1616 Símun Píta akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Wɔ kɛ ɔ́chí Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò, wɔ kɛ ɔ́chí Mmɔ Mandɛm anɛ áchí nɛpɛ́m.”
1617 Yesu akɛmɛ Píta bɛ, “Símun mmɔ̌ Jóna, ɛ́rɨ ntá yɛ ɛcha! Ɛtaya mmu áchí amfay kɛ ákʉ́ ɔ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ ndak anɛ, puyɛ̌ nkwǎ.
1618 Wɔ, ɔchí sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́,   nɛ ndǔ sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́ ɛsɛ́n kɛ nchí te ɛkɛt ɛya.   Nɛ yɛ̌ chí bɛtaŋá nɛwú bɛ́pú kway bɛtaŋ mɛncha nkwɔ bo Mandɛm.
1619 Nɛ chɔŋ nchyɛ́ wɔ bɛtaŋ amɛm Kɛfɔ Mandɛm. Nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɔ́gwɔ́rɛ́ fá amɨk, chɔŋ Mandɛm angwɔt yɔ awu amfay. Ɛnɛ́ ɔ́káŋárí, Mandɛm ǎkaŋari awu amfay.”
1620 Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, asɛmti yɛ bakoŋo bhi bati byo nɛ apay bɛ bákɛ́ kʉ yɛ̌ mmu andɨŋɨ bɛ yi chí Mpɛmɛ anɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò. 
1621 Bɛ́bhó mpok yɔ, Yesu abho bɛ́gháti bakoŋo bhi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛfakari nɛ yi. Arɛm bɛ yi abhɔŋ bɛrɔŋ Yerúsalɛm, nɛ arɛ́, bǒbati ɛtɔk, nɛ bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Moses mánchyɛ yi bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri, kpát mángwáy yi, kɛ ɛ́ghaka nɔkɔ manywɔp arat, ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
1622 Kɛ Píta asɔt yi nɛpak, abho bɛji yi bɛ, “Acha, Mandɛm ákɛ́ ka! Awǔ ndak ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛfakari nɛ wɔ!”
1623 Kɛ Yesu ayibhiri mmʉɛt ayɨŋɨ Píta, arɛm bɛ, “Satan, fá mɛ́ bɛsí! Ɔchí ɛrɛm ntá, ntá ya. Nkaysi yɛ chí nkaysi nkwǎŋwaŋ, abhɨ́kɨ́ fu ntá Mandɛm!” 
1624 Yesu aghati yɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi bɛ, “Mbák mmu ǎyàŋ bɛbhak nkoŋo wa, ángɔ́kɔ́ntɨk mmʉɛt yi, ampɔkɔ ɛkotákátí yi, ankoŋo mɛ.
1625 Yɛ̌ agha anɛ áyàŋ bɛpɛmɛ mmʉɛt yi ǎnɛm nɛpɛ́m ɛni. Kɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ áká mɛnɛm nɛpɛ́m ɛni ɛ̌ti ya, ǎbhɔŋ nɔ.
1626 Ntɨkɨ nsáy mmu ábhɔŋ mbák abhɔ̌ŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ fá amɨk, kɛ anɛ́m nɛpɛ́m ɛni? Nɛ mbák mmu ánɛ́m nɛpɛ́m ɛni, ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ yí ákwày bɛsɔt anchyɛ bɛ́ yi ampɛt ambɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛni?
1627 Nchí ghati bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mbɔnyunɛ chɔŋ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm mpɛtnsɛm fá amɨk nɛ bɛtaŋ Ɛtaya. Mbɔŋ bɛ́twɔ nɛ bɔángɛl Mandɛm, nchyɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu aywi akap, bɛ́kóŋo bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ́.
1628 Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, mbɔk yɛka báchí fá te abhɛn bápú gu kpátɛ mǎngɔ́ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm ndu nchí twɔ fá amɨk mbɔ Mfɔ bǒ mankɛm.”
17
171 Ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ manywɔp atandat, Yesu asɔt Píta, asɔt Jems nkwɔ́ nɛ manɔ ywi Jɔ̌n, akó amfay njiɛ ngo nɛ bhɔ, bábhak arɛ́ bɔ́bhɔ́.
172 Bápɛ́rɛ yɨŋɨ, bɛsí Yesu bɛ́yíbhiri bɛrɔbhɛ ghɔɔ ghɔ́ɔ mbɔ mmok. Ndɛn ɛ́yi nkwɔ ɛ́yíbhiri ɛrɔp pɛ́pɛ̌pɛ́p, ɛ́nkɔt nɔkɔ ŋwaŋwǎŋwaŋ.
173 Tɛ́mchok, Moses nɛ Ɛláija, barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm abhɛn tɛsáy bábhési, mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ kɛpɨ nɛ Yesu.
174 Píta abho bɛrɛm ntá Yesu bɛ, “Acha, ɛ́rɨ tontó bɛ sɛchi fá. Mbák ɔkɔŋ, chɔŋ nte bɛtɛm barat. Ɛmɔt ntá yɛ, ɛchak ntá Moses, nɛ ɛnɛ́fú ntá Ɛláija.”
175 Ɛnɛ́ Píta ábhɨ́kɨ́re naŋa ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yí árɛ̀m ntá Yesu, ɛkpɔkɔ́ nɛbhaŋ ɛnɛn nɛ́ghɔ̀ pɛ́pɛ̌pɛ́p ɛ́kúti bhɔ mankɛm. Ɛyɔŋ ɛ́fú ndǔ nɛbháŋ ɛnɔ ɛ́ré rɛm bɛ, “Nɛ́ chí Mɔ́wa. Nkɔŋ yí tontó. Ghók ka yi!”
176 Píta nɛ mamʉɛrɛ bhi bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛyɔŋ ɛyɔ, bɛcháy bɛkɛm bhɔ tontó, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap ákwɛ́n, atɛp bɛsí amɨk.
177 Kɛ Yesu arɔk, atɔk bhɔ arɛm bɛ, “Faté ká, bǎkɛ́ cháy.”
178 Báyóŋ nɔ́kɔ́ amɨ́k amfay, bɔ́ kɛpɛrɛ ghɔ yɛ̌ mmu. Ɛrɔp chi Yesu aywǐntí.
179 Nɛ ndǔ Yesu nɛ bɔPíta básɛ̀p njiɛ, Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎkɛ́ ghati yɛ̌ mmú ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ bǎghɔ́ fá, kpátɛ yi ankʉ Mmu anɛ áfú ntá yi ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.”
1710 Píta nɛ mamʉɛrɛ bhi bábhɛ́p Yesu bɛ, “Ndaká yí batɔŋ ɛbhé Moses bárɛ̀m bɛ Ɛláija abhɔŋ bɛpɛtnsɛm fá amɨk kɛ Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛ ǎtó antwɔ́?”
1711 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Ɛ́chí tɛtɛp bɛ́ Ɛláija abhɔŋ bɛ́yámbɨ antwɔ́, angoko yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ fá amɨk, kɛ Mpɛmɛ antwɔ.
1712 Kɛ nchí ghati bhe bɛ, Ɛláija anáŋ atwɔ kɛ bo bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ yi. Bákʉ́ nɛ yi mbɔ ɛnyǔ bákɔ́ŋɔ́. Nɔ́ kɛ̌ Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm nkwɔ ábhɔŋ chɔŋ ɛsɔŋɔri amɔ yap.”
1713 Mpok yɔ kɛ̌ bakoŋo Yesu bárɨ̀ŋɨ sayri sayri bɛ Yesu ǎrɛ̀m chi ɛ̌ti Jɔ̌n Njwiti. 
1714 Yesu nɛ bakoŋo bhi básɛ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ antɛn njiɛ, bátɛ́mɛri bɛyǎ bo abhɛn báchɛ́mɛ́ arɛ́ mánòŋ bhɔ. Mmu amɔt afú ndǔ ɛka yɔ, arɔk, atɛp mánɛ́n bɛsí Yesu,
1715 arɛm bɛ, “Acha, ghɔ́ ntínso nɛ mɔ́wa. Ǎkwɛn ntímɛn, nɛ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ́nɛ́ yí ábhɔ̀ŋ ɛya ɛcha. Bɛyǎ mpok, ǎkwɛn angó, ndɔŋ ɛchak, ǎkwɛn anyɛ́n.
1716 Nsɔt yí ntwɔ́ ntá bakoŋo bhɛ, kɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ kway bɛbu yi.”
1717 Yesu arɛm ntá bakoŋo bhi bɛ, “Bě mkpáká bho anɛ́ ábhɨkɨ bhɔŋ nɛka nɛ mɛ, bě bhó bǎyìbhiri tɛtɛp ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛchak, chɔŋ mpɛt ntat nɛ bhe ná? Chɔŋ nkɛ́pntɨ nɛ bhe ngaka fá? Twɔ́ ká nɛ mɔ́wu ntá ya.”
1718 Bárɔ́ŋɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ntá yi nɛ mɔ́wu, Yesu ásáy ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ yɔ, bɛ́ ɛ́ndɔ́ yi. Ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ́rɔ́ yi, ataŋ tɛ́mté.
1719 Mpok Yesu árɔ́bhɛ́ chí nɛ bakoŋo bhi, bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ndaká yí sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ kway bɛbok ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ yɔ?”
1720 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Chí ɛ̌ti bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm. Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, mbɔ bǎbhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm ɛnɛ́n nɛ́chí yɛ̌ chi nɨ́ŋɨ́nɨ́ŋɨ́ mbɔ mɔ́sɛpɛmɛ́nɔk ɛnɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ *mɔ́stat,   bǎkwáy bɛghati njiɛ bɛ́ ámfá fá andɔk nɛbhʉɛt áchák, ɛ́mfakari ɛnyu yɔ, nɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ kɛkwɛ́y bɛcha bhe. [Bo bákwày bɛ́bók ɛnyǔ ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ yɔ chí mbák báchí ndǔ nɛtarɛ́nsay nɛ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt]”   
1722 Ɛwak ɛ́mɔ́t, bakoŋo Yesu mankɛm bati byo nɛ apay bápɛ́t nɔ́kɔ́ nsɛm atú Gálili, Yesu aghati bhɔ́ bɛ, “Bákɛ́m chɔŋ Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm mámfyɛ yi amɔ bǒ mmɨk.
1723 Bǒ-bhɔ mángwáy yi, kɛ ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ manywɔp arat, Mandɛm ankʉ yi ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.” Bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛkʉ bakoŋo bábhɔŋ bɛyǎ basɛ́mɛ́. 
1724 Yesu nɛ bakoŋo bhi bárɔ́k baghaka Kapɛ̌naum. Ɛnɛ́ bɔ́ báchí arɛ, babhɛbhɛ́ nkábhɛ́nti abhɛn ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm bárɔ́k ntá Píta bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ntɔŋ ywɛka ǎchyɛ̀ nkábhɛ́nti anɛ ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm-ɛ?”
1725 Píta akɛmɛ bɛ, “Ɛɛ.” Píta apɛtnsɛm anywɔ́p bɛrɛm kɛpɨ nɛ Yesu. Kɛ ápɛ́rɛ rɛm ɛnyɨŋ, Yesu ayambɨ abhɛp yi bɛ, “Píta, ɔkáysí bɛ́ yí? Ntɨ́kɨ́ bhó báchyɛ̀ nkábhɛ́nti ntá bafɔ̌ mmɨk? Chí bɔ̌mɨk kɛ chi mankɔ?”
1726 Píta akɛmɛ bɛ, “Bafɔ básɔ̀t nkábhɛ́nti ntá mankɔ.” Yesu arɛm yɛ bɛ, “Ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ babhɔ̌ŋ bɔ̌mɨk bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛchyɛ nkábhɛ́nti.
1727 Kɛ tɛ̌ndu sɛ́pú yáŋ bɛkʉ bǒbhɛn mambe ntɨ, sɛp, dɔ́k manyu, gʉɛ́p áwám anyɛ́n. Nsi mbɨ anɛ ɔ́kɛ́mɛ́ nɛnɛ́ nnyu ywi. Chɔŋ ɔ́ngɔ́ nkáp arɛ anɛ akway bɛchyɛ awa nkábhɛ́nti anɛ ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm nɛ aywɛ. Sɔt wu chyɛ bhɔ.”
18
181 Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, bakoŋo Yesu bárɔ́k ntá yi babhɛp yi bɛ, “Ndǔ nkwɔ́ bhó abhɛn Mandɛm achi Mfɔ wap, ághá áchɨ́kɨ́ áchá báchák?”
182 Yesu abhɨŋɨ mandú mɔ, akʉ yi ate bɛsí bhap.
183 Arɛm bɛ, “Nchí ghati bhe bɛ mbák bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ yibhiri mǎndɔ́p mbɔ mǎmbɔ, bǎpú kway bɛbhak ndǔ mpǎy bho abhɛn Mandɛm achi Mfɔ wap wáwák.
184 Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ásɛ̀pti mmʉɛt mbɔ mǎmbɔ, yí wu kɛ ákway bɛchwe ndǔ kɛfɔ̌ mfay.” 
185 “Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ásìɛpti mandú mɔ mbɔ anɛ́, ɛ̌ti ya, ǎsìɛpti chí mɛ.
186 Chɔŋ ɛmbɛp ɛncha ntá mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ mɔ́wa amɔt anɛ abhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ mɛ ánkwɛ́n ndǔ bɛbʉ́. Ɛchi sayri ntá mmu wu, bɛ mánsɔt ntay nɛgho mánsɛt ɛmɨ ɛyi, mámɛsɛ yi amɛm manyu.
187 “Ɛ́bɛp ntá bǒ mmɨk ɛcha, mbɔnyunɛ bɔ́ bátwɔ̀ nɛ mamɔ anɛ ákʉ̀ bo mankwɛn ndǔ bɛbʉ́! Mamɔ ápú nɔk bɛ́twɔ, kɛ chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛ́p ntá mmu anɛ átwɔ̀ nɛ mamɔ ɛncha!
188 Ɛ́rɨ yɛ bɛ mbák awɔ ywɛ amɔt, nɛ yɛ̌ chi ɛkak ɛyɛ kɛ̌ ɛ́kʉ̀ ɔnkwɛn ndǔ bɛbʉ́, kpɔ́t awɔ wu, nɛ yɛ̌ chí ɛkak gʉɛp! Ɛ́chí sayri bɛ́ ɔ́mbák nɛ Mandɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti, yɛ̌ chí nɛ awɔ amɔt, yɛ̌ chí nɛ ɛkak ɛ́mɔt, ɛ́chá bɛ́mɛ́sɛ wɔ amɛm ngó anɛ apu nɛmɛ, nɛ amɔ apay, bɛkak bɛpay.
189 Nɛ mbák nyɛ́sɛ́ ɛnɛ nɛ́kʉ̀ bɛ́ ɔ́nkwɛ́n ndǔ bɛbʉ́, poŋórí nɔ́ fɛrɛ, ɔ́ngʉɛp. Ɛ́chí sayri bɛ́ ɔ́nchwe ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti nɛ nyɛ́sɛ́ nɛ́mɔt ɛcha mɛ́mɛ́sɛ wɔ amɛm nɛpǐngo nɛ amɨ́k ayɛ ankɛm apay.” 
1810 Yesu arɛm ntá bakoŋo bhi bɛ, “Sɔt ka mpok bɛ́ bǎkɛ́ byak yɛ̌ amɔt ndǔ nkwɔ bǎru bɔ̌bha abhɛn. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap abhɔŋ ángɛl amfay anɛ ákway bɛghati Mandɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ́ yi yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok. [Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm, ntwɔ́ chí bɛpɛmɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ánɛ́mɛ́ ɛbhɨ]
1812 Bǎkaysi bɛ yi? Mbák mmu abhɔŋ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n bɛsa bɛtay, amɔt anɛm ɛbhɨ, yí ǎkʉ yi? Pú ǎrɔ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n anɛ achi ndǔ nkwɔ́ bɛsa mɛnwi nsɛm nɛku nɛ anwi ambɨ̌-njiɛ, andɔk bɛyaŋ awu amɔt anɛ ánɛ́mɛ́?
1813 Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, mbák ayaŋ wú aghɔ, maŋák ǎyá yi antɨ ɛ̌ti ághɔ́ŋɔmɛn wu amɔt ɛncha maŋák amɛn yi ábhɔŋ bɛ anɛ́ bɛsa mɛnwi nsɛm nɛku nɛ anwi abhɨkɨ taka ɛbhɨ.
1814 Ɛ́chí ɛnyumɔt nɛ Ɛta yɛka mmu achi amfay bɛ apú yaŋ yɛ̌ mandú mɔ́ywi amɔt ánɛ́m ɛbhɨ.”   
1815 Bɛrɔŋ ambɨ Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Mbák ntɨ mǔnkwɔ ánkʉ́ wɔ bɛbʉ́, dɔ́k tɛmɛrí yi, mǎmbák ndiɛrɛ be bati apay. Mbák ɔkʉ yi ángɔ́ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bhi mǎnsokori ndakárɛ́, nɔ ɔwɛ́nɛ́ ntɨ mǔnkwɔ.
1816 Kɛ mbák abhɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛghok ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́rɛ̀m, pɛt dɔ́k ghɔ́ yi nɛ manɔ achak amɔt, yɛ̌ bati apay, yɛ̌ arat, bɛ́ bɔ́ mámbák batísiɛ ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bárɛ̀m.
1817 Mbák abhɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛghok bhɔ nkwɔ, kʉ nkwɔ Mandɛm mándɨ́ŋɨ́. Nɛ mbák bo Mandɛm bárɛm kɛ yí ǎchòk chi batú, dɔ̌ yi ambak yɛ̌ mbɔ mmǔ anɛ ápú chyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó, nɛ mbɔ mbɛbhɛ́ nkabhɛ́nti.
1818 Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎgwɔ́rɛ́ fá amɨk, Mandɛm ǎgwɔt awu amfay. Nɛ ɛnɛ́ bǎkáŋárí fá amɨk, Mandɛm ǎkaŋari yɔ awu amfay.
1819 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́chák ɛnɛ mɛ̌yaŋ mǎndɨŋɨ chi bɛ mbák bo bati apay mánká ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt fá amɨk ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bɔ́ báyàŋ nɛ mánɨ́kmʉɛt, Ɛtaya mmu achi amfay, ǎghók nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛnap.
1820 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ bakoŋo bha bati apay, bati arat, báchɛ́mɛ́ ɛ̌ti ya, nchí arɛ́ nɛ bhɔ.” 
1821 Píta arɔk yɛ ntá Yesu abhɛp yi bɛ, “Acha, mbák mmu ántóŋórí bɛkʉ mɛ bɛbʉ́, mbɔ̌ŋ bɛ́fóŋóri yi ndɔŋ ɛ́ní? Ndɔŋ tándrámɔt kɛ?”
1822 Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Wáwák! Mbák mmu ántóŋórí bɛkʉ wɔ bɛbʉ́, ɔbhɔŋ bɛ́fóŋóri yi maŋɔk bɛsa bɛrat nsɛm byo, ndɔŋ tándrámɔt.”
1823 “Dɔ̌ ka ngati bhe ɛ̌ti Kɛfɔ Mandɛm. Kɛ́chí mbɔ Mfɔ anɛ ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ bǒ bɛtɨk abhi bɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ wap ánkɛ́mɛ́ nkáp anɛ yi ákɛ̀m yi.
1824 Ábhó nɔ́kɔ́ bɛbhɛp barɛm ami, bátwɔ́ ntá yi nɛ mmu amɔt anɛ ákɛ̀m yi nkáp anɛ aya acha.
1825 Nkʉ bɛtɨk wu kɛkway bɛkɛmɛ bɛyǎ nkáp wu. Chi-bɛtɨk ywi achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ mántí yi nɛ ngɔrɛ́ ywi nɛ bɔ̌bhi, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́chák ɛnɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́, bɛ́ nkáp ywi ámfú.
1826 Mmǔ bɛtɨk wu ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, akwɛ́n bɛkak mfɔ wu abho mɛ́nɨkmʉɛt bɛ, ‘Acha, chyɛ̌ mɛ́ mpok, chɔŋ nkɛmɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌kɛm wɔ́.’
1827 Chi-bɛtɨk aghɔ́ nkʉbɛtɨk wu ntínso, afoŋori yi, afɛrɛ ntí ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákɛ̀m yi, arɔ yí ándɔ́k.
1828 Kɛ nkúbhɛ́ mmu anɛ mfɔ wu áfóŋórí áfú nɔ́kɔ́, arɔk atɛmɛri ntɨ nkʉbɛtɨk anɛ ákɛ̀m yi manyǔ nkáp anɛ ápú yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Akɛ́m yi angoŋo arɛm bɛ, ‘Kwɔ barɛm amɛn ɔ́kɛ̀m mɛ nɛ́nɛ.’
1829 Ntɨ nkʉbɛtɨk wu akwɛ́n yi bɛkak abho mɛnɨkmʉɛt bɛ, ‘Chiɛ́ mɛ́ mpok, chɔŋ nchyɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌kɛ̀m wɔ.’
1830 Kɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ ghok wáwák. Akʉ bákɛ́m mmʉɛrɛ ywi wu, bárɔk, bafyɛ ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ, bɛ mbák abhɨkɨ kwɔ barɛm ami ánáŋá, apú fú arɛ́.
1831 Batɨ̌ bǒ bɛtɨk bághɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákʉ́, batɨ ábé bhɔ tontó. Bárɔ́k bágháti mfɔ wu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ, ɛnɛ ɛfakari.
1832 Mfɔ achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ́ mándɔ́k mántwɔ́ nɛ yi. Bátwɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɛ yí, arɛm ntá yi bɛ, ‘Wɔ ɛbɛ́ptí nkʉbɛtɨk nɛ! Ɔ́nɨ́kmʉɛt ndɔ́ wɔ́ ɔrɔ̌ŋ nɛ bɛyǎ nkáp anɛ ɔ́kɛ́mɛ́ mɛ.
1833 Wɔ nkwɔ́ ɔpú kwáy bɛghɔ mbʉ ntɨ mǔbɛtɨk ntínso mbɔ ɛnyǔ ngɔ́ wɔ ntínso?’
1834 Mfɔ wu achyɛ ɛyɔŋ nɛ bɛyǎ bɛběntɨ́, bɛ mánsɔt yi mǎmɛ́sɛ ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ bɛ́ mbák abhɨ́kɨ́ kɛmɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákɛ́mɛ́, apu fú arɛ.”
1835 Yesu ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛtɛm nɛkay ɛnɛn, aghati bakoŋo bhi bɛ, “Nɔ́ kɛ̌ Ɛtaya mmu achi amfay ákʉ̀ nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ ywɛka anɛ ánísí bɛghɔ ntɨ ntínso, kɛ́ka bɛfoŋori yi nɛ ntɨ nɛnkɛm.”
19
191 Mpok Yesu ánáŋá bɛrɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn atú Gálili, afa, apé Nyɛ́n Jɔ́dan, asɛp, arɔk atú Judɛ́ya.
192 Bɛyǎ bhó bákóŋo yi arɛ, abú abhɛn mámè.
193 Ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ arɛ́, mbɔk bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bárɔ́k mɛmɔ yi, bábhɛp yi bɛ, “Yɛ̌ yí, yɛ̌ yi, ɛbhé ɛyɛsɛ ɛka bɛ mmu ándɔ́ ngɔrɛ́ ywi ndǔ nɛbhay kɛ ɛbhɨkɨ ka?”
194 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́re pay ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi amɛm ɛkáti Mandɛm-ɛ? Ɛ́ghàti bhɛsɛ bɛ, tɛ nɛbhǒmɨk, Mandɛm aghókó nyaka mɛnyǔ bo bapay, ngɔrɛ́ nɛ mbakanɛm,
195 arɛm bɛ, ‘Ɛ̌ti yɔ, mbakanɛm abhɔŋ bɛ́rɔ ɛtayi nɛ máyi, ambat mmʉɛt nɛ ngɔrɛ́ ywi,
196 bɔ́ batí apay mándɔp chi mmǔ amɔt.’ Bɔ́ kɛpɛrɛ bhak yɛ bati apay, kɛ mmǔ amɔt. Mmu ákɛ fyɛ yɛ ákɔ́rɛ́ nɛ́ntɨ bo abhɛn Mandɛm áchɛ́mɛ́.”
197 Bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bábhɛ́p Yesu bɛ, “Mbák ɛnyu yɔ kɛ ɛ́chí, ndaká yí Moses árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ́ mmu ǎkway bɛrɔ ngɔrɛ́ ywi mbák achyɛ yi ɛkáti awáy nɛbhay?”
198 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Chí ɛ̌ti nɛtaŋántɨ ɛnɛka kɛ̌ Moses áká nyaka bɛ bǎkway bɛrɔ baghɔrɛ́ bhɛka ndǔ nɛbhay. Ɛ́pú nyaka ɛnyu yɔ ndǔ nɛbhǒnɛt.
199 Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ, yɛ̌ agha anɛ árɔ́ ngɔrɛ́ ywi ndǔ nɛbhay, kɛbhák bɛ́ ngɔrɛ́ akwɛn bɛrwɔp, ambáy ngɔrɛ́ achak, akwɛn bɛrwɔp.”
1910 Yesu árɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, bakoŋo bhi bárɛm bɛ, “Mbák ɛ́chí nɔ́, ntí ápú yɛ́ anɛ mmu abhay ngɔrɛ́.”
1911 Kɛ Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Puyɛ̌ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu kɛ ǎkway bɛka bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn. Ndiɛrɛ bo abhɛn Mandɛm achyɛ́ bhɔ ntɨ bɛ́chɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, kɛ̌ bákway bɛka bhɔ.
1912 Mbɔk bo bachi bagú-bhó tɛ amɛm mɛniɛ. Abhɛ́nɛ́fú báchí bagú-bhó mbɔnyunɛ bo bachak kɛ bákʉ́ bɔ mámbák nɔ. Kɛ báchák bábhɨ́kɨ́ ka nɛbhay ndu báchyɛ́ mmʉɛt bɛkʉ bɛtɨk Kɛfɔ̌ mfáy. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ákwày bɛkoŋo ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ndɛ́mɛ́, ánkóŋó yɔ́.” 
1913 Bofú básɔ́t bɔ̌bhap bárɔ́k ntá Yesu nɛ bhɔ bɛ yi anyaŋa bhɔ amɔ anti, anɨkmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm anjɛt bhɔ. Bakoŋo bhi bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, bábho bɛsayti bhɔ bɛ bákɛ́ sɔŋɔri Yesu.
1914 Kɛ Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Dɔ̌ ká mǎmbɔ mantwɔ ntá ya, bǎkɛ́ chyɛt bhɔ mbi mbɔnyunɛ bǒ abhɛn bachi mbɔ bhɔ kɛ̌ Mandɛm ábhak Mfɔ awap.”
1915 Yesu árɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, asɔt bɔ̌bhɔ anyaŋa bhɔ amɔ anti, ayɛt bhɔ. Ákʉ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, arɔ nɛbhʉɛt wu arɔk ɛbhak ɛ́chak. 
1916 Ɛ́fákari bɛ mmu amɔt arɔk ntá Yesu, abhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, ntɨkɨ ɛrɨ́tí ɛnyɨŋ mɛ̌kwáy bɛkʉ kɛ Mandɛm anchyɛ mɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti?”
1917 Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Ndaká yí ɔ́bhɛ̀p mɛ ɛ̌ti ɛrɨ́tí ɛnyɨŋ? Mmǔ amɔt aywǐntí kɛ árɨ́. Mbák ɔ̌yáŋ yi anchyɛ wɔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti, ɔbhɔŋ bɛ́bhʉ́rɛ́ bɛbhé Mandɛm.”
1918 Mmǔ wu abhɛp Yesu bɛ, “Ɛbhɛ́n?” Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛbhé Mandɛm. Bɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Kɛ́ kwɛn bɛrwɔp. Kɛ́ wáy mmu, Kɛ́ ghɛp aghɛ́p. Kɛ́ te ntísiɛ akwarɛ,
1919 chyɛ̌ máyɛ nɛ ɛtayɛ kɛnókó. Nɛ ɔbhɔŋ bɛkɔŋ ntɨ nkwǎ mbɔ ɛnyu ɔ́kɔ́ŋɔ́ mmʉɛt ɛyɛ.’”
1920 Ɛsakámu yɔ arɛm bɛ, “Nnáŋ nchí bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́chák ɛ́bhʉɛ́t kɛ́?”
1921 Yesu aghati yi bɛ, “Mbák ɔ̌yáŋ ɔmbak chak ndǔ babhi ankɛm, dɔ́k tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ mɛnkɛm, chyɛ̌ nkáp ntá bachɛ́bhɛ́bho. Mbák ɔ́nkʉ́ nɔ, chɔŋ ɔ́mbɔŋ kɛfɔ̌ mɛnyɨŋ amfay. Ɔ́ntwɔ́ yɛ ɔnkoŋo mɛ.”
1922 Ɛsakámu yɔ ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, arɔbhɛ rɔŋɛrɔŋ nsónso mbɔnyunɛ abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ.
1923 Yesu ayibhiri mmʉɛt arɛm ntá bakoŋo bhi bɛ, “Nchí ghati bhe bɛ ɛ́bè mmʉɛt tontó bɛ mǔnkáp anka Mandɛm ambak Mfɔ ywi.
1924 Ɛ́chí wɨkɨrɨk bɛ mpɔŋɔ baso ámfʉɛ́t ndǔ mbok mbíábhan ɛ́cha mǔnkáp bɛ́ka Mandɛm ambak Mfɔ ywi.”
1925 Bakoŋo Yesu bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, bápɔ́p! Babho bɛbhɛp yi bɛ, “Mbák ɛnyu yɔ kɛ̌ ɛchi, ághá yɛ́ ákway bɛbhak mmu anɛ Mandɛm ápɛmɛ?”
1926 Yesu ayɨŋɨ bhɔ diíí, arɛm bɛ, “Ntá nkwǎŋwaŋ, mbi ápú, kɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ́pú cha Mandɛm.”
1927 Píta asá ɛyɔŋ arɛm bɛ, “Ná nɛ bhɛsɛ́? Sɛ́rɔ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ sɛ́kòŋo wɔ! Nsáy anɛ sɛ́bhɔ̀ŋ chí yí?”
1928 Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Nchí ghati bhe bɛ ndǔ mmɨk nkɔ, mpok Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm áchɔ̀kɔ ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ yi nɛ kɛnɛ́m kɛnkɛm, be bakoŋo bha bǎchɔ̀k nkwɔ́ ndǔ mɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ, bɛkɛm manɛrɛ́kɛt Israɛl byo nɛ apay.
1929 Nɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ árɔ́ yɛ̌ chí bɛkɛt, yɛ̌ chi bɔ̌mayi, yɛ̌ chí ɛ́táyi, yɛ̌ chí máyi, yɛ chí bɔ̌bhi, yɛ̌ chí bakɨ yi ɛ̌ti yí ákòŋo mɛ, chɔŋ ampɛt ambɔ́ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm ndɔŋ bɛsa bɛtay, ambɔ́ŋ nkwɔ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
1930 Kɛ chɔŋ bɛyǎ bo abhɛn bachi ambɨ nɛ́nɛ, mándɔp ansɛm, nɛ abhɛn bachi ansɛm, mándɔp bayǎmbɨ.”
20
201 Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Mbák Mandɛm achi nɛ bho mbɔ Mfɔ wap, mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́bhak mbɔ ɛnyu ɛ́chí ndǔ nɛkay ɛnɛn. Nɛkǎy ɛnɛn nɛchi bɛ, mbɔŋɔ́nkɨ̌fú achi nyaka. Ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, afa beti beti arɔk bɛyaŋ bǒ abhɛn bákʉ̀ bɛtɨk amɛm nkɨ ywi.
202 Aka nɛ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk abhɛn yi ayambɨ ásɔ́rɛ́ bɛ chɔŋ yi anchyɛ bhɔ nkáp anɛ́ ákwáy ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn nywɔp nɛmɔt. Ató yɛ́ bhɔ bɛ mándɔ́k mánkʉ́ bɛtɨk amɛm nkɨ ywi.”
203 Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ nkárɛ́nká nɛ́nɛnamɔt beti bhɔ, afa arɔk nɛfísiɛ, aghɔ́ bǒfu tété abhɛn babhɨkɨ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ.
204 Aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Dɔ́k ká nkwɔ ndǔ nkɨ wa mankʉ́ bɛtɨk arɛ́. Mǎnáŋ mǎmfáté beku, chɔŋ nchyɛ́ bhe nkáp anɛ ákwáy.” Báfʉɛ́t bárɔ́k.
205 Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ mbɔ nkárɛ́nká byo nɛ ɛpay, nɛ nkarɛnka ɛ́rát ɛnɛ ngósí, mbɔŋɔ́nkɨ wu akʉ ɛnyumɔt. Nɔ́ chí, asɔt bǒ bɛtɨk bachak ató ɛbhɨ.
206 Bɛ́rɔ́ŋ nkárɛ́nká ɛtay beku, apɛt afú, arɔk ɛtɔk, aghɔ́ bo báchák tété, ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bákʉ̀ ti. Abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Ndaká yí bǎchí fá tété, nywɔp nɛnkɛm, ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎkʉ ti?”
207 Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Sɛ́chí fá tété mbɔnyunɛ sɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ mmu anɛ ásɔ̀t bhɛsɛ ndǔ bɛtɨk.” Mbɔŋɔ́nkɨ wu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Dɔ́k ká nkwɔ mǎnkʉ́ bɛtɨk amɛm nkɨ wa.”
208 Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ běku, mpok bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk bápɛtnsɛm anywɔ́p, mbɔŋɔ́nkɨ abhɨŋɨ mmu anɛ áyɨ̀ŋɨ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk aghati yi bɛ, “Bɨŋɨ́ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk chyɛ bhɔ bakáp ayap, bɛ́bhó nɛ abhɛn bárɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛbhɨ ndɔbhɛnsɛm, bɛwɛnti nɛ abhɛn báyámbɨ.”
209 Abho nɛ abhɛn básɔ́rɛ́ bhɔ ndǔ bɛtɨk nkárɛ́nká ɛtay beku, achyɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ wap nkáp nywɔp nɛmɔt ankɛm.
2010 Ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ ntá bǒ abhɛn báyámbɨ bábhó bɛtɨk beti beti, bákáysi bɛ chɔŋ anchyɛ awap nkáp anja ancha anɛ bǒ abhɛn babho bɛtɨk chi beku. Kɛ achyɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ntí mmu chi ɛnyumɔt, nɔ chi nkáp bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn nywɔp nɛmɔt.
2011 Básɔ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bakap ayap, babho mɛnywinti ɛ̌ti mbɔŋɔ́nkɨ,
2012 mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Bǒ abhɛn bákʉ́ bɛtɨk chi ndǔ nɛŋɔkɔ́ nywɔp nɛmɔt, ɔchyɛ́ bhɔ nkáp ɛnyumɔt nɛ bhɛsɛ́ bhó sɛ́kʉ́ bɛtɨk ndǔ nywɔp nɛnkɛm amɛm ɛsɔ́ŋtí mmok.”
2013 Kɛ mbɔŋɔ́nkɨ akɛmɛ mmu wap amɔt bɛ, “Nkwǎnɛ, mbɨ́kɨ́ nyiɛ́ be yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Sɛ́ká ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt nɛ bhe bɛ mɛ̌chyɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka nkáp bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn nywɔp nɛmɔt. Pú nɔ́?
2014 Sɔt nkáp aywɛ dɔ́k. Mɛmbɔŋ kɛ̌ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ ntɨ bɛchyɛ mmu anɛ abho bɛtɨk ndɔbhɛnsɛm nkáp bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn nywɔp nɛmɔt mbɔ ɛnyǔ nchyɛ́ wɔ.
2015 Nkáp chi awa. Mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ ɛnyǔ nkɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ wú? Mpabhamɨ́k akʉ ɔ̌béntɨ ndǔ ntɔ́ŋɔ́ bǒbhɛn bɛrɨ̌ntɨ?”
2016 Yesu ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́tɛ́m nɛkay ɛnɛn, arɛm yɛ bɛ, “Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ ɛchi bɛ chɔŋ bɛyǎ bayǎmbɨ mándɔp ansɛm, nɛ bɛyǎ barɔbhɛ́nsɛm mándɔp ambɨ.” 
2017 Ɛnɛ́ Yesu ákɔ̀ bɛrɔŋ Yerúsalɛm nɛ bakoŋo bhi bati byo nɛ apay, asɔt bhɔ nɛpak, abho bɛghati bhɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́fákari nɛ yi.
2018 Arɛm bɛ, “Ghók ká, sɛ́rɔ̀ŋ nɔ chi Yerúsalɛm, nɛ mpok sɛ́gháká arɛ́, chɔŋ mámfyɛ Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm amɔ́ bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ ntá batɔŋ ɛbhé Moses, bɔ́ mándɛm bɛ mángwáy yi.
2019 Nɛ bǒbati mánsɔt yi mamfyɛ amɔ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl, bɛ́ mánjɔ́kɔ́ yi, nɛ bɛ mándɛ́n yí nɛ ɛkpa, nɛ bɛ mángó yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí. Kɛ ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ manywɔp arat, ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.” 
2020 Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, ngɔrɛ́ Sɛbɛdi asɔt bɔ̌bhi bati apay, arɔk ntá Yesu nɛ bhɔ. Atɛp mánɛ́n bɛsí bhi are bhɛ́p yi bɛ ankwak yi.
2021 Yesu abhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ɔ̌yáŋ mɛ̌nkʉ wɔ yi?” Akɛmɛ bɛ, “Ɛta, kʉ bɛ́ mpok ɔ́bhàk Mfɔ, bɔ̌bha abhɛn bati apay, manchɔkɔ nɛ wɔ, amɔt ɛbhe awɔ́nɛm, achák ɛbhe awɔ́ghɔ.”
2022 Kɛ Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́yàŋ nkʉ ntá yɛ. Bǎkwáy bɛka mɛnyu ɛsɔŋɔri anɛ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛ́nyú?” Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Sɛ́kwày bɛkʉ nɔ.”
2023 Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Tɛtɛp, chɔŋ mǎnyú nkɔ́p ɛsɔŋɔri anɛ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛnyu, kɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ bɛyap bo abhɛn babhɔŋɔ bɛchɔkɔ ɛbhe awɔ́nɛm ɛya nɛ abhɛn babhɔŋɔ bɛchɔkɔ ɛbhe awɔghɔ. Bɛbhak ɛbhɔ bɛchi ntá bǒ abhɛn Ɛtaya aghoko bhɔ́ ábhʉ́rɛ́ ntá yap.”
2024 Bakoŋo Yesu báchák bati byo bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bɔ̌ Sɛbɛdi barɛmɛ, bábhó bɛběntɨ nɛ mamʉɛrɛ bhap nɔ bachi nnɔ amɔt.
2025 Ɛ́kʉ́ Yesu abhɨŋɨ bhɔ mankɛm arɛm bɛ, “Bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ ntá bǒ mmɨk, bafɔ bábhɔŋ bɛyǎ bɛtaŋ amfay bǒbhap, nɛ bǒbati básɔ̀t bɛyǎ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ bǒbhap mángók bhɔ.
2026 Kɛ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛbhak ɛnyu yɔ ndǔ nkwɔ ywɛka. Mmu anɛ áyàŋ bɛbhak mǔngo ywɛka, abhɔŋ bɛbhak mǔbɛtok ywɛka,
2027 nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka anɛ áyàŋ bɛbhak mmǔ mbɨ abhɔŋ bɛbhak nsɛm aywɛka,
2028 nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm mbɨ́kɨ́ twɔ bɛ bo mántók mɛ. Ntwɔ chi bɛbhak mǔbɛtok, nɛ bɛchyɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛna ndu bɛku bɛyǎ bhó, mfɛ́rɛ́ bhɔ ndǔ kɛsɛmɛ́ bɛbʉ́.” 
2029 Yesu ǎfù nyaka ɛtɔk Jɛríko nɛ bakoŋo bhi. Ngɛ́mtay bho báré koŋo bhɔ.
2030 Manɛ́mámɨk bati apay babhak nɛpaká mbi chɔkɔ. Bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ Yesu kɛ̌ áfʉɛ̀t, bábho bɛbɨk mandɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Ɛta, Mmɔ̌ Mfɔ Debhít! Ghɔ́ bhɛsɛ́ ntínso!”
2031 Bo abhɛn bachi arɛ bábhó bɛsayti manɛ́mámɨk bhɔ bɛ, “Kusí ká!” Kɛ bákpɨk bare bɨk nɛ ɛyɔŋ amfay bɛ, “Acha, Mmɔ̌ Mfɔ Debhít! Ghɔ́ bhɛsɛ ntínso!”
2032 Yesu ate, abhɨŋɨ bhɔ, abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎyàŋ bɛ́ nkʉ bhe yí?”
2033 Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Ɛta, sɛ́yàŋ ɔ́nkʉ́ amɨ́k yɛsɛ ánɛ́nɛ́.”
2034 Yesu aghɔ́ bhɔ ntínso. Atɔk amɨ́k ayap. Tɛ́mté wu, babho bɛghɔ mbaŋ nɛ babho bɛkoŋo Yesu.
21
211 Yesu nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi bákɔ́ baghaka ndǔ bɔ̌bɛtɔk Bɛtfágɛ nɛ Bɛ́tani, ndǔ Njiɛ Mɛnok Ólif, kɛkwɔt nɛ Yerúsalɛm. Aré, ató baghɔkɔ́ bhi bati apay ambɨ.
212 Ápɛ́rɛ tó bhɔ, aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Dɔ́k ká ndǔ mɔ́tɔk anɛ achi afɔ ambɨ. Nɛchwe bǎchwè ɛtɔk, chɔŋ mǎngɔ́ mpɔŋɔ batu sɛsɛ́t, nɛ mɔ́ywi. Kaŋárí ká, mǎntwɔ fá nɛ yɔ.
213 Mbák yɛ̌ mmu abhɛp be ntí anɛ bǎkàŋari yɔ, ghatí ká yi bɛ, ‘Acha, áyàŋ yɔ.’ Tɛ́mté wu, chɔŋ yi andɔ mǎnsɔt yɔ.”
214 Ɛ́fákari nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyu ɛyɔ bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ árɛ́mɛ́ nyaka ɛ́mfú tɛtɛp. Ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ arɛm nyaka bɛ,
215 “Ghatí bo Síɔn   bɛ́ mfɔ wap ǎtwɔ̀. Abhɔŋ nɛsɛptǐmʉɛt, ǎtwɔ chɔkɔ amfǎy mpɔŋɔ batu, amfay mɔ́mpɔŋɔ batu.”
216 Bakoŋo Yesu bhɔ bárɔ́k bakʉ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi aghati bhɔ.
217 Básɔ́t mpɔŋɔ batu yɔ nɛ mɔ́ywi, bárɔ́k ntá Yesu nɛ yɔ. Básɔ́t ndɛn mfǎmʉɛt yap basɔbhɛri yɔ, Yesu akó achɔkɔ amfay.
218 Bɛyǎ bo abhɛn bachi arɛ, báfɛ́rɛ ndɛn mfǎmʉɛt yap baghay ambi. Báchák báré kpɔt bɛ́wɔ́kɛ́ndé mángay nɔkɔ ndǔ mbi anɛ yí áfʉɛ̀t arɛ́.
219 Bɛyǎ bho báré rɔŋ ambɨ, bachak mankoŋo nɔkɔ ansɛm. Yesu abhak nɛ́ntɨ́ ɛnap. Bɔ́ mankɛm báré bɨk mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Sɛ́mbɨ́tí Nyiɛ̌ nɛwú Mfɔ Debhít! Mandɛm ánjɛ́t mmu anɛ átwɔ̀ ndǔ nnyɛ́n Acha! Sɛ́mbɨ́tí Mandɛm mfay!”
2110 Nɛchwe yí áchwé Yerúsalɛm, ɛtɔk ɛnkɛm ɛ́nyɨ́kɨ́si tɨkɨ̌tɨk. Bo bábhó bɛbhɛp batɨ bɛ, “Anɛ mmu átwɔ̀ chi agha?”
2111 Bo abhɛn bákɔ̀ nɛ yi báré kɛmɛ mandɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Chí Yesu, Ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm anɛ áfú Násárɛt, atú Gálili.” 
2112 Yesu áchwé nɔ́kɔ́ ɛtɔk, arɔk amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm. Abók bakɔ̌siɛ nɛ bo abhɛn bákù mɛnyɨŋ. Atakati bɛ́fɛ́mɛ́ bo abhɛn bákɔ̀ ɛsiɛ bakap bɛwupsi. Atakati nkwɔ́ mɛnɔk bo abhɛn bátì bɛbhóŋó.
2113 Ndǔ Yesu ákʉ̀ nɔ, aghati bhɔ bɛ, Mandɛm arɛm bɛ, “Ɛkɛt ɛya ɛ́bhɔŋ bɛbhak chi ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt, kɛ bǎyibhiri yɔ ɛ́rɔp nɛbhʉɛt anɛ baghɛ́p bábhɛ̀sɛ arɛ.” Nɔ́ kɛ̌ básɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm.
2114 Ɛnɛ́ Yesu ábhʉɛ́t amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, bɛyǎ manɛ́mámɨk nɛ bakɛm bárɔ́k ntá yi, abú bhɔ mankɛm.
2115 Bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Moses bághɔ́ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛn Yesu ákʉ́. Bághɔ́ nkwɔ ndǔ mǎmbɔ bábɨ̀k amɛm ɛkɛrákap mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Bakak nɛ kɛnókó ámbák nɛ Nyíɛ́-nɛwu Mfɔ Debhít!” Baghɔ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, batɨ ábé bhɔ amɛm tontó.
2116 Bábhɛ́p Yesu bɛ, “Ɔpú ghók nɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bɔ̌bhɛn bárɛ̀m-ɛ?” Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Nchí ghók. Nɔ́ tɛ̌ bǎchí, bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ re ghók wáwák ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ basɨŋɨ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm?” Básɨŋ bɛ, “Ɔkʉ mǎmbɔ nɛ abhɛ́n babhʉɛt amɔ mándɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛchyɛ wɔ bakak nɛ kɛnókó?”
2117 Yesu árɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bhɔ, afa Yerúsalɛm arɔk Bɛ́tani, abhʉrɛ arɛ. 
2118 Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, Yesu afa abho bɛpɛtnsɛm Yerúsalɛm. Nsay akɛ́m yi.
2119 Ndǔ árɔ̀ŋ, aghɔ́ ɛnɔk fig nɛ́kú mbi. Arɔk arɛ́, kɛ yɛ̌ mɔ́sɛpɛmɛ́nɔk akɛ ghɔ́ amfay. Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ fʉɛ́t chí bɛyé bɔbhɔ. Yesu arɛm ntá ɛnɔk ɛyɔ bɛ, “Tɛ̌ mmɨk ámáy, ɔpú pɛrɛ kway mɛnyu kɛpɛm.” Ɛnɔk fig ɛyɔ ɛgu tɛ́mté.
2120 Baghɔk Yesu bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fákárí, bábhák maknkay tontó. Bábhó bɛrɛm nɛ batɨ bɛ, “Yi ɛ́kʉ́ ɛnɔk fig ɛnɛ ɛgu tɛ́mté ɛnyunɛ?”
2121 Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, mbák mǎmbɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm tɛtɛp, kɛmakati bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn yí ábhɔ́ŋɔ́, bǎkwáy bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ nkʉ ɛnɔk fig ɛnɛ. Nɛ bǎkwáy bɛ́gháti yɛ̌ chí njiɛ nɛ bɛ ‘Fǎ fá kwɛ́n awu amɛm manyu,’ ɛ́mfakari ɛnyu yɔ.
2122 Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mǎnɨkmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm anchyɛ bhe, apú rɔ bɛchyɛ bhe, mbák mǎnókó.” 
2123 Yesu achwe amɛm ɛkɛrákap, abho bɛtɔŋ bho Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm. Ndǔ yí ákʉ̀ nɔ, bǒbati bachiǎkap nɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk báchák bárɔ́k ntá yi bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ bɛtaŋ ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɛ ɔ́kʉ̀? Agha áchyɛ́ wɔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɔ?”
2124 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mɛnkwɔ mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt bɛbhɛp be. Mbák mǎnkɛ́mɛ́ mɛ yɔ, chɔŋ mɛnkwɔ ngati be mmu anɛ áchyɛ́ mɛ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ̌kʉ̀.”
2125 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛbhɛp be chi bɛ, “Agha áchyɛ́ nyaka Jɔ̌n Njwiti bɛtaŋ bɛjwiti bho? Mandɛm, kɛ chí bǒ mmɨk?” Báre kɛm ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ batɨ bɛ, “Chɔŋ sɛ́ndɛm bɛ yi? Mbák sɛ́ndɛm bɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn Jɔ̌n bɛ́fú nyaka ntá Mandɛm, ǎbhɛ́p bhɛsɛ bɛ, ‘Kɛ ndaká yi bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ noko ɛyɔŋ ɛyi?’
2126 Nɛ mbák sɛ́ndɛ́m bɛ, ‘Bɛ́fǔ nyaka ntá nkwǎ’, nɔ́ sɛ́yàŋ ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ bǒ bhɛsɛ́ mbɔnyunɛ bɔ́ mankɛm mánoko sayri bɛ Jɔ̌n achi nyaka ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm.”
2127 Bákɛ́mɛ Yesu chi bɛ, “Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ.” Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Mɛnkwɔ́ mpú ghati yɛ bhe mmu anɛ áchyɛ́ mɛ́ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɛ́ mɛ̌kʉ̀.” 
2128 Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Bǎrɛm bɛ́ yi ɛ̌ti ndak anɛ? Mmu amɔt achi nyaka nɛ bɔ̌bhi bati apay. Bábhák bɔ̌ babhakanɛm. Ɛwak ɛ́mɔt abhɨŋɨ anɛ mbɨ aghati yi bɛ, ‘Mɔ́wa, dɔ́k kʉ́ bɛtɨk amɛm nkɨ ɛchɔŋ.’”
2129 Mɔ́wu akɛmɛ bɛ, “Mpú rɔ́ŋ.” Kɛ ansɛm mpok, awupsi ntɨ arɔk.
2130 Chi afʉɛ́t arɔk ntá mmɔ̌ anɛ mɔ́nkwɛn, aghati yi nkwɔ bɛ, “Mɔ́wa, dɔ́k amɛm nkɨ kʉ bɛtɨk ɛchɔŋ. Mɔ́wu akɛmɛ yi bɛ ‘Ɛta, chɔŋ ndɔk.’ Kɛ akɛrɔ́ŋ.
2131 Ghatí ká mɛ. Ndǔ bɔ̌bhɔ bati apay, anɛ ághókó ɛ́táyi, akʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi áyàŋ chí anɛ́?” Bǒ mankɛm bakɛmɛ bɛ, “Anɛ nsénsí.” Yesu aghati bǒbati bo Israɛl bhɔ bɛ, “Dɨŋɨ́ ká tɛtɛp bɛ bǒ bɛbʉ́ mbɔ babhɛbhɛ́ nkábhɛ́nti nɛ baghɔrɛ́-nɛkɔ báyámbɨ bɛ́bhɔ́ŋ mbi bɛbhak bǒ abhɛn Mandɛm achi nɛ bhɔ mbɔ Mfɔ wap, ɛnɛ́ bǎrɔ̀p nsɛm.
2132 Nchí rɛm nɔ mbɔnyunɛ Jɔ̌n Njwiti atwɔ́ nyaka ntá yɛka bo Israɛl mankɛm, bɛtɔŋ bé ɛnyǔ mmu ákwáy bɛbhʉrɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛni chak bɛsí Mandɛm, kɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ noko ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m. Babhɛbhɛ́ nkabhɛnti nɛ baghɔrɛ́-nɛkɔ kɛ̌ mánókó ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m. Yɛ̌ndu bǎghɔ́ bɛ́ babhɛbhɛ́ nkábhɛ́nti nɛ baghɔrɛ́-nɛkɔ mánóko Jɔ̌n, bǎkɛ tɨ́knsɛm bɛ mǎnókó ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yí árɛ̀m.” 
2133 Ghok ka nɛkay nɛ́chák, “Mmǔfú abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka nkɨ. Apɨ mɛnɔk vain arɛ. Atɛp ɛbhá ɛnɛ ɛghabhɛri nkɨ ankɛm. Atɛ́m mbok aghoko nɛbhʉɛt anɛ báyàt kɛpɛm váin, bɛ nnok ywi amfu, mánsɔt, máná mmɛ́m. Ate mɔ́kɛrɛ́mfay amɛm nkɨ wu, bɛ́ ámbák nɛbhʉɛt anɛ mmu áchɔ̀kɔ ndu bɛ́bhábhɛ́ri nkɨ. Afyɛ́ yɛ bo arɛ́ bɛ mánkʉ bɛtɨk mánkɔrɛ nsáy nɛ yi. Arɔ, arɔk nɛkɔ ɛtɔk ɛchak.
2134 Mpok bɛkɔk kɛpɛmɛ́nɔk ákwáy nɔ́kɔ́, mbɔŋɔ́nkɨ ató bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk bhi bachak bɛ mándɔ́k mánsɔ́t aywi ákɔ́rɛ́ mbwɔt.
2135 Kɛ báchwɔ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ amɛm nkɨ, bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk ndǔ nkɨ bákɛ́m bhɔ. Bádɛ́n amɔt, báwáy áchák, bátɛ́mtí anɛfú nɛ batay.
2136 Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, mbɔŋɔ́nkɨ wu afɛrɛ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk abhi báchák ató. Báyá báchá abhɛn mbɨ. Kɛ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk abhɛn báchí amɛm nkɨ bákɛ́m bhɔ, bákʉ́ ɛnyumɔt nɛ bhɔ́, mbɔ ɛnyǔ bákʉ́ nɛ abhɛn mbɨ.
2137 Ndǔ ngwɛnti, mbɔŋɔ́nkɨ arɛm nɛ mmʉɛt yi bɛ, ‘Chɔŋ ntó mbɔŋ mɔ́wa. Yɛ̌ yí, bábhɔŋ bɛ́chyɛ yi kɛnókó.’ Afɛrɛ yɛ mɔ́ywi ató.
2138 Kɛ nɛghɔ́ anɛ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk bághɔ́ yi, bábhó bɛrɛm nɛ batɨ bɛ, ‘Yɨŋɨ́ mbɔ̌ŋ mɔ́ywi nɛ́, nɛ yí kɛ̌ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛ́nyiɛ́ nɛwú ɛtayi. Twɔ́ ká sɛ́nkɛm yi sɛ́ngwáy bɛ́ ɛtayi ánáŋ ángú, mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhi mɛ́ndɔp chi ɛbhɛsɛ.’
2139 Bákɛ́m yɛ́ yi, baya, báfú amɛm nkɨ nɛ yi, barɔk baway.”
2140 Yesu ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́tɛ́m nɛkay ɛnɛn, abhɛ́p yɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk Israɛl bɛ, “Bě bǎkáysí bɛ́ mpok mbɔŋɔ́nkɨ wu ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm nɛkɔ ɛnɛn yí árɔ́ŋɔ́, ǎkʉ yi nɛ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk bhɔ?”
2141 Bǒbati bhɔ bakɛmɛ Yesu bɛ, “Mpok anɛ mbɔŋɔ́nkɨ wu ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm, ǎkʉ bɛbɛ́ptí bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk bhɔ mángú ɛbɛ́ptí nɛwú, ansɔt nkɨ wu anchyɛ ntá bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk abhɛn bápú nɔ́k bɛchyɛ yi aywi ákɔ́rɛ́ mbwɔt tɛ́mté, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́fú ɛbhɨ.”
2142 Yesu abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ re pay ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm? Básɨŋ bɛ, ‘Nkúbhɛ́ ntay ɛnɛn batěkɛt bágʉɛ́bhɛ́ bɛ́ nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨ, nɔ́ kɛ nɛ́rɔ́bhɛ́ ntay ɛnɛn nɛ́kɛ́mɛ́ ɛkɛt nɛchá batay áchák ankɛm. Mandɛm kɛ ákʉ́ bɛ́ ɛ́mbák ɛnyu yɔ, nɛ ɛchi ndaká maknkay tontó ntá yɛsɛ!’
2143 “Mɛ̌ghàti yɛ be bɛ, chɔŋ Mandɛm amfɛrɛ áfɔ́k anɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ ndǔ yí áchí nɛ bhe mbɔ Mfɔ ywɛka, anchyɛ ntá bo báchák abhɛn bákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi áyàŋ bɔ mankʉ.” [Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ akwɛnɛ ndǔ ntay ɛnɛn, ǎsìɛpti ndǔ mbɨŋ, nɛ mmu anɛ ntay ɛnɛn nɛ́kwɛ́nɛ́ yi amʉɛt, nɛ́chɔ̀kɔti yi.]
2145 Bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ bakay yɔ nɔ́ Yesu átɛ́mɛ́, bárɨ́ŋɨ bɛ ǎrɛ̀m nɔ chí ɛ̌ti yap.
2146 Báre yaŋ bɛkɛm yi, kɛ báchày nyaka bɛyǎ bo abhɛn báchi arɛ, mbɔnyunɛ bárɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka bɛ bǒbhɔ básɔt Yesu mbɔ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm.
22
221 Yesu apɛt abho bɛghati bhɔ mɛnyɨŋ ndǔ bakay.
222 Yí bɛ, “Mbák Mandɛm achi nɛ bho mbɔ Mfɔ wap, mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́bhak mbɔ ɛnyu ɛchi ndǔ nɛkay ɛnɛn. Mfɔ amɔt anak nyaka ɛpǎ nɛbhay ntá mɔ́ywi.
223 Mpok ɛpa ákwáy nɔ́kɔ́, ató bɔ̌-bɛtok abhi bɛ́ mándɔ́k mángátí bǒ abhɛn yi ánáká bɛ mpok akway. Kɛ yɛ̌ amɔt kɛ twɔ.
224 Apɛt abhɨŋɨ bɔ̌-bɛtok abhi báchák aghati bhɔ bɛ, ‘Dɔ́k ká ghati bo abhɛn nnáká bɛ́ ngwáy bhɔ bɛsɛnɛ́ mpɔŋ nɛ mǎnáŋ mana nɛnyíɛ́, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́náŋ ɛ́chí téé. Dɔ́k ká ghati bhɔ mántwɔ́.’
225 Kɛ ndǔ bo abhɛn yi ánáká mankɛm, yɛ̌ mmu amɔt abhɨ́kɨ́ fyɛ ntí. Mánkʉ nɔkɔ chi ɛbhap mɛnyɨŋ. Amɔt arɔk ɛbhɨ ɛyi, achák arɔk chí ɛkɛrɛ́siɛ ɛyi,
226 abhɛ́nɛ́fú bákɛ́mti bɔ̌-bɛtok abhɛn mfɔ wu átó, bádɛn mbɔ nnya baway.
227 Mfɔ wu abhɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ bɛběntɨ. Ató batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bhi bárɔ́k báwáy bǒbhɔ, básɔ́ŋ ɛtɔk ɛyap.
228 Abhɨŋɨ yɛ bɔ̌-bɛtok abhi arɛm bɛ, ‘Mpok ɛpa akway. Kɛ bǒ abhɛn nnáká bátɔŋ bɛ babhɨkɨ kway bǒ abhɛn bátwɔ̀ ndǔ ɛpǎ ɛya.
229 Dɔ́k yɛ́ ká ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbay, mǎnák yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ bǎghɔ́, bɛ́ ántwɔ́ ndǔ ɛpǎ nɛbhay.’
2210 Bɔ̌bɛtok bhɔ bárɔ́k bakʉ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi ághátí bhɔ. Bábhɨ́ŋɨ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu. Mmǔ mbʉ́mbʉ mǎmbɨŋɨ bhɨ́ŋɨ, mmǔ ndɨ́ndɨ́ mǎmbɨŋɨ bhɨŋɨ. Ɛ́kʉ́ ɛkɛt ɛpǎ nɛbhay ɛ́jwí nɛ bo.
2211 “Kɛ mpok mfɔ áchwé anywɔ́p bɛghɔ bǒ abhɛn yi ánáká, aghɔ́ bɛ́ mmu amɔt abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ nkú-nɛbhay amʉɛt.
2212 Abhɛ́p mmu wu bɛ, ‘Nkwǎnɛ, ɔkʉ́ ná kɛ ɔ̌chwe fá, nkú-nɛbhay wɔ amʉɛt tí?’ Ɛcha mmu wu ɛnyɨŋ bɛrɛm.
2213 Mfɔ achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ mánkɛ́m yi mángwɔ́t amɔ nɛ bɛkak, mámɛsɛ nɛfí ndǔ ɛjuri. Arɛ́, bo bábhak ndǔ nɛdǐ kɛbhɔ nɛ nɛnyiɛ́ ámɛ́n.”
2214 Yesu ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛtɛm nɛkay ɛnɛn, arɛm bɛ, “Mandɛm ǎnak bɛyǎ bho, kɛ ǎyap chí bǎrú.” 
2215 Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, mbɔk bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bárɔ́k báté ɛyu, babho bɛyaŋ ɛnyǔ bákway bɛkʉ Yesu ánkwɛ́n anyu, bɛ bɔ mámbɔ́ŋ mbi bɛkɛm yi.
2216 Báká ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt, bátó mbɔk bakoŋo bhap nɛ mbɔk bo Israɛl abhɛn báté ansɛm Hɛ́rɔd ntá Yesu bɛ mámbɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ wɔ ɔchí mmu tɛtɛp, nɛ bɛ́ ɔ̌tɔ̀ŋ bho mbi Mandɛm tɛtɛp. Sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ ɔpú yɨŋɨ mmu ndǔ bɛsí ɔ́ncháy yi.
2217 Ghatí yɛ bhɛsɛ, ɛbhé yɛsɛ ɛka bɛ sɛ́nchíɛ nkábhɛ́nti ntá Mfɔ Rom kɛ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ ka?”
2218 Yesu arɨŋɨ nkaysi mbʉ́mbʉ yap. Arɛm bɛ, “Bě bho bɛtábhá, ndaká yí mǎmɔ̀ mɛ?”
2219 Aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Tɔ́ŋ ká mɛ nkáp kpokorok anɛ básɔ̀t bɛchyɛ ndǔ nkábhɛ́nti.” Bátwɔ́ yi nɛ ɛbhɔkɔ nkáp.
2220 Yesu asɔt akɛ́m awɔ, abhɛ́p bhɔ́ bɛ, “Ntí ághá nɛ́ arɛ? Nɛ nnyɛ́n chi ɛnɛn ághá?”
2221 Bákɛ́mɛ yí bɛ, “Chí ntí Sísa, Mfɔ Rom. Nɛ nnyɛ́n, chi ɛni.” Yesu aghati yɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Chiɛ́ yɛ́ ka mfɔ Rom yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi ɛyi, mǎnchyɛ Mandɛm yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi ɛnɛ Mandɛm.”
2222 Bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu arɛmɛ, bápɔ́p! Bárɔ́ yi, barɔk ɛbhak ɛyap. 
2223 Nkúbhɛ́ nywɔp ɛnɔ, mbɔk bǒnkwɔ Sádusi bárɔ́k ntá Yesu bɛbhɛp yi ɛnyɨŋ ndu bɛkʉ yi ánkwɛ́n anyu. Bǒnkwɔ Sádusi babhɨkɨ noko nyaka bɛ ɛwak ɛ́mɔt bawú bápɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
2224 Bábhɛ́p Yesu bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, Moses asɨŋ ndǔ ɛbhé ɛyɛsɛ bɛ, mbák mmu ángú ándɔ́ ngɔrɛ́ kɛ bɔ́ kɛbhɔŋ yɛ̌ mmɔ́, mɔ́mayi abhɔŋ bɛsɔt ngɔrɛ́ wu bɛ́ ámbé bɔ nɛ yi ndǔ nnyɛ́n manɔ anɛ ágú.
2225 Bɔ̌ chi amɔt bati tándrámɔt báchí nyaka fá. Anɛ mbɨ abháy ngɔrɛ́, agú ɛnɛ́ yi abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ yɛ̌ mmɔ́. Anɛ ákòŋo yi, asɔt kɛ́nkwɛ́sɛ́ wu ndǔ nɛbhay.
2226 Yí nkwɔ agú, kɛbhɔŋ mmɔ́ nɛ kɛ́nkwɛ́sɛ́ wu. Ɛ́fákari ɛnyumɔt nɛ anɛ ájwí bati arat, nɛ bɔ̌mayi bachak nkwɔ.
2227 Ndǔ ngwɛnti, ngɔrɛ́ wu nkwɔ agú.
2228 Ndu ɛchi nɔ, mpok Mandɛm ákʉ̀ bawú mámpɛ́tnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, ngɔrɛ́ wu ǎbhák anɛ agha? Ndu bɔ́ mankɛm, bati tándrámɔt, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap abhay nyaka yi.”
2229 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛ́chí nɛ bhe tontó! Nti achi bɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ yɛ̌ chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm nɛ yɛ̌ chi bɛtaŋ Mandɛm.
2230 Mpok Mandɛm ákú bawú mámpɛ́tnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, bo bábhak mbɔ bɔángɛl awu amfay. Bápú pɛrɛ bhay nɛbhay.
2231 Kɛ mbák mǎmàkati bɛ bawú bapu kway bɛpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, nɔ bǎrɛm bɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ re pay ndǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ágháti bhe? Ɛ́chí amɛm ɛkáti bɛ́ Mandɛm arɛm bɛ,
2232 ‘Mɛ nchí Mandɛm Ábraham, Mandɛm Áisek, nɛ Mandɛm Jekɔ́p!’ Mandɛm achí Mandɛm bo abhɛn bachi nɛpɛ́m. Apú Mandɛm bawú.”
2233 Bɛyǎ bo abhɛn báchí nyaka arɛ bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu árɛ́mɛ́, manyu áchók bhɔ, bɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ ɛnyǔ nɛtɔ́ŋ ɛnɛn Yesu átɔ̀ŋ. 
2234 Bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bághók bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu ághátí bǒnkwɔ Sádusi ɛ́kʉ́ manyu áchók bhɔ. Báté ɛyu, báyáŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́chák ɛnɛ bábhɛp Yesu.
2235 Mmǔ wap amɔt anɛ áchí ɛsáyrí ntɔŋ ɛbhé Moses arɔk mɛmɔ Yesu. Abhɛ́p yi bɛ,
2236 “Ntɔŋ, ɛbhé ɛnɛ ɛ́chá bɛbhé Moses bɛ́chák chi ɛ́nɛ́?”
2237 Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, chí ɛbhé ɛnɛ ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “‘Kɔŋ Mandɛm Acha ywɛ nɛ ntɨ ɛnɛ nɛnkɛm, nɛ ɛfóŋó yɛ ɛnkɛm, nɛ nkaysi yɛ nkɛm’.
2238 Ɛnɛ́ kɛ ɛchi ɛbhé mbɨ, nɛ yɔ́ kɛ ɛ́chá bɛchak mɛnkɛm.
2239 Ɛnɛ́ ɛ́jwí bɛpay ɛ́chi mbɔ ɛnɛ́, nɛ ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Kɔ́ŋ ntɨ nkwǎ mbɔ ɛnyu ɔ́kɔ́ŋɔ́ mmʉɛt ɛyɛ.’
2240 Bɛbhé ɛbhɛn bɛpay bɛ́kútí yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ bo mándɨ́ŋɨ́, mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛchi ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn Moses ásɨ́ŋɨ́, nɛ ɛbhɛn barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm básɨ́ŋɨ́.” 
2241 Ɛnɛ́ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi babhʉɛt ɛbhak ɛ́mɔt nɛ Yesu, yi abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ,
2242 “Ndǔ nkaysi yɛka, Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò abhɔŋ bɛbhak mmɔ̌ agha?” Bákɛ́mɛ Yesu bɛ, “Abhɔŋ bɛbhak ɛbhárɛ́mɔ Debhít.”
2243 Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Ná ɛchi yɛ bɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm ákʉ nyaka Mfɔ Debhít ambɨŋɨ yi bɛ ‘Acha?’ Mfɔ Debhít arɛm nyaka bɛ,
2244 ‘Mandɛm Acha arɛm nyaka ntá Acha wa bɛ, chɔkɔ fá ɛbhě awɔ́nɛm ɛya ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ-kɛnókó,   kpatɛ nkʉ bǒmpap abhɛ mándɔp mbɔ ɛnɔk ɛnɛ ɔ́nyàŋa chɔŋ bɛkak arɛ.’
2245 Yesu abhɛ́p yɛ bhɔ bɛ, mbák Mfɔ Debhít ǎbhɨ̀ŋɨ nyaka Mpɛmɛ́ rɛ́ bɛ Acha. Ná Achǎ-rɛ áyibhiri ambak ɛbhárɛ́mɔ ywi?”
2246 Yɛ̌ mmu kɛkway bɛkɛmɛ Yesu ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ábhɛ́bhɛ́ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi. Nɛ bɛ́bhó mpok ɛyɔ, yɛ̌ mmu kɛpɛrɛ mɔ bɛbhɛp yi yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
23
231 Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, Yesu abho bɛghati bakoŋo bhi nɛ bɛyǎ bo abhɛn bachi ɛbhak ɛ́mɔt nɛ yi bɛ,
232 “Batɔŋ-ɛbhé Mandɛm nɛ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi kɛ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ bɛghati bho mbɔ̌ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chí amɛm bɛkáti ɛbhɛn Moses asɨ́ŋɨ́.
233 Bǎbhɔŋ yɛ bɛkoŋo chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bárɛ̀m, bǎkɛ́ kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ́ bákʉ̀. Nchí rɛm nɔ mbɔnyunɛ bɔ́ babhɔŋ bápú kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ́ bághàti bho wáwák.
234 Bábày bho mɛnwɔ́ptí batu anti bɛ mámpɔ́kɔ́, ndǔ bɛyǎ bɛbhé ɛbhɛn bɔ báfyɛ̀, kɛ bɔ́ babhɔŋ bápú kwak bo mámbʉ́rɛ́ bɛbhé bhɔ yɛ̌ mandú.
235 Bákʉ̀ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛyap chi ndu bɛtɔŋ mmʉɛt. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt ɛchi bɛ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap ǎsɔt Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ansɨ́ŋ amfyɛ amɛm bɔ̌mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ nchóŋ ambat nɛfó purɛ́ɛ́, angwɔ́t ɛ́chák ndǔ ɛrɛbháwɔ, kɛ́mbyáká bɛjɛnjɛ̌mɛ́ ndɛn ɛyap nkwɔ bɛ́sàpti mɛ́ncha ɛnyu bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛbhak.
236 Bákɔŋ nkwɔ́ bɛ́chɔkɔ ndǔ bɛbhaká kɛnókó amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt nɛ ndǔ bɛpa.
237 Bákɔŋ nkwɔ bɛ bo mánkaka nɔ́kɔ́ bhɔ nɛfísiɛ nɛ kɛnókó. Nɛ bákɔŋ bɛ bo mambɨŋɨ nɔkɔ bhɔ bɛ, ‘Ntɔŋ’.
238 Yɛ̌ mmu ywɛka ákɛ́ ka mámbɨ́ŋɨ́ yi bɛ, ‘Ntɔŋ! Bǎbhɔŋ chi ntɔŋ amɔt, nɛ be mankɛm bǎchi chi batɨ bǒnkwɔ.’
239 Nɛ bǎkɛ́ bhɨŋɨ ntɨ mǔnkwɔ bɛ, ‘Ɛta mbɔnyunɛ bǎbhɔŋ chí chi amɔt, yí mmú áchí amfay.’
2310 Nɛ mmu ywɛka ákɛ́ ka batɨ mámbɨ́ŋɨ́ yi bɛ, ‘Ntɔŋ’   mbɔnyunɛ bǎbhɔŋ chi amɔt, Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò.
2311 Mmu anɛ áchá báchák abhɔŋ bɛbhak mǔbɛtok ywɛka.
2312 Yɛ̌ agha anɛ áyòŋ mmʉɛt, Mandɛm ǎsɛpti yi amɨk, nɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ásɛ̀pti mmʉɛt amɨk, Mandɛm ǎkosi yi amfay.” 
2313 Yesu abho yɛ bɛrɛm ntá batɔŋ ɛbhé Moses nɛ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bɛ, “Bě batɔŋ ɛbhé Moses, nɛ be bǒnkwɔ Fárisi, bo bɛtábhá! Chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛp ntá yɛka ɛncha mbɔnyunɛ bǎchyɛ̀t bo mbǐnywɔp bɛ bákɛ́ rɔ Mandɛm ambak Mfɔ wap. Bě babhɔŋ bǎpú ka Mandɛm ambak Mfɔ ywɛká, nɛ bǎchyɛ̀t mbi ntá abhɛn bákway bɛyaŋ bɛchwe arɛ! [Bě batɔŋ ɛbhé Moses, nɛ be bǒnkwɔ Fárisi, bǒ bɛtábhá! Chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛ́p ntá yɛka ɛncha. Bǎsɔt bɛkɛt mánkwɛ́sɛ́, mǎnkʉ nɔkɔ bɛrɔ́rí nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt, bɛrwɔ bho bɛ bǎchi bɛsayri bo Mandɛm. Ɛ̌ti yɔ, chɔŋ ntɛ́msí yɛka ancha anɛ bo bachak.]
2315 Bě batɔŋ ɛbhé Moses, nɛ be bǒnkwɔ Fárisi, bǒ bɛtábhá! Chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛ́p ntá yɛka ɛncha. Bǎkway bɛkɔ mǎnkɨŋɨ bɔmanyu mǎndɔk mbaŋ nɛ mbaŋ mɛ́nú bɛyaŋ yɛ̌ chí mmu amɔt bɛ ámbák mǔnkwɔ ywɛka. Kɛ mpok yi ayibhiri arɔbhɛ mbɔ bhe, nkúbhɛ́ bé kɛ̌ bǎkʉ yi ámbɛ́p ancha be babhɔŋ ndɔŋ ɛpay, ambak mmǔ anɛ árɔ̀ŋ ndǔ nɛpǐngo.
2316 “Bě manɛ́mámɨk abhɛn bǎyà bho mbi, chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛ́p ntá yɛka ɛncha! Bě bǎrɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Mbák mmu ámfyɛ́ bariɛp nɛ Mandɛm bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ, anjɨkɨ ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm bɛtɔŋ bɛ yi abhɔŋ bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛyɔ, kɛ yi kɛkʉ yɔ, yɛ̌ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛpu bhak.’ Nɛ bɛ, ‘Mbák mmu ánjɨ́kɨ́ ambɨŋɨ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, abhɔŋ bɛ́bhʉrɛ bariɛp ami.’
2317 Bě bɛchɨŋtǐ manɛ́mámɨk! Ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm kɛ̌ ɛ́chá mɛnyɨŋ gol, kɛ mɛnyɨŋ gol kɛ bɛcha ɛkɛrákap ɛnɛ ɛkʉ́ mɛnyɨŋ gol mɛ́mbak nyáŋá?
2318 Nɛ bǎrɛ̀m bɛ mbák mmu ámfyɛ́ bariɛp nɛ Mandɛm bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ, anjɨkɨ ambɨŋɨ nnyɛ́n ɛ́fɛ́mɛ́ akap Mandɛm bɛtɔŋ bɛ abhɔŋ bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛyɔ kɛ yi kɛkʉ yɔ, yɛ̌ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ́pú bhak. Bǎrɛm nkwɔ́ bɛ Mbák mmu ánjɨ́kɨ́ ndǔ nnyɛ́n mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bábhʉ́rɛ́ ndǔ ɛ́fɛ́mɛ́ bɛchyɛ akap ntá Mandɛm, abhɔŋ bɛ́bhʉrɛ bariɛp ami.
2319 Bě manɛ́mámɨk! Bɛsí Mandɛm, ɛ́fɛ́mɛ́ akap Mandɛm kɛ̌ ɛcha mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bábhʉrɛ arɛ́ ndu bɛchyɛ akap, kɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ kɛ bɛcha ɛ́fɛ́mɛ́ akap Mandɛm? Pú ɛ́fɛ́mɛ́ yɔ kɛ̌ ɛ́kʉ̀ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bábhʉ́rɛ́ arɛ ɛmbak nyáŋá?
2320 Ndu ɛ́chí nɔ́, mmu anɛ árɛ̀m ndak, anjɨkɨ ambɨŋɨ nnyɛ́n ɛ́fɛ́mɛ́ akap Mandɛm, abhɔŋ bɛrɨŋɨ bɛ, ayɨ́kɨ́ nɔ nkwɔ ndǔ nnyɛ́n yɛ̌ntɨkɨ akap anɛ achi ndǔ ɛ́fɛ́mɛ́ yɔ.
2321 Nɛ mmu anɛ árɛ̀m ɛnyɨŋ, anjɨkɨ ambɨŋɨ nnyɛ́n ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, abhɔŋ bɛrɨŋɨ bɛ, ayɨ́kɨ́ nɔ́ nkwɔ chi ndǔ nnyɛ́n Mandɛm mmu achi amɛm ɛkɛrákap,
2322 nɛ mmu anɛ árɛ̀m ɛnyɨŋ anjɨkɨ, ambɨŋɨ mfay, abhɔŋ bɛrɨŋɨ bɛ ǎyɨkɨ nɔ chi ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ Mandɛm nɛ Mandɛm mmu áchɔ̀kɔ arɛ.”
2323 Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Bě batɔŋ ɛbhé Moses, nɛ bě bǒnkwɔ Fárisi, bǒ bɛtábhá, chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛ́p ntá yɛka ɛncha! Bǎsɔt ndu bɛ́rɨ amɔt ndǔ baru byo mǎnchyɛ ntá Mandɛm, mǎnkʉ ɛnyumɔt nɛ mbwɔ́t achak, kɛ bǎpú fyɛ́ ntí bɛbhak chak nɛ bo mankɛm, bǎpú fyɛ́ ntí bɛghɔ bho ntínso, nɛ bǎpú fyɛ́ ntí bɛbhak tɛtɛp nɛ bo mankɛm. Ɛ́rɨ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɛcha bɛkɔrɛ mɛnyɨŋ baru byo, mǎnchyɛ ndu amɔt ntá Mandɛm. Ɛ́rɨ nyaka bɛ mǎnkóŋó ɛbhé ɛnɛ bɛkɔrɛ mɛnyɨŋ ndǔ baru byo mǎnchyɛ ndu amɔt ntá Mandɛm, kɛ bǎbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ nyaka bɛghɔkɔntɨk bɛbhé bɛ́chák.
2324 Bě manɛ́mámɨk abhɛn bǎyà bho mbi, bǎsɔt mpok bɛ́fɛ́rɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mɔ́nya anɛ áchí amɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mǎnyú, kɛ mpɔŋɔ baso mǎmɛnɛmɛ́n ham.
2325 “Bě batɔŋ ɛbhé Moses, nɛ be bǒnkwɔ Fárisi, bǒ bɛtábhá, chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛp ntá yɛka ɛncha! Chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛp ntá yɛka ɛncha mbɔnyunɛ bǎsɔ̀t mpok bɛ́tyɛt nsɛm-ámok nɛ nsɛmɛ́ nchán, kɛ batɨ yɛka ájwí nɛ bɛpɔ̌ nkaysi ndǔ bǎsɔt mɛnyɨŋ bho nɛ bɛtaŋ, nɛ ndǔ bǎchi bo batɨ rakáraka.
2326 Bě Nkwɔ Fárisi, manɛ́mámɨk! Ya ká mbɨ sǒ mmɛm ámók nɛ mmɛm nchán. Mbák mǎnkʉ nɔ, chɔŋ nsɛm-ámok nɛ nsɛmɛ́ nchán ɛ́ndyɛrɛ pɛ́pɛ̌pɛ́p nkwɔ.
2327 “Bě batɔŋ ɛbhé Moses, nɛ be bǒnkwɔ Fárisi, bǒ bɛtábhá! Chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛ́p ntá yɛka ɛncha mbɔnyunɛ, bǎchí mbɔ manɛm anɛ bághókó sayri, bawati nɛ mbɨ pɛ́pɛ́p, ɛnyu ɛnɛ mmu ághɔ̀, ankɔŋ, yɛ̌ndu bɛrɛnɛ́ bawú ɛbhɛn mɛ́náŋ bɛ́chɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ bɛghɛp kɛ bɛchi amɛm.
2328 Ɛnyu yɔ kɛ̌ bǎchi. Mmu ǎghɔ be ankaysi bɛ bǎchi chak nɛ bho, kɛ batɨ yɛka ájwí amɛm nɛ bapu nɛ bɛbʉ́.” 
2329 Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Bě batɔŋ ɛbhé Moses, nɛ be bǒnkwɔ Fárisi, bǒ bɛtábhá, chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛ́p ntá yɛka ɛncha! Bachǐmbɨ bhɛka baway nyaka barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ nɛ bo abhɛn bachi chak bɛsí Mandɛm. Bǎtè manɛm ayap nɛ́nɛ, mǎngwati nɔkɔ mbɨ arɛ́ bɛkʉ yɔ ándɨ́ amɨ́k.
2330 Bǎkʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mǎndɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, ‘Mbɔ bhɛsɛ sɛchi nyaka mpok bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ, mbʉ́ sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ ka nɛ bhɔ bɛ mángwáy barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm Acha.’
2331 Nɛrɛm anɛ bárɛ̀m nɔ ǎtɔŋ bɛ bě bǎbhɔŋ bárɛ̀m nɛ manyu yɛka bɛ bǎchi ɛnyumɔt mbɔ bachǐmbɨ bhɛka abhɛn báwáy nyaka barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm.
2332 Dɔ́k yɛ́ ka ambɨ mǎnáŋá bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn bachǐmbɨ bhɛka bábhó.
2333 Bě nnyɔ́ ɛnɛ! Bě bho bǎbɛbhɛ bǎchá mbɔ̌ŋ bɛfé! Bǎkáysí bɛ́ bǎkway bɛbhɔŋ mbi bɛbʉɛ bɛ Mandɛm akɛ tɛmsi bhe amɛm nɛpǐngo?
2334 Ghók yɛ́ ka, nchí to be baghatǐ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ áchí ndɨŋɨndak ndu ákòŋo Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm. Chɔŋ ntó be bátɔ̀ŋ-Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm nkwɔ́. Chɔŋ mǎngwáy mbɔk ɛyap, mǎngo báchák ndǔ bɛkotakati, nɛ mǎndɛn abhɛ́nɛ́fú nɛ bɛkpa amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛbhɛka, mǎnkoŋo nɔkɔ bɔ́ bɛtɔk nɛ bɛtɔk ndu bɛkɛm bhɔ bɛway.
2335 Chɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛnkʉ bɛ manoŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ achi chak anɛ bo báwáy, ámbák be anti, bɛ́bho nɛ manoŋ Ábɛl mmu achí nyaka chak bɛsí Mandɛm, bɛghaka ndǔ manoŋ Sakaría mmɔ̌ Barákia, mmu bǎwáy nyaka nɛntɨ ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm nɛ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ báchyɛ̀ akap arɛ́.
2336 Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, chɔŋ Mandɛm antɛmsi be bho mkpák anɛ ɛchɔŋ mankɛm ɛ̌ti bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bě nɛ bachǐmbɨ bhɛka bǎkʉ́.” 
2337 Yesu akók arɛm bɛ, “Eé Yerúsalɛm, bǒ Yerusalɛm! Bě bo bǎwày barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm, mǎntɛmti nɔkɔ nɛ batay ndu bɛway bo Mandɛm átó bɛ mángátí bhe Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi. Ndǔ bɛyǎ mpok, njáŋ bɛsɔt bhe mfyɛ́ amʉɛt bɛ́ mǎmbak nɛ mɛ mbɔ bɔ̌nkɔk abhɛn nnɔ nkɔk ákútí nɛbhʉɛt amɔt nɛ bɛbhap ɛbhi, kɛ bǎpú ka bɛ nkʉ nɔ!
2338 Nɛ nɛ́nɛ, chɔŋ Mandɛm andɔ ɛkɛt ɛyɛka, ɛ́ndɔp ɛnyu yɔ.
2339 Nɛ dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ, bǎpú pɛrɛ ghɔ́ chɔŋ mɛ wáwák kpatɛ mpok anɛ bǎrɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Sɛ́mbɨ́tí mmu anɛ átwɔ̀ ndǔ nnyɛ́n Mandɛm Acha.’”
24
241 Mpok Yesu árɔ́ ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm árɔ̀ŋ, baghɔkɔ́ bhi bábhɨ́ŋɨ yi, mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ yi ángɔ́ ndǔ ɛkɛt ɛyɔ ɛrɨ ɛcha!
242 Kɛ akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Pú bǎghɔ̌ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn básɔ́rɛ́ báté bɛkɛt ɛbhɛn bɛchi ndǔ ɛkɛrákap kɛ ɛ́bhak ɛnyunɛ? Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, mpok ǎtwɔ̀ anɛ ɛkɛt ɛnɛ ɛ́rɔ̀ŋ amɨk ɛnkɛm, yɛ̌nyɨŋ kɛrɔp téé.” 
243 Ɛnɛ́ Yesu achi chɔ́kɔ́ ambɨ Njiɛ Mɛnɔk Ólif. Bakoŋo bhi bárɔ́k ntá yi. Yɛ̌ mmu achak kɛbhak nɛ bhɔ. Bárɛ́m bɛ, “Ɛta, ghati bhɛsɛ, chɔŋ ɛ́mfakari nɔ ntɨkɨ mpok, nɛ ntɨkɨ ɛrɨŋ ɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ bo mándɨŋɨ bɛ mpok anɛ ɔ́twɔ̀ arɔp kɛ́kwɔ́t, nɛ bɛ́ mandú mpok mmɨk ǎmay?”
244 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Sɔt ka mpok bɛ́ yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́ rwɔ́ bhe!
245 Bɛyǎ bo bátwɔ̀ chɔŋ mánsɔt nnyɛ́n ɛna mántɛn ambɨ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap andɛm nɔkɔ bɛ ‘Yi kɛ achi Mpɛmɛ anɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtó!’ Nɛ mándwɔ bɛyǎ bhó bɛ mánjibhiri batɨ yap.
246 Chɔŋ mǎngók nsóŋó nɛnu, mǎngok mbok ɛ̌ti manu anɛ achi nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ nɛ anɛ átwɔ̀ ansɛm. Kɛ bǎkɛ́ chay. Mɛnyǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bɛ́bhɔŋ bɛfakari, kɛ ɛyɔ ɛpu tɔŋ bɛ ngwɛnti mmɨk aghaka.
247 Chɔŋ bɛtɔk mɛ́nu nɛ bɛtɔk bɛ́chák, bafɔ̌ ɛtɔk mánu nɛ batɨ̌ bafɔ̌ ɛtɔk. Chɔŋ nsay ankwɛ́n mbaŋ nɛ mbaŋ, mmɨk anyɨkɨsi ndǔ bɛtɔk nɛ bɛtɔk.
248 Kɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm bɛchi chi mbɔ nɛbhǒnɛt ɛnɛn bɛbe ntá ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ánòŋsi.
249 “Mpok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fàkari, chɔŋ mánkɛm be mámfyɛ amɔ́ bǒbati ɛtɔk bɛ mányok bhe sayri, mángwáy bhe. Nɛ chɔŋ bǒ bɛtɔkɔ́ mmɨk mankɛm mámpap bhe ɛ̌ti bǎchí bakoŋo bha.
2410 Nɛ mpok yɔ, chɔŋ bɛyǎ bakoŋo bha mánkɛmɛ mmʉɛt ansɛm, mánti nɔkɔ batɨ ntá bǒbati ɛtɔk, nɛ mámpabhɛ nɔkɔ batɨ.
2411 Mpok yɔ, bɛyǎ bo báfù, mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ báchí baghatǐ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm, ɛnɛ́ bárùɔ bho rwɔ́ bɛ mankoŋo bhɔ.
2412 Chɔŋ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo bákʉ̀ mɛ́nja kpát bo kɛpɛrɛ kɔŋ batɨ.
2413 Kɛ mmǔ anɛ átè kákátí tɛ ndǔ ngwɛnti, Mandɛm ǎpɛmɛ yi.
2414 Nɛ bo bábhɔŋ bɛghati Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ nɛ ɛ̌ti Kɛfɔ Mandɛm ndǔ bɛtɔkɔ́ mmɨk mɛnkɛm, bɛ́ amɛm yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛtɔk bo mámbɔ́ŋ mbi bɛghok yɔ, kɛ Mandɛm ankʉ ngwɛnti mmɨk antwɔ́.” 
2415 “Chɔŋ mǎngɔ ‘Ɛrɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm ápábhɛ́’ téé amɛm Ɛkɛrɛ́ Mandɛm ndu ɛ́nyɔ̀p yɔ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Daniɛl ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm árɛ́mɛ́ tɛsáy bɛ chɔŋ ɛ́mfakari.” [Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ápay ɛkáti ɛnɛ́ ámfyɛ anti, anjwimɛm.]
2416 “Mpok yɔ, bǒ abhɛn bachi atú Judɛ́ya mámbʉ́ɛ́, mámbɛ́sɛ́ amfǎy njiɛ.
2417 Mpok yɔ, mbák ɛ́fákárí bɛ́ mmu ǎkʉ bɛtɨk amfǎy ɛkɛt ɛyi, ákɛ́ sɔŋɔri mmʉɛt bɛsɛp kpɨk bɛ andɔk amfɛrɛ mɛnyɨŋ anywɔ́p kɛ ambʉɛ.
2418 Nɛ mmu anɛ achi ɛbhɨ ákʉ̀ bɛtɨk, ákɛ́ rɔ́ŋ kpɨ́k bɛbuɔp ndɛ yi.
2419 Nɛ chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛ́p ɛncha ntá baghɔrɛ́ abhɛn báchi nɛ mɛniɛ nɛ abhɛn báchí nɛ bɔ amɔ mpok yɔ!
2420 Nɨk nɔ́kɔ́ ka mmʉɛt bɛ mpok bɛbʉɛ ákɛ́ kwɛn yɛ̌ chi mpok mbaŋ ǎkwɛn chaɛɛ, nɛ yɛ̌ chi ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt.
2421 Bǎkɛ rɔ mɛnɨkmʉɛt, mbɔnyunɛ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ́ bo bábhɔ̀ŋ mpok yɔ chi ɛnyǔ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ re ghɔ wáwák tɛ nɛbhǒmɨk. Nɛ mpok yɔ ánáŋ ámfʉɛ́t, ɛnyǔ ɛsɔŋɔri yɔ ɛpu pɛrɛ bhák wáwák.
2422 Nɛ mbɔ Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ kpɔt manywɔp yɔ bɛ akɛ ya, mbʉ yɛ nkwǎŋwaŋ amɔt apu rɔp nɛpɛ́m. Kɛ Mandɛm akpɔt mpok ɛsɔŋɔri yɔ mbɨŋ ɛ̌ti bo abhɛn yi áyábhɛ́ bɛ mambak abhi.
2423 Mpok yɔ, mbák mmu ángátí bhe bɛ, ‘Ghɔ́ ká Mpɛmɛ anɛ Mandɛm átó fá’, yɛ̌ chi bɛ, ‘Ghɔ́ yi awu!’ Bǎkɛ́ noko bɛ ɛchi tɛtɛp.
2424 Bǎkɛ́ noko bɛ́ ɛ́chí tɛtɛp mbɔnyunɛ chɔŋ bǒ bɛtábhá mantwɔ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap andɛm nɔkɔ bɛ yi kɛ achi Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎto. Chɔŋ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ nsé nkwɔ mantwɔ. Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap ǎtwɔ, ankʉ nɔkɔ bɛrɛmɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ndu bɛrwɔ bho. Nɛ mándwɔ́ yɛ̌ chí bǒ abhɛn Mandɛm áyábhɛ́ bɛ mámbák abhi, mbák bábhɔŋ mbi bɛkʉ nɔ.
2425 Sɔt yɛ ka mpok! Nnáŋ ngati nɔ bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ambɨ ambɨ.
2426 Ndǔ ɛchi nɔ, mbák yɛ̌ mmu angati bhe bɛ, ‘Yɨŋɨ́ ka Kristo awu amɛm baso’, bǎkɛ́ noko mǎmfá bɛrɔŋ arɛ. Yɛ̌ mmu andɛm chi bɛ, ‘Yɨŋɨ́ ká Kristo fá amɛm mɔ́kɛt’ bǎkɛ́ noko ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m.
2427 Bǎkɛ́ rɔ mmu ándwɔ́ bhe mbɔnyunɛ, mbɔ ɛnyǔ miámiaŋ ákɔ̀t, angɔɔ, bɛfu ɛbhɔ́kɔ́ nɛbu ɛ́mɔt bɛghaka ɛchak, nɔ́ kɛ̌ ɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛbhak mpok Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm nchí twɔ.
2428 Nɛbhʉɛt anɛ ɛgú-nnya ɛchi, arɛ́ kɛ̌ kɛnɛn ɛkɛ́n kɛ́nyìɛ bɛgú nnya kɛ́chɛmti. 
2429 “Mbák manywɔp anɛ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri yɔ ámay, mmok ánɛm tɛ́mté, ntaŋ kɛpɛrɛ ghɔɔ, mambe ámfu amfay ánkwɛnti, nɛ bɛtaŋ mfáy mɛnyɨkɨsi.
2430 Mpok yɔ kɛ̌ ɛrɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ Mɛ Mmǔ mfú ntá Mandɛm nchí twɔ ɛ́bhesi yɛ amfay, nɛ bǒ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nnɛrɛ́kɛt fá amɨk mámbo mɛ́miak nɛ amɔ mámbɨkɨ nɔkɔ ndǔ kɛbhɔ áyɔ́mɛ. Nɛ mángɔ nɔkɔ ndǔ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm nchí sɛp nchí twɔ amɛm nɛbháŋ ɛnɛn mfay nɛ bɛtaŋ, mbaŋ ɛ́nkɛm ɛ́ngɔ nɔkɔ nɛ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ Mandɛm.
2431 Nɛ ɛrɛm ɛyɔŋɔ́ mmba ɛ́nkwɛn. Chɔŋ ntó bɔángɛl abha ndǔ mmɨk nkɛm, mánsɔt bo abhɛn Mandɛm áyábhɛ́, bɛbho ndǔ ɛbhɔ́kɔ́mɨk ɛ́mɔt bɛghaka ndu ɛchak, mánchɛm nɛbhʉɛt amɔt. 
2432 “Ghɔ́k ká ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛnɔkárɛm ɛnɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ́ ‘Fig’ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bhɛsɛ. Ɛ́náŋ ɛ́mbó bɛtɛm bɛtɔ́, bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ́ ɛso ɛ́rɔp chi kɛkwɔt.
2433 Ɛ́chí ɛnyumɔt nɛ nɛtwɔ wa, Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm. Mǎnáŋ mǎngɔ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm nɛ ngátí bhe bɛ́fàkari, dɨŋɨ́ ka bɛ mpok nɛtwɔ wa arɔp kɛkwɔt.
2434 Nchí ghati be tɛtɛp bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm bɛ́bhɔŋ bɛfakari, kɛ mkpáká bho abhɛn ɛchɔŋ amfʉɛ́t.
2435 Chɔŋ mfay amfʉɛt, mmɨk amfʉɛt, kɛ Ɛyɔŋ ɛya ɛ́pú fʉɛt wáwák. 
2436 “Kɛ yɛ̌ mmu abhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ mbɔ̌ŋ mpok anɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́fàkari. Bɔangɛl Mandɛm bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ, Yɛ̌ chí Mmɔ Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ. Ɛta aywǐntí kɛ̌ arɨŋɨ.
2437 Mpok anɛ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm nchí twɔ, mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́bhak mbɔ ɛnyǔ bɛ́chí nyaka mpok Nóa.
2438 Eghorǐ manyiɛp ɛ́pɛ́rɛ twɔ ndǔ mpok Nóa, bo mányìɛ̀ nyaka mányu nɔkɔ, nɛ mámbay nɔkɔ babhay, nɛ mántoko nɔkɔ bɔ, kpátɛ mpok anɛ Nóa áchwe amɛm ɛrɛmɛ́ áchwí anɛ Mandɛm ághátí nyaka Nóa ángókó.
2439 Bo bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ nyaka ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́fákari, kpátɛ mpok ɛ́ghorǐ manyiɛp ɛ́twɔ. Nɛ mpok ɛ́twɔ ɛ́pɔ́kɔ bɔ mankɛm. Ɛnyu yɔ kɛ̌ nɛtwɔ wa, Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm ábhák chɔŋ.
2440 Mpok yɔ, mbák bǒ bati apay bachi ɛbhɨ bákʉ̀ bɛtɨk, bákway bɛsɔt amɔt mándɔ achak.
2441 Nɛ mbák baghɔrɛ́ bati apay bachi nɛbhʉɛt amɔt bákɔ̀k nchwi, bákway bɛsɔt amɔt mándɔ achák.
2442 Bák yɛ́ ka pě, mbɔnyunɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ nywɔp ɛnɛn Acha yɛka átwɔ̀.
2443 Bǎbhɔŋ bɛrɨŋɨ bɛ mbák mbɔŋɔ́kɛt arɨ́ŋɨ́ mpok anɛ ngɛ́p átwɔ̀ ɛkɛt ɛyi, apú bhʉɛrɛ kɛnɔ́. Ǎbhak pě, bɛ ngɛ́p akɛ twɔ andak ɛkɛt.
2444 Bě nkwɔ́ bǎbhɔŋ yɛ bɛbhak pě mpoknkɛm, mbɔnyunɛ, Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm, nchí twɔ́ chí mpok anɛ yɛ̌ mmu apu kway bɛkaysi bɛ mɛ̌twɔ.” 
2445 Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Agha yɛ́ áchí mmɔ̌bɛtok tɛtɛp anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ kɛboŋ nɛ mbɔŋɔ́kɛt ásɨ́kɨ́ntɨ nɛ yí? Chí mmɔ̌bɛtok anɛ mbɔŋɔ́kɛt ákway bɛrɔ ɛkɛt ntá yi, angati yí bɛ ánchyɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɛnyíɛ́ ntá batɨ̌ bɔ̌-bɛtok ndǔ mpok.
2446 Chɔŋ ɛ́ndɨ ntá mmɔ̌bɛtok wu ɛncha mpok chi-bɛtɨk ywi afu nɛkɔ, apɛtnsɛm, aghɔ́ bɛ́ yi ǎkʉ̀ bɛtɨk ɛbhi sayri.
2447 Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ chi-bɛtɨk apú nɔ́k bɛrɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛyi awɔ́ mmɔ̌bɛtok wu.
2448 Kɛ mbák mmɔ̌bɛtok achi ɛbɛ́ptí mmu, andɛm nɛ mmʉɛt yi bɛ, ‘Mbɨ́kɨ́ kaysi bɛ chɔŋ chi-bɛtɨk awa ampɛtnsɛm ndu nɛkɔ̌ ɛnɛn yi árɔ́ŋɔ́ áyák’,
2449 ambo bɛdɛn batɨ̌ bɔ̌-bɛtok, anchɛm ɛkakánɛkɔ nɛ manyǔ mmɛ́m, ambo mɛnyiɛ, anyu nɔkɔ nɛ bhɔ,
2450 chi-bɛtɨk ywi ǎkway bɛ́twɔ ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn yi abhɨkɨ kaysi bɛ yi ǎkway bɛpɛtnsɛm.
2451 Nɛ mbák ɛ́mfákárí ɛnyu yɔ, chi-bɛtɨk ǎtɛmsi yi sayri, antɛ́n yi ándɔ́k ámbák nɛ bǒ bɛtábhá, ndǔ nɛbhʉɛ́rɛ́ kɛbhɔ nɛ nɛnyiɛ́ ámɛ́n.”
25
251 Yesu atɛ́m nɛkay ɛnɛn bɛ, “Nywɔp Mandɛm átwɔ̀ bɛbhak Mfɔ bǒbhi, mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́bhak mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛchi ndǔ nɛkǎy baghɔsɔ́ŋ bati byo abhɛn básɔ́rɛ́ nyaka bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛbhap, barɔk bɛtɛmɛri mbǎyngɔrɛ́ amɔt.
252 Bati atay bábhɔ́ŋ kɛ́ŋwáŋ, báchák bati atay bábhák ɛchɨŋti.
253 Abhɛn ɛchɨŋti bápɔ́kɔ bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ bhap, kɛ bɔ́ kɛpɔkɔ bawɛt mánkɛ́m amʉɛt.
254 Kɛ abhɛn kɛ́ŋwáŋ bápɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ɛbhap bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́, bápɔ́kɔ mɛnyɨŋ bawɛt nkwɔ bákɛ́m amʉɛt.
255 Ɛ́fákari bɛ mbǎyngɔrɛ́ anɛ bɔ mankɛm mánòŋ abhɨkɨ twɔ́ áyák. Ɛ́kʉ́ bábhó mɛmɔk kɛnɔ́, kpát bákwɛ́n kɛnɔ́.
256 Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ nɛ́ntɨ́bhɛti, mmǔ amɔt abho bɛbɨk andɛm nɔkɔ bɛ, ‘Ghók ká, mbǎyngɔrɛ́ wu atɛwú átwɔ̀! Twɔ́ ká sɛnsyɛpti yi!’
257 Baghɔsɔŋ bhɔ mankɛm bácháyti, maŋɛmɛ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap abho bɛ́kósi nnɨk-ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ywi.
258 Abhɛn ɛchɨŋti bati atay babho bɛrɛm ntá abhɛn kɛ́ŋwáŋ bɛ, ‘Kwak ka bhɛsɛ nɛ mbɔ bawɛt ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́. Ɛbhɛsɛ́ bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́twɔ̀ nɛmɛ.’
259 Kɛ abhɛn kɛ́ŋwáŋ bákɛ́mɛ bɛ, ‘Ngufú bawɛt amɛn sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ apu kway chɔŋ bhɛsɛ nɛ bhe. Dɔ́k ká ntá batǐ bawɛt mǎnku amɛka bawɛt.’
2510 Kɛ bárɔ́ŋ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛku amap bawɛt, mbǎyngɔrɛ́ achwɔp, asɔt abhɛn bati atay, abhɛn ɛbhap bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́dù, achwe amɛm ɛpǎ nɛbhay nɛ bhɔ́. Bakʉ̌-bɛtɨk báya nɛkok batiɛp.
2511 Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, baghɔsɔ́ŋ abhɛn báfú bɛku bawɛt bápɛtnsɛm, báte nɛfí, babho bɛdɛp nɛkok, mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, ‘Ɛta, Ɛta, dɛm mánɛ́nɛ́ bhɛsɛ mbǐnywɔp’.
2512 Kɛ mbǎyngɔrɛ́ akɛmɛ bhɔ chi bɛ, ‘Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bhe!’”
2513 Yesu ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́tɛ́m nɛkay ɛnɛn, arɛm bɛ, “Bák yɛ ka pě, mbɔnyunɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mpok anɛ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm nchí twɔ.” 
2514 Yesu atɛ́m nɛkay ɛnɛ́nɛ́fú bɛ, “Mpok Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm nchí twɔ, mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́bhak mbɔ ɛnyu ɛ́fákárí nyaka nɛ mmu amɔt nɛ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk abhi. Nywɔp nɛ́mɔ́t, achyɛ nkáp bɛ mándɔp mánkɔ nɔkɔ ɛsiɛ́ nɛ wu.
2515 Arɔ bhɔ nkáp bɛkoŋo ɛnyǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap ákwày bɛkʉ nɛ aywi nkáp. Achyɛ amɔt bɛbhǎ nkáp bɛtay. Achyɛ achák bɛbhǎ nkáp bɛpay. Achyɛ anɛfu ɛbhǎ nkáp ɛ́mɔt. Afa yɛ arɔk nɛkɔ.
2516 Bárɔ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, mǔbɛtɨk anɛ yí áchyɛ́ bɛbhǎ nkáp bɛtay abho bɛkɔ ɛsiɛ nɛ wu tɛ́mté. Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, abhɔ́ŋ nsáy bɛbhǎ nkáp bɛ́chák bɛtay.
2517 Anɛ bɛbhǎ nkáp bɛ́páy akʉ ɛnyumɔt, abhɔ́ŋ nsáy bɛbha bɛpay.
2518 Kɛ nkʉbɛtɨk anɛ ɛbhǎ nkáp ɛ́mɔt, ásɔ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ aywi nkáp, arɔk atɛ́m chí mbok amɨk abhɛsɛ ɛbhǎ nkáp ɛyɔ arɛ.
2519 Chi-bɛtɨk, átát nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ nɛkɔ ɛnɛn yi árɔ́ŋɔ́, apɛtnsɛm, abhɨŋɨ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk bɛ mántwɔ́, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap andɛm ɛnyǔ yi akʉ nɛ aywǐ nkáp.
2520 Anɛ bɛbhǎ nkáp bɛtay atwɔ́ nɛ bɛbha byó, arɛm bɛ, ‘Ɛta, ɔchyɛ́ nyaka mɛ bɛbhǎ nkáp bɛtay bɛ nkɔ ɛsiɛ nɛ wu. Nnu kpát bɛbha bɛ́chák bɛ́tay bɛ́ko amfay.’
2521 Chi-bɛtɨk akaka yi tontó arɛm bɛ, ‘Ɔkʉ sayri! Ɔchí ɛrɨ́tí mǔbɛtɨk nɛ ɔchí mmu tɛtɛp. Ɔtɔ̌ŋ ndǔ mandú nkáp bɛ ɔchí mmu tɛtɛp. Nɛ́nɛ, chɔŋ nchyɛ́ wɔ bɛtaŋ amfay bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ. Twɔ́ sɛ́nkʉ́ maŋák!’
2522 Anɛ bɛbhǎ nkáp bɛpay atwɔ́ nɛ mɛnwi arɛm bɛ, ‘Ɛta, ɔchyɛ́ nyaka mɛ bɛbhǎ nkáp bɛpay. Nnu kpát bɛchak bɛpay bɛko amfay’.
2523 Chi-bɛtɨk akaka yí tontó arɛm bɛ, ‘Ɔkʉ sayri! Ɔchí ɛrɨ́tí mǔbɛtɨk nɛ ɔchí mmǔ tɛtɛp. Ɔtɔ̌ŋ ndǔ mandú nkáp bɛ́ ɔchí mmǔ tɛtɛp. Nɛ́nɛ, chɔŋ nchyɛ́ wɔ bɛtaŋ amfay bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ. Twɔ́ sɛ́nkʉ́ maŋák!’
2524 Anɛ ɛbhǎ nkáp atwɔ́ nkwɔ arɛm bɛ, ‘Ɛta, ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ ɔchí mmu mbeápak. Ɔkɔŋ bɛghɛm nɛbhʉɛt anɛ ɔ́bhɨ́kɨ́ pɨ, ɔ̌nyokoti nɛbhʉɛt anɛ ɔ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tak mbwɔt arɛ.’
2525 Mbɔ̌ŋ yɛ̌ bɛcháy bɛ́kɔ́ ɛsiɛ́ nɛ nkáp aywɛ kɛ́ka ánɛ́m mbɔŋ ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ wɔ. Ɛ́kʉ́ ndɔk ntɛ́m mbok amɨk mbɛmɛ wú arɛ́. Yɨŋɨ́ ɛbhǎ nkáp ɛyɛ.
2526 Kɛ chi-bɛtɨk akɛmɛ yi bɛ, ‘Wɔ ɛbɛ́ptí nkʉbɛtɨk! Wɔ mbɔ́t! Ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ sayri bɛ́ nkɔŋ bɛghɛm nɛbhʉɛt anɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ pɨ, nnyokoti nɛbhʉɛt anɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ ták mbwɔt arɛ, pú nɔ?
2527 Kɛ ndaká yí ɔ́bhɨ́kɨ́ fyɛ nkáp awa amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́nkap bɛ nnáŋ ntwɔ́, mbɔ̌ŋ nsáy arɛ?’
2528 Chi-bɛtɨk achyɛ yɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ mánsɔt ɛbhǎ nkáp mǔbɛtɨk wu manchyɛ ntá anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛbhǎ nkáp byo.
2529 ‘Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ, mámaka yi bɛ́chák, ambɔ́ŋ mɛ́nja mɛncha. Kɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ɛnyɨŋ, yɛ̌ chí mandú anɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́, básɔt ntá yi.’
2530 Kɛ mbák chí nkwɛ̌ndɔŋ mǔbɛtɨk nɛ, bwɔ́p ká yi mǎmɛsɛ nɛfí ndǔ ɛjuri, bɛ́ ámbák awu ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt nɛdǐ kɛbhɔ nɛ nɛnyiɛ́ ámɛ́n.” 
2531 Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Mpok Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm átwɔ̀ mbɔ Mfɔ nɛ kɛnɛ́m ɛki, bɔángɛl Mandɛm bátwɔ̀ nɛ yi, ambak chɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ yi nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi mɛnkɛm.
2532 Ánáŋ ántwɔ́, bákʉ mkpaká bho bɛtɔkɔ́ mmɨk mɛnkɛm mánchɛm bɛsí bhi, ǎfap bhɔ́ ndǔ bakwɔ́ apay, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ mbabhɛri bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n áfàp mmɛ́nɛ́ mbɔŋ nɛ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n,
2533 antɛ́n bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n ɛbhě awɔ́nɛm ɛyi, antɛn mmɛ́n ɛbhě awɔghɔ.
2534 Mfɔ andɛm yɛ ntá bo abhɛn báchi ɛbhe awɔ́nɛm ywi bɛ, ‘Twɔ́ ká fá, be bhó Ɛtaya áyɛ́rɛ́! Twɔ́ ká mǎmbak nɛbhʉɛt anɛ Mandɛm achí nɛ bo abhɛn yi achi Mfɔ wap. Yí ághókó nɛbhʉɛt wu chi ntá yɛka tɛ nɛbhǒmɨk.
2535 Twɔ́ ka! Mpǒk nsay ánù mɛ, bǎchyɛ́ mɛ nɛnyíɛ́; mpǒk manyiɛp ákwàk mɛ, bǎchyɛ́ mɛ manyiɛp nnyú; nɛ mpok ntwɔ́ mbɔ kɛnkɔ, bǎsɔ́t mɛ mbɔ mɔmáyɛka.
2536 Mpok mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ ndɛn, bǎchyɛ́ mɛ ndɛn; mpok mɛ̌me, bǎkókóri mɛ; mpok nchí ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ, bǎré twɔ bɛghɔ mɛ.’
2537 Mpok yɔ, chɔŋ bo abhɛn báchí chák bɛsí Mandɛm mankɛmɛ yi bɛ ‘Acha, ntɨkɨ mpok sɛ́ghɔ́ bɛ́ nsay ǎnu wɔ, sɛ́chíɛ wɔ nɛnyíɛ́? Ntɨkɨ mpǒk manyiɛp ákwàk wɔ kɛ sɛ́chíɛ wɔ manyiɛp ɔ́nyú?
2538 Ntɨkɨ mpok ɔ́twɔ́ mbɔ kɛnkɔ, kɛ sɛ́sɔ́t wɔ chí mbɔ mɔ́mayɛsɛ? Ntɨkɨ mpok ɔ́chɛ́bhɛ́ ndɛn, kɛ sɛ́chíɛ wɔ ndɛn?
2539 Ntɨkɨ mpok ɔ́mè, mbák ɛ́pú nɔ, ɔbhak ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ, kɛ sɛ́ré twɔ́ bɛghɔ wɔ?’
2540 Mfɔ akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, ‘Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ bǎkʉ nyaka bɛrɨ ntá bo abhɛn báchí mbɔ bɔ̌maya, yɛ̌ chí ntá mmu wap amɔt anɛ ápú yɛ̌nyɨŋ, ɛ́chí ɛnyumɔt mbɔ bɛ bákʉ̀ nyaka bɛrɨ ɛbhɔ chi ntá ya.’
2541 Mpok yɔ ǎyibhiri mmʉɛt andɛm yɛ ntá bo abhɛn bachi ɛbhe awɔghɔ ywi bɛ, ‘Fǎ ká mɛ bɛsí, bě bho ntɛmsi Mandɛm achi nɛ bhe! Fǎ ká, dɔ́k amɛm ngo anɛ apu nɛmɛ yɛ̌ ɛwak, ngó anɛ́ Mandɛm aghókó ábhʉ́rɛ́ ntá Satan nɛ bɔángɛl abhi.
2542 Fǎ ká mɛ bɛsí. Mpǒk nsay ánù mɛ, bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ chyɛ mɛ nɛnyíɛ́; mpǒk manyiɛp ákwàk mɛ, bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ chyɛ mɛ manyiɛp mɛnyú.
2543 Mpók nchí kɛnkɔ nɛntɨ ɛnɛka, bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ sɔt mɛ mbɔ ntɨ manɔ́; mpok mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ ndɛn, bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ chyɛ mɛ ndɛn; mpok mɛ̌me, bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ kokori mɛ, nɛ mpok nchí ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ, bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ twɔ bɛghɔ mɛ.’
2544 Mpok yɔ, bǒ abhɛn bachi ɛbhe awɔghɔ yi bákɛ́mɛ bɛ, ‘Acha, ntɨkɨ mpok sɛ́ghɔ́ ndǔ nsay ánù wɔ, kɛ sɛ́kɛ chyɛ wɔ nɛnyíɛ́? Ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ manyiɛp ákwàk wɔ kɛ sɛ́kɛ chyɛ wɔ manyiɛp? Ntɨkɨ mpok ɔ́twɔ́ mbɔ kɛnkɔ ntá yɛsɛ kɛ sɛ́kɛ sɔt wɔ mbɔ ntɨ manɔ? Ntɨkɨ mpok ndɛn ɛ́chɛ́bhɛ́ wɔ, kɛ sɛ́kɛ chyɛ wɔ ndɛn? Ntɨkɨ mpok ɔ́mè kɛ sɛ́kɛ kokori wɔ? Nɛ ntɨkɨ mpok ɔ́chí ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ kɛ sɛ́kɛ kwak wɔ?’
2545 Mfɔ akɛmɛ yɛ bhɔ bɛ ‘Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ mǎnísí nyaka bɛkʉ bɛrɨ ntá yɛ̌ chí mmu amɔt anɛ ápú yɛ̌nyɨŋ, ɛ́chí ɛnyumɔt mbɔ bɛ mɛ kɛ̌ mǎnisi nyaka bɛkwak.’
2546 Mpok yɔ, bɔ́ bárɔŋ yɛ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt ntɛmsi anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti, kɛ bǒ abhɛn bachi chak bɛsí bhi, mǎnchwe ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.”
26
261 Yesu ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛtɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm, arɛm ntá baghɔkɔ́ bhi bɛ,
262 “Bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ ndǔ manywɔp apay ɛchɔŋ, Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ ɛbho. Chɔŋ mánti Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm ntá bǒmpap abha, mánkɛ́m mɛ mango ndǔ ɛkotákátí.”
263 Mpok yɔ, bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk báchɛm amɛm sɛnta Mǔngo bachiǎkap Mandɛm. Mǔngo wu aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Káyfas.
264 Báchɛ́m arɛ́ baka ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt bɛ mánkɛ́m Yesu bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ mángwáy.
265 Kɛ bághɔ́ bɛ́ ɛbhɨkɨ rɨ bɛ mánkɛ́m yi mpok ɛpa. Bárɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka bɛ́ mbák mánkɛ́m yi mpok ɛpa, bo bágʉɛ́p ɛsɔŋɔri amɛm ɛtɔk. 
266 Mpok Yesu áchí ɛtɔk Bɛ́tani, abhak amɛm ɛkɛt Símun. Símun wu anáŋ ame nyaka ɛbhaŋákwa.
267 Ɛnɛ́ Yesu ányìɛ nɛnyíɛ́ arɛ́, ngɔrɛ́ amɔt arɔk ntá yi nɛ bawɛrɛ́riɛp amɛn áré ya nkáp amɛm mɔɛ́nyɨŋɨ́fú. Bághókó nyaka mɔ́kpɛ́mɛ́ wu nɛ ɛnyǔ ntay ɛnɛn bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ alabásta. Ngɔrɛ́ wu atwɔ́ nɛ bawɛrɛ́ mɔ, atɛmti anti Yesu.
268 Kɛ baghɔk Yesu bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, batɨ ábé bhɔ amɛm, bábho bɛrɛm nɛ batɨ bɛ, “Ndaká yí ngɔrɛ́ nɛ áré chɔŋti bawɛrɛ́riɛp amɛn ɛnyunɛ́?
269 Bákway mbʉ bɛti mɔ ndǔ bɛyǎ nkáp, mánsɔt nkáp wu mánchyɛ ntá bachɛ́bhɛ́bho”.
2610 Yesu arɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bɔ bárɛ̀m. Ɛ́kʉ́ arɛm bɛ, “Ndaká yí bǎsɔŋɔri ngɔrɛ́ nɛ? Akʉ ɛrɨ́tí ɛnyɨŋ ntá ya.
2611 Bachɛ́bhɛ́bho báchí nɛ bhe mpoknkɛm, kɛ mpú bhak chɔŋ nɛ bhe mpoknkɛm.
2612 Atɛ́mtí mɛ́ bawɛrɛ́riɛp amɛn amʉɛt bɛ bákɛ́pɛrɛ fyɛ́ mɛ bawɛt amʉɛt kɛ mámbɛmɛ mɛ.
2613 Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ bo bághàti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ fá amɨk, chɔŋ mángati ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ngɔrɛ́ nɛ ákʉ́ nkwɔ, nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́nkʉ bɛ́ bákɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk yi.” 
2614 Ɛ́tárɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, ngɔk Yesu amɔt anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Júdas Iskariɔt afʉɛ́t arɔk ntá bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm
2615 abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Chɔŋ mǎnchyɛ mɛ yi mbák nkwák be mǎnkɛ́m yi?” Bápay nkáp silbha bɛbhɔ́k ɛsǎ nsɛm byo bachyɛ yi.
2616 Bɛ́bhó mpok yɔ, Júdas abho bɛ́yáŋ mbi bɛkwak bɔ mánkɛ́m Yesu. 
2617 Nywɔp Ɛpǎ Brɛt anɛ kɛbhɔŋ yís yɔ, baghɔk Yesu bárɔ́k ntá yi bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ɛta, sɛ́ndɔ́k sɛ́ntóŋtí ɛbhak ɛnɛ ɔ́nyìɛ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ fá?”
2618 Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Dɔ́k ká afɔ ɛtɔk ɛgho, chɔŋ mǎngɔ́ mmǔ fú. Nɛghɔ́ bǎghɔ́ yí, ghatí ká yi bɛ Ntɔŋ arɛm bɛ mpok akway, nɛ yi abhɔŋ mɛnyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ amɛm ɛkɛt ɛyɛ nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi”.
2619 Baghɔk Yesu bárɔ́k bakʉ ntoŋti mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi aghati bhɔ.
2620 Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ beku, Yesu arɔk achɔkɔ mɛnyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi bati byo nɛ apay.
2621 Ɛnɛ́ mányìɛ̀ nɛnyíɛ́, Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ, chɔŋ mmu ywɛka amɔt anti mɛ”.
2622 Ɛ́tɔ́k baghɔk Yesu tontó, babho bɛbhɛp yi amɔt amɔt bɛ, “Acha, chi mɛ kɛ?”
2623 Yesu akɛmɛ bɛ, “Mmǔ ywɛka amɔt anɛ ásɛbhɛ awɔ ywi amɛm ɛkpʉrɛ́ nɛnyiɛ nɛ mɛ ǎti chɔŋ mɛ.
2624 Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm, nchí rɔ́ŋɔ́rɔŋ mbɔ ɛnyǔ básɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛ̌ti ya, kɛ chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛ́p ntá mmu anɛ áti mɛ ɛ́ncha! Mbɔ bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhe yi, mbʉ ɛ́rɨ́ ntá yi ɛcha!”
2625 Júdas mmu abhɔŋɔ bɛti Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Ɛta, chi mɛ kɛ?” Yesu akɛmɛ bɛ, “Ɛ́chí mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɔ́rɛ́mɛ́.” 
2626 Ɛnɛ́ mányìɛ̀ nɛnyíɛ́, Yesu asɔt ɛkpɔkɔ́ brɛt, achyɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm. Abho bɛ́bɔ́kɔ́ti anchyɛ nɔkɔ ntá baghɔkɔ́ bhi, andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Sɔt ka, nyiɛ́. Nɛ́ chi mmʉɛ́t ɛya.”
2627 Asɔt yɛ amokó mmɛm, áchyɛ nɔ́kɔ́ bakak ntá Mandɛm, abho bɛchyɛ ntá yap, andɛm nɔkɔ bɛ, “Sɔt ka nyu, bě mankɛm.
2628 Nɛ́ chi manoŋ ma. Ǎkʉ nku anɛ Mandɛm ányú nɛ bǒbhi ántéé. Bákʉ manoŋ ma arɔŋ amɨk bɛ́ Mandɛm ámfóŋórí bɛbʉ́ bɛyǎ bho.
2629 Nchí ghati bhe bɛ mpú pɛrɛ nyu mmɛ́m amɛn, kpátɛ ɛwak ɛnɛ mɛ̌nyú mmɛ̌m bakɔ nɛ bhe ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt bɛchɔkɔ Ɛtaya”.
2630 Ndǔ ngwɛnti, Yesu nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi bákwáy nɛkwáy báchyɛ́ Mandɛm bakak. Báfú yɛ bákó amfay Njiɛ Mɛnɔk Ólif. 
2631 Bágháká nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ Njiɛ Mɛnɔk Ólif, Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Nkúbhɛ́ bɛti ɛbhɛn ɛchɔŋ, chɔŋ bě mankɛm mǎmfɛrɛ ntí nɛ mɛ mbɔnyunɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Mandɛm ǎdɛp chɔŋ mbabhɛri bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n angʉɛp amɨk, nkwɔ́ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n ántaka ɛbhɨ.
2632 Kɛ Mandɛm ánáŋ ánkʉ́ mpɛ́tnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, chɔŋ njambɨ atú Gálili, mǎntɛmɛri mɛ arɛ́.’”
2633 Píta arɛm bɛ, “Yɛ̌ bǒ mankɛm mámbʉ́ɛ́ wɔ, mɛ, mpú bʉɛ́!”
2634 Yesu aghati Píta bɛ, “Nchí ghati wɔ bɛ, nkɔk apɛrɛ́ kok nkúbhɛ́ bɛti ɛbhɛn, chɔŋ ɔ́ndɛm ndɔŋ ɛ́rát bɛ ɔbhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ mɛ.”
2635 Yɛ̌ nɔ́, Píta arɛm bɛ, “Yɛ̌ chí nɛwú, chɔŋ ngu nɛ wɔ. Mpú bʉɛ wɔ.” Baghɔk Yesu báchák mankɛm bárɛ́m chí ɛnyumɔt. 
2636 Yesu arɔk yɛ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Gɛtsɛ́mani nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi. Arɛ́, aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Chɔkɔ́ ká fá, mɛ̌tɛn mmʉɛt ambɨ ndu mɛnɨkmʉɛt.”
2637 Árɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, asɔt Píta nɛ bɔ̌ Sɛbɛdi bati apay, arɔk nɛ bhɔ. Arɔp nsónso nɛ bɛyǎ basɛ́mɛ́ antɨ.
2638 Aghati bɔPíta bɛ, “Basɛ́mɛ́ ajwi mɛ antɨ mbɔ bɛ ǎway mɛ way. Chɔkɔ́ ká fá, mǎmbak pě nɛ mɛ.”
2639 Arɔ bhɔ atɛ́n mmʉɛt ambɨ mandú. Akwɛn nɛ bɛsí amɨk, abho mɛnɨkmʉɛt bɛ, “Ɛtaya! Kʉ nkɔ́p ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ ámfʉɛ́t mɛ ansɛm ntí, mbák mbi achi bɛkʉ nɔ. Kɛ ɛ́kɛ́ bhák mbɔ ɛnyǔ mɛ̌yáŋ, ɛ́mbák chi mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɔ́yàŋ.”
2640 Afate yɛ, apɛtnsɛm ntá baghɔkɔ́ bhi abhɛn bati arat. Aghɔ bhɔ ndu bábhʉrɛ kɛnɔ́. Abhɛ́p Píta bɛ, “Bǎpú kwáy bɛ́chɔ́kɔ pě nɛ mɛ ndǔ nɛŋɔkɔ́ nywɔp nɛ́mɔ́t-ɛ?
2641 Bák ká pě, mǎnɨk nɔkɔ mmʉɛt, bɛ́ nɛmɔ nɛ́kɛ́ dɛp be amɨk. Bǎbhɔŋ ntɨ, kɛ mmʉɛt apu bhe.”
2642 Yesu apɛt arɔk are nɨkmʉɛt bɛ, “Ɛtaya! Mbák nkɔ́p ɛsɔŋɔri anɛ apú kway bɛfʉɛt mɛ ansɛm ntí, nká bɛ́ ɛ́mfákárí mbɔ ɛnyu ɔ́yàŋ.”
2643 Yesu apɛtnsɛm ndɔŋ ɛnɛ ɛjwi ɛpay, aghɔ́ baghɔkɔ́ bhi ndǔ bábhʉ̀rɛ kɛnɔ́. Bápú kwáy nyaka bɛ́chɔ́kɔ pě ndǔ kɛnɔ́ kɛ́jwí bɔ amɨ́k.
2644 Arɔ bhɔ arɔk ndɔŋ anɛ ajwi ɛ́rát are nɨkmʉɛt ɛnyumɔt mbɔ ndɔŋ ɛnɛ́ mbɨ ɛpay.
2645 Yesu apɛt yɛ nsɛm ntá baghɔkɔ́ bhi bhɔ bati arat, aghɔ́ ndu bábhʉ̀rɛ kɛnɔ́. Abhɛ́p bhɔ́ bɛ, “Bǎbhʉɛ́t bɛbhʉrɛ kɛnɔ́? Bǎbhʉɛ́t bɛ́ywěmʉrɛ? Mpok akway anɛ bátì Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm ntá bǒ bɛbʉ́.
2646 Faté ká sɛ́ndɔ́k, ghɔ́ ká, mmǔ anɛ áti mɛ ndǔ átwɔ̀.” 
2647 Ɛnɛ́ Yesu abhʉɛ́t bɛrɛm nɔ nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi, ngɔ̌k aywi amɔt ndǔ abhɛn bati byo nɛ apay anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Júdas, achwɔp nɛ bɛyǎ bho. Bǒ bhɔ bábhák nɛ bɔ akparɛnja nɛ nkɨ́k amɔ. Bǒbati bachiǎkap nɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk kɛ̌ bátó nyaka bhɔ.
2648 Júdas anáŋ ayámbɨ achyɛ́ nyaka bhɔ ɛrɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kwák bɔ́ mándɨŋɨ Yesu. Akʉ nɔ́, ndǔ ághátí bhɔ́ bɛ, “Mmu anɛ mɛ̌bhɛnɛ chɔŋ, chí yi. Kɛ́m ká yi!”
2649 Júdas áchwɔ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, afʉɛ́t téé, abhɛnɛ Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Ntɔŋ!” Abhɛnɛ yi.
2650 Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Mmʉɛrɛ wa, dɔ́k ambɨ, ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́twɔ́ bɛkʉ, kʉ yɔ́.” Tɛ́mté wu, bǒ abhɛn Júdas átwɔ́ nɛ bhɔ bárɔ́k téé bákɛ́m Yesu bábáyti.
2651 Bákɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ Yesu, mmu amɔt anɛ áchí nɛ yi, agwɔp akparɛnja ywi akpɔ́t atú nsɛm Mǔngo bachiǎkap Mandɛm chwát agʉɛp amɨk.
2652 Yesu aghati mmu ywi wu bɛ, “Kɛmɛ́ akparɛnja ywɛ amɛm kɛ́nkwɔ́p. Mmu anɛ ánù nɛnu nɛ akparɛnja, ǎgu nɛwú akparɛnja.
2653 Ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛ́ mɛ̌kwáy mɛnɨkmʉɛt nta Ɛtaya antó mɛ tɛ́mté bɔángɛl mánja máncha nka byo nɛ ɛpay, mántwɔ́ mánu ntá ya?
2654 Kɛ mbák nkʉ nɔ, ná ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́fú tɛtɛp?”
2655 Yesu abhɛ́p yɛ bɛyǎ bǒbhɔ bɛ, “Bǎtwɔ bɛkɛm mɛ nɛ bɔakparɛnja nɛ nkɨ́k mbɔ bɛ nchí ngɛ́bhɛ́ ntantaŋ? Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛwak, nchí chɔkɔ ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, ntɔŋ nɔkɔ bho mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti Mandɛm, bǎrɔ nyaka kɛkɛ́m mɛ?
2656 Kɛ dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm bɛ́fàkari chi bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm básɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛ́mfú tɛtɛp.” Afɔ̌ kɛ̌ baghɔkɔ́ bhi bárɔ́ yi bábʉɛ́.
2657 Bo abhɛn bákɛ́mɛ́ Yesu, básɔ́t yi barɔk ndǔ ɛkɛt Káyfas, Mǔngo bachiǎkap Mandɛm. Batɔŋ-ɛbhé Mandɛm nɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk báchɛ́mɛ́ nyaka arɛ.
2658 Ndu bárɔ̀ŋ arɛ, Píta are koŋo bhɔ tɛ ansɛm, kpát aghaka ndǔ sɛnta Mǔngo bachiǎkap Mandɛm. Achwe arɛ́, arɔk achɔkɔ nɛ bo abhɛn bábhàbhɛri sɛnta wu, anoŋ nɔkɔ bɛghɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bákʉ̀ chɔŋ ntá Yesu.
2659 Bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ bǒ ɛchɛmɛ́ bataŋá manyé bachak mankɛm báré yaŋ bǒ abhɛn bákway bɛbhat Yesu barak amʉɛt ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ bɔ́ bábhɔŋ mbi bɛway yi.
2660 Kɛ bákɛ bhɔŋ yɛ̌ mbi. Bɛyǎ bho báfú báré sénse amʉɛt Yesu, kɛ yɛ̌ mmú kɛrɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kway bɛkʉ bɛ mángwáy yi. Ɛ́tárɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, bo bati apay báfú báté bɛsí bataŋá manyé,
2661 bárɛm bɛ, “Yí wu arɛm bɛ ǎkwáy mɛmokoti ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm ampɛt ante yɔ́ ndǔ manywɔp arat.”
2662 Mǔngo bachiǎkap afate arɛm ntá Yesu bɛ, “Ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkɛmɛ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǒbhɛn bárɛ̀m bɛ ɔkʉ?”
2663 Yɛ̌ nɔ́, Yesu achɔkɔ kpák, akɛ rɛm yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Mǔngo bachiǎkap Mandɛm arɛm bɛ, “Ndǔ nnyɛ́n Mandɛm anɛ achi nɛpɛ́m mpoknkɛm, ghatí bhɛsɛ́ tɛtɛp mbák wɔ kɛ ɔ́chí Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò, Mmɔ Mandɛm.”
2664 Yesu akɛmɛ bɛ, “Ɛ́chí mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɔ́rɛ́mɛ́. Kɛ dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ́ mpok átwɔ̀ anɛ bǎghɔ chɔŋ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm, chɔkɔ ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ, ɛbhe awɔ́nɛm Mandɛm bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm. Chɔŋ mǎngɔ ndǔ Mmu anɛ áfú amfay átwɔ̀ amɛm nɛbháŋ.”
2665 Mǔngo bachiǎkap Mandɛm ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu árɛ́mɛ́, akɛ́m nkú yi adak ndu bɛtɔŋ bɛběntɨ bhi. Akók bɛ́, “Akʉ tɛ anáŋá! Ǎyɛnti mmʉɛt nɛ Mandɛm! Sɛ́pɛ́t sɛ́yàŋ batísiɛ́ mántwɔ́ mándɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákʉ́ ndaká yí? Bě mankɛm bǎghok ndǔ yí áyɛ̀nti mmʉɛt nɛ Mandɛm!
2666 Bǎrɛm bɛ yi?” Bákɛ́mɛ bɛ, “Abhɔŋ bɛ́gu!”
2667 Bábhó bɛ́pa yi batiɛ́ bɛsí, mándɛpti nɔkɔ. Báchák mánchyɛ nɔkɔ yi nsáp.
2668 Bákʉ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, mándɛm nɔkɔ bɛ, “Ndɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm, Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò, ghati bhɛsɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm akʉ wɔ ɔ́rɨ́ŋɨ́. Ghatí bhɛsɛ! Agha ádɛ́bhɛ́ nɔ́ wɔ?” 
2669 Mpok yɔ, Píta abhak nɛfí, amɛm sɛnta chɔ́kɔ́. Ngɔrɛ́ anɛ achi mmɔ̌-bɛtɨk Mǔngo bachiǎkap Mandɛm arɔk ntá yi arɛm bɛ, “Wɔ nkwɔ́ ɔchí nyaka nɛ Yesu mmu Gálili wu.”
2670 Kɛ Píta ataŋa bɛsí bǒ abhɛn bachi arɛ mankɛm bɛ, “Mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́rɛ̀m nɔ.”
2671 Ɛ́tárɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, áfú arɔk anyǔbhá ɛnɛ́ sɛnta. Arɛ́, mmɔ̌-bɛtɨk Mǔngo bachiǎkap Mandɛm achák, ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yi arɛm ntá bo abhɛn bachi arɛ́ téé bɛ, “Tánkwǎnɛ achí nyaka nkwɔ nɛ Yesu mmǔ Násárɛt wu.” Mmɔ̌ bɛtɨk anɛfú wu nkwɔ abhak chi ngɔrɛ́.
2672 Píta apɛt ataŋa, kpát, ayɨkɨ bɛ, “Mandɛm arɨŋɨ, mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mɔ́nkwǎ wu.”
2673 Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, bo abhɛn bachi arɛ téé bákókósi mmʉɛt nɛ Píta barɛm bɛ, “Nsé apu arɛ, wɔ nkwɔ́ ɔchí mmǔ amɔt ndǔ nkwɔ bho Yesu mmǔ atú Gálili wu. Ɛyɔŋɔ́nyu yɛ ɛ́ti wɔ.”
2674 Ndɔŋ anɛ, Píta arɛm bɛ, “Mandɛm ántɛ́msí mɛ mbák mɛ̌sè chi nsé! Mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mbɔ̌ŋ mmu wu!” Tɛ́mté wu, nnɛ́m nkɔk akók.
2675 Píta atɨk ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu ághátí nyaka yi bɛ, “Nkɔk apɛrɛ́ kók, chɔŋ ɔ́ndɛm ndɔŋ ɛ́rát bɛ ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mɛ.” Afú nɛfí, adi kɛbhɔ, nɛ bɛyǎ basɛ́mɛ́ antɨ.
27
271 Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk báchɔ́kɔ betí betí báká ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt ɛnyǔ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ bɛ mángwáy Yesu.
272 Báchyɛ́ ɛyɔŋ bɛ mángwɔ́t yi. Bafyɛ́ yi ngɛm amɔ, básɔ́t bárɔ́k ntá Páílet, mmu Rom anɛ achí nyaka gɔ́bhanɔ atú Judɛ́ya mpok yɔ. 
273 Júdas mmu átí Yesu ághók nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ bábhɔŋ bɛway Yesu nɛdǐ kɛbhɔ nɛ́jwí yi antɨ ɛ̌ti ɛpɔ̌ndak ɛnɛ yi ákʉ́. Asɔt nkáp silbha bɛbhɔ́k ɛsa nsɛm byo anɛ báchyɛ́ yí antí Yesu arɔk bɛ́kɛ́mɛ ntá bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk.
274 Ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ bɛsí ɛbhap arɛm bɛ, “Nkʉ-bɛbʉ́ ndu ntí mmu anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋ, kpatɛ bátwɔ̀ way yi.” Bákɛ́mɛ yí bɛ, “Ɛyɔ ɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ́ bhɛsɛ́ ná? Ɛsɔŋɔri ɛyɛ kɛ ɛ́chí.”
275 Júdas aták nkáp wu amɨk amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, afú arɔk asuri.
276 Bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm bárɔ́k bábwɔ́pti nkáp wu, bárɛ́m bɛ, “Nkáp anɛ chí nkáp manoŋ nɛ ɛbhé ɛyɛsɛ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛ mánchɛ́m nkáp manoŋ nɛ anɛ́ ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm.”
277 Báká nɔ́kɔ́ ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔ́t, básɔt nkáp wu bárɔ́k bákú nɛbhʉɛ́rɛ́mɨk ntá ngoko bɛte ndu bɛ́bhɛ́mɛ nɔkɔ mankɔ.
278 Ɛ̌ti ɛyɔ kɛ̌ bó bábhʉɛ́t bɛ́bhɨ́ŋɨ nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́mɨk wu bɛ́ Mmɨkɨ́ Manoŋ kpátɛ̌ ɛchɔŋ.
279 Ɛ́fákárí nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyu ɛyɔ, ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm Jeremáya árɛ́mɛ́ nyaka ɛ́fú tɛtɛp. Jeremáya arɛm nyaka bɛ, “Básɔ́t bɛbhɔ́kɔ́ nkáp ɛsa nsɛm byo, manyǔ nkáp anɛ mbɔk bo Israɛl bághɔ́ bɛ ákway bɛ́chyɛ́ ntá mmu anɛ ati yi.
2710 Bákú mmɨk ntá ngoko-bɛte nɛ nkáp ɛ́rɛ, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu Mandɛm ághátí nyaka mɛ nkʉ.” 
2711 Bárɔ́ŋ nɔ́kɔ́ ntá Páílet nɛ Yesu, ate bɛsí bhi. Páílet abhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Wɔ kɛ ɔ́chí nɛ́ Mfɔ bo Israɛl?” Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Ɛ́chí mbɔ ɛnyu ɔ́rɛ́mɛ́.”
2712 Bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk bábhó bɛ́bhát yí barak amʉɛt, kɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ kɛmɛ yɛ̌ ɛyɔŋ.
2713 Ɛ́kʉ́ Páílet arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Ɔpú ghók nɔ́ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bárɛ̀m bɛ́ ɔkʉ?”
2714 Kɛ Yesu akɛrɛm yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Ɛ́kʉ́ gɔbhánɔ abhak maknkay tontó. 
2715 Gɔ́bhanɔ abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka ɛpɨŋ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmíɛ́, ndǔ mpok Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ, ǎfɛrɛ mǔkɛnɔŋ amɔt anɛ bo báyàŋ yí ámfɛ́rɛ́.
2716 Mpok yɔ, mǔkɛnɔŋ amɔt anɛ bo báré rɨŋɨ ɛ̌ti barak anɛ yí áré kʉ, abhak ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ. Aka nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Barábas.
2717 Bɛyǎ bhó báchɛ́mɛ nɔ́kɔ́ ɛkɛt Páílet betí ɛbhɔ, abhɛ́p bɔ́ bɛ, “Agha bǎyáŋ mɛndɔ́ ándɔ́k, Barábas kɛ chí Yesu, anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ́ Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò?”
2718 Páílet arɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka sayri bɛ́ bǒbati bo Israɛl bákɛm Yesu bárɔ̌ŋ ntá yi nɛ yi chi ɛ̌ti mpabhamɨ́k.
2719 Ɛ́fákárí nkwɔ́ bɛ, ɛnɛ́ Páílet áchɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́táŋ Yesu, ngɔrɛ́ ywi ató mmu ntá yi nɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ, “Dɔ̌ mmu wu ándɔ́k. Achi chak. Ngɔ kɛnɔ́ ɛkɛ́n kɛ́re sɔŋɔri mɛ ɛ̌ti yi ndǔ bɛti ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́.”
2720 Mpok yɔ nɔ, bǒbati bachiǎkap nɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk báré ghati bɛyǎ bhó abhɛn báchí arɛ́ bɛ́ bákɛ́ rɔ bɛbhɛp Páílet ándɔ́ chí Barábas ándɔ́k, anchyɛ bɛtaŋ bɛ mángwáy Yesu.
2721 Ɛ́kʉ́ Páílet apɛt abhɛ́p bɔ́ bɛ, “Ndǔ bǒbhɛn bati apay, anɛ bǎyáŋ ndɔ́ ándɔ́k chí agha?” Bábɨ́k bɛ, “Barábas!”
2722 “Nkʉ́ yi nɛ Yesu mmu bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ́ Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò?” Bɔ́ mankɛm bábhó bɛ́bɨ́k bɛ, “Dɛm mángó yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí!”
2723 Kɛ Páílet abhɛ́p bɔ́ bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ ɛbɛ́ptí ndak yi ákʉ́?” Bɔ́ mankɛm bápɛ́t bábhó bɛ́bɨ́k bɛ, “Dɛm mángó yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí!”
2724 Páílet ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ yí ǎchɔŋti chí mpok nɛ bɛ́ ɛbyɔk ɛ́bho bɛ́kwɛ́n, arɛm mántwɔ́ yí nɛ manyiɛp ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ. Asɔt manyiɛp amɔ aso amɔ amɛm bɛsí bɛyǎ bǒbhɔ andɛm nɔkɔ bɛ, “Mɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ amɔ ndǔ nɛwú mmu nɛ. Nɛwú ɛni nɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ́ chí bhé!”
2725 Bɔ́ mankɛm bákɛ́mɛ bɛ, “Dɔ manoŋ ami ámbák bhɛsɛ́ antí, nɛ bɔ̌ bhɛsɛ́!”
2726 Páílet afɛrɛ yɛ Barábas mmǔ bo Israɛl nɛ bǒbati bhap báyàŋ yi amfɛrɛ. Achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ́ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu mándɛn Yesu nɛ ɛ́kpá, mánsɔt yí, mándɔk, mángó ndǔ ɛkotákátí.   
2727 Batɛmɛ́ nɛnu Páílet básɔ́t Yesu bárɔ́k amɛm áchá ywi nɛ yí, batɛmɛ́ nɛnu báchák mankɛm ndǔ ɛká batɛmɛ́ nɛnu ɛyap bátwɔ́ nkwɔ́ bákáp Yesu.
2728 Báyók nkú yi amʉɛt, básɔ́t nkú chu báfyɛ́ yí amʉɛt.
2729 Básɔ́t bɔ̌batábhɛ́nɔk nsɛ̌nsé mánɨ́ mbɔ ntá kɛfɔ báfyɛ́ yí antí, básɔ́t ɛnɔkɔfú báfyɛ́ awɔ́nɛm aywi. Bábhó bɛ́tɛ́p mánɛ́n bɛsí ɛbhi máŋɔkɔ nɔkɔ yí bɛ, “Acha mfɔ bo Israɛl, kɛnókó kɛ́chí ɛkɛ ɛta!”
2730 Bákʉ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, bápáti yí batiɛ́ amʉɛt, báfɔ́ŋɔ ɛnɔk ɛyɔ yi awɔ bákɛ́bhɛ bɛdɛpti yi anti nɛ yɔ.
2731 Bápɔbhɛ nɔkɔ bɛyɔkɔ yi, báfɛ́rɛ nkú chu yi amʉɛt, básɔ́t ayi yímbɔŋ bákɛ́mɛ yi amʉɛt. Básɔ́t yɛ yi bárɔ́k bɛgo ndǔ ɛkotákátí.
2732 Ɛnɛ́ báfú ɛkɛt Páílet bárɔ̀ŋ, bátɛ́mɛri mmu ɛtɔk Sírene fú ambi anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Símun. Bájirɛ yí ápɔ́kɔ́ ɛkotákátí Yesu.
2733 Bárɔ́k ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ́ Golgóta, nɔ́ chi “Nɛbhʉɛt Ɛnkɔ́nti.”
2734 Arɛ́, batɛmɛ́ nɛnu básɔ́t ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́nɛn mbɔ mbʉ̌nya,   báfyɛ́ ndǔ mmɛm báchyɛ́ yí ányú. Ághókótí nɔ́kɔ́ mɔ́, akɛ ka mɛ́nyú yɛ̌ ndu báyàŋ nyaka bɛ yi anyu mɔ.
2735 Básɔ́t Yesu bágó ndǔ ɛkotákátí. Batɛmɛ́ nɛnu abhɛn bágó yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí, bágʉɛ́p ɛbháŋá bɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ ɛnyǔ bábhɔ́ŋ bɛ́kɔ́rɛ ndɛn ɛyi bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap ambɔŋ amɔt.
2736 Báchɔ́kɔ yɛ amɨk mámbabhɛri nɔkɔ yí.
2737 Básɨŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu ákʉ́ kɛ bágò yí ndǔ ɛkotákátí, ndǔ ɛbhɔ́k ɛnɔk. Bágó ɛbhɔ́k ɛnɔk ɛyɔ ndǔ ɛko amfay ntí aywi. Ɛnyɨŋ básɨ́ŋ arɛ́ ɛ́bhák bɛ, “Nɛ́ chí Yesu, Mfɔ bo Israɛl.”
2738 Bágó ngɛ́bhɛ́ ntantaŋ amɔt ndǔ ɛyi ɛkotákátí ɛbhe awɔ́nɛm Yesu. Bákʉ́ ɛnyu ɛ́mɔ́t nɛ achák ɛbhe awɔghɔ yi.
2739 Bo abhɛn báfʉɛrɛ fʉɛt, bághaka nyaka arɛ mánte, mámɔk nɛ bati, mánsɔkɔti yi nɛ mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ,
2740 “Wɔ mmu ɔ́kway mɛmokoti ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, nɛ ɔ́nte yɔ́ ndǔ manywɔp arat! Pɛmɛ́ mmʉɛt ɛyɛ mbák ɔchí Mmɔ Mandɛm! Fú ndǔ ɛkotákátí sɛp amɨk sɛ́ngɔ́!”
2741 Bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm nɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk báré way nkwɔ yi, mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ,
2742 “Ápɛ̀mɛ nyaka bo báchák, kɛ apú kway bɛpɛmɛ mmʉɛt yi! Pú yí achi Mfɔ bo Israɛl? Ámfá ndǔ ɛkotákátí ansɛp amɨk, chɔŋ sɛ́noko yi.
2743 Asɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ nɛ Mandɛm. Mandɛm ampɛmɛ yi nɛ́nɛ mbák ǎyaŋ bɛpɛmɛ yi, mbɔnyunɛ arɛm bɛ achi Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm.”
2744 Baghɛ́p abhɛn bágó ndǔ ɛbhap bɛko mbɔ yí, báré so yí nkwɔ́ nɛ nsɔk ɛnyu ɛ́mɔ́t. 
2745 Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ nkárɛ́nká byo nɛ ɛpay nɛ ngósí, ɛjuri ɛ́kwɛ́n ɛtɔk ɛnkɛm. Ɛbhák kpátɛ nkárɛ́nká ɛ́rát nɛ ngósí.
2746 Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ mbɔ nkárɛ́nká ɛyɔ ɛ́rát nɛ ngósí, Yesu abɨk arɛm bɛ, “Ɛli, Ɛli, lama sabatani?” Nɔ́ chi, “Mandɛm wa, Mandɛm wa, ndaká yí ɔ́fɛ́rɛ́ ntí nɛ mɛ?”
2747 Mbɔk bo abhɛn báté kɛ́kwɔ́t báyɨ̀ŋɨ, bághók nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ Yesu ábɨ́kɨ́ ɛnyu ɛyɔ, báré rɛm nɛ batɨ bɛ, “Ǎbhɨ̀ŋɨ Ɛláija!”
2748 Ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu amɔt ajɛt tɛ́mté arɔk asɔt ɛkuchá fofok asɛbhɛ ndǔ ɛchyɛ́ mmɛ́m, asɔt akpaŋ anti mɔ́nɔk, asá amfay ntá Yesu, bɛchyɛ yi anyu.
2749 Kɛ abhɛ́nɛ́fú báré rɛm bɛ, “Dɔ̌ yi sɛ́ngɔ́ mbák Ɛláija ǎtwɔ̀ bɛpɛmɛ yi!”
2750 Yesu abɨk ndɔŋ achak, arɔ ɛfóŋó yi awɔ́ Mandɛm.
2751 Nkúbhɛ́ mpok yɔ, ɛkát ɛnɛ ɛchi amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm ɛ́ghárɛ bɛbhɔk bɛpay bɛfu amfay bɛghaka amɨk. Mmɨk anyɨkɨsi, kɛtárábhɛ́ kɛ́rákáti.
2752 Manɛm ánɛ́nɛ, Mandɛm akʉ bɛyǎ bo Mandɛm abhɛn mǎnáŋ bágú nyaka bapɛtsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
2753 Báfú amɛm manɛm ayap, nɛ Yesu ápɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, bo Mandɛm bhɔ bárɔ́k Yerúsalɛm. Bɛyǎ bho bághɔ́ bhɔ.
2754 Mǔngo batɛmɛ́ nɛnu nɛ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu abhɛn bachi nɛ yi bábhàbhɛri Yesu bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ mmɨk ányɨ́kɨ́sí, bághɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́chák ɛbhɛn bɛ́fákárí. Bɛchay bɛ́kɛ́m bhɔ tontó. Bábhó bɛrɛm bɛ, “Achí mbʉ Mmɔ Mandɛm tɛtɛp!”
2755 Bɛyǎ baghɔrɛ́ bábhák arɛ nkwɔ. Abhɛn bákòŋo nyaka Yesu bɛfu tɛ atú Gálili mánkwak nɔkɔ yi, babhak téé, nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ, mámkpɔkɔ nɔkɔ.
2756 Mbɔk baghɔrɛ́ bhɔ bábhák María mmɔ̌ ɛtɔk Mágdala, nɛ María nnɔ Jems nɛ Josɛ́f, nɛ María ngɔrɛ́ Sɛbɛdi, nnɔ Jems nɛ Jɔ̌n. 
2757 Mmǔ nkáp amɔt afǔ nyaka ɛtɔk Arimátia. Aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Josɛ́f. Abhak nkoŋo Yesu amɔt. Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ beku,
2758 arɔk ntá Páílet bɛ anchyɛ bɛtaŋ amfɛrɛ ɛrɛnɛ Yesu ndǔ ɛkotákátí. Páílet achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ́ mámfɛ́rɛ́ Yesu ndǔ ɛkotákátí manchyɛ yi.
2759 Josɛ́f asɔt yɛ Yesu anɛ́p nɛ ɛ́síɛndɛn nkɔ.
2760 Josɛ́f abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka nnɛm nɛkɔ ɛnɛ́n yi átɛ́mɛ́ ndǔ sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́. Arɔk abhɛmɛ Yesu ndǔ nnɛm ɛni nɔ. Abɨŋɨri yɛ ɛrɛm ntay áchók nnyǔ nnɛm, agurɛ.
2761 María, mmɔ̌ ɛtɔk Mágdala nɛ María achák, bábhák kɛ́kwɔ́t chɔ́kɔ́ mánjɨŋɨ nɔkɔ nnɛm. 
2762 Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt bo Israɛl, bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bárɔ́k bátɛ́mɛri Páílet.
2763 Bárɛm bɛ, “Ɛta, sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ re ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ mmǔ nsé wu arɛm nyaka bɛ ndǔ manywɔp arat yi ǎpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
2764 Ɛ́rɨ yɛ bɛ ɔ́nchyɛ́ ɛyɔŋ bo mandɔk mambabhɛri nɔkɔ nnɛm ɛni kpátɛ manywɔp arat amfʉɛt. Bakoŋo bhi bákway bɛrɔŋ mángɛp yi mámpɔkɔ, mándɔk, mámbo yɛ bɛghati bho bɛ yi apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Nɛ mbák ɛ́mfákárí nɔ́, nsé yap yɔ ǎchɔŋti mɛnyɨŋ ancha nsé anɛ mbɨ.”
2765 Páílet arɛm bɛ, “Yɨŋɨ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu nɔ. Sɔt ka bhɔ́ mándɔ́k mámbábhɛ́rí nɔ́kɔ́ nnɛm mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǎyaŋ.”
2766 Bárɔ́ yɛ barɔk báfyɛ́ ɛrɨŋ ndǔ ntay, nɛ bárɔ bɔ arɛ bɛ mambabhɛri nɔkɔ nnɛm.
28
281 Nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt bo Israɛl nɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, María mmɔ̌ ɛtɔk Mágdala nɛ María achák, báfú ntɨnywɔp, ɛnɛ́ mbaŋ ábhɨ́kɨ́ re kaŋari ndu bɛrɔŋ bɛyɨŋɨ nnɛm Yesu.
282 Ɛ́fákárí bɛ́ ángɛl Mandɛm áfú amfay ásɛ̀p amɨk, abɨŋɨri ntay afɛrɛ anyǔnnɛm, achɔkɔ arɛ́.
283 Bɛsí ángɛl Mandɛm wu bɛ́ré ghɔɔ mbɔ miámiaŋ, ndɛn ɛyi ɛ́ndiɛrɛ nɔkɔ pɛ́pɛ̌pɛ́p mbɔ ɛtɔkɔfiɔŋ.
284 Babhabhɛrǐ nnɛm báré wɛt nɛ bɛcháy nɛ bárɔp mbɔ bawú.
285 Kɛ ángɛl arɛm nta baghɔrɛ́ bɛ, “Bǎkɛ́ chay. Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ bǎyàŋ Yesu mmu bágó ndǔ ɛkotákátí.
286 Apú fá. Mandɛm akʉ yi apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nkúbhɛ́ mbɔnyu yi arɛmɛ bɛ ɛbhɔŋ bɛfakari. Twɔ́ ká ghɔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bábhʉ́rɛ́ yi.
287 Dɔ́k yɛ́ ka áyák mǎngátí bakoŋo bhi bɛ apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nɛ achi be ambɨ ǎrɔ̀ŋ atú Gálili. Chɔŋ mǎngɔ́ yi arɛ! Nnáŋ ngati nɔ bhe.”
288 Baghɔrɛ bhɔ bárɔ́ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ nnɛm nɛchi ntiɛ́t ntiɛt. Bɛcháy bɛ́kɛ́m bɔ, kɛ maŋák nkwɔ ajwi bhɔ antɨ. Bájɛt barɔk bɛ́yáŋ bakoŋo Yesu bɛ mángátí bhɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ángɛl Mandɛm ághátí bhɔ.
289 Ndu bárɔ̀ŋ, bápɛ́rɛ ghɔ, Yesu atɛmɛri bhɔ, arɛm bɛ, “Mandɛm ámbák nɛ bhe!” Bárɔ́k bákwɛ́n amɨk bɛsí bhi bábhó bɛkɛm bɛkak ɛbhi mánchyɛ nɔkɔ yi kɛnókó.
2810 Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎkɛ́ cháy. Dɔ́k ká ghati bakoŋo bha. Ghatí ká bhɔ bɛ, mándɔ́k atú Gálili. Chɔŋ mángɔ́ mɛ arɛ́.” 
2811 Ɛnɛ́ baghɔrɛ́ bhɔ bárɔ̀ŋ, ɛ́fákari bɛ mbɔk bo abhɛn bábhàbhɛri nnɛm bárɔ́k Yerúsalɛm bágháti bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛfakari mpok ángɛl Mandɛm ásɛ́bhɛ́ átwɔ́ ndǔ nnɛm.
2812 Bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm báchɔ́kɔ nɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk, báká ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt, báchyɛ́ bhɔ bɛyǎ nkáp ndǔ bɛsɔŋ.
2813 Bágháti bhɔ bɛ, “Ghatí nɔ́kɔ́ ká bho chi bɛ bakoŋo bhi bátwɔ́ nɛ bɛti, mpok sɛ́kwɛ́nɛ́ kɛnɔ́, bághɛ́p yi, bápɔ́kɔ bárɔk.
2814 Mbák gɔ́bhanɔ ángók ndak anɛ, chɔŋ sɛ́ndɨŋɨ ndǔ sɛ́chòk nnyu ywi bɛ ntɨ nɛndɨ yi amɛm, ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ bǎpu chwe ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri.”
2815 Babhabhɛrǐ nnɛm básɔ́t yɛ nkáp bɛsɔŋ wu, bárɔk bákʉ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǒbati bághátí bhɔ. Nɛ mbok yɔ bɛ́ bakoŋo Yesu bághɛp yi ghɛp kɛ̌ bo Israɛl bábhʉɛ́t bɛghati bo kpatɛ̌ ɛchɔŋ. 
2816 Bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn bati byo nɛ amɔt bárɔ́ yɛ bárɔ́k atú Gálili ndǔ njiɛ anɛ Yesu ághátí nyaka bɔ́ mándɔ́k arɛ́.
2817 Mpok bághɔ́ yi, bákwɛ́n amɨk babho bɛchyɛ yi kɛnókó. Kɛ mbɔk ayap bare makati mbák, sayri sayri, Yesu kɛ bɔ bághɔ̀ nɔ.
2818 Yesu akokosi mmʉɛt nɛ bhɔ́, aghati bhɔ bɛsí nɛ bɛsí bɛ, “Ɛtaya achyɛ́ mɛ bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm amfǎy yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu awu amfay nɛ fá amɨk.
2819 Dɔ́k yɛ́ ka, mǎnkʉ́ bɛ bǒ bɛtɔk mɛnkɛm mámbak bakoŋo bha, mǎnjwiti bhɔ ndǔ nnyɛ́n Ɛta, nɛ nnyɛ́n Mmɔ, nɛ nnyɛ́n Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ,
2820 mǎntɔŋ nɔ́kɔ́ bhɔ bɛ mánkʉ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ngátí be mǎnkʉ́ nɔkɔ. Nɛ nchí bhák nɛ bhe mpoknkɛm, tɛ ndǔ ngwɛnti mmɨk.”
1
11 Fá chí Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo Mmɔ Mandɛm.
12 Abho nyaka mbɔ ɛnyǔ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Aisáya ásɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm ɛkáti yi bɛ, Mandɛm arɛm nyaka bɛ, Yɨŋɨ́, chɔŋ ntó mpɔkɔntó wa wɔ ambɨ, bɛ ángókó mbi ywɛ kɛ ɔ́ntwɔ. ✡
13 “Mmǔ achi amɛm baso ǎbɨ̀k andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ́, ‘Toŋtí ká mbi anɛ Acha áfʉɛ̀t arɛ́. Kʉ́ ka mbi ywi ambak chak.’”
14 Jɔ̌n Njwiti abhésí nyaka amɛm baso angati nɔkɔ bho Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm bɛ bɔ́ mántɨ́knsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap mánjwítí bhɔ bɛ Mandɛm amfoŋori bɛbʉ́ bhap.
