1467 Ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yi ndǔ áwàk ngó, ayɨŋɨ yi dǐǐ arɛm bɛ, “Wɔ nkwɔ́ ɔchí mbʉ́ nɛ Yesu mmu Násárɛt-nɛ.”
1468 Píta ataŋa, arɛm bɛ, “Mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́rɛ̀m. Mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ntí nɛ nnɛt arɛ́.” Arɛm nɔkɔ nɔ, afa arɔk ate ndǔ nyǔbha ɛnɛ sɛnta, [nkúbhɛ́ mpok ɛyɔ nnɛ́m nkɔk akók].
1469 Ngɔrɛ́ bɛtok wu aghó yi arɛ́, apɛt abho bɛrɛm ntá bo abhɛn báchi arɛ téé bɛ, “Mmǔnɛ achi mmǔ ywi nkwɔ.”
1470 Píta apɛt ataŋa. Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, bo abhɛn báté arɛ́ nɛ Píta bárɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Sayri sayri, ɔchí mmǔ ywi amɔt mbɔnyunɛ wɔ nkwɔ́ ɔchí mmu Gálili!”
1471 Ndɔŋ ayɔ, Píta arɛm bɛ, “Mandɛm ántɛ́msí mɛ mbák mɛ̌sɛ̀ chi nsé! Mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mbɔ̌ŋ mmú anɛ bǎrɛ̀m nɔ ɛ̌ti yi!”
1472 Nkúbhɛ́ mpok ayɔ, nnɛ́m nkɔk akók ndɔŋ anɛ́ ajwí ɛ́pay. Píta atɨk ndǔ Yesu ághátí yi bɛ, “Nkɔk apɛrɛ́ kók ndɔŋ ɛpay, chɔŋ ɔ́ndɛm ndɔŋ ɛrat bɛ ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mɛ.” Agbɔkɔ kɛbhɔ, are di.
15
151 Bětí běti, bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Moses báte ɛyu nɛ nkwɔ́ ɛchɛmɛ́ bǒbati ɛtɔk báchák mankɛm. Báfyɛ́ yi ngɛm amɔ́, básɔt barɔk ntá Páílet, mmu Rom anɛ achi nyaka gɔ́bhanɔ atú Judɛ́ya mpok yɔ.
152 Páílet abhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Wɔ kɛ ɔ́chí nɛ́ Mfɔ bo Israɛl?” Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Ɛ́chí mbɔ ɛnyu ɔ́rɛ́mɛ́.”
153 Bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm bábhat Yesu bɛyǎ barak amʉɛt bɛsí Páílet.
154 Páílet apɛt abhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ɔ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛ́kɛ́mɛ? Ghok bɛbɛ́pti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bárɛ̀m bɛ́ ɔ̌kʉ!”
155 Kɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ Yesu kɛrɛm. Páílet abhak maknkay tontó. 
156 Gɔ́bhanɔ abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka ɛpɨŋ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmíɛ́, ndǔ mpok Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ, ǎfɛrɛ mǔkɛnɔŋ amɔt anɛ bo báyàŋ yí ámfɛ́rɛ́.
157 Mpok ɛyɔ bo bábhák ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ. Báfyɛ bhɔ́ kɛnɔŋ ndu bápú noko bǒbati ɛtɔk nɛ ndu bágʉ́ɛ́bhɛ́ ɛbyɔk amɛm ɛtɔk kpát báway bho. Mmǔ wap amɔt aka nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Barábas.
158 Ɛká bho bárɔk ntá Páílet bɛ́ ámfɛrɛ mǔkɛnɔŋ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔnyu yi ákʉ̀ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmíɛ́ mpok Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ.
159 Páílet abhɛ́p bɔ́ bɛ, “Bǎyaŋ mfɛ́rɛ́ Mfɔ bo Israɛl amɔ bɛ yi andɔkɔ?”
1510 Páílet arɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka sayri bɛ bǒbati bachiǎkap bákɛm Yesu bátwɔ ntá yi nɛ yi chi ɛ̌ti mpabhamɨ́k.
1511 Yɛ̌ nɔ, bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm bákʉ ngɛ́mtáy bǒbhɔ mándɛm Páílet ámfɛrɛ chi Barábas ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ.
1512 Páílet abhɛ́p bɔ́ bɛ, “Bǎyaŋ yɛ bɛ nkʉ yi nɛ mmu anɛ bǎbhɨŋɨ bɛ́ Mfɔ bo Israɛl?”
1513 Bábho bɛ́bɨk bɛ, “Dɛm mángó yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí.”
1514 Kɛ Páílet abhɛ́p bɔ́ bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ ɛbɛ́ptí ndak yi ákʉ́?” Kɛ ngɛ́mtáy bǒbhɔ bápɛt báre bɨk nɛ bɛtaŋ bɛ, “Dɛm mángó yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí!”
1515 Ndu Páílet áyàŋ nyaka bɛkʉ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bɛyǎ bǒbhɔ báyàŋ, afɛrɛ Barábas ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ. Achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bádɛ́n Yesu nɛ ɛ́kpá. Achyɛ yi ntá yap bɛ́ mángó ndǔ ɛkotákátí. 
1516 Batɛmɛ́ nɛnu básɔt yi bárɔk amɛm áchá gɔ́bhanɔ. Bábhɨŋɨ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu báchák mankɛm nɛbhʉɛt amɔt.
1517 Báfyɛ́ yi nkú chu amʉɛt anɛ ágháká yi tɛ bɛkak. Básɔt bɔ̌batábhɛ́nɔk abhɛ́n báchí nsěnse mánɨ́ ntá báfyɛ yi anti bɛ chi ayǐ nta kɛfɔ.
1518 Bábho bɛway Yesu mándɛm nɔkɔ bɛ, “Acha mfɔ bo Israɛl, kɛnókó kɛ́chí ɛkɛ ɛtá!”
1519 Báre dɛpti yi anti nɛ mɛnɔk. Mámpati nɔkɔ yí batiɛ́ amʉɛt nɛ mántɛp nɔkɔ mánɛ́n bɛsí bhi mbɔ́ bɛ báchyɛ̀ nɔ yi chi kɛnókó.
1520 Bápɔ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́yɔ́kɔ yi, báfɛ́rɛ nkú chu yi amʉɛt, básɔ́t ɛyi yímbɔŋ bákɛ́mɛ yi amʉɛt. Básɔ́t yɛ yi bárɔ́k bɛgo ndǔ ɛkotákátí. 
1521 Ɛnɛ́ bárɔ̀ŋ, bátɛmɛri mmǔ ɛtɔk Sírene amɔt anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Símun ndu áfú ɛbhɨ árɔ̀ŋ ɛtɔk. Mányiɛrɛ yi ámpɔ́kɔ́ ɛkotákátí Yesu. Símun achi nyaka chi Aleksánda nɛ Rúfɔs.
1522 Básɔt Yesu bárɔk ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ́ Golgóta, nɔ́ chi “Nɛbhʉɛt Ɛ̌nkɔ́nti.”
1523 Báchyɛ yi mmɛ̌m amɛn báchɔ́bhɛ́ nɛ babhé amɛn bábhɨŋɨ bɛ myrrh. Kɛ Yesu kɛnyu mɔ́.
1524 Bágó yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí. Básɔt ndɛn ɛyi bɛkɔ́rɛ. Bágʉɛp ɛbháŋá bɛ́rɨŋɨ anɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́sɔt.
1525 Bágó yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí mpok nywɔp nɛ́ghaka nkárɛnka nɛ́nɛnamɔt.
1526 Amfǎy ntí Yesu, ndǔ ɛkotákátí, ɛbhɔk ɛnɔk ɛbhak babhát. Básɨŋ arɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kʉ kɛ báway yi. Básɨŋ bɛ, “Mfɔ bo Israɛl.”
1527‑28 Bágó nkwɔ ngɛ́bhɛ́ ntantaŋ amɔt ndǔ ɛyi ɛkotákátí ɛbhe awɔ́nɛm Yesu. Bákʉ́ ɛnyumɔt nɛ achák ɛbhe awɔghɔ yi.
1529 Bo abhɛn báfʉɛrɛ́ fʉɛ́t, bágháká nyaka arɛ mántě, mánka nɛ batí, mánsɔkɔti nɔkɔ yi bɛ, “Aha! Wɔ mmu ɔ́kway mɛmokoti ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, nɛ ɔ́nte yɔ́ ndǔ manywɔp arat!
1530 Pɛmɛ́ mmʉɛt, nɛ fǎ ndǔ ɛkotákátí sɛp amɨk!”
1531 Bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm nɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk báré way nkwɔ yi, mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ nɛ batɨ bɛ, “Ápɛ̀mɛ nyaka bo báchák, kɛ apú kway bɛpɛmɛ mmʉɛt yi!
1532 Dɔ̌ ká sɛ́ngɔ́ ndǔ Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò, Mfɔ bo Israɛl, áfa ndǔ ɛkotákátí ansɛp amɨk. Mbák ánsɛ́p amɨk, chɔŋ sɛ́noko bɛ́ Mandɛm kɛ átó yi.” Baghɛ́p abhɛn bati apay báre sɔkɔti Yesu nkwɔ. 
1533 Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ nkárɛ́nká byo nɛ ɛpay nɛ ngósí, ɛjuri ɛ́kwɛ́n ɛtɔk ɛnkɛm. Ɛ́bhák kpátɛ nkárɛ́nká ɛ́rát nɛ ngósí.
1534 Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ mbɔ nkárɛ́nká ɛyɔ ɛ́rát, Yesu abɨk arɛm bɛ, “Ɛli, Ɛli, lama sabátani?” Nɔ́ chi, “Mandɛm wa, Mandɛm wa, ndaká yí ɔ́fɛ́rɛ́ ntí nɛ mɛ?”
1535 Mbɔk bo abhɛn báté kɛ́kwɔ́t báyɨ̀ŋɨ, bághók nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ Yesu ábɨ́kɨ́ ɛnyu ɛyɔ, báré rɛm nɛ batɨ bɛ, “Ghók ka, ǎbhɨŋɨ Ɛláija!”
1536 Mmǔ wap amɔt ajiɛt arɔk asɔt ɛkuchá agwɔ́t antí mɔ́nɔk asɛbhɛ yɔ́ amɛm ɛchyɛ́ mmɛ́m. Asá amfay, atɛmɛ Yesu anyu bɛ́ ánsɔ́k. Arɛm bɛ, “Dɔ̌ sɛ́ngɔ́ mbák Ɛláija ǎtwɔ̀ bɛfɛrɛ yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí nɛ.”
1537 Yesu ábɨ́kɨ́ nɔ́kɔ́, asɛbhɛ.
1538 Nkúbhɛ́ mpok yɔ, ɛkát ɛnɛ ɛchi amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm ɛ́ghárɛ bɛbhɔk bɛpay bɛfu amfay bɛghaka amɨk.
1539 Mǔnti nkwɔ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bɛsa bɛtay anɛ áté áyìŋɨ Yesu aghɔ́ ɛnyu yi ágú. Ɛkʉ arɛm bɛ, “Tɛtɛp, mǔnɛ achi mbʉ chi Mmɔ Mandɛm!”
1540 Baghɔrɛ́ fú báté nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ mánjɨŋɨ nɔkɔ. Mbɔk ɛyap báchi nyaka María anɛ ɛtɔk Magdala, nɛ Salóme nɛ María nnɔ Jems anɛ mɔ́nkwɛn nɛ Jóses.
1541 Baghɔrɛ́ bhɔ bákòŋo nyaka Yesu mánchyɛ nɔkɔ yi nɛkwak bɛbhó mpok anɛ yi áchi atú Gálili. Bɛyǎ baghɔrɛ́ báchak abhɛn bákóŋó nyaka Yesu Yerúsalɛm bábhak arɛ́ nkwɔ́. 
1542-43 Ɛ́ghaka beku ndǔ Nywɔp Ntoŋtí, ɛnɛ́ bátɔ̀ŋti mmʉɛt bɛ́chwe ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt, Josɛ́f mmǔ Arimátia amɔt, afa nɛ nɛtaŋántɨ arɔk ntá Páílet bɛ ánchyɛ́ yi bɛtaŋ ámfɛrɛ Yesu amfay ɛkotákátí. Josɛ́f achi nyaka mmǔ ɛchɛm ɛgho ɛnɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk anɛ abhɔŋɔ kɛnókó bɛsí bho, nɛ ǎnoŋ nyaka mpok anɛ Mandɛm átwɔ̀ ambak Mfɔ ntá bo abhɛn bachi abhi.
1544 Páílet ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Josɛ́f árɛ́mɛ́, abhak maknkay bɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ́ Yesu agu. Abhɨŋɨ mǔntí batɛmɛ́ nɛnu anɛ aghɔ ndu Yesu ágù, abhɛ́p yi mbák anáŋ agu tɛtɛp.
1545 Mǔntí batɛmɛ́ nɛnu wu aka bɛ́ anáŋ agu. Páílet aghati yɛ Josɛ́f bɛ́ ǎkway bɛ́rɔŋ bɛfɛrɛ ɛrɛnɛ Yesu.
1546 Josɛ́f arɔk aku ɛ́síɛndɛn. Afɛrɛ yi asɛbhɛ amɨk. Anɛ́p nɛ ɛ́síɛndɛn ɛyɔ, arɔk afyɛ́ yi amɛm nnɛm ɛnɛ́n bátɛ́mɛ́ ndǔ sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́. Afú abɨŋɨri yɛ ɛrɛmɛ́ ntay akuti nyǔnɛm.
1547 María anɛ ɛtɔk Magdala nɛ María nnɔ Jóses bághɔ́ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bábhʉrɛ Yesu.
16
161 Nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt nɛfʉɛrɛ nɔkɔ, baghɔrɛ́ bati arat báku bawɛrɛ́riɛp ndu bɛrɔŋ bɛwati Yesu amʉɛt. Bábhák María anɛ ɛtɔk Mágdala nɛ María nnɔ Jems nɛ Salome.
162 Bětí běti ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ mbɨ amɛm Sɔ́nde, báfú báre rɔŋ ndǔ nnɛm. Báchwɔp arɛ́ mpok mmok ánáŋ áfúú
163-4 Ɛnɛ́ bɔ́ bárɔ̀ŋ, báre rɛm nɛ batɨ bɛ, “Agha ábɨŋɨri chɔŋ ntay amfɛrɛ anyu nnɛm ntá yɛsɛ?” Bárɛ̀m nyaka nɔ mbɔnyunɛ ntay ɛnɔ nɛ́chɨk nyaka tontó. Bápɛ́rɛ chwɔp arɛ́, bághɔ́ bɛ́ bábɨŋɨri nɔ nɛ́rɔp chi nɛpak.
165 Baghɔrɛ́ bhɔ báchwe amɛm nnɛm, bághɔ ɛsakámu chɔkɔ ɛbhe awɔ́nɛm ɛyap nɛ nkú pɛ́pɛ́p amʉɛt. Bɛcháy bɛ́kɛ́m bɔ́ tontó.
166 Ɛsakámu ɛyɔ ɛ́ghati bhɔ́ bɛ, “Bǎkɛ́ cháy! Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ bǎyàŋ Yesu anɛ Násárɛt anɛ bágó ndǔ ɛkotákátí. Apú fá. Mandɛm akʉ yi apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi árɛ́mɛ́ nyaka bɛ ɛbhɔŋ bɛfakari. Twɔ́ ká ghɔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bábhʉ́rɛ́ yi.
167 Dɔ́k yɛ ka ghati bakoŋo bhi, sayri sayri Píta, bɛ́ achi be ambɨ ǎrɔ̀ŋ atú Gálili. Chɔŋ mǎngɔ yi arɛ́, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔnyu yi ágháti nyaka bhe.”
168 Baghɔrɛ́ bhɔ báfú ndǔ nnɛm báre rɔ́ŋ ntiɛ́t ntiɛt mángwɛrɛ nɔkɔ nɛ bábhak maknkay tontó. Bɛcháy bɛkʉ bɔ́ kɛrɛm yɛ̌nyɨŋ ntá mmu. 
169 Yesu áfú nɔkɔ ndǔ nɛwú beti bheti ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ mbɨ ndǔ sɔ́nde, ayambɨ atɔ́ŋ mmʉɛt ntá María anɛ ɛtɔk Magdala. Yi kɛ achi nyaka ngɔrɛ́ anɛ Yesu ábókó bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ tándrámɔt bɛ́rɔ yi.
1610 María arɔk aghati ndak anɛ ntá bo abhɛn bákɔ̀ nɔkɔ nyaka nɛ Yesu. Atɛmɛri bɔ́ ndǔ básɛ̀mɛ mándi nɔkɔ.
1611 Kɛ bághoko nɔkɔ bɛ Yesu apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nɛ bɛ́ María aghɔ yi, bákɛ noko bɛ́ ɛchi tɛtɛp. 
1612 Ɛ́tat nɔkɔ, Yesu abhɛsi ɛnyu ɛchak bɛsí bakoŋo bhi bati apay abhɛn báfu ɛtɔk ɛgho bákɔ mándɔkɔ nɔkɔ ndu mɔ́tɔk ɛbhɨ.
1613 Ɛ́tat nɔkɔ, bárɨŋɨ ɛnyu mmu yi áchi. Bápɛtnsɛm ɛtɔk ɛgho bágháti bakoŋo bhi báchák, kɛ yɛ̌ mmu wap kɛ noko bɛ ɛchi tɛtɛp. 
1614 Ansɛm mpok, ɛnɛ́ bakoŋo bhi batí byo nɛ amɔt mányìɛ nɛnyíɛ́, Yesu afú bhɔ bɛsí. Are bé nɛ bhɔ nɛ ntí bɛ bágwɔt batɨ yap nɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko bɛ yi apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m mbɔ ɛnyǔ bo abhɛn báyámbɨ baghɔ yi bágháti bhɔ́.
1615 Aghati yɛ̌ bhɔ bɛ, “Dɔ́k ká ndǔ bɛtɔkɔ́ mmɨk mɛnkɛm ghati nɔkɔ ká Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ntá bǒ mankɛm.
1616 Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ánókó Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ nɛ bǎjwíti yi, Mandɛm ǎpɛmɛ yi ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bɛ ámbák mmǔ ywi mpoknkɛm. Kɛ mmu anɛ abhɨkɨ ka mɛnoko, Mandɛm ǎchyɛ yi ntɛmsi ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhi bɛbhʉɛt nɛ yi.
1617 Chɔŋ bo abhɛn mánókó mámbɔŋ bɛtaŋ bɛ́kʉ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay. Chɔŋ mámbok bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛna, chɔŋ mándɛm bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛn bábhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛna.
1618 Mbák mǎnkɛ́m nnyɔ́ nɛ awɔ, apú kʉ bhe yɛ̌nyɨŋ, nɛ mbák mǎnyú ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́wày mmu, ɛ́pú kʉ bhe yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Chɔŋ mǎnyaŋa bǒmame amɔ́ anti mántaŋ.” 
1619 Yesu Acha ánáŋá nɔkɔ bɛ́rɛm kɛpɨ nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi, Mandɛm asɔt yi apɛtnsɛm amfay, achɔkɔ ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛnókó ndu ɛbhe awɔ́nɛm Mandɛm.
1620 Bakoŋo Yesu bárɔ́bhɛ́ nɔkɔ, báre kɔ mángati nɔkɔ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ mbǎnkɛm. Yesu Acha abhak nɛ bhɔ, achyɛ bhɔ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ndu bɛtɔŋ bɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ bɔ bághàti bho achi tɛtɛp.
1
11 Ɛta Tiófilɔs: Ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ bɛyǎ mámɔ bɛsɨŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛfakari ndǔ nkwɔ ywɛsɛ.
12 Básɨŋ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo abhɛn bághɔ́ nɛ bágháti bhɛsɛ. Batísyɛ́ bhɔ bághɔ nyaka barak ayɔ tɛ nɛbhǒnɛt, kɛ bábhak bǒ bɛtok ndu bɛ́gháti bho Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
13 Ɛta, mbɔ ɛnyǔ mɛmbɔ̌ŋ nkwɔ́ nnáŋ nkóŋó mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm sayri ndǔ ɛrɔri mpok, nkáysí bɛ́ ɛrɨ bɛ nsɨŋ ngati wɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt ɛ́mɔt ɛnyu ɛfakari.
14 Nchí sɨŋ bɛkʉ ɔndɨŋɨ tɛtɛp anɛ ayɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bághátí wɔ. 
15 Mpók anɛ Hɛ́rɔd achí mfɔ atú Judɛ́ya, nchiakap Mandɛm abhak anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Sakaría. Ǎkʉ̀ nyaka bɛtɨk Mandɛm nɛ nkwɔ bo abhɛn babhɨŋɨ bɛ Nkwɔ́ Abíja. Nnyɛ́n ngɔrɛ́ ywi nɛbhak bɛ Ɛlísabɛt. Yí nkwɔ afú ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt Arɔn, nnɛrɛ́kɛt bachiǎkap Mandɛm.
16 Sakaría nɛ ngɔrɛ́ ywi babhak chak bɛsí Mandɛm. Bábhɔŋ kɛnókó nɛ Mandɛm, mámbʉrɛ nɔkɔ bɛbhé bhi mɛnkɛm bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ ti.
17 Kɛ bɔ́ kɛbhɔŋ yɛ̌ mmɔ́ mbɔnyunɛ Ɛlísabɛt achí nyaka nkongɔrɛ́, nɛ bɔ́ bati apay mánáŋ nyaka bákɔk.
18 Ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, nkwɔ́ bachiǎkap anɛ́ Sakaría bábhák ndǔ bɛtɨk. Ɛkʉ Sakaría are kʉ bɛtɨk mbɔ nchiakap bɛsí Mandɛm.
19 Bɛ́kóŋo ɛpɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bachiǎkap Mandɛm, bágʉɛp nyaka ɛbháŋá ndu bɛyap mmu anɛ árɔ̀ŋ ndǔ mɔ́kɛt anɛ achi tɛ amɛm ɛkɛrákap Acha ndu bɛsɔŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́chyɛ̀ ɛrɨ́tí   ɛriɛp amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm. Bagʉɛp ɛbháŋá, ɛ́kwɛ́n amʉɛt Sakaría.
110 Mpok ákwáy nɔkɔ, bo bachɛm nɛfí ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm. Báre nɨkmʉɛt ɛnɛ́ Sakaría achi amɛm ásɔ̀ŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛrɨ́tí ɛriɛp ɛyɔ.
111 Ángɛl Mandɛm abhesi ntá yi, ate ɛbhe áwɔnɛm, ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt ɛfɛmɛ-akap atú anɛ básɔ̀ŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛrɨ́tí ɛriɛp ɛyɔ.
112 Mpok Sakaría ághɔ́ yi achayti, bɛcháy bɛ́kɛ́m yi tontó.
113 Kɛ ángɛl wu arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Sakaría, ɔ́kɛ́ cháy! Mandɛm aghok nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛnɛ. Nɛ chɔŋ ngɔrɛ́ ywɛ Ɛlísabɛt ampɔkɔ mɛniɛ ambé wɔ mɔ́mbakanɛm, nɛ ɔbhɔŋ bɛ́du yi nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Jɔ̌n.
114 Nɛ chɔŋ ɔ́mbɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ maŋák; nɛ bɛyǎ bo mámbɔŋ maŋák mpok bábhé yi.
115 Chɔŋ ɛ́mbak nɔ mbɔnyunɛ yi ǎbhák chɔŋ ɛrɛmɛ́mu bɛsí Acha. Bápɛrɛ́ bhé yí, chɔŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ambak nɛ yi tontó. Abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ mɛ́nyú mmɛ́m amɛn ákɛ̀m mmu, nɛ yɛ̌ chí mmɛm bataŋbataŋ.
116 Chɔŋ anja bɛyǎ bo Israɛl, mámpɛtnsɛm ntá Mandɛm Acha wap.
117 Chɔŋ Mɔ́wu anjambɨ kɛ Acha antwɔ́, nɛ chɔŋ yí ambɔ̌ŋ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn Ɛfóŋó mbɔ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Ɛláija, bɛ́ yi ankʉ bachǐbhɔ mánkɔŋ bǒbhap, ankʉ bo abhɛn bátàŋti nɛ Mandɛm mámbɔ́ŋ kɛboŋ, mámbak mbɔ bo abhɛn bachi chak bɛsí Mandɛm. Chɔŋ yí ankʉ bo mámbák ndǔ nté anɛ bákway bɛsyɛpti Acha.”
118 Kɛ Sakaría abhɛ́p ángɛl bɛ, “Chɔŋ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ anɛ́ ndak achí tɛtɛp ná. Mɛ nɛ ngɔrɛ́ wa sɛ́kɔk tontó.”
119 Ángɛl akɛmɛ Sakaría bɛ, “Dɨŋɨ́ bɛ́ mɛ nchí Gábriɛl. Nchí téé bɛsí Mandɛm, nɛ yímbɔŋ kɛ átó mɛ bɛ ngati wɔ mbok ndɨ́ndɨ́ nɛ.
120 Kɛ ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ noko ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ngati wɔ, ɛnɛ́ ɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛfu tɛtɛp mbák mpok akway. Tɛ̌ndu ɔ́bhɨ́kɨ́ noko, chɔŋ ɔ́nkwɛ́n kɛbhók ɔkɛpɛrɛ kwáy bɛrɛm kɛpɨ kpátɛ nywɔp ɛnɛ́n bariɛp amɛn áfu tɛtɛp.”
121 Ndǔ mpok yɔ bo abhɛn báchyɛ̀ Mandɛm bakak nɛfí ɛkɛrákap bare noŋ Sakaría mámakati nɔkɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛkʉ yi áre tat amɛm ɛkɛrákap.
122 Áfú nɔ́kɔ́, akɛpɛrɛ kwáy bɛrɛm kɛpɨ nɛ bhɔ. Are mak nɛ amɔ́ ntá yap. Bághɔ́ bɛ aghɔ̌ kɛnɔ́ amɨ́k anti fúú amɛm ɛkɛrákap.
123 Mpok anɛ Sakaría ábhak ndǔ bɛtɨk áfúɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, agurɛ anywɔ́p.
124 Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, ngɔrɛ́ ywi Ɛlísabɛt apɔkɔ mɛniɛ. Yí kɛfú nɛfí ndǔ bataŋ átáy andɛm nɔkɔ bɛ,
125 “Nɛ́nɛ, Ɛta Mandɛm atɔŋ mɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu. Afɛ́rɛ́ ntíánwɔ́p anɛ́ mɛ̌bhɔ̀ŋ nyaka bɛsí bho.” 
126 Mpok mɛniɛ Ɛlísabɛt bɛghaka bataŋ atandat, Mandɛm ató ángɛl Gábriɛl ɛtɔk Násárɛt, atú Gálili.
127 Ató yi ntá ngɔsɔ́ŋ anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ María. Abhɨ́kɨ́ re rɨŋɨ nyaka mbakanɛm. Mmu anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Josɛ́f anɛ áfú ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt Mfɔ Debhít atɨ nyaka bɛbhay María.
128 Ángɛl wu átwɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ntá yi arɛm bɛ, “Mmá, nkáká! Mandɛm ayɛt wɔ tontó!” Acha achí nɛ wɔ.
129 María aghoko nɔkɔ nɔ, ntí átáka yi amɛm, are bhɛp mmʉɛt ɛyi bɛ́, “Ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ bakak nɛ!”
130 Ángɛl arɛm bɛ, “María, ɔ́kɛ́ cháy. Mandɛm atɔŋ wɔ bɛrɨ̌ndu.
131 Chɔŋ ɔ́mpɔkɔ mɛniɛ, ɔ́mbe mɔ́mbakanɛm, nɛ ɔbhɔŋ bɛbhɨŋɨ yí bɛ Yesu.
132 “Chɔŋ yi ambak ɛrɛmɛ́mu nɛ chɔŋ nnyɛ́n ɛni nɛmbak bɛ Mmɔ Mandɛm Acha. Chɔŋ Ɛta Mandɛm anchyɛ yí ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ɛnɛ́ Debhít mmu yi achi ɛbhárɛ́mɔ ywi.
133 Nɛ chɔŋ ankɛ́m bo Israɛl mbɔ Mfɔ mpoknkɛm. Kɛfɔ ɛki kɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti!”
134 María abhɛ́p ángɛl wu bɛ, “Chɔŋ anɛ́ ndak ámbak ná, ɛnɛ́ mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mbakanɛm?”
135 Ángɛl akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Chɔŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ántwɔ́ ntá yɛ, nɛ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm Acha mɛ́nkʉ ɔ́mpɔkɔ mɛniɛ. Ɛ̌ti yɔ, mmɔ́ anɛ ɔ́bhe, ǎbhák nyáŋá nɛ mámbɨŋɨ yi bɛ, ‘Mmɔ Mandɛm.’
136 Yɨŋɨ́ Ɛlísabɛt, mánɔ́ ywɛ ndu nnɛrɛkɛt. Yɛ̌ndu yi are kɔ́k nɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ yi bɛ́ nkongɔrɛ́, achí nɛ mɛniɛ ndǔ bataŋ átándát nɛ́nɛ, nɛ chɔŋ ambé mɔ́mbakanɛm.
137 Yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛpu cha Mandɛm.”
138 María arɛm bɛ, “Mɛnchí chí mǔbɛtok Mandɛm, ɛ́mfákárí nɛ mɛ mbɔ ɛnyu ɔ́rɛ́mɛ́.” Ángɛl arɔ yɛ yi arɔk. 
139 Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, María afa, arɔk áyák, ndǔ ɛtɔk njiɛ ɛmɔ́t atú Júda.
140 Áchwɔ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ arɛ́, arɔk achwe ɛkɛt Sakaría, akaka Ɛlísabɛt;
141 Mpok Ɛlísabɛt aghoko bakak María, mmɔ́ ayoŋ mmʉɛt amɛm mɛniɛ ɛbhi nɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ abhak nɛ yi tontó.
142 Abɨk nɛ bɛtaŋ arɛm ntá María bɛ, “Ɔchí anɛ Mandɛm áyɛ́rɛ́ ndǔ nkwɔ baghɔrɛ́, nɛ áfɔ́k ámbák nɛ mmɔ̌ anɛ ɔ́bhe chɔŋ!
143 Ndé kʉ yi bɛ Mandɛm anchyɛ mɛ ɛnɛ́ ɛnyǔ ɛrɛm áfɔ́k, bɛ́ nnɔ Acha ántwɔ́ ntá ya?
144 Nɛchwe ɔ́chwé ɔ́káká mɛ, mmɔ́ anɛ achi mɛ mɛniɛ ayoŋ mmʉɛ́t nɛ maŋák.
145 Ɛ́rɨ ɛcha ntá yɛ́ mbɔnyunɛ ɔnókó bɛ́ chɔŋ Mandɛm ankʉ ntá yɛ mbɔ ɛnyu yí árɛ́mɛ́.” 
146 María abho bɛ́bɨti Acha bɛ, “Ntɨ ɛna nɛ́kwày ndu bɛ́káka Mandɛm Acha nɛ maŋák.
147 Ɛfóŋó ɛya ɛ́ŋàk ɛ̌ti Mandɛm Mpɛmɛ wa.
148 Atɔŋ mɛ bɛyǎ bɛrɨ̌ndu yɛ̌ndu nchí chí mmɔ̌bɛtok ywi nɛ mpú yɛ̌nyɨŋ! Nɛbho nɛ́nɛ, chɔŋ mkpáká bho ɛnkɛm mámbɨŋɨ mɛ bɛ, ‘Ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ɛyi ɛrɨ ɛcha!’
149 mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm, akʉ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ntá ya. Nɛ yí achí nyáŋá.
150 Ǎghɔ̀ ntínso nɛ bǒ abhɛn báchyɛ̀ yi kɛnókó, ndǔ mkpáká bho ɛnkɛm.
151 Akʉ bɛtaŋtí mɛnyɨŋ nɛ awɔ́ ywi, aták bo abhɛn báyòŋ mmʉɛ́t nɛ nkaysi anɛ achi amɛm batɨ̌ yap.
152 Afɛ́rɛ́ bɛrɛmɛ́ bafɔ ndǔ mɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ɛbhap, ákosi bo abhɛn bápú yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
153 Achyɛ́ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ntá bo abhɛn nsay ánù bhɔ, abók abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́, bárɔk amɔ amɔ.
154 Mandɛm akwak bo Israɛl, bǒ bɛtok bhi. Abhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bariɛp ami ntá bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ bɛ chɔŋ angɔ bhɔ ntínso.
155 Abhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛghɔ Ábraham ntínso, nɛ bɛbhárɛ́ bɔ̌bhi mankɛm, mpoknkɛm!”
156 María achɔkɔ nɛ Ɛlísabɛt ndǔ bataŋ árát, kɛ ǎpɛtnsɛm ɛkɛt ɛyi. 
157 Mpok anɛ Ɛlísabɛt ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́bhé ákwáy nɔkɔ, abhé mɔ́mbakanɛm.
158 Bakokosi bhi nɛ bǒnɛrɛ́kɛt, bághók nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyǔ bɛrɨ̌ntɨ ɛbhɛ́n Mandɛm átɔ́ŋɔ́ yí, báré ŋák nɛ yi.
159 Mmɔ ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ manywɔp ánɛn, bo bárɔ́k bɛ́siɛ́p yi. Báre yàŋ bɛdu yi nnyɛ́n bɛ Sakaría mbɔnyunɛ chi nnyɛ́n Ɛtayi.
160 Kɛ máyi arɛm bɛ, “Nnyɛ́n ɛni nɛbhɔŋ bɛbhak chi Jɔ̌n.”
161 Yɛ̌ nɔ, bárɛ́m ntá yi bɛ, “Yɛ̌ mmu apú ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt aywɛka anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nnyɛ́n ɛnɔ!”
162 Bábhó yɛ mɛmak nɛ amɔ ndu bɛbhɛp chimɔ nnyɛ́n ɛnɛn yi áyàŋ manchyɛ mɔ.
163 Sakaría amak nɛ amɔ bɛ́ mánchyɛ́ yi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ yi ánsɨŋ arɛ́. Báchyɛ nɔkɔ yi ɛnyɨŋ asɨ́ŋ arɛ́ bɛ, “Nnyɛ́n ɛni chí Jɔ̌n.” Bɔ mankɛm babhak maknkay tontó.
164 Tɛ́mté wu Sakaría apɛt abho bɛrɛm kɛpɨ ankaka nɔkɔ Mandɛm.
165 Bɛcháy bɛ́kɛ́m bakokosi bhap mankɛm. Nɛ mbok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ ataka ndǔ bɛtɔkɔ́ njiɛ mɛnkɛm atú Judɛ́ya.
166 Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ághókó mbok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fákárí abhʉɛrɛ bhɔ antɨ, ambɛbhɛ nɔkɔ mmʉɛ́t ɛyi bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ mmú yi abhak chɔŋ?” Ɛ́bhak kpoŋoroŋ bɛ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm Acha bɛ́chí nɛ yi. 
167 Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ abhak nɛ Sakaría, chi Jɔ̌n. Abho bɛ́rɛm kɛpɨ̌ntɨ bɛ,
168 “Bakak ámbák nɛ Mandɛm Acha bo Israɛl, mbɔnyunɛ atwɔ ndu bɛkwak bǒbhi, nɛ ndu bɛ́fɛ́rɛ bhɔ ndǔ kɛsɛm.
169 Áchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ ɛtaŋtí Mpɛmɛ anɛ áfú ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt anɛ́ mǔbɛtok ywi Mfɔ Debhít.
170 Mandɛm akʉ nyaka barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ bhi abhɛn bachi nyáŋá mandɛm ɛnyu ɛyɔ tɛntɛp,
171 bɛ chɔŋ ampɛmɛ bhɛsɛ ndu amɔ́ bǒmpap abhɛsɛ, nɛ amfɛrɛ bhɛsɛ amɔ bo abhɛn bapabhɛ bhɛsɛ.
172 Arɛm nyaka bɛ chɔŋ angɔ́ bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ ntínso, nɛ ántɨk nku anɛ yi anyu nɛ bǒbhi.
173 Nɔ chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm aghati nyaka Ɛtayɛsɛ Ábraham, ayɨkɨ bɛ́ yí ǎkʉ yɔ;
174 nɔ chi, bɛ́fɛ́rɛ bhɛsɛ amɔ bǒmpap abhɛsɛ, ankwak bhɛsɛ bɛ́ sɛ́ntók nɔkɔ chi yi, kɛbhɔŋ bɛcháy,
175 sɛ́mbák nyáŋá nɛ chak bɛsí bhi ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛsɛ nɛnkɛm. ndǔ manywɔp yɛsɛ́ fá amɨk ankɛm.
176 Nɛ wɔ mɔ́wa, chɔŋ mámbɨŋɨ wɔ bɛ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ anɛ Mandɛm Acha, mbɔnyunɛ́ chɔŋ ɔ́njambɨ kɛ Acha antwɔ, bɛ ɔntoŋti mbi ntá yi,
177 ɔ́nkʉ bǒbhi mándɨŋɨ bɛ chɔŋ yi amfoŋori bɛbʉ́ bhap, nɛ ampɛmɛ bhɔ.
178 Mandɛm ywɛsɛ ǎkʉ̀ nɔ mbɔnyunɛ ǎghɔ̀ bhɛsɛ ntínso tontó. Chí ntínso kɛ nɛ́kʉ yi áto chɔŋ Mpɛmɛ ywɛsɛ́, yí amfú amfay antwɔ mbɔ nyiɛnyíɛ́mok běti.
179 Ǎtwɔ̀ bɛchyɛ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ ntá bo abhɛn bachi ndǔ ɛjuri nɛ ndǔ bɛcháy nɛwú, nɛ ndu bɛya bhɛsɛ́ ndǔ mbi anɛ átwɔ̀ bhɛsɛ nɛ kpák.”
180 Mɔ́wú agó ataŋ ndǔ nkwɔmʉɛt nɛ ndǔ Ɛfóŋó. Bɛchɔ́kɔ́ bhi bɛbhak amɛm baso, anoŋ nɔkɔ nywɔp ɛnɛ́n yi átɔŋ mmʉɛt ntá bo Israɛl.
2
21 Mpok ɛyɔ Ɔgɔ́stɔs abhak mfɔ Rom, achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ́ mánsɔt mpáy bho mankɛm abhɛn bachi ndǔ bɛtɔk ɛbhɛn bɛchi antɛn yi.
22 Nɛpǎy-bho ɛnɔ nɛ́bhak ɛnɛ́n mbɨ mpok Kwiríniɔs achi gɔ́bhanɔ ɛtɔk Síria.
23 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu arɔk ɛyi ɛtɔk ndu bɛsɨŋ nnyɛ́n.
24‑5 Josɛ́f nkwɔ afa Násárɛt atú Gálili arɔk Bɛ́tlɛhɛm, atú Judɛ́ya. Bɛ́tlɛhɛm abhak ɛtɔk ɛnɛ babhe Mfɔ Debhít. Josɛ́f arɔk arɛ́ mbɔnyunɛ achi nyaka ɛbhárɛ́mɔ Debhít. Arɔk nɛ María, ngɔrɛ́ anɛ yi atɨ bɛbhay bɛ mánsɨ́ŋ manyɛ́n. Abhak nɛ mɛniɛ.
26 Ɛnɛ́ bɔ bachi Bɛ́tlɛhɛm, mpok nɛbhe ayi akway.
27 Abhé mɔ̌mbɨ ywi, abhak mɔ́mbakanɛm. Anɛ́p yi nɛ ndɛn, abhʉrɛ amɛm ɛkwɔbhɛ́ nɛnyiɛ nnya mbɔnyunɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nyaka ɛbhak bɛchɔkɔ amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́ mankɔ. 
28 Ndǔ bɛtǐ bhɔ, nkwɔ́ babhabhɛri bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n bábhak nɛfí nɛ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n ɛyap ndǔ atú ɛtɔk wu.
29 Ángɛl Mandɛm abhesi bɔ́ bɛsí, bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ Mandɛm bɛghɔ bhɔ́ amʉɛt nɛ bɛcháy bɛkɛm bɔ́ tontó.
210 Kɛ ángɛl wu arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Bǎkɛ́ chay, mbɔnyunɛ ntwɔ bhe nɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ áchyɛ̀ chɔŋ bo mankɛm bɛyǎ maŋák.
211 Bábhe Mpɛmɛ ywɛka ɛchɔŋ ɛtɔk Debhít. Yí kɛ achi mmu anɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò. Yi chi Acha.
212 Ɛrɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́tɔŋ chɔŋ be mmɔ̌rɛ chi bɛ bǎghɔ̀ chɔŋ ndǔ mánɛ́bhɛ́ yi nɛ ndɛn, bábhʉrɛ amɛm ɛkwɔbhɛ́ nɛnyiɛ nnya.”
213 Tɛ́mté wu, ngɛ́mtay bɔángɛl Mandɛm babhesi bare kway mámbɨti nɔkɔ Mandɛm bɛ
214 “Kɛnókó kɛ́mbák nɛ Mandɛm amfay; kpák ambak fá amɨk nɛ bo abhɛn bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi bɛchi nɛ bhɔ!”
215 Bɔangɛl bárɔ bhɔ, bapɛtnsɛm amfay. Babhabhɛri bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n babho bɛrɛm nɛ batɨ bɛ, “Sɛ́ndɔ́k ká Bɛ́tlɛhɛm sɛ́ngɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛfakari, ɛnɛ́ Mandɛm akʉ sɛndɨŋɨ.”
216 Báfá, bárɔk ayak bághɔ Josɛ́f nɛ María. Bághɔ́ mmɔ̌rɛ́ nkwɔ́ bhʉ́rɛ́ amɛm ɛkʉbhɛ́ nɛnyiɛ nnya.
217 Bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, barɛm ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn ángɛl Mandɛm aghati bhɔ ɛ̌ti mɔ́wu.
218 Bǒ mankɛm abhɛn baghoko ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bɔ barɛmɛ babhak maknkay.
219 Kɛ María abhʉrɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ mɛnkɛm antɨ, ankaysi nɔkɔ bhɔ.
220 Babhabhɛri bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n bápɛtnsɛm. Báre kway mámbɨti nɔkɔ Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn bághɔ́ nɛ ɛbhɛn baghoko, bɛchi ɛnyumɔt mbɔnyu ángɛl aghati bhɔ. 
221 Ɛgháká nɔ́kɔ́ manywɔp ánɛn, básyɛp mɔ́, bádu yi nnyɛ́n bɛ, Yesu, nnyɛ́n ɛnɛn ángɛl arɛmɛ nyaka bɛ babhɔŋ bɛchyɛ yi tɛ mpok babhɨkɨ re pɔkɔ́ mɛniɛ ɛbhi. 
222 Mpok ákwáy anɛ Josɛ́f nɛ María barɔŋ bɛkʉ mbɔnyu ɛbhé Moses ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ mánkʉ ndu bɛbhak pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm mpok ngɔrɛ́ abhé, bápɔ́kɔ Yesu bárɔk Yerúsalɛm ndu bɛtɔŋ yi ntá Mandɛm Acha,
223 mbɔnyu básɨŋ nyaka ndǔ Ɛbhé Mandɛm bɛ, “Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mɔ̌mbɨ anɛ achi mbakanɛm, bábhɔŋ bɛchyɛ yi ntá Mandɛm.
224 Bábhɔ́ŋ nkwɔ bɛchyɛ akap ɛ́bu wu anɛ achi ‘Bɔ̌bɛbhóŋó bɛpay, mbák ɛpu nɔ, bɛbhɛp bɛpay, bɛkoŋo ɛbhé Mandɛm.’”
225 Mpok ɛyɔ, mmu abhak Yerúsalɛm anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Símiɔn. Abhak chak anchyɛ nɔkɔ Mandɛm kɛnókó. Ǎnòŋ nyaka mpok anɛ Mandɛm átwɔ ankwɛnɛ batɨ bo Israɛl. Nɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ abhak nɛ yi.
226 Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ anáŋ akʉ nyaka yi arɨŋɨ bɛ́ apú gu kɛghɔ́ Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò.
227 Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ akʉ Símiɔn arɔk ndǔ ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm. Nnɔ nɛ chi Yesu báchwe arɛ́ nɛ yi ndu bɛtɔŋ yi ntá Mandɛm bɛkoŋo ɛbhé Moses.
228 Símiɔn aghɔ nɔkɔ mɔ̌rɛ́ asɔt yi akɛ́m amɔ abɨti Mandɛm bɛ́:
229 “Acha, ɔkʉ bariɛp amɛ afǔ tɛtɛp, dɔ yɛ́ mɛ, mmɔ̌bɛtok ywɛ ndɔ́k pɛtii,
230 mbɔnyunɛ nnáŋ ngɔ nɛ amɨ́k mmu anɛ ɔ́tó bɛ ampɛmɛ bhɛsɛ.
231 Mpɛmɛ anɛ ɔ́tɔ̀ŋti bɛ bǒ mankɛm mángɔ.
232 Achí ɛrɔŋɔ bɛtɔŋ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl mbi bɛrɨŋɨ wɔ, nɛ bɛ kɛnókó kɛ́ntwɔ́ ntá bǒbhɛ, bo Israɛl.”
233 Chi nɛ nnɔ babhak maknkay bɛghok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Símiɔn arɛmɛ ɛ̌ti Yesu.
234 Símiɔn ayɛ́t bhɔ, arɛm ntá máyi María bɛ, “Mandɛm ayap mɔ́nɛ bɛ ankʉ bɛyǎ bo Israɛl mankwɛn nɛ bɛ ánjoŋ abhɛnɛfu, nɛ bɛ ámbák ɛrɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bo bárɛ̀m bɛ bápú yaŋ.
235 “Nɛ chɔŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́nkʉ bɛ nkaysi anɛ achi bo ántɨ ambo bɛfú kpoŋoroŋ, nɛ wɔ ɔ́mbɔŋ bɛyǎ basɛ́mɛ́ ɛ̌ti mɔ́nɛ mbɔ mmu anɛ ɛɛkak ɛ́yɛ́mɛ́ yi antɨ.”
236-37 Mpok ɛyɔ, ngɔrɛ́ anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Ána abhak Yerúsalɛm. Abhak ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm. Abhak mmɔ̌ Fanuɛl, ɛbhárɛ́mɔ anɛ nnɛrɛ́kɛt Ásha. Akɔk nyaka tontó nɛ anáŋ achi nyaka ɛkɛrɛ́nɛbhay ndǔ mamiɛ́ tándrámɔt kɛ nnɛ́m aywi ǎgu. Arɔp kɛ́nkwɛ́sɛ́, tɛ mpok anɛ yi aghaka mamiɛ́ bɛsa mɛnwi nsɛm anwi. Yí kɛrɔ bɛrɔŋ ndǔ ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm ndu bɛchyɛ yi kɛnókó, nɛ are nɨkmʉɛt ambak nɔkɔ ndǔ nɛtarɛ́nsay, bɛti nɛ ngósí.
238 Nkúbhɛ́ mpok ɛyɔ Josɛ́f nɛ María bárɔk nɛ mmɔ́. Ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ mɔ̌rɛ́, achyɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti mmɔ́, ntá bo abhɛn mánòŋ nyaka bɛ Mandɛm amfɛrɛ bǒ Yerusalɛm ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri.
239 Josɛ́f nɛ María manaŋa nɔkɔ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm bɛkoŋo ɛbhé Mandɛm, bápɛtnsɛm nɛ mmɔ́ ɛtɔk ɛyap Násárɛt atú Gálili.
240 Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛ́go nɛ bɛ́bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ. Abhɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak nɛ áfɔ́k Mandɛm abhak nɛ yi. 
241 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmíɛ́, chi nɛ nnɔ Yesu bárɔ̀ŋ nyaka Yerúsalɛm ndǔ *Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ.
242 Mpok yi aghaka mamiɛ́ byo nɛ apay, bárɔ́k ndǔ ɛpǎ ɛyɔ mbɔ ɛnyu ɛsɨ́.
243 Ɛpa ɛ́máy nɔ́kɔ́, bare pɛtnsɛm ɛtɔk ɛyap kɛ Yesu arɔp Yerúsalɛm, chi nɛ nnɔ kɛrɨŋɨ.
244 Bákɔ ndǔ nywɔp nɛnkɛm mánkaysi nɔkɔ bɛ yi achi ndǔ nkwɔ́ wap. Bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ apú nɛ bhɔ, babho bɛyaŋ yi nɛntɨ mamʉɛrɛ bhap nɛ bǒnɛrɛ́kɛt awap.
245 Báyáŋ nɔ́kɔ́ yi kɛghɔ, bápɛtnsɛm Yerúsalɛm ndu bɛyaŋ yí arɛ́.
246 Ɛgháká nɔkɔ manywɔp árát, bághɔ́ yi amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm chɔkɔ nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé, ndu ághòk mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bárɛ̀m, nɛ ambɛbhɛ nɔkɔ bɔ́ bɛbhɛp.
247 Bo mankɛm abhɛn bághòk mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi árɛ̀m bábhák maknkay ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi arɨŋɨ nɛ ɛnyǔ ɛnɛ yi ákɛ̀mɛ bhɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bábhɛ̀p yi.
248 Mpok anɛ chi nɛ nnɔ bághɔ́ yi, ɛbhak bhɔ chi ɛnyɨŋ maknkay. Nnɔ abhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Mɔ́wa, mbʉ ɔbhɨkɨ kʉ ɛtayɛ nɛ mɛ ɛnyunɛ!”
249 Mmɛ nɛ ɛtayɛ sɛ́kɔ, sɛ́yàŋ wɔ nɛ bɛyǎ bɛcháy antɨ. Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Báyàŋ mbʉ mɛ ndaká yí? Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛ mbɔ̌ŋ bɛbhak amɛm ɛkɛt Ɛtaya?”
250 Kɛ nnɔ nɛ chi kɛjwimɛm ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ yi arɛmɛ ntá yap.
251 Apɛt yɛ nsɛm Násárɛt nɛ bhɔ, abhak nɛ bhɔ sayri akɛtaŋntí. Máyi abhʉrɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm antɨ.
252 Arɔk ambɨ bɛ́go ndǔ nkwɔmʉɛt nɛ ndǔ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak. Mandɛm abhɔ́ŋ maŋák nɛ yi andɔk nɔkɔ chí ambɨ. Ɛbhak ɛnyumɔt nɛ bo.
3
31‑2 Mpok Jɔ̌n mmɔ̌ Sakaría achi amɛm baso, Mandɛm achyɛ yi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛghati bho. Mpok Tibériɔs achi mfɔ ngo anɛ ɛtɔk Rom ndǔ mamiɛ́ nɛku, Pɔ́ntiɔs Páílet abhak gɔ́bhanɔ atú Judɛ́ya, Hɛ́rɔd abhak mǔnti atú Gálili, mɔmáyi Fílip abhak mǔnti atú Itúria nɛ Trakonítis, nɛ Lisánias abhak mǔnti atú Abilene. Káyfas nɛ Ánas babhak bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm. Mandɛm aghati Jɔ̌n mmɔ̌ Sakaría ɛnyɨŋ mpok yi achi amɛm baso,
33 Jɔ̌n arɔk yɛ ndǔ bɛtɔk mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn bɛchi atú Nnyɛ́n Jɔ́dan, angati nɔkɔ bho Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm bɛ bo mántɨ́knsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhap mánjwítí bhɔ́ bɛ Mandɛm amfoŋori bɛbʉ́ ɛbhap.
34 Ɛbhak mbɔ ɛnyǔ Aisáya ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm asɨŋɨ nyaka amɛm ɛkáti yi bɛ: “Mmǔ achi amɛm baso ǎbɨ̀k nɛ ɛyɔŋ amfay andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, ‘Toŋtí ká mbi anɛ Acha áfʉɛ̀t arɛ́. 
Kʉ́ ka mbǐ ywi ambak chak.
35 Chók ká yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛ́yɛ́mɛ́, mánkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ njiɛ ngo nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mɔ́njiɛ andɔp mmɨk nɛbhʉɛt. Nyabhɛ́ ká babhi anɛ achi ŋɔ́tí ŋɔ́tí, mǎndansi anɛ́ achi gbokotí gbókótí,
36 nɛ chɔŋ bǒ mankɛm mángɔ ndu Mandɛm ápɛ̀mɛ bho.’”
37 Jɔ̌n arɛm ntá bɛyǎ bo abhɛn bárɔ̀ŋ ntá yi bɛ́ yi anjwiti bhɔ́ bɛ, “Bě bɛfé! Agha áyɛ́bhɛ́ be batú bɛ mǎnjaŋ mbi ndu bɛbʉɛ ntɛmsi Mandɛm anɛ átwɔ̀?
38 Bǎbhɔŋ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ bǎtɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka tɛtɛp. Bǎkɛ́ chɔkɔ mǎndɛm bɛ́ bǎchí bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Ábraham. Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ́ Mandɛm ǎkwáy bɛsɔt batay ánɛ ankʉ yɔ́ ámbak bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Ábraham.
39 Yɛ̌ chí nɛ́nɛ, sɛtɨ sɛ́chí bhʉ́rɛ́, nɛ bákway bɛkpɔt yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnɔk ɛnɛ ɛpu nyu bɛrɨ́tí kɛpɛm tɛ ndǔ bakaŋ, mángʉɛp angó.”
310 Bǒ bhɔ bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́ bábhɛp Jɔ̌n bɛ, “Yi sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ yɛ bɛkʉ?”
311 Akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nkú ɛpay ánchyɛ́ amɔt ntá anɛ abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ, nɛ mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛnyíɛ́ ánkɔ́rɛ́ nɛ anɛ abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ.”
312 Babhɛbhɛ́ nkabhɛnti nkwɔ bárɔ́k bɛ yi anjwiti bhɔ. Bábhɛp yi bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, yi sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ?”
313 Jɔ̌n akɛmɛ bɔ bɛ, “Bǎkɛ́ sɔt nkábhɛ́nti ɛ́ncha anɛ́ bǎbhɔŋɔ bɛsɔt.”
314 Mbɔk batɛmɛ́ nɛnu nkwɔ́ bábhɛp yi bɛ, “Yí sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́kʉ?” Akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎkɛ́ sɔt nkáp ntá mmu nɛ bɛtaŋ, bǎkɛ́ bhat mmu ndak amʉɛt; dɔ̌ ká akap anɛ́ báchyɛ̀ bhe ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn bǎkʉ̀ ánkway bhe.”
315 Bo bábhaka nyaka ntɨ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Jɔ̌n árɛ̀m nɛ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ̀. Ɛ́kʉ bábho bɛbhɛp mmʉɛt mbák Jɔ̌n kɛ achi Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò.
316 Jɔ̌n akɛmɛ bhɔ́ bɛ, “Mɛ̌jwìti bhe nɛ manyiɛp. Kɛ mmu anɛ acha mɛ ǎtwɔ̀. Mbɨ́kɨ́ kwáy mmu anɛ nchí kaŋari nkwɔbhɛ́nya bɛkak ɛbhi. Ánáŋ ántwɔ́, chɔŋ anjwiti bhe nɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ nɛ ngó.
317 Ǎtwɔ̀ nɛ nchán myákátí awɔ ndu bɛ́chák nkway bɛ amfáp ɛnɛ ɛrɨ nɛ bɛkpáfu. Ánáŋ ánkʉ́ nɔ, ansɔt mbwɔt antɛn ndu nkpánɛ́, anyɔ mmɨk, ansɔt bɛkpáfu amfyɛ amɛm ngó anɛ apu nɛmɛ.”
318 Jɔ̌n arɛm bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ bɛchak ndu bɛfyɛ bhɔ ntɨ ndu ánù bɛkʉ mánóko Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ yi aghati bhɔ.
319 Jɔ̌n aji Mfɔ Hɛ́rɔd bɛ akwɛn ɛbhé Mandɛm ndu ásɔ́rɛ́ Hɛródias ngɔrɛ́ mɔ́máyi ábhay. Aji yí ɛ̌ti barak abʉ́abʉ achak ankɛm anɛ yi ákʉ́.
320 Nɛ mɛ́máka ndǔ ɛbhɔ̌ mɛnkɛm, Hɛ́rɔd arɛm báfé Jɔ̌n amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ. 
321 Bápɛ́rɛ fe Jɔ̌n, anáŋ ǎjwìti nyaka bho. Ajwiti Yesu nkwɔ. Nɛ mpok Yesu ánɨ̀kmʉɛt, nɛbu nɛ́nɛ́nɛ.
322 Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm asɔt mkpá ɛbhóŋó asɛp yi amʉɛt. Ɛyɔŋ ɛ́fú amfay ɛrɛm bɛ, “Wɔ ɔchí Mɔ́wa. Nkɔŋ wɔ tontó. Ɔ̌chyɛ̀ mɛ bɛyǎ maŋák” 
323 Mpok Yesu ábhó bɛtɨk ɛbhi, achi nyaka mbɔ mamiɛ́ ɛsǎ nsɛm byó, bo mándɛm nɔkɔ bɛ Yesu chí mmɔ̌ Josɛ́f mmɔ̌ Héli,
324 Héli mmɔ̌ Mátat, Mátat mmɔ̌ Lɛ́vi, Lɛ́vi mmɔ̌ Mɛ́lki, Mɛ́lki mmɔ̌ Jánai, Jánai mmɔ̌ Josɛ́f,
325 Josɛ́f mmɔ̌ Matátias, Matátias mmɔ̌ Ɛ́mɔs, Ɛ́mɔs mmɔ̌ Náhum, Náhum mmɔ̌ Ɛ́sli, Ɛ́sli mmɔ̌ Nágai,
326 Nágai mmɔ̌ Máat, Máat mmɔ̌ Matátias, Matátias mmɔ̌ Sémen, Sémen mmɔ̌ Jósɛk, Jósɛk mmɔ̌ Jóda,
327 Jóda mmɔ̌ Joánan, Joánan mmɔ̌ Résa, Résa mmɔ̌ Sɛrúbabɛl, Sɛrúbabɛl mmɔ̌ Síltiɛl, Síltiɛl mmɔ̌ Nɛri,
328 Nɛ́ri mmɔ̌ Mɛ́lki, Mɛ́lki mmɔ̌ Ádi, Ádi mmɔ̌ Kósam, Kósam mmɔ̌ Ɛlmádam, Ɛlmádam mmɔ̌ Ɛ́r,
329 Ɛ́r mmɔ̌ Jóshua, Jóshua mmɔ̌ Ɛliɛ́sa, Ɛliɛ́sa mmɔ̌ Jórim, Jórim mmɔ̌ Mátat, Mátat mmɔ̌ Lɛ́vi,
330 Lɛ́vi mmɔ̌ Símiɔn, Símiɔn mmɔ̌ Júda, Júda mmɔ̌ Josɛ́f, Josɛ́f mmɔ̌ Jónam, Jónam mmɔ̌ Ɛliákim,
331 Ɛliákim mmɔ̌ Mɛléa, Mɛléa mmɔ̌ Mɛ́na, Mɛ́na mmɔ̌ Matáta, Matáta mmɔ̌ Nátan, Nátan mmɔ̌ Debhít,
332 Debhít mmɔ̌ Jése, Jése mmɔ̌ Óbɛd, Óbɛd mmɔ̌ Bóas, Bóas mmɔ̌ Sálmɔn, Sálmɔn mmɔ̌ Náshɔn,
333 Náshɔn mmɔ̌ Amínadap, Amínadap mmɔ̌ Rám, Rám mmɔ̌ Hɛ́rɔn, Hɛ́srɔn mmɔ̌ Pɛ́res, Pɛ́res mmɔ̌ Júda,
334 Júda mmɔ̌ Jekɔ́p, Jekɔ́p mmɔ̌ Áisek, Áisek mmɔ̌ Ábraham, Ábraham mmɔ̌ Tɛ́ra, Tɛ́ra mmɔ̌ Náhɔ,
335 Náhɔ mmɔ̌ Sɛ́rug, Sɛ́rug mmɔ̌ Réu, Réu mmɔ̌ Pɛ́lɛk, Pɛ́lɛk mmɔ̌ Ɛ́ba, Ɛ́ba mmɔ̌ Shɛ́la,
336 Shɛ́la mmɔ̌ Kaínan, Kaínan mmɔ̌ Afásad, Afásad mmɔ̌ Shɛ́m, Shɛ́m mmɔ̌ Nóa, Nóa mmɔ̌ Lámɛk,
337 Lámɛk mmɔ̌ Mɛtúsɛla, Mɛtúsɛla mmɔ̌ Ɛ́nɔk, Ɛ́nɔk mmɔ̌ Járɛt, Járɛt mmɔ̌ Mahálálɛl, Mahálálɛl mmɔ̌ Kánǎn,
338 Kánǎn mmɔ̌ Ɛ́nɔs, Ɛ́nɔs mmɔ̌ Sét, Sét mmɔ̌ Ádam, Ádam mmɔ̌ Mandɛm.
4
41 Yesu ápɛ́rɛ fú ndǔ nnyɛ́n Jɔ́dan, ajwi nɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ. Yí akʉ Yesu arɔk amɛm baso,
42 abhak arɛ́ ndǔ manywɔp bɛsa bɛpay Satan amɔ nɔkɔ yi. Yí kɛnyiɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ndǔ manywɔp ɛyɔ ankɛm. Ndǔ ngwɛnti manywɔp ɛyɔ nsay akɛ́m yi.
43 Satan arɔk arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Mbák ɔchí Mmɔ Mandɛm, chyɛ̌ ɛyɔŋ bɛ ntǎy ɛnɛn nɛ́njíbhírí nɛ́ndɔp ɛkpɔkɔ́ brɛd.”
44 Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Ɛ́chí amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ, ‘Puyɛ̌ nɛnyíɛ́ nɔ́nɔ́ kɛ nɛ́kɛ̀m nɛpɛ́mɛ́ mu.’”
45 Satan asɔt yi akó ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ achi tɛ amfay atɔ́ŋ yí bɛtɔkɔ́ mmɨk mɛnkɛm nɛ kɛfɔ ɛkɛn kɛ́chí arɛ́ ndu mɔ́mbɨŋɨ́ mpok.
46 Arɛm yɛ ntá yi bɛ, “Báchyɛ́ bɛtaŋ nɛ kɛfɔ̌ mmɨk nkɛm ntá ya, nɛ nchí kway bɛchyɛ kɔ ntá yɛ̌ agha anɛ nkɔ́ŋɔ́. Chɔŋ nchyɛ́ wɔ bǒbhɛn mɛnkɛm nɛ kɛfɔ ɛkap.
47 Mbák ɔ́ntɛ́p mánɛ́n amɨk, ɔ́nchyɛ mɛ kɛnókó, mbɔ Mandɛm ywɛ, chɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm mɛ́nndɔp ɛbhɛ.”
48 Yesu akɛmɛ bɛ́, “Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Mmu abhɔŋ bɛchyɛ kɛnókó chi ntá Mandɛm Acha, antók chí yí aywǐntí.’”
49 Satan asɔt yi bárɔ́k Yerúsalɛm, bákó ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ áchí tɛ amfay ndǔ ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm. Arɛ́, arɛm ntá Yesu bɛ, “Mbák ɔchí Mmɔ Mandɛm, dók,
410 tɛ̌ndu ɛchi amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ, ‘Chɔŋ Mandɛm anchyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɔángɛl bhi mántwɔ́ manchyɛ wɔ nɛkwak.’
411 Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́pɛt ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Chɔŋ mánkpʉɛp wɔ nɛ amɔ yap, bɛ́ ɔ́kɛ́ tɛm ɛkak ndǔ ntay.’”
412 Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Ɛkáti ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Ɔ́kɛ́ mɔ Mandɛm Acha ywɛ.’”
413 Satan ámɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ Yesu ndǔ bɛyǎ babhi kɛkɛ́m yi, arɔ kpɨ́k yi. 
414 Yesu apɛt yɛ nsɛm atú Gálili ndǔ bɛtaŋá Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ. Mbok yi ataka atú Gálili wu ankɛm.
415 Are tɔ́ŋ bo Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt bo Israɛl, nɛ bo báré chyɛ yi kɛnókó. 
416 Yesu afa, arɔk Násárɛt, ɛtɔk ɛnɛ máné yi arɛ́. Mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛpɨŋ ɛyi ɛchi nyaka, arɔk amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt bo Israɛl. Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, afate bɛpay Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
417 Báchyɛ́ yi ɛkáti ɛnɛ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Aisáya. Anɛnɛ yɔ́, ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ básɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́:
418 “Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm Acha achí nɛ mɛ mbɔnyunɛ, ayap mɛ bɛ́ ngátí Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ntá bachɛ́bhɛ́bho. Ato mɛ, bɛ ntwɔ́ ngátí bo abhɛn bachi ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ kɛsɛm, bɛ chɔŋ mámfɛrɛ bhɔ arɛ. Nɛ bɛ́ chɔŋ amɨ́k anɛnɛ manɛ́mámɨk, nɛ bɛ chɔŋ mánchyɛ ngǎngaŋ ntá bo abhɛn batɨ̌ bakwǎŋwaŋ mányìɛrɛ bhɔ amɨk.
419 Ato mɛ bɛ́ mbé ntá bho bɛ mpok anɛ yi átɔŋ bɔ́ bɛrɨ̌ndu bhi akway.”
420 Yesu ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́pay ɛkáti yɔ, akuti yɔ́, akɛmɛ ntá mǔnti arɔk achɔkɔ amɨk. Bǒ mankɛm abhɛn bachi amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí bátɛp yi amɨ́k amʉɛt.
421 Abho yɛ bɛghati bhɔ bɛ, “Ɛchɔŋ, ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ basɨŋɨ́ mɛn árɛ̀m ɛ́fákárí mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǎghókó.”
422 Bǒ abhɛn bachi arɛ́, bárɛ́m bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti yi, nɛ babhak maknkay ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ́tí kɛpɨ ɛkɛn kɛ́fú yi anyu. Kɛ bábho bɛbhɛp bɛ, “Pú mmɔ̌ Josɛ́f nɛ?”
423 Yesu arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Chɔŋ mǎntɛm mɛ nɛkay ɛnɛn ɛ̌ti ya bɛ, ‘Ngaŋ, bú mmʉɛt ɛyɛ. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛghoko bɛ ɔkʉ awu ɛtɔk Kapɛ̌naum, kʉ bhɔ́ fá amɛm ɛtɔk ɛyɛ nkwɔ.’”
424 Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, bápú ka ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ amɛm ɛtɔk yi.
425 Kɛ nchí ghati bhe bɛ, mánkwɛ́sɛ́ bayǎ nyaka amɛm ɛtɔk Israɛl ndǔ mpok ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Ɛláija. Mpok yɔ manyiɛp kɛkwɛ́n ndǔ mamiɛ́ arat nɛ ɛbhɔ́k, nɛ ɛrɛmɛ́ nsay ɛ́kwɛ́n ndǔ ɛtɔk Israɛl ɛnkɛm.
426 Kɛ Mandɛm ábhɨ́kɨ́ tó nyaka Ɛláija ntá yɛ̌ kɛ́nkwɛ́sɛ́ amɔt, ɛbhɨ́kɨ́fʉɛt chi anɛ achi ɛtɔk Sárɛfat, atú Sídɔn, ɛtɔk bo bachak.
427 Nɛ ndǔ mpok ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Ɛláisha, bɛyǎ bǒ ɛbhaŋákwa bachi nyaka amɛm ɛtɔk Israɛl. Kɛ yɛ̌ amɔt Ɛláisha ábhɨ́kɨ́ bu, ɛbhɨ́kɨ́fʉɛt chi mmǔ ɛtɔk ɛchak, Náman, mmu Síria.”
428 Bo mankɛm abhɛn bachi amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí, bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, batɨ ábé bhɔ amɛm tontó.
429 Báfáte bákɛ́m yi, bafu ɛtɔk nɛ yi. Ndǔ ɛtɔk yap ɛchi amfǎy njiɛ, básɔ́t yi barɔk ndǔ nkókónjiɛ bɛ́ mámpúrí yi ankwɛn arɛ́.
430 Kɛ ayibhiri mmʉɛ́t, anɔnɛ, afʉɛ́t nɛntɨ nap arɔk ɛbhakayi. 
431 Yesu apɛt asɛp arɔk Kapɛ̌naum, ɛtɔk ɛgho, atú Gálili. Arɛ́, are tɔ́ŋ bo amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí bo Israɛl ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt ɛnap.
432 Bábhák maknkay tontó ɛ̌ti ɛnyu ɛnɛ yí átɔ̀ŋ mbɔnyunɛ ǎtɔ̀ŋ nyaka mbɔ mmǔ anɛ árɛ̀m ɛ́may.
433 Mmu amɔt abhak arɛ́ anɛ ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ́sɔ̀ŋɔri. Are bɨk nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ́,
434 “Ɛ̌! Yesu, Mmu Násárɛt, ɔbhɔŋ yí bɛkʉ nɛ bhɛsɛ! Ɔtwɔ fá bɛway bhɛsɛ? Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ mmu wɔ ɔ́chí. Ɔ́chí Mmu Nyáŋá anɛ Mandɛm átó!”
435 Yesu asáy ɛfóŋó yɔ bɛ, “Kusí! Fú yi amʉɛt!” Ɛfóŋó yɔ ɛ́gʉɛp mmǔ wu amɨk bɛsí bhap. Kɛ ɛ́fú yi amʉɛt kɛkʉ yi yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
436 Bǒ mankɛm bábhák maknkay, nɛ babho bɛbhɛp batɨ bɛ, “Ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ́ mmǔ-nɛ ɛ́chí nɛ́ ná e? Ǎsay bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ nɛ bɛtaŋ bɛ́ mɛ́mfu bo amʉɛ́t, nɛ mɛ́mfú.”
437 Nɛ nsoŋo Yesu akɔ ataka atú ɛtɔk wu ankɛm. 
438 Yesu afa ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí yɔ, arɔk, ndǔ ɛkɛt Símun. Nnɔ ngɔrɛ́ Símun abhɔ̌ŋ mbʉ́ɛ́p ataŋataŋ. Baghɔk Yesu manɨk yi mmʉɛt bɛ ambu yi.
439 Arɔk, ate nɛku bɛkɔk ɛbhɛn yi achi arɛ bhʉ́rɛ́. Achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ mbʉ́ɛ́p wu ándɔ́ yí. Ámay. Afaté akʉ nɛnyíɛ́ abho mɛne bhɔ.
440 Mpok anɛ mmok ánɛ̀m, bǒ mankɛm abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bǒmame mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu básɔ́t bhɔ bárɔ́k ntá Yesu. Abho mɛ́nyáŋa amɔ amʉɛt yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap, kpat abú bhɔ mankɛm.
441 Bɛyǎ bhap babhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ. Bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bhɔ bɛ́fú bɛyǎ bho amʉɛt mɛ́mbɨkɨ nɔkɔ bɛ́, “Wɔ ɔchí Mmɔ Mandɛm!” Kɛ Yesu are sáy bhɔ, kɛka mɛ́ndɛm yɛ̌nyɨŋ, mbɔnyunɛ bɛ́rɨŋɨ nyaka bɛ yi achi Mpɛmɛ anɛ Mandɛm átó. 
442 Nɛ́yí nɔkɔ, Yesu afa ɛtɔk, arɔk ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bo bápú arɛ́. Bǒ babho bɛyaŋ yi. Bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yí, babho mɛnɨkmʉɛt bɛ́ ákɛ́ rɔ ɛtɔk ɛyap.
443 Kɛ yi aghati bhɔ́ bɛ́, “Mbɔŋ bɛ́gháti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ bɛ Mandɛm achi Mfɔ amɛm bɛtɔk bɛchak nkwɔ, mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm átó mɛ fá amɨk chi ɛ̌ti yɔ.”
444 Arɔ yɛ, are kɔ andɔkɔ nɔkɔ ndǔ bɛtɔk ɛbhɛn bɛchi atú Judɛ́ya angati nɔkɔ bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt bo Israɛl
5
51 Ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, Yesu abhak téé angɔkɔ Ɛ̌ntɨŋnyɛn Gɛnɛ́sarɛt.   Bo báré nu bɛbhak kɛkwɔt nɛ yi bɛ mangok Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
52 Aghɔ́ bachwi apay angɔkɔnyɛ́n. Bawǎnsi abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bachwi yɔ, báfù amɛm mánchaka nɔkɔ basɨ yap.
53 Yesu arɔk achwe amɛm áchwí amɔt. Abhak anɛ Símun. Aghati yi bɛ ánók áchwí antɛn anyɛ́n mandú. Yesu achɔkɔ yɛ amɛm áchwí wu, antɔŋ nɔkɔ bo abhɛn bachi angɔkɔnyɛ́n Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
54 Ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛtɔŋ bo arɛm ntá Símun bɛ, “Tɛ́n áchwí ndǔ ɛɛntɛm mǎngʉɛp basɨ yɛka anyɛ́n bɛ mǎnkɛm nsi.”
55 Símun akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Ɛta, sɛ́dɛn mmʉɛt bɛti mɛnkɛm kɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ kɛm. Kɛ ndu bɛkoŋo ɛyɔŋ ɛyɛ, chɔŋ ngʉɛp básɨ ndǔ ɛɛntɛm.”
56 Yí nɛ mamʉɛrɛ bhi bárɔk bagʉɛp bɛyǎ nkáp anyɛ́n, bákɛ́m bɛyǎ nsi. Ɛ́yá kpát bɛyǎ nkáp yap abho bɛrakati.
57 Bámák batɨ̌ bawǎnsi abhɛn bachi ndǔ áchwí achak nɛ awɔ bɛ mántwɔ mánkwak bhɔ. Bárɔ́k bachɛm nɛ bhɔ, bafɛrɛ nsi báfyɛ́ amɛm bachwi apay kpát ábhó bɛbɛt.
58 Símun anɛ mpɨ́kɨ́rí nnyɛ́n ɛni nɛchi bɛ Píta, ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay yɔ, arɔk atɛp mánɛ́n bɛsí Yesu, arɛm bɛ, “Acha, kɛ́twɔ kɛkwɔt nɛ mɛ, mbɔnyunɛ nchí mmǔ bɛbʉ́.”
59 Árɛ́m nɔ, mbɔnyunɛ yi nɛ batɨ bhi bachi nyaka maknkay tontó bɛghɔ bɛyǎ nsi ɛnɛ bakɛmɛ.
510 Jems nɛ Jɔ̌n, batɨ̌ bawáy nsi, bábhák nkwɔ́ maknkay. Báchí nyaka bɔ̌ Sɛbɛdi. Yesu arɛm ntá Símun bɛ, “Kɛ́cháy. Bɛbho ɛchɔŋ ɔrɔbhɛ ya chí bo bɛ mantwɔ ntá ya.”
511 Bɔ Píta bátɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bachwi yap angɔkɔnyɛ́n, bárɔ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ bakoŋo Yesu. 
512 Mpok Yesu achi ɛtɔkɔ́fu, mmu ɛbhaŋákwa amɔt arɔk akwɛ́n yí bɛkak abho mɛnɨkmʉɛt ntá yi bɛ́, “Acha, mbák ɔkɔŋ, ɔ̌kway bɛkʉ mɛ ntaŋ.”
513 Yesu anyabhɛ awɔ́ atɔk yi arɛm bɛ, “Nkɔŋ bɛkʉ wɔ ɔ́ntáŋ, nɛme ɛnɛ nɛ́máy.” Tɛ́mté wu, ɛbhaŋákwa yi ɛmay.
514 Yesu asɛmti yí bɛ, “Kɛ́ ghati yɛ̌ mmu ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fákárí, kɛ dɔ́k ntá nchiakap Mandɛm bɛ yi angɔ bɛ ɛbhaŋákwa yɛ ɛmay. Ánáŋ ámbyó wɔ, ɔ́ndɔk, ɔnchyɛ yɛ akap ntá Mandɛm bɛ́kóŋo ɛbhé Moses. Chɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́mbak ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bo bɛ ɛbhaŋákwa yɛ ɛ́may.”
515 Kɛ yɛ̌ nɔ, mbok Yesu ataka mbǎnkɛm. Ngɛ́mtay bo bárɔ́k ntá yi ndu bɛghók Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm nɛ bɛ́ yi ambu mame yap.
516 Kɛ aya mmʉɛt arɔk ndǔ nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́fu amɛm baso anɨkmʉɛt. 
517 Nywɔp nɛmɔt, Yesu ǎtɔ̀ŋ nyaka bho Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm, Mandɛm Acha achyɛ yi bɛtaŋ, are bú bǒmame. Bǒnkwɔ Fárisi nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm babhak arɛ́. Báfú ndǔ bɔ̌bɛtɔk mankɛm atú Gálili, nɛ bachak báfú atú Judɛ́ya, nɛ abhɛnɛfu báfú Yerúsalɛm.
518 Bǒfú bátwɔ́ nɛ mbɛ́ntí amɔt anɛ bápɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ bɛkpaka. Báré yaŋ mbi bɛchwe anywɔ́p bɛ mambʉrɛ yi bɛsí Yesu.
519 Kɛ bɔ́ kɛbhɔ́ŋ mbi anɛ báfʉɛt manchwe amɛm ɛ̌ti bɛyǎ bó. Bákó amfǎy ɛkɛt, manɛnɛ mbok arɛ́, basɛbhɛ yi bhʉrɛ ndǔ bɛkpaka bhi, nɛ́ntɨ́ bhó, bɛsí Yesu.
520 Yesu ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyǔ nɛka ɛnɛ́n bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ yi, aghati mbɛ́ntí wu bɛ, “Nkwánɛ, mfóŋórí bɛbʉ́ bhɛ.”
521 Batɔŋ-ɛbhé Mandɛm nɛ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bábho bɛbhɛp mmʉɛ́t bɛ, “Agha nɛ́? Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m chi nsɔk ntá Mandɛm! Mandɛm aywǐnti kɛ ákway bɛfoŋori bɛbʉ́ mmu!”
522 Yesu arɨŋɨ nkaysi yap. Abhɛ́p bɔ́ bɛ, “Ndaká yí bǎkàysi mɛnyǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ?
523 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́chí wɨkɨrɨk chí ɛnɛ́? Bɛrɛm bɛ, ‘Mfóŋórí bɛbʉ́ bhɛ’, kɛ chi bɛrɛm bɛ, ‘Faté kɔ’?
524 Kɛ chɔŋ nkʉ mǎndɨŋɨ bɛ, Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm mbɔ̌ŋ bɛtaŋ fá amɨk bɛfoŋori bɛbʉ́ bho.” Arɛm ntá mbɛ́ntí wu bɛ, “Nchí ghati wɔ, faté, pɔkɔ́ bɛkpaka bhɛ gurɛ!”
525 Tɛ́mté wu, afate kpɛrɛp bɛsí bhap, apɔkɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ábhʉ̀rɛ nyaka arɛ́, abho bɛgurɛ, ambɨti nɔkɔ Mandɛm.
526 Bɛyǎ bɛcháy bɛkɛm bo mankɛm! Bábhák maknkay, babho bɛbɨti Mandɛm, mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Sɛghɔ̌ baraká maknkay ɛchɔŋ!” 
527 Awu áfʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, Yesu afa nɛbhʉɛ́rɛ́ wu arɔk aghɔ́ mbɛbhɛ́ nkabhɛ́nti anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Lɛ́vi chɔkɔ amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́bɛtɨk yi. Yesu aghati yi bɛ, “Twɔ́, bhák nkoŋo wa.”
528 Lɛ́vi afate, arɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ, abho bɛkoŋo Yesu.
529 Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, Lɛ́vi anak ɛrɛm ɛpa ɛkɛt yi ntá Yesu. Bɛyǎ babhɛbhɛ́ nkábhɛ́nti nɛ bakʉ̌ bɛbʉ́ bachak nkwɔ babhak arɛ́ nɛ Yesu.
530 Bǒnkwɔ Fárisi nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm, báré nywinti, nɛ bábhɛ́p bakoŋo Yesu bɛ, “Ndaká yí mǎnyìɛ mǎnyu nɔkɔ nɛ babhɛbhɛ́ nkabhɛntí nɛ bakʉ̌ bɛbʉ́ bachak?”
531 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Bo abhɛn bapu me, bápú yaŋ ngaŋ. Bǒ mame kɛ báyàŋ ngaŋ.
532 Mbɨ́kɨ́ twɔ bɛbhɨŋɨ bo abhɛn bakaysi bɛ bachi chak bɛsí Mandɛm bɛ mántɨ́knsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap, ntwɔ bɛ́bhɨ́ŋɨ chi bo babʉ́babʉ́.” 
533 Bo bárɛ́m ntá Yesu bɛ, “Bakoŋó Jɔ̌n Njwiti bátat nɔkɔ nsay ndu mɛnɨkmʉɛt. Bakoŋó nkwɔ Fárisi bákʉ̀ ɛnyumɔt. Kɛ abhɛ mányiɛ, mányu nɛ bapu tat nsay?”
534 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎkaysi bɛ mankɔ̌ abhɛn bachi ndǔ ɛpǎ nɛbhay bakway bɛbhak ndǔ nɛtarɛ́nsay? Nsé! Tɛ̌ndu mbǎyngɔrɛ́ abhʉɛ́t nɛ bhɔ, bápú kway bɛtat nsay.
535 Kɛ mpok ǎtwɔ̀ anɛ báfɛrɛ chɔŋ mbǎyngɔrɛ́ ntá yap. Nɛ chɔŋ mántarɛ nɔkɔ nsay ndǔ mpok yɔ.”
536 Yesu atɛ́m bɔ nɛkay ɛnɛ́n nkwɔ bɛ, “Yɛ̌ mmu apú kway bɛdak ɛbhɔ́kɔ́ndɛn ndǔ nkú anɛ nkɔ anchók mbok ndǔ ɛsɨ́ nku. Mbák mmu ánkʉ́ nɔ́, ǎchɔŋti nkú nkɔ, mbɔnyunɛ ɛbhɔ́kɔ́ndɛn ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fú ndǔ nkú nkɔ ɛ́pú kɔ nɛ ɛsɨ́ ndɛn.
537 Nɛ ntá bo abhɛn báfyɛ mmɛ́m ndǔ bɛbhǎ nkwɔbhɛnya, bápú fyɛ mmɛ̌m bakɔ amɛm ɛbhǎ nkwɔbhɛnya ɛnɛ́ ɛsɨ. Mbák mánkʉ́ nɔ, ɛbha ɛ́sɛn, ɛnchɔŋɔ, nɛ mmɛ́m andɔk amɨk.
538 Bábhɔŋ bɛfyɛ mmɛ̌m bakɔ chi amɛm ɛbhǎ mmɛ́m ɛnɛ́ ɛkɔ.
539 Nɛ bápú nyu ɛsɨ́ mmɛ́m mánjaŋ amɛn bakɔ mbɔnyunɛ bákaysi bɛ ɛsɨ́ mmɛ́m arɨ̌ achá amɛn bakɔ.”
6
61 Yesu nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi báré kɔ mámfʉɛt nɔkɔ amɛm nkɨ̌ nchwifú ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt bo Israɛl. Baghɔkɔ́ bhi bábho bɛkʉɛp ɛnyǔ nchwi yɔ, mámfɨkɨri mányiɛ nɔkɔ.
62 Mbɔk bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bábhɛp bɛ, “Ndaká yí bǎkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛbhé yɛsɛ ɛ́pú yaŋ mankʉ ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt?”
63 Kɛ Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ re pay amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mfɔ Debhít ákʉ́ nyaka nɛ bǒ abhɛn báchí nɛ yi mpok nsay ákɛ́mɛ́ bhɔ́?
64 Achwe amɛm ɛkɛt Mandɛm, apɔkɔ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn báchyɛ́ mbɔ akap ntá Mandɛm akɔrɛ nɛ bɔ̌bhi mányíɛ́. Ɛbhé ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ ndiɛrɛ bachiǎkap Mandɛm kɛ bákway mɛnyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɔ.”
65 Yesu arɛm yɛ ntá yap bɛ, “Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm kɛ̌ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɛm ɛnyǔ mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ nɛ ɛbhé ɛnɛ ɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ́ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt.” 
66 Ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt nɛ́chák, Yesu achwe amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí bo Israɛl antɔŋ nɔkɔ bo Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́. Mmǔ amɔt abhak arɛ́ anɛ awɔ́nɛm aywi ágú.
67 Mbɔk batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm nɛ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi abhɛn bachi arɛ́, bábháka ntɨ bɛ chɔŋ mámbɔŋ mbi ndu bɛrɛm bɛ yi akʉ ɛbɛ́ptí ndak. Bátɛ́p yɛ yi amɨ́k amʉɛt ndu bɛghɔ mbák chɔŋ Yesu ambú mmǔ wu ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt.
68 Yesu arɨŋɨ nkaysi yap. Arɛm ntá mmǔ wu bɛ, “Faté, twɔ́ fá ambɨ.” Mmǔ wu afate arɔk ate arɛ́.
69 Yesu arɛm yɛ ntá bǒbhɔ bɛ, “Ɛbhé yɛsɛ́ ɛ́rɛm bɛ́ sɛ́nkʉ yi ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt? Chí bɛ́kʉ bɛrɨ kɛ bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́? Chí bɛ́pɛ́mɛ mmu kɛ chí bɛ́chɔŋti nɛpɛ́m ɛni?”
610 Yesu ayibhiri mmʉɛ́t ayɨŋɨ bɔ́ mankɛm, arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Nyabhɛ́ awɔ́ ywɛ.” Akʉ nɔ, awɔ́ ywi apɛt ataŋ, ábhák mbɔ ɛnyu ɛsɨ́.
611 Kɛ batɨ ábé bǒnkwɔ Fárisi nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé tontó. Bábhó bɛsokori ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bákway bɛkʉ Yesu. 
612 Ndǔ manywɔbhɛ́ yɔ, Yesu akó amfǎy njiɛfú ndu mɛnɨkmʉɛt. Anɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm bɛtǐ mɛnkɛm.
613 Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, abhɨŋɨ bakoŋo bhi bɛ mántwɔ́ ntá yi. Bátwɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́, ayap bhɔ́ batí byo nɛ apay, áchyɛ́ bhɔ́ nnyɛ́n bɛ bǒnto.
614 Manyɛ́n yap áchí nyaka bɛ: Símun anɛ Yesu áchyɛ́ nnyɛ́n nɛchak bɛ Píta, nɛ mɔ̌máyi Andru, nɛ Jems nɛ Jɔ̌n, nɛ Fílip nɛ Batolómio,
615 nɛ Mátio, nɛ Tɔmás, nɛ Jems mmɔ̌ Alfeyɔs, nɛ Símun mfyɛ̌-bɛtaŋ ndǔ baraká ɛtɔk,
616 nɛ Júdas mmɔ̌ Jems, nɛ Júdas Iskariɔt anɛ átí nyaka Yesu. 
617 Yesu asɛp antɛ̌n njiɛ ndǔ mmɨk nɛbhʉɛt nɛ bhɔ́. Ngɛ́mtay bakoŋo bhi bábhák arɛ́ nɛ ngɛ́mtay bo bachak abhɛn báfú Yerúsalɛm nɛ abhɛn báfú atú Judɛ́ya ankɛm. Bo báfú ndǔ bɛtɔk bɛ́páy ɛbhɛn bɛchi kɛkwɔt nɛ manyu ɛbhɛn bábhìŋɨ bɛ Táya nɛ Sídɔn.
618 Bátwɔ́ bɛghók mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi átɔ̀ŋ nɛ bɛ yi ámbu bhɔ. Nɛ bo abhɛn bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛ́sɔ̀ŋɔri bhɔ, bataŋ.
619 Bǒ bhɔ mankɛm bare nu bɛtɔk Yesu, mbɔnyunɛ bɛtaŋ bɛ́fù nyaka yi amʉɛt mɛ́mbu nɔkɔ yɛ̌ ághá anɛ átɔk yi. 
620 Yesu ayoŋ amɨ́k ayɨŋɨ bakoŋo bhi arɛm bɛ, “Ɛ́rɨ ɛcha ntá yɛka bachɛ́bhɛ́bho; mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm achi Mfɔ ywɛka.
621 Ɛ́rɨ ɛcha ntá yɛka bǒ nsay ánù nɛ́nɛ, mbɔnyunɛ chɔŋ yi anchyɛ bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛkwak bɛbhɔŋ. Ɛ́rɨ ɛcha ntá yɛka bǒ bǎdì kɛbhɔ nɛ́nɛ, mbɔnyunɛ chɔŋ mǎngway ámɛn!
622 “Ɛ́rɨ ɛcha ntá yɛka mpok bo bápàp bhe, nɛ mánsɔkɔti nɔkɔ bhe nɛ mándɛm bɛbɛ́pti mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti yɛka, nɛ mándɛm nɔkɔ bɛ bǎchí bɛbɛ́ptí bho ɛ̌ti ya, Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm!
623 Bɔ́ŋ ká maŋák yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ ɛ́fákárí nɔ́ nɛ bhe, mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm abhʉ́rɛ́ ɛrɛm ákap ntá yɛka awu amfay. Nchí ghati bhe mbɔnyunɛ ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ bachǐmbɨ bhap bǎchyɛ̀ nyaka barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm ɛsɔŋɔri.
624 Kɛ chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛp ntá yɛka bafɔ̌nkáp ɛncha mbɔnyunɛ, mǎnaŋ bǎbhɔŋ ɛbhɛka bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ, nɛ mǎnyiɛ̌ nɛpɛ́m, ndak ámay.
625 Chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛp ntá yɛka bǒ mǎnyìɛ mǎnjwi nɛ́nɛ, mbɔnyunɛ chɔŋ nsay anu bhe! Chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛp ntá yɛka bo bǎwày ámɛ́n nɛ́nɛ, mbɔnyunɛ chɔŋ mǎndɔp ndǔ basɛ́mɛ́ nɛ nɛdǐ kɛbhɔ!
626 Chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛ́p ntá yɛka, be bho bo bǎrɛ̀m ɛrɨ́rɨ́ ɛ̌ti yɛka, mbɔnyunɛ ɛnyu yɔ kɛ̌ bachǐmbɨ bhap bárɛ̀m nyaka ɛ̌ti barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ nsé.” 
627 Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛtɔŋ. Arɛm bɛ, “Kɛ nchí ghati bhe bho bǎghòk mɛ bɛ, kɔ́ŋ ká bo abhɛn bápábhɛ́ bhe, mǎntɔŋ bɔ́ bɛrɨ.
628 Nɨk nɔkɔ ká mmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm ankwak bo abhɛn bárɛ̀m ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti yɛka.
629 Mbák mmu adɛp wɔ atá ndǔ ɛbhe awɔ́nɛm, tɔ́ŋ yi ɛbhe ɛ́chák nkwɔ. Nɛ mbák mmu ásɔt ndɛ́ yɛ, dɔ̌ yi ansɔt yɛ̌ chí nkú yɛ nkwɔ.
630 Mbák mmu anɨ́ŋɨ́ wɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́, chyɛ̌ yi. Nɛ mbák mmu asɔt ɛnyɨŋ ɛyɛ, kɛ́ghati yi bɛ ákɛ́mɛ́ yɔ ntá yɛ.
631 Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka ánkʉ́ yɛ nɛ batɨ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi ákway bɛyaŋ bɛ bo mánkʉ ntá yi.
632 “Mbák bǎkɔ̀ŋ chi bo abhɛn bakɔŋ be, bakak amɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́chyɛ bhe ǎbhák bɛ yi? Yɛ̌ chí bǒ bɛbʉ́ bákɔŋ bo abhɛn bakɔŋɔ bhɔ!
633 Nɛ mbák bǎkʉ̀ bɛrɨ chi ntá bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ bhe bɛrɨ bakak amɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛchyɛ bhe ǎbhák bɛ yi? Yɛ̌ chí bakʉ̌ bɛbʉ́ bákʉ̀ nɔ!
634 Nɛ mbák bǎpwɔ̀ mɛnyɨŋ chí ntá bo abhɛn bǎbhaka ntɨ bɛ bakɛmɛ ntá yɛka, bakak amɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛchyɛ bhe achi bɛ yi? Yɛ̌ chí bǒ bɛbʉ́ bápwɔ̀ nkwɔ mɛnyɨŋ ntá batɨ̌ bakʉ̌ bɛbʉ́, ndu bákɛmɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bápwɔ́ ntá yap!
635 Kɛ bǎbhɔŋ bɛbhak kɛkúrí! Kɔŋ ka bǒmpap abhɛka, nɛ mǎnkʉ bhɔ bɛrɨ. Pwɔ ka bhɔ́, kɛbhaka ntɨ bɛ chɔŋ mánkɛmɛ bhe yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ. Mbák bǎkʉ̀ ɛnyu yɔ, chɔŋ akap aywɛká ánja ancha, nɛ mǎmbak bɔ Mandɛm Acha. Ǎtɔ̀ŋ bɛrɨ̌ntɨ ntá bǒ bɛbʉ́ abhɛn bápú kaka yi nɛ abhɛn máŋɛ̀m mɛŋɛ́mɛ.
636 Ghɔ́ ká batɨ ntínso, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm ághɔ̀ bhe ntínso.” 
637 Yesu yi bɛ, “Bǎkɛ́ táŋ batɨ kɛka mántáŋ be. Bǎkɛ́ rɛm bɛ mánchyɛ́ batɨ ntɛ́msi, nɛ mbák bǎpú rɛm nɔ, bápú rɛm bɛ manchyɛ bhe ntɛmsi. Foŋorí nɔ́kɔ́ ka batɨ nɛ chɔŋ mámfoŋori nɔkɔ bhe.
638 Chiɛ́ ntá ntɨ, nɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm anchyɛ wɔ nkwɔ́. Yi apɛrɛ́ chyɛ, ǎyɛnti sayri, angoko kpát ɛ́njwi ɛntakati nɔkɔ amɨk. Ɛnyǔ ɛnɛ́ ɔ́yɛ̀nti ɔnchyɛ ntɨ, nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyuyɔ̌ kɛ báyɛ̀nti manchyɛ wɔ.”
639 Yesu atɛ́m bɔ nɛkay nkwɔ bɛ, “Nnɛmámɨ́k apu kway bɛyǎ ntɨ nnɛ́mámɨ́k mbi. Mbák ándɔ́k bɛkʉ nɔ, bɔ́ batí apay bápú kwɛn amɛm nɛpi?
640 Mmɔ̌káti apu kway bɛrɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ancha ntɔ̌ŋ aywi. Kɛ mpok anɛ bátɔ́ŋ yi kpát ánaŋa nɛghɔ́k ɛni, ǎbhák mbɔ ntɔ̌ŋ aywi.
641 Ndaká yí ɔ́yɨ̀ŋɨ mɔ́ɛ̌nyɨŋɨ anɛ achi anyɛsɛ ntɨ, ɛnɛ́ ɔ́pú fyɛ nti ndǔ nkɔkɔ́nɔk anɛ achi wɔ anyɛsɛ?
642 Ná ɔ́ghàti ntɨ bɛ, ‘Manɔ́, dɔ̌ mfɛ́rɛ́ mɔ́ɛ̌nyɨ́ŋɨ́ anɛ achi wɔ anyɛ́sɛ́,’ ɛnɛ́ wɔmbɔŋ ɔpú ghɔ́ nkɔkɔ́nɔk anɛ achi amɛm ɛnɛ nyɛ́sɛ́? Wɔ mmǔ bɛtábhá! Fɛrɛ́ kpɨ́k nkɔkɔ́nɔk anɛ achi wɔmbɔ̌ŋ anyɛsɛ, kɛ ɔ́ngɔ yɛ mbaŋ sayri ndu bɛ́fɛ́rɛ mɔ́ɛ̌nyɨ́ŋɨ́ anɛ achi amɛm nyɛ́sɛ́ manɔ́ywɛ.” 
643 Yesu apɛt arɛm bɛ, “Ɛrɨ́tí ɛnɔk ɛ́pú nyu bɛbɛ́ptí kɛpɛm. Nɛ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnɔk ɛ́pú nyu bɛrɨ́tí kɛpɛm.
644 Bárɨŋɨ ɛrɨ́tí ɛnɔk chí ndǔ kɛpɛm ɛki. Bápú rɔŋ ndu támfáŋ mánkɔ́k nɛpɨ.
645 Nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ nkáp ájwi amɛm mɔ́kɛrɛ́ nkáp, nɔ́ kɛ̌ nkaysi ndɨ́ndɨ́ ájwì antɨ mmǔ ndɨ́ndɨ́, nɛ bɛrɨ bɔ́bhɔ́ kɛ bɛ́fù arɛ́. Kɛ mbák mmú abhɔ̌ŋ ɛbɛ́ptí ntɨ, barak abʉ́abʉ kɛ áfù yi anyu, mbɔnyunɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́jwí mmu antɨ, yɔ́ kɛ ɛ́fù yi anyu.” 
646 Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Ndaká yí bǎbhɨ̀ŋɨ mɛ bɛ, ‘Acha, Acha’, ɛnɛ́ bǎpú kʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌ghàti bhe?
647 Chɔŋ ntɔ́ŋ be ɛnyǔ mmǔ anɛ átwɔ́ ntá ya, aghók ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ndɛ́mɛ́, ankʉ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi ághókó achi.
648 Achí mbɔ mmǔ anɛ áyámbɨ átɛ́mɛ́ nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́kɛt kpát nɛ́chwé nɛ́ghaka ndǔ sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́ kɛ ǎte ɛkɛt. Nɛ mpok nnyɛ́n nɛ́gbókó kpát nɛ́ghaka ndǔ ɛkɛt, ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ moko ɛ́nkwɛ́n mbɔnyunɛ até yɔ sayri.
649 Kɛ mmu anɛ ághok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ̌rɛ̀m yi kɛ kʉ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ndɛ́mɛ́, achí mbɔ mmu anɛ áté ɛkɛt, yi kɛ yambɨ bɛghoko nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́kɛt sayri. Mpok nnyɛ́n nɛgboko nɛ́ghaka ndǔ ɛkɛt, tɛ́mté wu, ɛ́báy mmʉɛt amɨk juu, ɛ́chɔ́ŋɔ ɛnkɛm!”
7
71 Yesu anáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛtɔŋ bo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm, afa apɛtnsɛm ɛtɔk Kapɛ̌naum.
72 Mǔnti nkwɔ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bǒ Rom amɔt achi nyaka arɛ́. Mǔbɛtok aywi anɛ yi aré kɔŋ áre me. Arɔp chi kɛkwɔt bɛ́gu.
73 Mǔnti wu ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ bo bárɛ̀m ɛ̌ti Yesu, ató bǒbati bǒ Israɛl bɛ mánɨ́kmʉɛt nta yi bɛ ándɔ́k ámbú mǔbɛtok aywi.
74 Bárɔ́k ntá Yesu mánɨkmʉɛt nta yi nɛ nɛsɛptímʉɛt mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Ɛta, dɔ́k kwák mǔnti-nɛ. Achi mmu anɛ ákwáy bɛ́bhɔŋ nɛkwak.
75 Akɔŋ bǒ bhɛsɛ nɛ yímbɔŋ kɛ áté ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí ɛyɛsɛ.”
76 Yesu are rɔ́ŋ nɛ bhɔ. Mpok bághaka kɛkwɔt nɛ ɛkɛt, mǔnti wu ató mamʉɛrɛ bhi bɛ́ mángátí Yesu bɛ, “Acha, kɛ́sɔŋɔri mmʉɛt bɛ́twɔ ndǔ ɛkɛt ɛya. Mbɨ́kɨ́ kway mmu anɛ ɔ́twɔ́ ɛkɛt ɛyi.
77 Yɛ̌ chi mɛmbɔŋ mbɨ́kɨ́ kaysi bɛ nkway bɛ́twɔ ntá yɛ. Chiɛ̌ chí ɛyɔŋ, chɔŋ mǔbɛtok wa antaŋ.
78 Nchí rɛm nɔ mbɔnyunɛ mɛ nkwɔ́ mbɔ̌ŋ bo abhɛn, mbák mángátí mɛ nkʉ ɛnyɨŋ, mbɔ̌ŋ bɛghok bhɔ. Nɛ mbɔ̌ŋ nkwɔ́ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu antɛnɛ ya abhɛn mbák ngátí bhɔ ɛnyɨŋ, bábhɔŋ bɛghok mɛ́. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap anɛ ndɛ́mɛ́ bɛ, ‘Dɔ́k’, ǎrɔŋ, nɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ndɛ́mɛ́ bɛ, ‘Twɔ́’, ǎtwɔ. Nɛ mbák ngátí mɔ̌bɛtok awa bɛ, ‘Kʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ’, abhɔŋ bɛkʉ yɔ.”
79 Yesu ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, abhak maknkay tontó. Ayibhiri mmʉɛt arɛm ntá bɛyǎ bo abhɛn bákòŋo yi bɛ, “Dɨŋɨ́ ká tɛtɛp bɛ, mbɨ́kɨ́ re ghɔ mmǔ Israɛl amɔt anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ mɛ mbɔ kɛnkɔ̌-nɛ.”
710 Mamʉɛrɛ́ abhɛn mǔnti wu átó bápɛtnsɛm ɛkɛt ɛyi, bághɔ́ bɛ mǔbɛtok ywi anáŋ ataŋ. 
711 Ansɛm mpok, Yesu nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi báfá báre rɔŋ ɛtɔk Naín. Ngɛ́mtay bo báre rɔŋ nɛ bhɔ́.
712 Ndu bágháká antítɔk, bághɔ́ ndǔ bo bápɔ́kɔ́ ngú báfù ɛtɔk bɛrɔŋ bɛbhɛmɛ. Ngú wu abhak njaŋamɔ ntá máyi anɛ achí nyaka kɛ́nkwɛ́sɛ́. Tóntó bo ɛtɔk ɛyɔ báré koŋo nkɔ́kɔ́ngu.
713 Acha aghɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ngɔrɛ́ wu, ntínso nɛ́kɛ́m yi tontó, arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Kɛ́pɛrɛ di.”
714 Arɔk, atɔk nkɔ́k anɛ́ bápɔkɔ ngú arɛ́. Bo abhɛn bápɔ́kɔ́ ngú báte. Yesu aghati ngú wu bɛ, “Ɛsakámu! Nchí ghati wɔ, faté.”
715 Tɛ́mté wu, afaté achɔkɔ chɔ́kɔ́, abho bɛrɛm kɛpɨ. Yesu asɔt yi achyɛ ntá máyi.
716 Bɛcháy bɛ́kɛ́m bo mankɛm abhɛn báchí arɛ́. Bábhó bɛbɨti Mandɛm mándɛmɛ́ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Ɛtaŋtí ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm afú fá ndǔ nkwɔ́ ywɛsɛ! Mandɛm atwɔ bɛ́pɛ́mɛ bǒbhi!”
717 Mbok ɛ̌tí yi akɔ aghabhɛri mmɨk bo Judeya nkɛm kpát aghaka ndǔ bɛtɔk bɛchák ɛbhɛn bɛchi kɛkwɔt. 
718 Mpok anɛ bakoŋó Jɔn Njwiti nkwɔ bághókó mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fàkari bágháti yi bɔ́ mɛnkɛm.
719 Abhɨŋɨ batí apay, ató ntá Acha bɛ mámbɛ́p yi bɛ, “Wɔ kɛ ɔ́chí Mpɛmɛ anɛ Jɔ̌n árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ ǎtwɔ, kɛ chi bɛ sɛ́bhɔŋ mɛnoŋ mmu achak?”
720 Bárɔ́k ntá Yesu bárɛm bɛ, “Jɔ̌n Njwiti ató bhɛsɛ́ bɛ sɛ́mbɛp wɔ bɛ, ‘Wɔ kɛ ɔ́chí Mpɛmɛ anɛ Jɔ̌n árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ ǎtwɔ, kɛ chi bɛ sɛ́bhɔŋ mɛnoŋ mmu achak?’”
721 Bátwɔ́ nɛ ntó ɛnɔ ntá Yesu mpok yi ábù bɛyǎ bho abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka mame mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu. Ǎbòk nyaka nkwɔ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ mɛ́ndɔ nɔkɔ bho, ankʉ nɔkɔ manɛ́mámɨk mángɔ mbáŋ.
722 Akɛmɛ baghɔkɔ́ Jɔ̌n bɛ, “Pɛt ka nsɛm ghati Jɔ̌n mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎghɔ́ nɛ ɛbhɛn bághókó bo bárɛ̀m: Bǎghók nɛ bǎghɔ́ bɛ manɛ́mámɨk bághɔ̀ mbaŋ nɛ́nɛ, nɛ bakɛm báfáté bákɔ̀. Bǒ ɛbhaŋákwa bátáŋ nɛ babhók bághòk mbaŋ. Bawú bápɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nɛ bághàti bachɛ́bhɛ́bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́.
723 Nɛ ɛ́rɨ ɛcha ntá mmǔ anɛ ápú kwɛ́n ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ̌kʉ̀.”
724 Bapɔkɔ́ ntó Jɔ̌n bhɔ bápɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nsɛm, Yesu abho bɛrɛm ntá bɛyǎ bo abhɛn bárɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yi achi ɛ̌ti Jɔ̌n bɛ, “Mpok bǎrɔ̀ŋ nyaka awu amɛm baso, bǎrɔ́k bɛghɔ ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ mmʉ? Bǎrɔk bɛghɔ mmu anɛ achi mbɔ ɛ̌nsɔ́manyiɛp ɛnɛ babhʉ́ɛ́p áfòk ɛ́nkwɛ́n ɛnɛ ɛbhe, ámfok ɛnkwɛn ɛbhe ɛ́chák kɛ?
725 Bǎrɔŋ nyaka amɛm baso bɛghɔ yi? Mmu anɛ afyɛ́ bɛrɨ́tí ndɛn amʉɛt kɛ? Bǒ abhɛn báfyɛ̀ mɛnyǔ ndɛn ɛbhɔ báchɔ̀kɔ chi amɛm bɛkírí-bafɔ!
726 Ghatí ká mɛ. Bǎrɔŋ nyaka amɛm baso bɛghɔ ntɨkɨ ɛnyʉ̌ mmu? Ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ? Ɛ́chi tɛtɛp. Kɛ dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ mmu anɛ bǎghɔ́ achá ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ.
727 Jɔ̌n kɛ achi mǔntó anɛ basɨŋ nyaka amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ̌ti yi bɛ, Mandɛm arɛm bɛ, ‘Yɨŋɨ́, chɔŋ ntó mpɔkɔntó wa wɔ ambɨ, bɛ ángókó mbi ywɛ kɛ ɔ́ntwɔ.’
728 Nchí ghati bhe bɛ Jɔ̌n Njwiti achá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achak ndǔ abhɛn bágú nɛ abhɛn bachi nɛpɛ́m. Yɛ̌ nɔ́, yɛ̌ chí mmu anɛ apu yɛ̌nyɨŋ ndǔ mpǎy bho abhɛn Mandɛm achi nɛ bhɔ mbɔ Mfɔ wap, acha yi.”
729 Bo bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyu yɔ, bɔ mankɛm nɛ babhɛbhɛ́ nkábhɛ́nti barɛm yɛ bɛ, nkaysi Mandɛm achi tɛtɛp. Barɛm ɛnyu yɔ, mbɔnyunɛ manaŋ baka nyaka nkwɔ bɛ́ Jɔ̌n anjwiti bhɔ́.
730 Kɛ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm bábhɨ́kɨ́ ka nyaka bɛ Jɔ̌n anjwiti bhɔ. Ɛnyu ɛyɔ, bábyak nkaysi anɛ Mandɛm abhɔŋɔ nɛ bhɔ.
731 Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Chɔŋ njɛnti mkpáká bho abhɛn ɛchɔŋ nɛ yi? Bachi mbɔ yi?
732 Báchí mbɔ bɔ̌ abhɛn báchɔ́kɔ́ nɛfí ɛsiɛ́. Kɛ mbɔk mámbɨŋɨ nɔkɔ abhɛnɛfu bɛ, ‘Sɛ́kwǎy bakwáy nɛbhay bɛ mǎmbɛn nɛbhɛ́n, kɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ bhɛn. Sɛ́kwáy bakwáy nɛwú, kɛbhɔ bě kɛdi!’
733 Jɔ̌n Njwiti atwɔ nyaka antarɛ nɔkɔ nsay ndu mɛnɨkmʉɛt, nɛ mmɛ́m yi kɛnyu. Bě bǎre rɛm bɛ, ‘Ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛchi nɛ yi!’
734 Mpok Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm ntwɔ́, nde nyiɛ, nnyú nɔkɔ. Běka bǎre rɛm bɛ, ‘Ghɔ́ ká yi awu, nyiɛ̌ mɛnyɨŋɨ́nyíɛ́ nɛ nyǔmɛm. Mamʉɛrɛ bhi chi babhɛbhɛ́ nkábhɛ́nti nɛ bakʉ̌ bɛbʉ́ bachak!’
735 Kɛ dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmu anɛ ákɔ́ŋ mbi Mandɛm ákʉ̀ kɛ bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɛ́n nɛ́fú ntá Mandɛm nɛchi tɛtɛp.” 
736 Ɛ́fákári bɛ mǔnkwɔ Fárisi amɔt abhɨ́ŋɨ́ Yesu bɛ ányíɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛkɛt yi. Yesu aka, arɔk, achɔkɔ are nyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ yi.
737 Ngɔrɛ́ nɛkɔ amɔt anɛ achi nyaka ɛtɔk ɛyɔ, ághók bɛ Yesu ǎnyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́ amɛm ɛkɛt ɛnɛ́ mǔnkwɔ Fárisi wu. Asɔt ɛ́kpɛ́mɛ́ bawɛrɛ́riɛp arɔk arɛ́ nɛ yɔ.
738 Ate kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ Yesu andi nɔkɔ kɛbhɔ. Babhɛsɛ mi are chɨtí bɛkak Yesu. Atɛp ntí amɨk antɛsɛ nɔkɔ bɛkak Yesu nɛ ɛmɛnɛ́nti yi, angwati nɔkɔ nɛ bawɛrɛ́riɛp.
739 Mǔnkwɔ Fárisi wu aghɔ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, are kaysi amɛm ntɨ ɛni bɛ, “Mbɔ mmǔ-nɛ achi ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm tɛtɛp, mbʉ arɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyǔ mmu anɛ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ átɔ̀k yi achi. Chí ngɔrɛ́ nɛkɔ.”
740 Kɛ Yesu abhɨŋɨ mǔnkwɔ Fárisi wu bɛ, “Símun, mbɔ̌ŋ ndak bɛ́ghati wɔ.” Símun akɛmɛ bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, dɔ́k ambɨ.”
741 Yesu abho yɛ̌ bɛ́tɛm nɛkay ɛnɛn bɛ, “Mmǔ amɔt apwɔ nyaka nkáp ntá bǒ batí apay. Amɔt akɛ́m yi bɛbhǎ nkáp byo. Anɛfú ɛbhǎ nkáp ɛ́mɔt.
742 Mmǔ wu abhɛ́p nkáp anɛ bákɛ̀m yi, kɛ yɛ̌ mmu wap kɛ kway bɛkɛmɛ anɛ́ yi ákɛ̀m. Afɔ̌ kɛ̌ yi afoŋori bhɔ́ mankɛm, afɛrɛ ntɨ ndǔ nkáp wu. Ghatí yɛ́ mɛ, ndǔ bati yap ápay, ntɨkɨ mmu ákway bɛkɔŋ mpwɔnkáp wu ancha anɛfu?”
743 Símun akɛmɛ bɛ, nkáysi bɛ, “Chi anɛ barɛm ami áyá.” Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Ɔrɛm tɛtɛp.”
744 Kɛ Yesu ayibhiri mmʉɛt ayɨŋɨ anɛ ngɔrɛ́ wu, arɛm ntá Símun bɛ, “Yɨŋɨ́ mɔ́ngɔrɛ́-nɛ. Tɛ nchwé ɛkɛt ɛyɛ, ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ chyɛ mɛ manyiɛp nsó bɛkak, kɛ yí asó bɛkak ɛbha nɛ babhɛsɛ mi, atɛsɛ nɛ ɛmɛnɛ́nti yi.
745 Ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ syɛpti mɛ nɛ kɛnókó mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ, kɛ yi abhʉ́ɛ́t mɛnyɔti bɛkak ɛbha.
746 Ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ wati mɛ ntí nɛ bawɛt kɛ yí ǎwati mɛ bɛkak nɛ bawɛrɛ́riɛp.
747 Nchi ghati yɛ́ wɔ bɛ́ mɔ́ngɔrɛ́-nɛ atɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ ɛkɔŋ bɛtɔŋ bɛ Mandɛm afóŋórí bɛyǎ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ́. Kɛ mmu anɛ ákáysí bɛ bɛbʉ́ bhi ɛbhɛn Mandɛm ákway bɛfóŋóri bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ ya, ǎtɔ̀ŋ chi mandú ɛkɔŋ.”
748 Yesu arɛm yɛ ntá mɔ́ngɔrɛ́ wu bɛ, “Mfóŋórí bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛ.”
749 Kɛ bǒ abhɛn mányìɛ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ Yesu bábho mɛnywinti mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Agha nɛ́, anɛ árɛ̀m tɛ bɛ yi ǎfòŋori bɛbʉ́?”
750 Yesu apɛt arɛm ntá mɔ́ngɔrɛ́ wu bɛ, “Dɔ́k sayri, nɛka ɛnɛ̌ nɛ mɛ nɛ́kʉ ɔtaŋ.”
8
81 Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, Yesu are kɔ amɛm bɛtɔk bɛgho nɛ ndǔ bɔ̌bɛtɔk angati nɔkɔ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ Mandɛm ábhak nɛ bho mbɔ Mfɔ wap. Baghɔkɔ́ bhi bati byo nɛ apay bábhák nɛ yi.
82 Mpáy baghɔrɛ́ bákɔ̀ nyaka nkwɔ nɛ bhɔ. Bábhák baghɔrɛ́ abhɛn Yesu ábú mame yap nɛ mbɔk bábhák abhɛn Yesu ábókó bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ ɛbhɛn bɛ́sɔŋɔri nyaka bhɔ. Ngɔrɛ́ amɔt abhak arɛ́ anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ María mmɔ̌ ɛtɔk Mágdala. Yesu anáŋ abok nyaka bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ tándrámɔt ɛbhɛn bɛ́sɔ̀ŋɔri yí.
83 Anɛfú abhak Joana, ngɔrɛ́ Kusa, mmǔ anɛ achi nkɛ́mfɔ ntá Mfɔ Hɛ́rɔd. Anɛfú abhak Susana. Nɛ bɛyǎ baghɔrɛ́ bachak. Bɔ básɔt nyaka nkáp awap mánkwak nɔkɔ bɛ Yesu nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi mámbɔ́ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchɛbhɛ bhɔ. 
84 Bo barɔk ambɨ bɛ́fú ndǔ bɛtɔk nɛ bɛtɔk mántwɔ nɔkɔ ntá Yesu. Ngɛ́mtay bho báchɛ́mɛ́ nɛbhʉɛt amɔt. Yesu atɛ́m bhɔ nɛkay ɛnɛn bɛ́:
85 “Ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, nkwaŋankɨ amɔt arɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛtak ɛnyǔ nchwifú amɛm nkɨ ywi. Ɛnɛ́ yi átàk árɔ̀ŋ, mbɔk akwɛnti ndǔ mɔ́mbi anɛ áchí amɛm nkɨ. Bo báyáti. Kɛnɛn kɛ́twɔ́ kɛ́bwɔ́pti nchwi yɔ nkɛm.
86 Achák akwɛnti ndǔ mmɨk sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́ nɛ mpok ácháká, anɨŋti, awɔsi, mbɔnyunɛ nɛbhʉɛ́rɛ́mɨk wu apu kɛm manyiɛp.
87 Mbuɔt anɛfu akwɛnti ndǔ mmɨk anɛ tákɔ nsěnse ágò arɛ́. Achak are gó, kɛ tákɔ nsěnse agó áchók yɔ.
88 Kɛ nchwi áchák akwɛnti ndǔ mmɨk ndɨ́ndɨ́, agó achyɛ bɛyǎ nchwi. Ayá acha anɛ bápɨ́ ndɔŋ bɛsa bɛtay.” Ndǔ ngwɛnti, Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Mmǔ anɛ áyàŋ bɛghok, ántá batú angok sayri.” 
89 Baghɔk Yesu bábhɛ́p yi ntí nɛkay ɛnɛn.
810 Akɛmɛ bhɔ́ bɛ́ “Mandɛm achyɛ́ mbi bɛ mǎndɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛchi bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ɛ̌ti ɛnyǔ yi ákɛ̀m bǒbhi mbɔ Mfɔ wap. Kɛ mbák chi bo bachak, nchí rɛm kɛpɨ nɛ bhɔ́ chi ndǔ bakay bɛ yɛ̌ndu báyɨ̀ŋɨ bákɛ́ ghɔ, nɛ yɛ̌ndu bághòk bákɛ́ jwimɛm.” 
811 Yesu arɔk ambɨ árɛ́m bɛ nɛkǎy ɛnɛn nɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ, “Mbuɔt chi Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
812 Mbuɔt anɛ ákwɛ́ntí ndǔ mɔ́mbi chi bo abhɛn bághókó Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm. Kɛ Satan antwɔ́ amfɛrɛ yɔ́ ndǔ batɨ yap bɛ bákɛ́ noko Mandɛm yi ampɛmɛ bhɔ.
813 Mbuɔt anɛ ákwɛ́ntí ndǔ mmɨk sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́ até ndǔ bo abhɛn bághòk Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm, mánoko tɛ́mté nɛ bɛyǎ maŋák. Kɛ bɔ kɛbhɔ́ŋ bakaŋ amɨk. Mánoko chi ndu mɔ́mbɨŋɨ́ mpok. Nɛmɔ nɛtwɔ nɔkɔ, mánkwɛn ansɛm.
814 Nɛ mbwɔt anɛ ákwɛ́ntí ndǔ mmɨk tákɔ nsěnse, até ndǔ mmu anɛ ághòk Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm, kɛ bakáysí ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ mmɨk, nɛ bakáp, nɛ nɛpɛ́m mɛ́nyiɛ, akʉ bɔ́ kɛsɛnɛ ndǔ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
815 Mbɔ ɛnyu ɛfakari nɛ mbwɔ́t anɛ ákwɛ́ntí ndǔ mmɨk ndɨ́ndɨ́, nɔ kɛ ɛchi nɛ bo abhɛn bághòk Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm mánkɛ́m nɛ ntɨ nɛ́mɔ́t mankʉ nɔkɔ mbɔ ɛnyu ɛ́yàŋ, mándɔk nɔkɔ ámbɨ bɛkʉ ɛnyu ɛyɔ nɛ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ́.” 
816 “Yɛ̌ mmu apú durɛ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ansɔt ɛnyɨŋ ankuti, mbák ɛ́pú nɔ ante antɛn bɛkɔk. Ǎte yɔ chí nɛbhʉɛt anɛ babhɔŋɔ bɛte yɔ bɛ mbaŋ angɔ́ɔ́ ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ achwe anywɔ́p.
817 Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ, chɔŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́, ɛ́mfú kpoŋoroŋ, nɛ ɛnɛ́ bábhɛ́sɛ́ ɛ́mfú kpoŋoroŋ.
818 Sɔt ka mpok bɛghok Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm sayri ɛnyu ɛnɛ bǎjwimɛm mbɔnyunɛ mmǔ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ, chɔŋ mámaka yi ɛ́chák, kɛ mmǔ anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ, yɛ̌ chí mandú anɛ yi ákáysí bɛ́ abhɔŋ, chɔŋ mánsɔt yɔ ntá yi.” 
819 Nnɔ Yesu nɛ bɔ̌mayi bárɔk bɛghɔ yi. Kɛ bɔ́ kɛ kwáy bɛrɔŋ kɛkwɔt nɛ yi mbɔnyunɛ bo bayǎ nyaka bacha.
820 Mǔfu aghati yi bɛ, “Máyɛ nɛ bɔ̌mayɛ báchí nɛfí téé báyàŋ bɛghɔ wɔ.”
821 Yesu akɛmɛ bɛ, “Máya nɛ bɔ̌maya chi bo abhɛn bághòk Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm nɛ mánkʉ mbɔ ɛnyu yɔ ɛ́rɛ̀m.” 
822 Nywɔp nɛmɔt Yesu arɛm ntá baghɔkɔ́ bhi bɛ, “Sɛ́mpé sɛ́ndɔ́k ɛbhě manyu ɛ́nɛ awu.” Báchwe amɛm áchwí nɛ yi bábhó mɛnok mandɔkɔ nɔkɔ.
823 Ndu mánòk bárɔ̀ŋ, Yesu akwɛ́n kɛnɔ́. Mbʉ́ɛ́p ataŋataŋ abho mɛnu. Nnyɛ́n nɛ́bho bɛdɛp áchwí, manyiɛp anchwe nɔkɔ amɛm. Ɛ́rɔp chi mandú bɛ mámbɛt anyɛ́n.
824 Baghɔkɔ bhi barɔk máŋɛ́mɛ́ yi barɛm bɛ, “Ɛta! Ɛta! Sɛ́twɔ gu anyɛ́n!” Yesu aŋɛmɛ asáy mbʉ́ɛ́p nɛ mpɛ́rɛ́nyɛn. Mbʉ́ɛ́p ágú, nɛ nnyɛ́n nɛ́kwɛ́n tɨɨ.
825 Abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ mɛ nɛ́chí fá?” Bɛcháy bɛkɛm bɔ nɛ bábhak maknkay, bábho bɛbhɛp batɨ bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ mmu nɛ? Ǎsay yɛ̌ chi mbʉ́ɛ́p nɛ mpɛ́rɛ́nyɛn, nɛ yɔ ɛ́nkʉ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi arɛmɛ!” 
826 Yesu nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi mánók yɛ, bápe nnyɛ́n, báchwɔ́p ɛtɔk Gɛrása. Gɛrása abhak ɛbhěnyɛn ɛnɛ ɛ́yɨ̀ŋɨ Gálili.
827 Nɛfú Yesu áfú amɛm áchwí, mǔfu afú ɛtɔk Gɛrása ɛyɔ akwɛsɛ yi. Bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛ́sɔ̀ŋɔri nyaka yi. Ndǔ ɛrɔri mpok, mmǔ wu ǎkɔ̀ nyaka chi ɛbhowɔ, yi kɛ chɔkɔ anywɔ́p. Ǎchɔkɔ nyaka ndǔ nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ manɛm.
828 Ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ Yesu, abɨk, arɔk akwɛ́n yi bɛkak, arɛm nɛ, ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ bɛ, “Yesu Mmɔ Mandɛm Acha! Ɔ́bhɔ̌ŋ ntɨkɨ ndak nɛ mɛ? Nɨkmʉɛt ɔ́kɛ́ chyɛ mɛ ɛsɔŋɔri!”
829 Arɛm ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ Yesu asay nyaka ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛnɛ ɛ́sɔ̀ŋɔri yi bɛ ɛ́ndɔ́ yi. Bɛyǎ mpok, ɛfóŋó yɔ ɛ́fate nyaka yi amʉɛt, nɛ yɛ̌ bákɛm yi báfyɛ ngɛm amɔ nɛ bɛkak, mámbabhɛri nɔkɔ yi, ǎkɨti ngɛm ɛyɔ, ɛfóŋó ɛyɔ ɛ́nkʉ yi ambʉ́ɛ́ anchwe amɛm baso.
830 Yesu ásáy nɔ́kɔ́ ɛfóŋó ɛbʉbʉ yɔ, abhɛp mmu wu bɛ, “Nnyɛ́n ɛnɛ bɛ yi?” Akɛmɛ bɛ, “Nnyɛ́n ɛna chi ngɛ́mtáy”; mbɔnyunɛ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛyǎ nyaka yi amʉɛt tontó.
831 Bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bhɔ bɛré nɨk Yesu mmʉɛt bɛ́ ákɛ́ tó bhɔ amɛm nɛpi ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
832 Ɛrɛmɛ́ nkwɔ́ bakók ányìɛ nyaka ambɨ njiɛ anɛ achi kɛkwɔt. Bɛfóŋó bhɔ mɛ́nɨkmʉɛt ntá Yesu bɛ́ ándɔ́ bɔ́ mándɔ́k mǎnchwe amʉɛt bakok bhɔ. Yesu achyɛ bhɔ mbi.
833 Bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bhɔ bɛ́fú amʉɛt mmu wu bɛrɔk bɛchwe amʉɛt nkwɔ́ bakók. Bakók mankɛm bárókóri básɛp ndǔ nkokonjiɛ dúgúdúgúdúgú bágúrɛ anyɛ́n.
834 Bo abhɛn bábhàbhɛri bakók, bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛfakari, bárɔk ɛtɔk ɛgho nɛ mbaŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi kɛkwɔt ntiɛ́t ntiɛt bágháti bho.
835 Bo bárɔ́k yɛ bɛghɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛfakari. Bágháká nɔ́kɔ́ ntá Yesu, bághɔ́ mmu anɛ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛ́fú yi amʉɛt. Abhak sayri ndǔ nkaysi yi. Bɛcháy bɛ́kɛm bɔ́ mankɛm tontó.
836 Bǒ abhɛn bághɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fákári, báré ghati abhɛn batwɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fákárí kɛ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛ́rɔ́ mmu anɛ bɔ bɛ́sɔ̀ŋɔri nyaka, yi ataŋ.
837 Bɛcháy bɛ́kɛ́m bǒ atú Gɛrása wu mankɛm. Bágháti Yesu bɛ́ amfu ɛtɔk ɛyap ándɔ́k. Arɔk achwe amɛm áchwí ndu bɛrɔŋ.
838 Mmǔ anɛ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛ́fú yi amʉɛt are nɨk Yesu mmʉɛt bɛ ándɔ́ yi ankoŋo yi. Kɛ ndu Yesu aghati yi ampɛtnsɛm, arɛm ntá yi bɛ,
839 “Pɛtnsɛm anywɔ́p ghati bo ɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛnɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ ntá yɛ.” Arɔk yɛ ndǔ ɛtɔk ɛyɔ ɛnkɛm angati nɔkɔ bo ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu akʉ ntá yi. 
840 Yesu apɛt nɔkɔ nsɛm ɛbhě manyu ɛchak, bǒ abhɛn mánòŋ yi, basyɛpti yi.
841 Mǔfu anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Jáyrɔs arɔk ntá Yesu. Achí nyaka mǔnti ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí bo Israɛl ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yi achí arɛ. Akwɛ́n Yesu bɛkak anɨkmʉɛt bɛ Yesu andɔk ɛkɛt ɛyi.
842 Mɔ́ywi arɔp nyaka kɛkwɔt bɛgu. Nɛ ndiɛrɛ mɔ́wu kɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka. Abhak mɔ́ngɔsɔ́ŋ anɛ achí mamiɛ́ byo nɛ apay. Ndu Yesu árɔ̀ŋ arɛ́ bɛyǎ bo bákáp yi bɛbhe bɛpay.
843 Ngɔrɛ́ amɔt abhak arɛ́, anɛ áfɛ̀rɛ manoŋ ndǔ mamiɛ́ byo nɛ apay. Anáŋ achɔ́ŋtí nyaka nkáp anɛ́ yí ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ankɛm kɛ yɛ̌ mmu kɛkwáy bɛbu yi.
844 Afú Yesu ansɛm, atɔti amɛm bɛyǎ bhó kpát arɔk atɔk nkokoŋ nkú yi. Tɛ́mté wu, manǒŋ mɔ asiɛ́p.
845 Yesu abhɛ́p bɛ, “Agha átɔ́kɔ́ mɛ́?” Bǒ mankɛm bataŋa. Píta arɛm yɛ bɛ, “Ɛ̌tá, bɛyǎ bo bákàp wɔ nɛ mányìɛrɛ wɔ!”
846 Yɛ̌ nɔ, Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Mmu atɔk mɛ. Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ nɔ mbɔnyunɛ ngók ndǔ bɛtaŋ bɛ́fú mɛ amʉɛt.”
847 Mɔ́ngɔrɛ́ wu ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ Yesu arɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛfakari, arɔk angwɛrɛ nɔkɔ gbagbǎgbak, ákwɛ́n bɛkak Yesu arɛm bɛsí bo mankɛm ntí anɛ yi átɔ́kɔ́ Yesu nɛ ɛnyǔ yi átáŋ tɛ́mté.
848 Yesu arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Mmá, nɛka ɛnɛ nɛ mɛ nɛ́kʉ ɔtaŋ. Mandɛm achi nɛ wɔ, dɔ́k sayri.”
849 Ɛnɛ́ Yesu ábhʉɛ́t bɛ́rɛm kɛpɨ nɛ ngɔrɛ́ wu, mǔnto achwɔp anɛ áfú ɛkɛt ɛnɛ Jáyrɔs mǔnti arɛm ntá yí bɛ, “Mɔ́ywɛ agu. Ɔ́kɛ́pɛrɛ sɔŋɔri Ntɔŋ.”
850 Kɛ Yesu aghoko nɔkɔ nɔ arɛm ntá Jairɔs bɛ, “Ɔ́kɛ́ cháy. Dɔ́kɔ́ rɔŋ ambɨ mɛnóko, chɔŋ mɔ́ywɛ antaŋ.”
851 Yesu aghaka nɔkɔ ɛkɛt Jairɔs, yi kɛka yɛ̌ mmu ánchwe anywɔ́p nɛ yi, ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ fʉɛt Píta, nɛ Jɔ̌n, nɛ Jems nɛ chimɔ nɛ máyi.
852 Bǒ mankɛm abhɛn bachi arɛ́ bare di mɔ́wu mámbyaka nɔkɔ amɔ antɨ. Kɛ Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Bɔ́t ká kɛbhɔ. Mɔ́nɛ abhɨkɨ gú. Ǎbhʉ̀rɛ chí kɛnɔ́!”
853 Bɔ́ mankɛm báré way Yesu way ndu bárɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ mɔ̌rɛ́ agǔ tɛtɛp.
854 Kɛ Yesu arɔk kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ mɔ́wu, akɛ́m awɔ ywi, abhɨŋɨ yi bɛ, “Mɔ́wa, faté.”
855 Ɛfóŋó yi ɛ́pɛ́tnsɛm, afate tɛ́mté. Yesu achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ manchyɛ yi nɛnyíɛ́ ányiɛ.
856 Ɛtayi nɛ máyi bábhák maknkay tontó. Kɛ Yesu asɛmti bhɔ bɛ bákɛ́ ghati yɛ̌ mmu ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fákárí.
9
91 Nywɔp nɛ́mɔ́t, Yesu abhɨŋɨ baghɔkɔ́ bhi bati byo nɛ apay, achyɛ bhɔ bɛtaŋ ndu bɛ́bók mɛnyǔ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ mɛnkɛm nɛ ndu bɛ́bu mame.
92 Kɛ ǎtó bhɔ nɛfí bɛ́ mándɔ́k mángátí bho ɛnyu Mandɛm abhak nɛ bo mbɔ Mfɔ wap nɛ bɛ mámbú bǒ mame.
93 Apɛt arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Bǎkɛ́ pɔkɔ́ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ndǔ nɛkɔ ɛnɔ, yɛ̌ ntɛm, yɛ̌ ɛbha, yɛ̌ brɛt, yɛ̌ nkáp, nɛ yɛ̌ chí ndɛn ɛ́chák.
94 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛtɔk ɛnɛ́ basyɛpti bhe arɛ́, bák ká amɛm ɛkɛt ɛ́mɔt kpátɛ mǎndɔ ɛtɔk ɛyɔ.
95 Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ bǎchuɔ́bhɛ́ kɛ bo kɛ syɛpti bhe, dɔ̌ ká ɛtɔk ɛyɔ nɛ bǎpɛrɛ́ fá arɛ́, kwɛt ka mfok anɛ áchí be bɛkak. Chɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́mbak mbɔ ntísiɛ ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bɔ́ bákʉ́.”
96 Báfá báre kɔ bɛtɔk nɛ bɛtɔk mángati nɔkɔ bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ nɛ mámbu nɔkɔ bǒmame yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak. 
97 Hɛ́rɔd, gɔ́bhanɔ Gálili, aghók yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fakari. Ntí átáka yi amɛm mbɔnyunɛ mbɔk bo bárɛ̀m nyaka bɛ, “Yesu chí Jɔ̌n Njwiti kɛ ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.”
98 Báchák bɛ, “Ɛláija kɛ ábhésí.” Nɛ abhɛ́nɛ́fú bɛ, “Ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ amɔt anɛ tɛ nyaka kɛ ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.”
99 Hɛ́rɔd arɛm nɛ mmʉɛt yi bɛ, “Nchyɛ́ nyaka ɛyɔŋ nɛ bákpɔ́t ntí Jɔ̌n. Kɛ mmǔ anɛ mɛ̌ghòk nɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛn ɛ̌ti yi chí agha?” Are yáŋ mbi bɛghɔ Yesu. 
910 Bǒnto Yesu bápɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nsɛm, bágháti Yesu mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ́ bákʉ́. Asɔt yɛ bhɔ ansɛm, bárɔ́k ɛtɔk ɛnɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Bɛtsáida.
911 Yɛ̌ nɔ, bɛyǎ bo bághók, bábho bɛkoŋo yi. Asɔt bhɔ sayri, abho bɛghati bhɔ ɛnyu Mandɛm abhak nɛ bho mbɔ Mfɔ wap ámbu nɔkɔ abhɛn báyàŋ yi ambu bhɔ.
912 Mmok ábhó nɔ́kɔ́ mɛ́nɛ́m, baghɔkɔ́ bhi bárɔ́k ntá yi barɛm bɛ, “Ghatí bǒbhɛn bɛ mándɔ́k ndǔ bɛtɔk ɛbhɛn bɛchi fá kɛkwɔt nɛ ndǔ bakɨ mánjáŋ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ bɛbhak bɛbhʉrɛ. Ɛtɔk ɛ́pú fá!”
913 Kɛ Yesu aghati bɔ bɛ, “Bě babhɔŋ, chyɛ̌ ká bhɔ nɛnyíɛ́ mányíɛ́.” Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Sɛ́bhɔŋ chi bɔ̌bɛkpɔkɔ́ brɛt batay nɛ nsi ɛpay. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛchak ɛpu. Ɔ̌yáŋ sɛ́ndɔ́k sɛ́nku nɛnyíɛ́ ntá ngɛ́mtáy bǒbhɛn mankɛm kɛ?”
914 Mpǎy babhakanɛm abhɛn bachi arɛ abhak mbɔ nká ɛtay. Yesu aghati baghɔkɔ́ bhi bɛ, “Kʉ ka bo mánchɔ́kɔ́ amɨk ndǔ bakwɔ́, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nkwɔ́ ámbɔ́ŋ bǒbati bɛsa bɛpay nsɛm byo.”
915 Baghɔkɔ́ bhi bákʉ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi árɛ́mɛ́, bǒ mankɛm báchɔ́kɔ amɨk.
916 Asɔt bɛkpɔkɔ́ brɛt bhɔ bɛ́táy nɛ nsi ɛpay. Ayoŋ amɨ́k mfay. Achyɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm, abho bɛ́bɔ́kɔ́ti brɛt wu anchyɛ nɔkɔ ntá baghɔkɔ́ bhi bɛ mánkɔ́rɛ́ nɛ nsi ntá bɛyǎ bǒbhɔ.
917 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap anyiɛ́ kpát ajwi. Baghɔk Yesu mányókóti nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn nɛrɔbhɛ. Nɛ́jwí bɛkay byo nɛ bɛpay. 
918 Nywɔp nɛmɔt, ɛ́fákari bɛ Yesu ǎnɨ̀kmʉɛt aywǐnti nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi babhak kɛkwɔt nɛ yi. Ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ mɛnɨkmʉɛt abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Bo bárɛ̀m bɛ́ nchí agha?”
919 Bɔ́ bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Mbɔk bárɛ̀m bɛ ɔchí Jɔ̌n Njwiti. Bachak bɛ Ɛláija, nɛ abhɛnɛfu bɛ ɔchí ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ amɔt anɛ tɛ̌ nyaka kɛ ɔpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.”
920 Arɛm nta yap bɛ, “Kɛ bě babhɔŋ bǎrɛ̀m bɛ mɛnchí agha?” Símun Píta akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Wɔ kɛ ɔ́chí Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò.” 
921 Yesu asɛmti bhɔ bɛ́ bákɛ́ ghati yɛ̌ mmu bɛ yi achi Mpɛmɛ.
922 Nɛ arɛm bɛ, “Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm mbɔ̌ŋ bɛghɔ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri. Bǒ-batí ɛtɔk, nɛ bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm, nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm bábyak chɔŋ mɛ nɛ mángwáy mɛ, kɛ ɛ́ghaka nɔkɔ manywɔp arat, mpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.” 
923 Yesu aghati yɛ bho mankɛm bɛ, “Mbák mmú ǎyàŋ bɛbhak nkoŋo wa, abhɔŋ bɛ́ghɔ́kɔntɨk mmʉɛt yi, ampɔkɔ ɛkotákátí yi yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔp, ankoŋo mɛ,
924 mbɔnyunɛ mmǔ anɛ áyàŋ bɛpɛmɛ mmʉɛt yi ǎnɛ́m nɛpɛ́m ɛni. Kɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ áká mɛnɛm nɛpɛ́m ɛni ɛ̌ti ya, ǎbhɔŋ chɔŋ nɔ.
925 Ntɨkɨ nsáy mmu ábhɔ́ŋ mbák abhɔŋ mmɨk nkɛm kɛ anɛ́m nɛpɛ́m ɛni? Yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ́pú.
926 Mbák mmu abhɔ̌ŋ ntíánwɔ́p ɛ̌ti ya nɛ ɛ̌ti ɛyɔŋ ɛya, chɔŋ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm mbɔ̌ŋ ntíánwɔ́p bɛ́sɔ́t yi mbɔ mmǔ wa mpok anɛ mɛ̌twɔ̀ nɛ kɛnɛ́m ɛka ɛkɛn kɛchi kɛnɛ́m Ɛta nɛ ɛkɛn bɔángɛl abhi.
927 Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, mbɔk bho báchi fá abhɛn bápú gu kpátɛ mángɔ ndǔ Mandɛm abhak nɛ bhɔ mbɔ Mfɔ wap.” 
928 Yesu ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛrɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, bɛrɔŋ mbɔ manywɔp ánɛn, asɔt Píta, nɛ Jɔ̌n, nɛ Jems akó amfǎy njiɛ nɛ bhɔ ndu mɛnɨkmʉɛt.
929 Ndu ánɨ̀kmʉɛt, bɛsí bhi bɛ́bhó bɛyibhiri. Ndɛn ɛ́yi nkwɔ ɛ́yíbhíri ɛ́nkɔt nɔkɔ ŋwaŋwǎŋwaŋ.
930 Tɛ́mchok bǒ bati apay bábhési bare rɛm kɛpɨ nɛ Yesu. Babhak Moses nɛ Ɛláija.
931 Báre ghɔ nɛ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ Mandɛm nɛ mándɛm nɔkɔ kɛpɨ nɛ Yesu ɛ̌ti nɛrɔŋ anɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɔŋ Yerúsalɛm angu arɛ.
932 Píta nɛ mamʉɛrɛ bhi bati apay bákwɛ́n kɛnɔ́, kɛ máŋɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bághɔ́ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ Yesu nɛ bǒ bati apay abhɛn bachi nyaka téé nɛ yi.
933 Mpok bɔ́ bárɔ̀ Yesu, Píta arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Ɛta, ɛ́rɨ tontó bɛ sɛchi fá! Dɔ̌ sɛ́nté bɛtɛm bɛrat, Ɛmɔt ntá yɛ, ɛchak ntá Moses, nɛ ɛnɛ́fú ntá Ɛláija.” Píta kɛrɨŋɨ mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi arɛmɛ.
934 Ɛnɛ́ Píta árɛ̀m ɛnyu yɔ, nɛbháŋ nɛ́sɛp nɛkuti bhɔ. Bɛcháy bɛ́kɛ́m baghɔk Yesu bhɔ ndǔ nɛbháŋ nɛ́kùti bhɔ.
935 Ɛyɔŋ ɛ́fú ndǔ nɛbháŋ ɛ́ndɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Nɛ́ chí Mɔ́wa anɛ njábhɛ́. Ghók ká yi!”
936 Ɛyɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́rɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyu yɔ, baghɔk Yesu baghɔ bɛ yi arɔp chi aywǐnti. Báchók manyu kɛ ghati yɛ̌ mmu ndǔ manywɔp yɔ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛn bɔ baghɔ. 
937 Nɛyí nɔ́kɔ́ mpok Yesu nɛ bɔ Píta básɛ́bhɛ́ njiɛ, bɛyǎ bho bárɔk batɛmɛri Yesu.
938 Mmǔ amɔt ndǔ nkwɔ bo bhɔ abho bɛbɨk andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, nnɨkmʉɛt, bú mɔ́wa. Achí mbakanɛm nɛ ndiɛrɛ yí kɛ mbɔ́ŋɔ́!
939 Ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛsɔŋɔri yi. Ɛ́kʉ ǎchɔkɔ ambo bɛbɨk, ɛ́ngʉɛp yi amɨk, ɛ́nkʉ yi ande wɛt ɛ́fɛ́n ɛ́mfu nɔkɔ yí anyu. Nɛ ɛ́taŋ kɛ ɛ́ndɔ yi. Ɛ́dɛ̀n yi, ɛ́mfyɛ yi mɛnɨ amʉɛt.
940 Nnɨkmʉɛt ntá baghɔkɔ́ bhɛ bɛ́ mámbók yɔ́ kɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ kway bɛkʉ nɔ.”
941 Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Bě mkpáká bho anɛ abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ nɛka nɛ mɛ, bě bhó bǎyìbhiri tɛtɛp ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛchak, chɔŋ mpɛt ntat nɛ bhe ná? Chɔŋ nkɛ́pntɨ nɛ bhe ngaka fá?” Kɛ arɛm ntá chimɔ bɛ, “Twɔ́ nɛ mɔ́ywɛ fá.”
942 Mpok mɔ́wu árɔ̀ŋ ntá Yesu, ɛfóŋó yɔ ɛpɛt ɛ́gʉɛp yí amɨk, ɛkʉ yi are wɛt. Kɛ Yesu ásáy ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ yɔ, bɛ ɛ́ndɔ́ mɔ́wu. Yesu abú yi, akɛmɛ ntá ɛtayi.
943 Bo mankɛm bábhák maknkay bɛghɔ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm. Bo barɔk ambɨ bɛbhak maknkay ɛ̌ti yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu ákʉ́. Yesu arɛm ntá baghɔkɔ́ bhi bɛ,
944 “Nɛnɛ́ ká batú sayri mǎngok ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ nchí ghati bhe. Chɔŋ mánti Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm, mámfyɛ yi amɔ bǒ mmɨk.”
945 Kɛ bɔ́ kɛjwimɛm ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́. Mandɛm abhɛsɛ ntí bɛyɔŋ bhɔ ntá yap bɛ bákɛ́ rɨŋɨ ndak anɛ áchí amɛm. Nɛ báre cháy bɛbhɛp Yesu mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́. 
946 Baghɔkɔ́ bhi bábhó bɛkɛm ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ batɨ ndu bɛrɨŋɨ mmu wap anɛ áchá bachak.
947 Yesu arɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bɔ bakaysi. Ɛ́kʉ asɔt mandú mmɔ́, ate nɛpakámʉɛt ɛni.
948 Arɛm yɛ ntá yap bɛ, “Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ásyɛpti mandú mmɔ́ mbɔ anɛ nɛ maŋák ndǔ nyɛ́n ɛnɛ, ǎsyɛpti mɛ́; nɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ásyɛpti mɛ nɛ maŋák ǎsyɛpti mmu anɛ átó mɛ. Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ mmu ywɛká anɛ ásɛ̀pti mmʉɛt ntá abhɛnɛfu, kɛ áchí mǔngo sayri sayri ntá yɛka mankɛm.” 
949 Jɔ̌n arɛm ntá Yesu bɛ, “Ɛta, sɛ́ghɔ mmu anɛ apu ndǔ nkwɔ ywɛsɛ ndu ábòk bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛna, sɛ́gháti yi bɛ, ákɛ́pɛrɛ kʉ nɔ mbɔnyunɛ apú ndǔ nkwɔ ywɛsɛ.”
950 Yesu akɛmɛ bɛ, “Bǎkɛ́ káŋ mmu mbɔ awú, mbɔnyunɛ yɛ̌agha anɛ ápú mǔmpap ywɛka achí mmǔ ywɛka.” 
951 Mpok ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ kɛ́kwɔ́t anɛ Mandɛm asɔt Yesu amfay, Yesu akʉ ntɨ ɛni bɛrɔŋ Yerúsalɛm nɛ abho bɛrɔŋ.
952 Ndu árɔ̀ŋ, ató bapɔkɔ́ ntó ambɨ. Bárɔk bachwe amɛm mɔ́tɔk amɔt atú Samária ndu bɛtoŋti mbaŋ ntá yi.
953 Kɛ bǒ ɛtɔk yɔ kɛ ka yi anchwe arɛ mbɔnyunɛ baghɔ nyaka bɛ yi atɨ bɛrɔŋ chi Yerúsalɛm.
954 Baghɔk abhi Jems nɛ Jɔ̌n, bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, bárɛm ntá Yesu bɛ, “Acha, ɔ̌yàŋ sɛ́mbɨ́ŋɨ́ ngó ámfú amfay antwɔ ansɔŋ bǒbhɛn-ɛ?”
955 Kɛ Yesu ayibhiri mmʉɛt aghati bhɔ bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bárɛmɛ ɛ́pú chak.
956 Yí nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi báfʉɛ́t bárɔk ndu mɔ́tɔk achak. 
957 Ndu bárɔ̀ŋ, mmǔfú arɛm ntá Yesu bɛ, “Chɔŋ mbak nkoŋo ywɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ ɔ̌rɔ̀ŋ.”
958 Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Bɛsɔp bɛbhɔŋ babhok, kɛnɛn kɛ́bhɔ́ŋ manyay, kɛ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ɛbhak bɛsoŋ ntí.”
959 Arɛm ntá mmu achak bɛ, “Koŋó mɛ́.” Kɛ mmu wu arɛm bɛ, “Acha, dɔ̌ kpɨ́k ndɔ́k mbɛ́mɛ́ Ɛtaya.”
960 Yesu aghati yi bɛ, “Dɔ̌ bawú mámbɛ́mɛ́ ngú wap. Kɛ wɔ, dɔ́k ghati bo Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti ɛnyu Mandɛm abhak nɛ bho mbɔ Mfɔ wap.”
961 Mmǔ achak arɛm bɛ, “Acha, chɔŋ nkoŋo wɔ, kɛ dɔ̌ kpɨ́k ndɔ́k anywɔ́p ndyɛ́p bǒbha.”
962 Yesu arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ákɛ́mɛ́ ɛnɔ ákwàŋ mbaŋ nɛ anjɨŋɨ nɔkɔ nsɛm, abhɨ́kɨ́ kway bɛbhak mǔbɛtok anɛ Mandɛm achi Mfɔ ywi.”
10
101 Awu áfʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, Acha ayap bakoŋo bhi bachak bɛsa bɛrat nsɛm byo nɛ apay ató ambɨ bati apay apay bɛ mándɔ́k ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛtɔk nɛ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yí mbɔ̌ŋ áyàŋ nyaka bɛrɔŋ.
102 Ápɛ́rɛ to bhɔ, aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Mbuɔt bɛ́fɛ́rɛ ɛbhɨ aya, kɛ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk bábhɨ́kɨ́ ya. Nɨk yɛka mmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm mmu achi mbɔŋɔ́nkɨ bɛ ántó bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk, mámfɛ́rɛ́ mbwɔt ɛbhɨ.
103 Dɔ́k ka! Nchí to be ntá bǒ mmɨk mbɔ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n nɛntɨ nkwɔ.
104 Bǎkɛ́ pɔkɔ́ yɛ̌ mɔ́bha nkáp, yɛ̌ ɛbhǎ nɛkɔ, nɛ yɛ̌ nkwɔbhánya ɛchak. Nɛ bǎkɛ́ kaka yɛ̌ mmu ambi.
105 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛkɛt ɛnɛ́ bǎchwé arɛ́, mǎnjámbɨ mǎndɛm bɛ, ‘Kpák anɛ Mandɛm áchyɛ̀ ámbák fá amɛm ɛkɛt ɛnɛ.’
106 Mbák mmu achi amɛm ɛkɛt ɛyɔ anɛ ákɔ́ŋɔ́ kpák, chɔŋ Mandɛm ankʉ kpák ambak nɛ yí. Kɛ mbák yɛ̌ mmu apú, áfɔ́k wu ǎpɛtnsɛm ntá yɛka.
107 Chwé ká mǎmbak chi arɛ. Bǎkɛ́ kɔ bɛkɛt nɛ bɛkɛt. Nyíɛ́ ká, mǎnyú yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bachyɛ bhe. Ɛchi chak bɛ nkʉbɛtɨk ambɔŋ akap ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhi.
108 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛtɔk ɛnɛ bǎchwe arɛ́ nɛ básiɛ́pti be nɛ maŋák, nyiɛ́ ká yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn bachyɛ bhe.
109 Bú ká bǒmame abhɛn ɛtɔk ɛyɔ, mǎngati bo abhɛn bachi arɛ bɛ, ‘Mpok anɛ Mandɛm abhak nɛ bho mbɔ Mfɔ wap arɔp chi kɛkwɔt.’
1010 Kɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ bǎchwe ɛtɔk kɛ bo abhɛn bachi arɛ kɛsyɛpti bhe nɛ maŋák, fú ka dɔk ndǔ nkɔŋɔ-mbi ɛnɛ ɛtɔk yɔ, mǎndɛm bɛ,
1011 ‘Yɛ̌ chí mfok ɛtɔk ɛyɛka anɛ ábátí ndǔ bɛkak ɛbhɛsɛ sɛ́kwɛ̀t sɛ́fɛ̀rɛ mbɔ ntísiɛ ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎkʉ́. Kɛ dɨŋɨ́ ka bɛ, mpok anɛ Mandɛm abhak nɛ bo mbɔ Mfɔ wap arɔp chi kɛkwɔt.’”
1012 Yesu arɔk ambɨ arɛm bɛ, “Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, ɛwak ɛnɛ Mandɛm átàŋ bǒ mmɨk, chɔŋ angɔ́ ntínso nɛ bǒ ɛtɔk Sódom ɛncha bǒ ɛtɔk ɛyɔ.” 
1013 “Bě bo Korasín, chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛ́p ntá yɛka ɛncha! Bě bo Bɛtsáida, chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛ́p ntá yɛka nkwɔ ɛncha! Mbɔ chi amɛm bɛtɔk Táya nɛ Sídɔn kɛ̌ nkʉ́ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛn-nɛ nkʉ ntá yɛka, mbʉ́ báfyɛ́ ndɛn pyɔ, mánto batwɔ́p anti tɛsáy, bɛtɔŋ bɛ bátɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap!
1014 Kɛ ɛwak ɛnɛ Mandɛm átàŋ bǒ mmɨk, chɔŋ angɔ́ ntínso nɛ bǒ-Taya nɛ Sídɔn ɛncha bhe.
1015 Nɛ bě bho Kapɛ̌naum, bǎkaysi bɛ bǎkway bɛyoŋ mmʉɛt, mǎnkó kpát mǎntɔk nɛbu? Nsé! Chɔŋ Mandɛm amɛsɛ bhɛ amɛm ɛtɔkɔ́ bawú!”
1016 Yesu apɛt arɛm ntá bakoŋo bhi bhɔ abhɛn yi ato bɛ, “Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ághók bé ǎghók chi mɛ. Anɛ ábyak be ǎbyak chi mɛ. Mmu nɛ ábyak mɛ, ǎbyak chi mmu anɛ átó mɛ.” 
1017 Abhɛn bati bɛsa bɛrat nsɛm byo nɛ apay bápɛtnsɛm nɛ maŋák, báré ghati Yesu bɛ, “Acha, ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛna, yɛ chi bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛ́sɛ̀pti mmʉɛt ntá yɛsɛ.”
1018 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Ngɔ̌ ndu Satan áfú amfay akwɛnɛ amɨk mbɔ miámiaŋ.
1019 Ghɔ́ ka! Nchyɛ́ bhe bɛtaŋ bɛ bǎkway bɛyat nnyɔ́ nɛ ngá-nɛghay amɨk. Nchyɛ́ be bɛtaŋ amfay bɛtaŋ Satan, mǔmpap, nɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛpu chyɛ be ɛsɔŋɔri.
1020 Yɛ̌ nɔ bǎkɛ́ ŋák chi bɛ, bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛ́sɛ́pti mmʉɛt ntá yɛka. Ŋák ka chi bɛ Mandɛm asɨŋ manyɛ́n yɛka amɛm ɛkáti ɛnɛ amfay.” 
1021 Mpok yɔ, Yesu anɨkmʉɛt bɛ, “Ɛta, wɔ mmu ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ mfay nɛ mmɨk! Nchí chyɛ wɔ bakak ndǔ ɔ́rɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ́mbák bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ntá barɨŋɨ́ndak nɛ ntá bo abhɛn bárɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ. Ɔnɛ́nɛ́ bhɔ ɔtɔŋ kpoŋoroŋ ntá bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ yɛ̌nyɨŋ mbɔ mǎmbɔ. Ɛta, ɛnyu yɔ kɛ̌ wɔmbɔŋ ɔ́yáŋá bɛ ɛmbak.”
1022 Yesu apɛt arɛm bɛ, “Ɛtaya achyɛ́ mɛ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm. Yɛ̌ mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mmu anɛ Mmɔ áchí ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ fʉɛt chí Ɛtayi. Nɛ yɛ̌ mmu abhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ mmu Ɛta áchí ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ fʉɛt chí Mɔ́ywi nɛ bǒ abhɛn yi áyábhɛ́ ndu bɛkʉ bɔ mándɨ́ŋɨ́ Ɛtayi.”
1023 Ayibhiri yɛ mmʉɛt arɛm ntá baghɔkɔ́ bhi ansɛm ansɛm bɛ, “Ɛ́rɨ ntá yɛka ɛcha bɛ́ bǎghɔ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɛ bǎghɔ̀!
1024 Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, bɛyǎ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ nɛ bafɔ babhɔ̌ŋ nyaka ɛkwak bɛghɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎghɔ̀, kɛ bɔ kɛghɔ bhɔ. Bábhɔ́ŋ ɛkwak bɛghok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎghòk, kɛ bábhɨkɨ ghok bhɔ.” 
1025 Ɛ́fákari bɛ ntɔŋ ɛbhé Moses arɔk mɛmɔ Yesu. Abhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, chɔŋ nkʉ yi kɛ mbɔ̌ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti?”
1026 Yesu arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ yi? Ɔ̌pay arɛ́ bɛ yi?”
1027 Akɛmɛ bɛ, ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Kɔŋ Mandɛm Acha ywɛ nɛ ntɨ ɛnɛ nɛnkɛm, nɛ ɛfóŋó yɛ ɛnkɛm, nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛ mɛnkɛm, nɛ nkaysi yɛ nkɛm, nɛ kɔ́ŋ nkokosi yɛ mbɔ ɛnyu ɔ́kɔ́ŋɔ́ mmʉɛt ɛyɛ.”
1028 Yesu arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Chi ɛnyu yɔ. Kʉ nɔ́, nɛ chɔŋ ɔ́mbɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m.”
1029 Kɛ ndǔ yi áyàŋ bɛtaŋa mmʉɛt, arɛm bɛ, “Kɛ mbɔ̌ŋ nkokosi wa chi agha?”
1030 Yesu akɛmɛ yi nɛ nɛkay ɛnɛn bɛ, “Mmǔfu afǔ nyaka ɛtɔk Yerúsalɛm ǎsɛ̀p Jɛríko. Ndu árɔ̀ŋ, akwɛ́n amɔ baghɛ́p bataŋataŋ. Báfɛ́rɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ yí amʉɛt, bádɛ́n yí, bárɔ́k, barɔ yi mpok árɔbhɛ kɛkwɔt bɛgu.
1031 Ɛ́fákari bɛ nchiakap Mandɛm amɔt ǎsɛ̀p ndǔ nkúbhɛ́ mbi wu. Ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ arɛ, aghɔ́ yi, apé ɛbhěmbi, arɔk ɛbhak ɛyi.
1032 Ɛ́fákári ɛnyumɔt nɛ nkú bɛtɨk amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm amɔt anɛ nnɛrɛ́kɛt *Lɛ́vi. Mpok yi aghaka arɛ, aghɔ́ yi, kɛ afʉɛ́t nkwɔ chi ɛbhe ɛchak, arɔk.
1033 Kɛ mmu Samária fú ǎsɛ̀p nyaka nkwɔ ndǔ mbi wu. Ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ mmu wu achi, aghɔ́ yi, nɛ abhɔ́ŋ ntínso nɛ yí.
1034 Arɔk ntá yi, achɨti babhe ndǔ bɛfʉɛt bhi, agwɔ́t. Apɔkɔ yɛ yi anyaŋa amfǎy mpɔŋɔ batu yi, arɔk nɛ yí ndǔ ɛkɛt ɛnɛ́ mankɔ bachyɛ nkáp kɛ mabʉrɛ arɛ́. Akwak yí.
1035 Nɛyí nɔ́kɔ́ afɛrɛ nkáp achyɛ ntá mmu anɛ ayɨŋɨ ɛkɛt ɛyɔ arɛm bɛ ‘Yɨŋɨ́ mɛ́ yi. Nnáŋ mpɛtnsɛm chɔŋ nkɛmɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛchak ɛnɛ ɔ́chɔŋti yi amʉɛt.’”
1036 Yesu arɛm nɔkɔ nɔ, abhɛ́p ntɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm bɛ, “Ɔkáysí bɛ ndǔ nkwɔ wu bati arat, agha átɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́ achi nkokosi ntá anɛ akwɛnɛ amɔ bághɛ́p?”
1037 Akɛmɛ bɛ, “Chí anɛ ághɔ́ yi ntínso.” Yesu aghati yɛ yi bɛ, “Dɔ́k yɛ́ kʉ mbɔ yí.” 
1038 Ɛnɛ́ Yesu nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi bákɔ̀ bárɔ̀ŋ báchwɔ́p ndu mɔ́tɔkɔ́fú. Ngɔrɛ́ amɔt anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Matá abhak arɛ. Asyɛpti Yesu amɔ ápay amɛm ɛkɛt ɛyi.
1039 Abhɔ́ŋ manɔ anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ María. María arɔk asibhiri ndǔ bɛkak Acha angoko nɔkɔ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛnɛ yi átɔ̀ŋ;
1040 Matá ankʉ nɔkɔ chi bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn nywɔp ndu mɛne Yesu. Ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ bɛtɨk bɛyǎ ntá yi aywǐntí, arɔk ntá Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Acha, ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ ndǔ mɔ́maya árɔ́ bɛtɨk mɛnkɛm mɛ awɔ́? Ghatí yi antwɔ ankwak mɛ!”
1041 Kɛ Acha akɛmɛ yi chi bɛ, “Matá, Matá! Ɔ̌fyɛ́ ntí nɛ ɔ̌dɛ̀n mmʉɛt ɛ̌ti bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ.
1042 Dɨŋɨ́ bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt kɛ ɛrɨ ɛcha. Yɔ́ kɛ̌ María áyábhɛ́, nɛ yɛ̌ mmu apú kway bɛsɔt yɔ ntá yi.”
11
111 Ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, Yesu are nɨkmʉɛt nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́fu. Ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́, nkoŋo ywi amɔt arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Acha, tɔ́ŋ bhɛsɛ ɛnyu mánɨkmʉɛt mbɔ ɛnyǔ Jɔ̌n átɔ́ŋ nyaka baghɔk abhi.”
112 Yesu aghati baghɔkɔ́ bhi bɛ, “Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ mǎnɨkmʉɛt, dɛm ka bɛ́: ‘Ɛta, kʉ bo mánchyɛ́ nnyɛ́n ɛnɛ kɛnókó. Kʉ bo mándɔ́ wɔ ɔmbak Mfɔ wap.
113 Chiɛ́ bhɛsɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔp, ɛnǐ nɛnyíɛ́.
114 Foŋorí bɛbʉ́ bhɛsɛ́, mbɔ ɛnyu sɛ́fòŋori yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ákʉ́ bhɛsɛ bɛbʉ́. Nɛ kɛ́ka sɛ́nchwe ndǔ nɛmɔ ɛnɛn nɛ́kʉ sɛ́nkwɛ́n ndǔ bɛbʉ́.’”
