115 Yesu arɛm yɛ ntá yap bɛ, “Sɛ́nsɔ́t bɛ mmu ywɛka amɔt arɔ̌ŋ ntá mmʉɛrɛ ywi mpok nywɔp nɛ́gháká nɛ́ntɨ́bhɛti, adɛp nɛkok arɛm bɛ, ‘Nkwǎnɛ, nnɨkmʉɛt pwɔ mɛ bɛkpkɔkɔ́ brɛt bɛ́rát.
116 Mmʉɛrɛ wa amɔt anɛ achi ambi ndǔ nɛkɔ atwɔ mɛ anywɔ́p nɛ́nɛ, nɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nɛnyíɛ́ bɛchyɛ yí anyiɛ!’
117 Mmʉɛrɛ ywɛ wu ankɛmɛ bɛ, ‘Kɛ́pɛrɛ sɔŋɔri mɛ. Nnáŋ mfe mbǐnywɔp nɛ nnáŋ mbʉrɛ nɛ bɔ̌bha. Mpú kway bɛfate bɛ nchyɛ́ wɔ yɛ̌nyɨŋ.’
118 Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ, yɛ̌ ndǔ yi ápú kway bɛfate bɛ anchyɛ yi nɛnyíɛ́, ɛ̌ti yi achi mmʉɛrɛ ywi, abhɔŋ bɛ́fáte anchyɛ yi yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ yi áyaŋ mbɔnyunɛ atóŋórí bɛ́dɛ́p nɛkok kɛbhɔŋ ntíánwɔ́p.
119 Nchí ghati yɛ bhe bɛ́: Nɨk ka mmʉɛt ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́yàŋ, chɔŋ Mandɛm anchyɛ wɔ. Yáŋ, chɔŋ ɔngɔ. Dɛp nɛkok, chɔŋ mánɛnɛ ntá yɛ.
1110 Kʉ nɔ, mbɔnyunɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ánɨ̀kmʉɛt ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi áyàŋ, Mandɛm ǎchyɛ yɔ ntá yi. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ áyàŋ ɛnyɨŋ, ǎghɔ yɔ. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ádɛ́bhɛ́ nɛkok, mánɛnɛ ntá yi.
1111 Bě bachǐbhɔ, mmǔ ywɛka anɛ mbák mɔ́ywi abhɛp yi tansi, ansɔt chi nnyɔ́ anchyɛ yi, chi agha?
1112 Yɛ̌ chí nɛchǐ-nkɔk kɛ̌ mmɔ́ abhɛp wɔ, ɔ̌chyɛ yi ngá-nɛghay?
1113 Mbák be bǒ bɛbʉ́, bǎbhɔŋ ntɨ bɛchyɛ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ntá bɔ̌bhɛka, bǎkáysí bɛ Ɛta mmu achi amfay, ǎnɔk bɛchyɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ntá bo abhɛn mánɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ yi anchyɛ bhɔ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ kɛ?” 
1114 Mpokófu, Yesu ǎbók ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ́ mmu akwɛnɛ kɛbhok. Ɛ́fú nɔ́kɔ́ mbók wu abho bɛrɛm kɛpɨ. Bo abhɛn bachi arɛ babhak maknkay.
1115 Kɛ mbɔk yap báré rɛm chi bɛ, “Bɛlsɛbul mfɔ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ kɛ áchyɛ́ yi bɛtaŋ bɛbok bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ.”
1116 Bo bárè yaŋ mbi mɛmɔ yi. Bábhɛ́p yi ankʉ ɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛnɛ́ ɛ́bhak mbɔ ɛrɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́tɔŋ bɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi bɛ́fú chi ntá Mandɛm.
1117 Kɛ ndu Yesu árɨ́ŋɨ́ nkaysi yap, aghati bhɔ́ bɛ, “Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛtɔk ɛnɛ akɔrɛ achi arɛ bo mánù nɔkɔ nɛ batɨ, ɛ́bhɔŋ chi mɛnɛmɛ. Nɛ nnɛrɛ́kɛt anɛ́ ákɔ́rɛ́ áchí arɛ nɛ bo mánù nɔkɔ nɛ batɨ, ákwɛ́nɛ́ kwɛn.
1118 Nɛ mbák Satan ankʉ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bhi mɛnu nɛ batɨ, ná yi ákway bɛbhak ɛnyǔ mfɔ anɛ yi achi ndǔ ɛrɔri mpok? Nchí bhɛp be mbɔnyunɛ bǎrɛ̀m bɛ ndǔ bɛtaŋ Satan kɛ̌ mɛ̌bòk bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ.
1119 Nɛ mbák ndǔ bɛtaŋ Satan kɛ̌ mɛ̌bòk bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ, bakoŋo bhɛka bábòk bhɔ ndǔ bɛtaŋ agha? Chɔŋ bakoŋo bhɛka mántaŋ be!
1120 Kɛ mbák, sayri sayri mɛ̌bòk bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ chi ndǔ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm, nɔ chi Mandɛm anáŋ achi nɛntɨ ɛnɛka mbɔ Mfɔ.
1121 Mpok mmǔ ntantaŋ ábhabhɛri ɛkɛt ɛyi nɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ nɛnu bhi, yɛ̌ mmu apu kway bɛghɛp mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhi.
1122 Kɛ mbák mmu anɛ átáŋ acha yi atwɔ ǎnu nɛ yí, andɛ́n yi, ansɔt mɛnyɨŋɨ́ nɛnu ɛbhi ɛbhɛn yi asɨkɨ ntɨ arɛ, ampɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhi andɔk ankɔrɛ nɛ bo bachak.
1123 Mmu anɛ apu nɛ mɛ, achi chi mǔmpap wa. Nɛ mmu anɛ ápú kwak mɛ ndu mɛ̌nyókóti bho, ǎtàkatak.” 
1124 Bɛ́rɔ́ŋ ambɨ Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Mbák mámbók ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ́ndɔ́ mmu, ɛ́rɔp chí bóŋboŋbóŋ amɛm baso, ɛ́njaŋ nɔkɔ ɛbhak ɛnɛ yɔ ɛ́chwe. Mbák ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ́ ɛbhak bɛchɔkɔ,
1125 ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Chɔŋ mpɛtnsɛm ɛbhak ɛnɛ mfú.’ Nɛ ɛ́náŋ ɛ́mpɛ́tnsɛm, ɛngɔ bɛ mányɔ ɛsɨ ɛkɛt ɛyi, bághókó sayri,
1126 ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛyɔ ɛ́rɔ̀ŋ yɛ, ɛ́nsɔt bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛ́chák tándrámɔt ɛbhɛn bɛ́bɛ́bhɛ́ bɛcha yɔ. Bɔ́ mɛnkɛm mɛndɔk mɛnchwe mmu wu amʉɛt mɛ́mbak nɛ yi, nté yi ambɛp ancha anɛ mbɨ.” 
1127 Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, ngɔrɛ́ amɔt amɛm ngɛ́mtáy bo abhɛn bachi arɛ arɛm ntá Yesu nɛ ɛyɔŋ amfay bɛ, “Ɛ́rɨ ɛcha ntá ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ábhé wɔ, achyɛ wɔ amɨ!”
1128 Yesu akɛmɛ bɛ, “Bo abhɛn ɛyap ɛrɨ ɛcha chi abhɛn bághòk Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm nɛ mánkʉ nɔkɔ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛ́yàŋ!” 
1129 Ɛnɛ́ bo báchák báchɛ̀m arɛ́ mándɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ, Yesu abho bɛrɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Mkpáká bho anɛ ɛchɔŋ ábɛp acha! Bábhɛ̀p bɛ mántɔ́ŋ bhɔ́ ɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay. Kɛ yɛ̌ ɛmɔ́t mpu tɔŋ bhɔ, ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ fʉɛt ɛnɛ Jóna.
1130 Nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Jóna achi nyaka ɛrɨŋ ntá bo Ninivɛ, ɛnyu yɔ kɛ̌ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm nchí bhak chɔŋ ɛrɨŋ ntá mkpáká bho abhɛn ɛchɔŋ.
1131 Ɛwak Mandɛm átàŋ bǒ mmɨk, mfɔ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ áchí nyaka ɛtɔk Shɛ́ba ǎfate andɛm bɛ be bo mkpáká mmɨk anɛ ɛchɔŋ bǎkʉ́ bɛbʉ́ mbɔnyunɛ yi afu nyaka nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ arɔk bɛghok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mfɔ Sólomon átɔ̀ŋ bho nɛ bɛyǎ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak. Nɛ nchí ghati bhe bɛ mmu achi fá nɛ́ntɨ́ ɛnɛka anɛ acha Sólomon, Yɛ̌ nɔ́, bǎpú ka bɛghok yi.
1132 Ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ manyé, chɔŋ bǒ Ninivɛ mángati be bho mkpáká mmɨk anɛ ɛchɔŋ bɛ́ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛchi nɛ bhe mbɔnyunɛ mpok bɔ bághókó ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Jóna aghati bhɔ, bátɨ́knsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap. Nchí ghati bhe bɛ mmu achi fá nɛ́nɛ anɛ áchá Jóna, yɛ̌ nɔ, bǎpú ghok yi! 
1133 “Yɛ̌ mmu apú durɛ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ansɔt ɛnyɨŋ ankuti. Bádʉrɛ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́, mánte chi ɛbhak ɛnɛ babhɔŋɔ bɛte yɔ bɛ mbaŋ angɔ́ɔ́ ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ achwe anywɔ́p.
1134 Amɨ́k ayɛka achi bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kʉ̀ mǎngɔ mbaŋ. Mpok amɨ́k ayɛka achi arɨ́árɨ́, mmʉɛt ɛyɛka ɛnkɛm ɛ́jwi nɛ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́. Kɛ mbák amɨ́k ayɛka ápú arɨarɨ, mmʉɛt ɛyɛka ɛnkɛm ɛ́jwi nɛ ɛjuri.
1135 Sɔt yɛ ka mpok bɛ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ ɛbhɛn bǎkaysi bɛ bɛchi be antɨ bɛ́kɛ́ bhak ɛjuri.
1136 Mbák yɛ batɨ yɛka ankɛm ajwi nɛ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́, nɛ yɛ̌ mandú ɛjuri apu arɛ, chɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka nɛnkɛm nɛmbak pɛ́pɛ́p, mbɔ mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ ɛ́ghɔ̀, ɛntɔŋ nɔkɔ yi mbi.” 
1137 Yesu ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛrɛm kɛpɨ ɛkɛn, mǔnkwɔ Fárisi amɔt abhɨŋɨ yi ndǔ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛkɛt ɛyi. Yesu arɔk achwe anywɔ́p, achɔkɔ amɨk mɛnyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́.
1138 Mǔnkwɔ Fárisi wu abhak maknkay bɛ́ghɔ bɛ Yesu abhɨkɨ so amɔ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛpɨŋ ɛyap ɛ́tɔ́ŋ kɛ anyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́.
1139 Acha aghati mǔnkwɔ Fárisi wu bɛ, “Bě bǒnkwɔ Fárisi, bǎsɔ̀t mpok bɛ́tyɛ́t nsɛmɛ́ nchán kɛ mɛŋɛ́mɛ́ nɛ bɛbʉ́ bɛjwi be antɨ.
1140 Bě bɛchɨŋtǐ bho! Mandɛm anɛ aghókó ɛnyɨŋ, pú yi kɛ aghoko mmɛm nɛ nsɛm ɛyi nkwɔ?
1141 Kɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɔŋɔ bɛkʉ chi bɛsɔt mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi amɛm bɛkpʉrɛ ɛbhɛka mánchyɛ ntá bachɛ́bhɛ́bho nɛ chɔŋ bɛpɨŋ ɛbhɛka mɛnkɛm mɛ́mbak nkwɔ pɛ́pɛ́p.
1142 “Bě bǒnkwɔ Fárisi, chɔŋ ɛmbɛp ntá yɛka ɛncha, mbɔnyunɛ bapú kʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi chak ntá bho nɛ bǎbhɨkɨ kɔŋ Mandɛm. Bǎsɔt ndu bɛrɨ amɔt ndǔ baru byo mǎnchyɛ ntá Mandɛm, mǎnkʉ ɛnyumɔt nɛ mbwɔt achak. Bǎbhɔŋ bɛkɔŋ Mandɛm nɛ mǎmbak sayri nɛ bho kɛ bǎbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ bɛghɔkɔntɨk bɛbhé bɛ́chák.
1143 Bě bǒnkwɔ Fárisi, chɔŋ ɛmbɛp ntá yɛka ɛncha! Bǎkɔŋ bɛchɔkɔ ndǔ mɛnɔk kɛnókó amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt bo Israɛl, nɛ bǎkɔ̀ŋ bɛ bo mankaka nɔkɔ bhe nɛ kɛnókó nɛfísiɛ.
1144 Chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛ́p ntá yɛka ɛncha! Bǎchí mbɔ manɛm anɛ mmu ákɔ̀ amfay kɛrɨŋɨ bɛ chi manɛm.”
1145 Ntɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm amɔt arɛm ntá Yesu bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, mpok ɔ́rɛ̀m mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, ɔ́chyɛ bhɛsɛ nkwɔ ntíánwɔ́p!”
1146 Yesu akɛmɛ bɛ, “Bě batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm, chɔŋ ɛmbɛp ntá yɛka nkwɔ ɛncha! Nti achi bɛ mǎnyìɛ̀rɛ bo mámpɔ́kɔ́ mɛnwɔ́ptí batu anɛ́ be babhɔŋ bǎpú kwak bo mámbʉ́rɛ́ bɛbhé bhɔ yɛ̌ mandú.
1147 Chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛ́p ntá yɛka ɛncha! Bachǐmbɨ bhɛka báwày nyaka barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ. Bǎtè manɛm ayap nɛ́nɛ, mǎngwati mbɨ arɛ́ bɛkʉ yɔ ándɨ́ amɨk.
1148 Bɛkʉ ɛnyu ɛyɔ, ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ bǎchi ɛnyumɔt mbɔ bachǐmbɨ bhɛka abhɛn báwáy nyaka barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm ndǔ bǎtè bɛrɨ́ti manɛm ntá yap.
1149 Ɛ̌tiyɔ, kɛ Mandɛm, ndǔ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛni, árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ ‘Chɔŋ ntó barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ nɛ bǒnto bha ntá bo Israɛl; nɛ chɔŋ mǎngwáy mbɔk ɛyap, nɛ mánchyɛ abhɛ́nɛ́fú bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri.’
1150 Chɔŋ Mandɛm antɛmsi yɛ mkpáká bho abhɛn ɛchɔŋ ɛ̌ti manoŋ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ mankɛm abhɛn bɔ báwáy tɛ nɛbhǒmɨk,
1151 bɛbho nɛ Ábɛl kpát bɛghaka amʉɛt Sakaría mu báwáy nɛntɨ ɛ́fɛ́mɛ́ akap nɛ ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm. Nchí ghati bhe bɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm antɛmsi mkpáká bho abhɛn ɛchɔŋ ɛ̌ti bawú yɔ ankɛm!
1152 Bě batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm, chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛp ntá yɛka ɛncha! Bǎbhɛsɛ ɛfɨŋɨ́ ɛnɛ mánɛ̀nɛ mbǐnywɔp anɛ mmu áfʉɛ̀t arɛ́ kɛ ambɔ́ŋ nɛjwǐmɛm ndǔ barak Mandɛm. Bǎbhɨkɨ chwe arɛ, nɛ bǎchyɛt mbi ntá abhɛn báyàŋ nyaka bɛchwe arɛ!”
1153 Nɛrɔ anɛ Yesu árɔ̀ nɛbhʉɛt wu, batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm nɛ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi babho bɛchiti yi nɛ bɛbhɛ́p, mányɔŋti nɔkɔ yi bɛkʉ yi ankwɛn anyu.
1154 Nɛ mánɔbhɛri nɔkɔ yí ndu bɛkʉ yi ákwɛ́n ndǔ ɛyɔŋɔ́nyu.
12
121 Ɛnɛ Yesu árɛ́m nɔ, bo báre twɔ, kpát báyá báchá, mánjati nɔkɔ batɨ. Yesu ayambɨ arɛm ntá baghɔkɔ́ bhi bɛ, “Sɔt ka mpok nɛ yís bǒnkwɔ Fárisi. Báchi chi bǒ bɛtábhá.
122 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bakuti, chɔŋ mánɛnɛ. Nɛ ɛnɛ́ ɛchi bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ chɔŋ mánkʉ bo mandɨŋɨ yɔ.
123 Ndu ɛchi nɔ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎrɛ́mɛ́ ansɛm ansɛm, chɔŋ bo mangok yɔ kpoŋoroŋ. Nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎghati bǎrǔ bho ansɛm ansɛm chɔŋ bo mánte amfay bɛkɛt mámbɨk bɛ bo mángók. 
124 “Mamʉrɛ bha, nchí ghati bhe bɛ, bǎkɛ́ cháy bǒ mmɨk. Bǎkway bɛway chi mmʉɛt nkwǎ kɛ bápu kway bɛku ɛnyɨŋ ɛchak ɛnɛ ɛbɛbhɛ ɛcha ɛyɔ.
125 Ghók ká mmu anɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́chay. Cháy ka mmu anɛ ákway bɛway mmʉɛt yɛka, nɛ ankwáy mɛmɛsɛ be amɛm nɛpǐngo!
126 Pú mmu akway bɛku bɔ̌kɛnɛn batay nɛ nkáp anɛ apu yɛ̌nyɨŋ? Yɛ̌ nɔ, Mandɛm apú ghɔkɔntɨk yɛ̌ amɔt.
127 Kɛ ná nɛ be? Mandɛm arɨ́ŋɨ́ yɛ̌ chí mpǎy bɛkaká ɛmɛnɛ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chí yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka anti. Bǎkɛ́ chay yɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bo bakway bɛkʉ bhe. Bɛsí Mandɛm, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka abhɔŋ mɛnwɔp tontó achá ngɛ́mtáy kɛnɛn. 
128 “Nchí ghati yɛ be bɛ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ árɛ̀m kpoŋoroŋ bɛsí bǒ mmɨk bɛ yi achi mmu wa, chɔŋ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm ndɛm bɛsí bɔángɛl Mandɛm ndǔ nywɔp manyé bɛ mmu wu achi awa.
129 Kɛ mmu anɛ ataŋa kpoŋoroŋ bɛsí bho bɛ apu mmu wa, chɔŋ mɛnkwɔ ntaŋa bɛsí bɔángɛl Mandɛm bɛ yi apu mmu wa.
1210 Nɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm amfoŋori yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ árɛ̀m ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm, kɛ apú foŋori mmu anɛ árɛ̀m ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ.
1211 Mpok básɔ́rɛ́ bhe ambɨ ndu bɛtaŋ be amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛbhap nɛ bɛsí bǒbati ɛtɔk nɛ bɔgɔ́bhanɔ, bǎkɛ́ sɛmɛ ɛnyǔ bǎkwày bɛtaŋa mmʉɛt nɛ ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ bɛrɛm.
1212 Mpok ɛyɔ chɔŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ántɔ́ŋ be ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɛm.” 
1213 Ɛnɛ́ Yesu ǎchyɛ̀ baghɔkɔ́ bhi maniɛ ɛnyu ɛyɔ, mmu amɔt amɛm ngɛ́mtáy bho arɛm ntá Yesu bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, ghatí mɔ́maya ánkɔ́rɛ́ nɛwú ɛtayɛsɛ ánchyɛ́ ɛbha mɛnyɨŋ!”
1214 Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Nkwánɛ, agha ábhʉ́rɛ́ mɛ́ ntaŋá manyé nɛ nkɔ́rɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ nɛwú ntá yɛka?”
1215 Kɛ arɔk ambɨ arɛm ntá bo mankɛm bɛ, “Sɔt ka mpok! Kɛ́m ká mmʉɛt bɛ bǎkɛ́ fyɛ ngoŋo ndu bɛbhɔŋ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ. Puyɛ̌ chi bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ kɛ bɛ́kɛ̀m nɛpɛ́m nkwǎ.”
1216 Yesu átɛ́m bɔ́ nɛkay bɛ, “Nkɨ mǔnkáp amɔt áchyɛ̀ nyaka yi bɛyǎ mbwɔt.
1217 Ɛkʉ abho bɛ́káysi andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, ‘Chɔŋ nkʉ yi? Mbɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ nɛbhʉɛt bɛ́bhʉrɛ mbwɔt?’
1218 Kɛ árɛm nɛ mmʉɛt yi bɛ, ‘Chɔŋ mmokoti bɛ̌tak ɛbha, ngoko ɛbhɛn bɛ́chɨ́kɨ́tí, mfyɛ́ mbwɔt aya nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbha arɛ.’
1219 Ndɛm yɛ nɛ mmʉɛ́t ɛya bɛ, ‘Ɔnáŋ ɔbhɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛsɔt bɛyǎ mamiɛ́. Kɛ́pɛrɛ sɔŋɔri mmʉɛt. Nyiɛ́, nyú, ɔ́nkʉ maŋák.’
1220 Kɛ Mandɛm aghati yi bɛ, ‘Wɔ ɛchɨŋtɨ́mu! Nkúbhɛ́ bɛti ɛbhɛn, nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ nɛ́may. Kɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n ɔ́bhʉ́rɛ́ bɛ́rɔ̀p chɔŋ chi ɛbhɛn bo bachak!’
1221 Nɔ́ kɛ ɛ́fakari nɛ mmu anɛ ábhʉ́rɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ntá yímbɔŋ, kɛ yi kɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛnwɔp bɛsí Mandɛm.” 
1222 Yesu aghati yɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi bɛ, “Nɔ́ kɛ̌ nchí ghati bhe bɛ, mmu ákɛ́ bhɔŋ basɛ́mɛ́ ɛ̌ti nɛpɛ́m ɛni bɛ chɔŋ nyiɛ́ yi, chɔŋ mfyɛ́ yi?
1223 Nɛpɛ́m nkwǎ nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ cha nɛnyíɛ́? Nɛpɛ́m nkwǎ nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ cha ndɛnɛ́?
1224 Yɨŋɨ́ ká kɛnɛn. Kɛ́pú kwaŋ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ kɛ́pú fɛrɛ mbwɔt ɛbhɨ. Kɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛkɛt nɛ yɛ̌ chi bɛ̌ták ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhʉ̀rɛ nɛnyíɛ́ arɛ́. Mandɛm kɛ áchyɛ̀ kɔ nɛnyíɛ́, nɛ bɛsí Mandɛm, bǎcha kɛnɛn tontó!
1225 Nɛ ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka basɛ́mɛ́ ákway bɛkʉ nɛpɛ́m ɛni nɛ́nsap, yɛ chi mandú nɨŋɨnɨŋɨ nɛ́nchá ɛnyu nɛbhɔŋɔ bɛbhak?
1226 Mbák yɛ bapú kway bɛkʉ mandú ɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛyɔ, ndaká yi bǎbhɔŋ basɛ́mɛ́ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ bɛchak?
1227 Yɨŋɨ́ ká bɔchuchu abhɛn bágò. Bápú kʉ bɛtɨk, nɛ bapu ghoko ndɛn. Kɛ nchí ghati bhe bɛ, yɛ̌ chí Mfɔ Sólomon mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛyǎ kɛnɛ́m, abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nyaka ndɛn ɛnɛ ɛrɨ mbɔ yɛ̌ chuchu amɔt.
1228 Mandɛm kɛ̌ ághókó tákɔ nɛ bɛrɨ ɛbhi, tákɔ anɛ ákway bɛbhak ɛchɔŋ, mbúrɛ́ angwɔsi, mámfyɛ́ ango. Bǎkáysí bɛ́ be kɛ̌ Mandɛm apu kwáy bɛ́kwák mǎmbɔ́ŋ ndɛn bɛ́fyɛ́ amʉɛt kɛ? Nɛka ɛnɛká nɛ Mandɛm nɛ́gʉ́psi nɛcha!
1229 Bǎkɛ́ sɔŋɔri yɛ batɨ̌ yɛka bɛbhɛp ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ mɛ́nyiɛ nɛ ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ mɛnyu.
1230 Bǒ mmɨk bákòŋo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn kɛ dɨŋɨ́ ka bɛ Ɛtayɛka arɨŋɨ bɛ bǎbhɔŋ bɛbhɔŋ bɔ́.
1231 Fíɛ́ ká ntí chi bɛ Mandɛm ámbák Mfɔ ywɛka, nɛ chɔŋ yí anchyɛ be mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm nkwɔ. 
1232 “Bɔ̌bha, bǎkɛ́ chay, yɛ̌ndu bǎchi nkwɔ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n anɛ abhɨkɨ ya. Mandɛm abhɔŋ maŋák bɛchyɛ be akɔrɛ ndǔ kɛfɔ ɛki.
1233 Tí ká mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ mǎnchyɛ nkáp ntá bachɛ́bhɛ́bho. Bɔ́ŋ ká bɔ̌bɛbhǎ-nkap abhɛn bápú chɔŋɔ bɛ nkáp anɛm. Bʉrɛ́ ká kɛfɔ̌ mɛnyɨŋ ɛkɛka amfay. Arɛ́, kɔ́ kɛ́bhak mpoknkɛm. Yɛ̌ ngɛ́p apu kway bɛghɛp ɛnyɨŋ arɛ, nɛ kɛngɔk apú chwe ánchɔŋti yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
1234 Ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ nkáp ywɛ áchí, arɛ́ kɛ̌ ntɨ ɛnɛ nkwɔ nɛ́bhak. 
1235 “Toŋtí ká mmʉɛt mǎndurɛ bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ bhɛka.
1236 Bák ká mbɔ bɔ̌-bɛtok abhɛn mánòŋ bɛ chi-bɛtɨk awap amfu ndǔ ɛpǎ nɛbhay ɛnɛ yi árɔ́ŋɔ́ arɛ ampɛtnsɛm bɛ mánɛ́nɛ́ mbǐnywɔp ntá yi tɛ́mté, mpok yi átwɔ́ ádɛ́bhɛ́ nɛkok.
1237 Chɔŋ ɛndɨ ɛncha ntá bo abhɛn bábhak pě mpok ɛtayap átwɔ́! Tɛtɛp nchí ghati bhe bɛ mpok yi atwɔ, ǎghati bhɔ manchɔkɔ amɨk, anchóŋ ndɛn ɛyi, ansɔt nɛnyíɛ́ anchyɛ bhɔ manyíɛ́.
1238 Yɛ̌ antwɔ́ chí nɛ nɛ́ntɨ́ bhiti, yɛ̌ chí mpok nkɔk ɛ́kòk, kɛ antɛmɛri bhɔ pě, ɛ́rɨ ɛncha ntá bǒ bɛtok bhɔ!
1239 Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ mbɔ mbɔŋɔ́kɛt ǎrɨŋɨ nɛŋɔkɔ́ nywɔp ɛnɛn ngɛ́p átwɔ̀, mbʉ apú rɔ mándak ɛkɛt ɛyi.
1240 Bě nkwɔ bǎbhɔŋ bɛtoŋti mmʉɛt Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm átwɔ̀ chɔŋ chi ndǔ mpok anɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ kaysi bɛ yi ǎtwɔ̀.” 
1241 Píta abhɛ́p Yesu bɛ, “Acha, ɔtɛ̌m nɛkay ɛnɛn chí ntá yɛsɛ kɛ chi ntá bo mankɛm?”
1242 Acha akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Mmǔ bɛtok anɛ achi tɛtɛp nɛ ndɨŋɨndak chí anɛ? Chí anɛ chi-bɛtɨk ywi áchyɛ́ yi bɛtaŋ bɛ anjɨŋɨ nɔkɔ batɨ̌ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk abhɛn bachi amɛm ɛfo yi, anchyɛ nɔkɔ bhɔ awap ákɔrɛ nɛnyíɛ́ ndǔ mpok.
1243 Chɔŋ ɛndɨ ɛncha ntá mǔbɛtok wu anɛ chi-bɛtɨk ywi átwɔ antɛmɛri yi ndu ákʉ̀ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ baghati yi ankʉ!
1244 Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, mbák nkʉbɛtɨk wu ákʉ nɔ chi-bɛtɨk ywi ǎchyɛ yi bɛtaŋ amfǎy mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhí mɛnkɛm.
1245 Kɛ mbák mǔbɛtok arɛm bɛ, chi-bɛtɨk awa ǎtat bɛ́twɔ, ambo bɛdɛn bɔ̌-bɛtok bachak, abhɛn baghɔrɛ́ nɛ abhɛn babhakanɛm, nɛ ambo mɛ́nyiɛ, anyu nɔkɔ, kpát mmɛm ánkɛm yi,
1246 chi-bɛtɨk ywi ǎtwɔ̀ ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn mǔbɛtok abhɨkɨ kaysi bɛ yí ǎtwɔ̀ nɛ ndǔ nɛŋɔkɔ́ nywɔp ɛnɛn mǔbɛtok wu abhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ. Antɛmsi yi, amfyɛ yi nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko Mandɛm bachi.
1247 Nɛ mǔbɛtok anɛ árɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ chi-bɛtɨk áyàŋ yi ankʉ, kɛ yi kɛ toŋti mmʉɛt ankʉ mbɔ ɛnyu ɛ́yaŋ, bátɛmsi chɔŋ yi sayri.
1248 Kɛ anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ chi-bɛtɨk áyàŋ yi ankʉ, mbák akʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́yàŋ mantɛmsi yi, báchyɛ yi chi mandú ntɛmsi. Bábhɛp tontó ntá mmu anɛ báchyɛ́ yi tontó. Nɛ báfyɛ amɨ́k tontó ntá mmu anɛ báfyɛ́ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ amɔ́ yi.” 
1249 Yesu apɛt arɛm bɛ, “Ntwɔ bɛgʉɛp chi ngó fá amɨk. Mbɔ ánaŋ akɛm, mbʉ nkɔŋ tontó!
1250 Chɔŋ mámfyɛ́ mɛ ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri mbɔ mmǔ anɛ báfyɛ́ yi anyɛ́n ndǔ mpok anɛ bájwìti yi. Ntɨ nɛ́pú pɔp mɛ amɛm tɛ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ ɛ́ntwɔ ɛmfʉɛt!
1251 Bǎkáysí bɛ́ ntwɔ fá amɨk chi bɛkʉ bo mámbák ndu kpák nɛ batɨ kɛ? Ǎe, ntwɔ chí nɛ akɔrɛ.
1252 Bɛ́bhó nɛ́nɛ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛkɛt ɛnɛ́ bo bachi arɛ bati atay, chɔŋ ákɔ́rɛ́ ámbak nɛntɨ nap. Bati arat kɛka abhɛn bati apay. Bati apay kɛka abhɛn bati arat.
1253 Ákɔ́rɛ́ ábhak chɔŋ ɛnyunɛ́ chi ápap mɔ́ywi anɛ mbakanɛm, mmɔ̌ anɛ mbakanɛm ampap ɛtayi, nnɔ ampap mɔ́ywi anɛ ngɔrɛ́, mɔ́ywi anɛ ngɔrɛ́ ampap nnɔ. Nnɔnɛ́m ampap ngɔrɛ́ mɔ́ywi, ngɔrɛ́ ampap nnɔnɛ́m ɛ́ywi.” 
1254 Yesu arɛm yɛ ntá ngɛ́mtay bho abhɛn bachi arɛ bɛ, “Mǎnáŋ mǎngɔ́ nɛbu ndǔ nɛ́gírí ndǔ ɛbhě nɛbu ɛnɛ mmok ánɛm arɛ, bǎrɛm bɛ ‘Manyiɛp átwɔ kwɛn’; nɛ ɛ́mbak ɛnyu yɔ.
1255 Nɛ mǎnáŋ mǎngɔ nɛbháŋ ndu nɛbho bɛkwɛn, bǎrɛm bɛ, ‘Ɛnɛm ɛ́twɔ̀’; nɛ ɛ́mbak ɛnyu yɔ.
1256 Bě bǒ bɛtabha! Bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ nɛbu mǎndɛm mbák manyiɛp ǎkwɛn chɔŋ, nɛ mbák apu kwɛn. Ndaká yí bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm ákʉ̀ ndǔ mpokó-nɛ? 
1257 “Ndak yí bě babhɔŋ bapú kway bɛrɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi chak bɛ mmu ankʉ?
1258 Mbák ɔbhɔ̌ŋ ndak nɛ mmu nɛ yi ákʉ́ manyé nɛ wɔ, ɔ̌kʉ yi? Ɔ́bhɔ̌ŋ bɛ́ghɔ bɛ ndaka wu ámay ansɛm ɛnɛ́ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɔŋ ndu acha manyé. Mbák ɔ́nká yi ansɔt wɔ ambɨ ndǔ manyé, ntaŋá manyé ǎchyɛ̀ wɔ ntá bo mbɨ̌ŋ nkú nɛ bɔ mámfe wɔ.
1259 Nchí ghati wɔ bɛ, ɔpú fu wawak kpátɛ ɔnchyɛ ákwɔ́ ywɛ ankɛm, yɛ̌nyɨŋ kɛrɔp.”
13
131 Nkúbhɛ́ mpok yɔ, mbɔk bho abhɛn bachi arɛ́, bátɛ́mɛ Yesu ɛ̌ti bo Galili abhɛn Páílet akʉ baway mpok báchyɛ̀ akap ntá Mandɛm.
132 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎkáysí bɛ bo Galili bhɔ bákʉ́ nyaka bɛbʉ́ bacha bǒ ɛtɔk Gálili bachak kɛ?
133 Nɔ́ bhɔ! Dɔ̌ ngati be bɛ, mbák bǎbhɨkɨ tɨ́knsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka, chɔŋ be mankɛm mǎngu mbɔ bhɔ.
134 Ná nɛ bǒ batí nɛku-nɛ-arat abhɛn ɛkɛrɛ́mfáy ɛnɛ ɛchi nɛpak ɛ̌ntɨ́ŋnyɛn Sílom ɛ́kwɛ́nɛ́ ɛ́wáy? Bǎkáysí bɛ́ ɛfákárí nyaka nɛ bhɔ ɛnyu yɔ chí ndu bákʉ́ bɛbʉ́ bacha bo bachak abhɛn bachi ɛtɔk Yerúsalɛm yɔ kɛ?
135 Nɔ́ bhɔ! Nchí ghati be bɛ, mbák bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ tɨ́knsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka, chɔŋ bě mankɛm mǎngu mbɔ bhɔ.” 
136 Yesu atɛ́m yɛ bhɔ nɛkay ɛnɛn bɛ, “Mmu amɔt apɨ nyaka ɛnɔk ɛnɛ babhɨŋɨ bɛ́ *fig amɛm nkɨ ywi. Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ mɛ́nyu kɛpɛm, are kɔ ambyo nɔkɔ mbák ɛ́nyu kɛpɛm, kɛ akɛ ghɔ́ yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
137 Aghati mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ bɛtɨk amɛm nkɨ wu bɛ ‘Yɨŋɨ́, ndǔ mamiɛ́ árát nchí twɔ bɛyaŋ kɛpɛm ndǔ ɛnɔk ɛnɛ, kɛ mpu ghɔ yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Kpɔ́t yɔ́ gʉ́ɛ́p amɨk! Ɛ́kʉ̀ kpɨ́k yi fá téé, ɛ́nchɛt nɔkɔ mmɨk ndɛ́ndɛm?’
138 Nkʉ bɛtɨk wu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, ‘Ɛta, dɔ̌ ɛ́mpɛ́t ɛmbak ndǔ mmíɛ́ ɛnɛn nkwɔ. Chɔŋ ntɛ́m nnɛt ywi ngabhɛri, mfyɛ́ ntɔbhɛ́-píɔ.
139 Nɛ mbák ɛ́nyu kɛpɛm mmíɛ́ mbúrɛ́ ɛ́ndɨ, kɛ mbák ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ nyu kɛpɛm, ɔ̌kwáy bɛghati mɛ mkpɔt yɔ ngʉɛp amɨk.’” 
1310 Ɛwak nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt bo Israɛl, Yesu áre tɔŋ bo amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí ɛyap.
1311 Ngɔrɛ́ amɔt abhak arɛ́ anɛ ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ́kʉ́ yi ápɛ́nɛ́ ndǔ mamiɛ́ nɛku-nɛ-arat, yí kɛpɛrɛ kway bɛkɔ chak.
1312 Yesu ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yi, abhɨŋɨ yí arɛm bɛ, “Mmá, nɛme ɛnɛ nɛ́may.”
1313 Atɔk yi nɛ amɔ. Tɛ́mte wu, anyabhɛ mmʉɛt téé, abho bɛbɨti Mandɛm.
1314 Mǔnti ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ Yesu akʉ mɔ́ngɔrɛ́ wu ataŋ ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt ɛnap, abé ntɨ, abho bɛrɛm nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ ntá bo abhɛn bachi arɛ bɛ, “Sɛ́bhɔŋ manywɔp átándat ndǔ bɛ́kʉ bɛtɨk. Mmu ámbɔ́ŋ nɛme, ántwɔ́ chí amɛm manywɔp ayɔ bɛ mámbú yi. Ɛ́kɛ́pɛrɛ bhak chi ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt.”
1315 Yesu Acha akɛmɛ yɛ yi bɛ, “Bě bǒ bɛtabha! Ntɨkɨ mmǔ ywɛka ápú kaŋari yɛ chí mpɔŋ yi, yɛ̌ chi mpɔŋɔ batu yi ándɔ́k anchyɛ yɔ́ manyiɛp ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt?
1316 Ná nɛ ngɔrɛ́ nɛ, mmɔ́ Ábraham   anɛ Satan ágwɔ́rɛ́ ndǔ mamiɛ́ nɛku nɛ arat. Ɛ́chí ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ bɛfɛrɛ yi ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt kɛ?”
1317 Nɛrɛm Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ, ntíánwɔ́p akɛm bǒmpap abhi mankɛm. Kɛ bɛyǎ bo bábhɔ́ŋ maŋák bɛ yi ǎkʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay bhɔ mɛnkɛm. 
1318 Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, Yesu arɛm yɛ bɛ, “Kɛfɔ Mandɛm kɛ́chí mbɔ yi? Chɔŋ njɛnti kɔ nɛ yí?
1319 Kɛfɔ Mandɛm fá amɨk kɛ́chi mbɔ mɔ́sɛpɛm anɛ ɛ́nɔk ɛnɛ́ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ mɔ́stat, anɛ bápɨ́ amɛm nkɨ, sɛ́chák, sɛ́gó, sɛ́rɔ́p ɛnɔk ɛnɛ kɛnɛn kɛ́twɔ̀ kɛ́nte manyay ndǔ batáp ayi.” 
1320 Yesu apɛt arɛm bɛ, “Chɔŋ mpɛt njɛnti Kɛfɔ Mandɛm nɛ yi?
1321 Kɛchi mbɔ yís anɛ ngɔrɛ́ ásɔ́rɛ́ achɛm nɛ nchán fláwa ɛ́rát. Mandu yís wu akʉ fláwa nkɛm amwɔt, kpát ajwi amɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ yi achi arɛ́.” 
1322 Ɛnɛ́ Yesu árɔ̀ŋ Yerúsalɛm, are te ndǔ bɛtɔk bɛgho nɛ bɔ̌bɛtɔk antɔŋ nɔkɔ bho Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
1323 Mmǔ amɔt abhɛp yi bɛ, “Acha, chɔŋ Mandɛm ampɛmɛ chi bǎru bho?” Yesu arɛm ntá yap bɛ,
1324 “Nu ka bɛ́fʉɛ́t ndǔ nyǔbhá anɛ áchí mábhɛ́rí. Nchí ghati bhe bɛ bɛyǎ bho báyàŋ chɔŋ bɛfʉɛt manchwe kɛ bápú bhɔŋ mbi.
1325 Mbɔŋɔ́kɛt ánáŋ chɔŋ amfate antiɛp mbǐnywɔp, bǎte nɛfí mǎndɛp nɔkɔ nɛkok nɛ mǎnɨk nɔkɔ mmʉɛt bɛ, ‘Acha, nɛnɛ́ bhɛsɛ mbǐnywɔp.’ Kɛ mbɔŋɔ́kɛt ankɛmɛ chí bɛ, ‘Mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bhe nɛ yɛ̌ chí ɛbhak ɛnɛ bǎfú.’
1326 Mǎmbo yɛ bɛrɛm bɛ, ‘Pú sɛ́chɔkɔ nyaka nɛbhʉɛt amɔt sɛ́nyíɛ́, nɛ sɛnyu nɛ wɔ? Nɛ ɔtɔ́ŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm amɛm bɛtɔk ɛbhɛsɛ?’
1327 Kɛ ákɛmɛ bhe chi bɛ, ‘Mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bhe nɛ yɛ̌ chi ɛbhak ɛnɛ bǎfú. Fǎ ká mɛ bɛsí, bě bakʉ̌ bɛbʉ́ mankɛm!’
1328 Arɛ́, chɔŋ mǎndi kɛbhɔ nɛ mǎmbak ndǔ nɛnyiɛ ámɛ́n mpok bǎghɔ Ábraham nɛ Áisek nɛ Jekɔ́p nɛ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ mankɛm chɔkɔ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛ́rɛ́ kɛfɔ̌ Mandɛm, ɛnɛ́ bátiɛ́bhɛ́ be nɛfí.
1329 Chɔŋ bo mámfu mbɨ nɛ nsɛm, ɛbhě awɔ́nɛm nɛ awɔ́ghɔ, mánchɔkɔ mányiɛ ɛpǎ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛ́rɛ́ kɛfɔ̌ Mandɛm.
1330 Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ, chɔŋ mbɔk bho abhɛn báchí ansɛm nɛ́nɛ mándɔp bǒmbɨ, nɛ abhɛn báchí bǒmbɨ mandɔp ansɛm.” 
1331 Ndǔ nkúbhɛ́ mpok ɛyɔ, mbɔk bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bárɔk bágháti Yesu bɛ, “Fǎ fá dɔk ɛbhak ɛ́chák. Mfɔ Hɛ́rɔd ǎyàŋ bɛ́way wɔ!”
1332 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Dɔ́k ká ghatí Hɛ́rɔd ɛsɔp ɛyɔ bɛ, ‘Chɔŋ ndɔk ambɨ bɛ́bok bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ nɛ mbú bho ɛchɔŋ nɛ mbúrɛ́, nɛ ɛ́gháká nɔkɔ manywɔp arat, nnaŋa bɛtɨk ɛbha.
1333 Yɛ̌ndu ɛ́chí nɔ́, mbɔŋ bɛrɔŋ Yerúsalɛm. Nchí kɔ ɛchɔŋ nɛ mbúrɛ́ nɛ ɛ́ghaka nɔkɔ ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn nɛjwi arat ńgaka arɛ́. Amɛm Yerúsalɛm kɛ báway nɔkɔ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm.’
1334 Yesu akók arɛm bɛ, Eé Yerúsalɛm, bǒ Yerusalɛm! Bě bo bǎwày barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm, mǎntɛmti nɔkɔ nɛ batay ndu bɛ́wáy bo Mandɛm átó bɛ mángátí bhe Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi. Ndǔ bɛyǎ mpok, njáŋ bɛsɔt be mfyɛ́ amʉɛt bɛ́ mǎmbak nɛ mɛ mbɔ bɔ̌nkɔk abhɛn nnɔ nkɔk ákútí nɛbhʉɛt amɔt nɛ bɛbhap ɛbhi, kɛ bǎpú ka bɛ nkʉ nɔ!
1335 Nɛ nɛ́nɛ, chɔŋ Mandɛm amfɛrɛ ntí ndǔ ɛkɛt ɛyɛka, ɛ́ndɔp ɛnyu ɛyɔ. Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, bǎpú pɛrɛ ghɔ́ chɔŋ mɛ́, kpátɛ mpok anɛ bǎrɛ̀m chɔŋ bɛ ‘Sɛ́mbɨ́tí mmu anɛ átwɔ̀ ndǔ nnyɛ́n Mandɛm Acha.’”
14
141 Ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt bo Israɛl nɛmɔt, Yesu arɔk mɛ́nyiɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ amɛm ɛkɛt ɛnɛ mǔnti amɔt anɛ achi mǔnkwɔ Fárisi. Bo Fárisi bhɔ bátɛp yi amɨ́k amʉɛt bɛghɔ ndǔ yi ákʉ̀.
142 Mǔfú abhak bɛsí Yesu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛmě afɛmntay.
143 Yesu abhɛ́p batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm nɛ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi abhɛn bachi arɛ bɛ, “Ɛbhé ɛyɛsɛ ɛ́ká bɛ mámbú mmu ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt kɛ?”
144 Kɛ bákɛ rɛm yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Yesu asɔt mmu wu abú yí. Arɔ yɛ yí arɔk.
145 Abhɛ́p yɛ́ bhɔ bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ mmǔ ywɛka anɛ mɔ́ywi nɛ yɛ̌ mpɔŋ yi ákwɛn amɛm mbokó manyiɛp ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt kɛ yi kɛya yɛ̌ yi, yɛ̌ yɔ tɛ́mté ámfɛ́rɛ́?”
146 Bɔ́ kɛkwáy bɛ́kɛmɛ Yesu yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
147 Ɛnɛ́ Yesu áyɨ̀ŋɨ, aghɔ́ ndǔ bǒ abhɛn mánáká ndǔ ɛpa báre yap bɛbhaká kɛnókó. Achyɛ bhɔ maniɛ bɛ,
148 “Mpok mánáká wɔ ndǔ ɛpǎ nɛbhay, ɔ́kɛ́ tɨŋɨ yap ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛnókó ɔ́nchɔkɔ arɛ́ mbɔnyunɛ ɛ́kwáy bɛfakari bɛ mának mmǔ anɛ acha wɔ.
149 Nɛ mmu anɛ ánáká bhe antwɔ́ andɛm bɛ, ‘Faté chyɛ ɛpok ɛnɛ ntá mmǔ-nɛ.’ Mbák ɛ́mfákárí ɛnyu yɔ, ɔ̌faté nɛ bɛyǎ ntíánwɔ́p bɛ́rɔŋ bɛchɔkɔ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ yɛ̌ mandú kɛnókó.
1410 Mpok mánáká wɔ ndǔ ɛpa, yap chi ɛnɔk ɛnɛ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ yɛ̌ kɛnókó, bɛ mmu anɛ ánáká ɛpa ántwɔ́, ankwáy bɛrɛm ntá yɛ bɛ, ‘Nkwǎnɛ, twɔ́ chɔkɔ ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛnókó.’ Bǒ ɛpa bachak mángɔ bɛ mmu anɛ ánáká ɛpa ǎchyɛ̀ wɔ kɛnókó.
1411 Yɛ̌ agha anɛ áyòŋ mmʉɛt, Mandɛm ǎsɛ̀pti yi amɨk. Nɛ mmu anɛ ásɛ̀pti mmʉɛt amɨk, Mandɛm ǎkòsi yi amfay.”
1412 Yesu arɛm yɛ ntá mmu anɛ ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ yí ndǔ ɛpa nkwɔ bɛ, “Mpok ɔ́bhɨ́ŋɨ́ bho ndǔ nɛnyíɛ́, ɔ́kɛ́ bhɨŋɨ chi mamʉɛrɛ bhɛ, nɛ bǒnɛrɛ́kɛt ywɛ, nɛ bǒ nkáp abhɛn bachi kɛkwɔt nɛ wɔ. Mbák ɔ́mbɨ́ŋɨ́ chi mɛnyǔ bo bhɔ, bɔ́ nkwɔ́ bákway bɛbhɨŋɨ wɔ bɛ́ ɔ́nyíɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ bhɔ nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́mbak akap anɛ ɔ́bhɔŋ.
1413 Mbák ɔ̌nàk ɛpa, bɨŋɨ́ bachɛ́bhɛ́bho, nɛ babák, nɛ bakɛm, nɛ manɛmamɨ́k.
1414 Nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́ndɨ ɛncha mbɔnyunɛ mɛnyǔ bǒbhɔ bápú kway bɛkɛmɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́kʉ́ ntá yap. Kɛ Mandɛm ǎkap wɔ mpok yi ákʉ̀ bo abhɛn bachi chak bɛsí bhi mámpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.” 
1415 Yesu ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́rɛ́m mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, mmu amɔt anɛ áchí ndǔ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ yi, arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Chɔŋ ɛ́ndɨ ntá yɛ̌ agha anɛ ányíɛ ɛpǎ ɛnɛ ɛ́bhak ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt Kɛfɔ Mandɛm awu amfay!”
1416 Nɛ Yesu aghati yi bɛ, “Mmǔfu anak nyaka ɛrɛm ɛpa, abhɨŋɨ bɛyǎ bho.
1417 Mpok anɛ ɛpa ɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛbho ákwáy nɔ́kɔ́, ató mɔ̌bɛtok ywi bɛ andɔk angati bo abhɛn yi anaka bɛ, ‘Twɔ́ ká, mánaŋ batoŋti yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ.’
1418 Arɔk aghati bhɔ́, kɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap arɔbhɛ ghati yi chí bɛ ndak akɛm yi. Anɛ mbɨ arɛm bɛ ‘Nku nkɨ nɛ mbɔŋ bɛ́rɔŋ bɛyɨŋɨ wu. Nɨkmʉɛt, ghatí ɛtayɛ bɛ ákɛ́ bentɨ.’
1419 Achák arɛm bɛ, ‘Nku mpɔŋ byó ɛnɛ ɛ́kwàŋ bakɨ. Nchí yaŋ ndɔ́k ngɔ́ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn yɔ ɛ́kwày bɛkʉ. Nɨkmʉɛ́t. Ghatí Ɛtayɛ bɛ́ ákɛ́ bentɨ.’
1420 Anɛfú arɛm bɛ, ‘Nɛ́nɛ kɛ mbáy ngɔrɛ́. Mpú kwáy yɛ bɛ́twɔ.’
1421 Mmɔ̌ bɛtok wu arɔk aghati ɛtayi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǒbhɔ bárɛmɛ. Mbɔŋɔ́kɛt abéntɨ. Aghati mɔ̌bɛtok yi wu bɛ, ‘Fú, dɔ́k áyák ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbay anɛ áchí ɛtɔk nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nɛbhʉɛ́t anɛ bo báchí arɛ sɔt bachɛ́bhɛ́bho twɔ ndǔ ɛpa nɛ bhɔ. Twɔ́ nɛ babák nɛ bakɛm nɛ manɛ́mámɨk.’
1422 Mmɔ̌ bɛtok arɔk atwɔ́, arɛm ntá yi bɛ, ‘Ɛta, nkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɔ́rɛ́mɛ́ kɛ ɛkɛt ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ re jwi.’
1423 Ɛtayi arɛm bɛ, nɛ́nɛ ‘Fú, dɔ́k, ɛtɔk ndǔ babhǐ agho nɛ ndǔ babhǐ bɛbhɨ. Fíɛ́ bɛtaŋ bɛ́ bo mántwɔ́ bɛ́ ɛkɛt ɛpa ɛ́njwi.
1424 Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ, yɛ̌ mmu amɔt ndǔ bo abhɛn njambɨ kɛ bɔ́ kɛtwɔ́, apú kwáy bɛ́ghókóti ɛnyɨŋ ndǔ ɛpa ɛya-nɛ.’” 
1425 Ngɛ́mtay bho báré kɔ nɛ Yesu. Ayibhiri mmʉɛ́t arɛm ntá yap bɛ,
1426 “Mbák mmu áyàŋ bɛ́bhak nɛ mɛ apú kwáy bɛbhák nkoŋo wa mbák abhɨ́kɨ́ kɔŋ mɛ ánchá ɛtayi nɛ máyi, nɛ ngɔrɛ́ ywi, nɛ bɔ̌bhi, nɛ, bɔ̌mayi abhɛn babhakanɛm nɛ abhɛn baghɔrɛ́ nɛ ankɔŋ mɛ ancha yɛ chí mmʉɛrɛ́ yi.
1427 Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛpɔkɔ ɛyi ɛko ankoŋo mɛ apú kway bɛbhak nkoŋo wa.
1428 “Mbák mmu ywɛka ǎyàŋ bɛte ɛkɛt ɛgho, pú ǎyambɨ anchɔkɔ amɨk ankay, angɔ mbák nkáp anɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ akway anɛ yi áte ɛkɛt anaŋa?
1429 Mbák abhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ nɔ, ǎkwáy bɛghoko nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́kɛt kɛ yí kɛte ɛkɛt ánáŋá, nɛ bo abhɛn bághɔ́ yɔ mámbo bɛ́wáy yi bɛ,
1430 ‘Anɛ abho bɛte ɛkɛt kɛ ɛcha yi mɛnaŋa.’
1431 “Nɛ sɛ́nsɔt bɛ mfɔ amɔt abhɔ̌ŋ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu nka byo (10,000). Apɛrɛ́ rɔŋ mɛnu nɛ mfɔ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu nka ɛsa, (20,000) ǎkʉ yi? Pú ǎyambɨ anchɔkɔ, ankaysi sayri, mbák ǎkway mɛnu nɛ mfɔ wu?
1432 Nɛ mbák ángɔ́ bɛ́ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ kway, ǎto bo ntá mfɔ wu mpok batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bhi babhʉɛt nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ bɛ mánsókórí ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ bápú nu nɛ batɨ.”
1433 Yesu arɛm yɛ bɛ, “Ɛ́chí ɛnyumɔt nɛ be mankɛm. Mbák mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ntɨ bɛrɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́, apú kway bɛbhak nkoŋo wa.” 
1434 Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Ngáŋ áchí ɛrɨ́tí ɛnyɨŋ. Kɛ mbák ngáŋ ábhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ manyɨŋti mi, ná bákway bɛkʉ wu ampɛt ambak ɛrɨ́tí ngáŋ?
1435 Ɛnyǔ ngáŋ wu ápú pɛrɛ rɨ́ ndǔ yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Ápú rɨ amɨk nɛ apu rɨ yɛ̌ ndu bɛfyɛ ndu ntó-takɔ anɛ báyàŋ ámpɔ́ɔ́ ánchyɛ ntɔbhɛ́-píɔ. Báto wu to. Mmǔ anɛ áyàŋ bɛghok ántá batu angok sayri.”
15
151 Mpokófu, babhɛbhɛ́ nkábhɛ́nti nɛ bakʉ̌ bɛbʉ́ bachak báré kap Yesu ndu bɛghok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yí átɔ̀ŋ.
152 Bǒnkwɔ Fárisi nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm bábho mɛ́nywínti bɛ, “Mɔ́nkwǎnɛ ǎsyɛpti bǒ bɛbʉ́, nɛ ǎnyiɛ tɛ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ bhɔ.”
153 Ɛ́kʉ Yesu atɛ́m bɔ́ nɛkay ɛnɛn bɛ:
154 “Sɛ́nsɔ́t bɛ mmǔ ywɛka amɔt abhɔŋ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n bɛsa bɛtay. Mbák amɔt anɛm ɛbhɨ, ǎkʉ̀ yi? Pú ǎrɔ̀ anɛ́ bɛsa mɛnwi nsɛm nɛkʉ nɛ anwi, andɔk bɛyaŋ awu ámɔt kpát ambɔŋ wu?
155 Nɛ mbák aghɔ wu, ǎpɔkɔ anyaŋa mankɨ nɛ maŋák,
156 nɛ mpok anɛ yi ágháká anywɔ́p, ǎbhɨŋɨ mamʉɛrɛ bhi nɛ bakokosi bhi, angati bhɔ bɛ, ‘Ŋák ká nɛ mɛ mbɔnyunɛ́, mbɔ̌ŋ ághɔ́ŋɔmɛn wa anɛ ánɛ́mɛ́ nyaka.’”
157 Yesu arɛm yɛ bɛ, “Nchí ghati bhe bɛ nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyu yɔ kɛ̌ maŋák ǎbhák amfay ntá Mandɛm nɛ bɔángɛl ɛ̌ti mmǔ bɛbʉ́ amɔt anɛ átɨ́kɨ́nsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhi ɛncha bo bɛsa mɛnwi nsɛm nɛku nɛ anwi abhɛn bákáysi bɛ bachi chak bɛsí Mandɛm nɛ ntí apú anɛ bɔ́ bátɨ̀k nsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap.” 
158 Yesu apɛt arɛm bɛ, “Sɛ́nsɔ́t bɛ ngɔrɛ́ amɔt abhɔŋ bɛbhɔ́kɔ́ nkáp byó. Mbák ɛbhɔk ɛ́mɔt ɛ́nɛm, ǎkʉ yi? Pú ǎdurɛ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́, ansɔt kɛtɨ́ŋɨ́ anyɔ ɛkɛt ɛnkɛm, ambyo sayri mbǎnkɛm kpatɛ angɔ́ yɔ́?
159 Nɛ mpok ághɔ́ yɔ ǎbhɨŋɨ mamʉɛrɛ nɛ bakokosi bhi, angati bhɔ bɛ ‘Ŋák ká nɛ mɛ mbɔnyunɛ ngɔ̌ ɛbhɔ́kɔ́ nkap ɛnɛ ɛnɛmɛ.’
1510 Yesu arɛm yɛ bɛ nchí ghati bhe bɛ bɔángɛl Mandɛm bábhɔŋ maŋák ɛ̌ti mmǔ bɛbʉ́ amɔt anɛ átɨ́kɨ́nsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhi.” 
1511 Ndu bɛrɔŋ ambɨ Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Mmǔfú abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɔ̌ babhakanɛm bati apay.
1512 Ɛwak ɛ́mɔ́t, anɛ mɔ́nkwɛn arɛm ntá ɛtayi bɛ, ‘Ɛta, chyɛ awa ákɔ́rɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́.’ Ɛtayap akɔrɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhi ntá yap bati apay.
1513 Ansɛm mpǎy manywɔp, anɛ mɔ́nkwɛn anyokoti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhi apɔkɔ arɔk ɛtɔk ɛ́chák nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ. Arɛ́ achɔŋti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhi mɛnkɛm ndu mɛ́nyiɛ ɛpɔ̌ nɛpɛm.
1514 Áchɔ́ŋtí nɔ́kɔ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ, ɛrɛmɛ́ nsay ɛ́kwɛ́n ɛtɔk ɛyɔ ɛnkɛm, arɔp amɔ apay.
1515 Ɛkʉ arɔk, abhat mmʉɛt nɛ mmǔ ɛtɔk ɛyɔ amɔt. Ató yi bɛ ándɔ́k, áne nɔ́kɔ́ bakók bhi amɛm nkɨ ywi.
1516 Are yáŋ mɛnyiɛ nɛnyiɛ́ bakók, kɛ yɛ̌ mmu kɛchyɛ yi ɛnyɨŋ mɛnyiɛ.
1517 Kɛ ásɔ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nkaysi nɛ mmʉɛt yi arɛm bɛ, ‘Ghɔ́ ká mɛ-á, bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk ɛtaya báchí awu mányìɛ̀ nɛnyíɛ́ mmʉɛt ngɔkngɔk, mándɔ nɔkɔ mbɔk, nsay átwɔ way mɛ fá!
1518 Chɔŋ mfá mpɛtnsɛm ntá Ɛtaya ngati yi bɛ, “Ɛta, nkʉ Mandɛm bɛbʉ́, nɛ nkʉ wɔ bɛbʉ́.
1519 Mbɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ kway mmu anɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ mɔ́ywɛ. Sɔt mɛ chí mbɔ nkʉbɛtɨk ywɛ̌ amɔt.”’
1520 Afate abho bɛpɛtnsɛm ntá ɛtayi. Kɛ ɛnɛ́ yi abhʉɛt nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ, chi aghɔ́ yi ndu átwɔ̀. Ntínso nɛ́kɛ́m yi, afate, ajɛt arɔk akɛ́m yi abhɛnɛ.
1521 Mmɔ arɛm ntá yi bɛ, ‘Ɛta, nkʉ Mandɛm bɛbʉ́, nɛ nkʉ wɔ bɛbʉ́, nɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ kwáy mmu anɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ mɔ́ywɛ.’
1522 Kɛ chi aghati bɔ̌-bɛtok bhi bɛ, ‘Twɔ́ ká ayak nɛ ɛ́wɛt ɛnɛ ɛrɨ́ ɛ́chá mǎnsɔbhɛri yi nɛ yɔ, mǎmfyɛ́ yi sɛnɔŋ ndǔ sɛnɔŋáwɔ, nɛ nkwɔbhánya bɛkak.
1523 Dɔ́k yɛ ká mǎnkɛm mɔ́sɛnɛ́ mpɔŋ mǎngwáy mǎnkʉ nɛnyíɛ́ bɛ sɛ́nyíɛ́ sɛnkʉ maŋák,
1524 mbɔnyunɛ mɔ́wa-nɛ agǔ nyaka, kɛ nɛ̌nɛ apɛt achi nɛpɛ́m. Anɛm nyaka kɛ mpɛt ngɔ yí.’ Afɔ̌ kɛ̌ ɛpa ɛ́bhó.
1525 “Mpǒk yɔ, mɔ́ywi anɛ nsénsí abhak ɛbhɨ. Ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ kɛkwɔ́t nɛ ɛkɛt ndǔ yi afu ɛbhɨ ápɛtnsɛm anywɔ́p, aghók ndǔ nkɛnkwɛt nɛ nɛbhɛ́n nɛ́chí anywɔ́p.
1526 Abhɨŋɨ mmɔ̌bɛtok amɔt abhɛ́p yí bɛ ‘Ntɨkɨ ndak áchí fá ɛchɔŋ?’
1527 Mmɔ̌ bɛtok wu aghati yí bɛ ‘Mɔmáyɛ apɛtnsɛm, kɛ ɛtayɛ áway mɔ́sɛnɛ́ mpɔŋ mbɔnyunɛ́ apɛtnsɛm dok.’
1528 Mɔ̌mbɨ wu abéntɨ, anisi bɛchwe anywɔ́p. Chi afú arɔk are anɨk yí mmʉɛt bɛ anchwe anywɔ́p.
1529 Kɛ akɛmɛ ɛtayi chi bɛ, ‘Yɨŋɨ, bɛyǎ mamiɛ́ anɛ ankɛm, nchí fá nɛ wɔ, nkʉ nɔkɔ bɛtɨk ntá yɛ mbɔ nsɛm. Yɛ̌ ɔrɛm bɛ yi, nkʉ kʉ, nkɛ taŋ ntí. Yɛ̌ nɔ, ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ re chyɛ mɛ yɛ̌ chi mɔ́mɛn bɛ́ nkʉ mǎŋák nɛ mamʉɛrɛ bha.
1530 Kɛ mpok mɔ́ywɛ-nɛ mmu árɔ́ŋɔ́ ányíɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ nɛ baghɔrɛ́-nɛkɔ ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm, ɔwǎy yi ɛsɛnɛ́mpɔŋ!’
1531 Chi abhɨŋɨ yɛ yí arɛm bɛ, ‘Mɔ́wa, ɔchí fá nɛ mɛ mpǒk nkɛm, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛya, chí ɛyɛ.
1532 Ɛ́chí mbʉ ɛrɨ́tí ɛnyɨŋ bɛ sɛnkɛm ɛpa ɛ́nɛ, sɛ́nkʉ́ maŋák, mbɔnyunɛ mɔmáyɛ nɛ agǔ nyaka kɛ nɛ́nɛ achi nɛpɛ́m. Anɛm nyaka kɛ sɛ́pɛt sɛghɔ yi.’”
16
161 Yesu apɛt arɛm ntá bakoŋo bhi bɛ, “Mǔnkáp amɔt achi nyaka. Abhɔ́ŋ mǔbɛtɨk anɛ ákɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhi mɛnkɛm. Bo bágháti yi bɛ, mmʉ̌ bɛtɨk ywí wu ǎchɔŋti nkáp ywi.
162 Abhɨŋɨ mǔbɛtɨk wu arɛm bɛ ‘Ntɨkɨ ndak nɛ́ ngoko ɛ̌ti yɛ? Dɔ́k twɔ́ mɛ́ nɛ bɛkáti ɛbhɛn ɔ́sɨ́ŋɨ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛya arɛ́. Ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ kwáy bɛ́kɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbha.’
163 “Mmǔ bɛtɨk wu arɛm nɛ mmʉɛt yi bɛ, ‘Chɔŋ nkʉ yi? Mmʉɛt ápú mɛ́ bɛ́kʉ bɛtɨk bɛtaŋ bɛtaŋ, nɛ ntí ánwɔ̀p mɛ mɛnɨŋɨ mɛnɨŋɨ.
164 Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, arɛm bɛ, nɛ́nɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ nchí kʉ bɛ́ bo mánsíɛ́ptí mɛ amɛm bɛkɛt ɛbhap mpok báfɛrɛ mɛ ndǔ bɛtɨk.’
165 Abhɨŋɨ bǒ barɛm abhɛn chi-bɛtɨk ywi amɔt amɔt. Abhɛ́p anɛ mbɨ bɛ, ‘Yi ɔ́kɛ̀m chi-bɛtɨk wa?’
166 Akɛmɛ yi bɛ ‘Babhaŋá bawɛt bɛsa bɛtay.’ Mmǔ bɛtɨk wu aghati yi bɛ, ‘Ghɔ́ ɛkati barɛm ɛyɛ, sɔt, wupsi, sɨŋ babhaŋ bɛsa bɛpay nsɛm byo ndǔ ɛnɛ́ ɛkɔ nɛ.’
167 Abhɛ́p yɛ anɛfú bɛ, ‘Ɔ̌kɛ́m ná?’ Akɛmɛ bɛ, ‘Bɛbhǎ nchwi bɛsa bɛtay.’ Mmǔ bɛtɨk wu achyɛ yí ɛkati barɛm arɛm bɛ, ‘Sɔt, wupsí sɨ́ŋ bɛbhǎ nchwi bɛsa mɛnwi ndǔ ɛnɛ ɛkɔ.’
168 Chi-bɛtɨk ywi ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ arwɔ̌ yi ɛnyuyɔ, akaka yí bɛ́ yi abhɔŋ kɛ́ŋwáŋ bɛ́káysi ndak. Ɛchi tɛtɛp bɛ bǒ mmɨkɨ nɛ bákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhap nɛ kɛŋwaŋ bácha ɛnyǔ bo Mandɛm bákʉ̀ ɛbhap.”
169 Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Kɛfɔ̌ bakáp nɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk kɛ́kway bɛ́twɔ nɛ bɛbɛ́pti mɛnyɨŋ kɛ nchí ghati bhe bɛ, mǎnsɔ́t kɔ mǎnkʉ bo mámbák mamʉɛrɛ bhɛka bɛ́ mpok kɛ́máy, Mandɛm ánsɔt bhe ndǔ bɛchɔ́kɔ́ bhi ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
1610 Mmǔ anɛ ábhʉ̀rɛ bariɛp ndǔ bǎru mɛnyɨŋ, ǎbhʉ̀rɛ bariɛp mi ndǔ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ. Nɛ mmu anɛ ápú bhʉɛrɛ bariɛp ndǔ bǎru mɛnyɨŋ, apú bhʉɛrɛ bariɛp ndǔ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ nkwɔ.
1611 Mbák bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ tɔŋ bɛ bǎbhʉ̀rɛ bariɛp ndǔ baraká nkáp nɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk, agha ákway bɛsɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ be amfyɛ kɛfɔ̌ bakáp ɛkɛn kɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti amɔ yɛka?
1612 Mbák bǎpú bhʉɛrɛ bariɛp ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn báfyɛ́ amɔ yɛka, yɛ̌ mmu apú kway bɛchyɛ bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi amfay?
1613 Yɛ̌ mɔbɛtok apu kwáy bɛtok bachi batí apay ndɔŋ amɔt. Mbák ámbɔ́ŋ bachi bapay, ǎkɔŋ amɔt ancha anɛfú, mbák ɛ́pú nɔ́, ǎchyɛ kɛnókó ntá amɔt, ambyak anɛfu. Mmu apu kwáy bɛtok Mandɛm antok nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ mmɨk.” 
1614 Yesu árɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, nkwɔ Fárisi bo bákɔ́ŋɔ́ nkáp tontó báre way yi.
1615 Yesu aghati bɔ bɛ, “Bě bǎchí bo abhɛn bátɔ̀ŋ mmʉɛt bɛ bǎchi chak bɛsí bho. Kɛ Mandɛm arɨŋɨ batɨ yɛka. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bo báyɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ́ ɛbhɔŋ mɛnwɔp chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm ápàp.”
1616 Yesu apɛt arɛm bɛ, “Jɔ̌n Njwiti ápɛ́rɛ twɔ, bo bátɔ̀ŋ nyaka chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi amɛm basɨŋ Moses nɛ amɛn barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ. Basɨŋɨ́ mɔ kɛ̌ bo bákòŋo nyaka. Jɔ̌n átwɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́, bábho bɛghati bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Kɛfɔ Mandɛm, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu are nu bɛchwe arɛ́ nɛ bɛtaŋ.
1617 Kɛ ɛchi wɨkɨrɨk bɛ mfay ámfʉ́ɛ́t, mmɨk amfʉɛt, ɛcha bɛ mandú ɛnyɨŋ ndǔ basɨŋ amɛn Moses nɛ amɛn barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ ánɛ́m.
1618 Ɛchi yɛ bɛ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ árɔ́ ngɔrɛ́ ywi ndǔ nɛbhay, akwɛ̌n bɛrwɔp. Nɛ mmǔ anɛ ábháy ngɔrɛ́ anɛ nnɛ́m árɔ́ ndǔ nɛbhay, akwɛ̌n nkwɔ bɛrwɔp.” 
1619 Yesu atɛ́m nɛkay ɛnɛ́n bɛ, “Mǔnkáp amɔt achi nyaka anɛ afyɛ́ ndɛn bɛyǎ nkáp, anyiɛ nɔkɔ ɛpa yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔp.
1620 Nchɛ́bhɛ́mu amɔt achí nyaka. Aka nyɛ́n bɛ Lásárɔs. Báre bhʉrɛ yi ndǔ nyǔbha mǔnkáp wu mpoknkɛm. Mmʉɛt yi ajwi nɛ bɛfʉɛt.
1621 Abhɔ́ŋ ɛkwak mɛnyiɛ yɛ̌ chi bɛchɔkɔti ɛbhɛn bɛ́kwɛ̀nti amɨk mpok mǔnkáp anyiɛ nɛnyiɛ. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛchak abhak bɛ mmú mǔnkáp ɛ́ré rɔŋ ɛ́nɨŋɨ nɔkɔ bɛfʉɛt ɛbhi.
1622 Ansɛm mpok, nchɛ́bhɛ́mú wu agú, bɔángɛl Mandɛm basɔt yi barɔk amfay, bákʉ yi achɔkɔ kɛkwɔt nɛ Ábraham. Mǔnkáp agú nkwɔ, bábhɛ́mɛ yi.
1623 Arɔk ɛtɔkɔ́ bawú, abhak ndǔ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri arɛ́. Áyóŋ nɔ́kɔ́ amɨ́k amfay, aghɔ́ Ábraham nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ nɛ Lásárɔs abhak yí nɛpaká mmʉɛt.
1624 Mǔnkáp wu akók yɛ arɛm bɛ, ‘Ɛta, Ábraham, ghɔ mɛ ntínso. Tó Lásárɔs ántáp sɛnɔŋ awɔ ndǔ manyiɛp antwɔ ankwɛnɛ mɛ ntɨ mandú. Nchí ndǔ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri amɛm ngó-nɛ.’
1625 Kɛ Ábraham akɛmɛ yi chi bɛ, ‘Mɔ́wa, kɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ mpok ɔchí awu amɨk, ɔbhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ Lásárɔs ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ chí bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ. Kɛ nɛ́nɛ yí achí sayri fá ɛnɛ́ wɔ ɔ́chí ndǔ nɛnyíɛ́ ámɛ́n.
1626 Dɨŋɨ́ nkwɔ bɛ, ɛrɛmɛ́ nɛpi nɛ́kɔrɛ bhɛsɛ ɛnyunɛ́, yɛ̌ mmu apu kway bɛfu fá ampe antwɔ ntá yɛka; nɛ yɛ̌ mmu apú kway bɛrɔ ɛbhě yɛká, ampé ántwɔ́ fá ntá yɛsɛ.’
1627 Mǔnkáp wu arɛm bɛ, ‘Ɛta Ábraham, nɨkmʉɛt tó yɛ Lásárɔs ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt ɛtaya.
1628 Mbɔ̌ŋ bɔ̌maya batí atay. Ghatí yi ándɔ́k ánsɛmti bhɔ bɛ bákɛ́ twɔ nkwɔ́ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛ́t nɛnyiɛ́ ámɛ́n anɛ.’
1629 Kɛ Ábraham akɛmɛ yi chí bɛ ‘Bɔ̌mayɛ babhɔŋ basɨŋ Moses nɛ amɛn barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ. Mángók mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn basɨŋɨ́ mɔ ághàti bhɔ.’
1630 Arɛm ntá Ábraham bɛ, ‘Ǎe Ɛta Ábraham, ɛyɔ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ kway. Mbák mmu amɔt anɛ ánáŋá ágú ámpɛ́tnsɛm angati bhɔ, chɔŋ mántɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap.’
1631 Ábraham aghati yɛ yi bɛ, ‘Mbák bɔ̌mayɛ babhɨkɨ ka bɛghok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi amɛm basɨŋ Moses nɛ amɛn barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ, nɔ bápú kway bɛghok yɛ chi mmu anɛ ánáŋá ágú kɛ ǎpɛtnsɛm ntá yap.’”
17
171 Yesu abho bɛ́gháti bakoŋo bhi bɛ, “Mamɔ anɛ átɛ̀n bo ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ápú nɔ́k bɛ́twɔ. Kɛ chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛp ɛ́ncha ntá mmú anɛ ákʉ̀ mamɔ ántwɔ́ ntá bho!
172 Ɛ́chí sáyrí ntá mmu wu bɛ mánsɔt ntay nɛgho mánsɛt ɛmɨ ɛyi, mámɛsɛ yí amɛm manyu ɛcha yi bɛbhak nɛpɛ́m ankʉ mmǔ amɔt anɛ ánókó Mandɛm ankwɛn ndǔ bɛbʉ́.
173 Sɔt ka mpok! Mbák mɔ́mayɛ ánkʉ wɔ bɛbʉ́, ghatí yi bɛ́ ándɔ́ ɛpɨŋ ɛyɔ. Mbák atɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhi, foŋorí yi.
174 Nɛ mbák akʉ wɔ bɛbʉ́ ndɔŋ tándrámɔt ndǔ ɛwak nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ndɔŋ antwɔ́, anɨk wɔ mmʉɛt bɛ, ‘Ɛta foŋorí mɛ́,’ ɔbhɔŋ bɛ́fóŋóri yi.” 
175 Bǒnto Yesu barɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Acha, kwak bɛ́ nɛka ɛnɛsɛ nɛ́ntáŋ nɛndɔk ambɨ.”
176 Acha akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mbɔ bǎbhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm ɛnɛ́n nɛ́chí yɛ̌ chi nɨ́ŋɨ́nɨ́ŋɨ́ mbɔ mɔ́sɛpɛm anɛ ɛnɔk ɛ́nɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ *mɔ́stat, mbʉ bǎkway bɛ́ghati ɛnɔk ɛnɛ bɛ, ‘Fǎ fá nɛ bakaŋ dɔ́k tě awu amɛm manyu’, nɛ yɔ́ ɛ́ngok be.” 
177 Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛtɔŋ. Arɛm bɛ, “Sɛ́nsɔ́t bɛ mmǔ ywɛka amɔt abhɔŋ mǔbɛtɨk anɛ áchí ɛbhɨ ákʉ̀ bɛtɨk, yɛ̌ chí ndu bɛbhábhɛri bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n, yɛ̌ chi ndu bɛ́kwáŋ mbaŋ. Mbák afǔ ɛbhɨ apɛtnsɛm anywɔ́p, wɔ chi-bɛtɨk ywi ɔ̌ghati yi bɛ, ‘Twɔ́ chɔkɔ́ amɨk nyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́’?
178 Pú ɔ̌ghati yi chi bɛ, ‘Dɔ́k wupsí ndɛn, kʉ nɛnyíɛ́ twɔ nɛ nɔ. Nnáŋ nnyiɛ́ nnáŋá, ɔ́nsɔt ɛnɛ ɔnyiɛ’?
179 Mbák akʉ mbɔ ɛnyu ɔ́ghátí yi ɔpú kwáy bɛkaka yi bɛ, ‘Ɔkʉ a’ mbɔnyunɛ akʉ chí bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ.
1710 Ɛ́mbák yɛ ɛnyumɔt nɛ bhe. Mǎnáŋ mǎnkʉ bɛtɨk mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn báchyɛ́ bhe, bǎbhɔŋ bɛrɛm chi bɛ, ‘Sɛ́chí chí bǒ bɛtok, yɛ̌ ndak áchák ápú. Sɛ́kʉ́ chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́kʉ.’” 
1711 Ndu Yesu ákɔ̀ bɛrɔŋ Yerúsalɛm, are fʉɛ́t ndǔ ndyɛrɛbhɨ Samária nɛ Gálili.
1712 Nɛchwe áchwè amɛm mɔ́tɔk amɔt, bǒ ɛbhaŋákwa bati byo bághɔ́ yi ndu átwɔ̀, báte, kɛrɔ́ŋ kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ yí.
1713 Bábho bɛbɨk mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ́, “Yesu, Ɛta, ghɔ́ bhɛsɛ ntínso.”
1714 Yesu ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bhɔ, aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Dɔ́k ká ntá bachiǎkap Mandɛm bɛ mánchák bhe.” Ɛnɛ́ bárɔ̀ŋ, ɛbhaŋákwa yap ɛ́may.
1715 Mmu wap amɔt ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ ataŋ, abho bɛpɛtnsɛm ntá Yesu ambɨti nɔkɔ Mandɛm nɛ ɛyɔŋ amfay.
1716 Ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ bɛsí Yesu, akwɛ́n yi bɛkak ankaka nɔkɔ yi. Ɛ́fákárí bɛ mmǔ wu achí chi mmu Samária.
1717 Yesu arɛm yɛ bɛ, “Pú bǒ bati byo kɛ mbúú? Abhɛ́nɛ́fú bati nɛ́nɛ́namɔt báchí fá?
1718 Ndiɛrɛ kɛnkɔ̌ nɛ aywǐntí kɛ ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm bɛbɨti Mandɛm-ɛ́?”
1719 Yesu aghati yɛ mmu wu bɛ, “Faté, dɔ́k ɛbhak ɛyɛ. Nɛka ɛnɛ́n ɔbhɔŋɔ nɛ mɛ nɛ́kʉ ɔtaŋ.” 
1720 Nywɔp nɛ́mɔt, mbɔk bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bábhɛp Yesu bɛ, “Ntɨ́kɨ́ mpok Mandɛm ábhák nɛ bo fá amɨk mbɔ Mfɔ wap?” Akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Yɛ̌ ɛrɨŋ ɛ́pú ɛnɛ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ Mandɛm abho bɛ́kɛm bo mbɔ Mfɔ wap.
1721 Nɛ yɛ̌ mmú apú kwáy bɛrɛm yɛ̌ bɛ, ‘Ghɔ́ ká Mandɛm fa nɛ bho mbɔ Mfɔ wap!’ Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ Mandɛm anáŋ achi Mfɔ ndǔ nkwɔ ywɛka.”
1722 Yesu arɛm yɛ ntá bakoŋo bhi bɛ, “Mpok ǎtwɔ̀ anɛ bǎbhɔ̀ŋ chɔŋ ɛkwak bɛbhak nɛ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm yɛ̌ chi ndǔ nywɔp nɛmɔt kɛ be kɛbhɔŋ mbi.
1723 Mpók yɔ, chɔŋ bo mámbak abhɛn bághàti bhe bɛ, ‘Ghɔ́ ká yi awu!’ Báchák mandɛm bɛ, ‘Ghɔ́ ká yi fá!’ Mbák mǎngók nɔ, bǎkɛ́ rɔŋ, bǎkɛ́ bho bɛ́koŋo bhɔ.
1724 Mbɔ ɛnyǔ miámiaŋ ákɔ̀t angɔɔ, bɛfu ɛbhɔ́kɔ́ nɛbu ɛ́mɔt bɛghaka ɛ́chák, nɔ́ kɛ̌ ɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛbhak mpok Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm nchí twɔ.
1725 Kɛ yí abhɔŋ bɛyambɨ angɔ́ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ mkpáká bho abhɛn ɛchɔŋ mámbyak yí, kɛ antwɔ́.
1726 Mbɔ ɛnyu ɛ́fákárí nyaka mpok Nóa, nɔ́ kɛ̌ ɛ́fàkari chɔŋ kɛ Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm ambesi.
1727 Bo mányìɛ̀ nyaka mányù nɔkɔ, abhɛn bábhày baghɔrɛ́ mámbay nɔkɔ, nɛ abhɛ́n bátòk bhɔ mántoko nɔkɔ kpatɛ nywɔp ɛnɛn Nóa áchwé amɛm áchwí, nɛ manyiɛp átwɔ́ akuti mmɨk awáy bǒ mankɛm.
1728 Chɔŋ ɛ́mbak nkwɔ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛchi nyaka mpok Lɔt. Bo mányìɛ̀ nyaka nɛ mányu nɔkɔ. Bákù nyaka mɛnyɨŋ nɛ abhɛn bɛ́ti mánti nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhap. Mbɔk bákwàŋ nyaka nɛnyíɛ́, abhɛ́nɛ́fú mánte nɔkɔ bɛkɛt.
1729 Kɛ ndǔ nkúbhɛ́ nywɔp ɛnɛ́n Lɔt afa ɛtɔk Sódom, Mandɛm akʉ ngó áfú amfay nɛ ɛkɛm mbɔ batay anɛ ádù, anyɛ mbɔ manyiɛp, ásɔ́ŋ bɔ mankɛm.
1730 Nɔ́ kɛ ɛ́bhàk chɔŋ nɛ bo mpok Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm ábhèsi.
1731 “Ɛwak ɛyɔ, ɛ́bhák ɛnyumɔt nɛ mmu anɛ achi amfǎy ɛkɛt. Ákɛ́ rɔ́ŋ kpɨ́k anywɔ́p bɛ ampɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ kɛ ambʉɛ. Ɛnyumɔt nɛ mmu anɛ achi ɛbhɨ. Ákɛ́ rɛm bɛ́ ǎpɛtnsɛm anywɔ́p ansɔt yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
1732 Bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fákárí nyaka nɛ ngɔrɛ́ Lɔt.
1733 Mmǔ anɛ áyàŋ bɛpɛmɛ mmʉɛt, chɔŋ anɛ́m nɛpɛ́m ɛni. Kɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ áká mɛ́nɛm nɛpɛ́m ɛni ɛ̌ti ya, chɔŋ ambɔ́ŋ nɔ́.
1734 Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, ndǔ mpok yɔ anɛ mɛ̌pɛtnsɛm, bǒ bati apay bákway bɛbhʉrɛ ndǔ bɛkɔ́k mɛ́mɔt, mánsɔt amɔt mandɔk nɛ yí, mándɔ anɛfu.
1735 Baghɔrɛ́ bati ápay bákway bɛbhak ndǔ ntay nɛmɔt mánkɔk nɔkɔ nchwi, mánsɔt amɔt mándɔk nɛ yi, mándɔ anɛfú.” [Bǒ bati apay bákwày bɛbhak ɛbhɨ, mánsɔt amɔt, mándɔ anɛfú.]
1737 Bakoŋo Yesu bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Acha, mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́fàkari chɔŋ fá?” Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Nɛbhʉɛt anɛ ɛgú-nnya ɛchi, arɛ́ kɛ̌ kɛnɛn ɛkɛn kɛ́nyìɛ̀ bɛgú nnya kɛ́chɛmɛ.”
18
181 Yesu atɛ́m nɛkay ɛnɛ́nɛ́fú ntá bakoŋo bhi ndu bɛtɔŋ bhɔ bɛ, bábhɔŋ mɛnɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm mpoknkɛm, kɛfɛrɛ ntí arɛ.
182 Arɛm bɛ, “Ntaŋá-manyé amɔt achi nyaka ɛtɔkɔfú, Mandɛm yi kɛ chyɛ kɛnókó, ntɨ nkwǎ yi kɛbhɔŋ mpok nɛ yi.
183 Kɛ́nkwɛ́sɛ́ amɔt abhak nkwɔ́ ɛtɔk ɛyɔ. Are rɔ́ŋ ntá ntaŋá manyé wu anɨk nɔkɔ yí mmʉɛt bɛ, ‘Ɛta, táŋ manyé ya sayri fɛrɛ mɛ amɔ́ mǔmpap awa.’
184 Ndǔ nɛbhǒnɛt, ntaŋá manyé wu kɛfyɛ́ ntí. Kɛ ansɛm mpok, achɔkɔ diíí arɛm nɛ mmʉɛt yi bɛ, ‘Yɛ̌ndu mpú chyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó, nɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ mpok nɛ ntɨ nkwǎ,
185 kɛ ndu mɔ́ngɔrɛ́-nɛ árɔ̀ŋ chi ambɨ bɛchyɛ mɛ ɛsɔŋɔri, chɔŋ ntáŋ manyé yi sayri nchyɛ́ yi. Mbák ɛ́pú nɔ́, apú sɛbhɛ mɛ ante amɨk.’”
186 Yesu Acha arɛm yɛ bɛ, “Bǎghok nɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ntaŋá manyé anɛ ápú chak árɛ́mɛ́?
187 Mbák mmu mbɔ yi ǎkwáy nyaka bɛ́kwak mɔ́ngɔrɛ́ wu, Mandɛm kɛ apu kway bɛkwak bo abhɛn yi áyábhɛ́ mbák bádì kɛbhɔ ntá yi bɛ̌ti nɛ ngósí? Ǎkway bɛ́chɔ́ŋti mpok kɛ ankwak bhɔ?
188 Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, chɔŋ Mandɛm amkpɔ́t manyé áyák anchyɛ bǒbhi. Kɛ mpok Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm, chɔŋ angɔ́ bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm fá amɨkɨ́?” 
189 Yesu atɛ́m nɛkay ɛnɛ́nɛ́fú ntá bo abhɛn bakaysi nyaka bɛ bachi chak bɛsí Mandɛm, mámbyaka nɔkɔ bo bachak.
1810 Yi bɛ, “Bo bati apay bárɔŋ nyaka mɛnɨkmʉɛt amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm. Amɔt abhak mǔnkwɔ Fárisi, anɛfú abhak mbɛbhɛ́ nkabhɛ́nti.
1811 Mǔnkwɔ Fárisi ate ɛyǐ ɛbhak anɨk mmʉɛt bɛ, ‘Mandɛm, nkáká wɔ́ bɛ mpú mbɔ bo báchák abhɛn bachi baghɛ́p, bakʉ̌ bɛbʉ́, nɛ bakwɛnɛ́ bɛrwɔp. Nkáká wɔ bɛ mpú mbɔ yɛ̌ chí mbɛbhɛ́ nkabhɛ́nti anɛ áté nɔ́ awu.
1812 Nchí bhak ndǔ nɛtarɛ́nsay ndɔŋ ɛ́páy ndu sɔ́nde amɔt. Nɛ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbha mɛnkɛm nchí chyɛ ndu amɔt amfay baru byo mbɔ akap ntá yɛ.’
1813 Kɛ mbɛbhɛ́ nkabhɛ́nti ate nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ. Ntí, yi kɛ yoŋ amfay, nɛ adɛp awɔ́ antɨ arɛm bɛ, ‘Ɛta Mandɛm, nchí mmǔ bɛbʉ́. Ghɔ́ mɛ ntínso!’
1814 Nchí ghati bhe bɛ Mandɛm ásɔ́t nyaka bɛ mbɛbhɛ́ nkabhɛ́nti wu achí chak bɛsí bhi. Ɛ́kɛbhák nɔ nɛ mǔnkwɔ Fárisi mbɔnyunɛ́ Mandɛm ǎsɛ̀pti yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ áyòŋ mmʉɛt, kɛ ǎkòsi yɛ̌ agha anɛ ásɛ̀pti mmʉɛt amɨk.” 
1815 Bofú básɔ́t bɔ̌bhap bárɔ́k ntá Yesu nɛ bhɔ bɛ yi anyaŋa bɔ amɔ anti anjɛt bhɔ. Baghɔkɔ́ bhi bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, bábho bɛsáyti bhɔ bɛ bákɛ́ kʉ nɔ.
1816 Kɛ Yesu abhɨŋɨ bǒbhɔ nɛ bɔ̌bhap. Nɛ ntá baghɔkɔ́ bhi arɛm bɛ, “Dɔ̌ ká mǎmbɔ mántwɔ ntá ya, bǎkɛ́ chyɛt bɔ mbi mbɔnyunɛ bǒ abhɛn bachi mbɔ bhɔ́ kɛ̌ Mandɛm abhak Mfɔ wap.”
1817 Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ, mbák mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ rɔ Mandɛm ankɛm yi mbɔ mɔ́nkwɛn apú kway bɛbhak ndǔ mpǎy bo abhɛn Mandɛm achi Mfɔ wap wáwák. 
1818 Ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, mǔnti bo Israɛl abhɛ́p Yesu bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, wɔ mmǔ ndɨ́ndɨ́, chɔŋ nkʉ yi kɛ mbɔ̌ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ́n nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti?”
1819 Yesu akɛmɛ yí bɛ, “Ndaká yí ɔ́bhɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛ bɛ mmǔ ndɨ́ndɨ́? Mmǔ ndɨ́ndɨ́ apú. Mandɛm aywǐnti kɛ achi Mmǔ ndɨ́ndɨ́.
1820 Ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛbhé Mandɛm. Bɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Ɔ́kɛ́ kwɛn bɛrwɔp. Ɔ́kɛ́ wáy mmu. Ɔ́kɛ́ ghɛp. Ɔ́kɛ́ te ntísiɛ ákwárɛ́. Chiɛ̌ máyɛ nɛ ɛtayɛ kɛnókó.’”
1821 Mmǔ wu árɛm bɛ́ “Nnáŋ nchí bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm.”
1822 Yesu ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Ɛ́rɔp ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt ɛnɛ́ ɔ́bhɨ́kɨ́ re kʉ. Dɔ́k tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ mɛnkɛm, chyɛ̌ nkáp ntá bachɛ́bhɛ́bho. Mbák ɔ́nkʉ́ nɔ, chɔŋ ɔ́mbɔ́ŋ kɛfɔ̌ mɛnyɨŋ amfay. Ɔ́ntwɔ́ yɛ ɔnkoŋo mɛ. Nɛ chɔŋ ɔ́mbɔ́ŋ kɛfɔ̌ mɛnyɨŋ awǔ amfay.”
1823 Ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, apɔp, arɔbhɛ rɔ́ŋɛ́rɔ́ŋ mbɔnyunɛ abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ.
1824 Yesu ayɨŋɨ yí, arɛm bɛ, “Ɛ́bèmʉɛt tontó bɛ mǔnkáp anka Mandɛm ambak Mfɔ ywi.
1825 Ɛ́chí wɨkɨrɨk bɛ mpɔŋɔ baso ámfʉɛ́t ndǔ mbok mbíábhan ɛ́cha mǔnkáp bɛ́ka Mandɛm ambak Mfɔ ywi.”
1826 Bo abhɛn baghoko bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɔ bábhɛ́p Yesu bɛ, “Agha ákwày yɛ bɛbhɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti?”
1827 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́cha nkwǎŋwaŋ, ɛ́pú cha Mandɛm.”
1828 Píta asá ɛyɔŋ arɛm bɛ, “Yɨŋɨ́, sɛ́rɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm sɛ́kòŋo wɔ.”
1829 Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, nchí ghati bhe bɛ, “Mmǔ anɛ árɔ́ yɛ̌ ɛkɛt, yɛ̌ ngɔrɛ́, yɛ̌ bɔ̌mayi, yɛ̌ ɛtayi nɛ máyi, nɛ yɛ̌ bɔ̌bhi ɛ̌ti Kɛfɔ Mandɛm,
1830 Mandɛm ǎchyɛ chɔŋ yi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛyǎ bɛcha ɛbhɛn yi anɛmɛ fá amɨk. Nɛ chɔŋ ambɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti ndǔ mmɨk nkɔ.” 
1831 Ɛ́tat nɔ́kɔ́, Yesu asɔt baghɔkɔ́ bhi bati byo nɛ apay nɛpak. Abho bɛ́gháti bhɔ bɛ, “Ghók ká! Sɛ́rɔŋ nɔ chí Yerúsalɛm, nɛ arɛ́, chɔŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm básɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛ̌ti Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm ɛ́mfakari.
1832 Chɔŋ mánkɛ́m yi mámfyɛ amɔ́ bǒbati abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl, mánjɔ́kɔ́ yi, nɛ mánsɔkɔti yí, nɛ mámpati yi batiɛ́ amʉɛt.
1833 Chɔŋ mándɛ́n yi nɛ ɛkpa, nɛ mángwáy yi. Kɛ ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ manywɔp arat, ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.”
1834 Kɛ baghɔk Yesu kɛjwimɛm yɛ̌ chi ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt ndǔ ɛbhɛn yi árɛ́mɛ́. Bɛ́bhak bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ntá yap nɛ bɔ́ kɛkɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi arɛmɛ. 
1835 Mpok Yesu aghaka kɛkwɔt nɛ Jɛríko, nnɛ́mámɨ́k amɔt abhak nɛpak mbi chɔ́kɔ́, anɨŋɨ nɔkɔ mɛnɨ́ŋɨ́.
1836 Ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ bɛyǎ bó báfʉɛ̀t, abhɛ́p ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fàkari.
1837 Bágháti yi bɛ, “Yesu anɛ Násárɛt kɛ áfʉɛ̀t.”
1838 Abho yɛ bɛ́bɨ́k bɛ, “Yesu! Mmɔ̌ Mfɔ Debhít! Ghɔ́ mɛ́ ntínso!”
1839 Bo abhɛn bárɔ̀ŋ ambɨ báré sayti yi bɛ ánchɔ́kɔ́ kpák; kɛ akpɨk are bɨk nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋɛtaŋ bɛ, “Mmɔ̌ Mfɔ Debhít! Ghɔ́ mɛ́ ntínso!”
1840 Yesu áte, achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ mántwɔ́ nɛ yi. Bátwɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ yi, Yesu abhɛ́p yi bɛ,
1841 “Ɔ̌yáŋ mɛ̌nkʉ́ wɔ yi?” Akɛmɛ Yesu bɛ, “Acha, nchí yaŋ mpɛt ngɔ mbaŋ.”
1842 Yesu arɛm yɛ ntá yi bɛ, “Ghɔ́ mbaŋ. Nɛka ɛnɛ́n ɔbhɔŋɔ nɛ mɛ nɛ́kʉ ɔtaŋ.”
1843 Tɛ́mté wu, abho bɛghɔ mbaŋ! Nɛ abho bɛkoŋo Yesu, ambɨti nɔkɔ Mandɛm. Bo mankɛm bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, babhɔ bɛbɨti nkwɔ Mandɛm.
19
191 Yesu achwe ɛtɔk Jɛríko are kɔ bɛfʉɛt.
192 Mmu amɔt abhak arɛ́ anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Sakio. Abhak mǔnti babhɛbhɛ́ nkábhɛ́nti. Abhɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ nkáp.
193 Árɨ́ŋɨ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ Yesu ǎfʉɛ̀t, abho bɛyaŋ mbi bɛ ángɔ́ ɛnyǔ mmu Yesu achi, kɛ ɛ̌ti kɛmbɨŋ ɛki nɛ bɛyǎ bo, yi kɛkwáy bɛghɔ yi.
194 Ajɛt arɔk ambɨ, akó amfǎy ɛnɔk ɛnɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ Síkámɔ ndǔ mbi anɛ Yesu ákɔ̀ arɛ ndu áyàŋ bɛghɔ yi.
195 Yesu ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ arɛ, ayoŋ amɨ́k amfay aghati Sakio bɛ, “Sakio, sɛp twɔ́ áyák. Mbɔŋ bɛ́bhak ɛkɛt ɛyɛ ɛchɔŋ.”
196 Sakio asɛp amɨk áyák, anak Yesu ɛkɛt yi nɛ bɛyǎ maŋák.
197 Bo bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ Yesu árɔ̀ŋ ndǔ ɛkɛt Sakio, báré nywinti mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Yesu ǎrɔ̀ŋ bɛbhák kɛnkɔ amɛm ɛkɛt nkʉ bɛbʉ́.”
198 Ɛnɛ́ Yesu nɛ Sakio báchí anywɔ́p, Sakio afate arɛm ntá Yesu bɛ, “Acha, ghók, chɔŋ nkɔ́rɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbha ndǔ baru apay, nchyɛ́ ndu amɔt ntá bachɛ́bhɛ́ bho. Nɛ mbák nsɔt ɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmu ndǔ mangwɔ, chɔŋ nkɛmɛ yɔ ndɔŋ ɛnwi.”
199 Yesu arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Ɛchɔŋ, Mandɛm apɛ́mɛ́ wɔ́ nɛ ɛfo ɛyɛ ɛnkɛm mbɔnyunɛ wɔ nkwɔ́ ɔchí ɛbhárɛ́mɔ Ábraham anɛ Mandɛm ábhɔ́ŋ bɛ́pɛ́mɛ.
1910 Nɛ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm ntwɔ bɛ́yáŋ nɛ bɛ́pɛ́mɛ chi bo abhɛn manɛ́mɛ́ ɛbhɨ.” 
1911 Ɛnɛ́ bo bághòk mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Yesu árɛ̀m, arɔk ambɨ bɛtɛm nɛkay nɛchak. Ntí abhak bɛ, anáŋ agháká nyaka kɛkwɔt nɛ Yerúsalɛm, nɛ bo bákàysi nyaka bɛ Kɛfɔ Mandɛm kɛ́twɔ̀ fá amɨk mandú mpok.
1912 Yesu aghati yɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Nnɛ́m mmu amɔt arɔ́ nyaka ɛtɔk yi arɔk ɛtɔk ɛ́chák nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ bɛ́ mánkʉ́ yí mfɔ ntá bǒbhi kɛ ampɛtnsɛm.
1913 Ápɛ́rɛ rɔŋ, abhɨŋɨ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk abhi bati byo. Achyɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap ɛbhǎ nkáp, arɛm bɛ ‘Kɔ nɔ́kɔ́ ká ɛsiɛ nɛ nkáp wu kpátɛ̌ mpok nɛpɛrɛ́nsɛm ɛná.’
1914 Arɔ yɛ are rɔ́ŋ. Kɛ bǒ ɛtɔk yi bápap nyaka yi. Bátó yɛ bo bɛ mándɔ́k mángátí mfɔ ngo bɛ ‘Acha, sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ yaŋ mmǔ-nɛ ambák mfɔ ywɛsɛ.’
1915 Yɛ̌ nɔ, nɛrɔŋ yi arɔŋɔ bákʉ́ yí mfɔ. Ápɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nsɛm ɛtɔk yi, abhɨŋɨ bǒ bɛtɨk abhɛn yi achyɛ nyaka nkáp bɛ mántwɔ́ yi angɔ nsay anɛ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́.
1916 Anɛ mbɨ arɔk aghatí yí bɛ, ‘Acha, mbɔ̌ŋ nsáy bɛbhǎ nkáp byo amfay ɛbha ɛ́mɔt ɛnɛ ɔ́chyɛ́ mɛ.’
1917 Mfɔ wu arɛm ntá yi bɛ, ‘Ɔkʉ sayri, ɔchí ɛrɨ́tí nkʉbɛtɨk! Tɛ̌ndu ɔ́tɔ́ŋɔ́ ndǔ mandú ɛnyɨŋ bɛ ɔ̌bhʉ̀rɛ bariɛp, mɛ̌chyɛ̀ wɔ bɛtaŋ bɛkɛm bɛtɔk byo.’
1918 Anɛ ájwí bati apay atwɔ́ arɛm bɛ, ‘Acha, mbɔ̌ŋ nsay bɛbhǎ nkáp bɛtay amfay ɛbha ɛ́mɔt ɛnɛ ɔ́chyɛ́ mɛ.’
1919 Mfɔ arɛm ntá nkʉbɛtɨk wu bɛ, ‘Mɛ̌chyɛ̀ wɔ bɛtaŋ bɛ́kɛ́m bɛtɔk bɛgho bɛtay.’
1920 Nkʉ bɛtɨk achák atwɔ arɛm bɛ, ‘Acha, ghɔ́ ɛbhǎ nkáp ɛyɛ. Nnɛp nyaka wu ndǔ ɛbhɔ́kɔ́ndɛn mbɛsɛ. Mbɨ́kɨ́ kʉ ɛnyɨŋ nɛ wu.
1921 Mbɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛchǎy mbɔnyunɛ ɔchí mmu mbeápak. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́pú ɛyɛ, ɔ̌sɔrɛsɔt. Nɛ ɔ̌ghɛ̀m ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɔ́bhɨ́kɨ́ pɨ.’
1922 Mfɔ wu aghati yi bɛ ‘Wɔ nkʉbɛtɨk mbʉ́mbʉ, ɛyɔŋɔ́nyu yɛ ɛ́way wɔ! Ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ nchí mmu mbeápak. Ɔrɨŋɨ bɛ́ nchí sɔt ɛnɛ́ ɛ́pú ɛya, nɛ nchí ghɛm ɛnɛ́ mbɨ́kɨ́ pɨ, pú nɔ́?
1923 Kɛ ndak yi ɔ́bhɨ́kɨ́ fyɛ́ nkáp awa amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́nkap? Mbɔ ɔkʉ nɔ, mbʉ́ ndu ntwɔ́ nɛ́, mbɨ́kɨ́ sɔt wú nɛ nsáy?’
1924 Aghátí yɛ bo abhɛn báchí arɛ téé bɛ, ‘Sɔt ka ɛbhǎ nkáp ɛyǐ yɔ mǎnchyɛ ntá mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛbha byo.’
1925 Bárɛ́m ntá yi bɛ, ‘Acha, pú yi abhɔŋ bɛbhǎ byo?’
1926 Mfɔ wu akɛmɛ bɛ, ‘Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́, báchyɛ yi ɛ́chák. Kɛ anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ, básɔ̀t ntá yi yɛ̌ chí mandú anɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́.
1927 Nɛ mbák chí bǒmpap abha bhɛn, abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ yaŋ nyaka bɛ mbák mfɔ wap, twɔ́ ká nɛ bhɔ fá, mǎngwáy bhɔ́ bɛsí bha.’” 
1928 Yesu átɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ bhɔ́ nɛkay ɛnɛn, arɔk ambɨ bɛ́kɔ bɛrɔŋ Yerúsalɛm, yi abhak ambɨ, bo abhɛn báchi nɛ yi mankoŋo nɔkɔ ansɛm.
1929 Ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ kɛ́kwɔ́t bɔ̌bɛtɔk Bɛtfágɛ nɛ Bɛ́tani, ndǔ Njiɛ Mɛnɔk *Ólif, ató baghɔkɔ́ bhi bati apay ambɨ.
1930 Aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Dɔ́k ká ndǔ mɔ́tɔk anɛ achi afɔ ambɨ. Nɛchwe anɛ báchwe arɛ chɔŋ mǎngɔ mɔ́ mpɔŋɔ batu sɛsɛ́t, anɛ yɛ̌ mmu abhɨkɨ re kɔ nɛ yɔ́. Kaŋarí ká twɔ́ mɛ nɛ yɔ́.
1931 Mbák mmú ámbɛ́p be ntí anɛ bǎkàŋari yɔ́, ghati ka yí bɛ, ‘Acha kɛ áyàŋ yɔ.’”
1932 Bǒ abhɛn yi átó, bárɔ́k, bághɔ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi aghati bhɔ.
1933 Ɛ́nɛ́ bákàŋari mɔ́mpɔŋɔ batu wu, bǒ abhɛn babhɔŋɔ yɔ, bábhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Ndaká yí bǎkàŋari mɔ́mpɔŋɔ batu wu?”
1934 Bákɛ́mɛ bɛ, “Acha ǎyàŋ yɔ.”
1935 Bárɔ́k yɛ nɛ yɔ ntá Yesu. Básɔ́t ndɛn ɛnɛ́ mfǎymʉɛt ɛyap basɔbhɛri mɔ́mpɔŋɔ batu wu, bákwák yi achɔkɔ amfay.
1936 Nɛ ndǔ yi ákɔ̀ árɔ̀ŋ, bo báré sɔt ndɛnɛ́ mfǎymʉɛt ɛyap mángay nɔkɔ ambi bɛ mɔ́mpɔŋɔ batu wu ankɔ amfay.
1937 Ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ mbi árɔ̀ Njiɛ Mɛnɔk Ólif ásɛ̀p Yerúsalɛm, ngɛ́mtáy bakoŋo bhi bábhó mɛŋák, mámbɨti nɔkɔ Mandɛm nɛ ɛyɔŋ amfay ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn bɔ́ bághɔ́.
1938 Mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Mandɛm ánjɛ́t mmu anɛ átwɔ̀ ndǔ nnyɛ́n Acha! Mandɛm Mfay kɛ áchyɛ̀ kpák. Sɛ́nchíɛ yí kɛnókó!”
1939 Mbɔk bǒnkwɔ Fárisi abhɛn báchí ndǔ ngɛ́mtáy bo bhɔ, bárɛ́m ntá Yesu bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, sáy bakoŋo bhɛ mánchɔkɔ kpák.”
1940 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Nchí ghati bhe bɛ yɛ̌ mbʉ́ mánchɔkɔ chí kpák, batay ábɨk ambɨti Mandɛm.” 
1941 Yesu ágháká kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ Yerúsalɛm, aghɔ́ ɛtɔk, adi kɛbhɔ ndǔ ntínso nɛ́kɛm yi nɛ Yerúsalɛm,
1942 andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Mbɔ be bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ yɛ̌ chí ɛchɔŋ, mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kʉ̀ bo mámbɔ́ŋ kpák, mbʉ́ ɛ́rɨ-e! Kɛ nɛ́nɛ, bɛchi bhɛsɛ bhɛsɛ nta yɛka nɛ bǎpú ghɔ bhɔ.
1943 Mpok ǎtwɔ̀ anɛ bǒmpap abhɛka bátwɔ̀ mánkap be, mántɛp nkók ankap ɛtɔk yɛka, mánchɛt bhe bɛbhě mɛnkɛm.
1944 Nɛ mánchwe mánaŋa bhe nɛ bɔ̌bhɛka mankɛm, mámokoti ɛtɔk ɛnkɛm ɛnyunɛ́ yɛ̌ ntay nɛ́pú rɔp amfǎy ntɨ. Chɔŋ ɛ́mfakari nɔ, mbɔnyunɛ́ bǎbyak Mandɛm mpok yi átwɔ́ bɛ́pɛ́mɛ bhe.” 
1945 Yesu arɔk achwe amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm abho bɛbok bǒ abhɛn bákɔ̀ ɛsiɛ́ amɛm,
1946 ambe nɔkɔ nɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ́ Mandɛm arɛm bɛ, ‘Ɛkɛt ɛya ɛ́bhɔŋ bɛbhak chi ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt’, kɛ bǎyíbhírí yɔ́ ɛ́rɔp chi ɛkɛt ɛnɛ́ baghɛ́p bábhɛ̀sɛ arɛ!”
1947 Yesu are rɔ́ŋ yɛ antɔŋ nɔkɔ bo amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔp. Bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm, nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Moses, nɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk bachak báre yáŋ mbi bɛway yi.
1948 Kɛ bɔ́ kɛbhɔ́ŋ mbi mbɔnyunɛ́ bo mankɛm bábhɔ̌ŋ nyaka ɛkwak bɛ́ghok mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn Yesu árɛ̀m.
20
201 Ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, ɛnɛ́ Yesu átɔ̀ŋ bo amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm angati nɔkɔ bhɔ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́, bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm nɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk bárɔ́k ntá yi,
202 barɛm bɛ, “Ghatí bhɛsɛ, ntɨkɨ bɛtaŋ ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɛ́ ɔ́kʉ̀? Agha áchyɛ́ wɔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɔ?”
203 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mɛ nkwɔ mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnyɨŋ bɛbhɛp be. Ghatí ká mɛ.
204 Bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn Jɔ̌n ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka ndu bɛjwiti bho, bɛ́fú chi ntá Mandɛm kɛ ntá nkwǎ?”
205 Báre kɛm ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ batɨ bɛ, “Chɔŋ sɛ́ndɛm bɛ yi? Mbák sɛ́ndɛm bɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn Jɔ̌n bɛ́fú nyaka ntá Mandɛm, ǎbhɛ́p bhɛsɛ bɛ, ‘Kɛ ndaká yi bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ noko ɛyɔŋ ɛyi?’
206 Nɛ mbák sɛ́ndɛ́m bɛ, ‘Bɛ́fǔ nyaka ntá nkwǎ’, bǒ mankɛm bátɛmti bhɛsɛ nɛ batay mangway, mbɔnyunɛ bɔ́ mankɛm mánóko sayri bɛ Jɔ̌n achi nyaka ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm.”
207 Ɛ́kʉ́ bakɛmɛ Yesu bɛ, “Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ.”
208 Nɛ Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Mɛnkwɔ́ mpú ghati yɛ be mmu anɛ áchyɛ́ mɛ́ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɛ́ mɛ̌kʉ̀.” 
209 Yesu abho yɛ bɛ́tɛm bɔ nɛkay nɛchak bɛ, “Mmǔfú achi nyaka. Atɨ nkɨ apɨ mɛnɔk vain arɛ. Afyɛ́ bo arɛ, bɛ mánkʉ bɛtɨk mankɔrɛ nsáy nɛ yi. Arɔ yɛ arɔk nɛkɔ ɛnɛn yi átàt, ɛtɔk ɛchak.
2010 Mpok bɛkɔk kɛpɛm ɛ́nɔk ákwáy nɔ́kɔ́, mbɔŋɔ́nkɨ ató bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk abhi bachak bɛ mándɔ́k mánsɔ́t aywi ákɔ́rɛ́ mbwɔt. Kɛ bǒ bɛtɨk bhɔ kɛchyɛ. Bákɛ́m yi badɛn, bábók, apɛtnsɛm amɔ́ amɔ.
2011 Mbɔŋɔ́nkɨ ató mǔbɛtok achak. Bákɛ́m awu nkwɔ́ bádɛn, báchyɛ́ yi ntiánwɔ́p, bábók apɛtnsɛm amɔ́ apay.
2012 Ató mmɔ̌bɛtok anɛ ajwi bati arat. Bádɛ́n, báfyɛ́ bɛfʉɛt amʉɛt, bábók, afú arɔk.
2013 Ɛ́kʉ mbɔŋɔ́nkɨ wu arɛm nɛ mmʉɛ́t ɛyi bɛ, ‘Chɔŋ nkʉ ná? Chɔŋ ntó mbɔ̌ŋ mmɔ̌ntɨ wa. Yɛ̌ yí, bábhɔŋ bɛ́chyɛ yi kɛnókó.’
2014 Kɛ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yi, bábhó bɛrɛm nɛ batɨ bɛ, ‘Yɨŋɨ́ mbɔ̌ŋ mɔ́ywi nɛ́, nɛ yí kɛ̌ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛ́nyiɛ́ nɛwú ɛtayi. Twɔ́ ká sɛnkɛm yi sɛ́ngwáy bɛ́ ɛtayi ánáŋ ángú, mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhi mɛ́ndɔp chi ɛbhɛsɛ.’
2015 Mɔ́ywi wu áchwé nɔ́kɔ́ amɛm nkɨ, bákɛ́m yi baya báfú amɛm nkɨ nɛ yi, barɔk baway.” Yesu átɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ nɛkay ɛnɛn, abhɛ́p bɔ́ bɛ, “Bǎkaysi bɛ chɔŋ mbɔŋɔ́nkɨ wu ankʉ yi ntá bǒbhɔ?
2016 Chɔŋ antwɔ́ angway bhɔ, anchyɛ nkɨ wu ntá bo bachak.” Bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, babho bɛrɛm bɛ, “Mandɛm akɛ ka!”
2017 Yesu ayɨŋɨ bhɔ dǐǐ, abhɛp bɛ, “Ntí basɨŋɨ́ amɛn achi bɛ yi? Basɨŋɨ́ amɛn árɛ̀m bɛ: ‘Nkúbhɛ́ ntay ɛnɛn batɛ̌kɛt bágʉɛ́bhɛ́ bɛ́ nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨ, nɔ́ kɛ nɛ́rɔ́bhɛ́ ntay ɛnɛn nɛ́kɛ́mɛ́ ɛkɛt nɛchá batay áchák ankɛm.’
2018 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ akwɛnɛ ndǔ ntay ɛnɛn, ǎsìɛpti ndǔ mbɨŋ, nɛ mmu anɛ ntay ɛnɛn nɛ́kwɛ́nɛ́ yi amʉɛt, nɛ́chɔ̀kɔti yi.” 
2019 Yesu atɛm nɔkɔ nɛkay ɛnɛn, batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm nɛ bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm bárɨŋɨ bɛ atɛm nɛkay ɛnɔ chi ɛ̌ti yap. Báre yaŋ bɛkɛm yi, kɛ báchày bo abhɛn báchi arɛ.
2020 Bárɔ́k yɛ ambɨ bɛyaŋ mbi bɛkɛm yi. Bátó baghokotǐ kɛpɨ ntá yi bɛ mánkɔt ngɛpti bɛ bachi bǒ tɛtɛp. Kɛ bárɔ̌ŋ nyaka chi bɛ mámbɛ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yi mɛnyɨŋ kpát ankwɛ́n anyu, ankwɛ́n ndǔ ntǎ yap bɛ mansɔt yi manto ntá Gɔ́bhanɔ Rom mmǔ bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm bɛchi yi amɔ.
2021 Baghokotǐ kɛpɨ bhɔ bárɔ́ŋɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ntá Yesu, babhɛp yi bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɔ́rɛ̀m nɛ ɔ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛchi chak. Sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ ɔpú yɨŋɨ mmu ndǔ bɛsí ɔ́ncháy yi, kɛ ɔ̌tɔ̀ŋ tɛtɛp ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áyàŋ bo mánkʉ.
2022 Ghatí bhɛsɛ, ɛbhé yɛsɛ ɛka bɛ sɛ́nchíɛ nkábhɛ́nti ntá Mfɔ Rom kɛ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ ka?”
2023 Yesu arɨŋɨ bapu map, arɛm ntá yap bɛ,
2024 “Tɔ́ŋ ká mɛ ɛbhɔ́kɔ́ nkap.” Bátɔ́ŋ nɔ́kɔ́ yi abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Ntí ághá nɛ́ arɛ́? Nɛ nnyɛ́n chí ɛnɛn ághá?” Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Chí ntí Sísa, Mfɔ Rom. Nɛ nnyɛ́n, chi ɛni.”
2025 Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Chiɛ́ yɛ́ ka nta Mfɔ Rom yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi ɛyi, mǎnchyɛ ntá Mandɛm yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi ɛnɛ Mandɛm.”
2026 Bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu arɛmɛ, bápɔ́p! Bɔ́ kɛbhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́, ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ yi ankwɛn anyu bɛ bɔ mánkɛ́m yi bɛsí bho. Bárɔp kpákpǎkpak. 
2027 Mbɔk bǒnkwɔ Sádusi bárɔ́k ntá Yesu babhɛp yi ɛ̌ti nɛpɛrɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Bǒnkwɔ Sádusi bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko nyaka bɛ bawú bápɛ̀t chɔŋ nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Babhɛp yi bɛ,
2028 “Ntɔŋ, Moses asɨŋ ndǔ ɛbhé ɛyɛsɛ bɛ, mbák mmu ángú ándɔ́ ngɔrɛ́ kɛ bɔ́ kɛbhɔŋ yɛ̌ mmɔ́, mɔ́mayi abhɔŋ bɛsɔt ngɔrɛ́ wu bɛ́ ámbé bɔ nɛ yi ndǔ nnyɛ́n manɔ anɛ ágú.
2029 Bɔ̌ chi amɔt bati tándrámɔt báchí nyaka. Anɛ mbɨ abháy ngɔrɛ́, agú kɛbhɔŋ yɛ̌ mmɔ́.
2030 Anɛ ákòŋo asɔt kɛ́nkwɛ́sɛ́ wu ndǔ nɛbhay agú kɛbhɔŋ mmɔ́.
2031 Anɛ ájwí bati arat nkwɔ asɔt yí kɛ agú kɛbhɔ́ŋ mmɔ́ nɛ yi. Ɛ́fákári ɛnyumɔt nɛ bɔ mankɛm bati tándrámɔt.
2032 Ndǔ ngwɛnti, ngɔrɛ́ wu nkwɔ agú.
2033 Ndu ɛchi nɔ, mpok Mandɛm ákʉ̀ bawú mámpɛ́tnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, ngɔrɛ́ wu ǎbhák anɛ agha? Ndu bɔ́ mankɛm, bati tándrámɔt, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap abhay nyaka yi.”
2034 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Fá amɨk, baghɔrɛ́ nɛ babhakanɛm bábháy batɨ,
2035 kɛ bo abhɛn chɔ́ŋ bápɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, mǎnchwe ndǔ mmɨk nkɔ, bápú pɛrɛ bháy nɛbhay
2036 mbɔnyunɛ bápú pɛrɛ kway bɛgu. Bábhak mbɔ bɔángɛl Mandɛm, bábhak bɔ̌ Mandɛm abhɛn yi akʉ bápɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
2037 Yɛ̌ chí Moses atɔŋ nyaka kpoŋoroŋ ndǔ mbok ɛnɔk ɛnɛ́ ngó ádù arɛ bɛ bawú bápɛt chɔŋ nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Ndǔ basɨŋɨ́ mi ɛ̌ti mbok ɛyɔ, Moses ǎbhɨ̀ŋɨ Mandɛm mmu achi Acha bɛ, ‘Mandɛm Ábraham, Mandɛm Áisek, Mandɛm Jekɔ́p!’
2038 Ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ Mandɛm achí Mandɛm bo abhɛn bachi nɛpɛ́m. Apú Mandɛm bawú. Ntá Mandɛm, bǒbhɔ mankɛm bachi nɛpɛ́m.”
2039 Mbɔk batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm báká nɛ yi, barɛm bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, ɔrɛm sayri!”
2040 Yɛ̌ mmu kɛpɛrɛ mɔ bɛ́bhɛp yi yɛ̌nyɨŋ. 
2041 Yesu abhɛ́p bo abhɛn bághòk yi bɛ, “Ná bákwày bɛrɛm bɛ Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò achi ɛbhárɛ́mɔ Mfɔ Debhít?
2042 Mbɔ̌ŋ Debhít asɨ̌ŋ amɛm Ɛkáti Bakway bɛ: ‘Mandɛm Acha arɛm nyaka ntá Acha wa bɛ, chɔkɔ fá ɛbhě awɔ́nɛm ɛya ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ-kɛnókó,
2043 kpatɛ nkʉ bǒmpap abhɛ mándɔp mbɔ ɛnɔk ɛnɛ chɔŋ ɔ́nyàŋa bɛkak arɛ.’
2044 Debhít ǎbhɨ̀ŋɨ nyaka Mpɛmɛ ɛrɛ bɛ Acha. Ná Achǎ áyibhiri ambak ɛbhárɛ́mɔ ywi?” 
2045 Bɛsí bo mankɛm abhɛn bághòk yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ, Yesu arɛm ntá baghɔkɔ́ bhi bɛ,
2046 “Sɔt ka mpok nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm. Bákɔŋ bɛghap mánkó mansɛp nɛ bɛwubhɛ wubhɛ́ ndɛn amʉɛt nɛfísiɛ bɛ bo mánkáká nɔ́kɔ́ bhɔ nɛ kɛnókó. Bákɔŋ nkwɔ́ bɛ́chɔkɔ ndǔ bɛbhaká kɛnókó amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt nɛ ndǔ bɛpa.
2047 Nɛ mányìɛ̀ mɛnyɨŋ mánkwɛ́sɛ́ ndǔ mangwɔ, mánkʉ nɔkɔ bɛrɔ́rí nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt bɛsí bhó mbɔ bɛ bachi bɛrɨtí bho. Chɔŋ ntɛ́msí yap anjá ancha.”
21
211 Ɛnɛ́ Yesu achi amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, ayɨŋɨ aghɔ́ ndǔ bǒ bakáp báfyɛ̀ akap amɛm ɛkʉbhɛ́ nkáp.
212 Aghɔ́ nkwɔ kɛ́nkwɛ́sɛ́ amɔt anɛ ɛyi ɛ́pú ndu afyɛ́ bɔ̌bɛbhɔ́kɔ́ nkap bapay.
213 Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, akap kɛ́nkwɛ́sɛ́-nɛ ácha anɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu.
214 Ndǔ bɛyǎ bakap kɛ̌ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap áfɛ́rɛ́ mandú achyɛ mbɔ akap, kɛ nchɛ́bhɛ́ ngɔrɛ́ nɛ, achyɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́.” 
215 Mbɔk baghɔkɔ́ bhi báré rɛm ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, mánkak nɔkɔ bɛrɨtí batay anɛ́ básɔ́rɛ́ báté yɔ́ nɛ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo báchyɛ́ bɛ mánsɔ́bhɛ́rí ɛkɛt ɛ́rɛ. Kɛ Yesu arɛm ntá yap bɛ,
216 “Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎghɔ̀ nɛ mɛnkɛm, mpok ǎtwɔ̀ anɛ ɛkɛt ɛnɛ ɛ́rɔ̀ŋ amɨk ɛnkɛm yɛ̌nyɨŋ kɛrɔp téé.” 
217 Bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, ntɨkɨ mpok chɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fakari, nɛ ntɨkɨ ɛrɨŋ ɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ bo mandɨŋɨ bɛ mpok anɛ ɔ́twɔ̀ arɔp kɛ́kwɔ́t?”
218 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ́ bɛ, “Sɔt ka mpok bɛ bákɛ́ rwɔ bhe mǎnjíbhírí batɨ yɛka. Bɛyǎ bo bátwɔ̀ chɔŋ mánsɔt nnyɛ́n ɛna mántɛn ambɨ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap andɛm nɔkɔ bɛ, ‘Mɛ kɛ nchi Mpɛmɛ anɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtó!’ Nɛ bɛ, ‘Mpok akway anɛ Mandɛm ápɛ̀mɛ mmɨk!’ Mbák mǎngók nɔ́ bǎkɛ́ koŋo bhɔ́.
219 Nɛ mpok bǎghókó nsóŋó-nɛnu nɛ ɛbyɔk, bǎkɛ́ chay. Mɛnyǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bɛbhɔŋ bɛfakari, kɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́pú tɔŋ bɛ ngwɛnti mmɨk arɔp kɛkwɔt.”
2110 Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛ́rɛm bɛ, “Chɔŋ bɛtɔk mɛ́nu nɛ bɛtɔk bɛ́chák, bafɔ̌ ɛtɔk mánu nɛ batɨ̌ bafɔ̌ ɛtɔk.
2111 Chɔŋ bɛtaŋtí nɛnyikisǐ mmɨk nɛ nsay nɛ bɛghorǐ mame mɛ́mbak mbǎŋ nɛ mbaŋ. Nɛ chɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ́ntwɔ nɛ bɛyǎ bɛcháy, nɛ bɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay mɛ́mfu amfǎy.
2112 Kɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm bɛ́pɛrɛ́ fákári, chɔŋ mánkɛm be, mánchyɛ ɛsɔŋɔri, mánsɔt be mandɔk amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛbhap mántaŋ be arɛ, mamfyɛ́ bhe amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ. Nɛ chɔŋ mámfyɛ be amɔ́ bafɔ nɛ bɔgɔ́bhanɔ bɛ mántáŋ be ɛ̌ti ya.
2113 Chɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́nchyɛ bhe mbi bɛghati bɔ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti ya.
2114 Kʉ yɛka batɨ̌ yɛka bɛ bǎpú sɛmɛ ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɔŋɔ bɛrɛm ndu bɛtaŋa mmʉɛt,
2115 mbɔnyunɛ chɔŋ mɛmbɔŋ nchyɛ́ bhe ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɛm, nchyɛ́ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak bɛ mǎnchók manyǔ bǒmpap abhɛka.
2116 Chɔŋ yɛ̌ chí bachi nɛ manɔ bhɛka, nɛ bɔ̌mayɛka, nɛ bǒ nnɛrɛ́kɛt, nɛ mamʉɛrɛ bhɛka mámfyɛ be amɔ́ bǒmpap abhɛka. Nɛ chɔŋ mángwáy mbɔk yɛka.
2117 Chɔŋ bo mankɛm mámpap be ɛ̌ti bǎchí bakoŋo bha.
2118 Chɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛ́bhɛn mɛ́nkway bɛfakari nɛ bhe kɛ yɛ̌ ɛkǎk ɛmɛnɛ́nti mmu ywɛka ɛpu nɛm.
2119 Mbák mǎnté kákátí, chɔŋ mǎmpɛmɛ mmʉɛt ɛyɛka. 
2120 “Mpok bǎghɔ́ bakwɔ́ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu ndu bákábhɛ́ Yerúsalɛm, dɨŋɨ́ yɛ́ ka bɛ mpok bɛchɔŋti Yerúsalɛm akway.
2121 Mpok yɔ, bǒ abhɛn bachi atú Judɛ́ya mámbʉ́ɛ́, mámbɛ́sɛ́ amfay njiɛ. Abhɛn báchi amɛm ɛtɔk Yerúsalɛm mámbʉ́ɛ́ mándɔ́k. Nɛ abhɛn bachi nɛfí bákɛ́ chwe ɛtɔk,
2122 mbɔnyunɛ manywɔp ayɔ chi anɛ ntɛmsi, bɛ́kʉ bɛ, mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn bɛchi amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm mɛ́mfú tɛtɛp.
2123 Nɛ chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛ́p ɛncha ntá baghɔrɛ́ nɛ mɛniɛ nɛ abhɛn báchí nɛ bɔ amɔ mpok ayɔ! Chɔŋ bɛyǎ bɛsɔŋɔri mɛ́ntwɔ fá amɨk nɛ Mandɛm ankʉ bǒ Yerúsalɛm mángɔ bɛběntɨ bhi.
2124 Chɔŋ mángwáy bɛyǎ bhap nɛ bɔakparɛnja, nɛ mánkɛmti bachak mbɔ basɛ́mɛ́ nɛnú ndǔ bɛtɔk nɛ bɛtɔk. Chɔŋ bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ Mandɛm mánjati Yerúsalɛm kpatɛ mpok ayap amfʉɛt. 
2125 “Mpok yɔ, chɔŋ bɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay mɛ́mbak amfay ndǔ mmok, nɛ ndǔ ntaŋ nɛ ndǔ mambe. Nɛ fá amɨk, chɔŋ bɛtɔk mɛ́mbɔ́ŋ basɛ́mɛ́ nɛ bɛcháy ɛ̌ti bɛrɛmti ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́fù ndǔ mpɛ́rɛ́nyɛn ɛnɛ bɔmanyu.
2126 Chɔŋ bo mámbɔŋ bɛcháy kpátɛ mbɔk mámfe ndu bárɨŋɨ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhó bɛfakari fá amɨk. Chɔŋ bɛtaŋ mfáy mɛ́nyɨkɨsi.
2127 Nɛ chɔŋ Mmǔ anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm ambesi, ande twɔ́ amɛm nɛbháŋ, nɛ bɛyǎ bɛtaŋ nɛ kɛnókó.
2128 Mpok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhó bɛfakari, tě ká sɛnɛ́ nɛ nkaysi bɛ mpok anɛ Mandɛm áfɛrɛ bhe ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri arɔp chi kɛkwɔt.” 
2129 Yesu atɛ́m bɔ nɛkay ɛnɛ́n bɛ, “Yɨŋɨ́ ká ɛnɔk *fig nɛ mɛnɔk bɛ́chák.
2130 Nɛtɛ́m anɛ bɔ́ bɛ́bho bɛ́tɛm bɛtɔ́, bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ ɛso ɛ́rɔp chi kɛ́kwɔ́t.
2131 Ɛ́chí ɛnyumɔ́t nɛ nɛtwɔ́ wa, Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm. Mǎnáŋ mǎngɔ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n-nɛ ngátí bhe bɛ́fàkari, dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ mpok anɛ Kɛfɔ Mandɛm kɛ́twɔ arɔp kɛkwɔt.
2132 Nchí ghati bhe tɛtɛp bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm bɛ́bhɔŋ bɛfakari, kɛ mkpáká bho abhɛn ɛchɔŋ amfʉɛ́t.
2133 Chɔŋ mfay amfʉɛt, mmɨk amfʉɛ́t, kɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛya ɛ́pú fʉɛt wáwák. 
2134 “Sɔt ka mpok bɛ́ bǎkɛ́ fyɛ ntí ndǔ mɛ́nyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́ tontó, bǎkɛ́ fyɛ ntí ndu mmɛ́m nɛ bǎkɛ́ bhɔŋ basɛ́mɛ́ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɛpɛmɛ́ mmɨk ɛnɛn. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kway bɛkʉ bɛ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛtwɔ́ ɛna nɛ́mbák tɛ́mchok ntá yɛka ndǔ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ toŋti mmʉɛ́t, nɛ nɛ́mbayti bhe mbɔ ntá.
2135 Chɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fàkari ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɔ mɛ́njɨŋɨ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu fá amɨk.
2136 Bák yɛ ka pě mpoknkɛm, mǎnɨk nɔkɔ mmʉɛt bɛ mǎmbɔ́ŋ bɛtaŋ bɛ́bʉɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛfakari, mǎnte bɛsí Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm.”
2137 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔp Yesu are tɔ́ŋ bo amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm. Ɛ́ghaka nɔkɔ běku, ankó andɔk ambʉrɛ amfay njiɛ mɛnɔk Ólif.
2138 Nɛ nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, bo mámpu mandɔk ntá yi amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm ndu bɛghok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi átɔ̀ŋ.
22
221 Mpok anɛ bo Israɛl mányìɛ̀ ɛpǎ Brɛt anɛ kɛbhɔŋ yís arɔp kɛkwɔt. Bábhɨŋɨ ɛpǎ yɔ bɛ, *Nɛkɨŋɨ.
222 Bǒ batí bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm báré yaŋ mbi bɛway Yesu bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ mbɔnyunɛ báchày nyaka ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bo bakway bɛkʉ. 
223 Satan akó anti Júdas anɛ mpɨ́kɨ́rí nnyɛ́n ɛni nɛchi bɛ Iskariɔt. Júdas achi nyaka mmu amɔt ndǔ nkwɔ baghɔk Yesu bati byo nɛ apay.
224 Arɔk anyiɛ́ bɛti nɛ bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ bǒbati batɛmɛ́ nɛnu abhɛn bábhàbhɛri ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, ɛnyu yi ákway bɛti Yesu ntá yap.
225 Bábhɔ́ŋ maŋák tontó, nɛ báká bɛchyɛ yi nkáp.
226 Júdas aka nɛ bhɔ́. Abho bɛyaŋ mbi ndu bɛ́tí Yesu ntá yap ndǔ mpok anɛ ngɛ́mtay bho bapu ghɔ. 
227 Nywɔp Brɛt anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ yís nɛ́kwáy. Ndu nywɔp ɛnɔ kɛ̌ báwày nyaka mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n anɛ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ,
228 Yesu ató yɛ Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n nɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ, “Dɔ́k ká toŋtí mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́ sɛ́nyíɛ́ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ.”
229 Bábhɛp yi bɛ, “Ɔ̌yàŋ sɛ́ntóŋtí yɔ́ fá?”
2210 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Yɨŋɨ́ ká, nɛchwe anɛ bǎchwé ɛtɔk, chɔŋ mǎngɔ́ mmu anɛ ápɔ́kɔ́ ɛjɔ̌ manyiɛp. Koŋó ká yi kpátɛ ɛkɛt ɛnɛ́ yi áchwe,
2211 mǎngati mbɔŋɔ́kɛt bɛ, ‘Ntɔŋ ǎto bhɛsɛ bɛ sɛ́mbɛp wɔ bɛ, mɔ́kɛrɛ́ mankɔ anɛ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛ́nyiɛ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ nɛ baghɔk abha achí fá?’
2212 Chɔŋ antɔ́ŋ be mɔ́kɛt anɛ achi amfay nɛ achɨk anɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛsɔbhɛri. Toŋtí ká yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ arɛ́.”
2213 Bárɔ́k, baghɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi aghati bhɔ. Bátóŋti Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ arɛ́. 
2214 Mpok ákwáy nɔ́kɔ́, Yesu achɔkɔ ndu ɛ́fɛ́mɛ́ nɛnyiɛ nɛ bǒnto.
2215 Aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Nnáŋ njǎŋ mɛnyiɛ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ ɛnɛ́ nɛ bhe tontó kɛ nchwe ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri.
2216 Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, mpú pɛrɛ nyiɛ́ chɔŋ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ kpátɛ mpok Mandɛm ákʉ̀ bo mándɨŋɨ ntí ɛpǎ ɛnɛ, nɔ́ chi mpok yi ábhák Mfɔ bǒ mankɛm.”
2217 Yesu asɔt yɛ nkɔ́p nɛ mmɛ́m amɛm. Áchyɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bakak ntá Mandɛm, achyɛ ntá bǒnto andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Sɔt ka nyú, ntɨ anyǔ anchyɛ ntɨ.
2218 Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, bɛ́bhó ɛchɔŋ, mpú pɛrɛ nyú mmɛ́mɛn kpátɛ mpok anɛ Mandɛm abhak Mfɔ bo mankɛm.”
2219 Asɔt yɛ ɛkpɔkɔ́ brɛd. Achyɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm. Are bɔkɔti anchyɛ nɔkɔ ntá baghɔkɔ́ bhi, andɛm nɔkɔ bɛ, “Brɛt-nɛ até ndǔ mmʉɛt ɛya anɛ nchí chyɛ mbɔ akap ɛ̌ti yɛka. Mǎndɔp, mǎnkʉ nɔkɔ ɛnyunɛ ndu bɛ́tɨk mɛ.”
2220 Mánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ mɛ́nyiɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́, asɔt nkɔ́p nɛ mmɛ́m amɛm, achyɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yí ákʉ́ nɛ nɛnyíɛ́. Arɛm bɛ, “Nɛ́ chí Nku Nkɔ anɛ Mandɛm ányú nɛ bǒ mmɨk ɛ̌ti nɛwú ɛna ndu bɛtɔŋ bɛ chɔŋ ankʉ *Nku Nkɔ anɛ yi ányú nɛ bo ante.
2221 Kɛ mmu anɛ átì mɛ achí fá chɔkɔ ǎnyìɛ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ mɛ.
2222 Nchí rɛm nɔ mbɔnyunɛ chɔŋ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm ngu mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi árɛ́mɛ́. Kɛ chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛ́p ɛncha ntá mmu wu nɔ átì mɛ ntá bǒmpap abha!”
2223 Bǒnto bábhó bɛbhɛp batɨ bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ mmǔ ywɛsɛ ákway bɛkʉ anɛ ɛnyǔ ndak ntá yi e?” 
2224 Baghɔkɔ Yesu babho bɛkɛm ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ batɨ ndu bɛ́rɨŋɨ mmu wap anɛ áchá abhɛnɛfu.
2225 Yesu arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Bafɔ abhɛn bɛtɔkɔ́ mmɨk babhɔŋ bɛtaŋ amfay bǒbhap nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ amfay bho, ǎyàŋ mámbɨŋɨ yi bɛ, ‘Nkwaka-bho.’
2226 Kɛ ɛ́kɛ́ bhák nɔ nɛ bhe. Mǔngo ywɛka abhɔŋ bɛbhak mbɔ mɔ́nkwɛn ndǔ nkwɔ ywɛka, mǔnti ambak mbɔ mǔbɛtok.
2227 Agha áchá ntɨ? Mmǔ anɛ báfʉɛ̀t yi nɛnyíɛ́ kɛ anɛ áfʉɛ̀t nɛnyíɛ́? Pú anɛ áchɔkɔ mámfʉɛt yi nɛnyíɛ́? Kɛ nchí nɛ bhe mbɔ mǔbɛtok.
2228 “Bě kɛ̌ bǎté nɛ mɛ ndǔ bɛsɔŋɔri bha mɛnkɛm.
2229 Nɛ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu Ɛtaya áchyɛ́ mɛ bɛtaŋ mɛnyiɛ kɛfɔ, ɛnyu yɔ kɛ̌ nchí kʉ chɔŋ bɛ be nkwɔ́ manyíɛ́ kɛfɔ.
2230 Chɔŋ mǎnyiɛ nɛ mǎnyú nɛ mɛ nɛbhʉɛt amɔt ndǔ ɛpǎ kɛfɔ ɛya, nɛ mǎnchɔkɔ nkwɔ ndǔ mɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ndu bɛkɛm manɛrɛ́kɛt Israɛl byo nɛ apay.” 
2231 Ɛ́tárɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, Yesu arɛm ntá Píta bɛ, “Símun, Símun, ghók! Báchyɛ́ Satan bɛtaŋ bɛ́ ámɔ́ bhe, amfap abhɛ́n bárɨ́ nɛ abhɛn babɛbhɛ mbɔ mmǔ ǎnyɨ̀kɨsi kasárá ndu bɛsɔt anɛ yi ághàŋ gari.
2232 Kɛ nnɨkmʉɛt ɛ̌ti yɛ bɛ́ ɔ́kɛ́ rɔ bɛ́bhɔŋ nɛka nɛ mɛ. Nɛ ɔ́náŋ ɔ́mpɛ́tnsɛm ntá ya, ɔ́kɛ́ rɔ bɛfyɛ bɔ̌mayɛ ntɨ.”
2233 Píta akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Acha, yɛ̌ báfyɛ̀ wɔ chi ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ, yɛ báwày wɔ wáy, mɛ̌gú chi nɛ wɔ.”
2234 Yesu aghati yí bɛ, “Píta, dɨŋɨ bɛ́ nkɔk apɛrɛ́ kók bɛtǐ ɛbhɛn, chɔŋ ɔ́ndɛm ndɔŋ ɛ́rát bɛ ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mɛ.” 
2235 Yesu abhɛ́p baghɔkɔ́ bhi bɛ, “Mpok ntó bhe pósá ti, ɛbha ti, nkwɔbhánya bɛkak ti, bǎchɛp nyaka yɛ̌nyɨŋ kɛ?” Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Wáwák.”
2236 Aghati yɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Kɛ nɛ́nɛ, mmǔ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nkáp ankɛm wu amʉɛt. Mmǔ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛbhǎ nɛkɔ ánsɔ́t yɔ. Anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ akparɛnja, ántí ndɛ́ yi anku akparɛnja.
2237 Nchí ghati bhe bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ básɨ́ŋɨ́ ndǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ̌ti ya, ɛbhɔŋ bɛfu tɛtɛp. Nɔ chi ɛnɛ́ ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Básɔt yi mbɔ nkʉ bɛbʉ́ amɔt.’ Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn básɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛ̌ti ya bɛ́bhɔŋ bɛfu tɛtɛp.”
2238 Baghɔkɔ́ bhi barɛm bɛ, “Acha, ghɔ́ bɔakparɛnja bapay fá.” Aghati bhɔ́ bɛ, “Dɔ̌ ká nɔ.” 
2239 Yesu afa yɛ arɔk amfay Njiɛ Mɛnok Ólif mbɔ ɛnyu ɛsɨ́. Baghɔkɔ́ bhi barɔk nɛ yi.
2240 Arɛ́, aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Nɨk nɔ́kɔ́ ká mmʉɛt bɛ mbák nɛmɔ nɛ́twɔ bǎkɛ́ kwɛn.”
2241 Árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, arɔ bhɔ, atɛ́n mmʉɛt ambɨ mandú, mbɔ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ ɔ́tɛ́m ntay nɛngaka. Atɛp mánɛ́n amɨk, abho mɛnɨkmʉɛt bɛ,
2242 “Ɛtaya, mbák ɔkɔŋ, fɛrɛ́ nkɔ́p ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ bɛ́ ámfórí mɛ. Kɛ ɔ́kɛ́ kʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌yáŋ, kʉ chi ɛnɛ́ wɔmbɔŋ ɔ́yàŋ.”
2243 [Ɛnɛ́ yi ánɨ̀kmʉɛt nɔ, ángɛl Mandɛm abhesi yi bɛsí, afyɛ́ yi ntɨ.
2244 Nɛ ndǔ bɛyǎ basɛmɛ, are nɨkmʉɛt nɛ ntɨ ɛni nɛnkɛm. Nsɔ́ŋtí anɛ áfú yi amʉɛt are chɨti amɨk mbɔ bakɔŋ manoŋ.]
2245 Ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ mɛnɨkmʉɛt, afate, apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yí árɔ́ baghɔkɔ́ bhi. Aghɔ bhɔ ndu bábhʉrɛ kɛnɔ́ ndu mánáŋ bápɔ́bhɛ́ ɛ̌ti bɛyǎ basɛ́mɛ́.
2246 Yesu abhɛ́p bhɔ́ bɛ, “Ndaká yí bǎbhʉ̀rɛ kɛnɔ́? Faté ká, mǎnɨkmʉɛt bɛ nɛmɔ nɛ́ntwɔ́, bǎkɛ́ kwɛn.” 
2247 Ɛnɛ́ Yesu abhʉɛ́t bɛrɛm nɔ nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi, ɛká bho ɛ́chwɔ́p. Júdas, mmu amɔt ndǔ nkwɔ baghɔk Yesu batí byó nɛ apay, abhak bɔ ambɨ. Arɔk kɛkwɔt nɛ Yesu ndu bɛ́bhɛ́nɛ yi.
2248 Kɛ Yesu abhɛp yi bɛ, “Júdas, ɔ̌bhɛ̀nɛ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm ndu bɛti mɛ ntá bǒmpap abha?”
2249 Baghɔkɔ́ bhi bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́twɔ̀ fakari, bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Acha, sɛ́nsɔ́t bɔakparɛnja bhɛsɛ sɛnu nɛ bǒbhɛn-ɛ?”
2250 Mmǔ wap amɔt agwɔp akparɛnja ywi. Akpɔ́t atú nsɛ̌m mǔngo bachiǎkap Mandɛm chwát agʉɛ́p amɨk.
2251 Kɛ Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Dɔ̌ ká nɔ!” Atɔk yɛ atú mmu wu, abu yi.
2252 Yesu abhɛ́p yɛ bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ bǒbati batɛmɛ́ nɛnu abhɛn bábhàbhɛri ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm nɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk abhɛn bátwɔ́ bɛkɛm yi bɛ, “Bǎtwɔ bɛkɛm mɛ nɛ bɔakparɛnja nɛ nkɨ́k mbɔ bɛ nchí chí ngɛ́bhɛ ntantaŋ?
2253 Mpok nchí nɛ bhe amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm nɛ́nji nɛnji, bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ kɛm mɛ. Kɛ mpok yɛka nɛ Satan, mfɔ ɛjuri, akway nɛ́nɛ.” 
2254 Bǒbhɔ bákɛ́m yɛ́ Yesu, bábhó bɛrɔŋ ndǔ ɛkɛt ɛnɛ mǔngo bachiǎkap Mandɛm. Píta are koŋo bhɔ ansɛm nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ.
2255 Bábháyti ngó nɛntɨ sɛnta. Bo báchɔ́kɔ nɛpaká ngó mángwaka nɔkɔ ngo. Píta achɔkɔ arɛ́ nɛ bhɔ.
2256 Ngɔrɛ́ bɛtok amɔt anɛ achi arɛ, aghɔ́ Píta nkwɔ arɛ́ chɔkɔ ndǔ ngo ághɔ̀ yi amʉɛt. Áyɨ́ŋɨ́ yi dǐǐ, arɛm bɛ, “Mɔ́nkwǎnɛ nkwɔ́ achi mbʉ nɛ Yesu.”
2257 Píta ataŋa, arɛm bɛ, “Mma, mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ yi.”
2258 Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, mmǔ achak aghɔ́ Píta arɛm bɛ, “Wɔ nkwɔ ɔchí mmǔ ywi amɔt.” Píta akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Cháá, mpú nɛ bhɔ”
2259 Ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔkɔ mbɔ nɛŋɔkɔ́ nywɔp nɛmɔt, mmǔ achak arɛm bɛ, “Tɛtɛp, mmǔ-nɛ nkwɔ́ achi mbʉ nɛ Yesu. Yi nkwɔ chi mmu Gálili.”
2260 Píta aghati yi bɛ, “Nkwǎnɛ, mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ wɔ ɔ́rɛ̀m!” Tɛ́mté wu, ɛnɛ́ yi ábhʉɛ́t bɛrɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m, nkɔk akók.
2261 Acha ayibhiri mmʉɛ́t ayɨŋɨ Píta. Amɨ́k ayap átɛ́mɛ́ri. Píta atɨk ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu ághátí yi bɛ, “Nkɔk apɛrɛ́ kók bɛti ɛbhɛn, chɔŋ ɔ́ndɛm ndɔŋ ɛrat bɛ ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mɛ.”
2262 Afú nɛfí, adi kɛbhɔ, nɛ bɛyǎ basɛ́mɛ́ antɨ. 
2263 Batɛmɛ́ nɛnu abhɛn bábhàbhɛri Yesu bábho bɛyɔkɔ yi nɛ mándɛnɛ nɔkɔ yi nɛ ɛ́kpá.
2264 Bágwɔ́t yi amɨ́k nkwɔ, mámbɛbhɛ nɔkɔ yi bɛ, “Wɔ mmu ɔ́chí ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ, ghatí bhɛsɛ! Agha ádɛ́bhɛ́ nɔ́ wɔ?”
2265 Bárɛ́m bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ bɛchak, mánso nɔkɔ yi nɛ nsɔk. 
2266 Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, bǒbati ɛtɔk, bǒ batí bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm bákɛ́m ɛchɛmɛ ɛghǒ yap. Básɔ́t Yesu barɔk arɛ́ nɛ yi.
2267 Bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ghatí bhɛsɛ, ɔchí Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò?” Akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mbák ngátí bhe bǎpú noko;
2268 nɛ mbák mbɛ́p bé ɛnyɨŋ, bapú kɛmɛ mɛ.
2269 Kɛ bɛ́bhó ɛchɔŋ, chɔŋ Mandɛm Bɛtaŋ Mɛnkɛm amfyɛ́ Mɛ Mmu mfú amfay nchɔkɔ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt bɛyǎ kɛnókó, ɛbhě awɔ́nɛm ɛyi.”
2270 Bɔ́ mankɛm babhɛp yi bɛ, “Nɔ́ ɔchí Mmɔ̌ Mandɛm-ɛ?” Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǎrɛ́mɛ́.”
2271 Bɔ́ bárɛ́m bɛ, “Sɛ́pɛ́t sɛ́yàŋ batísiɛ́ mántwɔ́ mándɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákʉ́ ndaká yí? Bɛsɛ́ babhɔŋ sɛ́ghok nɛ batú ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fú yi anyu.”
23
231 Nkwɔ́ bataŋá manyé bárɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, bɔ̌ mankɛm báfáte, básɔt Yesu báré rɔ́ŋ ntá Páílet nɛ yi.
232 Bábhó bɛbhat yi barak amʉɛt mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Sɛghɔ̌, mmǔ-nɛ ndu ákʉ̀ bɛ bǒ bhɛsɛ bákɛ́ bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé ɛtɔk. Ǎkàŋ nkwɔ bɛ́ bo bákɛ́ chyɛ nkábhɛ́nti ntá Sísa, Mfɔ Rom. Nɛ árɛ̀m bɛ yí achi Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò, nɔ́ chi bɛ achí Mfɔ.”
233 Páílet abhɛ́p yɛ Yesu bɛ, “Wɔ kɛ ɔ́chí nɛ́ Mfɔ bo Israɛl?” Akɛmɛ bɛ, “Ɛ́chí mbɔ ɛnyu ɔ́rɛ́mɛ́.”
234 Páílet arɛm yɛ ntá bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ ngɛ́mtay bo abhɛn bachi arɛ bɛ, “Mbɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ yɛ̌ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ nɛ mmǔ-nɛ.”
235 Kɛ bárɔ́k ambɨ bɛkɛmɛ bɛ, “Ǎkɔ̀ atú Judɛ́ya ankɛm antɔŋ nɔkɔ bho ndu mɛ́nyɨ́kɨ́si batɨ̌ yap amɛm bɛ mángʉ́ɛ́p ɛsɔŋɔri ɛtɔk. Akʉ nɔ́, bɛbho atú Gálili kpát bɛ́gháka fá Yerúsalɛm.” 
236 Páílet ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, abhɛ́p bhɔ mbák Yesu achi mmu atú Gálili.
237 Árɨ́ŋɨ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ Yesu afǔ atú ɛtɔk ɛnɛ Hɛ́rɔd achi mfɔ arɛ́, achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ mandɔk nɛ yi ntá Hɛ́rɔd. Mbɔŋ Hɛ́rɔd achi nyaka Yerúsalɛm mpok yɔ.
238 Hɛ́rɔd ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ Yesu, ábhɔ́ŋ maŋák tontó, mbɔnyunɛ anáŋ ǎghòk nyaka ɛ̌ti yi nɛ abhɔ́ŋ ɛkwak tɛntɛp bɛghɔ yi nɛ amɨ́k. Ǎbhàka nyaka ntɨ bɛ chɔŋ Yesu ankʉ ɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay yí angɔ́.
239 Ɛ́kʉ́ Hɛ́rɔd abhɛ́p Yesu bɛyǎ bɛbhɛp kɛ yɛ ɛ́mɔt Yesu ábhɨ́kɨ́ kɛmɛ.
2310 Ɛnɛ́ Hɛ́rɔd árɔ̀ŋ ambɨ bɛbhɛp yi bɛbhɛp, bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm báte kɛkwɔt, mámbat nɔkɔ yi barak amʉɛt nɛ bɛyǎ ɛ̌yu.
2311 Hɛ́rɔd nɛ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bhi báré byak yi, mámfyɛ nɔkɔ yí ɛtáŋɔk. Mámɛ́sɛ yi nkú kɛfɔ amʉɛt. Arɛm bɛ́ mánsɔ́t yí mámpɛtnsɛm ntá Páílet nɛ yi.
2312 Kɛmmʉɛrɛ Hɛ́rɔd nɛ Páílet kɛ́bho ndǔ nkúbhɛ́ nywɔp ɛnɔ. Ndǔ mpok anɛ áfʉɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm bachi nyaka chi ndǔ mpap. 
2313 Bápɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nsɛm ntá Páílet nɛ Yesu, Páílet ató bábhɨ́ŋɨ bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk nɛ bǒ ɛtɔk.
2314 Arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Bǎtwɔ̀ fá ntá ya nɛ mmǔ-nɛ bɛ ǎkʉ̀ bo bákɛ́ bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé ɛtɔk. Mbɛ̌p yi mɛnyɨŋ bɛsí bhɛka, nɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ́ yɛ̌ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ ɛbhě yi.
2315 Mfɔ Hɛ́rɔd nkwɔ́ abhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ yɛ̌ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ ɛbhě yi mbɔnyunɛ atǒ yi apɛtnsɛm ntá ya. Nchí ghati bhe bɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ yi abhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ mangway yi.
2316 Chɔŋ nchyɛ́ ɛyɔŋ bɛ mándɛ́n yi, mámfɛrɛ yi amɔ.” [Ɛpɨŋɨ́ bo Israɛl ɛ́chí nyaka bɛ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ bɔ́ mányìɛ̀ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ, Páílet abhɔŋ bɛ́fɛ́rɛ mmu amɔt anɛ bǒ Yerusalɛm báyàŋ yi amfɛrɛ ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ.]
2318 Bɔ́ mankɛm bábɨ́k mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Dɔ̌ mángwáy yi. Fɛrɛ́ bhɛsɛ chi Barábas!”
2319 Barábas chi mmu anɛ báfyɛ́ nyaka ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ ndǔ barak apay, “Agʉɛbhɛ́ nyaka ɛbyɔk ɛtɔk, nɛ awáy mmu.”
2320 Páílet apɛt arɛm kɛpɨ ntá yap nɛ nkaysi bɛ́fɛ́rɛ Yesu amɔ.
2321 Kɛ bárɔ́k ambɨ bɛbɨk bɛ, “Dɛm mángó yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí! Mángó yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí!”
2322 Ndǔ ndɔŋ anɛ ájwí ɛ́rát Páílet arɛm bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ ɛbɛ́ptí ndak yi ákʉ́? Mbɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ́ yɛ̌ ɛ́bɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákʉ́ ɛnɛ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ mángwáy yi. Chɔŋ nchyɛ́ ɛyɔŋ mándɛ́n yi nɛ ɛ́kpá, mámfɛrɛ yi amɔ.”
2323 Kɛ bárɔ́k ambɨ bɛkpɛmɛ, mambɨkɨ nɔkɔ bɛ Páílet andɔ mango yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí. Bǎri map anyiɛrɛ Páílet, awupsi ntɨ.
2324 Áká yɛ bɛ́ mánkʉ́ nɛ Yesu mbɔ ɛnyu bakɔŋɔ.
2325 Afɛrɛ Barábas mmu ágʉ́ɛbhɛ́ ɛbyɔk ɛtɔk nɛ awáy mmu, ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ, mbɔ ɛnyu bɔ báyàŋ. Achyɛ Yesu ntá bo Israɛl bɛ mánkʉ nɛ yi mbɔ ɛnyu bákɔ́ŋɔ́. 
2326 Batɛmɛ́ nɛnu básɔ́t Yesu báre rɔ́ŋ nɛ yi. Ndu bárɔ̀ŋ, bátɛ́mɛri mmǔ ɛtɔk Sírene amɔt anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Símun. Áfǔ nyaka ɛbhɨ ǎpɛtnsɛm anywɔ́p, Yerúsalɛm. Bákɛ́m yi bábáyti nɛ ɛko Yesu, bákʉ yi apɔkɔ yɔ́ ankoŋo nɔkɔ Yesu.
2327 Ngɛ́mtáy bhó báre koŋo Yesu ansɛm. Mbɔk yap bábhák baghɔrɛ́ abhɛn básɛ̀mɛ nyaka, mándi nɔkɔ yi.
2328 Kɛ Yesu ayibhiri mmʉɛt arɛm ntá baghɔrɛ́ bhɔ bɛ, “Baghɔrɛ Yerúsalɛm, bǎkɛ́ di mɛ! Dí ká chí mmʉɛt ɛyɛka nɛ bɔ̌bhɛka.
2329 Nchí ghati bhe bɛ mpok ǎtwɔ̀ anɛ bo bárɛ̀m chɔŋ bɛ, ‘Ɛ́rɨ ntá yɛntɨkɨ nkongɔrɛ́ nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ re bhé!’
2330 Ndǔ mpok yɔ, chɔŋ bo mándɛm ntá njiɛ ɛgho bɛ, ‘Kwɛ́n ká bay bhɛsɛ́’; nɛ ntá bɔ̌njiɛ bɛ, ‘Kutí ká bhɛsɛ.’
2331 Bo bárɛ̀m chɔŋ nɔ́, mbɔnyunɛ, mbák bákwày bɛ́kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ntá ya, Mmɛ mmu nchí ɛnɔk ɛbɨk, chɔŋ ɛ́mbak ná nɛ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́gú?”
2332 Ɛnɛ́ bárɔ̀ŋ nɔ, basɔt bakʉ̌ bɛbʉ́ bati apay nkwɔ abhɛn batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bárɔ̀ŋ nyaka bɛway nɛ Yesu.
2333 Bágháká nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ njiɛ anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ *Ɛ̌nkɔ́nti, bágó Yesu ndǔ ɛkotákátí. Bágó nkwɔ́ bakʉ̌ bɛbʉ́ bhɔ bati apay, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap ndǔ ɛyi ɛkotákátí, amɔt ɛbhě awɔ́nɛm Yesu, achák ɛbhě awɔ́ghɔ.
2334 Arɛ́, amfǎy ɛkotákátí, Yesu anɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm bɛ, “Ɛta, foŋorí bhɔ́, mbɔnyunɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bákʉ̀.” Batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bágʉɛp ɛbháŋá ndu bɛ́rɨŋɨ ɛnyu bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́kɔ́rɛ ndɛn Yesu.
2335 Bo bábhák arɛ́ tee mámkpɔkɔ nɔkɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fàkari. Kɛ bǒbati báré way yí way mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Ǎpɛ̀mɛ nyaka bo bachak! Ámpɛ́mɛ́ mmʉɛt ɛyi mbák achi Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò, Mmu Mandɛm Ayabhɛ!”
2336 Batɛmɛ́ nɛnu nkwɔ báré way Yesu, mándɔkɔ nɔkɔ bɛchyɛ yi mmɛ̌m amɛn ábáká.
2337 Nɛ mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Mbák tɛtɛp ɔchí Mfɔ bo Israɛl, pɛmɛ́ mmʉɛt ɛyɛ!”
2338 Amfay ntí Yesu, ɛbhɔ́kɛnɔk ɛbhak babhát ndǔ ɛko ɛnɛ básɨ́ŋɨ́ arɛ bɛ: “Nɛ́ chi Mfɔ bo Israɛl.”
2339 Nkʉ-bɛbʉ́ amɔt anɛ áchi nkwɔ́ kpaŋkpáŋ ndǔ ɛyǐ ɛkotákátí are way Yesu andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Pú wɔ kɛ ɔ́chí Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò? Pɛmɛ́ mmʉɛt ɛyɛ, ɔ́mpɛmɛ bhɛsɛ́ nkwɔ bhɔ!”
2340 Kɛ mmʉ̌ bɛbʉ́ achák wu are sayti yi bɛ, “Yɛ̌ndu ɔ́gù ndǔ ɛkotákátí mbɔ Yesu, ɔpú cháy Mandɛm-ɛ́?
2341 Wɔ nɛ mɛ sɛ́gù ɛ̌ti bɛpɔ̌ barak ayɛsɛ, kɛ mmǔ-nɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ yɛ̌ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ?”
2342 Arɛm yɛ bɛ, “Yesu, ghɔ́ mɛ ntínso, mpok ɔ́bhak Mfɔ.”
2343 Yesu aghati yí bɛ, “Nchí ghati wɔ bɛ, ɛchɔŋ, chɔŋ ɔ́mbak nɛ mɛ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt maŋák anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Párádis.”   
2344 Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ nkárɛ́nká byo nɛ ɛpay nɛ ngósí, mmok ánɛ́m, ɛjuri ɛ́kwɛn ɛkuti ɛtɔk ɛnkɛm kpátɛ nkárɛ́nká ɛ́rát beku,
2345 mbɔnyunɛ mmok ábhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ ghɔɔ. Nɛ ɛkát ɛnɛ ɛchi amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm ɛ́ghárɛ ndǔ bɛbhɔk bɛpay gbee.
2346 Yesu abɨk arɛm bɛ, “Ɛtaya, ndɔ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛna amɔ́ yɛ!” Árɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, asɛbhɛ.
2347 Mǔnti batɛmɛ́ nɛnu ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn bɛfakari, abɨti Mandɛm, andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Tɛtɛp, mmǔ-nɛ achí mbʉ chak bɛsí Mandɛm!”
2348 Ngɛ́mtay bo abhɛn báchɛ́mɛ́ nyaka arɛ ndu bɛghɔ, bághɔ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛfakari. Bágúrɛ nɛ basɛ́mɛ́, mámbyaka nɔkɔ amɔ antɨ.
2349 Bǒ mankɛm abhɛn bárɨ́ŋɨ́ Yesu, nɛ baghɔrɛ́ abhɛn bábhó bɛkoŋo yi tɛ Gálili, báté nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ mángɔ nɔkɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ. 
2350‑51 Mmǔ amɔt achí nyaka Yerúsalɛm mpok yɔ. Aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Josɛ́f. Achi nyaka mmǔ Arimátia, ɛtɔk bo Israɛl. Abhak ndɨ̌ndu nɛ mmǔ chak nɛ ǎnòŋ nyaka mpok anɛ Mandɛm abhak Mfɔ bho. Abhak mmǔ amɔt ndǔ ɛchɛmɛ ɛgho ɛnɛ bǒ batí ɛtɔk. Kɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ ka nyaka nɛ bhɔ ndǔ nkaysi yap nɛ nɛkʉ wap.
2352 Yí arɔk ntá Páílet bɛ́ ánchyɛ́ yi bɛtaŋ amfɛrɛ Yesu amfǎy ɛkotákátí. Páílet áchyɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yi bɛtaŋ,
2353 arɔk yɛ asɛbhɛ Yesu amɨk, anɛ́p yi nɛ ɛsyɛ̌ndɛn, arɔk afyɛ́ amɛm nnɛm ɛnɛ́n bátɛ́mɛ́ ndǔ sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́, kɛ kɛre bhɛmɛ yɛ̌ mmu arɛ́.
2354 Ɛ́chí nyaka chi nywɔp ɛnɛn bo bátòŋti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt, nɛ ɛ́rɔp chi mandú bɛgháká ndǔ mpok anɛ Nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt nɛ́bho.
2355 Baghɔrɛ abhɛn báfú nɛ Yesu tɛ Gálili, bákóŋo, baghɔ nnɛm, nɛ ɛnyǔ bábhʉ́rɛ́ mmʉɛt yi amɛm.
2356 Bápɛ́t yɛ nsɛm ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ báchɔ̀kɔ amɛm Yerúsalɛm. Bátóŋti bawɛt ɛrɨ́tí ɛriɛp amɛn báwati amʉɛt ngu. Nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ɛnap nɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́, báywěmʉɛt mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛbhé Moses ɛ́rɛ̀m.
24
241 Nɛ nɛyǐnwyɔp ndǔ Nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt, baghɔrɛ́ bhɔ básɔ́t bawɛrɛ́riɛp amɛn bɔ bághókó bárɔ́k ndǔ nnɛm Yesu nɛ nɛyǐnwyɔp.
