242 Bághɔ́ bɛ ntay ɛnɛn anyǔ nnɛm nɛ́rɔp chi nɛpaká nnɛm.
243 Báchwé amɛm nnɛm, kɛ bákɛ ghɔ mmʉɛt yi.
244 Ɛ́chá bhɔ ɛnyu bákʉ. Tɛ́mté wu, babhakanɛm bati apay nɛ ndɛn amʉɛt ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kɔ̀t ŋwaŋwǎŋwaŋ báté kɛkwɔt nɛ bhɔ.
245 Bɛcháy bɛ́kɛ́m baghɔrɛ́ bhɔ tontó. Bátɛ́p bati amɨk. Bǒ-bhɔ bábhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Ndaká yí báyàŋ mmu anɛ achi nɛpɛ́m ndǔ nkwɔ́ bawú?
246 Apú fá. Mandɛm akʉ yi apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi árɛ́mɛ́ nyaka bɛ ɛbhɔŋ bɛfakari. Twɔ́ ká ghɔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bábhʉ́rɛ́ yi. Tɨ́k ka ndǔ yi ágháti bhe mpok ábhʉɛ́t atú Gálili nɛ bhe.
247 Yi arɛm nyaka bɛ, chɔŋ mámfyɛ Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm amɔ́ bǒ bɛbʉ́, mángó yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí, nɛ ɛ́ghaka nɔkɔ manywɔp arat, ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.”
248 Baghɔrɛ́ bhɔ bátɨk yɛ bɛyɔŋ Yesu.
249 Bápɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nsɛm, bágháti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛfakari ntá bǒnto Yesu bati byo nɛ amɔt nɛ bakoŋo bhi abhɛ́nɛ́fú mankɛm.
2410 Baghɔrɛ́ abhɛn bághátí nyaka bǒnto Yesu mbok yɔ chi María anɛ áfú ɛtɔk Mágdala, nɛ Joana, nɛ María nnɔ Jems, nɛ baghɔrɛ́ báchák abhɛn báchi nyaka nɛ bhɔ.
2411 Kɛ bǒnto básɔ́t ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ baghɔrɛ́ bhɔ bárɛ́mɛ́ mbɔ ɛráká ndak, bɔ́ kɛnókó wáwák.
2412 Yɛ̌ nɔ́, Píta afate, ajɛt arɔk ndǔ nnɛm. Ákúrí nɔ́kɔ́, agʉɛp amɨ́k, ayɨŋɨ amɛm nnɛm. Aghɔ́ bɛbhɔ́kɔ́ ndɛn ɛbhɛn mánɛ́bhɛ́ nyaka mmʉɛt Yesu nɛ bhɔ bhʉ́rɛ́. Apɛtnsɛm anywɔ́p, amakati nɔkɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́nɛ́ ɛ́fákárí. 
2413 Nkúbhɛ́ ɛwak ɛyɔ, bakoŋo Yesu bati apay báfá Yerúsalɛm bare rɔŋ ndu mɔ́tɔk anɛ bábhìŋɨ bɛ Ɛmayus, nɛkɔ̌ ɛnɛn nɛchi mbɔ bɔkilɔ́mɛta nɛ́nɛnamɔt nɛ ɛbhɔ́k.
2414 Mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn bɛ́fákárí.
2415 Ɛnɛ́ bárɛ̀m mánkɛm nɔkɔ ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ batɨ, mbɔŋ Yesu arɔk kɛkwɔt nɛ bhɔ ankɔ nɔkɔ nɛ bhɔ.
2416 Kɛ ɛ́bhák mbɔ bɛ́ bágwɔt amɨ́k ayap. Bɔ́ kɛrɨŋɨ bɛ́ chí Yesu.
2417 Abhɛ́p bhɔ́ bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ ndak bǎkɔ̀ mǎndɛmɛ nɔkɔ ɛnyunɛ?” Báté nsónso.
2418 Mmu wap amɔt anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Klópas abhɛ́p yɛ yi bɛ, “Ndiɛrɛ wɔ kɛ ɔ́chí kɛnkɔ̌ anɛ átwɔ́ Yerúsalɛm anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛfakari arɛ́ ndǔ manywɔbhɛ́-nɛ?”
2419 Abhɛ́p bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ mɛnyɨŋ?” Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fákárí nɛ Yesu anɛ Násárɛt. Achi nyaka ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm, nɛ atɔ́ŋ bɛsí bho nɛ bɛsí Mandɛm bɛ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm bɛchi nɛ yi ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi árɛ̀m nɛ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ̀.
2420 Kɛ bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ bǒ batí ɛtɔk abhɛsɛ bákɛ́m yi bachyɛ mangway, nɛ bágó yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí.
2421 Sɛ́bhaka nyaka ntɨ bɛ yí kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́fɛ́rɛ bo Israɛl ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri. Ɛ́chí nɛ́nɛ manywɔp arat ɛnɛ́ ndak anɛ́ áfákárí.
2422 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́chák ɛ́chí bɛ́ mbɔk baghɔrɛ́ ndǔ nkwɔ ywɛsɛ bákʉ batí átaka bhɛsɛ amɛm. Bárɔ́k ndǔ nnɛm běti bheti,
2423 kɛ bákɛ ghɔ Yesu. Bápɛtnsɛm barɛm bɛ bághɔ̌ bo mbɔ bɔángɛl Mandɛm ndǔ kɛnɔ́ amɨ́k antifú abhɛn bághátí bhɔ bɛ Yesu achi nɛpɛ́m.
2424 Mbɔk bo abhɛn báchí nyaka ndǔ nkwɔ́ ywɛsɛ bárɔ́k ndǔ nnɛm bághɔ́ bɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛchi nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ baghɔrɛ́ bhɔ bárɛ́mɛ́, kɛ bɔ́ kɛghɔ́ mbɔŋ Yesu.”
2425 Afɔ̌ kɛ Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ ntá yap bɛ, “Bǎchɨŋti bǎcha! Nɛ batɨ̌ yɛka ápú wakari mɛ́nóko mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ bárɛmɛ!
2426 Pú Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò, abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛghɔ bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm kɛ anchwe ndǔ kɛfɔ ɛki?”
2427 Yesu abho yɛ mɛnɛnɛ ntá yap bɛ manjwimɛm ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn básɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛ̌ti yi amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm, bɛ́bho ndǔ Basɨŋɨ Moses bɛrɔ́ŋ bɛghaka ndǔ amɛn barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm mankɛm.
2428 Bágháká kɛkwɔt ɛtɔk ɛnɛ bárɔ̀ŋ, Yesu akʉ mbɔ bɛ ǎrɔ̀ bhɔ bɛrɔŋ ambɨ.
2429 Kɛ bájwɛ́ yi, barɛm bɛ, “Bʉrɛ́ nɛ bhɛsɛ. Nywɔp nɛ́rɔŋ nɛ mbaŋ anaŋ ǎgiri.” Arɔk yɛ bɛbhʉrɛ nɛ bhɔ.
2430 Mpok nɛnyíɛ́ ákwáy nɔ́kɔ́, asɔt ɛkpɔkɔ́ brɛt. Áchyɛ́ bakak ntá Mandɛm. Abho yɛ bɛ́bɔ́kɔ́ti anchyɛ nɔkɔ ntá yap.
2431 Amɨ́k ánɛ́nɛ bhɔ, bárɨ́ŋɨ yɛ bɛ chi yi. Kɛ anɛmsi bhɔ́ bɛsí.
2432 Babho bɛrɛm nɛ batɨ bɛ, “Nyakányɛt maŋák achi mbʉ bhɛsɛ antɨ mpok yi árɛ̀m kɛpɨ nɛ bhɛsɛ ambi, anɛnɛ nɔkɔ basɨŋ ntá yɛsɛ!”
2433 Báfáte tɛ́mté bápɛtnsɛm Yerúsalɛm. Bághɔ́ bǒnto Yesu bati byo nɛ amɔt nɛ bakoŋo bhi abhɛ́nɛ́fú abhɛn báchí nɛ bhɔ́ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt amɔt.
2434 Nɛchwe báchwé, bágháti bhɔ bɛ, “Acha apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m tɛtɛp! Atɔ̌ŋ mmʉɛt ntá Símun!”
2435 Bǒbhɔ bati apay bágháti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛfakari ambi, nɛ ɛnyu bɔ́ bárɨ́ŋɨ́ yi mpok yi abɔkɔti brɛt achyɛ bhɔ manyíɛ́.
2436 Ɛnɛ́ bárɛ̀m nɔ ɛ̌ti yi, mbɔŋ Yesu abhesi bɛsí bhap! Arɛm bɛ, “Kpák ámbák nɛ bhe.”
2437 Bácháyti, nɛ bɛcháy bɛ́kɛ́m bhɔ. Bákáysi bɛ bághɔ̀ nɔ chi ɛfóŋó ngu.
2438 Kɛ abhɛ́p bhɔ́ bɛ, “Bǎcháy yi? Yi mǎmàkati amɛm batɨ yɛka?
2439 Ghɔ́ ká amɔ ya nɛ bɛkak ɛbha, mǎndɨŋɨ bɛ chi mɛ tɛtɛp. Mɔ́ ká mmʉɛ́t ya mǎngɔ bɛ chi mɛ. Ɛfóŋó ɛ́pú bhɔŋ mmʉɛt nɛ bɛghɛp mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǎghɔ́ bɛ mbɔŋ.”
2440 Arɛm nɔkɔ nɔ, atɔ́ŋ bɔ́ amɔ yi nɛ bɛkak.
2441 Bábhɔ́ŋ maŋák tontó nɛ babhak maknkay bɛ yi achi nɛpɛ́m. Ɛkʉ bɔ́ kɛnókó bɛ ɛchi tɛtɛp. Yesu abhɛ́p bɔ́ bɛ, “Bǎbhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ mɛnyiɛ fá?”
2442 Báchyɛ yi mbɨŋɨ́ nsi anɛ bágwɔ́.
2443 Asɔt anyiɛ́ bɛsí bhap.
2444 Aghati yɛ bhɔ́ bɛ, “Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎghɔ̀-nɛ́, chí nkúbhɛ́ barak anɛ mɛ̌ghàti nyaka bhe mpok mbʉɛt nɛ bhe. Mɛ̌ghàti nyaka be bɛ, mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn bɛ́chi amɛm basɨŋɨ́ Moses nɛ amɛn abhɛn bɛchi ndǔ basɨŋɨ́ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ nɛ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chí amɛm Ɛkáti Bakway ɛ̌ti ya, bɛ́bhɔŋ bɛfu tɛtɛp.”
2445 Anɛnɛ yɛ nkaysi yap bɛ mánjwimɛm ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn básɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm.
2446 Aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Básɨŋ bɛ, Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò abhɔŋ bɛ́ghɔ ɛsɔŋɔri, angú, nɛ bɛghaka manywɔp árát, ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
2447 Nɛ bɛ bábhɔŋ bɛghati bǒ bɛtɔk mɛnkɛm ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛni bɛbho Yerúsalɛm bɛ Mandɛm ǎfòŋori bo abhɛn bátɨ́knsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap.
2448 Bǎchí batísiɛ́ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm nɛ bǎbhɔŋ bɛ́gháti bo bachak bɔ mɛnkɛm.
2449 Ghɔ́ ka, chɔŋ nto be akap anɛ Ɛtaya afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛ ǎtò ntá yɛka. Kɛ bǎbhɔŋ mɛ́noŋ fá amɛm ɛtɔk kpátɛ bɛtaŋ mɛ́mfu amfay mɛ́mbak nɛ bhe.” 
2450 Yesu asɔt yɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi, afú ɛtɔk nɛ bhɔ. Bárɔ́k bachwɔp ɛtɔk Bɛ́tani. Arɛ́, ayoŋ amɔ amfay, are yɛt bhɔ.
2451 Ɛnɛ́ yi áyɛ̀t bhɔ, arɔ bhɔ́, Mandɛm asɔt yi ámpɛ́tnsɛm amfay.
2452 Nɛ ndǔ yi ákò baghɔkɔ́ bhi báré chyɛ yi kɛnókó. Bápɛ́t yɛ nsɛm Yerúsalɛm nɛ bɛyǎ maŋák.
2453 Báre rɔ́ŋ ɛkɛrákap mámbɨti nɔkɔ Mandɛm.24
1
11 Bápɛ́rɛ ghoko mmɨk, mmu anɛ achi Ɛyɔŋ anáŋ achi nyaka. Abhak nɛ Mandɛm, nɛ abhak Mandɛm.
12 Abhak nɛ Mandɛm tɛ ndǔ nɛbhǒnɛt.
13 Mandɛm afʉɛ́t ntá yi kɛ ǎghoko mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm. Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ ghoko yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi apu nɛ yi.
14 Nɛpɛ́m nɛ́fù chí ntá yi mmu bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Ɛyɔŋ. Nɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛ́bhak ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kʉ̀ bo mángɔ́ tɛtɛp.
15 Ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ yɔ ɛ́ghɔ̀ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ ɛjuri ɛchi, nɛ ɛjuri ɛ́pú kway mɛnɛmɛ yɔ.
16 Mandɛm atǒ nyaka mmu amɔt anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Jɔ̌n.
17 Atwɔ́ bɛ́gháti bho ɛ̌ti ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛyɔ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ághókó ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m, anoko yɔ.
18 Jɔ̌n apu nyaka ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ yɔ. Atwɔ́ chí bɛ́gháti bho ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi arɨŋɨ ɛ̌ti ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ yɔ.
19 Ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛnɛ tɛtɛp, ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kʉ̀ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu angɔ mbaŋ ɛ́twɔ́ ntá bǒ mmɨk.
110 Ɛyɔŋ ɛ́bhak fá amɨk, nɛ báfʉ́ɛ́t ntá yi kɛ bághoko mmɨk. Yɛ̌ nɔ, mpok yi átwɔ́ fá amɨk, bǒ mmɨk kɛrɨŋɨ ɛnyu mmu yi achi.
111 Atwɔ́ ntá bǒbhi, kɛ bǒbhi bábhɨ́kɨ́ sɔt yi nɛ maŋák.
112 Kɛ bo mankɛm abhɛn básɔ́rɛ́ yí nɛ maŋák, básɨ́kɨ ntɨ nɛ yi, ǎchyɛ bhɔ bɛtaŋ bɛ́ mándɔp chí bɔ Mandɛm.
113 Mbɔŋ Mandɛm kɛ ákʉ̀ bɔ mambak bǒbhi. Bábhɨ́kɨ́ fu nyaka yɛ chi amʉɛt nkwǎ, nɛ yɛ̌ chi ndǔ nkaysi nkwǎŋwaŋ.
114 Ɛyɔŋ, ɛ́yíbhiri nkwǎ, atwɔ́ achɔkɔ nɛ bhɛsɛ. Sɛ́ghɔ́ mɛnwɔp ɛbhi ɛbhɛn bɛjwi nɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu nɛ tɛtɛp. Ɛyɔŋ chi Njaŋamɔ anɛ áfú ntá Ɛta.
115 Jɔ̌n ǎghàti nyaka bho ɛ̌ti yi ambɨk, andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Nɛ́ chi mmǔ anɛ mɛ́rɛ̀m nyaka ɛ̌ti yi bɛ, ‘Mmǔ anɛ átwɔ̀ mɛ ansɛm achá mɛ. Bápɛ́rɛ bhe mɛ, yí achi.’”
116 Ɛ̌ti bɛyǎ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi, achyɛ́ bhɛsɛ áfɔ́k ndɔŋ nɛ ndɔŋ.
117 Mandɛm afʉɛt nyaka ntá Moses achyɛ bho bɛbhé. Kɛ afʉɛt chi ntá Yesu Kristo kɛ ǎtɔŋ bhɛsɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu bhi nɛ tɛtɛp.
118 Yɛ̌ mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ re ghɔ Mandɛm. Njaŋamɔ ywi mmu achi nɛbhʉɛt amɔt nɛ yi kɛ ákʉ́ bo mandɨŋɨ mmu yi achi. 
119 Ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, bǒbati bo Israɛl abhɛn Yerúsalɛm bátó bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ bǒnɛrɛ́kɛt Lɛ́vi ntá Jɔ̌n bɛ mámbɛ́p yi angati bhɔ ɛnyǔ mmu yi achi. Nɛ chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fú Jɔ̌n anyu mbɔ ntísiɛ.
120 Yi kɛ bhɛsɛ bhɔ yɛ̌nyɨŋ nɛ yi kɛ rɔ bɛkɛmɛ bhɔ. Arɛm bɛ, “Puyɛ̌ mɛ kɛ nchí Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò.”
121 Bǒ bhɔ bápɛt bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Wɔ ɔchí yɛ́ agha? Ɛláija kɛ?” Jɔ̌n yi bɛ, “Mpú Ɛláija.” Bápɛ́t babhɛp yi bɛ, “Ɔchí ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ anɛ Moses árɛ́mɛ́ nyaka bɛ ǎtwɔ̀?” Akɛmɛ bɛ, “Ǎe.”
122 Ndɔŋ ɛyɔ bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Wɔmbɔ̌ŋ ɔrɛm bɛ ɔchí agha? Ghatí bhɛsɛ mmu wɔ ɔchí bɛ́ sɛ́mpɛ́tnsɛm nɛ ɛyɔŋ ntá bo abhɛn bátó bhɛsɛ. Wɔmbɔ̌ŋ ɔchí agha?”
123 Jɔ̌n aghati bhɔ mbɔnyǔ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Asaya arɛmɛ nyaka bɛ, “Nchí mmǔ anɛ achi amɛm baso ábɨ̀k nɛ ɛyɔŋ amfay andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, ‘Nyabhɛ́ ká mbi Acha ambak chak.’”
124 Bǒnkwɔ Fárisi kɛ bátó nyaka bǒbhɔ ntá Jɔ̌n.
125 Bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ɔbhɛ́ ɔpú Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò, ɔbhɛ́ ɔpú Ɛláija, nɛ ɔpú ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ, kɛ ndaká yí ɔ́jwìti bho?”
126 Jɔ̌n akɛmɛ bhɔ́ bɛ, “Mɛ̌jwìti bho nɛ manyiɛp, kɛ mmu áchí fá téé nɛntɨ ɛnɛka anɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ.
127 Yi ǎtwɔ̀ mɛ ansɛm. Mbɨ́kɨ́ kway mmu anɛ nchí kaŋari nkwɔbhɛ́nya bɛkak ɛbhi.”
128 Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fákárí chi ɛtɔk Bɛ́tani, ɛbhě Nyɛ́n Jɔ́dan, nɛ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ Jɔ̌n ájwìti nyaka bho. 
129 Ntɨ nywɔp, Jɔ̌n aghɔ Yesu ndu átwɔ̀ ntá yi, arɛm bɛ, “Yɨŋɨ́ Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n Mandɛm anɛ ápɔ̀kɔ bɛbʉ́ bo mankɛm fá amɨk!
130 Yí kɛ mɛ̌rɛ̀m nyaka ɛ̌ti yi bɛ, ‘Mmǔ ǎtwɔ̀ mɛ ansɛm anɛ acha mɛ mbɔnyunɛ bápɛrɛ bhe mɛ, yi achi.’
131 Yɛ̌ mɛmbɔŋ mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ nyaka bɛ chi yí, kɛ ntí anɛ ntwɔ́ njwiti nɔkɔ bho nɛ manyiɛp chí ndu bɛkʉ bo Israɛl mandɨŋɨ mmu yi achi.”
132 Jɔ̌n abho bɛghati bho ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ághɔ́ nɛ amɨ́k ɛ̌ti Yesu. Yí bɛ, “Ngɔ ndǔ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm áfú amfay asɔt mkpá ɛbhóŋó are sɛp kpát ate yi amʉɛt.
133 Kpátɛ mpok ɛyɔ, nkɛ rɨŋɨ bɛ́ chí yí. Kɛ Mandɛm mmu átó mɛ njwiti bho nɛ manyiɛp, anáŋ aghati nyaka mɛ bɛ, ‘Mmu anɛ ɔ́ghɔ́ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm asɛbhɛ arɔp nɛ yi, yí wu kɛ achi mmu anɛ ájwìti bho nɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ.’
134 Mɛ Jɔ̌n ngɔ nɛ amɨ́k ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fákárí, nɛ nchí rɛm mbɔ ntísiɛ bɛ tɛtɛp mmǔ-nɛ chi Mmɔ Mandɛm.” 
135 Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, Jɔ̌n apɛt abhak téé nɛ bakoŋo bhi bati apay.
136 Aghɔ́ ndǔ Yesu áfʉɛ̀t, arɛm bɛ, “Ghɔ́ Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n Mandɛm!”
137 Bakoŋó Jɔ̌n bati apay bághók nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́, bárɔ́ yi bábho bɛkoŋo Yesu.
138 Yesu ayibhiri mmʉɛt aghɔ bhɔ ndu bákòŋo yi. Abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎyàŋ yi?” Bákɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Rábay, ɔ̌chɔkɔ fá?” [Rábay chi Ntɔŋ]
139 Aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Twɔ́ ká ghɔ.” Bárɔ́k nɛ Yesu baghɔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yi áchɔ̀kɔ. Mpok yɔ nywɔp nɛ́bhák mbɔ nkárɛ́nká ɛnwi ɛnɛ́ ngósí. Bábhák nɛ yi kpátɛ̌ bɛti bɛgʉ.
140 Mmu amɔt ndǔ bǒbhɔ bati apay abhɛn bághoko nyaka ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Jɔ̌n árɛ́mɛ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu, nɛ abho bɛkoŋo yi aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Andru. Abhak manɔ Símun Píta.
141 Arɔk tɛ́mté, aghɔ mɔ́mayi Símun, aghati yi bɛ, “Sɛ́ghɔ mmu anɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ, ‘Mɛsáya’”, nɔ chi, Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò.
142 Andru asɔt Símun arɔk ntá Yesu nɛ yi. Yesu ayɨŋɨ yí, arɛm bɛ, “Wɔ ɔchí Símun, mmɔ̌ Jɔ̌n. Chɔŋ nnyɛ́n ɛna nɛ́chák nɛ́mbak bɛ Sɛ́fas” [nɔ chí Sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́]. 
143 Ntɨ nywɔp, Yesu akʉ ntɨ bɛ́rɔŋ atú Gálili. Arɔk aghɔ́ mmu anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Fílip. Aghati yi bɛ, “Twɔ́ bhák nkoŋo wa.”
144 Fílip abhak mmǔ Bɛtsáida, nkúbhɛ́ ɛtɔk ɛnɛ Andru nɛ Píta báfú arɛ́.
145 Fílip arɔk atɛmɛri Natániɛl aghati yi bɛ, “Sɛ́ghɔ̌ mmu anɛ Moses ásɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka ɛ̌ti yi amɛm Ɛkáti Bɛbhé Mandɛm, nkúbhɛ́ yi mmǔ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ nkwɔ básɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛ̌ti yi. Nɔ chi, Yesu mmu Násárɛt, mmɔ̌ Josɛ́f.”
146 Natániɛl ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Fílip árɛ́mɛ́ abhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ ɛrɨ́tí ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́kway bɛfu Násárɛt?” Fílip aghati yi bɛ, “Wɔmbɔŋ twɔ́ ghɔ́.”
147 Yesu ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ Natániɛl átwɔ̀ ntá yi, arɛm ɛ̌ti yi bɛ, “Nɛ́, chi mbɔ̌ŋ mmǔ Israɛl tɛ́mɛ́ tɛ́mɛ́. Bapu apú nɛ yi wáwák.”
148 Natániɛl abhɛ́p Yesu bɛ, “Ɔkʉ ná kɛ ɔ̌rɨŋɨ mɛ?” Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Fílip ápɛ́rɛ bhɨŋɨ wɔ ndǔ mpok anɛ ɔ́chí anɛrɛ́nɔk fig, nnáŋ ngɔ wɔ.”
149 Natániɛl arɛm bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, ɔchí Mmɔ Mandɛm tɛtɛp! Ɔchí Mfɔ bo Israɛl!”
150 Yesu ákɛ́mɛ́ yí bɛ, “Ɛ̌ti ndɛ́mɛ́ bɛ́ ngɔ wɔ anɛrɛ́nɔk fig kɛ ɔ́nókó bɛ́ nchí Mmɔ Mandɛm? Chɔŋ ɔ́ngɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛcha ɛbhɛn.”
151 Yesu aghati yi bɛ, “Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, chɔŋ mǎngɔ ndǔ nɛbu nɛ́nɛnɛ gbee, bɔángɛl Mandɛm mánkó amfay mánsɛbhɛ nɔkɔ amɨk bɛtɛmɛri Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm.”
2
21 Ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ manywɔp apay, ɛpǎ nɛbhay ɛ́bhák amɛm ɛtɔk Kána, atú Gálili. Nnɔ Yesu abhak arɛ́.
22 Mának nyaka Yesu nkwɔ́ nɛ bakoŋo bhi ndǔ ɛpǎ nɛbhay ɛyɔ.
23 Mmɛ́m ámáy nɔ́kɔ́, nnɔ Yesu arɔk aghati yi bɛ, “Mmɛ́m ɛpǎ amay.”
24 Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Mmá, ndaká yí ɔ́sɔŋɔri mɛ ɛ̌ti mmɛ́m? Mpok aya abhɨ́kɨ́ re kway.”
25 Máyi aghati bo abhɛn bákɔ̀rɛ mmɛm bɛ, “Kʉ ka yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yí ághàti bhe.”
26 Bɛjɔ̌ manyiɛp bɛtandat bɛchi nyaka arɛ téé. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛjɔ ɛ́sɔ̀t nyaka mbɔ líta manyiɛp bɛsǎ byo. Bɛ́kóŋo ɛpɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bo Israɛl, básɔ̀t nyaka manyiɛp ndǔ bɛjɔ ɛbhɔ ndu bɛ́so bɛ́pókó mmʉɛt.
27 Yesu aghati bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk bɛ, “Fíɛ́ ká manyiɛp amɛm bɛjɔ ɛbhɔ kpát mɛ́njwi.” Báfyɛ́ manyiɛp amɛm bɛjɔ, bɛ́jwí tɛ anyu.
28 Aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Sɔt ka mbɔk mǎnchyɛ́ ntá mǔnti ɛpǎ nɛbhay”. Bákʉ́ nɔ́.
29 mǔnti ɛpǎ nɛbhay ághókótí nɔ́kɔ́, aghɔ́ bɛ́ manyiɛp mɔ arɔp chi mmɛ́m. Yi kɛrɨŋɨ ɛbhak mɔ́ áfú, yɛ̌ndu bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk abhɛn bákò mɔ bárɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka bɛ manyiɛp kɛ ayibhiri ndǔ mmɛm. Mǔnti ɛpǎ nɛbhay abhɨŋɨ mbǎyngɔrɛ́,
210 arɛm bɛ, “Ndǔ ɛpa, báyambɨ mantwɔ chi nɛ ɛrɨ́tí mmɛ́m. Nɛ bo mǎnáŋ mányú ánchwé bhɔ amʉɛt, kɛ mántwɔ nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ mmɛ́m báchák. Kɛ ɔrɔ́ ɛrɨ́tí mmɛ́m ansɛm, nɛ nɛ́nɛ kɛ ɔ́twɔ̀ nɛ mɔ́.”
211 Yesu akʉ nyaka ɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛnɛ amɛm ɛtɔk Kána, atú Gálili. Ɛ́bhák ɛrɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mbɨ ɛnɛ yi akʉ́ ndu bɛtɔŋ ɛnyǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́. Ɛ́kʉ́, bakoŋo bhi mánóko bɛ yi achi Mmɔ Mandɛm.
212 Ɛpǎ nɛbhay ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, Yesu asɛp arɔk Kapɛ̌naum nɛ máyi nɛ bɔ̌mayi nɛ bakoŋo bhi. Bábhak arɛ́ ndǔ mpay manywɔp. 
213 Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ ɛnɛ bo Israɛl ɛ́rɔ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ kɛ́kwɔ́t, Yesu akó, arɔk Yerúsalɛm ndu mɛnyiɛ ɛpǎ ɛyɔ.
214 Arɛ́, arɔk achwe amɛm ɛ́kírí ɛnɛ ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm. Aghɔ́ bo abhɛn bátì mpɔŋ nɛ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n nɛ bɛbhóŋó. Bo básɔ̀t nyaka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ ndu bɛchyɛ akap. Aghɔ́ bawupsǐ bakap nkwɔ arɛ́.
215 Asɔt nnɨk aghoko ɛ́kpá, abho bɛ́bok bho nɛ yɔ, bɛ mámfú amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm. Akʉ ɛnyumɔt nɛ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n, nɛ mpɔŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chí arɛ́. Atakati bɛ́fɛ́mɛ́ bo abhɛn bákɔ̀ ɛsiɛ́ bakáp bɛwupsi, nɛ atakati bakáp ayap.
216 Aghati batǐ bɛbhóŋó bɛ, “Fɛrɛ́ ká mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn fá! Bǎkɛ́ sɔt ɛkɛt Ɛtaya mǎnjibhiri ndǔ ɛkɛrɛ́siɛ!”
217 Ndak awu ákʉ́ bakoŋo bhi bátɨk bɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Chɔŋ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ́ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ ɛkɛt ɛyɛ ɛ́ngway mɛ.”
218 Bɛ́kóŋo ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu ákʉ́, bo Israɛl bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɔ́kway bɛkʉ mbɔ ɛrɨŋ ndu bɛtɔŋ bhɛsɛ bɛ ɔbhɔ̌ŋ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn?”
219 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mbák mǎnchɔ́ŋtí ɛkɛrákap ɛnɛ, chɔŋ mpɛt nte yɔ́ ndǔ manywɔp arat.”
220 Bo Israɛl bárɛ́m bɛ, “Cháá, báté ɛkɛt ɛnɛ ndǔ mamiɛ́ bɛsa bɛpay nsɛm atandat, ɔbhɛ́ ɔ̌kway bɛte yɔ ndǔ manywɔp ararɛ?”
221 Kɛ ɛkɛrákap ɛnɛ́ Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ ɛ́bhak chi mmʉɛt yi.
222 Mpok Mandɛm akʉ yi ámpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, kɛ̌ bakoŋo bhi bátɨk bɛ yi arɛm nyaka bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn. Ɛ́kʉ́ bɔ mánóko mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm nɛ ɛbhɛn Yesu árɛ́mɛ́. 
223 Ɛnɛ́ Yesu áchí Yerúsalɛm ndǔ mpok Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ, bɛyǎ bo básɨ́kɨntɨ nɛ yi ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛn bághɔ́ yi ákú.
224 Kɛ Yesu kɛgʉɛ́p mmʉɛt ntá yap, mbɔnyunɛ, arɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka ɛnyǔ nkwǎŋwaŋ achi.
225 Yɛ̌ mmu kɛghati yi nkaysi bǒbhɔ mbɔnyunɛ yímbɔŋ arɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka ndǔ ntɨ̌ nkwǎ nɛchi amɛm.
3
31 Mǔnti bo Israɛl amɔt achi nyaka. Aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Nikɔdɛ́mɔs. Abhak mǔnkwɔ Fárisi.
32 Ɛwak ɛ́mɔt arɔk ntá Yesu nɛ bɛti arɛm bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ Mandɛm kɛ̌ átó wɔ bɛ ɔ́ntwɔ́ ɔ́ntɔ́ŋ bo mbɔnyunɛ yɛ̌ mmu apú kway bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛn ɔ́kʉ̀ mbák Mandɛm apu nɛ yi.”
33 Yesu aghati yi bɛ, “Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, Mandɛm apú kway bɛbhak ntá mmu mbɔ Mfɔ ywi, kpátɛ mámbe yi ndɔŋ achak.”
34 Nikɔdɛ́mɔs abhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ná bákway bɛbhe mmu anɛ ánáŋ áchɨ́kɨ́? Ǎkway bɛ́pɛ́tnsɛm amɛm mɛniɛ máyi bɛ mámbé yi ndɔŋ achak kɛ?”
35 Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, Mandɛm apú kwáy bɛbhak ntá mmu mbɔ Mfɔ ywi kpátɛ mámbé yi nɛ manyiɛp* nɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm.
36 Nɛbhě ɛnɛn nkwǎ chi nɛbhě nkwɔmʉɛt, kɛ nɛbhě Ɛfóŋó chí ɛnɛn nɛ́fú ntá Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm.
37 Ɔ́kɛ́ bhák maknkay ndu ngátí wɔ bɛ, ‘Bábhɔŋ bɛbhe wɔ ndɔŋ achak.’
38 Mbʉ́ɛ́p áfòk, ándɔk ɛbhak ɛnɛ wu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́rɔŋ. Ɔ̌ghok ndu wu áfʉɛ̀t kɛ ɔpú rɨŋɨ ɛbhak wu áfú nɛ ɛbhak ɛnɛ wú árɔ̀ŋ. Ɛ́chí ɛnyumɔt nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ bábhé yi ndu bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ.”
39 Nikɔdɛ́mɔs abhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ɛyɔ ɛkway bɛ́fàkari ná?”
310 Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Ɔchí ntɔŋ ntá bo Israɛl anɛ bo bárɨŋɨ sayri, yɛ̌ nɔ ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n-ɛ?
311 Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, sɛ́rɛ̀m mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́, nɛ sɛ́ghàti bho chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́ghɔ́ nɛ amɨ́k, yɛ̌ nɔ bǎpú noko mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́ghàti bhe.
312 Mbák ngátí bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti barak anɛ́ áfàkari fá amɨk be kɛnókó, ná bǎkwáy mɛnoko mbák ngátí bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti barak anɛ áfàkari awu amfay?
313 Yɛ̌ mmu amɔt ábhɨ́kɨ́ re ko amfay ɛbhak ɛnɛ Mandɛm achi, ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ fʉɛt Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm, yi mmu áfú amfay atwɔ amɨk.
314 Nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Moses ásɔ́rɛ́ nyaka nnyɔ́-sɛnɔŋ abhat ndǔ ɛnɔk, ayoŋ amfay, amɛm baso, ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ̌ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛyoŋ Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm nkwɔ amfay.
315 Bábhɔŋ bɛkpaŋ yi amfay ɛnɔk bɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ anoko yi, ámbɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
316 “Mandɛm akɔŋ nyaka bǒ mmɨk tontó, kpát achyɛ Njaŋá Mɔ́ywi bɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ánókó yi, ákɛ́ gu ánɛ́m, kɛ ámbɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛ́nti.
317 Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ to Mɔ̌ywi fá amɨk bɛ ántwɔ́ ántáŋ bǒ mmɨk andɛm bɛ babhɔŋ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́. Atǒ yí chi bɛ́ ámfʉɛ́t ntá yi, ampɛmɛ bǒ mmɨk.
318 Bápú tɛmsi mmu anɛ ánókó yi, kɛ mmu anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ ka mɛnoko, bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛchi nɛ yi mbɔnyunɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ ka mɛnoko Njaŋa-Mɔ Mandɛm.
319 Ntí anɛ Mandɛm átàŋ bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko Mɔ́ywi chi bɛ́ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛ́twɔ fá amɨk kɛ bo bákɔŋ ɛjuri bácha ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́, mbɔnyunɛ barak abʉ́abʉ kɛ bɔ bákʉ̀.
320 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ barak abʉ́abʉ ǎpap ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́. Apú rɔŋ ɛbhak ɛnɛ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛchi ndǔ ápú yaŋ bo mangɔ mɛnyɨŋ yi ákʉ̀.
321 Kɛ mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi tɛtɛp ǎtwɔ ndǔ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ maŋák, bɛ bo mangɔ bɛ Mandɛm kɛ ákwak yi ankʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ.” 
322 Yesu ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́rɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ yi ághàti Nikɔdɛ́mɔs, arɔk bɛbhak bɛchak atú Judɛ́ya nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi. Abhak arɛ́ nɛ bhɔ anjwiti nɔkɔ bho.
323 Mpok ɛyɔ, Jɔ̌n abhak Áénɔn, kɛkwɔt nɛ Sálim, anjwiti nɔkɔ bho. Abhak arɛ́ mbɔnyunɛ manyiɛp aya nyaka ɛbhak ɛyɔ. Bo báré rɔŋ ntá yi, anjwiti nɔkɔ bhɔ.
324 Bábhɨ́kɨ́ re kɛm nyaka Jɔ̌n mamfyɛ ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ.
325 Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, ɛpʉ́ítí ɛ́kwɛ́n nɛntɨ bakoŋo Jɔ̌n nɛ mmu Israɛl achak ɛ̌ti ɛnyǔ nɛso ɛnɛn nɛ́kʉ̀ mmu ambak pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm.
326 Ɛ́kʉ́ bakoŋo Jɔ̌n bárɔ́k ntá yi barɛm bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, mmu anɛ achi nyaka nɛ wɔ ɛbhé Nyɛ́n Jɔ́dan ɛnɛ́ awu ɔ́ngati nɔkɔ bo mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti yi, ǎjwiti bho nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu árɔ̀ŋ ntá yi.”
327 Jɔ̌n akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Yɛ̌ mmu apu kway bɛbhɔŋ ɛnyɨŋ kpátɛ Mandɛm anchyɛ yi yɔ.
328 Bě babhɔŋ bǎchí batísiɛ ndǔ ndɛ́mɛ́ bɛ́ puyɛ̌ mɛ kɛ̌ nchí Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò. Nchí chí mpɔkɔntó anɛ Mandɛm átó bɛ njambɨ kɛ yi antwɔ.
329 Mbǎy-ngɔrɛ kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ngɔrɛ́. Mmʉɛrɛ mbǎyngɔrɛ́ anɛ áchí téé ánòŋ bɛ́ghok ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ mbǎyngɔrɛ́,   ǎghok ɛyɔŋ ɛyi, ambɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ maŋák. Ɛnyu yɔ kɛ ɛ́chi nɛ mɛ. Maŋák ama ajwí pɔɔt nɛ́nɛ.
330 Nsóŋó yí abhɔŋ bɛ́kó nɔ́kɔ́ kó, aya ansɛp nɔkɔ.
331 “Mmu anɛ áfú amfay, achá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achak. Mmǔ mmɨk afu fá amɨk, nɛ ǎrɛm chi barak anɛ́ mmɨk. Mmu anɛ áfú amfay achá bǒ mmɨk mankɛm.
332 Yí ǎghati bo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi aghɔ nɛ amɨ́k, aghók nɛ batú. Yɛ̌ nɔ, yɛ̌ mmu apú noko ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m mbɔ ɛnyɨŋ.
333 Kɛ mmu anɛ ághókó ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ yi arɛmɛ anoko, ǎtɔŋ bɛ yi anókó ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ ɛ́chí tɛtɛp.
334 Ɛchi nɔ mbɔnyunɛ yí mmu Mandɛm átó, árɛ̀m chi Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm achyɛ́ yi Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ njɛnti ti.
335 Ɛta Mandɛm akɔŋ Mɔ́ywi nɛ afyɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm yi awɔ. Mandɛm achyɛ́ yi Ɛfóŋó ɛyi njɛnti ti.
336 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ánókó Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm, ǎbhɔ̀ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti. Mmu anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ noko Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm apú bhɔŋ nɛpɛ́m. Kɛ bɛběntɨ Mandɛm bɛ́tɨŋɨ nɛ yi.”
4
41 Yesu arɨŋɨ bɛ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bághók bɛ bɛyǎ bo bárɔbhɛ koŋo chi yi nɛ yí anjwiti nɔkɔ bhɔ, nɛ bɛ́ bakoŋo bhi báyá máncha nɔkɔ abhɛn Jɔ̌n.
42 Sayri sayri, puyɛ̌ Yesu kɛ ájwìti nyaka bho, chí bakoŋo bhi.
43 Yesu árɨ́ŋɨ́ nɔkɔ nɔ, afa atú Judɛ́ya apɛt atú Gálili.
44 Abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛ́fʉɛ́t atú Samária ndu bɛrɔŋ Gálili.
45 Ɛ́kʉ, akɔ aghaka ɛtɔk Samária ɛnɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ́ Síka, kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ nɛbhʉɛ́rɛ́mɨk anɛ Jekɔ́p áchyɛ tɛntɛp ntá mɔ́ywi Josɛ́f.
46 Mbokó manyiɛp anɛ Jekɔ́p ábhák arɛ. Yesu ágháká nɔkɔ arɛ́, ndǔ yi ánáŋ ápɔ́bhɛ́, achɔkɔ nɛpaká mbokó manyiɛp wu. Nywɔp nɛ́bhák mbɔ nkárɛ́nká byo nɛ ɛpay.
47 Ngɔrɛ́ Samária amɔt atwɔ́ ndu bɛya manyiɛp arɛ́. Yesu aghati yi bɛ, “Mma, chyɛ mɛ manyiɛp nnyú.”
48 Mpok ɛyɔ, bakoŋo Yesu bárɔŋ nyaka ɛtɔk ndu bɛ́kú nɛnyíɛ́.
49 Ngɔrɛ́ Samária wu akɛmɛ Yesu bɛ, “Wɔ, ɔchí mmu Ju, atú Judɛ́ya, mɛ mbák ngɔrɛ́ atú Samária, ɛkɔ ná kɛ ɔ̌rɛm bɛ nchyɛ́ wɔ manyiɛp ɔ́nyú. Bǒ Judeya bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ bhɛsɛ bo Samaria!”
410 Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Mbɔ ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ akap anɛ Mandɛm áchyɛ̀ bho, nɛ mmu anɛ árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́ bɛ, ‘Chiɛ mɛ manyiɛp’, mbʉ ɔrɛm mɛ nchyɛ́ wɔ manyiɛp amɛn áchyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m.”
411 Ngɔrɛ́ wu arɛm bɛ, “Ɛta, ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ɛnyɨŋ ndu bɛ́yǎ manyiɛp nɛ yɔ, nɛ mbokó manyiɛp áchwe, ɔ̌bhɔŋ manyiɛp amɛn áchyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m fá?
412 Ɔchá ɛtayɛsɛ Jekɔ́p mmu átɛ́mɛ́ nyaka mbokó manyiɛp anɛ arɔ ntá yɛsɛ? Ná ɔ́kway bɛchyɛ mmu manyiɛp amɛn áchá amɛn yímbɔŋ ányu nyaka, nɛ bɔ̌bhi mányú, mpɔŋ ɛyi ɛ́nyú?”
413 Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ányù manyiɛp amɛn, apú rɔ bɛ́bhɔŋ ɛkwaká manyiɛp.
414 Kɛ mmu anɛ ányù manyiɛp amɛn mɛ̌chyɛ̀, apú pɛrɛ bhɔŋ ɛkwaká manyiɛp wáwák. Manyiɛp amɛn mɛ̌chyɛ̀ yi, ǎbhák ntá yi mbɔ ntí mɔ́nyɛn anɛ́ manyiɛp ányày arɛ, anchyɛ nɔkɔ yi nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.”
415 Ngɔrɛ́ wu arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Ɛta, chyɛ mɛ manyiɛbhɛ́ mɔ, bɛ́ manyiɛp ákɛ́ pɛrɛ kwak mɛ, nɛ bɛ nkɛ́pɛrɛ twɔ fá ndu bɛya manyiɛp.”
416 Yesu aghati yi bɛ, “Dɔ́k bhɨŋɨ nnɛ́m aywɛ, twɔ́ nɛ yí.”
417 Ngɔrɛ́ wu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ nnɛ́m.” Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Ɔrɛm tɛtɛp bɛ́ ɔbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ nnɛ́m.
418 Ɔnáŋ ɔbhɔ̌ŋ manɛ́m batay, nɛ mmǔ anɛ ɔ́chí nɛ yi nɛ́nɛ, abhɨkɨ bhay wɔ. Ɔrɛm tɛtɛp!”
419 Ngɔrɛ́ wu arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Ɛta, ngɔ nɛ́nɛ bɛ ɔchí ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm.
420 Bɔtayɛsɛ bátwɔ̀ nyaka fá ndǔ njiɛ nɛ mánchyɛ nɔkɔ Mandɛm kɛnókó, kɛ be bǒ Judeya bǎrɛ̀m bɛ Yerúsalɛm kɛ áchi ɛbhak ɛnɛ bo bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛchyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó arɛ.”
421 Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Mmá, nokó ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mɛ̌ghàti wɔ. Mpok ǎtwɔ̀ anɛ bo bápú pɛrɛ bhɔŋ bɛchyɛ Ɛta Mandɛm kɛnókó yɛ̌ chi fá ndǔ njiɛ nɛ, yɛ̌ chi Yerúsalɛm.
422 Bě bo Samaria, bǎchyɛ̀ kɛnókó ntá ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɨ́kí rɨŋɨ. Bɛsɛ bo Judeya sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ mmu anɛ sɛ́chyɛ̀ kɛnókó mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm ǎfʉɛt chí ntá bo Judeya bɛ́pɛ́mɛ bho.
423 Mpok ǎtwɔ̀, nɛ mpok ɛyɔ anáŋ aghaka anɛ bo abhɛn báchyɛ̀ Ɛta Mandɛm kɛnókó, bákʉ̀ nɔ ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chí tɛtɛp bɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm ǎtɔ̀ŋ bhɔ mbi. Mɛnyǔ bo bhɔ kɛ̌ Mandɛm áyàŋ mánchyɛ́ yi kɛnókó.
424 Mandɛm achi Ɛfóŋó, nɛ bǒ abhɛn báchyɛ̀ yi kɛnókó, bábhɔŋ bɛchyɛ yi kɛnókó nɛ ntɨ nɛmɔt ndǔ bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ.”
425 Mɔ́ngɔrɛ́ wu arɛm bɛ, “Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò, yi mmu bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Kristo átwɔ̀. Ánáŋ ántwɔ́, chɔŋ angati bhɛsɛ barak ankɛm.”
426 Yesu aghati yi bɛ, “Mɛ, mmu nchí rɛm nɛ́ kɛpɨ nɛ wɔ, kɛ nchí Mpɛmɛ.”
427 Nkúbhɛ́ mpok yɔ, bakoŋo Yesu báfú ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ bárɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛku nɛnyíɛ́ bápɛtnsɛm. Bábhák maknkay bɛghɔ bɛ Yesu ǎrɛ̀m kɛpɨ nɛ ngɔrɛ́, kɛ yɛ̌ mmǔ wap kɛbhɛ́p ngɔrɛ́ wu bɛ, “Ɔ̌yàŋ yi?” Nɛ yɛ̌ amɔt kɛbhɛ́p Yesu bɛ, “Ndaká yí ɔ́rɛ̀m kɛpɨ nɛ yi?”
428 Ngɔrɛ́ wu arɔ ɛtě manyiɛp ɛyi, arɔk ɛtɔk téé, abho bɛ́gháti bho bɛ,
429 “Twɔ́ ká ghɔ mmǔ anɛ ághátí mɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ nkʉ́ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛna. Chí Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò kɛ?”
430 Ɛ́kʉ́ ɛtɔk ɛnkɛm ɛ́móko, bábhó bɛ́rɔŋ ntá Yesu.
431 Mpok anɛ ngɔrɛ́ wu árɔ́ árɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛtɔk, bakoŋo Yesu báré nɨk yí mmʉɛt bɛ́ “Ntɔŋ, nnyiɛ́ mbɔ nɛnyíɛ́.”
432 Kɛ yí aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Mbɔ̌ŋ nɛnyíɛ́ mɛ́nyiɛ ɛnɛ́n bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ.”
433 Ɛ́kʉ́, bábho bɛbhɛp batɨ bɛ, “Mmǔfú atwɔ yi nɛ nɛnyíɛ́ kɛ́?”
434 Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Nɛnyiɛ́ ɛna chi bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mmu anɛ átó mɛ áyàŋ nkʉ́, nɛ mɛnáŋá bɛtɨk ɛbhi.
435 Pú bǎrɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Mbák ɛ́ngáká bataŋ anwi, chɔŋ mámfɛrɛ mbwɔt ɛbhɨ?’ Kɛ nchí ghati bhe bɛ mǎnjoŋ amɨ́k mǎnjɨŋɨ nkɨ, mǎngɔ́ ndǔ mbwɔt ánáŋ ágháká bɛ́fɛ́rɛ ɛbhɨ.
436 Mmu anɛ áfɛ̀rɛ mbwɔt ɛbhɨ, ǎbhɔŋ akap ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhi. Nɛ ǎnyokoti mbwɔt anɛ áchí chí bo abhɛn bábhɔ̀ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti, bɛ mmu anɛ ápɨ̀ mbwɔt nɛ anɛ áfɛ̀rɛ yɔ ɛbhɨ, bɔ́ mankɛm mámbɔ́ŋ maŋák.
437 Ɛchí tɛtɛp mbɔ ɛnyu bárɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Mmu bɛ́pɨ ǎpɨ, anɛ bɛghɛm angɛm.’
438 Ntǒ be bɛ mǎndɔk mǎmfɛrɛ mbwɔt anɛ bǎbhɨkɨ pɨ. Bo bachak bápɨ, be bǎghɛ̀m mbwɔt anɛ bɔ bapɨ.”
439 Bɛyǎ bo Samaria abhɛn báfú ɛtɔk mánóko Yesu ɛ̌ti nɛrɛm anɛ ngɔrɛ́ wu arɛmɛ bɛ, “Aghátí mɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ nkʉ́ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛna.”
440 Mpok bátɛ́mɛ́rí Yesu, mánɨ́k yi mmʉɛt bɛ ámbák nɛ bhɔ, nɛ abhak nɛ bhɔ́ ndǔ manywɔp apay.
441 Nɛ bɛyǎ bo báchák mánóko ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Yesu aghati bhɔ.
442 Ɛ́kʉ bárɛ́m ntá ngɔrɛ́ wu bɛ, “Ɛpɛ́t ɛpu bɛ́ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɔ́rɛ́mɛ́ kɛ sɛ́nókó. Bɛsɛ́ babhɔŋ sɛ́ghok nɛ batú bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú yi anyu, nɛ sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ nɛ́ chí Mpɛmɛ bǒ mmɨk tɛtɛp.” 
443 Manywɔp apay anɛ Yesu achi nɛ bo Samária áfʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, afa bɛrɔŋ atú Gálili.
444 Yímbɔŋ arɛm nyaka bɛ, “Bápú chyɛ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ kɛnókó amɛm ɛtɔk ɛyi.”
445 Mpok Yesu áchwɔ́bhɛ́ Gálili, bǒ Galili básɔt yi nɛ maŋák ndu bághɔ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákʉ́ Yerúsalɛm mpok bárɔ́ŋɔ́ arɛ ndǔ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ. Bɔ́ nkwɔ bárɔŋ nyaka ndǔ ɛpǎ yɔ.
446 Yesu apɛt arɔk ɛtɔk Kána, atú Gálili, ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yi ákú nyaka manyiɛp áyíbhírí mmɛ́m. Mǔnti amɔt abhak Kapɛ̌naum anɛ mɔ́ywi áme.
447 Ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ Yesu afǔ atú Judɛ́ya átwɔ̀ Gálili, arɔk are nɨk yi mmʉɛt bɛ ándɔ́k Kapɛ̌naum ámbú mɔ́ywi. Mɔ́wu arɔp nyaka chi kɛ́kwɔ́t bɛ́gu.
448 Yesu aghati mǔngo wu bɛ, “Bǎpú ka mɛnoko mɛ mbák bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ́ bɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay.”
449 Mǔngo wu arɛm bɛ, “Ɛta, twɔ́ sɛ́ndɔ́k bɛ mɔ́wa ákɛ́ sɛbhɛ.”
450 Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Pɛtnsɛm anywɔ́p, mɔ́ywɛ apú gú.” Mǔngo wu anoko ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu árɛ́mɛ́, afa, are gurɛ.
451 Ɛnɛ́ yi ásɛ̀p árɔ̀ŋ, bǒ bɛtok bhi bátɛ́mɛ́ri yi ambi, baghati yi bɛ, “Mɔ́ywɛ achí nɛpɛ́m.”
452 Abhɛ́p bhɔ́ bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ mpok yi ábhó bɛ́chɔkɔ sayri?” Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Ɛ́yu ndu nkárɛ́nká amɔt nɛ ngósí.”
453 Chi mɔ́wu atɨk bɛ́ ndǔ nkúbhɛ́ nɛŋɔkɔ́ nywɔp ɛnɔ kɛ̌ Yesu ághati yi bɛ, “Mɔ́ywɛ apú gú.” Ɛ́kʉ́ mǔngo wu nɛ *ɛfo ɛyi ɛnkɛm mánóko Yesu.
454 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́bhák ɛrɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́jwí bɛpay ndǔ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛn Yesu ákʉ́ mpok yi áfú atú Judɛ́ya arɔŋɔ atú Gálili.
5
51 Ɛ́tárɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, mpok ɛpǎ bo Israɛl ɛ́chák akwáy. Yesu akó, arɔk Yerúsalɛm.
52 Ɛ̌ntɨ́ŋnyɛ́n ɛbhak Yerúsalɛm, kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ nyǔ-ɛbhá anɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ nyǔbha bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n. Bábhɨŋɨ ɛ̌ntɨ́ŋnyɛn ɛyɔ ndǔ ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ́ bo Israɛl bɛ Bɛtsáta. Bɛ́tɛm bɛtay bɛbhak kɛkwɔt nɛ ɛ̌ntɨŋ ɛyɔ.
53 Bɛyǎ bǒmame bábhák arɛ́; manɛ́mámɨk, nɛ babhɛ́nti, nɛ abhɛn bachi bhʉrɛ́. Báré noŋ bɛ nnyɛ́n nɛ́mboŋ. Mpok nɛ mpok, ángɛl Mandɛm ǎsɛ̀p nyaka amɨk amboŋ ɛ̌ntɨ́ŋnyɛn ɛyɔ. Nɛ mmǔ nɛme anɛ áyámbɨ ásɛ́bhɛ́ amɛm, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ nɛme ɛnɛn yi abhɔŋɔ nɛ́may.
55 Mmǔ amɔt abhak arɛ́ anɛ ánáŋ áchí nyaka amɨk ndǔ nɛme mamiɛ́ ɛsǎ nsɛm nɛku nɛ arat.
56 Yesu ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ ndu bɛtɛm ɛbhɔ, aghɔ́ mmu wu bhʉ́rɛ́. Arɨŋɨ bɛ́ yi anáŋ atat arɛ́ ndǔ ɛrɔ́rí mpok. Abhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ɔ̌yáŋ bɛ́ ɔ́ntáŋ?”
57 Mmǔ nɛme wu akɛmɛ Yesu bɛ, “Ɛta, mmu apú anɛ ápɔ̀kɔ mɛ nsɛp anyɛ́n ayak mpok nnyɛ́n nɛ́bòŋ. Mpɛrɛ́ nu bɛ́chwɔ́p arɛ́, mmu achák anáŋ áyámbɨ.”
58 Yesu aghati yí bɛ, “Faté, pɔkɔ́ ɛ̌sák ɛyɛ kɔ.”
59 Tɛ́mté wu, mmu wu ataŋ. Asɔt bɛkpaka bhi abho bɛkɔ. Nywɔp ɛnɔ nɛ́bhak chí nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt bo Israɛl.
510 Ɛ́kʉ, bo Israɛl bárɛm ntá mmu anɛ bábú yi bɛ, “Ɛchɔŋ chi nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt nɛ ɛbhé ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛ ɔ́mpɔ́kɔ́ ɛ̌sák ɛyɛ.”
511 Akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mmu anɛ ábú mɛ kɛ ághátí mɛ bɛ, ‘Pɛ́t ɛ̌sák ɛyɛ, faté kɔ.’”
512 Bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Mmǔrɛ́ ághátí wɔ ɔmpɛt ɛ̌sák ɛyɛ ɔnkɔ chí agha?”
513 Kɛ yi kɛ rɨŋɨ mmu wu. Yesu ábú nyaka yi anɔnɛ arɔk mbɔnyunɛ bɛyǎ bo báchí nyaka arɛ́.
514 Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, Yesu atɛmɛri yi amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, aghati yi bɛ, “Yɨŋɨ́, ɔnáŋ ɔtaŋ! Dɔ̌ bɛbʉ́ bɛ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chá ɛyɔ ɛ́kɛ́ tɛmɛri wɔ.”
515 Mmǔ wu arɔ, arɔk, aghati bǒbati bo Israɛl bɛ Yesu kɛ ábú yi.
516 Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ̌ bo Israɛl bábhó bɛ́chyɛ Yesu nɛnyok, bɛ yi akʉ mmu ataŋ ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt.
517 Kɛ Yesu aghati bhɔ́ bɛ, “Ɛtaya ǎkʉ̀ bɛtɨk mpoknkɛm, nɛ mɛnkwɔ́ mbɔŋ bɛkʉ bɛtɨk.”
518 Ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu árɛ́mɛ́, bo Israɛl bápɛ́t báre yaŋ mbi bɛway yi. Ntí abhak bɛ, puyɛ̌ chi ndiɛrɛ bɛ akwɛn ɛbhé nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt, kɛ ndak anɛ́ akpɨk ábɛ́bhɛ́ áchá ábhák bɛ, yí ǎbhɨ̀ŋɨ Mandɛm bɛ ɛtayi, nɛ bɛ bɛ́kʉ nɔ chi bɛyɛnti mmʉɛt nɛ Mandɛm. 
519 Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, Mmɛ Mmɔ Mandɛm mpú kwáy bɛkʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ndǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbha. Mɛ́kʉ̀ chí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ngɔ́ Ɛtaya ákʉ̀. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ Ɛtaya ákʉ̀, yɔ́ kɛ Mɛ Mɔ́ywi nchí kʉ nkwɔ́.
520 Ɛ́chí ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ Ɛta akɔŋ Mmɛ Mɔ́ywi, nɛ ǎtɔŋ mɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yímbɔŋ ákʉ̀. Nɛ chɔŋ antɔŋ mɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛn bɛcha ɛbhɛn, bɛ manyu ánchók bhe.
521 Nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛta áŋɛ̀mɛ bawú anchyɛ bhɔ nɛpɛ́m, nɔ́ kɛ̌ Mmɛ Mɔ́ywi nchí chyɛ nɛpɛ́m ntá yɛ̌ agha anɛ mɛ́yàŋ bɛchyɛ nɛpɛ́m.
522 Yɛ̌ mmu, Ɛta apu taŋ manyé yi. Áchyɛ́ bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm ntá ya, Mmɛ Mɔ́ywi, bɛ ntáŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu.
523 Ǎkʉ nɔ bɛ bo mankɛm mánchyɛ́ Mmɛ Mɔ́ywi kɛnókó nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ báchyɛ̀ yi kɛnókó. Mmǔ anɛ apu chyɛ Mmɛ Mɔ́ywi kɛnókó, apú chyɛ kɛnókó ntá Ɛtaya mmu ato mɛ.
524 Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, mmǔ anɛ ághókó ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌rɛ̀m, anoko mmu anɛ átó mɛ, ǎbhɔ̀ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti. Mandɛm apú rɛm bɛ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛchi nɛ yi. Afǔ ndǔ nɛwú, achwe ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
525 “Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, mpok ǎtwɔ̀, nɛ anáŋ akway, anɛ bawú bághòk ɛyɔŋ ɛya, Mmɛ Mmɔ Mandɛm, nɛ abhɛn bághókó mámbɔŋ nɛpɛ́m.
526 Nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛta áchyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m, nɔ kɛ̌ yi áchyɛ́ Mmɛ Mɔ́ywi nkwɔ bɛtaŋ bɛ́chyɛ bo nɛpɛ́m.
527 Nɛ achyɛ́ mɛ bɛtaŋ ndu bɛ́táŋ bo, mbɔnyunɛ mɛ kɛ mfú ntá Mandɛm.
528 Bǎkɛ́ bhak maknkay bɛghok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn. Mpok ǎtwɔ̀ anɛ bawú mankɛm bághok ɛyɔŋ ɛya amɛm manɛm ayap.
529 Nɛ mǎnáŋ mángók ɛyɔŋ ɛya, báfù ndǔ manɛm ayap. Abhɛn bákʉ́ nyaka bɛrɨ ndǔ mmɨk nɛ, máŋɛmɛ, manchwe ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti, nɛ abhɛn bákʉ́ nyaka bɛbʉ́, máŋɛmɛ mámbɔ́ŋ ntɛmsi.” 
530 Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Mpú kwáy bɛkʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ndǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbha. Ɛnɛ́ mɛ̌kʉ̀ nchí kʉ chi ndǔ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm mmu átó mɛ. Mɛ̌tàŋ bo mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi aghati mɛ ntaŋ bo. Nɛ mɛ̌tàŋ bo chí ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ ɛchí chak, mbɔnyunɛ mpú kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛmbɔŋ nchí yaŋ bɛkʉ. Nchí kʉ chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmu anɛ átó mɛ áyàŋ nkʉ.
531 Mbák ndɛm ɛ̌ti mmʉɛ́t ɛya, mbɔ̌ŋ bo abhɛn bakway bɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌rɛ̀m ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ mɛnwɔp.
532 Mmǔ anɛ áté mɛ ntísiɛ achi nyáŋá, nɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ yi árɛ̀m ɛ̌ti ya ɛbhɔŋ mɛnwɔp.
533 Bǎtò nyaka bo ntá Jɔ̌n bɛ mámbɛp yi ángati bhe ɛ̌ti ya, nɛ aghati bhe ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛchi tɛtɛp.
534 Puyɛ̌ chi bɛ nkwǎŋwaŋ kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́té mɛ ntísiɛ, nchí ghati bhe ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Jɔ̌n árɛ́mɛ́ ɛ̌ti ya bɛ Mandɛm ámpɛ́mɛ́ bhe.
535 Jɔ̌n achi nyaka mbɔ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛnɛ ɛ́dù ɛ́ngɔ nɔkɔ ŋwaaŋ, ndu mɔ́mbɨŋɨ mpok, bǎka ɛyɔŋ ɛyi nɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋ maŋák ndu mɔ́mbɨŋɨ mpok.
536 Kɛ mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́chí ɛbhɛn bɛ́rɛ̀m ɛ̌ti ya ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chá ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Jɔ̌n árɛ̀m. Nkúbhɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ́kʉ̀, bɛ́tè mɛ ntísiɛ bɛ Ɛta kɛ átó mɛ.
537 Nɛ Ɛta, yímbɔŋ, mmu átó mɛ áté mɛ ntísiɛ. Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ re ghok ɛyɔŋ ɛyi, bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ re ghɔ́ ɛnyǔ yi achi.
538 Nɛ Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi ɛ́pú amɛm batɨ yɛka mbɔnyunɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ noko mmu anɛ yi átó.
539 Bǎfyɛ̀ bɛtaŋ bɛpay Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ bǎkáysí bɛ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ be mbi nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti nɛ yɔ́ ɛ́rɛ̀m chi ɛ̌ti ya.
540 Yɛ̌ nɔ, bǎpú ka bɛ́twɔ ntá ya bɛ mǎmbɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m.
541 Mpú yáŋ nɔ chi kɛnókó ntá nkwǎ.
542 Nchí rɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mbɔnyunɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bhe. Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ ɛkɔŋ Mandɛm ɛ́pú amɛm batɨ yɛka.
543 Ntwɔ̌ ndǔ nnyɛ́n Ɛtaya, nɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ sɔt mɛ mbɔ mmu. Mbɔ mmu achák kɛ átwɔ́ nɔ́ árɛ̀m ɛ̌ti ndu mmʉɛt yi nɛ ndǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi mbʉ bǎsɔ́t yi mbɔ mmu ywɛka.
544 Ná bǎkway mɛnoko ɛnɛ́ báyàŋ chi bakak amɛn bǎchyɛ̀ batɨ, kɛfyɛ́ ntí ndǔ bakak amɛm Mandɛm áchyɛ.
545 Bǎkɛ́ kaysi bɛ́ chɔŋ ngati Ɛta ɛnyǔ bho bǎchi. Moses kɛ ághati chɔŋ yi, Moses mmu bǎbhaka ntɨ nɛ yi.
546 Mbɔ mǎnókó ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Moses ásɨ́ŋɨ́ tɛtɛp, mbʉ́ mǎnókó ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌ghàti bhe. Moses asɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka chí ɛ̌ti ya.
547 Mbák bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ noko basɨŋ ami, ná bǎkway mɛ́nóko ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ́rɛ̀m?”
6
61 Ɛ́tárɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, Yesu apé, arɔk ɛbhě Manyu Gálili. Nkúbhɛ́ Manyu wu kɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ Manyu Tibérias.
62 Ngɛ́mtay bo báré koŋo yi mbɔnyunɛ bághɔ̌ nyaka mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ́ ntá bǒmame.
63 Yesu akó ambɨ njiɛ, achɔkɔ arɛ́ nɛ bakoŋo bhi.
64 Ɛpǎ bo Israɛl ɛnɛ́ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ ɛ́rɔ́p kɛkwɔt.
65 Ayibhiri mmʉɛt, ayɨŋɨ, aghɔ́ ndǔ ngɛ́mtay bho bátwɔ̀ ntá yi. Abhɛ́p Fílip bɛ, “Chɔŋ sɛ́mbɔŋ brɛt bɛ́ku fá anɛ ákway bǒbhɛn?”
66 Yesu arɛm nɔ ndu mɛmɔ Fílip mbɔnyunɛ yímbɔŋ árɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ.
67 Fílip akɛmɛ Yesu bɛ, “Nkáp nkʉbɛtɨk ndǔ manywɔp bɛsǎ byo ápú kway bɛ́ku brɛt anɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap akway bɛbhɔŋ mandú.”
68 Nkoŋo ywi amɔt anɛ achí manɔ Símun Píta anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Andru arɛm ntá yi bɛ,
69 “Mmɔ̌ amɔt achi fá, anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkpɔkɔ́ brɛt bɛtay nɛ nsi ɛpay, kɛ ɛyɔ chi yi ntá bɛyǎ bǒbhɛn?”
610 Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Kʉ ka bo mánchɔ́kɔ́ amɨk.” Tákɔ ayá nɛbhʉɛt ɛ́rɛ. Ɛ́kʉ bo báchɔ́kɔ amɨk. Babhakanɛm bábhák mbɔ nká ɛtay.
611 Yesu asɔt yɛ bɛkpɔkɔ́ brɛt bhɔ. Áchyɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bakak ntá Mandɛm, akɔrɛ ntá bo abhɛn báchɔ́kɔ́ amɨk. Akʉ ɛnyumɔ́t nɛ nsi. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anyiɛ́ kpát ajwi.
612 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ányíɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnǐ ɛnɛ́n nɛ́kwáy yi, Yesu aghati bakoŋo bhi bɛ, “Nyokotí ká mbwɔ́ptí anɛ árɔ́bhɛ́ bɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛkɛ chɔŋti ndɛ́ndɛm.”
613 Mányókóti yɛ mbwɔpti anɛ bo mányíɛ́, bárɔ́. Ajwi bɛkay byo nɛ bɛpay.
614 Bo abhɛn báchi arɛ́, bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛyɔ, bárɛ́m bɛ, “Tɛtɛp, nɛ́ chi ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛ́twɔ fá amɨk.”
615 Yesu aghɔ́ bɛ bo báyàŋ bɛ́kɛm yi nɛ bɛtaŋ bɛ mánkʉ yi Mfɔ, afa, akó njiɛ, abhak arɛ́ aywǐnti. 
616 Běku bɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́, bakoŋo Yesu basɛp, barɔk angɔkɔ manyu,
617 báchwe amɛm áchwi bárè pé nnyɛ́n bɛrɔŋ Kapɛ̌naum. Bɛti mɛ́naŋ bɛ́gʉ nyaka ɛnɛ́ Yesu ábhɨ́kɨ́ re tɛmɛri bhɔ.
618 Mbʉ́ɛ́p ataŋataŋ abho mɛnu. Ɛkʉ bɛtaŋtí mpɛ́rɛ́nyɛn ɛya anyɛ́n.
619 Bakoŋo bhi mánók mbɔ bɔkilomɛta batay nɛ batandat. Bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ yi ákɔ̀ anyɛ́n átwɔ̀ kɛkwɔt nɛ bhɔ, bɛ́cháy bɛ́kɛ́m bhɔ tontó.
620 Kɛ Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎkɛ́ chay. Chi mɛ!”
621 Báká yɛ bɛ yi anchwe amɛm áchwí. Nɛchwe yi áchwé, áchwí arɔk atɛmɛ angɔkɔnyɛ́n, ndǔ nɛchyɛ̌nyɛn ɛnɛn bɔ́ bárɔ̀ŋ arɛ́.
622 Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, bo abhɛn bárɔ́bhɛ́ ɛbhěnyɛn ɛnɛ Yesu nɛ bakoŋo bhi báfú arɛ́, bátɨk bɛ ndiɛrɛ áchwí amɔt kɛ áchí nyaka arɛ, nɛ bɛ Yesu abhɨ́kɨ́ chwe amɛm áchwí wu andɔk nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi. Bɔ́ bárɔ́ nyaka yi bárɔ́k.
623 Ɛ́fákári bɛ bachwi achak anɛ áfú Tibérias átwɔ́ kɛkwɔt ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bɔ mányíɛ́ nyaka brɛt mpok Acha ánaŋ áchyɛ́ bakak ntá Mandɛm.
624 Bǒ bhɔ bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yɛ bɛ Yesu nɛ bakoŋo bhi, bápɛ́t bapu arɛ́, bɔ babhɔŋ báchwé amɛm bachwi yɔ, barɔk Kapɛ̌naum ndu bɛ́yaŋ Yesu.
625 Bágháká nɔ́kɔ́ ɛbhě manyu ɛnɛ Yesu árɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ bakoŋo bhi, bághɔ́ yi arɛ, babhɛp yi bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, ɔpě ɔtwɔ wɛn ntɨkɨ mpok?”
626 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, bǎpú yaŋ mɛ ɛ̌ti bǎghɔ́ bɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay, kɛ ɛ̌ti brɛt anɛ mǎnyiɛ́ bǎjwi.
627 Bǎkɛ́ fyɛ ntí ndǔ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn nɛ́chɔ̀ŋti. Fíɛ́ ká ntí chí ndǔ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn nɛpu chɔŋti, nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn nɛ́chyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti, ɛnɛn Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm nchí chyɛ chɔŋ be. Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ Ɛtaya achyɛ ɛrɨŋ bɛtɔŋ bɛ yi kɛ átó mɛ.”
628 Bɔ bábhɛ́p yɛ Yesu bɛ, “Bɛtɨk Mandɛm ɛbhɛn sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ nɔ́kɔ́ chi yi?”
629 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ mǎnkʉ chi bɛ mǎnókó mmu anɛ yi átó.”
630 Ɛ́kʉ bárɛm ntá Yesu bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ ɛrɨŋ ɔ́kwày yɛ bɛkʉ bɛ́ sɛ́ngɔ́, sɛ́noko wɔ? Chɔŋ ɔ́nkʉ yi ntá yɛsɛ?
631 Bǎchǐ mbɨ bhɛsɛ́ mányìɛ nyaka mana mpok bákɔ̀ amɛm baso. Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ básɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ, ‘Achyɛ nyaka bhɔ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn nɛ́fù amfay!’”
632 Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, puyɛ̌ Moses kɛ áchyɛ́ nyaka bachǐmbɨ bhɛka nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn nɛ́fú amfay. Ɛtaya kɛ áchyɛ̀ bhe nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn mbɔŋ ɛnɛ́n nɛ́fú amfay.
633 Nɛnyiɛ Mandɛm chi mmu anɛ áfú amfay atwɔ, nɛ ǎchyɛ nɛpɛ́m ntá bǒ mmɨk.”
634 Bárɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Ɛta, chyɛ̌ bhɛsɛ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɔ mpoknkɛm.”
635 Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Mɛ kɛ nchí nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn nɛ́chyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m. Mmu anɛ átwɔ́ ntá ya apu pɛrɛ ghok nsay nɛ mmu anɛ ásɨ̀kɨ ntɨ nɛ mɛ, apú bhɔ́ŋ ɛkwaká manyiɛp wáwák.
636 Kɛ ngátí bhe bɛ yɛ̌ndu bǎghɔ́ mɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ noko mɛ.
637 Yɛ̌ nɔ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ Ɛta áchyɛ́ mɛ, ǎtwɔ̀ ntá ya. Nɛ yɛ̌ mmu apú twɔ ntá ya mɛ̌mbók yi,
638 mbɔnyunɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ fú amfay ntwɔ́ fá amɨk bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌yáŋ. Ntwɔ bɛkʉ chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mmu anɛ átó mɛ áyàŋ mɛ̌nkʉ.
639 Nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mmu anɛ átó mɛ áyàŋ nkʉ chi bɛ nkɛ́rɔ yɛ̌ mmu amɔt anɛ yi áchyɛ́ mɛ ánɛ́m, kɛ bɛ́ nkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap ámpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn ngwɛnti.
640 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛta áyàŋ chí bɛ́ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ághɔ́ Mɔ́ywi, asɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ yi, ámbɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti. Nɛ chɔŋ nkʉ yi ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn ngwɛnti.”
641 Bo Israɛl bábhó yɛ mɛ́nywinti ɛ̌ti Yesu, ndǔ yi árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ, “Mɛ kɛ nchí nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn nɛ́fú amfay.”
642 Báre rɛm bɛ, “Pú Yesu mmɔ̌ Josɛ́f nɛ́? Pú sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛtayi nɛ máyi? Ɛ́kɔ ná kɛ yi arɛm bɛ, ‘Mfu amfay kɛ nchí ntwɔ fá amɨk’?”
643 Yesu akɛmɛ bɛ, “Dɔ̌ ká nɛnywíntí ɛnɛká nɔ.
644 Yɛ̌ mmu apú kwáy bɛ́twɔ ntá ya mbák Ɛtaya mmu átó mɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ ya yi ntá ya. Nɛ mmu anɛ átwɔ́ ntá ya, chɔŋ nkʉ yi ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ndǔ nywɔp ngwɛnti.
645 Ɛchí amɛm basɨŋɨ́ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ bɛ, ‘Chɔŋ Mandɛm ántɔ́ŋ bɔ́ mankɛm.’ Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ághókó, nɛ aghɔ́k ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛtaya árɛ́mɛ́, ǎtwɔ̀ ntá ya.
646 Mpú rɛm chi bɛ mmu achi anɛ anaŋ aghɔ Ɛtaya. Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm kɛ ánáŋ ághɔ́ yi.
647 Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, mmǔ anɛ anoko ǎbhɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
648 Mɛ kɛ nchí nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛ́n nɛ́chyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m.
649 Bachǐmbɨ bhɛka mányìɛ nyaka mana amɛm baso, yɛ̌ nɔ, bɔ mankɛm bágú.
650 Kɛ nɛ́ chi nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn nɛ́fú amfay, bɛ́ mmǔ anɛ ányíɛ́ nɔ́ ákɛ́ gu.
651 Mɛ kɛ nchí nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn nɛ́chyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛ́fú amfay. Mmu anɛ ányíɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn, ǎbhák nɛpɛ́m mpoknkɛm. Nɛnyiɛ́ ɛnɛ́n mɛ̌chyɛ chɔŋ bɛ́ bǒ mmɨk mámbɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m, chi nyamwʉɛ́t ɛya.”
652 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ ɛ́kʉ́ bo Israɛl bábho bɛkɛm ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ batɨ, mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Ná mmǔ-nɛ ǎkway bɛchyɛ bhɛsɛ nyamwʉɛ́t ayi bɛ sɛnyiɛ?”
653 Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, mbák bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ nyiɛ́ nyamwʉɛ́t Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm, mǎnyú manoŋ ami, bǎpú bhɔŋ nɛpɛ́m.
654 Mmǔ anɛ ányíɛ́ nyamwʉɛ́t ya nɛ anyú manoŋ ma, ǎbhɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti, nɛ chɔŋ nkʉ yi ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn ngwɛnti.
655 Nyamwʉɛ́t ɛya kɛ áchí mbɔ̌ŋ nɛnyíɛ́ mɛnyiɛ, nɛ manoŋ ama kɛ áchí mbɔ̌ŋ mmɛ́m amɛn mɛnyu.
656 Mmu anɛ ányìɛ nyamwʉɛ́t ya nɛ anyú manoŋ ma, achí babhát nɛ mɛ, nɛ mɛ nkwɔ́ nchí babhat nɛ yi.
657 Ɛta mmu achi nɛpɛ́m kɛ átó mɛ, nɛ ɛ̌ti yi kɛ nchí nɛpɛ́m. Nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ ɛchi bɛ, mmǔ anɛ ányìɛ mɛ ǎbhák nɛpɛ́m ɛ̌ti ya.
658 Nɛ́ chi nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛ́n nɛ́fú amfay nɛ́twɔ́ fá amɨk. Nɛ́pú mbɔ ɛnɛ́n bachǐmbɨ bhɛka mányíɛ́ nyaka, bágú. Mmǔ anɛ ányíɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn ǎbhɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.”
659 Yesu arɛm barak anɛ mpok yi áchí amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí ɛnɛ ɛtɔk Kapɛ̌naum átɔ̀ŋ bo. 
660 Bakoŋo Yesu bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ kɛpɨ ɛkɛn yi árɛ̀m, bɛyǎ bhap báré rɛm bɛ, “Anɛ́ ndak ataŋ acha, agha ákwày bɛka wu?”
661 Yesu árɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ baghɔkɔ́ bhi mánywìnti ɛ̌ti ndak anɛ. Abhɛ́p bɔ bɛ, “Batɨ ábé bhe ɛ̌ti ndak anɛ ndɛ́mɛ́?
662 Mbák mǎngɔ́ yɛ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm ndu nchí pɛtnsɛm amfay ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ mfú, bǎrɛm bɛ́ yi?
663 Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm kɛ áchyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m. Mmʉɛt nkwǎ apu kʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛ́n ngátí bhe bɛ́twɔ̀ nɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm nɛ bɛ́chyɛ nɛpɛ́m.
664 Yɛ̌ nɔ, mbɔk yɛka bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko.” Yesu arɨ́ŋɨ́ bo abhɛn bábhɨkɨ noko yi tɛ ndǔ nɛbhǒnɛt, nɛ arɨ́ŋɨ́ mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛti yi.
665 Yesu arɛm yɛ bɛ, “Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ ngátí bhé bɛ mmu apú kway bɛ́twɔ ntá ya mbák Ɛta abhɨ́kɨ́ chyɛ yi mbi.”
666 Nɛbho mpok yɔ, bɛyǎ bakoŋo bhi báya mmʉɛt ansɛm, bɔ́ kɛpɛrɛ koŋo yi.
667 Ɛ́kʉ́ Yesu abhɛ́p baghɔkɔ́ bhi bati byo nɛ apay bɛ, “Ná nɛ bhe, bǎrɔŋ nkwɔ?”
668 Símun Píta akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Ɛta, ntá agha? Wɔ kɛ ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chyɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
669 Sɛ́noko nɛ sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ wɔ kɛ ɔ́chí Mmu Nyáŋá anɛ Mandɛm átó.”
670 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ́ bɛ, “Pú njap be bati byo nɛ apay? Yɛ̌ nɔ, mmǔ ywɛka amɔt abhɔŋ ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ.”
671 Yesu ǎrɛ̀m nyaka nɔ ɛ̌ti Júda, mmɔ̌ Símun Iskariɔt, mbɔnyunɛ Júda, mmu amɔt ndǔ nkwɔ́ baghɔkɔ́ bhi bati byo nɛ apay, abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka nkaysi bɛti yi.
7
71 Barak anɛ áfʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, Yesu are kɔ mbǎŋ nɛ mbaŋ, atú Gálili. Yi kɛyáŋ bɛkɔ atú Judɛ́ya mbɔnyunɛ bo Judeya báyàŋ nyaka mbi bɛ́way yi.
72 Mpok yɔ, ɛpǎ bo Israɛl ɛnɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ Ɛpa Bɛ́tɛm   ɛ́rɔp kɛkwɔt.
73 Ɛkʉ bɔ̌mayi bárɛ́m ntá yi bɛ, “Fǎ fá, dɔ́k atú Judɛ́ya bɛ bakoŋo bhɛ mángɔ́ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛn ɔ́kʉ̀.
74 Yɛ̌ mmu apú kʉ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ mbák ǎyàŋ bo mándɨ́ŋɨ́ yi. Tɛ̌ndu ɔ́kʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay, kʉ nɔ́kɔ́ bhɔ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ mmɨk nkɛm ángɔ́.”
75 Kɛ yɛ̌ chi bɔ̌mayi kɛnoko yí.
76 Yesu arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Mpok aya ábhɨ́kɨ́ re kway, kɛ ntá yɛka yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok akway.
77 Bǒ mmɨk bápú kwáy bɛpap be. Bápap mɛ mbɔnyunɛ nchí rɛm bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ́ bákʉ̀ bɛbɛp.
78 Bě babhɔŋ mǎndɔ́k ndǔ ɛpa. Mpú rɔŋ. Mpok aya abhɨ́kɨ́ re kwáy.”
79 Yesu árɛ́m nɔ́, arɔp atú Gálili. 
710 Ɛnɛ́ bɔ̌mayi mǎnáŋ bárɔ́, bárɔ́ŋɔ́ Yerúsalɛm ndǔ ɛpa ɛyɔ, Yesu arɔk arɛ́ nkwɔ. Kɛ arɔk chi bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́, kɛrɔ́ŋ kpoŋoroŋ.
711 Bǒbati bo Judeya báré yaŋ yi arɛ́ mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Yi achí fá?”
712 Bo báré rɛm bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti yi. Mbɔk mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Yí achi ɛrɨ́tí mmu.” Báchák bɛ, “Nsé, ǎrwɔ̀ bho bɛ mánɛ́m ɛbhɨ!”
713 Yɛ̌ nɔ, yɛ̌ mmu amɔt kɛrɛm ɛnyɨŋ kpóŋóróŋ ɛ̌ti yi, mbɔnyunɛ báchày nyaka bǒbati bhap.
714 Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ nɛntɨ ɛpa, Yesu arɔk amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm abho bɛtɔŋ bo Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
715 Bǒbati bo Judeya bábhák maknkay ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi átɔ̀ŋ mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Ná mmǔ-nɛ áré rɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnyu ɛnɛ, ɛnɛ́ yi ábhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔk ɛkáti?”
716 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ̌tɔ̀ŋ bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ fu ntá ya. Bɛ́fú chi ntá mmu anɛ átó mɛ.
717 Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ntɨ bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ, ǎrɨŋɨ bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n mɛ̌tɔ̀ŋ bɛ́fú chi ntá Mandɛm nɛ bɛ puyɛ̌ mɛmbɔŋ kɛ ntɨ́ bɛtɔŋ bhɔ.
718 Mmu anɛ árɛ̀m mɛnyɨŋ ndǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi, ǎyaŋ kɛnókó ɛki yímbɔŋ. Mmu anɛ áyàŋ bo mánchyɛ́ kɛnókó chi ntá mmu anɛ átó yi, achí mmǔ tɛtɛp, bapu apú nɛ yi.
719 Moses achyɛ́ nyaka bhe bɛbhé, pú nɔ́? Yɛ̌ nɔ́, yɛ̌ mmu ywɛka apú bhʉrɛ́ bhɔ. Ndaká yí bǎyáŋ bɛway mɛ?”
720 Bɛyǎ bo abhɛn báchí arɛ bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ́sɔ̀ŋɔri wɔ! Agha áyàŋ bɛway wɔ?”
721 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Nkʉ ɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛ́mɔt manyu áchok bhe.
722 Moses aghátí nyaka bhe bɛ mǎnsyɛ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɔ̌bhɛka. Yɛ̌ nɔ, ɛbhé yɔ ɛbhɨkɨ fu nyaka ntá Moses. Ɛ́fú chí ntá bachǐmbɨ abhɛka. Nɛ bǎsìɛp mmu ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt.
723 Bě bǎsiɛ̀p bo ndǔ nywɔp nɛywěmʉɛt bɛ bǎkɛ kwɛn ɛbhé Moses. Bǎbentɨ nɛ mɛ mbɔnyunɛ́ nkʉ mmǔ nɛme átáŋ ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt?
724 Bǎkɛ́ kpɔ́t manyé mmu bɛkoŋo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎghɔ́ yi ákʉ̀. Bǎbhɔŋ bɛkpɔt manyé sayri bɛkoŋo tɛtɛp Mandɛm.” 
725 Mbɔk bo Yerusalɛm báré rɛm yɛ bɛ, “Pú mmǔ rɛ́ báyàŋ bɛway nɛ?
726 Achí fá árɛ̀m kɛpɨ kpoŋoroŋ, nɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɛm yɛ̌nyɨŋ ntá yi. Ɛ́kway bɛbhak bɛ bǒbati bárɨŋɨ bɛ yí chí Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò?
727 Kɛ sɛ́rɨŋɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ mmǔ-nɛ áfú. Mpok Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò átwɔ́, yɛ̌ mmu apú rɨŋɨ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yi áfú.”
728 Ɛ́kʉ́, ndu Yesu átɔ̀ŋ bho amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, arɛm nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ bɛ, “Bǎrɨŋɨ mɛ, nɛ bǎrɨŋɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ mfú? Mbɨ́kɨ́ twɔ ndǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbha. Mmǔ anɛ átó mɛ achí mmǔ tɛtɛp. Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ yi.
729 Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ yi, mbɔnyunɛ mfú chí ntá yi, nɛ yi kɛ átó mɛ.”
730 Ɛnyɨŋ Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ ɛ́kʉ́ báré yaŋ bɛkɛm yi, kɛ yɛ̌ mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ tɔk yi awɔ amʉɛt, mbɔnyunɛ mpok ayi abhɨ́kɨ́ re kway nyaka.
731 Bɛyǎ bo mánóko yi, mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Mbák Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò ántwɔ́, chɔŋ ankʉ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛn bɛ́chá ɛbhɛn mmǔ-nɛ ákʉ̀?”
732 Bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ bǒ ɛka yɔ bárɛ̀m bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti Yesu, báchɛm nɛ bǒbati bachiǎkap, bátó babhabhɛrí abhɛn ɛkɛrákap bɛ mankɛm yi.
733 Yesu arɛm yɛ ntá yap bɛ, “Mbɔŋ bɛ́pɛt bɛbhak nɛ bhe ndǔ mɔ́mbɨŋɨ mpok kɛ ndɔ́k ntá mmu anɛ átó mɛ.
734 Chɔŋ mǎnjaŋ mɛ, kɛ bǎpú ghɔ mɛ. Nɛbhʉɛt anɛ mɛ́rɔ̀ŋ bǎpú kwáy bɛ́twɔ arɛ́.”
735 Bo Israɛl bábhó bɛrɛm nɛ batɨ bɛ, “Atɨ bɛ́rɔ́ŋ fá, ɛnɛ́ sɛ́pú kway chɔŋ bɛghɔ yi? Atɨ bɛrɔŋ chi ɛtɔkɔ́ mankɔ ɛnɛ́ bǒ bhɛsɛ bátáká bárɔ́ŋɔ́ arɛ́ kɛ? Ǎyàŋ bɛrɔŋ bɛ́tɔŋ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl arɛ́ kɛ?
736 Yi bɛ ‘Chɔŋ sɛ́njáŋ yi, kɛ sɛpu ghɔ, nɛ bɛ́ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yi árɔ̀ŋ, sɛ́pú kway bɛrɔŋ arɛ. Nɔ́ bɛ yi?’” 
737 Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ nywɔbhɛ́ ngwɛnti ɛpa, nɔ́ chi, nywɔp nɛgho ɛnɛn ɛpǎ ɛyɔ, Yesu afate arɛm nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ bɛ, “Mmǔ anɛ manyiɛp ákwak yi, ántwɔ́ ntá ya.
738 Ɛ́chí nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu básɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ, ‘Mmǔ anɛ anókó mɛ, manyiɛp amɛn áchyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m ǎfu yi antɨ ansɛp nɔkɔ mbɔ nyɛ́n.’”
739 Yesu ǎrɛ̀m nyaka nɔ ɛ̌ti Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ɛnɛ́ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛchyɛ ntá bo abhɛn mánóko yi. Bábhɨ́kɨ́ re chyɛ nyaka Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ntá bo abhɛn mánóko mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm ábhɨ́kɨ́ re sɔt nyaka Yesu amfay, ánchyɛ́ yi kɛnókó.
740 Bo bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛ́n Yesu árɛ́mɛ́, mbɔk bo bábho bɛrɛm bɛ, “Nɛ́, chí ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛ́twɔ.”
741 Báchák bɛ, “Chi Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò.” Kɛ abhɛ́nɛ́fú bárɛm bɛ, “Yi abhɔŋ bɛfu chi atú Gálili kɛ?
742 Pú básɨŋ amɛm ɛkáti bɛ, Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò chi ɛbhárɛ́mɔ Mfɔ Debhít nɛ abhɔŋ bɛ́fu chi Bɛ́tlɛhɛm, ɛtɔk nɛbhe Mfɔ Debhít?”
743 Ɛ́kʉ́ ákɔ́rɛ́ nɛ bɛtaka bɛkwɛn nɛntɨ nap ɛ̌ti Yesu.
744 Mbɔk ayap báyàŋ nyaka bɛkɛm yi kɛ yɛ̌ mmu kɛtɔk yi awɔ amʉɛt. 
745 Babhabhɛri abhɛn ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm bápɛ́t yɛ nsɛm ntá bǒbati bachiǎkap nɛ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi. Bǒbati bábhɛ́p bhɔ́ bɛ, “Ndaká yí bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ twɔ nɛ yi?”
746 Babhabhɛri ɛkɛrákap bákɛ́mɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Yɛ̌ mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ re rɛm mɛnyǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmǔ wu árɛ̀m!”
747 Bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bákɛ́mɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Arwɔ̌ be nkwɔ bǎgúrɛ́ ɛbhɨ?
748 Bǎghɔ yɛ̌ mǔnti ɛtɔk amɔt anókó yi? Bǎghɔ yɛ̌ mǔnkwɔ Fárisi anókó yi?
749 Ndiɛrɛ ndɛ́ndɛmɛbho abhɛn, bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛbhé Moses kɛ mánóko yi. Ntá Mandɛm, bɔ mankɛm bábɛp!”
750 Nikɔdɛ́mɔs, mmǔ wap amɔt anɛ ánáŋ árɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka ntá Yesu abhɛp bhɔ bɛ,
751 “Ɛbhé ɛyɛsɛ ɛ́ká bɛ mánchyɛ́ mmu ntɛmsi ɛnɛ́ bábhɨ́kɨ́ re taŋ yi, mándɨ́ŋɨ́ sayri sayri ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ yi ákʉ?”
752 Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Wɔ nkwɔ́ ɔchí mmǔ Gálili? Yɨŋɨ́ Ɛkáti Mandɛm, chɔŋ ɔ́ngɔ́ bɛ́ yɛ̌ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ amɔt apú kway bɛfu atú Gálili.” Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu árɔ́ yɛ, agurɛ ɛkɛt ɛyi.
8
81 Yesu arɔk amfay Njiɛ Mɛnɔk Ólif.
82 Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, apɛtnsɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm běti běti. Bǒ mankɛm bárɔ́k ntá yi. Achɔkɔ amɨk, abho bɛtɔŋ bhɔ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
83 Batɔŋ-ɛbhé Mandɛm nɛ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi báyá ngɔrɛ́ anɛ bákɛ́mɛ́ ndǔ akwɛn bɛrwɔp, bátwɔ́ nɛ yi, bátɛp bɛsí bǒ mankɛm.
84 Bárɛ́m ntá Yesu bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, bákɛ̌m ngɔrɛ́ ndu ákwɛ̀n bɛrwɔp.
85 Ɛkáti bɛbhé Moses ɛ́ghàti bhɛsɛ bɛ bábhɔŋ bɛ́tɛ́mti ɛnyǔ ngɔrɛ́ nɛ nɛ batay mángwáy. Ɔrɛm bɛ́ yí?”
86 Bárɛ́m nɔ ndu mɛmɔ yi bɛ mámbɔ́ŋ mbi bɛbhat ndak yi amʉɛt. Yesu atɛp ntí amɨk, ansɨŋɨ nɔkɔ ɛnyɨŋ amɨk nɛ sɛnɔŋ awɔ.
87 Ndu bárɔŋ ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ yi ánchyɛ́ bhɔ ɛyɔŋ, anyabhɛ mmʉɛt téé, aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Mmǔ ywɛka anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ re kʉ bɛbʉ́ ánjámbɨ ámbwɔ́p ntay antɛm yi.”
88 Apɛt atɛp ntí amɨk ánsɨ́ŋɨ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ amɨk nɛ sɛnɔŋ awɔ.
89 Bǒ bhɔ bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu árɛ́mɛ́, bábhó bɛrɔ amɔt amɔt, bɛbho nɛ baseansi. Yesu arɔp aywǐnti nɛ ngɔrɛ́ wu arɛ́ téé, bɛsí bhi.
810 Yesu ayoŋ amɨ́k arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Mma, bɔ́ báchí fá? Yɛ̌ mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ rɛm bɛ mángwáy wɔ?”
811 Akɛmɛ Yesu bɛ, “Ɛta, yɛ̌ amɔt.” Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Mɛ nkwɔ́ mbɨ́kɨ́ rɛm bɛ mángwáy wɔ. Dɔ́k, kɛ ɔ́kɛ́ pɛrɛ kʉ bɛbʉ́”. 
812 Yesu apɛt abho bɛ́gháti bho mɛnyɨŋ. Arɛm bɛ, “Nchí ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛnɛ ɛ́chyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m. Mmu anɛ ábhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ mɛ, ǎbhɔŋ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kʉ̀ bo mámbɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m, nɛ apú kɔ amɛm ɛjuri.”
813 Bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bárɛm yɛ ntá yi bɛ, “Wɔ mbɔŋ ɔ́rɛ̀m ɛ̌ti mmʉɛt yɛ. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɔ́rɛ̀m puyɛ̌ ndak.”
814 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Yɛ̌ ɛ́mbak bɛ nchí rɛm chi ɛ̌ti mmʉɛ́t ɛya, ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mɛ́rɛ̀m chí mbɔŋ ndak, mbɔnyunɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ mfú nɛ ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ mɛ́rɔ̀ŋ. Kɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ mfú nɛ ɛbhak anɛ mɛ̌rɔ̀ŋ.
815 Bǎyɨ̀ŋɨ bho chí nɛ amɨ́k kɛ mǎmkpɔt manyé yap. Mɛmbɔŋ mpú kpɔ́t manyé mmu.
816 Yɛ̌ ɛ́mbak chí bɛ́ mɛ́tàŋ bhó, ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ mɛ́tàŋ ɛ́chí ɛrɨ́rɨ́ mbɔnyunɛ puyɛ̌ mɛ awántí kɛ nchí taŋ bo. Mɛ nɛ mmu anɛ átó mɛ kɛ sɛ́rɛ̀m ɛnyǔ mmu áchí.
817 Básɨŋ ndǔ ɛkáti bɛbhé ɛyɛka bɛ, batísiɛ bati apay mándɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt, nɔ́ chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bɔ́ bárɛ́mɛ́ ɛ́chí tɛtɛp.
818 Mɛmbɔŋ nchí te ntísiɛ bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ́rɛ̀m chí mbɔ̌ŋ ndak, nɛ Ɛtaya mmu átó mɛ ǎtè mɛ ntísiɛ nkwɔ́ bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌rɛ̀m ɛchi tɛtɛp.”
819 Bábhɛ́p yɛ yi bɛ, “Ɛtayɛ achí fá?” Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mɛ, nɛ yɛ̌ Ɛtaya, bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ. Mbɔ bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛ, mbʉ bǎrɨŋɨ Ɛtaya nkwɔ.”
820 Mpok Yesu átɔ̀ŋ bho amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm kɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́ bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn. Achí nyaka kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ bɛkʉbhɛ akap. Yɛ̌ mmu kɛtɔk yí mbɔnyunɛ mpok yi abhɨ́kɨ́ re kway nyaka. 
821 Yesu apɛt aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Nchí rɔ bhe, bɛ́rɔŋ. Nnáŋ ndɔ́k, chɔŋ mǎnjaŋ mɛ. Kɛ bǎgu chɔŋ ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka. Bǎpú kwáy bɛ́twɔ ɛbhak ɛnɛ mɛ́rɔ̀ŋ.”
822 Bo Israɛl bábhó yɛ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Yí bɛ ‘Nɛbhʉɛt anɛ mɛ̌rɔ̀ŋ, bǎpú kwáy bɛ́twɔ arɛ,’ ǎyaŋ bɛway mmʉɛt kɛ?”
823 Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎchí bǒ mmɨk. Mfu chi amfay. Bǎchí bǒ mmɨk nɛ, mpú mmǔ mmɨk nɛ.
824 Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ ngáti be bɛ́ chɔŋ mǎngú ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka. Chɔŋ mǎngú ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka mbák bǎbhɨkɨ noko bɛ́ nchí mmu anɛ nchí.”
825 Bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Wɔ ɔchí agha?” Yesu ákɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Nchí mmu anɛ ngáti bhe tɛ nɛbhǒnɛt bɛ nchi.
826 Mbɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ̌kwáy bɛrɛm ɛ̌ti yɛka nɛ nsɔt bɛtaŋ be. Kɛ mpú kʉ nɔ, mbɔnyunɛ mmu anɛ átó mɛ ǎbhʉɛrɛ bariɛp ami, nɛ ndiɛrɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ághàti mɛ kɛ nchí ghati bǒ mmɨk.”
827 Ɛnɛ Yesu árɛ̀m nɔ, bɔ́ kɛjwimɛm bɛ́ yi árɛ̀m chí ɛ̌ti Ɛta.
828 Ɛ́kʉ́ Yesu aghati yɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mǎnáŋ mǎnjoŋ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm amfay, chɔŋ mǎndɨŋɨ bɛ́ nchí mmu anɛ nchí, nɛ bɛ́ mpú kʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ndǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbha. Nchí rɛm chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛta ágháti mɛ ndɛ́m.
829 Nɛ yí mmú átó mɛ, achi nɛ mɛ. Abhɨ́kɨ́ rɔ mɛ mbak awanti mbɔnyunɛ mɛ́kʉ̀ chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ákɔ́ŋɔ́.”
830 Bɛyǎ bó abhɛn bághókó bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn, mánóko yi. 
831 Yesu arɛm yɛ ntá bo Israɛl abhɛn mánóko yi bɛ, “Bǎchí bakoŋo bha tɛtɛp mbák mǎndɔ́k ambɨ bɛkoŋo bɛyɔŋ ɛbha,
832 nɛ chɔŋ mǎndɨŋɨ tɛtɛp anɛ Mandɛm, nɛ tɛtɛp wu amfɛrɛ be ndǔ kɛsɛm.”
833 Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Sɛ́chí bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Ábraham, nɛ yɛ̌ mpok apú anɛ sɛ́chí basɛm ntá mmu. Ndaká yí ɔ́rɛ̀m bɛ chɔŋ sɛ́mfú ndǔ kɛsɛm?”
834 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ bɛbʉ́, achí nsɛmɛ́-bɛbʉ.
835 Nsɛm apú bhak ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt mpoknkɛm. Mmɔ̌ nnɛrɛ́kɛt kɛ ábhák arɛ mpoknkɛm.
836 Mbák yɛ mbɔ̌ŋ mmɔ́ amfɛrɛ be ndǔ kɛsɛm, chɔŋ mǎmbak ngǎngaŋ tɛtɛp.
837 Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ bǎchí bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Ábraham. Yɛ̌ nɔ́, bǎyaŋ mbi bɛway mɛ mbɔnyunɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛya ɛ́pú chwe amɛm batɨ yɛka.
838 Nchí ghati bhe chí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ngɔ́ ntá Ɛtaya, kɛ bǎkʉ̀ chí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɛtayɛka ágháti bhe.”
839 Bágháti Yesu bɛ, “Ɛtayɛsɛ chi Ábraham.” Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Mbɔ bǎchí bɔ̌ Ábraham tɛtɛp, mbʉ́ bǎkʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ Ábraham ákʉ̀ nyaka.
840 Kɛ bǎyàŋ mbi bɛway mɛ, mɛ mmu ngátí bhe tɛtɛp anɛ ngókó ntá Mandɛm. Ábraham apú kʉ nyaka nɔ.
841 Bǎkʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛtayɛka.” Bágháti yi bɛ, “Mandɛm kɛ achi ɛtayɛsɛ, sɛ́pú bɔ̌-ɛnɔŋ.”
842 Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Mbɔ Mandɛm achi ɛtayɛka, mbʉ bǎkɔ̀ŋ mɛ, mbɔnyunɛ mfú chí ntá Mandɛm. Mbɨ́kɨ́ twɔ́ chí ndǔ mmʉɛt ya, yi kɛ átó mɛ.
843 Ndaká yí bǎpú jwimɛm ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ́rɛ̀m? Chi mbɔnyunɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ntɨ bɛghok bɛyɔŋ ɛbha.
844 Bě bǎchi bɔ̌ ɛtayɛka Satan, nɛ bǎkɔŋ bɛkʉ chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɛtayɛka áyàŋ mǎnkʉ. Achí ngwayti bho tɛ nɛbhǒnɛt. Abhɨ́kɨ́ kɔŋ tɛtɛp Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ tɛtɛp apu nɛ yi. Mpok yi ásè nsé, ǎkʉ̀ chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kɔ́ ndɔ́ŋ ámɔt nɛ ɛpɨŋ ɛyi, mbɔnyunɛ achi nsěnse, nɛ nsé ɛnkɛm ɛ́fù chí ntá yi.
845 Kɛ tɛ̌ndu mɛ̌ghàti bhe chí tɛtɛp Mandɛm, bǎpú noko ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌rɛ̀m.
846 Ntɨkɨ mmǔ ákwày bɛtɔŋ bɛ nkʉ bɛbʉ́? Mɛ̌rɛ̀m chi tɛtɛp, ndaká yí bǎpú noko mɛ?
847 Mmu anɛ Mandɛm áchí ɛtayi, ǎkɔŋ bɛghok ɛyɔŋ ɛyi. Ntí anɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ kɔŋ bɛghok Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm achí bɛ bǎpú bɔ̌bhi.”
848 Bǒbati bo Israɛl bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ nɛfwɔp bɛrɛm bɛ ɔchí mmu Samária nɛ bɛ́ ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ́sɔ̀ŋɔri wɔ?”
849 Yesu akɛmɛ bɛ, “Mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ. Mɛ̌chyɛ̀ Ɛtaya kɛnókó, kɛ bǎchɔŋti nnyɛ́n ɛna.
850 Mbɨ́kɨ́ bhʉɛrɛ ntɨ bɛ́ bo mánchyɛ́ mɛ kɛnókó. Kɛ mmǔ achí anɛ áyàŋ bɛ́ bo mánchyɛ́ mɛ kɛnókó, nɛ yí kɛ ákway bɛrɛm ɛnyǔ mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́bhak.
851 Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, mmu anɛ ábhʉ̀rɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛya, apú gú wáwák.”
852 Bo Israɛl bhɔ bárɛm bɛ, “Bɛ́kóŋo bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛ, sɛ́ghɔ nɛ́nɛ bɛ ɔbhɔŋ ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ. Ábraham agǔ nyaka, barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm mankɛm bágú nkwɔ, kɛ wɔ, ɔ̌rɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Mbák mmu ámbʉ́rɛ́ bɛyɔŋ ɛbha apú gú wáwák.’
853 Wɔ, ɔchá ɛtayɛsɛ Ábraham mmu ágú nyaka? Barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm nkwɔ bágú nyaka! Ɔ̌sɔ̀t mmʉɛt yɛ mbɔ agha?”
854 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mbák mɛ̌chyɛ̀ mmʉɛ́t ɛya kɛnókó, nɔ́ kɛnókó ɛka kɛ́pú yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Ɛtaya kɛ áchyɛ̀ mɛ kɛnókó, nɛ nkúbhɛ́ yi kɛ bǎrɛ̀m bɛ achi Mandɛm aywɛka.
855 Kɛ yɛ̌ndu bǎrɛ̀m bɛ yi achi Mandɛm aywɛka, bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ yi, mɛ kɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ yi. Mbɔ ndɛm bɛ́ mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ yi, mbʉ nchí se chi nse mbɔ běka. Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ yi nɛ nchí bhʉɛrɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛyi.
856 Chi-mbɨ ywɛka Ábraham, ǎnòŋ nyaka nɛ maŋák bɛ́ghɔ nywɔp nɛtwɔ ɛna. Aghɔ́ nɔ́, ntɨ nɛ́rɨ yi amɛm.”
857 Bǒbati bo Israɛl bhɔ bárɛm yɛ ntá yi bɛ, “Ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ re ghaka yɛ̌ mamiɛ́ bɛsa bɛpay nsɛm byo, ɔbhɛ́ ɔnáŋ ɔghɔ Abraham-ɛ?”
858 Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, Ábraham ápɛ́rɛ bhák, Mɛ Nchí.”
859 Ɛ́kʉ bábho bɛbwɔpti batay bɛtɛmti yi nɛ yɔ́ mángwáy, kɛ Yesu abhɛsɛ, tɛ áfú amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm.
9
91 Ɛnɛ́ Yesu áfʉɛ̀t árɔ̀ŋ, aghɔ́ mmú anɛ achi nnɛ́mámɨk tɛ ndǔ nɛbhe ɛni.
92 Bakoŋo bhi bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, bɛbʉ́ agha bɛkʉ amɨ́k mmǔ nɛ ánɛ́mɛ́? Ɛbhi yímbɔŋ, kɛ ɛbhɛn chi nɛ nnɔ?”
93 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Puyɛ̌ chi bɛ́ mmǔ-nɛ akʉ bɛbʉ́, nɛ puyɛ̌ chí bɛ ɛtayi nɛ máyi bakʉ bɛbʉ́. Amɨ́k ánɛmɛ yi chi bɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́nkwak bo mángɔ ɛnyǔ ɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛnɛ Mandɛm aywǐnti ákway bɛkʉ.
94 Sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛkʉ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn mmu anɛ átó mɛ ndǔ mpok anɛ bɛti bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ re twɔ. Bɛti bɛ́twɔ̀, nɛ mɛ́náŋ mɛ́ntwɔ́, yɛ̌ mmu apú pɛrɛ kway bɛkʉ bɛtɨk.
95 Mpoknkɛm anɛ nchí fá amɨk, nchí ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ntá bǒ mmɨk.”
96 Árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, apá batiɛ́ amɨk, anywɔbhɛri ntɔp nɛ sɛnɔŋ awɔ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yi apá batiɛ́, asɔt ntɔp wu achɔri yi amɨ́k
97 aghati yi bɛ, “Dɔ́k ndǔ ɛ̌ntɨ́ŋnyɛ́n Sílom, sǒ bɛsí arɛ́.” Sílom chi “Bátó”. Mmu wu arɔk, aso bɛsí arɛ nɛ mpok ápɛ̀tnsɛm are ghɔ́ mbaŋ.
98 Bakokosi bhi nɛ bǒ mankɛm abhɛn bárɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka yi mbɔ nnɨŋɨ́ mɛnɨ́ŋɨ́, bábho bɛrɛm bɛ, “Pú mmú nyaka áchɔ̀kɔ anɨŋɨ nɔkɔ mɛnɨ́ŋɨ́ nɛ?”
99 Mbɔk bho bárɛ́ rɛm bɛ, “Chí yi.” Báchák bɛ, “Ǎe, kɛ achí mbɔ yi,” kɛ yímbɔŋ arɛm bɛ, “Chí mɛ.”
910 Bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ɛ́fákárí ná kɛ ɔbho bɛghɔ mbaŋ?”
911 Akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mmu anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Yesu kɛ ányɔ́bhɛ́rí ntɔp, asɔt, achɔri mɛ amɨ́k, arɛm bɛ ndɔ́k ndǔ ɛ̌ntɨ́ŋnyɛ́n Sílom nsó bɛsí arɛ. Ndɔk arɛ́ nso bɛsɨ́, mbo bɛghɔ mbaŋ.”
912 Bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Mmǔ-rɛ́ achí fá?” Akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ.” 
913 Básɔt nnɛ́mámɨk anɛ Yesu ákʉ́ yi ághɔ̀ mbaŋ bárɔ́k ntá bǒnkwɔ Fárisi.
914 Ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt bo Israɛl kɛ Yesu ányɔ́bhɛ́rí nyaka ntɔp awati yi amɨ́k, amɨ́k anɛnɛ yi.
915 Bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bápɛt bábhɛp yi ɛnyu ɛ́fákari kɛ yi ághɔ̀ mbaŋ. Aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Awátí ntɔp mɛ amɨ́k, nsó nɔ́kɔ́ bɛsí, mbo bɛghɔ mbaŋ.”
916 Mbɔk bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bhɔ bárɛm bɛ, “Mmǔ anɛ akʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ fú chi ntá Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ apú noko nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt ɛnɛsɛ.” Kɛ bachak báré rɛm bɛ, “Ná mmu bɛbʉ́ ákway bɛkʉ mɛnyǔ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛn?” Akɔrɛ akwɛn nɛntɨ ɛnap.
917 Bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bápɛt bábhɛ́p nnɛ́mámɨk anɛ Yesu ákʉ yi ághɔ̀ mbaŋ bɛ, “Wɔ bɛ́ mmu wu kɛ ákʉ́ ɔ́ghɔ̀ mbaŋ, ɔkáysí bɛ yi achi agha?” Akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Chí ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm.”
918 Bǒbati bo Israɛl kɛnókó bɛ amɨ́k anaŋ anɛmɛ nyaka yi kɛ apɛt abho bɛghɔ mbaŋ, kpatɛ mpok bábhɨ́ŋɨ́ máyi nɛ ɛtayi,
919 bábhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Mmɔ̌ ywɛka nɛ, bárɛ̀m bɛ́ amɨ́k anɛmɛ yi tɛ̌ndu nɛbhe ɛni? Ɛ́fakari ná kɛ yi ághɔ̀ mbaŋ nɛ́nɛ?”
920 Nnɔ nɛ chi bákɛmɛ bɛ, “Sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ nɛ chi mmɔ́ ywɛsɛ, nɛ bɛ́ amɨ́k anɛmɛ yi tɛ̌ndu nɛbhe ɛni.
921 Kɛ sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛnyu ɛ́fákárí kɛ yi ághɔ̀ mbaŋ nɛ́nɛ. Nɛ sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mmǔ anɛ anɛnɛ yi amɨ́k. Bɛ́p ká yi. Apú chí mandú mmɔ́. Chɔŋ yímbɔŋ angati bhe.”
922 Chi nɛ nnɔ bákɛ́mɛ ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ báchày nyaka bǒbati bo Israɛl nɛ ntí bɛ báká nyaka ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt bɛ mbák mmu ándɛm bɛ Yesu chi Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò, bábòk yi ndǔ ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí ɛyap.
923 Ɛkʉ yɛ chi nɛ nnɔ bárɛm chi bɛ, “Ápú mandú mmɔ́. Bɛ́p ká yímbɔŋ angati bhe.”
924 Ndɔŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́jwí ɛpay, bábhɨ́ŋɨ nnɛ́mámɨk anɛ Yesu ákʉ yi ághɔ̀ mbaŋ, baghati yi bɛ, “Dɛm tɛtɛp aywɛ bɛsí Mandɛm. Sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ mmǔ anɛ ɔ́rɛ̀m nɔ bɛ anɛ́nɛ́ wɔ amɨ́k chi mmǔ bɛbʉ́.”
925 Akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Kɛ chí mmǔ bɛbʉ́ kɛ puyɛ̌ mmǔ bɛbʉ̌-a, mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ. Ɛnɛ́ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ chi bɛ nchí nyaka nnɛ́mámɨk, kɛ nɛ́nɛ nchí ghɔ mbaŋ.”
926 Bábhɛp yi bɛ, “Akʉ́ yi ntá yɛ? Ná yi ákʉ́ kɛ ɔ̌ghɔ mbaŋ?”
927 Akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Nnáŋ ngáti bhe, kɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ noko, ndaká yí bǎpɛt bǎbhɛ̀p mɛ? Bě nkwɔ́ báyàŋ bɛbhak bakoŋo bhi?”
928 Bábhó bɛsɔkɔti yi mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Wɔ kɛ ɔ́chí nkoŋo ywi, bɛsɛ sɛ́chí chí bakoŋo Moses.
929 Sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ Mandɛm arɛm nyaka kɛpɨ nɛ Moses, kɛ mmǔ-nɛ, sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ yi áfú.”
930 Akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Ɛchí mɛ nɛpɔp tontó bɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ yi áfú, yɛ̌ndu yi ánɛ́nɛ́ mɛ amɨ́k!
931 Sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ Mandɛm apu ghok bǒ bɛbʉ́. Ǎghok chi mmu anɛ áchyɛ̀ yi kɛnókó, ankʉ nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi Mandɛm áyàŋ.
932 Tɛ̌ mmɨk ábhó, sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ re ghók bɛ mmu akʉ amɨ́k ánɛ́nɛ́ mmu anɛ bábhé yi amɨ́k nɛ́mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́.
933 Mbɔ mmǔ nɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ fú chi ntá Mandɛm, mbʉ abhɨkɨ kway bɛ́kʉ ɛnɛ ɛnyɨŋ.”
934 Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Kwáé, wɔ mmu bábhé ndǔ bɛbʉ́, ɔ́yàŋ bɛtɔŋ bhɛsɛ?” Bapuri yí bátɛ́n nɛfí bɛ ámfú ɛkɛt nɛnɨkímʉɛt ɛyap. 
935 Yesu aghók bɛ́ bábók mmu anɛ yi ákʉ́ amɨ́k ánɛ́nɛ́ batɛn nɛfí. Abho bɛyaŋ yi. Ághɔ́ nɔkɔ yi, abhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ɔnókó Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm?”
936 Yi akɛmɛ Yesu bɛ, “Ɛta, mmu wu chi agha? Ghatí mɛ, bɛ nnókó yi.”
937 Yesu aghati yi bɛ, “Ɔnáŋ ɔghɔ̌ yi, nɛ yí kɛ árɛ̀m kɛpɨ nɛ wɔ nɛ́nɛ.”
938 Mmǔ wu arɛm bɛ, “Acha, nnókó.” Akwɛ́n Yesu bɛkak, abho bɛ́chyɛ yi kɛnókó.
939 Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Ntwɔ fá amɨk bɛ mámkpɔ́t manyé bho. Ntwɔ bɛ́ bo abhɛn bachi amɨ́k nɛ́mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́ mangɔ mbaŋ, nɛ bɛ́ amɨ́k ánɛ́mɛ́ abhɛn bághɔ̀ mbaŋ.”
940 Mbɔk bǒnkwɔ Fárisi abhɛn bachi nyaka kɛkwɔt bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́, bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ɔ̌rɛ̀m nɔ chi bɛ bɛsɛ nkwɔ sɛ́chí amɨ́k nɛ́mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́ kɛ?”
941 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mbɔ bǎchí amɨ́k nɛ́mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́ mbʉ́ bɛbʉ́ bɛ́pú nɛ bhe. Kɛ tɛ̌ndu bǎrɛ̀m bɛ bǎghɔ̀ mbaŋ, bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka bɛrɔp nɛ bhe.”
10
101 Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, mmǔ anɛ ápú fʉɛ́t ndǔ nnyǔbha ánchwe ndǔ nkwɔ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n, kɛ ǎko chí ɛbhak ɛ́chák anchwe amɛm, chí ngɛ́p. Mbák ɛ́pú nɔ, chí ngɛ́bhɛ́ ntantaŋ.
102 Kɛ anɛ áfʉɛ̀t ndǔ nyǔbhá, chí mbabhɛri bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n.
103 Mbabhɛri nnyǔbha, ǎnɛ̀nɛ nyǔbhá ntá yi. Bághɔ́ŋɔ́mɛn árɨŋɨ ɛyɔŋ ɛyi. Ǎbhɨŋɨ yɔ́ ndǔ manyɛ́n ayap, ansɔt yɔ́ amfu nɛ yɔ.
104 Nɛ ánáŋ ántɛ́n yɔ́ ankɛm nɛfí, ǎrɔ́ŋ ambɨ, yɔ́ ánkoŋo nɔkɔ ansɛm, mbɔnyunɛ árɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛyɔŋ ɛyi.
105 Ápú koŋo kɛnkɔ̌ mmu. Ǎbʉɛ̀ yi bʉɛ, mbɔnyunɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛyɔŋ ɛyi.”
106 Yesu atɛ́m bo Israɛl nɛkay ɛnɛn, kɛ bɔ́ kɛjwimɛm ndǔ ntí nɛkay. 
107 Ɛkʉ, Yesu apɛt aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, mɛ kɛ nchí nyǔbhá bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n.
108 Bǒ mankɛm abhɛn bayambɨ bátwɔ́ kɛ mɛ̌twɔ̀, chí baghɛ́p nɛ baghɛ́p bataŋ bataŋ. Baghɔŋɔmɛn ábhɨ́kɨ́ ghók bhɔ.
109 Mɛ kɛ nchí mbǐnywɔp. Mmu anɛ áfʉɛ̀t ntá ya kɛ anchwe, ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́pú tɔk yi. Ǎchwè, amfú mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi ákɔ́ŋɔ́, ambɔ́ŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi áyàŋ.
1010 Ngɛ́p ǎtwɔ̀ chí bɛ́ghɛp aghɛ́p, bɛ́wáy, nɛ bɛ́chɔ́ŋti. Ntwɔ bɛ́ bo mámbɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m nɛ bɛ́ mámbɔ́ŋ nɔ nɛ́njwí pɔɔt nɛ áfɔ́k ankɛm.
1011 “Mɛ kɛ nchí ɛrɨ́tí mbabhɛri bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n. Ɛrɨ́tí mbabhɛri bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n ǎchyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m ɛni ɛ̌ti bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n ayi.
1012 Mmǔ anɛ básɔ́rɛ́ ndǔ bɛtɨk bɛ ámbábhɛ́rí nɔ́kɔ́ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n ɛnɛ́ yi ápú mbabhɛri bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n nɛ yɔ apu ayi, ǎghɔ nkwɔ ndu átwɔ̀ andɔ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n ambʉɛ́, nkwɔ ankɛ́m mbɔk, nɛ antak achak.
1013 Ǎbʉɛ́ mbɔnyunɛ achí chí mǔbɛtɨk, nɛ ápú fyɛ́ ntí nɛ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n.
1014 Mmɛ kɛ nchí ɛrɨ́tɨ́ Mbabhɛri bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n. Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n aya, nɛ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n aya árɨŋɨ mɛ,
1015 nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛtaya árɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛ, mɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ Ɛtaya. Nɛ nchí chyɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ ɛ̌ti bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n.
1016 Mbɔ̌ŋ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n áchák anɛ́ ápú ndǔ nkwɔ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n anɛ. Mbɔŋ bɛ́sɔt yɔ́ nkwɔ, ntwɔ́ nɛ yɔ, bɛ́ ánchɛ́m mmʉɛt nɛ anɛ́fú. Chɔŋ ánkoŋo ɛyɔŋ ɛya. Ɛnkʉ yɔ́ ankɛm ámbak ndǔ nkwɔ́ ámɔt anɛ́ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ mbabhɛri bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n amɔt.
1017 Ɛtaya akɔŋ mɛ mbɔnyunɛ nchí chyɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛna bɛ mpɛt mbɔŋ nɔ.
1018 Yɛ̌ mmu apú anɛ ásɔ̀t nɛpɛ́m ɛna ntá ya. Mɛmbɔ̌ŋ kɛ nchí chyɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛna. Mbɔ̌ŋ bɛtaŋ bɛ́chyɛ nɔ, nɛ mbɔ̌ŋ bɛtaŋ bɛ́pɛ́t bɛbhɔŋ nɔ. Ɛnɛ, chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ Ɛtaya ághátí mɛ nkʉ.”
1019 Bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kʉ ákɔrɛ ápɛt ákwɛ́n nɛntɨ bo Israɛl.
1020 Bɛyǎ bhap báré rɛm bɛ, “Ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ́sɔ̀ŋɔri yi! Ǎbhokori! Ndaká yí bǎté, bǎghòk ɛnyɨŋ yi árɛ̀m?”
1021 Kɛ báchák báré rɛm chi bɛ, “Puyɛ̌ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmu anɛ ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ́sɔ̀ŋɔri yi akwáy bɛrɛm nɛ. Ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ́kwày bɛ́kʉ nnɛ́mámɨ́k ángɔ́ mbaŋ-á?” 
1022 Mpok aghaka anɛ bo Israɛl mányìɛ ɛpa ɛnɛ bátɨ̀k ndu mánɨ́kɨ́mʉɛt báfyɛ́ ɛkɛrákap ɛnɛ Yerúsalɛm awɔ Mandɛm.
1023 Mbaŋ are kwɛn, Yesu arɔk ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, are kɔ ndu mɔ́kɛt mambarɛnkók anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ́ mɔ́kɛt mambarɛnkók Sólomon.
1024 Bo Israɛl bárɔ́k, bákáp yi, bábhó bɛbhɛp yi bɛ, “Chɔŋ ɔ́ndɔ sɛ́noŋ ɛntat ná kɛ ɔ́ngati bhɛsɛ mbák wɔ kɛ ɔ́chí Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò. Mbák wɔ kɛ ɔchí Mpɛmɛ, ghatí bhɛsɛ́ kpoŋoroŋ.”
1025 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Nnáŋ ngáti bhe, kɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ noko. Bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn mɛ̌kʉ̀ ndǔ nnyɛ́n Ɛtaya bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ be ɛnyǔ mmu nchí.
1026 Yɛ̌ nɔ, bǎpú noko mbɔnyunɛ bǎpú ndǔ nkwɔ́ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n aya.
1027 Bághɔ́ŋɔ́mɛn aya ághòk ɛyɔŋ ɛya. Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ yɔ́, nɛ yɔ ákòŋo mɛ.
1028 Nɛ nchí chyɛ yɔ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti. Ápú gú ánɛ́m. Mmu apú anɛ ákwày bɛ́fɛrɛ yɔ́ amɔ́ya.
1029 Ɛtaya mmu áchyɛ́ mɛ yɔ, achá bo mankɛm. Nɛ mmu apú kwáy bɛfɛrɛ yɔ ndu amɔ yi.
1030 Mɛ nɛ Ɛtaya sɛ́chí mmu amɔt.”
1031 Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, bo Israɛl bápɛt bábho bɛbwɔpti batay ndu bɛtɛmti yi nɛ yɔ́ mángwáy.
1032 Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Ntɔ̌ŋ be bɛyǎ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nkʉ́ ndǔ nnyɛ́n Ɛtaya. Ndu mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm, ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kʉ́ bǎyaŋ bɛway mɛ nɛ batay chí ɛnɛ́?”
1033 Bo Israɛl bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Sɛ́pú yaŋ bɛ́wáy wɔ nɛ batay ɛ̌ti ɛrɨ́tí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́kʉ́, kɛ ɛ̌ti ɔ́rɛ̀m bɛ ɔchí Mandɛm yɛ̌ndu ɔ́chí nkwǎŋwaŋ.”
1034 Yesu akɛmɛ bɔ́ bɛ, “Pú básɨŋ amɛm ɛkáti bɛbhé ɛyɛka bɛ Mandɛm arɛm bɛ, ‘Mɛ ndɛm bɛ́ bǎchí bɔmandɛm’?
1035 Sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m ɛ́pú kway bɛwupsi ɛnyu. Mbák Mandɛm abhɨŋɨ nyaka bo abhɛn bághòk ɛyɔŋ ɛyi bɛ bɔmandɛm,
1036 ná bǎkway bɛrɛm bɛ mɛ̌rɛ̀m bɛ nchí Mandɛm ndǔ ndɛ́mɛ́ bɛ nchí Mmɔ Mandɛm, mmu yi áyábhɛ́ átó fá amɨk?
1037 Mbák mpú kʉ chi bɛtɨk Ɛtaya, bǎkɛ́ noko mɛ.
1038 Kɛ mbák mɛ̌kʉ̀ chí bɛtɨk Ɛtaya, yɛ̌ndu bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ noko mɛ, nokó ká ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛ́n mɛ́kʉ̀ bɛ́ghàti bhe. Chɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́nkwak mǎndɨŋɨ, nɛ mǎnjwimɛm bɛ́ Ɛtaya achi babhat nɛ mɛ, nɛ mɛ nchí babhat nɛ Ɛtaya.”
1039 Bápɛt babho bɛyaŋ mbi ndu bɛkɛm yi, afori bɔ́ amɔ arɔk ɛbhakayi.
1040 Apɛtnsɛm ɛbhě manyu Jɔ́dan, ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ Jɔ̌n ájwìti nyaka bho, abhak arɛ́.
1041 Bɛyǎ bo bárɔ́k ntá yi mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Jɔ̌n ábhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛ́mɔt, kɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́ ɛ̌ti mmǔ anɛ ɛ́chí tɛtɛp.”
1042 Bɛyǎ bo mánóko Yesu ɛbhak ɛyɔ.
11
111 Mmǔ amɔt achi nyaka ɛtɔk Bɛ́tani, anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Lásárɔs. Akwɛ́n nɛme. Bɛ́tani abhak ɛtɔk ɛnɛ María nɛ mɔ́mayi Matá báchɔ̀kɔ.
112 María wu, kɛ áwáti nyaka bɛkak Yesu Acha nɛ bawɛrɛ́riɛp, are tɛsɛ nɛ ɛmɛnɛ́ntí yi. Yi kɛ mɔ́mayi Lásárɔs akwɛnɛ nyaka nɛme.
113 Ɛ́kʉ́ bɔ̌mayi bátó ɛyɔŋ ntá Yesu Acha bɛ, “Acha, mmʉɛrɛ ywɛ anɛ ɔ́kɔ́ŋɔ́ ǎme.”
114 Yesu ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ntó ɛnɛn arɛm bɛ, “Nɛme ɛnɛ́n nɛ́pú nɛmě nɛwú, nɛ́chí chí bɛ́kʉ bo mángɔ́ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm. Nɛ́twɔ chí bɛ nɛ́mbák ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kʉ̀ bo mángɔ́ bɛ Mmɔ Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛtaŋ.”
115 Yesu akɔŋ nyaka Matá nɛ bɔ̌mayi María nɛ Lásárɔs tontó.
116 Yɛ̌ nɔ, mpok yi ághókó bɛ́ Lásárɔs ǎme, achɔkɔ ɛbhak ɛnɛ yi achi ndǔ manywɔp apay.
117 Manywɔp yɔ apay áfʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, arɛm ntá bakoŋo bhi bɛ, “Sɛ́mpɛ́tnsɛm atú Judɛ́ya.”
118 Bakoŋo bhi bárɛm bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ re tat ɛnɛ bǒ batí Israɛl báyàŋ bɛ́tɛmti wɔ nɛ batay mángwáy, ɔbhɛ́ ɔ̌pɛtnsɛm arɛ́?”
119 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Pú maŋɔkɔ́ nywɔp áchi byo nɛ apay bɛ́bho beti bɛ́gháka beku? Mmu anɛ ákɔ̀ nɛ ngósí, apú chɨŋti nɛkwɛn mbɔnyunɛ ǎghɔ̀ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ mmɨk.
1110 Kɛ mmu anɛ ákɔ̀ nɛ bɛti ǎchɨ̀ŋti ankwɛn mbɔnyunɛ mbaŋ apu ghɔ.”
1111 Yesu átɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɛkay ɛnɛn, aghati yɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mmʉɛrɛ ywɛsɛ Lásárɔs akwɛn kɛnɔ́, kɛ nchí rɔŋ mɛ́ŋɛ́mɛ yi ndǔ kɛnɔ́.”
1112 Bakoŋo bhi bárɛm bɛ, “Acha, mbák ǎbhʉ̀rɛ kɛnɔ́, chɔŋ aŋɛmɛ, ambak sayri.”
1113 Kɛnɔ́ ɛkɛn Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ nyaka bɛ Lásárɔs ǎbhʉrɛ kɛbhak chi nɛwú kɛ bákáysi bɛ Yesu arɛm chi bɛ Lásárɔs ábhʉ̀rɛ kɛnɔ́ mbɔ́ŋ.
1114 Ɛ́kʉ́, yɛ Yesu aghati bhɔ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ, “Lásárɔs agu,
1115 nɛ ɛ̌ti yɛka, mbɔ̌ŋ maŋák bɛ mpú arɛ́ mbɔnyunɛ ɛfakari chi bɛ be mǎnókó. Sɛ́ndɔ́k sɛ́ngɔ́ yi.”
1116 Tɔmás anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Ɛfák, arɛm ntá batɨ bakoŋo Yesu abhɛ́nɛ́fú bɛ, “Sɛ́ndɔ́k ká nkwɔ bɛ Yɛ̌ chí nɛwú, sɛ́ngú nɛ yi.” 
1117 Yesu ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ Bɛ́tani, arɛ́, aghɔ́ bɛ́ mǎnáŋ bábhɛ́mɛ Lásárɔs kpát ɛfʉɛt manywɔp anwi.
1118 Bɛ́fu Bɛ́tani bɛ́gháka Yerúsalɛm achi nyaka mbɔ nɛkɔ̌ bɔkilomɛta babay nɛ ɛbhɔk,
1119 nɛ bɛyǎ bo Israɛl bárɔ́k bɛ́wáka nɛ Matá nɛ María ndǔ nɛwú mɔ́mayap.
1120 Matá ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ Yesu ǎtwɔ̀, afú, arɔk atɛmɛri yi ɛnɛ́ María árɔ́bhɛ́ anywɔ́p.
1121 Matá ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ Yesu, arɛm bɛ, “Acha, mbɔ ɔchí fá, mbʉ mɔ́maya abhɨkɨ gu!
1122 Kɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ yɛ̌ chí nɛ́nɛ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́bhɛ́bhɛ́ Mandɛm ǎchyɛ.”
1123 Yesu aghati Matá bɛ, “Chɔŋ mɔ́mayɛ ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.”
1124 Matá arɛm bɛ, “Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ chɔŋ ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛwak ɛnɛ bawú mankɛm bápɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, ndǔ ngwɛnti mmɨk.”
1125 Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Mɛ kɛ nchí kʉ bawú mampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, mámbak nɛpɛ́m. Mmu anɛ ánókó mɛ, yɛ̌ angú gú, chɔŋ ampɛt ambak nɛpɛ́m.
1126 Nɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ áchí nɛpɛ́m, anoko mɛ, apú gú wáwák. Matá, ɔnókó bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn?”
1127 Matá akɛmɛ bɛ, “Acha, nnókó. Nnókó bɛ́ ɔchí Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò, Mmɔ Mandɛm anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛ́twɔ fá amɨk.” 
1128 Matá árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, arɔk abhɨŋɨ mɔ́mayi María, aghati yí ndǔ ɛyu bɛ, “Ntɔŋ atwɔ, nɛ ǎyáŋ bɛghɔ wɔ́.”
1129 María ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, afate, áyák arɔk ntá Yesu.
1130 Yesu abhɨ́kɨ́ re ghaka nyaka ɛtɔk, abhak chí ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ Matá atɛmɛri yi.
1131 Bo Israɛl abhɛn báchí anywɔ́p nɛ María báwaka nɛ yi, bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ yi afate áyák áfú nɛfí, bákóŋo yi nɛ nkaysi bɛ ǎrɔ̀ŋ ndǔ nnɛm bɛdi kɛbhɔ arɛ.
1132 María arɔk nɛbhʉɛt anɛ Yesu achi. Nɛghɔ́ yí ághɔ́ Yesu, akwɛ́n yi bɛkak abho bɛrɛm bɛ, “Acha, mbɔ ɔchí fá, mbʉ́ mɔ́maya abhɨ́kɨ́ gú!”
1133 Yesu ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ María ádì nɛ bo Israɛl abhɛn bátwɔ́ bɛ́wáka nɛ yi bádì nkwɔ, ɛ́tɔ́k yi tɛ antɨ, ntínso nɛ́kɛ́m yi.
1134 Abhɛ́p bhɔ́ bɛ, “Bábhɛ́mɛ́ yi fá?” Bákɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Acha, twɔ́ ghɔ́.”
1135 Yesu adi.
1136 Ɛ́kʉ́ bo Israɛl bhɔ bábhó bɛrɛm nɛ batɨ bɛ, “Akɔŋ nyaka Lásárɔs achá! Ghɔ ndu áré di.”
1137 Kɛ mbɔk ɛyap báré rɛm chi bɛ, “Yi mmu ákʉ́ nnɛ́mámɨ́k ǎghɔ mbaŋ, apú kwáy nyaka bɛkʉ bɛ Lásárɔs ákɛ́ gú?” 
1138 Ɛ́pɛ́t ɛtɔk Yesu tontó, afa, arɔk ndǔ nnɛm. Nnɛm ɛnɔ nɛ́bhak chi mbok anɛ achi ndǔ sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́. Mánaŋ básɔt nyaka ntay nɛgho bákúti nyǔnɛm.
1139 Yesu aghati yɛ bo abhɛn bachi arɛ bɛ, “Bɨŋɨrí ká ntay ɛnɔ fɛrɛ́.” Kɛ Matá, manɔ ngú arɛm bɛ, “Acha, ɛriɛp ɛ́ya chɔŋ ɛncha. Ɛ́kʉ manywɔp anwi ɛchɔŋ ɛnɛ́ bábhɛ́mɛ́ yi!”
1140 Yesu aghati Matá bɛ, “Matá, pú ngátí wɔ́ bɛ mbák ɔnókó, chɔŋ ɔ́ngɔ́ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm?”
1141 Bábɨ́ŋɨri yɛ ntay ɛnɔ báfɛ́rɛ anyǔ nnɛm. Yesu ayoŋ amɨ́k ayɨŋɨ mfay arɛm bɛ, “Ɛta, nkáká wɔ bɛ́ ɔghok mɛ.
1142 Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ ɔ̌ghok mɛ mpoknkɛm, kɛ ndɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ chí ɛ̌ti bo abhɛn bachi fá téé bɛ́ mánkwáy mɛnoko bɛ wɔ kɛ ɔ́tó mɛ fá amɨk.”
1143 Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, abɨk bɛ, “Lásárɔs, fú twɔ́!”
1144 Lásárɔs mmu anɛ ánáŋ ágú nyaka, afú ndǔ nnɛm, nɛ ndɛn ɛnɛ mánɛ́bhɛ́ yí amɔ nɛ bɛkak nɛ bɛsí kɛ bábhɛ́mɛ yi. Yesu aghati bɔ bɛ, “Kaŋarí ká ndɛn ɛyɔ yi amʉɛt, bɛ yi ándɔ́k.” 
1145 Bɛyǎ bo Israɛl abhɛn bakoŋo María bághɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu ákʉ́, mánóko yi.
1146 Kɛ mbɔk yap báfá bárɔ́k ntá bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bághati bhɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu akʉ.
1147 Bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bábhɨ́ŋɨ bo ndǔ ɛchɛmɛ́ bǒbati Israɛl. Báchɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɛbhʉɛt amɔt bárɛm bɛ, “Chɔŋ sɛ́nkʉ ná? Mmǔ-nɛ ǎtɔ̀ŋ bɛyǎ bɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay.
1148 Mbák sɛ́ndɔ́ yi andɔk ambɨ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, chɔŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anoko yi. Nɛ mbák ɛ́mfákárí ɛnyu yɔ, bǒ Rom bátwɔ́ mánchɔŋti ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm ɛyɛsɛ nɛ ɛtɔk ɛyɛsɛ.”
1149 Kɛ mmǔ wap amɔt anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Káyfas anɛ achí nyaka mǔngo bachiǎkap Mandɛm ndǔ mmíɛ́ ɛnɔ, arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ yɛ̌nyɨŋ!
1150 Bǎbhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ bɛ ɛrɨ ntá yɛka bɛ mmu amɔt ángú ɛ̌ti bo mankɛm ɛcha bɛ ɛtɔk ɛnkɛm ɛnɛm?”
1151 Káyfas abhɨ́kɨ́ rɛm nyaka nɔ chi mbɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fú ndǔ nkaysi yi. Mandɛm kɛ ákʉ́ nyaka bɛ yi andɛm nɔ mbɔ mǔngo bachiǎkap ndǔ mmíɛ́ ɛnɔ. Arɛm bɛ́ chɔŋ Yesu ángú ɛ̌ti bo Israɛl mankɛm.
1152 Yesu abhɨkɨ bhɔ́ŋ nyaka bɛ́gu chí ndiɛrɛ ɛ̌ti bo Israɛl. Abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛ́gu ɛ̌ti bɔ̌ Mandɛm abhɛn bátáká mmɨk nkɛm bɛ mambak ndǔ nkwɔ́ amɔt.
1153 Bɛ́bhó ɛwak ɛyɔ, bǒbati bo Israɛl báré yáŋ mbi bɛ́wáy Yesu.
1154 Yesu kɛpɛrɛ kɔ yɛ kpoŋoroŋ atú ɛtɔk bo Israɛl. Afa arɛ́, arɔk atú ɛtɔk ɛnɛ ɛchi kɛkwɔt nɛ baso, amɛm ɛtɔk ɛnɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ Ɛfraim, abhak arɛ nɛ bakoŋo bhi.
1155 Mpok mɛnyiɛ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ bo Israɛl arɔp kɛkwɔt. Bɛyǎ bho báfa ndǔ bɔ̌bɛtɔk bhap bako, barɔk Yerúsalɛm ɛnɛ́ mpok ɛpǎ ɛyɔ ábhɨ́kɨ́ re ghaka, ndu bɛkʉ bɛ mámbák pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm mbɔ ɛnyu bo Israɛl bákʉ nɔkɔ nyaka.
1156 Bǒ bhɔ báyàŋ nyaka Yesu, nɛ ndu báchɛ́mɛ́ amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm báré bhɛ́p batɨ bɛ, “Bǎkáysí bɛ́ yí? Bǎkáysí bɛ́ apu twɔ ndǔ ɛpǎ?”
1157 Bǒbati bachiǎkap nɛ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi báchyɛ́ nyaka ɛyɔŋ bɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ árɨŋɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ Yesu achi, ángátí bhɔ́ bɛ mánkɛ́m yi.
12
121 Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ ɛ́rɔ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ manywɔp atandat, Yesu afa arɔk Bɛ́tani. Bɛ́tani abhak ɛtɔk Lásárɔs anɛ Yesu akʉ yi apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
122 Arɛ́, bákʉ́ yi nɛnyíɛ́ běku. Matá kɛ áfʉɛ̀t nyaka nɛnyíɛ́. Lásárɔs abhak mmu amɔt ndǔ bo abhɛn bachɔkɔ mányiɛ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ Yesu.
123 María asɔt ɛsáyrí ɛ́kpɛ́mɛ́ bawɛrɛ́riɛp amɛn áyá nkáp apɨkɨri bɛkak Yesu, antɛsɛ nɔkɔ nɛ ɛmɛnɛ́ntí yi. Ɛkɛt ɛnkɛm ɛ́jwi nɛ ɛrɨ́tí ɛriɛbhɛ́ bawɛrɛ mɔ.
124 Júdas Iskariɔt, nkoŋo Yesu amɔt anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛti yi arɛm bɛ,
125 “Bákway mbʉ bɛti bawɛrɛ́riɛp amɛn anchyɛ nkáp anɛ́ nkʉbɛtɨk ányiɛ ndǔ mmíɛ́. Ndaká yí bábhɨ́kɨ́ tí mɔ́ mánsɔt nkáp mánchyɛ ntá bachɛ́bhɛ́bho?”
126 Júdas abhɨkɨ rɛm nyaka ɛnyu ɛyɔ chi bɛ ǎghɔ báchɛ́bɛ́ bho ntínso. Arɛm nɔ chi ndu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka ntɨ ngɛ́p. Nɛ ndǔ nkwɔ bakoŋo Yesu, yi kɛ áchí nyaka mbʉrɛ nkáp, nɛ ǎsɔ̀t nyaka aywi arɛ́ ansɛm ansɛm anyiɛ nɔkɔ.
127 Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Dɔ̌ yí! Ɛ́rɨ yi ambʉrɛ bawɛt amɛn bɛ ámbák ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn bábhɛmɛ mɛ.
128 Bachɛ́bhɛ́bho bachi nɛ bhe mpoknkɛm, kɛ mpú bhak nɛ bhe mpoknkɛm.” 
129 Bɛyǎ bo Israɛl bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ Yesu achi Bɛ́tani, bárɔ́k arɛ, puyɛ̌ ndiɛrɛ ndu bɛ́ghɔ Yesu kɛ ndu bɛghɔ Lásárɔs nkwɔ mmǔ yi akʉ apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
1210 Ɛ́kʉ́ bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm báté ɛyu bɛ mángwáy Lásárɔs nkwɔ.
1211 Báyàŋ nyaka bɛ mángwáy Lásárɔs nkwɔ mbɔnyunɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛfakari nɛ yi ɛ́kʉ́ nyaka batɨ̌ bo Israɛl bábʉɛ̀ bhɔ, mánoko nɔkɔ Yesu. 
1212 Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, bɛyǎ bo abhɛn bátwɔ́ ndǔ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ bághók bɛ́ Yesu ǎtwɔ̀ Yerúsalɛm.
1213 Ɛ́kʉ́ bo babho bɛ́kpɔ́ti bɛ́wɔ̌amáŋ mandɔkɔ nɔkɔ bɛtɛmɛri yi, mámbɨk mandɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Sɛ́mbɨ́tí Mandɛm mfay! Mandɛm ánjɛ́t mmu anɛ átwɔ̀ ndǔ nnyɛ́n Acha! Sɛ́mbɨ́tɨ́ Mfɔ bo Israɛl!”
1214 Yesu asɔt mɔ́mpɔŋɔ batu, achɔkɔ yɔ́ ansɛm nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu básɨŋɨ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ,
1215 “Bǒ ɛtɔk Síɔn,   bǎkɛ́ cháy. Ghɔ́ ká, Mfɔ ywɛka ǎtwɔ̀, chɔ́kɔ́, amfay mɔ́mpɔŋɔ batu.”
1216 Mpok anɛ barak ayɔ áfákárí, baghɔk Yesu kɛjwimɛm bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn básɨŋɨ ɛ̌ti yi kɛ bɛ́fù nɔ́ tɛtɛp. Kɛ mpok Yesu apɛrɛnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nɛ Mandɛm asɔt yi amfay achyɛ yi kɛnókó, bátɨk yɛ bɛ básɨŋ nyaka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ ɛ̌ti yi. Bátɨk nkwɔ́ ɛnyǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bɛ́fákári ntá yi.
1217 Bo abhɛn bachi nɛ Yesu mpok yi ákʉ́ Lásárɔs afu ndǔ nnɛm báre ghati bo ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fákárí mbɔ batísiɛ Yesu.
1218 Ntí anɛ bɛyǎ bo bárɔ̀ŋ nyaka bɛghɔ Yesu chí bɛ, bághok bɛ́ yi akʉ ɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛyɔ.
1219 Bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ bɛyǎ bo bárɔ̀ŋ ntá Yesu bábho yɛ bɛrɛm nɛ batɨ bɛ, “Sɛ́wày chí mmʉɛt. Yɨ́ŋɨ́, mmɨk nkɛm arɔbhɛ koŋo chi yi.”
1220 Mbɔk bǒ Grik nkwɔ báchí nyaka ndǔ nkwɔ bho abhɛn bárɔ́ŋɔ́ Yerúsalɛm bɛchyɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm ndǔ mpok Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ.
1221 Bǒ Grik bhɔ bárɔ́k ntá Fílip anɛ áfú nyaka Bɛtsáida, atú Gálili barɛm bɛ, “Ɛta, sɛ́yàŋ bɛ́ghɔ Yesu.”
1222 Fílip afa, arɔk aghati Andru. Bɔ́ bati apay bárɔ́k baghati Yesu.
1223 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mpok akway anɛ Mandɛm ákʉ̀ bo mánchyɛ́ Mmu anɛ áfú ntá yi kɛnókó.
1224 Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, mbák bábhɨ́kɨ́ pɨ nyɛ́sɛ́ nchwi amɨk nɛ́mpɔ́, nɛ́bhak chi nyɛ́sɛ́ nchwi nɛmɔt. Kɛ mbák mámpɨ́ nyɛ́sɛ́ nchwi amɨk nɛ́mpɔ, nɛ́nchak, nɛ́chyɛ bɛyǎ nchwi nkɔ.
1225 Mmǔ anɛ ákɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛni, ǎnɛm nɔ́, kɛ mmu anɛ ápú re fyɛ ntí ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛni ɛnɛn fá amɨk apu nɛ́m nɔ́, ǎbhɔŋ nɔ́ kpát anchwe ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
1226 Mmu anɛ áká bɛtok mɛ, abhɔŋ bɛ́kóŋo mɛ. Nɛ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ mɛ̌bhák, arɛ́ kɛ̌ nkʉbɛtɨk awa ábhák nkwɔ. Mbák mmu ántók mɛ, Ɛtaya ǎkʉ yi ambɔŋ kɛnókó.” 
1227 Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Nɛ́nɛ, ntɨ ɛna nɛ́pú amɛm kpák. Chɔŋ ndɛm bɛ yi? Chɔŋ ndɛm chí bɛ ‘Ɛta, fɛrɛ́ mɛ ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ ɛ́twɔ̀ nɛ́ kɛ?’ Wáwák! Mbɔ̌ŋ ɛ̌ti ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ́ kɛ ntwɔ́ fá amɨk!
1228 Ɛta, kʉ bo mánchyɛ́ nnyɛ́n ɛna kɛnókó.” Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, ɛyɔŋ ɛ́fú amfay ɛrɛm bɛ, “Nnáŋ nkʉ nnyɛ́n ɛna nɛ́mbɔ́ŋ kɛnókó nɛ chɔŋ mpɛt nkʉ nɔ.”
1229 Bɛyǎ bo abhɛn bachi arɛ́ téé bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛyɔŋ ɛyɔ, bare rɛm bɛ, “Nɛfaŋ kɛ ásáy!” Báchák bɛ, “Ángɛl Mandɛm árɛ̀m kɛpɨ nɛ yi.”
1230 Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́twɔ́ ɛ̌ti yɛka. Ɛbhɨkɨ twɔ ɛ̌ti ya.
1231 Mpok akway anɛ Mandɛm átàŋ mmɨk nɛ, mpok ákway anɛ báfɛ̀rɛ mfɔ mmɨk nɛ ndǔ kɛfɔ ɛki.
1232 Nɛ mǎnáŋ mamkpáŋ mɛ amfay ndǔ ɛkotákátí, chɔŋ nja bǒ mankɛm bɛ mándɔ́ mmɨk mantwɔ ntá ya.”
1233 Yesu arɛm bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn ndu bɛtɔŋ ɛnyǔ nɛwú ɛnɛn yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́gu.
1234 Bɛyǎ bo abhɛn báchí arɛ bárɛ́m bɛ, “Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́ghati bhɛsɛ bɛ, ‘Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò apú gú. Ndaká yí ɔ́rɛ̀m bɛ chɔŋ mánsɔt mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm mango ndǔ ɛkotákátí? Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm chi agha?’”
1235 Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛ́bhʉɛ́t nɛ bhe ndu mɔ́mbɨŋɨ mpok. Dɔk yɛ ka ambɨ bɛkɔ ndǔ mpok anɛ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛ́bhʉɛ́t nɛ bhe, bɛ ɛjuri ɛkɛ twɔ ɛmfɔkɔri bhe. Mmǔ anɛ ákɔ̀ amɛm ɛjuri, apú rɨŋɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ yi árɔ̀ŋ.
1236 Sɨkɨ́ ká ntɨ nɛ mmǔ anɛ áchyɛ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ nɛ́nɛ, ndǔ yi abhʉɛ́t nɛ bhe, bɛ́ mǎmbák bɔ̌ bɛdyɛrɛ.” Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, arɔk abhɛsɛ ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ bo bápú kwáy bɛghɔ yi.
1237 Yɛ̌ndu yi ákʉ́ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay bɛsí ɛbhap, bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko yí.
1238 Ɛ́bhak ɛnyu ɛyɔ bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Aisáya árɛ́mɛ́ tɛntɛp bɛ́ chɔŋ ɛ́mfakari, ɛ́mfú tɛtɛp. Nɔ chí bɛ, “Ɛta Mandɛm, agha ánókó ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́gháti bhɔ? Agha ághɔ́ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛ?”
1239 Bǒbhɛn bábhɨkɨ kwáy nyaka mɛ́nóko, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu Aisáya apɛt árɛ́mɛ́ nyaka bɛ
1240 “Mandɛm akʉ bɔ́ mámbák amɨ́k nɛ́mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́, agwɔ́t batɨ ayap, báchí mbɔ bo abhɛn bákútí amɨ́k bɛ bákɛ́ ghɔ́ mbaŋ, nɛ bɛ́ batu yap ákɛ́ ghók yɛ̌nyɨŋ, nɛ bɛ bákɛ́ jwimɛm, mantwɔ ntá ya, mbú bhɔ.”
1241 Aisáya arɛm nyaka nɔ mbɔnyunɛ aghɔ nyaka kɛnókó Yesu, nɛ are rɛm ɛ̌ti yi.
1242 Kɛ yɛ̌ndu bɛyǎ bo mánóko nyaka Yesu, bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɛm kpoŋoroŋ bɛ mánóko, ndu báchày bǒnkwɔ Fárisi, bɛ bákɛ́ bók bhɔ ndǔ ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkímʉɛt.
1243 Bákɔŋ kɛnókó ɛkɛn bǒ mmɨk báchyɛ̀ bhɔ, ɛcha kɛnókó ɛkɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ.
1244 Yesu arɛm nɛ ɛyɔŋ amfay bɛ, “Mmǔ anɛ ánókó mɛ, abhɨ́kɨ́ noko chí mɛ, anókó mmu anɛ ato mɛ nkwɔ.
1245 Nɛ mmǔ anɛ ághɔ́ mɛ, ághɔ̌ mmu anɛ átó mɛ nkwɔ.
1246 Ntwɔ fá amɨk mbɔ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ánókó mɛ, ákɛ́ rɔp amɛm ɛjuri.
1247 Mmu anɛ ághókó ɛyɔŋ ɛya kɛ yi kɛkʉ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yí ághókó, mpú táŋ yí. Mbɨ́kɨ́ twɔ fá amɨk bɛ́táŋ bo, ntwɔ chi bɛpɛmɛ bho.
1248 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́chí ɛnɛ ɛ́taŋ mmu anɛ ábyak mɛ, yi kɛnókó ɛyɔŋ ɛya. Chɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ndɛ́mɛ́ mɛntaŋ yi ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn bátaŋ bo.
1249 Ɛbhɔŋ bɛbhak ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n ndɛ́mɛ́, mbɨ́kɨ́ rɛm chí ndǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbha. Ɛtaya mmu átó mɛ kɛ ághátí mɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́rɛm.
1250 Nɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ ɛyɔŋ ɛyi ɛnɛ yí áchyɛ́ mbɔ ɛbhé ɛ́twɔ̀ nɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌rɛ̀m yɛ chí ɛnɛ́ Ɛta ágháti mɛ ndɛm.”
13
131 Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ ɛ́pɛ́rɛ ghaka, Yesu arɨŋɨ bɛ mpok akway anɛ yi árɔ mmɨk, ampɛtnsɛm ntá ɛtayi. Ndǔ yi ákɔ́ŋ nyaka bǒbhi fá amɨk, nɛ́nɛ atɔ́ŋ bɛ́ akɔŋ bɔ acha.
132 Mpok Yesu áchɔ́kɔ́, ányìɛ nɛnyíɛ́, běku nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi. Satan anáŋ achwe nyaka antí Júdas, mmɔ̌ Símun Iskariɔt, ndu bɛkʉ yi ántí Yesu.
133 Yesu arɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ ɛtayi achyɛ yi bɛtaŋ amfay mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm, nɛ bɛ́ yí afú chí ntá Mandɛm nɛ ǎpɛ̀tnsɛm ntá Mandɛm.
134 Mpok báchɔ́kɔ́ mɛnyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɔ, Yesu afaté, afɛrɛ ɛ́wɛt ɛyi amʉɛt, asɔt táwáy atɛ́m ɛbho.
135 Asɔt yɛ manyiɛp afyɛ́ ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ, abho bɛso bɛkak bakoŋo bhi, antɛsɛ nɔkɔ nɛ táwáy anɛ yi átɛ́mɛ́ ɛbho.
136 Áchwɔ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ntá Símun Píta, Píta arɛm bɛ, “Acha, ɔ̌yàŋ bɛso bɛkak ɛbha?”
137 Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Nɛ́nɛ, ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ntí anɛ mɛ̌kʉ̀ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌kʉ̀, kɛ ansɛmpok chɔŋ ɔ́njwimɛm.”
138 Píta arɛm bɛ, “Ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛso mɛ bɛkak wáwák.” Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Mbák mbɨ́kɨ́ so bɛkak ɛbhɛ, nɔ mɛmay nɛ wɔ sɛ́may.”
