139 Píta arɛm ntá Yesu bɛ, “Acha, ɔ́kɛ́ so chi ndiɛrɛ bɛkak ɛbha, sǒ amɔ́ ya nɛ ntí wa nkwɔ!”
1310 Yesu aghati yi bɛ, “Mmǔ anɛ ánáŋ ásó mmʉɛt, abhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ bɛso mmʉɛt, ɛbhɨkɨ fʉɛt bɛkak ɛbhi, mbɔnyunɛ mmʉɛt nkɛm achi pɛ́pɛ́p. Nɛ bǎchi pɛ́pɛ́p, kɛ puyɛ̌ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka.”
1311 Yesu anáŋ arɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛti yi. Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ, “Puyɛ̌ be mankɛm kɛ bǎchí pɛ́pɛ́p.”
1312 Ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́só bɛkak ɛbhap, akɛmɛ nkú amʉɛt, apɛtnsɛm, arɔk, achɔkɔ amɨk. Abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎjwímɛm ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ nkʉ́ ntá yɛka?
1313 Bǎbhɨ̀ŋɨ mɛ bɛ, ‘Ntɔŋ’ nɛ ‘Acha’ nɛ ɛ́chí tɛtɛp. Nchí Ntɔŋ nɛ Acha ntá yɛka.
1314 Mbák mɛ, Acha nɛ Ntɔŋ aywɛka nsó bɛkak ɛbhɛka, be nkwɔ bǎbhɔŋ bɛso bɛkak batɨ!
1315 Ntɔ̌ŋ be chi ɛrɨŋ bɛ be nkwɔ mǎnkʉ́ nɔ́kɔ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ nkʉ.
1316 Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, mǔbɛtok apú cha chi-bɛtok aywi, nɛ mǔnto apú cha mmǔ anɛ átó yi.
1317 Nɛ́nɛ, bǎrɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn. Chɔŋ ɛndɨ ntá yɛka ɛncha mbák bǎkʉ̀ bhɔ.
1318 Mpú rɛm chi ɛ̌ti yɛka mankɛm, ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bo abhɛn njábhɛ́. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́ghàti bhɛsɛ ɛ́bhɔŋ bɛ́fú kpoŋoroŋ mbɔ ɛnyu basɨŋɨ bɛ, ‘Anɛ ányíɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ mɛ ǎti chɔŋ mɛ.’
1319 Nchí ghati bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɛ́nɛ ndu bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ re fakari, bɛ́ mɛ́náŋ mɛ́mfákárí, mǎnókó bɛ, ‘Nchí mmu nchí’ mpoknkɛm.”
1320 Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, “Mmǔ anɛ ásɔ̀t yɛ̌ agha anɛ ntó sayri, ǎsɔt mɛ. Nɛ mmǔ anɛ ásɔ́rɛ́ mɛ́ sayri, ǎsɔt mmǔ anɛ átó mɛ.” 
1321 Yesu árɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, ntɨ nɛ́ré sɔŋɔri yi amɛm, arɛm kpoŋoroŋ bɛ, “Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, mmu ywɛka amɔt ǎtí chɔŋ mɛ.”
1322 Bakoŋo bhi bábhó bɛyɨŋɨ batɨ, kɛrɨŋɨ mmu anɛ Yesu árɛ̀m nɔ ɛ̌ti yi.
1323 Nkoŋo anɛ Yesu ákɔ́ŋɔ́ tontó abhak chɔ́kɔ́ kɛkwɔt nɛ yi.
1324 Símun Píta amak yi nɛ awɔ arɛm bɛ, “Ghatí bhɛ́sɛ́ mmu anɛ ɔ́rɛ̀m nɔ ɛ̌ti yi.”
1325 Nkoŋo wu akokosi mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu abhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Acha, chí agha?”
1326 Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Chi mmu anɛ mɛ̌tap chɔŋ brɛt anɛ amɛm nchán nnok nchyɛ́ yí.” Yesu asɔt yɛ ɛkpɔkɔ́ brɛt atap ndǔ nnok, achyɛ Júdas, mmɔ̌ Símun Iskariɔt.
1327 Nɛsɔt Júdas ásɔ́rɛ́ brɛt wu, Satan akó yi anti. Yesu aghati yi bɛ, “Ɔ́kɛ́ chɔŋti mpok bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́yàŋ bɛkʉ.”
1328 Bakoŋo Yesu báchák kɛrɨŋɨ ntí anɛ Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ ntá Júdas.
1329 Tɛ̌ndu Júdas kɛ ákɛm nyaka ɛbhǎ nkáp, mbɔk ɛyap báré kaysi bɛ Yesu ǎghàti yi chi bɛ ándɔ́k, ánkú mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ básɔt mɛnyiɛ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ. Báchák bákáysi bɛ Yesu ato yi ándɔ́k ánchyɛ́ nkáp ntá bachɛ́bhɛ́bho.
1330 Júdas ásɔ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ɛkpɔkɔ́ brɛt ɛyɔ, afú nɛfí tɛ́mté. Nɛ bɛti bɛ́gʉ́. 
1331 Júdas áfú nɔ́kɔ́, Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Nɛ́nɛ, chɔŋ bo mángɔ́ ndu báchyɛ Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm kɛnoko, nɛ bɛfʉɛt ntá yi mángɔ ndu bachyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó.
1332 Mbák Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm ákʉ̀ mánchyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó, mbɔ̌ŋ Mandɛm ǎkʉ̀ bo mánchyɛ Mmu anɛ áfú ntá yi kɛnókó, nɛ chɔŋ ankʉ nɔ tɛ́mté.
1333 Bɔ̌bha, mpú pɛrɛ tat nɛ bhe. Chɔŋ mǎnjáŋ mɛ, kɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ngátí nyaka bǒbati bo Israɛl, nchí ghati bhe nɛ́nɛ bɛ, ‘Ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ mɛ̌rɔ̀ŋ, bǎpú kwáy bɛ́twɔ arɛ́’.
1334 Nchí chyɛ be ɛbhé ɛkɔ. Kɔŋ ka batɨ mbɔnyu nkɔ́ŋ be. Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ̌ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkɔŋ batɨ.
1335 Mbák mǎnkɔ́ŋ batɨ, chɔŋ ɛ́nkʉ bǒ mankɛm mándɨŋɨ bɛ bǎchí bakoŋo bha.” 
1336 Símun Píta abhɛp Yesu bɛ, “Acha, ɔ̌rɔ̀ŋ fá?” Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ mɛ̌rɔ̀ŋ, ɔpú kway bɛ́twɔ arɛ́ nɛ́nɛ, kɛ chɔŋ ɔ́nkoŋo mɛ arɛ́ ansɛmpok.”
1337 Píta arɛm bɛ, “Acha, ndáká yí mpú kwáy bɛ́kóŋo wɔ nɛ́nɛ? Yɛ̌ chí nɛwú, nká bɛ́gu ɛ̌ti yɛ.”
1338 Yesu arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Ɔbhɛ́ yɛ̌ chí nɛwú ɔká bɛ́gu ɛ̌ti ya? Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, nkɔk apɛrɛ́ kok nkúbhɛ́ bɛti ɛbhɛn, chɔŋ ɔ́ndɛm ndɔŋ ɛ́rát bɛ ɔbhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ mɛ.”
14
141 Yesu aghati baghɔkɔ́ bhi bɛ, “Bǎkɛ́ rɔ batɨ ánsɔ́ŋɔ́rí be amɛm. Sɨkɨ́ ká ntɨ nɛ Mandɛm, mǎnsɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ mɛnkwɔ.
142 Ɛkɛt Ɛtaya ɛbhɔŋ bɛyǎ bɔ̌bɛkɛt. Mbɔ ɛ́pú nɔ, mbʉ mbɨ́kɨ́ ghati bhe bɛ nchí rɔ́ŋ arɛ́ bɛ́tóŋti ɛbhak ntá yɛka.
143 Nɛ nnáŋ, ndɔ́k, ngókó ɛbhak mbʉrɛ́, ntá yɛka chɔŋ mpɛtnsɛm, nsɔt be, bɛ́ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ nchí, bě nkwɔ mambák arɛ.
144 Bǎrɨŋɨ mbi anɛ árɔ̀ŋ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ mɛ̌rɔ̀ŋ.”
145 Tɔmás arɛm ntá Yesu bɛ, “Acha, sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ ɔ́rɔ̀ŋ, ná sɛ́kwày bɛrɨŋɨ mbi?”
146 Yesu aghati yi bɛ, “Mɛ kɛ nchí mbi, mɛ kɛ nchí tɛtɛp, mɛ kɛ nchí nɛpɛ́m. Yɛ̌ mmu apu kway bɛ́twɔ ntá Ɛta ɛnɛ́ ábhɨ́kɨ́ fʉɛt ntá ya.
147 Mbɔ bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛ́ tɛtɛp, mbʉ́ bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ Ɛtaya nkwɔ́. Nɛbho nɛ́nɛ, bǎrɨŋɨ yí nɛ mǎnáŋ bǎghɔ́ yí.”
148 Fílip arɛm bɛ, “Acha, tɔ́ŋ bhɛ́sɛ́ mbɔŋ ɛtayɛ. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́chák ɛnɛ sɛ́yàŋ ɛ́pú.”
149 Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Fílip, mpok anɛ nkɛm nchí nɛ bhe, yɛ̌ nɔ, ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mɛ? Mmu ángɔ́ mɛ nɔ́ aghɔ Ɛtaya nkwɔ. Ná ɔ́rɛ̀m yɛ bɛ, ‘Tɔ́ŋ bhɛsɛ́ ɛtayɛ?’
1410 Ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ noko bɛ nchí babhát nɛ Ɛtaya nɛ Ɛtaya achi babhat nɛ mɛ? Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ́ghàti bhe, mpú kʉ nɔ chi ndǔ mmʉɛ́t ɛya. Ɛtaya mmu achí babhat nɛ mɛ ǎkʉ̀ bɛtɨk ɛbhi.
1411 Nokó ka ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ngátí bhe bɛ́ nchí babhat nɛ Ɛtaya nɛ Ɛtaya achi babhat nɛ mɛ. Mbák bápú kway mɛnoko mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ̌rɛ̀m, nokó ká ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ̌kʉ̀.”
1412 Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, “Mmu anɛ asɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ mɛ, ǎkway bɛ́kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ̌kʉ̀. Ǎkwáy bɛ́kʉ yɛ̌ chí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chá ɛbhɛn, mbɔnyunɛ mɛ̌rɔ̀ŋ ntá Ɛtaya.
1413 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɛ́bhɛ́ ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛna, chɔŋ nkʉ yɔ́ bɛ́ bo mángɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmɔ́ ákʉ̀ nɛ mánchyɛ Ɛta kɛnókó ɛ̌ti Mɔ́ywi.
1414 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bábhɛ́bhɛ́ ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛna, chɔŋ nkʉ yɔ nta yɛka.” 
1415 Yesu apɛt aghati baghɔkɔ́ bhi bɛ, “Mbák bǎkɔŋ mɛ, bʉrɛ́ ká ɛyɔŋ ɛbha.
1416 Mbák bǎkʉ̀ nɔ, chɔŋ nnɨk Ɛtaya mmʉɛt, nɛ yi anchyɛ bhe Nkwak achak, yi ambák nɛ bhe mpoknkɛm.
1417 Yí chí Ɛfóŋó ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ bo mándɨ́ŋɨ́ barak anɛ tɛtɛp. Bǒ mmɨk bápú kway bɛsɔt yi nɛ maŋák mbɔnyunɛ bápú kway bɛghɔ yi, nɛ bapu kway bɛrɨŋɨ yí. Kɛ chɔŋ mǎndɨ̀ŋɨ yi mbɔnyunɛ ǎbhák chɔŋ nɛ bhe, nɛ amɛm batɨ yɛka.”
1418 Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Nnáŋ ndɔ́k, mpú rɔ mǎmbák mbɔ bɔ̌bɛrǎ. Chɔŋ mpɛtnsɛm ntá yɛka.
1419 Mandú mpok, bǒ mmɨk bápú pɛrɛ ghɔ́ mɛ kɛ bǎghɔ́ chɔŋ mɛ. Nɛ tɛ̌ndu mpɛt nchi bhak chɔŋ nɛpɛ́m, chɔŋ bě nkwɔ mǎmpɛt mǎmbak nɛpɛ́m.
1420 Ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɔ, chɔŋ mǎndɨŋɨ bɛ́ nchí babhat nɛ Ɛtaya, nɛ bǎchi babhat nɛ mɛ, nɛ nchí babhat nɛ bhe.
1421 Mmu anɛ ághòk ɛnyɨŋ mɛ̌rɛ̀m ánkʉ mbɔ ɛnyu yi ághókó, yi kɛ áchí mmu anɛ ákɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛ. Nɛ Ɛtaya akɔŋ mmu anɛ akɔŋ mɛ. Mɛnkwɔ́ nchí kɔŋ bɛ yi ántwɔ́ ntá yi, nkʉ yí ándɨŋɨ mɛ.”
1422 Júdas, [anɛ áchí kɛkúrí nɛ Júdas Iskariɔt] abhɛ́p Yesu bɛ, “Acha, ndaká yí ɔ́twɔ̀ chɔŋ chi ntá yɛsɛ bakoŋo bhɛ bɛ́kʉ sɛ́ndɨ́ŋɨ́ wɔ, kɛbhák bɛ́ ɔ̌kʉ nɔ chi ntá bǒ mmɨk bachak?”
1423 Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Mmu anɛ ákɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛ, ǎbhʉ̀rɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛya. Ɛtaya ǎkɔ̀ŋ yi. Nɛ mɛ, nɛ Ɛtaya sɛ́ntwɔ sɛnchɔkɔ nɛ yi.
1424 Mmǔ anɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ kɔŋ mɛ, apú bhʉɛrɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛya. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bǎghoko mɛ ntɔ́ŋɔ́, bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ fu ntá ya. Bɛ́fu chi ntá Ɛtaya mmu átó mɛ.
1425 “Ngátí bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɛnɛ́ mbʉɛ́t nɛ bhe.
1426 Kɛ Ɛta ǎtò chɔŋ Nkwak ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛna. Yí wu chi Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ. Ánáŋ ántwɔ́, chɔŋ antɔŋ be yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ, ankwak be mǎntɨk mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn ngáti bhe.
1427 Nchí rɔ kpák ámbák nɛ bhe. Nchí chyɛ bhe kpák anɛ áfù ntá ya. Puyɛ̌ ɛnyǔ mmɨk áchyɛ̀ bho kpák kɛ̌ mɛ̌chyɛ. Bǎkɛ rɔ batɨ ánsɔ́ŋɔ́rí bhe amɛm, nɛ bǎkɛ rɔ bɛcháy mɛ́mbak amɛm batɨ yɛka.
1428 Bǎghok ndu ngátí bhe bɛ, ‘Mɛ̌rɔ̀ŋ, kɛ chɔŋ mpɛtnsɛm ntá yɛká.’ Mbɔ bǎkɔ̀ŋ mɛ mbʉ bǎbhɔŋ maŋák bɛ́ mɛ̌rɔ̀ŋ ntá Ɛtaya, mbɔnyunɛ Ɛtaya acha mɛ.
1429 Ngátí nɔ́ bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɛ́nɛ ɛnɛ́ bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ re fakari, nɛ ntí bɛ mɛ́náŋ mɛ́mfákárí, mǎnókó.
1430 Mpú pɛrɛ ghati bhe bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ mbɔnyunɛ mfɔ mmɨk ǎtwɔ̀. Abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ amfay ya.
1431 Kɛ nchí kʉ chí mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛtaya ághátí mɛ, bɛ́ bǒ mmɨk mándɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ nkɔŋ yi. Faté ká sɛ́ndɔ́k.”
15
151 Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Mɛ kɛ nchí mbɔ̌ŋ nnɛrɛ́nɔk, nɛ Ɛtaya achi nkwaŋankɨ.
152 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ntábhɛ́nɔk awa anɛ́ ápú nyu kɛpɛm, Ɛtaya ǎkpɔt angʉɛp. Nɛ ntábhɛ́nɔk anɛ ányù kɛpɛm, ǎkpɔti batap rɔrɔt amfɛrɛ bɛ́ wú ányú kɛpɛm ancha ɛnyu ɛsɨ́.
153 Bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛ́n ngátí bhe bɛ́kʉ bǎchí pɛ́pɛ́p.
154 Bat yɛ ka mmʉɛt nɛ mɛ mpoknkɛm, bɛ́ mɛnkwɔ mbát mmʉɛt nɛ bhe. Mbák ntabhɛ́nɔk ápú babhát ndǔ ɛnɔk, ápú nyu kɛpɛm. Ɛnyu yɔ kɛ ɛchi nɛ bhe. Mbák mmǔ abhɨ́kɨ́ bhat mmʉɛt nɛ mɛ, apú kwáy mɛ́nyú kɛpɛm.
155 Mɛ kɛ nchí nnɛrɛ́nɔk. Bǎchí batáp. Mmu anɛ achí babhat nɛ mɛ mpoknkɛm, mɛnkwɔ́ mbak babhát nɛ yi, yí wu kɛ ányù bɛyǎ kɛpɛm. Mbák mpú nɛ bhe, bǎpú kway bɛkʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
156 Mbák mmu apú babhát nɛ mɛ, ǎbhák mbɔ ntábhɛ́nɔk anɛ́ bákpɔ́t báfɛ́rɛ́, ágú. Mányókóti mɛnyǔ batap ayɔ mámɛsɛ ango, ánsɔŋɔ.
157 Mbák mǎndɔk ambɨ bɛbhat mmʉɛt nɛ mɛ, nɛ bɛyɔŋ ɛbha mɛ́mbak amɛm batɨ yɛka, nchí chyɛ bhe yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ babhɛbhɛ mɛ.
158 Ndǔ mǎnyú bɛyǎ kɛpɛm, bǎtɔŋ bɛ bǎchí bakoŋo bha, nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ̀ bo mánchyɛ Ɛtaya kɛnókó.
159 Mbɔ ɛnyu Ɛtaya ákɔ́ŋ mɛ, nɔ́ kɛ nkɔ́ŋɔ́ bhe. Bat ka mmʉɛt nɛ mɛ bɛ́ ɛkɔŋ ɛya ɛ́mbák amɛm batɨ yɛka mpoknkɛm.
1510 Mbák mǎndɔk ambɨ bɛbhʉrɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛya, mpú rɔ bɛkɔŋ be nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ nchí bhʉɛrɛ Ɛyɔŋ Ɛtaya nɛ yi akɔŋ mɛ mpoknkɛm.
1511 Ngátí bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ maŋák ama ámbák nɛ bhe, nɛ bɛ maŋák amɛka anjwi pɔɔt.
1512 “Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ nchí ghati bhe chi bɛ mankɔ́ŋ batɨ mbɔnyu nkɔ́ŋ be.
1513 Ɛkɔŋ ɛchak ɛ́pú ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chá ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ́ mmu ánchyɛ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛni ɛ̌ti mamʉɛrɛ bhi.
1514 Bǎbhak mamʉɛrɛ bha mbák bǎkʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ngátí bhe.
1515 Mpú pɛrɛ bhɨŋɨ be bɛ́ bɔ̌bɛtok, mbɔnyunɛ mmɔ̌bɛtok apu rɨŋɨ nkaysi chi-bɛtɨk ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákʉ̀. Mbɨ́ŋɨ́ bhe bɛ́ mamʉɛrɛ bha mbɔnyunɛ ngátí bé mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n ngókó ntá Ɛtaya mɛnkɛm.
1516 Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ yap mɛ, mɛ kɛ njábhɛ́ bhe ntó bɛ́ mǎndɔ́k mǎnyú kɛpɛm, nɛ bɛ́ kɛpɛm ɛkɛka kɛ́mbák mpoknkɛm. Kʉ ka nɔ́ bɛ Ɛtaya ánchyɛ́ bhe yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɛbhɛ yi ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛna.
1517 Ɛnɛ kɛ nchí ghati bhe bɛ mǎnkɔ́ŋ batɨ.” 
1518 Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Mbák bǒ mmɨk bápap bhe, dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ báyambɨ bápap mɛ.
1519 Mbɔ bǎchí bǒ mmɨk, mbʉ́ mmɨk akɔŋ be nɛ ntí bɛ́ bǎchí bo bhi. Kɛ ndǔ njábhɛ́ bhe mfɛ́rɛ́ nɛ́ntɨ bǒ mmɨk, ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ̌ bápábhɛ́ be.
1520 Bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ngátí nyaka bhe bɛ ‘Mmǔ bɛtok apú cha chi-bɛtok aywi.’ Mbák bǒ mmɨk báchyɛ́ mɛ ɛsɔŋɔri, chɔŋ mánchyɛ be nkwɔ́ ɛsɔŋɔri. Mbɔ bábhʉ́rɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ngátí bhɔ, mbʉ́ chɔŋ mámbʉrɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ be nkwɔ bǎghàti bhɔ.
1521 Báchyɛ̀ chɔŋ be bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm ɛ̌ti bǎkoŋo mɛ, mbɔnyunɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mmu anɛ átó mɛ fá amɨk.
1522 Mbɔ mbɨ́kɨ́ twɔ́ ngátí bhɔ mɛnyɨŋ, mbʉ bákwáy bɛtaŋa mmʉɛt bɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ bɛbʉ́. Kɛ nɛ́nɛ, bápú kway bɛtaŋa bɛ babhɨkɨ kʉ bɛbʉ́.
1523 Mmu anɛ ápábhɛ́ mɛ, apap Ɛtaya nkwɔ́.
1524 Mbɔ mbɨ́kɨ́ kʉ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay bɛsí bhap ɛbhɛ́n yɛ̌ mmu áchák ábhɨ́kɨ́ re kʉ, mbʉ́ bákway bɛtaŋa mmʉɛt bɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ bɛbʉ́. Kɛ bághɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n nkʉ́, yɛ̌ nɔ bápàp mɛ, nɛ bápáp Ɛtaya.
1525 Ɛchi ɛnyu ɛyɔ bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́ghàti bhɛsɛ ɛmfu tɛtɛp, nɔ chi bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ ‘Bápap mɛ ntí tí.’
1526 Kɛ Nkwak anɛ mɛ̌tò chɔŋ ntá yɛka, ǎfù chi ntá Ɛtaya. Chɔŋ yi angati bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti ya mbɔ ntísiɛ awa. Yi chí Ɛfóŋó mmu ákʉ̀ bo mandɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi tɛtɛp.
1527 Bě nkwɔ́ bǎchí batísiɛ́ bha mbɔnyunɛ bachí nɛ mɛ tɛ̌ndu nɛbhǒnɛt.”
16
161 Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Ngátí bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́ bǎkɛ́ kwɛn ansɛm.
162 Chɔŋ mámbok bhé ndǔ bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛbhap. Mpok ǎtwɔ̀ anɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ áwày bhe, akaysi bɛ́ ǎkʉ̀ chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ.
163 Báchyɛ̀ chɔŋ be bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn, mbɔnyunɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ Ɛtaya nɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mɛ.
164 Kɛ ngáti bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́ mpok anaŋ ánkwáy anɛ bɔ bɛ́fàkari, mǎntɨk bɛ nnáŋ ngátí bhe. “Mbɨ́kɨ́ ghati bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mpok bǎhó bɛkoŋo mɛ mbɔnyunɛ nchí nyaka nɛ bhe.
165 Kɛ nɛ́nɛ nchí pɛtnsɛm ntá mmu anɛ átó mɛ, Yɛ̌ nɔ, yɛ̌ mmu ywɛka abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɛp mɛ bɛ, ‘Ɔ̌rɔ̀ŋ fá?’
166 Batɨ ayɛka ájwí nɛ́nɛ nɛ basɛ́mɛ́ mbɔnyunɛ ngátí bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn.
167 Yɛ̌ ndu ɛchi nɔ, nchí ghati bhe ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi tɛtɛp. Ɛ́rɨ ntá yɛka bɛ́ ndɔ́k mbɔnyunɛ mbák mbɨ́kɨ́ rɔŋ, Nkwak apú twɔ́ ntá yɛka. Kɛ mbák ndɔ́k, chɔŋ ntó yi ntá yɛka.
168 Nɛ ánáŋ ántwɔ́, chɔŋ ankʉ bǒ mmɨk mangɔ bɛ báchí bǒ bɛbʉ́, mángɔ bɛ mɛ nchí chak bɛsí Mandɛm, nɛ mangɔ bɛ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛchi nɛ bhɔ ndǔ nɛtaŋ anɛ bɔ bátàŋ mɛ.
169 Ǎkʉ bɔ mangɔ bɛ bachi bǒ bɛbʉ́ mbɔnyunɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko mɛ.
1610 Ǎkʉ bɔ mangɔ bɛ nchí chak bɛsí Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ mɛ̌rɔ̀ŋ ntá Ɛtaya nɛ bǎpú pɛrɛ ghɔ́ chɔ́ŋ mɛ.
1611 Ǎkʉ mángɔ́ bɛ chɔŋ mántáŋ bǒ bɛbʉ́ ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, tɛ̌ndu Mandɛm átáŋ mfɔ mmɨk, afɛrɛ yi ndǔ kɛfɔ ɛki.
1612 “Mbɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ bɛghati bhe, kɛ mbák ngátí bhe bɔ mɛnkɛm nɛ́nɛ, bǎpú kway bɛ́jwimɛm.
1613 Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ kɛ ákʉ̀ chɔŋ bo mándɨŋɨ tɛtɛp nkɛm anɛ áyɨ́ŋɨ́ Mandɛm. Anaŋ ántwɔ́ chɔŋ ankʉ mǎndɨŋɨ tɛtɛp nkɛm, mbɔnyunɛ ápú rɛm chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fú yi antɨ. Ɛnɛ́ yi aghoko kɛ árɛ̀m, nɛ chɔŋ angati bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́twɔ̀ ambɨ.
1614 Chɔŋ anchyɛ mɛ kɛnókó mbɔnyunɛ ǎsɔ̀t chɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú ntá ya, angati bhe.
1615 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ Ɛtaya chi ɛya nkwɔ. Nɔ́ kɛ ngátí bhe bɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ághàti chɔŋ bhe, ǎsɔt chi ntá ya.” 
1616 Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛghati baghɔkɔ́ bhi bɛ, “Mandu mpok, bǎpú pɛrɛ ghɔ mɛ. Kɛ mandú mpok, chɔŋ mǎmpɛt mǎngɔ mɛ.”
1617 Mbɔk baghɔkɔ́ bhi báré rɛm nɛ batɨ bɛ, “Ɛnɛ́ yí árɛ̀m nɔ chí yí. Yí bhɛ mandú mpok, sɛ́pú pɛrɛ ghɔ́ yí, nɛ mandú mpok chɔŋ sɛ́mpɛt sɛ́ngɔ́ yi. Apɛt arɛm bɛ chi mbɔnyunɛ yí ǎrɔŋ ntá ɛtayi. Nɔ́ bɛ́ yí?”
1618 Bápɛt báré rɛm nɛ batɨ bɛ, “Yi bɛ́ ‘Mandu mpok’, mandú mpok, nɔ bɛ́ yi?” Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ jwimɛm ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́.
1619 Yesu arɨŋɨ bɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi báyàŋ bɛbhɛp yi ɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti ndak anɛ. Arɛm yɛ bɛ, “Ngátí bhe bɛ mandú mpok, bǎpú pɛrɛ ghɔ́ mɛ, kɛ mandú mpok chɔŋ mǎmpɛt mǎngɔ́ mɛ. Yɔ́ kɛ ɛ́sɔŋɔri nɛ́ bhe?
1620 Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, chɔŋ mǎndi babhɛsɛ ansɛp nɔkɔ amɨ́k nɛ mámbɔŋ basɛ́mɛ́, kɛ bǒ mmɨk mámbɔŋ maŋák. Chɔŋ mǎmbɔ́ŋ basɛ́mɛ́ kɛ basɛ́mɛ́ amɛka anjibhiri andɔp chí maŋák.
1621 Mpok ngɔrɛ́ nɛ mɛniɛ ánòŋsi, ǎbhɔ́ŋ basɛ́mɛ́ antɨ mbɔnyunɛ mpok nɛbhe akway. Kɛ ánáŋ ámbé, maŋák ǎbhák nɛ yi bɛ mɔ́nkɔ átwɔ́ fá amɨk. Ɛ́nkʉ angɔkɔntɨk bɛbě nɛbhe.
1622 Nɔ́, kɛ ɛ́chi nɛ be nkwɔ́. Nɛ́nɛ basɛ́mɛ́ ajwí be antɨ, kɛ chɔŋ mpɛt ngɔ́ bhe, nɛ mpok yɔ chɔŋ mǎmbɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ maŋák, nɛ yɛ̌ mmú apu kway bɛfɛrɛ mɔ́ amɛm batɨ ayɛka.
1623 Ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɔ, bapú pɛrɛ bhɛ́p mɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, mbák mǎmbɛp Ɛtaya yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛna, ǎchyɛ bhe.
1624 Kpátɛ̌ ɛchɔŋ, bǎbhɨkɨ re bhɛ́p Ɛtaya yɛ̌nyɨŋ ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛna. Bɛ́p ká, nɛ chɔŋ anchyɛ be bɛ maŋák amɛka anjwi pɔɔt.” 
1625 Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Mpok anɛ nkɛm, ngátí bhe barak anɛ chí ndǔ bakay. Kɛ mpok ǎtwɔ̀ anɛ mpú pɛrɛ ghati be mɛnyɨŋ ndǔ bakay. Mpok yɔ ánkwáy, ndɔbhɛ ghati bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti Ɛtaya chi kpoŋoroŋ.
1626 Mpok yɔ, chɔŋ mǎmbɛp Ɛtaya mɛnyɨŋ ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛna. Mbɨ́kɨ́ rɛm bɛ chɔŋ nɨkmʉɛt ntá yi bɛ ánchyɛ́ bhe ɛnyɨŋ.
1627 Mbɔŋ Ɛta akɔŋ be mbɔnyunɛ bǎkɔŋ mɛ, nɛ mǎnókó bɛ mfu chí ntá yi.
1628 Mfú chí ntá Ɛta kɛ nchí twɔ fá amɨk. Nɛ́nɛ, nchí rɔ mmɨk, nchí pɛtnsɛm ntá Ɛta.”
1629 Baghɔk abhi barɛm yɛ ntá yi bɛ, “Mhm! Nɛ́nɛ ɔ̌rɛ̀m mɛnyɨŋ kpoŋoroŋ nɛ sɛ́jwimɛm. Ɔpú pɛrɛ rɛm kɛpɨ ndǔ bakay!”
1630 Nɛ́nɛ, sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ, ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ. Ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ yɛ̌ chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ antɨ bɛbhɛp wɔ. Ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ sɛ́nókó bɛ́ ɔfu chí ntá Mandɛm.
1631 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mǎnókó nɛ́nɛ?
1632 Mpok ǎtwɔ̀, tɛtɛp anáŋ atwɔ, anɛ bǎtaka chɔŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu andɔk ɛyi ɛbhak mǎndɔ mɛ awánti. Kɛ sayri sayri, mpú mɛ awánti mbɔnyunɛ, Ɛta achi nɛ mɛ.
1633 Ngátí bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ mǎmbát mmʉɛt nɛ mɛ mǎmbɔ́ŋ kpák amɛm batɨ ayɛka. Chɔŋ mǎmbɔŋ bɛsɔŋɔri fá amɨk, kɛ bɔ́ŋ ká nɛtaŋántɨ́, nnáŋ mfɔ́kɔ́rí mmɨk.”
17
171 Yesu ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛrɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, ayoŋ amɨ́k ayɨŋɨ mfay, arɛm bɛ, “Ɛta, mpok akway. Chiɛ́ Mɔ́ywɛ kɛnɛ́m bɛ ɛ̌ti ya bo mángɔ́ kɛnɛ́m ɛkɛ.
172 Wɔ kɛ ɔ́chyɛ́ mɛ́ bɛtaŋ amfay bǒ mankɛm bɛ́ nkʉ mankɛm abhɛn ɔ́chɛ́ mɛ mambɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
173 Nɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti, chí bɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ wɔ, wɔ mmu ɔ́chí Mandɛm tɛtɛp nɛ achák apu nɛ bɛrɨŋɨ Yesu Kristo mmu ɔ́tó.
174 Nkʉ bo mángɔ́ kɛnɛ́m ɛkɛ ndu nnáŋá bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn ɔ́chyɛ́ mɛ.
175 Ɛta, nɛ́nɛ sɔt mɛ mbak nɛ wɔ, ɔ́nchyɛ mɛ kɛnɛ́m bɛsí ɛbhɛ, nkúbhɛ́ kɛnɛ́m ɛkɛn mbɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka nɛ wɔ kɛ ɔ̌ghoko mmɨk.
176 “Nkʉ bo mándɨ́ŋɔ́ wɔ, bo abhɛn ɔ́yábhɛ́ fá amɨk ɔ́chyɛ́ mɛ. Báchí bǒ bhɛ, nɛ wɔ kɛ ɔ́chyɛ́ mɛ bhɔ. Bábhʉ́rɛ́ ɛyɔŋ ɛyɛ.
177 Nɛ́nɛ bárɨŋɨ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mbɔ́ŋɔ́, ɛ́fú chí ntá yɛ.
178 Ngátí bhɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɔ́chyɛ́ mɛ bɛ ngati bhɔ. Báká nɛ mɛ, nɛ bárɨŋɨ yɛ tɛtɛp bɛ mfu chí ntá yɛ. Mánoko nkwɔ bɛ wɔ kɛ ɔ́tó mɛ.
179 Nchí nɨkmʉɛt ɛ̌ti yap. Mpú nɨkmʉɛt ɛ̌ti mmɨk nkɛm. Nchí nɨkmʉɛt chi ɛ̌ti bo abhɛn ɔ́chyɛ́ mɛ mbɔnyunɛ bɔ́ báchí bǒ bhɛ.
1710 Bǒbha mankɛm chí abhɛ, nɛ abhɛ chí abha. Nɛ bɔ́ kɛ̌ nɛpɛ́m ɛnap nɛ́kù bo mángɔ́ kɛnókó ɛka.
1711 Nɛ́nɛ, mpɛt mpú fá amɨk, kɛ bɔ́ bábhʉɛ́t arɛ. Nchí twɔ ntá yɛ. Ɛta! Wɔmbɔŋ mmú ɔ́chí Nyáŋá, kɛ́m bɔ̌ nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛ, bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛ́n ɔ́chyɛ́ mɛ bɛ mambak mbɔ mmu amɔt, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ wɔ nɛ mɛ sɛchi mmu amɔt.
1712 Mpok nchí nɛ bhɔ, nkɛ́m bɔ sayri nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chí ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛna, nnyɛ́n ɛnɛn ɔ́chyɛ́ mɛ. Nkɛm bɔ́, nɛ yɛ̌ mmu wap amɔt abhɨkɨ nɛm ɛbhɨ, ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ fʉɛt chí anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka mɛ́nɛm, bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ básɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛ́mfú tɛtɛp.
1713 Nɛ́nɛ, nchí twɔ ntá yɛ, nɛ nchí rɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ndǔ mpok mbʉɛ́t fá amɨk, bɛ́ maŋák ama ámbák nɛ bhɔ.
1714 Ngátí bhɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɔ́chyɛ́ mɛ ngati bhɔ. Ɛ̌ti yɔ, mmɨk apap bhɔ mbɔnyunɛ bápú bǒ mmɨk anɛ, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ mpú mmǔ mmɨk.
1715 Mpú nɨkmʉɛt bɛ́ ɔ́mfɛ́rɛ́ bhɔ fá amɨk, kɛ chí bɛ́ ɔ́nkɛ́m bɔ́ bɛ mbʉ́mbʉ ákɛ́ kʉ bhɔ yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
1716 Bápú bǒ mmɨk nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ mpú mmǔ mmɨk.
1717 Sɔt tɛtɛp kʉ bɔ́ mámbák nyáŋá. Ɛyɔŋ ɛyɛ ɛchi tɛtɛp.
1718 Nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɔ́tó mɛ fá amɨk, nɔ́ kɛ̌ nchí to bhɔ amɨk.
1719 Nɛ ɛ̌ti yap, nchyɛ́ mmʉɛt ntá yɛ bɛbhak nyáŋá bɛ́ bɔ́ nkwɔ́ mankway bɛbhak nyáŋá tɛtɛp.
1720 “Mpú nɨkmʉɛt chi ɛ̌ti bakoŋo abhɛn bɔ́bhɔ, kɛ ɛ̌ti bo abhɛn bághòk mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bátɔ̀ŋ, mánsɨkɨntɨ nɛ mɛ nkwɔ.
1721 Nchí nɨkmʉɛt bɛ́ bɔ́ mankɛm mámbák mbɔ mmu amɔt. Ɛtaya, mɛ̌nɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɔ́bhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ mɛ nɛ mbát mmʉɛt nɛ wɔ, bɔ́ nkwɔ mámbát mmʉɛt nɛ bhɛsɛ bɛ́ mmɨk ánkwáy mɛ́nóko bɛ wɔ kɛ ɔ́tó mɛ tɛtɛp.
1722 Nchyɛ́ bhɔ́ nkúbhɛ́ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn ɔ́chyɛ́ mɛ, bɛ́ bɔ́ mámbák mmu amɔt, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ wɔ nɛ mɛ sɛchi.
1723 Chɔŋ mbak nɛ bhɔ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɔ́chí nɛ mɛ, bɛ sayri sayri, mándɔp chi mmu amɔt, bɛ́ mmɨk ankway bɛrɨŋɨ bɛ wɔ kɛ ɔ́tó mɛ, nɛ bɛ́ ɔkɔŋ bɔ́ mbɔnyu ɔ́kɔ́ŋ mɛ.
1724 Ɛta, mɛ̌yáŋ bɛ bɔ́ nkwɔ, bǒ ɔ́chyɛ́ mɛ mámbák nɛ mɛ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ mɛnchí, bɛ́ mángɔ́ kɛnókó ɛkɛn ɔ́chyɛ́ mɛ mbɔnyunɛ ɔkɔŋ mɛ tɛ mpok ɔ́bhɨ́kɨ́ re ghoko mmɨk.
1725 Ɛta, wɔ mmu ɔ́chí chak, bǒ mmɨk bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ wɔ, kɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ wɔ, nɛ nkwɔ wa anɛ bárɨŋɨ bɛ́ wɔ kɛ ɔ́tó mɛ.
1726 Nkʉ bɔ́ mándɨ́ŋɨ́ wɔ́, nɛ chɔŋ ndɔk ambɨ bɛkʉ nɔ, bɛ bɔ mankɔŋ batɨ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔnyu ɔ́kɔ́ŋ mɛ, nɛ bɛ mɛ́mbák amɛm batɨ ayap.”
18
181 Yesu ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ mɛnɨkmʉɛt ɛnyu ɛyɔ, afa nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi, bákɨŋɨ mɔ́nyɛn anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Kídrɔn. Mɔ́nkɨ áchí nyaka arɛ anɛ yí achwe amɛm nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi.
182 Júdas mmu átí yi arɨŋɨ nkwɔ ɛbhak ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ Yesu nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi bátɛmɛri nɔkɔ nyaka arɛ.
183 Júdas asɔt ɛká batɛmɛ́ nɛnu nɛ mbɔk babhabhɛri abhɛn ɛkɛrákap abhɛn bǒbati bachiǎkap nɛ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bátó. Bɔ́ mankɛm barɔk arɛ nɛ bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ nɛnu amɔ.
184 Yesu arɨŋɨ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́fákári nɛ yí. Afú ndǔ nkwɔ́ baghɔkɔ́ bhi, atɛ́n mmʉɛt ambɨ arɛm bɛ, “Agha bǎyáŋ?”
185 Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Yesu mmu Násárɛt.” Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Ghɔ́ mɛ́ nɛ.” Júdas mmu atí yi abhak arɛ́ téé nɛ bhɔ.
186 Mpok Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Ghɔ́ mɛ́ nɛ”, bárɔ́k nɛ nsɛm nɛ nsɛm bákwɛ́nti amɨk.
187 Yesu apɛt abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Aghǎ bǎyàŋ?” Bárɛ́m bɛ, “Yesu mmu Násárɛt.”
188 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Ngátí bhe bɛ chi mɛ. Mbák yɛ mɛ kɛ bǎyàŋ, dɔ̌ ká bakoŋo bha abhɛn mandɔk.”
189 Arɛm nɔ, bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́ nyaka bɛ, “Ndu bo abhɛn ɔ́chyɛ́ mɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ nɛm yɛ amɔt,” ɛmfu tɛtɛp.
1810 Símun Píta mmu achi nɛ akparɛnja amʉɛt, agwɔp akparɛnja wu ndǔ kɛ́nkwɔ́p, kpɔ́t atú nsɛm Mǔngo bachiǎkap Mandɛm chwát agʉɛp amɨk. Nnyɛ́n nsɛm ɛrɛ nɛ́bhak bɛ Málkɔs.
1811 Yesu aghati Píta bɛ, “Kɛmɛ́ akparɛnja ywɛ amɛm kɛ́nkwɔ́p. Nkɛ́ nyu nkɔ́p ɛsɔŋɔri anɛ Ɛta áchyɛ́ bɛ mɛ nyu kɛ?” 
1812 Mǔnti batɛmɛ́ nɛnu asɔt ɛká batɛmɛ́ nɛnu ɛyi, bárɔ́k, bákɛ́m Yesu bágwɔ́t. Babhabhɛrǐ ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm bábhák nɛ bhɔ.
1813 Báyámbɨ bárɔ́k ntá Ánas, chi ngɔrɛ́ Káyfas. Káyfas abhak mǔngo bachiǎkap Mandɛm ndu mmiɛ ɛnɔ.
1814 Yi kɛ áchyɛ́ nyaka maníɛ́ ntá bo Israɛl bɛ, “Ɛ́rɨ bɛ mmu amɔt ángú ɛ̌ti bo mankɛm.” 
1815 Símun Píta nɛ nkoŋo Yesu achák báré koŋo Yesu. Ndǔ nkoŋo Yesu achák wu achí mmǔ anɛ mǔngo bachiǎkap árɨŋɨ sayri, yí akoŋo Yesu kpát arɔk achwe amɛm sɛnta mǔngo bachiǎkap.
1816 Píta ate nɛfí ndǔ nyǔ-ɛbhá. Ɛ́kʉ́ nkoŋo achák wu, anɛ mǔngo bachiǎkap árɨ́ŋɨ́ apɛtnsɛm nɛfí, arɛm kɛpɨ nɛ ngɔsɔ́ŋ anɛ áchí anyǔbhá. Asɔt yɛ Píta áchwé amɛm nɛ yi.
1817 Ngɔsɔ́ŋ wu nɔ ábhàbhɛri nyǔ-ɛbhá abhɛ́p Píta bɛ, “Pú wɔ nkwɔ ɔchí nkoŋo mmǔ-nɛ?” Píta akɛmɛ bɛ, “Mpú nɛ yi.”
1818 Mbʉ́ɛ́p áchí nyaka mpok yɔ. Ɛ́kʉ́ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk abhɛn mǔngo bachiǎkap nɛ babhabhɛrǐ ɛkɛrákap báfyɛ́ ngo ndu nntó bakiri, báté bághábhɛri mángwák nɔkɔ ngó wu. Píta nkwɔ arɔk ate nɛ bhɔ angwaka nɔkɔ ngo. 
1819 Mǔngo bachiǎkap abhɛ́p Yesu ɛ̌ti bakoŋo bhi nɛ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi átɔ̀ŋ bho.
1820 Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Ndɛm mɛnyɨŋ kpoŋoroŋ ntá bo mankɛm. Ntɔ́ŋ bo amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt nɛ amɛm ɛkɛrákap mpoknkɛm ndǔ mbaŋ ɛnɛ bo Israɛl báchɛ̀m arɛ. Mbɨ́kɨ́ rɛm yɛ̌nyɨŋ bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́.”
1821 Ndak yí ɔ́bhɛ́p mɛ mɛnyɨŋ? Bɛ́p bo abhɛn bághókó mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ndɛ́mɛ́. Bɛ́p bɔ́ mángátí wɔ. Bárɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ndɛ́mɛ́.
1822 Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, mbabhɛri ɛkɛrákap amɔt anɛ áchí arɛ́ téé, adɛp Yesu nɛ awɔ́ arɛm bɛ, “Kwáé, ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ ɔ́rɛ̀m kɛpɨ ntá mǔngo bachiǎkap Mandɛm-ɛ?”
1823 Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Mbák ndɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́pú chak, ghatí mɛ yɔ. Kɛ mbák ndɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi chak, ɔdɛp mɛ ndáká yí?”
1824 Afɔ̌ kɛ Ánas átó Yesu nɛ ngɛm amɔ ntá Káyfas, mǔngo bachiǎkap. 
1825 Símun Píta abhʉɛ́t nyaka téé, angwaka nɔkɔ ngo. Mbɔk bo abhɛn bachi arɛ bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Pú wɔ nkwɔ́ ɔchí nkoŋo ywi?” Píta ataŋa, arɛm bɛ, “Cháá, mpú nɛ yi”
1826 Mmɔ̌ bɛtok amɔt anɛ mǔngo bachiǎkap abhak arɛ́. Atú mɔ́mayi kɛ̌ Píta ákpɔ́rɛ́ nyaka. Yí wu abhɛ́p Píta bɛ, “Pú ngɔ̌ nyaka wɔ amɛm mɔ́nkɨ nɛ yi?”
1827 Píta apɛt ataŋa. Tɛ́mté wu, nnɛ́m nkɔk akók kɔkɔrɔ́kɔ̌ɔ. 
1828 Básɔ́t yɛ Yesu ɛkɛt Káyfas betí beti bárɔk ndǔ sɛnta gɔ́bhanɔ nɛ yi. Gɔ́bhanɔ abhak mmǔ Rom. Babhɔŋɔ́ bo Israɛl kɛchwe ndu áchá gɔ́bhanɔ. Ɛbhé yap ɛ́rɛ̀m nyaka bɛ́ mbák mmu Israɛl ánchwé ɛkɛt mmu anɛ ápú mmu Israɛl, apú bhák pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm. Ndu báyàŋ nyaka mɛnyiɛ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ, bɔ́ kɛyaŋ bɛ́bhak nɛ bakwap bɛsí Mandɛm.
1829 Ɛ́kʉ́ Páílet afú amɛm sɛnta ywi arɔk atɛmɛri bhɔ nɛfí, abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ mmǔ-nɛ akʉ́?”
1830 Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Mbɔ mmǔ nɛ apú nkʉ bɛbʉ́, mbʉ́ sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ twɔ fá ntá yɛ nɛ yi.”
1831 Páílet aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Sɔt ka yi bɛ bě babhɔŋ mǎntáŋ manyé yi bɛ́kóŋo ɛbhé ɛyɛka.” Bákɛ́mɛ Páílet bɛ, “Ɛbhé ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ chyɛ bhɛsɛ bɛtaŋ bɛ́táŋ manyé mmu, kpát sɛ́nchyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ mangway yi.”
1832 Ɛ́fákári ɛnyu ɛyɔ bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ nyaka ndu bɛtɔŋ ɛnyǔ nɛwú yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́gu ɛmfu tɛtɛp.
1833 Páílet apɛt achwe amɛm áchá ywi. Abhɨŋɨ Yesu abhɛp yi bɛ, “Wɔ kɛ ɔ́chí Mfɔ bo Israɛl?”
1834 Yesu akɛmɛ yí bɛ, “Ndak anɛ́ ɔ́bhɛ́bhɛ́ mɛ, áfu chi wɔmbɔ̌ŋ antɨ kɛ bo báchák kɛ̌ bágháti wɔ wu ɛ̌ti ya?”
1835 Páílet akɛmɛ bɛ, “Ɔkáysí bɛ nchí mmu Israɛl? Bǒ ɛtɔk ɛyɛ nɛ bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm kɛ bákɛ́m wɔ batwɔ ntá ya nɛ wɔ. Mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́kʉ́ chi yi?”
1836 Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Kɛfɔ ɛka kɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ fu fá amɨk. Mbɔ kɛfɔ ɛka kɛ́fu chi fá amɨk, mbʉ bǒbha mánú bɛ bákɛ́ kɛm mɛ manchyɛ ntá bo Israɛl. Kɛ, kɛfɔ ɛka kɛbhɨkɨ fu ndǔ mmɨkɨ nɛ.”
1837 Páílet abhɛp yi bɛ, “Nɔ ɔchí mfɔ?” Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Ɔrɛm bɛ mɛnchí mfɔ. Ɛ̌ti ɛyɔ kɛ bábhé mɛ, nɛ ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ ntwɔ fá amɨk bɛghati bho tɛtɛp Mandɛm. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ anɛ ákòŋo tɛtɛp Mandɛm, ǎta batú bɛ́ghok ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌rɛ̀m.”
1838 Páílet abhɛ́p Yesu bɛ, “Tɛtɛp chí yí?” Páílet árɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, arɔ Yesu apɛt afú nɛfí ntá bo Israɛl aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Mbɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi akʉ.
1839 Kɛ ɛpɨŋ ɛyɛka ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmíɛ́, mpok Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ, mbɔŋ bɛrɔ mǔkɛnɔŋ amɔt anɛ bǎyàŋ mandɔ yi andɔk. Bǎyaŋ mámfɛ́rɛ́ Mfɔ bo Israɛl amɔ, yí ándɔ́kɔ́?”
1840 Bápɛ́t babɨk bɛ, “Puyɛ̌ mmǔ-nɛ, fɛrɛ́ chí Barábas. Barábas achí nyaka ngɛ́bhɛ́ ntantaŋ.”
19
191 Páílet achyɛ yɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ mánsɔ́t Yesu mandɛn nɛ ɛ́kpá.
192 Batɛmɛ́ nɛnu básɔ́t bɔ̌batábhɛ́nɔk abhɛn báchí nsěnse, mánɨ́ ntá bábáy yi anti, barɛm bɛ chi nta kɛfɔ. Básɔ́t nkú chu bafyɛ́ yi amʉɛt, bárɛm bɛ chí ayi nkú kɛfɔ.
193 Bábhó bɛrɔŋ ntá yi máŋɔkɔ nɔkɔ yi bɛ, “Acha mfɔ bo Israɛl, kɛnókó kɛ́chí ɛkɛ ɛta!” Ndu bárɛ̀m nɔ, manchyɛ nɔkɔ yi nsáp bɛsí.
194 Páílet apɛt arɔ áchá ywi afú nɛfí ntá bo Israɛl arɛm bɛ, “Ghok ka, nchí ntwɔ́ nɛfí nɛ yi ntá yɛka bɛ mǎndɨŋɨ bɛ́ mbɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákʉ́ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́yàŋ bɛ mángwáy yi.”
195 Yesu afú yɛ, arɔk nɛ ntá kɛfɔ nsěnse yɔ antí, nɛ nkú chú yɔ amʉɛt. Páílet arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Yɨ́ŋɨ́ mmǔ ywɛka nɔ!”
196 Bǒbati bachiǎkap nɛ babhahɛrǐ ɛkɛrákap bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yí, bábho bɛbɨk mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Dɛm mángó yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí! Mángó yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí!” Páílet arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Bě babhɔŋ mǎnsɔt yi mǎngó ndǔ ɛkotákátí, mbɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákʉ́ ɛnɛ ɛ́yàŋ mángwáy yi.”
197 Bo Israɛl, bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Sɛ́bhɔ̌ŋ ɛbhé, nɛ bɛkoŋo ɛbhé yɔ, abhɔŋ bɛ́gu mbɔnyunɛ ákʉ́ mmʉɛt yi Mmɔ Mandɛm.”
198 Páílet ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn, bɛcháy bɛ́pɛ́t bɛkɛm yi bɛcha.
199 Apɛt achwe amɛm áchá abhɛp Yesu bɛ, “Ɛtɔk ɛnɛ ɔ́fú arɛ chi ɛnɛ́?” Kɛ Yesu abhɨkɨ kɛmɛ yɛ ɛyɔŋ.
1910 Páílet arɛm yɛ ntá yi bɛ, “Ɔpú kɛmɛ mɛ yɛ̌ ɛyɔŋ? Ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛ mbɔ̌ŋ bɛtaŋ bɛrɛm bɛ mándɔ́ wɔ mándɔ, nɛ mbák ndɛ́m bɛ mángó wɔ́ ndǔ ɛkotákátí, bágò?”
1911 Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Mandɛm kɛ áchyɛ́ wɔ bɛtaŋ. Mbɔ ɛ́pú nɔ́, mbʉ ɔbhɔ̌ŋ bɛtaŋ amfay ya fá? Nɔ kɛ ɛchi bɛ bɛbʉ́ mmu anɛ ákɛ́mɛ́ mɛ́ áchyɛ́ ntá yɛ, bɛ́chá ɛbhɛ.”
1912 Páílet ághókó nɔkɔ nɔ, abho bɛyaŋ mbi bɛfɛrɛ Yesu amɔ. Kɛ bo Israɛl bárɔ́k chí ambɨ bɛbɨk bɛ, “Mbák ɔ́ndɔ́ mmǔ-nɛ ándɔ́k, nɔ́ ɔpú mmʉɛ́rɛ Mfɔ Rom! Mmu anɛ ǎrɛ̀m bɛ áchí Mfɔ, chi mmǔ anɛ ánù nɛ Mfɔ Rom bɛ ambak ndǔ mmʉɛt ɛyi!”
1913 Páílet ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn, asɔt Yesu afú nɛ yi, achɔkɔ ndǔ ɛnɔk ntaŋá manyé, nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ ndu ɛyɔŋ bo Israɛl bɛ́ Gabáta. Nɔ́ chi, nɛbhʉɛt batǎy batay.
1914 Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ nkárɛ́nká byo nɛ ɛpay ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn bátòŋti mmʉɛt mɛnyiɛ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ, Páílet arɛm ntá bo Israɛl bɛ, “Yɨŋɨ́ ka Mfɔ ywɛka nɛ!”
1915 Bábhó bɛbɨk mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Dɔ̌ mángwáy yi! Dɔ̌ mǎngwáy! Dɛm mángó yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí!” Páílet arɛm bɛ, “Ngó Mfɔ ywɛka ndǔ ɛkotákátí?” Bǒbati bachiǎkap bákɛ́mɛ bɛ, “Mfɔ amɔt kɛ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́, nɛ chí Sísa.”
1916 Páílet ásɔ́t yɛ Yesu achyɛ ntá yap bɛ mándɔk mángó yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí. 
1917 Básɔ́t ɛkotákátí ɛnɛ́ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛgo Yesu arɛ báchyɛ́ yímbɔŋ ámpɔ́kɔ́. Apɔkɔ kpát bárɔ́k bágháká ndǔ ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ́ Golgóta, nɔ́ chi “Nɛbhʉɛt Ɛnkɔ́nti.”
1918 Arɛ́, bágó Yesu ndǔ ɛkotákátí. Bágó bo báchák nkwɔ bati apay, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap ndǔ ɛyi ɛkotákátí, amɔt ɛbhe awɔ́nɛm Yesu, achák ɛbhe awɔghɔ.
1919 Páílet nkwɔ arɛm básɨ́ŋ ɛnyɨŋ ndǔ ɛbhɔ́kɔ́nɔk bábhát ndǔ ɛkotákátí, amfay ntí Yesu. Básɨ́ŋ amɔ ábhák bɛ, “Yesu mmu Násárɛt, Mfɔ bo Israɛl.”
1920 Básɨ́ŋ amɔ achí nyaka ndǔ bɛyɔŋ ɛtɔk bɛrat, ndǔ ɛyɔŋ bo Israɛl, nɛ ndǔ ɛyɔŋɔ Latin, nɛ ndǔ ɛyɔŋɔ́ Grik. Nɛ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bágó Yesu ndǔ ɛkotákátí abhak kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ ɛtɔk ɛgho. Ɛ́kʉ́, bɛyǎ bo Israɛl bápáy basɨ̌ŋɨ́ mɔ.
1921 Bǒbati bachiǎkap bárɔ́k ntá Páílet barɛm bɛ, “Ɔ́kɛ́ sɨ́ŋ bɛ, ‘Mfɔ bo Israɛl.’ Sɨ́ŋ chí bɛ, ‘Mmǔ-nɛ arɛm nyaka bɛ achí Mfɔ bo Israɛl.’”
1922 Páílet akɛmɛ bɛ, “Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ nsɨ́ŋɨ́ nnáŋ nsɨŋ.”
1923 Batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bágó nɔ́kɔ́ Yesu ndǔ ɛkotákátí, básɔ́t ndɛn ɛyi bákɔ́rɛ ndǔ baru anwi, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap asɔt ndu amɔt. Kɛ ɛ́rɔp nkú amɔt. Nkú yɔ abhak ntěndɛn nɛmɔt ɛnɛn báyɛ́mɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nɛku ɛni bɛ́fú amfay bɛ́gháka amɨk, kɛkpɔti yɔ́ yɛ̌ ɛbhak.
1924 Ɛkʉ báré rɛm nɛ batɨ bɛ, “Sɛ́kɛ́ dakati nkú anɛ. Sɛ́ngʉɛ́p chí ɛbháŋá, sɛ́ngɔ́ mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛsɔt yɔ.” Ɛ́fákárí ɛnyunɛ bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ́mɛ́ ɛ́mfú tɛtɛp. Nɔ́ chí, basɨ̌ŋ amɛn árɛ̀m bɛ, “Básɔ́t ndɛn aya bákɔ́rɛ́. Bágʉɛ́p ɛbháŋá bɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́sɔt nkú aya.”
1925 Batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bákʉ nɔ. Nnɔ Yesu abhak téé kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ ɛkotákátí, nɛ manɔ́ máyi, María, ngɔrɛ́ Klopas, nɛ María mmɔ̌ ɛtɔk Mágdala.
1926 Yesu ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ máyi nɛ nkoŋo anɛ yi ákɔ́ŋɔ́ téé kɛ́kwɔ́t, arɛm ntá máyi bɛ, “Mmá, ghɔ́ mɔ́ywɛ nɔ!”
1927 Arɛm yɛ ntá nkoŋo wu bɛ, “Ghɔ́ máyɛ nɔ!” Nɛ bɛbho ɛwak ɛyɔ nkoŋo wu asɔt nnɔ Yesu arɔk ɛkɛt ɛyi nɛ yí. 
1928 Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm bɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, Yesu arɨŋɨ bɛ bɛtɨk ɛbhi mɛmay. Ndu bɛkʉ bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́mfú tɛtɛp, arɛm bɛ, “Manyiɛp ǎkwak mɛ.”
1929 Ɛjɔ̌ mmɛ́m amɛn ánɛn ɛchí nyaka arɛ téé. Básɔ́t ɛkuchá fofok bágwɔ́t antí ntábhɛ́nɔk ɛnɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ haysɔp, bátáp ndǔ mmɛm mɔ básá yi anyu.
1930 Yesu asɔ́k mmɛ́m mɔ, arɛm bɛ, “Bɛtɨk ɛbha mɛ́may.” Akʉ́ɛ́p ɛmɨ, arɔ nɛpɛ́m ɛni nɛndɔk. 
1931 Nywɔp ntóŋtí bo Israɛl nɛ́kwáy. Bɛkʉ yɛ bɛ́ ɛrɛnɛ ngú ɛ́kɛ́ rɔp amfay ɛkotákátí ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt bo Israɛl, bárɔ́k babhɛp Páílet bɛ ánchyɛ́ bɛtaŋ mánsíɛ́ptí bɛkak ɛbhap, mámfɛ́rɛ́ bhɔ ndǔ bɛkotakati. Nywɔp nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ɛnɔ nɛ́bhak nywɔp nɛgho.
1932 Ɛkʉ́ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bárɔk, básiɛ́ptí bɛkak mmǔ mbɨ, básiɛ́ptí bɛkak anɛfú.
1933 Kɛ bágháká nɔ́kɔ́ amʉɛt Yesu, bághɔ́ bɛ́ anáŋ agu, bɔ́ kɛsyɛpti bɛkak ɛbhi.
1934 Kɛ ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu amɔt asɔt nɛkɔŋ ayɛm Yesu ambeápak. Tɛ́mté wu, manoŋ nɛ manyiɛp abho bɛfu.
1935 Mmǔ anɛ ághɔ́ nyaka ndu ɛ́fákárí kɛ̌ ágháti bhɛsɛ nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ǎrɛ̀m ɛchí tɛtɛp. Arɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ árɛm chi tɛtɛp bɛ be nkwɔ́ mǎnsɨ́kɨ́ntɨ nɛ Yesu.
1936 Ɛ́fákárí ɛnyu ɛyɔ bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛchí amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́mfú tɛtɛp. Nɔ́ chí, ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ básɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka bɛ, “Yɛ̌ ɛghɛp ɛyi ɛ́mɔt bápú syɛp.”
1937 Nɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛpɛt ɛ́rɛ̀m ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt áchák bɛ, “Chɔŋ bo mámkpɔk yi anɛ báyɛ́mɛ́.” 
1938 Ɛ́tárɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, mmǔ amɔt átwɔ́. Áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Josɛ́f. Abhak mmǔ ɛtɔk Arimátia. Achí nyaka mmu anɛ ákòŋo Yesu. Ǎcháy nyaka bo Israɛl ndu yi achi nkoŋo Yesu. Afʉɛ́t arɔk ntá Páílet bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́, anɨkmʉɛt bɛ Páílet andɔ yi ámfɛ́rɛ́ mmʉɛt Yesu ndǔ ɛkotákátí. Páílet achyɛ yi bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ nɔ. Josɛ́f arɔk yɛ, afɛrɛ mmʉɛt Yesu ndǔ ɛkotákátí.
1939 Nikɔdɛ́mɔs mmu árɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛghɔ Yesu nɛ betí ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, abhak nkwɔ nɛ Josɛ́f. Yí, Nikɔdɛ́mɔs arɔk nɛ babhé amɛn bábyɔk amʉɛt ngu bɛ́ ákɛ́ chɔŋɔ. Babhé mɛ́rɛ́ abhak nchɔ́ptí myrrh nɛ álos. Ǎkway nyaka bɛbhak mbɔ kilo bɛsa bɛpay nsɛm byo ndǔ mɛnwɔp ɛbhi.
1940 Josɛ́f nɛ Nikɔdɛ́mɔs báfɛ́rɛ Yesu ndǔ ɛkotákátí, básɔ́t bɛ́syɛ́ndɛn nɛ babhé amɔ arɛ́, mánɛ́p yi bɛkoŋo ɛpɨŋ bo Israɛl.
1941 Mɔ́nkɨ áchi nyaka ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bágó Yesu ndǔ ɛkotákátí. Nnɛm nɛkɔ nɛ́bhák arɛ ɛnɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ re bhɛmɛ yɛ̌ ngú amɔt amɛm.
1942 Tɛ̌ndu nywɔp ɛnɔ nɛ́chí nyaka chí nywɔp ɛnɛn bo Israɛl bákʉ̀ ntoŋti bɛ́chwe ndǔ nywɔp nɛywěmʉɛt ɛnap, nɛ mbɔnyunɛ nnɛm ɛnɔ nɛ́bhɨkɨ sap nyaka nɛkɔ, Josɛ́f nɛ Nikɔdɛ́mɔs bárɔ́k bábhɛ́mɛ Yesu arɛ.
20
201 Nywɔp nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt bo Israɛl nɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, María mmɔ̌ ɛtɔk Mágdala afa nɛ nɛyǐnywɔp arɔk ndǔ nnɛm Yesu. Aghɔ́ bɛ́ mǎnáŋ bábɨ́ŋɨ́rí ntay ɛnɛn nɛchi anyǔ nnɛm báfɛrɛ.
202 María afa yɛ arɔk ntiɛ́t ntiɛt ntá Símun Píta nɛ nkoŋo Yesu áchák anɛ Yesu ákɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka, arɛm bɛ, “Báfɛ́rɛ́ Yesu Acha ndǔ nnɛm nɛ sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bárɔ́ŋ bábhʉ́rɛ́ yi.”
203 Píta afú yɛ nɛ nkoŋo anɛfú wu, báfá, báré rɔ́ŋ ndǔ nnɛm.
204 Báre rɔŋ ntiɛ̌ntiɛt, kɛ nkoŋo anɛfú wu ajɛt acha Píta. Ayambɨ aghaka ndǔ nnɛm.
205 Akuri amɨk. Asá nɔ́kɔ́ amɨ́k awu amɛm, aghɔ́ bɛbhɔ́k ɛ́síɛndɛn arɛ kɛ akɛ chwe amɛm.
206 Símun Píta mmu ákòŋo yi ansɛm áchwɔ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ nnɛm, afʉɛ́t, arɔk amɛm, aghɔ́ bɛbhɔ́k ɛ́síɛndɛn ɛbhɔ arɛ bhʉ́rɛ́.
207 Aghɔ́ ndɛn anɛ mánɛ́bhɛ́ nyaka ntí Yesu nɛ yɔ nkwɔ. Nɛ ndɛn ɛyɔ ɛbhak aywi nɛbhʉɛt kɛkúrí nɛnɛp.
208 Kɛ nkoŋo anɛfú wu anɛ ayambɨ áchwɔ́bhɛ́ ndǔ nnɛm achwe amɛm nkwɔ, aghɔ́ nɛ amɨ́k, anoko.
209 Kpátɛ mpok yɔ, bɔ́ bábhɨkɨ re jwi nyaka mmɛm ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ́mɛ́ bɛ́ Yesu abhɔŋ bɛpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
2010 Bakoŋo Yesu bhɔ bápɛtnsɛm ndǔ bɛkɛt ɛbhap. 
2011 Kɛ María ate nɛpaka nnɛm andi nɔkɔ kɛbhɔ, nɛ ɛnɛ́ yí ábhʉɛ́t bɛdi, akuri amɨk, agʉɛ́p amɨ́k awu amɛm nnɛm.
2012 Aghɔ́ bɔángɛl Mandɛm bati apay chɔ́kɔ́ nɛ ndɛn pɛ́pɛ́p amʉɛt ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bábhʉ́rɛ́ nyaka Yesu. Amɔt abhak ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt ntí ywi achi nyaka. Achák ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt bɛkak.
2013 Bárɛ́m ntá María bɛ, “Mmá, ɔ̌di yi?” María akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Chi ɛ̌ti báfɛ́rɛ́ Acha bárɔŋ nɛ yi, nɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ bábhʉ́rɛ́ yi.”
2014 Árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, ayibhiri mmʉɛt aghɔ́ Yesu téé, kɛ yi kɛrɨŋɨ bɛ chi yi.
2015 Yesu arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Mma, ɔ̌di yi? Ɔ̌yàŋ agha?” Ndǔ María ákáysí bɛ́ chí mmu anɛ áyɨ̀ŋɨ nkɨ, arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Ɛta, mbák ɔ́fɛ́rɛ́ yi, ghatí mɛ́ ɛbhak ɛnɛ ɔ́bhʉ́rɛ́ yi bɛ́ ndɔ́k nsɔt yí.”
2016 Yesu arɛm bɛ, “María!” María ayibhiri mmʉɛt arɛm ndǔ ɛyɔŋ bo Israɛl bɛ, “Rabóni!” [Nɔ chí “Ntɔŋ”].
2017 Yesu arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Kɛ́kɛm mɛ, mbɔnyunɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ re rɔŋ amfay ntá Ɛtaya. Kɛ dɔ́k ntá bɔ̌maya ghatí bhɔ bɛ́ mɛ̌pɛtnsɛm ntá Ɛtaya, nɛ ɛtayɛka. Ntá Mandɛm awa, nɛ Mandɛm aywɛka.”
2018 María mmɔ̌ ɛtɔk Mágdala arɔk aghati bakoŋo Yesu bɛ, “Ngɔ Yesu Acha.” Nɛ aghati bhɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Yesu aghati yi. 
2019 Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ beku ndǔ nkúbhɛ́ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt ɛnɔ, bakoŋo Yesu bábhak amɛm ɛkɛt ɛ́mɔt nɛ babhǐnywɔ́p femfé ndu báchay bǒbati bo Israɛl. Yesu arɔk ate bɔ́ bɛsí, arɛm bɛ, “Kpák ámbák nɛ bhe.”
2020 Árɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, atɔ́ŋ bɔ amɔ yi nɛ mbeápak ɛyi. Bakoŋo abhi bájwí nɛ maŋák ndu bághɔ́ Yesu Acha.
2021 Yesu apɛt arɛm bɛ, “Kpák ámbák nɛ bhe! Nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛtaya átó mɛ, kɛ nchí tó be.”
2022 Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, afɛ́p bhɔ ɛ̌yú, arɛm bɛ, “Dɔ̌ ka Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ámbák nɛ bhe.
2023 Mbák mǎmfóŋórí mmu bɛbʉ́ ɛbhi, Mandɛm nkwɔ ǎfoŋori yi. Mbák bǎbhɨkɨ foŋori bɛbʉ́ mmu, bɛ́rɔ̀p yi anti.” 
2024 Nkoŋo Yesu amɔt ndǔ abhɛn bati byo nɛ apay, anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Tɔmás, nɔ chí ɛfák, apú nyaka nɛ batɨ, mpok Yesu átwɔ́.
2025 Tɔmás átɛ́mɛ́rí nɔ́kɔ́ bhɔ, báré ghati yi bɛ, “Sɛ́ghɔ Yesu Acha.” Kɛ yi akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Kpátɛ ngɔ́ nɛ amɨ́k bɛbhé-mpi yí amɔ, ntɔk bhɔ́ nɛ sɛnɔŋ awɔ, mbát awɔ́ ndǔ tambe ywi mpú noko.”
2026 Ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ manywɔp ánɛn, bakoŋo Yesu bápɛ́t babhak anywɔp ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt amɔt. Tɔmás abhak nɛ bhɔ. Babhǐnywɔp ábhák femfé, Yɛ̌ nɔ, Yesu atwɔ́, ate nɛntɨ ɛnap, arɛm bɛ, “Kpák ámbák nɛ bhe.”
2027 Arɛm yɛ ntá Tɔmás bɛ, “Tɔ́k bɛrɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi ndu amɔ́ ya nɛ kɛnɔŋámɔ ɛkɛ ghɔ. Sá awɔ́ fá ndǔ tambe wa. Kɛ́pɛrɛ makati. Bák mmu anɛ ánòko!”
2028 Tɔmás akɛmɛ yí bɛ, “Acha nɛ Mandɛm awa!”
2029 Yesu arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Ɔnókó mbɔnyunɛ ɔ́ghɔ́ mɛ nɛ amɨ́k? Ɛrɨ ɛcha ntá bo abhɛn mánòko yɛ̌ndu bábhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ́ nɛ amɨ́k.” 
2030 Yesu akʉ nyaka bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay bɛ́chák bɛsí bakoŋo bhi, ɛbhɛ́n bábhɨ́kɨ́ sɨŋ amɛm ɛkáti ɛnɛ.
2031 Básɨŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chí amɛm ɛkáti ɛnɛ bɛ mɛnkwak be mǎnókó bɛ Yesu kɛ achi Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò, Mmɔ Mandɛm. Nɛ bɛ́ ndǔ mǎnókó yí, mǎmbɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛni.
21
211 Ɛ́tárɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, Yesu apɛt atɔ́ŋ mmʉɛt ntá bakoŋo bhi. Ndɔŋ yɔ, ɛbhák chi nɛpaka Manyu Tibérias.   Sɛ́ngɔ́ ɛnyǔ yi atɔŋ nyaka mmʉɛt ntá yap.
212 Símun Píta nɛ Tɔmás anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ ɛfák, nɛ Natániɛl anɛ áfú Kána atú Gálili, nɛ bɔ̌ Sɛbɛdi bati apay, nɛ bakoŋo Yesu báchák bati apay bachi nyaka ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt amɔt.
213 Símun Píta arɛm bɛ, “Mɛ̌rɔ̀ŋ anyɛ́n nɛ ási.” Bakoŋo Yesu báchák bárɛ́m bɛ, “Sɛ́rɔ̀ŋ nɛ wɔ.” Bɔ́ bárɔ́k básɔ́t áchwí, báré gháp anyɛ́n amɛm áchwí wu bɛti mɛnkɛm ndu bɛkɛm nsi, kɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɔ́kɛ kɛ́m.
214 Ndu mbaŋ ákàŋari, Yesu ate nɛpakányɛ́n. Yɛ̌ nɔ, bakoŋo bhi kɛrɨŋɨ bɛ chi yi.
215 Yesu arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Bɔ̌bha, bǎkɛm nsi?” Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Ǎe.”
216 Aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Gʉɛ́p ká asɨ ɛbhe awɔ́nɛm áchwí, chɔŋ mǎnkɛ́m nsi.” Bágʉɛ́p asɨ ɛbhe awɔ́nɛm. Bɛyǎ nsi ɛkwɛn, kpát ɛ́chá bhɔ́ bɛyǎ bɛyǎ nkáp ɛbhɨ.
217 Nkoŋo anɛ Yesu ákɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka arɛm ntá Píta bɛ, “Chi Acha!” Píta ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ chi Yesu Acha, asɔt ndɛn ayi afyɛ́ amʉɛt, adók, akwɛn amɛm manyu. Afɛ́rɛ́ nyaka yɔ amʉɛt ndu bɛkʉ bɛtɨk.
218 Kɛ bakoŋo abhɛn bárɔ́bhɛ́ amɛm áchwí báré nok bɛkoŋo yi angɔkɔnyɛ́n, mánja nɔkɔ bɛyǎ nkáp anɛ ajwi nɔ nɛ nsi. Nɛbhʉɛt anɛ báfú bɛ́rɔ́ŋ angɔkɔnyɛ́n kɛ sap. Abhak mbɔ bayat bɛsa bɛtay.
219 Bákó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛbhɨ baghɔ ngo anɛ bábháytí nɛ bakiri. Nsi ɛbhak arɛ. Brɛt nkwɔ abhak arɛ.
2110 Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Twɔ́ ká, nɛ mbɔk nsi ɛyɔ nɔ́ bǎkɛ́mɛ́.”
2111 Píta arɔk ndu áchwí, aya bɛyǎ nkáp, akó ɛbhɨ nɛ wu. Ájwí nɛ nsi ɛgho ɛbhak bɛsa tándrámɔt nsɛm byo nɛ ɛ́rát. Kɛ yɛ̌ndu nsi ɛyɔ ɛ́yá nɔ́, ásɨ kɛdakati.
2112 Yesu arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Twɔ́ nyiɛ́ ká nɛnyíɛ́.” Kɛ yɛ̌ nkoŋo amɔt kɛmɔ bɛbhɛp yi bɛ, “Ɔchí agha?” Bárɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ chí Yesu Acha.
2113 Yesu asɔt brɛ́t achyɛ bhɔ. Akʉ ɛnyumɔt nɛ nsi.
2114 Ndɔŋ ayɔ abhak anɛ ajwi ɛrat ɛnɛ́ Yesu átɔ́ŋɔ́ mmʉɛt ntá bakoŋo bhi, bɛbho ndǔ mpok anɛ yi ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. 
2115 Mányiɛ nɔ́kɔ́ nɛnyíɛ́, Yesu arɛm ntá Símun Píta bɛ, “Símun, mmɔ̌ Jɔ̌n, ɔkɔŋ mɛ ɔchá mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn-ɛ?” Símun akɛmɛ bɛ, “Ɛɛ, Acha, ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ nkɔŋ wɔ.” Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Ne bɔ̌bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n ayá.”
2116 Bɛ́jwí ndɔŋ ɛpay, Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Símun, mmɔ̌ Jɔ̌n, ɔkɔŋ mɛ?” Símun akɛmɛ bɛ, “Ɛɛ, Acha, ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ nkɔŋ wɔ.” Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Babhɛri nɔkɔ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n aya.”
2117 Bɛ́jwí ndɔŋ ɛ́rát, Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Símun, mmɔ̌ Jɔ̌n, ɔkɔŋ mɛ?” Píta abé ntɨ mbɔnyunɛ Yesu ábhɛp yi ɛnyɨŋ ɛrɛ ɛ́mɔt ndɔŋ ɛ́rát. Ɛ́kʉ, aghati Yesu bɛ, “Acha, ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ, ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ nkɔŋ wɔ.” Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Ne bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n aya.
2118 Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, mpok ɔ́chí ɛsakámu, ɔre gwɔ́t mmʉɛt, ɔ́ndɔk yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ ɔ́kɔ́ŋɔ́. Kɛ mpok ɔ́kɔ́kɔ́, chɔŋ ɔ́njoŋ ámɔ́ amfay, mmu achák amfyɛ wɔ́ ndɛn amʉɛt, ansɔt wɔ andɔk ɛbhak ɛnɛ ɔ́bhɨ́kɨ́ kɔŋ bɛrɔŋ.”
2119 Yesu arɛm nɔ́ bɛtɔŋ ɛnyǔ nɛwú ɛnɛn Píta ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́gu ndu bɛchyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó. Yesu arɛm yɛ ntá Píta bɛ, “Koŋó mɛ́.” 
2120 Píta ayibhiri mmʉɛt aghɔ́ nkoŋo anɛ Yesu ákɔ́ŋɔ́ ndu ákòŋo bhɔ́ ansɛm. Nkoŋo wu kɛ ághɔ́kɔ́ nyaka amʉɛt Yesu mpok mányìɛ̀ nɛnyíɛ́, nɛ yí wu kɛ ábhɛ́bhɛ́ nyaka Yesu bɛ, “Acha, agha áti chɔŋ wɔ?”
2121 Píta ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yi, abhɛp Yesu bɛ, “Acha, ná nɛ anɛ?”
2122 Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Mbák mɛ̌yaŋ bɛ́ yi wu ambak nɛpɛ́m tɛ mpɛtnsɛm, ɛyɔ ɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ́ wɔ́ ná? Koŋó mɛ́!”
2123 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu árɛ́mɛ́, ɛ́táká nɛntɨ bǒnkwɔ bɛ nkoŋo Yesu wu abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛ́gu. Kɛ, sayri sayri, Yesu abhɨ́kɨ́ ghati nyaka Píta bɛ Jɔ̌n apu gú. Arɛm chi bɛ, “Mbák mɛ̌yáŋ bɛ yi ákɛ́ gú tɛ́ mpɛtnsɛm, ɛyɔ ɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ́ wɔ́ ná?”
2124 Nkoŋo Yesu wu kɛ ághàti bhɛsɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, nɛ yi kɛ ásɨ́ŋɨ́ bhɔ amɨk. Nɛ sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yí árɛ̀m ɛchi tɛtɛp. 
2125 Yesu akʉ nyaka bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ bɛchak. Mbɔ básɨ́ŋ bɔ́ mɛnkɛm amɨk ɛ́mɔt ɛ́mɔt, nkáysí bɛ́ mbʉ mmɨk nkɛm ajwí nɛ bɛkáti, kpátɛ mbɔk andɔp.21
1
11 Ɛta Tiófilɔs, ndǔ ɛkáti ɛya ɛnɛ mbɨ, nsɨŋ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛ́n Yesu ákʉ́ nɛ ɛbhɛn yi atɔŋɔ bɛbho mpok yi ábhó bɛtɨk ɛbhi fá amɨk,
12 kpát bɛ́gháka nywɔp ɛnɛn Mandɛm ákʉ́ yi akó amfay. Ápɛ́rɛ ko amfay, Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ akʉ yi angati bo abhɛn yi ayabhɛ bɛ mámbák bǒnto bhi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ babhɔŋɔ bɛkʉ.
13 Mpok yi apɛrɛnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, atɔ́ŋ mmʉɛt ntá yap ndǔ bɛyǎ ndɔŋ ndǔ manywɔp bɛsa bɛpay. Bághɔ́ yi kpoŋoroŋ ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ bápú kway mɛmakati bɛ, sayri sayri, apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Apɛt nyaka nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m antɔŋ nɔkɔ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm bɛkʉ bo mándɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm ábhák nɛ bho mbɔ Mfɔ wap.
14 Mpok yí ábhʉɛ́t nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎkɛ́ fá Yerúsalɛm. Chɔkɔ́ ká noŋ akap anɛ́ Ɛta afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛ́tó mbɔ ɛnyǔ ngátí bhe.
15 Jɔ̌n ájwìti nyaka bo nɛ manyiɛp, kɛ ndǔ mpǎy manywɔp, chɔŋ Mandɛm anjwiti bhe nɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ.”
16 Mpok Yesu achi nɛ bǒnto bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Acha, chɔŋ ɔ́nsɔt kɛfɔ Israɛl ɔ́nkɛmɛ ntá yɛsɛ bo Israɛl kɛ?”
17 Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ bɛriŋɨ mpok anɛ Ɛta afyɛ́ bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛmfakari. Ɛta mmu afyɛ́ mpok ndǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi kɛ árɨ́ŋɨ́.
18 Chɔŋ Mandɛm anchyɛ bhe bɛtaŋ mpok Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ atwɔ́ ntá yɛka, mǎmbak yɛ batísiɛ bha amɛm Yerúsalɛm, nɛ atú Judɛ́ya ankɛm, nɛ atú Samária, nɛ ndǔ mmɨk nkɛm.” 
19 Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, Mandɛm asɔt yi apɛtnsɛm amfay. Báte mánjɨŋɨ nɔkɔ yi ndu árɔ̀ŋ. Nɛbháŋ nɛ́kúti yi, bɔ kɛpɛrɛ ghɔ́ yi.
110 Báré yɨŋɨ gbɔkɔ́ɔ́ ndǔ yi árɔ̀ŋ amfay. Bápɛ́rɛ ghɔ, bo bati apay nɛ nkú pɛ́pɛ́p amʉɛt báté kɛkwɔt nɛ bhɔ.
111 Barɛm bɛ, “Bě bo Galili, ndáká yi bachi afɔ téé mánjɨŋɨ nɔkɔ awu amfay? Chɔŋ Yesu mmu árɔ́ be arɔŋɔ amfay, ampɛtnsɛm nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǎghɔ́ yi árɔ̀ŋ amfay.” 
112 Bǒnto Yesu barɔ yɛ Njiɛ Mɛnɔk Ólif bápɛtnsɛm Yerúsalɛm, nɛkɔ ɛnɛ́n nɛchi mbɔ kilómɛta amɔt.
113 Báchwɔ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ arɛ́, bákó amfay ndu mɔ́kɛt amɔt amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́mfáy anɛ bɔ báchɔ̀kɔ nyaka arɛ. Bǒnto bhɔ babhak Píta, nɛ Jɔ̌n, nɛ Jems, nɛ Andru, nɛ Fílip, nɛ Tɔmás, nɛ Batolómio, nɛ Mátio, nɛ Jems mmɔ́ Alfeyɔs, nɛ Símun anɛ achi nyaka ndǔ nkwɔ bo abhɛn mánù ɛ̌ti ɛtɔk ɛyap, nɛ Júdas mmɔ́ Jems.
114 Bɔ mankɛm babhak ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt. Báchyɛ́ mmʉɛt ndǔ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt nɛbhʉɛt amɔt chɛchɛm nɛ mbɔk bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn baghɔrɛ́, nɛ María nnɔ Yesu, nɛ bɔ̌máyi abhɛn babhakanɛm.
115 Ɛwak ɛ́mɔ́t ndǔ manywɔp ɛyɔ, bakoŋo Yesu bákɛ́m ɛchɛmɛ. Bábhák batí bɛsa bɛtandat. Arɛ, Píta afate arɛm bɛ,
116 “Bɔ̌ma, mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn básɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ̌ti Júdas mmu ákwáká bo mankɛm Yesu bɛbhɔŋ nyaka bɛfu tɛtɛp. Nɔ chí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ákʉ́ nyaka Mfɔ Debhít ándɨ́ŋɨ́ nɛ arɛm bɛ bɛbhɔŋ bɛfakari.
117 Yí Júdas achí nyaka ndǔ nkwɔ́ ywɛsɛ́ ndu Yesu áyábhɛ́ yi bɛ ankʉ bɛtɨk nɛ bhɛsɛ.
118 “Júdas atí nɔ́kɔ́ Yesu, asɔt nkáp manoŋ anɛ́ báchyɛ́ yi aku ɛkpɔkɔ́ mmɨk. Nɛ ndǔ ɛkpɔ́kɔ́ mmɨk ɛyɔ, yímbɔŋ akwɛ́n kɛ́bhɛri mɛniɛ bɛ́sɛ́n, mántɛp árɔ́ri amɨk, agú.
119 Bǒ mankɛm abhɛn báchí amɛm ɛtɔk Yerúsalɛm bághók ndak anɛ áfákárí. Ɛ́kʉ́ bábhó bɛ́bhɨ́ŋɨ nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́mɨk wu ndǔ ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛyap bɛ Akɛldáma, nɔ́ chí mmɨkɨ́ manoŋ.
120 “Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyǔ Mfɔ Debhít asɨŋɨ amɛm Ɛkáti Bakway bɛ́: ‘Ɛkɛt ɛyi ɛ́ndɔ́p ɛwɔ́, yɛ̌ mmu kɛ́chɔkɔ amɛm.’ Nɛ Debhít apɛt asɨŋ bɛ, ‘Mmu áchák ánsɔ́t ɛ́pɔ́kɔ́ bɛtɨk ɛyi.’
121‑22 “Ɛ́rɨ yɛ bɛ́ mmu áchák ánchɛ́m nɛ bhɛsɛ bɛ sɛ́ngátí nɔ́kɔ́ bo mbɔ batísiɛ bɛ Yesu apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Mmu wu abhɔŋ bɛ́bhak chi mmu anɛ achi nyaka ndǔ nkwɔ ywɛsɛ mpok Yesu Acha achi nɛ bhɛsɛ, bɛ́bho mpok Jɔ̌n ájwítí yí bɛghaka nywɔp ɛnɛn yi arɔŋɔ amfay.”
123 Nkaysi yap akwɛ́n amʉɛt bo bati apay: Josɛ́f nɛ Matías. Josɛ́f abhɔ́ŋ manyɛ́n áchák ápáy. Nɔ́ chí Jústɔs nɛ Básabas.
124 Mánɨ́k yɛ mmʉɛt bɛ́, “Acha, ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ nkaysi yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu. Ndǔ bǒbhɛn batí apay, ntɨkɨ mmu ɔ́yábhɛ́
125 bɛ́ ambak mǔnto ndu bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn ndu bɛsɔt ɛpók Júdas mmú árɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kwáy nɛ yi?
126 Bágʉɛ́p yɛ ɛbhaŋa ɛ̌ti bǒbhɛn batí apay. Ɛ́ká Matías. Básɔ́t yɛ Matías báchɛm nɛ nkwɔ bǒnto Yesu bachak batí byó nɛ amɔt.”
2
21 Nywɔp ɛpǎ bo Israɛl ɛnɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ́ *Pɛ́ntɛkɔs ɛghaka nɔkɔ, bakoŋo Yesu mankɛm bábhák nɛbhʉɛt amɔt.
22 Ɛwat ɛ́fú amfáy tɛ́mchók mbɔ ɛnɛ́ mbʉ́ɛ́p ataŋataŋ ɛ́jwǐ amɛm ɛkɛt ɛnɛ́ bɔ bachi arɛ.
23 Bághɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ bárɨ́ngo. Átáka, ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap abhɔ́ŋ nɛmɔt ɛnɛn nɛte yi anti.
24 Tɛ́mté wu Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ abhak nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap tontó. Akʉ́ bábhó bɛ́rɛ́m bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛn bɔ babhɨkɨ ghɔk.
25 Mpok yɔ, bǒ abhɛn báfyɛ̀ bɛtaŋ bɛbhʉ̀rɛ bɛbhé bo Israɛl babhak Yerúsalɛm. Báfú ndǔ bɛyǎ bɛtɔk.
26 Bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛwat ɛyɔ, bárɔk ntiɛ́t ntiɛt bɛ́ghɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fàkari. Bábhak maknkay bɛghók ndǔ bakoŋo Yesu bárɛ̀m bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk nyáŋá nyáŋá ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap ághòk ndu ɛyi ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bárɛ̀m.
27 Bábhák maknkay tontó, bábho bɛrɛm bɛ, “Pú bǒbhɛn mankɛm chi bo Galili?
28 Ná ɛ́chí bɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛsɛ ǎghòk ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bɔ́ bárɛ̀m ndǔ ɛyi ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk?
29 Sɛ́fǔ bɛtɔk nyáŋá nyáŋá: Mbɔk báfu Pátia, báchák Mídia, abhɛ́nɛ́fú Ɛ́lam; mbɔk báfú Mɛsopotemia, báchák atú Judéya, abhɛ́nɛ́fú atú Kapadóshiya; mbɔk báfú atú Pɔ́ntɔs, báchák atú Ésia.
210 Mbɔk báfú atú Fríjia, báchák atú Pamfília. Mbɔk báfú Íjip, báchák báfú ndǔ batáp ɛtɔk Líbia anɛ achi kɛkwɔt nɛ Sírene. Ndú abhɛn báfú Rom, mbɔk chi bo Israɛl, báchák bǒ abhɛn bákòŋo Mandɛm mbɔ bo Israɛl,
211 báchák báfú Krɛt, abhɛ́nɛ́fú Arébia. Yɛ̌ nɔ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ ywɛsɛ ǎghòk ndu bɔ́ bárɛ̀m mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛn Mandɛm ákʉ́ ndu ɛyi ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk.”
212 Bɔ́ mankɛm bábhák maknkay, batí átáká bhɔ́, bábhó bɛbhɛp batɨ bɛ, “Anɛ́ ndak-aa?”
213 Kɛ bachak báré way bakoŋo Yesu mándɛm nɔkɔ bɛ, “Mmɛ́m akɛm bǒbhɛn!” Nɛtwɔ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ 
214 Píta afate yɛ nɛ bǒnto báchák batí byó nɛ amɔt, abho bɛrɛm nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ ntá bɛyǎ bǒbhɔ bɛ, “Bǒ Judɛ́ya nɛ be mankɛm abhɛn bǎchi Yerúsalɛm, tá ká batú mǎngók ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌rɛ̀m.
215 Bǒbhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ kwɛ́n chi mmɛ́m mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǎkàysi. Nywɔp nɛchi ndiɛrɛ nkárɛ́nká nɛ́nɛ́namɔt běti.
216 Nɛ́ chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Jóɛl arɛmɛ nyaka bɛ chɔŋ ɛmfakari. Joɛl arɛm nyaka bɛ,
217 Mandɛm arɛm bɛ ‘Ndǔ manywɔbhɛ́ ngwɛnti, chɔŋ nkʉ Ɛfóŋó ya antwɔ ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu. Bɔ̌bhɛka mángati barak anɛ́ mɛ mfyɛ́ bɔ́ antɨ. Bɛsak ɛbhɛka mángɔ́ kɛnɔ́ amɨ́k antifu, nɛ baseansi bhɛka mángɔ kɛnɔ́.
218 Ndu manywɔp ɛyɔ, chɔŋ nkʉ Ɛfóŋó ya ɛ́ntwɔ́ ntá bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk abha, abhɛ́n baghɔrɛ́, nɛ abhɛn babhakanɛm, nkʉ bɔ́ mángati barak anɛ́ mfyɛ́ bɔ́ antɨ.
219 Nɛ chɔŋ nkʉ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay mɛ́mfakari amfay, nɛ ntɔŋ bɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay fá amɨk. Chɔŋ manoŋ ambak, ngó ambak, mɔ́ngo ambak.
220 Chɔŋ mmok anjibhiri ándɔp ɛjuri, ntaŋ ánjibhiri andɔp manoŋ, kɛ nywɔp nɛgho ɛnɛ́n Acha átwɔ̀ nɛngaka.
221 Nɛ chɔŋ ɛmbak bɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ábhɨ̀ŋɨ Acha bɛ ánkwák yi, Acha ǎpɛmɛ yi.’”
222 Píta arɔk ambɨ bɛ́rɛ́m bɛ, “Bo Israɛl, ghók ká bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛ́n: ‘Yesu mmu Násárɛt chí mmu anɛ Mandɛm áyábhɛ́ nyaka. Atɔ́ŋ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ́ ayap yí ndǔ áchyɛ́ yi bɛtaŋ. Akʉ yɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay. Atɔ́ŋ bɛrɨŋ. Bě babhɔŋ bǎrɨŋɨ nɔ sayri mbɔnyunɛ akʉ nyaka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛsí ɛbhɛka.
223 Mandɛm anáŋ arɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛfakari nɛ Yesu bɛkoŋo nkaysi yi. Báfyɛ́ yɛ́ yi amɔ yɛká bɛ mǎnchyɛ yi ntá bo bɛbʉ́ bɛ mángó ndǔ ɛkotákátí, mángway.
224 Kɛ Mandɛm akʉ yí ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, afɛrɛ yí ndǔ bɛbě nɛwú mbɔnyunɛ nɛwú nɛpu kway nyaka bɛbhɔŋ bɛtaŋ amfǎy yi.’”
225 Mfɔ Debhít asɨŋ nyaka ɛ̌ti yi bɛ, “Nchí ghɔ nyaka Acha mpoknkɛm bɛsí bha, abhak ɛbhe awɔ́nɛm ɛya, bɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛkɛ nyɨkɨsi mɛ.
226 Ntǐ ɛna nɛ́jwi yɛ nɛ maŋák, nɛ nchí rɛm kɛpɨ nɛ maŋák. Nɛ mbákántɨ chí nɛ Mandɛm,
227 Mbɔnyunɛ wɔ Mandɛm ɔpú chɛn chɔŋ mɛ ɔ́ndɔ́ amɛm ɛtɔkɔ́ bawú, ɔpú rɔ chɔŋ Mmu anɛ áchyɛ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛni ntá yɛ ámpɔ́ amɛm nnɛm.
228 Ɔkʉ mɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ mbi nɛpɛ́m. Ndǔ ɔ́chí nɛ mɛ mpoknkɛm, chɔŋ ɔ́nkʉ mɛmbɔŋ bɛyǎ maŋák.”
229 Píta arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Bɔ̌ma, nchí kway bɛghati bhe kpoŋoroŋ ɛ̌ti Mfɔ Debhít, chi mbɨ ywɛsɛ. Agu nyaka, bábhɛ́mɛ yi, nɛ nnɛm ɛni nɛbhʉɛt fá nɛ bhɛsɛ kpatɛ ɛchɔŋ.
230 Achí nyaka ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ. Arɨŋɨ bariɛp amɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ́ yi, kpát anyú nku bɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm ankʉ ɛbhárɛ́mɔ ywi anyiɛ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ɛyi.
231 Debhít ayambɨ aghɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛkʉ ndǔ mpok anɛ átwɔ̀ ambɨ kɛ yɔ ɛmfakari. Aghɔ́ bɛ, chɔŋ Mandɛm ankʉ Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Ɛ̌ti yɔ, Debhít arɛm nyaka bɛ, ‘Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ chɛn Mpɛmɛ yí áyábhɛ́ ándɔ́ amɛm ɛtɔkɔ́ bawú nɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ chɛn mmʉɛt yi ámpɔ́ amɛm nnɛm.’
232 Mandɛm akʉ Yesu apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nɛ bɛsɛ́ mankɛm sɛ́ghɔ́ yi nɛ sɛchi batísiɛ bɛ achi nɛpɛ́m.
233 Mandɛm achyɛ yí bɛyǎ kɛnókó ndu akʉ yi achɔkɔ ɛbhe awɔ́nɛm ɛyi ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ. Ɛta abhʉrɛ bariɛp ami ndu achyɛ yí Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ. Nɛ chí Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ mmu Yesu achyɛ bhɛsɛ kɛ ákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́fàkari nɛ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǎghɔ̀ nɛ bǎghòk.
234 Debhít abhɨ́kɨ́ rɔ nyaka ɛtɔkɔ́ bawú ándɔ́k amfay. Kɛ yímbɔŋ arɛm bɛ, ‘Ɛta Mandɛm arɛm nyaka ntá Acha wa bɛ́: “Chɔkɔ́ fá ɛbhe awɔ́nɛm ɛya ndu ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ,
235 kpátɛ nkʉ bǒmpap abhɛ mámbak mbɔ ɛnɔk ɛnɛ ɔ́chɔkɔ ɔ́nyaŋa bɛkak arɛ́.”’
236 “Bo Israɛl mankɛm bábhɔŋ bɛ́rɨŋɨ yɛ sayri bɛ, Yesu mmu be bǎgo ndǔ ɛkotákátí kɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ yi áchi Acha nɛ Mpɛmɛ yi áyábhɛ́.”
237 Bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ Píta arɛmɛ, ɛ́kwɛ́n bɔ́ tɛ antɨ. Babhɛp Píta nɛ bǒnto bachak bɛ, “Bɔ̌ma, chɔŋ sɛ́nkʉ yɛ ná?”
238 Píta akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ yɛka abhɔŋ bɛ́tɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhi nɛ mánjwiti yi ndǔ nnyɛ́n Yesu Kristo bɛ Mandɛm amfoŋori bɛbʉ́ bhi. Mmǔ anɛ ákʉ́ nɔ Mandɛm ǎchyɛ yi Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ mbɔ akap.
239 Bariɛp amɛn ayɨ́ŋɨ́ be nɛ bɔ̌bhɛka, nɛ bǒ mankɛm abhɛn bachi nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ. Ayɨ́ŋɨ́ nkwɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ Mandɛm Acha yɛsɛ ábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ antwɔ ntá yi.”
240 Píta arɔk ambɨ bɛ́rɛm baya mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́chák ansɛmti nɔkɔ bhɔ bɛ́ “Fɛrɛ́ ká mmʉɛt ndǔ ntɛmsi anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́twɔ ntá bǒ bɛbʉ́ abhɛn fá ammɨk.”
241 Ɛkʉ bo abhɛn mánóko ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Píta arɛmɛ bárɔ́k bájwiti bhɔ. Nɛ bo abhɛn bachɛmɛ nɛ bakoŋo Yesu nywɔp ɛnɔ babhak mbɔ nká ɛ́rát.
242 Bachyɛ mmʉɛt ndu bɛ́ghɔ́k mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǒnto Yesu bátɔ̀ŋ. Bɔ́ mankɛm abhɛn manókó babhak ndu nsoŋ amɔt ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ, ndǔ Nɛnyiɛ Acha nɛ ndu nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt. 
243 Bǒnto Yesu bábho bɛkʉ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay nɛ bɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay. Bɛcháy bɛ́kɛ́m bo mankɛm abhɛn bághɔ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ.
244 Nɛ bo abhɛn mánóko mankɛm babhák ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔ́t, mánkɔrɛ nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhap ndǔ nsoŋ amɔt.
245 Mpok nɛ mpok, abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ bátì nyaka mánkɔrɛ nɔkɔ nkáp nɛ abhɛn ɛyap ɛ́pú ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap abhɔŋ ɛnyɨŋ.
246 Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔp báchɛ̀m nyaka amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm amɛm Yerúsalɛm ndu mɛ́nɨ́kmʉɛt. Báchɛ̀m nyaka nkwɔ amɛm bɛkɛt ɛbhap ndǔ Nɛnyiɛ Acha nɛ ndǔ mɛnyiɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ bɛyǎ maŋák nɛ ntɨ nɛmɔt,
247 mámbɨti nɔkɔ Mandɛm. Bǒ mankɛm bághɔ́ ndǔ bakoŋo Yesu bákʉ̀ nɛ báre bhɔ́ŋ maŋák nɛ bhɔ. Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛwak Acha ankʉ nɔkɔ bo abhɛn yi ápɛ́mɛ́ mánchɛ́m nɛ bakoŋo bhi.
3
31 Ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n bare rɔŋ ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm ndu nkárɛ́nká ɛ́rát nɛ ngósí mpok nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt.
32 Bágháká nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ nyǔbha anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Ɛrɨ́tí Nyǔbha, bághɔ́ mmu anɛ áchí mbɛ́ntí tɛ nɛbhe ɛni arɛ́ chɔ́kɔ́. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛwak bo bápɔ̀kɔ nyaka yi mámbʉrɛ ndu nyǔbha wu bɛ́ ánɨ́ŋɨ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nkáp ntá bo abhɛn báfʉɛ̀t bɛrɔŋ amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm mɛnɨkmʉɛt.
33 Mbɛ́ntí wu aghɔ nɔkɔ Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n ndǔ báyaŋ bɛfʉɛt mandɔk ɛkɛrákap, abho mɛ́nɨŋɨ bhɔ nkáp.
34 Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n báyɨŋɨ yi diíí. Píta arɛm yɛ bɛ, “Yɨŋɨ́ bhɛsɛ!”
35 Atɛp bɔ amɨ́k amʉɛt nɛ nkaysi bɛ́ chɔŋ manchyɛ yi ɛnyɨŋ.
36 Kɛ Píta arɛm bɛ, “Mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nkáp, kɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ chɔŋ nchyɛ́ wɔ. Ndǔ nnyɛ́n Yesu Kristo mmu Násárɛt, faté kɔ!”
37 Akɛ́m yi ndǔ awɔ́nɛm ayoŋ. Tɛ́mté wu, bɛtaŋ Mandɛm bɛ́chwe ndu bɛkak nɛ mɛmɨ̌ bɛkak ɛbhi.
38 Adók ate kpɛrɛp, abho bɛkɔ. Are kɔ andokoti nɔkɔ, nɛ ambɨtɨ nɔkɔ Mandɛm, kpát arɔk achwe amɛm ɛkɛrákap nɛ bhɔ.
39 Bo mankɛm abhɛn bachi arɛ bághɔ́ yi ndu ákɔ̀ ambɨti nɔkɔ Mandɛm.
310 Bárɨ́ŋɨ bɛ yi kɛ áchɔ̀kɔ nɔ́kɔ́ nyaka ndǔ Ɛrɨ́tí Nyǔbha anɛ ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm anɨŋɨ nɔkɔ nkáp. Ɛkʉ bábhák maknkay, nɛ manyu arɔp bhɔ fúfú bɛghɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛfakari. 
311 Mmu wu abhat mmʉɛt nɛ Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n kpát bárɔk baghaka amɛm nɛbhʉɛt ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Áchá Sólomon. Bo mankɛm bare rɔŋ arɛ ntiɛ́t ntiɛt bɛghɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fàkari. Babhak maknkay tontó.
312 Píta aghɔ nɔkɔ ndǔ bǒbhɔ bákàp bhɔ, arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Bɔ̌ma, bo Israɛl, ndaká yi bǎchí maknkay, mǎmkpɔkɔ nɔkɔ bhɛsɛ ɛnyu ɛyɔ? Bǎkaysi bɛ chi ndǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛsɛ́ kɛ̌ yí ákɔ̀ nɛ́nɛ kɛ? Nɛ puyɛ̌ chi bɛ sɛ́chày Mandɛm tontó.
313 Mandɛm bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ, Mandɛm Ábraham nɛ Áisek nɛ Jekɔ́p kɛ achyɛ mǔbɛtok ywi Yesu kɛnókó. Achyɛ́ yi kɛnókó yɛ̌ndu be bǎrɛ̀m nyaka bɛ bǎbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ yi mpok Páílet áyàŋ bɛfɛrɛ yi amɔ. Bǎsɔ́t yi bǎchyɛ́ ntá bǒbati Rom bɛ mángwáy.
314 Yesu achí nyaka nyáŋá nɛ chak bɛsí Mandɛm, Yɛ̌ nɔ be kɛka bɛ Páílet ándɔ́ yi andɔk. Bǎrɛ́m bɛ Páílet ándɔ́ chí ngwayti bho andɔk.
315 Bǎkʉ́ báwáy yi mmu áchyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m. Kɛ Mandɛm akʉ yí apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Bɛsɛ́ sɛ́ghɔ́ nɛ amɨ́k ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛfakari.
316 Yesu kɛ ákʉ́ mbɛ́ntí nɛ áfáté. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎghɔ́ nɛ ɛnɛ́ bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ ɛfakari, mɛnkɛm bɛ́chí ɛnyu yɔ mbɔnyunɛ sɛ́sɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ nɛ yi. Chí ndu sɛ́sɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ nɛ yí kɛ ɛ́kʉ mbɛ́ntí nɛ áfáté kpɛrɛp mbɔ ɛnyǔ bě mankɛm bǎghɔ́.
317 “Bɔ̌ma, nɛ́nɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ ká bɛ́ be nɛ bǒ batí bhɛka bǎchí nyaka chi amɛm ɛjuri bɛyɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎkʉ́ ntá Yesu.
318 Kɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ bhi bághátí bo tɛsáy bɛ, Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò, abhɔŋ bɛghɔ ɛsɔŋɔri, Mandɛm akʉ yɔ ɛfu tɛtɛp.” Tɨ́k yɛ́ ka nsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka, mámpɛtnsɛm ntá Mandɛm, bɛ yi amfoŋori bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka.
319 Mbák mǎnkʉ ɛnyu yɔ, Acha ǎkʉ mǎmbɔŋ mpok nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ndǔ bɛfóŋó ɛbhɛka,
320 antó be Mpɛmɛ yi afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò bɛ ambak Mpɛmɛ yɛka.
321 Yí wu chi Yesu mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛbhak amfay nɛ Mandɛm kpátɛ mpok anɛ yi ákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm mɛ́njíbhírí mɛ́ndɔp bɛkɔ. Barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm mánáŋ bárɛm tɛntɛp bɛ chɔŋ ɛ́mbak ɛnyu yɔ.
322 Moses arɛm nyaka bɛ, “Chɔŋ Mandɛm Acha antó be ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ ywi mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi ato mɛ. Nɛ chɔŋ yi ambak mmu ywɛka amɔt nɛ bǎbhɔŋ bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ághàti bhe mǎnkʉ.
323 Nɛ chɔŋ ɛmbak bɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ apu ghok ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ wu, báfap yi nɛ bǒ Mandɛm, mangway.
324 Samuɛl nɛ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ abhɛn báfú yi ansɛm, mankɛm bárɛm nyaka nkwɔ́ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́fàkari manywɔp anɛ́ ɛchɔŋ.
325 Mɛnyɨŋ ɛ́bhɛn barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ bárɛ́mɛ́ mɛnkɛm bɛ́yɨŋɨ bhe. Nɛ nku anɛ Mandɛm ányú nyaka nɛ bachǐmbɨ bhɛka, ányu nɛ be nkwɔ́, mbɔnyunɛ arɛm nyaka ntá Ábraham bɛ, ‘Chɔŋ mfʉɛ́t ntá bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ bhɛ ńjɛt manɛrɛ́kɛrɛ́ mmɨk ankɛm.’
326 Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ ɛchi bɛ Mandɛm ayap nyaka mǔbɛtok ywi, ayambɨ átó yi chi ntá yɛka bɛ́ ánjɛ́t be ndǔ ákʉ̀ be mandɔ́ nɛpɛ́m bɛbʉ́ ɛnɛka.”
4
41 Ɛnɛ́ Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n bághàti bo mɛnyɨŋ ɛnyu yɔ, mbɔk bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ mǔnti babhabhɛri ɛkɛrákap nɛ mbɔk bǒnkwɔ Sádusi bátwɔ́ ntá yap.
42 Batɨ ábé bhɔ mbɔnyunɛ Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n bátɔ̀ŋ mángati nɔkɔ bo bɛ́ Yesu apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m bɛtɔŋ bɛ chɔŋ bawú mámpɛtsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
43 Bákɛ́m Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n bárɔ́k báfe, nɛ tɛ̌ndu beku mɛnaŋ bɛ́gháká nyaka, barɔ bhɔ arɛ tɛ ntɨnywɔp.
44 Yɛ̌ nɔ, bɛyǎ bo abhɛn bághókó ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n bághátí bhɔ, mánóko. Mpǎy bakoŋo Yesu mankɛm akó aghaka mbɔ nká ɛtay.
45 Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, bakɛmɛ́ ɛtɔk nɛ bǒ batí bo Israɛl, nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm bákɛ́m ɛchɛmɛ amɛm ɛtɔk Yerúsalɛm.
46 Ánas mǔngo bachiǎkap Mandɛm, nɛ Káyfas, nɛ Jɔ̌n, nɛ Aleksánda, nɛ bǒnɛrɛ́kɛt mǔngo bachiǎkap báchɛm nɛ bhɔ.
47 Básɔ́t Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n bákʉ bɔ́ báte bɛsí bhap, bábhɛ́p yɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Ndu nnyɛ́n agha bákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn? Agha áchyɛ́ bhe bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ bhɔ?”
48 Ndǔ bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ, Píta akɛmɛ bhɔ́ bɛ, “Bě bakɛmɛ́ ɛtɔk nɛ bǒ batí ɛtɔk,
49 mbák bábhɛ̀p bhɛsɛ ɛchɔŋ ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ ɛbhɛn sɛ́kʉ́ ntá mbɛ́ntí-nɛ, nɛ ɛnyǔ ɛ́fákárí kɛ yi ǎtaŋ,
410 Bě mankɛm nɛ bo Israɛl mankɛm dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ chí Yesu Kristo mmu Násárɛt kɛ ákʉ́ mmǔ-nɛ ataŋa. Yí mmu bágó ndǔ ɛkotákátí, kɛ̌ Mandɛm akʉ yí apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, ndǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi kɛ̌ bǎghɔ́ mmǔ-nɛ áté be bɛsí kpɛrɛp.
411 Nkúbhɛ́ Yesu kɛ̌ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m ɛ̌ti yi bɛ́: ‘Ntay ɛnɛ́n bě batě bɛkɛt bǎbyáká, nɔ́ kɛ nɛ́rɔ́bhɛ́ ɛkwap ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kɛ́mɛ́ ɛkɛt.’
412 Ndiɛrɛ yí kɛ ákway bɛpɛmɛ bhɛsɛ. Mmu achak apú fá amɨk anɛ Mandɛm achyɛ bɛ ampɛmɛ bhɛsɛ.”
413 Bo ɛchɛmɛ́ bǒ batí ɛtɔk bághɔ́ nɛtaŋántɨ Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n ndǔ bárɛ̀m kɛpɨ kɛbhɔŋ bɛcháy nɛ ndǔ bághɔ́ nkwɔ bɛ́ bɔPíta báchí chí ndɛ́ndɛmɛ́ bho, nɛ bɛ bɔ bábhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔk ɛkáti, bábhák maknkay. Kɛ bághɔ́ bɛ bɔPíta mánáŋ bákɔ̀ nyaka nɛ Yesu.
414 Nɛ ndu bághɔ́ mbɛ́ntí anɛ bákʉ́ yi ataŋa nɛpak Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n, manyu áchók bhɔ.
415 Ɛ́kʉ́ bátɛ́n kpɨ́k bɔ́ nɛfí. Bábho bɛsokori mámbɛbhɛ nɔkɔ batɨ bɛ,
416 “Chɔŋ sɛ́nkʉ yi nɛ bǒbhɛ́n? Bǒ mankɛm fá ɛtɔk Yerúsalɛm baghɔ ɛrɛmɛ́ ɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛnɛ́ bɔ́ bákʉ́ nɛ sɛ́pú kway bɛtaŋa.
417 Kɛ ndu bɛkʉ bɛ mbok anɛ ákɛ́pɛrɛ taka ɛtɔk, sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛya bǒbhɛn batú bɛ bákɛ́pɛrɛ rɛm yɛ̌nyɨŋ ntá mmu ndǔ nnyɛ́n Yesu.”
418 Bábhɨ́ŋɨ yɛ bhɔ bápɛtnsɛm amɛm áchá. Básɛ́mti bhɔ́ bɛ bakɛpɛrɛ rɛm nɛ bakɛpɛrɛ tɔ́ŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ndǔ nnyɛ́n Yesu.
419 Kɛ Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n bákɛ́mɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Bě babhɔŋ bɛ́p ká mmʉɛt ɛyɛka ndak anɛ. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́chí chak bɛsí Mandɛm chi ɛnɛ́? Bɛ́ghok bhe kɛ chi bɛghok Mandɛm?
420 Sɛ́pú kwáy bɛrɔ bɛrɛm ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́ghɔ́ nɛ amɨ́k nɛ sɛ́ghók nɛ batú.”
421 Nkwɔ ɛchɛmɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk bapɛt básɛ́mtí nɔ́kɔ́ bhɔ, báfɛrɛ bhɔ amɔ. Bɔ́ kɛbhɔŋ mbi bɛtɛmsi bɔPíta mbɔnyunɛ bǒ mankɛm bákàka nyaka Mandɛm ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛfakari.
422 Nɛ mamiɛ́ mbɛ́ntí wu acha nyaka bɛsa bɛpay. 
423 Báfɛ́rɛ́ nɔkɔ Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n amɔ, bápɛtnsɛm ntá batɨ̌ bǒnkwɔ Yesu, baghati bhɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǒbatí ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm nɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk bárɛ́mɛ́ ntá yap.
424 Bakoŋo Yesu bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, bɔ́ mankɛm babho mɛnɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ; “Ɛta, wɔ ɔchí Acha, wɔ kɛ ɔ́ghókó mfay nɛ mmɨk, nɛ manyɛ́n nɛ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn bɛ́chí arɛ.
425 Wɔ kɛ ɔ́kʉ́ nyaka bɛ mǔbɛtok ywɛ Mfɔ Debhít, chi-mbɨ ywɛsɛ́, ándɛm ndǔ bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ bɛ: ‘Ndaká yí bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl bábèntɨ nɛ wɔ Mandɛm? Ndaká yí bǒbhɛn bátè bɛyu ɛbhɛn bɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ntí nɛ nnɛt?
426 Bafɔ̌ mmɨk bátòŋtí mmʉɛt mɛ́nu nɛnu, bǒbatí ɛtɔk báchɛm nɛbhʉɛt amɔt, báte ɛyu mɛnu nɛ Mandɛm Acha nɛ Mpɛmɛ yí afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò.’
427 “Hɛ́rɔd nɛ Pɔ́ntiɔs Páílet báchɛm nɛ bo Israɛl nɛ mbɔk bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl fá amɛm Yerúsalɛm, báte ɛyu antí Yesu mmǔ bɛtok ywɛ anɛ achi nyáŋá.
428 Báchɛ́m bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́náŋ ɔ́bhʉ́rɛ́ nyaka bɛ chɔŋ ɛ́mfakari.
429 Acha, ghɔ́ yɛ ndǔ bápà bhɛsɛ. Kʉ bɛ bhɛsɛ́ bǒ bɛtok abhɛ, sɛ́ngátí nɔ́kɔ́ bho Ɛyɔŋ ɛyɛ nɛ nɛtaŋántɨ nɛnkɛm.
430 Chiɛ́ bhɛsɛ bɛtaŋ bɛbú bǒmame, nɛ bɛtɔŋ bɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay nɛ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ndǔ nnyɛ́n mǔbɛtok ywɛ Yesu, mmu achi nyáŋá.”
431 Mánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ mɛnɨkmʉɛt, nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bɔ bachi arɛ anyɨkɨsi. Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ abhak nɛ bhɔ tontó akʉ bábhó bɛghati Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm kɛbhɔŋ bɛcháy. 
432 Nkwɔ́ bo abhɛn mánókó Yesu bábhɔ́ŋ ntɨ nɛ́mɔt nɛ nkaysi amɔt. Yɛ̌ mmu wap akɛ rɛm bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhi bɛ́chí chí ndiɛrɛ ntá yi aywǐntí. Ɛnyɨŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ɛbhak ɛnyɨŋ ɛyap mankɛm.
433 Bǒnto Yesu báré ghati bo nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhap mɛnkɛm bɛ Yesu Acha apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, nɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm bɛbhak nɛ bɔ mankɛm tontó.
434 Yɛ̌ mmu wap abhɨkɨ chɛ́p nyaka ɛnyɨŋ mbɔnyunɛ abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bakɨ nɛ yɛ̌ chi bɛkɛt, bátì nyaka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ mántwɔ nɛ nkáp
435 mámbʉrɛ bɛsí bǒnto, nɛ bɔ mánkɔrɛ nkáp wu bɛkoŋo nté anɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap.
436 Ɛnyu yɔ kɛ̌ mmǔ anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Josɛ́f akʉ nyaka. Abhak mmu nnɛrɛ́kɛt Lɛ́vi nɛ mmu ɛtɔk Sáyprɔs. Bǒnto Yesu bádú yí nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Banábas, nɔ́ chí, “Mmǔ anɛ afyɛ́ bo ntɨ.”
437 Abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka nkɨ, atí wú, atwɔ́ nɛ nkáp, abhʉrɛ bɛsí bǒnto Yesu.
5
51 Kɛ ɛwak ɛmɔt, mmǔ anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Ananías nɛ ngɔrɛ́ aywi Safíra bátí nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́mɨk.
52 Ananías abhɛsɛ mbɔk nkáp ansɛm. Ngɔrɛ́ aywi arɨŋɨ bɛ yi akʉ nɔ. Asɔt anɛ́ árɔ́bhɛ́ arɔk abhʉrɛ bɛsí bǒnto Yesu.
53 Kɛ Píta abhɛp yi bɛ, “Ananías, ndaká yí ɔ́rɔ́ Satan ánkó wɔ́ antí bɛ ɔ́nsé nsé ntá Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ nɛ ɔrɔ mbɔk nkáp anɛ ɔ́tí mmɨk ansɛm?
54 Mpok ɔ́bhɨ́kɨ́ re tí yɔ́, mmɨk achi nyaka chi ayɛ. Nɛ mpok ɔ́tí yɔ́ nkáp abhak chi aywɛ. Ndaká yí ɔkaysi bɛkʉ ɛnɛ ɛnyǔ ɛnyɨŋ? Ɔsensé chi ntá Mandɛm, puyɛ̌ ntá nkwǎ!”
55 Nɛghók Ananías ághókó bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn, akwɛ́n amɨk agú. Bɛyǎ bɛcháy bɛ́kɛm yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ághoko ndak anɛ.
56 Bɛsak báchwe, mánɛ́p yi nɛ ndɛn, bápɔ́kɔ, barɔk babhɛmɛ.
57 Ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ mbɔ maŋɔk nywɔp arat, ngɔrɛ́ Ananías achwe anywɔ́p, yi kɛrɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛfakari.
58 Píta abhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ghatí mɛ tɛtɛp, nkáp ankɛm anɛ́ wɔ nɛ nnɛ́m aywɛ bǎtí mmɨk nɛ?” Akɛmɛ bɛ, “Ɛɛ, yɨŋɨ wu ankɛm nɔ.”
59 Píta arɛm bɛ, “Ná wɔ nɛ nnɛ́m aywɛ bǎká ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt mɛmɔ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm Acha ɛnyǔ ɛyɔ? Ghok! Bo abhɛn bábhɛ́mɛ́ nnɛ́m aywɛ, báchi afɔ ambǐnywɔp, nɛ chɔŋ mampɔkɔ wɔ nkwɔ.”
510 Tɛ́mté wu, Safíra akwɛ́n bɛkak Píta agú. Bɛsak báchwé nɔ́kɔ́ bághɔ́ bɛ agu, bápɔkɔ bafu barɔk babhɛmɛ kɛkwɔt nɛ nnɛ́m.
511 Bɛyǎ bɛcháy bɛkɛm bǒnkwɔ Yesu mankɛm nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achak anɛ aghoko ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛfakari. 
512 Bǒnto Yesu báre kʉ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay bɛchak bɛsí bo ndǔ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm. Báre chɛm nɛbhʉɛt amɔt amɛm nɛbhʉɛt ɛkɛrákap anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ nyaka bɛ Acha Sólomon.
513 Yɛ̌ mmu achak kɛchɛm nɛ bhɔ ɛ̌ti bɛcháy, kɛ bo báre chyɛ̀ bhɔ kɛnókó.
514 Nɛ bɛyǎ bo, baghɔrɛ́ nɛ babhakanɛm, báré noko, manchɛm nɔkɔ mmʉɛt nɛ nkwɔ́ Yesu.
515 Ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛn bǒnto bákʉ̀, bo báré pɔkɔ́ bǒmame mámbʉrɛ nɔkɔ nɛpaká mbi, mbɔk ndu bɛkɔ́k, bachak ndu bɛ̌sak, bɛ́ Píta apɛrɛ́ fʉɛt ndɨkandi ywi ánkwɛ́n mbɔk ayap amʉɛt.
516 Bɛyǎ bo bare fu ndǔ bɔ̌bɛtɔk abhɛn bachí kɛkwɔt nɛ Yerúsalɛm, mándɔkɔ nɔkɔ nɛ bǒmame, nɛ abhɛ́n bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛ́sɔ̀ŋɔri bhɔ. Bɔ mankɛm bataŋ. 
517 Kɛ mǔngo bachiǎkap nɛ bǒ mankɛm abhɛn bachi nɛ yi, nɔ chi bǒnkwɔ Sádusi, bábhɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ mpap amɨ́k.
518 Bákɛ́m bǒnto báfyɛ́ ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ.
519 Kɛ ángɛl Mandɛm atwɔ́ nɛ bɛti, anɛnɛ babhǐnywɔp ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ, asɔt bɔ́ báfú, arɛm bɛ
520 “Dɔ́k ká amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, mǎnte, mǎngati bo yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti nɛpɛ́m nɛkɔ ɛnɛn.”
521 Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, bárɔ́k bachwe amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm bábhó bɛtɔŋ bo mbɔ ɛnyǔ ángɛl aghati bhɔ. Mǔngo bachiǎkap nɛ nkwɔ́ ywi bábhɨŋɨ bǒbati ɛtɔk Israɛl mankɛm, bákɛ́m ɛchɛmɛ, bachyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ mandɔ́k mamfɛrɛ bǒnto ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ mantwɔ nɛ bhɔ.
522 Babhabhɛri abhɛn ɛkɛrákap báchwɔ́p arɛ, kɛghɔ bhɔ. Bápɛtnsɛm nɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ,
523 “Sɛ́rɔŋ, sɛghɔ babhǐnywɔp femfé, nɛ babhabhɛri nɛfí téé, kɛ sɛ́nɛ́nɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ babhǐnywɔp, sɛbhɨkɨ ghɔ́ yɛ̌ mmu amɛm.”
524 Mǔnti babhabhɛri ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm nɛ bǒ batí bachiǎkap baghoko nɔkɔ nɔ, batí átáka bhɔ amɛm, bare bhɛp mmʉɛt ɛyap ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛfakari nɛ bǒnto Yesu.
525 Ɛbhɨkɨ tat, mmu amɔt achwe aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Ghók ká, bo abhɛn bǎfé ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ ɛ́yu, báchí awu amɛm ɛkɛrákap téé bátɔ̀ŋ bo.”
526 Mǔnti babhabhɛri ɛkɛrákap nɛ bǒbhi bárɔk basɔt bǒnto, kɛ bákɛ tɔk bɔ́ awɔ amʉɛt ndǔ báchày bɛ bo bákɛ́ tɛmti bɔ́ nɛ batay mangway.
527 Bápɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɛ bhɔ, bakʉ bɔ baté bɛsí ɛchɛmɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk. Mǔngo bachiǎkap abhɛ́p bɔ́ bɛ
528 “Sɛ́yɛp be batu bɛ bǎkɛ́ pɛrɛ rɛm yɛ̌nyɨŋ ndǔ nnyɛ́n mmǔ-nɛ? Yɛ̌ nɔ, bǎtàk mbok Yesu amɛm Yerúsalɛm nkɛm nɛ bǎyàŋ bɛkʉ ɛmbak bɛ bɛsɛ́ kɛ sɛ́kʉ́ báwáy yi.”
529 Píta nɛ bǒnto Yesu mankɛm bakɛmɛ bɛ, “Sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛghok chi Mandɛm, puyɛ̌ nkwǎŋwaŋ.
530 Mandɛm bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ́ akʉ Yesu mmu báwáy ndu bago yi ndu ɛkotákátí ampɛtnsɛm ndu nɛpɛ́m.
531 Mandɛm akósí yí amfay, afyɛ́ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt kɛnókó bɛ ambak Mǔntí nɛ Mpɛmɛ, bɛ́ ánchyɛ́ bo Israɛl mbi bɛtɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap Mandɛm amfoŋori bhɔ.
532 Sɛ́ghàti bo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n sɛ́ghɔ́ nɛ amɨ́k mbɔ batísiɛ, nɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ mmu Mandɛm achyɛ́ ntá bo abhɛn bághòk yi achi ntísiɛ nkwɔ.”
533 Bǒ ɛchɛmɛ bǒbatí ɛtɔk bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, batɨ ábe bhɔ tontó. Bábho bɛyaŋ mbi ndu bɛ́way bǒnto Yesu.
534 Kɛ mǔnkwɔ Fárisi amɔt, anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Gamáliɛl, abhak arɛ́. Abhak mmu ɛchɛmɛ́ bǒ batí amɔt nkwɔ́ nɛ ntɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm. Bǒ mankɛm báchyɛ̀ nyaka yi kɛnókó. Afate achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ mántɛn kpɨk bǒnto Yesu nɛfí.
535 Arɛm yɛ ntá bǒbati ɛtɔk bɛ, “Bo Israɛl, sɔt ka mpok ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bǎkáysi bɛkʉ nɛ bǒbhɛn.
536 Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ Tiódas árɛ̀m nyaka bɛ yi achi nnɛ́m mmu. Bǒ mbɔ batí bɛsǎ ɛsa (400) babhak bákoŋo bhi. Báwáy nɔ́kɔ́ yi, bakoŋo bhi bhɔ bátáka, nsóŋó ɛyi amay.
537 Ɛ́tárɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, Júdas mmu Gálili nkwɔ afú mpok básɔ̀t mpǎy bho. Aya mbɔk bho báré koŋo yí. Yi nkwɔ agú, nɛ bɛyǎ bo abhɛn bákòŋo nyaka yi bátáka.
538 Bɛ́yɨŋɨ yɛ ndak anɛ, nchí ghati beka bɛ mǎndɔ́ bǒbhɛn, bǎkɛ́ kʉ bhɔ́ yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Mbák nkaysi-nɛ, nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ batɨ̌ bɛkʉ bɛfu chí ntá nkwǎ, chɔŋ mánkwɛn.
539 Kɛ mbák bɛfu chi ntá Mandɛm, bǎpú kway bɛchyɛt bhɔ mbi. Bǎkway mbɔŋ bɛghɔ bɛ mánù chí nɛ Mandɛm!”
540 Bábhɨ́ŋɨ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yɛ bǒnto Yesu, badɛn bɔ, básɛ́mti bhɔ bɛ bákɛ́pɛrɛ rɛm yɛ̌nyɨŋ ndu nnyɛ́n Yesu, barɔ bɔ mándɔ́k.
541 Bǒnto báfú bárɔ ɛchɛmɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk bárɔ́k nɛ maŋák mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm aghɔ bɛ bɔ bakway bo abhɛn bábhɔ̀ŋ kɛyɔ́rɛ́ ɛ̌ti nnyɛ́n Yesu.
542 Bɔ kɛrɔ bɛtɔŋ nɛ bɛ́gháti bo Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ bɛ Yesu chi Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò. Báre kʉ nɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔp amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm nɛ amɛm bɛkɛt ɛbhap.
6
61 Mpok yɔ, bakoŋo Yesu báre yá mándɔkɔ nɔkɔ chi ambɨ. Bɛ́táŋá bɛ́kwɛ́n. Bo Israɛl abhɛn bárɛ̀m ɛyɔŋ Grik nkwɔ báré nywinti bɛ abhɛn bárɛ̀m chi ndiɛrɛ ɛyɔŋ bo Israɛl bákɔ̀rɛ mɛnyɨŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛwak kɛfyɛ́ ntí ndu bɛchyɛ mánkwɛ́sɛ́ bhap.
62 Ɛkʉ bǒnto Yesu batí byó nɛ apay bábhɨŋɨ nkwɔ bakoŋo Yesu bárɛm bɛ, “Ɛpú chak bɛ sɛndɔ bɛghati bho Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm, sɛ́ndɔbhɛ taŋ chi baraká nɛnyɛ́.
63 Bɔ̌ma, yap yɛ ka bǒbati tándrámɔt. Bábhɔŋ bɛbhak bo abhɛn bo bárɛ̀m ɛrɨ́rɨ́ ɛ̌ti yap, mámbak bo abhɛn Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ achi nɛ bhɔ sayri, nɛ mámbak barɨŋɨ́ndak. Yap ka bhɔ́. Sɛ́kway bɛchyɛ bhɔ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn.
64 Mbák ɛchi nɔ́, chɔŋ sɛ́mbɔ́ŋ mpok bɛchyɛ mmʉɛt ndǔ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt, nɛ ndu bɛ́ghati bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ nɛ ndu bɛ́tɔŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.”
65 Bǒnkwɔ mankɛm bábhɔ́ŋ maŋák ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǒnto barɛmɛ. Báyáp Stífin mmu amɔt anɛ abhɔŋɔ nɛka nɛ Yesu tontó nɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ achi nyaka nɛ yi mpoknkɛm. Báyap Fílip nkwɔ́, nɛ Prokórɔs, nɛ Nikanɔ́, nɛ Tímɔn, nɛ Pamɛ́nas, nɛ Níkolas, kɛnkɔ anɛ áfú nyaka Antiɔk. Anáŋ áchyɛ̀ nyaka Mandɛm kɛnókó mbɔ ɛnyǔ bo Israɛl bákʉ̀ kɛ ǎnoko Yesu.
66 Básɔt bhɔ bɛsí bǒnto Yesu. Bǒnto mánɨkmʉɛt mányáŋa bɔ́ amɔ anti.
67 Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛ́re go ɛndɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ, nɛ mpǎy bakoŋo Yesu ayá tontó amɛm ɛtɔk Yerúsalɛm. Bɛyǎ bachiǎkap Mandɛm nkwɔ́ báre noko Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́. 
68 Stífin chí mmu anɛ Mandɛm átɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ bɛrɨ̌ndu, achyɛ yí bɛyǎ bɛtaŋ. Stífin akʉ bɛrɛm mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay nɛ atɔ́ŋ bɛrɨŋ bɛsí bo.
69 Mbɔk bo báfate bábhó bɛkɛm ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ yi. Bábhak bǒ ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí ɛnɛ bo abhɛn báfɛ́rɛ́ ndǔ kɛsɛm. Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ bábhɨŋɨ nyaka yɔ. Bábhák bo Israɛl abhɛn bafu Síren nɛ mmu Aleksánda. Bɔ́bhɔ nɛ bo Israɛl bachak abhɛn bafu atú Silísha nɛ Esia bare kɛm ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ Stífin.
610 Kɛ bɔ kɛkwáy bɛkɛmɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́ nɛ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɛn Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ achyɛ yi.
611 Bákú bo mámpu bɛ bághok ndǔ yi árɛ̀m ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti Moses nɛ ɛ̌ti Mandɛm.
612 Ɛnyu yɔ kɛ̌ mányɨkɨsí batɨ̌ bǒ batí ɛtɔk amɛm, nɛ batɨ batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm, nɛ batɨ bǒ mankɛm. Bákɛ́m yɛ Stífin barɔk bɛsí ɛchɛmɛ bǒ batí ɛtɔk nɛ yi.
613 Bátwɔ́ nɛ batísyɛ ákwárɛ́ abhɛn bárɛ́mɛ́ bɛ, “Mmǔ-nɛ apú rɔ bɛrɛm ɛbʉ́bʉ mpoknkɛm ɛ̌ti ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm ywɛsɛ́ nɛ nɛ ɛ̌ti ɛbhé Moses.
614 Sɛ́ghok ndǔ yi árɛ̀m bɛ chɔŋ Yesu Mmǔ Násárɛt wu amokoti ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm ɛnɛ, nɛ angupsi bɛpɨŋ ɛtɔk ɛbhɛn Moses árɔ́ ntá yɛsɛ.”
615 Bǒ mankɛm abhɛn báchí amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́ manyé chɔkɔ, batɛp Stífin amɨ́k amʉɛt, bághɔ́ bɛ́ bɛsí bhi bɛ́yibhiri bɛrɔbhɛ ghɔɔ chi mbɔ ɛbhɛ́n ángɛl Mandɛm.
7
71 Mǔngo bachiǎkap Mandɛm abhɛ́p Stífin bɛ “Ɛchi tɛtɛp bɛ ɔkʉ barak anɛ bárɛ̀m nɔ bɛ ɔkʉ?”
72 Stífin akɛmɛ bɛ, “Bɔmá nɛ bɔta, ghók ka mɛ! Mandɛm bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm abhesi nyaka ntá chi-mbɨ aywɛsɛ́ Ábraham mpok yi achi atú Mɛsopotemia kɛ árɔ̀ŋ ɛtɔk Haran,
73 arɛm ntá yi bɛ, ‘Fǎ ɛtɔk ɛyɛ, dɔ̌ nnɛrɛ́kɛt aywɛ dɔ́k atú anɛ mɛ́tɔ̀ŋ chɔŋ wɔ.’
74 Ábraham afa yɛ atú bo Cháldia wu, arɔk achɔkɔ ɛtɔk Háran. Ɛtayi ágú nɔ́kɔ́, Mandɛm akʉ yi afa arɛ́ atwɔ́ ndǔ mmɨk anɛ bǎchí arɛ́ ɛchɔŋ.
75 Ábraham abhak fá, yɛ̌ nɔ, Mandɛm kɛchyɛ yí yɛ̌ chí mɔ́nɛbhʉɛ́rɛ́ mmɨk. Afyɛ́ chí bariɛp bɛ́chyɛ mmɨk ntá yi nɛ ntá bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ bhi yɛ̌ndu yi abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ nyaka mmɔ́.
76 Mandɛm arɔk ambɨ bɛ́ghati yi bɛ: ‘Chɔŋ bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ bhɛ mámbak mankɔ amɛm ɛtɔk bǒ bachak. Bǒ bhɔ mambʉrɛ bhɔ ndu kɛsɛm, mánchyɛ nɔkɔ bhɔ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri ndu mamiɛ́ bɛsǎ ɛsa.
77 Kɛ chɔŋ nchyɛ́ ntɛ́msí ntá bǒ ɛtɔk ɛnɛ́ bɔ bátòk. Nɛ ansɛm mpok, chɔŋ mámfa mántwɔ, mánchyɛ̀ nɔkɔ mɛ kɛnókó fá.’
78 Mandɛm anyú yɛ nku nɛ Ábraham. Ɛrɨŋɨ́ nku yɔ ɛbhak nɛsiɛ́p anɛ básiɛ̀p bɔ̌babhakanɛm. Ábraham abhé nɔ́kɔ́ yɛ Áisek, asiɛ́p yi mpok yi ágháká manywɔp ánɛn. Áisek ábhé Jekɔ́p, Jekɔ́p abhak chi ntá bɔ̌ bati byo nɛ apay abhɛn báchí nyaka bachǐmbɨ manɛrɛ́kɛt bo Israɛl.
79 “Bachǐmbɨ bhɔ bábhɔ́ŋ mpabhamɨ́k nɛ mɔ́máyap Josɛ́f. Bátǐ yi mbɔ nsɛm ntá bakɔ̌siɛ, Bɔ́ bárɔ́k ɛtɔk Íjip nɛ yi. Kɛ Mandɛm abhak nɛ yi,
710 afɛrɛ yí ndǔ bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhi mɛnkɛm, atɔ́ŋ yi bɛrɨ̌ndu, nɛ achyɛ́ yi nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak bɛsí Mfɔ Íjip. Mfɔ Íjip achyɛ yi bɛtaŋ amfǎy ɛtɔk Íjip ɛnkɛm, nɛ ɛkɛt ɛyi ɛnkɛm.
711 Ansɛm mpok, nsay akwɛ́n ɛtɔk Íjip ɛnkɛm nɛ ɛtɔk Kánǎn. Ɛkʉ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛya ɛcha. Bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ kɛkwáy bɛbhɔŋ nɛnyiɛ.
712 Jekɔ́p ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ yɛ bɛ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛchi Íjip, ató bachi bhɛsɛ arɛ́. Ɛbhak ndɔŋ anɛ mbɨ anɛ bɔ́ bárɔ́ŋɔ́ Íjip.
713 Nɛrɔ́ŋ anɛ bɔ́ bárɔŋɔ arɛ́ ndɔŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛjwi ɛ́páy, Josɛ́f akʉ bɔ̌mayi bárɨŋɨ yí, nɛ Mfɔ Íjip arɨŋɨ nnɛrɛ́kɛt Josɛ́f.
714 Josɛ́f ató yɛ bábhɨŋɨ ɛ́táyi Jekɔ́p nɛ bǒnɛrɛ́kɛt ywi mankɛm, batí bɛsa bɛ́rát nsɛm nɛku.
715 Jekɔ́p arɔk ɛtɔk Íjip nɛ nnɛrɛ́kɛt ywi ankɛm. Abhak arɛ́ tɛ mpok anɛ yi ágú nɛ bɔ̌bhi bo bachi bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ.
716 Bápɔ́kɔ́ yi bápɛtsɛm Shɛ́kɛm, bábhɛ́mɛ ndǔ nnɛm ɛnɛn Ábraham ákú nyaka ntá bɔ Hamɔ amɛm ɛtɔk Shɛ́kɛm nɛ nkáp sílbhá.
717 “Mpok anɛ Mandɛm abhɔŋɔ bɛkʉ bariɛp amɛm yi afyɛ́ nyaka nɛ Ábraham aghaka nɔkɔ kɛkwɔt, mpǎy bo Israɛl abhɛn bachi Íjip bɛpɛt baya tontó.
718 Ɛbhak ɛnyu yɔ kpatɛ mmu achak abhak Mfɔ Íjip anɛ abhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ nyaka Josɛ́f.
719 Mfɔ wú achyɛ bǒ bhɛsɛ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri, akʉ bɔtayɛsɛ mándɔ́ bɔ̌bhap nɛfí mángú.
720 “Mpok yɔ kɛ bábhé Moses. Arɨ́ tontó nɛ Mandɛm akɔŋ yi. Máne yí ɛkɛt ɛtayi ndǔ bataŋ árát.
721 Bárɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yi nɛfí, mmɔ́ Mfɔ Íjip anɛ ngɔrɛ́, asɔt yi mbɔ mɔ́ywi, ane yi.
722 Bátɔ́ŋ yí nɛrɨŋɨ́ kɛpɨ bo Íjip nɛnkɛm, ágó abhak ɛrɨ́tí ndɛmɛ kɛpɨ nɛ nnɛ́m mmu ndu mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ̀.
723 “Ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ mamiɛ́ bɛsa bɛ́páy, nkaysi atwɔ́ yi antɨ bɛ ándɔ́k ángɔ́ bɔ̌mayi, bo Israɛl.
724 Ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ mmu Íjip ádɛ̀n mmu Israɛl amɔt, arɔk bɛkwak yi. Akɛmɛ kɛ́mbé, kpát awáy mmu Ijip wu.
725 Moses akaysi bɛ bǒbhi bárɨŋɨ bɛ́ Mandɛm kɛ átó yi ámfɛ́rɛ́ bhɔ́ ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri, kɛ bɔ́ kɛrɨŋɨ ɛnyu ɛyɔ.
726 Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, arɔk atɛmɛri ndu bǒbhi, bo Israɛl bati apay mánù. Achwe bɛkʉ bɔ mambak ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt, arɛm bɛ, ‘Ghók ká, bǎchí bǒ mmu amɔt, ndaká yí mánù nɛ batɨ?’
727 Kɛ anɛ áyáŋ ntɨ mpay, apuri Moses, abhɛ́p yí bɛ, ‘Agha ákʉ́ wɔ mfɔ nɛ ntaŋá manyé yɛsɛ́?
728 Ɔ́yàŋ bɛ́way mɛ mbɔ ɛnyu ɔ́wáy mmu Íjip ɛ́yú?’
729 Moses ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, abʉɛ́ arɔk achɔkɔ ɛtɔk Mídia. Arɛ́ kɛ yi ábháy ngɔrɛ́ abhɔ́ŋ bɔ̌ babhakanɛm bati apay.
730 “Ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ mamiɛ́ bɛsa bɛpay, ángɛl Mandɛm abhesi ntá yi amɛm baso, kɛkwɔt Njiɛ Sináy. Ángɛl wu abhak amɛm ngó anɛ ádù ndǔ mɔ́nɔk amɔt anɛ ágò ɛbhɨ.
731 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Moses ághɔ́ ɛkʉ yi abhak maknkay. Nɛ nɛrɔŋ yi árɔ̀ŋ kɛkwɔt bɛyɨŋɨ, aghók Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm Acha ndu ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ,
732 ‘Mmɛ kɛ nchí Mandɛm bachǐmbɨ bhɛka, Mandɛm Ábraham, Mandɛm Áisek, nɛ Mandɛm Jekɔ́p.’ Nɛ́kóŋó nɛ́kɛ́m Moses, afɛrɛ amɨ́k arɛ.
733 Mandɛm Acha arɛm yɛ ntá yi bɛ, ‘Fɛrɛ́ nkwɔbhánya ɛyɛ bɛkak, mbɔnyunɛ nɛbhʉɛ́rɛ́mɨk anɛ ɛ́té nɔ arɛ achi nyáŋá.
734 Ngɔ̌ bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn bǒbha bábhɔ̀ŋ amɛm ɛtɔk Íjip nɛ ngók nɛdǐ kɛbhɔ ɛnap, nɛ nsɛp ntwɔ bɛfɛrɛ bhɔ́ ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛyɔ. Twɔ́ yɛ́, chɔŋ ntó wɔ Íjip.’
735 “Stífin arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, nkúbhɛ́ Moses anɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ ka nyaka bɛghok yi, nɛ babhɛp yi bɛ, ‘Agha ákʉ́ wɔ mfɔ nɛ ntaŋá manyé ntá yɛsɛ?’ Mandɛm afʉɛt ntá ángɛl anɛ abhesi ntá yi ndu mɔ́nɔk bɛghati yi bɛ ándɔ́k ámbák mǔnti wap nɛ mmu anɛ áfɛrɛ bhɔ ndu ɛsɔŋɔri.
736 Moses akʉ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay, nɛ atɔ́ŋ bɛrɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́tɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm amɛm ɛtɔk Íjip. Afɛrɛ bo Israɛl arɛ́, akʉ báfʉɛ́t ndǔ Manyu Chu, nɛ amɛm baso ndǔ mamiɛ́ bɛsa bɛpay.
737 Nkúbhɛ́ Moses-nɛ árɛ́mɛ́ nyaka ntá bo Israɛl bɛ, ‘Chɔŋ Mandɛm anchyɛ bhe ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ achak anɛ áfù ndu nkwɔ yɛka mbɔ ɛnyǔ achyɛ mɛ ntá yɛka.’
738 Yí Moses kɛ achi nyaka nɛ́ntɨ́ bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ́ nɛ ángɛl Mandɛm amɛm baso. Mpok yɔ, ángɛl Mandɛm árɛ́m kɛpɨ ntá yi ndu Njiɛ Sináy, akʉ yi arɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áyàŋ yí ankʉ sɛndɨŋɨ, nɔ́ chí Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chí tɛtɛp mpoknkɛm.
739 “Kɛ bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ kɛka bɛghok yi. Bápúri yi batɛn nɛpak, kɛ bápɛ́tnsɛm Íjip amɛm batɨ̌-yap.
740 Ɛ́kʉ́ barɛm ntá Arɔn bɛ, ‘Ghokó bɔmandɛm ntá yɛsɛ, bɛ mandɔkɔ nɔkɔ bhɛsɛ ambɨ. Mbák chi Moses mmu áfɛ́rɛ́ bhɛsɛ ɛtɔk Íjip, sɛbhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛfakari nɛ yi.’
741 Bághóko ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi mbɔ mɔ́mpɔŋ, bare chyɛ yɔ akabhɛ́ nya, nɛ mányíɛ́ ɛpa ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ baghoko nɛ amɔ.
742 Kɛ Mandɛm atɨknsɛm ntá yap akpɨk arɔ bɔ mánchyɛ̀ nɔkɔ kɛnókó ntá mmok, nɛ ntaŋ nɛ mambě mfay mbɔ bɔmandɛm abhap, mbɔ ɛnyu ɛchi amɛm bɛkáti barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ bɛ, ‘Bo Israɛl! Mpok anɛ bǎkɔ̀ amɛm baso ndǔ mamiɛ́ bɛsa bɛ́páy, ntá yá kɛ̌ báwày nyaka nnya mánchyɛ̀ nɔkɔ akap kɛ?
743 Bǎpɔkɔ nyaka ɛ́tɛm ɛnɛ́ mandɛm nsé anɛ áká nyɛ́n bɛ Mɔ́lɔk. Nɛ nɛmbe ɛnɛn mandɛm nsé Ráfan. Nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎghókó ndu bɛchyɛ bhɔ kɛnókó. Ɛ̌ti yɔ, chɔŋ mfɛ́rɛ́ be ntó ɛtɔk ɛ́chák bɛfʉɛt Bábilɔn.’
744 “Stífin arɔk ambɨ bɛ́rɛm bɛ Bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ́ babhɔ̌ŋ nyaka ɛ́tɛm amɛm baso ɛnɛ́ ɛ́tɔ́ŋ bɛ́ Mandɛm achí nɛ bhɔ. Moses aghókó nyaka yɔ ɛ́bhák mbɔ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm aghati yi, nɛ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm átɔ́ŋ yi amfay Njiɛ Sináy bɛ ɛbhɔŋ bɛbhak.
745 Ansɛm mpok, bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ́ bárɔ yɔ́ ntá bɔ̌bhap. Bápɔ́kɔ́ yɔ́ mpok bákɔ̀ nɛ Jóshua. Mandɛm abók bo abhɛn báchí arɛ bɛsí bɔtayɛsɛ, basɔt mmɨk. Ɛ́tɛm ɛyɔ ɛ́bhák arɛ́ tɛ mpok anɛ Debhít achi mfɔ.
746 Mandɛm atɔ́ŋ Debhít bɛrɨ̌ndu. Anɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm Jekɔ́p bɛ andɔ yi anté ɛkɛt ntá yi.
747 Sólomon kɛ áté ɛkɛt ɛyɔ ntá Mandɛm.
748 Yɛ̌ nɔ, Mandɛm Acha apu chɔkɔ ndǔ bɛkɛt ɛbhɛ́n bo bate nɛ amɔ. Ɛ́chí mbɔ ɛnyǔ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ Mandɛm arɛm bɛ,
749 ‘Mfay chí ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ɛya, nɛ mmɨk chi ɛrwɔ ɛnɛ mɛ́sɨ̀kɨ bɛkak arɛ. Ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ ɛkɛt ɔ́kway bɛte ntá ya? nɛbhʉɛ́t anɛ mɛ̌kwáy bɛywemʉɛt achí nɛ fá?
750 Pú amɔ́ ya kɛ ághókó mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm-ɛ?’
751 “Bɛ́rɔŋ ndǔ ngwɛ́nti, Stífin arɛm bɛ, ‘Bě bo nɛtaŋántɨ, bě bo bǎpu noko Mandɛm nɛ bǎpú ghok ɛyɔŋ ɛyi. Bǎchɛt Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ mbi mbɔ bachǐmbɨ bhɛka.
752 Ntɨkɨ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ bachǐmbɨ bhɛka bábhɨ́kɨ́ chyɛ ɛsɔŋɔri? Nɛ báwày nyaka barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm abhɛn bárɛ́mɛ́ mbɨ mbɨ bɛ, Mmɔ̌ bɛtok anɛ achí chak bɛsí Mandɛm ǎtwɔ̀. Yí wu kɛ bǎtí nɛ bǎwáy.
753 Bě kɛ̌ Moses ásɔ́rɛ́ ɛbhé Mandɛm ntá bɔángɛl achyɛ ntá yɛka, yɛ̌ nɔ, bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ bhʉɛrɛ yɔ́.’” 
754 Bo ɛchɛmɛ bǒ batí ɛtɔk bághókó nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Stífin árɛ̀mɛ, batɨ ábé bɔ tontó, amɨ́k apěti anti.
755 Kɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ achi nyaka nɛ Stífin tontó. Ayoŋ amɨ́k ayɨŋɨ mfay, aghɔ́ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ Mandɛm, nɛ Yesu téé ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt kɛnókó Mandɛm,
756 Stífin arɛm bɛ, “Ghók ka! Ngɔ ndǔ mánɛ́nɛ́ mbǐnywɔp ɛtɔkɔ́ mfay, Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm abhak téé ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt kɛnókó ɛbhe awɔ́nɛm Mandɛm.”
757 Kɛ bábhó bɛbɨk ɛ̌ri, báchók batú nɛ amɔ, bádú bárɔ́k bákɛ́m yi.
758 Báyá yi báfú ɛtɔk nɛ yí, bátɛ́mti yi nɛ bɛtay bawáy. Batísiɛ bɛtábhá báfɛ́rɛ nkú mfǎmʉɛt ɛyap, barɔ ntá ɛsakámu amɔt bɛ ambabhɛri nɔkɔ. Ɛsakámu wu aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Sɔ̌l.
759 Mpok bátɛ̀mti Stífin nɛ batay, anɨkmʉɛt bɛ, “Yesu Acha, sɔt Ɛfóŋó ɛya!”
760 Akwɛ́n atɛp mánɛ́n amɨk, arɛm nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ bɛ, “Acha, foŋori bhɔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhap ɛbhɛn.” Árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, asɛbhɛ.
8
81 Sɔ̌l abhak arɛ́ téé, aka bɛ́ ɛrɨ mángwáy Stífin. Sɔ̌l are chyɛ bǒnkwɔ bɛyǎ nɛnyok Bɛ́bhó ɛwak ɛyɔ, báré chyɛ nkwɔ Yesu abhɛn báchí Yerúsalɛm bɛyǎ nɛnyok. Ɛkʉ bɔ́ mankɛm bábʉɛ́ bataka atúɛtɔk Judɛ́ya nɛ átú Samária ankɛm. Ɛrɔp chi bǒnto Yesu bɔ́bhɔ́ amɛm ɛtɔk Yerúsalɛm.
82 Baway nɔkɔ Stífin, mbɔk bo abhɛn báchyɛ̀ Mandɛm kɛnókó bápɔ́kɔ yi bárɔ́k bábhɛ́mɛ, nɛ bádi yi tontó.
83 Mbák chi Sɔ̌l, are yáŋ mbi mɛ́nɛ́mɛ bǒnkwɔ Yesu. Ɛ́kʉ abho bɛ́chwé ɛkɛt nɛ ɛkɛt anja nɔkɔ abhɛn mánókó, baghɔrɛ́ nɛ babhakanɛm, amfyɛ nɔkɔ ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ.
84 Bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn bábʉɛ̀ bátáka mbankɛm báre kɔ mángati nɔkɔ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu.
85 Anɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ Fílip arɔk ɛtɔk ɛ́gho atú Samária angati nɔkɔ mbok ɛ̌ti Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò.
86 Akʉ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay arɛ́. Bo baghɔ nɔkɔ nɔ, bɛyǎ bhap báre tá batú sayri ndu bɛghok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yí árɛ̀m.
87 Bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́sɔ̀ŋɔri bo bɛ́re rɔ bhɔ mɛ́mbɨkɨ nɔkɔ nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ. Bɛyǎ bo abhɛn bachi bhʉrɛ́ nɛ bakɛm bátaŋ nkwɔ.
88 Ɛkʉ bɛyǎ maŋák abhak nɛ bǒ ɛtɔk ɛgho Samária ɛyɔ.
89 Mmǔfú anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Símun achí nyaka ɛtɔk ɛyɔ nkwɔ. Abhak mǔnjɔ. Anaŋ ákʉ̀ nyaka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ ndu ɛrɔri mpok, andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ́ yí achí ɛtaŋtí mmu. Bǒ Samária babhak maknkay bɛ́ghɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ̀.
810 Bɔ mankɛm, manɛ́m bo nɛ ndɛ́ndɛ́mɛ́ bho bare tá batú bɛghok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ághàti bhɔ, mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Mmǔ-nɛ chi mmu Mandɛm anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Ɛtaŋtǐ mʉ.”
811 Barak mandɛm nsé anɛ yi ákʉ̀ ndu ɛrɔ́ri mpok, akʉ bo báre ta batú bɛghók mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi árɛ̀m.
812 Fílip átwɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti ɛnyu Mandɛm abhak nɛ bǒbhi mbɔ Mfɔ wap nɛ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo, baghɔrɛ́ nɛ babhakanɛm bábho mɛ́nóko mándɔkɔ nɔkɔ bɛ mánjwiti bhɔ́.
813 Yɛ̌ Símun nkwɔ́ anoko bájwíti yí. Bájwítí nɔ́kɔ́ yí, abhat mmʉɛt nɛ Fílip, ankoŋo nɔkɔ yi yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak. Nyu arɔp yi fuu ɛ̌ti bɛrɛmɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛ́n Fílip ákʉ̀, nɛ ɛ̌ti bɛrɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n Mandɛm áfʉɛ̀t ntá Fílip antɔŋ nɔkɔ.
814 Bǒnto abhɛn Yerúsalɛm bághoko nɔkɔ bɛ bǒ-Samaria mánoko Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm, bátó Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n arɛ́.
815 BɔPíta bachwɔp nɔkɔ Samária, bare nɨkmʉɛt bɛ́ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ántwɔ ntá bo abhɛn mánóko Yesu.
816 Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ abhɨkɨ re twɔ nyaka ntá yɛ̌ mmu wap. Yɛ̌ nɔ, manaŋ bajwiti nyaka bhɔ ndǔ nnyɛ́n Yesu Acha.
817 Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n mányáŋa amɔ́ antí bǒbhɛn manɨkmʉɛt, Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ atwɔ́ abhak nɛ bhɔ.
818 Símun ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ atwɔ achi nɛ bhɔ́ ndǔ bǒnto mányáŋá bɔ amɔ antí, afɛrɛ nkáp bɛ́chyɛ bǒnto,
819 arɛm bɛ, “Kʉ ká mɛnkwɔ́ mbɔ̌ŋ bɛtaŋ bɛ́ yɛ̌ agha anɛ nyáŋá yi amɔ́ anti Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ántwɔ́ ntá yi.”
820 Kɛ Píta akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Ɛghori ɛ́mpɔ́kɔ́ wɔ́ nɛ nkáp aywɛ! Ɔkáysí bɛ́ ɔ̌kwáy bɛ́ku akap Mandɛm nɛ nkáp na?
821 Dɨŋɨ́ bɛ́ ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ yɛ ɛnyɨŋ ndu bɛtɨk ɛbhɛsɛ́ mbɔnyunɛ ntɨ ɛnɛ nɛ́pú chak bɛsí Mandɛm.
822 Ndu ɛchi nɔ, tɨ́k nsɛm ndǔ nkaysi bɛbʉ́ anɛ achi wɔ antɨ ɔ́nɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm Acha. Ngufú chɔŋ amfoŋori nkaysi anɛ achi wɔ antɨ.
823 Ngɔ bɛ́ ɔbhɔŋ ɛpɔ̌ mpabhamɨ́k nɛ ɔ́kwɛ̌n nsɛm antɛn bɛbʉ́.”
824 Símun aghoko nɔkɔ nɔ, akɛmɛ Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n bɛ, “Bɔta, nɨk ka Mandɛm mmʉɛt ɛ̌ti ya bɛ́ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt ɛnɛ bǎrɛ́mɛ́ ɛ́kɛ́ fakari nɛ mɛ.”
825 Mánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ghati bo mbok Yesu nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi akʉ ntá yap, bárɔ́ bare pɛtnsɛm Yerúsalɛm. Báre téé ndǔ bɔ́bɛtɔk Samária mangati nɔkɔ bo Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu. 
826 Kɛ ángɛl Acha atwɔ́ arɛm ntá Fílip bɛ, “Faté sɛp ndǔ ɛsɨ́ mbi anɛ áfù Yerúsalɛm árɔ̀ŋ Gása”.
827‑28 Fílip afate abho bɛ́rɔŋ. Ɛ́fákari bɛ́ mmǔ Ɛtǒpia amɔt anɛ afú Yerúsalɛm ndǔ mɛnɨkmʉɛt ápɛtnsɛm ɛtɔk ɛyi amɛm ɛ́kárɨk ɛnɛ mpɔŋɔ́ndɨ́k ɛ́yà. Abhak mǔngo Ɛtǒpia anɛ baghaka nɛ yi kɛ akɛmɛ nyaka ɛfɨŋɨ́ ɛkɛrɛ́ nkáp mbɔ mmu anɛ baghaka yi apu kway nyaka bɛchɛm nɛ bo abhɛn mfɔ ngɔrɛ́   Mfɔ Ɛtǒpia wu aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Kándas. Ɛnɛ́ yí áchi amɛm ɛkarɨk ɛyi árɔ̀ŋ, are pay ɛkáti ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Aisáya.
829 Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ aghati Fílip bɛ, “Dɔ́k awu kɔ nɔ́kɔ́ kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ ɛkarɨk ɛyɔ.”
