830 Fílip ajɛt arɔk kɛkwɔt nɛ yɔ́, aghók ndǔ mmu wu ápày ɛkáti ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Aisáya. Abhɛ́p yí bɛ, “Ɔ̌bhɔŋ nɔ nɛjwǐmɛm ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɔ́pày?”
831 Mǔngo Ɛtǒpia wu akɛmɛ bɛ, “Mɛ̌kwáy bɛjwimɛm ná ɛnɛ́ yɛ̌ mmu ábhɨ́kɨ́ nɛ́nɛ angati mɛ?” Abhɨŋɨ yɛ Fílip ánkó ánchɔ́kɔ́ nɛ yí amɛm ɛ́kárɨ́k.
832‑33 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ápày ndǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛbhak bɛ́: “Achí nyaka mbɔ ághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n anɛ bakɛmɛ bárɔŋ bɛway, mbɔ mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n anɛ báfɛ̀rɛ ɛmɛnɛ ɛyi, yɛ̌ bɛbɨk yɔ kɛbɨk. Akɛ nɛ́nɛ ɛyɔŋ. Báyɔ́rɛ yi, bataŋ yi, bákpɔ́t nyé ɛni, bachyɛ yi ɛsɔŋɔri ndɛ́ndɛm. Agha ákway bɛtɔŋ bɛ, Yɨŋɨ́ mɔ̌wa nɛ́, ɛnɛ́ bákpɔ́rɛ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛni ambɨ ambɨ fá amɨk?”
834 Mǔngo wu abhɛ́p Fílip bɛ, “Ɛ̌tá, ghati mɛ́, ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ asɨ̌ŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m nɔ́ ɛ̌ti agha? Arɛm nɔ chí ɛ̌ti mmu áchák kɛ ɛ̌ti mmʉɛt ɛyi?”
835 Fílip abho ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt ɛkáti Aisáya wu agháti mǔngo Ɛtǒpia Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ Yesu.
836 Báre kɔ mándɔkɔ nɔkɔ. Bágháká nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ manyiɛp achi, arɛm ntá Fílip bɛ, “Yɨŋɨ́ manyiɛp. Ntí achí anɛ bábhɨkɨ bhɔ́ŋ bɛ́jwiti mɛ?” [Fílip akɛmɛ yí bɛ, “Mbák ɔ́sɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ ɛnɛ nɛnkɛm nɛ Yesu, mɛ̌kwáy bɛ́jwiti wɔ.” Mmǔ wu akɛmɛ yí bɛ́ “Nnókó bɛ Yesu Kristo chí Mmɔ Mandɛm.”]
838 Mǔngo wu achyɛ yɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ́ mánkʉ ɛ́kárɨk ɛ́nté. Ɛ́té nɔ́kɔ́, bɔ́ nɛ Fílip básɛp báchwe anyɛ́n, Fílip ajwiti yí.
839 Báfú nɔ́kɔ́ anyɛ́n, Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ afɛrɛ Fílip arɛ́, mǔngo Ɛtǒpia wu kɛpɛrɛ ghɔ́ yi. Yɛ̌ nɔ, arɔk ambɨ nɛ nɛkɔ ɛni nɛ maŋák.
840 Fílip ápɛ́rɛ yɨŋɨ arɔp chí ɛtɔk Asótus. Abho bɛ́ghati Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ arɛ. Arɔk ambɨ bɛ́kʉ nɔ ndu bɔ̌bɛtɔk mankɛm abhɛn báchi ambi kpátɛ mpok yi aghaka Seséria.
9
91 Mpok ɛyɔ nkɛm, Sɔ̌l arɔk ambɨ bɛpa bɛ yi abhɔŋ bɛway bakoŋo Yesu. Arɔk ntá mǔngo bachiǎkap Mandɛm,
92 aghati yi bɛ anchyɛ yi bɛkáti ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́chyɛ yi bɛtaŋ bɛrɔŋ Damáskɔs ndu bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt bo Israɛl bɛ́ mbák ángɔ́ bakoŋo Mbi Yesu arɛ́, ankwáy bɛ́kɛ́mti bhɔ́, baghɔrɛ́ nɛ babhakanɛm, angwɔ́t, andɔk Yerúsalɛm nɛ bhɔ́.
93 Sɔ̌l afa yɛ are rɔ́ŋ. Agháká nɔ́kɔ́ kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ Damáskɔs, bɛdíɛ́rɛ́ bɛfú amfay tɛ́mchok bɛsɛp bɛ́káp yi.
94 Sɔ̌l akwɛ́n amɨk, aghók ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́bhɛ̀p yi bɛ, “Sɔ̌l, Sɔ̌l, ndaká yí ɔ́chyɛ̀ mɛ nɛnyok?”
95 Sɔ̌l akɛmɛ bɛ, “Acha, chí wɔ agha?” Ɛyɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́kɛ́mɛ yí bɛ, “Mmɛ Yesu kɛ ɔ́kòŋo gbɔkɔ́gbɔkɔ ɔnchyɛ nɔkɔ nɛnyok.
96 Kɛ faté, dɔ́k amɛm ɛtɔk ɛgho. Chɔŋ mángati wɔ́ arɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́kʉ.”
97 Bǒ abhɛn bákɔ̀ nyaka nɛ Sɔ̌l, bághók ɛyɔŋ ɛyɔ, kɛ bɔ kɛghɔ yɛ̌ mmú. Báte manyu chochok.
98 Sɔ̌l afate amɨk, anɛnɛ amɨ́k, kɛ yi kɛkwáy bɛghɔ mbaŋ. Bákɛ́m yi ndu awɔ, baya barɔk ɛtɔk Damáskɔs.
99 Abhak arɛ́ ndǔ manywɔp árát, yi kɛkwáy bɛghɔ mbaŋ. Mpok yɔ nkɛm yi kɛnyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́, yɛ̌nyɨŋ yi kɛ nyu.
910 Nkoŋo Yesu amɔt achi nyaka Damáskɔs anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Ananías. Aghɔ́ kɛnɔ́ amɨ́k ántífú ndu Yesu Acha abhɨŋɨ yí bɛ, “Ananías.” Aka arɛm bɛ, “Acha, ghɔ́ mɛ́ nɛ.”
911 Acha aghati yi bɛ, “Faté dɔ́k ndu nkɔngɔ-ɛtɔk anɛ́ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ́ Téé. Ɔ́náŋ ɔ́nchwɔp ndǔ ɛkɛt Júdas bɛ́p mmu Tásɔs anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Sɔ̌l. Achí arɛ́ ǎnɨ̀kmʉɛt.
912 Nɛ ndǔ kɛnɔ́ amɨ́k ántí fúú, aghɔ́ mmu anɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ́ Ananías, ndu áchwé anywɔ́p. Anyaŋa amɔ anti ywi bɛ́ ámpɛt ankway bɛghɔ mbaŋ.”
913 Ananías akɛmɛ bɛ, “Acha, bɛyǎ bo bághátí mɛ mbok Sɔ̌l wu nɛ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ákú ntá bǒbhɛ awu Yerúsalɛm.
914 Bǒbatí bachiǎkap Mandɛm báchyɛ́ yí bɛtaŋ, nɛ atwɔ fá chi bɛ́kɛmti bǒbhɛ.”
915 Kɛ Yesu Acha aghati yi bɛ, “Dɔ́k mbɔnyunɛ njap yí ámbák mʉ̌bɛtɨk awa, bɛ́ ándɔk ángati bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl, nɛ bafɔ bhap, nɛ bo Israɛl ɛ̌ti ɛya.
916 Chɔŋ mɛmbɔŋ ntɔŋ yí ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnkɛm ɛnɛ́ yí ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛghɔ ɛ̌ti ya.”
917 Ananías árɔ́ yɛ arɔk áchwé amɛm ɛkɛt ɛnɛ́ Sɔ̌l áchi arɛ. Anyaŋa yí amɔ ántí arɛm bɛ, “Sɔ̌l, manɔ́, mbɔŋ Yesu Acha mmu abhésí ntá yɛ ankɔŋɔmbi mpok ɔ́twɔ̀ fá, kɛ átó mɛ́ nkʉ́ ɔ́mpɛt ɔ́ngɔ́ mbaŋ nɛ bɛ́ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ambak nɛ wɔ.”
918 Tɛ́mté wu ɛbhak ntá Sɔ̌l mbɔ bɛ mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ bɛfabhɛ́ nsi bɛfu yí amɨ́k bɛkwɛnti. Apɛt abho bɛghɔ mbaŋ. Afate yɛ arɔk bájwíti yi.
919 Anyíɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi bɛ́pɛ́tnsɛm. Sɔ̌l abho bɛ́gháti mbok Yesu ɛtɔk Damáskɔs Sɔ̌l abhak Damáskɔs nɛ bakoŋo Yesu ndu mpǎy manywɔp.
920 Abho yɛ bɛ́rɔ́ŋ ndǔ bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt bo Israɛl tɛ́mté angati nɔkɔ bo ɛ̌ti Yesu bɛ́, “Yesu áchí Mmɔ Mandɛm.”
921 Bǒ mankɛm abhɛn bághókó yi, bábhák maknkay, mámbɛbhɛ nɔkɔ batɨ bɛ, “Pú nkúbhɛ́ mmǔ-nɛ kɛ ákɔ̀ nyaka angʉɛbhɛ nɔkɔ nɛnu nɛ bo abhɛn bábhɨ̀ŋɨ nnyɛ́n Yesu awu Yerúsalɛm nɛ? Atwɔ fá chí bɛ́ ánkɛ́mtí bo Yesu angwɔt, ansɔt ampɛtnsɛm nɛ bhɔ Yerúsalɛm. Atwɔ fá ndu bɛkɛmti bhɔ bɛ ansɔt ampɛtnsɛm nɛ bhɔ́ ntá bǒ batí bachiǎkap Mandɛm.”
922 Yɛ̌ nɔ, Sɔ̌l are tɔ́ŋ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu andɔk nɔkɔ chí ambɨ. Are fʉɛ́t ndu bɛyǎ babhi bɛtɔŋ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ́ Yesu kɛ áchí Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò ɛnyunɛ́ bo Israɛl abhɛn báchí Damáskɔs bábhɨkɨ kwáy bɛkɛm kɛfe nɛ yí.
923 Ɛfʉɛrɛ nɔkɔ bɛyǎ manywɔp, bǒbati bo Israɛl báté ɛyu bɛway Sɔ̌l.
924 Sɔ̌l arɨŋɨ nkaysi yap. Báre noŋ yi bɛti nɛ ngósí ndu manyǔbhá anɛ Damáskɔs bɛ mpok yi áyàŋ bɛfʉɛt, mankɛm yí mangway.
925 Kɛ bɛti mɛ́mɔt, bakoŋó Sɔl basɔt yi báfyɛ́ amɛm ɛkay bákʉ yi áfʉɛ́t ndǔ mbok anɛ́ áchi ndǔ nkok anɛ ákábhɛ́ ɛtɔk, básɛ́bhɛ yi amɨk ansɛm ɛbhá. Abʉɛ́. 
926 Sɔ̌l apɛtnsɛm Yerúsalɛm are mɔ bɛ́chɛm mmʉɛt nɛ bakoŋo Yesu arɛ́, kɛ bɔ́ kɛnoko bɛ yi achi nkoŋo Yesu. Báre chay mámbʉɛ nɔkɔ yí.
927 Kɛ mmu amɔt anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Banábas asɔt yí arɔk ntá bǒnto Yesu. Aghati bhɔ ɛnyǔ Sɔ̌l aghɔ Yesu Acha ambi mpok yi árɔ̀ŋ Damáskɔs nɛ ɛnyǔ Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ kɛpɨ nɛ yi. Aghati nkwɔ́ bɔ́ ɛnyǔ Sɔ̌l átɔ́ŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm kpoŋoroŋ ndu nnyɛ́n Yesu awu Damáskɔs kɛbhɔ́ŋ bɛcháy.
928 Bɛbho yɛ mpok yɔ, achɛm mmʉɛt nɛ bakoŋo Yesu Acha ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bɔ bákʉ̀.
929 Are tɔŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ndu nnyɛ́n Yesu kɛbhɔ́ŋ bɛcháy. Mpók nɛ mpok ándɛm nɔkɔ ɛ̌ti Yesu ntá bo Israɛl abhɛn bárɛ̀m ɛyɔŋɔ Grik, ankɛm nɔkɔ ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ bhɔ́. Ɛkʉ bare yáŋ chí bɛ́wáy yí.
930 Batɨ̌ Bǒ nkwɔ́ bárɨ́ŋɨ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, básɔt yi barɔk Seséria, bátó yí ándɔ́k Tásɔs.
931 Ɛ́fákári yɛ bɛ bǒnkwɔ Yesu abhɛn bachi atú Judɛ́ya, nɛ abhɛn atú Gálili, nɛ abhɛn atú Samária nkɛm kɛpɛrɛ bhɔŋ ɛsɔŋɔri. Bakoŋo Yesu bábhʉrɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnap ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ nɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ bɔ báchyɛ̀ Mandɛm kɛnókó. Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ are chyɛ bhɔ nɛpɔptǐntɨ́, anchyɛ nɔkɔ bhɔ bɛtaŋ. Ɛ́kʉ bɛyǎ bo báchák báre noko Yesu mánchɛm nɔkɔ nɛ bhɔ.
932 Ɛ́fákari bɛ Píta ǎkɔ̀ nyaka mbǎŋ nɛ mbaŋ ndu bɛ́byo bo Mandɛm. Ɛwak ɛ́mɔ́t, arɔk bɛbyo abhɛn bachi ɛtɔk ɛnɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ Lída.
933 Akwɛsɛ mbɛ́ntí amɔt arɛ́. Báre pɔ̀kɔ yi yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ yi árɔ̀ŋ. Abhak ɛnyu yɔ ndu mamiɛ́ ánɛ̀n. Aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Aénias.
934 Píta arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Aénias, Yesu Kristo ǎkʉ̀ wɔ ɔ́ntáŋ nɛ́nɛ. Faté pɛ́t ɛ̌sák ɛyɛ.” Tɛ́mte wu, atɛ́m afate.
935 Bǒ ɛtɔk Lída nɛ Shárɔn babhak arɛ́. Bɔ mankɛm bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndu Aénias ákɔ̀, mánókó Yesu Acha.
936 Ngɔrɛ́ amɔt achi nyaka ɛtɔk Jopa anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Tabíta,   [Nɔ́ chí Dɔ́kas ndu ɛyɔŋ Grik] abhak nkoŋo Yesu. Ǎkʉ nyaka bɛrɨ, ankwak nɔkɔ bachɛ́bhɛ́bho mpoknkɛm.
937 Mpok yɔ, akwɛ́n nɛme agú. Báso yi bábhʉrɛ amɛm mɔ́kɛrɛ́mfay ndu ɛkɛrɛ́ mfay.
938 Jopa kɛsap nɛkɔ nɛ Lída. Bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn Jopa bághók bɛ Píta achi Lída. Bátó bo batí apay, ntá yi. Bárɔk manɨk yi mmʉɛt bɛ, “Ɛta, twɔ ghɔ bhɛsɛ́ ayak, kɛ́chɔŋti mpok.”
939 Píta afa yɛ are rɔŋ nɛ bhɔ. Ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ arɛ́, basɔt yi bako ndu mɔ́kɛrɛ́mfay. Bɛyǎ mánkwɛ́sɛ́ bábhak arɛ. Bɔ́ mankɛm bakap Píta. Báre di, mántɔŋ nɔkɔ ndɛn ɛnɛ Tabita áyɛ́mɛ́ ntá yap mpok yi achi nɛpɛ́m.
940 Píta aghati bɔ́ mankɛm mámfu nɛfí. Atɛp mánɛ́n amɨk anɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm. Ayibhiri mmʉɛt ntá ngu arɛm bɛ, “Tabíta, faté!” Tabíta anɛnɛ amɨ́k. Ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ Píta afate achɔkɔ chɔ́kɔ́.
941 Píta asá áwɔ́ akɛm yi akwak yi afate. Abhɨŋɨ yɛ bo Mandɛm nɛ mánkwɛ́sɛ́, asɔt Dɔ́kas atɔ́ŋ bɔ́ bɛ mangɔ bɛ́ yi achí nɛpɛ́m.
942 Mbok Dɔ́kas ataka ɛtɔk Jopa ɛnkɛm. Bɛyǎ bo mánóko, básɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ Yesu Acha.
943 Píta arɔk ambɨ bɛchɔkɔ Jopa ndǔ bɛyǎ manywɔp nɛ ngoko nkwɔbhɛ́nya ɛnɛ bághárɛ́ amʉɛt nnya ɛnɛ baway. Nnyɛ́n ɛni nɛ́bhak bɛ Símun.
10
101 Mmufú achí nyaka ɛtɔk Seséria, anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Kɔnéliɔs. Abhak mǔntí ɛ́ká batɛmɛ́ nɛnu Rom bɛsa bɛ́táy. Báré bhɨŋɨ ɛka ɛyɔ bɛ́ Ɛka Itália.
102 Kɔnéliɔs abhak mmu anɛ ákɔ́ŋɔ́ baraká Mandɛm nɛ ǎchyɛ̀ nyaka Mandɛm kɛnókó nɛ ɛfo ɛyi ɛnkɛm. Abhak mmu anɛ ánɨ̀kmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm mpoknkɛm, anchyɛ nɔkɔ bɛyǎ nɛkwak ntá bo Israɛl abhɛn bachi bachɛ́bhɛ́bho.
103 Ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, mbɔ nkarɛnka ɛrat nɛ ngósí, aghɔ́ kɛnɔ́ amɨ́k anti fúú. Aghɔ́ sayri ndu ángɛl Mandɛm amɔt átwɔ́ ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ yi bɛ, “Kɔnéliɔs!”
104 Ayoŋ amɨ́k are yɨŋɨ ángɛl wu nɛ bɛcháy, abhɛp yi bɛ, “Ɛta chí yi?” Ángɛl Mandɛm akɛmɛ bɛ, “Mandɛm aghok nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛnɛ, aghɔ́ nɛkwak ɛnɛ́n ɔ́chyɛ́ ntá bachɛ́bhɛ́bho nɛ abhɔŋ maŋák nɛ wɔ.
105 Tó yɛ bo Jopa bɛ mandɔ́k mámbɨ́ŋɨ́ mmu anɛ ákà nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Símun anɛ nnyɛ́n ɛni nɛchak nɛchi bɛ Píta.
106 Ǎchɔ̀kɔ nɛ Símun ngoko nkwɔbhɛ́nya. Ɛkɛt Símun wu ɛchi angɔkɔ manyu.”
107 Ángɛl Mandɛm árɔŋɔ nɔkɔ, Kɔnéliɔs nkwɔ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk abhi batí apay nɛ ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu amɔt anɛ achi nyaka nɛ yi mpoknkɛm ankwaka nɔkɔ yi. Ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu wu abhak mmu anɛ áchày Mandɛm.
108 Bátwɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́, aghati bhɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ángɛl Mandɛm árɛ́mɛ́. Ató yɛ bɔ́ ɛtɔk Jopa.
109 Bárɔ bare rɔŋ, bágháká kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ ɛtɔk mbɔ nkárɛ́nká byo nɛ ɛpay. Nkúbhɛ́ mpok yɔ, Píta akó amfay ɛkɛt ndu mɛnɨkmʉɛt. Mfay ɛkɛt abhak ransi.
1010 Nsay akɛ́m yi, are yáŋ ɛnyɨŋ mɛ́nyiɛ́ mpok anɛ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛbhʉɛt angó, aghɔ́ kɛnɔ́ amɨ́k ántífú.
1011 Aghɔ́ bɛ́ nɛbu nɛ́nɛ́nɛ. Ɛnyɨŋɨ́fú ɛ́fú arɛ ɛre sɛp amɨk. Ɛ́bhak mbɔ ntěndɛn nɛgho ɛnɛ́n bákɛ́mɛ́ ndǔ batí yi anwi básɛ̀bhɛ amɨk.
1012 Mɛnyǔ nnya mɛnkɛm bɛ́bhak ndu ɛnyɨŋ ɛyɔ. Nnya ɛnɛ́ bɛkak mɛnwi ɛbhak arɛ́ nɛ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́sù mɛniɛ amɨk nɛ kɛnɛn.
1013 Aghók ɛyɔŋ ndu ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Píta, faté, wáy nyìɛ.”
1014 Kɛ Píta akɛmɛ bɛ, “Cháá! Acha mbɨ́kɨ́ re nyiɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛpu pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm wáwák.”
1015 Ɛyɔŋ ɛpɛt ɛtwɔ ntá yí ndɔŋ anɛ ájwí ɛpay bɛ, “Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm akʉ bɛ ɛmbak pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí bhi, yɛ̌ mmu akɛ rɛm bɛ ɛ́pú pɛ́pɛ́p.”
1016 Ɛ́fákárí nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyu yɔ ndɔŋ ɛ́rát, ɛnyɨŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́pɛ́tnsɛm amfay.
1017 Ɛnɛ́ Píta abhʉɛ́t bɛyaŋ bɛrɨŋɨ ntí kɛnɔ́ amɨ́k antífú ɛkɔ, bǒ abhɛn Kɔnéliɔs átó, bare bhɛp ɛbhak ɛnɛ Símun áchí. Bárɔ́k kpát báchwɔp ndǔ nyǔbha ɛkɛt ɛnɛ yi achi arɛ.
1018 Básá ɛyɔŋ babhɛp mbák mmu anɛ ákà nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Símun Píta achí arɛ́.
1019 Nɛ ɛnɛ́ Píta abhʉɛ́t bɛkáysi kɛnɔ́ ɛkɔ, Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ arɛm ntá yí bɛ, “Yɨŋɨ́, bǒ batí árát báyàŋ wɔ.
1020 Faté, sɛp, dɔ́k áyák nɛ bhɔ nɛ ɔ́kɛ́ chɔnti mpok. Mɛ kɛ ntó bɔ.”
1021 Píta asɛp arɔk ntá bǒbhɔ, arɛm bɛ, “Mɛ kɛ nchí mmu anɛ bǎyàŋ. Bǎtwɔ ndaká yí?”
1022 Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Kɔnéliɔs, mǔnti batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bɛsa bɛ́tay, kɛ ato bhɛsɛ́ ntá yɛ. Achí chak bɛsí Mandɛm nɛ ǎchày Mandɛm. Bo Israɛl mankɛm báchyɛ̀ yi kɛnókó tontó. Ángɛl Mandɛm ághátí yi ántó mámbɨŋɨ wɔ, ɔ́ntwɔ ɛkɛt ɛyi, bɛ angok ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́gháti yi.”
1023 Píta asɔt bɔ́ árɔk anywɔ́p nɛ bhɔ. Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, Píta afa are rɔ́ŋ nɛ bɔ́. Mbɔk bǒ nkwɔ́ Yesu abhɛn Jopa bárɔ́k nɛ yi.
1024 Bákɔ bábhʉrɛ ambi, kɛ nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́ báchwɔp Seséria. Kɔnéliɔs anáŋ arɨŋɨ nyaka bɛ́ Píta ǎtwɔ̀. Ató bábhɨŋɨ bǒ nnɛrɛ́kɛt nɛ mamʉɛrɛ bhi. Bɔ́ mankɛm bachɔkɔ mánoŋ nɔkɔ bɔPíta.
1025 Nɛchwe Píta áchwe anywɔ́p, Kɔnéliɔs akwɛ́n yi bɛkak, abho bɛ́chyɛ yí kɛnókó.
1026 Kɛ Píta akɛm yí ndu awɔ, bɛ yí amfate, arɛm bɛ, “Mɛ nkwɔ́ nchí chí nkwǎ mbɔ wɔ.”
1027 Nɛ ndu bárɛ̀m kɛpɨ nɛ Píta, Píta achwe anywɔ́p, aghɔ́ bɛyǎ bo.
1028 Arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Bě babhɔŋ bǎrɨŋɨ ndu ɛbhé ɛyɛsɛ ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ mmu Israɛl abhɨkɨ bhɔ́ŋ bɛfyɛ mmʉɛt nɛ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl nɛ abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ yɛ̌ chi bɛrɔŋ bɛghɔ bhɔ. Kɛ Mandɛm atɔŋ mɛ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ, nkɛ́ yɨŋɨ yɛ̌ mmu mbɔ bɛ abhɨkɨ kway bɛsí bha.
1029 Ngɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yɛ bo abhɛn ɔ́tó, mfá nde twɔ́ nkɛkɛ́m ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ mmu. Ghatí yɛ mɛ ntí anɛ ɔ́bhɨŋɨ mɛ́!”
1030 Kɔnéliɔs akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Ɛ́kʉ manywɔp anwi ɛchɔŋ ɛnɛ́ nchí amɛm ɛkɛt ɛya nchí nɨkmʉɛt. Nkúbhɛ́ mpok mbɔ anɛ, mbɔ nkarɛnka ɛ́rát nɛ ngósí, mmu abhesi mɛ bɛsí nɛ nkú anɛ are ghɔɔ,
1031 árɛm bɛ, ‘Kɔnéliɔs, Mandɛm aghok nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛnɛ, nɛ aghɔ nɛkwak ɛnɛ́n ɔ́chyɛ̀ bachɛ́bhɛ́ bho.
1032 Tó yɛ mmu Jopa bɛ andɔk ambɨŋɨ mmu anɛ ákà nnyɛ́n bɛ Símun Píta. Achí kɛnkɔ amɛm ɛkɛt Símun ngoko nkwɔbhɛ́nya nɛ ɛkɛt ɛyi ɛ́chí angɔkɔ manyu!’
1033 Ntó yɛ bo tɛ́mté bɛ́ mámbɨ́ŋɨ́ wɔ, nɛ ɛ́rɨ ndu ɔ́twɔ́. Bɛsɛ́ mankɛm sɛ́chí fá bɛsí Mandɛm ndu bɛghok yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ Acha ágháti wɔ ɔ́ngátí bhɛsɛ́.” 
1034 Píta abho yɛ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Ngɔ sayri bɛ́ Mandɛm apú tɔŋ kɛ́rɨ́ŋámík.
1035 Kɛ ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛtɔk, yɛ agha anɛ áchày Mandɛm ankʉ nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́chi chak bɛsí bhi, Mandɛm ǎsɔt yi ambak mmǔ ywi.
1036 Nkáysí bɛ bǎrɨŋɨ ntó ɛnɛn yi ató nyaka ntá yɛsɛ bo Israɛl bɛ chɔŋ ankʉ bo mambak sayri nɛ yi ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu Kristo akʉ. Yi Yesu achí Acha amfǎy bo mankɛm.
1037 Bǎrɨŋɨ ɛrɛmɛ́ ndak anɛ́ áfákárí atú Judɛ́ya ankɛm, bɛ́bho atú Gálili, mpok Jɔ̌n ánáŋ ánáŋá nyaka bɛghati bo bɛ mántɨ́knsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap yi anjwiti bhɔ.
1038 Bǎrɨŋɨ ɛ̌ti Yesu mmu Násárɛt, nɛ ɛnyu Mandɛm achyɛ́ nyaka yi Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ nɛ bɛtaŋ. Akɔ mbǎnkɛm ankʉ nɔkɔ bɛrɨ nɛ ambu nɔkɔ bǒ mankɛm abhɛn Satan áchyɛ̀ bhɔ ɛsɔŋɔri mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm achi nɛ yí.
1039 Nɛ sɛ́ghɔ nɛ amɨ́k mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ́ Yerúsalɛm nɛ mbaŋ ɛchak amɛm ɛtɔk bo Israɛl. Bágó yí ndu ɛkotákátí, agú.
1040 Kɛ ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ manywɔp árát, Mandɛm akʉ yi apɛtnsɛm ndu nɛpɛ́m, atɔ́ŋ mmʉɛt kpoŋoroŋ ntá bo.
1041 Kɛ abhɨkɨ tɔ́ŋ mmʉɛt chí ntá bo mankɛm. Atɔ́ŋ mmʉɛt ntá batísiɛ́ abhɛn Mandɛm ánáŋ áyábhɛ́, nɔ́ chí bhɛsɛ́ bo sɛ́nyíɛ́ nɛ sɛ́nyú nɛ yi mpok yi ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ndu nɛpɛ́m.
1042 Nɛ yi aghátí bhɛsɛ bɛ́ sɛ́kɛ́rɔ bɛghati Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ yɔ ntá bo, nɛ bɛ́ sɛ́nkʉ bo mándɨŋɨ bɛ́ yí kɛ̌ Mandɛm ayabhɛ bɛ ambak mmu nɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́táŋ bo abhɛn bachi nɛpɛ́m nɛ abhɛn bágú.
1043 Barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ mankɛm bárɛ̀m nyaka ɛ̌ti yi bɛ, yɛ̌ agha anɛ asɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ Yesu, Mandɛm ǎfoŋori bɛbʉ́ ɛbhi ɛ̌ti yi Yesu.” 
1044 Ɛnɛ́ Píta abhʉɛ́t bɛ́rɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ, Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ atwɔ́ abhak nɛ bo mankɛm abhɛn bághòk Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
1045 Bǒ nkwɔ́ Yesu abhɛn bachí bo Israɛl, nɔ́ chí abhɛn báfú Jopa nɛ Píta, bábhak maknkay tontó mbɔnyunɛ bághɔ́ bɛ Mandɛm achyɛ́ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ntá bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl nkwɔ.
1046 Bábhak maknkay mbɔnyunɛ bághók ndu bobhɔ́ bárɛ̀m bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk bɛ́chák bɛ́chák ɛbhɛ́n bɔ́ bábhɨkɨ ghɔ́k, mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Mandɛm ataŋ nɛ arɨ achá!” Ɛ́kʉ Píta arɛm bɛ́,
1047 “Mandɛm achyɛ́ bǒbhɛn Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔnyu yí áchyɛ́ nyaka bhɛsɛ bo Israɛl. Agha ákwáy yɛ bɛ́káŋ bɛ́ bákɛ́ jwiti bhɔ́?”
1048 Achyɛ yɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ́ mánjwiti bhɔ́ ndu nnyɛ́n Yesu Kristo. Bájwítí bhɔ. Bárɛm bɛ Píta anchɔkɔ nɛ bhɔ ndu mpǎy manywɔp.
11
111 Bǒnto nɛ bakoŋo Yesu báchák atú Judɛ́ya ankɛm, bághók bɛ mbɔk bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl mánóko Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm nkwɔ.
112 Mbɔk bo bachi nyaka ndu nkwɔ́ bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn báte bɛ bábhɔŋ bɛ́siɛ́p yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu mbɔ bɔ́ bo Israɛl, kɛ ankwáy bɛ́bhak mmu Mandɛm. Píta ápɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nsɛm Yerúsalɛm, bǒbhɔ báré ji yí mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ,
113 “Yí ɛkʉ ɔ́rɔ́ŋ ɔ́chwé amɛm ɛkɛt bo ɛtɔk ɛ́chák abhɛn bábhɨkɨ syɛp bhɔ kpátɛ ɔ̌nyìɛ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ bhɔ́?”
114 Píta abho yɛ bɛ́ghati bhɔ́ sayri yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fákári tɛ ndǔ nɛbhǒnɛt bɛ,
115 “Ɛwak ɛ́mɔt ndu nchí nɨkmʉɛt awu ɛtɔk Jopa, ngɔ́ kɛnɔ́ amɨ́k antífú. Ngɔ́ ndu ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́fú amfay ɛ́sɛ̀p. Ɛbhak mbɔ ntěndɛn nɛgho ɛnɛn bákɛ́mɛ́ bati yi anwi básɛ̀bhɛ amɨk. Ɛgháká nɔ́kɔ́ kɛkwɔ́t nɛ mɛ ɛ́te.
116 Njɨŋɨ sayri bɛghɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi arɛ. Ngɔ́ nnya mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu. Nnya ɛnɛ anywɔ́p nɛ nnya ɛbebe nɛ nnya ɛnɛ́ ɛ́sù mɛniɛ amɨk nɛ kɛnɛn.
117 Ngók ɛyɔŋ ndu ɛ́ghàti mɛ bɛ ‘Píta, faté, wáy nyiɛ!’
118 Kɛ nkɛmɛ bɛ ‘Acha wáwák! Mbɨ́kɨ́ re nyiɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́pú pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí ɛbhɛ.’
119 Kɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛpɛt ɛrɛm ndɔŋ anɛ ájwi ɛpay bɛ, ‘Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm akʉ bɛ ɛmbak pɛ́pɛ́p, yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́ rɛm bɛ ɛpu pɛ́pɛ́p.’
1110 Ɛ́fákári ɛnyu ɛyɔ ndɔŋ ɛ́rát, ɛnyɨŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́pɛ́tnsɛm amfay.
1111 Nkúbhɛ́ mpok yɔ, bo batí arat bachwɔp ambǐnywɔp ɛkɛt ɛnɛ́ nchí arɛ́. Báfú Seséria nɛ ntó bɛ́ mánsɔt mɛ.
1112 Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ aghati mɛ bɛ, ‘Faté sɛp dɔ́k nɛ bhɔ. Ɔ́kɛ́ fyɛ ntí bɛ́ bápú bo Israɛl.’ Bɔ̌mayɛsɛ abhɛn batí átándát abhɛn Jopa bákóŋo mɛ sɛ́rɔk Seséria, nɛ bɛsɛ mankɛm sɛ́chwe ɛkɛrɛ́ mmu wu Kɔnéliɔs.
1113 Aghati bhɛsɛ́ ndu yí ághɔ́ ángɛl Mandɛm ɛkɛt ɛyi nɛ ángɛl wu ágháti yi bɛ ántó bo Jopa mámbɨŋɨ mɛ Símun Píta bɛ
1114 ndɔ́k ngáti yi mbok anɛ ákʉ̀ yi andɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyu Mandɛm akway bɛpɛmɛ yi nɛ ɛfo ɛyi ɛnkɛm.
1115 Nɛbho mbó bɛ́gháti bhɔ mɛnyɨŋ, Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ atwɔ́ ntá yap nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu ɛ́fákári nyaka nɛ bhɛsɛ ndǔ nɛbhǒnɛt.
1116 Ntɨk yɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu Acha árɛ́mɛ́ nyaka bɛ, ‘Jɔ̌n ǎjwiti bo nɛ manyiɛp, kɛ chɔŋ mánjwiti bhe nɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ.’
1117 Be bábhɔŋ, ghɔ́ yɛka! Mandɛm achyɛ́ bǒbhɔ nkúbhɛ́ akap anɛ́ yi achyɛ́ nyaka bhɛsɛ mpok sɛ́nókó Yesu Kristo Acha. Nchí yɛ́ nyaka agha bɛchɛt Mandɛm mbi?”
1118 Bághókó nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Píta árɛ́mɛ́ mɛnkɛm, manyu áchók bhɔ. Báre chyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó mandɛm nɔkɔ bɛ, “Nɔ Mandɛm achyɛ mbi ntá bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl nkwɔ bɛ mankway bɛtɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhap, mambɔŋ nɛpɛ́m!” 
1119 Bɛyǎ bakoŋo Yesu báfú nyaka Yerúsalɛm ɛ̌ti ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ ɛbho mpok báwáy Stífin bataka mbaŋ nɛ mbaŋ. Mbɔk bárɔk kpatɛ atú Foníshia, báchák tɛ Sáyprɔs nɛ abhɛnɛfu tɛ Ántiɔk. Bárɔŋ nɔkɔ nɔ, mangati nɔkɔ mbok Yesu ntá bo Israɛl bɔ́bhɔ.
1120 Kɛ mbɔk abhɛn bachi bo Sáyprɔs nɛ abhɛn bachi bo Sírene bárɔk Ántiɔk bábhó bɛ́gháti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ Yesu ntá bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl nkwɔ́.
1121 Acha abhak nɛ bhɔ́, akwak bɛyǎ mánoko bábho bɛkoŋo mbi ywi.
1122 Mbok akɔ aghaka ntá bǒnkwɔ Yesu abhɛn Yerúsalɛm. Bátó Banábas ɛtɔk Ántiɔk.
1123 Agháká nɔ́kɔ́ árɛ́, aghɔ́ ndu Mandɛm átɔ́ŋɔ́ bǒbhɔ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi, abhɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ maŋák, abho bɛ́fyɛ́ bhɔ́ ntɨ bɛ mámbak tɛtɛp nɛ Yesu, mánte kpirí mpoknkɛm nɛ ntɨ nɛnkɛm.
1124 Banábas achí nyaka ɛrɨ́tí mmu anɛ asɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ Yesu sayri. Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ abhak nɛ yí tontó. Akwak bɛyǎ bo mánoko mbok Yesu, báchɛm mmʉɛt nɛ bakoŋo bhi.
1125 Banábas arɔk yɛ Tásɔs bɛ́yaŋ Sɔ̌l.
1126 Ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yi, asɔt yí apɛtnsɛm Antiɔk nɛ yi. Sɔ̌l nɛ yi bábhak arɛ ndǔ mmíɛ́ nɛnkɛm nɛ nkwɔ Yesu, mántɔŋ nɔkɔ bɛyǎ bo Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́. Chi Antiɔk kɛ bábhó nyaka bɛbhɨŋɨ bakoŋo Yesu bɛ, “Nkwɔ Kristo.”
1127 Mpok yɔ, mbɔk barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ báfú Yerúsalɛm barɔk Antiɔk.
1128 Mmu wap amɔt áká nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Ágábɔs. Ndu bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ afate arɛm bɛ chɔŋ ɛrɛmɛ nsay ɛ́nkwɛ́n ndǔ bɛtɔk mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́chí antɛn Mfɔ Rom. [Nsay yɔ akwɛ́n mpok Klaodiɔs áchí Mfɔ Rom].
1129 Bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn Antiɔk baghoko nɔkɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ágábɔs árɛ́mɛ́, báká ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt bɛ mánchwɔp nkáp manto ndu bɛkwak batɨ̌ bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn báchi atú Judɛ́ya. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛ́chyɛ mbɔ ɛnyu amɔ yi atɔŋɔ.
1130 Bákʉ́ ɛnyu ɛyɔ, bátó Banábas nɛ Sɔ̌l Yerúsalɛm bɛ mándɔk mánchyɛ nkáp wu ntá bǒbati bǒnkwɔ Yesu.
12
121 Ndu mpok yɔ, Mfɔ Hɛ́rɔd abho bɛ́chyɛ nɛnyok ntá mbɔk bǒnkwɔ.
122 Achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bákɛ́m Jems manɔ Jɔ̌n báwáy nɛ akparɛnja.
123 Ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yí ákʉ́ ɛ́chyɛ̀ bo Israɛl maŋák, arɔk ambɨ nɛ bɛbʉ́ bhi, achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ mánkɛ́m Píta nkwɔ́. Ɛyɔ ɛ́fákárí ndǔ mpok Ɛpǎ brɛt anɛ kɛbhɔŋ yís.
124 Bákɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ Píta, arɛm báfyɛ́ yi ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ. Bakwɔ́ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu ábhak anwi ndu bɛbhabhɛri yi mkpák nɛ mkpák. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nkwɔ́ wap ábhɔ́ŋ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu manwi. Hɛ́rɔd abhɔ́ŋ nkaysi bɛ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ ɛ́mfʉ́ɛ́t, mámfɛrɛ yi mántáŋ kpoŋoroŋ bɛsí bho.
125 Kɛ ɛnɛ́ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bábhàbhɛri Píta ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ, bakoŋo Yesu báré nɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm nɛ batɨ yap ankɛm ɛ̌ti yi. 
126 Nkúbhɛ́ bɛti ɛbhɛ́n Hɛ́rɔd árɔ́bhɛ́ nóŋ chi bɛ nywɔp nɛ́njí mámfɛ́rɛ́ Píta ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ mántáŋ yi bɛsí bho, Píta abhak bhʉrɛ nɛ́ntɨ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bati apay, femfé nɛ ngɛm. Ngɛm amɔt abhat yi nɛ ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu amɔt ndǔ ɛbhěmʉɛt ɛ́mɔt, achák abhat yi nɛ ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu anɛfú ndǔ ɛbhěmʉɛt ɛ́chák. Batɛmɛ́ nɛnu báchák bábhak anyǔbhá mámbabhɛri nɔkɔ ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ.
127 Ángɛl Mandɛm abhesi tɛ́mchók, bɛdiɛrɛ bɛ́kwɛ́n amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ. Ángɛl akɛ́m Píta ndǔ nɛnkɨ anyɨkɨsi, áŋɛ́mɛ́ yí arɛm bɛ, “Faté áyák!” Tɛ́mté wu ngɛm ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chí amɔ́ Píta ɛ́yóko ɛ́kwɛ́n amɨk.
128 Ángɛl ágháti yɛ Píta bɛ, “Fíɛ́ nkú nɛ nkwɔbánya ɛyɛ.” Píta akʉ nɔ. Apɛt aghatí yi bɛ, “Bhat ndɛ́ yɛ amʉɛt, koŋó mɛ.”
129 Píta abho bɛ́koŋo yi. Nɛfú anɛ báfú ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ, yí kɛrɨŋɨ bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ángɛl ákʉ̀ ntá yi chí ndaká tɛtɛp. Are kaysi bɛ́ ághɔ̀ nɔ chi kɛnɔ́ amɨ́k antífú.
1210 Báfʉɛ́t nɛbhʉɛt anɛ babhabhɛri abhɛn mbɨ nɛ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ abhɛn bákòŋo báchwɔp ndu nyǔbha anɛ́ mmu ǎfʉɛt anchwe ɛtɔk. Nnyǔbha wu ánɛ́nɛ ndu mmʉɛt ɛyi. Báfú bárɔ́k nɛfí, bákɔ baghaka ndʉ́ nkɔngɔ ɛtɔk amɔt. Píta ápɛ́rɛ́ yɨŋɨ ángɛl ánáŋ árɔ́ yi arɔŋ.
1211 Píta arɨŋɨ yɛ bɛ́ tɛtɛp yí afuu ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ, arɛm bɛ, “Nɛ́nɛ, ndɨ́ŋɨ́ tɛtɛp bɛ́ Mandɛm ato ángɛl aywi ántwɔ́ ámfɛ́rɛ́ mɛ́ amɔ Hɛ́rɔd nɛ ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bo Israɛl batɨ bɛ́kʉ mɛ.”
1212 Árɨ́ŋɨ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fákárí ntá yi, afʉɛ́t arɔk ɛkɛrɛ́ Maria, nnɔ Jɔ̌n Mák. Bɛyǎ bo báchɛmti nyaka arɛ mánɨk nɔkɔ mmʉɛt.
1213 Píta abho bɛ́dɛp nɛkok ɛnɛn mbɨ. Ngɔsɔ́ŋ anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Róda áchí nyaka mmɔ̌ bɛtok anywɔ́p. Arɔk bɛrɨŋɨ mmu anɛ ádɛ̀p nɛkok.
1214 Aghók bɛ́ chí ɛyɔŋ Píta. Nɛ bɛyǎ maŋák, arɔ mbǐnyɔ́p kɛnɛnɛ apɛtnsɛm aghati bǒ mankɛm bɛ́, “Píta achí ambǐnywɔp téé!”
1215 Bárɛm bɛ, “Ɔ̌bhokori!” Kɛ arɔk chi ambɨ bɛ́gháti bhɔ bɛ́, “Chí Píta tɛtɛp.” Afɔ̌ kɛ barɛmɛ bɛ, “Chi ángɛl aywi.”
1216 Mpok yɔ nkɛm, Píta are dɛp nɛkok. Mánɛ́nɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ mbǐnywɔp, bághɔ́ bɛ chi Píta tɛtɛp.
1217 Asá awɔ́ bɛ mánchɔ́kɔ́ kpák. Báchɔkɔ kpák kpák. Abho yɛ bɛ́gháti bhɔ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm afɛrɛ yi ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ. Ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́, aghati bhɔ́ bɛ mángátí Jems nɛ bǒnkwɔ́ bachak ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fákári. Arɔ yɛ bhɔ́, arɔk ɛbhak ɛchák.
1218 Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, ɛbyɔk ɛ́kwɛ́n ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ. Batɛmɛ́ nɛnu abhɛn bábhàbhɛri Píta, báré makati mámbɛbhɛ nɔkɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fákárí nɛ yi.
1219 Mfɔ Hɛ́rɔd ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ bábhɨkɨ ghɔ́ Píta, achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ́ mánjáŋ yi. Báyáŋ yí kɛ bákɛ ghɔ yi. Hɛ́rɔd abhɨŋɨ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bhɔ, ábhɛ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bhɔ mɛnyɨŋ, achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ́ mángwáy bhɔ́. Hɛ́rɔd afa atú Judɛ́ya anɛ́ yí áchí arɛ arɔk atú Seséria áchák achɔkɔ arɛ́. 
1220 Hɛ́rɔd ǎbentɨ tontó nɛ bǒ-Taya nɛ abhɛn Sídɔn. Ɛkʉ bɛtɔk ɛbhɔ bɛ́pay bɛyap nkwɔ bho. Bátó bhɔ́ mándɔ́k mángɔ́ Hɛ́rɔd. Báyámbɨ bághɔ́ chí Blastɔs, nkɛ́mfɔ anɛ Hɛ́rɔd. Aka bɛkwak bhɔ mánsókórí nɛ Mfɔ Hɛ́rɔd bɛ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ́máy nɛ́ntɨ́ bɛtɔk Táya nɛ Sídɔn nɛ ɛyi. Báyàŋ nyaka bɛbhak ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt nɛ Mfɔ Hɛ́rɔd mbɔnyunɛ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnap nɛ́fù nyaka chi atú ɛtɔk ɛnɛ achi antɛn yi.
1221 Nywɔp Mfɔ Hɛ́rɔd afyɛ́ ndu bɛrɛm kɛpɨ nɛ bhɔ nɛkwáy nɔ́kɔ́, afyɛ́ ndɛn kɛfɔ yi, achɔkɔ ndu ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ arɛm kɛpɨ bɛsi bǒbhɔ.
1222 Bǒbhó bare bɨk bɛ, “Chi ɛyɔŋ mandɛm. Puyɛ chi ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ nkwǎŋwaŋ!”
1223 Tɛ́mté wu, ángɛl Mandɛm aguɛ́p yi nɛme amʉɛt mbɔnyunɛ arɔ́ bo mánchyɛ yi kɛnókó ɛkɛn babhɔŋɔ bɛchyɛ chi ntá Mandɛm. Kɛ́nyoŋo kɛ́nyíɛ́ yi, agú.
1224 Kɛ, Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛ́re go ɛ́ndɔkɔ nɔkɔ chi ambɨ.
1225 Banábas nɛ Sɔ̌l, mánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́pɔ́kɔ́ bhɔ́ Yerúsalɛm, bápɛtnsɛm Antiɔk. Básɔ́t Jɔ̌n Mák, arɔk nɛ bhɔ.
13
131 Barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ nɛ batɔŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm báchi nyaka ndǔ Nkwɔ Yesu abhɛn Antiɔk. Bábhak Banábas, nɛ Símiɔn anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ́ Ɛgírímɔ, nɛ Lusiɔs anɛ áfú Sírene, nɛ Manáen anɛ áchí nyaka mmʉɛrɛ kɛmbɔ́ anɛ Mfɔ Hɛ́rɔd Ántipas, nɛ Sɔ̌l.
132 Ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, ɛnɛ báchí ndǔ nɛtarɛ́nsay nɛ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt mánchyɛ nɔkɔ Mandɛm kɛnókó, Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ arɛm bɛ, “Dɔ̌ ká Banábas nɛ Sɔ̌l, mámbák nyáŋá ndu bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn mbɨŋɨ bɔ mankʉ.”
133 Bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, bárɔ́k ambɨ nɛ nɛtarɛ́nsay nɛ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt. Mányáŋa yɛ amɔ anti Banábas nɛ Sɔ̌l manɨkmʉɛt, barɔ yɛ bɔ mandɔk. 
134 Banábas nɛ Sɔ̌l bárɔk mbɔ ɛnyu Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ átó bhɔ. Bárɔ́k Sɛlusia básɔt achwǐnyɛ́n anɛ árɔ̀ŋ ndǔ ɛtɔk nɛ́ntɨ́nyɛn ɛnɛ babhɨŋɨ bɛ Sáyprɔs.
135 Báchwɔ́bhɛ́ nɔkɔ arɛ ndu mɔ́tɔk anɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ́ Salamis, bárɔ áchwi nɛkunyɛ́n bákó ɛtɔk mángati nɔkɔ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt bo Israɛl. Jɔ̌n Mák abhak nɛ bhɔ́, ankwak nɔkɔ bhɔ.
136 Bárɔ́k ambɨ ɛnyuyɔ ndǔ bɛtɔk nɛ bɛtɔk kpát bákɨŋɨ ɛtɔk nɛntɨnyɛn Sáyprɔs ɛyɔ ɛnkɛm báchwɔp Pafɔs. Bátɛ́mɛri mmu Israɛl arɛ́ anɛ achi mǔnjɔ kɛ ǎpù bapu bɛ́ achí ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm. Aka nnyɛn bɛ́ Ba-Jesus.
137 Achí nyaka mpoknkɛm nɛ gɔ́bhanɔ ɛtɔk ɛyɔ anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Sɛjɔs Paólɔs. Sɛjɔs Paólɔs abhak ndɨŋɨndak. Abhɨŋɨ Banábas nɛ Sɔ̌l mbɔnyunɛ áyàŋ nyaka nkwɔ bɛghok Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
138 [Nnyɛ́n Ba-Jesus nɛchak nɛchi nyaka bɛ́ Ɛ́límas nɔ chi mǔnjɔ ndu ɛyɔŋ Grik.] Ɛ́límas mǔnjɔ abho bɛ́kɛm ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ bhɔ ndu yi áyàŋ bɛ́kʉ gɔ́bhanɔ ákɛ́ koŋo mbi Yesu.
139 Bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ bɛbhak nɛ Sɔ̌l anɛ nnyɛ́n ɛni nɛ́chák nɛ́chí nyaka bɛ́ Pɔ̌l. Pɔ̌l atɛp yi amɨ́k amʉɛt,
1310 arɛm bɛ, “Wɔ mmɔ̌ Satan! Wɔ mmu ɔ́pábhɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi chak bɛsí Mandɛm. Wɔ mmu bapu ájwí wɔ́ mɛniɛ. Ɔpú rɔ bɛkʉ mbi Mandɛm anɛ achí chak ambak ŋɔ́tíŋɔ́tí?”
1311 Dɨŋɨ́ bɛ awɔ Mandɛm ákwɛn wɔ amʉɛt nɛ́nɛ. Nɛ chɔŋ amɨ́k ánɛmɛ wɔ, ɔ́kɛ́pɛrɛ kwáy bɛghɔ mbaŋ ndǔ mbɨŋɨ́ mpok. Tɛ́mté wu, nɛbháŋ nɛ́kúti yi amɨ́k ɛjuri ɛ́kwɛ́n yi bɛsí arɔbhɛ nɛmɛri nɛ́mɛ́ri ambɛbhɛ nɔkɔ mbák mmu achí anɛ ákway bɛkɛm yi awɔ ánjá yi mbi.
1312 Gɔ́bhanɔ ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fákári, anoko Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu. Ɛ́bhak yi maknkay bɛ́ghok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bátɔ̀ŋ ɛ̌ti Yesu Acha. 
1313 Pɔ̌l nɛ bo abhɛn bákɔ̀ nɛ yi bachwe ɛtɔk Pafɔs, bákɔ́ anyɛ́n anyɛ́n barɔk bágháka Pɛ́ga atú Pamfília. Jɔ̌n Mák arɔ bhɔ́ arɛ apɛtnsɛm Yerúsalɛm.
1314 Bárɔ Pɛga bárɔk ambɨ kpát báchwɔ́p Antiɔk atú Pisídia. Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt bo Israɛl, bárɔk bachwe ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí báchɔkɔ amɨk.
1315 Bápáy nɔkɔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm mbɔ ɛnyu Moses asɨ́ŋɨ́ nɛ ɛnɛ ɛ́fú ndǔ basɨŋɨ́ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ, bǒ batí ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí ɛyɔ bátó mmu bɛ ángátí bɔPɔ̌l bɛ, “Bɔ̌ma, mbák bǎbhɔŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛkway bɛfyɛ bhɛsɛ ntɨ, ghatí ká bhɛsɛ.”
1316 Pɔ̌l afate yɛ asá nɛ awɔ bɛ bo manchɔkɔ kpák. Abho yɛ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Bo Israɛl nɛ bo bɛtɔk bɛ́chák abhɛn báchày Mandɛm, ghók ká!
1317 Mandɛm bo Israɛl ayap nyaka bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ́ akʉ nnɛrɛ́kɛt bǒ bhɛsɛ áchɨk mpok báchí mankɔ amɛm ɛtɔk Íjip. Mandɛm afɛrɛ bhɔ́ ndu kɛsɛm arɛ́ nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi ɛbhɛn bɛyǎ bɛcha.
1318 Ndǔ mamiɛ́ bɛsa bɛpay, abhak nɛ bhɔ́ amɛm baso, abhɔ́ŋ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ́ nɛ bhɔ.
1319 Mpok babhɔŋɔ bɛ́chwe ɛtɔk Kánǎn akʉ mánáŋa manɛrɛ́kɛt bo tándrámɔt anɛ achi arɛ, achyɛ bo Israɛl mmɨk Kánǎn.
1320 Ndǔ mamiɛ́ ankɛm anɛ́ bɔ báchɔ́kɔ́ ɛtɔk Íjip nɛ anɛ́ báchí amɛm baso kɛ báchwe Kánǎn ábhák mbɔ mamiɛ́ bɛsa bɛbay nsɛm byo (450). Achyɛ yɛ bhɔ bataŋá manyé nɛ bɔ babhak kpátɛ ndǔ mpok Samuɛl anɛ achi nyaka ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm.
1321 Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ mpok bábhɛ́bhɛ́ yɛ Samuɛl bɛ ánchyɛ bhɔ mfɔ, Mandɛm ayap Sɔ̌l, mmɔ̌ Kish. Kish afú ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt Bɛnjamin. Sɔ̌l abhak mfɔ wap ndǔ mamiɛ́ bɛsa bɛ́pay. Kish afú nyaka ndu nnɛrɛ́kɛt Bɛnjamin.
1322 Mandɛm áfɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yi ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ, ayap Debhít bɛ ambak mfɔ wap. Mandɛm arɛm ɛ̌ti Debhít bɛ, ‘Debhít mmɔ̌ Jése, chí mmu anɛ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ maŋák nɛ yi, mmu anɛ apú nɔ́k bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ndɛ́mɛ́ yi ankʉ.’
1323 Mandɛm akʉ ɛbhárɛ́mɔ Debhít ambák Mpɛmɛ bo Israɛl bɛ́kóŋo bariɛp ami ntá bachǐmbɨ bhap. Mpɛmɛ wu chí Yesu.
1324 Jɔ̌n anáŋ ayambɨ aghátí nyaka bo Israɛl mankɛm bɛ mántɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap mámpɛtnsɛm ntá Mandɛm bɛ yi anjwiti bhɔ́, kɛ Yesu antwɔ.
1325 Ɛ́rɔ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ kɛ́kwɔ́t bɛ Jɔ̌n ánaŋa bɛtɨk ɛbhi, abhɛ́p bo bɛ, ‘Bǎkáysí bɛ́ mɛ kɛ nchí Mpɛmɛ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́twɔ kɛ? Chao! Puyɛ̌ mɛ! Ghók ka, yí átwɔ̀ mɛ ansɛm, nɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ kway mbɔ̌ŋ mmu anɛ áchoti, bɛfɛrɛ nkwɔbhánya bɛkak ɛbhi.’”
1326 Pɔ̌l apɛt arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Bɔ̌ma, bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Ábraham, nɛ beká bo bɛtɔk bɛ́chák abhɛn báchày Mandɛm, chi ntá yɛsɛ kɛ Mandɛm átó yɛ ntó ɛnɛ́n nɛ́ghàti bhɛsɛ ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ yi akway bɛpɛmɛ bhɛsɛ!
1327 Bǒ Yerusalɛm nɛ bǒbatí bhap bábhɨ́kɨ́ sɔt nyaka Yesu mbɔ Mpɛmɛ anɛ Mandɛm átó. Ɛkʉ bátáŋ yi, bakpɔt manyé yi bɛ babhɔŋ bɛway yi. Nɛ ndu bákʉ́ nɔ, ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ bárɛ́mɛ́ nyaka ɛ̌ti yi ɛ́fú tɛtɛp. Nɛ yɔ kɛ bɔ bápày nyaka yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ɛnap.
1328 Yɛ̌ndu bábhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ́ ntí anɛ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́rɛm bɛ mangway yi, bárɛm bɛ Páílet andɔ mangway Yesu.
1329 Nɛ mánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́kʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛnyu Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ́mɛ́ ɛ̌ti yi, báfɛ́rɛ yi amfǎy ɛkotákátí barɔk babhʉrɛ amɛm nnɛm ɛnɛ́n bághókó ndu sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́.
1330 Yɛ̌ nɔ, Mandɛm akʉ yi apɛtnsɛm ndu nɛpɛ́m.
1331 Nɛ ndu bɛyǎ manywɔp are bhesi bɛsí bo abhɛn bákɔ̀ nyaka nɛ yi bɛbho Gálili kpatɛ Yerúsalɛm. Bɔ́bhɔ kɛ báchí batísiɛ́ bhi ntá bo Israɛl.
1332-33 Banábas nɛ mɛ sɛ́twɔ fá bɛ́gháti beka Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ bɛ bariɛp amɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka nɛ bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ́, akʉ mɔ́ afǔ tɛtɛp ntá yɛsɛ́ bɛbhárɛ́ bhɔ́ bhap, ndu ákʉ́ Yesu apɛrɛnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Mandɛm akʉ bariɛp ɛmɔ afǔ tɛtɛp mbɔ ɛnyu ɛchi amɛm Ɛkáti Bakway, bɛbhɔ́k bɛpay bɛ Mandɛm arɛm bɛ: ‘Wɔ ɔchí Mɔ́wa, nɛ ɛchɔŋ nchí rɛm kpoŋoroŋ bɛ Nchí Ɛtayɛ.’
1334 Nɛ bɛ́yɨŋɨ nɛkʉ anɛ Mandɛm akʉ Yesu ámpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnyu ɛnɛ yi ápú pɛrɛ gú, Mandɛm arɛm nyaka bɛ́: ‘Chɔŋ nchyɛ́ bhe áfɔ́k mbɔ ɛnyu mfyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp nɛ Debhít nɛ njɛt yi nɛ ɛ́bhɔŋ bɛbhak ɛnyu ɛyɔ.’
1335 Nɛ ndu bɛ́rɔŋ ambɨ, ɛ́chí nɛbhʉɛt achák amɛm Ɛkáti Bakway bɛ Debhít arɛm ntá Mandɛm bɛ, ‘Ɔpú rɔ chɔŋ Mmu anɛ áchyɛ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛni ntá yɛ ámpɔ́ amɛm nnɛm.’
1336 Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ rɛm nyaka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn chi ɛ̌ti Mfɔ Debhít mbɔnyunɛ Debhít ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛtɨk Mandɛm áchyɛ́ yi ánkʉ́ fá amɨk ndu ayi mpok, agú akoŋo bachǐmbɨ bhi. Apɔɔ ndǔ nnɛm.
1337 Mandɛm arɛm nyaka chi ɛ̌ti mmu achák, anɛ yi ákʉ́ ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m anɛ mmʉɛt ayi abhɨkɨ pɔɔ.
1338 Bɔ̌ma dɨŋɨ́ yɛ ká bɛ́ chí ɛ̌ti Yesu kɛ Mandɛm áfòŋori bɛbʉ́ mbɔ ɛnyu sɛ́ghàti bhe.
1339 Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ánókó Yesu, Mandɛm ǎsɔ̀t bɛ yi achi chak bɛsí bhi. Ɛbhé Moses ɛ́pú kwáy bɛ́kʉ nɔ ntá mmu.
1340 Sɔt yɛka mpok bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ básɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛ́kɛ́ fakari nɛ bhe. Nɔ́ chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ básɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ,
1341 ‘Bě bho bǎbyàk ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm árɛ̀m, yɨŋɨ́ ka mbaŋ sayri, mǎmbák maknkay, nɛ mǎngu, nɛ ntí bɛ́ mɛ̌kʉ̀ ɛnyɨŋ ndu manywɔp ayɛka, ɛnɛ yɛ mángátí bhe, bǎpú noko wawak!’”
1342 Ɛnɛ Pɔ̌l nɛ Banábas báfù ndǔ ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí bo Israɛl, bo báre nɨk bɔ́ mmʉɛt bɛ́ mámpɛ́tnsɛm mandɔk ambɨ bɛghati bhɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ndu nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ɛnɛ́n nɛ́twɔ̀ ambɨ.
1343 Bo báfú nɔ́kɔ́ ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí, bɛyǎ bo Israɛl nɛ bo abhɛn bápu bo Israɛl kɛ báchày Mandɛm, báré koŋo Pɔ̌l nɛ Banábas. BɔPɔ̌l básɛ́mti bhɔ́ bɛ́ mánté kpirí, mándɔkɔ nɔkɔ chi ambɨ bɛghɔkɔ mmʉɛt ndu bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm.
1344 Ɛ́gháká nɔkɔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt ɛnɛn nɛ́kòŋo, ɛtɔk ɛnkɛm ɛ́twɔ́ bɛ́ghok Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
1345 Kɛ bo Israɛl bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ ngɛ́mtay bo báchɛ̀m arɛ́ ɛnyu ɛyɔ, bábhɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ mpabhamɨ́k nɛ bɔPɔ̌l. Bábhó bɛsɔkɔti Pɔ̌l mánkɛmɛ nɔkɔ ɛpʉ́ítí ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m.
1346 Ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ́ Pɔ̌l nɛ Banábas bábhó bɛ́rɛm kɛbhɔŋ bɛcháy bɛ, “Bě bo Israɛl kɛ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́yámbɨ bɛ́gháti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm. Kɛ tɛ̌ndu bǎbyàk yɔ́, nɛ bǎyɨ́ŋɨ mmʉɛt ayɛka bɛ́ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ kwáy bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛ́nti, sɛ́rɔ̀ yɛ be nɛ sɛ́rɔ̀ŋ ntá bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl nɛ yɔ.
1347 Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ Mandɛm Acha ághátí bhɛsɛ sɛnkʉ, mpok árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ, ‘Nkʉ wɔ ɔ́mbák ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ntá bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl, bɛ́ ndǔ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm, ɔ́nkwak mmɨk nkɛm ambɔŋ nɛpɛ́m.’”
1348 Bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, bábhɔŋ bɛyǎ maŋák, bábhó bɛ́chyɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm ɛ̌ti ɛyɔŋ ɛyi. Nɛ abhɛn Mandɛm áyábhɛ́ bɛ́ mámbɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ́n nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔ́ŋ ngwɛnti, mánoko Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu.
1349 Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛ́táka atú ɛtɔk wu ankɛm.
1350 Kɛ bo Israɛl abhɛn báchí arɛ́ mányɨ́kɨ́si batɨ bǒbatí ɛtɔk ɛyɔ nɛ manɛ́m baghɔrɛ́ abhɛn mánókó Mandɛm. Bákʉ bo báchyɛ Pɔ̌l nɛ Banábas nɛnyok kpát bábók bhɔ báfá atú ɛtɔk ɛyap.
1351 Pɔ̌l nɛ Banábas bákwɛ́t mfok ɛtɔk ɛyɔ anɛ áchí bhɔ́ bɛkak bɛtɔŋ bɛ́ chɔŋ Mandɛm antáŋ bǒbhɔ ndu ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bɔ́ bákʉ́. Báfa báré rɔ́ŋ Ikɔ́niɔm.
1352 Bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn ɛtɔk Antiɔk, bájwi nɛ maŋák nɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ abhak nɛ bhɔ́ sayri.
14
141 Pɔ̌l nɛ Banábas báchwɔ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ Ikɔ́niɔm, bárɔk báchwe ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí bo Israɛl baghati Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ Yesu arɛ. Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ abhak nɛ bhɔ. Ɛ́kʉ́ bɛyǎ bo mánóko. Bo abhɛn mánóko bábhák bo Israɛl nɛ bo bɛtɔk bɛchak.
142 Kɛ bo Israɛl abhɛn bábhɨkɨ noko mbok Yesu bábho bɛrɛm bɛpɔ̌ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ́nyɨkɨsi batɨ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl. Bárɔ́bhɛ bé chí ntɨ nɛ bhɔ.
143 Pɔ̌l nɛ Banábas babhak Ikɔ́niɔm ndu ɛrɔri mpok mángati nɔkɔ bo mbok Acha kpoŋoroŋ kɛbhɔŋ bɛcháy. Mandɛm are tɔ́ŋ bo Ikɔ́niɔm kpoŋoroŋ bɛ́ mbok anɛ bɔ́ Pɔ̌l bághàti bho ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi achí tɛtɛp, akʉ nɔ ndu áchyɛ́ bhɔ́ bɛtaŋ bɛ́kʉ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay.
144 Ɛtɔk ɛ́kɔ́rɛ bɛbhe bɛpay, mbɔk bábhak ansɛm bo Israɛl, bo báchák bábhak nɛ bǒnto Yesu.
145 Mbɔk bo Israɛl nɛ abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl báchɛ́m nɛ bǒ batí bhap báká ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt bɛ mánchyɛ bǒnto Yesu ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ bɛ mantɛmti bhɔ nɛ batay mángwáy.
146 Bǒnto bárɨŋɨ nɔ́kɔ́ nkaysi yap, bábʉɛ́ bárɔk atú Likáonia, ndu bɛtɔk Lístra nɛ Dɛ́be nɛ mbaŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi kɛkwɔt arɛ,
147 mángati nɔkɔ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu. 
148 Mmufú achí nyaka ɛtɔk Lístra. Abhak mbɛ́ntí tɛ nɛbhe ɛni.
149 Ɛwak ɛ́mɔ́t, abhak chɔ́kɔ́ anta nɔkɔ batú ndu ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Pɔ̌l árɛ̀m. Pɔ̌l ayɨŋɨ yi dǐǐ, ághɔ́ bɛ́ yí wu anókó bɛ́ Mandɛm ǎkwáy bɛ́bú yi.
1410 Pɔ̌l arɛm nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ bɛ, “Faté tě chak!” Afate kpɛrɛp abho bɛ́kɔ.
1411 Ngɛ́mtay bo abhɛn bachi arɛ bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ Pɔ̌l ákʉ́, bábhó bɛ́bɨk ndu ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛyap, ɛyɔŋ bǒ Likáonia mandɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Bɔmandɛm básɔt mmʉɛt bakwǎŋwaŋ bátwɔ fá amɨk ntá yɛsɛ!”
1412 Bárɛ́m bɛ́ Banábas chí mándɛm anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Sús, nɛ bɛ Pɔ̌l chi mándɛm anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Hɛmes mbɔnyunɛ yí kɛ achi nyaka ndɛmɛ kɛpɨ.
1413 Ɛkɛrákap mandɛm nsé Sús ɛ́chí nyaka nɛfí bɛfʉɛt nkok ɛtɔk. Nchiakap mandɛm nsé Seus asɔt manɛ́m mpɔŋ nɛ bɔchuchu abhɛn mánɨ́ arɔk antí ɛtɔk mbɔnyunɛ yí nɛ ngɛ́mtáy bhó abhɛn báchi arɛ báyàŋ nyaka bɛchyɛ akap ntá Banábas nɛ Pɔ̌l.
1414 Kɛ Banábas nɛ Pɔ̌l, bǒnto Yesu, bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bǒbhɔ báyàŋ bɛkʉ, batɨ achɔŋti bhɔ amɛm kpát bádákáti ndɛn ɛ́yap amʉɛt. Bájɛt báchwe amɛm ɛká bo ɛyɔ nɛ bǎrí mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ,
1415 “Bɔta, ndaká yi bákʉ̀ ɛnyunɛ? Sɛ́chí nkwɔ chi bakwǎŋwaŋ mbɔ bhe! Sɛ́twɔ fá bɛ́gháti bhe Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu bɛ́ mǎntɨk nsɛm ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ nsay mǎntwɔ́ ntá Mandɛm mmu áchyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m. Yí kɛ ághókó mfay nɛ mmɨk nɛ manyɛ́n nɛ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn bɛchi arɛ́.
1416 Ndu mpok anɛ áfʉɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm, arɔ́ nyaka bo bɛtɔkɔ́ mmɨk mankɛm mánkʉ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bákɔ́ŋɔ́.
1417 Yɛ̌ nɔ, abhɨkɨ rɔ nyaka bɛtɔŋ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ́ yí áchí. Ǎkʉ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ. Yí kɛ ákʉ̀ manyiɛp ámfú amfay nɛ ǎchyɛ̀ mbwɔt ndǔ ayi mpok, anchyɛ bhe nɛnyíɛ́, anchyɛ maŋák.”
1418 Pɔ̌l nɛ mmʉɛrɛ ywi bárɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kʉ̀ bo bhɔ mángɔ́ bɛ́ bɔ́ nkwɔ́ báchí chí bakwǎŋwaŋ. Yɛ̌ nɔ, bábhɨ́kɨ́ kwáy bɛchyɛt bɔ mbi bɛ́ bɛ́kɛ́ chyɛ bhɔ́ akap anɛ́ babhɔŋɔ bɛchyɛ chi ntá Mandɛm.
1419 Kɛ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, mbɔk bo Israɛl báfú Antiɔk anɛ atú Pisídia, báchák báfú Ikɔ́niɔm. Bákʉ́ bɛyǎ bo mánká nɛ bhɔ. Ɛkʉ bátɛ́mti Pɔ̌l nɛ batay, básu bárɔk bárɔ antí ɛtɔk nɛ nkaysi bɛ́ anáŋ agu.
1420 Kɛ mpok anɛ bakoŋo Yesu bárɔ́ŋɔ́ arɛ bákap yi, afate apɛtnsɛm ɛtɔk Lístra nɛ bhɔ́. Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, Banábas nɛ yi bárɔ bárɔk Dɛ́be. 
1421 Pɔ̌l nɛ Banábas báre ghati bo Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu amɛm ɛtɔk Dɛ́be. Bɛyǎ bo mánoko nɛ bábho bɛ́kóŋo Yesu. Bɔ Pɔ̌l bápɛt yɛ nsɛm Lístra nɛ Ikɔ́niɔm nɛ Antiɔk anɛ Pisídia.
1422 Báré fyɛ́ bakoŋo Yesu ntɨ mbaŋ ɛyɔ ɛnkɛm mánchyɛ nɔkɔ bhɔ́ maníɛ́ bɛ́ mándɔ́k ambɨ bɛ́te kpirí ndʉ̌ nɛsɨkɨ́ntɨ ɛnap nɛ Yesu. BɔPɔ̌l bágháti bhɔ́ bɛ bábhɔŋ bɛghɔ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri kɛ mǎnchwe ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ́n Mandɛm ǎbhák Mfɔ wap.
1423 Pɔ̌l nɛ Banábas báyap bǒ batí ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛkɛrɛ́ Mandɛm. Báfyɛ́ bhɔ́ amɔ Yesu Acha mmu bɔ́ básɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ nɛ yi ndu nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt nɛ nɛtarɛ́nsay.
1424 Báfʉɛt yɛ atú Pisídia, bárɔk atú Pamfília.
1425 Arɛ́, bágháti mbok Yesu amɛm ɛtɔk Pɛga. Báfá Pɛga basɛp bárɔk Atália.
1426 Básɔ́t achwǐnyɛ́n bɛfu Atália bápɛtnsɛm Antiɔk. Amɛm ɛtɔk Antiɔk kɛ̌ bǒnto Yesu mánɨ́kɨ́mʉɛt ɛ̌ti Banábas nɛ Pɔ̌l bɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm mɛ́mbák nɛ bhɔ ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn bákʉ́ kɛ bápɛtnsɛm Antiɔk.
1427 Báchwɔ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ Antiɔk, babhɨŋɨ Bǒ nkwɔ́ Yesu báchɛm nɛbhʉɛt amɔt. Bágháti bhɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn bɔ bákʉ́ ndu bɛtaŋ Mandɛm, nɛ ɛnyu Mandɛm ánɛ́nɛ́ mbi bɛ́ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl mánsɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ nɛ Yesu.
1428 Babhak arɛ́ nɛ bakoŋo Yesu ndǔ mpǎy bataŋ.
15
151 Bo báfú Judɛ́ya bátwɔ́ Antiɔk bábhó bɛtɔŋ bǒnkwɔ Yesu mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Mandɛm apú kway bɛ́pɛ́mɛ mmu mbák babhɨkɨ syɛp yí bɛkoŋo ɛbhé Moses.”
152 Pɔ̌l nɛ Banábas bákɛ́m ɛtaŋtí ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ bhɔ́ ɛ̌ti ndaka wu kɛghɔ́ ntí. Ɛ́kʉ baka ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt bɛ Pɔ̌l nɛ Banábas nɛ mbɔk bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn Antiɔk mándɔ́k Yerúsalɛm, mángɔ́ bǒnto nɛ bǒbati nkwɔ́ Yesu ɛ̌ti ndaka wu.
153 Bafa bare rɔŋ mbɔ ɛnyǔ nkwɔ Yesu bátó bhɔ́. Ɛnɛ́ bárɔ̀ŋ atú Foníshia nɛ atú Samária, báre téé ndǔ bɛtɔk ɛbhɛn bɛchi ambi mángati nɔkɔ bǒnkwɔ́ bɛ́ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl mánóko mbok Yesu nkwɔ. Ɛyɔ ɛ́chyɛ bakoŋo Yesu bɛyǎ maŋák.
154 Báchwɔ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ Yerúsalɛm, bǒnkwɔ, nɛ bǒnto Yesu nɛ bǒbatí ɛtɔk básɔt Pɔ̌l nɛ Banábas nɛ bo bachak nɛ maŋák. Pɔ̌l nɛ Banábas bágháti yɛ bhɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛ́n Mandɛm ákwáká bɔ mankʉ.
155 Kɛ mbɔk bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn bachi bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, báfáte babho bɛ́rɛm bɛ, “Bábhɔŋ bɛsyɛp bɔ, mángati bhɔ bɛ mámbʉrɛ bɛbhé Moses.”
156 Bǒnto Yesu nɛ bǒbatí bapɛt bachɔkɔ bɛyɨŋɨ ndaka wu.
157 Bátát nɔkɔ arɛ́ ndu bárɛ̀m ndaka wu, Píta afate aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Bɔ̌ma, bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ Mandɛm anáŋ ayap mɛ nɛ́ntɨ ɛnɛka tɛ mpok anɛ áfʉɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm bɛ́ ngati Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu ntá bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl bɛ́ bɔ́ nkwɔ́ mangok, mánoko.
158 Nɛ Mandɛm mmu arɨŋɨ batɨ bo mankɛm, atɔŋ kpóŋóróŋ bɛ́ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl bákway mɛ́nóko nkwɔ. Akʉ nɔ́ ndu áchyɛ́ bhɔ́ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu yi achyɛ nyaka bhɛsɛ.
159 Afoŋori bɛbʉ́ bhap ndu básɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ nɛ Yesu nɛ akɛ tɔ́ŋ bɛ́ bɛsɛ bo Israɛl sɛ́chí kɛkúrí nɛ bhɔ.
1510 Ntí anɛ bǎyàŋ yɛ mɛmɔ Mandɛm, bɛ́ghɔ mbák chɔŋ yi ambé ntɨ achí bɛ́ yí? Ndaká yí bǎchyɛ̀ batu anɛ yɛ̌ chi bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ babhɨkɨ kway nyaka bɛpɔkɔ ntá bo abhɛn bachi bakoŋo Yesu? Yɛ̌ chi bɛsɛ nkwɔ sɛ́bhɨkɨ kway bɛpɔkɔ batǔ yɔ.
1511 Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨ bɛkʉ nɔ! Sɛ́noko bɛ́ Mandɛm ǎpɛ̀mɛ bhɛsɛ́ chí ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhɛn Yesu Acha átɔ́ŋɔ́ bhɛsɛ́ nɛ nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyu yɔ kɛ ǎpɛ̀mɛ bɔ nkwɔ.”
1512 Píta árɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, ɛchɛmɛ ɛnkɛm ɛ́kwɛ́n kpák ndu bɛ́ghok ndu Banábas nɛ Pɔ̌l bághàti bhɔ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ́ bhɔ́ bɛtaŋ, bákʉ́ nɛntɨ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl.
1513 Mánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́rɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bárɛ̀m, Jems afate abho bɛ́rɛm bɛ, “Bɔ̌ma, ghók ká ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌rɛ̀m!
1514 Símiɔn anaŋ ághátí bhɛsɛ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm ábhó bɛtɔŋ bɛ́ akɔŋ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl nkwɔ, nɛ ayap mbɔk ɛyap bɛ mámbák bǒbhi.
1515 Nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́ ɛ́kɔ ndɔŋ amɔt nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ bárɛ́mɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu básɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ
1516 ‘Ansɛm mpok, chɔŋ mpɛtnsɛm mpɛt ntee ɛkɛt Debhít ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kwɛ́nɛ́. Chɔŋ njoŋ ɛkɛt ɛnɛ́ ɛ́báy mmʉɛt amɨk nkʉ yɔ ɛmpɛt ɛnte.
1517 Chɔŋ nkʉ nɔ bɛ bǒbhɔ mankɛm mámbo bɛyaŋ mbi bɛ́twɔ ntá ya, yɛ̌ chi bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl, mankɛm abhɛn mbɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ mámbák bǒbha nkwɔ.
1518 Nɔ kɛ Mandɛm Acha mmu akʉ bo mándɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn arɛmɛ tɛsáy.’”
1519 Jems arɔk ambɨ bɛ́rɛm bɛ, “Ndu nkaysi aya, sɛ́kɛ́pɛrɛ sɔŋɔri bǒ abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl abhɛn bátwɔ̀ ntá Mandɛm.
1520 Sɛ́nsɨ́ŋ chí ɛkáti sɛ́ngáti bhɔ bɛ bákɛ́ nyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ nya anɛ áfú ndǔ akap anɛ báchyɛ́ ntá mandɛm nsé, nɛ bɛ mándɔ ɛpúsí, nɛ bɛ bákɛ́ nyiɛ́ nya ɛnɛ́ manoŋ amap ábhɨ́kɨ́ rɔŋ amɨk, nɛ bɛ bákɛ́ nyiɛ manoŋ.
1521 Sɛ́nsɨ́ŋ bɔ́ nɔ mbɔnyunɛ bábho bɛ́pay bɛbhé Moses ɛbhɛ́n amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt bo Israɛl tɛntɛp, ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt, nɛ bo yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛtɔk bárɨŋɨ bhɔ.” 
1522 Bǒnto Yesu nɛ bǒbatí nɛ bǒnkwɔ́ Yesu mankɛm bághɔ́ bɛ́ chí ɛrɨ́tí nkaysi. Báká ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt bɛ mánjáp bo mánto Antiɔk nɛ Pɔ̌l nɛ Banábas. Báyáp yɛ Sáilas nɛ Júdas anɛ nnyɛ́n ɛni nɛ́chák nɛ́chí bɛ Básabas. Bɔ batí apay bábhak bǒbatí nkwɔ Yesu.
1523 Ɛkáti ɛnɛ́ báchyɛ́ bhɔ́ mándɔ́k nɛ yɔ ɛ́ré rɛm bɛ, “Bɛsɛ́ bǒnto Yesu nɛ bǒbatí nɛ bǒnkwɔ́ Yesu mankɛm sɛ́kàka be bɔ̌máyɛsɛ abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl awu Antiɔk, nɛ abhɛn Síria nɛ abhɛn Silísha.
1524 Sɛ́ghok bɛ mbɔk bo báfu fá ntá yɛsɛ́ batwɔ awu nɛ nɛtɔ́ŋ ɛnap bɛ́chyɛ bhe ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ bafyɛ bhe ɛbyɔk antɨ ɛnɛ́ sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tó bhɔ́.
1525 Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ sɛ́chɔ́kɔ́, sɛkǎ ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt bɛ́ sɛ́njap bo sɛ́nto ntá yɛka nɛ abhɛn ɛkɔŋ abhɛsɛ, Pɔ̌l nɛ Banábas,
1526 bo abhɛn báká nɛwú ɛ̌ti Acha ywɛsɛ Yesu Kristo.
1527 Sɛ́tò yɛ Júdas nɛ Sáilas ntá yɛka. Mǎnaŋ mǎngáká awu chɔŋ mángati bhe bɛsí nɛ bɛsi nkúbhɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́nsɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm ɛkáti.
1528 Ɛ́chí bɛ́ sɛ́bhɔŋ nkaysi amɔt nɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ bɛ sɛ́kɛ́ chyɛ bhe batu áchák anɛ acha bɛbhé ɛbhɛn bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛbhʉrɛ.
1529 Nɔ chi bɛ bǎkɛ́ nyiɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn nɛfǔ ndʉ̌ akap anɛ́ báchíɛ ntá mandɛm nsé, nɛ bǎkɛ́ nyiɛ́ manoŋ, nɛ yɛ̌ chi nnya anɛ manoŋ ami ábhɨ́kɨ́ rɔŋ amɨk. Nɛ bɛ mǎndɔ́ ɛpúsí. Mbák mǎndɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, chɔŋ ɛ́mbak ɛrɨ́rɨ́ nɛ bhe. Mǎnchɔkɔ sayri.”
1530 Bǒbhɔ bati anwi báfa Yerúsalɛm barɔk Antiɔk. BɔPɔ̌l bábhɨ́ŋɨ nkwɔ́ Yesu báchɛ́m nɛbhʉɛt amɔt bachyɛ bhɔ ɛkáti ɛnɛ bapɔkɔ.
1531 Bápáy nɔkɔ yɔ, maníɛ́ amɛn áchi amɛm ɛ́fyɛ́ bo Antiɔk ntɨ, bábhɔŋ maŋák.
1532 Júda nɛ Sáilas babhak barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ. Bágháti bǒnkwɔ Yesu bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ ndu bɛ́fyɛ́ bhɔ́ ntɨ nɛ bɛ́kwák bɔ mántaŋ ndu nɛsɨkɨ́ntɨ ɛnap nɛ Yesu.
1533 Báchɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ arɛ́ nɛ bhɔ́ ndu mɔ́mbɨŋɨ́ mpok, bǒnkwɔ́ Yesu bátɨ́k bhɔ́, nɛ maŋák bɛ mámpɛ́tnsɛm Yerúsalɛm ntá bo abhɛn bátó bhɔ́. [Kɛ Sáilas akʉ ntɨ bɛ́rɔp Antiɔk.]
1535 Pɔ̌l nɛ Banábas bárɔp Antiɔk. Arɛ́, báre tɔ́ŋ, mángati nɔkɔ bo ɛyɔŋ Acha nɛ bɛyǎ bo báchák nkwɔ. 
1536 Ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, Pɔ̌l arɛm ntá Banábas bɛ, “Sɛ́mpɛtnsɛm ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛtɔk ɛnɛ sɛ́ghátí ɛyɔŋ Acha arɛ sɛ́ngɔ́ ndǔ bǒnkwɔ́ báchí.”
1537 Banábas are yáŋ bɛ́ mánsɔ́t Jɔ̌n Mák yí ándɔ́k nɛ bhɔ.
1538 Kɛ Pɔ̌l kɛka bɛ́ ɛ́chi sayri bɛ́sɔt yi mbɔnyunɛ arɔ́ nyaka bhɔ ɛtɔk Pamfília ɛnɛ́ bábhɨ́kɨ́rɛ naŋa bɛtɨk ɛbhap.
1539 Ɛ̌ti yɔ, Pɔ̌l nɛ Banábas bákɛ́m bɛyǎ ɛpʉ́ítí kpát akɔrɛ akwɛn nɛntɨ nap. Banábas asɔt Jɔ̌n Mák báchwe achwǐnyɛ́n, bárɔk Sáyprɔs.
1540 Kɛ Pɔ̌l ayap chi Sáilas. Bǒnkwɔ́ Yesu mánɨkmʉɛt bɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu Acha mɛ́mbak nɛ bhɔ.
1541 Pɔ̌l asɔt Sáilas bárɔk Síria nɛ Silísha ɛnɛ́ yi afyɛ́ ntɨ nta bakwɔ́ Yesu abhɛn báchí arɛ ntɨ.
16
161 Pɔ̌l nɛ Sáilas barɔk baghaka Dɛ́be nɛ bafu nɔkɔ arɛ barɔk Lístra. Nkoŋo Yesu amɔt abhak arɛ́ anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Tímɔti. Máyi abhak mmu Israɛl anɛ ánókó Yesu, kɛ aywi chí abhak mmǔ Grik.
162 Bǒnkwɔ abhɛn Lístra nɛ Ikɔ́niɔm bárɛ̀m nyaka ɛrɨrɨ ɛ̌ti Tímɔti.
163 Ɛ́kʉ́ Pɔ̌l are yaŋ bɛsɔt Tímɔti bɛ andɔk nɛ bhɔ. Akʉ yɛ básyɛ́p yi mbɔnyunɛ bo Israɛl bachi nyaka ndǔ bɛtɔk ɛbhɔ nɛ bárɨ́ŋɨ bɛ chi Tímɔti achi chi mmǔ Grik.
164 Arɔk yɛ nɛ Pɔ̌l nɛ Sáilas. Ndu bárɔ̀ŋ, mángati nɔkɔ bo ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛtɔk ɛnɛ bachwɔbhɛ arɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǒnto nɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk abhɛn bachi Yerúsalɛm bárɛ́mɛ́, nɛ mánsɛmti nɔkɔ bhɔ́ bɛ mámbʉrɛ bɛbhé ɛbhɔ sayri.
165 Ɛyɔ ɛkʉ bakwɔ Yesu bárɔk ambɨ bɛ́sɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ Yesu, nɛ mpǎy yap anjá andɔkɔ nɔkɔ chi ambɨ. 
166 Pɔ̌l nɛ Sáilas nɛ Tímɔti baghat bafʉɛt atú Frijia nɛ atú Galéshia mbɔnyunɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛ mángati bo Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm atú Esia.
167 Bágháká nɔ́kɔ́ kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ ndiɛrɛ ɛbhɨ Mísia nɛ Bitínia, báré yaŋ bɛrɔŋ atú Bitíni, kɛ Ɛfóŋó Yesu kɛka bɔ́ mándɔ́k.
168 Ɛ́kʉ́ baghat bafʉɛt atú Misia, bárɔ́k Troas.
169 Arɛ́, Pɔ̌l aghɔ́ kɛnɔ́ amɨ́k antifú nɛ bɛti ndǔ mmu Masidónia áté ánɨ̀kmʉɛt andɛm nɔkɔ ntá yi bɛ, “Twɔ́ fá Masidónia kwak bhɛsɛ!”
1610 Pɔ̌l ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ kɛnɔ́ ɛkɔ, sɛ́ká bɛ́ Mandɛm abhɨ́ŋɨ́ bhɛsɛ́ sɛ́ndɔ́k sɛ́ngátí Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ntá bǒ atú Masidónia. Tɛ́mté wu, Mmɛ Lukas nchɛm nɛ bhɔ sɛ́tóŋti mmʉɛt bɛ́rɔ́ŋ arɛ́.   
1611 Sɛ́chwe áchwi anɛ árɔ̀ŋ Troas. Sɛ́rɔk téé sɛ́gháká Samótras, ɛtɔk ɛnɛ́ nnyɛ́n nɛ́kábhɛ́. Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ ntɨnywɔp, sɛ́gháká Neápolis.
1612 Sɛ́fú nɔkɔ arɛ́, sɛkɔ amɨk sɛ́gháka Fílipi. Fílipi abhak ɛtɔk ɛgho atú Masidónia, nɛ abhak antɛn Mfɔ Rom. Sɛ́bhak Fílipi ndu mpǎy manywɔp.
1613 Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt bo Israɛl, sɛ́fú amɛm ɛtɔk sɛ́rɔk angɔkɔnyɛ́n ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ sɛ́káysí bɛ́ bo báchɛ̀m arɛ mɛ́nɨkmʉɛt. Sɛ́chɔ́kɔ amɨk sɛ́ndɛm nɔkɔ kɛpɨ nɛ baghɔrɛ́ abhɛn báchɛ́mtí arɛ́.
1614 Ngɔrɛ́ amɔt anɛ aká nnyɛ́n bɛ Lídia afʉ́ ɛtɔk ɛgho ɛnɛ babhɨŋɨ bɛ Tiatíra. Abhak nkɔsíɛ́ ndǔ ndɛn ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chí mmʉɛt chu nɛ ɛ́yá nkáp. Ǎchyɛ nyaka Mandɛm kɛnókó. Mandɛm akʉ yi anɛnɛ ntɨ ɛni aghók sayri nɛ anoko ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Pɔ̌l árɛ̀m.
1615 Bájwiti yi nɛ *ɛfo ɛyi. Anɨk bhɛsɛ mmʉɛt arɛm bɛ, “Mbák bǎsɔt mɛ mbɔ mmǔ anɛ ánókó Yesu tɛtɛp, twɔ́ ká chɔkɔ́ ɛkɛt ɛyá.” Anyiɛrɛ bhɛsɛ́ ɛnyu ɛyɔ kpát sɛrɔk. 
1616 Ɛwak ɛ́mɔ́t, ɛnɛ́ sɛ́rɔ̀ŋ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt, sɛ́tɛ́mɛri mɔ́ngɔsɔ́ŋ anɛ áchi nsɛm. Ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́ɛbʉ ɛbhak nɛ yi ɛ́kʉ́ are rɛ́m mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɔŋɔ bɛfakari. Ɛyɔ ɛ́chyɛ̀ nyaka bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ yí bɛyǎ nkáp.
1617 Ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bhɛsɛ nɛ Pɔ̌l, abho bɛkoŋo bhɛsɛ ambɨkɨ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Bǒbhɛn chí bǒ bɛtok Mandɛm mfay! Bághàti bhe ɛnyu Mandɛm ápɛmɛ bho.”
1618 Arɔk ambɨ bɛkʉ nɔ ndǔ bɛyǎ manywɔp kpát ntɨ nɛ́bé Pɔ̌l, ayibhiri mmʉɛt asáy ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chí ngosɔ́ŋ wu amʉɛt bɛ, “Ndǔ nnyɛ́n Yesu Kristo nchí ghati wɔ bɛ ɔ́mfú yí amʉɛt.” Tɛ́mté wu ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ yɔ ɛ́rɔ́ ngɔsɔ́ŋ wu.
1619 Ndu ɛ́fákárí nɔ, bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ yi bághɔ́ bɛ mbǐ wap bɛbhɔŋ nkáp áchɔŋti. Bákɛ́m Pɔ̌l nɛ Sáilas, báya gbaka gbaka gbaka bárɔk nɛfísiɛ, bɛsí bǒbatí ɛtɔk, amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́ manyé.
1620 Bágháká nɔ́kɔ́ arɛ́ bárɛm bɛ, “Bǒbhɛn chí bo Israɛl nɛ báchyɛ̀ ɛsɔŋɔri amɛm ɛtɔk ɛyɛsɛ́.
1621 Bátɔ̀ŋ bhɛsɛ bɛpɨŋɨ́tɔk ɛbhɛ́n ɛbhé ɛyɛsɛ́ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛ sɛ́nkóŋó. Sɛ́chí bo Rom nɛ sɛ́pú kwáy bɛ́kóŋo bɛpɨŋɨ́tɔk ɛbhap.”
1622 Bɛyǎ bo abhɛn bachi arɛ bachɛm nɛ bǒ ngɔsɔ́ŋ wu bɛbhat bɔPɔ̌l barak amʉɛt. Bataŋá manyé báchyɛ́ ɛyɔŋ, báyók bɔ́ ndɛn amʉɛt nɛ bádɛ́n bɔ́ nɛ bɛkpa.
1623 Bádɛ́n nɔ́kɔ́ bhɔ́ sayri, bágʉɛ́p bhɔ́ ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ, bágháti mmu anɛ ábhàbhɛri ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ bɛ́ ánsɔ́t mpok bɛ́ bákɛ́ bʉɛ.
1624 Mbabhɛri wu ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, asɔt bhɔ́, arɔk afyɛ́ ndu mɔ́kɛt anɛ achi tɛ amɛm. Báfyɛ́ bhɔ́ bɛko bɛkak.
1625 Kɛ ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ mbɔ nɛ́ntɨ́bhɛti, Pɔ̌l nɛ Sáilas babho mɛnɨkmʉɛt mánkway nɔkɔ bakwáy ndu bɛbɨti Mandɛm, batɨ̌ bǒkɛnɔŋ bachak mángoko nɔkɔ.
1626 Bápɛ́rɛ ghɔ́ nɛnyɨkɨsí mmɨk nɛ́kwɛ́n, kpát mmɨk anɛ báté ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ arɛ́ anyɨkɨsi. Babhǐnywɔp ánɛ́nɛ ndǔ mmʉɛt yap tɛ́mté, ngɛm ɛnɛ́ báfé bǒkɛnɔŋ nɛ yɔ ɛ́káŋári ɛnkɛm, ɛ́kwɛ́nti amɨk.
1627 Mbabhɛri ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ afate. Ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ babhǐnywɔp fúfú, akaysi bɛ́ bǒkɛnɔŋ mankɛm bábʉɛ. Agwɔp akparɛnja ywi ndu bɛway mmʉɛt.
1628 Kɛ Pɔ̌l abɨk arɛm bɛ, “Ɔ́kɛ́ way mmʉɛt. Bɛsɛ́ mankɛm sɛ́chí fá!”
1629 Mbabhɛri wu arɛm bɛ́ mántwɔ́ yí nɛ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́. Bátwɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɛ yɔ́, arɔk ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ ntiɛ́t ntiɛt akwɛ́n ndǔ bɛkak Pɔ̌l nɛ Sáilas angwɛrɛ nɔkɔ nɛ bɛcháy.
1630 Asɔt yɛ bɔ́ nɛfí abhɛ́p bɔ́ bɛ́, “Bɔtá, chɔŋ nkʉ yi kɛ Mandɛm ampɛmɛ mɛ?”
1631 Bákɛ́mɛ yí bɛ, “Nokó Yesu Acha nɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm ampɛmɛ wɔ nɛ ɛfo ɛyɛ ɛnkɛm.”
1632 Bɔ Pɔ̌l bágháti yɛ yí nɛ ɛfo ɛyi Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu Acha.
1633 Nkúbhɛ́ bɛti ɛbhɔ, asɔt bhɔ́ tɛ́mté aso bɛfʉɛt ɛbhap. Pɔ̌l nɛ Sáilas bájwiti yi nɛ ɛfo ɛyi ɛnkɛm.
1634 Asɔt yɛ bɔ́ ɛkɛt ɛyi achyɛ bhɔ́ nɛnyíɛ́. Yi nɛ ɛfo ɛyi ɛnkɛm bájwi nɛ maŋák bɛ mánóko Mandɛm.
1635 Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́ bǒ batí ɛtɔk bátó bǒ mbɨ̌ŋ nkú ntá mbabhɛri ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ nɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ, “Dɔ̌ bǒbhɔ mándɔk!”
1636 Mbabhɛri ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ arɔk aghati bɔPɔ̌l bɛ, “Bǒbatí báto ɛyɔŋ bɛ ndɔ be mǎndɔ́k. Bǎkwáy yɛ bɛrɔŋ. Mǎnkɔ sayri.”
1637 Kɛ Pɔ̌l arɛm ntá bo mbɨ̌ŋ nkú bɛ, “Báway bhɛsɛ nɛ mantɛm bɛsí bho, mámɛsɛ bhɛsɛ́ ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ ɛnɛ́ bábhɨkɨ taŋ bhɛsɛ yɛ̌ndu sɛchi bǒ Rom. Nɛ́nɛ, báyàŋ sɛ́mfú sɛ́ndɔ́k bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́? Wáwák! Bɔ́ babhɔŋ bǒbatí bábhɔŋ bɛ́twɔ ndu mmʉɛt ɛyap mámfɛrɛ bhɛsɛ́.”
1638 Bǒ mbɨ̌ŋ nkú bápɛtnsɛm baghati bǒbatí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Pɔ̌l arɛmɛ nɛ bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ Pɔ̌l nɛ Sáilas báchí bǒ Rom, bɛcháy bɛkɛm bɔ.
1639 Babhɔ̌ŋ bǒbatí bárɔ́k yɛ mánɨkmʉɛt ntá Pɔ̌l nɛ Sáilas bɛ mǎmfóŋórí bhɔ́. Báfɛ́rɛ yɛ bɔPɔ̌l ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ, mánɨ́kmʉɛt ntá yap bɛ mándɔ́ ɛtɔk ɛyap.
1640 Pɔ̌l nɛ Sáilas báfú yɛ ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ, bárɔk ɛkɛt Lídia. Bátɛ́mɛri bǒnkwɔ Yesu arɛ báchíɛ bhɔ maníɛ́ nɛ báfyɛ́ bɔ́ ntɨ. Báfá yɛ ɛtɔk ɛyɔ.
17
171 BɔPɔ̌l bárɔk báfʉɛ́t bɛtɔk Amfípolis nɛ Apolónia báchwɔp ɛtɔk Tɛsalónika, nɛbhʉɛt anɛ ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí bo Israɛl ɛchi.
172 Pɔ̌l arɔk achwe amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí ɛyɔ. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak yí árɔ́ŋɔ́, ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ yí ákʉ̀ nyaka. Ndǔ bɔsɔnde barat are fyɛ́ mbok nɛ bhɔ ndu bɛkʉ bɔ mámbɔŋ nɛjwǐmɛm ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm,
173 nɛ anɛnɛ nɔkɔ nɛ antɔŋ nɔkɔ bɛ Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò, abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛghɔ ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ angú, kɛ ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Pɔ̌l are ghati bhɔ́ bɛ, “Yesu mmu nchí ghati bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti yi kɛ áchí Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò.”
174 Mbɔk ɛyap mánóko, báchɛ́m mmʉɛt nɛ Pɔ̌l. Bɛyǎ bǒ Grik abhɛn mánɨ̀kmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm bo Israɛl nɛ bɛyǎ manɛ́m baghɔrɛ́ ɛtɔk ɛyɔ mánóko nkwɔ, báchɛ́m mmʉɛt nɛ bɔPɔ̌l mbɔ bakoŋo Yesu.
175 Kɛ mbɔk bo Israɛl bábhɔŋ mpabhamɨ́k nɛ bɔPɔ̌l. Manyokoti bo abhɛn bághabhɛ ghap nɛ bákʉ bo mángʉ́ɛ́p ɛbyɔk ɛtɔk. Bárɔ́k bádákáti babhǐnywɔp báchwe amɛm ɛkɛt ɛnɛ mmu anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Jáson ndu bɛyaŋ Pɔ̌l nɛ Sáilas bɛ mánsɔt bhɔ mandɔk ndǔ nchɛmti bo abhɛn bachi nɛfí.
176 Kɛ ndǔ bábhɨkɨ ghɔ bɔPɔ̌l, báyá Jáson nɛ bǒnkwɔ́ Yesu báchák gbaka gbaka gbaka bárɔ́k ntá bǒbatí ɛtɔk nɛ bhɔ, mambɨkɨ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Bǒ abhɛn bákɔ̀ mbǎnkɛm mánchyɛ nɔkɔ ɛsɔŋɔri bátwɔ fá nkwɔ́
177 nɛ Jáson asɔt bɔ́ afyɛ́ anywɔ́p. Bɔ́ mankɛm bákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ bápú bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé mfɔ ngo anɛ Rom mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ Mfɔ achák áchí anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Yesu.”
178 Bǒbatí nɛ bǒtɔk bághók nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, batí átáka bhɔ amɛm.
179 Bákʉ Jáson nɛ bǒnkwɔ bhɔ bághɔ́kɔ nkáp ndu bɛtɔŋ bɛ bápú pɛrɛ chyɛ ɛsɔŋɔri. Bárɔ́ yɛ bɔ́ mandɔk. 
1710 Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ nɛ bɛti, bǒnkwɔ́ bátɨ́ŋ bákʉ́ Pɔ̌l nɛ Sáilas bábʉ́ɛ barɔk ɛtɔk Bɛ́roa. Arɛ́, bárɔ́k báchwé ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí bo Israɛl.
1711 Bo Israɛl abhɛn Bɛ́roa bábhɔ́ŋ ntɨ bɛghok mbok Yesu anɛ́ Pɔ̌l nɛ Sáilas bághàti bhɔ ɛ́cha abhɛn Tɛsalónika, mbɔnyunɛ básìɛpti nyaka Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm nɛ bɛyǎ ɛkwak. Báre chak Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛghɔ mbák mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Pɔ̌l átɔ̀ŋ bɛchi tɛtɛp.
1712 Ɛ́kʉ bɛyǎ-bhap mánóko Yesu Acha. *Manɛ́m baghɔrɛ́ Grik nɛ bɛyǎ babhakanɛm mánóko nkwɔ́.
1713 Kɛ bo Israɛl abhɛn Tɛsalónika bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ Pɔ̌l ǎghati Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛtɔk Bɛ́roa nkwɔ́, bárɔ́k arɛ́ mányíkɨ́si batɨ̌ bo, bɛ mánchyɛ́ bɔPɔ̌l ɛsɔŋɔri.
1714 Tɛ́mté wu, batɨ̌ bǒ nkwɔ́ Yesu bátɨ́k Pɔ̌l bɛ andɔk tɛ angɔkɔnyɛ́n, kɛ Sáilas nɛ Tímɔti bárɔ́p Bɛ́roa.
1715 Bo abhɛn bárɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ Pɔ̌l, barɔk nɛ yi kpát bágháka Atɛns. Pɔ̌l aghati yɛ bhɔ mpok anɛ bápɛ̀tnsɛm bɛ́ mángátí Sáilas nɛ Tímɔti bɛ mánjáŋ mbi mántɛmɛri yi ayak amɛm ɛtɔk Átɛns.
1716 Ɛnɛ́ Pɔ̌l ánòŋ Tímɔti nɛ Sáilas ɛtɔk Atɛns, ntɨ nɛ́ré sɔŋɔri yi amɛm bɛghɔ bɛ́ ɛtɔk ɛ́jwí nɛ bɛbhó njɔ ɛnɛ bo básɔt mbɔ bɔmandɛm.
1717 Ɛ́kʉ́ are rɔŋ ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí bo Israɛl yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔp ankɛm nɔkɔ ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ bhɔ nɛ bǒ Grik abhɛn mánóko nyaka Mandɛm nkwɔ. Ǎrɔŋ nyaka nkwɔ nɛfísiɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔp ankʉ nɔkɔ ɛnyumɔ́t nɛ bo abhɛn bátwɔ̀ árɛ́.
1718 Bǒfú bábhak abhɛn bátɔ̀ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kɔ̀ ndɔ́ŋ ámɔ́t nɛ bakoŋo Ɛpikurɔs nɛ bɔ Stɔik,   Bɔ́ nkwɔ́ bákɛ̀m nyaka ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ yi. Pɔ̌l ǎghàti nyaka bho mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti Yesu andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ́ chɔŋ bawú mámpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Ɛ́kʉ́ mbɔk ɛyap báré way Pɔ̌l mandɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ́, “Ɛchɨŋtǐ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ nkwɔ́ ǎrɛ̀m nɔ́ mbɔŋ yi?” Báchák bɛ, “Ɛ́chí mbɔ bɛ yi ǎghàti bho chí ɛ̌ti bɔmandɛm abhɛn sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ fá ɛtɔk ɛnɛ.”
1719 Básɔt Pɔ̌l barɔk Ariyopagɔs, nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bǒbatí báchɛ̀m nɔkɔ nyaka, bárɛ́m ntá yi bɛ, “Sɛ́kɔŋ bɛ́rɨŋɨ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ bɛkɔ ɛbhɛ́n ɔ́tɔ̀ŋ.
1720 Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n ɔ́rɛ̀m bɛchi maknkay ntá yɛsɛ́ nɛ sɛ́yàŋ bɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́rɛ̀m.”
1721 Báre rɛm ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ bo Atɛns nɛ mankɔ mankɛm abhɛn báchí arɛ́ bákɔŋ nyaka bɛ́chɔ́kɔ bɛghok nɛ bɛ́fyɛ mbok ɛ̌ti barak akɔ.
1722 Pɔ̌l afate yɛ ate nɛ́ntɨ́ bǒ ɛchɛmɛ́ Areopagɔs yɔ abho bɛ́rɛm bɛ, “Bǒ Atɛns, ngɔ bɛ́ bǎfyɛ́ ntí ndǔ baraká bɔmandɛm tontó.
1723 Ɛnɛ́ nchí kɔ ɛtɔk mfyɛ́ nɔkɔ amɨ́k ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎchyɛ kɛnókó mbɔ bɔmandɛm, ndɔk ngaka nɛbhʉɛ́t amɔt anɛ ɛfɛmɛ akap ɛchi, ngɔ́ ndu básɨŋ arɛ́ bɛ, ‘Ntá mandɛm anɛ bo bábhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ.’ Mandɛm anɛ nɔ bé bǎchyɛ̀ kɛnókó yɛ̌ndu bǎbhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ yí kɛ mɛ́ghàti bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti yi.
1724 Mandɛm mmu ághókó mmɨk nkɛm nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́chí arɛ́, yí kɛ áchí Acha anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm amfay nɛ fá amɨk. Apú chɔkɔ amɛm bɛkɛt ɛbhɛ́n bakwǎŋwaŋ bághókó.
1725 Nɛ nkwǎŋwaŋ apú kwáy bɛ́kʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ánchyɛ́ yí mbɔnyunɛ yi apu chɛ́p yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Yímbɔŋ kɛ áchyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m nɛ ɛ̌yú nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́chák ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu.
1726 Ayámbɨ aghókó nyaka mmǔ amɔt nɛ amʉɛt mmu wu kɛ̌ manɛrɛ́kɛrɛ́ bho ankɛm fá amɨk áfú. Ápɛ́rɛ ghoko yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nnɛrɛ́kɛt, ayambɨ abhʉrɛ nɛbhʉɛ́t anɛ bǒnɛrɛ́kɛt wu bábhàk nɛ mpok anɛ bɔ́ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́bhak arɛ́.
1727 Mandɛm akʉ ɛnyu yɔ bɛ́ bɔ́ mánjáŋ yi nɛ ndu báyàŋ yi mbɔ mmǔ anɛ ámɔ̀ nɛ amɔ́ bɛyaŋ ɛnyɨŋ amɛm ɛjuri, mánkwáy bɛrɨŋɨ yi. Kɛ sayri sayri, Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ sap nɛkɔ nɛ yɛ̌ mmu ywɛsɛ amɔt.
1728 Ɛ́chi nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ mmǔ ywɛka amɔt árɛ́mɛ́ nyaka bɛ, ‘Nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛsɛ́ nɛ́fù chi ntá yi, nɛ yí kɛ áchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ́ bɛtaŋ sɛ́kɔ̀, nɛ yí kɛ ákʉ́ bɛ sɛmbɔŋ nɛpɛ́m.’ Ɛ́chí mbɔ ɛnyǔ mbɔk batɛmɛ́ bakay bhɛka bárɛ́mɛ́ bɛ, ‘Bɛsɛ́ nkwɔ́ sɛ́chí bɔ̌ abhɛn Mandɛm.’
1729 Tɛ̌ndu sɛ́chí yɛ́ bɔ̌ Mandɛm, sɛ́kɛ́ kaysi bɛ́ Mandɛm achí mbɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mmu ákwày bɛ́sɔt gol nɛ yɛ̌ chí silbha nɛ yɛ̌ chí ntáy angoko nɛ kɛboŋ ɛki nɛ ɛka ɛyi nkwɔ.
1730 Mandɛm afɛ́rɛ́ ntí ndu mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo bákʉ́ ndǔ mpok anɛ bɔ babhɨkɨrɛ rɨŋɨ nkaysi yi. Kɛ nɛ́nɛ, ághàti bo mankɛm mbankɛm bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu antɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhi,
1731 mbɔnyunɛ abhʉ́rɛ́ nywɔp ɛnɛn yi átàŋ bǒ mankɛm ɛnyu ɛnɛ ɛchi chak. Anáŋ ayap mmu anɛ átàŋ manyé yɔ, nɛ atɔ́ŋ ɛrɨŋ bɛkʉ bǒ mmɨk mankɛm mándɨ́ŋɨ́ mmu wu, ndu ákʉ́ yi ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.”
1732 Mpok bághoko ndu Pɔ̌l árɛ̀mɛ ɛ̌ti nɛpɛrɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, mbɔk ɛyap bare yɔkɔ yi, kɛ bachak barɛm bɛ, “Sɛ́kɔŋ bɛ ɔ́mpɛt ɔ́mfʉɛ́t ɔngati bhɛsɛ ɛ̌ti nɛpɛrɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.”
1733 Pɔ̌l arɔ yɛ bɔ́ afú arɔk.
1734 Kɛ mbɔk bákóŋo yí. Bɔ́bhɔ mánóko. Dionisiɔs, mmǔ ɛchɛmɛ́ Ariyopagɔs, nɛ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Damarís nɛ bo báchák babhak ndǔ nkwɔ bho abhɛn bakoŋo Pɔ̌l.
18
181 Pɔ̌l afa Atɛns arɔk ɛtɔk Kɔrint.
182 Atɛmɛri mmu Israɛl amɔt arɛ́ anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Akwíla, mmǔ atú Pɔ́ntɔs. Ɛbhɨkɨre tat nyaka, ɛnɛ́ Akwíla nɛ ngɔrɛ́ ywi Prisíla bárɔ́ ɛtɔk Ítali mbɔnyunɛ Klaudiɔs Mfɔ Rom, achyɛ nyaka ɛyɔŋ bɛ́ bo Ju mankɛm mámfá Rom. Pɔ̌l arɔk bɛghɔ bhɔ.
183 Babhɔ̌ŋ nyaka awɔ́-bɛtɨk ámɔ́t nɛ Pɔ̌l, nɔ́ chí bɛtɨk bɛ́ghóko bɛ́tɛm nɛ ndɛn. Pɔ̌l achɔkɔ nɛ bhɔ mángoko nɔkɔ bɛ́tɛm.
184 Pɔ̌l are rɔ́ŋ ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí bo Israɛl ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt ɛnap ankɛm nɔkɔ ɛpʉiti nɛ bhɔ nɛ anu nɔkɔ bɛ bo Israɛl nɛ abhɛn Grik mánóko mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ághàti bhɔ ɛ̌ti Yesu.
185 Mpok Sáilas nɛ Tímɔti báfú atú Masidónia báchwɔ́bhɛ́ Atɛns, Pɔ̌l arɔ bɛtɨk bɛghoko bɛ́tɛm arɔbhɛ kʉ chi bɛtɨk bɛghati bo Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ndu mpok nkɛm anɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́, anu nɔkɔ bɛkʉ bo Israɛl mángɔ́ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ Yesu kɛ achí Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò.
186 Kɛ bɔ́ kɛka nɛ yi. Mánsɔkɔti nɔkɔ yi. Akwɛt ndɛn ɛ́nɛ ɛchi yi amʉɛt, arɛm bɛ, “Ntǔ bɛbʉ́ bhɛka arɔp nɛ bhe. Amɔya achi pɛ́pɛ́p. Nɛbho ɛchɔŋ ntɨ̌knsɛm ntá yɛka nɛ ndɔbhɛ rɔ́ŋ chí ntá bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl.”
187 Afa yɛ arɛ́, arɔk achɔkɔ ɛkɛt mmu amɔt anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Títiɔs Jɔ́stɔs. Jɔ́stɔs abhak mmǔ anɛ áchyɛ̀ Mandɛm kɛnókó. Ɛkɛrɛ yi ɛ́bhák kɛkwɔt nɛ ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí bo Israɛl.
188 Mmǔ amɔt abhak arɛ́ anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Kríspɔs. Abhak mǔnti ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt. Yi anoko Yesu Acha nɛ ɛfo ɛyi ɛnkɛm. Bɛyǎ bǒ Kɔrint bachak abhɛ́n bághòk nyaka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Pɔ̌l árɛ̀m mánóko nkwɔ, nɛ bájwíti bhɔ.
189 Bɛti mɛ́mɔt, Yesu Acha aghati Pɔ̌l ndǔ kɛnɔ́ amɨk anti fúú bɛ, “Ɔ́kɛ́ cháy. Dɔ́k ambɨ bɛ́gháti bo ɛ̌ti ya. Kɛ́chɔkɔ kpak.
1810 Nchí nɛ wɔ nɛ yɛ̌ mmu apú kway bɛkʉ wɔ ɛnyɨŋ. Bɛyǎ bo bachi ɛtɔk ɛnɛ abhɛn babhak chɔŋ bǒbha.”
1811 Pɔ̌l arɔk yɛ ambɨ bɛ́chɔ́kɔ ɛtɔk ɛyɔ ndu mmíɛ́ nɛ bataŋ átándát, antɔŋ nɔkɔ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
1812 Bǒ Rom bákʉ́ nɔ́kɔ́ Galío gɔ́bhanɔ atú Gris, bo Israɛl abhɛn bachi arɛ bágwɔ́t nnɛt nɛ bákɛ́m Pɔ̌l bárɔk ndu acha manyɛ́ nɛ yi.
1813 Arɛ́, bágháti Galío bɛ, “Mmǔnɛ ánù bɛkʉ bo mánchyɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ Mandɛm kɛnókó ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ ɛbhé yɛsɛ́ ɛ́pú yaŋ mmu ankʉ.”
1814 Kɛ mpok Pɔ̌l áyàŋ bɛrɛm ɛnyɨŋ bɛ́ ántáŋá mmʉɛt, Galio arɛm ntá bo Israɛl bɛ, “Bě bo Israɛl, mbɔ yí akʉ chi ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ nɛ yɛ̌ ndak abʉ́abʉ, mbʉ nkáá nɛ bhe.
1815 Kɛ tɛ̌ndu ndak anɛ achi chi ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo bárɛ̀m nɛ manyɛ́n bo nɛ bɛbhé ɛbhɛka, be babhɔŋ mǎndɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyǔ bátàŋ wu. Mpú kwáy bɛtáŋ ayɔ barak.”
1816 Galío árɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, abók bhɔ́ bɛ mámfú amɛm acha manyé.
1817 Bafu nɔkɔ, bakɛm Sɔstɛ́nes mmu anɛ achi nyaka mǔnti ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛyɔ bádɛ́n nɛfí acha manyé. Yɛ̌ nɔ, Galío akɛ fyɛ́ ntí arɛ́.
1818 Pɔ̌l apɛt atat nɛ bǒnkwɔ Yesu abhɛn Kɔrint ndǔ bɛyǎ manywɔp. Arɔ yɛ bhɔ, asɔt achwǐnyɛ́n arɔk atú Síria nɛ Prisíla nɛ Akwíla. Báchwɔ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ɛtɔk Kɛnkreya, Pɔ̌l amu ntí bɛtɔŋ bɛ ǎbhʉ́rɛ́ bariɛp amɛn yi afyɛ́ bɛsí Mandɛm.
1819 Báchwé achwi bárɔk Ɛ́fɛsɔs. Pɔ̌l arɔ Prisíla nɛ Akwíla angɔkɔnyɛ́n arɔk achwe amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt, are kɛ́m ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ bo Israɛl.
1820 Nkwɔ́ wap abhɛn mánóko bárɛm bɛ Pɔ̌l ántát nɛ bhɔ kɛ yi kɛka.
1821 Pɔ̌l arɛm chi bɛ, “Mbák chí nkaysi Mandɛm chɔŋ mpɛtnsɛm fá ntá yɛka.” Arɛm nɔkɔ nɔ, arɔ bhɔ achwe áchwí bare rɔŋ.
1822 Ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ Seséria akó ɛtɔk, arɔk akaka nkwɔ́ Yesu abhɛn bachi arɛ́, asɛp arɔk Antiɔk.
1823 Átát nɔ́kɔ́ arɛ́ mpǎy manywɔp, afa are kɔ bɛtɔk nɛ bɛtɔk atú Galéshia nɛ Fríjia, amfyɛ nɔkɔ bakoŋo Yesu mankɛm ntɨ ndǔ nɛsɨkɨ́ntɨ ɛnap. 
1824 Mmu Israɛl amɔt anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Apólos atwɔ́ Ɛ́fɛsɔs. Ɛtɔk nɛbhe ɛyi ɛ́bhák Aleksándriya. Yi achí nyaka mmu anɛ árɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛrɛm kɛpɨ nɛ arɨŋɨ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm sayri.
1825 Mánaŋ bátɔŋ nyaka yí mbi Yesu Acha nɛ ághàti nyaka bo mɛnyɨŋ abhɛn bɛ́dù yi antɨ bɛghati bo ɛ̌ti Yesu nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu bɔ bɛchi. Kɛ arɨŋɨ chí nɛjwiti ɛnɛn Jɔ̌n atɔŋɔ bo.
1826 Amɛm ɛtɔk Ɛ́fɛsɔs, Apólos abho bɛ́gháti bo mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti Yesu amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt kɛbhɔ́ŋ bɛcháy. Prisíla nɛ Akwíla bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛnɛ yi ághàti bho ɛ̌ti Yesu, básɔ́t yí ɛkɛt ɛyap, mánáŋa batɔŋ yi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ́ mbi Mandɛm nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bɛchi.
1827 Apólos ákʉ ntɨ bɛ́rɔ́ŋ Akáiya. Bǒbati bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn Ɛ́fɛsɔs báfyɛ́ yi ntɨ nɛ básɨ́ŋ ɛkáti ntá bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn Akáiya bɛkʉ bɛ mánsyɛpti yi sayri. Aghaka nɔkɔ arɛ́, akwak tontó bo abhɛn Mandɛm atɔŋ bɔ bɛrɨ̌ndu nɛ mánóko.
1828 Arɛ́, are kɛm ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ bo Israɛl bɛsí bo mankɛm. Adɛbhɛ nɔkɔ bɔ amɨk ndu ɛpʉ́ítí ɛyɔ nɛ are sɔt mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛtɔŋ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ Yesu kɛ achí Mpɛmɛ anɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò.
19
191 Ɛnɛ́ Apólos áchí Kɔrint, Pɔ̌l are kɔ atú Esia. Akɔ kpát aghaka Ɛ́fɛsɔs. Atɛmɛri mpay bakoŋo Yesu arɛ́.
192 Abhɛ́p bhɔ́ bɛ, “Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ atwɔ ntá yɛka mpok mǎnókó Yesu?” Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ́ “Áe! Yɛ̌ chí bɛghok bɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ achí sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ re ghok.”
193 Pɔ̌l abhɛ́p bhɔ́ bɛ, “Ntí anɛ bájwítí yɛ nyaka bhe achi bɛ yi?” Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Chí ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Jɔ̌n ághàti bho kɛ bájwítí bhɛsɛ.”
194 Pɔ̌l abho yɛ bɛkʉ bɔ́ mánjwímɛm. Arɛm bɛ, “Jɔ̌n ǎjwìti nyaka bo bɛtɔŋ bɛ bátɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap angati nɔkɔ bo Israɛl bɛ́ bábhɔŋ mɛ́nóko mmu anɛ átwɔ̀ yi ansɛm, nɔ chi Yesu.”
195 Bǒ Ɛ́fɛsɔs bhɔ bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, báka bájwíti bhɔ mbɔ bo abhɛn mánóko Yesu Acha.
196 Pɔ̌l anyaŋa yɛ bɔ́ amɔ anti. Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ abhak nɛ bhɔ, bábho bɛrɛm bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk nyáŋá nyáŋá ɛbhɛ́n bɔ́ babhɨkɨ ghɔ́k, mándɛm nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n Mandɛm afyɛ́ bhɔ́ antɨ.
197 Bɔ mankɛm babhak mbɔ batí byo nɛ apay.
198 Pɔ̌l abhak Ɛ́fɛsɔs ndǔ bataŋ árát andɔk nɔkɔ ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt bɛghati bhɔ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm kɛbhɔŋ bɛcháy ankɛm nɔkɔ ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ bhɔ ndu áyàŋ bɛ bɔ́ mándɨ́ŋɨ́, mánoko, ɛnyǔ Mandɛm áyàŋ bɔ mambak nɛ yi mbɔ Mfɔ wap.
199 Kɛ mbɔk ɛyap báchók batú kɛnoko ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Pɔ̌l árɛ̀m. Báré rɛm chí bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti mbi Acha bɛsí bo mankɛm. Ndu bákʉ̀ nɔ Pɔ̌l asɔt bo abhɛn mánókó arɔk nɛ bhɔ́, ankɛm nɔkɔ ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ bhɔ ɛ̌ti Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm amɛm áchá Tiránɔs yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔp.
1910 Arɔk ambɨ bɛ́kʉ ɛnyuyɔ ndǔ mamiɛ́ ápay. Ɛ́kʉ bo mankɛm abhɛn báchí atú Esia, bághók Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu Acha, nɔ chi bo Israɛl nɛ abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl. 
1911 Ndǔ Pɔ̌l átɔ̀ŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm, Mandɛm achyɛ yí bɛtaŋ bɛ́kʉ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛ́n bo bábhɨkɨre ghɔ́.
1912 Ɛ́kʉ́ kpát bo babho bɛsɔt bɛbhɔ́kɔ́ ndɛn ɛbhɛn bɛ́tɛ́sɛ bɛsí nɛ nkú yi, mámbarɛ nɔkɔ amʉɛt bǒmame, nɛ bɔ́ mántaŋ nɔkɔ, nɛ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ mɛ́mfu nɔkɔ bo amʉɛt.
1913 Mpǎy bo Israɛl babhak arɛ abhɛn bákɔ̀ mánkʉ nɔkɔ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ mɛ́mfú mɛ́ndɔ́ bo abhɛn bɔ bɛsɔŋɔri. Báre mɔ bɛ́bok bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ ndu nnyɛ́n Yesu Acha nkwɔ́. Babho yɛ bɛrɛm ntá bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛ, “Ndu nnyɛ́n Yesu mmu Pɔ̌l ághàti bo ɛ̌ti yi, fú ka yi amʉɛt.”
1914 Bɔ̌ Sɛva bati tándrámɔt bare kʉ nɔ. Sɛva achi nyaka mǔngo bachiǎkap Mandɛm amɔt.
1915 Ɛwak ɛ́mɔ́t ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛghati bhɔ bɛ, “Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ Yesu, ndɨŋɨ Pɔ̌l, kɛ báchí ntɨkɨ bho?”
1916 Mmǔ anɛ ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛsɔŋɔri yí akwɛ́n bɔ́ amʉɛt arakati ndɛn ɛyap nɛ aták bɔ́ mankɛm kpát bábʉɛ́ báfú bɛbho bɛwɔ nɛ bɛfʉɛt amʉɛt.
1917 Bo abhɛn báchi Ɛ́fɛsɔs mankɛm, bo Israɛl nɛ abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ndak anɛ́ áfákárí, bɛcháy bɛ́kɛ́m bɔ́ bábhó bɛchyɛ nnyɛ́n Yesu Acha kɛnókó.
1918 Bɛyǎ bo abhɛn mánókó babho bɛfu kpoŋoroŋ mánsu nɔkɔ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bákʉ̀.
1919 Bɛyǎ bǒ abhɛn bákʉ̀ baraká mandɛm nsé, bátwɔ́ nɛ bɛkátǐ-njɔ ɛbhap mɛnkɛm básɔ́ŋ bhɔ bɛsí bo mankɛm. Nɛ mbɔ báti nyaka bhɔ ti mbʉ bɛchyɛ nkáp anɛ aghaka bɛbhɔk silbha nka bɛsa bɛpay nsɛm byo (50.000).
1920 Ɛ́kʉ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ataka mbaŋ nɛ mbaŋ, ɛndɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ nɛ bɛtaŋ. 
1921 Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fákárí nɔ́kɔ́, Pɔ̌l akʉ ntɨ ɛni bɛ́ yí abhɔŋ bɛ́fʉɛ́t atú Masidónia nɛ atú Akáiya ampɛtnsɛm Yerúsalɛm. Arɛm bɛ, “Nnáŋ ngáká arɛ́, mbɔŋ bɛrɔŋ Rom nkwɔ.”
1922 Ató yɛ bakwak abhi batí ápay, Tímɔti nɛ Ɛrástɔs, bɛ́ mándɔ́k ambɨ atú Masidónia. Yímbɔŋ arɔp ansɛm atú Esia ndu mɔ́mbɨŋɨ́ mpok.
1923 Mpok yɔ, ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ́bhó ɛtɔk Ɛ́fɛsɔs ɛ̌ti Mbi Yesu Acha.
1924 Ntɛnátɛn achí nyaka arɛ́ anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Dɛmɛ́triyɔs. Ǎsɔt nyaka Silbha ankʉ nɔkɔ bɔ̌bɛkɛrɛ́ mandɛm nsé anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Atɛ́mis. Awɔ́-bɛtɨk ɛbhi áre chyɛ̀ yí nɛ bo báchák abhɛn bákʉ̀ bhɔ bɛyǎ nsay.
1925 Dɛmɛ́triyɔs abhɨŋɨ bhɔ báchɛ́m nɛbhʉɛt amɔt, arɛm bɛ, “Bɔtá, bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ́ kɛnɛ́m ɛkɛsɛ́ kɛnkɛm kɛ́fù chí ndǔ awɔ́-bɛtɨk anɛ.
1926 Bě babhɔŋ bǎghɔ̀ nɛ bǎghòk ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ Pɔ̌l ákʉ̀, puyɛ̌ chí ndiɛrɛ fá Ɛ́fɛsɔs, kɛ atú Esia ankɛm. Akʉ bɛyǎ bo báka nɛ yi ndu yi árɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Bɔmandɛm abhɛn bo bághókó nɛ amɔ bápú bo mandɛm wáwák!’
1927 Ǎkway bɛ́chɔ́ŋti yɛ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛsɛ́ ɛbhɛn mbák sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ sɔt mpok. Ǎkway bɛkʉ nkwɔ́ bɛ́ bo bákɛ́pɛrɛ sɔt ɛkɛrákap mandɛm ngɔrɛ́ Atɛ́mis, mbɔ ɛnyɨŋ. Mbák ɛ́mfákárí nɔ, Atɛ́mis mmu áchí mandɛm ngo ywɛsɛ apú pɛrɛ bhak yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Nɛ yí kɛ̌ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu atú Esia nɛ bǒ mmɨk mankɛm báchyɛ̀ kɛnókó!”
1928 Bɔ bághók nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ nɛ Dɛmɛ́triyɔs arɛmɛ, batí átáka bɔ amɛm, bábho bɛ́bɨk mandɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Atɛ́mis, mandɛm bǒ Ɛ́fɛsɔs, chi mandɛm ngo!”
1929 Ɛbyɔk ɛ́kwɛ́n ɛtɔk Ɛ́fɛsɔs ɛnkɛm. Bo barɔk ayak bákɛ́m Gáyɔs nɛ Arístakɔs báyá, bárɔk amɛm acha ɛtɔk nɛ bhɔ́. Gáyɔs nɛ Arístakɔs babhak bǒ Masidónia abhɛn bákɔ̀ nɛ Pɔ̌l.
1930 Pɔ̌l are yáŋ bɛrɔŋ ndǔ nchɛmti-bǒ bhɔ bɛ ádɛm ɛnyɨŋ, kɛ bakoŋo Yesu kɛchyɛ yí mbi bɛ ánkʉ nɔ.
1931 Mbɔk bǒbatí ɛtɔk bábhák mamʉɛrɛ bhi. Bɔ́bhɔ bátó nkwɔ́ ɛyɔŋ mɛnɨk yi mmʉɛt bɛ akɛ sá ɛkak amɛm áchá.
1932 Ɛbyɔk ɛ́kwɛn amɛm áchá mbɔnyunɛ bɛyǎ bho bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ nyaka mbɔ̌ŋ ndak anɛ achi amɨk. Ɛbhak yɛ bɛ mbɔk bábɨ̀k mándɔkɔ nɔkɔ ɛyap ɛbhe, báchák mántaŋ mandɔkɔ nɔkɔ ɛyap.
1933 Mbɔk ɛyap bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ bo Israɛl bátó Aleksánda ambɨ, bákáysi bɛ́ yí kɛ átwɔ́ nɛ ɛsɔŋɔri, ɛ́kʉ́ Aleksánda asá áwɔ́ amfay ndu áyàŋ bɛ́rɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ ndu bɛ́táŋa mmʉɛt.
1934 Kɛ bárɨŋɨ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ achí mmu Israɛl, bápɛ́t bábho bɛwat mandɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Atɛ́mis, mandɛm anɛ bǒ Ɛ́fɛsɔs, chí mandɛm ngo!” Barɔk ambɨ bɛkʉ ɛnyuyɔ ndǔ maŋɔkɔ́ nywɔp ápáy.
1935 Nsɨŋɨ́-bɛkati anɛ ɛtɔk Ɛ́fɛsɔs anu kpát akʉ mbaŋ akwɛn. Abho yɛ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Bo Ɛ́fɛsɔs! Agha abhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ bɛ ɛtɔk Ɛ́fɛsɔs kɛ ɛ́bhàbhɛri ɛkɛrákap ɛnɛ Atɛ́mis nɛ ntay mandɛm ɛnɛn nɛ́fú amfay nɛ́kwɛ́nɛ́ fá amɨk ntá yɛsɛ?
1936 Tɛ̌ndu yɛ̌ mmu apú kwáy bɛ́táŋa mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, bǎbhɔŋ mbʉ bɛ́chɔ́kɔ chí kpák kɛchyɛ ɛsɔŋɔri.
1937 Bǎsɔt bǒbhɛn bǎtwɔ fá nɛ bhɔ ɛnɛ́ bábhɨ́kɨ́ ghɛp yɛ̌nyɨŋ amɛm ɛkɛrákap ɛyɛsɛ nɛ yɛ̌ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɛm ɛ̌ti Mandɛm aywɛsɛ
1938 Sɛ́bhɔ̌ŋ bǒ batí nɛ manywɔp anɛ bátaŋ manyé. Mbák Dɛmɛ́triɔs nɛ bǒ ɛka bábhɔŋ ndak nɛ mmu, mántwɔ́ arɛ́ nɛ wú bɛ mántáŋ.
1939 Kɛ mbák ndak áchák áchí anɛ́ bǎyàŋ bɛrɨŋɨ, chɔŋ mányurɛ wú amɛm áchá ɛtɔk ndu nywɔp ɛnɛn manyé.
1940 Nchí rɛm ɛnyunɛ́ nɛ ntí bɛ, bǎkway bɛchyɛ bhɛsɛ́ ɛsɔŋɔri bɛ́ sɛ́twɔ́ nɛ ɛbyɔk ɛtɔk ɛnyu ɛnɛ́, mbák mámbɛ́p bhɛsɛ́, sɛpu bhɔ́ŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ sɛ́rɛ̀m.”
1941 Árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, aghati bhɔ́ bɛ́ mángúrɛ́. Ɛchɛm ɛ́táka.
20
201 Ɛbyɔk ɛyɔ ɛ́máy nɔ́kɔ́ Ɛ́fɛsɔs, Pɔ̌l abhɨŋɨ bakoŋo Yesu. Arɛm kɛpɨ nɛ bhɔ́ ndu bɛ́fyɛ́ bɔ́ ntɨ. Arɔ yɛ bhɔ́ abho bɛrɔŋ atú Masidónia.
202 Ndǔ árɔ̀ŋ, are fyɛ́ bakoŋo Yesu ntɨ amɛm bɛtɔk Masidónia mɛnkɛm, kpát achwɔp ɛtɔk Gris.
203 Abhak arɛ́ ndǔ bataŋ árát. Ndu átòŋti mmʉɛt bɛ́sɔt áchwi andɔk Síria, aghók bɛ́ bo Israɛl bápà bɛ́kɛm yi. Ayibhiri ntɨ ɛni arɔbhɛ sɔt chí mbi atú Masidónia bɛ́kɔ́ amɨk ámpɛ́tnsɛm.
204 Bo abhɛn bákɔ̀ nɛ yi babhak Sopátɛ mmɔ̌ Pírɔs mmu ɛtɔk Bɛ́roa, nɛ bǒ Tɛsalónika bati apay, nɔ chi Arístakɔs nɛ Sɛkúndus, nɛ Gáyɔs mmu ɛtɔk Dɛ́be, nɛ Tímɔti, nɛ bo atú Esia bati apay, nɔ chi Tíkíkɔs nɛ Trofímɔs.
205 Ɛ́tárɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, bɔ́ bárɔ́ bhɛsɛ́   bárɔ́k ambɨ mɛnoŋ bhɛsɛ́ ɛtɔk Troas.
206 Sɛ́sɔt achwǐnyɛ́n ɛtɔk Fílipi, sɛ́ré koŋo bhɔ, mpok ɛpǎ bo Israɛl ɛnɛ́ brɛt anɛ kɛbhɔŋ yís ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́. Sɛ́kɔ́ anyɛ́n anyɛn ndǔ manywɔp átáy sɛ́tɛ́mɛri bhɔ Troas, nɛ sɛ́bhák arɛ́ ndu manywɔp tándrámɔt. 
207 Ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛ́n mbɨ ndǔ sɔ́nde, sɛ́chɔ́kɔ nɛ bǒnkwɔ́ nɛbhʉɛt amɔt ndǔ Nɛnyiɛ Ɛta. Pɔ̌l abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛ́rɔ́ betí. Ɛkʉ́ arɛm kɛpɨ nɛ bhɔ kpátɛ nɛntɨ bɛti.
208 Bɛyǎ bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́bhak ndǔ mɔ́kɛt anɛ áchí amfay anɛ bhɛsɛ́ nɛ bhɔ́ sɛ́chɛ́mɛ́ arɛ́.
209 Ɛsakámú amɔt anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Yútikɔs abhak ndǔ ɛchɨ́kɨ́ ɛnɛ nyɛ́sɛ́kɛt chɔ́kɔ́. Mɔ́kɛt anɛ sɛ́chí arɛ abhak ndǔ nɛŋɔk ɛkɛt ɛnɛn nɛjwi arat. Ndǔ Pɔ̌l árɔ̀ŋ ambɨ bɛ́gháti bhɔ mɛnyɨŋ ndǔ ɛrɔri mpok, Yútikɔs abho mɛmɔk kɛnɔ́. Ákwɛ́n nɔ́kɔ́ kɛnɔ́, amok akwɛ́n amɨk nɛfí. Bápɛ́rɛ sɛp bɛ mámpɔ́kɔ́ yi agú.
2010 Pɔ̌l asɛp yɛ amɨk akuri akɛ́m yí nɛ amɔ́ ápáy abhɛnɛ, arɛm bɛ, “Bǎkɛ́ cháy, achí nɛpɛ́m”.
2011 Pɔ̌l apɛt yɛ nsɛm amfay. Mányiɛ nɔ́kɔ́ Nɛnyiɛ́ Acha, arɛm kɛpɨ nɛ bhɔ ndǔ ɛrɔ́rí mpok tɛ̌ nywɔp nɛ́yí. Arɔ yɛ bɔ́ arɔk.
2012 Básɔt ɛsakámu wu bápɛtnsɛm anywɔ́p nɛ yí mbɨk nɛ bɛyǎ maŋák antɨ.
2013 Sɛ́yámbɨ ndu áchwí sɛnok bɛrɔŋ Asɔs. Yímbɔŋ anaŋa atɨ nyaka bɛ́kɔ́ amɨk. Sɛ́ré rɔ́ŋ nɛ́ nkaysí bɛ́ Pɔ̌l arɔbhɛ tɛmɛri bhɛsɛ́ ɛtɔk Asɔs nɛ sɛ́nsɔt yí arɛ́.
2014 Átɛ́mɛ́rí nɔ́kɔ́ bhɛsɛ Asɔs, achwe nkwɔ́ ndu áchwi anɛ sɛchi amɛm nɛ bɛsɛ́ mankɛm sɛ́rɔ́k Mitilene.
2015 Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, sɛ́rɔ́k sɛ́chwɔ́p nɛchyɛ̌nyɛ́n Kios. Nɛ́pɛ́t nɛ́yi nɔ́kɔ́, sɛ́nók sɛ́chwɔ́p Sámɔs, nɛ ndǔ ntɨnywɔp sɛ́gháka Milɛ́tɔs.
2016 Pɔ̌l anáŋ atɨ nyaka bɛ sɛ́mfʉɛt kɛte Ɛ́fɛsɔs, mbɔnyunɛ abhɨkɨ yáŋ nyaka bɛ sɛ́nchɔ́ŋti mpok atú Esia. Are wɛ̀nɛ bɛ mbák Mandɛm ánkwák, yi ánchwɔ́p Yerúsalɛm ndǔ nywɔp Ɛpǎ Pɛntɛkɔs. 
2017 Sɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ Milɛ́tɔs, Pɔ̌l ató ɛyɔŋ bɛ bǒbatí nkwɔ Yesu abhɛn Ɛ́fɛsɔs mántɛ́mɛ́rí yi arɛ.
2018 Bátɛ́mɛ́rí nɔ́kɔ́ yi, aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Bě babhɔŋ bǎrɨŋɨ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛna nɛ́chí mpǒknkɛm anɛ mɛnchí atú Esia bɛ́bhó nywɔp ɛnɛ́n mbɨ bɛ́gháka ɛchɔŋ.
2019 Nchí kʉ nyaka bɛtɨk Yesu Acha nɛ nɛsɛptǐmʉɛt nɛnkɛm, nɛ babhɛsɛ amɨ́k ɛ̌ti mamɔ anɛ ǎtwɔ̀ ntá ya ndǔ bo Israɛl bápà bɛfyɛ mɛ ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri.
2020 Bǎrɨŋɨ ndǔ ntwɔ́ ntɔ́ŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ntá bɛká bho nɛ nkɔ nɔkɔ bɛkɛt nɛ bɛkɛt nkɛ bhɛsɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kwáy bɛkwak bhe.
2021 Nde ya batú bo Israɛl nɛ abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl bɛ́ mántɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhap mánkóŋó Mandɛm nɛ bɛ́ mámbɔ́ŋ nɛka nɛ Acha ywɛsɛ Yesu Kristo.
2022 “Nɛ́nɛ, mɛ́rɔ̀ŋ Yerúsalɛm nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ányìɛrɛ mɛ, yɛ̌ndu mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fákari chɔŋ nɛ mɛ arɛ́.
2023 Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ chí bɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ághàti mɛ bɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ nchwɔ́bhɛ́ chɔŋ bo mámfyɛ́ mɛ ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ nɛ mánchyɛ mɛ ɛsɔŋɔri.
2024 Kɛ mpú sɔt nɛpɛ́m ɛna mbɔ ɛnyɨŋ. Nchí yáŋ chí bɛ njɛt tɛndǔ ngwɛnti, nnáŋá bɛtɨk abhɛn Yesu Acha áchyɛ́ mɛ́ nkʉ. Bɛtɨk ɛbhɔ chí bɛ́gháti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhɛn Mandɛm ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ bo.
2025 “Nnáŋ nkɔ mbáŋ nɛ mbaŋ, ngáti bhe ɛnyǔ Mandɛm ábhàk nɛ bo mbɔ Mfɔ wap, nɛ nɛ́nɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ yɛ̌ mmu ywɛka amɔt apú pɛrɛ ghɔ́ mɛ.
2026 Nchí ghati yɛ bhe ɛchɔŋ bɛ́ mbák mmu ywɛka amɔt arɔp ansɛm anɛ́m ɛbhɨ amɔ aya apu arɛ.
2027 Ngátí bhé yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ́ nkaysi Mandɛm nɛ yɛ̌ ɛ́mɔ́t mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɛsɛ.
2028 Kɛ́m ká mmʉɛt sayri, mǎnkɛm bǒnkwɔ Mandɛm ankɛm nkwɔ sayri. Bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ Mandɛm asɔt manoŋ Mɔ́ywi akʉ bɔ mámbák bǒbhi. Nɛ ɛ̌ti yap kɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ákʉ́ mǎmbak bǒ batí bhap.
2029 Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ mpok ndɔ́ bhe, chɔŋ nkwɔ ɛ́nchwe nɛntɨ ɛnɛka, nɛ ɛ́pú rɔ bhe.
2030 Mpok ǎtwɔ nɛ mpok yɔ ánáŋ ánkwáy, mbɔk bǒnkwɔ báyibhiri tɛtɛp Mandɛm mándɔbhɛ rɛm chi barak anɛ ápɔ̀kɔ bho angʉrɛ ɛbhɨ kpát mánja bakoŋo Yesu bɛ mandɔbhɛ koŋo chi bhɔ.
2031 Sɔt yɛ ka mpok nɛ bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ nchí ghati nyaka bhe mɛnyɨŋ nɛ babhɛsɛ amɨ́k, njɛp nɔkɔ be batú bɛ̌ti nɛ ngósí ndǔ mamiɛ́ árát.
2032 Nɛ́nɛ, nchí fyɛ́ bhé amɔ Mandɛm nɛ nchí rɔ bhe Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi ɛnɛ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi. Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi ɛ́kwày bɛkʉ mǎngó mǎnsɛ́nɛ́, nɛ ɛkway bɛchyɛ bhe áfɔ́k anɛ́ Mandɛm ábhʉ́rɛ́ ntá bǒ abhɛn yí ákʉ́ mámbák abhi.
2033 Mpok nchí nɛ bhe, mbɨ́kɨ́ fyɛ́ amɨ́k ndǔ nkáp anɛ mmu nɛ yɛ̌ chi ndɛn ɛnɛ mmú.
2034 Bě babhɔŋ bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ́ nkʉ bɛtɨk nɛ amɔ́ya ndu bɛbhɔŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mɛ nɛ bo abhɛn mɛ̌kʉ̀ bɛtɨk Mandɛm nɛ bhɔ sɛ́chɛbhɛ.
2035 Ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm, ntɔŋ be bɛ sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛkʉ bɛtɨk bɛ sɛ́nkwák bo abhɛn mmʉɛt apu bhɔ, nɛ sɛ́kɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu Acha árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ, ‘Ɛ́rɨ̌ ntá mmu anɛ áchíɛ ɛcha mmu anɛ ásɔrɛ sɔt.’”
2036 Pɔ̌l ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́rɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m, bɔ́ mankɛm bátɛp mánɛ́n amɨk, babho mɛnɨkmʉɛt.
2037 Mankɛm bábho bɛdi kɛbhɔ mámbɛnɛ nɔkɔ yi nɛ mándiɛbhɛ nɔkɔ yi nɛkɔ bɛ, “Ɔ́nkɔ sayri.”
2038 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kpɨ́k ɛ́kʉ́ bɔ bádí kɛbhɔ tontó chi ndǔ yi ághátí bhɔ bɛ bápú pɛrɛ ghɔ yi.
21
211 Bɛsɛ́ nɛ Pɔ̌l sɛ́rɔ́ bǒbatí nkwɔ́ Ɛ́fɛsɔs. Achwi ápɔ́kɔ bhɛsɛ́ sɛ́pé sɛrɔk téé sɛ́gháká ndǔ ɛtɔk ɛnɛ nnyɛ́n nɛkabhɛ ɛnɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Kós. Nɛ́yí nɔkɔ sɛ́rɔ́k sɛ́chwɔ́p Ródes. Sɛ́fú nɔ́kɔ́ árɛ́ sɛ́rɔ́k sɛ́gháka Patara.
212 Arɛ́ sɛ́ghɔ́ áchwi áchák anɛ́ árɔ̀ŋ atú Foníshia. Sɛ́chwé sɛ́ré rɔ́ŋ.
213 Sɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ sɛ́ghɔ̀ Sáyprɔs, sɛ́rɔ́ yɛ Sáyprɔs ɛbhe awɔ́ghɔ, sɛ́fʉɛ́t bɛ́rɔ́ŋ ndǔ mmɨk Síria. Sɛ́rɔ́k sɛ́chwɔ́p Táya, nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛ́fɛ́rɛ batu.
214 Sɛ́fú amɛm áchwí sɛ́kó sɛ́rɔ́k ɛtɔk. Sɛ́ghɔ́ mpay bakoŋo Yesu arɛ, sɛ́chɔ́kɔ nɛ bhɔ́ ndǔ manywɔp tándrámɔt. Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ akʉ bɔ baghati Pɔ̌l bɛ ákɛ́mɔ bɛrɔŋ Yerúsalɛm.
215 Kɛ ndǔ ngwɛnti mpok anɛ sɛchɔkɔ nɛ bhɔ, sɛrɔ bhɔ bɛrɔŋ. Bɔ́ mankɛm, baghɔrɛ́ nɛ babhakanɛm nɛ bɔ bárɔ́k bɛ́tɨk bhɛsɛ́ kpát bágháka angɔkɔnyɛ́n. Bɛsɛ́ mankɛm sɛtɛp manɛ́n amɨk sɛ́nɨkmʉɛt, sɛ́káka batɨ.
216 Sɛ́rɔ́k yɛ sɛ́chwé amɛm áchwí, bɔ bápɛtnsɛm bɛkɛt ɛbhap.
217 Sɛ́rɔ́ yɛ Táya, áchwí ápɔ́kɔ bhɛsɛ kpát sɛ́gháka Tolemays. Sɛ́rɔ áchwí sɛ́kó ɛtɔk sɛ́káka bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn bachi arɛ, nɛ sɛbhak nɛ bhɔ́ ndǔ nywɔp nɛmɔt.
218 Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, sɛrɔ, sɛrɔk Seséria. Ngati Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm amɔt abhak arɛ́ anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Fílip. Abhak mmu amɔt ndǔ nkwɔ́ bo batí tándrámɔt abhɛn báyábhɛ́ nyaka Yerúsalɛm bɛ mánkwak nɔkɔ bǒnto. Sɛ́rɔ́k sɛchɔkɔ ɛkɛt ɛyi.
219 Fílip abhɔ́ŋ bɔ̌baghɔsɔ́ŋ batí ánwi. Bɔ́ kɛbháy manɛm. Mandɛm áchyɛ́ nyaka bhɔ akap bɛrɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n yí afyɛ́ bɔ́ antɨ.
2110 Ɛnɛ́ sɛ́náŋ sɛ́chí arɛ ndu mpǎy manywɔp, ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm amɔt anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Ágábɔs afú atú Judɛ́ya atwɔ arɛ́.
2111 Atwɔ́ ntá yɛsɛ asɔt mgbat anɛ Pɔ̌l agwɔ́t amɔ nɛ bɛkak ɛbhi yímbɔŋ arɛm bɛ, Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ arɛm bɛ, “Ɛnyunɛ́ kɛ̌ bo Israɛl bágwɔt chɔŋ mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ mgbat anɛ awu Yerúsalɛm mámfyɛ yi amɔ bo abhɛn bápu bo Israɛl.”
2112 Sɛ́ghókó nɔ́kɔ́ ndak wu, bɛsɛ́ bho sɛ́kɔ̀ nyaka nɛ yi nɛ bǒnkwɔ abhɛn bachi Seséria sɛ́nɨ́k Pɔ̌l mmʉɛt bɛ́ ákɛ́rɔŋ Yerúsalɛm.
2113 Kɛ Pɔ̌l akɛmɛ chi bɛ, “Ndaká yí bǎdì ɛnyunɛ? Bǎyɛ̀m ntɨ ɛna amɛm! Mɛnká bɛ mámfyɛ mɛ ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ, nɛ yɛ̌ chí nɛwú nká bɛgu ɛ̌ti Yesu Acha.”
2114 Nɛ ndu sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ kwáy bɛkʉ yi anjibhiri ntɨ̌ ɛni, sɛ́rɔ, sɛ́rɛm bɛ, “Ɛ́mbák mbɔ ɛnyǔ mbɔŋ Mandɛm Acha áyàŋ.”
2115 Manywɔp ayɔ áfʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, sɛ́tóŋti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛsɛ, sɛ́fá sɛbho bɛrɔŋ Yerúsalɛm.
2116 Mbɔk bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn Seséria barɔk nɛ bhɛsɛ́ básɔ́t bhɛsɛ́ ɛkɛt Násɔn mmǔ Sáyprɔs anɛ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛ́chɔ́kɔ ɛkɛt ɛyi. Násɔn áchi nyaka mmu amɔt anɛ áyámbɨ bɛbhak nkoŋo Yesu. 
2117 Mpok sɛ́chwɔ́bhɛ́ Yerúsalɛm batɨ bǒnkwɔ abhɛn bachi árɛ́ básɔ́t bhɛsɛ nɛ maŋák.
2118 Nɛ́yí nɔkɔ Pɔ̌l asɔt bhɛsɛ́ sɛ́rɔk bɛghɔ Jems. Bǒbati bǒnkwɔ bachak abhɛn Yerúsalɛm mankɛm bábhák arɛ.
2119 Pɔ̌l akaka bhɔ́ aghati bhɔ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ nɛ́ntɨ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl mpok yí ákʉ̀ bɛtɨk Mandɛm nɛntɨ nap.
2120 Bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi arɛmɛ báchyɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm. Barɛm yɛ ntá Pɔ̌l bɛ, “Manɔ́, wɔmbɔ̌ŋ ɔghɔ ndǔ bɛyǎ nká bo Israɛl mánókó Yesu, nɛ bábhʉɛt bɛfyɛ bɛtaŋ ndu bɛbhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé Moses sayri.
2121 Bo Israɛl abhɛn fá Yerúsalɛm bárɛm bɛ́ ɔ̌kɔ̀ ɔ́ngati nɔkɔ bo Israɛl mankɛm abhɛn báchí amɛm bɛtɔk bɛchak bɛ mámfɛ́rɛ́ ntí ndǔ bɛbhé Moses nɛ bɛ mándɔ bɛ́syɛ́p bɔ̌bhap, nɛ bɛ mándɔ́ bɛ́kóŋo bɛpɨŋ ɛbhɛn bachǐmbɨ bhap.
2122 Chɔŋ sɛ́nkʉ yɛ ná? Bɔ bábhɔŋ chɔŋ bɛghok bɛ wɔ ɔtwɔ!
2123 Ɔ́bhɔ̌ŋ yɛ bɛkʉ chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́ghàti wɔ. Bǒ bati anwi mányiɛ mgbá nɛ Mandɛm.
2124 Dɔ́k yɛ nɛ bhɔ amɛm ɛkɛrákap bɛ mǎnsó bɛsí nɛ Mandɛm, bɛtɔŋ bɛ nku yap amay. Wɔmbɔ̌ŋ chyɛ̌ nkáp anɛ bɔ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛchyɛ kɛ mǎmu bati yap. Chɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́nkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu andɨŋɨ bɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bárɛ̀m ɛ̌ti yɛ bɛ́pú tɛtɛp, nɛ bɛ́ ɔ̌bhʉ̀rɛ bɛbhé Moses.
2125 Mbák chi bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl, sɛ́to bɔ bɛkáti ndu bɛ́gháti bhɔ́ bɛ́ bákɛ́ nyiɛ́ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ báchyɛ́ ntá mandɛm nsé mbɔ akap. Nɛ bɛ́ bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ mɛ́nyiɛ́ manoŋ nɛ nnya anɛ manoŋ ami ábhɨ́kɨ́ rɔŋ amɨk, nɛ bɛ́ bǎkɛ́ fyɛ amɔ ndǔ barak ɛpúsí.”
2126 Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, Pɔ̌l asɔt yɛ bǒbhɔ batí anwi, bɔ́ mankɛm básó bɛsí nɛ Mandɛm. Arɔk yɛ amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm bɛkʉ bǒ batí mándɨ́ŋɨ kpoŋoroŋ nywɔp ɛnɛn nɛsǒ-bɛsí ɛnap nɛ Mandɛm nɛ́may, kɛ mánchyɛ akap ɛ̌ti yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap ndǔ nkwɔ bho bati anwi. 
2127 Manywɔp tándrámɔt anɛ Pɔ̌l afyɛ́ árɔ́p nɔ́kɔ́ kɛkwɔt mɛmay, mbɔk bo Israɛl abhɛn bafu atú Esia bághɔ́ Pɔ̌l amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm. Mányɨ́kɨ́si batɨ̌ bo bɛ mánkɛ́m Pɔ̌l, nɛ bákɛ́m yi,
2128 mámbɨk nɔkɔ bɛ, “Bo Israɛl, kwak ka bhɛsɛ́! Ghɔ́ ká mmu anɛ ákɔ̀ antɔŋ nɔkɔ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti bo bhɛsɛ́ nɛ bɛbhé Moses nɛ ɛ̌ti ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm ɛnɛ. Akʉ kpát nɛ́nɛ asɔt bǒ abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl achwe fá amɛm ɛkɛrákap ɛnɛ nɛ bhɔ. Anyɔ̌p Ɛkɛt Mandɛm nɛ ɛ́pɛt ɛpu ɛkɛrɛ́ bɛdyɛrɛ!”
2129 Bárɛ̀m nyaka ɛnyuyɔ mbɔnyunɛ mǎnáŋ nyaka bághɔ̌ Pɔ̌l nɛ Trofimɔs mmu Ɛ́fɛsɔs, amɛm ɛtɔk. Ɛkʉ basɔt bɛ Pɔ̌l achwe amɛm ɛkɛrákap nɛ yi.
2130 Ɛbyɔk ɛ́kwɛ́n yɛ ɛtɔk ɛnkɛm nɛ bo babho bɛjɛt mándɔkɔ nɔkɔ ndǔ ɛkɛrákap. Bákɛ́m Pɔ̌l baya gbaka gbaka gbaka báfú nɛ yi batɨŋ batiɛp babhǐnywɔp ɛkɛrákap.
2131 Nɛ ndu báyàŋ bɛway Pɔ̌l, ɛyɔŋ ɛ́rɔ́k ntá mǔngo batɛmɛ́ nɛnu Rom bɛ, ɛbyɔk ɛ́kwɛn amɛm ɛtɔk Yerúsalɛm ɛnkɛm.
2132 Tɛ́mté wu, asɔt batɛmɛ́ nɛnu nɛ mbɔk bǒbati bhap básɛ́p barɔk arɛ. Bo bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yí ndǔ átwɔ̀ nɛ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu, bábhɔ́t bɛdɛn Pɔ̌l.
2133 Mǔngo batɛmɛ́ nɛnu akɛ́m yi nɛ achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ́ mámfé yi nɛ ngɛm ɛpay. Abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Mmǔ-nɛ chi agha? Akʉ yi?”
2134 Bǒbhɔ bábho bɛbɨk mandɛm nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ kɛkuri kɛkuri ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ mbɔk bárɛ̀m ɛyap ɛnyu, báchák mándɛm nɔkɔ ɛyap. Ɛbyɔk ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ mǔngo batɛmɛ́ nɛnu kɛ́kɛm ntí nɛ nnɛt ndǔ ndak anɛ áfákárí. Aghati bǒbhi bɛ́ mansɔt Pɔ̌l mandɔk mamfyɛ amɛm ɛbhǎ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu.
2135 Ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ ndu nkɔ́k anɛ bɛ́chwe anywɔ́p, batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bápɔ́kɔ yi ndǔ bághɔ́ bɛ́ bɛyǎ bo abhɛn bachi arɛ babho bɛ́twɔ nɛ baraká bɛtaŋ.
2136 Bɛyǎ bǒbhɔ báre koŋo yi mándɛm nɔkɔ bɛ, “Wáy ka yi!” 
2137 Ndu ɛ́rɔ́bhɛ́ kɛ́kwɔ́t bɛ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu manchwe amɛm ɛbha, Pɔ̌l abhɛ́p mǔngo wu bɛ, “Ɛ́tá, chɔŋ ɔ́nka bɛ́ ngátí wɔ, ndak-a?” Mǔngo wu aghok nɔkɔ ndǔ yi árɛ̀m chi Grik, abhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛyɔŋɔ́ Grik-ɛ?
2138 Pú wɔ́ ɔ́chí mmu Íjip? Pú wɔ kɛ ɔkʉ bo bágʉɛ́bhɛ́ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛtɔk nɛ ɔkʉ bawǎy bho nka ɛnwi bárɔ́k nɛ wɔ amɛm baso?”
2139 Pɔ̌l akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Puyɛ̌ mɛ. Nchí mmu Israɛl, mmɔ̌ ɛtɔk Tásɔs, ɛtɔk ɛgho ɛnɛ ɛbhɔŋɔ mɛnwɔp atú Silísha. Nnɨkmʉɛt, chyɛ mɛ ɛpok ndɛm kɛpɨ ntá bo abhɛn.”
2140 Mǔngo wu akaa. Pɔ̌l ate yɛ ndǔ nkɔ́k anɛ bɛchwe anywɔ́p asá awɔ amfay bɛ bo mánkwɛn kpák. Bákwɛ́n nɔ́kɔ́ kpák, abho yɛ bɛrɛm kɛpɨ nɛ bhɔ ndǔ Híbru, ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛyap.
22
221 Pɔ̌l arɛm bɛ, “Bɔtá nɛ bɔmá, Tá ká batú mǎngok ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɛm ndu bɛ́táŋa mmʉɛt bɛsí ɛbhɛka.”
222 Bɔ́ bághók ndǔ yi árɛ̀m chí ɛyɔŋ bo Israɛl. Mbǎŋ akwɛn chák. Pɔ̌l arɔk yɛ ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ,
223 “Mɛ, nchí mmu Israɛl. Nchí mmɔ́ Tásɔs atú Silísha, kɛ ngo chí fá Yerúsalɛm amɔ ntɔŋ ngo ywɛsɛ, Gamáliɛl. Ngɔk ɛkáti chi antɛn ɛyi. Atɔ́ŋ mɛ bɛkoŋo bɛbhé bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́bhak nɛ nchyɛ́ mmʉɛt bɛkoŋo Mandɛm mbɔ be mankɛm abhɛn bǎchí fá ɛchɔŋ.
224 Nchí chyɛ nyaka nɛnyok ntá bo abhɛn bákòŋo Mbi Yesu wu kpát mbɔk mángu nɔkɔ, nɛ ńkɛ́mti nɔkɔ baghɔrɛ́ nɛ babhakanɛm mámfyɛ nɔkɔ bhɔ́ ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ.
225 Mǔngo bachiǎkap nɛ bǒ ɛchɛmɛ́ bǒ batí ɛtɔk bákwày bɛ́te mɛ ntísiɛ bɛ́ nchí kʉ nyaka ɛnyu yɔ. Ntá yap kɛ nchi nsɔt nyaka bɛkáti ndu bɛrɔŋ ntá batɨ̌ bo Israɛl abhɛn Damáskɔs. Mbɔ̌ŋ bɛtaŋ bɛ́kɛ́mti bakoŋo Yesu arɛ́ bɛ mpɛ́tnsɛm Yerúsalɛm nɛ bhɔ́ mánchyɛ́ bɔ́ ntɛ́msí. 
226 “Ndǔ nchí rɔŋ, ngáká nɔ́kɔ́ kɛ́kwɔ́t ɛtɔk Damáskɔs, mbɔ nkárɛ́nká byó nɛ ɛpay nɛ ngósí, ɛtaŋtí bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ bɛ́fú amfay tɛ́mchok bɛ́kwɛ́n bɛkap mɛ, mbaŋ aghɔ tontó.
227 Ɛ́kʉ́ nkwɛ́n amɨk ngók ɛyɔŋ ndǔ ɛ́rɛ̀m ntá ya bɛ, ‘Sɔ̌l! Sɔ̌l! Ɔ́chyɛ̀ mɛ nɛnyok ndaká yí?’
228 Nkɛmɛ bɛ, ‘Acha chí wɔ agha?’ Ɛyɔŋ ɛ́kɛ́mɛ bɛ, ‘Chí mɛ Yesu Mmu Násárɛt kɛ ɔ́chyɛ̀ nɛnyok.’
229 Bǒ abhɛn nkɔ́ nɛ bhɔ́ bághɔ́ nkwɔ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ ɛbhɔ kɛ bákɛ ghók ɛyɔŋɔ́ mmu anɛ árɛ̀m kɛpɨ nɛ mɛ.
