1210 Ntá mmu amɔt Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ǎchyɛ akap bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay, ntá achák anchyɛ akap bɛghati bho mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛfu ntá Mandɛm. Ntá mmu amɔt ǎchyɛ akap bɛrɨŋɨ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ nɛ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ, ntá achák anchyɛ akap bɛrɛm bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛn yi abhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ, nɛ ntá anufú anchyɛ akap mɛ́nɛ́nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mmu arɛmɛ ndǔ ɛyɔŋ ɛtɔk ɛnɛ yi abhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ.
1211 Nkúbhɛ́ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm amɔt kɛ áchyɛ akap anɛ ankɛm. Yí ǎchyɛ akap ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu mbɔ ɛnyu yí áyàŋ. 
1212 Sɛ́rɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ nkwǎŋwaŋ abhɔŋ chí mmʉɛt amɔt, kɛ bɛ́pókómʉɛt bɛchi nyáŋá nyáŋá. Yɛ̌ndu bɛ́pókómʉɛt bɛyǎ, ndiɛrɛ mmʉɛt amɔt kɛ áchí. Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ ɛ́chí nɛ Kristo.
1213 Mbɔk yɛsɛ́ sɛ́chí bo Israɛl, báchák bápú bo Israɛl. Mbɔk yɛsɛ́ sɛ́chí basɛm, báchák bápú basɛm. Kɛ bájwítí bhɛsɛ́ mankɛm chí ndǔ bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ɛ́rɛ́ amɔt, nɛ sɛ́rɔp chí mmʉɛt amɔt mbɔ mmu amɔt.
1214 Ɛ́chí tɛtɛp bɛ́ mmʉɛt nkwǎŋwaŋ abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ chi ɛ́pókómʉɛt ɛ́mɔt. Abhɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ bɛ́pókómʉɛt.
1215 Mbák ɛkak ɛ́ndɛ́m bɛ, “Tɛ̌ndu mpú awɔ, mpú ɛ́pókómʉɛt.” Ɛyɔ ɛ́nkʉ bɛ ɛkak ɛ́kɛ́ bhak ɛ́pókómʉɛt kɛ́?
1216 Nɛ mbák atú ándɛm bɛ, “Tɛ̌ndu mpú nyɛ́sɛ́, mpú ɛpókómʉɛt”, ɛyɔ ɛ́pú kʉ bɛ́ atú ákɛ bhák ɛ́pókómʉɛt.
1217 Mbák mmʉɛt nkɛm achí chí nyɛ́sɛ́, mmu ǎkwáy bɛ́ghok mbaŋ ná? Nɛ mbák mmʉɛt nkɛm áchí chí átú, mmu ǎkwáy bɛ́ghok ɛriɛp ná?
1218 Kɛ mbɔ ɛnyu ɛ́chi, Mandɛm aghókó bɛ́pókómʉɛt mɛnkɛm, akʉ bɛ bɔ mɛ́mbak mmu amʉɛt mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi áyáŋá nyaka bɛ mɛ́mbak.
1219 Mbɔ bɛ́pókómʉɛt mɛnkɛm bɛ́chí chí ɛ́pókómʉɛt ɛ́mɔ́t, mbʉ́ mmʉɛt nkwǎŋwaŋ ǎfu fá?
1220 Kɛ mbɔ ɛnyu ɛ́chi, bɛ́pókómʉɛt bɛ́yǎ, kɛ ndiɛrɛ mmʉɛt amɔt kɛ achi.
1221 Nyɛ́sɛ́ mmu nɛ́pú kwáy bɛ́gháti awɔ́ bɛ, “Mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ɛnyɨŋ bɛ́kʉ nɛ wɔ?” Nɛ ntí apu kway bɛ́gháti bɛkak bɛ, “Mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛ́kʉ nɛ wɔ.”
1222 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛrɨŋɨ chí bɛ mmu apú kway bɛbhák nɛpɛ́m mbák mámfɛ́rɛ́ bɛ́pókómʉɛt ɛbhɛ́n bo bákáysí bɛ́ bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ mɛnwɔp yi amʉɛt.
1223 Nɛ bɛ́pókómʉɛt ɛbhɛ́n sɛ́kàysi bɛ́ bɛ́pú yɛ̌nyɨŋ, bɔ́ kɛ̌ sɛre sɔt mpok bɛ́kɛ́m. Nɛ bɛ́pókómʉɛt ɛbhɛ́n sɛ́bhɛ̀sɛ bɛ́ bo bákɛ́ ghɔ́ nɛ amɨ́k, bɔ kɛ sɛ́kɛ̀m sayri ɛncha,
1224 bɛ́pókómʉɛt ɛbhɛn bɛ́pú chyɛ mmu ntíánwɔ́p. Kɛ Mandɛm aghókó mmʉɛt yɛsɛ́ ɛnyu ɛnɛ sɛ́chyɛ̀ bɛ́pókómʉɛt ɛbhɛ́n bo bábhɔ̀ŋ ntíánwɔ́p nɛ bhɔ kɛnókó ɛ́ncha bɛ́pókómʉɛt bɛ́chák.
1225 Mandɛm aghókó mmʉɛt nkwǎŋwaŋ ɛnyu ɛyɔ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛ́pókómʉɛt ɛmbak sayri nɛ bɛ́pókómʉɛt bɛ́chák.
1226 Mbák ɛ́pókómʉɛt ɛ́mɔ́t ɛ́ghòk bɛbe, bɛ́chák mɛnkɛm bɛ́ghòk bɛbe, nɛ mbák báchyɛ̀ ɛpókómʉɛt ɛ́mɔ́t kɛnókó, bɛ́chák bɛ́bhɔŋ maŋák nɛ yɔ́.
1227 Bě bǒnkwɔ mankɛm bǎchí mmʉɛt Kristo nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ ywɛka achi ɛ́pókómʉɛt Yesu.
1228 Nɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ bo abhɛn babhɔ́ŋɔ́ akap mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu ndǔ nkwɔ bakoŋo Yesu. Bǒ mbɨ chí abhɛn yi áchyɛ́ akap bɛbhak bǒnto Yesu. Abhɛn bákòŋo chí bo abhɛn Mandɛm achyɛ akap bɛ́gháti bho mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛfu ntá yi. Abhɛn bapɛt bákòŋo chí abhɛn yi áchyɛ akap bɛ́tɔŋ bo Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm. Ǎchyɛ̀ báchák akap bɛ́kʉ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay, abhɛ́nɛ́fú anchyɛ akap bɛ́bu bǒmame, báchák akap bɛ́kwak bho. Ǎchyɛ̀ abhɛnɛfu akap bɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ bɛkɛm bo sayri. Achyɛ bachak akap bɛrɛm bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛ́n bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ.
1229 Bo mankɛm báchí bǒnto kɛ́? Bo mankɛm báchí barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ kɛ? Bo mankɛm báchí batɔŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm kɛ? Bo mankɛm bákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay kɛ?
1230 Bo mankɛm babhɔŋ akap bɛ́bu bǒmame kɛ? Bo mankɛm bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ akap bɛrɛm bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛ́n bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ kɛ? Bo mankɛm babhɔŋ akap mɛnɛnɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bárɛ́mɛ́ ndǔ bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛn babhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ kɛ?
1231 Kɛ fyɛ́ ká nti ndǔ bɛbhɔŋ akap anɛ acha achak. Nɛ́nɛ, chɔ́ŋ ntɔŋ be mbi anɛ árɨ́ áchá áchák ankɛm, bɛ mǎnkoŋo chí wu.
13
131 Yɛ̌ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛrɛm chi bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk mɛnkɛm nɛ bɛyɔŋɔ́ bɔángɛl nkwɔ, mbák mbɨ́kɨ́ kɔŋ bo, nɔ́ nchí chí mbɔ akánkáŋ nɛ njánɛ́ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́yɔ̀ŋ.
132 Nɛ yɛ̌ mbɔ́ŋ chí akap bɛ́gháti bho mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́fú ntá Mandɛm nɛ mbák ndɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm,   yɛ̌ chí mɛnyɨŋ Mandɛm ɛbhɛ́n bɛchí bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́, nɛ mbák mbɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ mɛ̌kwáy bɛ́gháti njiɛ ngo bɛ, “Fǎ fá”, amfa, kɛ nkɛ kɔŋ bo, nɔ mpú yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
133 Mbák nchyɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhá mɛnkɛm ntá bho, nchyɛ́ yɛ̌ chí mmʉɛ́t ɛya bɛ mánsɔ́ŋ, kɛ nkɛ kɔŋ bo, ɛyɔ ɛpu kwák mɛ ndǔ yɛ̌ mbi.
134 Mbák mmu akɔŋ bo, ǎbhɔŋ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ́ nɛ bhɔ, ǎtɔŋ bɔ bɛrɨ́ntɨ, apú bhɔŋ mpabhamɨ́k nɛ bhɔ, nɛ apu pányu nɛ bhɔ.
135 Mbák mmu akɔŋ bo apú yoŋ mmʉɛt, apú kʉ barak ntíánwɔ́p, apú yɨŋɨ chi ndiɛrɛ mmʉɛt yi. Apú kaysi chí ndiɛrɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛkwak yímbɔŋ, apú wakari bɛbent, apú fyɛ bo antɨ mbák bákʉ yi bɛbʉ́.
136 Mmu anɛ akɔŋ bo apú bhɔŋ maŋák mpok bákʉ́ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ, ǎbhɔŋ maŋák mpok bo bákʉ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛchí chak.
137 Mmu anɛ akɔŋ bo, apú fɛrɛ ntɨ nɛ bo abhɛn bakʉ̌ bɛbʉ́, ápú rɔ bɛ́fyɛ ntí nɛ bo mpoknkɛm, ápú rɔ bɛbhaka ntɨ bɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm ankʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛmbak sayri, nɛ ǎte kpirí ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ.
138 Ɛkɔŋ ɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti. Kɛ mbák chi akap bɛghati bho mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú nta Mandɛm, chɔŋ wu ámfʉɛt. Chɔŋ akap bɛrɛm bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛn mmu abhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ ámay nɛ anɛ́ bɛrɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ndǔ bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ áfʉɛrɛ fʉɛt nkwɔ.
139 Nɛ́nɛ, sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛnyɨŋ chí mbɔk mbɔk. Nɛ sɛ́ghàti bho mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ bhɛsɛ antɨ chí mbɔk mbɔk.
1310 Kɛ mpok anɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́jwí pɔɔt bɛ́twɔ́, chɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chí mbɔk nɛ́nɛ mɛ́may.
1311 Mpok mbʉɛ́t mandu mmɔ, nchí rɛm nyaka kɛpɨ mbɔ mǎmbɔ, nkaysi nɔkɔ barak mbɔ mǎmbɔ, ngɔ nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ mǎmbɔ. Kɛ mpok nnáŋ nchɨ́kɨ́, ndɔ baraká kɛ̌mbɔ́.
1312 Nɛ́nɛ, sɛ́ghɔ̀ mɛnyɨŋ chi bɛbhɛrí bɛ́bhɛ́rí mbɔ bɛ sɛ́yɨ̀ŋɨ chí ɛ́kírísú ɛnɛ ɛchí bɛbhɛrí bɛ́bhɛ́rí. Kɛ mpok yɔ ánkwáy, chɔŋ sɛ́ngɔ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ sayri nɛ amɨ́k. Nɛ́nɛ, ndɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛnyɨŋ chí mbɔk mbɔk, kɛ mpok yɔ ánkwáy, chɔŋ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ sayri nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm árɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛ sayri.
1313 Mɛnyɨŋ bɛchi bɛrat ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhak mpoknkɛm. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛ́bhɛrɛ chi nɛka, nɛbhakántɨ, nɛ ɛkɔŋ. Kɛ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛrat, ɛnɛ ɛcha bɛchak mɛnkɛm chi ɛkɔŋ.
14
141 Fiɛ́ ká ntí ndǔ bɛ́bhɔŋ ɛkɔŋ nɛ bho, mǎmbɔŋ bɛyǎ ɛkwak bɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ánchyɛ́ be akap, sayri sayri, akap bɛ́gháti bho mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú ntá Mandɛm.
142 Nchí rɛm nɔ mbɔnyunɛ mmu anɛ árɛ̀m bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛn yi abhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ, apú rɛm mɛnyɨŋ ntá bho, ǎrɛ̀m chi ntá Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ yɛ̌ mmu apu jwimɛm ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m. Ǎrɛ̀m chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛyɨŋɨ Mandɛm nɛ bɛchi bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́, ndǔ bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm.
143 Kɛ mmu anɛ ághàti bo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú nta Mandɛm ǎchyɛ̀ bhɔ bɛtaŋ, afyɛ́ bho ntɨ, nɛ ǎchyɛ̀ bhɔ nɛpɔptǐntɨ.
144 Mmǔ anɛ árɛ̀m bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛn yi ábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ, ǎchyɛ̀ chi mmʉɛt yi bɛtaŋ. Kɛ mmu anɛ ághàti bho Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ǎchyɛ̀ batɨ bǒnkwɔ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm.
145 Nchí yaŋ bɛ be mǎnkɛm mǎndɛm bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛn bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ, kɛ sayri sayri, nchí yaŋ mǎngati bho mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ be antɨ. Mmu anɛ árɛ̀m mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ yi antɨ achá anɛ árɛ̀m bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛn yi abhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ mbák mbɔ̌ŋ mmu akabhɛ́ bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk abhɨ́kɨ́ nɛ́nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ ɛnchyɛ bo bɛtaŋ.
146 Bɔ̌ma, mbák ntwɔ́ ntá yɛka ndɛmɛ nɔkɔ chi bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛn mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ, chɔŋ nkwak be ná? Mbɔŋ bɛkʉ mǎndɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ mɛndɨ́ŋɨ́, nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ndɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛ̌ti Mandɛm, nɛ ɛbhɛ́n yi afyɛ́ mɛ antɨ bɛ ngati bho, nɛ mbɔŋ bɛtɔŋ Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi.
147 Mbák mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nɛpɛ́m mbɔ mbaŋ bɛ́fé nɛ nɛkɨ́ŋ bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ chyɛ ɛrɨ́tí ɛyɔŋ, ná mmu ákway bɛrɨŋɨ nɛkwáy ɛnɛn báfè nɛ mbaŋ, nɛ ɛnɛ́n bákwɛ̀t?
148 Nɛ mbák mmbá nɛnu ábhɨ́kɨ́ chyɛ ɛyɔŋ sayri, agha ákway bɛrɨŋɨ bɛ chi mmbá nɛnu, antoŋti mmʉɛt bɛ́ ándɔ́k ɛbhɨ̌nɛnu?
149 Ɛ́chí ɛnyumɔt nɛ bhe. Mbák mǎndɛm ɛnyɨŋ ndǔ ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛnɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ, bo bápú kway bɛjwimɛm. Ná bɔ bákway yɛ bɛrɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bárɛ̀m? Ɛ́bhak ntá yap chi mbɔ bɛ bǎrɛ̀m kɛpɨ nɛ mbʉ́ɛ́p, nɛ́ ɛ́pú bhɔŋ ntí.
1410 Bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk bɛyǎ fá amɨk, nɛ bɛ́chí kɛkúrí kɛkúrí. Nɛ yɛ ɛ́mɔt ɛpu ɛnɛ bo abhɛn bárɛ̀m yɔ bápú ghok.
1411 Kɛ mbák mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛnɛ mmu árɛ̀m, nchí bhak chi kɛnkɔ ntá yi, yí nkwɔ ambak chí kɛnkɔ ntá ya.
1412 Nchí ghati yɛ bhe bɛ, tɛ̌ndu bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛyǎ ɛkwak bɛbhɔŋ akap anɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm áchyɛ̀, fyɛ́ ká ntí tontó ndǔ akap anɛ́ ákwak bǒnkwɔ mántaŋ mandɔkɔ nɔkɔ chi ambɨ.
1413 Mmu anɛ árɛ̀m ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛnɛ yi ábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ, anɨ́kmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm ánchyɛ́ yi akap mɛ́nɛ́nɛ́ nta bho ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m ndǔ ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛnɛ yi abhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ.
1414 Nchí rɛm nɔ mbɔnyunɛ mbák nchí nɨkmʉɛt ndǔ ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛnɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ, ɛfóŋó ɛya kɛ ɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt ɛnɛ́, ndǔ nkaysi ya, mpú jwimɛm ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ́rɛ̀m.
1415 Chɔŋ nkʉ yɛ yi? Chɔŋ nnɨ́k nɔkɔ mmʉɛt nɛ ɛfóŋó ɛya nɛ nnɨkmʉɛt nɛ nkaysi ya nkwɔ. Chɔŋ nkway nɔkɔ bakway nɛ ɛfóŋó ɛya nɛ nkwáy nɔkɔ nɛ nkaysi ya nkwɔ́.
1416 Mbák ɛ́pú nɔ, mbák mmu ywɛka ǎnɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛchyɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm ndu ɛfóŋó, ná mmu anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m ǎkway bɛka bɛ, “Amen” ɛnɛ́ yi ábhɨ́kɨ́ jwimɛm?
1417 Yɛ̌ mmu ánchyɛ chyɛ́ ɛrɨ́tí bakak ntá Mandɛm, nɛnɨkímʉɛt ɛnɔ nɛ́pú chyɛ mmu achak bɛtaŋ.
1418 Nkáká Mandɛm bɛ, ndǔ bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ, ndɛm bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛn mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ncha bhe mankɛm.
1419 Yɛ̌ nɔ, ndǔ nchɛmti bǒnkwɔ, ɛrɨ ntá ya, bɛghati bho mɛnyɨŋ nɛ bɛyɔŋ bɛtay ɛbhɛn bo bághòk mánjwimɛm, ɛcha bɛrɛm mɛnyɨŋ nɛ bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛya bɛcha nka byo ndǔ ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛnɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ.
1420 Bɔ̌ma bǎkɛ́ bhak mǎmbɔ ndǔ nkaysi yɛka. Bák ká mbɔ bɔ abhɛn babhʉɛt amɔ ndu barak bɛbʉ́, kɛ ndǔ nkaysi ayɛka bák ká bɛsɛ́nɛ́ bho.
1421 Básɨŋ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ Acha arɛm bɛ, “Chɔŋ nsɔt bǒ bɛtɔk bɛchak abhɛn bárɛ̀m bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛn bǒbha bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ndɛm kɛpɨ ntá yap. Yɛ̌ nɔ, bǒbha bápú tá chɔŋ batú bɛghok ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ́rɛ̀m.”
1422 Ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bhɛsɛ bɛ bɛrɛm kɛpɨ ndǔ bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛn bo bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ, chí ɛrɨŋ ntá bo abhɛn babhɨkɨ noko Yesu Kristo, puyɛ̌ ntá bo abhɛn mánóko. Kɛ akap bɛghati bho mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú ntá Mandɛm, chí ɛrɨŋ ntá bo abhɛn mánóko.
1423 Mbák Nkwɔ Kristo ankɛm achɛm ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt amɔt nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ achi amɛm ǎrɛ̀m ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛnɛ yi ábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ, kɛ ɛ́mfakari bɛ bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ akap wu nɛ bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko manchwe amɛm, bɔ́ bhɔ bapu rɛm bɛ ɛbhokori ɛ́kɛm be?
1424 Kɛ mbák bo mankɛm bárɛ̀m chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú ntá Mandɛm, nɛ mmu anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ noko Yesu Kristo, nɛ yɛ̌ chí anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn antwɔ́ anchwe, ǎghok ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎrɛm anjwimɛm anka bɛ yi achi mmǔ bɛbʉ́, nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ághókó mɛ́mbo bɛtaŋ yi.
1425 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ághókó ɛ́ghati yi kpoŋoroŋ mɛnyɨŋ bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ɛbhɛn bɛchi yi antɨ, ɛ́nkʉ yi ankwɛn bɛsí Mandɛm anchyɛ yi kɛnókó, andɛm bɛ, “Mandɛm achi nɛ be tɛtɛp!” 
1426 Bɔ̌ma, ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ yɛ bɛkʉ chi bɛ, mpok bǎchɛ́mɛ́ nɛbhʉɛt amɔt ndu mɛnɨkmʉɛt, mbák mmu amɔt achyɛ́ nɛkwáy, achak antɔ́ŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm, anɛfu andɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm akʉ yi andɨŋɨ, nɛ mbák achak andɛm kɛpɨ ndǔ ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛnɛ yi abhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ, anɛfú ánɛ́nɛ́ yɔ ndǔ ɛyɔŋɔ́mbɔŋ. Kʉ ká yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛmbak anɛ ɛchyɛ bo mankɛm bɛtaŋ ndú baraka Mandɛm.
1427 Mbák bo báchí abhɛn bárɛ̀m bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ, ɛrɨ bati apay, nɛ yɛ̌ bati arat mandɛm. Nɛ bábhɔŋ bɛrɛm mɛnyɨŋ mmǔ amɔt amɔt, nɛ mmǔ achak ambak anɛ ánɛnɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bárɛ̀m.
1428 Kɛ mbák yɛ̌ mmu apú mɛnɛnɛ ndǔ ɛyɔŋɔ́mbɔŋ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ akap wu ánchɔ́kɔ́ kpák amɛm ɛchɛmɛ Nkwɔ Kristo, andɛm nɔkɔ bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛn yi ábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ nɛ mmʉɛt yi nɛ ntá Mandɛm.
1429 Bǒbati apay, mbák ɛpu nɔ, batí arat, mándɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm aghati bhɔ, bachak mánde chak mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bárɛ̀m.
1430 Nɛ mbák Mandɛm ákʉ́ mmu anɛ achi chɔkɔ andɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ anɛ bárɛ̀m, ánkúsí kpɨ́k.
1431 Bo abhɛn bárɛ̀m mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú ntá Mandɛm bǎkway bɛkʉ nɔ amɔt amɔt bɛ bǒ mankɛm mángɔ́k ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ ɛ́mfyɛ́ bhɔ ntɨ.
1432 Bǒ abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ akap bɛrɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú ntá Mandɛm bákwáy bɛkɛm mmʉɛt manchɔkɔ kpák, bɛ mándɨ́ŋɨ́ mpok anɛ bákway bɛrɛm kɛpɨ.
1433 Mandɛm apu Mandɛm ɛbyɔk, ǎyàŋ sɛmbɔŋ chi ɛyɔŋ ɛmɔt nɛ kpák ndǔ nkwɔ yɛsɛ. Mbɔ ɛnyu ɛchí amɛm bakwɔ́ bho Mandɛm ankɛm,
1434 baghɔrɛ́ bábhɔŋ bɛchɛkɔ kpák amɛm bɛchɛmɛ bǒnkwɔ. Bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛrɛm kɛpɨ. Bábhɔŋ bɛsɛptimʉɛt mbɔ ɛnyu ɛbhé Moses ɛ́rɛ̀m.
1435 Mbák ɛnyɨŋ ɛchi ɛnɛ bɔ báyàŋ bɛrɨŋɨ, mámbɛ́p manɛ́m abhap anywɔ́p. Ɛchi ɛnyɨŋ ntíánwɔ́p ntá ngɔrɛ́ bɛrɛm kɛpɨ amɛm ɛchɛmɛ́ bǒnkwɔ.
1436 Kwae! Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛ́bho chi ntá yɛka kɛ? Kɛ chí bɛ ndiɛrɛ ntá yɛka kɛ yɔ ɛ́chwɔ́bhɛ́?
1437 Mbák mmu akáysí bɛ yi achi ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ, nɛ yɛ bɛ́ abhɔŋ akap anɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm achyɛ yi, ándɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌sɨ̀ŋ-nɛ ntá yɛka chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu Acha ághátí mɛ nsɨŋ.
1438 Mbák mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛ ɛchi ɛnyu ɛyɔ, bǎkɛ́ ka yi nkwɔ.
1439 Bɔ̌ma, bɔ́ŋ yɛ ka bɛyǎ ɛkwak bɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm ánchyɛ́ bhe akap bɛghati bho mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú ntá Mandɛm, nɛ bǎkɛ́ káŋ bo bɛ bákɛ́ rɛm bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ.
1440 Bǎbhɔŋ bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ sayri nɛ ɛbyɔk ti.
15
151 Bɔ̌ma, nchí yaŋ bɛtɨk bhe ɛ̌ti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ ngátí nyaka bhe, bǎbhʉ́rɛ yɔ antɨ nɛ bǎté kpɨrí ndu yɔ.
152 Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́-nɛ kɛ Mandɛm ásɔt bɛpɛmɛ bhe, mbák mǎndɔ́k ambɨ bɛkɛm yɔ nɛ bɛtaŋ. Mbák ɛ́pú ɛnyu ɛyɔ, nɔ mǎnókó chi ndɛ́ndɛm.
153 Nnɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌ghàti bhe mbɔ ɛnyǔ bághátí nyaka mɛ nkwɔ chi bɛ: Kristo agú nyaka ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ bhɛsɛ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ́mɛ́ nyaka bɛ chɔŋ ɛ́mfakari.
154 Bábhɛ́mɛ yi nɛ ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ manywɔp arat, Mandɛm akʉ yí apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ́mɛ́ nyaka bɛ chɔŋ ɛ́mfakari.
155 Atɔ́ŋ yɛ mmʉɛt ntá Píta nɛ, ansɛm mpok, ntá bǒnto bhi batí byo nɛ apay.
156 Atɔ́ŋ yɛ mmʉɛt ntá mpǎy bakoŋo bhi mpok amɔt. Báyá bácha bati hɔndrɛt ɛtay (500). Yɛ̌ndu mbɔk ɛyap mǎnáŋ bágú, bɛyǎ bhap bábhʉɛ́t nɛpɛ́m.
157 Abhesi yɛ ntá Jems nɛ, ansɛm mpok, ntá bǒnto mankɛm.
158 Ndǔ ngwɛnti, abhesi ntá ya nkwɔ, mmɛ mmu nchí mbɔ mmɔ̌ anɛ bábhé ndu mpok anɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhakantɨ bɛ chɔŋ mámbe yi.
159 Ndǔ nkwɔ́ bǒnto Yesu, mmɛ kɛ nchí ansɛm mankɛm, nkɛ kwáy mmu anɛ bo bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ mǔnto mbɔnyunɛ mɛ̌chyɛ̀ nyaka bǒnkwɔ Mandɛm bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri.
1510 Kɛ ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm, nchí mmu anɛ nchí ɛchɔŋ, nɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu bhi nɛ mɛ bɛ́pú nyaka ndɛ́ndɛm. Bɛ́pú nyaka ndɛ́ndɛm mbɔnyunɛ nkʉ́ bɛtɨk nchá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mǔnto achak, yɛ̌ndu ɛpu chi nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbha kɛ ndǔ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm ndǔ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi bɛchi nɛ mɛ.
1511 Ndu ɛchi nɔ, yɛ̌ chí mmɛ kɛ ngátí nyaka bhe Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́, yɛ̌ chi bǒnto báchák, bɛsɛ mankɛm sɛ́ghàti bho chi nkúbhɛ́ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ́rɛ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo, nɛ yɔ kɛ̌ be mǎnókó. 
1512 Mbák Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ sɛ́ghàti bho achí bɛ Kristo ápɛ́tnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, ná yɛ mbɔk yɛka bákway bɛrɛm bɛ bawú bapu pɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m?
1513 Mbák ɛ́chí tɛtɛp bɛ bawú bapu pɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, nɔ́ Kristo abhɨ́kɨ́ pɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
1514 Nɛ mbák Kristo abhɨ́kɨ́ pɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, nɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́gháti bhe ɛ̌ti yi bɛchi chi ndɛ́ndɛm nɛ nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ yi nɛchi chi ndɛ́ndɛm.
1515 Mbák ɛ́chí tɛtɛp bɛ bawú bapu pɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, nɔ sɛ́sè chi nsé ɛ̌ti Mandɛm, ndu sɛ́ghàti bho bɛ Mandɛm akʉ Kristo apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Mbák ɛchí tɛtɛp bɛ bawú bapu pɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, nɔ Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ Kristo ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nɛ nɔ nɛka ɛnɛsɛ nɛchi chi ndɛ́ndɛm.
1516 Ɛ́chí ɛnyu yɔ mbɔnyunɛ mbák bawú bapu pɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, nɔ Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ nyaka Kristo ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
1517 Nɛ mbák Kristo abhɨ́kɨ́ pɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, nɔ nɛka ɛnɛsɛ nɛchi chi ndɛ́ndɛm, nɛ nɔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka bɛbhʉɛt be anti.
1518 Mbɔ ɛnyu yɔ kɛ ɛchi, mbʉ bo abhɛn mánóko Kristo bǎgu mánɛ́m.
1519 Mbák ndiɛrɛ ɛ̌ti nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn fá amɨk kɛ sɛ́bháká ntɨ nɛ Kristo, nɔ ndǔ bǒ mmɨk mankɛm ɛbɛp ɛbhe yɛsɛ́ ɛcha.
1520 Kɛ ɛchí tɛtɛp bɛ Mandɛm akʉ Kristo apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ndu bɛtɔŋ bɛ chɔŋ yí ankʉ bawú mámpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
1521 Mbɔ ɛnyǔ nɛwú nɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ ntá mmu amɔt, kɛ nɛ́twɔ́ fá mmɨk, nɔ kɛ nɛpɛrɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nkwɔ nɛfʉɛrɛ ntá mmu amɔt kɛ nɛ́twɔ́.
1522 Nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǒ bágù mbɔnyunɛ bachi bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Adam, nɔ kɛ Mandɛm ákʉ chɔŋ bǒ mankɛm abhɛn bábhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo mámpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
1523 Kɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu abhɔŋ bɛpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ndǔ mpok anɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́. Kristo kɛ áyámbɨ ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Mpok yi apɛt átwɔ́ kɛ̌ bǒbhi bápɛt chɔŋ nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
1524 Mmɨk amay yɛ, Yesu Kristo ansɔt awɔ́nɛm amfǎy bɛfóŋó ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ amfǎy bho, ansɔt kɛfɔ ɛki anchyɛ ntá Mandɛm mmu achi Ɛtayi.
1525 Yesu abhɔŋ bɛkɛm kɛfɔ kpátɛ Mandɛm ankʉ bǒmpap abhi mámdɔp mbɔ ɛnɔk ɛnɛ yi anyaŋa bɛkak amfay.
1526 Mǔmpap anɛ Mandɛm ánaŋa chɔŋ ndǔ ngwɛnti chi nɛwú.
1527 Ɛ́chi mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Mandɛm afyɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ antɛn yi.” Kɛ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm bɛ́chí antɛn yi” abhɨ́kɨ́ tɔŋ bɛ Mandɛm mmu afyɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm antɛn Kristo ǎbhák nkwɔ antɛn yi.
1528 Kɛ mpok anɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm mɛ́mbak antɛn Kristo kɛ̌ mbɔŋ Mɔ́ywi afyɛ́ mmʉɛt antɛn Mandɛm, mmu afyɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ antɛn yi, bɛ Mandɛm aywǐntí ambak Mfɔ, nɛ yɛ̌ mmu achak ákɛ́ bhak mbɔ Mandɛm.
1529 Mbák bawú bápú pɛtnsɛm chɔŋ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, ntí anɛ bájwìti bho ndǔ ntí bo abhɛn bawú achi bɛ yi?
1530 Mbák bawú bápú pɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, ntí anɛ sɛ́kà nɛwú mpoknkɛm achi bɛ yi?
1531 Bɔ̌ma, nchí anyǔ nɛwú mpoknkɛm. Nchí rɛm nɔ ntá yɛka mbɔnyunɛ mɛ̌pànyu ɛ̌ti yɛka nɛ ntí bɛ bɛtɨk Yesu Kristo Acha yɛsɛ ɛbhɛn mɛ́kʉ̀ bɛ́kʉ́ bǎchi bǒbhi.
1532 Mpok nchí ɛtɔk Ɛ́fɛsɔs, mbɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ bo abhɛn báchí arɛ. Ntɨkɨ nsáy mɛ́bhɔ̀ŋ ndǔ nɛnu ɛnɛ́n mɛ́nù ɛnɛ́n nnú nɛ nnyǎbhɨ ɛyɔ mbák bawú bapu pɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m? Mbák bapu pɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, “Sɛ́nyíɛ́, sɛ́nyú, mbɔnyunɛ mandú mpok sɛ́gu.”
1533 Bǎkɛ́ rɔ bo mándwɔ bhe. “Ɔ̌kɔ̀ nɛ ngɛ́p, ɔ́ngɛ́p aghɛp.”
1534 Bɔ́ŋ nkaysi anɛ achi chak, mǎndɔ bɛbʉ́. Mbɔk ayɛka bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ Mandɛm wáwák. Nchí rɛm nɔ bɛ ntíánwɔ́p ankɛm be.
1535 Mmu akwáy bɛbhɛp bɛ, “Chɔŋ Mandɛm ankʉ bawú mámpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ná? Bápɛ̀tnsɛm nɛ ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ mmʉɛt?”
1536 Mbák mmu ámbɛ́p nɔ́, nɔ achí ɛchɨŋtɨ́mu! Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛ, mmu ámpɨ́ mbwɔt, mbák yɔ abhɨ́kɨ́ yambɨ angu, apú chak ángó?
1537 Nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mmu ápɨ́, puyɛ̌ chi nnɛrɛ́ nchwi nɛ puyɛ̌ nnɛrɛ́ mbwɔt achak, chi mɔ́nyɛsɛ nchwi, mbák ɛ́pú nɔ, mɔ́nyɛsɛ mbwɔt achák.
1538 Kɛ Mandɛm ǎchyɛ́ nyɛ́sɛ́ mbwɔt ɛnɛn bápɨ́ aywi mmʉɛt anɛ nɔ nɛ́chak, nɛ́ngo, nɛmbɔŋ mbɔ ɛnyu yi átɨ́ bɛ́ ɛ́mbák. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ mbwɔt ǎfu amik ambɔ́ŋ chí ayi ɛnyǔ mmʉɛt.
1539 Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛpɛ́m bɛbhɔŋ mmʉɛt kɛkúrí kɛkúrí. Bakwǎŋwaŋ bábhɔŋ ayap ɛnyǔ mmʉɛt, nnya ɛ́bhɔ́ŋ ɛyap ɛnyǔ mmʉɛt, kɛnɛn kɛbhɔ́ŋ ɛyap ɛnyǔ mmʉɛt, nɛ nsi ɛ́bhɔ̌ŋ ɛyap ɛnyu mmʉɛt.
1540 Mmʉɛt mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi amfǎy ɛ́chí kɛkúrí nɛ mmʉɛt mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi fá amɨk. Nɛ bɛrɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn amfay bɛ́chí kɛkúrí nɛ bɛrɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn fá amɨk.
1541 Mmok abhɔŋ ɛbhi bɛrɨ, ntaŋ ábhɔ́ŋ ɛbhi bɛrɨ, mambe ábhɔ́ŋ ɛbhap bɛrɨ, nɛ mambe ábhɔ́ŋ bɛrɨ kɛkúrí kɛkúrí.
1542 Ɛnyuyɔ kɛ ɛbhak mpok Mandɛm ákʉ bawú mámpɛ́tnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Mmʉɛ́t ngú anɛ bábhɛ́mɛ́, ǎpɔpɔ́ɔ. Kɛ mpok yi ákʉ̀ bawú mámpɛ́tnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, mmʉɛt nkwǎ ǎbhák chi anɛ ápú gu wáwák.
1543 Mpok bábhɛ̀mɛ mmu, ɛrɛnɛ yi ɛ́bɛ̀p nɛ apú bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ. Mpok Mandɛm áku bawú mámpɛ́tnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, mmʉɛt ɛyɔ ǎrɨ, ambɔ́ŋ bɛtaŋ.
1544 Mpok bábhɛ́mɛ́ mmu, bábhɛ̀mɛ mmʉɛt bǒ mmɨk. Mpok Mandɛm ákʉ bawú mámpɛ́tnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, mmu ǎbhɔ̀ŋ chi ɛnyǔ mmʉɛt ɛnɛ amfay. Mbák mmʉɛt bǒ mmɨk achi, nɔ mmʉɛt ɛnɛ amfay ɛbhɔŋ bɛbhak nkwɔ.
1545 Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́ghàti bhɛsɛ bɛ, “Adam, mmu Mandɛm áyámbɨ aghoko, achí nyaka nkwǎŋwaŋ anɛ achi nɛpɛ́m.” Kɛ Adam anɛ áfú ansɛm chí Ɛfóŋó nɛ yi ǎchyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m.
1546 Puyɛ̌ mmʉɛt anɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm áchyɛ̀ kɛ ayambɨ. Anɛ bǒ mmɨk kɛ áyámbɨ, kɛ anɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm áchyɛ̀ antwɔ chɔŋ ansɛm mpok.
1547 Mandɛm aghókó mmǔ mbɨ chí nɛ ntɔp, anɛ átwɔ́ ansɛm afú chi amfay.
1548 Bǒ mmɨk mankɛm báchí mbɔ mmu anɛ Mandɛm ághókó nɛ ntɔp, nɛ bǒ mfay mankɛm báchi mbɔ mmu anɛ áfú amfay.
1549 Nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ sɛ́chí mbɔ mmu anɛ bághókó nɛ ntɔp nɛ́nɛ, mpok ǎtwɔ̀ anɛ sɛ́bhak mbɔ mmu anɛ áfú amfay.
1550 Bɔ̌ma, nchí ghati bhe bɛ ɛnyǔ mmʉɛt ɛnɛ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛpú kway bɛbhak ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ Mandɛm achi Mfɔ arɛ, nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́gugu ɛ́pú kway bɛchɔkɔ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt amɔt nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛpu kway bɛgu wáwák.
1551 Ghók ká, nchí ghati bhe ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́chí bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ntá yɛka. Bɛsɛ́ mankɛm sɛ́pú gu chɔŋ, kɛ báyibhiri mmʉɛt ɛyɛsɛ.
1552 Chɔŋ sɛ́mbɔŋ mmʉɛt ɛkɔ tɛ́mchók, ndǔ mɔ́mbɨŋɨ mpok anɛ mmu ákiɛp amɨ́k, ndǔ mpok anɛ mmbá anɛ ngwɛnti ákwɛ́nɛ́. Mpok ɛyɔ, bawú bápɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nɛ mmʉɛt ɛnɛ ɛ́pú gu wawak; kɛ mánjibhiri bhɛsɛ abhɛn sɛchi pě tɛ́mté, sɛ́mbɔŋ mmʉɛt ɛkɔ.
1553 Ɛ́bhak ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ mmʉɛt ɛyɛsɛ ɛnɛ ɛ́pɔpɔ́ɔ ɛbhɔŋ bɛyibhiri ɛndɔp mmʉɛt ɛkɔ ɛnɛ ɛ́pú gu wáwák. Nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́gugu ɛbhɔŋ bɛyibhiri ɛndɔp chi ɛnɛ ɛ́pú gu wáwák.
1554 Mpok ɛyɔ, chɔŋ ɛ́mfakari bɛ mmʉɛt ɛyɛsɛ ɛnjibhiri ɛnyu yɔ, bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́ghati bhɛsɛ ɛ́mfú tɛtɛp. Nɔ chi bɛ, “Mámɛn nɛwú. Básɔt awɔ́nɛm amfǎy nɛwú ndak amay.”
1555 Nɛwú, bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛ amfay nɛpɛ́m bɛchi fá? Bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn ɔ́sɔ̀t bɛsak bho bɛ́chí fá?
1556 Bɛbʉ́ kɛ bɛ́chyɛ̀ nɛwú bɛtaŋ. Bɛbhé Mandɛm kɛ bɛ́chyɛ̀ bɛbʉ́ bɛtaŋ.
1557 Kɛ sɛ́nkáká Mandɛm bɛ achyɛ́ bhɛsɛ awɔ́nɛm amfǎy bɛbʉ́ ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu Kristo Acha ywɛsɛ ákʉ́.
1558 Bɔ̌ma, abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, ndǔ ɛ́chí nɔ, tě yɛ ka kpirí, kɛ́ fɛrɛ amɔ́. Dɔ́k ká ambɨ bɛkʉ bɛtɨk Acha nɛ batɨ yɛka ankɛm mpoknkɛm, tɛ̌ndu bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ bɛtɨk Yesu Kristo Acha ɛbhɛn bǎkʉ̀ bɛpu nɛm ndɛ́ndɛm.
16
161 Bɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ nkáp anɛ bǎchwɔ̀p ndu bɛkwak bo Mandɛm, bǎbhɔŋ bɛkʉ mbɔ ɛnyu ngátí bǒnkwɔ abhɛn atú Galéshia mánkʉ.
162 Ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ ywɛka ámbʉ́rɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ, bɛkoŋo nkáp anɛ yi ákʉ́ bɛtɨk ábhɔ́ŋɔ́, bɛ bǎkɛ́ chwɔp bakap chi ndiɛrɛ mpok anɛ ntwɔ́ awu.
163 Nnáŋ ngáká awu, chɔŋ nsɨŋ ɛkáti nchyɛ́ ntá bo abhɛn bǎyábhɛ́ bɛto Yerúsalɛm nɛ akap aywɛka.
164 Nɛ mbák ɛrɨ bɛ mɛnkwɔ ndɔ́k, chɔŋ ndɔk nɛ bhɔ. 
165 Chɔŋ ntwɔ́ bɛghɔ bhe mpok nnáŋ mfʉɛ́rɛ́ atú Masidónia mbɔnyunɛ mbɔ̌ŋ ntɨ bɛfʉɛt arɛ.
166 Ngufú chɔŋ ntat nɛ be mandú, nɛ ɛ́kway bɛbhak ndǔ ɛso ɛnkɛm. Mpok ánkwáy yɛ anɛ mɛ̌rɔ̀ŋ ɛbhak ɛnɛ mɛ̌rɔ́ŋ, mǎnkwak mɛ ndɔ́k arɛ́.
167 Mpú yaŋ bɛ ntwɔ́ ngɔ́ bhe mfʉɛrɛ fʉɛt. Mbɔ̌ŋ ntɨ bɛ́twɔ bɛtat nɛ bhe, mbák Mandɛm ankwak.
168 Kɛ mbɔ̌ŋ bɛbhak fá Ɛ́fɛsɔs kpatɛ mpok Ɛpǎ Pɛntɛkɔs ankwáy.
169 Mbɔ̌ŋ ɛrɨ́tí mbi bɛkʉ ɛsayri bɛtɨk fá yɛ̌ndu bɛyǎ bo mánù bɛchyɛt mɛ mbi.
1610 Tímɔti ánáŋ ántwɔ́ awu, kɛ́m ká yi sayri, ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ yi ábhɔŋ maŋák bɛbhak nɛ bhe. Yi chí mmǔ anɛ ákʉ̀ bɛtɨk Mandɛm mbɔ mɛ.
1611 Ndu ɛchi nɔ, bǎkɛ́ rɔ yɛ̌ mmu ámbyák yi. Tɨ́k ká yi sayri bɛ ámpɛtnsɛm ntá ya. Batɨ̌ bǒnkwɔ nɛ mmɛ sɛ́nòŋ yi.
1612 Mbák chí manɔ ywɛsɛ Apólos, ngátí yi bɛyǎ mpok bɛ ántwɔ́ awu nɛ bǒnkwɔ bachak mángɔ bhe, kɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛ́twɔ nɛ́nɛ. Chɔŋ antwɔ́ mpok yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛpok. 
1613 Bák ká pě, mǎnte kpirí ndǔ nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ Yesu. Bɔ́ŋ ká nɛtaŋántɨ, mánte sɛnɛ́.
1614 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎkʉ̀, kʉ́ ka yɔ nɛ ɛkɔŋ.
1615 Bɔ̌ma, bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ ndǔ bo Akáiya mankɛm, ɛfo ɛnɛ Stɛfánas kɛ ɛ́yámbɨ bɛkoŋo Yesu Kristo, nɛ báchíɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnap ndu bɛkǔ bɛtɨk bɛ mánkwak bo Mandɛm.
1616 Sɛptí ká mmʉɛt ntá bǒ mbɔ abhɔ nɛ ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achak anɛ áchɛ́mɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ bhɔ ndǔ bɛtɨk.
1617 Mbɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ maŋák bɛ Stɛfánas nɛ Fɔtunátɔs nɛ Akaikɔs bátwɔ fá, mbɔnyunɛ nɛtwɔ́ wap achi mbɔ bhɛ bě nkwɔ bǎtwɔ.
1618 Báfyɛ mɛ ntɨ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu báfyɛ́ bhe ntɨ. Chíɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ká mɛnyǔ bo bhɔ kɛnókó.
1619 Bakwɔ́ bho Kristo abhɛn Ésia bátó be bakak. Akwíla nɛ Príska nɛ bǒnkwɔ abhɛn báchɛmɛ nɔkɔ ɛkɛt ɛyi bátó be bɛyǎ bakak ndǔ nnyɛ́n Acha.
1620 Bɔ́mayɛsɛ abhɛn fá mankɛm bátǒ bakak. Kaká ká batɨ nkwɔ sayri mbɔ bǒ Kristo.
1621 Mmɛ Pɔ̌l, kɛ nchí sɨŋ bakak amɛn nɛ awɔ́ wa.
1622 Mbák mmú achi anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ kɔŋ Yesu Kristo Acha, ɛyak ɛ́mbák nɛ yi. Acha ywɛsɛ, twɔ́!
1623 Bɛrɨ̌ndu Yesu Acha mɛ́mbák nɛ bhe.
1624 Nkɔŋ bě mankɛm. Sɛ́rɔp chi ndǔ nsoŋ amɔt ndu sɛ́bhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo.16
1
11 Mɛ Pɔ̌l, mǔnto Yesu Kristo bɛkoŋo nkaysi Mandɛm, kɛ nchí sɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Nchí fá nɛ Tímɔti, mɔmáyɛsɛ amɔt. Nchí sɨŋ ntá yɛka bǒnkwɔ Mandɛm abhɛn ɛtɔk Kɔrint nɛ bo Mandɛm mankɛm abhɛn báchi atú Akáiya ankɛm.
12 Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha mántɔ́ŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu, mánchyɛ bɛ kpák. 
13 Sɛ́mbɨ́tí Mandɛm nɛ Chi Yesu Kristo Acha ywɛsɛ. Achí Mandɛm ntínso nɛ ǎchyɛ bhɛsɛ nɛpɔptǐntɨ́.
14 Ǎchyɛ bhɛsɛ nɛpɔptǐntɨ́ ndǔ bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛsɛ́ mɛnkɛm bɛ sɛ́nkwáy bɛchyɛ bo abhɛn báchí ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ ɛsɔŋɔri nɛpɔptǐntɨ́. Nkúbhɛ́ nɛpɔptǐntɨ́ ɛnɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ mpok ɛsɔŋɔri, kɛ nɛ́kʉ̀ sɛ́nkwáy bɛchyɛ bo abhɛn bachi ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri nɛpɔptǐntɨ́.
15 Ndu sɛ́ghɔ̀ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ̌ti sɛ́bhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo nɔ́ kɛ Mandɛm áfʉɛt ntá Kristo bɛchyɛ bhɛsɛ nɛpɔptǐntɨ́.
16 Sɛ́bhɔ̀ŋ ɛsɔŋɔri chí bɛ́ Mandɛm anchyɛ bhe nɛpɔptǐntɨ́, ampɛmɛ bhe. Nɛ Mandɛm ǎchyɛ bhɛsɛ́ nɛpɔptǐntɨ́ chi bɛ sɛ́nkwáy bɛchyɛ bhe nɛpɔptǐntɨ́. Ɛnkʉ mǎnkwáy yɛ bɛbhɔŋ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ ndu bɛte kákátí ndǔ nkúbhɛ́ bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn sɛ́bhɔ̀ŋ.
17 Sɛ́bhàka ntɨ nɛ bhe, nɛ sɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ bɛcháy mbɔnyunɛ sɛrɨŋɨ bɛ ndǔ bǎká bɛbhɔŋ ɛsɔŋɔri mbɔ bhɛsɛ, Mandɛm ǎchyɛ bhe nkwɔ nɛpɔptǐntɨ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi ákʉ̀ nɛ bhɛsɛ.
18 Bɔ̌ma, sɛ́yàŋ mǎndɨŋɨ bɛyǎ bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ awu atú Esia. Báchyɛ bhɛsɛ nɛnyok ɛnɛn nɛ́yá nɛcha. Ɛkʉ sɛ́fɛ́rɛ ntí ndǔ sɛ́kàysi bɛ ndak ywɛsɛ ámay.
19 Ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ́yá kpát sɛ́rɔ́bhɛ noŋ chi nɛwú. Kɛ ɛfakari nyaka nɔ chi bɛkʉ sɛ́ndɨŋɨ bɛ sɛ́pú kwáy bɛkwak mmʉɛt ɛyɛsɛ. Sɛ́ghɔ́ bɛ́ sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛsɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ Mandɛm mmu ákwày bɛkʉ bawú mampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
110 Mandɛm áfɛ́rɛ bhɛsɛ́ ndǔ nɛwú, nɛ chɔŋ andɔk ambɨ bɛpɛmɛ bhɛsɛ. Sɛ́bhàka ntɨ chi nɛ yi bɛ chɔŋ ampɛt ampɛmɛ bhɛsɛ.
111 Be nkwɔ bǎbhɔŋ bɛkwak bɛsɛ ndǔ nɛnɨkímʉɛt. Nɛ chɔŋ bɛyǎ bo mánchyɛ nɔkɔ Mandɛm bakak ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ, bɛyɨŋɨ bɛrɨ̌ntɨ ɛbhɛn yi átɔ́ŋɔ́ bhɛsɛ ɛ̌ti bɛyǎ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt. 
112 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ́ sɛ́dɛ̀p awɔ antɨ chi bɛ batɨ̌ yɛsɛ ághàti bhɛsɛ bɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛsɛ nɛchi sayri nɛ bǒ mmɨk, sayri sayri nɛ bhe. Sɛ́kʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ bo Mandɛm nɛ ntɨ nɛmɔt nɛ tɛtɛp ndu sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ koŋo nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɛn bǒ mmɨk. Sɛ́kʉ nɔ chi ndǔ bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm bɛchi nɛ bhɛsɛ.
113‑14 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎpày ndǔ bɛkáti ɛbhɛsɛ chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi bhɛsɛ antɨ, sɛbhɨkɨ bhɛsɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Yɛ̌ bǎbhɨkɨ jwimɛm nɛ́nɛ bɛyɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ bo sɛchi, nókó ká bɛ chɔŋ mǎnjwimɛm sayri ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, bɛ nywɔp Yesu Acha átwɔ̀, mǎnkwáy bɛdɛp awɔ antɨ ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bɛsɛ́ sɛ́dɛ̀p mburɛ awɔ antɨ ɛ̌ti yɛka.
115 Tɛ̌ndu mpú makati nyaka wáwák bɛ chɔŋ mǎnsɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ mɛ, mbɔ̌ŋ nkaysi bɛyambɨ bɛ́twɔ awu ntá yɛka bɛ maŋák bɛghɔ mɛ ámbák nɛ bhe ndɔŋ ɛpay.
116 Mbɔ̌ŋ nyaka nkaysi bɛ́te awu ntá yɛka kɛ mfʉɛt ndɔk atú Masidónia, mpɛ́t ntě bɛ́ghɔ bhe mpok mfú atú Masidónia nchí pɛtnsɛm, bɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́nkʉ mǎmbɔŋ mbi bɛ́chyɛ mɛ nɛkwak ndǔ nɛkɔ ɛnɛn mɛ̌rɔ̀ŋ Judɛ́ya.
117 Nchí kʉ nyaka mbɔ bǒ mmɨk kɛ? Mmǔ mmɨk kɛ árɛ̀m ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt ankʉ chi ɛ́chák.
118 Tɛ̌ndu Mandɛm achi tɛtɛp, ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ngátí bhe puyɛ̌ ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ nkwǎ mmu ákà ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt ankʉ chi ɛchak.
119 Yesu Kristo Mmɔ Mandɛm anɛ Silvánɔs nɛ Tímɔti nɛ mɛ sɛ́ghàti nyaka bhe ɛ̌ti yi ndǔ nkwɔ ayɛka apú mmu bɛyɔŋ bɛyɔŋ. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́, yɔ́ kɛ yi ákʉ̀.
120 Chi bɛfʉɛt ntá Yesu kɛ̌ bariɛp Mandɛm mankɛm áfù tɛtɛp. Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ sɛ́rɛ̀m ndu nnyɛ́n Yesu Kristo bɛ́ “Amen”   ndu bɛchyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó.
121 Mandɛm kɛ áchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ nɛ be bɛtaŋ bɛ sɛ́nté kpirí nɛ Kristo. Yi kɛ afyɛ́ bhɛsɛ bɛ́ sɛ́mbák bǒbhi,
122 afyɛ́ bhɛsɛ ɛrɨŋ amʉɛt, bɛtɔŋ bɛ sɛchi bɔ̌bhi. Akʉ nɔ ndu áchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ mmu achi amɛm batɨ yɛsɛ́ ndu bɛtɔŋ bɛ chɔŋ anchyɛ bhɛsɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛchak.
123 Mandɛm achi ntísiɛ wa bɛ mpú sénse. Ntí anɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ pɛtnsɛm Kɔrint chi bɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ yaŋ mpɛt nchyɛ́ bhe ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ́chák.
124 Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ yaŋ bɛsɔt chi bɛtaŋ bɛghati bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛ́nóko. Sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ́ bǎbhɔŋ bǎte kpirí ndǔ nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ Yesu. Sɛ́yàŋ chi bɛ sɛ́nchɛm amɔ́ nɛ bhe sɛnkʉ bɛtɨk bɛ maŋák amɛka anja.
2
21 Ɛ̌ti ɛyɔ kɛ̌ nkʉ ntɨ bɛ mpú pɛrɛ twɔ awu ntá yɛka ndɔŋ achák ndu mbɨ́kɨ́ yaŋ bɛchɔŋti batɨ ayɛka amɛm.
22 Mbák nkʉ́ batɨ ánchɔ́ŋɔ́ be amɛm, agha achák áchi awu anɛ ákway bɛkʉ mɛ mbɔ́ŋ maŋák? Pú nkúbhɛ́ be mbák nkʉ batɨ áchɔ́ŋɔ́ be amɛm?
23 Ɛ̌ti ɛyɔ kɛ nsɨ́ŋɨ́ bhe ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Nsɨŋ yɔ́ ɛnyu ɛyɔ bɛ nnáŋ ntwɔ́ awu, be bho bǎbhɔŋɔ bɛchyɛ mɛ maŋák, bǎkɛ́ kʉ ntɨ nɛnchɔŋɔ́ mɛ amɛm. Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ sayri bɛ mbák nchí maŋák, be nkwɔ bǎbhak maŋák.
24 Nsɨŋ be nɛ bɛyǎ bɛbe antɨ, nɛ basɛ́mɛ́, nɛ babhɛsɛ amík. Mbɨ́kɨ́ sɨŋ bɛ́chɔŋti batɨ ayɛka amɛm. Nsɨŋ chi bɛkʉ mǎndɨŋɨ bɛ nkɔŋ be tontó. 
25 Kɛ mmǔ anɛ átwɔ́ nɛ ɛsɔŋɔri, abhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ chi mɛ. Mbɨ́kɨ́ yaŋ bɛrɛm tontó, kɛ ngɔ bɛ ákʉ́ chi be mankɛm.
26 Ntɛ́msí anɛ bɛyǎ bhɛka bǎká bɛ mánchyɛ mmu wu akway nɔ.
27 Foŋorí yɛ́ ka yi, mǎnchyɛ yi nɛpɔptǐntɨ́ bɛ mɛnyɨŋ bɛkɛ taŋ mɛncha yi ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ yi ákpɨkɨ fɛrɛ amɔ.
28 Nchí nɨk yɛ be mmʉɛt bɛ mǎmpɛt mǎnkʉ yi angɔ bɛ bǎkɔŋ yi tɛtɛp.
29 Nti anɛ nsɨ́ŋɨ́ bhe ɛkáti ɛyɔ chi bɛ mmɔ́ be ngɔ́ mbák chɔŋ mǎnkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ngátí bhe.
210 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ bǎfoŋori bɛbʉ́ bhi, mɛ nkwɔ nchí foŋori yi. Nɛ mɛ̌foŋori mbák ɛnyɨŋ ɛchi mbɔŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́yàŋ bɛ mámfoŋori yi. Nchí foŋori yi ɛ̌ti yɛka ndu nnyɛ́n Kristo mmu átó mɛ.
211 Ɛ́bhɔŋ bɛbhak ɛnyu ɛyɔ bɛ Satan ákɛ́ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ amfay yɛsɛ. Bɛsɛ́ babhɔŋ sɛrɨŋɨ nkaysi yi. 
212 Mpok nchwɔ́bhɛ́ Troas ndu bɛghati bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo, Acha ánɛ́nɛ́ mbi ntá ya.
213 Yɛ̌ nɔ, ntɨ nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ pɔp mɛ amɛm ndu mbɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ mmʉɛrɛ wa Táytɔs arɛ́.   Ngati yɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mǎnchɔkɔ sayri.” Mfa ndɔk atú Masidónia. 
214 Bakak ámbák nɛ Mandɛm mmu ánù ansɔt chi awɔ́nɛm. Asɔt bhɛsɛ́ mbɔ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu abhɛn bákɛ́mɛ́ ɛbhɨ̌nɛnu nɛ ǎya bɛsɛ mbi mpoknkɛm ndu sɛ́rɔ́bhɛ́ nu chi ɛbhe Yesu nɛ́nɛ. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ sɛ́rɔ̀ŋ, Mandɛm áfʉɛ̀t ntá yɛsɛ bɛkʉ bo mándɨ́ŋɨ́ Kristo ndu sɛ́kʉ̀ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ántáká nɔ́kɔ́ mbɔ ɛrɨ́tí ɛriɛp mbǎnkɛm
215 Bapɛ́m ayɛsɛ achi mbɔ bawɛt ɛrɨ́tí ɛriɛp amɛn Kristo áchyɛ́ ntá Mandɛm. Ɛriɛp ɛyɔ ɛ́tàka ndǔ nkwɔ bo abhɛn Mandɛm ǎpɛ̀mɛ nɛ ndǔ nkwɔ́ bo abhɛn bákɔ̀ chi ndǔ mbi nɛwú.
216 Ntá bo abhɛn bákɔ̀ ndǔ mbi nɛwú, ɛriɛp ɛnɛ ɛchi chi mbɔ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛriɛp ɛnɛ́ ɛ́wày bhɔ way. Kɛ ntá bo abhɛn Mandɛm ápɛ̀mɛ, sɛ́chi ɛrɨ́tí ɛriɛp ɛnɛ ɛ́chyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m. Ntɨkɨ mmu ákway bɛkʉ ɛnɛ́ ɛnyǔ bɛtɨk?
217 Bɛyǎ bo básɔ̀t Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ bághàti bho mbɔ mbi bɛyaŋ nkáp. Bɛsɛ́ sɛ́pú nɔ, sɛ́ghàti bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ chí nɛ ntɨ nɛmɔt, ndǔ bɛtaŋ Kristo, nɛ sɛrɨŋɨ bɛ amík Mandɛm achi bhɛsɛ amʉɛt.
3
31 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́rɛ̀m ɛ̌ti mmʉɛt ɛyɛsɛ ɛ́kɛ́ kʉ mǎnkaysi bɛ sɛ́pɛt sɛ́yàŋ chi bɛ mǎndɨŋɨ ɛnyu bho sɛ́chi. Bo báchí abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́twɔ be nɛ bɛkáti ɛbhɛn bɛ́rɛ̀m ɛrɨ́rɨ́ ɛ̌ti ɛya. Mɛnyǔ bo bho, bápɛt báyàŋ nɔ chi bɛ mǎnchyɛ bhɔ bɛkáti bɛ mántɔŋ ntá bo bachak? Bɛsɛ sɛ́pu nɔ.
32 Bɛ̌ bǎbhɔŋ kɛ bachí ɛkáti ɛnɛ́ ɛ́rɛ̀m ɛrɨ́rɨ́ ɛ̌ti bɛtɨk ɛbhɛsɛ. Básɨŋ ɛkáti ɛyɔ chi amɛm batɨ ayɛsɛ,   bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ampay andɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ bo sɛ́chi.
33 Nɛ bǎtɔ̀ŋ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ́ Kristo kɛ ásɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛkáti ɛnɛ ató bhɛsɛ nɛ yɔ́. Abhɨ́kɨ́ sɨŋ yɔ nɛ ɛnɔkɛ́kati. Asɨŋ yɔ chi nɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm mmu áchyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m. Abhɨ́kɨ́ sɨŋ yɔ ndǔ bɛ́gbáká batay. Asɨŋ yɔ chi amɛm batɨ̌ bakwǎŋwaŋ.
34 Sɛ́kway bɛrɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mbɔnyunɛ sɛ́sɨ̀kɨ ntɨ nɛ Mandɛm ndǔ nnyɛ́n Yesu Kristo.
35 Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tɔŋ bɛ bɛsɛ babhɔŋ sɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ sɛ́kway bǒ abhɛn bákʉ̀ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn. Mandɛm kɛ ákʉ́ sɛ́nkwáy bɛku bhɔ.
36 Nkúbhɛ́ Mandɛm kɛ ákʉ́ sɛ́nkwáy bɛbhak bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk, ndu bɛ́gháti bho ɛ̌ti Nku Nkɔ. Nku Nkɔ anɛ ǎyàŋ bɛ, nɛbho nɛ́nɛ, bo bákɛ́ koŋo chi ɛbhé mbɔ ɛnyu básɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka, kɛ sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛghok chi Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ. Ɛbhé ɛ́twɔ̀ mmu chi nɛ nɛwú kɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ǎtwɔ̀ chi nɛ nɛpɛ́m.
37 Bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ yɛ̌ndu nku nsɨ́ anɛ átwɔ̀ nɛ nɛwú, ǎkʉ̀ nyaka bo mángɔ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm kpoŋoroŋ. Mandɛm asɨ́ŋ bɛbhé ndǔ bɛ́gbáká batay achyɛ ntá Moses. Ɛnɛ́ Moses ásɛ̀p bɛ́rɔŋ ntá bo Israɛl nɛ batay yɔ, bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ Mamdɛm bɛ́re ghɔ yi bɛsí. Ndu ásɛ̀p bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ Mandɛm ɛbhɔ mɛ́may nɔkɔ. Yɛ̌ nɔ, yɛ̌ mmu wap kɛkwáy bɛyɨŋɨ yi bɛsí tɛbhɛ tɛbhɛ.
38 Mbák ɛ́kway bɛ́bhak nyaka ɛnyu yɔ ndǔ mpok nku nsɨ́, ná nɛ ɛchɔŋ, ndǔ mpok nku nkɔ? Bɛtɨk Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ mmu áchyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m bɛbhɔŋ bɛtɔŋ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ Mandɛm tontó ɛncha mpok nku nsɨ́.
39 Nku nsɨ́ ǎtwɔ̀ nyaka nɛ ntɛ́msi. Yɛ̌ nɔ, abhak chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm. Nɛ́nɛ, Nku Nkɔ, yɔ́ anɛ ákʉ̀ sɛ́mbák chak bɛsí Mandɛm, abhɔŋ bɛ́tɔŋ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm ancha Nku Nsɨ́.
310 Tɛtɛp, ndǔ ndak anɛ, nku nsɨ́ abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ mbɔnyunɛ sɛ́rɔbhɛ koŋo chi Nku Nkɔ anɛ áchá nku nsɨ́ ndǔ átɔ̀ŋ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ Mandɛm tontó.
311 Tɛtɛp, mbák nku nsɨ́ anɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ tat ǎkway nyaka bɛtɔŋ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ Mandɛm, Nku Nkɔ anɛ abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti abhɔŋ bɛtɔŋ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ ɛbhi ancha anɛ nsɨ́.
312 Tɛ̌ndu sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛbhakántɨ́, sɛ́bhɔŋ ngǎngaŋ nɛ sɛ́kʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ nɛ nɛtaŋántɨ.
313 Moses ǎkùti nyaka bɛsí bhi nɛ ndɛn mpoknkɛm anɛ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ Mandɛm ɛbhɛn bɛ́ghɔ̀ bɛsí bhi bɛ́bhó mɛmay mandú mandú, bɛ bo Israɛl bákɛ́ ghɔ ndǔ mɛ́nɛ̀msi. Sɛ́pú bhɛsɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
314 Bo Israɛl bághɔ̀ nyaka bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ Mandɛm, yɛ̌ nɔ, bágwɔ́t batɨ̌ yap amɛm. Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ ɛchi nɛ bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ bhap kpátɛ ɛchɔŋ. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ bápày bɛkáti Mandɛm ɛbhɛn nku nsɨ́, ɛ́bhak chi mbɔ bɛ ndɛn ɛyɔ akútí batɨ yap, nɛ ɛ́kʉ bɔ bákɛ́ jwimɛm ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bápày. Ndiɛrɛ Kristo kɛ ákway bɛfɛrɛ ɛkúti ɛyɔ ndǔ batɨ yap.
315 Nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyu yɔ kɛ ɛ́chi kpátɛ ɛchɔŋ. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ bápày basɨŋ amɛn Moses, bápú jwimɛm, mbɔnyunɛ ɛ́bhak ntá yap chi mbɔ bɛ básɔt ɛnyɨŋ bákuti batɨ̌ ayap.
316 Kɛ mpok mmu átɨ́kɨ́nsɛm ndǔ ɛsɨ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛni, ǎtwɔ̀ ntá Acha bɛ amfɛrɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kútí ntɨ ɛni.
317 Nɛ́nɛ, Acha anɛ sɛ́rɛ̀m nɔ ɛ̌ti yi ǎkʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ chi nɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ Ɛfóŋó Acha achi nɛ bho, bábhɔŋ ngangaŋ.
318 Nɛ́nɛ, bɛsɛ bo sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ ndɛn anɛ ákútí batɨ yɛsɛ, sɛ́ghɔ̀ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ Acha, nɛ sɛ́yìbhiri bɛbhak mbɔ yi. Nɛ ndǔ sɛ́yìbhiri nɛŋɔ̌k nɛ nɛŋɔk, bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ ɛbhi bɛ́ghɔ̀ bhɛsɛ amʉɛt mɛ́nja mɛndɔkɔ nɔkɔ chi ambɨ. Acha mmu ákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ nɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm kɛ ákʉ ɛmbak nɔ.
4
41 Tɛ̌ndu sɛrɨŋɨ bɛ Mandɛm ntínso kɛ áchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn-nɛ sɛ́kʉ̀, sɛpú fɛrɛ amɔ́.
42 Sɛ́fɛ́rɛ́ ntí ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́twɔ̀ nɛ ntíánwɔ́p nɛ ndǔ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo bákʉ̀ ansɛm ansɛm. Sɛ́pú kʉ bɛtábhá nɛ mmu wáwák nɛ sɛpu mɔ bɛyibhiri Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́kʉ̀ chi bɛghati bho tɛtɛp Mandɛm ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ákwày bɛrɨŋɨ bɛ sɛchi bǒ tɛtɛp bɛsí Mandɛm.
43 Mbák Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ sɛ́ghàti bho achi chi mbɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́, ǎbhák ɛnyu ɛyɔ chi ntá bo abhɛn bachi ndu mbi nɛwú.
44 Bǒ bhɔ bápú jwimɛm ndǔ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ mbɔnyunɛ Satan mmu achi mandɛm mmɨk anɛ́mɛ́ bɔ amɨk bɛ bákɛ noko Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́. Yi apu yaŋ bɔ́ mangɔ́ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ ɛbhɛn bɛ́ghɔ̀. Nɔ chi, bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fù ndǔ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Kristo. Apu yaŋ bɔ mandɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ Kristo achi, Kristo mmu achi ɛnyu ɛ́mɔt nɛ Mandɛm.
45 Sɛ́pú kɔ bɛghati bho ɛ̌ti mmʉɛt ayɛsɛ. Sɛ́ghàti bho chi ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo nɛ bɛ yi achi Acha. Mbák chi bhɛsɛ babhɔŋ, ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́ghàti bhe chi bɛ sɛchi chi bǒ bɛtok bhɛka ɛ̌ti Yesu.
46 Ndǔ nɛbhǒnɛt, ɛnɛ́ Mandɛm ághòko mmɨk, arɛm bɛ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ mɛ́ngɔ́ɔ́ ndǔ ɛjuri, nɛ ɛbhak nɔ. Nkúbhɛ́ Mandɛm kɛ ákʉ́ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ ɛbhi bɛ́ghɔ̀ amɛm batɨ yɛsɛ. Nɛ sɛ́ghɔ̀ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ Mandɛm ndǔ bɛ́ghɔ̀ bɛsí Kristo nɛ sɛ́rɨŋɨ nɛ́nɛ ɛnyǔ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ Mandɛm bɛchi.
47 Bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ ɛbhɛn bɛ́ghɔ̀ bɛsɛ antɨ chi nnɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ. Yɛ̌ nɔ, bɛsɛ babhɔŋ sɛchi chi mbɔ bɛtě ntɔp, bɛtaŋ ti. Ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ, bɛyǎ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ bɛtɨk Mandɛm bɛ́fù chi ntá yi, puyɛ̌ ntá yɛsɛ.
48 Mpok nɛ mpok, báchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ bɛsɔŋɔri mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu, kɛ bɛsɔŋɔri bhɔ bɛpu bɔkɔti bɛtě ntɔp ɛbhɛn bhɛsɛ sɛchi. Ɛcha bhɛsɛ́ ɛnyǔ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́kʉ kɛ sɛpu fɛrɛ amɔ́.
49 Mányòk bhɛsɛ, kɛ Mandɛm apú rɔ bɛbhak nɛ bhɛsɛ. Bádɛp bhɛsɛ amɨk, kɛ bápú kway bɛway bhɛsɛ.
410 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ sɛ́rɔ̀ŋ, bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn sɛ́ghɔ̀ bɛchi mbɔ bɛ sɛ́pɔ́kɔ́ nɛwú Yesu amʉɛt sɛ́kɔ̀ nɛ nɔ. Ɛ̌ti yɔ, bo bághɔ̀ nɛpɛ́m Yesu ndu nɛ́kʉ̀ bɛtɨk amʉɛt yɛsɛ.
411 Tɛtɛp, sɛchi anyǔ nɛwú mpoknkɛm ɛ̌ti Yesu, nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ̀ Mandɛm ántɔ́ŋ ɛnyǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn mbɔŋ Yesu Acha nɛ́kʉ̀ bɛtɨk ndǔ mmʉɛt ɛyɛsɛ́ ɛnɛ ɛ́pú tat fá amɨk.
412 Sɛ́ká yɛ nɛwú, bɛ́ mǎnkwáy bɛ́bhɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ́n nɛ́bhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛ́nti.
413 Tɛ̌ndu sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ nkúbhɛ́ ɛfóŋó nɛka mbɔ mmǔ anɛ arɛmɛ mbɔ ɛnyu ɛchi amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ, “Nnókó, nɛ ɛ̌ti yɔ ndɛm”. Bɛse nkwɔ sɛ́noko, nɛ ɛ̌ti yɔ sɛ́ghàti bo Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́.
414 Sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ Mandɛm mmu ákʉ́ Yesu Acha ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, ǎkʉ chɔŋ bɛsɛ́ nkwɔ́ sɛ́mpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nɛ yi, nɛ ansɔt bhɛsɛ nɛ bhe sɛ́mbak nɛ Yesu ndǔ nɛbhʉ́ɛ́t bɛchɔkɔ bhi.
415 Bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm bɛchi chi ndǔ bɛrɨ ɛbhɛka, bɛ ndǔ bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm bɛ́gháká ntá bɛyǎ bho, mɛ́nkʉ́ bo abhɛn báchyɛ̀ Mandɛm bakak mánjá mándɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ, bɛ bo mánchyɛ nɔ́kɔ́ Mandɛm kɛnókó. 
416 Tɛ̌ndu sɛ́rɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, sɛ́pu fɛrɛ amɔ. Yɛ̌ndu bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn nkwɔmʉɛt mɛ́mày mɛ́ndɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ, Mandɛm ǎkʉ̀ sɛmbɔŋ nɔkɔ bɛtaŋ bɛkɔ amɛm batɨ ayɛsɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔp.
417 Nɛ bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn sɛ́ghɔ̀ fá amɨk bɛ́chi mandú tontó, nɛ bɛ́pu tat. Bɛ́kwàk bhɛsɛ kwak bɛ sɛ́nkwáy bo abhɛn sɛ́chwè ndǔ bɛyǎ maŋák Mandɛm ɛwak ɛ́mɔt. Maŋák amɔ acha yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ nɛ abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
418 Sɛ́pú yɨŋɨ yɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo bághɔ̀ nɛ amɨ́k. Sɛ́yɨ̀ŋɨ chi ɛbhɛn bápú ghɔ, mbɔnyunɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo baghɔ bɛ́fʉɛrɛ fʉɛt. Ɛbhɛn bápú ghɔ kɛ bɛbhak mpoknkɛm.
5
51 Sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ mmʉɛt ayɛsɛ́ anɛ fá amɨk achí mbɔ bɛ́tɛm. Mbák bɛ́tɛm ɛbhɛn mɛ́nkwɛ́n, Mandɛm ǎchyɛ bhɛsɛ ɛkɛt ɛkɔ awu amfay. Puyɛ̌ chi bakwǎŋwaŋ kɛ bághókó yɔ, mbɔŋ Mandɛm kɛ áchyɛ̀ mmʉɛt nkɔ yɔ, nɛ yɔ abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
52 Tɛtɛp, sɛ́chi ndǔ nɛdǐ kɛbhɔ fá amɨk nɛ sɛ́nòŋ nɛ bɛyǎ ɛkwak bɛ Mandɛm anchyɛ bhɛsɛ mmʉɛt ɛkɔ ɛnɛ ɛchi amfay,
53 bɛ ndu afyɛ́ yɔ bhɛsɛ amʉɛt, sɛ́kɛ́ bhak bɛbho bɛwɔ.
54 Ndǔ bɛ́tɛm ɛbhɛn sɛchi arɛ́ nɛ́nɛ, sɛ́bhɔ̀ŋ ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ sɛ́chí ndǔ nɛdǐ kɛbhɔ. Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tɔ́ŋ bɛ sɛ́yàŋ Mandɛm ámfɛ́rɛ́ mmʉɛt anɛ ágù. Sɛ́yàŋ chi bɛ yi anchyɛ bhɛsɛ mmʉɛt nkɔ, bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛpu gu ɛ́mɛn ɛnɛ ɛ́gù.
55 Mbɔŋ Mandɛm kɛ̌ ákʉ́ sɛ́mbák bo abhɛn sɛ́kwày bɛ́bhɔ́ŋ mmʉɛt nkɔ yɔ. Achyɛ́ bhɛsɛ́ Ɛfóŋó ɛyi mbɔ nkɛm bɛ́ chɔŋ anchyɛ bhɛsɛ mmʉɛt nkɔ yɔ nkwɔ tɛtɛp.
56 Sɛ́bhɔŋ yɛ ntɨ nɛtaŋ nɛtaŋ mpoknkɛm ndu sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ, ɛnɛ́ sɛ́bhʉɛ́t ndǔ mmʉɛt ɛnɛ, sɛ́pú kway bɛbhak amfay nɛ Yesu Acha.
57 Ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛsɛ fá amɨk sɛ́bhɔ̌ŋ nɛka nɛ yi. Sɛ́pú ghɔ yi nɛ amɨ́k.
58 Sɛ́bhɔŋ ntɨ nɛ ɛ́rɨ ntá yɛsɛ bɛ sɛ́ndɔ́ mmʉɛt ɛnɛ sɛndɔk sɛmbak anywɔ́p nɛ Acha.
59 Ndu ɛchi yɛ nɔ, yɛ̌ sɛ́bhʉɛ́t chi fá amɨk, yɛ̌ sɛ́chí chí awu nɛ yí, nnɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ chi bɛ́ sɛ́nkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛkʉ yi ámbɔ́ŋ maŋák nɛ bhɛsɛ mpoknkɛm.
510 Ntí achi bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu abhɔŋ bɛ́te bɛsí Kristo mmu átàŋ bo mankɛm. Chɔŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ambɔ́ŋ nsáy anɛ ákwáy nɛ yi bɛ́kóŋo nɛpɛ́m ɛni fá amɨk. Mbák sɛ́kʉ bɛrɨ, chɔŋ sɛ́mbɔ́ŋ ɛrɨ́tí akap, nɛ mbák sɛ́kʉ bɛbʉ́, sɛ́mbɔŋ ntɛ́msi.
511 Ndu sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ ǎtàŋ chɔŋ bo mankɛm, sɛbhɔŋ bɛcháy nɛ Yesu Acha. Bɛchay ɛbhɛn bɛ́kʉ sɛ́fyɛ̀ yɛ bɛtaŋ ndu bɛkʉ bɛ bo mánóko bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́ghàti bhɔ bɛchi tɛtɛp. Mbɔŋ Mandɛm arɨ́ŋɨ́ bhɛsɛ́ sayri, nɛ nkáysí bɛ be nkwɔ bǎrɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ bo sɛ́chi.
512 Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tɔŋ bɛ sɛ́pɛt sɛ́yàŋ bɛkʉ mǎndɨŋɨ mɛnyu bo sɛchi. Sɛ́yàŋ chi bɛkʉ mǎndɨŋɨ ntí anɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́panyu ɛ̌ti ɛyɛsɛ bɛ́ mǎndɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́kɛ́mɛ bo abhɛn bárɛ̀m ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ. Mpányu yap apu yɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ ntɨ mmu nɛchi amɛm nɛ Mandɛm. Báyɨ̀ŋɨ bho chi ndǔ nté yap achi.
513 Mbák sɛchi bɛchɨŋtǐ bho mbɔ ɛnyǔ mbɔk bo bárɛ̀m, sɛ́bhák nɔ chí ndu sɛ́nù bɛchyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó. Kɛ mbák bǎká bɛ sɛ́pú bɛchɨŋtǐ bho, dɨŋí yɛ́ ka bɛ sɛ́kʉ̀ bɛtɨk chi ɛ̌ti yɛka.
514 Bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn sɛ́kʉ̀, sɛ́kʉ̀ bhɔ chi mbɔnyunɛ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ́ Kristo ɛ́pùri bhɛsɛ. Sɛ́noko bɛ ndu Kristo ágú ɛ̌ti yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu, bɛsɛ́ mankɛm sɛ́náŋ sɛgu.
515 Agú ɛ̌ti yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu bɛ bo abhɛn básɔ́rɛ́ nɛpɛ́m nɛkɔ ɛnɛn yi áchyɛ̀ nɛ maŋák bákɛ́ pɛrɛ bhak chi ndǔ mmʉɛt ɛyap. Bapɛ́m ayap ándɔp chí mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi áyàŋ mbɔnyunɛ ɛ̌ti yap kɛ yi ágú nɛ ɛ̌ti yap kɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ yi ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
516 Bɛbho nɛ́nɛ, sɛ́pú pɛrɛ yɨŋɨ yɛ bho chí bɛkoŋo nkaysi bǒ mmɨk. Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ sɛ́yɨ̀ŋɨ nyaka Kristo, kɛ nɛ́nɛ, sɛrɨŋɨ mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnyǔ mmu yi áchí.
517 Ɛnɛ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ mmu anɛ ábhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo arɔp yɛ chi mmǔ nkɔ. Mɛnyɨŋ bɛsɨ́ bɛ́fʉɛt, ɛbhɛn bɛkɔ kɛ bɛ́rɔ́bhɛ́.
518 Mandɛm kɛ ákʉ́ bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm mɛ́mbák ɛnyu ɛyɔ. Yí kɛ átó Kristo ánkʉ sɛ́mpɛ́tnsɛm ntá yi, nɛ achyɛ́ bhɛsɛ bɛtɨk bɛkʉ bo mámpɛ́tnsɛm mámbɔŋ kpák nɛ Mandɛm.
519 Ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ Mandɛm áfʉ̀ɛt nyaka ntá Kristo bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ámpɛ́tnsɛm ambɔŋ kpák nɛ yi. Abhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ yɨŋɨ nyaka ndǔ bɔ bapu bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé. Nɛ afyɛ́ ntó amɔ yɛsɛ ɛnɛ́n nɛ́kʉ̀ bo mámpɛ́tnsɛm mámbɔŋ kpák nɛ yi.
520 Sɛ́chí yɛ bo abhɛn Kristo afyɛ́ ntó ɛnɛn bhɛsɛ́ amɔ. Mbɔŋ Mandɛm kɛ áfʉɛ̀t yɛ ntá yɛsɛ́, ndu ábhɨ̀ŋɨ be nɛ ɛkɔŋ. Ndǔ nnyɛ́n Kristo, sɛ́nɨ̀k be mmʉɛt, pɛt ka nsɛm ntá Mandɛm.
521 Ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ, Mandɛm akʉ Kristo mmu ábhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ yɛ bɛbʉ́ ámbák mbʉ́mbʉ bɛ sɛ́mfʉ́ɛ́t ntá yi sɛ́mbák chak bɛsí Mandɛm.
6
61 Bɛsɛ bo sɛ́kʉ̀ bɛtɨk nɛ Mandɛm, sɛ́nɨ̀k be mmʉɛt bɛ bǎkɛ́ rɔ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhɛn yi atɔŋɔ bhe mɛ́mbák ndɛ́ndɛm.
62 Yi ǎrɛ̀m mbɔ ɛnyǔ básɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ, “Mpok ákwáy nɔ́kɔ́ bɛtɔŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu, ngók nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛnɛka, nywɔp bɛ́pɛ́mɛ bho nɛkwáy nɔkɔ, nkwak bhe.” Ghók ká, nɛ́nɛ chi mpok anɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ bɛtɔŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu, nɛ́nɛ chi mpok anɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ bɛpɛmɛ bhe.
63 Sɛ́pú kʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́chɛ̀t mmu mbi nɛ Mandɛm bɛ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛ́kɛ́ bhak ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛsɛ.
64 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́yàŋ chi bɛ ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́kʉ̀, sɛ́ntɔ́ŋ bɛ sɛ́chí bǒ bɛtok Mandɛm tɛtɛp. Sɛ́bhɔŋ maŋák mpoknkɛm. Sɛ́bhɔ̀ŋ ɛsɔŋɔri mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu, yɛ̌ nɔ sɛ́bhɔŋ maŋák mpoknkɛm.
65 Mánáŋ badɛn bhɛsɛ, mánáŋ báfyɛ̌ bhɛsɛ ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ. Mǎnaŋ bágʉɛ́p ɛbyɔk bɛ bǒ mánchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ ɛsɔŋɔri. Sɛ́yaŋá gu bɛtɨk. Mpok nɛ mpok, sɛ́kɛ bhɔŋ mbi bɛbhʉrɛ kɛnɔ́ nɛ ɛ́nchɛbhɛ nɔkɔ bhɛsɛ tɛ nɛnyíɛ́ mɛnyiɛ.
66 Batɨ̌ yɛsɛ achi amɛm pɛ́pɛ́p, nɛ sɛ́rɨŋɨ tɛtɛp anɛ Mandɛm. Sɛ́bhɔŋ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ́ nɛ bho, nɛ sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛrɨ̌ntɨ. Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ achi nɛ bhɛsɛ, nɛ sɛ́kɔŋ bo tɛtɛp.
67 Sɛ́ghàti bo chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi tɛtɛp. Bɛtaŋ Mandɛm bɛ́chi nɛ bhɛsɛ. Sɛ́chí chak bɛsí Mandɛm nɛ ɛyɔ ɛchi mbɔ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ nɛnu ɛbhɛn bɛ́kwàk bhɛsɛ sɛ́nu nɛ bǒmpap abhɛsɛ, sɛ́nchɛt bɔ mbi bɛbhɔŋ bhɛsɛ.
68 Mbɔk bho báchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ kɛnókó kɛ bachak bábyak bhɛsɛ byak. Mbɔk bho bárɛ̀m ɛrɨ́rɨ́ ɛ̌ti ɛyɛsɛ, kɛ báchák bárɛ̀m chi ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti ɛyɛsɛ. Bo básɔ̀t bhɛsɛ mbɔ bǒ bapu, ɛnɛ́ sɛ́rɛ̀m chi tɛtɛp.
69 Bo bárɛ̀m bɛ agha arɨŋɨ kpɨk bhɛsɛ́, yɛ̌ nɔ bo bárɨŋɨ bhɛsɛ sayri. Ɛ́chí mbɔ bɛ sɛ́gùgu, yɛ̌ nɔ, sɛ́chi nɛpɛ́m. Báchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ ɛsɔŋɔri, kɛ sɛ́pú gú.
610 Sɛ́chí ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri, yɛ̌ nɔ, sɛbhɔŋ maŋák mpoknkɛm. Sɛ́chí amɔ apay, yɛ̌ nɔ sɛ́kʉ̀ bɛyǎ bo bábhɔ̀ŋ bɛyǎ áfɔ́k. Ɛchi mbɔ bɛ sɛ́bhɨkɨ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ, yɛ̌ nɔ, sɛ́bhɔŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ.
611 Bě bo Kɔrint, sɛ́ghati bhe yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ kpoŋoroŋ nɛ sɛ́nɛnɛ batɨ yɛsɛ ntá yɛka.
612 Bǎbhɨkɨ fu bɛsɛ antɨ, be kɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ kɔŋ bhɛsɛ.
613 Nchí ghati bhe mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ mmu anɛ árɛ̀m ɛnyɨŋ ntá bɔ́bhi. Nɛnɛ́ ká batɨ ntá yɛsɛ, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ sɛ́kɔ́ŋ bhe.
614 Bǎkɛ́ nyɔ́p mmʉɛt nɛ bo abhɛn bábhɨkɨ noko Yesu. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi chak bɛsí Mandɛm, ɛ́bhɔŋ yi bɛkʉ nɛ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́pú chak. Bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ bɛkway bɛ́bhak nɛbhʉɛt amɔt nɛ ɛjuri kɛ?
615 Kristo abhɔŋ yi bɛkʉ nɛ Satan? Mmu anɛ ánókó Yesu abhɔŋ yi bɛkʉ nɛ mmu anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ noko?
616 Ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm ɛbhɔŋ yi bɛkʉ nɛ bɔmandɛm nsé? Bɛsɛ bo sɛ́nókó Yesu kɛ sɛ́chí ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm mmu achi nɛpɛ́m. “Chɔŋ nnte ɛkɛt ɛya nɛntɨ ɛnap, mbak nɛ bhɔ. Chɔŋ mbak Mandɛm wap, bɔ́ mámbak bǒbha.”
617 Ɛta Mandɛm árɛ̀m yɛ bɛ, “Fú ká nɛntɨ nap fap ka mmuɛ́t nɛ bhɔ. Bǎkɛ́ nyɔ́p mmʉɛt nɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bakwap, nɛ chɔŋ mpɛt nsɔt be amʉɛt.”
618 Mandɛm Acha Bɛtaŋ Mɛnkɛm ǎrɛ̀m mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛchi nɛbhʉɛt achak amɛm Ɛkáti ɛyi bɛ,“Chɔŋ mbak Ɛtayɛka, mǎmbak bɔ̌bha.”
7
71 Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, tɛ̌ndu Mandɛm áchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ bariɛp amɛn, sǒ ká amɔ́ fɛrɛ́ ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kwày mɛnyɔp mmʉɛt ɛyɛsɛ nɛ batɨ̌ ywɛsɛ. Sɛ́ncháy Mandɛm, sɛ́nu bɛbhak nyáŋá bɛsí bhi ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi. 
72 Nɛnɛ́ ká batɨ ntá yɛsɛ. Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ yɛ̌ mmu ɛbɛ́pti ɛnyɨŋ, sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ chɔŋti ntí mmu amɛm, nɛ sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ nyiɛ́ mmu ɛbhɔ́ŋ.
73 Mpú rɛm nɔ chi ndu bɛtaŋ be bɛ bǎkʉ bɛbʉ́. Nnáŋ njámbɨ ngátí bhe bɛ́ sɛ́kɔŋ be nɛ batɨ yɛsɛ́ ankɛm, nɛ yɛ̌ chi nɛwú yɛ̌ chi nɛpɛ́m, yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ́pú kɔrɛ bhɛsɛ nɛ bhe.
74 Mbákántɨ nɛ bhe tontó. Mɛ̌dɛ̀p awɔ́ antɨ tontó ɛ̌ti yɛka. Bǎchyɛ̀ mɛ nɛpɔptǐntɨ́ tontó, nɛ yɛ̌ndu sɛ́bhɔ̀ŋ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri, maŋák ama aya acha.
75 Yɛ̌ chi mpok anɛ sɛ́gháká atú Masidónia sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt. Bɛsɔŋɔri bɛre twɔ bɛbhě mɛnkɛm.
76 Kɛ Mandɛm mmu áchyɛ bo abhɛn batɨ apɛt apu bɔ amɛm nɛpɔptǐntɨ́, achyɛ́ bhɛsɛ nɛpɔptǐntɨ́ ndu Táytɔs átwɔ́.
77 Puyɛ̌ ndiɛrɛ nɛtwɔ Táytɔs kɛ Mandɛm ásɔ́rɛ́ bɛchyɛ bɛsɛ nɛpɔptǐntɨ́. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛchak ɛ́chí bɛ bǎchyɛ́ Táytɔs nɛpɔptǐntɨ́ mpok yi achi awu nɛ bhe. Ágháti mɛ ɛnyǔ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛkwak bɛ ntwɔ́ awu, nɛ ɛnyǔ batɨ ábè bhe amɛm nɛ áyɔ́mɛ. Apɛt aghati mɛ ndǔ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ ntɨ tontó bɛte nɛ mɛ. Ɛ́kʉ́ maŋák ama apɛt aya acha.
78 Yɛ̌ ɛmbak chi bɛ ɛkáti ɛnɛ́ nsɨ́ŋɨ́ bhe ɛ́kʉ́ bǎbhɔ́ŋ basɛ́mɛ́, áyɔ́mɛ apú nɛ mɛ bɛ nsɨŋ yɔ́. Ndǔ nɛbhǒnɛt mbɔ́ŋ áyɔ́mɛ mbɔnyunɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ yɔ́ ɛ́chyɛ́ bhe basɛ́mɛ́, yɛ̌ndu basɛ́mɛ́ mɔ áchí chí ndǔ mɔ́mbɨŋɨ mpok.
79 Tɛtɛp, mbɔ̌ŋ maŋák bɛ nsɨŋ be ɛkáti kɛ puyɛ̌ chí ɛ̌ti yɔ́ ɛ́chyɛ́ bhe basɛ́mɛ́. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ́ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ maŋák chi bɛ basɛ́mɛ́ amɛn ɛkáti ɛyɔ ɛ́chyɛ́ bhe akʉ bǎtɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka. Bɛběntɨ ɛbhɛká bɛchi ɛnyǔ bɛběntɨ ɛbhɛ́n Mandɛm áyàŋ bǒbhi mámbɔ́ŋ. Ɛ́kʉ bɛ ɛkáti ɛyɔ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ twɔ nɛ mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́ ntá yɛ̌ mmu ywɛka.
710 Basɛ́mɛ́ amɛn Mandɛm ákɔ́ŋɔ́ ǎkʉ̀ mmu ántɨ́knsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhi, antwɔ́ ntá yi bɛ́ yí ámpɛ́mɛ́ yi, nɛ apu twɔ nɛ áyɔ́mɛ. Kɛ basɛ́mɛ́ bǒ mmɨk ǎtwɔ̀ chi nɛ nɛwú.
711 Bě babhɔŋ mǎngɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ basɛ́mɛ́ amɛn Mandɛm akɔŋɔ ákʉ́ ntá yɛka. Nɛ́nɛ, bǎbhɔŋ bɛyǎ ɛkwak bɛ́yíbhiri mɛnyɨŋ. Ɛ́kʉ bǎso amɔ ndǔ ndak anɛ nɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ bɛběntɨ́ ɛ̌ti ndak anɛ́ mmu wu ákʉ́ nɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋ bɛcháy ɛ̌ti ndak anɛ áfákárí. Bǎbhɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ ɛkwak bɛghɔ mɛ nɛ bǎyàŋ tontó bɛ mántɛ́msí mmǔ anɛ átwɔ́ nɛ ndak.
712 Yɛ̌ndu nsɨ́ŋɨ́ yɛ be ɛkáti, mbɨ́kɨ́ sɨŋ chi bɛkʉ mǎndɨ́ŋɨ́ mmu anɛ ákʉ́ nɛfwɔp nɛ mmu anɛ bǎkʉ́ yi nɛfwɔp. Nsɨŋ chi ɛ̌ti bǎghɔ́ bɛsí Mandɛm, bɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋ ntɨ nɛ bhɛsɛ tontó.
713 Ɛyɔ ɛ́chyɛ̀ yɛ bɛsɛ nɛpɔptǐntɨ́. Bǎfyɛ́ bhɛsɛ ntɨ, nɛ bɛrɔŋ ambɨ, sɛchi maŋák ɛ̌ti maŋák amɛn Táytɔs ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ndǔ be mankɛm bǎsɔ́rɛ́ yi awu sayri, bǎkʉ́ ntɨ ɛni nɛpɔp amɛm.
714 Mɛ̌ghàti nyaka bhe chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi tɛtɛp mpoknkɛm. Nɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ chyɛ mɛ ntíánwɔ́p ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ngátí Táytɔs ndɛbhɛ nɔkɔ awɔ́ antɨ ɛ̌ti yɛka, nɛ ɛ́fú nkwɔ tɛtɛp.
715 Nɛ́nɛ, Táytɔs apɛt akɔŋ be áchá, sayri sayri, mpok yi átɨ̀k ɛnyǔ bǎsíɛ́ptí yi nɛ bɛcháy, mǎngwɛrɛ nɔkɔ, nɛ ɛnyǔ bǎkʉ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ághátí bhe.
716 Nɛ́nɛ, nchí ŋák, mbɔnyunɛ mbákántɨ nɛ bhe ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi.
8
81 Bɔ̌ma, sɛ́yàŋ mǎndɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm ɛbhɛn bakwɔ́ bho Kristo abhɛn atú Masidónia bátɔ́ŋɔ́.
82 Bɛyǎ bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn bɔ́ bághɔ́, bɛ́kʉ bábhɔŋ mamɔ tontó. Yɛ̌ nɔ, bábhɔŋ bɛyǎ maŋák. Ɛ́kʉ bábhɔŋ bɛyǎ ɛkɔŋ bɛ́chyɛ akap kɛyɨŋɨ nsɛm ndu bɛ́kwak bo, yɛ̌ndu báchí ndǔ bɛyǎ kɛchɛ́p.
83 Nchí ghati bhe bɛ báchyɛ mbɔ ɛnyǔ amɔ yap átɔ̀ŋ. Nɛ mpok báchyɛ̀, báchyɛ́ mbɔŋ ɛcha ɛnyǔ amɔ́ ayap átɔ́ŋɔ́, mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛ́fú bhɔ antɨ.
84 Báchyɛ́, mánɨk nɔkɔ bhɛsɛ mmʉɛt ndɔŋ nɛ ndɔŋ nɛ ntɨ nɛnkɛm bɛ́ sɛ́nchíɛ bɔ́ mbi mánkwák bo Mandɛm abhɛn bachi Yerúsalɛm.
85 Nkwɔ́ bho Masidónia bákʉ́ bacha ɛnyu ɛnɛ sɛ́kàysi nyaka bɛ bákway bɛkʉ. Nnɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ anɛ bɔ báyámbɨ bákʉ́ chí bɛ báchyɛ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛnap nɛnkɛm ntá Mandɛm Acha. Báchyɛ́ yɛ mmʉɛt ntá yɛsɛ nkwɔ ndu bɛkoŋo nkaysi Mandɛm.
86 Táytɔs anáŋ abho bɛsɔt bakap ntá yɛka ndǔ bɛkwak bachɛ́bhɛ́bho. Ɛ́kʉ sɛ́ghátí yɛ yi bɛ ampɛtnsɛm awu ankwak be mǎndɔk ambɨ mɛnaŋa bɛtɨkɨ́ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhɛn bǎbhó.
87 Bǎbhɔŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ndu mbi Mandɛm bǎcha. Bǎbhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu ɛrɨ́rɨ́. Bághàti bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu sayri. Bǎrɨŋɨ tɛtɛp Mandɛm. Bǎchyɛ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka nɛnkɛm ndu bɛkʉ bɛtɨk Mandɛm nɛ bǎkɔŋ bhɛsɛ tontó. Kʉ yɛka nkwɔ bɛtɨk ndu bɛchyɛ nɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhɛn bɛya bɛcha.
88 Mpu rɛm nɔ chí bɛ bǎbhɔŋ bɛkʉ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ngátí bhe. Nchí kʉ chi bɛ mǎndɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyǔ bǒ báchák bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛkɔŋ ndu bɛ́kwák. Nkʉ chi bɛ mǎmbɔ́ŋ mbi bɛtɔŋ bɛ bǎkɔŋ bo bachak tɛtɛp.
89 Bě bǎbhɔŋ bǎrɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhɛn Yesu Kristo Acha átɔ́ŋɔ́ bhɛsɛ. Yɛ̌ndu yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ, ayibhiri arɔp nchɛ́bhɛ́ mmu ɛ̌ti yɛka bɛ kɛchɛp ɛki kɛ́nkʉ mǎmbák bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ bɛsí Mandɛm.
810 Maníɛ́ ama ndǔ ndak anɛ chi bɛ: Mmíɛ́ ɛ́yú, bě kɛ̌ bǎyambɨ bɛchyɛ akap, nɛ mbɔ̌ŋ be kɛ̌ bǎyámbɨ bɛbhɔŋ ɛkwak bɛkʉ nɔ.
811 Naŋá yɛ ká bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn bǎbho mbɔ ɛnyǔ amɔ́ ayɛka átɔ̀ŋ, bɛ nɛkʉ ywɛka ánkɔ ɛnyumɔt nɛ ɛkwak bɛkʉ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǎtɨ́
812 Mbák mmu abhɔŋ ntɨ bɛ́chyɛ akap, Mandɛm ǎsɔt ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi áchyɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ amɔ́ yi átɔ̀ŋ. Apú bhɛp mmu ánchyɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ.
813 Mpú rɛm nɔ chi bɛ mámfɛ́rɛ́ ntu amʉɛt bǒ bachak mámbay be anti.
814 Nchí yaŋ chi bɛ ndǔ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ tontó nɛ́nɛ, mǎnkwak bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ, bɛ mpok bɔ nkwɔ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́, mánkwak be ndǔ mpok anɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ. Ɛnyu ɛyɔ be mankɛm bǎbhak sayri ɛnyumɔt.
815 Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́ghàti bhɛsɛ bɛ, “Mmǔ anɛ ápɔ́kɔ́ bɛyǎ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn nɛ́fú amfay ntá Mandɛm, ǎnyiɛ nyaka yɛ̌nyɨŋ kɛrɔp, anɛ ápɔ́kɔ́ chi mandú abhɔ́ŋ ɛnɛn nɛkwáy yi gbák.”   
816 Nchí kaka Mandɛm bɛ akʉ Táytɔs ámbɔ́ŋ nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyǔ ntɨ ɛnɛn mɛ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ ndu bɛkwak bhe.
817 Puyɛ̌ chi bɛ aká bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́ghátí yi. Yímbɔŋ anáŋ abhɔŋ ɛkwak bɛpɛt bɛ́twɔ awu bɛghɔ be mankɛm. Ɛ̌ti yɔ, ǎtwɔ̀ yɛ nkwɔ ndǔ mmʉɛt ɛyi.
818 Sɛ́tò manɔ achak nkwɔ nɛ Táytɔs. Nkwɔ́ bo Kristo mbaŋ ɛnkɛm bárɨ́ŋɨ́ yi sayri ɛ̌ti bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ̀ ndu bɛ́gháti bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́.
819 Nɛ ndu bɛrɔŋ ambɨ, yi kɛ bakwɔ́ bho Kristo mbankɛm báyábhɛ́ bɛ́ ankɔ nɔkɔ nɛ bhɛsɛ ndǔ bɛtɨkɨ́ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhɛn sɛ́kʉ̀. Sɛ́kʉ̀ bhɔ ndu nkwɔ ɛnyu ɛyɔ bɛ́ sɛ́nchyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó nɛ bɛ́tɔŋ bɛ sɛbhɔŋ ntɨ bɛ́kwak bho.
820 Ndǔ sɛ́kɔ̀ ndu nkwɔ, ɛyɔ ɛpu chyɛ mbi bɛ mmu ánkáysí bɛ sɛ́bhɔŋ batɨ apay. Sɛ́sɔ̀t mpok bɛ yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́ ji bhɛsɛ bɛyɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ sɛ́kʉ̀ nɛ bɛyǎ akabhɛ́ nkáp anɛ.
821 Sɛ́yàŋ chí bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi chak, puyɛ̌ chi ndiɛrɛ bɛsí Mandɛm Acha, kɛ bɛsí bho nkwɔ.
822 Sɛ́tò nkwɔ mɔ́mayɛsɛ achák nɛ bhɔ. Sɛ́naŋ sɛmɔ yi ndɔŋ nɛ ndɔŋ, ndu bɛyǎ babhi, nɛ sɛ́ghɔ́ bɛ abhɔŋ ntɨ bɛ́kʉ bɛtɨkɨ́ Mandɛm. Nɛ́nɛ, áchyɛ́ mmʉɛt ndu bɛkʉ bhɔ achá mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnyu ɛsɨ́ mbɔnyunɛ abháká ntɨ nɛ be tontó.
823 Mbák chí Táytɔs, chi ntɨ nkʉbɛtɨk awa. Ǎkʉ̀ bɛtɨk nɛ mɛ ndu bɛkwak be. Mbák chí bɔ̌mayɛsɛ bachak abhɔ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap achi mǔnto ndǔ ntí bakwɔ́ bho Kristo abhɛn bátó yi, bɔ bho báchyɛ̀ Kristo kɛnókó.
824 Kʉ yɛka bakwɔ́ bho Kristo mángɔ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ bǎbhɔŋ ɛkɔŋ nɛ bho, nɛ bɛ ntí achi anɛ sɛ́dɛ̀p awɔ antɨ ɛ̌ti ɛyɛka bɛsí bhap.
9
91 Ntí apu anɛ mɛ̌sɨŋ be ɛ̌ti nɛkwak ɛnɛn bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛchyɛ nkwɔ Kristo abhɛn Yerúsalɛm.
92 Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ bǎbhɔŋ ɛkwak bɛkwak nɛ ngátí nkwɔ Kristo abhɛn atú Masidónia ɛ̌ti yɛka ndɛp nɔkɔ awɔ antɨ bɛ běka bɔ̌mayɛsɛ mankɛm abhɛn atú Akáiya mǎnaŋ bǎtoŋti mmʉɛt ndu bɛchyɛ nɛkwak tɛ mmíɛ́ ɛyu. Nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn bǎfyɛ̀ ndǔ ndak anɛ ndu mɛ́nyɨ́kɨ́si batɨ̌ bɛyǎ bhap bɛ mántóŋtí awap akabhɛ́ nkáp nkwɔ.
93 Kɛ nchí to bɔ̌mayɛsɛ abhɛn ntá yɛka ndu bɛkʉ bɛ nɛpá anɛ sɛ́pànyu ɛ̌ti ɛyɛka ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ákɛ́ bhak ndɛ́ndɛm. Ɛnɛ, chi bɛkʉ bɛ mǎnkwáy bɛ́tóŋti mmʉɛt nɛ aywɛka akap mbɔ ɛnyǔ ngátí bhɔ bɛ chɔŋ mǎnkʉ.
94 Mbák ntwɔ́ awu nɛ mbɔk bǒnkwɔ Masidónia ɛnɛ́ bǎbhɨkɨ re toŋti mmʉɛt sayri, chɔŋ mbɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ ntíánwɔ́p mbɔnyunɛ ngátí bhɔ́ ɛnyǔ nsɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ bhe. Mbák ɛ́mfákárí nɔ, ntíánwɔ́p ɛnɛka nɛ́ya mbɔŋ nɛ́ncha.
95 Ɛ̌tiyɔ kɛ nkaysi yɛ bɛ ɛrɨ mfyɛ́ bɛtaŋ bɛ bɔ̌mayɛsɛ mánjámbɨ mántwɔ awu mǎntoŋti akap anɛ bǎfyɛ bariɛp bɛchyɛ kɛ mɛ̌ntwɔ. Ɛrɨ bɛkʉ bɛ akap wu ámbák chi anɛ áfù be antɨ, puyɛ̌ chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mányiɛrɛ be nyiɛrɛ mǎnkʉ.
96 Bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ mmǔ anɛ apɨ́ mbwɔt anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ ya, ǎghɛm mbwɔt anɛ abhɨkɨ ya. Kɛ mmǔ anɛ ápɨ́ bɛyǎ, ǎghɛm bɛyǎ.
97 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu abhɔŋ bɛchyɛ akap chi mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi akʉ ntɨ bɛchyɛ, puyɛ̌ chi nɛ basɛ́mɛ́ antɨ, nɛ ɛ́kɛ́bhak chi mbɔ bɛ bápùri yi puri, mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm akɔŋ mmu anɛ áchyɛ̀ akap nɛ maŋák.
98 Nɛ Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛtaŋ bɛchyɛ bhe áfɔ́k anɛ aya acha bɛ mǎmbɔŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́chɛ́bhɛ́ be ɛnyu ɛnɛ ɛ́ya ɛncha kpát mǎnkwáy bɛkwak bo abhɛn mɛnyɨŋ bɛchɛbhɛ bhɔ.
99 Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Mmu Mandɛm achi awɔ́ fúú. Ǎchyɛ bo abhɛn ɛyap ɛpu kɛyɨŋɨ nsɛm. Bɛrɨ́tí bɛtɨk ɛbhi bɛ́pú nɛm.”
910 Chɔŋ Mandɛm mmu áchyɛ̀ mbwɔt ntá nkwaŋankɨ nɛ ánchyɛ̀ nɛnyíɛ́ mɛnyiɛ anchyɛ be nkwɔ mbwɔt, ankʉ yɔ anjá ancha, nɛ ankʉ bɛrɨ́tí bɛtɨk ɛbhɛka mɛ́nchyɛ́ bɛyǎ mbwɔt.
911 Chɔŋ Mandɛm anchyɛ bhe kɛnɛ́m ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi bɛ mǎnkwáy bɛchyɛ tontó nɛ awɔ́ fúú. Nɛ akap aywɛka wu ámfʉɛt ntá yɛsɛ angaka ntá bo abhɛn bǎtò wu ntá yap, nɛ ánkʉ bɔ́ mánchyɛ́ Mandɛm bakak.
912 Bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn-nɛ bǎkʉ̀ bɛ́kwàk nkwɔ bo Kristo ndu mɛnyu bɛpay. Bɛ́kwàk bɔ mámbɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchɛbhɛ bhɔ nɛ bɛ́kwàk bɔ mánchyɛ́ Mandɛm bɛyǎ bakak.
913 Ndǔ bǎchɛ́mɛ́ nkáp nɛ bǎchyɛ́ bo bhɔ, bǎtɔŋ bɛ bǎkoŋo tɛtɛp anɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ bǎrɛm bɛ mǎnókó. Ndǔ bǎchyɛ ɛnyu yɔ nɛ awɔ fuu ndu bɛkwak bhɔ nɛ bo bachak, bo bághɔ nɛ báchyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó.
914 Ndu bɛrɔŋ ambɨ, chɔŋ bɔ́ mánɨk nɔkɔ mmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm ɛ̌ti yɛka. Bábhɔŋ ɛkɔŋ bɛghɔ bhe mbɔnyunɛ bághɔ bɛyǎ bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm amʉɛt yɛka.
915 Sɛ́nkáká nɔ́kɔ́ Mandɛm ndǔ akap anɛ yi áchyɛ́ anɛ mmu apú kway bɛrɛm ɛnyǔ wu achí.
10
101 Mɛmbɔŋ Pɔ̌l kɛ nchí nɨk be mmʉɛt ndǔ nnyɛ́n Kristo mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ nɛ nɛsɛptǐmʉɛt. Chi mɛ mmu mbɔk bho bárɛ̀m bɛ mpok nchí nɛ bhe bɛsí nɛ bɛsi nchí rɛm kɛpɨ nɛ bɛcháy, kɛ mpok mpu nɛ bhe nchí sɨŋ be bɛkáti nɛ bɛtaŋtí bɛyɔŋ.
102 Nchí nɨk be mmʉɛt bɛ bǎkɛ́ puri mɛ bɛ mbák bɛběbɛbe nɛ bhe mpok ntwɔ́ awu. Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ mbɔŋ bɛ́bhak bɛběbɛbe chi nɛ bo abhɛn bákàysi bɛ sɛ́kʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ bǒ mmɨk.
103 Yɛ̌ndu sɛ́chí ndǔ mmɨkɨ nɛ sɛ́pú nu mbɔ bǒ mmɨk.
104 Mɛnyɨŋɨ́ nɛnu ɛbhɛsɛ puyɛ̌ chi ɛbhɛn bakwǎŋwaŋ. Mandɛm kɛ áchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ bhɔ, nɛ bɛ́bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ bɛchɔŋti bɛpok ɛbhɛn bǒmpap abhɛsɛ bábhɛ̀sɛ.
105 Sɛ́chɔ̀ŋti nɛtaŋányu nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́té bɛchɛt bo mbi bɛ bákɛ́ rɨŋɨ baraka Mandɛm. Sɛ́kɛ̀m yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ nkaysi mbɔ mǔkɛnɔŋ anɛ bákɛ́mɛ́ ɛbhɨ̌nɛnu, nɛ sɛ́kʉ̀ yɔ ándɔ́bhɛ ghok chi Kristo.
106 Mpok mǎnaŋ bǎchyɛ mmʉɛt ɛnkɛm ntá Mandɛm, chɔŋ sɛ̌ntoŋti mmʉɛt bɛ́tɛ́msi yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ anɛ átaŋntí nɛ Kristo.
107 Bǎrɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛyɨŋɨ mɛ chi amfay amfay. Mbák yɛ mmu arɨŋɨ sayri bɛ yi achi nkoŋo Kristo, ándɨŋɨ bɛ bɛsɛ nkwɔ sɛchi bakoŋo Kristo mbɔ yi.
108 Yɛ̌ ɛmbak chi bɛ nchí dɛp awɔ antɨ tontó mandú ncha ɛnyǔ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ ɛ̌ti bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn Yesu Acha áchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ, ɛyɔ ɛpu kʉ mbɔ̌ŋ ntíánwɔ́p. Achyɛ́ mɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɔ chi bɛkʉ mǎngo, puyɛ̌ bɛkʉ mǎnkwɛn.
109 Mbɨ́kɨ́ yaŋ ɛmbak mbɔ bɛ mɛ̌sɔ̀t bɛkáti ɛbhɛn mɛ̌sɨ̀ŋ bɛkʉ mǎmbɔŋ bɛcháy.
1010 Mbɔk bho bárɛ̀m bɛ, “Bɛkati Pɔ̌l ásɨ̀ŋ bɛtaŋ bɛcha nɛ bɛyɔŋ ɛbhi bɛ́tɔ̀k mmu tɛ antɨ, kɛ mpok yi achi nɛ bhɛsɛ, apú bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ nɛ apú rɛm yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chwè bo antɨ.”
1011 Mɛnyǔ bǒbhɔ bábhɔŋ bɛrɨŋɨ bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́sɨ̀ŋ ndǔ bɛkáti mpok sɛ́pú awu, bɔ́ kɛ sɛ́kʉ chɔŋ mpok sɛ́bhak awu nɛ bhe.
1012 Puyɛ̌ bɛ sɛ́mɔ̀ bɛyɛnti mmʉɛt nɛ bo abhɛn bákàk mmʉɛt. Kɛ nɛyɛnti mmʉɛt ɛnap nɛ batɨ ndu bɛtɔŋ bɛ bácha bhɔ, nɛ́tɔ̀ŋ chi bɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ mbɔ̌ŋ kɛboŋ.
1013 Mbák chi bhɛsɛ, sɛ́pú pányu ɛncha ɛnyu sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ. Sɛ́tɨ bɛwɛnti chi ndǔ ndiɛrɛ anɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ bɛ sɛ́nkʉ sɛ́ngwɛnti arɛ́, nɛ be nkwɔ bǎchí ɛbhe ɛyɛsɛ.
1014 Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ kɨŋɨ ndiɛrɛ anɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ mpok sɛ́yambɨ sɛ́twɔ́ ntá yɛka. Bɛsɛ babhɔŋ kɛ sɛ́yambɨ sɛ́twɔ́ bhe nɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo.
1015 Sɛ́pú kɨŋɨ ndiɛrɛ anɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ ndu ɛbhɛsɛ bɛtɨk. Sɛ́bhaka ntɨ chi bɛ ndǔ nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ Kristo nɛ́gò nɛ́ndɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ, chɔŋ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛsɛ nkwɔ nɛntɨ ɛnɛka mɛ́ngo mɛndɔk nɔkɔ chí ambɨ.
1016 Mbák ɛchi nɔ, chɔŋ sɛ́nkway bɛrɔŋ bɛghati Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ amɛm bɛtɔk bɛchak ɛbhɛn yɛ̌ mmu abhɨkɨ re kʉ bɛtɨk arɛ́, kɛpányu ɛ̌ti bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn bɔ bákʉ́ ndǔ ɛbhe mmu achak.
1017 Kɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Yɛ̌ agha anɛ áyaŋ bɛ́panyu, ámpányu ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm Acha ákʉ́.”
1018 Puyɛ̌ mmu anɛ árɛ̀m ɛrɨ́rɨ́ ɛ̌ti mmʉɛt ɛyi kɛ Mandɛm Acha ásɔt nɛ maŋák, chi mmu anɛ Mandɛm árɛ̀m ɛrɨrɨ ɛ̌ti yi.
11
111 Nchí nɨkmʉɛt bɛ mǎnkɛpntɨ nɛ mɛ ndu nchí rɛm kɛpɨ mbɔ ɛchɨŋtɨ́mu. Kɛ́p ká ntɨ nɛ mɛ.
112 Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ nkɔŋ be nɛ mpabhamɨ́k anɛ Mandɛm. Nsɔt be mbɔ ngɔsɔ́ŋ anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mbakanɛn nɛ nnáŋ mfyɛ́ bariɛp nɛ mmǔ amɔt anɛ ábháy bhe. Mmǔ wu chi Kristo.
113 Kɛ mbɔŋ bɛcháy bɛ bǒfú bákway bɛrwɔ bhe mbɔ ɛnyǔ Satan ásɔ́rɛ́ nyaka bapu mi arwɔ́ Ifa, ɛ́nkʉ nkaysi ayɛka ampɔkɔ bhe mǎngurɛ ɛbhɨ, kɛpɛrɛ koŋo mbi Kristo nɛ ntɨ nɛmɔt ɛnɛn nɛchi pɛ́pɛ́p.
114 Nchí rɛm nɔ mbɔnyunɛ ɛchi mbɔ bhɛ mbák mmu atwɔ ntá yɛka aghati bhe ɛnyɨŋ, yɛ̌ yi árɛ̀m chi ɛ̌ti Yesu achak anɛ achi kɛkúrí nɛ anɛ sɛ́ghàti bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti yi, mǎnoko nóko. Nɛ yɛ̌ árɛ̀m chi ɛ̌ti ɛfóŋó ɛnɛ ɛchi kɛkúrí nɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm mmu mǎnɛnɛ batɨ ntá yi bǎkaka, nɛ yɛ̌ árɛ̀m chi ɛ̌ti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ achi kɛkúrí nɛ anɛ mǎnókó, mǎnsɔrɛ sɔt amɔ apay.
115 Mbɨ́kɨ́ kaysi bɛ bo abhɛn bǎsɔt bɛ bachi manɛm bǒnto bacha mɛ.
116 Ngufú mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛrɛm kɛpɨ, kɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ nchí rɛm, nɛ sɛ́naŋ sɛ́kʉ be mǎndɨŋɨ nɔ́ kpoŋoroŋ ndɔŋ nɛ ndɔŋ, nɛ ndǔ bɛyǎ babhi.
117 Mpok ngátí bhe Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ Mandɛm, mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɛp be nkáp. Nsɛ́ptímʉɛ́t ntá yɛka ndu bɛkwak mǎmbak manɛ́m bo. Nkʉ̌ nyaka nɔ chi bɛbʉ́ kɛ?
118 Nchí sɔt nyaka nkáp ntá bakwɔ́ bho achak ndǔ bɛkwak bhe.
119 Nɛ mpok nchí awu nɛ bhe nkɛ bhɔŋ nkáp mbɨ́kɨ́ chyɛ yɛ̌ mmu ywɛka ɛsɔŋɔri mbɔnyunɛ batɨ bɔ̌mayɛsɛ abhɛn báfú atú Masidónia kɛ báchyɛ̀ nyaka mɛ nɛkwak. Mbɨ́kɨ́ chyɛ bhe ntu wa bɛ mǎmpɔkɔ wáwák. Nɛ ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ nchí bhak.
1110 Ndǔ tɛtɛp Kristo achi nɛ mɛ, nchí rɛm bɛ yɛ̌ mmu apú kway bɛkʉ mɛ mbɔt bɛdɛp awɔ antɨ ndǔ atú Akáiya ankɛm.
1111 Nchí kʉ nɔ ndak yi? Chi bɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ kɔŋ be kɛ? Wáwák! Mandɛm arɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ nkɔŋ be!
1112 Nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ nchí kʉ, chɔŋ ndɔk ambɨ bɛkʉ yɔ, bɛ́ mkpɔt bɛkak bo abhɛn bárɛ̀m bɛ bákʉ̀ bɛtɨk ɛbhap nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ mɛ́kʉ̀ ɛbha.
1113 Mɛnyǔ bǒbhɔ puyɛ̌ bǒnto abhɛn tɛtɛp. Chi bo abhɛn báyíbhírí mkpá, nɛ bárwɔ̀ bho ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn bɔ bákʉ bɛ báchi bǒnto Kristo.
1114 Ndak anɛ apu anɛ́ maknkay. Yɛ̌ chí mbɔŋ Satan ǎyibhiri mkpá ankʉ mbɔ bɛ achi ángɛl anɛ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ Mandɛm bɛ́ghɔ̀ yi amʉɛt.
1115 Ɛ́pú yɛ́ ɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay mbák bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk Satan bákʉ̀ nkwɔ mbɔ bɛ báchí bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chak bɛsí Mandɛm. Ndǔ ngwɛnti yap bábhɔŋ chi nsáy bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn bɔ bákʉ̀. 
1116 Mpɛt nchí rɛm bɛ, yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́ kaysi bɛ ntí ábhɨ́kɨ́ kway mɛ amɛm. Mbák bǎkaysi nɔ, sɔt ká mɛ ɛnyu ɛnɛ bǎkway bɛghok ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mmu anɛ ntí abhɨkɨ kway yi amɛm árɛ̀m, bɛ́ mɛnkwɔ ndɛp awɔ antɨ mandú.
1117 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mɛ́rɛ̀m puyɛ̌ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Acha aghati mɛ. Nchí rɛm chi mbɔ ɛchɨŋtímu.
1118 Tɛ̌ndu bɛyǎ bo bápànyu ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bakwǎŋwaŋ básɔ̀t bɛ bɛbhɔŋ mɛnwɔp be mǎngok nɔkɔ nsé yap, bǎbhɔŋ yɛ bɛghok mɛnyɨŋɨ́ tɛtɛp ɛbhɛn mbɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́gháti bhe ɛ̌ti mmʉɛt ɛya.
1119 Bě bho bǎchi barɨŋɨ́ndak, bǎchɔ̀kɔ mǎngoko nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchɨŋtǐ bho bárɛ̀m nɛ maŋák.
1120 Bǎkà bo abhɛn bábhʉ̀rɛ bhe mbɔ basɛm nɛ mányiɛ bhe nsɛm amɔt, nɛ mányìɛrɛ be amɨk, nɛ báyɨŋɨ be fúú kpát bádɛn be.
1121 Ɛ̌! Mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nɔ chi bɛtaŋ-ɛ! Foŋorí ká mɛ bɛ mpú kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ ntá yɛka. Chɔŋ ndɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm mbɔ ɛchɨŋtímu. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ mmu ándɛp awɔ antɨ, mɛ nkwɔ mɛ̌kwáy bɛdɛp awɔ antɨ ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛyɔ.
1122 Mbák bádɛ̀p awɔ antɨ bɛ́ báchi bo Hibru, mɛ nkwɔ nchí mmu Hibru. Mbák báchí bo Israɛl, mɛ nkwɔ nchí mmu Israɛl. Mbák báchi bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Ábraham, mɛ nkwɔ nchí ɛbhárɛ́mɔ Ábraham.
1123 Mbák báchi bǒ bɛtok Kristo, mɛ nchá bhɔ́. [Nchí rɛm mbɔ ɛbhokori mmu.] Nkʉ bɛtɨk nchá bɔ́ mankɛm. Nchwe kɛnɔŋ ndɔŋ nɛ ndɔŋ ncha yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu, mǎntɛm áyá acha, nɛ ndɔp kɛ́kwɔ́t bɛgu ndɔŋ nɛ ndɔŋ.
1124 Bo Israɛl mánaŋ bádɛp mɛ nnɛt nɛ ɛ́kpá ndɔŋ ɛsǎ nsɛm nɛkú nɛ ɛnwi. Bákʉ nɔ ndɔŋ ɛtay.
1125 Bǒ Rom bádɛ́n mɛ nɛ ɛ́kpa kɛnɔŋ ndɔŋ ɛ́rát. Bo bátɛ́mti mɛ nɛ batay ndu bɛway ndɔŋ amɔt. Achwi abɛt anyɛ́n nɛ mɛ ndɔŋ ɛ́rát. Achwi árákáti amɛm manyu ɛkʉ ngɔ́kɔ́nyɛn ndǔ bɛti mɛ́mɔt nɛ nywɔp nɛ́mɔt.
1126 Mfórí nɛwú bɛyǎ mpok ɛnɛ́ mɛ́rɔ̀ŋ nɛkɔ. Mfórí nɛwú amɛm manyɛ́n anɛ ájwí ágbóko, mfori nɛwú amɔ bɛtaŋtí baghɛ́p nɛ amɔ́ batɨ̌ bo Israɛl nɛ abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl. Mfórí nɛwú amɛm bɛtɔk bɛgho, nɛ amɛm baso, nɛ amɛm manyu nɛ amɔ́ bǒnkwɔ abhɛn bɛtábhá.
1127 Nnáŋ nkʉ bɛtɨk, nsɔŋɔri mmʉɛt bɛyǎ mpok nkɛ kway bɛbhʉrɛ kɛnɔ́, nɛ nchɔ́kɔ́ nsay nkɛ kwáy bɛbhɔŋ yɛ̌ manyiɛp mɛnyu nɛ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn nɛ́kwáy mɛ, nɛ mbʉ́ɛ́p ákɔ́k mɛ ndu mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ndɛn bɛkuti mmʉɛt.
1128 Bɛsɔŋɔri bɛchak bɛ́chí kɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ yaŋ bɛrɛm ɛ̌ti bɛsɔŋɔri yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛwak. Puyɛ̌ chi ndiɛrɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn. Mbɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ basɛ́mɛ́ bɛyɨŋɨ ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ běka bakwɔ́ Kristo bǎchi.
1129 Agha ákway bɛbhɔŋ bɛ́kwɛ́nɛ́ kɛ ɛ́kɛbhak ntá ya mbɔ bɛ mɛ kɛ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ ɛbhɔ? Agha bákway bɛkʉ yi ankwɛn ndu bɛbʉ́ kɛ ntɨ̌ kɛdu mɛ amɛm nɛ bɛběntɨ?
1130 Mbák mbɔŋ bɛdɛp awɔ antɨ chɔŋ nkʉ nɔ chi ndu mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ.
1131 Mandɛm Mmu achí Chi ntá Yesu Acha arɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ mpú sénse. Bakak ámbak nɛ yi ngwɛnti ti.
1132 Mpok nchí ɛtɔk Damáskɔs, Gɔ́bhanɔ anɛ mfɔ ngo Arɛtas afyɛ́, áchyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu mambabhɛri nɔkɔ nyǔbha anɛ́ ɛtɔk ɛnyu ɛnɛ bɔ bákway bɛkɛm mɛ.
1133 Kɛ bǒnkwɔ bákʉ nchwe amɛm ɛkay ɛnɛ básɛ́rɛ́ nnɨk arɛ bátɔ́ ndu mbok anɛ achi ankok, básɛ́bhɛ mɛ amɨk, mbʉɛ.
12
121 Mbɔŋ bɛrɔŋ ambɨ bɛdɛp awɔ́ antɨ yɛ̌ndu nsáy ápú arɛ́. Kɛ dɔ̌ ká ngati bhe ɛ̌ti kɛnɔ́ amɨ́k anti fúú, ɛkɛn ngɔ́ nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Yesu Acha ákʉ́ mɛ ndɨŋɨ.
122 Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ mmǔ anɛ achi nyaka nkoŋo Kristo. Ɛ́gháká mamiɛ́ byo nɛ anwi ɛchɔŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm ásɔ́rɛ́ yi tɛ amfay.
123 Mpɛt nchí rɛm bɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ Mandɛm asɔt nyaka mmu wu árɔk Paradays* nɛ yi, kɛ chí ndu ɛfóŋó kɛ chí ndu nkwɔmʉɛt a, mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ. Mbɔŋ Mandɛm kɛ árɨ́ŋɨ́.
124 Arɛ́, aghók mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmu ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛghati bho ɛnyǔ bɔ bɛchi, nɛ mmu apú kway mbɔŋ bɛrɛm ɛnyǔ bɛchi.
125 Mbɔŋ bɛdɛp awɔ antɨ ɛ̌ti mmu wu, kɛ mpú kʉ nɔ ɛ̌ti mmʉɛ́t ɛya. Nchi dɛp awɔ antɨ chi ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ.
126 Yɛ̌ ɛmbak chi bɛ nchí yaŋ bɛdɛp awɔ antɨ mpú bhak ɛchɨŋtímu mbɔnyunɛ nchí rɛm chi tɛtɛp. Kɛ mpú kʉ nɔ́ ndǔ mpú yáŋ bɛ yɛ̌ mmu ánkáysí bɛ ncha ɛnyǔ mmu ɛnɛ yi ághɔ̀ nɛ ɛnɛ́ yi ághòk mɛ̌rɛm bɛ nchí.
127 Ndu bɛkʉ bɛ nkɛ́ pányu ɛ̌ti bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ́ mɛndɨ́ŋɨ́, áchyɛ́ mɛ ɛsɔŋɔri. Mbák mbɔ mmu anɛ báfyɛ́ yi nsé amʉɛt. Ɛsɔŋɔri ɛyɔ ɛbhak ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Satan átó bɛ ɛ́nyíɛ́rɛ́ mɛ amɨk, ɛ́nkaŋ mɛ nkɛ pányu.
128 Nnɨk Yesu Acha mmʉɛt ndɔŋ ɛ́rát bɛ yi amfɛrɛ mɛ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ amʉɛt.
129 Kɛ akɛmɛ mɛ bɛ, “Bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbha bɛ́kway nɛ wɔ mbɔnyunɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbha bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ kpoŋoroŋ chi amʉɛt bo abhɛn mmʉɛt apú bhɔ.” Ndu ɛchi yɛ̌ nɔ, chɔŋ ndɔk ambɨ bɛdɛp awɔ́ antɨ nɛ maŋák ɛ̌ti mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ, bɛ bɛtaŋ Kristo mɛ́mbak nɛ mɛ.
1210 Ɛ̌ti Kristo, nchí yɛ maŋák bɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ, yɛ̌ básɔ̀kɔti mɛ sɔkɔti, yɛ̌ mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́taŋa taŋ ntá ya, nɛ yɛ̌ nchí bhɔŋ nɛnyok mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu, nɛ yɛ̌ báchyɛ̀ mɛ chi bɛsɔŋɔri. Ɛchi nɔ mbɔnyunɛ mpok anɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ kɛ nchí taŋ sayri. 
1211 Ndɛm kɛpɨ mbɔ ɛchɨŋtímu. Bě kɛ̌ bǎpúrí mɛ nkʉ nɔ mbɔnyunɛ, be kɛ bǎbhɔŋɔ bɛghati bho ɛnyǔ mmu mɛ nchí. Yɛ̌ndu mpú yɛ̌nyɨŋ, bǒnto abhɛn bǎyòŋ nɔ manyɛ́n ayap amfay bábhɨkɨ cha mɛ.
1212 Mpok nchí awu nɛ bhe nkʉ mɛnyɨŋ bɛtɔŋ be bɛ nchí mǔnto tɛtɛp. Mbɔ́ŋ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ́ nɛ nkʉ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu.
1213 Ndiɛrɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ kʉ ntá yɛka ɛnɛ́ nkʉ ntá bakwɔ́ Kristo bachak ncha chi bɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɛp bhe nɛkwak? Foŋorí ká mɛ ndǔ nɛfʉɔp ɛnɔ!
1214 Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ nnáŋ ntóŋtí bɛ́twɔ bɛghɔ bhe ndu ndɔŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́jwí ɛ́rát. Mpú bhak chɔŋ ntu ntá yɛka mbɔnyunɛ be kɛ mɛ̌yaŋ, puyɛ̌ bakap ayɛka. Ɛchi nɔ mbɔnyunɛ puyɛ̌ mǎmbɔ kɛ babhɔŋɔ bɛbhʉrɛ mɛnyɨŋ ntá bachi nɛ manɔ bhap, chi bachi nɛ manɔ kɛ bábhɔŋɔ bɛbhʉrɛ mɛnyɨŋ ntá bɔ̌bhap.
1215 Chɔŋ mbɔŋ bɛyǎ maŋák bɛchyɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mbɔ́ŋɔ́, yɛ̌ chi mmʉɛt ɛya, ndu bɛkwak bhe. Ndǔ ɛkɔŋ ɛya nɛ bhe ɛ́gò ɛ́ndɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ, ɛyɛka nɛ mɛ ɛ́may nɔkɔ may kɛ?
1216 Sayri sayri, bákà nɛ mɛ bɛ mpok ntwɔ́ awu, mpú sɔt nyaka mɛnyɨŋ ntá yɛka, yɛ̌ nɔ mbɔk bárɛ̀m bɛ nchí mmu bɛtábhá, nɛ bɛ nchí sɔt mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛka ndu ngwáy.
1217 Ndǔ nkwɔ bho abhɛn ntó ntá yɛka, yɛ̌ amɔt ábhɨ́kɨ́ sɔt nnyɛ́n ɛna bɛrwɔ bhe. Ɛ́pú nɔ kɛ?
1218 Nnɨk nyáka Táytɔs nɛ mɔmáyɛsɛ bɛ mántwɔ́ awu ntá yɛka. Átwɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ asɔt mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛka ndǔ ngwáy kɛ? Mɛ nɛ Táytɔs sɛ́bhɔŋ chi nkaysi amɔt. Pú nɔ́? Bɛsɛ nɛ yi sɛ́bhɔŋ chi ɛkakánɛkɔ ɛ́mɔt. Pú nɔ́?
1219 Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, bǎkáysí bɛ ndu mpok anɛ nkɛm sɛ́rɛ̀m mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn chi ndu bɛ́táŋá mmʉɛt ntá yɛka kɛ? Wáwák! Sɛ́rɛ̀m chi ɛnyǔ Kristo áyàŋ bɛ sɛ́ndɛm nɛ bɛsí Mandɛm. Sɛ́kʉ̀ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ chi bɛ mǎnsɛ́nɛ́ ndǔ mbi Mandɛm.
1220 Mbɔ̌ŋ bɛcháy bɛ ngufú mpok ntwɔ́ awu bɛghɔ bhe nchí kway bɛtɛmɛri bhe ndu nte anɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ káysi bɛtɛmɛri bhe, nɛ be nkwɔ mǎngɔ bɛ mpú ndu nte anɛ bǎkaysi bɛghɔ mɛ. Ngufú, nchí kway bɛtɛmɛri bhe ndǔ bǎgwà, nɛ ndǔ bǎbhɔ̀ŋ mpabhamɨ́k nɛ batɨ, nɛ ndǔ ɛchókóntɨ, nɛ ndǔ mǎŋɛm mɛŋɛ́mɛ́, nɛ ndǔ bǎchɔŋti manyɛ́n batɨ, nɛ ndǔ ɛnaŋti, nɛ ndǔ ɛpɨŋ bɛkáysi bɛ bǎcha batɨ, nɛ ndǔ bǎkʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ táká táká.
1221 Mbɔ̌ŋ bɛcháy bɛ nnáŋ mpɛt ntwɔ awu chɔŋ Ɛta Mandɛm ánkʉ mbɔ́ŋ ntíánwɔ́p bɛsí ɛbhɛka, nɛ mbak ndǔ nɛdǐ kɛbhɔ ɛ̌ti bɛyǎ bǒ ahbɛn bákʉ̀ nyaka bɛbʉ́ nɛ bábhʉɛt bɛkʉ bɛpɔ̌ mɛnyɨŋ, nɛ ɛpúsí, nɛ mányiɛ bɛpǎ ɛpusi.
13
131 Ndɔŋ anɛ ákʉ́ ɛ́rát ɛnɛ nchí twɔ bɛghɔ bɛ bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ mbák bo mándɛm bɛ mmǔ ákʉ́ ndak, bábhɔŋ bɛ́twɔ nɛ batísiɛ bapay, mbák apu nɔ, barat.
132 Mpok ntwɔ́ awu ndǔ nɛkɔ ɛnɛn nɛ́jwí ndɔŋ ɛpay, njɛp batú bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ bɛbʉ́ nɛ bǒnkwɔ bachak mankɛm. Nɛ́nɛ, mpɛt nchí sɛmti bhɔ ɛnɛ́ mpú awu nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ nkʉ nyaka mpok ntwɔ́ awu bɛ, mbák mpɛ́t ntwɔ, mpú rɔ bhɔ ɛnyu ɛyɔ.
133 Chɔŋ nkʉ mǎngɔ bɛrɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ nchí rɛm chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú ntá Kristo. Apú kɛm be mbɔ mmǔ anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ. Ǎtɔŋ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi mpok áchí nɛntɨ ɛnɛka.
134 Yɛ̌ndu bágó yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí mbɔ mmu anɛ abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ, Mandɛm ákʉ́ yi apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Bɛsɛ nkwɔ sɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ ndu sɛ́bhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ yi. Kɛ ndu sɛ́tòk bhe, chɔŋ sɛ́mbɔŋ nɛpɛ́m nɛ Kristo ndǔ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm.
135 Chák ká mmʉɛt bɛghɔ mbák, ndǔ ɛkakánɛkɔ ɛyɛka, bǎkòŋo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mǎnókó. Yɨŋɨ́ ká mmʉɛt. Mbák ɛpu nɔ, nɔ́ bǎkwɛn nɛmɔ.
136 Nókó ká bɛ chɔŋ mǎngɔ bɛ sɛbhɨkɨ kwɛn nɛmɔ.
137 Sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm bɛ bǎkɛ́ kʉ nɛfwɔp. Sɛ́pú kʉ nɔ chi bɛkʉ bo mángɔ́ bɛ sɛ́chí chak. Sɛ́yáŋ chi bɛ mǎmbák chak, yɛ̌ndu bǎkway bɛyɨŋɨ bhɛsɛ mbɔ bo abhɛn babhɔŋɔ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́.
138 Yɛ̌ ɛmbak yi, sɛpú kway bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́chɛt tɛtɛp mbi. Sɛ́kʉ̀ chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛkʉ tɛtɛp anɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ándɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ambɨ.
139 Sɛ́bhɔ̀ŋ maŋák mbák bǎtaŋ, yɛ ɛ́mbak chi bɛ sɛbhɨkɨ taŋ. Sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm bɛ nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ́ngó nɛnjwi pɔɔt.
1310 Nti anɛ nchí sɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ ntá yɛka ambɨ ambɨ chi bɛ mpok anɛ mɛ̌twɔ chɔŋ awu, nkɛ́sɔt bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ́ mɛ mbak bɛběbɛbe nɛ bhe. Mandɛm achyɛ́ mɛ bhɔ chi bɛkʉ mǎnte ndǔ nɛka ɛnɛka, puyɛ̌ chi bɛkʉ mǎnkwɛn.
1311 Bɔ̌ma, bɛrɔŋ ndǔ ngwɛnti, ghók ká maníɛ́ ma, mǎnchɔkɔ sayri. Nyurɛ́ ká ɛkakánɛkɔ ɛyɛka, mǎmbak ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt nɛ batɨ. Bák ká sayri nɛ bo báchák. Mbák mǎnkʉ nɔ, chɔŋ Mandɛm mmu ákɔŋ bhɛsɛ nɛ ǎchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ kpák, ambak nɛ bhɛsɛ, ambak nɛ bhe.
1312 Kaká ka batɨ sayri mbɔ bo Mandɛm.
1313 Bǒnkwɔ mankɛm abhɛn báchí fá bátò nkwɔ bhe bakak.
1314 Yesu Kristo Acha ántɔ́ŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu, nɛ ɛkɔŋ Mandɛm ɛmbak amɛm batɨ yɛka, nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt ɛnɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ áchyɛ̀ ɛmbak nɛ be mankɛm.13
1 
11 Mɛ Pɔ̌l mǔnto Yesu Kristo kɛ nchí sɨ́ŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Puyɛ̌ bakwǎŋwaŋ kɛ báyábhɛ́ mɛ, nɛ puyɛ̌ nkwǎ kɛ átó mɛ. Chi Yesu Kristo nɛ Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ mmu akʉ Yesu ampɛtnsɛm ndu nɛpɛ́m.
12 Nchí sɨ́ŋ ntá yɛka bǒnkwɔ abhɛn atú Galéshia, nɛ batɨ bǒnkwɔ abhɛn báchí fá nɛ mɛ bachɛm nɛ mɛ bɛ́to be bakak.
13 Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha mántɔŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu, mánchyɛ bhe kpák.
14 Yesu Kristo achyɛ́ nyaka mmʉɛt ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ bhɛsɛ ndǔ mkpáká mmɨk bɛbʉ́ anɛ ɛchɔŋ. Akʉ nɔ bɛ́kɔ́ŋɔ nkaysi Mandɛm mmu achi Ɛtayɛsɛ.
15 Yi kɛ bo mankɛm bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́chyɛ́ kɛnókó ngwɛnti ti. Amen. 
16 Ɛchí mɛ maknkay bɛ́ bǎtɨŋ bǎrɔ̀ Mandɛm mmu ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ be ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu Kristo bɛ mambák bǒbhi, nɛ bárɔ́bhɛ́ koŋo chí Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ achak.
17 Puyɛ̌ chi mbɔŋ bɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ achak achi, kɛ mbɔk bo báfyɛ̀ bhe ɛbyɔk antɨ nɛ báyàŋ chí bɛ́yibhiri Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Kristo ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛchak.
18 Kɛ yɛ̌ ɛmbák chi bɛsɛ, yɛ̌ chí ángɛl kɛ ághátí bhe mbok anɛ áchí kɛkúrí nɛ anɛ sɛ́ghátí bhe, ɛyak ɛmbak nɛ yi.
19 Mbɔ ɛnyǔ sɛ́náŋ sɛ́gháti bhe, mpɛt nchí ghati bhe bɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ághàti bhe mbok anɛ achí kɛkúrí nɛ anɛ sɛ́ghàti nyaka bhe, mǎnókó, ɛyak ɛmbak nɛ yi.
110 Nchí yaŋ nɛ chí bɛ bo mankak mɛ kɛ? Wáwák! Mandɛm kɛ̌ mɛ̌yaŋ ánkák mɛ. Nchí yaŋ chí bɛ́ bo mambɔŋ maŋák nɛ mɛ kɛ? Mbɔ mbʉɛ́t chí mmu anɛ nchí yaŋ bɛ bo mambɔŋ maŋák nɛ mɛ, mbʉ mpú mmɔ̌bɛtok Kristo. 
111 Bɔ̌ma, dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ ngátí bhe abhɨki fu ndǔ nkaysi bakwǎŋwaŋ,
112 abhɨ́kɨ́ fu ntá nkwǎ, nɛ yɛ̌ nkwǎŋwaŋ abhɨkɨ tɔŋ mɛ. Mbɔŋ Yesu Kristo kɛ ákʉ́ mɛndɨ́ŋɨ́ yɔ.
113 Bǎghok ɛnyǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛna nɛchi nyaka mpok mɛ́kòŋo bɛpɨŋɨ́ bo Israɛl, bǎghók ndu nchí chyɛ nyaka bǒnkwɔ Mandɛm bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri, nnu nɔkɔ bɛ nnáŋá nkwɔ wap.
114 Nchí nu nyaka tontó bɛ́kóŋo bɛpɨŋ abhɛn bachǐmbɨ bha. Nɛ nchí koŋo nyaka mbi Mandɛm bo Israɛl nɛ ntɨ ɛna nɛnkɛm, kpát ncha bo Israɛl báchák abhɛn ɛkaká nɛbhe ɛya.
115 Kɛ Mandɛm anáŋ ayap nyaka mɛ tɛ ndǔ mpok anɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ re bhe mɛ. Ayap mɛ ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi, abhɨŋɨ mɛ bɛ mbak mmɔ̌bɛtok ayi.
116 Abhɔ́ŋ maŋák bɛkʉ mɛndɨ́ŋɨ́ Mɔ́ywi, bɛ mbɔ́ŋ mbi bɛghati bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu ntá bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl. Ákʉ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, mbɨ́kɨ́ rɔŋ ntá yɛ̌ mmu bɛ anchyɛ mɛ maniɛ.
117 Yɛ̌ chí Yerúsalɛm mbɨ́kɨ́ ko ndɔk bɛghɔ bo abhɛn báyámbɨ bɛbhak bǒnto kɛ mɛ̌twɔ ansɛm. Ndɔkɔ́rɔ́ŋ téé atú Arébia, kɛ ɛ́tárɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, mpɛtnsɛm Damáskɔs.
118 Ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ mamiɛ́ arat, ndɔk Yerúsalɛm bɛghɔ Píta. Mbak nɛ yí ndu manywɔp nɛkú.
119 Nkɛ ghɔ yɛ̌ mǔnto achak arɛ, ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ fʉɛ́t Jems, manɔ Yesu Acha.
120 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ́sɨ̀ŋ ntá yɛka ɛchi tɛtɛp. Mandɛm arɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ mpu sénse.
121 Mfá nɔ́kɔ́ Yerúsalɛm, ndɔk nkó atú Síria nɛ atú Silísha nkwɔ.
122 Bě bǒnkwɔ Kristo atú Judɛ́ya bǎbhɨkɨ re ghɔ nyaka mɛ nɛ amɨ́k.
123 Bághòk nyaka ghok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo bárɛ̀m ɛ̌ti ya bɛ, “Mmǔ nyaka áchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ ɛsɔŋɔri, arɔbhɛ ghati chí bo bɛ mbák mmu ásɨ́kɨ́ntɨ nɛ Yesu Kristo, Mandɛm ǎpɛmɛ yi, ɛnɛ́ nkúbhɛ́ nɛsɨkɨ́ntɨ nɛ Kristo kɛ yi ánù nyaka bɛ́chɔ́ŋti.”
124 Ɛkʉ́ bo bare bɨti Mandɛm ɛ̌ti ya.
2
21 Ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ mamiɛ́ byo nɛ anwi, mpɛt nkó ndɔk Yerúsalɛm nɛ Banábas. Nsɔt Táytɔs sɛ́rɔ́k nɛ yi.
22 Ndɔk mbɔ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm akʉ nyaka mɛndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ mbɔŋ bɛ́rɔŋ arɛ́. Ngáká nɔ́kɔ́ arɛ, mɛ nɛ bǒbati sɛ́chɔ́kɔ́ ansɛm ansɛm, nkʉ bɔ mándɨ́ŋɨ́ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ mɛ́ghàti bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl. Nkʉ nɔ bɛ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn mɛ̌kʉ̀ nɛ ɛbhɛn mbʉ́ɛ́t bɛkʉ bɛkɛ bhak ndɛ́ndɛm.
23 Táytɔs mmu ákɔ̀ nɛ mɛ abhak mmu Grik. Yɛ̌ nɔ, bákɛ te mbɔŋ kákáti bɛ mánsíɛ́p yi.
24 Kɛ bǒ nse bachwe ndu nkwɔ bakoŋo Yesu ansɛm ansɛm mánjaŋa nɔkɔ bɛ mansyɛp yi. Mánɔ́nɛ báchwe ndu nkwɔ ywɛsɛ ndu bɛghɔ ɛnyu sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ ngangaŋ amfǎy bɛbhé bo Israɛl, ndu sɛbharɛ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo. Báyàŋ nyaka bɛ sɛ́mpɛ́tnsɛm ndu kɛsɛm antɛnɛ bɛbhé bo Israɛl.
25 Sɛ́kɛ chyɛ bhɔ mbi yɛ mandú. Sɛ́kɛ yáŋ bɛ bɔ manchɔŋti tɛtɛp anɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́, tɛ̌ndu bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɔŋ ambɨ mɛnoko yɔ.
26 Mbák chí bo abhɛn báyábhɛ́ bɛ́ mámbák bǒbati ntá bǒnkwɔ, bɛtaŋ ɛbhap bɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ mɛ. Mandɛm ápú tɔŋ kɛ́rɨ́ŋámík. Bɔ́ bábhɨ́kɨ́ tɔ́ŋ mɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛkɔ mɛ́máka ndǔ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ mɛ̌ghàti bho.
27 Bághɔ́ bɛ tɛtɛp, Mandɛm kɛ afyɛ́ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ amɔya bɛ ngati bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi akʉ nɛ Píta bɛ yi angati Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ntá bo Israɛl.
28 Nkúbhɛ́ mmu anɛ áchyɛ́ Píta bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn ntá bo Israɛl, kɛ áchyɛ́ mɛ nkwɔ bɛtaŋ, bɛkʉ bɔ ntá abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl.
29 Jems nɛ Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n báchí nyaka mbɔ bɛkwap nɛntɨ bǒnkwɔ. Bághɔ́ nɔkɔ bɛ́ Mandɛm afyɛ́ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn amɔ́ya tɛtɛp, bákáka mɛ nɛ Banábas nɛ amɔ́ ndu bɛ́tɔŋ bɛ́ bɛsɛ́ nɛ bhɔ sɛchi ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt. Sɛ́ka nɛ bhɔ bɛ́ mɛ nɛ Banábas sɛbhɔŋ bɛ́rɔŋ ntá bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl nɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́, bɔ mándɔk ntá bo Israɛl.
210 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt kɛ baghati bɛsɛ, nɔ chi bɛ, sɛkɛ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛchyɛ nɔkɔ nɛkwak ntá bachɛ́bhɛ́bho abhɛn Yerúsalɛm, nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi nyaka mɛ antɨ bɛ́kʉ. 
211 Píta átwɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ Antiɔk, nji yi bɛsí bhi mbɔnyunɛ akʉ nyaka ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛpu chak.
212 Mpok yí áyámbɨ átwɔ́, are nyíɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl. Kɛ bo abhɛn Jems átó bátwɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́, abho bɛya mmʉɛt ansɛm, akɛpɛrɛ nyíɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ bo abhɛn bapu bo Israɛl, ndu áchay nkwɔ́ bo abhɛn bárɛ̀m bɛ babhɔŋ bɛsyɛp yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nkoŋo Yesu anɛ apu mmu Israɛl.
213 Bo Israɛl bachak abhɛn bachi bakoŋo Yesu babho bɛkʉ bɛtábhá mbɔ Píta, ɛnyu ɛnɛ́, yɛ̌ chi Banábas nkwɔ akʉ́ ɛnyumɔt mbɔ bhɔ.
214 Kɛ ngɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ bápú kɔ ndɔ́ŋ amɔt nɛ tɛtɛp anɛ achi ndu Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́, mfate ngati Píta bɛsí bhap mankɛm bɛ, “Mbák wɔ mmu Israɛl ɔ̌kʉ̀ mbɔ mmu anɛ apu mmu Israɛl, ndaká yi ɔ́nù bɛkʉ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl mámbák mbɔ bo Israɛl?” 
215 Bɛsɛ́ babhɔŋ sɛ́chí bo Israɛl, bɔtayɛsɛ nkwɔ bo Israɛl. Sɛ́pú bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl, bɔ́ bhǒ bo bárɛ̀m bɛ báchi bǒ bɛbʉ́.
216 Yɛ̌ nɔ, bɛsɛ bo Israɛl sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ puyɛ̌ bɛbhʉrɛ bɛbhé bo Israɛl kɛ ákʉ mmu ambak chak bɛsí Mandɛm, chi bɛsɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ Yesu Kristo. Yɛ̌ chi bɛsɛ sɛ́nókó Yesu Kristo bɛ Mandɛm ansɔt bɛsɛ mbɔ bo abhɛn bachi chak ɛ̌ti nɛka ɛnɛsɛ nɛ Kristo, puyɛ̌ chi ɛ̌ti sɛ́bhʉ̀rɛ bɛbhé. Ɛchi ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ, bɛbhʉrɛ bɛbhé apú kʉ yɛ̌ mmu ambak chak bɛsí Mandɛm.
217 Mbák ndu sɛ́yaŋ bɛbhak chak bɛsí Mandɛm kɛ sɛ́bhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo, kɛ ɛ́mfakari bɛ bɛsɛ babhɔŋ sɛ́kʉ̀ bɛbʉ́, nɔ Kristo ǎtó bhɛsɛ ndǔ bɛbʉ́ kɛ? Wáwák!
218 Kɛ mbák mpɛ́tnsɛm ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nnáŋ ndɔ́, nɔ nchí mbɔ̌ŋ mmu bɛbʉ́.
219 Mbák chi mɛ, bɛyɨŋɨ bɛbhé Moses ndɔp chi ngú, mbɔnyunɛ bɛbhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ mɛ. Ɛ́fákári ɛnyu ɛyɔ bɛ́ mbák nɛpɛ́m bɛsí Mandɛm.
220 Bágó mɛ ndǔ ɛkotákátí nɛ Kristo. Nɛ́nɛ, nɛpɛ́m ɛna fá amɨk puyɛ̌ ɛna, chi ɛ́nɛ́n Kristo mmu achi nɛ mɛ. Nɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛna nɛ́nɛ chi ɛnɛn Mmɔ Mandɛm mmu akɔŋ mɛ, achyɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛni ɛ̌ti ya ndu mbɔ́ŋ nɛka nɛ yi.
221 Mpu sɔt bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm mbɔ bɛ bɛ́pú yɛ̌nyɨŋ, mbɔnyunɛ mbák mmu ǎbhák chak bɛsí Mandɛm chi ndu yi ákoŋo bɛbhé, nɔ nɛwú Kristo agu nɛ́chí ndɛ́ndɛm!
3
31 Bě bo Galéshia, bɛchɨŋti bho! Agha ányíɛ́ bhe nɛ ɛpɛm akʉ mǎnɛ́m ɛbhɨ? Pú nkʉ bǎrɨŋɨ Yesu Kristo mbɔ bɛ ntɔŋ be kpoŋoroŋ ndu yi ágǔ amfay ɛkotákátí?
32 Dɔ̌ ká mbɛp be ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́mɔt. Mandɛm achyɛ bhe Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ chi ɛ̌ti bǎbhʉ̀rɛ bɛbhé kɛ chi ndu bǎghókó Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo nɛ mǎnókó?
33 Ndu bǎre chɨŋti nɔ? Bǎbho bɛkoŋo Kristo ndu bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ, nɛ́nɛ, barɔbhɛ yaŋ bɛ́wɛ́nti chi ndǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛka babhɔŋɔ́
34 Bɛyǎ bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn bǎghɔ̀ ɛ̌ti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ mɛ́mbák ndɛ́ndɛmɛ́? Mbɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛ bɛchi nyaka chi ndɛ́ndɛm.
35 Mandɛm mmu áchyɛ̀ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ nɛ ǎkʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay nɛntɨ ɛnɛka, ǎkʉ̀ nɔ chi ɛ̌ti bǎbhʉ̀rɛ bɛbhé Moses kɛ? Kɛ chi ndǔ bǎghókó Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ nɛ mǎnókó?
36 Ɛchí mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ Ábraham anókó nyaka Mandɛm, nɛ ɛ̌ti ɛyɔ, Mandɛm asɔt yi bɛ achi chak bɛsí bhi.
37 Sɛ́ghɔ́ yɛ bɛ bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm kɛ báchí bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Ábraham.
38 Nɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛnaŋ ɛrɛm nyaka tɛsáy bɛ́ chɔŋ Mandɛm ankʉ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl mámbak chak bɛsí ɛbhi mbɔnyunɛ bábhɔ̌ŋ nɛka nɛ yi. Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́pɛt ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ Mandɛm aghati nyaka Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ntá Ábraham bɛ, “Ɛ̌ti yɛ, chɔŋ njɛt manɛrɛ́kɛrɛ bhǒ mmɨk ankɛm.”
39 Nɔ kɛ ɛchi bɛ Mandɛm ǎyɛt yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ Kristo, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi áyɛ́rɛ́ nyaka Ábraham ndu yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ yi.
310 Mbák chi bo abhɛn bákàysi bɛ bɛbhʉ́rɛ bɛbhé bo Israɛl kɛ ákʉ̀ bɔ mámbák chak bɛsí Mandɛm, ɛyak ɛchi nɛ bhɔ, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Ɛyak ɛchi nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ápú bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn bɛ́chí amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm.”
311 Nɛ́nɛ, ɛchí kpoŋoroŋ bɛ yɛ̌ mmu apú kway bɛbhak chak bɛsí Mandɛm ɛ̌ti yi ábhʉ̀rɛ bɛbhé. Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Mmu anɛ achi chak bɛsí Mandɛm ɛ̌ti yí ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ Kristo, ǎbhɔ̀ŋ nɛpɛ́m.”
312 Bɛbhé bɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ yɛ̌ ɛnyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ nɛka ɛnɛn mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ Kristo. Ɛbhé Moses ɛ́rɛ̀m mbɔ ɛnyǔ basɨŋɨ bɛ, “Mmu anɛ ábhʉ̀rɛ bɛbhé, ǎbhɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛ̌ti yɔ.”
313 Kristo aku bhɛsɛ afɛ́rɛ́ ndǔ ɛyak ɛnɛ ɛchi nɛ bo abhɛn bápú bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé mɛnkɛm. Akʉ nɔ ndu ásɔ́rɛ́ ntɛmsi bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛsɛ. Ɛ́bhak mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Ɛyak ɛchi nɛ mmu anɛ ágú ndǔ ɛkotákátí.”
314 Yesu Kristo akʉ nɔ bɛ áfɔ́k anɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛchyɛ Ábraham, ámbák nɛ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl, ndu bábhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ yi, nɛ bɛ́ Mandɛm anchyɛ bɛsɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ nyaka yi afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛ́chyɛ́ ɛ̌ti nɛka ɛnɛsɛ. 
315 Bɔ̌ma, sɛ́nsɔt ɛrɨŋ ndu nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn bo abhɛn fá amɨk. Mbák bo bati apay manka bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ, mányu nku, yɛ̌ mmu ápú kway bɛway nku yɔ, nɛ mmu ápú kway mɛmaka ɛnyɨŋ ɛchak arɛ́, tɛ̌ndu manyu nku.
316 Nɔ kɛ ɛ́chí nɛ nku anɛ Mandɛm anyǔ nyaka nɛ Ábraham. Mandɛm afyɛ́ Ábraham nɛ ɛbhárɛ́ mɔ́ywi bariɛp. Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛpú rɛm bɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka yi nɛ bɛbhárɛ́ bɔ̌bhi bariɛp, bɛtɔŋ bɛ báya, kɛ ntá yi nɛ ɛbhárɛ́ mɔ́ywi, bɛtɔŋ bɛ chi amɔt. Ɛbhárɛ́mɔ wu chí Kristo.
317 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ́yàŋ mǎnjwimɛm chi bɛ Mandɛm anaŋ anyu nyaka nku nɛ Ábraham, kɛ ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ mamiɛ́ bɛsa ɛsa nsɛm amɔt nsɛm byo, achyɛ bo Israɛl ɛbhé. Bɛbhé bhɔ bɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ yɛ̌ bɛtaŋ ndu bɛway nku anɛ Mandɛm anyu nɛ Ábraham, bɛ bariɛp amɛn yi afyɛ́ nyaka akɛ pɛrɛ téé.
318 Mbɔ Mandɛm ǎchyɛ́ bo akap chi ɛ̌ti bábhʉ̀rɛ bɛbhé, mbʉ apú koŋo chi bariɛp ami ndu akap anɛ yi áchyɛ̀ bo. Kɛ chi ɛ̌ti bariɛp ami ntá Ábraham kɛ yi áchyɛ́ nyaka akap wu.
319 Ndu ɛchi nɔ, ndaká yi Mandɛm achyɛ yɛ bɛbhé? Achyɛ́ bɛbhé bɛ mɛ́nkʉ bɛsɛ sɛndɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ bɛbʉ́ bɛchi. Nɛ bɛbhé bɛbhɔŋ nyaka bɛbhak chi ndu mandú mpok, mɛnoŋ nɛtwɔ́ anɛ ɛbhárɛ́mɔ Ábraham. Ntá yi kɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛchyɛ akap wu. Mandɛm achyɛ nyaka bɛbhé ntá bɔángɛl bɛ mansɔt mantwɔ nɛ bhɔ, nkwǎŋwaŋ abhak nɛntɨ Mandɛm nɛ bǒ mmɨk.
320 Bɛrɛm bɛ mmu achi nɛntɨ bho, ǎtɔ̀ŋ bɛ bakwɔ́ bho achi apay anɛ yi áté nɛntɨ ɛnap. Kɛ mpok Mandɛm afyɛ́ bariɛp ntá Ábraham, abhak chi aywǐnti. 
321 Ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ́chí nɛntɨ bɛbhé Mandɛm nɛ bariɛp Mandɛm kɛ? Wáwák! Mbɔ bachyɛ bo ɛbhé ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kʉ mmu ámbɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m mbák ábhʉ̀rɛ yɔ, mbʉ bɛbhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé ákʉ̀ mmu ambak chak bɛsí Mandɛm.
322 Kɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ mmɨk nkɛm achi antɛnɛ kɛsɛmɛ́ bɛbʉ́. Ɛchi yɛ bɛ, ndiɛrɛ bo abhɛn babhɔŋɔ nɛka nɛ Yesu Kristo kɛ bákway bɛbhɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛchyɛ ntá bo abhɛn mánókó Yesu Kristo.
323 Mpok apɛ́rɛ́ ghaka anɛ bákʉ́ sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ mmu abhɔŋ bɛsɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ Kristo kɛ ambak chak bɛsí Mandɛm, sɛchi nyaka antɛnɛ́ bɛbhé, sɛ́bhak mbɔ bo abhɛn báfyɛ́ ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ.
324 Bɛbhé kɛ bɛ́chí yɛ̌ nyaka mbɔ mmǔ anɛ ábhàbhɛri, ányurɛ nɔkɔ bhɛsɛ, kpatɛ mpok anɛ Kristo átwɔ́, bɛ sɛ́nkwáy bɛbhak chak bɛsí Mandɛm ɛ̌ti sɛ́sɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ yi.
325 Nɛ́nɛ, ɛnɛ́ sɛ́sɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ nɛ Kristo bɛbhé bɛ́pú mbɔ mmu anɛ ábhàbhɛri, anyurɛ nɔkɔ bhɛsɛ.
326 Ɛ̌ti bǎsɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ Yesu Kristo, be mankɛm bǎrɔp chí bɔ̌ Mandɛm.
327 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ bájwítí yi bɛ ambat mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo arɔp chí mbɔ Kristo, ndu asɔrɛ́ ɛpɨŋɨ́ Kristo.
328 Yɛ̌ mmu achí chi mmu Israɛl yɛ ápú, yɛ̌ mmu achí chí nsɛm yɛ mɔ̌mɨk, yɛ chí ngɔrɛ́ yɛ mbakanɛm, be mankɛm abhɛn babhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo bǎrɔp chí ɛnyu ɛ́mɔt.
