329 Nɛ ndu bǎchi bo Kristo, bǎchí yɛ bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Ábraham, nɛ chɔŋ mǎnyíɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛ́chyɛ́ bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Ábraham.
4
41 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ́yàŋ be mǎndɨŋɨ chí bɛ mmɔ́ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛ́nyiɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛ́táyi achi ɛnyu ɛ́mɔt nɛ nsɛm mpok yi abhʉɛ́t chí mɔ́nkwɛn, yɛ̌ndu mɛnyɨŋ ɛ́táyi mɛnkɛm chí ɛbhi.
42 Mpok yɔ, bo báchák kɛ mánè yi, mambabhɛri nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhi, kpátɛ mpok ɛ́táyi afyɛ́ ankwáy.
43 Nɔ kɛ ɛchi nɛ bɛsɛ nkwɔ. Mpok sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ nyaka baraka Mandɛm, sɛ́bhák basɛm antɛnɛ́ bɛfóŋó ɛbhɛn bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛtaŋ fá mmɨk.
44 Kɛ mpok anɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ bariɛp ákwáy nɔ́kɔ́, ató Mɔ́ywi bɛ antwɔ fá amɨk. Ngɔrɛ́ abhé yi, nɛ abhak antɛnɛ́ bɛbhé bo Israɛl.
45 Atwɔ́ ɛnyu ɛyɔ bɛkʉ bo abhɛn bachi nyaka antɛnɛ́ bɛbhé, bɛ Mandɛm ansɔt bɛsɛ mbɔ bɔ̌bhi.
46 Nɛ ndu bǎrɔbhɛ chi bɔ̌bhi, Mandɛm ató Ɛfóŋó Mɔ́ywi bɛ ambak amɛm batɨ yɛsɛ, nɛ yi Ǎkwàk bhɛsɛ sɛmbɨ́ŋɨ́ nɔ́kɔ́ Mandɛm bɛ, “Ɛta, Ɛtaya!”
47 Mandɛm akʉ yɛ be bǎpɛt bǎpu basɛm, bǎrɔp chi bɔ́. Nɛ tɛ̌ndu yi asɔrɛ bhe bɛ mǎmbák bɔ̌bhi, chɔŋ anchyɛ bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛchyɛ bɔ̌bhi. 
48 Mpok bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ re rɨŋɨ Mandɛm, bǎbhak ndǔ kɛsɛmɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chi bɔmandɛm nsé.
49 Kɛ nɛ́nɛ, ɛnɛ́ mǎnaŋ bǎrɨŋɨ Mandɛm, nɛ mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɛm chi bɛ, nɛ́nɛ, ɛnɛ́ Mandɛm árɨ́ŋɨ́ bhe, ná bǎkway bɛpɛt bɛbhak basɛm ntá bɛfóŋó ɛbhɛn bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛtaŋ fá amɨk, ɛnɛ́ mbɔ̌ŋ bɛtaŋ ɛbhap bɛ́pú yɛ̌nyɨŋ, nɛ bɛpú kway bɛkwak bhe?
410 Bǎyɨ̀ŋɨ ɛnɔ nywɔp, mǎnsɔt bɛ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛgho. Mǎnjɨŋɨ awǔ ntaŋ, mǎnsɔt bɛ ntaŋ agho. Mǎnjɨŋɨ ayɔ̌ mpok, mǎnsɔt bɛ mpok ɛpǎ ɛgho. Nɛ ɛnɔ̌ mmíɛ́, mǎnsɔt bɛ mmíɛ́ nɛgho.
411 Ndu bǎkʉ̀ nɔ, mbɔŋ bɛcháy mbɔnyunɛ ɛchi mbɔ bɛ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn nkʉ bɛkwak bhe bɛchi chi ndɛ́ndɛm.
412 Bɔ̌ma, nchí nɨk be mmʉɛt bɛ mǎmbák mbɔ mɛ mbɔnyunɛ ndɔp chí mbɔ bhe. Bǎbhɨkɨ kʉ mɛ bɛbʉ́.
413 Bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ́ ndǔ ndɔŋ anɛ mbɨ, nɛme kɛ nɛkʉ ngati bhe Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́.
414 Nɛ yɛ̌ndu nɛme ɛna nɛchyɛ nyaka bhe bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri, bǎbhɨkɨ byak mɛ. Bǎsyɛpti mɛ mbɔ ángɛl Mandɛm, mbɔ bɛ nchí chi Yesu Kristo.
415 Ndǔ manywɔp ayɔ, bǎbhɔŋ nyaka bɛyǎ maŋák. Yi ɛ́fákárí nɛ maŋák amɛn bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka? Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ sayri bɛ yɛ̌ ngati nyaka bhe chi bɛ mǎmpóŋórí amɨ́k ayɛka mǎnchyɛ mɛ bǎkʉ nɔ.
416 Ndɔp yɛ chi mǔmpap aywɛka ndu ngátí bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi tɛtɛp kɛ?
417 Bǒbhɔ bákʉ̀ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ndu bɛyibhiri batɨ yɛka bɛ mǎnkóŋó bhɔ́, kɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ɛrɨ́tí nkaysi. Báyàŋ chi bɛkʉ mǎndɔ bhɛsɛ mǎnkoŋo bhɔ.
418 Mbák bǎtɔ̀ŋ ɛkɔŋ nɛ batɨ anɛ bɛbʉ́ bɛpu arɛ́, mbák bǎkʉ̀ nɔ nɛ ɛrɨ́tí nkaysi, kʉ ka nɔ́ mpoknkɛm, puyɛ̌ chi ndyɛrɛ ndǔ mpok anɛ nchi nɛ bhe.
419 Bǒbha, mpɛt nchí mbɔ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ánòŋsi, nɛ mpu rɔ bɛghok bɛbe kpátɛ mǎmbɔŋ ɛpɨŋɨ́ Kristo.
420 Mbɔ̌ŋ ntɨ bɛbhak awu nɛ bhe nɛ́nɛ bɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyu nchí ghati bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, mbɔnyunɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mbɔŋ ɛnyɨŋ bɛrɛm. 
421 Ghatí ká mɛ, be bo bǎyàŋ bɛ bɛbhé mɛmbɔŋ bɛtaŋ amfay yɛka, bǎpú ghok ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛbhé ɛ́rɛ̀m-ɛ?
422 Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ Ábraham abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɔ̌babhakanɛm bati apay. Amɔt abhak mmɔ̌ nsɛm, achak abhak mmɔ̌ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ápú nsɛm.
423 Bábhé mmɔ́ ngɔrɛ́ nsɛm mbɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achak. Mmɔ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ápú nsɛm, bábhé yi chi bɛkoŋo bariɛp Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka nɛ Ábraham.
424 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛfakari nyaka ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bhɛsɛ bɛ baghɔrɛ́ abhɔ bati apay bate ndǔ nku ɛpay. Amɔt afú amfay njiɛ Sináy. Nku yɔ ate ndu ntí Hága, mmu abhé bɔ abhɛn báchí ndǔ kɛsɛm.
425 Hága chi njiɛ Sináy amɛm ɛtɔk Arébia. Nɛ Hága até mbɔ Yerúsalɛm anɛ manywɔp anɛ ɛchɔŋ, mbɔnyunɛ achi nyaka ndǔ kɛsɛm nɛ bɔ̌bhi.
426 Kɛ Yerúsalɛm anɛ amfay apú ndu kɛsɛm nɛ yi kɛ achi máyɛsɛ.
427 Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Wɔ, nkongɔrɛ́, wɔ mmu ɔpú bhe, bɔ́ŋ maŋák. Nnɔ anɛ ápú bhɔŋ bɛbě nɛbhe, kway nɛ maŋák, mbɔnyunɛ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ bárɔ́ ndu nɛbhay, bɔ̌bhi baya bacha. Abhɛn ngɔrɛ́ anɛ abhay nnɛ́m.”
428 Bɔ̌ma, bǎchi yɛ bɔ Mandɛm chí mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ chɔŋ mǎmbak bɔ̌bhi. Ɛ́chí nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ chɔŋ Ábraham ambɔ́ŋ Áisek.
429 Nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛchi nyaka mpok ɛyɔ, mmɔ̌ anɛ bábhé mbɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achak ǎchyɛ̀ nyaka mmɔ́ anɛ bábhé ndǔ bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm ɛsɔŋɔri. Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ ɛchi nɛ́nɛ.
430 Kɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ yi? Ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Bók ngɔrɛ́ anɛ achi nsɛm nɛ mɔ́ywi, mbɔnyunɛ mmɔ̌ nsɛm ápú kwáy mɛnyiɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛ́táyi nɛ mmɔ̌ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ápú nsɛm.”
431 Bɔ̌ma, bɛsɛ sɛ́pú yɛ bɔ̌ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ achí nsɛm, sɛchi chi bɔ̌ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ apu nsɛm.
5
51 Kristo afɛ́rɛ́ bɛsɛ ndǔ kɛsɛm bɛ sɛ́kɛ́pɛrɛ bhak basɛm. Tě yɛ ka kpirí nɛ bǎkɛrɔ yɛ̌ mmu ankʉ mǎmpɛtnsɛm ndǔ kɛsɛm.
52 Ghók ká, mɛ Pɔ̌l nchí ghati bhe bɛ mbák mǎnka bɛ mansyɛp bhe nɛ nkaysi bɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ mǎmbak chak bɛsí Mandɛm, nɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Kristo ákʉ́ ntá yɛka ɛpu yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
53 Mpɛt nchí sɛmti be bɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ aka bɛ mansyɛp yi abhɔŋ bɛbhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé mɛnkɛm.
54 Nkwɔ ywɛka anɛ bákàysi bɛ bɛbhʉrɛ bɛbhé bo Israɛl kɛ ǎkʉ bɔ mambak chak bɛsí Mandɛm babhɔŋ bɛrɨŋɨ bɛ báfap mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo. Báfɛrɛ mmʉɛt ndǔ bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm.
55 Mbák chi bɛsɛ, sɛ́bhaka ntɨ bɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm ankʉ bɛsɛ sɛmbak chak bɛsí bhi ɛ̌ti sɛ́sɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ nɛ Kristo. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛyɔ kɛ sɛ́nòŋ ndu bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ.
56 Mmu anɛ ábhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo, yɛ basyɛp yi syɛp, yɛ bábhɨkɨ syɛp, ɛyɔ ɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ. Nnɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ chí bɛ mmu ántɔ́ŋ bɛ yi asɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ nɛ Yesu Kristo ndu yi ákɔŋ bo.
57 Bǎkʉ̀ nyaka sayri. Agha áchɛ́rɛ́ bhe mbi bɛ bǎkɛ́pɛrɛ koŋo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi tɛtɛp?
58 Puyɛ̌ mmu anɛ ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ bhe kɛ afyɛ́ bɛtaŋ bɛ mǎnkʉ nɔ.
59 Mandu yís ǎkʉ fláwa anɛ bábáy ndǔ ɛte ánkó nkɛm.
510 Ndu sɛbharɛ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha, dɨŋɨ́ ká sayri bɛ bǎbhɔŋ bɛkoŋo chí nkaysi aya, puyɛ̌ achak. Mmu anɛ afyɛ́ be ɛbyɔk antɨ, ntɛmsi Mandɛm ǎbhák nɛ yi, yɛ yi achi agha!
511 Bɔ̌ma, mbák chi mɛ, mbɔ mbʉɛ́t bɛghati bho bɛ babhɔŋ bɛsyɛp mmu kɛ yi ambak chak bɛsí Mandɛm, mbʉ bo Israɛl báchyɛ̀ mɛ ɛsɔŋɔri ndaká yi? Mbʉ́ mbok nɛwú Yesu ndu ɛkotákátí apu chyɛ bo Israɛl ɛsɔŋɔri.
512 Ntá bo abhɛn báchyɛ̀ nɔ bhe ɛsɔŋɔri ndu báté bɛ bábhɔŋ bɛsyɛp mmu kɛ ambak chak bɛsí Mandɛm, mɛ̌yàŋ bɛ mámkpɨ́k mángak mmʉɛt ɛyap.
513 Bɔ̌ma, mbák chi bhe, Mandɛm abhɨ́ŋɨ́ be bɛ bǎkɛ́pɛrɛ bhak basɛm antɛn bɛbhé, kɛ nɛfɛrɛ anɛ bafɛrɛ bhe ndǔ kɛsɛm ákɛ́ bhak ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ mǎnkáysí bɛ bǎkway bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmʉɛt nkwǎ áyàŋ mmu ankʉ. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɔŋɔ bɛkʉ chi bɛkwak batɨ ndǔ ɛkɔŋ.
514 Bɛbhé mɛnkɛm bɛchɛm ndu ɛbhé ɛ́mɔt ɛnɛ ɛpɔkɔ bɔ, nɛ yɔ ɛrɛm bɛ, “Kɔŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu mbɔ mmʉɛt yɛ.”
515 Kɛ mbák bǎkʉ̀ chi mbɔ nyǎbhɨ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́nɛmti, ɛndakati nɔkɔ batɨ, sɔt ka mpok bɛ bǎkɛ́ bho bɛway batɨ. 
516 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ nchí ghati yɛ bhe chi bɛ dɔ̌ ká Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ anja nɔkɔ bhe mbi, nɛ bǎkɛ́ kʉ chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmʉɛt nkwǎ áŋwaka bɛ yi ankʉ.
517 Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmʉɛt nkwǎ áŋwaka bɛ bo mankʉ bɛ́pú kɔ ndɔŋ amɔt nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ áyàŋ bo mankʉ, nɛ ɛnyumɔt kɛ ɛchi bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ áyàŋ bo mankʉ bɛ́pú kɔ ndɔŋ amɔt nɛ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmʉɛt nkwǎ áŋwaka bɛ mmu ankʉ. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛpay bɛpu kɔ ɛkak ɛ́mɔt, nɛ ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ bǎpú kway bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ ntɨ bɛkʉ.
518 Kɛ mbák Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ áyà bhe mbi, nɔ bǎpu antɛnɛ́ bɛbhé.
519 Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmʉɛt nkwǎ átò mmu ankʉ bɛ́pú bhɛsɛ. Bɛchi chi bɛbʉ́ kɛbhʉ́rɛ́, nɛ bɛpɔ̌ nkaysi ndu baraká kɛbhʉrɛ nɛ mɛ́ŋwáka ndǔ baraká kɛbhʉrɛ.
520 Mɛnyɨŋ bɛchak chi bɛkoŋo bɔmandɛm nsé, nɛ baraká babú, nɛ bɛpap batɨ, nɛ bɛ́táŋá, nɛ mpabhamɨ́k, nɛ bɛbentɨ, nɛ nkaysi anɛ mmu abhɔŋ chi ndyɛrɛ ɛ̌ti mmʉɛt ɛyi, nɛ bɛ́kɔ́rɛ mmʉɛt ndǔ bakwɔ́, nɛ ɛpɨŋ ákɔ́rɛ́,
521 nɛ bɛbhɔŋ amɨ́k abʉ́abʉ nɛ batɨ, nɛ bɛkwɛn mmɛ́m, nɛ bɛpǎ ɛbhɛn bɛ́tò bo ndǔ ɛpúsí, nɛ mɛnyɨŋ bɛchak mbɔ ɛbhɔ. Nchí ya be batú mbɔ ɛnyu ɛsɨ́ bɛ́, bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ mɛnyǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bápú kway bɛbhɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti nɛ Mandɛm.
522 Kɛ ɛpɨŋ ɛnɛ́ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ áchyɛ̀ mmu chi ɛpɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kʉ̀ yi ambɔŋ ɛkɔŋ nɛ batɨ, nɛ ambɔŋ maŋák, nɛ kpák, nɛ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ, nɛ bɛrɨ̌ntɨ, nɛ ambɔ́ŋ ɛrɨ́tí ntɨ, nɛ ambak mmu tɛtɛp,
523 nɛ yi kɛbhak gum gum, nɛ nɛkɛ́mɛ́mʉɛt. Yɛ̌ ɛbhé ɛpu ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kaŋ bo bǎkɛ́ kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn.
524 Nɛ bo Yesu Kristo mánaŋ báfɛrɛ ntí ndǔ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ máŋwàka nyaka bɛkʉ. Ɛchi mbɔ bɛ bágo mmʉɛt nkwǎ nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yɔ áyàŋ mmu ankʉ ndu ɛkotákátí.
525 Tɛ̌ndu Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ kɛ áchyɛ́ bɛsɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ́nɛ, sɛbhɔŋ bɛrɔ yi ámbɔ́ŋ bɛtaŋ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛsɛ.
526 Bɔ̌ma, yɛ̌ mmu akɛ yoŋ mmʉɛt. Mmu ákɛ́ yɔkɔ ntɨ, nɛ mmu akɛ yɨŋɨ ntɨ nɛ amɨ́k abʉ́abʉ.
6
61 Bɔ̌ma, be bho Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ achi nɛ bhe, mbák mǎngɔ́ ndǔ mmu ákʉ̀ bɛbʉ́, kwák ká yí pɛtii bɛ ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ mbi Mandɛm. Nɛ ndǔ bǎkʉ̀ nɔ, sɔt ká mpok bɛ be babhɔŋ bǎkɛ kwɛn ndǔ nɛmɔ.
62 Pɔkɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ká batu batɨ. Mbák mǎnkʉ nɔ, nɔ bábhʉ̀rɛ ɛbhé Kristo.
63 Mbák mmu akaysi bɛ achi mǔngo, ɛnɛ́ yi apú yɛ̌nyɨŋ, ǎrwɔ́ chi mmʉɛt.
64 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ánjɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ̀, nɛ mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ sayri áŋák nɛ mmʉɛt ɛyi, kɛbhak bɛ ǎyɛ̀nti mmʉɛt nɛ mmǔ achak.
65 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu abhɔŋ bɛ́kʉ chi ɛbhi bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn Mandɛm achyɛ yi ankʉ.
66 Mmu anɛ bátɔ̀ŋ yi Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛchyɛ mmu anɛ átɔ̀ŋ yi aywi ákɔ́rɛ́ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́.
67 Mmu akɛ́ rwɔ mmʉɛt, yɛ̌ mmu ápú kwáy bɛrwɔ Mandɛm. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mmu ápɨ́, yɔ́ kɛ yi aghɛm.
68 Mmu anɛ ápɨ́ chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchyɛ mmʉɛt yi maŋák, ǎghɛm chi nɛwú. Kɛ mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm áyàŋ yi ankʉ ǎghɛm nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
69 Sɛ́kɛ́ pɔp yɛ bɛkʉ bɛrɨ mbɔnyunɛ, mbák sɛbhɨkɨ fɛrɛ amɔ́, mpok ánkwáy, chɔŋ sɛ́ngɛm ɛrɨ́tí mbwɔt.
610 Ndu ɛchi nɔ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ mbi, sɛnkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu bɛrɨ, sayri sayri, batɨ bǒnkwɔ. 
611 Ghɔ́ ká bɛrɛmɛ́ basɨŋ amɛn nsɔ́rɛ́ bɛsɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ ntá yɛka nɛ awɔ́ awa mɛmbɔŋ.
612 Bo abhɛn báyàŋ bɛkʉ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ambɔŋ maŋák nɛ bhɔ kɛ báfyɛ̀ bɛtaŋ bɛ mansyɛp bhe. Bákʉ̀ nɔ ndu bápú yaŋ bɛ bo Israɛl mánchyɛ bhɔ ɛsɔŋɔri bɛ́ bághàti bo bɛ́ nɛwú Kristo ndǔ ɛkotákátí kɛ nɛ́pɛmɛ mmu.
613 Bo abhɛn basyɛphɛ bhɔ bápú bhʉɛrɛ mbɔŋ bɛbhé mɛnkɛm. Kɛ báyàŋ bɛsyɛp bhe bɛ mámpányu bɛ́ bǎchi bakoŋo bhap.
614 Kɛ Mandɛm akɛka bɛ́ mpányu ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛchak ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́fʉɛt chi ɛ̌ti nɛwú Yesu Kristo Acha ndu ɛkotákátí. Ɛ̌ti nɛwú Yesu ndu ɛkotákátí. Mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk bɛrɔp ntá ya chi mbɔ bɛgú mɛnyɨŋ, nɛ mɛ ndɔp chi mbɔ ngú ntá mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk.
615 Yɛ̌ básyɛp mmu syɛp, yɛ̌ babhɨkɨ syɛp, ɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ. Nnɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ chi bɛ́ sɛmbak bǒ bakɔ.
616 Kpák ambak nɛ bhe, ntínso Mandɛm nɛ́mbak nɛ bǒ Mandɛm mankɛm abhɛn bákòŋo ɛbhé ɛkɔ ɛnɛ.
617 Bɛbho ɛchɔŋ, yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́pɛrɛ chyɛ mɛ ɛsɔŋɔri mbɔnyunɛ bɛrɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi mɛ amʉɛt bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ nchí mmu Yesu.
618 Bɔ̌ma, bɛrɨ̌ndu Yesu Kristo Acha mɛ́mbak amɛm batɨ ayɛka. Amen.
1
11 Mɛ Pɔ̌l, mǔntó Yesu Kristo bɛkoŋo nkaysi Mandɛm, kɛ nchí sɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Nchí sɨŋ ntá yɛka bo Mandɛm abhɛn bǎbhʉ̀rɛ bariɛp ndǔ Mandɛm áchɛ́mɛ́ bhe nɛ Yesu Kristo.
12 Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ nɛ Acha yɛsɛ Yesu Kristo mántɔ́ŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu, mánchyɛ be kpák. 
13 Sɛ́mbɨ́tí Mandɛm Mmu achi Chi Yesu Kristo Acha ywɛsɛ. Yi achyɛ́ bhɛsɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ áfɔ́k anɛ́ áfù amfay ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yi achi Mfɔ arɛ́, mbɔnyunɛ ábhat bhɛsɛ nɛ Kristo.
14 Mandɛm ápɛ́rɛ́ ghoko mmɨk, anáŋ ayap nyaka bhɛsɛ ndu áchɛ́mɛ́ bhɛsɛ nɛ Kristo, bɛ sɛ́mbák nyáŋá, kɛbhɔ́ŋ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛsí bhi.
15 Ndu ákɔ́ŋ bhɛsɛ, anáŋ atɨ nyaka bɛ sɛ́mfʉ́ɛ́t ntá Yesu Kristo sɛmbak bɔ̌bhi. Akʉ nɔ bɛkoŋo ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi átɨ́ nyaka bɛkʉ,
16 bɛ sɛ́mbɨ́tí yi ɛ̌ti bɛyǎ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhɛn yi átɔ́ŋɔ́ bhɛsɛ ndɛ́ndɛm, ndu ábhárɛ́ bhɛsɛ nɛ Mɔ́ywi mmu yi akɔŋ tontó.
17 Mandɛm aku bhɛsɛ nɛ manoŋ Kristo afɛ́rɛ́ ndǔ kɛsɛm ndu ábhárɛ́ bhɛsɛ nɛ Kristo. Nɛ afóŋórí bhɛsɛ ndǔ sɛ́pú bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé. Akʉ nɔ bɛkoŋo ɛnyǔ yi átɔ́ŋ bhɛsɛ bɛyǎ bɛrɨ̌ndu
18 ɛbhɛn yi áre tɔŋ bhɛsɛ, akʉ nkwɔ bɛ sɛ́mbɔ́ŋ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak nɛnkɛm nɛ nɛjwǐmɛm nɛnkɛm.
19 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi átɨ́ nyaka bɛkʉ ɛnɛ́ sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́re rɨŋɨ nyaka, atɨ̌ bɛkʉ yɔ bɛfʉɛt ndu mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Kristo ákʉ́.
110 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛyɔ nɔ Mandɛm atɨ bɛkʉ ɛchi nyaka bɛ mpok ánáŋ ánkwáy, yi ǎchɛm mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm, ɛbhɛn amfay nɛ ɛbhɛn fá amɨk, amfyɛ́ amɔ Kristo.
111 Mandɛm ǎkʉ̀ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi átɨ́ bɛkʉ. Ayap bhɛsɛ tɛntɛp ndu ákɔ́ŋ nyaka bɛkʉ nɔ, bɛ́ sɛ́mbák bɔ̌bhi ndǔ yi ábhárɛ́ bhɛsɛ nɛ Kristo mbɔnyunɛ yi ákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi átɨ́ nyaka bɛkʉ bɛkoŋo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi áyàŋ bɛkʉ.
112 Bɛsɛ́ bho sɛ́yámbɨ bɛbhaka ntɨ nɛ Kristo sɛbhɔŋ bɛkʉ bo mámbɨ́tɨ́ yi ɛ̌ti kɛnɛ́m ɛki.
113 Ɛchi ɛnyumɔt nɛ bhe nkwɔ. Mǎnáŋ bǎghok ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi tɛtɛp, nɛ chí Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ bɛ Mandɛm ǎpɛmɛ chɔŋ bhe, nɛ mǎnókó Kristo. Mpok anɛ mǎnókó, Mandɛm achyɛ bhe Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ mbɔ sɛbhaŋ ndu bɛtɔŋ bɛ bǎchi bǒbhi nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu yi afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎkʉ.
114 Achyɛ́ bhɛsɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ mmu yi áchyɛ̀ bɔ̌bhi. Ɛ̌ti yɔ, sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ Mandɛm ǎfɛrɛ chɔŋ bɛsɛ mankɛm bo sɛ́chí bɔ̌bhi ndǔ kɛsɛm. Ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ́ bo báre bɨti Mandɛm ndǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi bɛyǎ bɛcha. 
115 Tɛ mpok anɛ njámbɨ ngoko bɛ bǎsɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ nɛ Yesu Acha nɛ bɛ́ bǎkɔŋ bo Mandɛm mankɛm,
116 mbɨ́kɨ́ rɔ bɛkaka Mandɛm ɛ̌ti yɛka ndǔ mpok anɛ mɛ̌nɨ̀kmʉɛt.
117 Mɛ̌nɨ̀kmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm. Achi Mandɛm Yesu Kristo Acha ywɛsɛ. Achi nkwɔ Ɛtayi. Mɛ̌nɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ yi anchyɛ bhe Ɛfóŋó yi mmu ákʉ̀ mǎndɨŋɨ Mandɛm mǎndɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ.
118 Mɛ̌nɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ yi ánɛ́nɛ́ batɨ̌ yɛka sayri ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ bǎrɨŋɨ manɛ́m mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎbháká ntɨ arɛ bɛ chɔŋ yi ankʉ ntá bo abhɛn yi ábhɨ́ŋɨ́. Nchí yaŋ bɛ mǎndɨŋɨ bɛyǎ áfɔ́k anɛ yi afyɛ́ bariɛp ndu bɛkʉ manɛ́m mɛnyɨŋ ntá bo abhɛn bachi abhi.
119 Mɛ̌nɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ mǎndɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi bɛyǎ ɛnyǔ ɛnɛ́ sɛpu kway bɛyɛnti bhɔ. Bɛyǎ ndu bɛkwak bhɛsɛ bho sɛ́nókó yi. Bɛtaŋ ɛbhi bhɔ bɛyǎ tontó.
120 Nɛ nkúbhɛ́ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn kɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ nyaka Yesu ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m achɔkɔ ɛbhě awɔ́nɛm ywi awu amfay ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ Kristo achi arɛ mbɔ Mfɔ.
121 Arɛ́, abhɔ́ŋ bɛtaŋ amfǎy bɔángɛl mankɛm nɛ bafɔ bhap, nɛ amfǎy yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ awu amfay nɛ fá amɨk. Abhɔŋ bɛtaŋ amfǎy bafɔ mankɛm, abhɛn bakwǎŋwaŋ nɛ abhɛn bachi bɛfóŋó nkwɔ amfǎy bo abhɛn báchí ndǔ nɛŋɔkɔ́mɨk ɛnɛn mfay ɛnɛn nɛ́twɔ̀.
122 Afyɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm amɔ́ yi bɛ ndǔ ákʉ́ yi mmu abhɔŋ bɛtaŋ amfay yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ, ámbák mǔnti ntá bǒnkwɔ.
123 Nɛ bǒnkwɔ mankɛm báchí mmʉɛt Yesu. Amʉɛt bǒnkwɔ kɛ bághɔ bɛrɨ̌ Kristo mɛnkɛm nɛ mbák chi Kristo, amʉɛrɛ-yi kɛ bo bághɔ bɛrɨ Mandɛm.
2
21 Ndǔ mpok anɛ afʉɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm, bǎchi nyaka mbɔ bawú bɛsí Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ bǎpú bhʉɛrɛ nyaka bɛbhé Mandɛm ɛ̌ti bɛyǎ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka.
22 Mpok yɔ, bɛpɨŋ ɛbhɛka bɛbhak chi ɛbhɛn bǒ mmɨk nɛ mǎnkoŋo nɔkɔ chi mfɔ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ anɛ, nɛ́nɛ, abhɔ̌ŋ bɛtaŋ ndǔ bɛpɨŋɨ́ bho. Mfɔ bɛfóŋó wu ǎkɛ̀m batɨ̌ bo abhɛn bátàŋti nɛ Mandɛm.
23 Bɛsɛ mankɛm nkwɔ sɛ́kʉ̀ nyaka mbɔ bhɔ, sɛ́nkoŋo nɔkɔ chi bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmʉɛt ɛyɛsɛ nɛ batɨ̌ yɛsɛ áŋwàka bɛ sɛnkʉ. Ndǔ ntee ayɛsɛ yɔ, Mandɛm abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛchyɛ bhɛsɛ ntɛ́msí mbɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achak ndu ábé nyaka ntɨ tontó ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́.
24 Kɛ ntínso Mandɛm nɛya tontó. Atɔ́ŋ yɛ bhɛsɛ chi ɛkɔŋ ɛyi ɛnɛ ɛ́yá ɛ́chá.
25 Nɛ yɛ̌ chi mpok anɛ sɛ́chí nyaka mbɔ bawú ɛ̌ti sɛpu bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé Mandɛm, yí akʉ sɛ́bhak nɛpɛ́m chɛ́chɛm nɛ Kristo mmu ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Bɛkoŋo bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi kɛ̌ yi ápɛ́mɛ́ bhé.
26 Ndu Mandɛm ábhárɛ́ bhɛsɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo, yí akʉ sɛ́pɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nɛ yi. Nɛ akʉ sɛ́chɔ́kɔ́ nɛ Kristo amfay ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yi achi Mfɔ.
27 Ákʉ́ bhɛsɛ bɛyǎ bɛrɨ ɛnyu yɔ bɛfʉɛt ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu Kristo ákʉ́ ndu bɛkwak bhɛsɛ bɛ sɛ́ntɔ́ŋ bo abhɛn mpok anɛ átwɔ̀ ansɛm ɛnyǔ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi bɛyǎ tontó ɛnyu ɛnɛ sɛ́pú kway bɛyɛnti bhɔ.
28 Mandɛm ápɛ́mɛ́ bhe ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu bhi nɛ ndǔ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ yi. Abhɨ́kɨ́ pɛmɛ bhe ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎkʉ̀, chi akap anɛ yi áchyɛ́ bhe ndɛ́ndɛm.
29 Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ pɛmɛ be bɛ bǎkʉ nyaka bɛrɨ́tí bɛtɨk. Yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́ pá yɛ nnyu.
210 Sɛ́chí yɛ chí awɔ́-bɛtɨk Mandɛm. Aghókó bhɛsɛ, abhat nɛ Yesu Kristo, bɛ́ sɛ́nkʉ́ nɔ́kɔ́ chí bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ. Nɛ Mandɛm anáŋ átóŋtí nyaka bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ ábhʉ́rɛ́ ntá yɛsɛ, bɛ sɛ́nkʉ nɔkɔ bhɔ. 
211 Bě bho bǎpú bo Israɛl, bǎkɛ ghɔkɔntɨk ɛnyǔ bǎchí nyaka ndǔ mpok anɛ áfʉɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm. Bo Israɛl básyɛp bho, nɛ ɛ̌ti yɔ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ mmʉɛt yap bɛ, “Bo abhɛn bǎsyɛphɛ bho nɛ bǎbhɨ̀ŋɨ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl bɛ, bo abhɛn babhɨkɨ syɛp bhɔ.”
212 Bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ mpok ɛyɔ bǎbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ nyaka yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ Kristo. Bě kɛbhɔŋ ɛnyɨŋ nɛ bǎbhak mankɔ ndu nkwɔ bo abhɛn Mandɛm áyábhɛ́ afyɛ́ bariɛp ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi áyàŋ bɛkʉ ntá yap, kɛ ɛyɔ ɛbhɨkɨ yɨŋɨ nyaka bhe. Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nyaka yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bǎbhaka ntɨ arɛ́ mǎnòŋ nɔkɔ fá ndǔ mmɨkɨ nɛ, nɛ be kɛrɨŋɨ Mandɛm.
213 Bǎsap nyaka nɛkɔ nɛ Mandɛm, kɛ nɛ́nɛ, Mandɛm abhat be nɛ Yesu Kristo, ákʉ mǎmbák kɛkwɔt nɛ yi bɛfʉɛt ndǔ manoŋ Kristo amɛn árɔ́ŋɔ́ amɨk.
214 Kristo yímbɔŋ ákʉ́ bhɛsɛ́ bo Israɛl nɛ be bho bǎpu bo Israɛl bɛ sɛ́mbák kpák nɛ batɨ. Mpap achí nyaka nɛntɨ ɛnɛsɛ mbɔ nkók anɛ ákɔ́rɛ́ bhɛsɛ. Afɛ́rɛ́ mpap ayɔ mpok yi ágú, akʉ sɛ́rɔp chi mmu amɔt.
215 Achɔ́ŋtí bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn bɛbhé Moses mɛnkɛm. Mbɔk bɛbhé bɛbhak ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo babhɔŋɔ bɛkʉ. Bɛchak bɛkóŋo bɛpɨŋɨ́tɔk. Akʉ́ ɛnyuyɔ bɛ bakwɔ́ bho apay andɔp chi nkwɔ amɔt, nɔ chi, nkwɔ bo bakɔ abhɛn Mandɛm ábhárɛ́ nɛ yi. Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ̌ yi akʉ kpák ámbák nɛntɨ bo Israɛl nɛ abhɛn bapu bo Israɛl.
216 Afɛ́rɛ́ mpap nɛntɨ bakwɔ́ bho bhɔ apay bɛfʉɛt ndǔ nɛwú ɛni ndǔ ɛkotákátí. Akʉ bɛ́ bakwɔ́ bho apay mándɔp chi nkwɔ amɔt, nɛ bɛ bo Israɛl nɛ abhɛn bapu bo Israɛl, mambak ɛrɨrɨ nɛ Mandɛm.
217 Atwɔ́ yɛ aghati Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ árɛ̀m bɛ kpák achi nɛ bě bho bǎchi nyaka nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ nɛ abhɛn bachi kɛkwɔt.
218 Chi bɛfʉɛt ntá Yesu Kristo kɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm ákwàk bhɛsɛ nɛ be bɛ sɛ́mbɔ́ŋ mbi bɛrɔŋ ntá Ɛta.
219 Bě bho bǎpu bo Israɛl bǎpɛt bǎpú yɛ mankɔ, nɛ bǎpú bo abhɛn báfú nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ. Bǎrɔp chí bǒ ɛtɔk mbɔ bo Mandɛm bachak, nɛ bǒ nnɛrɛkɛt Mandɛm anɛ áchí mbɔ ɛfo ɛ́mɔt.
220 Bě nɛ bhɔ bǎchi bɛkpɔkɔ́ ntɔp ɛbhɛn básɔ́rɛ́ báté ɛkɛt ɛyɔ. Barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ nɛ bǒnto Yesu báchí nɛbhʉɛ́rɛ́kɛt ɛnɛn bághókó báté ɛkɛt ɛyɔ arɛ, nɛ Yesu Kristo yímbɔŋ achi ɛkwap ɛnɛ ɛ́kɛ̀m ɛkɛt.
221 Yi akʉ bɛsɛ bho sɛchi maŋɔkɔ́kɛt nyáŋá nyáŋá sɛ́bhàt mmʉɛt nɛ batɨ sayri ɛnyu ɛnɛ ɛkɛrákap ɛ́té sɛnɛ nɛ ɛ́gò bɛbhak nyáŋá ndǔ ɛchi ntá Acha.
222 Nɛ ndǔ Mandɛm áchɛ́mɛ́ bhe nɛ Kristo, yí ákʉ́ bǎbhàt mmʉɛt nɛ bǒnkwɔ bachak mankɛm bɛ be nɛ bhɔ mǎmbák ɛkɛt ɛnɛ Mandɛm áchɔ̀kɔ arɛ bɛfʉɛt ntá bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ.
3
31 Mɛ Pɔ̌l, mɛ̌nɨ̀kmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm ɛ̌ti yɛka bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl. Nchí mǔkɛnɔŋ mbɔnyunɛ nchí ghati bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo ndu bɛkwak bhe.
32 Nkáysí bɛ mǎnaŋ bǎghok ɛ̌ti bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ́ mɛ ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi bɛ nkʉ ndǔ bɛkwak bhe.
33 Atɔ́ŋ mɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chí nyaka bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́, ákú ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bhɔ, mbɔ ɛnyǔ nsɨ́ŋɨ́ mandú ngátí bhe ɛ̌ti mbɔk mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ.
34 Mpok bǎpày ɛkáti ɛnɛ, chɔŋ mǎnkwáy bɛghɔ bɛ njwímɛm sayri ndǔ nkaysi Mandɛm anɛ achi nyaka bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ɛ̌ti Kristo.
35 Ndǔ mkpáká bho anɛ ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm, Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ bho mándɨŋɨ nkaysi yɔ, mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi ákʉ́ nɛ́nɛ bɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ántɔ́ŋ yɔ ntá bǒnto nɛ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ bhi, bɔ́ bho báchi nyáŋá ntá yi.
36 Nkaysi bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ yɔ achi bɛ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl bábhɔ̀ŋ nkwɔ áfɔ́k anɛ bo Israɛl bábhɔ̀ŋ, bɛ bɔ bárɔp chi mmu amɔt nɛ bo Israɛl nɛ bɛ chɔŋ mámbɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛ ǎkʉ ntá bɔ̌bhi ndǔ yi ábhárɛ́ bhɔ nɛ Kristo. Bɛfʉɛt ndǔ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo kɛ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ.
37 Mandɛm atɔŋ mɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu, asɔt mɛ bɛ nkʉ́ bɛtɨk ɛbhi ndu bɛghati bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́-nɛ. Akʉ nɔ ndǔ áchyɛ́ mɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi.
38 Tɛ̌ndu mbɨ́kɨ́ ghaka mbɔ yɛ̌ mmu Mandɛm achak, yi atɔŋ mɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu, áchyɛ́ mɛ bɛtɨk bɛghati bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl áfɔ́k anɛ áfù ntá Kristo. Áfɔ́k wu áya ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ mmu apu kway bɛjwimɛm ndǔ wu ankɛm achi.
39 Bɛtɨk bɛchak ɛbhɛn yi áchyɛ́ mɛ chi bɛ nkʉ́ bǒ mankɛm mángɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm mmu ághókó mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ábhʉ́rɛ́ nyaka bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ndǔ mpoknkɛm anɛ áfʉɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm.
310 Mandɛm akʉ nɔ bɛ nɛ́nɛ, bɛfʉɛt ntá nkwɔ Kristo, ántɔ́ŋ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ nɛ bafɔ bhap nɔ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ amfay ndu nɛbhʉɛt anɛ Yesu achi Mfɔ arɛ ɛnyǔ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákʉ̀.
311 Mandɛm ákʉ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi átɨ́ nyaka tɛ mpok yi ábhɨ́kɨ́ re fʉɛt ntá Acha ywɛsɛ Yesu Kristo.
312 Ndu Mandɛm ábhárɛ́ bhɛsɛ nɛ Kristo nɛ sɛ́sɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ yi, sɛ́kwáy bɛrɔŋ ntá Mandɛm ndu bɛrɛm kɛpɨ nɛ yi, kɛbhɔŋ bɛcháy nɛ kɛmakati bɛ yi ǎghòk bhɛsɛ.
313 Ndu ɛchi nɔ, nchí ghati bhe bɛ bǎkɛ́ fɛrɛ amɔ ɛ̌ti bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn mɛ̌ghɔ̀ ɛ̌ti yɛka ndu bɛkwak bhe. 
314 Ndu Mandɛm ákʉ́ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ, nchí kwɛn bɛsí Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ ndǔ mɛ̌nɨ̀kmʉɛt ɛ̌ti yɛka.
315 Yi afyɛ́ nnyɛ́n ɛni ndǔ manɛrɛ́kɛt ankɛm, awu amfay nɛ fá amɨk.
316 Yǐ ataŋ acha nɛ abhɔŋ bɛyǎ áfɔ́k. Mɛ̌nɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ yi ankʉ batɨ̌ yɛka antaŋ amɛm ndu bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ,
317 bɛ Kristo ámbák amɛm batɨ yɛka mpoknkɛm ndǔ bǎsɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ nɛ yi, nɛ bɛ mǎmbak mbɔ ɛnɔk ɛnɛ bakaŋ ɛyi áchwè amɨk sayri nɛ mbɔ ɛkɛt ɛnɛ ɛ́té sɛnɛ́ ndǔ ɛkɔŋ Mandɛm.
318 Ɛnyu ɛyɔ, be nɛ bo Mandɛm báchák mankɛm bǎkwáy bɛjwimɛm bɛ Kristo akɔŋ bhɛsɛ tontó ɛnyu ɛnɛ mmu apu kway bɛyɛnti yɔ.
319 Mɛ̌nɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ mǎndɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ Kristo, yɛ̌ndu sɛ́pú kway bɛrɨŋɨ yɔ ɛnkɛm, bɛ́ mǎnkwáy bɛrɔp chi mbɔ Mandɛm ndǔ ɛpɨŋ ɛyɛka.
320 Mandɛm ǎkway bɛkʉ ɛncha mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn sɛ̌kwáy mɛnɨkmʉɛt bɛ yi ankʉ ndǔ bɛkwak bhɛsɛ, nɛ ɛncha ɛnyǔ ɛnɛ sɛ́kway bɛkaysi bɛ chɔŋ yi ankʉ. Ǎkʉ̀ nɔ nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi ɛbhɛn bɛ́kʉ̀ bɛtɨk amɛm nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛsɛ.
321 Bɛsɛ bho sɛchi ndu Nkwɔ Kristo, bo Mandɛm ábhárɛ́ nɛ Yesu Kristo, sɛ́nchíɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó. Ndǔ mkpáká bho ɛnkɛm, mpoknkɛm. Amen.
4
41 Ndu ɛchi nɔ, mɛ Pɔ̌l mǔkɛnɔŋ ɛ̌ti Yesu Acha, nchí sɛmti bhe bɛ ɛkakánɛkɔ ɛyɛka ɛ́mbák ɛnɛ ɛ́kwáy nɛ bo abhɛn Mandɛm ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ mambak abhi.
42 Bɔ́ŋ ká nɛsɛptímʉɛt nɛnkɛm. Bǎkɛ́ bhak gum gum nɛ bho. Bɔ́ŋ ká ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ. Tɔ́ŋ nɔ́kɔ́ ká batɨ ɛkɔŋ, mǎnsɔt bhɔ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bachi.
43 Bɔ́ŋ ká bɛyǎ ɛkwak ndu bɛkɛm nɛchɛmɛ́mʉɛt ɛnɛn Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ákʉ́ mǎmbɔŋ bɛfʉɛt ndǔ kpák anɛ ágwɔ̀t bhe nɛ batɨ̌ bǒ Kristo.
44 Bɛsɛ mankɛm sɛchi ndu mmʉɛt amɔt, sɛbhɔŋ chi Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ amɔt. Nɛ ɛchi ɛnyu ɛ́mɔt nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt kɛ ɛchi ɛnɛ sɛ́bháká ntɨ arɛ, bɛ Mandɛm abhɨŋɨ bɛsɛ bɛ sɛmbɔŋ chɔŋ yɔ.
45 Acha amɔt kɛ sɛ́tòk. Bɛsɛ mankɛm sɛ́noko chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt. Sɛ́bhɔŋ chi nɛjwiti nɛmɔt.
46 Mandɛm amɔt kɛ achi, nɛ yi achi Ɛtayɛsɛ mankɛm. Achí Mfɔ bɔ̌bhi mankɛm, áfʉ̀ɛt ntá yɛsɛ bɛkʉ bɛtɨk ɛbhi nɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ achi nɛ bɔ̌bhi mankɛm.
47 Kɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu abhɔŋ ayi njɛnti akap kɛkúrí anɛ Kristo áchyɛ́ yi ndu bɛkʉ bɛtɨk nɛ wu.
48 Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ̌ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Mpok yi ákó tɛ amfay, ásɔ́t ngɛ́mtáy bo abhɛn yi ákɛ́mɛ́ bɛ́ mankoŋo yi, akɔrɛ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ntá bho.”
49 Kɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Yi akó amfay”, ɛghati bhɛsɛ bɛ yi? Ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bhɛsɛ bɛ anáŋá asɛp nyaka ndǔ ɛtɔkɔ́ bawú.
410 Nkúbhɛ́ mmu anɛ ásɛ́bhɛ́ amɨk kɛ ákó kpát afʉɛ́t nɛbu, bɛ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm mɛ́mbak mbɔ ɛnyu bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛbhak.
411 Nɛ yi kɛ ákɔ́rɛ́ akap ntá bho. Ntá mbɔk, achyɛ́ akap bɛbhak bǒnto. Ntá bachak, achyɛ́ akap bɛbhak barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ. Nɛ ntá abhɛnɛfu, anɛ bɛghati bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́, nɛ achyɛ́ mbɔk akap bɛbhak babhabhɛri.
412 Kristo ákʉ́ nɔ bɛ bo mankɛm abhɛn yi áchyɛ́ batí bɛtɨk ayɔ, mánkwak bo Mandɛm bɛ mánkwáy bɛkʉ bɛtɨk ɛbhi ɛnyu ɛnɛ mmʉɛt Kristo átaŋ andɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ.
413 Ndu ɛchi nɔ, chɔŋ bɛsɛ mankɛm sɛndɔk ambɨ mɛnoko Mmɔ Mandɛm, nɛ ndu bɛrɨŋɨ yi ɛnyu ɛ́mɔt. Mbák sɛ́chí ɛnyu ɛyɔ, chɔŋ sɛ́ngo sɛ́nsɛnɛ, nɛ sɛ́naŋa bɛbhak mbɔ Kristo.
414 Sɛ́kɛ́pɛrɛ bhák bo abhɛn bachi mbɔ mɔ́áchwi anɛ mpɛ́rɛ́nyɛn ɛ́dɛ̀p ɛ́ntɛn ɛbhé ɛ́mɔt, ɛ́ndɛp ɛntɛn ɛbhé ɛchak mpok batɔŋɔ́ nse bárwɔ̀ bhɔ nɛ nsé yap. Batɔŋɔ́ nse bhɔ bákʉ̀ bo manɛm ɛbhɨ ndu bákòŋo baraká nse anɛ bɔ́ bátɔ̀ŋ.
415 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ chi bɛkɔŋ batɨ, nɛ bɛrɛm chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi tɛtɛp ɛ̌ti Mandɛm bɛ sɛ́ngo nɔkɔ ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi kpátɛ sɛ́ndɔp chi mbɔ Kristo mmu achi ntí ntá Nkwɔ Kristo.
416 Yí kɛ áchɛ̀m bǒbhi mankɛm ndǔ nkwɔ amɔt bɛ mámbák mbɔ mmu amɔt nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ mmʉɛt nkwǎ achi nɛ maŋɔk anɛ áfáŋá byoŋómʉɛt mɛnkɛm bɛ́ mmʉɛt ambak amɔt. Nɛ ndǔ mmʉɛt nkwǎ, mpok yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́mʉɛt ákʉ̀ ɛbhi bɛtɨk sayri, mmʉɛt ǎgò ɛrɨrɨ. Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ ɛchi nɛ bǒnkwɔ Kristo. Mpok bɔ́ bákɔ̀ŋ batɨ nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ǎkʉ̀ ɛbhi bɛtɨk sayri, bákwàk batɨ mánsɛ́nɛ́ ndǔ nɛka ɛnɛn babhɔŋɔ nɛ Yesu. 
417 Nchí ghati yɛ bhe nɛ nchí sɛmti bhe ndǔ nnyɛ́n Acha bɛ bǎbhɨkɨ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ bɛ́bhak mbɔ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl. Bɔ bákɔŋ chi bɛpɔ̌ nkaysi yap.
418 Báchí amɛm ɛjuri nɛ báfap nyaka bhɔ nɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ̀, mbɔnyunɛ bachi amɨ́k nɛ́mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́ ndǔ nɛjwǐmɛm ɛnap nɛ bágwɔ́t batɨ ayap amɛm.
419 Bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ yɛ̌ mandú ntíánwɔ́p. Báchyɛ́ yɛ mmʉɛt ndǔ bɛkʉ baraká ntianwɔp anɛ mmʉɛt ɛyap ɛ́yàŋ bɔ mankʉ. Bákʉ̀ barak ɛ́pusi ankɛm, nɛ bápú rɔ bɛkʉ yɔ.
420 Kɛ be, puyɛ̌ ɛnyǔ ɛyɔ kɛ bátɔ́ŋ bhe ɛ̌ti Kristo.
421 Nɛ mánaŋ batɔŋ be mɛnyɨŋɨ́ tɛtɛp ɛ̌ti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu.
422 Fɛrɛ́ yɛ́ ka ɛsɨ́ mkpá ayɛka anɛ áchyɛ̀ nyaka be ɛbɛ́ptí ɛkakánɛkɔ. Bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mǎŋwaka nyaka bɛkʉ bɛ́rwɔ̀ nyaka bhe nɛ mɛ́nchɔŋti nɔkɔ batɨ̌ yɛka amɛm.
423 Dɔ̌ ká Mandɛm ankʉ mǎmbak bǒ bakɔ ndǔ batɨ yɛka bɛ nkaysi ywɛka ámbák nkɔ.
424 Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ ywɛka abhɔŋ bɛ́fyɛ mkpá nkɔ anɛ Mandɛm aghoko, bɛ ámbák mbɔ yímbɔŋ. Mkpá nkɔ yɔ chi ɛpɨŋ ɛkɔ ɛnɛ ɛchi chak tɛtɛp bɛsí Mandɛm, nɛ ɛchi nyáŋá tɛtɛp.
425 Ndu ɛchi nɔ, dɔ̌ ká baraká nse. Bɛsɛ́ mankɛm sɛ́ndɛm nɔkɔ chi tɛtɛp nɛ batɨ, mbɔnyunɛ sɛchi mbɔ bɛpókómʉɛt nyáŋá nyáŋá ndǔ mmʉɛt amɔt.
426 Mbák mmu ywɛka aběntɨ, ákɛ́ rɔ bɛběntɨ bhi mɛnto yi ndǔ bɛbʉ́, nɛ ákɛ́ bhʉɛrɛ bɛběntɨ antɨ ndǔ nywɔp nɛnkɛm.
427 Kɛ́chyɛ ka Satan mbi bɛ́ ándwɔ́ mmu ankʉ bɛbʉ́.
428 Mmu anɛ áchi ngɛ́p ákɛ́pɛrɛ ghɛ́p aghɛ́p. Mmu abhɔŋ bɛkʉ bɛtɨk sayri ndǔ bɛkɛm nɛpɛ́m ɛni nɛ ndǔ bɛkwak bachɛ́bhɛ́bho.
429 Yɛ̌ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛyɔŋ ɛ́kɛ́ fu be anyu. Dɛm nɔ́kɔ́ ká chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kwàk bo mántaŋ ndǔ mbi Mandɛm mbɔ ɛnyǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛgo. Mmu abhɔŋ bɛrɛm chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kwak abhɛn bághòk yi.
430 Nɛ bǎkɛ́ kʉ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ Mandɛm ambɔŋ kɛsɔ́ti. Mandɛm achyɛ́ bhe Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ mbɔ ɛrɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ bǎchi bǒbhi nɛ bɛ chɔŋ anaŋa bɛfɛrɛ bhe ndǔ kɛsɛm ɛwak ɛ́mɔt.
431 Dɔ̌ ká nkaysi bɛyǎ mpap, nɛ bɛběntɨ, nɛ ɛchoko-ntɨ, nɛ bɛ́táŋá, nɛ bɛchɔŋti manyɛ́n batɨ, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nkaysi bɛkʉ batɨ bɛbʉ́.
432 Tɔ́ŋ ká batɨ bɛrɨ, mǎngɔ bhɔ ntínso. Nɛ foŋorí nɔ́kɔ́ ká batɨ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm áfʉɛ́rɛ́ ntá Kristo afoŋori bhe.
5
51 Tɛ̌ndu bǎchi bɔ̌ Mandɛm nɛ yi akɔŋ be tontó, ŋɔkɔ́ yɛka ɛpɨŋ ɛyi.
52 Bǎbhɔŋ bɛkɔŋ bo ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka nɛnkɛm nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Kristo ákɔ́ŋɔ́ bhɛsɛ nɛ áchyɛ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛni ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ. Áchyɛ́ mmʉɛt mbɔ akabhɛ́nya anɛ áchyɛ́ Mandɛm bɛyǎ maŋák.
53 Bǎchi bo Mandɛm. Bǎkɛ́ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ ɛpúsí, nɛ bɛbɛ́ptí nkaysi. Bǎkɛ́ fyɛ́ amɨ́k ndǔ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ bo bachak. Bǎkɛ rɔ mbɔŋ bɛ mántáká mɛnyɨ̌ŋ ɛbhɔ ndu nkwɔ ywɛka.
54 Bǎkɛ́ rɛm yɛ̌ bɛpɔ̌-kɛpɨ nɛ bɛbhokori kɛpɨ, nɛ bǎkɛ́ kʉ bɛchoŋó ntok. Kɛ chyɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ká bakak ntá Mandɛm.
55 Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ yɛ̌ nkoŋo baghɔrɛ́, nɛ yɛ̌ chi mmu anɛ ntɨ ɛni nɛ́pú amɛm pɛ́pɛ́p, nɛ mmu anɛ afyɛ́ amɨ́k ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ bo bachak apú bhɔŋ ákɔ́rɛ́ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt kɛfɔ Kristo nɛ Mandɛm. Mmu anɛ afyɛ́ amɨ́k ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ bo bachak achi mbɔ mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɔmandɛm bachak mbɔnyunɛ akɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ acha Mandɛm.
56 Bǎkɛ́ ka yɛ bɛ mmu ánsɔ́t bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi fuu andwɔ̀ bhe. Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ mɛnyǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ kɛ bɛ́kʉ̀ Mandɛm ambentɨ, nɛ chɔŋ antɛmsi bo abhɛn bapu ghok yi.
57 Bǎkɛ́ bhak ndǔ nsoŋ amɔt nɛ mɛnyǔ bǒbhɔ.
58 Bě bǎchi nyaka ndǔ ɛjuri. Nɛ̌nɛ, ɛnɛ́ Mandɛm áchɛ́mɛ́ bhe nɛ Yesu Acha, bɔ́ŋ ká ɛkakánɛkɔ ɛnɛ ɛ́kwáy nɛ bo abhɛn bachi amɛm bɛdiɛ́rɛ́.
59 Bɛdiɛrɛ́ bɛ́kʉ̀ bo mǎmbɔŋ ɛrɨ́tí ɛpɨŋ, mámbak chak, nɛ mámbak bo abhɛn bachi tɛtɛp.
510 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka ánú bɛrɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chyɛ Acha bɛyǎ maŋák.
511 Bǎkɛ́ fyɛ́ mmʉɛt ndǔ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo abhɛn bachi amɛm ɛjuri bákʉ̀. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bɛ́chí ndɛ́ndɛm. Bǎbhɔŋ bɛkʉ bo mandɨŋɨ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bɛ́bɛp.
512 Mbɔŋ bɛ́rɛm ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bákʉ̀ bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ chi ɛnyɨŋɨ́ ntíánwɔ́p.
513 Mpok bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ bɛ́ghɔ̀ ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ, bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ ɛnyu yɔ ɛchi,
514 mbɔnyunɛ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ kɛ bɛ́kʉ̀ mángɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ. Ndu ɛchi nɔ kɛ bárɛ̀m bɛ, “Mbʉɛrɛ kɛnɔ́, ŋɛmɛ́! Fú ndǔ nɛwú, nɛ chɔŋ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ Kristo mɛ́ngɔ wɔ amʉɛt.”
515 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka ánsɔt yɛ mpok nɛ ɛkakánɛkɔ ɛyi. Bǎkɛ́ bhak mbɔ bɛchɨŋtǐ bho. Bák ká chi mbɔ barɨŋɨ́ndak.
516 Kʉ ka bɛrɨ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ mbi bɛkʉ nɔ, mbɔnyunɛ bɛyǎ bo bákʉ̀ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ nɛ́nɛ.
517 Ndu ɛchi nɔ, bǎkɛ́ bhak bɛchɨŋtǐ bho. Nu ka bɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Acha áyàŋ mǎnkʉ.
518 Bǎkɛ́ bhak bakwɛnɛ́ mmɛ́m. Ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ̀ mmu ákɛ́ kway bɛkɛm mmʉɛt, ɛ́ntwɔ yɛ yi nɛ mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́. Kɛ dɔ̌ ká Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm ambak nɛ bhe, ambɔ́ŋ bɛtaŋ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka.
519 Kwáy nɔ́kɔ́ ka mɛnyǔ bakwáy Nku Nsɨ́, nɛ bakwáy Mandɛm, nɛ bakwáy anɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ áchyɛ̀ ndu bɛ́fyɛ́ batɨ ntɨ. Kwáy nɔ́kɔ́ ka bakway ndu bɛbɨti Acha nɛ batɨ yɛka ankɛm.
520 Kaká ká Ɛtayɛsɛ Mandɛm mpoknkɛm ɛ̌ti yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ndǔ nnyɛ́n Yesu Kristo Acha. 
521 Sɛptí nɔ́kɔ́ ka mmʉɛt ntá batɨ. Ɛpɨŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́mfú ndǔ kɛnókó ɛkɛn bǎchyɛ̀ Kristo.
522 Baghɔrɛ́ nɛbhay, sɛptí nɔ́kɔ́ ká mmʉɛt ntá manɛ́m abhɛka mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǎsɛpti mmʉɛt ntá Acha.
523 Nnɛ́m achi mǔnti ntá ngɔrɛ́ ywi mbɔ ɛnyǔ Kristo achi mǔnti ntá bǒnkwɔ. Bǒnkwɔ chi mmʉɛt yi nɛ yímbɔŋ kɛ ápɛ̀mɛ bhɔ.
524 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ngɔrɛ́ abhɔŋ yɛ bɛsɛpti mmʉɛt ntá nnɛ́m aywi ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ, mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǒnkwɔ básɛ̀pti mmʉɛt ntá Kristo.
525 Bě manɛ́m, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka abhɔŋ bɛkɔŋ ngɔrɛ́ ywi nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Kristo ákɔ́ŋ bǒnkwɔ nɛ agú ɛ̌ti yap.
526 Agú bɛ́kʉ bɔ mámbák pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm ndu ásó bhɔ nɛ manyiɛp nɛ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
527 Kristo akʉ nɔ́ bɛ ankway bɛkʉ nkwɔ Kristo mantwɔ ntá yi nɛ bɛyǎ bɛrɨ, kɛbhɔ́ŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ Mandɛm nɛ yɛ̌ chi bo mánji bhɔ.
528 Ɛnyu ɛyɔ nkwɔ kɛ ɛchi bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nnɛ́m abhɔŋ bɛkɔŋ ngɔrɛ́ ywi mbɔ mmʉɛt yi. Mmu anɛ ákɔ̀ŋ ngɔrɛ́ ywi ǎkɔ̀ŋ chi mmʉɛt yi.
529 Mmǔ anɛ ápábhɛ́ mmʉɛt yi apú. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu áyɨ̀ŋɨ mmʉɛt yi sayri ankɛ́m yɔ ɛrɨrɨ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Kristo áyɨ̀ŋɨ bǒnkwɔ,
530 nɛ bɛsɛ mankɛm sɛchi bɛpókómʉɛt ɛbhi.
531 Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Mbakanɛm abhɔŋ bɛrɔ máyi nɛ ɛtayi anchɛm mmʉɛt nɛ ngɔrɛ́ ywi, bɔ bati apay mándɔp mmǔ amɔt.”
532 Bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́rɛ̀m ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́. Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ bɛ́rɛ̀m chi ɛnyǔ Kristo achi nɛ Nkwɔ Kristo.
533 Kɛ ɛ́chí ɛnyu ɛyɔ nɛ bhe nkwɔ. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu abhɔŋ bɛkɔŋ ngɔrɛ́ ywi mbɔnyu ákɔ́ŋɔ́ mmʉɛt ɛyi yímbɔŋ, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ngɔrɛ́ abhɔŋ bɛchyɛ nnɛ́m ywi kɛnókó.
6
61 Bɔ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka abhɔŋ bɛghok máyi nɛ ɛtayi, mbɔnyunɛ bǎchi bakoŋo Acha nɛ ɛchi chak bɛkʉ nɔ.
62 “Nokó ka manɔ nɛ bachi bhɛka.” Ɛnɛ, chí ɛbhé mbɨ ɛnɛ́ Mandɛm afyɛ́ bariɛp amɛn abhak nɛ mmu anɛ ábhʉ̀rɛ yɔ.
63 Bariɛp amɔ achi bɛ, “Mmǔ anɛ ábhʉ̀ɛrɛ ɛbhé ɛnɛ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛbhak sayri nɛ yi, nɛ ǎbhɔŋ ɛrɔri nɛpɛ́m fá amɨk.”
64 Bě bachǐbhɔ, bǎkɛ́ bhɔŋ ɛpɨŋ bɛkʉ batɨ ambe bɔ̌ bhɛka. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ chi mɛ́nyúrɛ nɛ bɛtɔŋ bhɔ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Acha áyàŋ. 
65 Basɛm, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka abhɔŋ bɛ́ghok mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ yi fá amɨk sayri. Chiɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ka bhɔ kɛnókó nɛ bɛchǎy nɛ nɛwɛrɛ́mʉɛt nɛ mǎnkʉ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛka nɛ ntɨ nɛmɔt nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bághòk Kristo.
66 Bǎkɛ́ ghok bhɔ chi ndiɛrɛ bɛsí bhap nɛ ndǔ bɛkʉ bɔ mambɔŋ maŋák. Kɛ kʉ ka ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ mǎnkʉ nɛ ntɨ nɛnkɛm mbɔ basɛm Kristo.
67 Kʉ nɔ́kɔ́ ka bɛtɨk nɛ maŋák mbɔ bɛ bǎtòk chi Acha, puyɛ̌ nkwǎ.
68 Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ yi ǎkap yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu bɛkoŋo bɛrɨ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ́, yɛ̌ achi nsɛm, yɛ apu.
69 Bě nkwɔ bho bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ basɛm, kɛ́m ká bhɔ sayri. Bǎkɛ́ pá bɛchyɛ bhɔ ntɛmsi. Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ Ɛta mmu achi amfay kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ be nɛ bhɔ, nɛ yi apú tɔŋ kɛ́rɨ́ŋámík. 
610 Ɛnyɨŋɨ́ ngwɛnti ɛnɛ nchí ghati bhe chi ɛnɛ: Kɛ́m ká nɛbhárɛ́mʉɛt ɛnɛka nɛ Acha bɛ mǎntáŋ nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi ɛbhɛn bɛyǎ bɛcha.
611 Kɛ́m ká mɛnyɨŋɨ́ nɛnu mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ̀, bɛ́ mǎnkwáy mɛnu nɛ Satan, mǎnte kpirí mpok yi áyàŋ bɛrwɔ bhe.
612 Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ sɛ́pú nu chi nɛ bakwǎŋwaŋ. Sɛ́nù chi nɛ bɛbɛ́ptí bɛfóŋó, nɛ bafɔ bhap, nɛ mɛnyǔ bɛtaŋ bɛchak. Sɛ́nù nkwɔ nɛ bɛfóŋó ɛbhɛn bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛtaŋ ndǔ mmɨk ɛjuri nɛ, nɛ sɛ́nù nɛ ngɛ́mtáy bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ ɛbhɛn bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛtaŋ amfay ndǔ mbʉ́ɛ́p.
613 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka ánsɔt yɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ nɛnu mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ̀, bɛ mpok ɛsɔŋɔri ántwɔ́, mǎnu tɛ ndǔ ngwɛnti, nɛ mǎndɔk ambɨ bɛte kpirí.
614 Ndu ɛchi nɔ, dɔ́k ká ambɨ bɛte kpɨrí. Tɛtɛp anɛ bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ ámbák mbɔ mgbat anɛ ákɛ̀m mɛnyɨŋí nɛnu ɛbhɛka. Kʉ nɔ́kɔ́ ká chi ndiɛrɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chak mbɔnyunɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bɛchi mbɔ nkú bɛsé anɛ ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu afyɛ́ ndu bɛkuti mbeápak ɛyi.
615 Ghatí nɔ́kɔ́ ka bo Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ ákʉ̀ bɔ mambɔŋ kpák bɛsí Mandɛm. Ndǔ bǎkʉ̀ nɔ, ɛbhak mbɔ mpok ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu afyɛ́ bɛtaŋtí nkwɔbhɛ́nya bɛ́ ákɛ́ kwɛn amɨk mpok ájɛ̀t ntyɛt.
616 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́chák chi bɛ mǎndɔ́k ambɨ bɛbhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Kristo, bɛ nɛ́mbák ɛkuti ɛyɛka mbɔ ɛnɛ ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu ákɛ̀m awɔ́ bɛ anchyɛt bakɔŋ anɛ ádù nɛ ngó anɛ́ mbʉ́mbʉ átò.
617 Bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ Mandɛm apɛ́mɛ́ bhe. Bɛrɨŋɨ nɔ ǎbhák ndǔ nkaysi ayɛka mbɔ kɛndɛ́n anɛ ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu ákùti ntí ywi nɛ yɔ. Sɔt ka nkwɔ́ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛnɛ́ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ áchyɛ́ bhe mbɔ akparɛnja nsɛm ɛpay anɛ ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu.
618 Nɨk nɔ́kɔ́ ká mmʉɛt mpoknkɛm nɛ ɛ̌ti yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ áyà bhe mbi. Bǎk ká pě. Kɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ ká ɛkɨ́kɨ́ ndǔ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛ̌ti bǒ Mandɛm mankɛm bɛ yi ankwak bhɔ.
619 Nɨk nɔ́kɔ́ ká mmʉɛt ɛ̌ti ya nkwɔ bɛ Mandɛm anchyɛ mɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛghati bo ɛ̌ti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ achi nyaka bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ nkɛbhɔŋ bɛcháy.
620 Ɛ̌ti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ kɛ̌ Kristo ásɔ́rɛ́ mɛ, akʉ mɛ nté ndǔ ntí ywi, nɛ nchí mǔkɛnɔŋ nɛ́nɛ. Nɨk nɔ́kɔ́ ká mmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm anchyɛ mɛ nɛtaŋántɨ bɛ ngátí nɔkɔ bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ mbɔnyu mbɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ. 
621 Chɔŋ Tíkíkɔs antwɔ́ awu angati bhe ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ bɛchi fá nɛ mɛ nɛ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ́kʉ̀. Achi manɔ ywɛsɛ anɛ sɛ́kɔ́ŋɔ́. Achi nkʉbɛtɨk anɛ Acha nɛ yí achi mmu anɛ abhʉrɛ bariɛp ami.
622 Ɛ̌ti yɔ, kɛ nchí to yi ntá yɛka bɛ ankʉ mǎndɨŋɨ ɛnyu bɛsɛ sɛchi, nɛ bɛ́ ámfyɛ́ bhe ntɨ.
623 Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha mánchyɛ́ běka bǒnkwɔ kpák, mánkwak be bɛ mǎnkɔŋ batɨ, nɛ bɛ mǎndɔ́k ambɨ bɛbhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu Kristo.
624 Nchí nɨkmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm ántɔ́ŋ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi ntá bǒ mankɛm abhɛn bákɔ́ŋɔ́ Yesu Kristo Acha nɛ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ ɛpu gu manyiɛp.6
1 
11 Mɛ Pɔ̌l nɛ Tímɔti, bɛsɛ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk Yesu Kristo kɛ sɛ́sɨ̀ŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Sɛ́sɨ̀ŋ ntá yɛka bo Mandɛm mankɛm, bě bhó bǎbhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu awu ɛtɔk Fílipi. Sayri sayri, sɛ́sɨ̀ŋ ntá yɛká bǒ batí nɛ be bho bǎkwàk bǒ batí bɛkʉ bɛtɨk Mandɛm ndǔ nkwɔ bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn Fílipi.
12 Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha mántɔŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu, mánchyɛ bhe kpák. 
13 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ ntɨ ɛna nɛ́kwɛ́n be amʉɛt, nchí nɨkmʉɛt nkaka Mandɛm ɛ̌ti yɛká!
14 Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ mɛ̌nɨ̀kmʉɛt ɛ̌ti yɛka mankɛm, nchí kʉ nɔ chí nɛ bɛyǎ maŋák.
15 Nchí kʉ nɔ nɛ bɛyǎ maŋák mbɔnyunɛ bǎchɛm mmʉɛt nɛ mɛ tɛ nɛbhǒnɛt bɛghaka ɛchɔŋ, ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn mɛ̌kʉ̀ bɛ́gháti bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu.
16 Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ chɔŋ Mandɛm mmu ábhó ɛrɨ́tí bɛtɨk amɛm batɨ yɛka andɔk ambɨ bɛkʉ bhɔ kpátɛ mpok anɛ yi ánaŋa bhɔ ndu nywɔp ɛnɛn Yesu Kristo ápɛtnsɛm.
17 Ɛ́chí ɛrɨ́rɨ́ bɛ́ mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnyǔ bakaysi amɛn ákʉ̀ nɨkmʉɛt ɛ̌ti yɛka nɛ bɛyǎ maŋák. Ɛ́chí ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ nkɔŋ be tontó nɛ ntí bɛ be mankɛm bǎchɛm mmʉɛt nɛ mɛ ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn. Mandɛm atɔŋ mɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi ndǔ áchyɛ́ mɛ bɛtɨk ɛbhi nkʉ́. Bǎchɛm mmʉɛt nɛ mɛ nɛ́nɛ, ɛnɛ́ nchí mǔkɛnɔŋ, nɛ mpok anɛ nchí nyaka ndǔ mmʉɛ́t ɛya nte nɔkɔ ndu áchá manyé bɛtɔŋ bɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ achí tɛtɛp, nɛ bɛkʉ bo mánóko yɔ sayri.
18 Ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ́ mbɔ̌ŋ nɛ bhe ɛ́fǔ ntá Yesu Kristo. Mbɔŋ Mandɛm arɨ́ŋɨ́ nɔ.
19 Mɛ̌nɨ̀kmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm bɛ́ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ́ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ batɨ ɛ́ngó ɛ́ndɔ́k nɔ́kɔ́ chí ambɨ. Nɛ bɛ mǎndɨ́ŋɨ́ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ mǎndɔ́k nɔ́kɔ́ chí ambɨ, mǎndɨŋɨ nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chí chak bɛsí Mandɛm.
110 Ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ̀ bɛ mǎnkóŋó chí ɛpɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́rɨ́ ɛ́chá bɛ́ bǎkɛ́ kʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bakwap nɛ bɛ́ bǎkɛ́ kʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bo bákwày bɛji bhe. Bák ká chi ɛnyu yɔ kpatɛ ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn Kristo átwɔ̀.
111 Mǎnáŋ mǎmbák ɛnyu ɛyɔ, Yesu Kristo ǎkʉ mǎmbɔ́ŋ ɛrɨ́tí ɛpɨŋ. Kʉ nɔ́kɔ́ ká chí bɛyǎ bɛrɨ bɛ́ bo mángɔ́ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎkʉ mánchyɛ nɔkɔ Mandɛm kɛnókó nɛ mándɛm nɔkɔ bɛ́, “Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛtaŋ achá.” 
112 Bɔ̌ma, mɛ̌yáŋ mǎndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fákárí nɛ mɛ fá, ɛ́kwak Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu ándɔ́k chí ambɨ.
113 Ɛ́kʉ kpát batɛmɛ́ nɛnu mankɛm abhɛn bábhàbhɛri ɛ́kírí Mfɔ Rom nɛ bo báchák mankɛm, bárɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ ɛ̌ti nchí nkoŋo Kristo kɛ̌ báfyɛ́ mɛ fá amɛm ɛkɛt ɛnɛ, “Mbɔ mǔkɛnɔŋ.”
114 Nɛ nɛfyɛ́ báfyɛ́ mɛ fá mbɔ mǔkɛnɔŋ ákʉ́ bɛyǎ bǒnkwɔ básɨkɨntɨ nɛ Yesu Acha sayri, kpatɛ bághàti bho báchák Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm kɛbhɔ́ŋ bɛcháy.
115 Ɛ́chí tɛtɛp bɛ́ nɛyɨŋɨ anɛ mbɔk ɛyap báyɨ̀ŋɨ mɛ nɛ amɨ́k abʉ́abʉ nɛ nɛyɛnti bɔ́ báyɛ̀nti mmʉɛt nɛ mɛ kɛ̌ ákʉ́ bɔ́ bághàti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Kristo, kɛ mbɔk báchi abhɛn bághàti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ nɛ ɛrɨ́tí nkaysi.
116 Bɔ́ bhɔ bághàti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ nɛ ɛrɨ́tí nkaysi ndu bákɔ́ŋ mɛ. Bákɔŋ mɛ mbɔnyunɛ bɔ́ bárɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ Mandɛm ayap mɛ nɛ ákʉ́ bɛ mbák fá amɛm ɛkɛt ɛnɛ mbɔ mǔkɛnɔŋ chí ndu bɛkʉ bo mándɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ achí tɛtɛp.
117 Kɛ mbák chí bǒ abhɛn báyɨ̀ŋɨ mɛ nɛ amík abʉ́abʉ, mánjɛnti nɔkɔ mmʉɛt nɛ mɛ, bɔ́ bághàti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Kristo chí mbɔnyunɛ mánù bɛ́chá mɛ. Bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ ɛrɨ́tí nkaysi. Báyàŋ bɛbay mɛ chí batú áchák antí nɛ́nɛ, fá amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ.
118 Kɛ yɛ̌ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ́pú arɛ́. Yɛ̌ bábhɔŋ chí ɛrɨ́tí nkaysi yɛ̌ bábhɔŋ chí nkaysi mbʉ́mbʉ, nnɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ chí bɛ́ bo bághòk Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo. Ɛyɔ ɛ́chyɛ̀ mɛ maŋák.
119 Mpú rɔ bɛ́bhɔŋ maŋák mbɔnyunɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ be mǎnɨk Mandɛm mmʉɛt ɛ̌ti ya nɛ bɛ́ ndǔ bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Yesu Kristo, chɔŋ mámfɛrɛ mɛ ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ.
120 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mɛ̌yaŋ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛna nɛ ntɨ ɛna nɛnkɛm nɛ ɛnɛ́ mbákántɨ arɛ́ chi bɛ nkɛ́ kʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ ntíánwɔ́p ánkɛm mɛ. Mɛ̌yàŋ chi bɛ mbɔ́ŋ nɛtaŋántɨ mpoknkɛm bɛ nɛ́nɛ, nɛ yɛ̌ chi ndǔ mpok anɛ átwɔ̀ ambɨ, nɛtaŋántɨ ɛna nɛ́nchyɛ́ Kristo kɛnókó, yɛ̌ ngǔgú, yɛ̌ nchí chí nɛpɛ́m.
121 Ntá ya, bɛbhak nɛpɛ́m chí bɛ́chyɛ Kristo kɛnókó, kɛ bɛ́gu arɨ mbɔŋ achá.
122 Kɛ mbák ndɔ́k ambɨ bɛbhak nɛpɛ́m fá amɨk, ɛyɔ ɛ́chyɛ̀ mɛ mbi bɛkʉ bɛtɨk Kristo ndu bɛkwak bo. Chɔŋ nsɔt yɛ chí nɛpɛ́m kɛ nɛwú-e? Ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́páy, ɛ́chá mɛ ɛnɛ́ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛsɔt.
123 Mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́páy bɛ́chí mɛ antɨ nɛ nchí mbɔ mmu anɛ áchí ndǔ manyé mbi kɛrɨŋɨ mbi anɛ yí ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkoŋo. Mpok nɛ mpok, nchí bhɔ́ŋ nkaysi bɛ ɛ́rɨ bɛ mbák nɛpɛ́m, kɛ mbɔ̌ŋ ntɨ bɛ́rɔŋ bɛbhak nɛ Kristo, nɛ ɛyɔ kɛ̌ ɛ́rɨ́ ntá ya ɛ́chá.
124 Kɛ ɛ̌ti yɛká, ɛ́rɨ bɛ́ mbák nɛpɛ́m.
125 Nɛ tɛ̌ndu ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ ɛ́rɨ bɛ manywɔp ɛya ándɔ́k ambɨ ɛ̌ti yɛká, ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ chɔŋ mbak nɛpɛ́m, ndɔk ambɨ bɛbhak nɛ bhe ndu bɛ́kwák mǎmbɔŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu ɛ́nchá ɛnyu ɛsɨ́, bɛ́ maŋák amɛká anjá ancha.
126 Ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ̀ yɛ bɛ́ mpok mpɛ́t nchí pɛtnsɛm ntá yɛká, ntí ámbák anɛ be bǎbhɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ maŋák ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ Yesu Kristo ákʉ́ ntá ya.
127 Nnɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ achí bɛ bapɛm ayɛka ámbák mbɔ ɛnyǔ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo ághàti bhe. Ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ̀ bɛ yɛ̌ ntwɔ́ awu ntá yɛká, yɛ̌ mbɨ́kɨ́ twɔ́, mɛ̌yáŋ ngók chí bɛ́ bǎté kpirí ndǔ nkaysi amɔt, nɛ bɛ́ mǎnu nɛ ntɨ ɛnɛká nɛ́mɔ́t bɛ́ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo ándɔ́k ambɨ.
128 Bǎkɛ́ cháy bǒ abhɛn bápábhɛ́ bhe. Mánáŋ mángɔ́ bɛ bǎpú chay bhɔ bárɛ̀m bɛ, “Ɔ́e! Bácha bhɛsɛ. Mandɛm ǎtɛmsi chɔŋ bhɛsɛ.” Ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ Mandɛm ǎpɛmɛ chɔŋ bhe.
129 Ɛ́chí ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ mǎmbák bakoŋo Yesu Kristo puyɛ̌ chí ndiɛrɛ ndu mɛnoko yí, kɛ ndu bɛghɔ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ̌ti yi nkwɔ.
130 Nɛ́nɛ, bǎkwáy bɛchɛm mmʉɛt nɛ mɛ ndu mɛnu nkúbhɛ́ nɛnu ɛnɛn mɛ̌nù nyaka ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo, nɛ bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ mbʉɛ́t ndǔ nɛnu ɛnɛn fá amɛm ɛkɛt ɛnɛ́ nchí arɛ́ mbɔ mǔkɛnɔŋ.
2
21 Mɛ, ndɨ́ŋɨ́ sayri bɛ́ tɛ̌ndu bǎbhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo, yí afyɛ́ bhe ntɨ ndǔ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ́ yí ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ bhe. Nɛ tɛ̌ndu bǎbhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm, Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ, ǎkʉ bɛ́ mǎnkɔ́ŋ batɨ, mǎntɔŋ bɔ́ bɛrɨ̌ndu.
22 Nchí ghati yɛ bhe bɛ mǎmbɔ́ŋ nkaysi amɔt, mǎmbɔ́ŋ ɛkɔŋ nɛ batɨ, mǎmbak ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔ́t ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎkʉ nɛ ntɨ nɛ́mɔ́t. Mbák mǎnkʉ́ nɔ́, maŋák ama ǎyá ancha.
23 Bǎkɛ́ kʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ndu bɛtɔŋ mmʉɛt bɛ́ bǎchá batɨ, kɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ ywɛka abhɔŋ bɛsɛptimʉɛt ntá batɨ mbɔ bɛ bɔ́ báchá yi.
24 Mmu ywɛka ákɛ́ yɨŋɨ chi ndiɛrɛ mmʉɛt yi. Abhɔŋ bɛ́fyɛ́ ntí nɛ batɨ nkwɔ.
25 Bɛpɨŋ ɛbhɛka bɛbhɔŋ bɛbhak ɛnyu ɛ́mɔt mbɔ ɛnɛ Yesu Kristo ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka.
26 Yɛ̌ndu yi achí nyaka ɛnyu ɛ́mɔt mbɔ mbɔŋ Ɛta Mandɛm ndǔ babhi ankɛm, abhɨ́kɨ́ kɛ́m kɨ́kɨ́rɨ́k bɛ́ yi achi Mandɛm.
27 Akʉ mmʉɛt mbɔ bɛ apu yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Asɔt mmʉɛt mbɔ nsɛm, atwɔ́ fá amɨk mbɔ nkwǎŋwaŋ.
28 Nɛ átwɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ fá amɨk mbɔ nkwǎŋwaŋ, arɔk ambɨ bɛ́sɛ́pti mmʉɛt amɨk anchyɛ nɔkɔ Mandɛm kɛnókó, kpatɛ agú nɛwú ntíánwɔ́p ndǔ ɛkotákátí.
29 Ɛ̌ti yɔ, Mandɛm akósí yí áchyɛ́ yí bɛtaŋ amfǎy mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm, achyɛ yi nnyɛ́n kɛnókó ɛnɛ́n nɛ́chá manyɛ́n ankɛm.
210 Mandɛm akʉ́ ɛnyu ɛyɔ ndu bɛchyɛ nnyɛ́n Yesu kɛnókó bɛ bǒ abhɛn báchi amfay nɛ abhɛn báchí fá amɨk, nɛ abhɛn báchí ndǔ ɛtɔkɔ́ bawú, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap abhɔŋ bɛ́tɛ́p mánɛ́n bɛsí Yesu anchyɛ yí kɛnókó.
211 Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu abhɔŋ bɛrɛm kpoŋoroŋ bɛ chi Yesu Kristo kɛ achi Mfɔ bo mankɛm. Chɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́nkʉ bɛ bo mánchyɛ́ Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ́ bakak nɛ kɛnókó. 
212 Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, Mandɛm apɛ́mɛ́ bhe. Bǎghók yɛ ɛnyǔ Kristo ásɛ́ptímʉɛt bɛsí Mandɛm. Bǎghók nyaka mɛ mpok nchí nɛ bhe. Nɛ́nɛ, ndǔ mpɛ́t mpú nɛ bhe, bǎkɛ́ gʉɛ́p ɛyɔŋ ɛyá ɛbhɨ. Ghók ká mɛ ɛ́nchá ɛnyu ɛsɨ́. Nu ká bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎkwáy bɛkʉ ndu bɛ́chyɛ́ Mandɛm kɛnókó nɛ batɨ ayɛká ankɛm. Ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ̀ bɛ́ Mandɛm ámbɔ́ŋ mbi bɛkʉ bapɛm ayɛka ambak mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi áyàŋ.
213 Nchí rɛm nɔ mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm achi nɛ bhe mpoknkɛm nɛ ǎkwàk bhe bɛ mǎmbɔ́ŋ ntɨ bɛ́ghok yi, anchyɛ nɔkɔ be bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi áyàŋ mǎnkʉ.
214 Kʉ ka yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ kɛnywinti ansɛm nɛ batɨ, nɛ bǎkɛ bhak bɛyɔŋ bɛyɔŋ.
215 Ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ̀ bɛ yɛ̌ mmu akɛ ji bhe nɛ bɛ bǎkɛ́ bhɔŋ bakwap bɛsí Mandɛm. Ɛ́kʉ nkwɔ bɛ be bɔ̌ Mandɛm abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ntɨ́ bǒ abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛpɔ̌ bɛpɨŋ, mǎmbák mbɔ bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ntá yap.
216 Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛ́kwàk bo mámbɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m. Ghatí nɔ́kɔ́ ká yɔ ntá bho. Bǎbhɔŋ bɛkʉ nɔ bɛ mbɔ́ŋ maŋák ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn Kristo ápɛ̀tnsɛm, nɛ bɛ ntiɛt anɛ́ njɛ́rɛ́ nɛ́ntɨ́ ɛnɛka nɛ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn nkʉ́, bɛ́kɛ́ bhak ndɛ́ndɛm.
217 Bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎkʉ̀ ndǔ bǎbhɔŋɔ nɛka nɛ Yesu bɛ́chí mbɔ nnya anɛ básɔ́rɛ́ bɛchyɛ akap ntá Mandɛm mbɔ akap. Yɛ̌ ɛmbak chi bɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛna nɛ́rɔ̀ŋ mbɔ mmɛ́m amɛn bátò amfay nnya yɔ, mɛ̌bhák chi maŋák, nɛ nchí ŋák nɛ bhe mankɛm.
218 Bě nkwɔ́ bǎbhɔŋ bɛbhak maŋák. Ŋák ká nɛ mɛ. 
219 Mbák chí nkaysi Yesu Kristo Acha bɛ́ ntó Tímɔti awu ntá yɛká, chɔŋ ntó yi mandú mpok. Chɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́nchyɛ nkwɔ mɛ maŋák mpok yi áfú awu ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ntá ya, ághátí mɛ ɛnyǔ bǎchí awu.
220 Mɛ, mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ yɛ̌ mmu mbɔ yi anɛ ákway bɛkwak be ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́yɨ́ŋí nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka, bɛ mǎmfyɛ́ mɛ ntɨ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ́ Yesu Kristo.
221 Nchí rɛm nɔ mbɔnyunɛ bo báchák mankɛm bákàysi chi ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛyɨŋɨ ɛnap nɛpɛ́m, kɛfyɛ́ ntí ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛyɨŋɨ Yesu Kristo.
222 Kɛ be babhɔŋ bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ Tímɔti átɔ́ŋ bɛ achi ɛrɨ́tí nkʉbɛtɨk Yesu Kristo Acha nɛ mǔbɛtok bo bachak nɛ ntɨ ɛni nɛnkɛm. Akwak mɛ bɛ́gháti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu mbɔ mmɔ́ anɛ ákòŋo ɛ́táyi ansɛm bɛkʉ bɛtɨk.
223 Nnáŋ ngɔ́ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́chí ɛbhe ɛya, chɔŋ mbɔŋ nkaysi bɛto yi awu ntá yɛka.
224 Nɛ nsɨkɨ ntɨ bɛ́ chɔŋ Yesu Acha ankʉ bɛ mɛ nkwɔ ntwɔ awu mandú mpok.
225 Nnáŋ nkʉ ntɨ bɛ ɛ́chí sayri bɛto Ɛpafrodáytɔs ámpɛ́tnsɛm awu ntá yɛka. Ɛpafrodáytɔs mmu bǎtó bɛ ántwɔ́ ankwak mɛ mɛnu mbɔ ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu ndu bɛtɨk Yesu chí nkoŋo Yesu nkwɔ́ mbɔ mɛ.
226 Mɛ́tò yi ampɛtnsɛm ntá yɛka, mbɔnyunɛ abhɔŋ ɛ́kwak bɛghɔ bhe mankɛm ndu bǎghókó nyaka bɛ yi ǎmè.
227 Bɛrɛm tɛtɛp, ǎme nyaka, kpát ɛ́rɔ́p chí nɛwú, kɛ Mandɛm aghɔ́ yi ntínso. Nɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ chí yi aywǐnti ntínso, aghɔ mɛ nkwɔ ntínso. Mbɔ abhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ nɔ, mbʉ basɛ́mɛ́ ma aya acha.
228 Mbɔŋ yɛ ɛkwak nɛ́nɛ ncha ɛnyu ɛsɨ́ bɛto yi ampɛtnsɛm antɛmɛri bhe awu bɛ mǎngɔ yi batɨ ámpɔ́p be amɛm nɛ bɛ basɛ́mɛ́ ma nkwɔ ámay.
229 Sɔt yɛka yí nɛ bɛyǎ maŋák mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛsyɛpti ntɨ nkoŋo Yesu. Chiɛ̌ ká yi kɛnókó, mǎnchyɛ kɛnókó ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achák anɛ áchí mbɔ yi.
230 Chiɛ́ ká yi kɛnókó mbɔnyunɛ ntí ywi áyaŋá rɔŋ ɛ̌ti bɛtɨk Kristo. Chiɛ̌ ká yi kɛnókó nɛ ntí bɛ́ be kɛ bǎtó yi antwɔ tɛ fá ankwak mɛ tɛ̌ndu be babhɔŋ bǎpú kway nyaka bɛ́twɔ.
3
31 Bɔ̌ma, ndu bɛrɔŋ ambɨ, yɛ̌ yí yɛ̌ yi, bɔ́ŋ ká maŋák ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu Acha ákʉ́. Yɛ̌ndu nchí ghati bhe chí nkúbhɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn njámbɨ ngati bhe, ɛyɔ ɛ́pú chyɛ mɛ ɛsɔŋɔri tɛ̌ndu ɛ́kʉ̀ bɛ bǒmpap bákɛ́ bhɔŋ mbi nɛ bhe.
32 Sɔt ka mpok nɛ bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ, mmú ɛyɔ nɔ ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ bábhɔŋ bɛkpɔt mmʉɛt mbakanɛm kɛ ambak mmu Mandɛm, ɛnɛ́ ɛyɔ ɛ́twɔ̀ chi nɛ ɛsɔŋɔri.
33 Bɛsɛ́ kɛ sɛ́chí bo Mandɛm tɛtɛp, yɛ̌ndu bábhɨ́kɨ́ syɛp bhɛsɛ. Sɛ́chí bo Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ kɛ ákwàk bhɛsɛ sɛ́nɨ́kmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm. Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ fyɛ nti ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmǔ mmɨk ághɔ́kɔ́ mmʉɛt arɛ́ mbɔ ɛpɨŋ bɛsyɛp babhakanɛm. Sɛ́pànyu chi ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ Yesu Kristo ákʉ́ ndu bɛ́pɛ́mɛ bhɛsɛ.
34 Ɛchi tɛtɛp bɛ mbɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ̌kwáy bɛ́ghɔ́kɔmʉɛt arɛ́. Mbɔ ɛchi bɛ mmu abhɔŋ bɛghɔkɔ mmʉɛt chi ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ̀, mbʉ mbɔŋ bɛdɛp awɔ́ antɨ bɛ ɛya ɛnyu ɛcha ɛnɛ batɨ.
35 Bɛ́kóŋo bɛpɨŋ ɛbhɛsɛ bo Israɛl, básyɛp mɛ mpok bábhe mɛ. Nchí mmǔ ɛtɔk Israɛl, ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt Bɛnjamin. Bachǐmbɨ bha chí bo Israɛl. Bárɨ́ŋɨ bɛpɨŋ bo Israɛl nɛ ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk bo Israɛl nkwɔ́. Nɛ nchí mmu nkwɔ Fárisi, bɔ bho báte kpirí bɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu abhɔŋ bɛbhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé bɔtayɛsɛ.
36 Nchí fyɛ nyaka bɛyǎ bɛtaŋ ndu bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nkáysí bɛ Mandɛm kɛ áyàŋ nkʉ bhɔ kpát, nchyɛ́ nɔkɔ Nkwɔ Kristo bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri. Nɛ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ kɛbhak nɛ mɛ mbɔnyunɛ nchí bhʉɛrɛ nyaka bɛbhé bo Israɛl mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛ́yàŋ.
37 Kɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ mɛnkɛm nyaka nkáysí bɛ́ bɔ́ kɛ bɛ́kʉ̀ mɛ́mbak mmu Mandɛm, bɛ́rɔp chí bɛpɔ̌ mɛnyɨŋ ntá ya ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu Kristo akʉ ntá ya.
38 Bɛ́rɛ́m tɛtɛp, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́chák ɛ́rɔp chi mbɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mfɛ́rɛ́ ndu áchwí nto anyɛ́n bɛ ntí wa ándɔp mɛ̌mbát mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo. Bɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ Yesu Kristo Acha wa achá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́chák ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛna nɛ́nɛ. Ɛ̌ti mɛ́yàŋ bɛrɔp nɛ Yesu, mfɛ́rɛ́ ntí ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛ́n nkáysí nyaka bɛ bɛ́kʉ̀ Mandɛm ámpɛ́mɛ́ mɛ. Nɛ bɛ́rɔp ntá ya chi mbɔ mɛ́nyɨ́ŋ ɛbhɛn bátó ndǔ ɛbhwɔ́rɛ́ mɛnyɨŋɨ́.
39 Nchí yaŋ bɛ mbát mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu sayri. Puyɛ̌ chí ɛ̌ti mɛ̌bhʉ̀ɛrɛ bɛbhé bo Israɛl kɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ bɛ mbák chak bɛsí bhi. Ɛ̌ti nɛka ɛnɛ nɛ Kristo kɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ bɛ́ mbák chák bɛsí bhi.
310 Nchí yaŋ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ Kristo ndɔ́k nɔ́kɔ́ chí ambɨ, nɛ nchí yaŋ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm ásɔ́rɛ́ nyaka ákʉ́ Yesu ápɛ́tnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Nchí yaŋ mbat mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu, nka ɛsɔŋɔri mbɔ yi, nchɛm mmʉɛt nɛ yi ndǔ nɛwú ɛni. Nɛ mbɔ̌ŋ nɛsɛptǐmʉɛt bɛsí Mandɛm, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka kpát aka nɛwú
311 bɛ́ mbák Mandɛm ánkwák, mɛ nkwɔ́, mpɛ́tnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m mbɔ Yesu. 
312 Mpú rɛm nɔ́ chi bɛ nnáŋ ngaka ɛnyu mmu anɛ mɛ́yàŋ bɛbhak, nɛ mpú rɛm nɔ chi bɛ nnáŋ nsɛ́nɛ́ ndǔ mbi Mandɛm. Kɛ nchí nu ndɔk nɔkɔ chí ambɨ, bɛ́ ɛyɔ ɛ́nkwak mɛ mbak ɛnyu mmu Yesu Kristo áyàŋ nyaka bɛ mbak mpok yi ayabhɛ mɛ bɛ́ mbák mmǔ ywi.
313 Bɔ̌ma, mpú yɨŋɨ mmʉɛ́t ɛya bɛ́ nnáŋ nnu kpát nsɔt awɔ́nɛm, mbɔ̌ŋ akap. Kɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔ́t ɛnɛ mɛ̌kʉ̀ chí bɛ njɛt ntiɛt, mfɛ́rɛ́ ntí ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛfʉɛrɛ ansɛm, ndɔbhɛ jɛt ndɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ.
314 Mpú rɔ bɛ́fyɛ́ bɛtaŋ bɛ́ njɛt téé tɛ ndǔ ngwɛnti, mbɔ́ŋ nsáy. Nsáy yɔ achí bɛ Mandɛm abhɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛ ntwɔ bɛ mbak amfay nɛ yi ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo mmu ágú ɛ̌ti ya.
315 Ɛ́rɨ bɛ bɛsɛ bakoŋo Yesu bho sɛ́náŋ sɛ́sɛ́nɛ́ ndǔ mbi Mandɛm, sɛ́mbɔ́ŋ nkaysi amɔt ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn. Nɛ mbák mmu achí anɛ ayi nkaysi achi nyáŋá, chɔŋ Mandɛm ankʉ yí angɔ bɛ nkaysi ya ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn achi ɛrɨ́tí nkaysi.
316 Yɛ̌yi yɛ̌yi, sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛrɔŋ ambɨ bɛrɨŋɨ tɛtɛp anɛ Mandɛm ákʉ sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́.
317 Bɔ̌ma, Koŋó nɔ́kɔ́ ká ɛkakánɛkɔ ɛya nɛ fyɛ́ ká amɨ́k amʉɛt bo abhɛn bákòŋo bɛkaká nɛkɔ ɛbhɛsɛ. Bǎrɨŋɨ ndǔ bɛpɨŋ ɛbhɛsɛ bɛchi nyaka mpok sɛ́chí awu nɛ bhe.
318 Nchí ghati bhe bɛ́ bǎkɛ́ rɔ bɛkoŋo bɛkaká nɛkɔ ɛbhɛsɛ mbɔnyunɛ bɛyǎ bho bachi abhɛn bɛpɨŋ ɛbhap bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ bɔ́ bábhɨ́kɨ́ kɔŋ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ árɛ̀m bɛ́ Kristo agu ndǔ ɛkotákátí ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ. Nnáŋ nchí ghati nɔkɔ bhe ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mpok nɛ mpok, nɛ nɛ́nɛ, mpɛt nchí ghati bhe nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́rɛ́ nɛ babhɛsɛ amɨ́k.
319 Ngwɛnti yap chi mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́. Mandɛm awap chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fʉɛ̀t bɔ anyu ɛ́nchwe bɔ mɛniɛ nɛ mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́chák ɛbhɛn bɔ báfyɛ̀ ngoŋo arɛ́. Bákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo bághɔ̀ mámbɔ́ŋ chí ntíánwɔ́p, yɛ̌ nɔ, bɔ́ babhɔŋ bápànyu ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ. Nɛ bábhʉrɛ batɨ yap ndǔ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk.
320 Kɛ mbák chí bhɛsɛ, ɛyɛsɛ́ ɛtɔk ɛ́chí amfay, ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ Yesu Kristo Acha achi. Nɛ sɛ́bhaka ntɨ bɛ́ yí mmu áchí Mpɛmɛ ywɛsɛ́ ámfú arɛ́ ámpɛtnsɛm.
321 Yí ánáŋ ántwɔ́, ǎsɔt nkúbhɛ́ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mbák antɛn yi, anjibhiri mmʉɛ́rɛ́ ntɔp ɛyɛsɛ-nɛ, ankʉ yɔ́ ɛ́ndɔp chí mbɔ mmʉɛt anɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka mpok Mandɛm ákʉ́ yí apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
4
41 Bɔ̌ma, nkɔŋ be tontó nɛ mbɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ ɛkwak bɛghɔ bhe mbɔnyunɛ be kɛ̌ bǎchí maŋák ama, nɛ be kɛ̌ bǎchí nsáy bɛtɨk ɛbha. Tě yɛka kpirí, mǎnkʉ nɔkɔ mbɔ ɛnyu ngátí be bho bǎbhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu.
42 Mɛ̌nɨ̀kmʉɛt ntá Ɛyódia nɛ Sintíke bɛ́ mándɔ́ bɛgwá ɛbhap mámbák ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔ́t, tɛ̌ndu bɔ́ bati apay báchí bǒ Yesu Kristo Acha.
43 Nɛ wɔ ɛrɨ́tí ntɨ nkʉbɛtɨk wa, nchí yáŋ nkwɔ́ bɛ ɔ́nkwák mɛ́nyúrɛ́ bághɔrɛ́ abhɛn bati apay bɛ́ mámbák ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt. Bákʉ́ bɛyǎ bɛtɨk nɛ mɛ ndu mɛ́nu bɛ́gháti bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́. Bákʉ́ bɛtɨk nɛ Klɛ́mɛn, nɛ batɨ̌ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk abha báchák. Bɔ́ mankɛm báchí bo Mandɛm ásɨ́ŋɨ́ manyɛ́n ayap amɛm ɛkáti manyɛ́n bǒ abhɛn bábhɔ̀ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
44 Bák ká maŋák mpoknkɛm bɛ bǎchí bǒ Yesu Acha. Mbʉɛ́t bɛ́sɛ́mti bhe, bák ká maŋák mpoknkɛm.
45 Kʉ ka yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ángɔ́ bɛ́ bǎpú mmʉɛt gum gum ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka. Bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ Yesu Acha ǎpɛ̀tnsɛm mandú mpok.
46 Mmu ákɛ́ rɔ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ́nsɔ́ŋɔ́rí ntɨ ɛni amɛm. Yɛ̌yi yɛ̌yi, ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ chí mɛnɨk nɔ́kɔ́ mmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎyàŋ yi ánchyɛ́ bhe. Nɨk nɔ́kɔ́ ká mmʉɛt, mǎnkaka nɔkɔ yí ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ́.
47 Nɨk nɔ́kɔ́ ká mmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm nɛ chɔŋ yi anchyɛ bhe kpák. Nɛ ɛnyu kpák anɛ Mandɛm áchyɛ̀, bǒ mmɨk bápú kwáy bɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ wáwák. Nɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm ankʉ kpák ámbák amɛm batɨ yɛka, ankʉ bɛ kpák ámbák nkwɔ́ ndǔ nkaysi yɛká, bɛ yɛ̌yi yɛ̌yi, bǎkɛ bhɔŋ bɛcháy. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́chí tɛtɛp mbɔnyunɛ bǎbhat mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo.
48 Nɛ́nɛ, bɔ̌ma, bʉrɛ́ ká nkaysi ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́rɨ́, nɛ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́chyɛ̀ mmu kɛnókó, nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chí chak bɛsí Mandɛm, nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ bakwap, nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bo bághɔ̀ mánkɔŋ, nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bo bábhɔ̀ŋ ɛkwak bɛghɔ, nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́rɨ́ bɛ́chá, nɛ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́kʉ̀ bo mámbɨti bhe.
49 Bǎkɛ́ rɔ bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bǎghɔ́kɔ́ ntá ya, nɛ ndu bɛ́kóŋo yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nkaysi anɛ áfú ndǔ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛnɛ́ bǎsɔrɛ ntá ya, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bǎghókó ntá ya, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎghɔ́ mɛ́ nkʉ. Nɛ chɔŋ kpák anɛ Mandɛm áchyɛ̀ ambak nɛ bhe. 
410 Mɛ mmǔ Yesu Kristo Acha, mbɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ maŋák bɛ yɛ̌ndu ɛ́náŋ ɛ́tárɛ́, bǎpɛt bǎtɔ̀ŋ ndǔ akap anɛ bǎtó mɛ bɛ bǎbhɨkɨ ghɔkɔntɨk mɛ. Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ bǎkaysi mɛ mpoknkɛm, kɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nyaka chi mbi bɛkwak mɛ.
411 Mpú rɛm nɔ́ chi ɛ̌ti nchɛ́bhɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ. Yɛ̌ mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnyɨŋ, yɛ̌ mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ, ngɔk bɛbhak mbɔ mmu anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ chɛp yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
412 Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyǔ mɛ̌kwáy bɛbhak mbɔ mmu anɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ́pú sɔŋɔri yí mpok mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́chɛ́bhɛ́ mɛ́ nɛ yɛ̌ chí mpok mbɔ́ŋɔ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ. Yɛ̌ ɛ́mbak bɛ́ yi, ngɔk bɛbhak mbɔ mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ mpǒknkɛm, yɛ̌ chí mpok nnyiɛ́ njwí, nɛ mpok anɛ nchɔkɔ nsay, nɛ yɛ̌ mbɔ́ŋ, yɛ̌ mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ.
413 Yɛ̌ ɛ́mbak bɛ yi, mɛ̌tee kpɨrí ɛ̌ti bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn Yesu áchyɛ̀ mɛ.
414 Kɛ nkáká bhé tontó bɛ́ bǎchɛm amɔ nɛ mɛ ndǔ nɛkwak ɛnɛ́n bǎchyɛ́ mɛ́ mpok mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́táŋá mɛ amʉɛt.
415 Nɛ be bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn ɛtɔk Fílipi, be babhɔŋ bǎrɨŋɨ sayri bɛ mpok njámbɨ ntwɔ́ awu nɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ndɔ ɛtɔk ɛyɛka atú Masidónia ndɔk atú ɛtɔk ɛchak, ndiɛrɛ be kɛ̌ bǎtó nyaka mɛ nkáp ndu bɛ́chyɛ mɛ nɛkwak. Yɛ̌ bǒnkwɔ báchák bábhɨ́kɨ́ chɛm amɔ nɛ mɛ ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn mɛ́kʉ̀.
416 Nchí rɛm nɔ́ mbɔnyunɛ yɛ̌ chí mpok anɛ nchí ɛtɔk Tɛsalónika ɛnɛ́ mbɨ́kɨ́re rɔ atú ɛtɔk ɛyɛká Masidónia, be bǎtó mɛ nkáp, puyɛ̌ chí ndɔŋ amɔt, kɛ ndɔŋ ɛ́páy, mpok mɛnyɨŋ bɛtaŋa mɛ amʉɛt.
417 Mpú rɛm nɔ́ chí bɛ mɛ́yàŋ mǎntó mɛ́ akap áchák. Ɛnyɨŋ mɛ̌yáŋ chí bɛ́ mǎndɔ́k ambɨ bɛkʉ bɛrɨ, mɛ́máka ndǔ ɛbhɛ́n mǎnáŋ bǎkʉ́ ansɛm mbɔ mmǔ anɛ ámàka nkáp ndǔ anɛ́ yí ánáŋ áyámbɨ afyɛ́ amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́nkap bɛ nsáy yi ánja.
418 Be bǎkap mɛ ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbha kpát yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɔp. Nɛ́nɛ, bakáp anɛ bǎtó Ɛpafrodáytɔs ántwɔ́ ánchyɛ́ mɛ ákʉ́ mbɔŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ nchɛ́bhɛ́. Nɛ akap aywɛka áchí mbɔ akap ɛrítí ɛriɛp anɛ́ bǎchíɛ ntá Mandɛm, nɛ Mandɛm ǎbhɔ́ŋ maŋák nɛ wu.
419 Mandɛm mmu nchí mmɔ̌bɛtok ywi abhɔ̌ŋ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́yá bɛ́chá. Nɛ chɔŋ anchyɛ bhe yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chɛ́bhɛ́ bhé ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu Kristo ákʉ́ ntá yɛsɛ.
420 Kɛnókó kɛ́mbák nɛ Mandɛm mmu áchí Ɛ́táyɛsɛ́ mpoknkɛm. Amen. 
421 Kaká ká bo Mandɛm báchák abhɛn báchí bakoŋo Yesu Kristo awu mankɛm ntá ya. Batɨ̌ bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn báchí fá Rom nɛ mɛ bátó nkwɔ bhe bakak.
422 Bǒ Mandɛm báchák mankɛm abhɛn báchí fá Rom nɛ mɛ, sayri sayri, abhɛn báchi bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk ntá mfɔ-ngo anɛ Rom, bátó nkwɔ bhe bakak.
423 Nchí nɨkmʉɛt bɛ́ bɛrɨ̌ndu Yesu Kristo Acha mɛ́mbak amɛm batɨ ayɛka. Amen.
1
11 Mɛ Pɔ̌l mǔnto Yesu Kristo bɛkoŋo nkaysi Mandɛm, kɛ nchí sɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Nchí fá nɛ ntɨ mǔnkwɔ ywɛsɛ Tímɔti.
12 Sɛ́tò yɔ ntá yɛka bo Mandɛm, be batɨ̌ bǒnkwɔ abhɛn bábhʉ̀rɛ bariɛp awu ɛtɔk Kɔlɔse nɛ Mandɛm abhat be nɛ Kristo. Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ ántɔ́ŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu anchyɛ bhe kpák. 
13 Sɛ́kàka Mandɛm mmu Yesu Kristo Acha ywɛsɛ achi Mɔ́ywi, nɛ sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt ɛ̌ti yɛka,
14 mbɔnyunɛ sɛ́ghok bɛ bǎbhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu Kristo nɛ bǎkɔŋ bo Mandɛm mankɛm.
15 Bǎkʉ̀ nɔ mbɔnyunɛ bǎbháká ntɨ ndǔ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm ábhʉ́rɛ́ amfay ntá yɛka. Mpok bǎghókó Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ kɛ bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, nɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ achi tɛtɛp.
16 Mbok yɔ atwɔ ntá yɛka mbɔ ɛnyǔ átwɔ́ ntá bo mmɨk nkɛm nɛ ǎnyù kɛpɛm nɛ ágò. Nɔ kɛ yɔ achi nyaka ndǔ nkwɔ yɛka bɛbho ndu nywɔp ɛnɛn bǎghókó ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm nɛ bǎjwimɛm ɛnyu bɔ bɛchi tɛtɛp.
17 Bǎghók Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ nɛ ntá Ɛpafras. Yi achi ntɨ mǔbɛtok Mandɛm anɛ sɛ́kɔ́ŋɔ́ tontó. Achi nkʉbɛtɨk Kristo anɛ ábhʉ̀ɛrɛ bariɛp ami. Achi awu ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛnɛsɛ.
18 Yi aghati bhɛsɛ ɛnyǔ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ákʉ́ bɛ mǎnkɔŋ batɨ.
19 Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔt mɛnɨkmʉɛt ɛ̌ti yɛka bɛbho nywɔp ɛnɛn sɛ́ghókó nɔ. Sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm amfʉɛt ntá Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ánkwak mǎndɨŋɨ sayri ɛnyiŋ ɛnɛ yi áyàŋ mǎnkʉ. Sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm ánkʉ nɔ ndu ákʉ mǎmbak barɨŋɨ́ndak bɛyɨŋɨ baraká Ɛfoŋo nɛ ndu akwak mǎmbɔŋ nɛjwǐmɛm ndu bɔ bɛchi. Achyɛ́ bhe nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak bɛ mǎndɨŋɨ sayri yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi atɨ́ nyaka bɛkʉ nɛ ǎkʉ̀ ntá bǒbhi.
110 Sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ nɛjwǐmɛm ɛnɔ nɛ́nkwák mǎmbɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛ́kwáy ntá nkoŋo Yesu Acha. Ɛnɔ nɛ́kʉ̀ Mandɛm ambɔŋ maŋák, nɛ nɛ́kwàk mǎnkʉ nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛrɨ ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi, nɛ nɛ́kʉ̀ mǎndɨŋɨ Mandɛm mǎndɔkɔ nɔkɔ chi ambɨ.
111 Nɛ sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm ánsɔt bɛtaŋ ɛbhi ɛbhɛn bɛyǎ bɛcha ánkʉ mǎmbɔŋ nɔkɔ bɛtaŋ, bɛ yɛ̌yí yɛ̌yi, mǎmbɔŋ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ́, mǎnte sɛnɛ́, mǎndɔkɔ nɔkɔ chi ambɨ nɛ maŋák,
112 mǎnkaka nɔkɔ Ɛta. Yí kɛ ákʉ́ mǎnkwáy bɛbhɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi atoŋti ntá bǒbhi abhʉɛrɛ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ ɛbhi bɛ́ghɔ̀.
113 Afɛ́rɛ́ bhɛsɛ ndǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn ɛjuri, akʉ bɛ Mɔ́ywi mmu yi ákɔ́ŋɔ́ tontó ámbák wu Mfɔ ywɛsɛ.
114 Bɛ́fʉɛt ntá Mɔ́ywi wu sɛ́bhɔŋ mbi bɛ mánku bhɛsɛ mǎmfɛrɛ ndǔ kɛsɛm ɛkɛn bɛbʉ́, nɔ chi, mǎmfóŋórí bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛsɛ. 
115 Yɛ̌ mmu apu kway bɛghɔ Mandɛm. Mɔ́ywi kɛ ákʉ́ sɛ́njwimɛm ɛnyu Mandɛm achi. Nɛ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ mɔ̌mbɨ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt, nɔ kɛ Mɔ́ywi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ amfǎy mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn Mandɛm ághókó.
116 Ɛchi nɔ mbɔnyunɛ yi kɛ Mandɛm árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ ángókó yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ, ɛbhɛn bɛchi amfay nɛ ɛbhɛn bɛchi fá amɨk, ɛbhɛn bo bághɔ̀ nɛ ɛbhɛn bo bápú kway bɛghɔ, bɛtaŋtí bɛfóŋó, ɛbhɛn bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛtaŋ bɛcha bafɔ bachak nɛ bɛfóŋó ɛbhɛn nɛŋɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ɛkap nɛcha ɛkɛn bachak, nɛ yɛ̌ chí ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ amfay bho mbɔ bafɔ. Bɛ́fʉɛt ntá yi, nɛ ntá yi, kɛ bághókó mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm.
117 Bápɛ́rɛ ghoko yɛ̌nyɨŋ, yi achi. Nɛ yi kɛ ákɛ̀m mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm bɛ mɛ́mbak mbɔ ɛnyu bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛbhak.
118 Yírɛ kɛ achi mǔnti anɛ bǒnkwɔ, nɛ bǒnkwɔ chi mmʉɛt yi. Yí kɛ ágháy nɛbhʉɛ́rɛ́mɨk ntá bǒnkwɔ.
119 Ɛchi ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka maŋák bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyu mmu yi achi, Mɔ́ywi nkwɔ achi.
120 Nɛ yí kɛ Mandɛm ásɔ́rɛ́ bɛ ankʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ, yɛ̌ chi ɛnɛ́ fá amɨk nɛ yɛ̌ chi ɛnɛ amfay, bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mbɔ́ŋ mbi bɛpɛt bɛbhak ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt nɛ yi ɛ̌ti nɛwú Mɔ́ywi ndǔ ɛkotákátí. Nɛ́nɛ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́kwày bɛbhak ndu kpák ndu nté anɛ yɔ́ ɛchi nɛ Mandɛm. 
121 Bě nkwɔ bǎchi nyaka nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ nɛ Mandɛm, bǎbhak bǒmpap abhi ndu nkaysi yɛka ɛ̌ti bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎkʉ̀ nyaka.
122 Kɛ Kristo asɔt nyaka mmʉɛt nkwǎŋwaŋ, agú ndǔ ɛkotákátí ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka. Ɛnyu yɔ kɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ bɛ mǎmpɛt mǎmbak ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt nɛ yi, bɛ mǎmbak nyáŋá, kɛbhɔŋ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛsí bhi.
123 Kɛ bǎbhɔŋ bɛrɔŋ ambɨ bɛbhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́, mǎnte sɛnɛ́ nɛ kpirí. Bǎkɛ́ rɔ nɛbhakántɨ ɛnɛn Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ákʉ́ bǎbhɔŋɔ mpok bǎghókó yɔ. Bághati Mbok anɛ ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu fá amɨk. Mɛ Pɔ̌l nchí mǔbɛtok anɛ nchí kʉ bo mándɨŋɨ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́-nɛ. 
124 Nɛ́nɛ, mbɔŋ maŋák ndu bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn mɛ́bhɔ̀ŋ mbɔnyunɛ bɛ́kwàk bhe. Nchí bhɔŋ bɛsɔŋɔri ndǔ nkwɔmʉɛt mbɔnyunɛ nchí naŋa bɛbhɔŋ bɛsɔŋɔri mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn bɛrɔbhɛ nyaka bɛ Kristo ámbɔ́ŋ, ɛ̌ti bǒnkwɔ. Bǒnkwɔ Kristo bhɔ chi mmʉɛt ɛyi.
125 Ɛ̌ti bǒnkwɔ kɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ bɛ mbak mǔbɛtok ndu bɛkʉ mǎndɨŋɨ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm sayri.
126 Ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi nyaka bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ntá mkpaká bho ɛnɛ ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm, kɛ nɛ́nɛ, Mandɛm akʉ bǒbhi mándɨ́ŋɨ́ yɔ.
127 Mandɛm áyàŋ nyaka bɛ bǒbhɔ mándɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ ɛnyɨŋ bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ɛnɛ yi átóŋtí abhʉrɛ chi nnɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛbhɔŋɔ bɛkwak bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl. Kristo achí amɛm batɨ yɛka, nɛ bǎkway bɛbhaka ntɨ bɛ chɔŋ mǎnyiɛ kɛnɛ́m ɛki nɛ yi.
128 Kristo ɛ́rɛ kɛ sɛ́ghàti bho mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti yi. Ndu sɛ́kʉ̀ nɔ, sɛ́yà batú yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛkʉ nɛ sɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ. Sɛ́sɛ̀mti bhɔ, nɛ sɛ́tɔ̀ŋ nɛ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak nɛnkɛm bɛ́ sɛ́nkwáy bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap ánkwáy ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi, mbɔ mmu anɛ ábhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo, ndǔ mpok anɛ sɛ́te bɛsí Mandɛm nɛ yi.
129 Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ nchí fyɛ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ bɛtɨk, ndɛp nɔkɔ mmʉɛt nɛ bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn Kristo áchyɛ̀ mɛ.
2
21 Nchí yaŋ mǎndɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ nchí nu tontó ɛ̌ti nkwɔ Kristo anɛ Laodísia nɛ ɛ̌ti bakwɔ́ bho bachak ankɛm, abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́re ghɔ mɛ.
22 Nchí yaŋ bɛfyɛ bhe ntɨ, ndǔ bǎgwɔ́rɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ batɨ ndu ɛkɔŋ. Nchí yaŋ bɛ be mankɛm nɛ bhɔ mǎnjwimɛm sayri ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛ̌ti Kristo, bɛ mǎndɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti Kristo ɛbhɛn bɛchi bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ nɛ bɛ́kʉ̀ mǎmbɔŋ bɛyǎ áfɔ́k ndǔ bákòŋo mbi ywi.
23 Yí kɛ ánɛ̀nɛ mbi bɛ sɛ́mbák barɨŋɨ́ndak nɛ bɛ sɛ́ndɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛnyɨŋ. Nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɛn nɛ́rɨ nɛcha.
24 Nchí ghati bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́ sɔt sɛ́rwɔrɛ́nyu ándwɔ bhe ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛyɨŋɨ Kristo, bɛ mǎnɛm ɛbhɨ.
25 Yɛ̌ndu mpú awu, ntɨ ɛna nɛchi nɛ bhe mpoknkɛm. Nkɔŋ bɛghok bɛ bǎkʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛnyu ɛ́yàŋ nɛ bɛ bǎte kpirí ndǔ nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ Kristo. 
26 Tɛ̌ndu bǎsɔ́rɛ́ bɛ Yesu Kristo achi Acha, bʉrɛ́ ká nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi áyàŋ.
27 Dɔ̌ ka bapɛ́m ayɛka ambak nɛ Yesu mbɔ ɛnɔk ɛnɛ ɛ́mʉ́rɛ́ bakaŋ amɨk, mǎnsɛnɛ ndǔ nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ yi nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bátɔ́ŋ be, mǎnchyɛ nɔ́kɔ́ Mandɛm bɛyǎ kɛnókó.
28 Sɔt ka mpok bɛ yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́ sɔt nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɛn bǒ mmɨk nɛ sɛ́rwɔrɛ́nyu andwɔ be mǎmbák basɛm ntá mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bátɔ̀ŋ be. Ɛnyǔ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɔ nɛ́fù chi ndǔ nkaysi bakwǎŋwaŋ nɛ ntá bɛfóŋó ɛbhɛn bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛtaŋ fá amɨk, nɛ́pú fu ntá Kristo.
29 Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ mmu Mandɛm achi, ɛnyuyɔ kɛ Kristo achi.
210 Ndǔ bǎbhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ yi, bǎjwi pɔɔt. Yi kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ amfǎy mɛnyǔ bɛfóŋó mɛnkɛm.
211 Ndǔ bǎchɛ́mɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo, afɛ́rɛ́ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛpɨŋ amɛm batɨ yɛka. Ɛyɔ chí ɛrɨŋ bɛtɔŋ bɛ bǎchi bǒbhi. Puyɛ̌ chi ɛrɨŋ ɛnɛ mmu afyɛ́ amʉɛt mpok báyaŋ bɛsyɛp yi mbɔ ɛnyǔ bo Israɛl bákʉ mpoknkɛm. Chí Kristo kɛ afyɛ́ ɛrɨŋ ɛyi amɛm batɨ ayɛka.
212 Mpok bájwítí bhe, bábhɛ́mɛ be nɛ Kristo. Bě nkwɔ bǎpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nɛ yi mpok yi apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Ɛ́fákári nɔ mbɔnyunɛ bǎsɨkɨ nyaka ntɨ ndǔ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm mmu ákʉ́ Kristo apɛtnsɛm ndu nɛpɛ́m.
213 Bǎchi nyaka chi bawú ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka mbɔnyunɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́re fyɛ nyaka be ɛrɨŋ amʉɛt bɛtɔŋ bɛ bǎchi bo Mandɛm. Kɛ achyɛ́ bhe nɛpɛ́m nɛkɔ nɛ Kristo ndu áfóŋórí bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛsɛ mɛnkɛm.
214 Sɛ́kwɛn nyaka manyé bɛsí Mandɛm ndu sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi áyàŋ. Kɛ adákátí ɛkati manyé bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛsɛ, nɛ ɛ́bhak mbɔ bɛ ábáy nyaka bhɔ anti Yesu, nɛ bágó yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí nɛ bhɔ.
215 Afɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ ntá bɛfóŋó ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ fá amɨk, akʉ bɛ bɔ́ bɛ́kɛ́ bhɔŋ kɛnókó bɛsí bho ndǔ ású bhɔ́ amɨk. Atɔ́ŋ bhɔ mbɔ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu abhɛn bákɛ́mɛ́ ɛbhɨ̌nɛnu. Ɛbhɨ̌ nɛnu ɛyɔ ɛbhak nɛwú Yesu ndǔ ɛkotákátí. Asɔt awɔ́nɛm amfǎy bɛfóŋó ɛbhɔ ɛnyuyɔ bɛfʉɛt ndǔ nɛwú Kristo ndǔ ɛkotákátí.
216 Ndu ɛchi yɛ̌ nɔ, bǎkɛ́ rɔ bɛ yɛ̌ mmu ánji be bɛ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛ́chí nɛ bhe ɛ̌ti mɛnyǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mǎnyìɛ nɛ ɛbhɛn mǎnyù. Nɛ bǎkɛ́ rɔ bɛ mmu ampuri bhe mǎnkoŋo bɛbhé ɛ̌ti bɛpǎ mmyɛ́,   nɛ ɛpǎ ntaŋ akɔ, nɛ ɛ̌ti ɛpǎ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt.
217 Bɛbhé ɛbhɔ mɛnkɛm bɛchi chi mbɔ ndɨ́kándi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm ábhʉ́rɛ́ nyaka bɛ bɛ́twɔ chɔŋ. Mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi ansɛm ndɨ́kándi wu ankɛm chi Kristo yímbɔŋ.
218 Bǎkɛ́ rɔ yɛ̌ mmu ándɛ́m bɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ kway, ansɛt nkwɛrɛ bɛ bǎbhɔŋ bɛbhɔŋ ɛnyǔ nɛsɛptímʉɛt ɛnɛn nɛ́pú tɛtɛp, nɛ bɛ bǎbhɔŋ bɛchyɛ kɛnókó ntá bɔángɛl. Bǒbhɔ bápà bɛ Mandɛm ǎtɔ̀ŋ bhɔ mɛnyɨŋ ndǔ kɛnɔ́ amɨ́k anti fúú, nɛ báyòŋ mmʉɛt ndɛ́ndɛm. Nkaysi yap achí chí anɛ bǒ mmɨk.
219 Ɛkʉ bɔ bábhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ bhat mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo, mǔnti wap. Yí kɛ achi mbɔ ntí nɛ bǒnkwɔ bachi mbɔ mmʉɛt ɛyi. Básɔ̀t bɛtaŋ ɛbhap mɛnkɛm chi ntá yi nɛ ǎkʉ̀ bɔ mánchɛm mmʉɛt ndǔ nkwɔ amɔt mbɔ ɛnyǔ barɨŋ ákɛm byoŋómʉɛt. Bágò yɛ ndǔ mbi Mandɛm mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi áyàŋ. 
220 Bǎgú nɛ Kristo, nɛ Mandɛm afɛ́rɛ́ bhe antɛn bɛfóŋó ɛbhɛn bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛtaŋ fá amɨk. Ndu ɛ́chí nɔ, ndaká yi bǎchi mbɔ bǒ mmɨk? Ndaká yí bǎbhʉɛt bɛkoŋo bɛbhé bǒ mmɨk, mbɔ ɛbhɛn bɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ,
221 “Bǎkɛ́ kɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ ɛyɔ nɛ awɔ. Yɛ̌ chi bɛghokoti, bǎkɛ́ ghokoti ɛnyǔ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɔ. Yɛ̌ bɛtɔk, bǎkɛ́ tɔk ɛnyǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛyɔ.”
222 Mɛnyǔ bɛbhé ɛbhɔ bɛ́fʉɛrɛ fʉɛt. Mɛnyǔ bɛbhé ɛbhɔ bɛ́fù chi ntá bǒ mmɨk nɛ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bátɔ̀ŋ.
223 Bɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ bɛbhé ɛbhɔ, mmu ǎkway bɛkaysi bɛ bɛ́chyɛ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak mbɔnyunɛ bo abhɛn báfyɛ̀ bhɔ bátè kpɨrí bɛ mmu abhɔŋ bɛfyɛ mmʉɛt ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ Mandɛm ɛbhɔ, nɛ bárɛ̀m bɛ mmu abhɔŋ bɛsɛpti mmʉɛt amɨk, nɛ bɛ mmu abhɔŋ bɛchyɛ mmʉɛt yi bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri. Bɛbhe ɛbhɛn bɛchi chi ndɛ́ndɛm. Bɛ́pú kway bɛkwak mmu ambɔŋ bɛtaŋ ndu bɛkɛm mmʉɛt bɛ ákɛ́ koŋo bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmʉɛt ɛyi áyàŋ yi ankʉ.
3
31 Tɛ̌ndu Mandɛm ákʉ́ bǎfú ndǔ nɛwú bápɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nɛkɔ nɛ Kristo, bʉrɛ́ ká ntɨ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi amfay, ɛbhak ɛnɛ Kristo áchɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt kɛnókó, ɛbhe awɔ́nɛm Mandɛm.
32 Bʉrɛ́ ka nkaysi chi ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi amfay, puyɛ̌ ndǔ ɛbhɛn bɛchi fá amɨk.
33 Ɛchi mbɔ bɛ bǎgu mpok anɛ Yesu ágú. Nɛ́nɛ, nɛpɛ́m nɛkɔ ɛnɛka nɛchi bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ awɔ́ Kristo ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yi achi nɛ Mandɛm.
34 Nɛ mpok Kristo mmu achi nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛsɛ ábhèsi, chɔŋ be nkwɔ mǎmbesi nɛ yi nɛ mǎmbɔŋ ákɔ́rɛ́ ndu kɛnɛ́m ɛki. 
35 Sǒ yɛ́ ka amɔ́ mǎmfɛ́rɛ́ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́yɨ̀ŋɨ nɛpɛ́m nɛsɨ́ ɛnɛka. Nɔ chi ɛpúsí, nɛ yɛ̌ chí bɛpɔ̌ baraká kɛbhʉrɛ, nɛ mɛ́ŋwáka ndǔ baraká kɛbhʉrɛ, nɛ nkaysi bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́, nɛ yɛ̌chi bɛfyɛ amɨ́k ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ bo bachak mbɔnyunɛ bɛfyɛ amɨ́k ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ chi bɛsɔt bhɔ mbɔ bɔmandɛm mmɨk.
36 Ɛ̌ti barak abʉ́abʉ yɔ kɛ Mandɛm ǎbè chɔŋ ntɨ, antɛmsi bho.
37 Ndǔ mpok anɛ áfʉɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm, bǎkʉ nyaka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mpok bachi ndǔ ɛsɨ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka.
38 Kɛ nɛ́nɛ, bǎkɛ́ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ bɛběntɨ, nɛ ɛchoko-ntɨ, nɛ nkaysi bɛkʉ batɨ bɛbʉ́, nɛ bɛchɔŋti manyɛ́n batɨ, nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛkɛ fu be anyu.
39 Bǎkɛ́ sénse ntá batɨ tɛ̌ndu mǎnáŋ bǎrɔ ɛsɨ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɔ nɛ́tò nyaka be mǎnkʉ nɔkɔ,
310 nɛ bǎrɔbhɛ koŋo chi ɛpɨŋ ɛkɔ. Bǎyíbhírí bǎrɔp bǒ bakɔ nɛ bǎyìbhiri mǎndɔkɔ nɔkɔ chi ambɨ mǎndɔbhɛ nɔkɔ mbɔ Mandɛm. Yi kɛ ághókó bhe mbɔ bǒ bakɔ bɛ mǎndɨŋɨ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti yi.
311 Ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nɛkɔ ɛnɛn, yɛ̌ mmu achi chi mmu Israɛl yɛ̌ mmu ɛtɔk ɛchak, yɛ̌ básyɛp mmu yɛ̌ bábhɨ́kɨ́ syɛp, yɛ̌ chi mmu anɛ amɨ́k ánɛ́nɛ́ yi yɛ̌ chi anɛ achi nyabhɨ, yɛ̌ chi nsɛm yɛ chi mɔ̌mɨk, mankɛm báchí ɛnyumɔt. Nnɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ chi Kristo nɛ yi achi amɛm batɨ bǒbhi mankɛm.
312 Mandɛm ayap be bɛ mǎmbak bǒbhi, bǎchi nyáŋá, nɛ akɔŋ be tontó. Ndu ɛchi nɔ, bǎbhɔŋ bɛghɔ batɨ ntínso, mǎntɔŋ bɔ bɛrɨ̌ntɨ nɛ nɛsɛptǐmʉɛt, nɛ ɛpɨŋ bɛsɔt mɛnyɨŋ pɛtii, nɛ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ.
313 Bɔ́ŋ ká ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ nɛ batɨ, mǎndɔk ambɨ bɛfoŋori batɨ, yɛ̌ ɛ́mbak chi bɛ bákʉ mǎmbentɨ. Bǎbhɔŋ bɛfoŋori batɨ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu Acha ywɛsɛ áfóŋórí bhe.
314 Nɛ nnɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛcha ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm ɛnɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtɔŋ batɨ chi bɛkɔŋ bhɔ. Ɛkɔŋ ɛ́gwɔ̀t mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ndǔ nsoŋ amɔt.
315 Dɔ̌ ká kpák anɛ Kristo áchyɛ̀ ántɔ́ŋ be ɛnyǔ bǎbhɔŋɔ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ tɛ̌ndu Mandɛm ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ be bɛ mǎmbak ndu mmʉɛt amɔt, nɛ bɛ kpák ambak nɛ bhe. Nɛ bǎbhɔŋ bɛkaka Mandɛm ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ̀.
316 Dɔ̌ ká Ɛyɔŋ Kristo ɛ́mbɔŋ bɛtaŋ amɛm batɨ ayɛka. Tɔ́ŋ nɔ́kɔ́ ká batɨ ɛkɔŋ ɛyɔ, mǎnchyɛ nɔkɔ bhɔ maniɛ́, nɛ bɛyǎ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak. Kwáy nɔ́kɔ́ ka bakwáy anɛ áfù ndu Ɛkáti Bakway ɛnɛ ɛchi amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm, nɛ bakwáy Mandɛm achak, nɛ bakwáy anɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ afyɛ́ be antɨ. Kwáy nɔ́kɔ́ ka yɔ nɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm amɛm batɨ yɛka.
317 Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎkʉ̀, nɛ ɛnɛ́ bǎrɛ̀m, mǎnkʉ yɔ ndu nnyɛ́n Yesu Acha, mǎmfʉɛt ntá yi mǎnchyɛ nɔkɔ bakak ntá Ɛta Mandɛm. 
318 Bě baghɔrɛ́ nɛ manɛ́m, sɛptí nɔ́kɔ́ ka mmʉɛt ntá manɛ́m abhɛka ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ mbɔnyunɛ ɛyɔ kɛ ɛrɨ bɛsí Yesu Kristo Acha.
319 Manɛ́m, kɔŋ ka baghɔrɛ́ bhɛka, nɛ bǎkɛ́ bhak bɛbebɛbe nɛ bhɔ.
320 Bɔ, ghók nɔ́kɔ́ ka bachi nɛ manɔ bhɛka ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bághàti be mǎnkʉ, mbɔnyunɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́chyɛ̀ Yesu Acha maŋák.
321 Bachǐ-bhɔ, bǎkɛ́ kʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ bɔ̌bhɛka mambe ntɨ. Mbák mǎnkʉ nɔ, bákway bɛfɛrɛ amɔ.
322 Basɛm, ghók nɔ́kɔ́ ka bachi bhɛka abhɛn fá amɨk ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ. Bǎkɛ́ kʉ nɔ chi ndiɛrɛ mpok anɛ amɨ́k ayap achi be amʉɛt, mbɔ bo abhɛn báyàŋ chi bɛchyɛ bhɔ maŋák. Ghók ká bhɔ nɛ batɨ ayɛka ankɛm mbɔnyunɛ bǎchyɛ̀ Mandɛm kɛnókó.
323 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn báchyɛ́ bhe, kʉ ka bhɔ nɛ batɨ ayɛka ankɛm tɛ̌ndu bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ bátòk nɔ chi Yesu Acha, puyɛ̌ nkwǎ.
324 Bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ chɔŋ mǎmbɔŋ akap anɛ Yesu Acha ábhʉ́rɛ́ ntá bǒbhi. Chi Kristo Acha kɛ bátòk nɔ!
325 Dɔ́k ká ambɨ bɛkʉ nɔ mbɔnyunɛ yɛ̌agha anɛ ákʉ̀ bɛbʉ́ ǎbhɔŋ nsáy ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhi, nɛ Mandɛm ǎtaŋ bo kɛtɔ́ŋ kɛ́rɨ́ŋámík.
4
41 Bě abhɛn bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ basɛm, kɛ́m ká bhɔ ɛrɨ́rɨ́ nɛ ɛnyu ɛnɛ ɛchi chak. Bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ be nkwɔ bǎbhɔŋ mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ be amfay. 
42 Tě ka kákátí ndǔ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt, mǎmbak pě, nɛ mǎnkaka nɔkɔ Mandɛm.
43 Nɨk nɔkɔ ka mmʉɛt ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ nkwɔ bɛ Mandɛm ánɛ́nɛ́ bhɛsɛ mbi ndu bɛghati bho kpoŋoroŋ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Kristo anɛ achi bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́. Chi ɛ̌ti mɛ́ghàti bho yɔ kɛ nchí ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ.
44 Nɨk nɔkɔ ka mmʉɛt bɛ ngátí bho yɔ mbɔ ɛnyǔ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ, ɛnyu ɛnɛ bághòk mánjwimɛm.
45 Ɛkaká nɛkɔ ɛyɛka ɛbhɔŋ bɛtɔŋ bɛ bǎchi barɨŋɨ́ndak bɛsí bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ Mandɛm, nɛ bǎkɛ́ chɔŋti yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ bǎbhɔŋɔ mbi bɛghati bɔ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́.
46 Ɛyɔŋɔ́nyu ɛyɛka ɛbhɔŋ bɛbhak ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chyɛ̀ bo maŋák, ɛ́mbak mbɔ ɛnɛ́ mmu anɛ afyɛ́ ngaŋ anyu bɛ mǎndɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyǔ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́kɛ́mɛ bo abhɛn bábhɛ̀p be mɛnyɨŋ. 
47 Chɔŋ Tíkíkɔs ángati bhe yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti ya. Achí manɔ nɛ ntɨ mǔnkwɔ anɛ nkɔ́ŋ tontó. Ǎkʉ̀ bɛtɨk nɛ ntɨ nɛmɔt nɛ ǎtok Acha nɛ mɛ.
48 Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ ntó yi ntá yɛka bɛ ankʉ mǎndɨŋɨ ɛnyu sɛchi, nɛ bɛ ámfyɛ́ be ntɨ.
49 Ǎtwɔ̀ awu nɛ Ɔnɛ́simɔs, mmǔ ywɛka amɔt. Ɔnɛ́simɔs achi mmu tɛtɛp nɛ manɔ anɛ sɛ́kɔ́ŋɔ́ tontó. Chɔŋ bɔ mángati bhe yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fákárí fá.
410 Arístakɔs mmu achi fá ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ nɛ mɛ ǎtò be bakak. Mbák Mák manɔ Banábas mmu ngátí bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti yi ántwɔ́ awu, sɔt ka yí nɛ amɔ́ apay.
411 Nɛ Jísɔs anɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ Jɔ́stɔs ǎtò bhe bakak nkwɔ. Ndiɛrɛ bo Israɛl abhɛn bati arat kɛ bachi batɨ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk nɛ mɛ ndú bɛkʉ bo mándɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyu Mandɛm abhak nɛ bho mbɔ Mfɔ wap. Bɔ́ mankɛm báchyɛ̀ mɛ nɛpɔptǐntɨ́ tontó.
412 Ɛpáfras nkwɔ ǎtò be bakak. Achi mmǔ ywɛka amɔt nɛ mǔbɛtok Yesu Kristo. Ǎnɨkmʉɛt ɛ̌ti yɛka nɛ ntɨ ɛni nɛnkɛm mpoknkɛm bɛ mǎnsɛnɛ ndǔ mbi Mandɛm, nɛ bɛ mǎndɨŋɨ sayri yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ mǎnkʉ.
413 Nchí ntísiɛ Ɛpáfras bɛ ákʉ́ tontó ɛ̌ti yɛka nɛ bǒnkwɔ Laodísia, nɛ abhɛn Hiɛrapolis.
414 Lukas, ngaŋ anɛ sɛ́kɔ́ŋɔ́ tontó, nɛ Démas bátò be bakak.
415 Kaká ká bǒnkwɔ abhɛn ɛtɔk Laodisia, nɛ Nímfa, nɛ ɛka bǒnkwɔ abhɛn báchɛ̀m ɛkɛt ɛyi.
416 Mǎnáŋ mǎmpay ɛkáti ɛnɛ ndǔ nkwɔ ywɛka, kʉ ká mámpay yɔ ntá nkwɔ́ Laodísia nkwɔ. Pay ká nkwɔ ɛkáti ɛnɛ́ ntó ntá nkwɔ́ ɛtɔk Laodísia mpok anɛ bɔ bátó yɔ ntá yɛka.
417 Nɛ ghati ká Akípɔs bɛ, “Ghɔ bɛ ɔnáŋá bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn Yesu Acha achyɛ wɔ.”
418 Mɛ Pɔ̌l nchí sɨŋ bakak amɛn nɛ awɔ́ awa mɛmbɔŋ. Tɨk ka bɛ́ nchí ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ. Mandɛm antɔŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu.4
1 
11 Mɛ Pɔ̌l kɛ̌ nchí sɨ́ŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ ntá yɛka nkwɔ Yesu abhɛn Tɛsalónika. Nchí sɨŋ ntá yɛka bǒ Mandɛm mmu achi Ɛtayɛsɛ nɛ be bho bǎbhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha. Nchí fá nɛ Sáilas nɛ Tímɔti. Mandɛm antɔ́ŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu, anchyɛ bhe kpák. 
12 Sɛ́chyɛ̀ bakak ntá Mandɛm mpoknkɛm ɛ̌ti yɛka mankɛm nɛ sɛ́fyɛ̀ bhé ndǔ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛnɛsɛ́ mpoknkɛm.
13 Ɛ́chí ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ bɛsí Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ, sɛ́pú ghɔkɔntɨk bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn bǎkʉ̀ ndǔ bǎbhɔŋɔ nɛka nɛ Yesu, nɛ ɛnyǔ bǎdɛ́nɛ́ mmʉɛt ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛka ɛ̌ti ɛkɔŋ, nɛ ɛnyǔ bǎte kpirí ndǔ nɛbhakántɨ́ ɛnɛka nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha.
14 Bɔ̌ma, sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ Mandɛm akɔŋ be nɛ ayap be
15 tɛ̌ndu Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ sɛ́ghàti bho abhɨkɨ twɔ nyaka ntá yɛka chí ndǔ ɛyɔŋɔ́nyu yɔyɔ, kɛ ndǔ bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ nkwɔ. Nɛ bǎrɨŋɨ nyaka bɛ yɔ achi tɛtɛp. Mpok sɛ́chí awu nɛ bhe, bǎrɨŋɨ nyaka ɛnyǔ ɛkakánɛkɔ ɛyɛsɛ ɛchi. Sɛ́bhʉ̀rɛ nyaka mmʉɛt ɛyɛsɛ ɛnyu ɛyɔ ndu bɛkwak bhe!
16 Nɛ bǎkóŋo ɛkakánɛkɔ ɛyɛsɛ nɛ ɛkakánɛkɔ Yesu Kristo Acha. Yɛ̌ndu bǎghɔ̀ nyaka bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri, bǎsíɛ́pti Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm nɛ maŋák amɛn Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ áchyɛ̀.
17 Ɛ́kʉ bǎrɔ́p ɛrɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bakoŋo Yesu mankɛm atú Masidónia nɛ Akáiya máŋɔ̀kɔ.
18 Nɛ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛ́tàka atú Masidónia nɛ atú Akáiya ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎkʉ́, kɛ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ may nɔ. Mbok nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ Mandɛm akɔ mbankɛm, ɛnyu ɛnɛ sɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛrɛm ndu bɛtɔŋ ɛnyǔ mǎnoko.
19 Bɔ́ babhɔŋ bárɛ̀m ɛnyǔ básɔ́rɛ́ bhɛsɛ mpok sɛ́twɔ́ awu ntá yɛka nɛ ɛnyǔ bǎtɨknsɛm ntá bɔmandɛm nsé bǎrɔ́bhɛ chyɛ kɛnókó chi ntá Mandɛm. Yi aywǐnti kɛ achi Mandɛm anɛ tɛtɛp nɛ yi kɛ áchyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m.
110 Bǒ bhɔ bárɨ́ŋɨ́ nkwɔ bɛ mǎnòŋ Mmɔ Mandɛm ámfú amfay antwɔ. Nɔ chi, Yesu mmu Mandɛm ákʉ́ nyaka áfú ndǔ nɛwú apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Yí wu kɛ ápɛ̀mɛ bhɛsɛ mpok Mandɛm átàŋ bo ndu ábè ntɨ nɛ bhɔ ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ bhap.
2
21 Bɔ̌ma, bǎbhɔŋ bɛrɨŋɨ bɛ nɛtwɔ́ anɛ sɛ́twɔ́ awu bɛghɔ bhe ápú nyaka ndɛ́ndɛm.
22 Yɛ̌ndu mánáŋ báchyɛ́ nyaka bhɛsɛ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ ntíánwɔ́p ɛtɔk Fílipi mbɔ ɛnyu bǎrɨŋɨ, Mandɛm ywɛsɛ afyɛ́ bhɛsɛ ntɨ bɛ sɛ́ntwɔ́ sɛ́ngátí bhe Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ áfú ntá yi yɛ̌ndu bɛyǎ bo mánù nyaka tontó bɛchyɛt bhɛsɛ mbi.
23 Bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ sɛ́gháti bhe ɛ́chí tɛtɛp nɛ yɛ̌ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛpu arɛ́. Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ nkaysi bɛ́rwɔ́ yɛ̌ mmu.
24 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́kʉ̀ chi bɛ, tɛ̌ndu Mandɛm áyɨ́ŋɨ́ ághɔ́ bɛ sɛ́kwǎy bo abhɛn yi afyɛ́ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ amɔ́, nɔ kɛ sɛ́ghàti bho yɔ. Nɛ puyɛ̌ chi bɛ bo mámbɔ́ŋ maŋák nɛ bhɛsɛ, kɛ chí bɛ́ Mandɛm mmu áyɨ̀ŋɨ bɛghɔ ɛnyǔ bati ayɛsɛ achi amɛm, ámbɔ́ŋ maŋák nɛ bhɛsɛ.
25 Bǎrɨŋɨ nkwɔ bɛ mpok sɛ́chí nɛ bhe sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ sɔt sɛ́rwɔrɛ́nyu bɛkʉ mǎmbɔ́ŋ maŋák. Nɛ mbɔŋ Mandɛm achi ntísiɛ bɛ sɛ́pú ghati nyaka bhe Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ chí nɛ nkaysi bɛbhɔŋ nsáy anɛ áfù ntá yɛka.
26 Nɛ sɛ́pú kʉ nyaka yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛ́ yɛ̌ chi be, yɛ chi bo báchak, mánkaka bhɛsɛ. Sɛ́kwáy nyaka bɛbhɛp be mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ bǒnto Kristo.
27 Kɛ sɛ́kɔ́pti bhe mbɔ ɛnyǔ nnɔ ákɛ̀m bɔ̌bhi.
28 Sɛ́kɔŋ be tontó, kpát ɛ́kʉ́ sɛ́ká bɛ sɛbhɔŋ bɛchyɛ be, puyɛ̌ chí ndiɛrɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm, kɛ yɛ chi mmʉɛt ɛyɛsɛ nkwɔ ndǔ bǎchí bhɛsɛ antɨ tontó.
29 Bɔ̌ma, bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔkɔntɨk ndu sɛ́re kʉ bɛtɨk, sɛ́mkpɔt nɔkɔ nsɔ́ŋti bɛti nɛ ngósí mpok sɛ́chí awu nɛ bhe. Sɛ́kʉ̀ nyaka bɛtɨk ɛnyu yɔ bɛ sɛ́mbɔ́ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chɛ́bhɛ́ bhɛsɛ. Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ yaŋ nyaka bɛbhak ntu ntá yɛka mpok sɛ́ghàti bhe Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm.
210 Bǎchi batísiɛ bhɛsɛ. Mandɛm nkwɔ achi ntísiɛ bɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛsɛ́ nɛntɨ ɛnɛka bakoŋo Yesu nɛchí nyáká nyáŋá nɛ chak nɛ nɛ́kɛ bhɔŋ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛsí Mandɛm.
211 Bǎrɨŋɨ ɛnyu sɛ́kɛ̀m nyaka yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka mbɔ ɛnyǔ chi bhɔ ákɛ̀m bɔ̌bhi.
212 Sɛ́fyɛ̀ nyaka bhe ntɨ nɛ sɛ́kpɛ̀mɛ nyaka bhe bɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka nɛ́nchyɛ Mandɛm maŋák. Yí kɛ ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ bhe bɛ mǎmbak bo abhɛn yi achi Mfɔ wap nɛ bɛ mǎmbák ndu kɛnɛ́m ɛki nɛ yi.
213 Nɛ nkwɔ sɛ́kàka Mandɛm mpoknkɛm mbɔnyunɛ mpok sɛ́gháti bhe Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi, bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ sɔt yɔ́ mbɔ ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ nkwǎ. Bǎsɔ́t bɛ tɛtɛp chi Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kʉ̀ bɛtɨk amɛm batɨ yɛka, be bho mánóko.
214 Bɔ̌ma, bǎrɔp bo abhɛn mǎŋɔkɔ ɛkakánɛkɔ ɛnɛ́ bǒnkwɔ Mandɛm abhɛn atú Judɛ́ya. Bǎbhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo mbɔnyunɛ bǎghɔ̌ ɛsɔŋɔri amɔ batɨ bo ɛtɔk ɛyɛka nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bo Israɛl báchyɛ́ nyaka bhɔ ɛsɔŋɔri atú Judɛ́ya.
215 Bo Israɛl bhɔ kɛ báwáy nyaka Yesu Acha nɛ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm nɛ bɔ́ kɛ báboko bhɛsɛ ɛtɔk. Bákʉ̀ ntɨ nɛ́mbé Mandɛm. Bachi bǒmpap ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu.
216 Bo Israɛl bhɔ báchɛ̀t bhɛsɛ mbi bɛ sɛkɛ ghati bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ Mandɛm ámpɛ́mɛ́ bhɔ. Bákʉ́ bɛbʉ́ kpát mánáŋá. Kɛ bákʉ́ kpát bɛběntɨ Mandɛm bɛchi nɛ bhɔ. 
217 Bɔ̌ma, yɛ̌ndu bákʉ́ sɛ́rɔ́ nyaka bhe ndu mɔ́mbɨŋɨ́ mpok, batɨ yɛsɛ ábhʉ́ɛ́t nyaka nɛ bhe, nɛ ɛ́kʉ́ ɛkwak bɛpɛt bɛghɔ bhe bɛsí nɛ bɛsi ɛ́re yá ɛ́ndɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ nɛ sɛre nu bɛghɔ bhe.
218 Sɛ́yàŋ nyaka bɛ́twɔ awu ntá yɛka. Mɛmbɔŋ Pɔ̌l, mmɔ́ bɛ́twɔ awu ndɔŋ nɛ ndɔŋ, kɛ Satan achɛ́t bhɛsɛ mbi.
219 Pú sɛ́bháká ntɨ chi nɛ bhe? Pú be kɛ̌ báchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ maŋák-á? Pú be kɛ̌ bǎkʉ̀ sɛ́ndɛp chɔŋ awɔ́ antɨ bɛsí Yesu Acha ywɛsɛ ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn yi apɛtnsɛm, bɛ sɛ́kʉ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛsɛ́ sayri?
220 Tɛtɛp, be kɛ bǎkʉ sɛ́dɛ̀p awɔ́ antɨ, nɛ be kɛ báchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ bɛyǎ maŋák.
3
31 Sɛ́chɔ́kɔ́ kpát, sɛ́kɛ pɛrɛ kwáy bɛkɛpntɨ, sɛ́ka bɛrɔp ansɛm ndu ɛtɔk Atɛns,
32 sɛ́tó mɔ́mayɛsɛ Tímɔti ntá yɛká. Yí achí ntɨ nkʉbɛtɨk Mandɛm ndu bɛ́gháti bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Kristo. Sɛ́tó yi bɛ ámfyɛ bhe ntɨ, ankʉ mǎnté kpirí ndǔ nɛka ɛnɛka,
33 bɛ yɛ̌ mmu ywɛka amɔt ákɛ́ kwɛn ansɛm ɛ̌ti bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn. Bě babhɔŋ bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ, bɛkoŋo nkaysi Mandɛm, bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́tɛ́mɛ́ri bhɛsɛ.
34 Mpok sɛ́chí nyaka nɛ bhe, sɛ́ghàti nyaka be ambɨ ambɨ bɛ chɔŋ sɛ́mbɔŋ bɛsɔŋɔri, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛ́fákárí, nɛ bǎrɨŋɨ ɛnyu ɛyɔ.
35 Ɛ̌ti yɔ, mpok mbɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ kway bɛ́kɛpntɨ, ntó Tímɔti bɛ ántwɔ́, ángɔ́ mbák babhʉɛ́t bɛ́sɨ́kɨ ntɨ nɛ Kristo. Mbɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛcháy bɛ ngufú Satan mmu ámɔ̀ bo ndu bɛkʉ bɔ bákɛ́pɛrɛ noko Yesu, abhɔŋ mbi nɛ bhe nɛ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛsɛ mɛnkɛm bɛrɔŋ ndɛ́ndɛm.
36 Kɛ Tímɔti anáŋ áfǔ awu apɛtnsɛm fá, nɛ ɛrɨ́tí ntó bɛ bǎtaŋ ndǔ nɛsɨkɨ́ntɨ ɛnɛka nɛ Kristo nɛ ndǔ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ batɨ. Nɛ aghátí bhɛsɛ bɛ bǎkàysi bhɛsɛ nɛ maŋák mpoknkɛm nɛ bǎbhɔŋ ɛkwak bɛghɔ bhɛsɛ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛkwak bɛghɔ bhe.
37 Bɔ̌ma, ɛkʉ yɛ bɛ yɛ̌ndu báchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ́ nɛnyok nɛ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri, batɨ apɔp bhɛsɛ amɛm mbɔnyunɛ bǎte kpirí ndu nɛsɨkɨ́ntɨ ɛnɛka nɛ Kristo.
38 Tɛ̌ndu bǎte kpirí ndu mbi Yesu Acha, sɛ́chí sayri.
39 Ntɨkɨ ɛnyu bakak sɛ́kway bɛchyɛ Mandɛm ɛ̌ti maŋák mankɛm amɛn sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛsí bhi ɛ̌ti yɛka?
310 Sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt nɛ batɨ yɛsɛ ankɛm bɛti nɛ ngósí bɛ́ Mandɛm ánkwak sɛmpɛt sɛngɔ bhe bɛsí nɛ bɛsi, nɛ sɛ́ntɔŋ be mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎbhɨ́kɨ́re rɨŋɨ, ndu bɛkwak mǎmbɔŋ nɛka nɛ Kristo mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛ́yaŋ.
311 Sɛ́nɨkmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ yímbɔŋ nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha mánkʉ sɛ́ntwɔ ntá yɛka.
312 Sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ Yesu Acha ánkʉ ɛkɔŋ ɛyɛka nɛ batɨ nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achak ɛ́ngó ɛ́ndɔ́k nɔ́kɔ́ chí ambɨ, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ ntá yɛka.
313 Sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt ɛnyu ɛyɔ bɛ yi ankʉ batɨ ántáŋ be amɛm nɛ bɛ́ bǎkɛ́ bhɔŋ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́, nɛ bɛ́ mǎmbák nyáŋá bɛsí Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ, kɛ mpok anɛ Yesu Kristo Acha átwɔ̀ nɛ bo Mandɛm ankway.
4
41 Bɔ̌ma, ndu bɛrɔŋ ambɨ, sɛ́ghati bhe ɛnyǔ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛbhʉrɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǎkʉ̀ nɔ bɛ Mandɛm ámbɔ́ŋ maŋák nɛ bhe. Sɛ́nɨ̀k yɛ be mmʉɛt sɛ́mkpɛmɛ nɔkɔ ndu nnyɛ́n Yesu Acha bɛ mǎndɔk ambɨ bɛkʉ nɔ.
42 Bě babhɔŋ bǎrɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́ghátí nyaka bhe ndǔ nnyɛ́n Yesu Acha bɛ bǎbhɔŋ bɛ́kʉ.
43 Ɛnyɨŋ Mandɛm áyàŋ chi bɛ mǎmbák nyáŋá, bɛ bǎkɛ́ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ barak ɛ́pusi.
44 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka ankɛ́m mmʉɛt ɛyi,   ɛnyu ɛnɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛni nɛ́bhak pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm, nɛ bo mámbɔŋ kɛnókó nɛ yi.
45 Bǎkɛ́ ŋwaka ndǔ barak ɛ́pusi, kɛkɛ́m mmʉɛt mbɔ bo abhɛn babhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ Mandɛm.
46 Yɛ̌ mmú ákɛ́ kʉ ntɨ bɛbʉ́ ndǔ ndaká kɛbhʉrɛ anɛ́, nɛ yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́ nyiɛ ntɨ ɛ́bhɔ́ŋ! Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ Yesu Acha ǎkɛmɛ kɛ́mbé ntá bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ mɛnyǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɔ mɛnkɛm nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ sɛ́náŋ sɛ́gháti bhe bɛ mǎnsɔt mpok.
47 Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɨŋɨ bhɛsɛ chí bɛ sɛmbak bǒ ɛpúsí, abhɨ́ŋɨ́ bhɛsɛ bɛ sɛ́mbak nyáŋá bɛsí bhi.
48 Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ábyàk yɛ ndak anɛ apú byak chi nkwǎ, ǎbyàk chí Mandɛm mmu áchyɛ̀ bhe Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ yi.
49 Nti apú bɛsɨŋ be bɛ mǎmbɔ́ŋ ɛkɔŋ nɛ batɨ̌ bakoŋo Yesu. Mandɛm yímbɔŋ anáŋ átɔ́ŋ be ɛnyu bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkɔŋ batɨ.
410 Nɛ tɛtɛp, bǎkɔŋ batɨ̌ bǒnkwɔ atú Masidónia ankɛm. Kɛ bɔmá, sɛ́ghàti bhe bɛ́ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ́ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ batɨ ɛ́ndɔ́k nɔ́kɔ́ chi ambɨ.
411 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka ánkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ bɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛni nɛ́kɛ́ chyɛ bho ɛsɔŋɔri. Mmu ákɛ́ chwe ndǔ ndaká ntɨ. Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka abhɔŋ bɛkʉ bɛtɨk nɛ amɔ́ yi nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ sɛ́ghátí nyaka bhe.
412 Mǎmbák ɛnyu ɛyɔ bɛ́ bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko mánchyɛ́ bhe kɛnókó nɛ bɛ́ bǎkɛ́ kɔ bɛsɨ́kɨ́. 
413 Bɔ̌ma, nɛ́nɛ, sɛ́yàŋ bɛkʉ bɛ bǎkɛ́ rɔp amɛm ɛjuri bɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ bo abhɛn bágú bɛ bǎkɛ́ di bhɔ mbɔ bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhakantɨ bɛ chɔŋ bawú mámpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
414 Tɛ̌ndu sɛ́nókó bɛ́ Yesu ágú nyaka, apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, sɛ́noko nkwɔ bɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm ankʉ bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn bágú mámpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m mpok Yesu átwɔ.
415 Bɛ́kóŋo ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mbɔŋ Yesu Acha árɛ́mɛ́, sɛ́ghàti bhe bɛ mpok Yesu Acha átwɔ́, bɛsɛ́ bho sɛchi nɛpɛ́m sɛ́pú yambɨ bɛ́tɛ́mɛri yi kɛ abhɛn bágú mántɛmɛri yi.
416 Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ chɔŋ mbɔŋ Yesu Acha amfú amfay antwɔ́ anchyɛ ɛyɔŋ nɛ bɛtaŋ. Mfɔ bɔángɛl Mandɛm andɛm nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ, nɛ mmbá Mandɛm ankwɛ́n. Ɛ́mfakari yɛ bɛ́ bakoŋó Kristo abhɛn bágú mánjambɨ mámpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m,
417 kɛ bɛsɛ́ bho sɛchi nɛpɛ́m nɛ sɛ́bhʉɛ́t ansɛm, sɛ́nko ndǔ nɛbháŋ tɛ́mté nɛ bhɔ, sɛ́ntɛmɛri Yesu Acha ndǔ yi ásɛ̀p. Nɛ bɛbho mpok ɛyɔ, sɛ́mbak nɛ yi mpoknkɛm.
418 Chiɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yɛka batɨ nɛpɔptǐntɨ́ nɛ bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn.
5
51 Bɔ̌ma, ntí apú bɛsɨŋ be ɛ̌ti mbɔ̌ŋ mpok anɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́fákari.
52 Bǎbhɔŋ bɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ nywɔp Yesu Acha átwɔ̀ nɛ́bhak chɔŋ mbɔ ngɛ́p anɛ átwɔ̀ nɛ bɛti.
