53 Mpok anɛ bo bárɛ̀m bɛ, “Mbǎŋ achi kpák, yɛ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ́pu.” Mpok ɛyɔ kɛ̌ ɛrɛ̌m ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ́kwɛn bɔ amʉɛt tɛ́mchok mbɔ bɛbe ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ánòŋsi. Nɛ mbi bɛ́bʉ́ɛ kɛbhák.
54 Bɔ̌ma, kɛ mbák chí bhe, bǎpú amɛm ɛjuri, bɛ́ nywɔp ɛnɔ nɛ́mfɔ́kɔ́rí bhe mbɔ ngɛ́p.
55 Bǎchí bo abhɛn bǎkɔ̀ nɛ ngósí, mpok mbaŋ ághɔ̀. Sɛ́pú bo ɛjuri, sɛ́pú bo bɛti.
56 Sɛ́kɛ́ bhʉrɛ yɛ kɛnɔ́ mbɔ mbɔk bho. Sɛ́mbák chí pě, sɛ́nkɛm nɔkɔ mmʉɛt.
57 Bo abhɛn bábhʉ̀rɛ kɛnɔ́, bábhʉ̀rɛ chi nɛ bɛ́ti, nɛ bo bákwɛ̀n mmɛ́m chí nɛ bɛti.
58 Kɛ tɛ̌ndu sɛ́chí chí bǒ ngósí, sɛ́nkɛ́m mmʉɛt. Sɛ́ndɔ́k ambɨ mɛ́nóko Yesu nɛ bɛ́bhɔŋ ɛkɔŋ nɛ bo, bɛ ɛyɔ ɛmbák mbɔ kɛndɛ́n anɛ ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu ákɛ́mɛ́ bɛchyɛt mmʉɛt. Sɛ́mbáká ntɨ bɛ chɔŋ Yesu ampɛmɛ bhɛsɛ, nɛ bɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́mbák ntá yɛsɛ́ mbɔ ntá ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu anɛ ákuti ntí ywi.
59 Bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ yap bhɛsɛ chi bɛ sɛ́mbák bo abhɛn yi átàŋ anchyɛ ntɛmsi. Ayap bhɛsɛ chi bɛ ánkʉ Yesu Kristo Acha ámpɛmɛ bhɛsɛ.
510 Yesu ágú ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ́ bɛ yi ánáŋ ántwɔ́, yɛ̌ sɛbhʉɛt chí pě, yɛ̌ sɛ́gǔ gu, sɛ́nkwáy bɛ́bhak nɛ yi.
511 Ndu ɛ́chí nɔ, fyɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yɛ́ka batɨ ntɨ mǎnkwak nɔkɔ batɨ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǎkʉ̀ nɔ. 
512 Bɔ̌ma, sɛ́ghàti bhe bɛ mǎnchyɛ́ nɔkɔ bǒ abhɛn bákʉ̀ bɛtɨk Acha ndǔ nkwɔ ywɛka kɛnókó bɛ mánchyɛ nɔkɔ bhe maniɛ bɛ bǎkɛ́ kʉ bɛbʉ́.
513 Bǎbhɔŋ bɛchyɛ bhɔ bɛyǎ kɛnókó, mǎnkɔŋ bɔ́ ɛ̌ti bɛtɨk ɛbhɛ́n bɔ bákʉ̀. Nɛ mǎmbák sayri nɛ batɨ.
514 Bɔ̌ma, sɛmtí nɔ́kɔ́ bábhɔ́t, mǎmfyɛ nɔkɔ abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛcháy ntɨ. Kwak nɔ́kɔ́ ká abhɛn mmʉɛt ápú bhɔ. Bɔ́ŋ ká ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu.
515 Ghɔ́ ká bɛ yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́ kɛmɛ bɛbʉ́ amfǎy bɛbʉ́. Nu nɔ́kɔ́ ká bɛkʉ chi bɛrɨ̌ndu ntá batɨ bǒnkwɔ nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achak.
516 Bák ká maŋák mpoknkɛm,
517 mǎnɨk nɔkɔ mmʉɛt mpoknkɛm.
518 Nɛ yɛ̌ ɛ́mbak bɛ yi, chyɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ká Mandɛm bakak, tɛ̌ndu mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm chi ɛbhɛn yi áyàŋ mǎnkʉ́ ndǔ bǎchí bo Yesu Kristo.
519 Bǎkɛ́ nɛmɛ ngó Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ.
520 Bǎkɛ́ byák ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ákʉ́ ntɨ mǔnkwɔ ándɛm.
521 Bǎbhɔŋ bɛchak yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ sayri, mǎnkɛm ɛ́nɛ ɛ́rɨ́.
522 Bǎkɛ́ bhɔŋ ɛnyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ barak abʉ́abʉ.
523 Mbɔ̌ŋ Mandɛm mmu áchɨ̀ɛ kpák ánkʉ́ mǎmbák nyáŋá ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi. Yímbɔŋ ámbʉ́rɛ́ nkaysi, nɛ ɛfóŋó, nɛ mmʉɛt yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ ápú bhɔŋ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ kpátɛ mpok Yesu Kristo Acha átwɔ.
524 Mandɛm mmu ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ be bɛ mǎmbák bǒbhi, ǎbhʉ̀rɛ bariɛp ami, nɛ chɔŋ ankʉ nɔ.
525 Bɔ̌ma, fyɛ́ ká bhɛsɛ ndǔ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt.
526 Kaká ká batɨ nɛ ɛkɔŋ Mandɛm.
527 Nchí ghati bhe ndǔ nnyɛ́n Yesu Acha bɛ mǎmpáy ɛkáti ɛnɛ ntá bǒnkwɔ mankɛm.
528 Bɛrɨ̌ndu Yesu Kristo Acha mɛ́mbák nɛ bhe.5
1
11 Mɛ Pɔ̌l kɛ nchí sɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ́ ntá yɛka bǒnkwɔ Yesu abhɛn Tɛsalónika. Nchí sɨŋ ntá yɛká bo Mandɛm mmu achi Ɛtayɛsɛ, be bho bǎbhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha. Nchí fá nɛ bɔ̌mayɛsɛ Sáilas nɛ Tímɔti.
12 Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha mántɔŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu, mánchyɛ bhe kpák. 
13 Bɔ̌ma, sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛ́chyɛ́ bakak ntá Mandɛm mpoknkɛm ɛ̌ti yɛka. Ɛ́kway bɛ sɛ́nkʉ́ nɔ mbɔnyunɛ bǎbhɔ̀ŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu Kristo mǎndɔk nɔkɔ chí ambɨ, nɛ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ batɨ ɛ́rɔ̀ŋ chí ambɨ.
14 Bɛsɛ́ babhɔŋ sɛ́pànyu ntá bǒnkwɔ Mandɛm báchák ɛ̌ti yɛka, ndǔ bǎté kpirí ndǔ nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ Yesu, yɛ̌ndu bo báchyɛ̀ bhe nɛnyok nɛ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri.
15 Ndu ɛchi nɔ, mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm átàŋ chɔŋ bo ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ ɛchi chak. Chɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛnkʉ mǎnkwáy bɛbhak bo abhɛn Mandɛm ábhàk Mfɔ wap. Tɛ̌ndu ɛ̌ti Kɛfɔ ɛki kɛ bǎbhɔ̀ŋ ɛsɔŋɔri.
16 Mandɛm ǎkʉ chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchí chak. Nɛ chɔŋ yi ankɛmɛ kɛ́mbé ntá bo abhɛn báchyɛ̀ bhe ɛsɔŋɔri.
17 Chɔŋ anchyɛ bhe nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ndǔ bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛka, anchyɛ bhɛsɛ nkwɔ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt. Chɔŋ Mandɛm ankʉ nɔ́ mpok Yesu Acha ábhèsi nɛ bɛtaŋtí bɔángɛl bhi amɛm ngó anɛ ákàp bhɔ nɛ ádù gum gum gum.
18 Chɔŋ yí antɛmsi bǒ abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ yaŋ bɛrɨŋɨ Mandɛm nɛ abhɛn bápú ka bɛkoŋo Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo Acha ywɛsɛ.
19 Chɔŋ amfɛrɛ bhɔ́ bɛsí bhi nɛ ndǔ bɛdíɛ́rɛ́ bhi nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi, anchyɛ bhɔ ntɛmsi anɛ abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
110 Mpok Yesu Acha átwɔ̀, bo Mandɛm mankɛm báchyɛ̀ yi kɛnókó nɛ bǒ abhɛn mánókó mámbak maknkay bɛ bághɔ́ yi. Bě nkwɔ bǎbhak chɔŋ nɛ bhɔ mbɔnyunɛ mǎnókó mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́ghátí bhe.
111 Ɛ̌ti ɛyɔ kɛ sɛ́nɨ̀k Mandɛm mmʉɛt mpoknkɛm ɛ̌ti yɛka bɛ yi ánkʉ mǎmbak bo abhɛn bákwáy bɛ́bhak bǒbhi. Sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ́ yi anchyɛ bhe bɛtaŋ mǎnáŋá bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎyaŋ bɛkʉ nɛ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn bákʉ̀ ɛ̌ti nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ Yesu Kristo.
112 Sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt nɔ bɛ bo mánchyɛ́ nyɛ́n Yesu Acha kɛnókó ɛ̌ti yɛka nɛ bɛ mǎmbɔ́ŋ kɛnókó nɛ yi bɛ́kóŋo bɛrɨ̌ndu abhɛn Mandɛm ywɛsɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha bátɔ̀ŋ be.
2
21 Bɔ̌ma, bɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ nɛtwɔ́ Yesu Kristo Acha nɛ nɛnyokoti anɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛ́nyókóti bhɛsɛ bɛ sɛ́ntɛ́mɛ́rí yi, sɛ́ghàti bhe bɛ,
22 bǎkɛ́ rɔ batí ywɛka ángwákárí bɛtaka amɛm. Yɛ̌ mmu andɛm chi bɛ yi achi ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ, yɛ̌ chi bɛ achi ngati Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm, nɛ yɛ̌ chi bɛ ɛkáti ɛ́fú ntá yɛsɛ bɛ nywɔp Yesu Acha átwɔ̀ nɛ́gháká, bǎkɛ fyɛ́ ntí.
23 Bǎkɛ́ rɔ yɛ̌ mmu andwɔ bhe ndu yɛ̌ mbi, mbɔnyunɛ nywɔp ɛnɔ nɛ́pɛrɛ́ twɔ, bɛyǎ bo báte nɛsaŋ nɛ Mandɛm Acha mámbyaka nɔkɔ bɛbhé bhi kɛ mbʉ́mbʉ ambesi. Ngwɛnti yi chi mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́.
24 Chɔŋ yí andɛm bɛ Mandɛm apú yɛ̌nyɨŋ nɛ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bo báchíɛ kɛnókó mbɔ Mandɛm ɛpú yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Yí ǎrɛm mbúrɛ́ bɛ achá Mandɛm nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ mɛnkɛm, andɔk kpát anchɔkɔ amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm andɛm bɛ yímbɔŋ achi Mandɛm.
25 Bǎkɛ́ ghɔ́kɔ́ntɨk bɛ ngátí nyaka bhé mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n mpok nchí nɛ bhe?
26 Nɛ bǎrɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kɛ̀m yi ansɛm. Abhɔŋ bɛ́bhési chi mbák mpok yi akway.
27 Ɛnyu bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn mbʉ́mbʉ abhɔŋɔ mɛ́naŋ bɛ́kʉ̀ bɛtɨk fá amɨk bhɛsɛ́ bhɛsɛ́. Kɛ mmu anɛ áchɛt bo mbi bɛ bǎkɛ́ bhʉrɛ bɛbhé Mandɛm ǎrɔŋ chɔŋ ambɨ bɛkʉ nɔ kpatɛ mpok anɛ Mandɛm áfɛrɛ yi ambi.
28 Mpok yɔ kɛ mbyaká bɛbhé Mandɛm wu abhesi, kɛ Yesu Acha ánáŋ ántwɔ́, ǎfɛp chi ɛ̌yu, ɛyi ɛ́may. Mbɔ̌ŋ nɛtwɔ Yesu ǎnaŋa bɛtaŋ ɛbhi.
29 Mbyaká bɛbhé Mandɛm wu ǎtwɔ bɛkʉ bɛtɨk Satan. Nɛ chɔŋ ansɔt bɛtaŋ ɛbhi ankʉ baraká maknkay anɛ bapu mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu ndu bɛ́rwɔ bho.
210 Chɔŋ ansɔt yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbɛ́pti ɛnyɨŋ bɛrwɔ bo abhɛn bachi ndǔ mbi nɛwú. Chɔŋ ankʉ nɔ ndu bábhɨkɨ ka bɛkɔŋ tɛtɛp anɛ áyɨ́ŋɨ́ Yesu Kristo bɛ Mandɛm ampɛmɛ bhɔ.
211 Ɛ̌ti yɔ, Mandɛm ǎto ɛtati ɛ́njwi bɔ antɨ ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ bárɔbhɛ noko chi baraká nsé.
212 Ɛyɔ ɛnkʉ yi anchyɛ ntɛ́msí ntá bo mankɛm abhɛn bábhɨkɨ noko tɛtɛp anɛ ayɨ́ŋɨ́ Yesu, kɛ bakɔŋ bɛkʉ chí bɛbʉ́.
213 Bɔ̌ma, be bo Yesu Acha ákɔ́ŋɔ́, sɛbhɔŋ bɛkaka Mandɛm ɛ̌ti yɛka yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok mbɔnyunɛ ayap be bɛ́ ámpɛ́mɛ́ bhe tɛ mpok anɛ yi ábhɨ́kɨ́ re ghoko mmɨk. Ayap bɛpɛmɛ bhe bɛfʉɛt ndǔ bɛtaŋá Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ Mmu ákʉ̀ mǎmbák nyáŋá nɛ ɛ̌ti mǎnókó tɛtɛp anɛ ayɨ́ŋɨ́ Yesu Kristo.
214 Mandɛm afʉɛt ndǔ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ sɛ́ghátí bhe abhɨ́ŋɨ́ be. Akʉ nɔ bɛ́ mǎmbɔ́ŋ ákɔ́rɛ́ ndu kɛnɛ́m Yesu Kristo Acha.
215 Bɔ̌ma, tě yɛka kpirí, mǎndɔk ambɨ mɛnoko mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́tɔ́ŋ be mpok sɛchi nɛ bhe nɛ ɛbhɛn sɛ́sɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm bɛkáti ɛbhɛn sɛ́tó ntá yɛka.
216 Mbɔŋ Yesu Kristo Acha nɛ Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ mmu akɔŋ bhɛsɛ mántɔ́ŋ bɛsɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu, mánchyɛ bɛsɛ nɛpɔptǐntɨ́ mpoknkɛm nɛ nɛbhakántɨ ndǔ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛfakari.
217 Sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo mánchyɛ bhe nɛpɔptǐntɨ́ nɛ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ nɛ bɛrɛm chi bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ.
3
31 Bɔ̌ma, ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́chák chi bɛ mǎnɨk nɔkɔ mmʉɛt ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ bɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu Acha antaka ayak nɛ bɛ́ bo abhɛn bághòk yɔ mánsyɛpti yɔ nɛ kɛnókó, mbɔ ɛnyu ɛ́fákárí nyaka nɛ bhe.
32 Nɨk ka mmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm ámfɛ́rɛ́ bhɛsɛ amɔ bɛbɛ́ptí bho. Puyɛ̌ bo mankɛm abhɛn bághòk Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ kɛ mánóko.
33 Kɛ Yesu Acha apú nɔ́k bɛbhʉrɛ bariɛp ami. Chɔŋ ankʉ batɨ antaŋ be amɛm, ankuti bhe bɛ mbʉ́mbʉ ákɛ́ kʉ be yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
34 Yesu Acha akʉ sɛ́sɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ nɛ bhe bɛ bǎkʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́ghátí bhe mǎnkʉ nɛ bɛ chɔŋ mǎndɔk ambɨ bɛkʉ bhɔ.
35 Sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ Yesu Acha antɔ́ŋ be ɛnyǔ Mandɛm akɔŋ bhe nɛ ɛnyu bɛkɛpntɨ mbɔ Kristo. 
36 Bɔ̌ma, sɛ́ghàti bhe ndǔ nnyɛ́n Yesu Kristo Acha bɛ bǎkɛ́ chɛm mmʉɛt nɛ yɛntɨkɨ ntɨ mǔnkwɔ anɛ ábhɔ̀t abhɔt kɛbháká koŋo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́tɔ́ŋ be.
37 Bě babhɔŋ bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ bǎbhɔŋ bɛkoŋo bayarɛ́kak ayɛsɛ. Sɛ́pú bhɔt nyaka abhɔ́t mpok sɛchi nɛ bhe.
38 Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ nyiɛ nyaka nɛnyíɛ́ mmu ywɛka kɛchyɛ nkáp. Kɛ sɛ́kʉ̀ nyaka bɛtɨk bɛti nɛ ngósí, sɛ́mkpɔt nɔkɔ nsɔ́ŋti bɛ́ sɛ́kɛ́ chyɛ bhe ɛsɔŋɔri.
39 Sɛ́pú kʉ nyaka nɔ chi bɛ sɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ bɛ́gháti bhe bɛ mǎnchyɛ bhɛsɛ nɛkwak. Sɛ́yàŋ nyaka chí bɛ sɛ́ntɔ́ŋ be ɛpɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́kóŋo.
310 Yɛ̌ chi mpok sɛchi nɛ bhe sɛ́ghàti nyaka be bɛ mbák mmu apú kʉ bɛtɨk bǎkɛ́ chyɛ yi nɛnyíɛ́.
311 Sɛ́rɛ̀m nɔ mbɔnyunɛ sɛ́ghok bɛ mbɔk ywɛka bǎbhɔ̀t abhɔt nɛ bɛ bɛtɨk ɛbhap chi bɛ́fyɛ nnyu ndǔ barak bo bachak.
312 Ndǔ nnyɛ́n Yesu Kristo Acha sɛ́ghàti mɛnyǔ bo bhɔ sɛ́njɛp nɔkɔ bhɔ batú bɛ mánkʉ ɛbhap bɛtɨk. Mándɔ́ bɛ́chyɛ ɛsɔŋɔri mánkʉ bɛtɨk ndu bɛbhɔŋ ɛnap nɛnyíɛ́.
313 Bɔ̌ma, kɛ mbák chi bhe, bǎkɛ́ pɔp bɛ́kʉ bɛrɨ.
314 Mbák mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛ́kóŋo ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́sɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm ɛkáti ɛnɛ, fyɛ́ ká yi amɨ́k amʉɛt nɛ bǎkɛ́ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ yí. Kʉ́ ká yí ɛnyu yɔ bɛ ntíánwɔ́p ánkɛ́m yi.
315 Kɛ bǎkɛ́ sɔt ɛnyu mmu wu mbɔ mǔmpap. Kɛ ya ká yí batú nɛ ɛkɔŋ mbɔ ntɨ mǔnkwɔ. 
316 Mbɔŋ Yesu Acha mmu áchyɛ̀ kpák ánchyɛ be kpák ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi mpoknkɛm. Yesu Acha ámbák nɛ bhe mankɛm.
317 Mɛ Pɔ̌l kɛ nchí sɨŋ nɛ awɔ́ wa ndu bɛkaka bhe. Ɛnyunɛ kɛ nchí sɨŋ ndǔ ngwɛnti bɛkáti bha mɛnkɛm bɛkʉ bo mándɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛkáti ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fú ntá ya.
318 Bɛrɨ̌ndu Yesu Kristo Acha mɛ́mbák nɛ bhe mankɛm.3
1
11 Mɛ Pɔ̌l kɛ nchí sɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Nchí nkʉbɛtɨk Mandɛm nɛ mǔnto Yesu Kristo. Mandɛm mmú ápɛmɛ bhɛsɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo mmu sɛ́bháká ntɨ nɛ yi ndu nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛ́twɔ̀ ambɨ kɛ bátó mɛ.
12 Tímɔti, nchí sɨ́ŋ ntá yɛ, wɔ mmu ɔ́chí mbɔ mɔ́wa tɛtɛp ndu ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ Yesu mbɔ mɛ. Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha ywɛsɛ mántɔŋ wɔ bɛrɨ̌ndu nɛ ntínso, mánchyɛ wɔ kpák. 
13 Tímɔti, dɔp Ɛ́fɛsɔs nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu ngati nyaka wɔ ɔ́nkʉ. Mɛ̌rɔ̀ŋ atú Masidónia. Dɔp arɛ́ ghati bo abhɛn bátɔ̀ŋ baraká nse bɛ mándɔ́ bɛ́tɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ. Mɛ̌rɔ̀ŋ atú Masidónia
14 Ghatí bhɔ́ bákɛ́pɛrɛ chɔŋti mpok yap ndǔ bɛrɔ́rí mbok ɛ̌ti bachǐmbɨ bhap. Bɛrɔ́rí mbok ɛbhɔ bɛ́pú kwak bo mánkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm áyaŋ bɔ́ mánkʉ. Mmu ǎkway bɛ́koŋo nkaysi Mandɛm chí mbák abhɔŋ nɛka nɛ yi.
15 Ntí anɛ ngátí wɔ ɔ́ndɛm bǒbhɔ mándɔ́ bɛ́tɔŋ baraká nsé chí bɛ bo Mandɛm mámbɔŋ ɛkɔŋ nɛ batɨ. Nɛ chi ɛnyǔ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fù ndǔ ntɨ ɛnɛ́n nɛchí amɛm pɛ́pɛ́p, ntɨ ɛnɛn nɛpú ka mmu ánkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́twɔ̀ yi nɛ áyɔ́mɛ, ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ nɛtɔ́ŋ ɛnɛn tɛtɛp.
16 Mbɔk bho bárɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bágúrɛ ɛbhɨ ndu kɛ́mbwɔ́bhɛ́ ntí ti.
17 Báyàŋ bɛ́bhak batɔŋ ɛbhé ɛnɛ Mandɛm áchyɛ́ nyaka Moses, kɛ bábhɨkɨ bhɔŋ nɛjwǐmɛm ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fù bɔ anyu, yɛ̌ndu bátɔ̀ŋ nɛ ntɨ nɛnkɛm mánkaysi nɔkɔ bɛ́ bárɨŋɨ.
18 Bɛsɛ́ mankɛm sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ bɛbhé Mandɛm áchyɛ́ nyaka ntá Moses bɛ́rɨ mbák bo bábhʉ̀rɛ bhɔ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛ́yàŋ.
19 Sɛ́rɨŋɨ nkwɔ bɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ fyɛ́ bɛbhé ɛbhɛn ntá bo abhɛn báchi chak bɛsí Mandɛm, nɔ chi bo abhɛn bábhʉ̀ɛrɛ bɛbhé. Báfyɛ bɛbhé chi ntá bo abhɛn bápu bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé, nɛ abhɛn bátáŋntí, nɛ ntá bo abhɛn bábhɨkɨ bhɔŋ mpok nɛ Mandɛm, nɛ bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm ápú yáŋ sɛ́nkʉ. Bɛbhé bɛ́chí ntá bo abhɛn bákáysi bɛ ntí apu anɛ mánɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm nɛ abhɛn bábyàk Mandɛm. Bɛbhé ɛbhɛn bɛ́chi nkwɔ ntá bo abhɛn báway bachi nɛ manɔ bhap nɛ bo bachak.
110 Báchyɛ bɛbhé ɛ̌ti bo abhɛn bákòŋo baghɔrɛ́ nɛ babhakanɛm nɛfí. Bachyɛ bɛbhé ɛ̌ti babhakanɛm abhɛn bábhʉrɛ nɛ batɨ̌ babhakanɛm nɛ baghɔrɛ́ nkwɔ abhɛn bákʉ̀ nɔ. Bachyɛ bɛbhé ɛ̌ti bo abhɛn bághɛ̀p batɨ̌ bakwǎŋwaŋ ndu bɛti bhɔ mbɔ basɛm. Báfyɛ bɛbhé ɛ̌ti basěnse. Bachyɛ bɛbhé ɛ̌ti bo abhɛn bátè ntísiɛ ákwárɛ́, nɛ Mandɛm achyɛ bɛbhé ɛ̌ti yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́pú ndɔ́ŋ ámɔt nɛ nɛtɔ́ŋ ɛnɛ́n tɛtɛp.
111 Nɛtɔ́ŋ ɛnɛn tɛtɛp nɛ́kɔ̀ ndɔ́ŋ amɔt nɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ mɛ amɔ́ bɛ ngati bho. Yí kɛ̌ bo báchyɛ̀ bakak nɛ áfɔ́k ankɛm áfù chi ntá yi. 
112 Nchí kaka Yesu Kristo Acha ywɛsɛ tontó. Yi kɛ áchyɛ́ mɛ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn. Nchí chyɛ yí bakak mbɔnyunɛ aghɔ bɛ́ nkway bɛ́bhak mǔbɛtok yi, ayap yɛ mɛ bɛ́ nkʉ bɛtɨk ɛbhi.
113 Akʉ nɔ nɛ mɛ yɛ̌ndu nchí rɛm nyaka ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti yi nchyɛ́ nɔkɔ yi ɛsɔŋɔri, nsɔkɔti nɔkɔ yi. Kɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ nyaka ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mɛ̌kʉ̀ nɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ re noko nyaka yi. Ɛ́kʉ́ aghɔ mɛ ntínso.
114 Mandɛm Acha akʉ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi bɛ́jwi nɛ mɛ tontó mbɔ nnyɛ́n ɛnɛ́n nɛ́jwí, nɛ́gbóko, nɛtaka ɛbhɨ. Akʉ mɛ mbɔ́ŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu, achyɛ́ mɛ ɛkɔŋ nkwɔ́. Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ ɛ́chí nɛ bo abhɛn bábhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo.
115 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chi tɛtɛp nɛ chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ákwày mɛ́noko nɛ ntɨ ɛni nɛnkɛm. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́rɛ chi bɛ Mandɛm ákʉ bo mándɨŋɨ bɛ Yesu Kristo atwɔ nyaka fá amɨk ndu bɛ́pɛ́mɛ bǒ bɛbʉ́. Nɛ mɛ nchí mmu anɛ ɛbhá bɛbʉ́ bɛ́yá bɛ́chá ɛbhɛn yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achak.
116 Nchí mmǔ bɛbʉ́, yɛ̌ nɔ, Mandɛm aghɔ mɛ ntínso ndu áyaŋ bɛtɔŋ ɛnyǔ Yesu Kristo ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛyǎ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ nɛ mɛ, mɛ mmu nkʉ́ nyaka bɛbʉ́ ncha yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achak. Yesu akʉ nɔ́, bɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́mbák ɛrɨŋ ntá bho ndu bɛ́kwák bɔ mánkway mɛnoko yi, mámbɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
117 Bakak nɛ kɛnókó ámbák nɛ Mandɛm anɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ ngwɛ́nti. Achi Mfɔ anɛ ápú gú nɛ bápú ghɔ́ yi nɛ amɨ́k nɛ ndiɛrɛ yí kɛ achí Mandɛm. *Amen.
118 Mɔ́wa Tímɔti, mɛ̌ghati wɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ. Bɛ́kɔ̀ ndɔ́ŋ ámɔt nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bo antɨ nɛ bárɛm ɛ̌ti yɛ. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn-nɛ mɛ̌ghàti wɔ bɛ́bhɔŋ bɛ́bhák ntá yɛ mbɔ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ nɛnu ndu bɛkʉ ɔ́nu sayri nɛ bo abhɛn bátɔ̀ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́pú tɛtɛp.
119 Ndu ɔ́nù, kɛ́m nɛka ɛnɛn ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ Yesu sayri. Mbɔk bho bábyàk ɛnyǔ ntɨ ɛnɛn nɛpu twɔ mmu nɛ áyɔ́mɛ, nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ nɛka ɛnɛn bábhɔŋɔ nɛ Yesu nɛ́rɔp mbɔ áchwi anɛ́ árákátí anyɛ́n ndǔ batay. Kɛ́m yɛ̌ ntɨ ɛnɛ bɛ ɔ́kɛ́ kʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́twɔ̀ nɛ áyɔ́mɛ.
120 Himɛ́neɔs nɛ Aleksánda báchí nkwɔ́ mbɔ bo abhɛn bábyàk ɛnyǔ ntɨ ɛnɛn nɛpu twɔ nɛ áyɔ́mɛ. Ndɔ́ bhɔ́ bati apay amɔ Satan bɛ mándɔ́ bɛrɛm ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti Mandɛm.
2
21 Ɛnyɨŋɨ́ mbɨ ɛnɛ́ nchí ghati yɛ wɔ chí bɛ bǎkɛ́ rɔ mɛnɨkmʉɛt ɛ̌ti bo mankɛm. Ɛ́rɨ mǎnɨkmʉɛt ɛ̌ti bo abhɛn mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́chɛ́bhɛ́ bhɔ nɛ ɛ̌ti bo báchák. Ɛ́rɨ mɛnɨkmʉɛt bɛ́chyɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ́ ntá bho mankɛm.
22 Nɨk nɔ́kɔ́ ká mmʉɛt ɛ̌ti bafɔ nɛ bǒ mankɛm abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ amfay bo bachak. Kʉ ka nɔ́, bɛ sɛ́mbák sayri nɛ batɨ, kɛbhɔ́ŋ ɛsɔŋɔri. Sɛ́nkoŋo nɛpɛ́m bo abhɛn bághòk Mandɛm nɛ nɛpɛ́m bo abhɛn mánòko mmʉɛt.
23 Ɛrɨ mɛ́nɨkmʉɛt ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ ɛ́chyɛ̀ Mandɛm mmú ápɛ́mɛ́ bhɛsɛ maŋák.
24 Yi ǎyaŋ bɛpɛmɛ bo mankɛm nɛ ǎyaŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ándɨ́ŋɨ́ nɛtɔ́ŋ ɛnɛn tɛtɛp ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo.
25 Yí aywǐnti kɛ áchí Mandɛm ntá bo mankɛm nɛ mmǔ amɔt kɛ ásɔ̀t bo ntá yi. Mmu wu chí Yesu Kristo mmu ákʉ́ mmʉɛt bɛ ambak nkwǎŋwaŋ.
26 Achyɛ nyaka mmʉɛt bɛ́ anku bo mankɛm ámfɛ́rɛ́ ndǔ kɛsɛmɛ́ bɛbʉ́. Akʉ nɔ ndǔ mpok Mandɛm áyábhɛ́ bɛ́tɔŋ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ́ ǎyaŋ bɛ́pɛ́mɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu.
27 Ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu ákʉ́ kɛ Mandɛm áyábhɛ́ mɛ bɛ mbak mǔnto, bɛ́ ngátí nɔ́kɔ́ bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo nɛ bɛ ntɔŋ nɔkɔ bǒ bɛtɔk mɛnkɛm bɛ́ mánókó mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi tɛtɛp. Nchí rɛm chi tɛtɛp, mpú sénse.
28 Nchi yaŋ yɛ̌ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bǒnkwɔ báchɛ́mɛ́, babhakanɛm abhɛn báchyɛ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛnap ntá Mandɛm mánsá amɔ anɛ achi pɛ́pɛ́p amfay mánɨk nɔkɔ mmʉɛt kɛbhɔŋ bɛběntɨ nɛ bɛ́táŋá nɛ batɨ.
29 Nchi yaŋ nkwɔ́ bɛ baghɔrɛ́ mánsɔ́bhɛ́rí nɔ́kɔ́ mmʉɛt nɛ kɛnókó, mándɨŋɨ ndu báyàp ndɛn nɛ mámfyɛ yɔ sayri ɛnyu ɛnɛ ɛ́kwáy. Bákɛ́ ghoko batí ámbák yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyu nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ŋwaŋwaŋ arɛ́ kpaŋtí kpáŋtí nɛ bákɛ́ fyɛ ndɛn bɛyǎ nkáp.
210 Bɛrɨ̌ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ áchyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó tɛtɛp bɛ́fú chí ndǔ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ abhɛn yi ákʉ̀.
211 Ngɔrɛ́ abhɔŋ bɛ́chɔ́kɔ kpák ámbɔ́ŋ nɛsɛptǐmʉɛt, antá batu ndu bɛghok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bátɔ̀ŋ amɛm ɛkɛt Mandɛm.
212 Mbɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛ ngɔrɛ́ ántɔ́ŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm, nɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛ́ ngɔrɛ́ ámbɔŋ bɛtaŋ amfay babhakanɛm. Abhɔŋ bɛ́chɔ́kɔ chí kpák.
213 Sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ́ Mandɛm ayámbɨ aghókó Adam kɛ ǎghoko Ifa,
214 nɛ Satan abhɨ́kɨ́ rwɔ nyaka Adam. Ifa kɛ ákóŋó nsé Satan akwɛ́n ndǔ bɛbʉ́.
215 Yɛ̌ nɔ, chɔŋ Mandɛm ampɛmɛ baghɔrɛ́ bɛfʉɛt ndǔ nɛbhé anɛ bɔ́ bábhè bɔ, nɛ mbák bapu tɔŋ mmʉɛt, nɛ mbák bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɔ bɛsɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ Kristo, nɛ mbák bárɔ̀ŋ ambɨ bɛkɔŋ bɛtɨ̌ bakwaŋwaŋ, nɛ mbák báchi nyáŋá ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnap, kɛbhɔŋ bɛkwɛnɛ.
3
31 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mɛ̌rɛ̀m nɛ́, ɛ́chi tɛtɛp: Mbák mmu ámfyɛ̌ ntí bɛ́bhak mǔnti Nkwɔ Kristo, nɔ ǎyaŋ bɛkʉ ɛrítí bɛtɨk.
32 Mmǔ ntí bǒnkwɔ abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ bɛ́bhɔŋ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ nɛ abhɔŋ bɛ́bhɔŋ chí ngɔrɛ́ amɔt. Abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ mɛ́ŋwaka ndu yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Abhɔŋ bɛbhak mmu anɛ ákɛ̀m mmʉɛt, nɛ abhɔŋ bɛ́bhʉɛrɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛni ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ bo báchyɛ̀ yi kɛnókó, nɛ abhɔŋ bɛbhak mmu anɛ ásɔ̀t mankɔ sayri, nɛ abhɔŋ bɛbhak ɛrɨ́tí ntɔŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
33 Mmǔ ntí bǒnkwɔ abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛbhak nkwɛnɛ́-mɛ́m. Abhɔŋ bɛ́bhak mmu anɛ ápú tɔ́ŋ bɛtaŋ. Abhɔŋ bɛ́bhak sayri nɛ bho. Abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛbhak ntaŋ-bɛ́táŋá nɛ mmǔ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ngoŋó nkáp.
34 Mmǔ ntí bo Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛbhak mmu anɛ ákɛ̀m ɛfo yi sayri, ankʉ bɔ̌bhi mámbak bo abhɛn bághòk yí mánchyɛ nɔkɔ bo kɛnókó ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ.
35 Mbák mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛ́kɛm ɛkɛt ɛyi sayri, ná yí ákway bɛbhak ɛrɨ́tí mǔnti ntá bǒnkwɔ abhɛn bachi antɛnɛ́ yi?
36 Mǔnti abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛbhak mɔ̌nkɔ ndǔ Nkwɔ Yesu mbɔnyunɛ ǎkway bɛyoŋ mmʉɛt nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́nkʉ Mandɛm antɛmsi yi mbɔ ɛnyu átɛ́msí nyaka Satan.
37 Abhɔŋ bɛbhak mmǔ anɛ bǒ nɛfí nkwɔ báchyɛ̀ kɛnókó. Mbák ɛ́pú nɔ, bákwày bɛ́chyɛ yi ntíánwɔ́p ankwɛ́n ndǔ ntá Satan.
38 Bo abhɛn bákwak bɛkʉ bɛtɨk Mandɛm, bábhɔŋ bɛbhak bo abhɛn bápú kʉ ntok nɛ bɛtɨk ɛbhap nkwɔ́. Bábhíkɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛbhak bǒ bɛyɔŋ bɛyɔŋ, bábhɨkɨ bhɔ́ŋ bɛbhak manyǔ mmɛ́m, nɛ bákɛ́ bhák bǒ ngoŋó nkáp.
39 Bábhɔŋ bɛ́kɛm nɛ bɛtaŋ mɛnyɨŋ bhɛ́sɛ bhɛ́sɛ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm ákʉ bo mándɨŋɨ nɛ mánóko. Babhɔŋ bɛkɛm bɔ nɛ ntɨ ɛnɛn nɛchi chak.
310 Bo bábhɔŋ bɛ́fyɛ kpɨk amɨ́k bɔ amʉɛt. Mbák mángɔ́ yɛ bɛ́ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛ́pú nɛ bhɔ́, mánsɔt bhɔ́ mbɔ bo abhɛn bákwàk bɛ́kʉ bɛtɨk Mandɛm.
311 Baghɔrɛ́ abhɛn bákwàk bɛ́kʉ bɛtɨk Mandɛm, bábhɔŋ nkwɔ́ bɛ́bhɔŋ ɛrɨtí ɛpɨŋ. Bákɛ́ bhák bo abhɛn bárɛ̀m ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti bo báchak, bábhɨkɨ bhɔŋ mɛ́ŋwaka ndǔ yɛ̌ ɛnyɨŋ nɛ bábhɔŋ bɛ́bhak bǒ tɛtɛp ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ.
312 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmú anɛ ákwàk bɛkʉ bɛtɨk Mandɛm, abhɔŋ bɛbhay chi ngɔrɛ́ amɔt. Yí nɛ ngɔrɛ́ ywi bábhɔŋ bɛ́kɛm bɔ̌bhap nɛ ɛfo yap ɛnkɛm sayri.
313 Mbák bǒ abhɛn bákwàk bɛkʉ bɛtɨk Mandɛm bákʉ̀ bhɔ sayri, bo báchyɛ bhɔ kɛnókó nɛ bákway bɛ́rɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo kɛbhɔŋ bɛcháy. 
314 Mbɔ̌ŋ ntɨ bɛ́twɔ awu ntá yɛ mandú mpok. Yɛ̌ nɔ, nchí sɨŋ bɛ́gháti wɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ mbɔnyunɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́kway bɛ́fákári nkɛ wakari bɛ́twɔ awu.
315 Mbák mbɨ́kɨ́ wakari bɛ́twɔ, ɔ̌kwáy bɛ́rɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ bǒ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛbhak ndu nnɛrɛ́kɛt Mandɛm, nɔ chí Nkwɔ Yesu. Mandɛm ywɛsɛ́ achí nɛpɛ́m, nɛ Nkwɔ Yesu bachi mbɔ bɛkwap ɛbhɛn bɛ́kɛ̀m nɛtɔŋ ɛnɛn tɛtɛp.
316 Ɛnyɨŋ bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ɛnɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ nɛ sɛ́nóko ɛ́chí ɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay. Agha ákway mɛ́mákáti yɔ? Ɛnyɨŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́chí bɛ yi? Ɛ́chí bɛ: Yí, Yesu Kristo akʉ mmʉɛt bɛ ámbák nkwǎ, Atwɔ́ fá amɨk, Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm átɔ́ŋ bo bɛ yí achi chak bɛsí Mandɛm. Bɔangɛl Mandɛm bághɔ́ yi. Bo bágháti bachak ɛ̌ti yi amɛm bɛtɔkɔ́ mmɨk, bǒ mmɨk mánoko yi, Mandɛm asɔt yɛ yi amfay ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ɛyi.
4
41 Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm ǎghàti bhɛsɛ sayri bɛ mpok ǎtwɔ̀ anɛ mbɔk bho bárɔ bɛ́koŋo nɛtɔ́ŋ ɛnɛn tɛtɛp, mándɔbhɛ koŋo chí bɛfóŋó ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́rwɔ bho nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ.
42 Batɨ bǒ-nsé nɛ bǒ bapu bhɔ ájwi nɛ ɛjuri nɛ básɔ̀t mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú ntá bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛtɔŋ bo.
43 Mpok yɔ, bǒ-nsé bhɔ bárɛ̀m chɔŋ bɛ nɛbhay nɛbhɨkɨ rɨ, nɛ bɛ́ bo bákɛ́ nyiɛ́ mbɔk mɛnyǔ mɛnyɨŋɨ́nyiɛ, nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛ́n Mandɛm ághókó bɛ́ bo abhɛn mánókó Yesu nɛ bárɨŋɨ nɛtɔ́ŋ ɛ́nɛ́n tɛtɛp mányíɛ́, mánchyɛ nɔkɔ Mandɛm bakak.
44 Tɛ̌ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm ághókó ɛ́rɨ, bo bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ bɛbyak yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Sɛ́kway mɛ́nyiɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ sɛ́nchyɛ nɔkɔ bakak ntá Mandɛm,
45 mbɔnyunɛ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm nɛ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt bɛ́kʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛmbak nyáŋá bɛsí Mandɛm. 
46 Mbák ɔ́ntɔ́ŋ bǒnkwɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, chɔŋ ɔ́mbak ɛrɨ́tí nkʉbɛtɨk Yesu Kristo anɛ máné nɛ bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chyɛ nɛka nɛ nɛtɔ́ŋ ɛnɛ́n tɛtɛp ɛnɛn ɔ́kóŋó.
47 Ɔ́kɛ́ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛ́kʉ nɛ bɛchákárí mbok ɛ̌ti bachǐmbɨ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́pú ka mmu ánchyɛ́ Mandɛm kɛnókó. Fíɛ́ bɛtaŋ ndu bɛkʉ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ nɛmbak mbɔ ɛnyu Mandɛm áyaŋ.
48 Kʉ nɔ, mbɔnyunɛ nɛghɔkɔsǐ mmʉɛt ɛnɛ́n nkwɔmʉɛt nɛ́chyɛ̀ mmu mandu nsáy, kɛ bɛghɔkɔsǐ mmʉɛt ndu bɛ́kʉ̀ mmu ámbák anɛ ákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áyàŋ, ǎchyɛ̀ mmu nsáy ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi. Ɛchí ɛnyu yɔ mbɔnyunɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɔ nɛ́bhɔŋ bariɛp amɛm nsáy ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn fá amɨk nɛ ɛnɛ́n nɛ́twɔ̀ ambɨ.
49 Bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi tɛtɛp nɛ ɛrɨ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anoko bhɔ́ sayri.
410 Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ sɛ́fyɛ̀ bɛtaŋ bɛ́kʉ bɛtɨk nɛ sɛ́nù bɛ bo mándɨŋɨ nɛtɔ́ŋ ɛnɛ́n tɛtɛp mbɔnyunɛ sɛ́bhaka ntɨ nɛ Mandɛm anɛ ápɛ̀mɛ bǒ mankɛm, sayri sayri, abhɛn mánókó.
411 Tɔ́ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɛ fyɛ́ bɛtaŋ bɛ bo mángɔ́k bhɔ.
412 Ɔ́kɛ́ rɔ mmu ámbyak wɔ bɛ́ ɔchí mɔ́nkwɛn. Bák ɛrɨŋ ntá abhɛn mánoko Yesu, ndǔ ɛyɔŋɔ́nyu yɛ, nɛ ndǔ nɛkʉ ywɛ, nɛ ndǔ ɛkɔŋ ɛyɛ, nɛ ndǔ nɛka ɛnɛ nɛ Yesu, nɛ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ bakwap.
413 Ghɔ́ bɛ bápày Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ntá bho, nɛ ghɔ́ bɛ́ báfyɛ̀ bho ntɨ nɛ bɛ bátɔ̀ŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm. Kʉ nɔ, kpátɛ mpok anɛ mɛ̌twɔ̀ awu.
414 Kɛ́ rɔ akap anɛ́ ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ myákámyáká, nɔ chí akap anɛ́ nyaka barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ bágháti ɛ̌ti yɛ nɛ ɛ́kʉ bǒ batí mányáŋa wɔ amɔ́ antí bɛ́ ántwɔ́ ntá yɛ.
415 Kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛ́bhɛn. Fíɛ́ ntí arɛ́ bɛ́ bo mángɔ́ ndu ɔ́kʉ̀ sayri.
416 Sɔt mpok nɛ mmʉɛt ɛyɛ nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɔ́tɔ̀ŋ. Kɛ́m bɔ́ nɛ bɛtaŋ mbɔnyunɛ mbák ɔ́nkʉ ɛnyu yɔ, chɔŋ ɔ́mpɛmɛ mmʉɛt ɛyɛ nɛ bo abhɛn ɔ́tɔ̀ŋ.
5
51 Ɔ́kɛ́ ji nsénsí nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ. Chiɛ̌ yi chi maniɛ́ mbɔ bɛ achi chi ɛtayɛ. Sɔt babhakanɛm abhɛn bábhíkí ghaka ɛkaká nɛbhe ɛyɛ mbɔ bɔ̌máyɛ.
52 Sɔt basénsí baghɔrɛ́ mbɔ bɔmáyɛ, ɔ́nsɔt baghɔrɛ́ abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ ghaka ɛkaká nɛbhe ɛyɛ mbɔ bɔ̌máyɛ. Nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ nɛ́kɛ́ bhɔŋ bakwap.
53 Tɔ́ŋ mánkwɛ́sɛ́ abhɛn bábhɨkɨ bhɔŋ nɛkwak bɛrɨ̌ntɨ bɛ bɔ́ mámbɔ́ŋ mɛnwɔp.
54 Mbák kɛ́nkwɛ́sɛ́ abhɔ̌ŋ bɔ nɛ yɛ̌chi bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ, bɔ́ bábhɔŋ bɛ́kwak nnɛrɛ́kɛt wap mbɔ ɛnyu Mandɛm áyàŋ. Bábhɔŋ bɛ́kap bachi nɛ manɔ bhap ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn bɔ́ bákʉ́ mbɔnyunɛ́ ɛyɔ ɛ́chyɛ̀ Mandɛm maŋák.
55 Kɛ́nkwɛ́sɛ́ anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ mmu anɛ ákwàk yi ǎrɔ nɛpɛ́m ɛni nɛnkɛm ntá Mandɛm nɛ ǎnɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛti nɛ ngósí bɛ́ Mandɛm ánkwak yi.
56 Kɛ kɛ́nkwɛ́sɛ́ anɛ árɔ́ mmʉ́ɛt myáká myáká ndu ɛpɔ̌ nɛpɛ́m, achí ngú ndǔ ɛfóŋó, yɛ̌ndu abhʉɛ́t nɛpɛ́m ndǔ nkwɔmʉɛt.
57 Ghatí bhɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛ́kɛ́ bhak nɛ bhɔ́.
58 Mbák mmu apú yɨŋɨ bǒbhi, sayri sayri bǒ nnɛrɛ́kɛt ywi, nɔ apú pɛrɛ koŋo nɛtɔ́ŋ ɛnɛn tɛtɛp. Ɛnyǔ mmu wu abɛp achá mmu anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ noko Yesu wáwák.
59 Bǎkway bɛ́fyɛ́ nnyɛ́n kɛ́nkwɛ́sɛ́ ndu nkwɔ́ mánkwɛ́sɛ́ abhɛn báyàŋ nɛkwak mbák arɛm agháká mamiɛ́ bɛsa bɛ́rát. Ɛnyu kɛ́nkwɛ́sɛ́ wu abhɔŋ bɛbhak chí ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka ndiɛrɛ nnɛ́m amɔt.
510 Abhɔŋ bɛbhak chí ngɔrɛ́ anɛ bo bárɛ̀m bɛ ǎkʉ nyaka ɛrɨ́rɨ́ mbɔ mɛ́ne bɔ̌bhi sayri, nɛ bɛtok bo Mandɛm, nɛ bɛ́kwak bo abhɛn báchí ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri. Ɛnyǔ kɛ́nkwɛ́sɛ́ wu abhɔŋ bɛbhak ngɔrɛ́ anɛ áchyɛ́ nyaka nɛpɛ́m ɛni nɛnkɛm ndu bɛ́kʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ bɛrɨ.
511 Kɛ ɔ́kɛ́ fyɛ manyɛ́n mánkwɛ́sɛ́ abhɛn bábhʉɛ́t nɛ manoŋ amʉɛt ndǔ nkwɔ mánkwɛ́sɛ́ abhɛn báyàŋ nɛkwak mbɔnyunɛ mbák ɛkwak bɛbhɔŋ nnɛ́m ɛ́nkó bɔ́ antí, bághɔkɔntɨk Kristo,
512 nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́nkʉ mánchɔŋti bɛsí bhap nɛ Yesu ndu bábhíkí bhʉɛrɛ nku mbɨ anɛ mányú nɛ yi.
513 Bákway bɛbhak babhɔ́t, mánkɔ nɔkɔ bɛkɛt nɛ bɛkɛt. Bakway bɛbhak bo kɛ́mbwɔ́bhɛ́ nɛ bǒ ɛnáŋtí, nɛ bo abhɛn báchwè ndǔ baraká bo báchák, mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛrɛm.
514 Nkɔŋ yɛ bɛ́ mánkwɛ́sɛ́ abhɛn bábhʉɛ́t nɛ manoŋ amʉɛt mámbáy manɛ́m, mámbe bɔ, mánkɛm bɛkɛt ɛbhap sayri, bɛ bákɛ́ chyɛ mǔmpap ywɛsɛ mbi bɛrɛm ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ.
515 Ndɛm nɔ nɛ ntí bɛ mbɔk yap bágúrɛ́ ɛbhɨ nɛ bárɔbhɛ koŋo chí Satan.
516 Mbák ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ánókó abhɔŋ mánkwɛ́sɛ́ ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt ywi, ánkwak bhɔ́. Ákɛ́ rɔ ntǔ wap ntá bakoŋo Yesu báchák. Mbák mánkʉ nɔ, nkwɔ́ Yesu bábhɔŋ mbi bɛ́kwak mánkwɛ́sɛ́ abhɛn kɛbhɔ́ŋ nɛkwak.
517 Bǒ nkwɔ́ bábhɔŋ bɛ́chyɛ bǒ batí abhɛn bákʉ̀ bɛtɨk ɛbhap ɛrɨrɨ kɛnókó nɛ ɛrɨ́tɨ́ akap. Ɛ́mbák ɛnyu yɔ, sayri sayri nɛ abhɛn báfyɛ̀ bɛtaŋ bɛ́gháti nɛ bɛ́tɔŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
518 Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́ghàti bhɛsɛ́ bɛ, “Ɔ́kɛ́ gwɔt nnyǔ mpɔŋ bɛ́ ákɛ́ nyiɛ́ nchwi mpok yɔ ákʉ̀ bɛtɨk amɛm nkɨ̌ nchwi.” Ɛ́pɛt ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Nkʉ bɛtɨk abhɔ̌ŋ ngǎngaŋ bɛ mánchyɛ yi akap.”
519 Mbák bǒ nkwɔ́ mándɛ́m bɛ́ mǔnti akʉ ndak, kɛ́tɨŋɨ ka, kpatɛ batísiɛ mámfú mbɔ batí ápay nɛ arat.
520 Ji bo abhɛn bápú rɔ bɛbʉ́ bɛsí bǒ mankɛm bɛ bakoŋo Yesu bachak mámbɔ́ŋ bɛcháy.
521 Bɛsí Mandɛm nɛ Yesu Kristo nɛ bɔángɛl Mandɛm, nchí ghati wɔ bɛ ɔ́mbʉ́rɛ́ bɛbhé ɛbhɛn sayri, ɔkɛ́ tɔ́ŋ kɛnkábhɛ́ nɛ kɛ́rɨ́ŋámík.
522 Kɛ́ wakari mɛ́nyáŋa mmu amɔ antí ndu bɛ́kʉ yi mǔnti bǒ nkwɔ́ kɛ́ka ɔ́mbɔŋ mbát ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bo bachak. Kɛ́m mmʉɛt ɛyɛ bɛ ɔ́kɛ́ kwɛn ndǔ bɛbʉ́.
523 Ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ ɔrɔp chi mame mame, kɛ́pɛrɛ nyú yɛ̌ chí ndiɛrɛ manyiɛp. Sɔt nɔ́kɔ́ nkwɔ mandú mmɛ́m bɛ ánkwák bɛkʉ mɛniɛ ɛbhɛ mɛ́mpɔp.
524 Bɛbʉ́ mbɔk bho bɛchi kpóŋóróŋ nɛ bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ chɔŋ mántáŋ bɔ́, kɛ bɛbʉ́ bo bachak bɛchi bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ɛnyu ɛnɛ ɛ́tat kɛ bo mándɨŋɨ bhɔ.
525 Nɔ́ kɛ ɛ́chí nɛ bɛrɨ ɛbhɛn mmu ákʉ̀. Bɛ́ghɔ̀ kpoŋoroŋ. Kɛ yɛ̌ chí ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́chí bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́, bɛ́pú rɔp bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ mpoknkɛm.
6
61 Bǒ mankɛm abhɛn bachi basɛm bábhɔŋ bɛchyɛ kɛnókó ntá bachi bhap bɛ bo bákɛ́ rɛm ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti nnyɛ́n Mandɛm nɛ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́tɔ̀ŋ.
62 Abhɛ́n bachi bhap mánókó Yesu bákɛ́ rɔ bɛ́chyɛ bhɔ kɛnókó ɛkɛ́n kɛ́kwáy nɛ bhɔ nɛ bákɛ rɔ bɛghok bhɔ yɛ̌ndu bárɔ́bhɛ́ chí bǒ mmu amɔt. Ɛrɨ́ bɛ́ mántók bachi bhap sayri ɛ́ncha mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnyu ɛsɨ, mbɔnyunɛ bachi abhɛ́n bɔ́ bákwàk mánoko Yesu Kristo nɛ Mandɛm akɔŋ bhɔ́.  Tɔ́ŋ bo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, ɔ́ngati bɔ́ mánkʉ bhɔ́.
63 Mbák mmu ǎtɔ̀ŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́chák ɛnɛ́ ɛ́pu ndɔ́ŋ ámɔ́t nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ngáti wɔ, ansɔt bɛyɔŋ Yesu Kristo Acha mbɔ ndaká-nsé nɛ yí kɛka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́tɔ̀ŋ ɛ̌ti nɛpɛ́m bǒ nkwɔ́ Yesu,
64 nɔ achí paka nɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Ɛnyǔ mmu wu abhɔŋ chí ɛpɔ̌ ɛpɨŋ bɛ́kɛm ɛpʉ́ítí, nɛ bɛtaŋ bɛ́táŋá ɛ̌ti bɛyɔŋ, ɛnɛ́ ɛyɔ ɛ́twɔ̀ chí nɛ mpabhamɨ́k nɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ bo mántáŋ nɛ batɨ, mándɛm nɔkɔ ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti batɨ, nɛ mánkaysi nɔkɔ bɛ mmu ákú ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ngufú abhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ.
65 Ɛnyǔ mmu wu chí mmu ɛpʉ́ítí mpoknkɛm nɛ bho báchák. Batɨ̌ mɛnyǔ bo bhɔ ábɛp amɛm nɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ rɨŋɨ mbɔ̌ŋ ndaká Mandɛm. Bákaysi bɛ bɛ́kʉ mbɔ ɛnyu Mandɛm áyàŋ chí mbi bɛyaŋ nkáp.
66 Ɛrɛmɛ́ nsáy achí nɛ mmu anɛ ábhʉ̀ɛrɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛni mbɔ ɛnyu Mandɛm áyàŋ nɛ ambɔ́ŋ maŋák nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́.
67 Yɛ̌nyɨŋ sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ twɔ fá ammɨk nɛ yɔ́, nɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ mmu apú rɔŋ nɛ yɔ.
68 Mbák sɛ́bhɔŋ yɛ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ ndɛn sɛ́ndɔ́ ɛbhɔ mɛ́nkwáy nɛ bhɛsɛ.
69 Bo abhɛn báyàŋ bɛbhɔŋ bɛyǎ nkáp báwakari bɛkwɛn ndǔ nɛmɔ, mánkwɛn ndu ntá nɛ nkaysi anɛ átwɔ̀ bhɔ́ nɛ mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́ nɛ nɛwú.
610 Ɛ́chí ɛnyu yɔ mbɔnyunɛ ɛkɔŋɔ́ nkáp ɛ́twɔ̀ nɛ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm. Chí ɛ̌ti ngoŋó nkáp kɛ̌ mbɔk bho bárɔ́ mbi Mandɛm bárɔp ndǔ nɛměntɨ ɛ̌ti nɛdǐ kɛbhɔ ɛnɛn nɛchi nɛ bhɔ. 
611 Kɛ wɔ Tímɔti, mmǔ Mandɛm, kɛ́fyɛ́ amɔ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ. Kʉ ntɨ ɛnɛ bɛ́ ɔ́mbák chak bɛsí Mandɛm, nɛ búrɛ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ mbɔnyu Mandɛm áyàŋ. Bɔ́ŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu, kɔŋ bo, bɔ́ŋ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ, nɛ bák ndu kpák nɛ bo báchák.
612 Nu ɛrɨ́tí nɛnu ɛ̌ti Yesu nɛ́ bɔ́ŋ nɛka nɛ yi, ɔ́ngɔ́ bɛ́ ɔbhɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti. Mandɛm abhɨ́ŋɨ́ wɔ chí ɛ̌ti nɛpɛ́m ɛnɔ mpok ɔ́rɛ́mɛ́ kpoŋoroŋ bɛsí bɛyǎ batísiɛ bɛ́ ɔnókó Yesu.
613 Mɛ̌ghati wɔ bɛsí Mandɛm mú áchyɛ̀ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ nɛpɛ́m, nɛ bɛsí Yesu Kristo mu áté ntísiɛ ndǔ tɛtɛp Mandɛm bɛsí Pɔ́ntiɔs Páílet,
614 bɛ́ ɔ́nkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ngátí wɔ mɛnkɛm. Kɛ́ kwɛn ndu yɛ̌ ɛ́mɔt ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ yɛ̌ mmu apu kway bɛ́ji wɔ. Ɛ́mbák nɔ́ kpát bɛ́gháka ɛwak ɛnɛ Acha ywɛsɛ Yesu Kristo ábhèsi.
615 Mandɛm anɛ bo bábɨ̀ti, yi mmu áchi Mfɔ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ amfay yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ, Acha nɛ Mfɔ bafɔ, chɔŋ yí ankʉ Yesu ambesi ndǔ mpok anɛ yi áyábhɛ́.
616 Mandɛm apú gú. Bɛchɔ́kɔ́ bhi bɛ́bhɔŋ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ ɛbhɛn mmu ápú kwáy bɛyɨŋɨ. Yɛ̌ mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ re ghɔ yi nɛ mmu apú kwáy bɛ́ghɔ yi. Kɛnókó kɛnkɛm kɛchi ɛki nɛ bɛtaŋá kɛfɔ bɛchi ɛbhi mpoknkɛm. *Amen.
617 Ghatí bǒ bakáp fá ammɨk bɛ bákɛ́ yoŋ mmʉɛt, nɛ bɛ bákɛ́ bhakantɨ ndǔ kɛfɔ̌ mmɨk, mbɔnyunɛ kɛ́fʉ̀ɛrɛ fʉɛt. Ghatí bhɔ́ mánsɨ́kɨ́ntɨ nɛ Mandɛm mmu áchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ bɛ sɛ́mbɔŋ ɛrɨ́tɨ́ nɛpɛ́m.
618 Ghatí bɔ́ mánkʉ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛrɨ. Mánkʉ́ nɔkɔ bɛrɨ ndǔ bɛyǎ babhi. Bákɛ́ taŋ awɔ́. Mánkɔrɛ nɔkɔ nɛ batɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ maŋák.
619 Mbák mánkʉ ɛnyʉ yɔ, nɔ bábhʉ̀ɛrɛ ɛrɛmɛ́ kɛfɔ ɛkɛ́n kɛ́chí ntá yap, kɛfɔ ɛkɛ́n bábhɔ̀ŋ amfay ndǔ mpok anɛ átwɔ̀ ambɨ. Mbák mánkʉ nɔ, chɔŋ mámbɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn tɛtɛp.
620 Tímɔti, kɛ́m bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn báchyɛ́ wɔ sayri. Ɔ́kɛ́ chwe ndǔ kɛpɨ ɛkɛn kɛpu chyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó nɛ ɛpʉ́ítí nti ti ɛnɛ ɛpu kɔ ndɔ́ŋ ámɔt nɛ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm. Bo bákaysi bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ chi nɛrɨŋɨ́, ɛnɛ́ ɛ́pú nɔ.
621 Nɛrɛm anɛ mbɔk bho bárɛ̀m bɛ bárɨŋɨ ǎkʉ́ bábhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ noko nɛtɔ́ŋ ɛnɛn tɛtɛp. Bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm mɛ́mbák nɛ bhe mankɛm.6
1  
11 Mɛ Pɔ̌l, kɛ nchi sɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Nchí mǔnto Yesu Kristo, bɛkoŋo nkaysi Mandɛm. Yi ayap mɛ bɛ ngati bho Mbok Ndɨndɨ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo anɛ achi ɛ̌ti bariɛp amɛm yi afyɛ́ nyaka bɛchyɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti nta bo abhɛn manoko Yesu Kristo.
12 Nchí sɨŋ ntá yɛ Tímɔti, wɔ mú ɔ́chí mbɔ mɔ̌wa anɛ nde kɔŋ. Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha ywɛsɛ mántɔ́ŋ wɔ bɛrɨ̌ndu, mángɔ wɔ ntínso nɛ mánchyɛ wɔ kpák. 
13 Tímɔti, nchí kaka Mandɛm ɛ̌ti yɛ. Nchí nɨkmʉɛt ntá yi nɛ ntɨ ɛnɛn nɛchí amɛm pɛ́pɛ́p mbɔ bachǐmbɨ bha bákʉ̀ nyaka. Nchí nɨkmʉɛt ndu bɛ́káka Mandɛm bɛti nɛ ngósí, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok, anɛ ntɨ ɛna nɛ́kwɛ́n wɔ amʉɛt.
14 Mbɨ́kɨ́ ghɔkɔntɨk babhɛsɛ mɛ nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ mbɔŋ ɛkwak bɛti nɛ ngósí bɛ́ghɔ wɔ bɛ́ maŋák ánjwí mɛ antɨ.
15 Nɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ ghɔkɔntɨk ɛnyu ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ Yesu tɛtɛp nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ nnɔ máyɛ Lóis nɛ máyɛ Yúnis bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka. Nnókó tɛtɛp bɛ ɛnyǔ nɛka ɛnɔ nɛbhʉɛt nɛ wɔ.
16 Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ̌ mɛ̌tɨk yɛ wɔ bɛ́ ɔ́nkʉ bɛ akap anɛ Mandɛm áchyɛ́ wɔ mpok nyáŋá wɔ amɔ anti ambak mbɔ ngó anɛ́ áyaŋ mɛnɛmɛ kɛ báfok wu ádù.
17 Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm áchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ chyɛ bhɛsɛ ntɨ bɛcháy. Ǎchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ chi nɛtaŋántɨ, nɛ ɛkɔŋ, nɛ nɛkɛ́mɛ́mʉɛt.
18 Ɔ́kɛ́ bhɔŋ yɛ ntíánwɔ́p bɛghati bho ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛ̌ti Acha ywɛsɛ Yesu. Ɔ́kɛ́ bhɔŋ ntíánwɔ́p ɛ̌ti ya, yɛ̌ndu nchí mǔkɛnɔŋ ɛ̌ti nsɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ yi. Kɛ dɔ̌ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ wɔ mɛ́nkwák wɔ ɔ́nka ɛsɔŋɔri mbɔ mɛ ɛ̌ti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ Yesu.
19 Mandɛm apɛ́mɛ́ bhɛsɛ ndu áfɛ́rɛ́ bhɛsɛ ndǔ bɛbʉ́. Ayap bhɛsɛ bɛ sɛ́mbák bǒbhi. Akʉ nɔ yɛ̌ndu sɛ́pú bɛrɨ́tí bho. Anáŋ abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka nkaysi bɛ́pɛ́mɛ bhɛsɛ, tɛ mpok mmɨk ábhɨ́kɨ́re bho. Mandɛm anáŋ abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka nkaysi bɛ́fʉɛ́t ntá Yesu Kristo, antɔŋ bhɛsɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu bhi.
110 Mandɛm anáŋ atɔ́ŋ bhɛsɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi ndu átó Yesu Kristo mmu átwɔ́. Yí achi Mpɛmɛ ywɛsɛ. Awǎy bɛtaŋá nɛwú nɛ achyɛ́ bhɛsɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́. Yɔ́ achí mbɔ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ ǎtɔ̀ŋ bhɛsɛ mbi nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
111 Mandɛm ayap mɛ bɛ mbák mǔnto Yesu, ayap mɛ bɛ́ mbák mmú nchí ghati bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́, nɛ ayap mɛ mbák mmú anɛ nchí tɔ́ŋ bo Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi.
112 Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ nchí ghɔ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ ɛnkɛm. Kɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ntíánwɔ́p mbɔnyunɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ mmu anɛ nnókó. Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ yí abhɔŋ bɛtaŋ bɛkɛm bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn yi achyɛ mɛ sayri kpátɛ bɛghaka ɛwak ɛnɛ yi átwɔ̀.
113 Bʉrɛ́ bɛyɔŋ ɛbha sayri bɛ mɛ́nkwak wɔ ɔ́ntɨk ɛnyǔ nɛtɔŋ ɛnɛn tɛtɛp nɛchi. Kʉ nɔ dɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ ndu bɛ́bhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu, nɛ ɔ́nkɔŋ bo báchák. Ɔ̌kway bɛ́kʉ nɔ mbɔnyunɛ ɔbhat mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo.
114 Ndǔ bɛtaŋá Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ mmú achí nɛ bhɛsɛ, kɛ́m Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ báfyɛ wɔ amɔ sayri.
115 Ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ bǒnkwɔ Yesu mankɛm abhɛn báfú atú Esia bátɨ̌knsɛm ntá ya. Fijɛ́lɔs nɛ Hɛmogɛ́nes nkwɔ́ bátɨknsɛm ntá ya.
116 Yesu Acha ángɔ́ nnɛrɛ́kɛt Ɔnɛsifórɔs ntínso. Akwɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ntɨ bɛyǎ mpok, kɛbhɔ́ŋ ntíánwɔ́p bɛ nchí mǔkɛnɔŋ nɛ ngɛm amɔ.
117 Nɛchwɔp yí áchwɔ́bhɛ́ fá Rom, ayáŋ mɛ mbǎnkɛm kpát aghɔ́ mɛ.
118 Nchí nɨkmʉɛt bɛ Acha ángɔ́ yi ntínso ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ manyé. Ɔ̌rɨŋɨ sayri nɛkwak ɛnɛ́n yi áchyɛ́ mɛ amɛm ɛtɔk Ɛ́fɛsɔs.
2
21 Mɔ́wa Tímɔti, dɔ̌ yɛ Mandɛm anchyɛ wɔ bɛtaŋ. Ǎkwáy bɛ́kʉ nɔ ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi nɛ wɔ ndu ɔ́bhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo.
22 Sɔt mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɔ́ghókó ndǔ mɛ̌tɔ̀ŋ kpoŋoroŋ bɛsí bɛyǎ batísiɛ tɔ́ŋ ntá bǒ tɛtɛp. Sɔt bɔ́ tɔ́ŋ ntá bo tɛtɛp abhɛn bákway bɛtɔ́ŋ bhɔ́ ntá bo báchák nkwɔ́.
23 Mbɔ ɛrɨ́tí ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu Yesu Kristo, ɔbhɔŋ bɛ́te kákáti ndu ɛnyǔ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ́ bakoŋo Yesu báchák bábhɔ̀ŋ.
24 Ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu anɛ áchí ndǔ bɛtɨk nɛ ǎnù bɛ mǔnti ywi ámbɔ́ŋ maŋák nɛ yi, apú fyɛ mmʉɛt ndǔ baraká ɛtɔk áchák.
25 Mmǔ anɛ ájɛ́t ntiɛt nɛ batɨ, apú kway bɛbhɔŋ nsáy mbák abhɨkɨ jɛt ankoŋo bɛbhé ntiɛt.
26 Nkwaŋa-nkɨ anɛ afyɛ́ bɛtaŋ ndǔ bɛtɨk kɛ áyámbɨ bɛbhɔŋ mbwɔ́t anɛ áfú ɛbhɨ.
27 Sɔt nɔ́kɔ́ nkaysi ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ngátí-nɛ́ wɔ, mbɔnyunɛ chɔŋ mbɔŋ Mandɛm Acha ankwak wɔ ɔ́mbɔ́ŋ nɛjwǐmɛm ndu bɔ́ mɛnkɛm.
28 Ɔ́kɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk Yesu Kristo, ɛbhárɛ́mɔ Mfɔ Debhít mmu Mandɛm ákú nyaka yi apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m mbɔ ɛnyu ɛchi amɛm Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ mɛ̌ghati bho.
29 Ndu mɛ̌ghati bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ nɛ, kɛ nchí ghɔ́ ɛsɔŋɔri, nɛ ngɛm amɔ mbɔ nkʉ bɛbʉ́. Kɛ mmu ápú kwáy bɛ́fe Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ.
210 Nká yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ̌ti bǒ abhɛn Mandɛm ayabhɛ bɛ mámbak abhi. Nká ɛsɔŋɔri bɛ́ Yesu Kristo ámpɛ́mɛ́ bhɔ nkwɔ mámbák nɛ Mandɛm mmú áchyɛ bhɔ kɛnókó ngwɛnti ti.
211 Bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chi tɛtɛp. Bɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Mbák sɛ́gu nɛ yi, chɔŋ sɛ́mbak nkwɔ nɛpɛ́m nɛ yi.
212 Mbák sɛ́nkɛ́pntɨ ndǔ bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛsɛ, chɔŋ sɛ́mbak bafɔ nɛ yi nkwɔ. Mbák sɛ́ndɛm bɛ́ sɛ́bhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ yi, chɔŋ yí nkwɔ andɛm bɛ́ abhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ bhɛsɛ.
213 Mbák sɛ́pu bhʉrɛ bariɛp amɛsɛ, yí ǎbhʉrɛ bariɛp ami mpoknkɛm. Kristo apú kwáy bɛ́táŋa bɛ yí apú mmu anɛ yi achi.”
214 Tɨk nɔkɔ bǒnkwɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ngáti-nɛ́ wɔ. Yɛp nɔkɔ bɔ́ batú ndǔ nnyɛ́n Mandɛm bɛ́ mándɔ́ bɛ́kɛm ɛpʉ́ítí ɛ̌ti bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́twɔ chi nɛ bɛ́táká. Ɛyɔ̌ ɛnyǔ ɛpʉ́ítí ɛ́pú kwak yɛ̌ mmu, ɛ́twɔ̀ chí nɛ mɛnɛmɛ ntá bo abhɛn bághòk.
215 Nu bɛ́ Mandɛm anjɨŋɨ wɔ ambɔ́ŋ maŋák nɛ wɔ bɛ́ ɔchí nkʉbɛtɨk anɛ apú kway bɛbhɔŋ ntíánwɔ́p, nɛ bɛ́ ɔ̌tɔŋ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ sayri.
216 Kɛ́ chwe ndǔ kɛ́mbwɔ́bhɛ́ ɛkɛ́n kɛ́pú chyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó. Ɛ́nyu kɛ́mbwɔ́bhɛ́ ɛkɔ kɛ́kʉ̀ bo mánsap nɛkɔ nɛ Mandɛm.
217 Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo abhɛn básábhɛ́ nɛkɔ nɛ Mandɛm bátɔ̀ŋ bɛ́chí mbɔ nsak ntá bo abhɛn bɔ́ bátɔ̀ŋ, nɔ chí, mbɔ nsak anɛ ányiɛ mmʉɛt andɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ. Himɛ́neɔs nɛ Filɛ́tɔs báchi mɛnyǔ bo bhɔ.
218 Batí yap ápay bárɔ nɛtɔ́ŋ ɛnɛ́n tɛtɛp bágurɛ ɛbhɨ ndǔ bátɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ Mandɛm anáŋ akʉ bo bápɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Bákʉ kpát mbɔk bho abhɛn mánókó Yesu bápú pɛrɛ noko yi.
219 Kɛ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛchí mbɔ nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́mɨk ɛnɛn baghoko sayri ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ́pú kway mɛnyɨkɨsi nɔ́ kɛ báte ɛkɛt arɛ́. Básɨŋ ndǔ ntay ɛnɛn bápɨ́ arɛ bɛ, “Ɛta Mandɛm arɨ́ŋɨ́ bo abhɛn bachi abhi.” Básɨŋ nkwɔ bɛ, “Yɛ̌ agha anɛ árɛ̀m bɛ achi mmu Acha ándɔ́ bɛbʉ́.”
220 Amɛm ɛkɛt ɛgho puyɛ̌ ndiɛrɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bághókó nɛ pú nɛ ɛbhɛn bághókó nɛ *ɛ́gírí kɛ bɛ́bhak arɛ. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn baghoko nɛ mɛnɔk nɛ ɛbhɛn bághoko nɛ ntɔp bɛ́bhak arɛ́ nkwɔ. Mbɔk mɛnyɨŋ chí ɛbhɛn básɔt mánkʉ ɛnyɨŋ arɛ nɛ kɛnókó. Bɛ́chák chi ɛbhɛn bápu sɔt mankʉ ɛnyɨŋ arɛ nɛ kɛnókó.
221 Ɛnyu yɔ kɛ ɛ́chí nɛ Bǒ nkwɔ́ Yesu. Yɛ̌ agha anɛ árɔ́ bɛbʉ́ akʉ ntɨ ɛni nɛ́mbak amɛm pɛ́pɛ́p, Mandɛm ǎchyɛ yí kɛnókó. Mandɛm ǎkʉ nɔ nɛ yi, mbɔnyunɛ achyɛ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛni nɛnkɛm ntá Mandɛm mmu áchí mbɔŋɔ́kɛt. Ɛnyǔ mmu wu abhɔŋ ntɨ bɛ́kʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ bɛrɨ.
222 Ghɔ́ yɛ bɛ́ ɔfɛ́rɛ́ ntí ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛsak báfyɛ̀ ngoŋo arɛ́. Kʉ ntɨ bɛ́bhak chak bɛsí Mandɛm, nɛ ndu bɛbhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu, nɛ bɛkɔŋ bo báchák. Kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, ɔ́mbak sayri nɛ bo abhɛn bábhɨ̀ŋɨ nnyɛ́n Ɛta nɛ batɨ pɛ́pɛ́p bɛ́ ánkwak bhɔ.
223 Ɔ́kɛ́ chwe ndǔ bɛpʉítí ɛbhɛn bɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ntí nɛ nnɛt. Mɛnyǔ bɛpʉítí bhɔ bɛ́twɔ̀ chi nɛ bɛ́táŋá.
224 Nɛ mǔbɛtok Acha abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ bɛbhak ntaŋ-bɛ́táŋá. Abhɔŋ bɛbhak chi mmǔ anɛ átɔ̀ŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu bɛrɨ̌ntɨ nɛ, abhɔŋ bɛbhak ɛrɨ́tí ntɔ̌ŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm, nɛ ambak mmǔ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ nɛ bǒ abhɛn báchyɛ̀ yi ɛsɔŋɔri.
225 Puyɛ̌ nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ kɛ̌ mǔbɛtok Yesu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́tɔŋ bo abhɛn bápú ka nɛ yi. Mandɛm ǎkwáy bɛ́kʉ bɔ́ mántɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap nɛ mánoko nɛtɔŋ ɛnɛn tɛtɛp.
226 Nɛ mbák mánókó nɛtɔ́ŋ ɛnɛn tɛtɛp, kɛboŋ ɛkap kɛ́kway bɛ́pɛ́tnsɛm nɛ mámfú ndǔ ntá anɛ Satan. Bákwɛn nyaka ndǔ ntá yi mankʉ nɔkɔ chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi áyaŋ bɔ́ mánkʉ.
3
31 Dɨŋɨ́ bɛ́ ndǔ manywɔp anɛ ngwɛnti, bɛyǎ bɛsɔŋɔri bɛ́bhak fá amɨk.
32 Ntí achi bɛ mpok ɛyɔ, bo bákɔŋ mmʉɛt ɛyap máncha, mánkɔŋ nkáp máncha, mámpányu, mámbɔŋ nɛyoŋómʉɛt, mámbak basɔkɔtɨ̌ bho, bɔ́ kɛka bɛghok bachi nɛ manɔ bhap. Nɛ yɛ̌ mmú ankʉ bhɔ́ bɛrɨ ná bákɛ sɔt mbɔ ɛnyɨŋ. Mpok ɛyɔ, bo bákaysi bɛ́ ntí apú anɛ bɔ́ mánɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm ndu bɛ́chyɛ yi kɛnókó.
33 Ndu bɛ́rɔŋ ambɨ, mpok ɛyɔ bo bápu bhɔŋ ɛkɔŋ nɛ batɨ nɛ yɛ̌ chí amɛm manɛrɛ́kɛt, bápu foŋori batɨ. Bárɛm ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti batɨ ndu bɛchɔŋti manyɛ́n ɛyap. Ndǔ mpok ɛyɔ, bo bápú kway bɛkɛm mmʉɛt, kɛ bádù mbɔ nkwɔ kɛbhɔ́ŋ ntínso nɛ batɨ, nɛ bápú kɔŋ ɛrɨ́tɨ́ ɛnyɨŋ.
34 Mpok ɛyɔ, chɔŋ bo mánti batɨ ntá bǒmpap abhap, nɛ mámbak bo tákátáká, nɛ chɔŋ mánkʉ nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ kɛ yambɨ mánsɔt nkaysi arɛ́. Chɔŋ bo mánde yoŋ mmʉɛt nɛ mánkɔŋ mɛ́nyiɛ chi nɛpɛ́m, kɛkɔŋ Mandɛm.
35 Mpok ɛyɔ chɔŋ bo mánde kɔt ngɛpti bɛ báchi bo Mandɛm yɛ̌ndu bábhɨkɨ noko bɛ́ Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛtaŋ bɛ́kʉ bɔ́ mámbak bǒbhi. Kɛ́chɛm ɛkak nɛ mɛnyǔ bo bhɔ.
36 Yɛ̌ nɛ́nɛ, mbɔk yap báchwè ndǔ manɛrɛ́kɛt mándwɔ nɔ́kɔ́ baghɔrɛ́ abhɛn bápu ka bɛkɛm mmʉɛt bɛ mángwákárí bɛkwɛn ndǔ ntǎ bɛbʉ́.
37 Ɛnyǔ baghɔrɛ́ bhɔ bábhɔŋ ɛkwak ndu bɛ́ghɔk mɛnyɨŋ bɛkɔ mpoknkɛm kɛ bápú kwáy bɛbhɔŋ nɛ́jwǐmɛm ndǔ nɛtɔ́ŋ ɛnɛ́n tɛtɛp.
38 Batɔŋɔ́ nse bhɔ bágʉɛti mmʉɛt mǎnchwe ndǔ manɛrɛ́kɛt mánu nɔkɔ bɛ́ bo bákɛ́ noko tɛtɛp Mandɛm. Báchi mbɔ Jánɛs nɛ Jambrɛs bo mánú nyaka bɛ bo bákɛ́ noko mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm átó Moses ángati Mfɔ Íjip. Báchí bǒ bɛbɛ́ptí nkaysi nɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu tɛtɛp.
39 Kɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nkaysi yap abhɔŋ bɛ́kwɛnɛ́kwɛn mbɔnyunɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ǎghɔ chɔŋ ɛchɨŋti yap. Ɛnyu yɔ kɛ ɛ́fákárí nyaka nɛ Jánɛs nɛ mmʉɛrɛ yi Jámbrɛs. 
310 Kɛ wɔ Tímɔti, ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ̌tɔ̀ŋ wɔ, ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛna, ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌kay ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛna, ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ ndu mbɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ Yesu, ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ ndǔ mɛ̌kɛ̀pntɨ, ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ ndu mbɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛkɔŋ nɛ bho, nɛ ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ ndǔ mɛ̌tè kákáti mpok ɛsɔŋɔri.
311 Ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ nkwɔ́ ndǔ bo báre nyok mɛ. Ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn nde bhɔ́ŋ. Ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ ndu báre nyok mɛ amɛm bɛtɔk Antiɔk, nɛ Ikɔ́niɔm nɛ Lístra. Ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ ndé bhɔ́ŋ kɛ Acha Yesu ǎfɛrɛ mɛ ndu bɔ́ mɛnkɛm.
312 Tɛtɛp, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ntɨ bɛbhʉɛ́rɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛni mbɔ ɛnyu Mandɛm áyàŋ ɛ̌ti yi ábhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo, bo báchyɛ́ yi nɛnyok.
313 Kɛ mbák chí bǒ bɛbʉ́ nɛ bǒ bapu bábɛ̀p mándɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ, bárwɔ̀ bho, bo mándwɔ nɔkɔ bhɔ́.
314 Kɛ mbák wɔ Tímɔti, ɔ́kɛ́ rɔ bɛ́kóŋo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bátɔ́ŋɔ́ wɔ nɛ ɔnoko bhɔ́ sayri. Ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ bo abhɛn bátɔ̀ŋ wɔ bhɔ.
315 Ɔ́kɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ́ ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ basɨ́ŋ amɛn áchí amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm tɛ kɛ̌mbɔ́ ɛkɛ. Basɨŋ amɛn achi Nyáŋá ǎkwáy bɛ́kwak wɔ ɔ́mbɔŋ kɛboŋ bɛbhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu Kristo nɛ ɔ́mbɔŋ nɛpɛ́m.
316 Mandɛm kɛ áchyɛ́ nkaysi basɨŋ mankɛm amɛn áchí amɛm Ɛkáti yi. Basɨ̌ŋ ǎkwak ndu bɛtɔŋ bhɛsɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi tɛtɛp nɛ ǎji bhɛsɛ ndu mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛpu sayri ndǔ bapɛm ayɛsɛ. Basɨ̌ŋ ǎkwak mɛnyurɛ bhɛse ndǔ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ ɛbhɛsɛ nɛ ndu bɛtɔŋ bhɛsɛ ɛnyu bɛbhak chak ndǔ bapɛm yɛsɛ.
317 Ɛyɔ ɛ́kwak bɛ mǔbɛtok Mandɛm ánkwáy ndǔ yɛntɨkɨ mbi nɛ bɛ ámbɔ́ŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́yàŋ ndu bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛrɨ́tɨ́ bɛtɨk.
4
41 Tímɔti, nchí sɛmti yɛ wɔ bɛsí Mandɛm nɛ bɛsí Yesu Kristo mmú átaŋ mburɛ bo abhɛn báchi pě nɛ abhɛn bágu ɛwak ɛ́mɔt mpok yi ábhèsi bɛkʉ bo mángɔ bɛ yi achi Mfɔ.
42 Nchí sɛmti wɔ bɛ́ ɔ́ngátí nɔ́kɔ́ bho Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm. Kɛ́rɔ bɛ́ghati bhɔ́. Mpok yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́kɔ̀ sayri, ghati bho. Yɛ̌ chí mpok anɛ mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́pu kɔ sayri, ghatí bhɔ́. Kʉ bo mándɔ bɛbʉ́ bhap. Ji bhɔ́ mandɔ́ bɛbʉ́ bhap. Kɛ fyɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɔ́ ntɨ nkwɔ́. Kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɛ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ nɛ ntɨ bɛtɔŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
43 Nchí sɛmti wɔ, tɔ́ŋ bo Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ mpok ǎtwɔ anɛ bo bápú pɛrɛ kɔŋ bɛghok nɛtɔ́ŋ ɛnɛn tɛtɛp. Mpok yɔ, chɔŋ bo mándɔbhɛ koŋo chí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ́ babhɔŋ bákɔ́ŋɔ́, mánjaŋ batɔŋ abhɛn bátɔ̀ŋ bɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ́nyɨ̀ŋɨ bhɔ batú.
44 Mpok ɛyɔ, chɔŋ bo mándɔ bɛghok tɛtɛp anɛ Mandɛm áyaŋ bo mándɨŋɨ, mándɔbhɛ fyɛ́ ntí bɛ́ghok chí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn batɔŋɔ́ nse bátɔŋ.
45 Kɛ wɔ Tímɔti, yɛ̌ ɛ́mbak ná, kɛ́rɔ bɛbhak nɛ ntɨ amɛm kpák. Yɛ̌ ɔ̌ghɔ ɛsɔŋɔri ná, kɛ́p ntɨ. Kʉ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn ngati Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́, nɛ ɔbhɔŋ bɛkʉ bɛtɨk mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn Mandɛm achyɛ wɔ ɔ́nkʉ.
46 Mbák chí mɛ, nɛpɛ́m ɛna nɛ́naŋ nɛ́rɔ̀ŋ mbɔ nnya anɛ bárɔ̀ŋ bɛchyɛ akap ntá Mandɛm nɛ yɔ. Mandú mpok mɛ̌rɔ mmɨk.
47 Mɛ, nnu sayri. Njɛt, nkóŋó barak Mandɛm tɛ ndǔ ngwɛntí nkɛ kɛmɛ mmʉɛt ansɛm.
48 Nɛ́nɛ, nsáy ǎnoŋ mɛ. Nsáy yɔ, Yesu Acha mmu achí ntaŋá manyé kɛ áchyɛ̀ mburɛ mɛ yɔ́ ndǔ ɛwak ɛnɛ yi ápɛtnsɛm. Yi achi chak bɛsí Mandɛm. Nɛ nsáy yɔ apu chí ntá ya mɛ awánti. Achí ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ anɛ ánòŋ nɛpɛrɛ́nsɛm Yesu nɛ maŋák. 
49 Nu bɛ́twɔ, kɛ́chɔŋti mpok.
410 Démas achɛn mɛ arɔ́, arɔŋ ɛtɔk Tɛsalónika mbɔnyunɛ akɔŋ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk. Krésens arɔŋ Galéshia, arɔŋ Táytɔs, nɛ Damátia.
411 Ndiɛrɛ Lukas kɛ áchi nɛ mɛ. Mpok ɔ́yaŋ bɛ́twɔ, sɔt Mák twɔ́ nɛ yi mbɔnyunɛ ǎkwak chɔŋ mɛ fá.
412 Ntó Tíkíkɔs andɔk Ɛ́fɛsɔs.
413 Fʉɛ́t Troas sɔt nkú mbʉ̌ɛ́p ya anɛ ndɔ́ ntá Kápɔs. Sɔt bɛkáti ɛbha nkwɔ́, sayri sayri nkúbhɛ́ nnya nɛ́nɛ́p ɛnɛ́ básɨ́ŋɨ́ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm arɛ́.
414 Bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛn Aleksánda ntɛnátɛn ákʉ́ mɛ bɛ́yǎ bɛcha. Kɛ chɔŋ Acha Yesu anchyɛ yi nsáy ndu bɛbʉ́ ɛbhi.
415 Yi abhɨkɨ yaŋ nyaka bɛghok Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛnɛ sɛ̌ghàti bho wáwák. Wɔ mbɔŋ ɔbhɔŋ bɛ́kɛm mmʉɛt nɛ yi.
416 Ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ mbɨ ɛnɛ́n nchwé amɛm áchá manyé bɛ ntáŋá mmʉɛt, yɛ̌ mmu apú nyaka nɛ mɛ. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu abʉɛ́ mɛ. Mandɛm ámfóŋóri bhɔ́.
417 Bǒ mankɛm bábʉɛ mɛ, kɛ Yesu Acha abhɨkɨ rɔ mɛ. Achi nɛ mɛ mpoknkɛm ankwaka nɔkɔ mɛ ndu áchyɛ mɛ bɛtaŋ bɛ́gháti bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ yi. Ngátí bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ nkɛm bɛ́ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl mángók. Yesu afɛ́rɛ́ mɛ ndu nɛwú nkwɔ, afɛrɛ mɛ anyǔ nkʉ.
418 Chɔŋ Yesu Acha amfɛrɛ mɛ ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbɛ́pti ɛnyɨŋ, ampɛmɛ mɛ bɛ́ mbák amfay nɛ yí mmu achí Mfɔ bo Mandɛm. Kɛnókó kɛ́mbák nɛ yi mpoknkɛm, Amen. 
419 Kaká mɛ Príska nɛ Akwíla. Kaká ɛfo ɛnɛ́ Ɔnɛsifórɔs nkwɔ́.
420 Ɛrástɔs arɔp ɛtɔk Kɔ́rint. Ndɔ́ Trofímɔs ɛtɔk Milɛ́tɔs mbɔnyunɛ ǎme.
421 Nu bɛ́twɔ ndǔ mpok anɛ mbaŋ ábhɨ́kɨ́ re bho bɛ́kwɛn tontó. Nɔ́ chí ndǔ mpok nnɛ́m nɛbháŋ. Ɛbúlɔs nɛ Púdɛns nɛ Láinɔs nɛ Kláúdia nɛ bo nkwɔ́ Yesu báchak fá Rom báto wɔ bakak.
422 Yesu Acha ámbák nɛ wɔ. Bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm mɛ́mbák nɛ be mankɛm.4
1
11 Mɛ Pɔ̌l, nkʉbɛtɨk Mandɛm nɛ mǔnto Yesu Kristo kɛ nchi nsɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Bɛtɨk ɛbha chí bɛ́kwak bo abhɛn Mandɛm áyábhɛ́ bɛ́ mámbák abhi bɛ mánsɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ nɛ Yesu sayri, nɛ bɛ́kʉ bɔ́ mándɨŋɨ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛnɛ Yesu átɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka. Ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kʉ̀ bo mámbʉrɛ bapɛ́m ayap mbɔ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm áyàŋ.
12 Ɛ́nkʉ mámbaka ntɨ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti. Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp ɛ̌ti nɛpɛmɛ́ nɔ tɛndǔ nɛbhǒnɛt, nɛ Mandɛm ápú sense.
13 Mpok Mandɛm anɛ ápɛmɛ bhɛsɛ́ afyɛ́ ákwáy nɔkɔ, akʉ bo mándɨŋɨ ɛ̌ti nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ́n bɛ́fʉɛ́t ndu Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ Yesu anɛ yi afyɛ́ amɔ́ya bɛ ngati bho.
14 Táytɔs, ɔ́chí mɔ́wa mbɔnyunɛ ɔbhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu mbɔ mɛ. Mandɛm mmu achi Ɛta nɛ Yesu Kristo Mpɛmɛ ywɛsɛ mántɔŋ wɔ bɛrɨ̌ndu, manchyɛ wɔ kpák. 
15 Ntí anɛ ndɔ́ wɔ Krɛt chí bɛ ɔ́nyábhɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́rɔ́bhɛ́ mɛ́nyábhɛ arɛ́, nɛ bɛ ɔ́mfyɛ́ bǒ batí bɛkɛrɛ́ Mandɛm ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛtɔkɔ́ Krɛt. Kʉ nɔ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔnyu ngátí wɔ.
16 Mǔnti chí mmu anɛ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛ́pu nɛ yi, abhɔŋ bɛ́bhɔ́ŋ chi ngɔrɛ́ amɔt, chí mmu anɛ bɔ̌bhi mánókó nɛ mmu apú kwáy bɛ́ji bhɔ́ bɛ́ bábhɨkɨ bhɔ́ŋ kɛnókó nɛ máyap nɛ ɛtayap.
17 Tɛ̌ndu mǔnti bo Mandɛm chí mmu anɛ Mandɛm áchyɛ́ bɛtɨk ɛbhi nta yi, bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ bɛ́bhak nɛ yi, abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ bɛ́bhak mmǔ mpányu, abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ bɛ́bhak mmu ɛchókóntɨ, abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ bɛ́bhak nnyǔmɛ́m, abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ bɛ́bhak mmu anɛ átɔ̀ŋ bɛtaŋ, abhɔŋ bɛ́bhak chí sayri nɛ bho. Abhɔŋ nkwɔ́ bɛ́bhak mmu anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ ngoŋó nkáp nɛ apú kʉ bapu ɛ̌ti nkáp.
18 Mmǔ ntí bo Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛbhak mmu anɛ ásɔ̀t mankɔ sayri, mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ maŋák bɛkʉ bɛrɨ, mmǔ anɛ ákɛ̀m mmʉɛt sayri, mmǔ anɛ áchí chak bɛsí Mandɛm bɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛni nɛ bo báchák. Abhɔŋ bɛbhak nyáŋá, nɛ mmǔ ntɨ ɛnɛn nɛpu to yi ankʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́twɔ̀ yi nɛ áyɔ́mɛ.
19 Nɛ bɛ́rɔ́ŋ ndu ngwɛ́nti, mǔnti bo Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛ́kɛ́m Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu nɛ bɛtaŋ mbɔ ndu sɛ́tɔ́ŋ. Mbok yɔ́ achí tɛtɛp nɛ ɛnyumɔt mpoknkɛm. Ɛyɔ ɛ́kwàk mǔnti ámfyɛ́ bo ntɨ ndu átɔ̀ŋ bhɔ, ɛ́mpɛt ɛ́nkwak yi ányúrɛ́ bo abhɛn bátɔ̀ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́pú ndɔ́ŋ ámɔ́t nɛ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
110 Nchí rɛm nɔ mbɔnyunɛ, bɛyǎ bo bátɔ̀ŋ nɛtaŋántɨ, sayri sayri mbɔk bo Israɛl abhɛn mánóko mbok Yesu Kristo. Bárɛ̀m mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ntí nɛ nnɛt nɛ bárwɔ̀ bo bɛ mánókó kɛ́mbwɔ́bhɛ́ kap.
111 Ɔ́bhɔ̌ŋ bɛkʉ bǒbhɔ́ mánchók manyu yap. Bátɔ̀ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bábhɨkɨ bhɔ́ŋ bɛtɔŋ, mánchɔŋti nɔkɔ batí bo mankɛm ndǔ mbɔk manɛrɛ́kɛt bɛ mándɔ́ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu. Bákʉ̀ nɔ, chi bɛsɔt bakáp ntá bho, ɛnɛ́ ɛyɔ chí ɛnyɨŋɨ́ ntíánwɔ́p.
112 Mbɔ̌ŋ mmu Krɛt wap amɔt, anɛ básɔ́rɛ́ mbɔ ndɨŋɨndak arɛm ɛ̌ti yap tɛntɛp bɛ, “Bǒ Krɛt báchí basěnsi mpoknkɛm! Báchi nyǎbhɨ, bábhɔ̀t abhɔt, mányiɛ nɔkɔ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ ngoŋo.”
113 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mmu wu árɛ́mɛ́ ɛ̌ti bǒ ɛtɔk ɛyi Krɛt ɛ́chí tɛtɛp. Ɔbhɔŋ yɛ bɛghati bhɔ sayri bɛ mándɔ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bhap. Kʉ nɔ bɛ mankɛm Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm nɛ bɛtaŋ,
114 mámfɛrɛ ntí ndu bakǎy bapu amɛn bo Israɛl nɛ ndǔ bɛbhé ɛbhɛ́n bo abhɛn bápú koŋo Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ Yesu báfyɛ́.
115 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́rɨ ntá mmu anɛ ntɨ ɛni nɛ́chi pɛ́pɛ́p, kɛ ntá mmu anɛ ntɨ ɛni nɛ́pú pɛ́pɛ́p nɛ abhɨkɨ noko Yesu, ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́rɨrɨ ɛpu. Bɛ́rɛm tɛtɛp, nkaysi yap nɛ batɨ̌ yap ánáŋ áchɔ́ŋɔ amɛm.
116 Bárɛ̀m bɛ́ bárɨŋɨ Mandɛm, kɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɔ́ bákʉ̀ bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ́ bábhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ yi. Bábɛp báchá, bátàŋ ntí nɛ Mandɛm, nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bɔ́ bákwày bɛ́kʉ ɛ́pú.
2
21 Kɛ wɔ Táytɔs, ɔbhɔŋ bɛtɔŋ bo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́kɔ̀ ndɔŋ amɔt nɛ nɛtɔ́ŋ ɛnɛ́n tɛtɛp.
22 Ghatí baséansi abhɛn babhakanɛm bɛ mándɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛkɛm mmʉɛt nɛ bɛ mámbʉrɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnap ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ bo báchyɛ̀ bhɔ kɛnókó. Ghatí bhɔ bɛ bábhɔŋ bɛtɔŋ bɛ bábhɔ̌ŋ kɛboŋ, mánkɛm baraká Mandɛm ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ ɛ́yàŋ nɛ bɛ bábhɔŋ bɛbhɔŋ ɛkɔŋ nɛ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ.
23 Ghatí baséansi baghɔrɛ́ nkwɔ bɛ mambʉrɛ bapɛ́m yap ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ átɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ báchyɛ̀ Mandɛm kɛnókó. Bǎkɛ́ rɛm ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti batɨ nɛ bǎkɛ́ bhak manyǔmɛ́m. Tɔ́ŋ bo báchák bɛ́kʉ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ.
24 Tɔ́ŋ yɛ̌ nɛŋɔkɔ́ baghɔrɛ́ abhɛn bákòŋo bhɔ́ ansɛm bɛ mánkɔŋ manɛ́m abhap nɛ bɔ̌bhap.
25 Kwak bɔ mámbak mbɔ bo abhɛn babhɔŋɔ kɛboŋ nɛ bákɛ̀mʉɛt bɛ bákɛ́ fu nɛfí. Bǎbhɔŋ bɛtɔŋ bhɔ bɛ mándɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyu bákɛm bɛkɛt ɛbhap mántɔŋ ɛrɨ́tí ɛpɨŋ ntá bo abhɛn bachi arɛ, nɛ bɛ mámbɔ́ŋ nɛsɛptǐmʉɛt nɛ manɛ́m abhap. Mámbák ɛnyu yɔ bɛ yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ kwáy bɛrɛm ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
26 Ghatí bɛsakábho sayri bɛ mántɔ́ŋ bɛ bábhɔŋ kɛboŋ nɛ bɛ mándɨ́ŋɨ́ ndu bákɛ̀m mmʉɛt.
27 Wɔmbɔŋ tɔ́ŋ bɔ́ ɛrɨ́tí ɛpɨŋ. Kʉ nɔ́kɔ́ chí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛrɨ. Mpok ɔ́tɔ̀ŋ bɔ, kʉ mándɨŋɨ bɛ́ ɔ̌chyɛ chi Mandɛm kɛnókó nɛ bɛ ɔ̌kwàk bɔ kwak. Kʉ bɔ́ mándɨŋɨ bɛ ɔ̌kʉ̀ sayri.
28 Bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛ bɛbhɔŋ bɛbhák ɛbhɛn bɛ́kʉ̀ manyu ánchók bo nɛ ntíánwɔ́p ámbák nɛ bo abhɛ́n bápú ka nɛ wɔ ndu bábhɨkɨ bhɔŋ mbi bɛrɛm ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ.
29 Ghatí bo abhɛn báchí basɛm bɛ ɛ́rɨ mángók nɔkɔ bachi bhap ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ. Ɛrɨ bɛ mámbɔŋ ntɨ bɛkʉ bachi bhap mámbɔŋ maŋák nɛ bhɔ mpoknkɛm nɛ bɛ bákɛ́ kɛmɛ bhɔ ɛyɔŋ anyu.
210 Bákɛ́ sɔt mɛnyɨŋɨ́ bachi bhap ansɛm ansɛm. Bábhɔŋ bɛtɔŋ bachi bhap bɛ báchi bo bɛsɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ bhɔ sayri. Ɛpɨŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ̀ bɔ mántɔŋ ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bákʉ̀ bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bátɔ́ŋ bɔ ɛ̌ti Mandɛm mmu ápɛ̀mɛ bhɛsɛ bɛrɨ, ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ bo bachak bákway bɛbhɔŋ ɛkwak bɛ́kóŋo bhɔ.
211 Ntí anɛ bo bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́bhʉrɛ bapɛm ayap ɛnyu ɛyɔ chi bɛ Mandɛm atɔ̌ŋ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi ndu áchyɛ́ mbi anɛ bo mankɛm bákway bɛfʉɛt arɛ, yi ampɛmɛ bhɔ.
212 Bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm ɛbhɛn bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bhɛsɛ bɛ sɛ́ndɔ́ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo abhɛn bábhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ Mandɛm bákʉ̀, bɛ́ sɛ́ndɔ́ bɛfyɛ ngoŋo ndu mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk ɛbhɛn bɛ́chyɛ̀ bo maŋák fá amɨk. Bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ nkwɔ bɛ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛsɛ fá amɨk, sɛbhɔŋ bɛ́rɨŋɨ ndu sɛ́kɛ̀mmʉɛt bɛ́kʉ chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chí chak bɛsí Mandɛm nɛ bɛbhʉɛrɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛsɛ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm áyàŋ.
213 Ndu sɛ́kʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ, sɛ́bháká ntɨ ndu ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛrɨ ɛcha. Sɛ́bhaka ntɨ bɛ kɛnɛ́m ɛkɛn kɛbhesi chɔŋ nɛ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm ywɛsɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo Mmu ápɛ̀mɛ bhɛsɛ.
214 Yesu achyɛ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛni bɛ́fɛ́rɛ bhɛsɛ ndǔ bɛtaŋá bɛbʉ́ mɛnkɛm nɛ ndu bɛso batɨ ywɛsɛ. Akʉ nɔ, bɛ sɛ́mbák bǒbhi yímbɔŋ, nɔ chi bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛyǎ ɛkwak bɛkʉ chi bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ.
215 Tɔ́ŋ yɛ bo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn. Fíɛ́ bhɔ́ ntɨ nɛ ghatí bhɔ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bhap. Kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ́ wɔ mɛnkɛm. Ɔ́kɛ́ rɔ yɛ̌ mmu ámbyák wɔ.
3
31 Táytɔs, ghatí bakoŋo Yesu bɛ mámbɔŋ nɛsɛptǐmʉɛt nta bo bati ɛtɔk nɛ bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ amfay yap. Bákɛ́ tɔ́ŋ nɛtaŋántɨ nɛ bɛ́ ɛ́mbák wɨkɨrɨk nta yap bɛ́kʉ bɛtɨk nɛ ntɨ nɛmɔt.
32 Ghatí bhɔ́ bɛ mmu ákɛ́ rɛm ndak abʉ́abʉ ɛ̌ti ntɨ, nɛ bɛ mánchɔ́kɔ́ sayri nɛ batɨ, mámbak ndu kpak nɛ batɨ. Ɛrɨ mámbɔ́ŋ nɛsɛptímʉɛt bɛsí bo mankɛm.
33 Ghatí bhɔ́ ɛnyu yɔ́ mbɔnyunɛ ndǔ mpok anɛ áfúɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm, bɛsɛ babhɔŋ sɛ́chí nyaka amɨ́k nɛ́mɛ́ nɛ́mɛ́ ndǔ baraka Mandɛm. Sɛ́tàŋ nyaka ntí. Nɛ bo bárwɔ̀ nyaka bhɛsɛ sɛ́nkʉ́ nɔkɔ bɛbʉ́. Sɛ́bhák ndǔ kɛsɛmɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmʉɛt ɛyɛsɛ ɛ́nŋwaka bɛ́ sɛ́nkʉ. Sɛ́kaysi nyaka bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bɛ́chyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ maŋák. Sɛ́kʉ̀ nyaka bɛbʉ́ nɛ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋ mpap amɨ́k. Bo bápàp nyaka bhɛsɛ, bɛsɛ́ nkwɔ sɛ́mpap nɔkɔ batɨ.
34 Kɛ Mandɛm Mpɛmɛ ywɛsɛ́ átɔ́ŋ nɔkɔ bhɛsɛ́ bɛrɨ̌ntɨ ɛbhi nɛ ɛkɔŋ ɛyi,
35 apɛmɛ bhɛsɛ. Ɛ́pú nyaka chí bɛ sɛ́kʉ̀ bɛrɨtí mɛnyɨŋ, chi ɛ̌ti ntínso ɛni. Apɛ́mɛ́ bhɛsɛ́ ndu ákʉ́ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ yi áfɛ́rɛ́ bhɛsɛ́ bɛbʉ́ antɨ, akʉ sɛ́rɔp chí bo bakɔ abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛpɛ́m nɛkɔ.
36 Mandɛm anɛ, apɛrɛ́ chyɛ mmu ɛnyɨŋ, ǎchyɛ kɛrɔ mbɔk ansɛm, achyɛ bɛsɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ tontó bɛfʉɛt ntá Mɔ́ywi, Yesu Kristo Mpɛmɛ ywɛsɛ́,
37 bɛ ankʉ sɛmbak chak bɛsí Mandɛm ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi. Akʉ nɔ bɛ́ sɛmbak bɔ̌bhi, sɛ́mbáká ntɨ bɛ chɔŋ sɛmbɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
38 Mɛnyɨŋ ɛ́bhɛn ngátí nɛ́ wɔ bɛ́chí tɛtɛp. Nchi yaŋ yɛ bɛ ɔ́ngáti bo abhɛn mánoko Mandɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sayri bɛ mámfyɛ́ ntí bɛ́kʉ bɛrɨ. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́rɨ tontó nɛ bɛ́kwàk yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu.
39 Kɛ ɔbhɨkɨ bhɔ́ŋ bɛ́kɛm kɛfě nɛ bo ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́bhɨkɨ bhɔ́ŋ ntí nɛ nnɛt, nɛ ɛ̌ti manyɛ́n bachǐmbɨ. Kɛ́ táŋ nɛ bho ɛ̌ti bɛbhé ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ nyaka Moses. Bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ apú kwak yɛ̌ mmu, nɛ bɛ́bɛp tontó.
310 Ghatí mmu anɛ átwɔ̀ nɛ ákɔ́rɛ́ ándɔ́ barak ákɔ́rɛ́., Mbák ɔ́ngátí yí ndɔŋ amɔt, ndɔŋ ɛ́pay, abhɨkɨ ghók, fɛrɛ́ nti nɛ yi.
311 Ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ nkaysi ɛnyǔ mmu wu apú chak. Ǎkʉ bɛbʉ́ mpǒknkɛm nɛ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhi bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛ́chí nɛ yi.
312 Mɛ̌tò wɔ mmu awu. Mbák ɛ́pú Atɛ́mas, chɔŋ ɛ́mbak Tíkíkɔs. Nɛghɔ́ anɛ ɔ́ghɔ́ mmu wap, ɔ́kɛ́ nɔ́k bɛ́twɔ ayak ndu bɛtɛmɛri mɛ ɛtɔk Nikópolis. Arɛ́ kɛ̌ mɛ̌bhák mpok manyiɛp áyá nɛ mbǎŋ ǎkwɛn tontó.
313 Mpok Sɛ́nas ntaŋá manyé nɛ Apólos báté bɛ́rɔ́ŋ nɛkɔ, kʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ bɛ́ghɔ bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́bhɨkɨ chɛp bɔ́ ndǔ nɛkɔ ɛnap.
314 Bǒ bhɛsɛ chi bǒ Mandɛm nɛ bábhɔŋ bɛ́fyɛ ntí ndu bɛkʉ bɛrɨ, bɛ́ ɛ́kɛ́ be bhɔ mmʉɛt bɛ́kwak bo abhɛn ɛyap ɛ́pú. Bákɛ́ bhák mbɔ mmu anɛ ápú kʉ bɛrɨ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛni.
315 Bo abhɛn báchi fá nɛ mɛ bátó wɔ bakak. Kaká bǒ nkwɔ́ abhɛn bákɔ́ŋ bhɛsɛ́ nɛ manoko ɛnyumɔt mbɔ bɛsɛ. Mandɛm ántɔ́ŋ bé bɛrɨ̌ndu.
1
1 Mɛ Pɔ̌l, mǔkɛnɔŋ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo kɛ nchí sɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Nchí fá nɛ mɔ́mayɛsɛ Tímɔti. Filɛmɔn, nchí sɨŋ ntá yɛ anɛ ɛkɔŋ, nɛ ntɨ nkʉbɛtɨk ywɛsɛ.
2 Kaká mɔmáyɛsɛ Afia, nɛ Akipɔs, ntɨ ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu Yesu mbɔ bhɛsɛ, nɛ ɔ́nkaka bǒnkwɔ abhɛn báchɛ̀m nɔkɔ ɛkɛt ɛyɛ ndu mɛnɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm.
3 Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha mántɔ́ŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu mánchyɛ be kpák.
4 Filɛmɔn, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ mɛ̌nɨ̀kmʉɛt nchí kaka Mandɛm ɛ̌ti yɛ,
5 mbɔnyunɛ nchí ghok ɛ̌ti ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ bo Mandɛm, nɛ ɛnyu ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ Yesu Acha.
6 Nɛ nchí nɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm bɛ ɔ́nchɛ́m mmʉɛt nɛ batɨ̌ bǒnkwɔ ɔ́ndɔ́k nɔ́kɔ́ chi ambɨ, nɛ bɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́nkwak wɔ ɔ́ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ ndu sɛbharɛ mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo.
7 Manɔ́, ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛkɔŋ nɛ batǐ bǒnkwɔ ɛ́chyɛ̀ mɛ bɛyǎ maŋák nɛ nɛpɔptǐntɨ́ tontó mbɔnyunɛ ɔ́kʉ́ batɨ̌ bo Mandɛm mankɛm ataŋ amɛm.
8 Ndu mbárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo, nchí kway bɛghati wɔ ɔ́nkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ.
9 Yɛ̌ nɔ, ɛ̌ti ɛkɔŋ, mɛ Pɔ̌l, mmǔ nsensi nɛ mǔkɛnɔŋ nɛ́nɛ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo, nchí nɨk wɔ chi mmʉɛt.
10 Nchí nɨkmʉɛt ntá yɛ ɛ̌ti mɔ́wa Ɔnɛ́simɔs mmu ndɔ́bhɛ́ ɛtayi fá amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ.
11 Ndǔ mpok anɛ áfʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm, apú nyaka yɛ̌nyɨŋ ntá yɛ, kɛ nɛ́nɛ achí mmu anɛ ákway bɛkwak wɔ, nɛ ǎkwáy bɛkwak mɛ nkwɔ.
12 Nchí to yi ampɛtnsɛm ntá yɛ, nɛ ɛchi mbɔ bɛ ntɨ ɛna kɛ mɛ̌tò nɔ ntá yɛ.
13 Mbʉ́ nkɔŋ bɛ yi andɔp fá ánkwáká nɔ́kɔ́ mɛ ndǔ kɛnɔŋ ɛkɛ́nɛ nchí arɛ ɛ̌ti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́. Mbʉ yi arɔp fá bɛkwak mɛ ndǔ ntí ywɛ.
14 Kɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ yaŋ bɛkʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́bhɨ́kɨ́ chyɛ mɛ bɛtaŋ bɛ nkʉ. Ɛ́rɨ bɛ́ bɛrɨ ɛbhɛn ɔ́kʉ̀ mɛ́mfú chi wɔmbɔŋ antɨ, kɛbhak bɛ mɛ̌jirɛ wɔ jirɛ.
15 Ngufú, ɛ́fákárí nyaka bɛ Onɛ́simɔs ándɔ́ wɔ ndu mɔ́mbɨŋɨ́ mpok chi bɛ ámpɛ́tnsɛm ntá yɛ ndu nté anɛ yi ákway bɛbhak nɛ wɔ mpoknkɛm.
16 Yi apɛt apu chi ndiɛrɛ nsɛm. Acha nsɛm nɛ́nɛ. Arɔp chi ntɨ manɔ́ anɛ ɔ́kwáy bɛkɔŋ. Nkɔŋ yi tontó, kɛ ɔbhɔ̌ŋ mbɔŋ bɛkɔŋ yi ɛncha ɛnyu ɛnɛ nkɔ́ŋɔ́ yi. Achí nsɛm aywɛ, apɛt abhak ntɨ manɔ́ ntá yɛ ndu ábhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Acha mbɔ wɔ.
17 Ndu ɛchi nɔ, mbák ɔsɔt mɛ mbɔ ntɨ nkʉbɛtɨk Kristo, yi ánáŋ ántwɔ́ awu, syɛpti yi nɛ maŋák nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu ɔ́syɛpti nɔkɔ mɛ.
18 Yɛ̌ ákʉ́ wɔ chi ɛnyɨŋ, yɛ̌ ǎkɛ̀m wɔ chi barɛm, fyɛ́ mɔ́ ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛna.
19 Mɛmbɔ̌ŋ Pɔ̌l kɛ nchí sɨŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ nɛ awɔ́ wa bɛ́ chɔŋ ńkwɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ barɛm amɛn Ɔnɛ́simɔs ákɛ̀m wɔ. Nɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ yaŋ bɛrɛm bɛ ɔ̌kɛ̀m mɛ barɛm nkwɔ, nɛ barɛmɛ́ mɔ chi nɛpɛ́m nɛkɔ ɛnɛ.
20 Manɔ́, kʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ntá ya ndu nnyɛ́n Yesu Acha. Kʉ mbɔ ntɨ mmǔ Kristo bɛ ntɨ nɛ́mpɔ́p mɛ amɛm.
21 Ndu nchí sɨŋ ɛkáti-nɛ, mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛcháy nɛ wɔ mbɔnyunɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ chɔŋ ɔ́nkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ́yàŋ wɔ ɔ́nkʉ, nɛ ɔ́nkʉ mbɔŋ ɛncha ɛnyu ɛnɛ mɛ́yàŋ.
22 Mpɛt nchí yaŋ bɛ ɔ́ngoko mɔ́kɛt ɔmbʉrɛ ntá ya. Nnókó bɛ́ chɔŋ Mandɛm angók nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛnɛka, ankʉ ńtwɔ awu. 
23 Ɛpáfras, ntɨ mǔkɛnɔŋ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo ǎtò wɔ bakak.
24 Mák nɛ Arístakɔs nɛ Demas nɛ Lukas, batɨ̌ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk Mandɛm, bátò bhe bakak nkwɔ́.
25 Bɛrɨ̌ndu Yesu Kristo Acha mɛ́mbak nɛ bhe.
1
11 Ndǔ mpok anɛ áfʉɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm, Mandɛm ǎfʉ̀ɛt nyaka ntá barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ bhi ndu bɛrɛm kɛpɨ ntá bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ. Akʉ́ nɔ ndɔŋ nɛ ndɔŋ nɛ ndǔ bɛyǎ babhi.
12 Kɛ ndǔ manywɔp anɛ ɛchɔŋ, anɛ́ achí kɛkwɔt nɛ ngwɛnti mmɨk, afʉɛ́t chi ntá Mɔ́ywi kɛ ǎrɛ̀m kɛpɨ ntá yɛsɛ. Yí kɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ bɛ́ ámbák mmu anɛ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛbhak ɛbhi. Nɛ afʉɛ́t chí ntá yi kɛ ǎghoko yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ.
13 Yí amʉ́ɛ́t kɛ̌ kɛnɛ́m Mandɛm kɛ́tɔ̀ŋ kpoŋoroŋ nɛ ɛnyǔ mmu Mandɛm achi, nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyu mmu wu kɛ yi achi. Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi ɛbhɔŋ bɛtaŋ nɛ yɔ kɛ yi ásɔ̀t bɛkɛm mmɨk nkɛm. Mpok yi ánáŋá bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ Mandɛm amfoŋori bɛbʉ́ bho bɛ mámbák pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí bhi, akó amfay achɔkɔ ɛbhě awɔ́nɛm Mandɛm mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm.
14 Ndu ɛchi nɔ, Mandɛm akʉ bɛ́ Mɔ́ywi ánchá bɔángɛl nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ nnyɛ́n ɛnɛn yi áchyɛ́ yi nɛcha ɛnɛn bɔángɛl.
15 Yɛ̌ ángɛl apú anɛ Mandɛm ághátí yi bɛ, “Wɔ, ɔchí Mɔ́wa, nɛ ɛchɔŋ nchí rɛm bɛ ndɔp Ɛtayɛ.” Nɛ yɛ̌ chí bɛ́rɛ́m bɛ, “Chɔŋ mbak Ɛtayi nɛ ɔ́mbak Mɔ́wa”, abhɨ́kɨ́ rɛm ntá bɔángɛl.
16 Nɛ yɛ̌ chí mpok Mandɛm átó Mmɔ̌ mbɨ ywi fá amɨk, arɛm chí bɛ́ bɔángɛl abhi mankɛm mánchyɛ́ Mɔ́ywi kɛnókó.
17 Ɛ̌ti bɔángɛl, yi ǎrɛ̀m bɛ́ ákʉ̀ bɔ mambak mbɔ mbʉ́ɛ́p, ákʉ̀ bǒ bɛtok abhi mámbák mbɔ bárɨ́-ngo.
18 Kɛ ntá Mɔ́ywi arɛm chi bɛ, “Ɛ̌ Mandɛm, kɛfɔ ɛkɛ kɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti. Mpok ɔ́kɛ̀m bǒbhɛ, ɔ́kʉ̀ nɔ ɛnyu ɛnɛ ɛchí chak.
19 Ɔkɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛchí chak nɛ ɔpap ɛpɨŋ ɛnɛ bo bapu bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé. Mɛ Mandɛm ywɛ nkʉ yɛ wɔ ɔ́mbɔ́ŋ maŋák mbɔnyunɛ nchyɛ́ wɔ kɛnókó ɛkɛ́n kɛ́chá ɛkɛn mamʉɛrɛ bhɛ mankɛm.”
110 Mandɛm apɛt arɛm ntá Mɔ́ywi bɛ, “Wɔ, Acha, kɛ ɔ́ghókó mmɨk ndǔ nɛbhǒnɛt. Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi amfay, chí awɔ-bɛtɨk aywɛ.
111 Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm bɛ́fʉɛ̀rɛ fʉɛt, kɛ wɔ ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti. Chɔŋ bɔ́ mɛnkɛm mɛ́nkɔk mɛndɔp mbɔ bɛsɨ ndɛn.
112 Chɔŋ ɔ́mpɛt bhɔ́ ɔ́mfɛrɛ mbɔ bɛsɨ́ ndɛn ɛbhɛn mmu áwùpsi, kɛ wɔ ɔchí ɛnyumɔt mpoknkɛm, nɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.”
113 Kɛ ntɨkɨ ángɛl Mandɛm ánáŋ ághátí yi bɛ, “Chɔkɔ́ fá ɛbhě awɔ́nɛm awa kpatɛ nkʉ bǒmpap abhɛ mándɔp mbɔ ɛnɔk ɛnɛ ɔ́nyàŋa bɛkak arɛ?”
114 Pú bɔ́ mankɛm bachi chi bɛfóŋó ɛbhɛn bɛ́kʉ̀ bɛtɨk ɛbhi nɛ Mandɛm átò bhɔ bɛ mankwak bǒ abhɛn yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛpɛmɛ?
2
21 Ndu ɛchi yɛ̌ nɔ, sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛsɔt mpok sɛ́mbʉrɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́náŋ sɛ́ghɔ́kɔ́ bɛ sɛ́kɛ́ rɔ bhɔ sɛnɛm ɛbhɨ.
22 Tɛ̌ndu mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔángɛl barɛmɛ bɛchi nyaka tɛtɛp, nɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ abhɨkɨ bhʉɛrɛ bhɔ nɛ mmu anɛ átàŋ ntí, abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka ntɛmsi anɛ ákwáy nɛ yi,
23 ná sɛ́kwày bɛbʉɛ ntɛmsi anɛ átwɔ̀ mbák sɛ́mbyak ɛrɛmɛ́ nɛpɛmɛ anɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ bɛ́pɛ́mɛ́ bhɛsɛ? Mbɔŋ Yesu Acha kɛ áyámbɨ bɛrɛm kpoŋoroŋ ɛ̌ti nɛpɛmɛ anɛ Mandɛm ápɛ̀mɛ bho, kɛ bo abhɛn bághókó bákʉ bɛsɛ sɛndɨŋɨ bɛ ɛchi tɛtɛp.
24 Mandɛm are tɔ́ŋ bɛrɨŋ, ankʉ nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu ndu bɛtɔŋ nkwɔ bɛ́ bɛchí tɛtɛp. Are fʉɛ́t nkwɔ ndǔ akap anɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ áchyɛ̀ bho, bɛ́kóŋo nkaysi yi.
25 Puyɛ̌ ntá bɔángɛl kɛ Mandɛm áchyɛ́ bɛtaŋ amfay mmɨk anɛ sɛ́rɛ̀m nɛ́ bɛ ǎtwɔ̀ ansɛm.
26 Básɨŋ nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́fu amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ, “Mandɛm Acha, nkwǎŋwaŋ chí agha anɛ ɔ́re kaysi yi? Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm chi agha anɛ ɔ́re fyɛ ntí nɛ yi?
27 Ndǔ mɔ́mbɨŋɨ́ mpok, ɔsɛ́ptí yi bɛ bɔángɛl máncha yi. Ɔkʉ yɛ yí ámbɔ́ŋ kɛnɛ́m nɛ kɛnókó mbɔ mfɔ.
28 Ɔchyɛ́ yi bɛtaŋ amfǎy yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ.” Bɛrɛm bɛ báchyɛ yi bɛtaŋ amfǎy yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɔp ɛnɛ ɛpu antɛnɛ́-yi. Kɛ sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ re ghɔ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛchi antɛnɛ́-yi.
29 Kɛ sɛ́ghɔ̀ Yesu mmu bákʉ́ bɔángɛl máncha yi ndǔ mɔ́mbɨŋɨ mpok. Báchyɛ́ yi kɛnɛ́m nɛ kɛnókó mbɔ mfɔ ɛ̌ti ɛsɔŋɔri nɛwú. Chi ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm kɛ yi ágú ɛ̌ti bo mankɛm.
210 Mandɛm kɛ ághókó yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛchi ntá yi. Ndu áyàŋ nyaka bɛ bɛyǎ bho mámbɔ́ŋ mbi bɛbhak bɔ̌bhi nɛ mámbɔŋ kɛnɛ́m, ɛrɨ nyaka bɛ yi mmu ánɛ́nɛ́ bhɔ mbǐ wu ámfʉɛ́t ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri bɛ ankwáy ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi mbɔ mmǔ anɛ ákʉ̀ bɔ mámbɔŋ nɛpɛ́m.
211 Yesu mmu ákʉ̀ bo mambák pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm abhɔŋ chi amɔt nɛ bo abhɛn yi ákʉ́ bɛ mambák pɛ́pɛ́p. Ɛ̌ti yɔ, yi ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ntíánwɔ́p ndu bɛbhɨŋɨ bɔ bɛ, “Bɔ̌ma.”
212 Yi arɛm ntá Mandɛm bɛ, “Chɔŋ ndɛm ɛ̌ti yɛ ntá bɔ̌maya mpok bǒbhɛ báchɛ́mɛ́ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt amɔt, nte bɛsí bhap nchyɛ́ wɔ bakak.”
213 Apɛt arɛm bɛ, “Chɔŋ nsɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ Mandɛm.” Nɛ bɛ, “Ghɔ́ mɛ́ nɛ́, nɛ bɔ̌ abhɛn Mandɛm achyɛ mɛ.”
214 Tɛ̌ndu bɔ̌ abhɛn yi arɛmɛ nɔ ɛ̌ti yap báchí bakwǎŋwaŋ, mbɔŋ Yesu ayíbhírí nyaka arɔp nkwǎ. Akʉ nɔ́ bɛ́ ámfʉɛ́t ndǔ nɛwú anchɔŋti bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn mmǔ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋá nɛwú, nɔ chi Satan.
215 Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ yi ákway nyaka bɛfɛrɛ bho ndǔ bɛcháy nɛwú. Báchí nyaka basɛm ndǔ bɛcháy ɛbhɔ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnap nɛnkɛm.
216 Sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ atwɔ nyaka bɛkwak chi bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Ábraham, puyɛ̌ bɔángɛl.
217 Abhɔŋ yɛ bɛrɔp nyaka mbɔ bhɛsɛ bakwǎŋwaŋ ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi, bɛ́ ámbák mǔngo bachiǎkap anɛ ábhʉ̀rɛ bariɛp ami bɛsí Mandɛm ndu bɛtɨk ɛbhi nɛ bɛ ánkway bɛchyɛ akap ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ bǒ mankɛm.
218 Tɛ̌ndu yímbɔŋ ánáŋ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ mamɔ, abhɔŋ mbi bɛkwak abhɛn mamɔ átwɔ̀ ntá yap.
3
31 Bɔ̌ma, be bho bǎchi nyáŋá, mmu anɛ achi amfay abhɨ́ŋɨ́ be bɛ mǎmbak bǒbhi. Kaysí yɛ ka mmu anɛ Yesu achi. Yi kɛ Mandɛm átó mbɔ mǔngo bachiǎkap anɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛ́bhɛn sɛ́nókó, mbɔnyu sɛ́ghàti bho kpoŋoroŋ.
32 Ǎbhʉ̀rɛ nyaka bariɛp ami bɛsí Mandɛm mmu áyábhɛ́ yi bɛ ambak mǔngo bachiǎkap nɛ mǔnto nkúbhɛ́ mbɔnyu Moses nkwɔ achi nyaka mmu anɛ ábhʉ̀rɛ bariɛp ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhi amɛm ɛkɛrɛ Mandɛm.
33 Yesu kɛ Mandɛm ásɔ́rɛ́ bɛ abhɔŋ bɛbhɔŋ kɛnókó ancha Moses, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ mmu anɛ áté ɛkɛt ábhɔ́ŋ kɛnókó acha ɛkɛt ɛnɛ yi ate.
34 Mmu kɛ áte yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛkɛt, kɛ Mandɛm kɛ ághókó mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm.
35 Moses achí nyaka mmǔ tɛtɛp ndu bɛtɨk ɛbhi mbɔ mǔbɛtok amɛm ɛkɛrɛ Mandɛm. Bɛtɨk ɛbhi bɛ́te ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛkʉ bo mándɨ́ŋɨ́ ansɛmpok.
36 Kɛ mbák chi Kristo, ǎkɛm ɛkɛt Ɛtayi nɛ ntɨ nɛmɔt mbɔ Mɔ́ywi. Nɛ bɛsɛ bǒ Mandɛm sɛ́chí bo ɛkɛt ɛyi ɛnkɛm mbák sɛ́nté kpirí ndu mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́sɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ nɛ sɛ́bháka ntɨ arɛ nɛ sɛ́dɛ̀p awɔ antɨ bɛ chɔŋ sɛ́mbɔŋ bɔ.
37 Bǎbhɔŋ yɛ bɛghok ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ árɛ̀m mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛchí amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ, “Ɛchɔŋ, mbák mǎngok Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi,
38 bǎkɛ́ gwɔt batɨ amɛm mbɔnyu bachǐmbɨ bhɛka bágwɔ́rɛ́ nyaka batɨ yap nɛ Mandɛm mpok bághàp amɛm baso. Bátáŋntɨ nɛ mɛ nɛ, mamɔ mɛ.
39 Mámɔ́ mɛ amɛm baso ɛnyu ɛyɔ, nɛ bághɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nkʉ́ nɛ́ntɨ́ ɛnap ndǔ mamiɛ́ bɛsa bɛpay.
310 Ɛ̌ti yɔ ntɨ nɛ́bé mɛ nɛ mkpáká bobhɔ, ndɛm bɛ, ‘Batɨ̌ yap ápɔ̀kɔ bhɔ ɛbhɨ mpoknkɛm, nɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mbi wa.’
311 Njɨkɨ ndǔ bɛběntɨ bɛ, ‘Bápú kway bɛchwe ndǔ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ɛna wáwák.’”
312 Bɔ̌ma, sɔt ka mpok bɛ ndǔ nkwɔ ywɛka, yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́ bhak anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛbɛ́ptí ntɨ, nɛ akɛka bɛ́sɨ́kɨ ntɨ nɛ Mandɛm, ɛ́nyu ɛnɛ́ yi arɔ mbi Mandɛm mmu achí nɛpɛ́m.
313 Sɛmtí nɔ́kɔ́ ka batɨ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔp bɛ bɛbʉ́ bɛkɛ rwɔ mmǔ ywɛka ántáŋntɨ nɛ Mandɛm. Kʉ ka nɔ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok, ɛnɛ́ nywɔp nɛ́chák nɛ́bhʉɛ́t ɛnɛ́n bábhɨŋɨ bɛ, “Ɛchɔŋ.”
314 Sɛ́bhɔŋ ákɔ́rɛ́ ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu Kristo ákʉ́ nta yɛsɛ mbák sɛ́ndɔ́k ambɨ bɛte kpirí ndǔ nɛsɨkɨ́ntɨ ɛnɛn sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka nɛ yi ndǔ nɛbhǒnɛt. Sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛkʉ nɔ tɛ ndǔ ngwɛnti.
315 Bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bárɛ́mɛ́ nyaka bɛ, “Ɛchɔŋ, mbák mǎngok Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi bǎkɛ́ gwɔt batɨ amɛm mbɔ ɛnyǔ bachǐmbɨ bhɛka bátàŋ nyaka ntí nɛ Mandɛm.”
316 Bɔ agha bághókó nyaka Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm yɛ̌ nɔ, bátáŋ ntɨ? Pú bo Moses abhɛn yi áfú nyaka ɛtɔk Íjip nɛ bhɔ?
317 Bɔ agha bákʉ́ nyaka Mandɛm ambe ntɨ ndǔ mamiɛ́ bɛsa bɛpay? Pú bo abhɛn bákʉ́ bɛbʉ́, nɛ bágú amɛm baso?
318 Nɛ mpok Mandɛm áyɨ́kɨ́ arɛm bɛ, “Bápú kway bɛchwe ndǔ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ɛna wáwák”, ntɨkɨ bho yi árɛ́mɛ́ nyaka nɔ ɛ̌ti yap? Pú bǒ abhɛn bápú ghok nyaka yi?
319 Sɛ́ghɔ yɛ bɛ bápú kway nyaka bɛchwe ndǔ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko nyaka yi.
4
41 Bariɛp amɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ tɛsáy bɛ chɔŋ bǒbhi mǎnchwe ndǔ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ɛni abhʉɛ́t. Sɛbhɔŋ yɛ bɛsɔt mpok bɛ yɛ̌ mmu ywɛka akɛ bhak anɛ bárɛm ɛ̌ti yi bɛ abhɨkɨ kway mmu anɛ achwe ndǔ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ɛnɔ.
42 Sɛ́ghok nkwɔ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bo abhɛn tɛntɛp bághókó nyaka. Kɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bɔ bághòk ɛ́kɛ kwak bhɔ mbɔnyunɛ batɨ yap apu nyaka arɛ.
43 Ndiɛrɛ bɛsɛ bho sɛ́nókó kɛ sɛ́chwè ndǔ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ɛnɔ, puyɛ̌ bǒ abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko. Kɛ Mandɛm árɛ́m nyaka ɛ̌ti yap bɛ, “Njɨ́kɨ́ ndǔ bɛběntɨ ɛbha bɛ, ‘Bápú kway bɛchwe ndǔ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ɛna wáwák.’” Mandɛm arɛm nɔ yɛ̌ndu ánáŋ ánáŋá nyaka bɛghoko nɛbhʉɛt nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ɛnɔ nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi atɨ bɛkʉ tɛ mpok anɛ yí ághókó mmɨk.
44 Sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ ɛchi ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ, ndǔ nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́fu amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm, bárɛm ɛ̌ti nywɔp ɛnɛn nɛjwi tándrámɔt bɛ, “Mandɛm anaŋa nɔkɔ bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛkʉ, aywe mmʉɛ́t ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn nɛjwi tándrámɔt.”
45 Ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt achak amɛm ɛkáti ɛyi, Mandɛm apɛt ǎrɛm nyaka bɛ, “Bɔ́ bápú kway bɛchwe ndǔ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ɛna wáwák.”
46 Mbi anɛ báchwè ndǔ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt Mandɛm abhʉɛ́t yɛ fúú. Kɛ bo abhɛn baghoko Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ mpok ɛyɔ bábhɨ́kɨ́ chwe arɛ ɛ̌ti nɛtaŋántɨ ɛnap.
47 Ɛ̌ti yɔ, Mandɛm afyɛ́ mpok achak anɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ, “Ɛchɔŋ”. Debhít kɛ ákʉ́ sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ nɔ mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm afʉɛt nyaka ntá yi tɛntɛp arɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mánáŋ bárɛ́mɛ́ bɛ yi arɛm bɛ, “Ɛchɔŋ, mpok bǎghoko ɛyɔŋ ɛyi, bǎkɛ́ gwɔt ntɨ.”
48 Mbɔ bo abhɛn Jóshua ásɔ́rɛ́ achwe ɛtɔk Kánǎn nɛ bhɔ bábhɔ̌ŋ nyaka nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt tɛtɛp, mbʉ Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ rɛm ɛ̌ti mpok nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt achak.
49 Ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ yɛ bɛ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt nɛchak nɛbhʉɛt ambɨ ntá bo Mandɛm.
410 Yɛ̌ agha anɛ áchwe ndu nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt Mandɛm, ǎywɛ́mʉɛt ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhi mbɔ ɛnyu Mandɛm ábhɔ́ŋ nyaka nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt mpok ánáŋá bɛghoko mmɨk.
411 Sɛ́nú yɛ bɛchwe ndǔ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ɛnɔ bɛ ɛnyǔ nɛtaŋa ntɨ bo Israɛl nɛ́kɛ́ kʉ yɛ̌ mmu ywɛsɛ ankwɛn.
412 Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛchi nɛpɛ́m nɛ ɛbhɔŋ bɛtaŋ. Ɛ́chap ɛcha yɛ̌ntɨkɨ akparɛnja nsɛm ɛpay. Ɛ́chwè tɛ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ nɛpɛ́m nkwǎ nɛ́chɛm nɛ ɛfóŋó ɛyi. Ɛ́chwè mmu antɨ ɛ́ntɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi átɨ́ bɛkʉ.
413 Yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ́pú bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ bɛsí Mandɛm. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi aghoko ɛchi kpoŋoroŋ bɛsí bhi. Ntá yi kɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛsɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɛm ntí anɛ yi ákʉ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákʉ́. 
414 Sɛ́ghɔ bɛ sɛbhɔŋ mǔngo bachiǎkap anɛ ákó áchí amfay nɛ Mandɛm. Yí chí Yesu, Mmɔ Mandɛm. Sɛ́ndɔ́k yɛ ambɨ bɛkɛm sayri mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́nókó ɛ̌ti yi.
415 Mǔngo bachiǎkap ywɛsɛ chi mmu anɛ ághɔ̀ bhɛsɛ ntínso ndu mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́bè bhɛsɛ mmʉɛt mbɔnyunɛ yímbɔŋ abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka mamɔ mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu, Yɛ̌ nɔ, akɛ kʉ bɛbʉ́.
416 Sɛ́ndɔ́k yɛ kɛkwɔt kɛbhɔŋ bɛcháy ntá Mandɛm mmu achi ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ɛyi. Achí Mandɛm bɛrɨ̌ndu nɛ chɔŋ angɔ́ bhɛsɛ ntínso, antɔŋ bhɛsɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi ndu bɛkwak bhɛsɛ́ ndǔ mpok anɛ sɛ́chɛ́bhɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ.
5
51 Bo báyàp yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mǔngo bachiǎkap ndǔ nkwɔ wap, mámbʉrɛ, yi ankʉ nɔkɔ bɛtɨk Mandɛm ndǔ ntí wap. Yi kɛ ásɔ̀t yɛ akap anɛ bho nɛ akabhɛ́nya nkwɔ ánchyɛ̀ nɔkɔ ntá Mandɛm ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ bho.
52 Arɨ́ŋɨ́ ndu ákɛ̀m sayri bo abhɛn bábhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ yɛ̌nyɨŋ nɛ abhɛn babhɔŋɔ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ tɛ̌ndu yímbɔŋ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nkwɔ bɛyǎ bɛkwɛnɛ bɛsí Mandɛm.
53 Abhɔŋ yɛ bɛchyɛ nɔkɔ akap ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ ɛbhi yímbɔŋ, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu áchyɛ̀ akap ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ bo abhɛn yi áté ndǔ ntí wap.
54 Yɛ̌ mmu ápú chyɛ mmʉɛt kɛnókó andɛm bɛ yi ǎkway bɛbhak mǔngo bachiǎkap. Mandɛm kɛ áyap mmu, ankʉ yí ambak mǔngo bachiǎkap nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu ákʉ́ nyaka nɛ Árɔn.
55 Nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyǔ yɔ kɛ ɛchi nɛ Kristo. Puyɛ̌ yímbɔŋ kɛ áyóŋó nyaka mmʉɛt bɛ́ ámbák mǔngo bachiǎkap ambɔ́ŋ kɛnókó nchiakap. Mandɛm kɛ ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ yi, arɛm bɛ, “Wɔ, ɔchí Mɔ́wa, nɛ ɛchɔŋ nchí rɛm bɛ ndɔp chi Ɛtayɛ”.
56 Apɛt árɛ̀m nɛbhʉɛt achak bɛ, “Chɔŋ ɔ́mbak nchiakap mpoknkɛm mbɔ ɛnyu bárɛ́mɛ́ nyaka ɛ̌ti Mɛlkísɛdɛk.”
57 Mpok Yesu achi fá amɨk, arɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka bɛ Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ nɛwú nɛmfʉɛt yi ansɛm. Anɨkmʉɛt nɛ ntɨ nɛnkɛm kpát ɛyɔŋ ɛyi ɛre ko amfay, babhɛsɛ ansɛp nɔkɔ. Mandɛm aghok nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛni mbɔnyunɛ asɛ́ptí nyaka mmʉɛt, anchyɛ nɔkɔ Mandɛm kɛnókó.
58 Yí achi nyaka Mmɔ Mandɛm tɛtɛp, yɛ̌ nɔ, aghɔ́k bɛghok Mandɛm ndǔ bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn yi ághɔ̀.
59 Mandɛm ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛkʉ yi ankway ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi, ayibhiri arɔp mmu anɛ áchyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ághòk yi.
510 Mandɛm afyɛ́ yi ambak ɛnyǔ mǔngo bachiǎkap anɛ Mɛlkísɛdɛk achi nyaka. 
511 Mbɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ bɛchak ɛbhɛn nchí kway bɛrɛm ɛ̌ti Yesu mǔngo bachiǎkap ywɛsɛ. Kɛ chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́bè mmʉɛt bɛkʉ be mǎnjwimɛm tɛ̌ndu bǎrɔ́bhɛ́ chi bo abhɛn bapu kɛm ɛnyɨŋ ayak.
512 Yɛ̌ndu bǎchi bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛbhak batɔŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm nɛ́nɛ, nté yɛka ǎtɔ̀ŋ bɛ bǎbhʉɛt chi bo abhɛn mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtɔŋ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mbɨ ɛbhɛn mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛghɔk ɛ̌ti Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm. Bǎchí mbɔ mǎmbɔ abhɛn bábhʉɛt mɛnyu chi nɛ́bhɨ. Bǎpú mbɔ bǒ abhɛn bákwáy mɛnyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́ mbɔŋ.
513 Mmu anɛ ányù chi amɨ, ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ɛka ndu bɛrɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi chak bɛsí Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ achí mmɔ́.
514 Nɛnyiɛ́ mbɔŋ nɛchi chi ntá baseansi. Bɔ́ kɛ mánáŋ bághɔ́kɔ́sí mmʉɛt nɛ bárɨŋɨ ɛwupsi ɛnɛ ɛchi ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛrɨ́ nɛ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́bhɛ́bhɛ́.
6
61 Sɛ́ndɔ́ yɛ bɛyɨŋɨ nɔkɔ chi ndiɛrɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mbɨ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo, sɛ́ndɔ́k ambɨ ndu bɛchak bɛ sɛ́nsɛ́nɛ́ ndǔ nɛjwǐmɛm ɛnɛsɛ. Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ bɛsɔt mpok bɛrɛm ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kɛ́mɛ́ nɛka ɛnɛsɛ mbɔ ɛbhɛn bɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ mmu abhɔŋ bɛtɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhi, andɔ bɛkʉ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́twɔ̀ yi chi nɛ nɛwú, nɛ bɛ mmu abhɔŋ bɛka nɛ Mandɛm.
62 Nɛ bɛ bábhɔŋ bɛsɔt mpok bɛrɛm ɛ̌ti nɛjwiti, nɛ ɛ̌ti ɛpɨŋ mɛ́nyáŋa bho amɔ́ anti, nɛ ɛnyǔ mbúrɛ́ Mandɛm ákʉ̀ bawú mámpɛ́tnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, nɛ ɛ̌ti nɛtáŋ anɛ mbúrɛ́ bátàŋ bo mámkpɔt manyé yap ndɔŋ amɔt ndak amay.
63 Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛ́tɨ́ŋɨ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ. Chɔŋ sɛ́ndɔ́k chi ambɨ mbák ɛ́chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm áyaŋ.
64 Sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛrɨŋɨ bɛ bápú kway bɛkʉ mmu anɛ arɔ mbi Mandɛm bɛ ámpɛt antɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhi. Nchí rɛm ɛ̌ti ɛnyǔ mmu anɛ mánáŋ bákʉ́ amɨ́k ánɛ́nɛ́ yi, aghɔ́ akap anɛ Mandɛm ǎchyɛ̀ bǒ bhi, nɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ abhak nɛ yi nkwɔ.
65 Ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛni, anáŋ aghɔ nkwɔ bɛrɨ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fù ndu Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm, aghɔ́ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhàk chɔŋ ndǔ nɛŋɔkɔ́ mpok ɛnɛn nɛ́twɔ̀ ansɛm.
66 Mbák mmu wu ántáŋ ntí nɛ Kristo, bápú kway bɛkʉ yi ampɛt antɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhi, tɛ̌ndu yi achi mbɔ mmu anɛ apɛt ágò Mmɔ Mandɛm ndǔ ɛkotákátí, anchyɛ nɔkɔ yi ntíánwɔ́p bɛsí bho, ɛnɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́twɔ̀ yi chi nɛ mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́.
67 Mandɛm ǎyɛt mmɨk anɛ ányù manyiɛp amɛn ákwɛ̀n arɛ, ankʉ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ́ngó, nɛnchyɛ mbwɔt ntá mmu anɛ ákwáŋá yɔ.
68 Kɛ mbák mmɨk ǎgò chi bɔ̌mɛnɔk nɛ tákɔ nsěnse, nɔ yɔ abhɨ́kɨ́ rɨ́, ǎrɔp chi mmɨk anɛ báchɔ̀ŋti chɔŋti, nɛ ndu ngwɛnti, mánsɔŋ yɔ sɔŋ.
69 Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, yɛ̌ndu mɛ́rɛ̀m nɔ nɛ bhe, mbɔ̌ŋ ntɨ nɛ bhe bɛ́ bǎkʉ̀ chi bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kɔ̀ ndɔŋ amɔt nɛ nɛpɛmɛ anɛ Mandɛm ápɛ̀mɛ bhe.
610 Mandɛm achi chak mpoknkɛm nɛ apu kway bɛghɔkɔntɨk bɛtɨk ɛbhɛka nɛ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ bǎtɔ́ŋɔ́ yi ndǔ bǎkwàk batɨ bǒnkwɔ nɛ bǎrɔ̀ŋ ambɨ bɛkʉ nɔ.
611 Nɛ sɛ́yàŋ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka ándɔ́k ambɨ bɛtɔŋ nkúbhɛ́ ntɨ ɛnɔ tɛ ndǔ ngwɛnti, nɛ bǎpú nɔ́k chɔŋ bɛbhɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎbhaka ntɨ bɛ chɔŋ mǎmbɔŋ.
612 Mpú yaŋ mǎndɔ abhɔt ánkɛ́m be. Nchí yaŋ chi bɛ mǎnkoŋo ɛrɨŋ ɛnɛ bo abhɛn mánókó, nɛ bábhɔŋ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ nɛ bághaka ndǔ nté anɛ bábhɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛchyɛ. 
613 Mpok Mandɛm afyɛ́ Ábraham bariɛp, ayɨkɨ ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛni yímbɔŋ, tɛ̌ndu yɛ̌ mmu apu anɛ acha yi bɛ yi ánkwáy bɛyɨkɨ ndu nnyɛ́n mmu wu.
614 Ayɨkɨ arɛm bɛ, “Mpú nɔ́k bɛ́yɛt wɔ, nɛ chɔŋ nchyɛ́ wɔ bɛyǎ bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ.”
615 Ábraham ánoŋ yɛ nɛ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ kpát abhɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛchyɛ yi.
616 Nkwǎŋwaŋ ǎyɨkɨ chi ndǔ nnyɛ́n mmu anɛ acha yi, nɛ mpok bo bákɛ̀m ɛpʉ́ítí, mánáŋ mányú nku, ɛpʉ́ítí ɛ́may.
617 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛyɔ kɛ ɛ́kʉ́ Mandɛm áyɨ́kɨ́ nyaka ndu bɛ́tɔŋ bo abhɛn bariɛp ami achi ntá yap kpoŋoroŋ bɛ bɔ́ báká ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi atɨ bɛkʉ.
618 Mandɛm akʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛpay ndu bɛ́fyɛ bhɛsɛ ntɨ, bɛsɛ bho sɛ́bʉɛ́ sɛ́rɔ́ŋɔ́ ntá yi bɛ yi ampɛmɛ bhɛsɛ. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bɛpay bɛpu wupsi mbɔnyunɛ yí apú kway bɛsense. Afyɛ́ bɛsɛ ntɨ bɛ sɛkɛ rɔ bɛbhaka ntɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛchyɛ bhɛsɛ.
619 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ sɛbhaka ntɨ arɛ ɛ́kɛ̀m bɛsɛ ɛrɨ́rɨ́ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛsɛ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ndo ákɛ̀m áchwí nɛbhʉɛt amɔt kpɛmm bɛ nnyɛ́n nɛ́kɛ pɔkɔ́ wu. Nɛbhakántɨ́ ɛnɛsɛ nɛ Yesu nɛ́kʉ́ sɛ́fʉɛ́t ɛkat sɛ́chwe tɛ amɛm mɔ́kɛrɛ kóŋ, ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ Mandɛm.
620 Yesu anáŋ ayámbɨ arɔŋ arɛ ndǔ ntí ayɛsɛ mpok yi árɔ́bhɛ́ chi mǔnti bachiǎkap anɛ mpoknkɛm mbɔ ɛnyǔ bárɛ́mɛ́ nyaka ɛ̌ti Mɛlkísɛdɛk.
7
71 Mɛlkísɛdɛk-nɛ achi nyaka mfɔ ɛtɔk Salɛm nɛ nchiakap Mandɛm Acha. Ábraham anu nyaka nɛ bɛyǎ bafɔ awáy bhɔ. Mpok yi áfú ɛbhɨ̌nɛnu ápɛ̀tnsɛm, Mɛlkísɛdɛk atɛmɛri yi, ayɛ́t yi.
72 Ábraham akɔrɛ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn yi áfú ɛbhɨ̌nɛnu nɛ bhɔ ndu baru byo, achyɛ yi ndu amɔt. Nnyɛ́n Mɛlkísɛdɛk ɛnɔ nɛ́te ndǔ “Mfɔ anɛ ákʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chak.” Achi nkwɔ Mfɔ Salɛm, nɔ chi “Mfɔ anɛ áchyɛ kpák.”
73 Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɛm yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ̌ti ɛtayi nɛ máyi nɛ nnɛrɛ́kɛt ywi nɛ mpok anɛ bábhé yi. Nɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛni nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti. Achí nchiakap Mandɛm ngwɛnti ti mbɔ Mmɔ Mandɛm.
74 Ghɔ́ ká ɛnyǔ nnɛ́m mmu yi achi nyaka! Yɛ̌ndu Ábraham achi nyaka chi mbɨ anɛ bo Israɛl, akɔ́rɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi áfú ɛbhɨ̌nɛnu nɛ bhɔ ndǔ baru byo, achyɛ yi ndu amɔt.
75 Mbɔk bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Lɛ́vi bachi bachiǎkap Mandɛm. Ɛbhé Moses ɛ́ghàti bhɔ bɛ mánsɔt ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ amɔt ndǔ anɛ byo ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu Israɛl, yɛ̌ndu bɔ nɛ bo Israɛl mankɛm bachi bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Ábraham, nɔ chi bǒ nnɛrɛ́kɛt amɔt.
76 Kɛ Mɛlkísɛdɛk mmu ápú nyaka mbɔ̌ŋ mmǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt Lɛ́vi asɔt nyaka ɛnyǔ akap wu nɔ Ábraham áchyɛ́ yi, ayɛ́t yi mmu Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp nɛ yi.
77 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu arɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ mmu anɛ áyɛt ntɨ kɛ áchá mmu anɛ yi áyɛ́rɛ́.
78 Bɛyɨŋɨ bachiǎkap abhɛn bachi bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Lɛ́vi, bɔ́ mankɛm abhɛn básɔt akap anɛ ndu-amɔt ntá bho, bágù mbɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achak. Kɛ bɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ Mɛlkísɛdɛk, mmu ásɔ́rɛ́ nyaka nkwɔ akap wu, Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛsɛ bɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛni nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
79 Sɛ́kwáy mbɔŋ bɛ́rɛm bɛ Lɛ́vi mmu bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ bhi básɔt ɛnyǔ akap wu ntá bho, achyɛ́ nyaka ɛnyǔ akap wu ntá Mɛlkísɛdɛk tɛ̌ndu chi-mbɨ ywi Ábraham áchyɛ́ nyaka wu ntá Mɛlkísɛdɛk.
710 Ɛchi ɛnyuyɔ mbɔnyunɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ re bhe nyaka Lɛ́vi mpok Mɛlkísɛdɛk atɛmɛri Ábraham. Yɛ̌ nɔ, Lɛ́vi ánáŋ achí nyaka ndǔ manoŋ Ábraham.
711 Mpok Mandɛm ákʉ́ bachiǎkap abhɛn bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Lɛ́vi manchyɛ bɛbhé ɛbhɛn bɛ́kwáy nɛ nkwɔ́ bachiǎkap abhɔ, mbɔ bɛtɨk ɛbhap bɛ́kway nyaka bɛkʉ bɛ bo mámbák chak mbɔ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm áyàŋ, mbʉ́ ntí apu anɛ nchiakap achak átwɔ anɛ achi mbɔ Mɛlkísɛdɛk, nɛ abhak kɛkúrí nɛ bachiǎkap abhɛn nnɛrɛ́kɛt Arɔn.
712 Mpok nnɛrɛ́kɛt anɛ bachiǎkap áwúpsí, ɛwúpsí ɛbhak ndu ɛbhé nkwɔ.
713 Mmu anɛ bárɛ̀m mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɛ̌ti yi afu chí ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt anɛ́ achí kɛkúrí nɛ anɛ́ yɛ̌ mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ re fu arɛ, nɛ anɛ́ ákʉ̀ bɛtɨkɨ́ Mandɛm mbɔ nchiakap.
714 Ɛchi kpoŋoroŋ bɛ Acha ywɛsɛ Yesu afu nyaka ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt Júda, nɛ Moses ábhɨ́kɨ́ rɛm yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ̌ti nnɛrɛ́kɛt wu mpok yi árɛ̀m ɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti bachiǎkap. 
715 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛpɛt ɛ́kʉ̀ sɛngɔ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ ɛbhé ɛ́yíbhiri, chi nɛtwɔ anɛ nchiakap achak átwɔ́ mbɔ Mɛlkísɛdɛk.
716 Achí nchiakap, puyɛ̌ chi bɛkoŋo ɛbhé ɛnɛ ɛ́rɛ̀m ɛ̌ti nnɛrɛ́kɛt anɛ nchiakap ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛfu arɛ, kɛ chi bɛkoŋo bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn nɛpɛ́m ɛni ɛnɛn yɛ̌ mmu apu kway bɛchɔŋti.
717 Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyǔ bárɛ́mɛ́ ɛ̌ti Kristo bɛ, “Wɔ, ɔchí nchiakap Mandɛm ngwɛnti ti mbɔ Mɛlkísɛdɛk.”
718 Ndu bɛrɔŋ ambɨ, bárɔ ɛsɨ́ ɛbhé mbɔnyunɛ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ nyaka bɛtaŋ, ɛ́kɛpɛrɛ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ bhɛsɛ.
719 Nti achi bɛ ɛbhé yɔ ɛ́pú kway bɛkwak mmu ankway ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi bɛsí Mandɛm. Nɛ́nɛ, bátwɔ́ nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛchak ɛnɛ ɛcha bɛbhé. Yɔ́ kɛ sɛ́bháká ntɨ arɛ́ nɛ ɛ́yà bhɛsɛ kɛkwɔt nɛ Mandɛm.
720 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛchak ɛnɛ sɛ́ghɔ̀ ɛ̌ti nchiakap wu chi bɛ Mandɛm anyu nyaka nku bɛ Yesu ǎbhák nchiakap. Yɛ̌ nchiakap achak apú, anɛ mányú nku ɛ̌ti yi.
721 Ntá Yesu kɛ yi áyɨ́kɨ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́ghàti bɛsí bɛ, “Ɛta Mandɛm ayɨkɨ, nɛ ápú kway bɛyibhiri nkaysi yi. Ayɨ́kɨ́, arɛm bɛ, ‘Ɔchí nchiakap ngwɛnti ti.’”
722 Nku anɛ Mandɛm ányú ɛ̌ti Yesu ɛnyuyɔ ǎtɔ̀ŋ bɛ, mpok sɛ́ghɔ̀ Yesu, sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ yi achi sɛbhaŋ ɛsɛn Mandɛm achyɛ ndu bɛtɔŋ bɛ nku yɔ atéé acha anɛ nsɨ.
723 Ɛwupsi ɛchak ɛchi bɛ, bachiǎkap abhɛn mbɨ baya nyaka nɛ ntí bɛ báchí nyaka bo abhɛn nɛwú nɛ́káŋ bɔ bákɛ́ rɔŋ ambɨ nɛ bɛtɨk ɛbhap.
724 Kɛ mbák chi Yesu, yi ǎrɔ̀ŋ ambɨ bɛkʉ bɛtɨk ɛbhi mbɔ nchiakap mpoknkɛm, mbɔnyunɛ yi apu gu wáwák.
725 Ndu ɛchi nɔ, yi ǎkway bɛpɛmɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ áfʉɛ́rɛ́ ntá yi atwɔ ntá Mandɛm ndɔŋ amɔt ndak amay, tɛ̌ndu yi achi nɛpɛ́m mpoknkɛm ndu mɛnɨkmʉɛt ɛ̌ti yap.
726 Ɛnyǔ mǔngo bachiǎkap wu kɛ ákwáy yɛ bɛkwak bɛsɛ, mbɔnyunɛ yi achi nyáŋá, abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛ́kwɛ́nɛ́, abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bakwap, achí kɛkúrí nɛ bǒ bɛbʉ́, nɛ achí ndǔ nɛbhʉɛ́rɛ́ kɛnókó amfay.
727 Nti apu anɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛchyɛ akap yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔp mbɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mǔngo bachiǎkap anɛ mbɨ. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap ǎyambɨ nyaka anchyɛ akap ɛ̌ti ɛbhi bɛbʉ́, kɛ andɔk yɛ ambɨ bɛkʉ nɔ ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ bo bachak. Yesu achyɛ́ akap ndɔŋ amɔt ndak ámáy, mpok yi achyɛ mmʉɛt bɛ mango ndu ɛkotákátí.
728 Ɛbhé Moses ɛ́kʉ̀ nyaka bo abhɛn bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛ́chí nɛ bhɔ mámbák bǒ bagho bachiǎkap, kɛ Mandɛm anyu nku akʉ Mɔ́ywi mmu ákwáy ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi mpoknkɛm ámbák mǔngo bachiǎkap.
8
81 Mbɔ̌ŋ ntí-ndak anɛ sɛ́rɛ̀m chi bɛ sɛbhɔŋ ɛnyǔ mǔngo bachiǎkap anɛ áchɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛ́rɛ́ kɛnókó nɛ Mandɛm mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm awu amfay.
82 Mǔngo bachiǎkap wu ákʉ̀ bɛtɨk ɛbhi amɛm ɛtɛm ɛnɛ ɛchi nyáŋá, ɛnɛ́ mbɔŋ Mandɛm Acha áté, kɛbhak chi nkwǎŋwaŋ.
83 Báfyɛ̀ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mǔngo bachiǎkap chi bɛ anchyɛ nɔkɔ akap nɛ akabhɛ́nya ntá Mandɛm. Ndu ɛchi nɔ, nchiakap ywɛsɛ nkwɔ abhɔŋ bɛ́bhɔŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi áchyɛ ntá Mandɛm mbɔ akap.
84 Mbɔ yi achi chi fá amɨk, mbʉ ápú bhak nchiakap wáwák, tɛ̌ndu bachiǎkap bachak bachí fá amɨk abhɛn báchyɛ̀ akap bɛkoŋo ɛnyǔ ɛnɛ́ ɛbhé Moses ɛ́rɛ̀m.
85 Bɛtɨk ɛbhap bɛchi mbɔ ndɨkandi anɛ ákʉ̀ sɛ́ndɨ́ŋɨ́ mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fàkari amɛm ɛtɛm ɛnɛ amfay. Sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ ɛchi nɔ mbɔnyunɛ mpok Moses ábhɔŋ nyaka bɛte ɛ́tɛm akap, Mandɛm aghati yi bɛ, “Ɔbhɔŋ bɛghɔ bɛ ɔté ɛtɛm ɛyɔ mbɔ ɛnyu ntɔ́ŋɔ́ wɔ amfay njiɛ.”
86 Kɛ nɛ́nɛ, bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn Kristo bɛ́chá ɛbhɛn bachiǎkap abhɛn Nku Nsɨ́, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ nku anɛ ákʉ́ Yesu ate nɛntɨ Mandɛm nɛ bho áchá anɛ nsɨ́, mbɔnyunɛ akɔ nɛ nku anɛ árɨ́ áchá.
87 Mbɔ nku nsɨ́ yɔ ǎkway nyaka bɛkwak bo mambak chak bɛsí Mandɛm, mbʉ ntí apu bɛbhɔŋ nku achák.
88 Kɛ Mandɛm Acha aghɔ̌ nyaka bɛ bɛ́kwɛ́nɛ́ bɛchí nɛ bǒbhi. Ɛ̌ti yɔ, arɛm bɛ, “Mpok ǎtwɔ̀ anɛ nchí nyu nku achák nɛ bo Israɛl, nɛ bǒ Júda nkwɔ.
89 Nku anɛ apú bhak mbɔ anɛ nsɨ́ nyaka nyu nɛ bachǐmbɨ bhap mpok nsɔ́rɛ́ bhɔ́ nɛ awɔ́ wa mfɛ́rɛ́ ɛtɔk Íjip. Bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɔŋ nyaka ambɨ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nku nsɨ́ áyaŋ bɔ mankʉ. Ɛ́kʉ́ Acha arɛm bɛ, ‘Ndu ɛ́chí nɔ, mbɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ mpok nɛ bhɔ. Mmɛ Mandɛm Acha kɛ nchí rɛm.’
810 Nɛ́ chi nku anɛ mɛ̌nyú chɔŋ nɛ bo Israɛl ndǔ manywɔp anɛ átwɔ̀. Mmɛ Acha nchí rɛm bɛ chɔŋ mfyɛ́ bɛbhé ɛbha bɔ́ antí, nsɨŋ bhɔ amɛm batɨ yap. Chɔŋ mbak Mandɛm awap, nɛ bɔ mámbak bǒbha.
811 Yɛ̌ mmu apu bhɔŋ chɔŋ bɛtɔŋ ntɨ, nɛ yɛ̌ chi ntɨ manɔ bɛ, ‘Dɨŋɨ́ Mandɛm’, mbɔnyunɛ bo mankɛm bárɨ̀ŋɨ chɔŋ mɛ, bɛbho amʉɛt ndɛ́ndɛmɛ bho bɛghaka amʉɛt manɛ́m bho.
812 Nɛ chɔŋ ngɔ́ bhɔ ntínso, mfóŋórí bɛbʉ́ bhap nkɛpɛrɛ tɨk bhɔ́ wawak.”
813 Nɛrɛm anɛ Mandɛm árɛm ɛ̌ti Nku Nkɔ ǎtɔ̀ŋ bɛ anɛ mbɨ abhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́náŋá ɛ́fʉ́ɛrɛ́ mpok, yɔ kɛpɛrɛ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ, ɛ́nɛmɛnɛm.
9
91 Nku mbɨ anɛ Mandɛm ányú nɛ bo Israɛl abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛbhé ɛbhɛn bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ ɛnyǔ bo babhɔŋɔ bɛchyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó, nɛ ɛtɛm ɛbhak fá amɨk ɛnɛ́ bǒ báchyɛ̀ yi kɛnókó arɛ́.
92 Ɛtɛm ɛyɔ ɛ́bhɔ́ŋ bɔ̌bɛkɛt bapay. Anɛ mbɨ abhak Nɛbhʉɛt Bɛdiɛrɛ. Arɛ́ kɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛpɔkɔ bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ mkpak ɛchi nyaka, nɛ brɛt Mandɛm.
93 Ndɛn akɔ́rɛ́ nyaka mɔ́kɛt anɛ mbɨ nɛ anɛ ansɛm. Bábhɨ̀ŋɨ nyaka mɔ́kɛt wu bɛ Nɛbhʉɛt anɛ achi Nyáŋá Áchá.
94 Ɛ́fɛ́mɛ́ akap ɛnɛ bághákó nɛ pú ɛbhak amɛm mɔ́kɛt wu. Amfay ɛ́fɛ́mɛ́ ɛyɔ kɛ básɔ̀ŋ nyaka ɛnyɨŋɨ́ ɛriɛp ɛnɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ ínsɛns. Ɛkʉbhɛ́ Nku ɛ́bhak nkwɔ amɛm. Bákúti yɔ ɛnkɛm nɛ pú. Mɔ́te anɛ mána achi amɛm abhak amɛm ɛkʉbhɛ́ yɔ. Ntɛ́m Arɔn ɛnɛn nɛ́tɛ́mɛ́ bɛyé nɛ́bhák nkwɔ amɛm. Bɛ́gbáká batay apay anɛ Mandɛm ásɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka bɛbhé arɛ kɛ áchyɛ ntá Moses bɛbhak nkwɔ amɛm ɛkʉɛp ɛyɔ.
95 Bɛfóŋó bɛpay ɛbhɛn bághókó mbo bɔángɛl bɛbhak amfay ɛkʉbhɛ yɔ. Bɛbhap ɛbhap mɛ́nyábhɛ amfay nɛbhʉɛt anɛ Mandɛm áfoŋori nyaka bɛbʉ́ bho arɛ. Kɛ sɛ́pú kway bɛrɛm yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɛ́nɛ.
96 Mánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛbhʉɛrɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ndǔ ayi nɛbhʉɛt, bachiǎkap báre rɔŋ ndǔ mɔ́kɛt anɛ mbɨ, mpok nɛ mpok, ndǔ bɛkʉ ɛbhap bɛtɨk.
97 Kɛ mǔngo bachiǎkap aywǐnti kɛ áchwè amɛm mɔ́kɛt anɛ achi Nyáŋá Acha ndɔŋ amɔt ndǔ mmíɛ́. Nɛ abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛchwe arɛ̌ chi nɛ manoŋ amɛn yi áchyɛ̀ ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ bhi nɛ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛn bo bákʉ́ kɛrɨŋɨ bɛ chi bɛbʉ́.
98 Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ǎsɔ̀t mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛtɔŋ bɛsɛ bɛ mpoknkɛm anɛ mɔ́kɛt anɛ mbɨ abhʉɛt téé, mbi bɛchwe arɛ apu bhak.
