99 Ɛnɛ chí ɛrɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bhɛsɛ ndǔ mkpáká mmɨk anɛ ɛchɔŋ bɛ akap nɛ akabhɛ́nya anɛ báchyɛ̀ Mandɛm apu kway bɛkʉ ntɨ mmu nɛ́nkwáy ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi bɛsí Mandɛm.
910 Bɛsɨ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ mɛnkɛm bɛ́yɨ̀ŋɨ chi mɛnyɨŋ mɛnyiɛ nɛ ɛbhɛn mɛnyu, nɛ mɛnyǔ mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́chák ɛbhɛn bo básɔ̀t mánso mmʉɛt bɛ bákɛ bhɔŋ bakwap bɛsí Mandɛm. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bɛ́yɨ̀ŋɨ chi bɛbhé ɛ̌ti mmʉɛt nɛ mɛ́may mpok Mandɛm átwɔ nɛ ɛnyu ɛkɔ.
911 Kristo atwɔ́ mbɔ mǔngo bachiǎkap anɛ ákʉ́ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́twɔ̀ mɛ́mfákárí. Achwe amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́ Mandɛm ɛnɛ ɛ́kwáy ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi ɛ́cha ɛbhɛn bɛ́chí nyaka fá amɨk. Puyɛ̌ bo kɛ báté yɔ, nɛ ɛ́pú ndǔ mpǎy mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn fá amɨk.
912 Achwe ndǔ mɔ́kɛt anɛ achi Nyáŋá Áchá ndɔŋ amɔt, ndak ámáy. Puyɛ̌ chi nɛ manoŋ mmɛ́n nɛ amɛn bɔ̌mpɔŋ kɛ̌ yí achwe arɛ́ nɛ mɔ. Manǒŋ mi yímbɔŋ kɛ̌ yí áchyɛ́, nɛ ndǔ ákʉ́ nɔ aku bhɛsɛ afɛrɛ ndǔ kɛsɛmɛ́ bɛbʉ́ mpoknkɛm.
913 Ndǔ mpok anɛ áfʉɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm, básɔt nyaka chi manoŋ mmɛ́n nɛ amɛn nnɛ́m mpɔŋ nɛ batwɔp amɛn mɔ́ngɔ̌ mpɔŋ anɛ básɔ́ŋɔ́, mámyakati amʉɛt mmu anɛ apú pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm, bɛ ambak yɛ pɛ́pɛ́p.
914 Mbák manoŋ nnya ǎkway nyaka bɛkʉ mmu ambak pɛ́pɛ́p, ná nɛ manoŋ Kristo, yi mmu achyɛ mmʉɛt anɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ́bhɨkɨ nyɔ́p ntá Mandɛm mbɔ akap ndǔ bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó mmu achi mpoknkɛm? Manoŋ ami abhɔŋ bɛ́bhɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ bɛtaŋ ndu bɛkʉ bɛ batɨ yɛsɛ ambak pɛ́pɛ́p, nɛ bɛ́ sɛ́kɛ́pɛrɛ kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́twɔ̀ bhɛsɛ nɛ nɛwú. Akʉ́ nɔ́ bɛ́ sɛ́ndɔ́bhɛ tok chi Mandɛm mmu achi nɛpɛ́m.
915 Nɛchyɛ anɛ yi áchyɛ́ mmʉɛt mbɔ akap ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ ákʉ́ yi ate nɛntɨ Mandɛm nɛ nkwǎ ndǔ Nku Nkɔ ndu bɛkʉ bɛ bo abhɛn Mandɛm abhɨŋɨ, mámbɔ́ŋ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛchyɛ bhɔ, tɛ̌ndu nɛwú nɛ́fɛ́rɛ́ bho ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛn Nku Nsɨ́.
916 Ɛkáti nɛwú-bɛ́su ɛchi mbɔ nku. Mbák sɛ́kʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mmu ásɨ́ŋɨ́ arɛm ɛnyǔ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkɔrɛ nɛwú ɛni, bápú kway bɛkoŋo yɔ kpatɛ ɛ́mbak kpoŋoroŋ bɛ yi ánáŋ ágú.
917 Ɛkáti nɛwú mmu ɛ́bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ chi mpok yi ánáŋ ágú, tɛ̌ndu ɛ́pú bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ mpoknkɛm anɛ mmu anɛ ásɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛkáti yɔ achi nɛpɛ́m. Ɛchi mbɔ nku.
918 Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ̌ manoŋ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛrɔŋ amɨk ndu bɛkʉ bɛ ɛsɨ́ nku ɛmbɔŋ bɛtaŋ.
919 Mpok Moses ánáŋá ághátí bho bɛbhé Mandɛm mɛnkɛm, asɔt ntábhɛ́nɔk hysɔp, anɛp babyɔk mmɛ́n amɛn achi chu arɛ. Asɔt manoŋ mɔ́mpɔŋ nɛ amɛn mmɛ́n, achɔpti nɛ manyiɛp. Asɔt yɛ ntábhɛ́nɔk hysɔp wu, atap amɛm manoŋ mɔ, amyakati ndǔ ɛkáti bɛbhé nɛ amʉɛt bo mankɛm.
920 Ndu ákʉ̀ nɔ, are rɛm bɛ, “Manoŋ amɛn ákɛm nku anɛ Mandɛm anyu nɛ bhe nɛ ǎghati bhe bɛ mǎmbʉ́rɛ́ yɔ.”
921 Ɛnyu ɛ́mɔt kɛ Moses amyakati nyaka manoŋ ndǔ ɛtɛm nɛ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn básɔ̀t nyaka bɛchyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó nɛ bhɔ.
922 Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ bɛ́kóŋó bɛbhé Moses, babhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛsɔt manoŋ ndu bɛkʉ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ mɛ́mbak pɛ́pɛ́p. Mbák manoŋ abhɨkɨ rɔŋ amɨk, bápú foŋori bɛbʉ́ bho. 
923 Ɛ̌ti ɛyɔ kɛ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi fá amɨk ɛbhɛn bɛ́chí ndɨkandi mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mbɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi amfay bɛ mɛ́mbák pɛ́pɛ́p ɛnyu ɛyɔ. Kɛ ndu bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mfay mɛ́mbák pɛ́pɛ́p bábhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛsɔt chi manoŋ amɛn acha manǒŋ nnya.
924 Kristo abhɨ́kɨ́ rɔŋ ndǔ ɛkɛrɛ́ Mandɛm ɛnɛ bághókó nɛ amɔ, ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chí ndɨ́kándi ɛkɛrákap ɛnɛ mbɔŋ awu amfay. Achwe chi amɛm mbɔŋ ɛtɛm ɛnɛ́ amfay nɛ achí arɛ nɛ́nɛ bɛsí Mandɛm, ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ.
925 Nɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ rɔŋ amfay ndu bɛchyɛ mmʉɛt mbɔ akap ndɔŋ nɛ ndɔŋ mbɔ ɛnyǔ mǔngo bachiǎkap áchwe nyaka ndǔ mɔ́kɛt anɛ achi Nyáŋá Acha yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmíɛ́ nɛ manoŋ amɛn apu ami.
926 Sayri sayri, mbɔ yi ǎrɔ̀ŋ nyaka amfay ndɔŋ nɛ ndɔŋ ndu bɛchyɛ akap, mbʉ́ yi abhɔŋ bɛbhɔŋ ɛsɔŋɔri tɛ ndǔ ngwɛnti mmɨk. Kɛ abhésí ndɔŋ amɔt ndak ámáy ndǔ ngwɛnti mpok achyɛ mmʉɛt mbɔ akap anɛ ápɔ́kɔ́ bɛbʉ́ bo.
927 Nɛ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ mmu abhɔŋ bɛ́gu ndɔŋ amɔt, nɛ ánáŋ ángú, andɔbhɛ noŋ chi manyé,
928 ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ ɛchi yɛ bɛ Kristo achyɛ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛni mbɔ akap ndɔŋ amɔt ndu bɛ́pɔkɔ bɛbʉ́ bo mankɛm, nɛ chɔŋ ampɛt antwɔ́, puyɛ̌ ndu bɛfɛrɛ bɛbʉ́, kɛ ndu bɛpɛmɛ bo abhɛn bachi nɛ amɨ́k ambi mánòŋ yi.
10
101 Bɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ bɛbhé Moses, bɛchi mbɔ ndɨ́kándi bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛ́twɔ, puyɛ̌ mbɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ. Ɛnyu ɛsɨ́ ɛnɛ ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ mánchyɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ akap ndɔŋ nɛ ndɔŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmíɛ́ ɛ́pú kway nyaka bɛkʉ bo abhɛn bátwɔ ntá Mandɛm ndu bɛchyɛ yi kɛnókó mánkwáy bɛsí bhi ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi wáwák.
102 Mbɔ akap wu ákʉ̀ bo mambak pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm mbʉ bábhʉɛt bɛchyɛ wu? Mbʉ batɨ̌ bho ápú pɛrɛ taŋ bɔ ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ bhap.
103 Kɛ akap anɛ báchyɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmíɛ́, áchí nyaka chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ bo mántɨk bɛbʉ́ bhap.
104 Ɛ́chí ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ manoŋ mpɔŋ nɛ manoŋ mmɛ́n ápú kway bɛfɛrɛ mmu bɛbʉ́ anti wáwák.
105 Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ ɛchi bɛ mpok Kristo ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛ́twɔ fá amɨk, arɛm ntá Mandɛm bɛ, “Ɔ́bhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ yaŋ bɛ bo mánchyɛ́ akabhɛ́nya nɛ mɛnyǔ akap áchák. Kɛ ɔghókó chí mmʉɛt nkwǎ ɔchyɛ́ mɛ bɛ́ nchyɛ́ wɔ akap nɛ yɔ.
106 Akabhɛ́ nya bɛsɔŋ bɛchyɛ wɔ ápú chyɛ wɔ maŋák. Yɛ̌ chí akap anɛ bo báchyɛ bɛ ampɔkɔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhap apu chyɛ wɔ maŋák.”
107 Ndɛm yɛ bɛ, “Ɛta Mandɛm, ghɔ́ mɛ́ nɛ. Ntwɔ bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ wɔ ɔ́yàŋ mɛnkʉ́ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ basɨŋɨ ɛ̌ti ya amɛm ɛkáti ɛyɛ.”
108 Kristo arɛm bɛ, “Ɔpú yaŋ, mánchyɛ́ wɔ akabhɛ́nya nɛ akabhɛ́ mbwɔt, nɛ yɛ̌ chi ɛnyǔ akap achak, nɛ akabhɛ́nya ɛnɛ básɔ̀ŋ ango nɛ ɔpú bhɔŋ maŋák nɛ akap ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́. Báchyɛ̀ akap anɛ́ bɛkoŋo bɛbhé Moses. Arɛm nɔ yɛ̌ndu bo báchyɛ nyaka akap chi bɛkoŋo bɛbhé Moses.”
109 Kristo árɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, apɛt arɛm bɛ, “Ɛta Mandɛm, ghɔ́ mɛ́ nɛ́. Ntwɔ bɛ́kʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́yàŋ mɛnkʉ.” Kristo ǎtɔ̀ŋ ndǔ nɛrɛm anɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ bɛ Mandɛm afɛ́rɛ́ ɛsɨ́ akap, afyɛ́ anɛ akɔ.
1010 Nɛ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo ákʉ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ nyaka bɛ yi ankʉ, achyɛ mmʉɛt yi mbɔ akap ndɔŋ amɔt ndak amay, sɛ́rɔ́p chi pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm.
1011 Ndǔ nku nsɨ́, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nchiakap ǎte nyaka ndǔ bɛtɨk, ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ báchyɛ akap arɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔp, ndu bɛ́chyɛ nkúbhɛ́ akap anɛ apu kway bɛpɔkɔ bɛbʉ́ bho wáwák.
1012 Kɛ Kristo achyɛ mmʉɛt yi mbɔ akap ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ bho ndɔŋ amɔt nɛ akap wu ákwáy ndǔ mpoknkɛm. Akó yɛ amfay achɔkɔ amɛm mɔ́kɛt anɛ achi Nyáŋá, ɛbhě awɔ́nɛm Mandɛm.
1013 Arɛ́, ǎnoŋ Mandɛm ankʉ bǒmpap abhi mámbák mbɔ ɛnɔk ɛnɛ yi ányaŋa bɛkak arɛ.
1014 Nɔ́ kɛ ɛchi bɛ Kristo asɔt akap amɔt akʉ bo abhɛn Mandɛm ákʉ́ mambák abhi mánkwáy ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi bɛsí Mandɛm mpoknkɛm.
1015 Nɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ nkwɔ ǎtè ntísiɛ bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi tɛtɛp. Ayámbɨ arɛm bɛ,
1016 Mandɛm Acha arɛm bɛ, “Nɛ́ chi nku nkɔ anɛ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛnyu nɛ bǒbha mpok anɛ manywɔp ayɔ áfʉɛ́rɛ́. Chɔŋ mfyɛ́ bɛbhé bha amɛm batɨ yap, nsɨŋ bhɔ amɛm nkaysi yap.”
1017 Apɛt arɛm bɛ, “Mpú pɛrɛ tɨk chɔŋ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhap nɛ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bákʉ̀ wáwák!”
1018 Mánaŋ mámfóŋórí bɛbʉ́ bho, ntí apu pɛrɛ bhak anɛ bɔ báchyɛ akap. 
1019 Bɔ̌ma, tɛ̌ndu manoŋ Yesu árɔ́ŋɔ́ amɨk ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ, sɛ́kway yɛ bɛrɛm bɛ sɛ́bhɔŋ ngǎngaŋ bɛchwe ndǔ nɛbhʉɛ́t anɛ achi Nyáŋá.
1020 Yesu ánáŋá anɛnɛ ɛkat, achyɛ bhɛsɛ mbǐ akɔ anɛ nɛpɛ́m bɛ́ sɛ́nkwáy bɛ́fʉɛt arɛ́ sɛndɔk tɛ amɛm. Ɛkat ɛnɛ yi ánɛ́nɛ́ chi mmʉɛt yi anɛ yi áchyɛ́, ndu ágú ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ.
1021 Nɛ tɛ̌ndu sɛ́bhɔŋɔ Nnɛ́m Nchiakap nɛ yi kɛ ákɛ́mɛ́ ɛkɛrɛ́ Mandɛm,
1022 sɛ́ndɔ́k kɛkwɔt nɛ Mandɛm nɛ batɨ anɛ tɛtɛp nɛ sɛ́nsɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ ɛnyu ɛnɛ sɛpu pɛrɛ makati yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Sɛ́nkʉ nɔ mbɔnyunɛ Yesu anáŋ amyakati manoŋ ami ndǔ batɨ yɛsɛ nɛ áchí pɛ́pɛ́p, nɛ yɔ ápú pɛrɛ taŋ bhɛsɛ ndǔ yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Asó mmʉɛt ɛyɛsɛ nkwɔ nɛ manyiɛp amɛn abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ bakwap.
1023 Sɛ́nkɛ́m sayri nɛbhakántɨ ɛnɛn sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́twɔ̀ ambɨ ɛbhɛn sɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ sɛbhaka ntɨ arɛ́. Sɛ́kɛ́ makati mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm mmu afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛchyɛ bhɛsɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ ǎbhʉrɛ bariɛp ami.
1024 Sɛ́mfyɛ́ ntí bɛ́ghɔ ɛnyǔ sɛ́kwáy mɛnyɨkɨsi batɨ anɛ batɨ̌ bǒnkwɔ ɛnyu ɛnɛ bákway bɛbhɔŋ ɛkɔŋ nɛ bho nɛ mánkʉ nɔkɔ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ.
1025 Sɛ́kɛ́ fɛrɛ ntí ndu bɛchɛm nɛ batɨ mbɔ ɛnyǔ mbɔk bo bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛpɨŋ bɛkʉ. Ɛnyɨŋ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ chi bɛ sɛ́mfyɛ́ nɔkɔ batɨ ntɨ, sayri sayri, nɛ́nɛ, ɛnɛ́ nywɔp ɛnɛn Yesu átwɔ̀ nɛchi kɛkwɔt.
1026 Mbák sɛ́nchók batú, sɛ́ndɔ́k ambɨ bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́, ɛnɛ́ sɛ́náŋ sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ tɛtɛp anɛ Mandɛm, sɛ́ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ yɛ̌ akap achak apu anɛ ákway bɛkʉti bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛsɛ.
1027 Mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ nɔ, abhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛchak ɛnɛ yi ánoŋ, ɛbhɨkɨ fʉɛt chi mɛnoŋ nɛ bɛcháy manyé anɛ átwɔ̀ ambɨ nɛ ngó anɛ́ ádù gum gum gum anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛ́mɛn bǒmpap Mandɛm.
1028 Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ábyak nyaka ɛbhé Moses nɛ bo bati apay, yɛ̌ bati arat, mánte ntísiɛ bɛ akʉ nɔ tɛtɛp, báway yi kɛbhɔŋ ntínso nɛ yi.
1029 Ná nɛ mmu anɛ ábyak Mmɔ Mandɛm? Bǎkaysi bɛ ntɨkɨ ntɛ́msí anɛ ábɛ́bhɛ́ áchá ákwáy nɛ yi? Ɛnyǔ mmu wu ǎsɔ̀t manoŋ nku anɛ ákʉ́ yi ambak pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm mbɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛpú nyáŋá, nɛ ǎrɛm ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ mmu ákʉ̀ bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm mɛ́mbak nɛ bǒbhi.
1030 Sɛ́rɨŋɨ mmu anɛ árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ, “Mɛ kɛ nchí Nkɛmɛ kɛ́mbé.” Apɛt arɛm bɛ, “Chɔŋ Acha ántáŋ bǒbhi.”
1031 Bɛ́kwɛn amɔ́ Mandɛm mmu achi nɛpɛ́m chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́cháy.
1032 Tɨk ka manywɔp anɛ áfʉɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm, mpok bákʉ́ amɨ́k ánɛ́nɛ́ bhe. Mpok yɔ, bǎté kpirí ndǔ bɛyǎ bɛsɔŋɔri ndǔ mǎnù nɛ bhɔ.
1033 Mpok achi nyaka anɛ básɔ̀kɔti, manchyɛ nɔkɔ bhe nɛnyok bɛsí bho. Mpok achak bǎre té ansɛm bǒ abhɛn báchyɛ bhɔ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnyu yɔ.
1034 Bǎbhɔŋ nyaka ntínso nɛ bǒkɛnɔŋ. Nɛ mpok báfɔ̀ŋɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛka, bǎka nɛ maŋák bɛ mankʉ nɔ, ndǔ bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ bǎbhɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛcha ɛbhɔ, nɛ bɛ bɔ bɛ́bhak mpoknkɛm.
1035 Bǎkɛ́ rɔ yɛ nɛsɨkɨ ntɨ ɛnɛka. Nɛ́twɔ nɛ bɛyǎ nsáy.
1036 Bǎbhɔŋ yɛ bɛte kpirí bɛ mǎnkwáy bɛkoŋo nkaysi Mandɛm, mǎmbɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yí afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛchyɛ be.
1037 Mandɛm arɛm bɛ, “Mandú mpok, mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́twɔ, ǎtwɔ, nɛ apú chɔŋti mpok.
1038 Kɛ mmǔ wa anɛ achi chak ǎbhak chɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ndu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ mɛ. Kɛ mbák ánjá mmʉɛt ansɛm, mpú bhɔŋ maŋák nɛ yi.
1039 Kɛ mbák chi bɛsɛ, sɛ́pú bo abhɛn báyà mmʉɛt ansɛm mangu manɛm. Sɛ́chí chí bo abhɛn sɛ́bhɔ́ŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm, nɛ yi ǎpɛmɛ bhɛsɛ.”
11
111 Bɛbhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm chi yi? Chí nɛka anɛ mmu ákà bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi abhaka ntɨ bɛ chɔŋ ambɔ́ŋ ɛ́bhɔŋ bɛ́fákári, nɛ mɛ́nóko nɛ ntɨ nɛnkɛm bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmu apú ghɔ́ nɛ amɨ́k bɛ́chi tɛtɛp.
112 Nɛka ɛnɛn bo abhɛn tɛ nyaka kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ nyaka Mandɛm arɛm bɛ bɔ bákʉ sayri.
113 Nɛka kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ Mandɛm asɔt chi ɛyɔŋɔ́nyu ɛyi kɛ ǎghoko mmɨk. Ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́ghɔ̀ nɛ amɨ́k bɛ́fù chi ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmu apu kway bɛghɔ nɛ amɨ́k.
114 Nɛka Ábɛl kɛ nɛkʉ yi achyɛ nyaka Mandɛm akap anɛ́ ákwáy achá anɛ Ken. Nɛsɔt anɛ Mandɛm ásɔ́rɛ́ akap Ábɛl atɔ́ŋ bɛ aká bɛ Ábɛl achi chak bɛsí bhi. Yɛ̌ndu Ábɛl ágú, nɛka ɛni nɛ́kʉ abhʉɛt bɛrɛm kɛpɨ ntá yɛsɛ tɛ̌ ɛchɔŋ.
115 Nɛka ɛnɛn Ɛnɔk kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ Mandɛm asɔrɛ yi amfay ɛnɛ́ yi abhɨkɨ ghɔ́ nɛwú. Ɛ́kʉ yɛ̌ mmu kɛghɔ́ yi ndu Mandɛm anaŋ asɔrɛ nyaka yi. Kɛ Mandɛm ápɛ́rɛ́ sɔt Ɛnɔk, ánáŋ atɔŋ nyaka bɛ abhɔŋ maŋák nɛ yi.
116 Bǎghɔ yɛ bɛ mbák mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm, ɛ́pú kway bɛfakari bɛ Mandɛm ambɔŋ maŋák nɛ yi. Yɛ̌ agha anɛ árɔ̀ŋ kɛkwɔt nɛ Mandɛm abhɔŋ mɛ́nóko bɛ Mandɛm achi, nɛ bɛ ǎchyɛ̀ ǎkap yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ áyàŋ yi nɛ ntɨ ɛni nɛnkɛm.
117 Nɛka Nóa kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ bɛ, mpok Mandɛm ásɛ́mtí yi ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yɛ̌ mmu abhɨkɨ re ghɔ́ nyaka nɛ amɨ́k, anoko, aghoko ɛrɛm áchwí, achwe amɛm nɛ ɛfo ɛyi ɛnkɛm, Mandɛm apɛmɛ bhɔ. Nɛkʉ Nóa akʉ nɔ ɛghori ɛ́kwɛ́n amʉɛt bǒ mmɨk nɛ. Mandɛm asɔt bɛ Nóa achi chak ndu abhɔŋ nyaka nɛka.
118 Nɛka Ábraham kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ yi ákʉ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm aghati yi. Mpok Mandɛm ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ yi bɛ́ ámfá, ándɔ́k nɛbhʉɛt anɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛchyɛ yi, arɔ ɛtɔk ɛyi, are kɔ andɔk nɔkɔ, kɛrɨŋɨ atú anɛ́ yi árɔŋ.
119 Nɛka ɛni kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ yi achɔkɔ atú anɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛchyɛ yi. Abhak arɛ́, achɔkɔ ndu bɛ́tɛ́m mbɔ bɛ achi chi kɛnkɔ. Ɛnyumɔt, mɔ́ywi Áisek, nɛ ɛbhárɛ́ mɔ́ywi Jekɔ́p, bo Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛchyɛ bhɔ mmɨk yɔ nkwɔ, báchɔ́kɔ ndu bɛ́tɛ́m nɛ yi Ábraham.
1110 Ábraham achɔ́kɔ́ nyáká ndu bɛ́tɛ́m mbɔnyunɛ abháká nyaka ntɨ ndǔ ɛtɔk ɛnɛ ɛ́bhak mpoknkɛm ɛnɛ Mandɛm ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nkaysi ɛnyu ɛbhɔŋɔ bɛbhak, yímbɔŋ ate yɔ.
1111 Nɛka ɛnɛn Sará ngɔrɛ́ Ábraham kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ yi ákway nyaka bɛ́pɔ́kɔ mɛniɛ, yɛ̌ndu mamiɛ yi ánáŋ acha nyaka anɛ́ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ akway bɛpɔkɔ mɛniɛ. Ɛ́bhak ɛnyu yɔ mbɔnyunɛ anókó nyaka bɛ Mandɛm achi Mmǔ tɛtɛp, nɛ ǎbhʉ̀rɛ bariɛp ami.
1112 Mpok yɔ, Ábraham anáŋ akɔk nyaka tontó, ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ yi apu pɛrɛ kway bɛbhɔŋ bɔ. Yɛ̌ nɔ, bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ bhi báyá kpát mbɔ mambě mfay nɛ mbɔ ɛ̌siɛ́p ɛnɛ ɛchi angɔkɔnyɛ́n ɛnyu ɛnɛ yɛ̌ mmu apu kway bɛpay bhɔ.
1113 Bǒbhɛn mankɛm babhɔ̌ŋ nyaka nɛka nɛ Mandɛm tɛ ndiɛrɛ nɛwú. Nɛ yɛ̌ mmu wap abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nyaka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛchyɛ bhɔ. Bághɔ̀ nyaka bhɔ ghɔ tɛ nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ, bábhɔŋ bɛyǎ maŋák mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ báchi chi mankɔ abhɛn báfʉ̀ɛrɛ fʉɛt fá amɨk.
1114 Nɛ bo abhɛn bárɛ̀m ɛnyu ɛyɔ bátɔ̀ŋ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ́ báyàŋ ɛtɔk ɛnɛ bɔ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ ɛyap.
1115 Mbɔ ɛtɔk ɛnɛ bɔ báfú arɛ kɛ̌ bákàysi, mbʉ́ báyàŋ nyaka mbi bɛpɛtnsɛm arɛ́.
1116 Báyàŋ nyaka chi ɛtɔk ɛnɛ ɛ́rɨ́ ɛ́chá, nɔ chi ɛnɛ ɛchí amfay. Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ̌ ntíánwɔ́p apu nɛ Mandɛm bɛ bɔ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ yi bɛ Mandɛm awap. Sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ nɔ mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm aghókó ɛtɔk abhʉrɛ ntá yap.
1117 Nɛka Ábraham kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ bɛ mpok Mandɛm áchyɛ́ yi nɛmɔ ndu aghati yi bɛ ándɔ́k ánchyɛ́ mɔ́ywi Áisek mbɔ akap, Ábraham mmu Mandɛm afyɛ́ yi bariɛp, aka bɛchyɛ njaŋa mɔ́ywi mbɔ akap.
1118 Aka bɛkʉ nɔ yɛ̌ndu Áisek ɛ́rɛ kɛ̌ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka Ábraham bariɛp ɛ̌ti yi bɛ, “Áisek kɛ achi mmɔ́ anɛ ákʉ chɔŋ ɔ́mbɔŋ bɛyǎ bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ.”
1119 Ábraham anoko bɛ́ yɛ Áisek agǔ gu, Mandɛm ǎkway bɛkʉ bawú mampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Sɛ́kway yɛ bɛrɛm bɛ Áisek achí nyaka chi mbɔ mmu anɛ ánáŋ ágú kɛ Mandɛm akʉ yi afú ndǔ nɛwú, apɛtnsɛm ntá ɛtayi.
1120 Nɛka Áisek kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ yi áyɛ́rɛ́ nyaka bɔ̌bhi Jekɔ́p nɛ Isau, aghati bhɔ ɛ̌ti áfɔ́k anɛ átwɔ ansɛm.
1121 Nɛ nɛka ɛnɛn Jekɔ́p nɛ Mandɛm kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ yi áyɛ́rɛ́ bɔ̌mɔ́ywi Josɛ́f bati apay mpok yi arɔbhɛ kɛkwɔt bɛgu, aghɔkɔ mmʉɛt ndǔ ntɛm ɛni, achyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó.
1122 Nɛka ɛnɛn Josɛ́f nɛ Mandɛm kɛ̌ nɛ́kʉ́ bɛ́ mpok yi arɔbhɛ chi bɛ́gu, arɛm ɛ̌ti nɛfú anɛ bo Israɛl bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛfu ɛtɔk Íjip, nɛ aghati bhɔ bɛ mpok bɔ báfù, mánsɔt bɛghɛp ɛbhi mandɔk nɛ bhɔ.
1123 Nɛka ɛnɛn chi nɛ nnɔ Moses kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ bábhɛ́sɛ́ yi anywɔ́p ndǔ bataŋ arat mpok bábhé yi, bɛ́ bákɛ́ way yi. Bákʉ nɔ ndǔ bághɔ́ bɛ Moses arɨ acha, bɔ kɛchay bɛkwɛn ɛbhé Mfɔ Íjip.
1124 Nɛka Moses nɛ Mandɛm kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ bɛ mpok yi ágó aghaka ɛsakámu akɛ ka bo mámbɨ́ŋɨ́ yi bɛ mmɔ̌ mɔ̌mfɔ Íjip anɛ ngɔrɛ́.
1125 Arɛm bɛ ɛchi sayri bɛbhɔŋ ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ bo Mandɛm ɛcha mɛ́nyiɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn bɛbʉ́ ndu mɔ́mbɨŋɨ mpok.
1126 Aghɔ̌ nyaka bɛ ɛ́rɨ mámbyak yi ɛ̌ti Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò ɛcha yi bɛbhɔŋ kɛnɛ́m ɛtɔk Íjip. Ɛ́bhak ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ yi ǎnòŋ nyaka chi akap anɛ átwɔ̀ ambɨ.
1127 Nɛka Moses nɛ Mandɛm kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ yi arɔ ɛtɔk Íjip kɛcháy bɛběntɨ Mfɔ Íjip. Akɛ́pntɨ, arɔk mbɔ bɛ yi ǎghɔ̀ nyaka Mandɛm mmǔ bo bápú ghɔ nɛ amɨ́k.
1128 Nɛka Moses nɛ Mandɛm kɛ̌ nɛ́kʉ́ yi ághátí bo Israɛl bɛ mámbʉ́rɛ́ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ. Arɛm bɛ bɔ mámyákátì manoŋ mɔ́mɛn amfay ndǔ bɛchɨ́kɨ́ mfay ɛbhɛn babhǐnywɔp ayap, bɛ ángɛl Mandɛm anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛway yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mɔ̌mbɨ bo Íjip, ánáŋ ángáká ndǔ ɛkɛt ɛnɛ́ mmu Israɛl, ankɨŋɨ, kɛtɔk yɛ̌ mmɔ́ wap.
1129 Nɛka kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ bo Israɛl bákɔ́ bápé manyu anɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ Manyu Chu mpok ákɔ́rɛ́ mbɨŋ ɛpay, ɛ́rɔp mbɔ bɛ bákɔ̀ chi ndǔ mmɨk anɛ nnyɛ́n nɛ́pú fʉɛt arɛ. Kɛ mpok bo Íjip mámɔ́ bɛkʉ ɛnyumɔt, nnyɛ́n nɛ́gbókó nɛ́pɔ́kɔ bhɔ mankɛm.
1130 Nɛka ɛnɛ́n bo Israɛl nɛ Mandɛm kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ bákɔ́ bághábhɛ́rí ɛtɔk Jɛríko ndǔ manywɔp tándrámɔt, nkok anɛ́ ákábhɛ́ ɛtɔk, ámóko akwɛn.
1131 Nɛka ɛnɛn ngɔrɛ́-nɛkɔ anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Ráhab kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ yi ásɔ́rɛ́ nyaka bǒ abhɛn bárɔ́ŋɔ́ ndu bɛghokoti kɛpɨ abhɛsɛ amɛm ɛkɛt ɛyi, yí kɛgú mpok amɔt nɛ bo abhɛn bapú ghok nyaka Mandɛm.
1132 Mbák ndɔk ambɨ bɛ́rɛm ɛ̌ti bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka nɛka nɛ Mandɛm, nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bákʉ́, nchí rɛm ngaka fá? Mpok apu bɛrɛm ɛ̌ti Gidiɔn, nɛ Bárak, nɛ Samsɨn, nɛ Jɛ́fta, nɛ Debhít, nɛ Samuɛl nɛ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ mankɛm bachak mankɛm nkwɔ.
1133 Nɛka ɛnɛn bǒ bho bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka nɛ Mandɛm kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ mbɔk ayap mánú nɛ bɛtɔk bɛchak básɔt awɔ́nɛm. Báchák bákɛ́m ɛtɔk ɛnyu ɛnɛ ɛchi chak, nɛ bábhɔ́ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛchyɛ bhɔ. Nɛka ɛnɛ́n abhɛ́nɛ́fú nɛ́kʉ́ manyǔ anɛ́ nkʉ áchók.
1134 Mbɔk yap mánɛ́mɛ ngó anɛ ádù gum gum gum, wu kɛsɔŋ bhɔ. Mbɔk yap bábʉ́ɛ bǒ abhɛn báyàŋ nyaka bɛway bhɔ nɛ akparɛnja. Yɛ̌ndu bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nyaka bɛtaŋ, bɛtaŋ bɛ́kó bɔ amʉɛt. Mbɔk bábhák bɛtaŋtí batɛmɛ́ nɛnu abhɛ́n mánú básɔt awɔ́nɛm amfǎy nkwɔ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu abhɛn bɛtɔk bɛchak, nɛ bákʉ́ nkwɔ wu bábʉɛ́.
1135 Nɛka nɛ́kʉ́ mbɔk baghɔrɛ́ bághɔ́ ndǔ bǒbhap abhɛn bágú bápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Bádɛ́n mbɔk kpát bágú, yɛ̌ nɔ, bɔ kɛka bɛ́fɛ́rɛ ntɨ nɛ Mandɛm bɛ mamfɛrɛ bhɔ amɔ́. Báká bɛ ɛ́rɨ tontó bɛ bɔ mángú bɛ́ Mandɛm ankʉ bɔ mampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛ́rɨ nɛcha.
1136 Bo básɔ́kɔ́ti mbɔk yap, nɛ bádákáti nsɛm ɛyap nɛ bɛkpa. Báfyɛ́ báchák ngɛm amɔ́ nɛ mamɛsɛ bhɔ amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ.
1137 Bátɛ́mti mbɔk nɛ batay baway, bákpɔ́t abhɛ́nɛ́fú mbɨŋ ɛpay nɛ nsɔ̌. Báwáy báchák nɛ bɔ akparɛnja. Mbɔk yap báré kɔ nɛ nkwɔbhɛ́mɛ́n amʉɛt mbɔ ɛyap ndɛn, nɛ babhak ndu kɛchɛp. Bo báré chyɛ bhɔ nɛnyok nɛ bɛsɔŋɔri mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu.
1138 Bárɔ́bhɛ bóŋóbóŋ amɛm ɛbhɨ nɛ ndǔ mmɨk njiɛ, mámbɛsɛ nɔkɔ amɛm bɔbasɛm nɛ amɛm babhok. Mmɨkɨ nɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ kway nyaka nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bɛrɨ́tí bo mbɔ bhɔ bábhak arɛ.
1139 Ɛ̌ti nɛka ɛnap, Mandɛm arɛm bɛ bǒbhɔ mankɛm bákʉ́ sayri. Yɛ̌ nɔ, yɛ̌ mmu wap amɔt akɛ bhɔ́ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛchyɛ bhɔ.
1140 Mandɛm abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́rɨ́ bɛ́chá antɨ ntá yap, nɛ bɔ bɛchi ntá yɛsɛ nkwɔ. Nɛ ɛchi bɛ bɛsɛ́ nɛ bhɔ sɛ́chɛm nɛbhʉɛt amɔt kɛ bɛsɛ mankɛm sɛ́nkwáy ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi bɛsí Mandɛm.
12
121 Mbák chí bɛsɛ, bɛyǎ batísiɛ bakap bhɛsɛ. Ndu ɛchi nɔ, sɛ́ndɔ́ yɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́nwɔ̀p bhɛsɛ, nɛ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛn bɛ́gwɔ̀t bɛsɛ, sɛ́njɛt ntiɛt anɛ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́jɛt nɛ ɛkɨ́kɨ́.
122 Ndu sɛ́jɛ̀t, sɛ́ntɛ́p amɨ́k amʉɛt Yesu. Yí kɛ ánɛ́nɛ́ mbi bɛ sɛmbɔŋ nɛka nɛ yi. Nɛ yírɛ kɛ̌ nɛka ɛnɛsɛ́ nɛ́jwi pɔɔt mbɔ ɛnyu nɛbhɔŋɔ bɛbhak. Aká nyaka bɛgu ndǔ ɛkotákátí, abyák ntíánwɔ́p anɛ achi ndu ɛnyǔ nɛwú ɛnɔ, mbɔnyunɛ arɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka bɛ maŋák achi ambɨ amɛn Mandɛm abhʉ́rɛ́ ntá yi. Nɛ́nɛ, achí ɛbhe awɔ́nɛm Mandɛm ndu ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ̌ ɛyi.
123 Kaysí ka Yesu mmu bǒ bɛbʉ́ báre kʉ yi bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ, yɛ̌ nɔ ate kpirí ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ mɛnkɛm, bɛ batɨ ákɛ́ nɛ́m be amɛm, mǎmfɛrɛ amɔ.
124 Ndú nɛnu ɛnɛn mǎnù nɛ bɛbʉ́, yɛ̌ mmu ywɛka abhɨ́kɨ́ re chyɛ ntí ɛ̌ti nɛnu ɛnɔ.
125 Bǎghɔ́kɔ́ntɨk ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm ághátí bhe mbɔ bɔ̌bhi ndu bɛ́fyɛ bhe ntɨ? Arɛm nyaka bɛ “Mɔ́wa, ɔ́kɛ́ sɔt mbɔ ɛráká ndak, nɛnyurɛ anɛ Acha ányùrɛ wɔ, nɛ ɔ́kɛ́ rɔ ntɨ nɛ́nɛ́m wɔ amɛm, mpok yi áchyɛ̀ wɔ ntɛ́msí.
126 Dɨŋɨ́ bɛ Acha ǎnyurɛ mmu anɛ yi akɔŋɔ, nɛ ǎtɛmsi yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ anɛ yí ásɔ́rɛ́ bɛ mɔ́ywi.”
127 Kɛ́p yɛ́ ka ntɨ ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ bǎghɔ̀. Chi mbi anɛ Mandɛm ányùrɛ bhe. Ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ Mandɛm asɔt be mbɔ bɔ̌bhi. Ntɨkɨ mmɔ́ ɛtayi apu nyurɛ yi mbák ákʉ́ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ?
128 Mbák Mandɛm apu nyurɛ bhe mpok anɛ bǎkʉ́ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi ákʉ̀ nɛ bɔ̌bhi mankɛm, nɔ bǎpú bɔ̌bhi tɛtɛp. Nɔ nɔ bǎchi chi mbɔ bɔ̌-ɛnɔŋ.
129 Nɛ ndu bɛ́rɔŋ ambɨ, mpok bɔtáyɛsɛ abhɛn fá amɨ́k báchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ ntɛmsi ndǔ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ ɛbhɛn sɛ́kʉ̀, sɛ́chyɛ̀ bhɔ kɛnókó, ná nɛ Ɛtayɛsɛ anɛ amfay? Sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛchyɛ yi mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛfóŋó ɛbhɛsɛ kɛnókó ɛncha, nɛ chɔŋ sɛ́mbɔŋ nɛpɛ́m.
1210 Bɔtayɛsɛ mányùrɛ nyaka bhɛsɛ ndu mɔ́mbɨŋɨ mpok mbɔ ɛnyǔ bɔ́ bághɔ́ bɛ ɛ́rɨ ntá yɛsɛ. Mbák chi Mandɛm, nɛnyurɛ anɛ yi ányùrɛ bɛsɛ achi ndu bɛkʉ bhɛsɛ bɛrɨ mbɔnyunɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́kwak bhɛsɛ sɛmbak nyáŋá mbɔ yímbɔŋ.
1211 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ mányùrɛ mmu ɛ́bhak ntá yi mbɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛbhɨkɨ rɨ, puyɛ̌ mbɔ ɛnɛ ɛrɨ. Kɛ ansɛm mpok, bo abhɛn bághɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛkɔ mpok anɛ mányùrɛ bhɔ, bákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chak bɛsí Mandɛm, nɛ kpák ǎbhak amɛm batɨ yap. 
1212 Tɛ̌ndu bǎrɨŋɨ ɛnyu ɛyɔ, kʉ́ ka amɔ ywɛka anɛ áwɛ̀t ántáŋ ndu bɛkʉ bɛtɨk. Tɛ̌ ka sɛnɛ́ bɛ bɛkak ɛbhɛka bɛ́kɛ́ pɛrɛ wɛt gbagbǎgbak.
1213 Kɔ nɔ́kɔ́ ká ndǔ babhi anɛ achi chak. Bo abhɛn bɛkak ɛbhap bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ sɛnɛ amɨk mánkóŋó babhi yɔ́, nɛ chɔŋ maŋɔk ayap anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ taŋ, ántaŋ.
1214 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka ánú bɛbhak kpák nɛ bo mankɛm, anu bɛbhak nyáŋá bɛsí Mandɛm, mbɔnyunɛ mmu anɛ apu nyáŋá apú kway bɛghɔ Acha.
1215 Kʉ ká yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ bɛ yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́ rɔ bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm mɛmfʉɛt yi. Kʉ ka yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ bɛ yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́ nɛn mbɔ kɛ́ngɔ́-bɛchi. Mɛnyǔ bo bhɔ bátwɔ̀ nɛ ɛsɔŋɔri mánchɔŋti bapɛ́m bɛyǎ bho.
1216 Kʉ ka yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ bɛ yɛ̌ mmu ywɛka akɛ chwe ndǔ barak ɛpúsí nɛ bɛ yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́ bhák anɛ apu bhɔŋ mpok nɛ Mandɛm, mbɔ Isau mmu átí kɛsénsí ɛki ntá manɔ anɛ mɔ́nkwɛn ɛ̌ti nchaŋ nɛnyíɛ́ amɔt.
1217 Bǎbhɔŋ bɛrɨŋɨ bɛ mpok anɛ yi ánáŋ ákʉ́ nɔ, are yaŋ bɛ ɛtayap ánjɛ́t yi mmu achi nsensi, kɛ ɛtayap anisi mbɔnyunɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nyaka mbi bɛyibhiri ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákú yɛ̌ndu mɔ́wu áyàŋ nyaka áfɔ́k nɛ babhɛsɛ amɨ́k.
1218 Tɨk ka nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bǎté arɛ ndu bɛrɔŋ kɛkwɔt nɛ Mandɛm. Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ te chi ndu nɛbhʉɛt anɛ mmu ákway bɛtɔk nɛ awɔ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bo Israɛl báté nyaka anɛrɛ́-njiɛ Sináy, mángɔ́ nɔkɔ ndǔ ngó ádù amfǎy njiɛ gum gum gum, bághɔ́ ɛjuri ɛnɛ ɛ́giri pyɔɔ ndu ɛ́chwé, mbaŋ kɛpɛrɛ ghɔ, nɛ mbʉ́ɛ́p ataŋataŋ ánu nɔkɔ.
1219 Nɛ bághók ɛtaŋtí ɛyɔŋɔ́ mmba, nɛ bághók Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm nkwɔ. Bɛcháy bɛ́kɛ́m bɔ, bábho mɛnɨkmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm andɔ bɛrɛm kɛpɨ nɛ bhɔ,
1220 mbɔnyunɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ághátí bhɔ chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛcha bɛtaŋ ɛbhap. Ǎghàti nyaka bhɔ bɛ “Mbák mmu antɔk njiɛ-nɛ, tɛmtí ká yi nɛ batay mǎngwáy, yɛ̌ chi nnya, tɛmtí ká wáy mbák atɔk njiɛ nɛ.”
1221 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bɔ bághɔ́ ɛ́bhak ɛnyɨŋ bɛ́chay tontó, kpát Moses yímbɔŋ arɛm bɛ, “Mmʉɛt ǎwɛt mɛ gbagbǎghak nɛ bɛcháy.”
1222 Kɛ mbák chí bhe, bǎtwɔ̀ kɛkwɔt nɛ njiɛ Síɔn nɛ yɔ chi ɛtɔk Mandɛm mmu achi nɛpɛ́m. Ɛtɔk ɛyɔ chi Yerúsalɛm anɛ amfay. Ngɛ́mtay bɔángɛl Mandɛm báchí arɛ́ ndǔ ɛpǎ maŋák.
1223 Bǎtwɔ́ ndǔ ɛchɛmɛ bɔ̌mbɨ Mandɛm abhɛn yi ásɨ́ŋɨ́ manyɛ́n ayap amɛm ɛkáti ɛyi amfay. Bǎtwɔ́ ntá Mandɛm mmu átàŋ bho mankɛm. Bǎtwɔ́ bǎchɛm nɛ bɛfóŋó bo abhɛn bayambɨ bátwɔ́. Chí bɛfóŋó bo abhɛn bachi chak, abhɛn Mandɛm ákʉ̀ bákwáy ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi bɛsí bhi.
1224 Bǎtwɔ́ ntá Yesu mmu áté nɛntɨ Mandɛm nɛ bǒ mmɨk kɛ Mandɛm anyú nku nkɔ nɛ bhɔ. Bǎtwɔ́ ndǔ manoŋ Yesu amɛn yi amyakati be amʉɛt.   Manoŋ mi atéé ndu ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́rɨ́ ɛchá ɛnɛ́ manoŋ Ábɛl atee ndu ntí ywi.
1225 Sɔt ká mpok bɛ bǎkɛ byak mmǔ anɛ ághàti bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn. Bo Israɛl báchòk nyaka batú ntá mmu anɛ áyɛ̀p bhɔ batú fá amɨk. Mbák bɔ́ bápú kway nyaka bɛ́bʉɛ bɛ bákɛ́ chwe ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri, nɔ chɔŋ ɛntaŋ mbɔŋ ɛncha bɛ sɛ́mbʉ́ɛ mbák sɛ́byàk mmu anɛ achi amfay, nɛ áyɛ̀p bhɛsɛ batú?
1226 Ndu mpok ɛyɔ, Mandɛm ǎrɛm nyaka kɛpɨ, mmɨk anyɨkɨsi, kɛ nɛ́nɛ afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛ, “Chɔŋ nkʉ mmɨk anyɨkɨsi ndɔŋ achak gbogbǒgbok, nɛ puyɛ̌ mmɨk yɔ́yɔ́, kɛ mfǎy nkwɔ.”
1227 Ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ bɛ, “Ndɔŋ achak” ɛ́tɔŋ bhɛsɛ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm amfɛrɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kway mɛnyɨkɨsi, mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn yi ághókó, bɛ ɛbhɛn bɛpu nyɨkɨsi mɛ́ndɔp.
1228 Sɛ́nkáká yɛ Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ ákʉ́ bɛ sɛ́mbák bo abhɛn yi achi Mfɔ wap, nɛ kɛfɔ ɛki kɛ́pú ɛkɛn mmu ákway mɛnyɨkɨsi. Ndu ɛ́chí nɔ, sɛ́nchíɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó ɛkɛn kɛ́chyɛ̀ yi maŋák, sɛ́nsɛpti mmʉɛt bɛsí bhi, sɛ́mbɔ́ŋ bɛcháy bɛsí bhi,
1229 mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm ayɛsɛ achí ngó anɛ ásɔ́ŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ.
13
131 Dɔ́k ká ambɨ bɛkɔŋ batɨ nɛ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ bakoŋó Kristo.
132 Bǎkɛ́ nɔ́k bɛsyɛpti mankɔ, sayri mbɔnyunɛ mbɔk bho básìɛpti nyaka mankɔ nɛ ɛ́fákári bɛ básiɛ́pti bɔángɛl kɛrɨŋɨ bɛ chi bɔángɛl.
133 Kaysí nɔ́kɔ́ ka bo abhɛn báchí ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ mbɔ bɛ bǎchi arɛ nɛ bhɔ. Kaysí nɔ́kɔ́ ka bo abhɛn batɨ̌ bakwǎŋwaŋ báchyɛ bhɔ ɛsɔŋɔri, tɛ̌ndu be nkwɔ bǎkwáy bɛbhɔŋ ɛsɔŋɔri bɔ bhɔ.
134 Bo mankɛm bábhɔŋ bɛkɛm nɛbhay nɛ kɛnókó. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ngɔrɛ́ abhɔŋ bɛbhak tɛtɛp nɛ nnɛ́m, yí kɛkwɛ́n bɛrwɔp, nnɛ́m nkwɔ abhɔŋ bɛbhak ɛnyumɔt, mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm apú rɔ bɛ́táŋ mmu anɛ ákʉ́ ɛpúsí nɛ nkwɛnɛ́ bɛrwɔp.
135 Bǎkɛ́ nyiɛ ɛkɔŋ nɛ nkáp. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu abhɔŋ bɛbhak maŋák nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm yímbɔŋ arɛm bɛ, “Mpú kway bɛrɔ wɔ, mpú kway bɛfɛrɛ ntí nɛ wɔ.”
136 Ndu ɛ́chí nɔ, sɛ́kwáy bɛrɛm nɛ ntɨ̌ nɛnkɛm bɛ, “Mandɛm Acha achi nkwak wa, mpú chay yɛ̌nyɨŋ, mmu ǎkway bɛkʉ mɛ yi?”
137 Kaysí ka bǒbati bhɛka, bɔ́ bho bághàti nyaka bhe Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm. Kaysí ká bɛrɨ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnap, mǎmbɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm mbɔ bhɔ.
138 Yesu Kristo achí ɛnyumɔt ɛyu, nɛ ɛchɔŋ, nɛ mpoknkɛm.
139 Mbɔk bho bátɔ̀ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi bɛkɔ nɛ kɛkúrí. Bǎkɛ́ rɔ yɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ́ bátɔ̀ŋ mɛ́mpɔ́kɔ́ bhe mǎngúrɛ́ ɛbhɨ. Ɛrɨ bɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm mɛ́nkʉ batɨ yɛsɛ antaŋ, puyɛ̌ chí bɛbhé ɛ̌ti nɛnyíɛ́. Bɛbhé bhɔ bɛ́pú kwak bo abhɛn bákòŋo bhɔ.
1310 Sɛ́bhɔŋ ɛ́fɛ́mɛ́ akap ɛnɛ bachiǎkap abhɛn bákʉ̀ nyaka bɛtɨk amɛm ɛtɛm bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngǎngaŋ bɛsɔt ɛnyɨŋ arɛ manyíɛ́.
1311 Mǔngo bachiǎkap ǎsɔt nyaka manoŋ nnya anɛ báwáy ndu bɛchyɛ akap anchwe amɛm nɛbhʉɛt anɛ áchí nyáŋá anchyɛ akap bɛ Mandɛm amfoŋori bɛbʉ́ bho. Kɛ mbák chi mbɔ̌ŋ nnya ɛnɛ báwáy, báfu nyaka ɛtɔk nɛ yɔ kɛ mánsɔŋ. Bápú sɔ́ŋ yɔ́ amɛm ɛtɔk.
1312 Ɛnyu yɔ nkwɔ kɛ ɛ́chí nyaka nɛ Yesu. Aghɔ̌ nyaka ɛsɔŋɔri, agu chi nɛfí, puyɛ̌ amɛm ɛtɔk. Akʉ nɔ bɛ manoŋ mi ankʉ bo mámbák nyáŋá.
1313 Sɛ́mfú yɛka amɛm ɛtɔk sɛndɔk sɛntɛmɛri yi nɛfí, sɛ́mbɔŋ ntíánwɔ́p anɛ́ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka.
1314 Sɛ́ndɔ́k mbɔnyunɛ sɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ɛtɔk ɛnɛ ɛbhak mpoknkɛm fá amɨk. Sɛ́yàŋ chi ɛtɔk ɛnɛ ɛbhɔŋɔ bɛ́twɔ.
1315 Ndǔ nnyɛ́n Yesu, sɛ́nchíɛ nɔ́kɔ́ Mandɛm bakak mbɔ aywɛsɛ akap. Akap wu chí nɛrɛm anɛ sɛ́rɛm nɛ manyu yɛsɛ bɛ yi kɛ achi Acha.
1316 Bǎkɛ́ rɔ bɛkʉ bɛrɨ, nɛ bɛkwak batɨ nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎbhɔŋɔ. Ɛnyǔ akap wu kɛ Mandɛm ábhɔŋ maŋák nɛ wu.
1317 Ghók nɔ́kɔ́ ka bǒbati bhɛka, mǎmbɔ́ŋ nɛsɛptǐmʉɛt bɛsí bhap, mbɔnyunɛ bɔ kɛ báyɨ̀ŋɨ bhe, mbɔ bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́ghátí Mandɛm ɛnyu bɔ bákɛ́mɛ́ bhe. Ghók nɔ́kɔ́ ká bhɔ bɛ mánkʉ bɛtɨk ɛbhap nɛ maŋák, nɛ bɛ bɔ bákɛ́ bhɔŋ kɛsɔ́ti.
1318 Nɨk nɔ́kɔ́ ká mmʉɛt ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ. Sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ batɨ yɛsɛ achi pɛ́pɛ́p, nɛ sɛ́yaŋ bɛbhak chak ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́kʉ̀.
1319 Nchí ghati bhe nɛ ntɨ ɛna nɛnkɛm bɛ mǎnɨ́k nɔ́kɔ́ mmʉɛt ɛ̌ti ya bɛ Mandɛm ankwak mɛ mpɛt ntwɔ ntá yɛka mandú mpok.
1320 Mandɛm mmu ákʉ̀ bɛ batɨ ayɛsɛ ambak amɛm kpák, ámbák nɛ bhe. Yi kɛ ákʉ́ Acha yɛsɛ Yesu Kristo áfú ndǔ nɛwú, apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Yi, Yesu, chi Mbabhɛri bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n ngo, anɛ ábhabhɛri bo Mandɛm mankɛm. Ɛ́chí ɛnyu yɔ mbɔnyunɛ manoŋ ɛmi arɔŋ nyaka amɨk ndu bɛkʉ bɛ nku anɛ Mandɛm ányú nɛ bo ánté mpoknkɛm.
1321 Mandɛm ánchyɛ́ bhe yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛrɨ́tí ɛnyɨŋ, bɛ mǎnkóŋó nɔ́kɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi áyàŋ mǎnkʉ. Mandɛm ankʉ Yesu Kristo ankwak be mǎnkʉ́ nɔ́kɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chyɛ yi maŋák. Sɛ́nchíɛ Yesu Kristo bakak mpoknkɛm ɛ̌ti kɛnɛ́m ɛki. Amen. 
1322 Bɔ̌ma, mpɛt nchí ghati bhe bɛ mǎnsɔt ɛyɔŋ ɛya ɛnɛ nsɨ́ŋɨ́ ndu bɛ́fyɛ bhe ntɨ nɛ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ. Mbɨ́kɨ́ sɨŋ ɛrɔ́rí ɛkáti.
1323 Nchí yaŋ mǎndɨŋɨ bɛ báfɛ́rɛ́ mɔmáyɛsɛ Tímɔti ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ. Mbák yi antwɔ ayak, chɔŋ ntwɔ́ nɛ yi ndu bɛghɔ bhe.
1324 Kaká ká bǒbati bhɛka mankɛm, nɛ bo Mandɛm báchák mankɛm. Bǒnkwɔ abhɛn báfú Itali bátó bhe bakak.
1325 Bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm mɛ́mbak nɛ bhe mankɛm.13
1 
11 Mɛ Jems, mmɔ̌bɛtok Mandɛm nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha kɛ̌ nchí sɨ́ŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Nchí sɨ́ŋ ntá yɛká bǒ Mandɛm, bě bho bǎtaka ndǔ bɛtɔkɔ́ mmɨk mɛnkɛm. Nchí tó be mankɛm bakak. 
12 Bɔ̌ma, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ́ ɛ́tɛ́mɛ́rí mmu ywɛka ámbɔ́ŋ chi maŋák,
13 mbɔnyunɛ bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ mbák mamɔ ántwɔ́, mǎndɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ bɛtɔŋ bɛ bǎbhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm tɛtɛp, ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ mǎnté kpirí nɛ Mandɛm tɛndǔ ngwɛ́nti ɛ́ncha ɛnyu ɛsɨ́.
14 Bǎbhɔŋ yɛ́ bɛ́té kpirí tɛ ndǔ ngwɛnti bɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́nkʉ mǎngó mǎnjwi pɔɔt, mmǔ ywɛka kɛbhák mbɔk bɛyɨŋɨ bɛpɨŋɨ́ bo Mandɛm.
15 Kɛ mbák mmǔ ywɛka achɛp kɛboŋ bɛrɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ yi abhɔŋɔ bɛkʉ, ánɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm nɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm anchyɛ yi kɛboŋ. Nɛ bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ Mandɛm apɛrɛ́ chyɛ mmu ɛnyɨŋ, ǎchyɛ yi nɛ ntɨ nɛmɔt, kɛyáŋ bɛji mmu.
16 Kɛ mmu apɛrɛ́ nɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm, ánókó bɛ́ Mandɛm ǎghok yi. Ákɛ́ makati wawak, mbɔnyunɛ mmu anɛ ánɨ̀kmʉɛt amakati nɔkɔ achí mbɔ mpɛ́rɛ́nyɛ́n ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chi amɛm manyu. Mpok anɛ mbʉ́ɛ́p áfòk, ádɛ̀p yɔ́ ántɛn nɔkɔ ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ wú árɔ̀ŋ.
17 Ɛnyǔ mmu wu, mmu batɨ ápáy, ákɛ́ kaysi bɛ ǎkwáy mɛnɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm ambɔ́ŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi áyàŋ.
18 Nɔ́ kɛ ɛ́chí nɛ mmu batɨ ápáy mbɔnyunɛ apú te kákáti ndǔ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ yí ákʉ̀. 
19 Mmu Mandɛm anɛ áchí nchɛ́bhɛ́ mmu, ámbɔ́ŋ maŋák bɛ́ Mandɛm akósí yí ndǔ ákʉ́ yí ámbák mmu ywi.
110 Kɛ mbák chí mǔnkáp ámbɔ́ŋ maŋák chí bɛ́ Mandɛm asɛ́ptí yí, akʉ yi ángɔ́ bɛ́ áchí nchɛ́bhɛ́ mmu bɛsí Mandɛm. Nchí rɛm nɔ mbɔnyunɛ bǒ bakáp báfʉɛ̀t mandú mpok mbɔ bɔchuchu ndu tákɔ. Bábhak sayri, kɛ mandú mpok mángu.
111 Ǎgu mbɔnyunɛ mpok mmok áfú, átíɛ́ nɛ bɛtaŋ, ánku tákɔ ansɔŋɔ, bɔchuchu mánkuri, bɛrɨ̌ bhap mɛ́may mɛnkɛm. Ɛ́chí ɛnyumɔt nɛ mǔnkáp. Yɛ̌ chí mpok anɛ yi áyàŋ nkáp, ɛyi ɛ́kwáy mɛ́máy. 
112 Ɛ́rɨ ɛchá ntá mmu anɛ ápú rɔ bɛ́sɨ́kɨ ntɨ nɛ Yesu Kristo ndǔ átè kpirí mpok bɛsɔŋɔri bɛ́twɔ̀ ntá yi. Ɛrɨ ntá yi mbɔnyunɛ ǎnu kpát ansɔt awɔ́nɛm, Mandɛm anchyɛ yí akap anɛ́ yi afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛ́chyɛ́ bǒ abhɛn bákɔ́ŋ yi, nɔ chi, nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
113 Nɛ dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ mmu anɛ nɛmɔ nɛ́twɔ̀ ntá yí, nɛ ǎyàŋ bɛ́kʉ bɛbʉ́, ákɛ́ rɛm bɛ́ “Mandɛm kɛ̌ átó mɛ́ nɛmɔ ɛnɛn.” Yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ́pú kway mɛmɔ Mandɛm ɛ́ntɛn yi ndǔ bɛbʉ́. Nɛ yímbɔŋ Mandɛm apú kwáy mɛmɔ yɛ̌ mmu bɛ ánkʉ bɛbʉ́.
114 Nkaysi mbʉ́mbʉ anɛ áchí mmu antɨ kɛ áyà mmu ankwɛ́n ndǔ nta anɛ nɛmɔ bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́.
115 Nkaysi bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́, ánáŋ yɛ ángó, ánjwi mmu antɨ, ǎtó yí ndǔ bɛbʉ́, nɛ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɔ mɛ́náŋ mɛ́njwí ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛni, nɔ́ nɛwú nɛ́twɔ.
116 Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, bǎkɛ́ rɔ yɛ̌ mmu ándwɔ́ bhé bɛ́ Mandɛm kɛ̌ átò mmu nɛmɔ.
117 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ akap anɛ́ árɨ́ ndǔ babhi ankɛm áfù chí amfay. Mandɛm mmu ághókó bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ mfáy kɛ̌ áchyɛ̀ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛrɨ́tí akap, nɛ yí ápú yibhiri ɛnyu mbɔ ndɨ́kándi. Mmok ákɔ̀ amfay, bɛsap ndɨ́kándi mɛ́ngupsi nɔkɔ.
118 Ndǔ nkaysi mbɔŋ Mandɛm kɛ yi áyábhɛ́ bɛsɛ́ bɛ́ sɛ́mbák bɔ̌bhi. Afʉɛ́t ndǔ ɛyɔŋ ɛyi bɛkʉ bɛsɛ́ bɔ̌bhi. Nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛyi ɛ́chí tɛtɛp mpoknkɛm. Ayap bɛsɛ́ bɛ sɛ́mbák bɔ̌bhi bɛ́ sɛ́mbák ambɨ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛ́n yí ághókó. 
119 Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ ywɛka abhɔŋ bɛ́wákári bɛta batú ndu bɛ́ghok mɛnyɨŋ, kɛ ákɛ́ wakari bɛrɛm kɛpɨ nɛ ákɛ́ wakari bɛ́bentɨ.
120 Bɛběntɨ nkwǎ bɛ́chɛt yí mbi bɛ ákɛ́ kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áyàŋ yí ánkʉ́.
121 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ ywɛka abhɔŋ yɛ́ bɛrɔ bɛpɔ̌ bɛpɨŋ mɛnkɛm nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛn bɛ́gháŋá yi amʉɛt. Sɛptí ká mmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm, mǎmfyɛ́ ntí ndǔ Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi ɛnɛ yi ápɨ̀ amɛm batɨ yɛka. Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi ɛnɛ ɛ́bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ bɛ́pɛ́mɛ bhe.
122 Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ bǎbhɔŋ bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛ́ghati bhɛsɛ. Mbák bǎghókó ghok, nɔ bǎrwɔ chí mmʉɛt.
123 Nɔ bǎrwɔ chí mmʉɛt mbɔnyunɛ mbák mmu ǎghok Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm kɛ yi kɛbháká kʉ ndiɛrɛ yɔ́ ɛ́ghàti yí, ǎbhák chí mbɔ mmu anɛ ásɔ́rɛ́ mpok bɛ́yɨŋɨ mmʉɛt ndu ɛ́kírísú angɔ́ bɛsí ɛbhi mbɔ ɛnyu bɛ́chí.
124 Kɛ nɛtɨ́k yi atɨ́kɨ́nsɛm ndǔ ɛ́kírísú, antɨŋ angɔkɔntɨk ɛnyǔ yi achi.
125 Kɛ mmu anɛ afyɛ́ ntí ndǔ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm, ankʉ nɔkɔ mbɔnyǔ ɛ́ghàti yi, yí kɛghɔkɔntɨk yɔ, ɛ́rɨ ntá yi ɛncha. Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm chí ɛbhé Mandɛm. Ɛ́rɨ ndǔ babhi ankɛm, nɛ ɛ́bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ bɛ́fɛ́rɛ bɛsɛ ndǔ bɛbʉ́.
126 Mbák mmu asɔt mmʉɛt yi mbɔ mmu Mandɛm kɛ yí kɛkɛ́m nɛ́rɨ́ ɛni, nɔ́ ǎrwɔ́ chi mmʉɛt nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ yí ákʉ̀ mbɔ mmu Mandɛm ǎchɔŋti chí mpok.
127 Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmu Mandɛm ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ ɛbhɛn bɛ́rɨ́ bɛsí Mandɛm chí bɛ́ yí ánkwák bɔ̌bɛrǎ nɛ mánkwɛ́sɛ́, nɛ ankɛ́m mmʉɛt bɛ́ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk bɛ́kɛ́ chɔŋti yi mɛ́nkʉ́ yi ánjíbhírí ámbák mmǔ bɛbʉ́. Mmǔ Mandɛm anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛnyǔ ɛpɨŋ ɛyɔ kɛ ábhak pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm.
2
21 Bɔ̌ma, tɛ̌ndu bǎbhɔŋɔ nɛka nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha ywɛsɛ mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ kɛnókó kɛnkɛm, bǎkɛ́ chyɛ kɛnókó ntá bo abhɛn bǎghɔ́ bɛ́ báchí sayri, mǎmbyak abhɛn ɛyap ɛ́pú.
22 Sɛ́nsɔ́t bɛ́ bǒ bati apay bátwɔ ndǔ ɛchɛmɛ ɛyɛká. Amɔt ansɔbhɛri mmʉɛt nɛ ndɛn bɛyǎ nkáp nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ŋwaŋwǎŋwaŋ amʉɛt, nchɛ́bhɛ́mu nkwɔ́ antwɔ́ nɛ bɛsɨ́ ndɛn amʉɛt.
23 Mbák mǎmfyɛ́ amɨ́k ntá anɛ áchí mǔnkáp mǎndɛm bɛ, “Ɛta twɔ́ chɔkɔ́ fá”, kɛ ntá nchɛ́bhɛ́ mmu mǎndɛm chí bɛ, “Tě awu. Mbák ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ te awu, twɔ́ sɛbhɛrí fá”.
24 Mbák mǎnkʉ́ nɔ, pú kɛ́rɨ́ŋámík nɔ bǎtɔ̀ŋ nɛ́ntɨ ɛnɛká? Ɛ́rɨ nɔ? Nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ nkaysi yɛká abhɨ́kɨ́ rɨ.
25 Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, tá ká batú mǎngók. Mandɛm ayap bo abhɛn báchí bachɛ́bhɛ́bho bɛsí bǒ mmɨk bɛ́ mámbɔ́ŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu, mámbɔŋ kɛfɔ bɛsí Mandɛm. Akʉ nkwɔ́ bɛ́ bɔ́ mámbák bo abhɛn yí ábhàk nɛ bhɔ́ mbɔ Mfɔ wap. Ɛnyu yɔ kɛ̌ yí afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛkʉ nɛ bo abhɛn bákɔ́ŋ yi.
26 Kɛ mbák chí bhe, bǎchyɛ bachɛ́bhɛ́bho ntíánwɔ́p! Ntɨkɨ bo báchyɛ̀ bhe ɛsɔŋɔri mánja nɔkɔ bhe ndǔ báchá manyé? Pú bǒ bakábhɛ?
27 Pú bɔ́ bhɔ kɛ bárɛ̀m bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ndu bɛ́chɔ́ŋti ɛrɨ́tɨ́ nnyɛ́n Ɛtayɛka mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bhe?
28 Mbák tɛtɛ̌tɛp bǎbhʉɛrɛ nnɛ́m ɛbhé Mandɛm Mfɔ ywɛsɛ mbɔ ɛnyu ɛ́chí amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ, “Kɔŋ ntɨ nkwǎ mbɔ mmʉɛt ɛyɛ”, nɔ́ bǎkʉ̀ sayri.
29 Kɛ mbák bǎchyɛ̀ kɛnókó ntá mbɔk bho, mǎmbyaka nɔkɔ abhɛ́nɛ́fú, nɔ́ bǎkʉ bɛbʉ́ ndǔ bǎkwɛ̀n ɛbhé Mandɛm nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ bǎchí bo abhɛn bǎpú bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé Mandɛm.
210 Bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ábhʉ̀ɛrɛ bɛbhé Mandɛm mɛnkɛm kɛ ankwɛ́n bɛ́bhʉrɛ ɛbhé ɛ́mɔ́t, bɛsí Mandɛm, achí ɛnyumɔ́t mbɔ mmu anɛ ákwɛ́nɛ́ bɛbhé mɛnkɛm.
211 Ɛ́chí ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm mmu árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ, “Ɔ́kɛ́ kwɛn bɛrwɔp”. Nkúbhɛ́ yí kɛ árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ, “Ɔ́kɛ́ wáy”. Ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ yɛ bɛ́ mbák ɔ́ngwáy mmu, nɔ́ ɔ́kwɛ̌n ɛbhé Mandɛm yɛ̌ndu ɔ́bhɨ́kɨ́ kwɛ́n bɛrwɔp.
212 Bǎbhɔŋ yɛ́ bɛ́ghɔ bɛ́ bɛyɔŋɔ́nyu ɛbhɛká nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bǎkʉ, mǎnkʉ bhɔ mbɔ bo abhɛn bákòŋo ɛbhé Mandɛm ɛnɛ́ ɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ bɛ́fɛ́rɛ bɛsɛ́ ndǔ bɛbʉ́. Ɛbhé ɛyɔ kɛ̌ Mandɛm ásɔ̀t bɛ́táŋ bɛsɛ ndǔ ɛwak manyé.
213 Bǎbhɔŋ bɛkʉ nɔ́ mbɔnyunɛ bo abhɛn bápú bhɔ́ŋ ntínso nɛ batɨ, Mandɛm ǎtáŋ bhɔ ɛwak manyé kɛbhɔ́ŋ ntínso. Kɛ mmu anɛ ábhɔ̀ŋ ntínso nɛ batɨ, Mandɛm ǎtɔ́ŋ yí ntínso ɛwak manyé. 
214 Bɔ̌ma, mbák mmu árɛm bɛ́ yí abhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm kɛ yí kɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ yi ánkʉ, ɛyɔ ɛ́kwàk yi ná? Bɛ́rɛ́m chi nɛ nyu bɛ yi abhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm, apú kwáy bɛ́pɛ́mɛ yi wáwák ndǔ ɛwak ɛnɛ Mandɛm átàŋ bo.
215 Sɛ́nsɔ́t bɛ́ mmu ywɛká amɔt, yɛ̌ ngɔrɛ́, yɛ̌ mbakanɛm, anɛ áchí ntɨ mmu Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ndɛn ɛnɛ yí afyɛ́ amʉɛt nɛ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn yi ányìɛ.
216 Nɛ mmǔ ywɛka amɔt ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yi, andɔk antɨ́k yí nɛfí andɛm bɛ, “Ɔ́nkɔ sayri, Mandɛm anjɛt wɔ ɔ́mbɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ ndɛn nɛ nɛnyíɛ́”, kɛ yí kɛchyɛ yi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi áchɛ́bhɛ́, nɔ́ akwak yi ndǔ ntɨkɨ mbi?
217 Ɛnyu yɔ kɛ ɛ́chí nɛ nɛka. Mbák mmu ǎrɛm bɛ ábhɔ̌ŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm, kɛ yí kɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ yi ánkʉ́, nɔ́ nɛrɛm yí árɛ̀m bɛ abhɔ̌ŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm achi chi ndɛ́ndɛm.
218 Ngufú mmu ǎkwáy bɛ́kɛm ɛpʉ́ítí bɛ, “Akap Mandɛm áchyɛ́ mbɔk bho chi nɛka ɛnɛ́n bɔ́ bábhɔ́ŋ nɛ yí, ɛnɛ́ akap anɛ bo báchák chi bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áyàŋ bo mánkʉ”. Kɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́rɛ́m ntá ɛnyǔ mmǔ wu chí bɛ, “Ghatí mɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ ɔbhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm mbák ɔpú kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áyàŋ bo mánkʉ́?” Mbák chí mɛ́, mɛ̌kwáy bɛ́sɔ́t mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ̌kʉ̀ ntɔ́ŋ wɔ́ bɛ́ nká nɛ Mandɛm tɛtɛp.
219 Ɔnókó bɛ́ Mandɛm amɔt kɛ áchí, achák ápú? Ɛrɨ! Kɛ ɔ́kɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ́ yɛ̌ chí bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ mɛ́nókó nkwɔ́ bɛ́ Mandɛm amɔt kɛ áchí nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́chyɛ̀ bhɔ́ bɛcháy, mángwɛrɛ nɔkɔ gbagbǎgbak.
220 Wɔ ɛchɨŋtɨ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ, ɔ̌yàŋ mántɔ́ŋ wɔ́ bɛ mbák mmu anókó bɛ Mandɛm achi kɛ yi kɛbháká kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áyàŋ bo mánkʉ́, nɔ nɛnoko yi ánókó bɛ Mandɛm achi, achí chí ndɛ́ndɛmɛ́?
221 Ɔ́kɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ Mandɛm arɛm nyaka bɛ ɛtayɛsɛ Ábraham achi chak bɛsí bhi ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákʉ́. Nɔ́ chí ndǔ ásɔ́rɛ́ mɔ́ywi Áisek arɔk bɛchyɛ mbɔ akap ndǔ mpok anɛ Mandɛm aghati yi ánkʉ ɛnyuyɔ.
222 Ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ Ábraham abhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm tɛtɛp, aka bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm ághátí yi ánkʉ́. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yí ákʉ́, kɛ ɛ́tɔ́ŋ bɛ́ yi aká nɛ Mandɛm tɛtɛp.
223 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ kɛ básɨ́ŋɨ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ, “Ábraham anókó nyaka Mandɛm, ɛ́kʉ́ Mandɛm arɛm bɛ́ Ábraham achí chak bɛsí bhi, nɛ bo báré bhɨŋɨ Ábraham bɛ́ mmʉɛrɛ Mandɛm”.
224 Bě babhɔŋ bǎkwáy yɛ́ bɛ́ghɔ bɛ́ bɛrɨ ɛbhɛn mmu ákʉ̀ kɛ bɛ́kʉ̀ Mandɛm ánsɔ́t yí mbɔ mmu anɛ áchí chak bɛsí bhi. Púyɛ chí nɛrɛm yí árɛ̀m nɛ nyu bɛ́ áká nɛ Mandɛm.
225 Nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyu yɔ kɛ ɛ́chí nyaka nɛ Ráhab, ngɔrɛ́-nɛkɔ. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yí ákʉ́ kɛ̌ Mandɛm ághɔ́, asɔt bɛ́ yí achí chak bɛsí bhi. Nɔ́ chí, Ráhab asɔt baghokotǐ kɛpɨ abhɛn báfú Israɛl abhɛsɛ amɛm ɛkɛt ɛyi, achyɛ bhɔ́ maniɛ́. Báfʉɛ́t yɛ́ mbi áchák bápɛtnsɛm Israɛl kɛbhɔ́ŋ ɛsɔŋɔri.
226 Tɛ̌ndu yi ákʉ́ ɛnyu yɔ kɛ Mandɛm ǎsɔ́t bɛ yi achi chak bɛsí bhi, dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔnyǔ mmu apu kway bɛbhak nɛpɛ́m mbák abhɨkɨ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ ɛ̌yú, nɔ́ kɛ ɛchi bɛ mbák mmu apú kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áyàŋ bo mankʉ, nɛrɛm yi árɛ̀m bɛ abhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm ǎbhak chi ndɛ́ndɛm.
3
31 Bɔ̌ma, puyɛ̌ be mankɛm kɛ̌ babhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́bhak batɔŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm. Bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ ɛwak ɛnɛ Mandɛm átàŋ bo, manyé ásɔ̀ŋ bɛsɛ́ bhó sɛ́tɔ̀ŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm amʉɛt ɛ́ncha bo báchák.
32 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ǎkwɛ́n ndǔ bɛyǎ babhi. Kɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ ndǔ ɛyɔŋɔ́nyu ɛyi, achí mmu anɛ ájwí pɔɔt nɛ ǎkwáy nkwɔ́ bɛkɛm mmʉɛt ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi.
33 Sɛ́nsɔ́t mpɔŋɔndɨ́k. Mmu ǎsɔt mɔ́mbɨŋɨ́ sɛnɔŋ amfyɛ́ yɔ́ anyu ndu bɛkʉ yɔ angok yi, andɔk yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ yi áyàŋ yɔ́ ándɔ́k.
34 Ná nɛ áchwɨ̌nyɛn nkwɔ? Yɛ̌ndu áré chɨk, nɛ yɛ̌ mbʉ́ɛ́p anɛ́ ádɛ̀p wu ántaŋ ná, nsɔm achí anɛt áchwi babhát anɛ mbák mmu ánjá anjɛp, áchwi árɔ̀ŋ chí ɛbhak ɛnɛ yí áyàŋ wu andɔk.
35 Nɛ́rɨ́ nkwǎ nɛchi mbɔ nsɔm anɛ achi anɛt áchwí. Yɛ̌ndu nɛ́chí nɨ́ŋɨ́ nɨ́ŋɨ́, nɛ́pà bɛkʉ bɛrɛm mɛnyɨŋ. Bě babhɔŋ mǎnkáysí ndǔ mɔ́nɛmbě ngó ákɛm ndǔ ɛrɛmɛ́ nchɔ́t ámbo bɛ́du gum gum gum.
36 Nɛ́rɨ́ nkwǎ nɛ́chí mbɔ ngó. Ɛyɔŋɔ́nyu ɛnɛ mmu ɛ́kwày bɛ́twɔ nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ bɛbʉ́ fá amɨk. Bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛn nɛ́rɨ́ nɛ́twɔ̀ nɛ bhɔ bɛ́chɔ̀ŋti nɛpɛ́m nkwǎŋwaŋ nɛnkɛm. Nɛ́kʉ̀ ngó ánkɛ́m anɛ́ ásɔ̀ŋ nɛpɛ́m nkwǎŋwaŋ nɛnkɛm. Nɛ ngó wu áfù chí ndǔ nɛpǐngo anɛ́ ápú nɛmɛ.
37 Nkwǎ ǎkwáy bɛ́bhʉɛ́rɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ nyǎbhɨ, kɛnɛn, nnya ɛnɛ́ ɛ́sù mɛniɛ amɨk nɛ ɛnɛ ányɛ́n, ankʉ yɔ́ ɛ́ngók yi, nɛ bo mánáŋ bákʉ́ nɔ.
38 Kɛ yɛ̌ mmu apú kwáy bɛkɛm nɛ́rí ɛni. Nɛ́rí nɛ́bɛp nɛ́chá. Nɛ́chí mbɔ babhé amɛn mmu ányìɛ angú.
39 Nɛ nɛ́rɨ́ kɛ sɛ́bɨti Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ. Nɛ nkúbhɛ́ nɛrɨ́ kɛ sɛ́sɔ̀t bɛrɛm bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ntá bo abhɛn Mandɛm ághókó, akʉ mǎmbák mbɔ yímbɔŋ ndǔ bɛyǎ babhi.
310 Bɔ̌ma, ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛbhak ɛnyu yɔ! Nnyu amɔt ámbɨti Mandɛm, nkúbhɛ́ nnyu wu ámbɨk mmu ɛyak.
311 Mbokónyɛ́n ámɔt ápú kwáy bɛchyɛ ɛrɨ́tí manyiɛp, ámpɛt ánchyɛ nɔkɔ manyiɛp amɛn áchí ngáŋ ngaŋ.
312 Bɔ̌ma, nnɛt nsúkúrú ápú kwáy mɛ́nyú bakwa nɛ nnɛt nsɨ́ŋɨ́ ápú kwáy mɛ́nyú nsúkúrú. Ɛ́nyu yɔ kɛ ɛ́chí bɛ nnyɛ́n ngáŋ ngaŋ nɛ́pú kwáy bɛ́chyɛ́ manyiɛp mɛnyu. 
313 Ná mbɔk yɛká bátɔ̀ŋ mmʉɛt bɛ́ bárɨŋɨ? Mbák bo báchí ndǔ nkwɔ́ ywɛká abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ kɛboŋ, bárɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chí chak nɛ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́pú chak, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap ámbɔ́ŋ ɛrɨ́tí ɛpɨŋ nɛ nɛsɛptímʉɛt ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛni. Ɛpɨŋ ɛyɔ kɛ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ mmu achí ndɨŋɨndak tɛtɛp.
314 Kɛ mbák bǎbhɔŋ batɨ anɛ ájwí nɛ bɛyǎ mpabhamɨ́k nɛ ɛpɨŋ ɛnɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ánù chí ndǔ aywi ntí, bǎkɛ́ pányu ndɛ́ndɛm bɛ bǎchi barɨŋɨ́ndak mbɔnyunɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́bhak chi nsé.
315 Ɛnyǔ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɔ nɛ́pú fú ntá Mandɛm, nɛ́fù chí ntá bǒ- mmɨk. Ɛnyǔ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɔ nɛ́fù chí ntá bo abhɛn Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm ɛ́pú nɛ bhɔ́ nɛ nɛ́fù chí ntá mfɔ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ.
316 Ɛ́chí ɛnyu yɔ mbɔnyunɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ bo bábhɔ̀ŋ mpabhamɨ́k nɛ batɨ nɛ ɛpɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mmu ánù chí ndiɛrɛ ndǔ ayi mmʉɛt, ɛbyɔk ɛ́bhàk arɛ, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛpɨŋ ɛ́bhàk arɛ́ nkwɔ́.
317 Kɛ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ nɛchí kɛkúrí. Ɛnyɨŋɨ́ mbɨ chi bɛ nɛ́pú fyɛ mmu bakwap antɨ. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kòŋo chí bɛ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɛ́n Mandɛm áchyɛ nɛ́kʉ̀ mmu ámbák sayri nɛ batɨ, nɛ́kʉ̀ mmu ákɛ́ bhɔŋ ntɨ gum gum, nɛ́kʉ̀ mmu ámbɔ́ŋ ɛpɨŋ bɛghɔ bho ntínso, nɛ ɛpɨŋ bɛkʉ bɛrɨ mpoknkɛm. Mmǔ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɛ́n nɛ́fù ntá Mandɛm, ǎbhák mmu tɛtɛp, ápú kʉ bɛtábhá.
318 Chi bɛbhak sayri nɛ batɨ kɛ ákʉ̀ bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ kpák ambak nɛntɨ bho mámpɨ́ mbwɔt, nɛ chɔŋ mángɔ mbwɔt mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo bákʉ̀ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chak bɛsí Mandɛm.
4
41 Yi ɛ́kʉ̀ be bho bǎrɛm bɛ́ bǎchí bǒ Mandɛm mǎnù mǎntáŋ nɔkɔ nɛ batɨ? Pú bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎfyɛ́ ngoŋo arɛ́ kɛ bɛ́kʉ̀ mǎnu mpoknkɛm-ɛ?
42 Bǎyáŋ bɛ́bhɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ kɛ bǎpú bhɔ́ŋ bɔ́. Ɛ́kʉ bǎyàŋ bɛ́way bho. Nɛ bǎfyɛ̀ ámɨ́k ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo báchák kɛ bǎpú kwáy bɛ́bhɔŋ bɔ́. Ɛ́kʉ bǎtàŋ nɛ batɨ, mǎnu nɔkɔ. Ntí anɛ bǎpú bhɔ́ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn chí bɛ́ bǎpú nɨkmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm ánchyɛ́ bhé bɔ́.
43 Nɛ yɛ̌ mǎnɨk chí mmʉɛt bɛ́ Mandɛm ánchyɛ́ bhe ɛnyɨŋ, bǎpú bhɔ́ŋ yɔ́. Bǎpú bhɔ́ŋ yɔ́ mbɔnyunɛ bǎpú bhɛ́p nɛ nkaysi ndɨ́ndɨ́. Bǎbhɛ̀p chí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎfyɛ̀ ngoŋo arɛ́.
44 Bě bho bǎpú kʉ mbɔ ɛnyu Mandɛm áyàŋ! Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛ́ mmu anɛ ányìɛ ɛkɔŋ nɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk chí mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ mmʉɛ́t yi mǔmpap Mandɛm-ɛ? Tɛtɛp, mmu anɛ ányìɛ ɛkɔŋ nɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk, chí mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ mmʉɛ́t yi mǔmpap Mandɛm.
45 Bǎkɛ́ kaysi bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ básɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́chí ndɛ́ndɛm, nɔ́ chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ básɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ, “Ɛfóŋó ɛnɛ́ Mandɛm áchyɛ́ nkwǎ, ɛ́fyɛ̀ amɨ́k ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ bo báchák ɛ́chá.”
46 Kɛ Mandɛm ǎtɔŋ bɛsɛ bɛyǎ bɛrɨ̌ndu, nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́chyɛ̀ bɛsɛ́ bɛtaŋ amfǎy nkaysi bɛ́fyɛ ámɨ́k ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ bo báchák. Ɛ́chí mbɔnyǔ básɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ, “Mandɛm apú ka nɛ mmu anɛ áyòŋ mmʉɛt, kɛ ǎyɛt mmu anɛ ásɛ̀pti mmʉɛt mbɔ bɛ yí ápú yɛ̌nyɨŋ.”
47 Sɛptí yɛ̌ ka mmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm. Bǎkɛ́ chyɛ Satan mbi, nɛ chɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́nkʉ yi ambʉ́ɛ́ andɔ bhe.
48 Kokosí nɔ́kɔ́ ká mmʉɛt nɛ Mandɛm nɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm ankokosi mmʉɛt nɛ bhe. Bě bakʉ̌ bɛbʉ́, fɛrɛ́ ká amɔ́ ndǔ bɛbʉ́. Bě bho bǎchí ɛkak nɛfí ɛkak ánywɔp, fɛrɛ́ ká bɛbʉ́ antɨ bɛ́ batɨ yɛka ambak pɛ́pɛ́p.
49 Bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka. Bák ká ndǔ basɛ́mɛ́ nɛ nɛdǐ kɛbhɔ, babhɛsɛ ansɛbhɛ nɔkɔ amɨ́k byaká byaká byaká. Dɔ̌ ká nɛway-ámɛ́n ɛnɛká mǎmbák ndǔ basɛ́mɛ́. Dɔ̌ ká maŋák amɛká mǎndɔp ndǔ kɛbhɔ.
410 Sɔt ká mmʉɛt mbɔ bɛ́ bǎpú yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛsí Mandɛm, nɛ chɔŋ yi ankosi bhe. 
411 Bɔ̌ma, mmu ákɛ́ rɛm ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti ntɨ. Mbák mmu ándɛ́m ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti ntɨ, mbák ɛ́pú nɔ́, ansɔt mmʉɛt mbɔ ntaŋá manyé bɛ́rɛ́m bɛ́ ntɨ abɛp, nɔ́ ǎrɛ̀m ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti ɛbhé Mandɛm nɛ ǎtáŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm. Kɛ dɨŋɨ ká bɛ mbák mmu ǎrɛm bɛ́ ɛbhé Mandɛm ɛ́bɛp, nɔ́ yí ápú bhʉɛrɛ yɔ́, kɛ ǎsɔ̀t mmʉɛt mbɔ ntaŋá manyé bɛrɛm bɛ́ ɛbhé ɛ́bɛp.
412 Mandɛm aywǐntí kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ bɛ́fyɛ bɛbhé, nɛ ndiɛrɛ yí aywǐntí, kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ ndu bɛ́táŋ bo. Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛtaŋ bɛ́pɛ́mɛ mmu, nɛ yí kɛ árɛ̀m bɛ́ mmu ángú, angú. Kɛ mbák chí wɔ́, ɔkáysí bɛ́ ɔchí agha bɛkʉ mmʉɛt ɛyɛ ntaŋá manyé, ɔ́ndɛm bɛ́ ntɨ mmu Mandɛm abɛp. 
413 Bě bho bǎpà, mǎndɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Mbák ɛ́pú ɛchɔŋ nɔ́ mbúrɛ́, chɔŋ sɛ́ndɔ́k ɛtɔk ɛgho fú, sɛ́nchɔkɔ arɛ́ ndǔ mmíɛ́ nɛmɔt sɛ́nkɔ ɛsiɛ́, sɛ́mbɔŋ bɛyǎ nkáp,” Ghók ká.
414 Bǎkwáy bɛ́rɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fàkari mbúrɛ́ ná? Bapɛ́m ayɛka achi mbɔ mɔ́ngo. Ɔ̌ghɔ́ mɔ́ngo nɛ́nɛ kɛ mandú mpok anɛmsi.
415 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɛm chi bɛ, “Mbák chí nkaysi Mandɛm, chɔŋ ambʉɛrɛ bɛsɛ́ nɛpɛ́m, anchyɛ bɛsɛ́ bɛtaŋ sɛ́nkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ sɛ́yàŋ bɛkʉ.”
416 Kɛ bǎpú kʉ ɛnyu yɔ. Bǎpá chí nyu mǎnjoŋ nɔkɔ mmʉɛt. Nɛyoŋómʉɛt ɛnɛka ɛnɔ nɛnkɛm nɛ́bhɨkɨ rɨ.
417 Yɛ̌ agha anɛ árɨŋɨ ɛrɨ́tí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ yí ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ, kɛ yí kɛkʉ yɔ́, bɛsí Mandɛm, akʉ bɛbʉ́.
5
51 Bě bǒ bakáp, tá ká batú mǎngók mǎncháp ɛ̌rí kɛbhɔ, mǎmbak ndǔ basɛ́mɛ́ ɛ̌ti bɛyǎ bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn bɛ́twɔ̀ ambɨ ntá yɛká.
52 Bakáp ayɛká áchɔ́ŋtí, nɛ kɛngɔk anyiɛ bɛrɨ́tí ndɛn ɛyɛká.
53 Mfárɛ́káŋ anyiɛ bakáp ayɛká. Mfárɛ́káŋ anɛ ányíɛ́ nɔ́ wú, mpok Mandɛm átàŋ bé, kɛ̌ yi ásɔ̀t mbɔ ntísiɛ ndu bɛ́chyɛ́ bhe ntɛ́msí. Nɛ mfárɛ́káŋ yɔ kɛ ányìɛ mmʉɛt ɛyɛká mbɔ ngó ányìɛ ɛnyɨŋ.
54 Bo bákʉ̀ bɛtɨk ndǔ bakɨ yɛka, be kɛchyɛ bakáp ayap. Ngway yɛká akʉ bɔ́ bádì kɛbhɔ bɛ́ Mandɛm ánkwák bhɔ́, nɛ Mandɛm Acha bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm ǎghok kɛbhɔ ɛkap.
55 Mǎnyìɛ nɛpɛ́m fá amɨk, mǎnkʉ nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chyɛ bhe maŋák. Mǎnyiɛ, bǎchɨkɨti bǎrɔp muri múrí mbɔ ɛsɛnɛ́ mpɔŋ ɛnɛ́ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɔŋ bɛway.
56 Bǒ bakáp, bǎchyɛ́ bɛsɔŋ ntá bataŋá manyé nɛ bákʉ́ bachɛ́bhɛ́bho mǎnkwɛn manyé, nɔ chi bo abhɛn bábhɨkɨ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ mɛnu nɛ bhe mánchɛ́t bhe mbi. 
57 Bɔ̌ma, kɛ́p yɛ ká ntɨ ndǔ mǎnòŋ mpok anɛ Yesu Acha átwɔ̀. Yɨŋɨ́ ká bakwaŋá bakɨ. Bákɛ̀pntɨ mɛ́noŋ manyiɛp nchyɛ́miɛ nɛ amɛn ákʉ̀ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ́ngó. Nɛ bákɛ̀pntɨ mɛnoŋ mpok anɛ báfɛ̀rɛ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛbhɨ.
58 Bě nkwɔ, bɔ́ŋ ká ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ, mǎnte kpirí mbɔnyunɛ mpok anɛ Yesu Acha ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́twɔ arɔp kɛkwɔt.
59 Bɔ̌ma, mmu ákɛ́ nywinti ámbɨ́ŋɨ́ nnyɛ́n ntɨ. Mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ nɔ́, ǎkwɛ́n manyé ɛwak Mandɛm átàŋ bo. Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ Ntaŋá-manyé achi ambǐnywɔp téé, apu nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ.
510 Bɔ̌ma, bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk barɛmɛ́ kɛpǐntɨ Mandɛm, bo bárɛ̀m nyaka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ bɔ́ antɨ bɛ mándɛm. Báchí bɛrɨ́tí bɛrɨŋ ntá yɛsɛ́. Bɔ́ bábhɔ̀ŋ nyaka bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri, yɛ̌ nɔ́, mánkɛbhɛ nɔkɔ chí ntɨ.
511 Sɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ́ ɛrɨ ntá yap ɛcha mbɔnyunɛ báté nyaka kpirí. Bǎrɨŋɨ ndǔ Job áté nyaka kpirí, nɛ ndǔ ngwɛnti, Mandɛm akʉ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛyi ɛ́máy ɛnkɛm, ɛ́rɨ́ yɛ ntá yi ɛcha. Tɛtɛp, Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛyǎ ntínso nɛ bɛsɛ́.
512 Bɔ̌ma, ndak anɛ chí ɛrɛmɛ́ ndak. Mbák ɔrɛm ɛnyɨŋ, ɔ́kɛ́ yɨkɨ. Ɔ́kɛ́ yɨkɨ ɔ́mbɨŋɨ nnyɛ́n Mandɛm mmu áchí amfay. Kɛ́yɨkɨ ɔ́mbɨ́ŋɨ́ mmɨk, nɛ ɔ́kɛ́ yɨkɨ ndǔ nnyɛ́n yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ́chák. Mbák ɔká ɛnyɨŋ, dɛm bɛ, “Ɛɛ”, nɛ “Ɛ̌” ámbák chí Ɛɛ. Mbák ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ ká, dɛm bɛ, “Cháo” nɛ “Cháo” ambak chí Cháo. Mbák ɔká ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt, ɔ́nkʉ chí ɛ́chák nɔ ɔ́kwɛ̌n ɛbhé Mandɛm.
513 Mbák mmǔ ywɛka achí ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri, ánɨ́k nɔ́kɔ́ mmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm ánkwák yí. Mbák mmu achí sayri, ákɛ́ rɔ bɛ́chyɛ́ bakak ntá Mandɛm.
514 Mbák mmu ywɛka ǎme, ámbɨ́ŋɨ́ bǒbati Nkwɔ Kristo. Ámbɨ́ŋɨ́ bhɔ bɛ mánɨkmʉɛt ɛ̌ti yi, mángwati yi bawɛt amʉɛt ndǔ nnyɛ́n Yesu Acha.
515 Nɛ mbák bápú makati bɛ Mandɛm ǎghok nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛnap, mmǔ nɛme ǎtaŋ. Mandɛm Acha ǎkʉ mmu nɛme antaŋ, amfoŋori yɛ̌ntɨkɨ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ́.
516 Su nɔ́kɔ́ yɛ ká bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛká ntá batɨ, mǎnɨk nɔkɔ mmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm ámbú bo abhɛn mámè. Nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt mmu anɛ áchí chak bɛsí Mandɛm nɛ́bhɔŋ bɛyǎ bɛtaŋ.
517 Yɨŋɨ́ ká Ɛláija. Áchí nyaka ntɨ nkwǎ mbɔ bhɛsɛ́. Anɨkmʉɛt nɛ ntɨ ɛni nɛnkɛm bɛ́ manyiɛp ákɛ́ kwɛn, nɛ yɛ̌ nɛkɔŋ nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ chɨ amɨk ndǔ mamiɛ́ arat nɛ ɛbhɔk.
518 Apɛt anɨk mmʉɛt. Mandɛm akʉ yɛ nɛbu nɛ́nɛ́nɛ, manyiɛp asɛp gbokórókórók achwe amɨk, mmɨk apɔp, abho bɛchyɛ nɛnyíɛ́.
519 Bɔ̌ma, mbák mmu ywɛká arɔ́ mbi Mandɛm anɛ́m ɛbhɨ, achák ánjá yí ámpɛtnsɛm.
520 Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ákwáká mmu bɛbʉ́ wu bɛ ántɨ́knsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhi ámpɛ́tnsɛm ntá Mandɛm, mmǔ wu afɛ́rɛ́ yí ndǔ nɛwú, nɛ Mandɛm ǎfoŋori bɛyǎ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhi.5
1 
11 Mɛ Píta, mǔnto Yesu Kristo kɛ nchí sɨ́ŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Nchí sɨ́ŋ ntá yɛka bo Mandɛm, be bho bǎchi mankɔ nɛ bǎtáká mbaŋ nɛ mbaŋ, mbɔk atú Pɔ́ntɔs, báchák atú Galéshia, abhɛnɛfu atú Kapadóshiya, báchák atú Esia, nɛ abhɛnɛfu atú Bitínia.
12 Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ ayap be tɛsáy bɛkoŋo nkaysi anɛ yi ánáŋ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka ɛ̌ti yɛka. Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ákú mǎmbák nyáŋá bɛ mǎmbák bo abhɛn bághòk Yesu Kristo nɛ bɛ ansɔt manoŋ mi ánkʉ mǎmbák pɛ́pɛ́p. Mandɛm ántɔ́ŋ be bɛyǎ bɛrɨ̌ndu, anchyɛ be kpák tontó tonto. 
13 Sɛ́nchíɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm Mmu achi Chi ntá Acha ywɛsɛ Yesu Kristo! Ɛ̌ti bɛyǎ ntínso ɛni, achyɛ́ bhɛsɛ nɛpɛ́m nɛkɔ ndu ákʉ́ Yesu Kristo áfú ndʉ́ nɛwú apɛtnsɛm ndʉ́ nɛpɛ́m. Ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ sɛ́bhaka ntɨ nɛ́nɛ bɛ chɔŋ sɛmbɔŋ nɛpɛ́m nɛ yi.
14 Sɛ́chi nɛ amík ambɨ sɛ́nòŋ áfɔ́k anɛ Mandɛm ábhʉ́rɛ́ amfay ntá bǒbhi. Abhʉ́rɛ́ wu ntá yɛka. Áfɔ́k wu apu may nɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ́pú kwáy bɛchɔŋti wu nɛ ápú gú manyiɛp.
15 Ndǔ bǎbhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm ǎbhàbhɛri bhe. Ǎkʉ̀ nɔ bɛ ámpɛ́mɛ́ bhe ndǔ ngwɛnti mpok. Mandú mpok yi ǎkʉ̀ be mǎndɨŋɨ ndǔ yi ápɛ̀mɛ bho.
16 Bǎkɛ́ rɔ yɛ bɛbhɔŋ maŋák ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, yɛ̌ndu nɛ́nɛ, bǎkway bɛbhɔŋ bɛyǎ bɛsɔŋɔri nɛ mamɔ mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu ndu mɔ́mbɨŋɨ́ mpok.
17 Mamɔ anɛ átwɔ̀ chi bɛkʉ bo mángɔ́ mbák bábhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm tɛtɛp. Yɛ̌ndu pú áchɔ̀ŋti, báfyɛ yi ango mánsɔŋ sayri mámfɛrɛ bakwap ndu bɛrɨŋɨ mbák chi pú tɛtɛp. Nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ Mandɛm nɛcha pú. Bǎbhɔŋ yɛ bɛghɔ ɛsɔŋɔri ndu bɛkʉ bo mandɨŋɨ mbák nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ Mandɛm nɛ́chí tɛtɛp nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu básɔ̀ŋ pú ndu bɛghɔ mbák chi pú tɛtɛp. Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ ɛchi bɛ mbák mánte kpirí ndǔ nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ Mandɛm, chɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́ntwɔ bhe nɛ bakak, nɛ kɛnɛ́m, nɛ kɛnókó ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn Yesu Kristo ápɛtnsɛm.
18 Bǎkɔŋ yi yɛ̌ndu bǎbhɨkɨ re ghɔ yi. Mǎnoko yi yɛ̌ndu bápú ghɔ́ yi nɛ́nɛ, nɛ bábhɔ̀ŋ maŋák amɛn ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ njɛnti nɛ amɛn mmu apú kwáy bɛrɛm ɛnyu mɔ achi.
19 Akap anɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛ̌ti nɛka ɛnɛká nɛ Yesu chi nɛpɛmɛ yí ápɛ́mɛ́ bhe.
110 Barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ abhɛn bárɛ̀m nyaka ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛtɔŋ bhe, báyàŋ nyaka, mámbɛbhɛ nɔkɔ ndu bɛ́rɨŋɨ ɛ̌ti nɛpɛ́m nɛkɔ ɛnɛn.
111 Ɛfóŋó Kristo ákʉ̀ nyaka barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ mángátí bho be Kristo abhɔŋ bɛbhɔŋ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri, nɛ ndǔ ngwɛnti, ambɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ kɛnókó. Bɔ́ mánù nyaka bɛrɨŋɨ mpok anɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́fákári, nɛ mbɔ̌ŋ mmu anɛ bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛfakari nɛ yi.
112 Mandɛm akʉ bɔ́ mandɨŋɨ bɛ bě kɛ bǎbhɔŋ nsáy ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhap, puyɛ̌ bɔ babhɔŋ. Nsáy yɔ afʉ̌ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo abhɛn bághàti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ bághátí bhe ndǔ bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ mmu Mandɛm átó. Yɛ̌ chi bɔángɛl bábhɔŋ nyaka ɛkwak bɛrɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn tɛntɛp. 
113 Ndu ɛchi nɔ, toŋtí ká mmʉɛt ndu bɛkʉ bɛtɨk Mandɛm, mǎmbɔŋ nɛkɛ́mɛ́mʉɛt, mámbaka ntɨ sayri ndǔ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhɛn bɛ́twɔ̀ bhe ambɨ mpok Yesu Kristo ábhesi.
114 Tɛ̌ndu bǎchi bo abhɛn bǎghòk Mandɛm, bǎkɛ́ yibhiri mmʉɛt mǎnkóŋó bɛpɔ̌ bɛpɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka mpok bǎbhʉɛ́t amɛm ɛjuri.
115 Tɛ̌ndu Mandɛm mmu abhɨ́ŋɨ́ bhe achi nyáŋá, be nkwɔ bǎbhɔŋ bɛbhak nyáŋá ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn bǎkù,
116 nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ básɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ, “Bǎbhɔŋ bɛbhak nyáŋá, mbɔnyu mɛnchí nyáŋá.”
117 Nɛ tɛ̌ndu bǎbhɨ̀ŋɨ Mandɛm bɛ Ɛta mpok mǎnɨ̀kmʉɛt ntá yi mmú átàŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu bɛkoŋo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ̀ kɛtɔ́ŋ kɛ́rɨ́ŋámík, bɔ́ŋ ká kɛnókó nɛ yi ndǔ ɛkakánɛkɔ ɛyɛka fá amɨk mbɔ mankɔ.
118 Bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ Yesu Kristo aku bhe afɛ́rɛ́ ndǔ bɛpɔ̌ bɛpɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎsɔ́rɛ́ nyaka ntá bachǐmbɨ bhɛka. Abhɨ́kɨ́ ku bhe chí nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chɔ̀ŋti nkáp.
119 Aku bhe chi nɛ manoŋ mi nɛ mɔ́ acha nkáp tontó. Yí achi mbɔ mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n anɛ abhɨkɨ kʉ nchɔŋtí nɛ yɔ kɛnyɔp mmʉɛt.
120 Mandɛm ápɛ́rɛ ghoko mmɨk, anáŋ ayap nyaka yi. Kɛ ndǔ manywɔp ngwɛnti anɛ kɛ yi abhesi ɛ̌ti ɛyɛka.
121 Akʉ mǎmbɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm mmu akʉ yi ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nɛ akʉ yi ambɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ kɛnókó, bɛ́ nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ́mbák chi nɛ Mandɛm nɛ bɛ́ mǎmbaka ntɨ nɛ yi.
122 Nɛ́nɛ, ɛnɛ́ mǎnáŋ bafɛ́rɛ́ bɛbʉ́ antɨ ndǔ bǎkòŋo tɛtɛp Mandɛm, bɔ́ŋ ká ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ́ tɛtɛp nɛ batɨ. Kɔŋ ka batɨ nɛ batɨ yɛka ankɛm.
123 Nɛpɛ́m nɛkɔ ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ fu chi ntá bachi nɛ manɔ abhɛka bo bapɛm ayap áfʉɛrɛ fʉɛt. Mandɛm asɔt chi Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi kɛ ǎchyɛ bhe nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn, nɛ nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti mbɔnyunɛ nɛ́fǔ ndǔ Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m, nɛ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
124 Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́ghàti bhɛsɛ bɛ “Nkwǎŋwaŋ nkɛm achi mbɔ tákɔ, bɛrɨ bhi mɛnkɛm mbɔ bɔchuchu abhɛn tákɔ. Tákɔ ǎwɔsi, bɔchuchu mánkuri,
125 kɛ Ɛyɔŋ Acha ɛbhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.” Ɛyɔŋ ɛyɔ chi Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ bághátí nyaka bhe.
2
21 Ndu Mandɛm achyɛ nɔ bhe nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛkɔ, fɛrɛ́ ká barak abʉ́abʉ ankɛm antɨ. Bǎkɛ́ pɛrɛ sénse, dɔ̌ ká bɛtábhá, dɔ̌ ká mpabhamɨ́k, nɛ dɔ̌ ká bɛrɛm barak abʉ́abʉ ɛ̌ti bho ndu bɛchɔŋti manyɛ́n ayap.
22 Bák ká mbɔ mɔ̌nkɔ mmu áŋwaka mɛnyu amɨ mpoknkɛm. Bɔ́ŋ ká ɛkwak nɛbhɨ ɛnɛn mbɔŋ, nɔ chi, Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm. Yɔ́ ɛ́kʉ̀ bɛ mǎngo Mandɛm ápɛmɛ bhe.
23 Ɛrɨ mǎmbɔ́ŋ ɛkwak ɛnyu yɔ mbɔnyunɛ mǎnaŋ bǎrɨŋɨ nɛ́nɛ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka ɛnyǔ bɛrɨ̌ntɨ ɛbhɛn Acha Yesu Kristo átɔ̀ŋ bhɛsɛ.
24 Twɔ́ yɛ ka ntá Acha. Yí achi mbɔ ntay ɛnɛn nɛchi nɛpɛ́m, ɛnɛ́n bǒ mmɨk bábyaka bɛ nɛpu yɛ̌nyɨŋ, kɛ Mandɛm ayap nɔ nɛbhɔŋ mɛnwɔp bɛsí bhi.
25 Bě nkwɔ bǎchi nɛpɛ́m. Bák yɛ ka mbɔ batay anɛ básɔ̀t bɛte ɛkɛt ɛnɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm ábhàk arɛ́. Bǎchi bo abhɛn yi ábhʉ́rɛ́ nyáŋá bɛ mǎmbák nnɛrɛ́kɛt anɛ́ bachiǎkap, ndu bɛchyɛ mmʉɛt ɛyɛka nkɛm ntá yi ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chyɛ̀ Mandɛm maŋák ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo.
26 Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyu básɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ, “Ghɔ́ ká! Nchí bhʉrɛ ntay ɛnɛn nɛ́kɛm ɛkɛt fá amɛm ɛtɔk Síɔn, chí ntay ɛnɛn njábhɛ́ nɛ nɛ́rɨ nɛcha. Mmu anɛ ánókó yi, bápú kʉ yi ámbɔ́ŋ ntíánwɔ́p wawak.”
27 Bě abhɛn mǎnókó yi, ntá yɛka yi arɨ acha kɛ ntá bo abhɛn babhɨkɨ noko yi basɨŋ bɛ, “Nkúbhɛ́ ntay ɛnɛn batěkɛt bábyáká, nɔ́ kɛ nɛ́yíbhírí nɛ́rɔ́bhɛ́ ntay ɛnɛn nɛ́kɛ̀m ɛkɛt.”
28 Basɨŋ nkwɔ amɛm ɛkáti bɛ, “Ntay ɛnɛ́n nɛ́kʉ̀ chɔŋ bo mántɛm ɛkak mánkwɛ́n, nkúbhɛ́ nɔ́ kɛ nɛchi sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́ ɛsɛn sɛ́kʉ̀ bo mánkwɛn.” Bátɛ̀m ɛkak arɛ́ mbɔnyunɛ bápú bhʉɛrɛ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu Mandɛm atɨ nyaka bɛ ɛ́mbák.
29 Kɛ mbák chi bhe, Mandɛm ayap bhe bɛ mǎmbak nnɛrɛ́kɛt anɛ bachiǎkap ntá Mfɔ ywɛsɛ. Bǎchi nyáŋá bɛsí Mandɛm. Ayap be bɛ mǎmbák bǒbhi mǎngátí nɔ́kɔ́ bho bɛtɨkɨ́ maknkay ɛbhi, yi mmu áfɛ́rɛ́ bhe ndǔ ɛjuri abhʉrɛ amɛm ɛrɛmɛ́ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́.
210 Mpok yɔ, bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɔ ntínso Mandɛm nɛmbak nɛ bhe kɛ nɛ́nɛ, bǎrɔ ntínso Mandɛm nɛmbak nɛ bhe. 
211 Abhɛ́n ɛkɔŋ, bǎchi mankɔ nɛ bǎfʉɛrɛ fʉɛt fá amɨk. Ndu ɛchi nɔ, nnɨkmʉɛt, fɛrɛ́ ká amɔ́ ndǔ barak abʉ́abʉ anɛ mmʉɛt ɛyɛka ɛ́kʉ̀ mǎŋwaka bɛkʉ mbɔnyunɛ mɛnyǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ mɛ́nù nɛ bɛfóŋó ɛbhɛka.
212 Kɛ́m ká ɛrɨ́tɨ́ ɛkakánɛkɔ yɛka nɛntɨ bo abhɛn babhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ Mandɛm bɛ yɛ̌ bárɛ̀m chi ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti yɛka, mánáŋ mángɔ́ bɛrɨ́ ɛbhɛn bǎkʉ̀, mánchyɛ kɛnókó ntá Mandɛm ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn yi átwɔ bɛtaŋ bo.
213 Ɛ̌ti Acha Yesu, sɛptí ká mmʉɛt ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mǔnti ywɛka, nɛ yɛ̌ chi mfɔ ngo mmu bo mankɛm bachi antɛnɛ yi,
214 nɛ yɛ̌ chi bɔgɔ́bhanɔ abhɛn yi átó bɛ mántɛ́msí nɔ́kɔ́ bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ, mánkaka nɔkɔ abhɛn bákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chak.
215 Mandɛm áyàŋ bɛ mǎnkʉ́ nɔ́kɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chak bɛ manyu ánchók bɛchɨŋtǐ bho abhɛn babhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
216 Bák ká mbɔ bo abhɛn bábhɔŋɔ ngǎngaŋ bɛbhak ndǔ mmʉɛt ɛyap. Kɛ bǎkɛ́ rɛm bɛ ɛ̌ti bǎbhɔŋ ngǎngaŋ, bǎkway bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́. Bák ká mbɔ bǒ bɛtok Mandɛm.
217 Chiɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ka bo mankɛm kɛnókó. Bɔ́ŋ ká ɛkɔŋ nɛ batɨ bǒnkwɔ, Bɔ́ŋ ká bɛcháy Mandɛm, chyɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ká mfɔ-ngo kɛnókó. 
218 Bǒ bɛtok, bɔ́ŋ ká nɛsɛptǐmʉɛt bɛsí bachi abhɛka nɛ kɛnókó kɛnkɛm. Bǎkɛ́ bhak ɛnyu ɛyɔ ndiɛrɛ nɛ abhɛn bɛrɨ̌ntɨ nɛ abhɛn bákɛ̀m be sayri. Bák ká ɛnyu yɔ yɛ̌ chi nɛ abhɛn báchí bɛběbɛbe.
219 Mmu anɛ ákɛpntɨ ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ báchyɛ̀ yi ndɛ́ndɛm ndu yi árɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ Mandɛm achi nɛ yi, Mandɛm ǎbhɔŋ maŋák nɛ yi.
220 Kɛ ntá mmu anɛ ákʉ́ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ, mbák mándɛ́n wɔ ɔ́nkɛpntɨ, nsáy anɛ ɔ́bhɔ̀ŋ ǎbhák bɛ yi? Kɛ mbák ɔ́kʉ̀ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛchi chak kɛ ɔ́mbɔŋ ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ ɔ́nkɛpntɨ ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri yɔ, Mandɛm ǎbhɔ́ŋ maŋák nɛ wɔ.
221 Chi ndu ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ kɛ Mandɛm abhɨŋɨ bhe mbɔ ɛnyǔ Yesu Kristo nkwɔ abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ̌ti yɛka, arɔ be ɛrɨŋ bɛ mǎnkóŋó nɔ́kɔ́ bayat yi.
222 Abhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ nyaka yɛ̌ bɛbʉ́, nɛ yɛ̌ mmu yi abhɨkɨ rwɔ.
223 Mpok básɔ̀kɔti yi, abhɨ́kɨ́ kɛmɛ yɛ̌ nsɔk. Mpok yi ághɔ̀ ɛsɔŋɔri, abhɨ́kɨ́ pa yɛ̌ mmu. Árɔ barak ankɛm ntá Mandɛm mmu átàŋ manyé ɛnyu ɛnɛ ɛchi chak.
224 Yímbɔŋ ápɔ́kɔ́ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛsɛ mɛnkɛm amʉɛt ndǔ ɛkotákátí. Akʉ nɔ bɛ sɛ́ndɔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛsɛ sɛ́mbak chak. Bɛfʉɛt ɛbhɛ́n báfyɛ́ yi amʉɛt bɛ́bǔ bhe.
225 Bǎchí nyaka mbɔ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n anɛ́ ánɛ́mɛ́ ɛbhɨ, kɛ nɛ́nɛ bápɛtnsɛm ntá Mbabhɛri bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n, mmu achi Mbabhɛri bapɛ́m ayɛka.
3
31 Bě baghɔrɛ́ nkwɔ bǎbhɔŋ bɛsɛptimʉɛt ntá manɛ́m abhɛka. Mbák mǎnkʉ nɔ, bǎkway bɛkʉ manɛ́m abhɛka abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm mánoko yɛ̌ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɛm chí ɛnyɨŋ ntá yap.
32 Bákway mɛnoko mpok bághɔ̀ kɛnókó ɛkɛn báchyɛ̀ Mandɛm nɛ ndǔ bǎchí chak bɛsí bhi.
33 Bɛrɨ ɛbhɛka bɛkɛ fú chi ndǔ mmʉɛt bɛsɔbhɛri nɛ bati bɛ́ghóko nɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ pú nɛ ndu bɛfyɛ bɛrɨ́tí ndɛn.
34 Mɛ́mbák chí bɛrɨ̌ ɛpɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fù amɛm ntɨ, nɛ bɛbhak kpák, nɛ nɛsɛptímʉɛt mbɔnyunɛ ɛnyǔ bɛrɨ ɛbhɔ bɛpu gu manyiɛp, nɛ ɛbhɔ kɛ Mandɛm ákɔŋ tontó.
35 Baghɔrɛ́ abhɛn tɛsáy abhɛn bachi nyáŋá nɛ básɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ nɛ Mandɛm bághòk nyaka manɛ́m abhap nɛ ɛnyu ɛyɔ, báre fyɛ́ bɛrɨ amʉɛt.
36 Sará abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka ɛnyu ɛpɨŋ ɛyɔ, ambɨŋɨ nɔkɔ nnɛ́m ɛ́ywi Ábraham bɛ acha. Nɛ bǎchi bɔ̌ Sará nɛ́nɛ, mbák bǎkòŋo ɛrɨ́tí ɛpɨŋ ɛyi kɛbhɔŋ bɛcháy.
37 Bě manɛ́m nkwɔ, mǎnkɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ baghɔrɛ́ bhɛka sayri, mǎnchyɛ nɔkɔ bɔ́ kɛnókó mbɔ bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ mbɔ bhe. Bě nɛ bhɔ bǎbhɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn Mandɛm achyɛ ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi. Kʉ nɔ́kɔ́ ká nɔ bɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛkɛ chyɛt nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛnɛka. 
38 Ndǔ ngwɛnti, bɔ́ŋ ká nkaysi amɔt, mǎmbɔŋ nɔkɔ ntínso nɛ batɨ, mánkɔŋ batɨ bǒnkwɔ, mǎmbɔŋ bɛrɨ̌ntɨ nɛ batɨ, nɛ mǎmbɔŋ nɛsɛptímʉɛt.
39 Yɛ̌ mmu ywɛka ákɛ́ kɛmɛ bɛbʉ́ amfǎy bɛbʉ́. Mbák mu asɔk wɔ, ɔ́kɛ́ sɔk yi. Kɛ nɨkmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm ankʉ yi bɛrɨ. Mandɛm abhɨ́ŋɨ́ wɔ́ chi bɛ ɔ́mbak nɔ bɛ́ yi anjɛt wɔ.
310 Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Mmu anɛ áyàŋ bɛbhɔŋ ɛrɨ́tí nɛpɛ́m, nɛ áyàŋ bɛbhak maŋák, ánkɛ́m nɛ́rɨ ɛni bɛ ákɛ́ rɛm ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ, bɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ́kɛ́ fu yi anyu.
311 Mmǔ wu abhɔŋ bɛtɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́, ándɔ́bhɛ kʉ chi bɛrɨ, ánú bɛbhak kpák nɛ bho, andɔk ambɨ bɛkʉ nɔ.
312 Amɨ́k Mandɛm Acha áchí amʉɛt bo abhɛn bachi chak, nɛ yi ǎghòk yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛnap, kɛ ǎtɨknsɛm ntá bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ bɛbʉ́.”
313 Mbák báyàŋ tontó bɛ́kʉ bɛrɨ, agha ákway mɛnɨ bhe?
314 Nɛ yɛ̌ ɛmbak chi bɛ bǎbhɔ̀ŋ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ̌ti bǎchí chak, ɛyɛka ɛ́rɨ ɛncha. Bǎkɛ chay yɛ̌ mmu, nɛ batɨ ákɛ́ sɔŋɔri be amɛm.
315 Kɛ chyɛ nɔkɔ ka Kristo kɛnókó mbɔ Acha amɛm batɨ yɛka. Tě ká mpoknkɛm bɛghati yɛ̌ agha anɛ ábhɛ̀p bhe ntí anɛ bǎbháká ntɨ nɛ Yesu. Kʉ nɔ́kɔ́ ka nɔ nɛ ɛrɨ́tí ɛyɔŋɔ́nyu, nɛ kɛnókó.
316 Bʉrɛ́ ká batɨ yɛka pɛ́pɛ́p, bɛ mpok bo básɔ̀kɔti bhe ɛ̌ti ɛrɨ́tí ɛkakánɛkɔ ɛyɛka mbɔ bakoŋó Kristo, ntíánwɔ́p ánkɛm bɔ.
317 Ɛ́chí sayri bɛghɔ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ̌ti ɔ́kʉ̀ bɛrɨ mbák nɔ kɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ, ɛcha bɛbhɔŋ ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ ntí bɛ ɔ̌kʉ̀ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ.
318 Kristo nkwɔ aghɔ nyaka ɛsɔŋɔri, agú ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ bo mankɛm, ndɔŋ amɔt ndak ámáy. Anaŋa bɛtɨk ɛbhɔ, yi mmu achi chak, ɛ̌ti bo abhɛn bapu chak, bɛ́ ánsɔt bɛsɛ ntá Mandɛm. Báwáy yi, agú ndǔ nkwɔmʉɛt, kɛ ndǔ Ɛfóŋó, Mandɛm akʉ yi apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
319 Nɛ Yesu arɔk ndǔ Ɛfóŋó aghati Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ntá bɛfóŋó bo abhɛn bábhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ ndǔ ɛtɔkɔ́ bawú mɛnoŋ manyé anɛ ngwɛnti mmɨk.
320 Nɔ chí, bɛfóŋó bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko nyaka Mandɛm mpok Nóa. Mandɛm ǎnòŋ nyaka nɛ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ bɛ bɔ́ mángúpsí batɨ yap mpok Nóa ághòko áchwí. Bǎru bho bati anɛn abhɛn bachi amɛm áchwí kɛ bápɛ́m nyaka ndu áchwí ághɔ̀k amfǎnyɛ́n.
321 Manyiɛbhɛ́ mɔ até ndǔ nɛjwiti ɛnɛn nɛ́pɛ̀mɛ bhe ɛchɔŋ. Nɛjwiti puyɛ̌ chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fɛ̀rɛ bo bakwap amʉɛt. Chi nku anɛ mmu ányù nɛ Mandɛm nɛ ntɨ ɛnɛn pɛ́pɛ́p. Nɛjwiti nɛ́pɛ̀mɛ mmu ɛ̌ti nɛpɛrɛ́nsɛm ɛnɛn Yesu Kristo ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
322 Mpok ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, ákó amfay, achɔkɔ ndu ɛbhe awɔ́nɛm Mandɛm. Arɛ́, bɔángɛl, bɛfóŋó, nɛ bɛtaŋtí bɛfóŋó, nɛ mɛnyǔ bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm bɛ́chí antɛnɛ yi.
4
41 Tɛ̌ndu Kristo ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ yɛ ɛsɔŋɔri fá amɨk, agú, bǎbhɔŋ bɛgwɔt mmʉɛt nɛ ɛnyǔ nkaysi anɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka mbɔnyunɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛsɔŋɔri mbɔ Kristo fá amɨk abhɨkɨ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ ɛnyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ bɛbʉ́.
42 Ɛyɔ ɛkʉ bɛ tɛ ndiɛrɛ nɛwú, bǎkɛ́ pɛrɛ ŋwaka bɛkʉ bɛpɔ̌ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǒ mmɨk bábhɔ̀ŋ ɛkwak arɛ. Bɔ́ŋ ká ɛkwak chí bɛ́kóŋo nkaysi Mandɛm.
43 Ndǔ mpok anɛ áfʉɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm, bǎkʉ̀ nyaka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl bákɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ. Ɛyɔ ɛkway! Bǎchyɛ̀ nyaka nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka ndu bɛpɔ̌ baraka ɛpúsí, bǎbhɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ ɛkwak ndu bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ, bǎbhák manyǔ mmɛ́m, mǎnkoŋo nɔkɔ bɛpǎ ɛpusi nɛ bɛchɛmɛ́ manyǔ mmɛ́m, mǎnchyɛ nɔkɔ kɛnókó ntá bɔmandɛm nsé, ɛnɛ ɛbhé Mandɛm ɛpu ka nɔ.
44 Bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ Mandɛm bachi maknkay bɛ nɛ́nɛ, bǎpú pɛrɛ chɛm mmʉɛt nɛ bhɔ ndǔ ɛpɔ̌ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɔ. Ɛkʉ bɔ bárɛ̀m bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti yɛka.
45 Kɛ mpok átwɔ̀ anɛ bo bhɔ bátè bɛsí Mandɛm ndǔ manyé bɛ mándɛm ɛnyu bákʉ́ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnap. Mandɛm até bɛ́taŋ bo abhɛn bachi pě nɛ bawú.
46 Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ bághàti nyaka Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ yɛ̌ chí ntá bawú bɛ́ yɛ̌ndu bágú mbɔ ɛnyǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu, mánkwáy bɛbhak nɛpɛ́m ndu ɛfóŋó mbɔ Mandɛm. 
47 Ngwɛnti mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm achi kɛkwɔt. Bǎkɛ́ bhak yɛ taka taka ndǔ nkaysi yɛka. Bák ká pě amɛm batɨ ayɛka bɛ mǎnkwáy mɛnɨkmʉɛt.
48 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛcha bɛchak mɛnkɛm chi bɛ mǎndɔk ambɨ bɛkɔŋ batɨ nɛ batɨ ayɛka ankɛm tɛ̌ndu ɛkɔŋ ɛ́kùti bɛyǎ bɛbʉ́.
49 Syɛptí nɔ́kɔ́ ká batɨ bǒnkwɔ amɛm bɛkɛt ɛbhɛka kɛbhák bɛ bákʉ̀ nɔ mǎnywinti nɔkɔ.
410 Mandɛm áchyɛ̀ bhe akap mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu abhɔŋ bɛkwak ntɨ nɛ aywi akap mbɔ ɛrɨ́tí nkʉbɛtɨk Mandɛm.
411 Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ághàti bho Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm, abhɔŋ bɛkʉ nɔ mbɔ mmu anɛ árɛ̀m nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fú ntá Mandɛm. Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ákʉ̀ bɛtik Mandɛm, abhɔŋ bɛkʉ bhɔ́ chi nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ̀ yi. Ɛ́bhɔŋ bɛbhak nɔ, bɛ ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ, bo mánchyɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ Mandɛm kɛnókó ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo. Mandɛm kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ kɛnókó kɛnkɛm nɛ bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm bɛ́chí ɛbhi ngwɛnti tí. Amen. 
412 Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, bǎkɛ́ bhak maknkay ndǔ bɛrɛm bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn bɛ́twɔ̀ ntá yɛka. Bɛ́twɔ̀ chi mɛmɔ be mbák bǎsɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ Mandɛm tɛtɛp. Bákɛ́ sɔt bhɔ mbɔ bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo bábhɨ́kɨ́ re ghɔ kɛ bɛ́fàkari nɛ bhe.
413 Bɔ́ŋ nɔ́kɔ́ ká chi maŋák tɛ̌ndu bábhɔ̀ŋ ɛsɔŋɔri mbɔ Kristo ndǔ bǎchɛ́mɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ yi, bɛ́ be nkwɔ mǎnjwi nɛ maŋák mpok yi átwɔ nɛ kɛnɛ́m ɛki.
414 Ɛ́rɨ ntá yɛka ɛcha mbák bǒ básɔ̀kɔti bhe ɛ̌ti bǎchi bakoŋo Kristo mbɔnyunɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ Ɛfóŋó bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm, nɔ chi Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm, achi nɛ bhe.
415 Kɛ yɛ̌ mmu ywɛka ákɛ́ bhɔŋ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ̌ti yi achi ngwayti bho, yɛ̌ chi ɛ̌ti yi achi ngɛp, yɛ̌ chi ɛ̌ti yi achi nkʉ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ, nɛ ɛ́kɛ́ bhak chi ɛ̌ti yi ákɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛchwe ndǔ baraka bo bachak.
416 Kɛ mbák mmu ǎbhɔ̀ŋ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ̌ti yi achi mmu Kristo, ntíánwɔ́p ákɛ́ kɛm yi. Ánkáká nɔ́kɔ́ kaka Mandɛm bɛ yi aká nnyɛ́n bɛ mmǔ Kristo.
417 Ɛ́mbák chí nɔ́ mbɔnyunɛ mpok manyé akway, nɛ ábho chi ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt Mandɛm. Nɛ mbák ámbó nɛ bhɛsɛ, chɔŋ ɛ́mbak ná nɛ bo abhɛn bápú koŋo Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm?
418 Nɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Mbák bo ábhɛn báchí chak bábhɔŋ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri kɛ mámpɛmɛ bhɔ, chɔŋ ɛ́mbak ná nɛ bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ Mandɛm, nɛ bákʉ̀ bɛbʉ́?”
419 Bo abhɛn bábhɔ̀ŋ ɛsɔŋɔri mbɔnyunɛ ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ nkaysi Mandɛm achi, bábhɔŋ bɛrɔ́ŋ ambɨ bɛ́kʉ bɛrɨ, mándɔ bapɛm ayap ntá Mandɛm mmu aghoko bhɔ. Yi apú rɔ bɛbhʉrɛ bariɛp ami.
5
51 Nchí ghati yɛ bǒbati abhɛn bachi ndǔ nkwɔ ywɛka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́kʉ. Mɛ nkwɔ nchí mǔnti mbɔ bhe. Ngɔ̌ nyaka ɛnyu Kristo ághɔ̀ ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ nchí ndǔ mpǎy bo abhɛn Mandɛm ákʉ̀ chɔŋ mǎngɔ kɛnɛ́m Kristo mpok yi átwɔ̀.
52 Babhɛrí nɔ́kɔ́ ká bǒnkwɔ abhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ amɔ́ yɛka mbɔ mmu anɛ ábhàbhɛri nkwɔ́ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n. Kʉ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ká mbɔ bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ntɨ bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ mankʉ. Ɛ́kɛ́ bhak chi mbɔ bɛ mányiɛrɛ bhe nyirɛ. Kʉ nɔ́kɔ́ ká nɔ nɛ ntɨ nɛnkɛm kɛfyɛ́ ngoŋo ndǔ bɛbhɔŋ nsáy.
53 Bǎkɛ́ bhak mbɔ bafɔ amfáy bo abhɛn báfyɛ́ amɔ́ yɛka. Bák ká chɨ́ bɛrɨ́tɨ́ bɛrɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛ́ŋɔ́kɔ.
54 Nɛ mpok Mbabhɛri bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n anɛ ngo abhesi, chɔŋ anchyɛ bhe akap anɛ́ árɨ́ achá, akap anɛ apu yibhiri ɛnyu.
55 Bě bɛsakábho nɛ baghɔsɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ŋ ká nɛsɛptímʉɛt ntá bǒ batɨ́ bhɛka. Bɔ́ŋ ká nɛsɛptímʉɛt nɛ batɨ. Nɛsɛptǐmʉɛt nɛ́mbák ntá yɛka mbɔ nkú anɛ mmu afyɛ́ amʉɛt. Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Mandɛm apú chyɛ mbi ntá mmu anɛ áyòŋmʉɛt, kɛ ǎtɔ̀ŋ bɛrɨ̌ndu ntá bo abhɛn básɛptimʉɛt amɨk.”
56 Sɛptí yɛ ka mmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm bɛ́ mpok yi ankway, yí ankosi bhe.
57 Dɔ̌ ká bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛka mɛnkɛm ntá yi. Yí kɛ áyɨ̀ŋɨ bhe.
58 Kɛ́m ká mmʉɛt. Bák ká pě. Satan mǔmpap ywɛka ǎghàp, amkpe nɔkɔ mbɔ nkʉ, ndu áyàŋ mmu anɛ yi akɛm anyiɛ.
59 Bǎkɛ́ chyɛ yi mbi. Tě ka kpirí ndǔ nɛka ɛnɛka. Bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ batɨ bǒnkwɔ mbaŋ nkɛm fá amɨk, bághɔ̀ nkúbhɛ́ mɛnyu bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn bǎghɔ̀.
510 Mǎnáŋ mǎngɔ ɛsɔŋɔri, nɛ ɛ́pú bhak chɔŋ ndu ɛrɔri mpok, chɔŋ mbɔŋ Mandɛm mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɨ̌ndu mɛnkɛm ankʉ mǎnte sɛnɛ́, ɛnyɨŋ kɛchɛp bhe, ambʉrɛ bhe ndu nté anɛ mǎnáŋ bǎchi nyaka arɛ, anchyɛ bhe bɛtaŋ. Yi kɛ ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ be bɛ mǎmbɔŋ ákɔ́rɛ́ ndǔ kɛnɛ́m ɛkɛn kɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti ndǔ bǎchɛ́mɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo.
511 Bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm chi ɛbhi mpoknkɛm. Amen. 
512 Sáilas akwak mɛ bɛsɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Nsɔt yí mbɔ ntɨ manɔ anɛ mɛ̌kwáy bɛsɨkɨntɨ nɛ yi. Ntí anɛ nsɨ́ŋɨ́ bhe mɔ́mbɨŋɨ́ ɛkáti ɛnɛ chi ndu bɛ́fyɛ bhe ntɨ nɛ bɛghati bhe ɛnyu Mandɛm áyɛ̀t bho. Tě ká kpirí arɛ́.
513 Ɛka bǒnkwɔ abhɛn bachi fá ɛtɔk Bábilɔn, bátò be bakak. Mandɛm ayap bɔ́ nkwɔ mbɔ bhe. Mɔ́wa Mák nkwɔ ǎtò be bakak.
514 Kaká ká batɨ sayri nɛ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ Yesu. Kpák ámbák nɛ be mankɛm abhɛn bǎchɛ́mɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo.
1  
11 Mɛ Símun Píta, mǔbɛtok, nɛ mǔnto Yesu Kristo kɛ nchí sɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Nchí sɨŋ ntá bo abhɛn mánoko Yesu Kristo mbɔ bhɛsɛ. Yi mmu achi Mandɛm ywɛsɛ nɛ Mpɛmɛ ywɛsɛ kɛ akʉ bɛsɛ́ mankɛm sɛ́bhɔŋ nɛka nɛ yi. Yi achi chak ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ yi ákʉ.
12 Mandɛm ántɔ́ŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu andɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ, anchyɛ bɛ kpák anɛ ájwi amɛm batɨ yɛka ndǔ bǎrɨ̀ŋɨ yi nɛ Acha ywɛsɛ Yesu Kristo. 
13 Yesu Kristo áchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ sɛ́ndɨŋɨ Mandɛm mmu ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ bhɛsɛ bɛ sɛ́mbɔ́ŋ kɛnɛ́m nɛ yi, nɛ bɛ sɛ́nkoŋo ɛpɨŋ ɛyi ɛnɛ́ ɛrɨ ɛcha. Ndu sɛ́rɨ̀ŋɨ yi, ǎchyɛ bhɛsɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chɛ́bhɛ́ bhɛsɛ. Nɛ ǎchyɛ bhɛsɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi bɛ sɛ́mbɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m nɛkɔ nɛ ɛpɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bo Mandɛm bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛbhɔŋ.
14 Bɛ́fʉɛ́t ndǔ kɛnɛ́m ɛki nɛ ɛrɨ́tɨ́ ɛpɨŋ ɛyi, Mandɛm ǎchyɛ bhɛsɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛrɨ bɛcha, ɛbhɛn yi afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛchyɛ bhɛsɛ. Akʉ nɔ bɛ mǎmbʉ́ɛ́ bɛpɔ̌ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo máŋwaka bɛkʉ fá amɨk, mǎndɔbhɛ bhɔŋ chi ɛpɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm.
15 Ndu ɛchi nɔ, nu ká mɛ́máka ɛpɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛrɨ ɛcha ndǔ nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ Yesu, mǎnu nkwɔ bɛrɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ.
16 Ndu mɛ́máka ndǔ nɛrɨŋɨ́mɛnyɨŋ bɔ́ŋ ká nkwɔ nɛkɛmɛ́mʉɛt. Nɛ mɛ́máka ndǔ nɛkɛmɛ́mʉɛt, tě ká kpirí. Nɛ mɛ́máka ndǔ nɛte kpirí, bɔ́ŋ ká ɛpɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bo Mandɛm bábhɔŋɔ bɛbhɔŋ.
17 Nɛ mɛ́máka ndǔ ɛpɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chyɛ̀ Mandɛm maŋák, bɔ́ŋ ká ɛkɔŋ nɛ batɨ mbɔ bǒnɛrɛ́kɛt amɔt nɛ mǎnkɔŋ bǒ mankɛm.
18 Mbák mǎndɔ́k ambɨ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ndɔŋ nɛ ndɔŋ, nɛrɨŋɨ anɛ bǎrɨŋɨ Acha ywɛsɛ Yesu Kristo apú bhak ndɛ́ndɛm, kɛ bɛrɨ bɛ́fù ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bǎkʉ̀.
19 Kɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛpu ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛni achí nnɛ́mámɨ́k. Mbák ɛ́pú nɔ́, apú ghɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ, nɛ ághɔ́kɔ́ntɨk bɛ Mandɛm asó bɛbʉ́ bhɛsɛ afɛrɛ.
110 Bɔ̌ma, fyɛ́ yɛ́ ka bɛtaŋ ndu bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ Mandɛm abhɨ́ŋɨ́ bhe nɛ ayap bhe tɛtɛp mbɔnyunɛ mbák bákʉ̀ nɔ bǎpú kwɛn wáwák.
111 Nɛ Mandɛm ápú rɔ mɛ́nɛ́nɛ mbǐnywɔp fúú, bɛ mǎnchwe ndǔ kɛfɔ ɛkɛn Acha nɛ Mpɛmɛ ywɛsɛ Yesu Kristo. Kɛfɔ ɛkɔ kɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti. 
112 Mbɔ̌ŋ yɛ nkaysi bɛtɨk bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm, mpoknkɛm, yɛ̌ndu bǎrɨŋɨ bhɔ nɛ bǎte kpirí ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ tɛtɛp ɛbhɛn bátɔ́ŋɔ́ be.
113 Nkáysí bɛ ɛchi chak bɛ ntɨ́k nɔ́kɔ́ bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ndu mbʉɛ́t fá amɨk bɛ bǎkɛ́ bhʉrɛ kɛnɔ́,
114 tɛ̌ndu ndɨ́ŋɨ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Acha ywɛsɛ Yesu Kristo átɔ́ŋ mɛ bɛ manywɔp aya fá amɨk ábhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ yá.
115 Nɛ mbɔ̌ŋ bɛghɔ bɛ mpok nnáŋ ndɔ́ mmɨk, mǎntɨk nɔ́kɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mpoknkɛm. 
116 Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́ghàti nyaka bhe ɛ̌ti nɛtwɔ Acha ywɛsɛ Yesu Kristo nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi bɛ́pú bakay. Bɛsɛ́ babhɔŋ sɛ́ghɔ́ kɛfɔ ɛki nɛ amɨ́k.
117 Mpok Mandɛm mmu achi Ɛta átɔ́ŋɔ́ kɛnɛ́m ɛki nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi, sɛbhak arɛ nɛ Yesu. Sɛ́ghók ndu Mandɛm mmu acha mankɛm árɛ̀m bɛ, “Nɛ́ chi Mɔ́wa. Nkɔŋ yi tontó. Ǎchyɛ̀ mɛ bɛyǎ kɛnókó.”
118 Bɛsɛ́ babhɔŋ sɛ́ghók ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fǔ amfay mbɔnyunɛ sɛ́chí nyaka nɛ yi amfǎy njiɛ Mandɛm.
119 Ɛ̌ti yɔ, sɛ́rɨŋɨ mbɔŋ nɛ́nɛ ɛcha ɛnyu ɛsɨ́ bɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ bárɛ́mɛ́ nyaka bɛ́chí tɛtɛp. Fíɛ́ yɛ́ ka ntí ndǔ bɛyɔŋ ɛbhap, mbɔnyunɛ bɛ́chí mbɔ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛnɛ ɛ́ghɔ̀ amɛm ɛjuri. Dɔ́k ká ambɨ bɛghok bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɔ kpatɛ mpok anɛ nywɔp nɛ́yì. Ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɔ, nɛmbe   ɛnɛn beti nɛ́ghɔ̀ amɛm batɨ yɛka.
120 Ɛnyɨŋɨ́ mbɨ ɛnɛ́ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɨŋɨ chi bɛ, mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ barɛmɛ nyaka, ɛbhɛn bɛchi amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm, yɛ̌ mmu apú kway bɛsɔt kɛboŋ ɛki ánɛ́nɛ́ bhɔ ntá bho,
121 mbɔnyunɛ yɛ̌ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ amɔt abhɨkɨ rɛm nyaka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛfu ndu nkaysi nkwǎŋwaŋ. Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm kɛ áchwé nyaka bho antɨ, akʉ bɔ́ mándɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛfu ntá Mandɛm.
2
21 Barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ nsé báchi nyaka nɛntɨ bǒ Mandɛm. Nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyu yɔ kɛ ɛchi ɛchɔŋ bɛ batɔŋɔ́ nsé bábhɔŋ bɛbhesi nɛntɨ ɛnɛka mántɔŋ nɔkɔ be baraká nsé ɛ̌ti Mandɛm nɛ bapu ɛnɛ́ ɛyɔ ɛ́twɔ̀ bhɔ chi nɛ mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́. Bátɔ̀ŋ nɛ mánìsi bɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛtayap mmu ákú bhɔ́ áfɛ́rɛ́ ndǔ kɛsɛm. Nɛ ndu bákʉ̀ nɔ, ngwɛnti yap ǎbɛ́p ancha.
22 Chɔŋ bɛyǎ bho mánkoŋo bɛpɔ̌ barak ɛpúsí yap nɛ ɛyɔ ɛnkʉ bo bachak mándɛm bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti mbi anɛ tɛtɛp.
23 Nɛ chɔŋ batɔŋɔ́ nse bhɔ mánsɔt bɛyɔŋɔ́ nse ndu bɛrwɔ bhe bɛ mányiɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛka nɛ ngwáy yap. Mandɛm ánáŋ átàŋ bɔ tɛ mpok anɛ afʉɛrɛ ansɛm nɛ ɛrɔp chi bɛ mámbɔ́ŋ ntɛmsi yap.
24 Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ rɔ nyaka bɔángɛl mándɔ́k ndɛ́ndɛm mpok bákʉ́ bɛbʉ́, kɛ amɛsɛ bhɔ amɛm nɛpi, ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ ágiri pyɔ́ɔ́, afe bɔ arɛ́ nɛ ngɛm bɛ mámbák arɛ tɛ mpok manyé ankway.
25 Abhɨ́kɨ́ rɔ nkwɔ bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ mpok nɛ yi, ndu mpok Nóa. Ató ɛghorǐ manyiɛp ɛ́wáy bǒbhɔ mankɛm. Apɛmɛ chí ndiɛrɛ Nóa mmu ághàti bho bɛ mámbák chak bɛsí Mandɛm. Nɛ apɛmɛ bo bachak bati tándrámɔt.
26 Bǎrɨŋɨ nkwɔ bɛ Mandɛm anáŋá nyaka bo Sódom nɛ Gomóra mpok yi átó ngo arɛ. Ásɔ́ŋ bhɔ krokotok, bɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́mbák mbɔ ɛrɨŋ ntá bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ mpok nɛ yi.
27 Mpok yɔ, apɛ́mɛ́ Lɔt mmu achí chak, yi mmu bɛpɔ̌ barak ɛpúsí anɛ bǒ bɛbʉ́ bhɔ bákʉ̀, áchyɛ nyaka yi ɛsɔŋɔri antɨ.
28 Ǎchɔkɔ nyaka nɛ bɛbɛ́ptí bǒbhɔ, angɔ nɔkɔ bɛbɛ́ptí barak anɛ bɔ bákʉ̀ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔp nɛ angok nɔkɔ bɛpɔ̌ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bárɛ̀m. Bɛbɛpti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bɛ́chɔ̀ŋti nyaka ntɨ ɛni amɛm tontó mbɔnyunɛ yímbɔŋ achi nyaka mmu chak.
29 Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bhɛsɛ bɛ Mandɛm Acha arɨ́ŋɨ́ ndu áfɛrɛ bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bo Mandɛm bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ, nɛ ndu átɛ̀msi bo abhɛn bápù chak, bɛ ntɛmsi yap ambak nɛ bhɔ tɛ ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn manyé.
210 Arɨ́ŋɨ́ nkwɔ báráká ntianywɔp anɛ mmʉɛt ɛyap ɛ́ŋwaka bɛ mánkʉ nɛ bo abhɛn bábyak bɛfóŋó ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ.
211 Yɛ̌ndu bɔángɛl bacha bhɔ ndǔ bɛtaŋ bápú rɛm bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ. Bápú sɔkɔti bhɔ́ nɛ bápú rɛm ɛbʉbʉ ɛ̌ti yap bɛsí Ɛta Mandɛm.
212 Kɛ batɔŋɔ́ nse bhɔ bárɛ̀m mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛnyǔ mmʉɛt ɛyap ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ, mbɔ nyǎbhɨ ɛnɛ́ bábhe chi bɛ mankɛm mangway. Bǎbhɔŋ bɛ́way bhɔ mbɔ nyǎbhɨ.
213 Bǎbhɔŋ bɛ́chyɛ bhɔ ɛsɔŋɔri mbɔnyunɛ bɔ báchyɛ̀ bo bachak ɛsɔŋɔri. Bo abhɛn báyàŋ mɛnyiɛ nɛpɛ́m, Maŋák amap chi bɛkʉ nɔ yɛ̌ chi nɛ ngósí chuuu. Bɛpɨŋ ɛbhap bɛ́twɔ̀ nɛ ntíánwɔ́p ntá yɛka. Báchɔ̀kɔ nɛ bhe manyíɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ kɛ bákʉ̀ chi bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chyɛ bɔ maŋák.
214 Nɛ bákʉ̀ barak ɛ́pusi nɛ amɨk, nɛ ɛkwak bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́ ɛpu may bɔ antɨ. Bárwɔ̀ bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko Yesu. Batɨ yap achi chi batɨ bǒ ngwáy. Ntɛ́msí Mandɛm anáŋ achi nɛ bhɔ.
215 Bárɔ mbi anɛ achi chak, mánɛ́m ɛbhɨ. Bákʉ̀ chi mbɔ Bálam,   Mmɔ Boas ákɔ́ŋ nyaka bɛ́kʉ bɛbʉ́ bɛ ámbɔ́ŋ nsáy-nkáp,
216 kɛ báji yi ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ ɛbhi. Ɛkʉ mpɔŋɔ batu anɛ apu rɛm kɛpɨ arɛm kɛpɨ ntá yi nɛ ɛyɔŋɔ́ nkwǎŋwaŋ, akʉ yi andɔ ɛbhokori ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákʉ̀ nyaka.
217 Batɔŋɔ́ nse bhɔ́ báchi chi babhok manyiɛp anɛ manyiɛp ápú nyáy arɛ. Báchí mbɔ nɛbháŋ ɛnɛn mbʉ́ɛ́p ápɔ̀kɔ nɛ manyiɛp kɛfú arɛ ánkwɛ́n. Mandɛm aghókó ɛbhak ɛnɛ ɛ́giri pyɔɔ abhʉrɛ ntá yap.
218 Bápànyu, mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chi ɛchɨŋti. Mánù nkwɔ bɛrwɔ bo abhɛn báyàŋ bɛfap mmʉɛt nɛ nkwɔ bho abhɛn bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛchi nɛ bhɔ. Mánù mɛ́ŋɔ́kɔ́ti bhɔ bɛ́ mánkʉ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛpɔ̌ barak ɛ́pusi anɛ mmʉɛt ɛyap ɛ́ŋwaka bɛ bɔ mánkʉ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bɔ́ babhɔŋ bákʉ̀.
219 Báfyɛ̀ bho bariɛp bɛkʉ mánkáysí bɛ chɔŋ bɔ́ mámbɔŋ ngǎngaŋ bɛkoŋo nɛtɔŋ ɛnɛsɛ, ɛnɛ́ bɔ́ babhɔŋ bachi basɛ́mɛ́ bɛbʉ́. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ amfay mmu, mmu wu ǎbhák chi nsɛm ntá ɛnyɨŋ ɛyɔ.
220 Mbák bo mándɨ́ŋɨ́ Yesu Kristo mmu áchí Acha nɛ Mpɛmɛ ywɛsɛ, nɛ mámbʉɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk ɛbhɛn bɛ́gwɔ̀t bho gwɔt, kɛ mámpɛt mándɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ mɛngwɔt bhɔ nɛ bɛtaŋ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnap, nte anɛ bɔ bábhák arɛ́ ǎbɛp ancha anɛ bɔ́ bachi nyaka arɛ mpok bábhɨ́kɨ́ re rɨŋɨ Yesu Kristo.
221 Ɛrɨ nyaka mbɔŋ bɛ bákɛ́ rɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ mmu abhak chak ɛ́cha bɔ bɛrɨŋɨ, kɛ mámpɛt mánjibhiri mmʉɛt, mándɔ bɛbhé Mandɛm áchyɛ́, kɛpɛrɛ koŋo bhɔ.
222 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fakari nɛ mɛnyǔ bo bhɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ bakay anɛ́ árɛ̀m bɛ, “Mmú ǎgwɔ ɛnyɨŋ ampɛtnsɛm anyiɛ yɔ”, nɛ bɛ, “Báso akók ampɛtsnɛm anyɔ́p mmʉɛt ndǔ batɔp”, achi tɛtɛp.
3
31 Bɔ̌ma, nɛ́ chi ɛkáti ɛnɛ́ ɛjwi bɛpay ndu bɛkáti ɛbhɛn nsɨŋɨ́ bhe. Ndu bɔ bɛpay mɛnkɛm, nchí tɨk be mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mǎnáŋ bǎrɨŋɨ, ndu bɛkwak mǎmbɔŋ nkaysi anɛ achi chak.
32 Nsɨŋ bɛkʉ mǎntɨk nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm bárɛ́mɛ́ tɛ́ntɛp bɛ bɛ́bhɔ́ŋ bɛfakari, nɛ bɛ mǎntɨk nkwɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Acha mmu achi Mpɛmɛ ywɛsɛ afʉɛrɛ ntá bǒnto aghati bhe bɛ mǎnkʉ nɔkɔ.
33 Ɛnyɨŋɨ́ mbɨ ɛnɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɨŋɨ chi bɛ mpok anɛ nɛtwɔ́ Yesu Kristo árɔ́bhɛ́ kɛkwɔt, bo bátwɔ chɔŋ abhɛn báway bhe ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mǎnókó, mánkʉ nɔkɔ chi bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fù bɔ antɨ.
34 Chɔŋ mámbɛbhɛ nɔkɔ bhe bɛ, “Yí afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎpɛtnsɛm, atwɔ kɛ́? Tɛsáy bɔtayɛsɛ bágú, mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́bhʉɛ́t chi ɛnyumɔ́t mbɔ mpok anɛ Mandɛm ághókó mmɨk.”
35 Bághɔkɔntɨk bɛ́ Mandɛm aghókó mfay tɛ́ntɛp chi nɛ ɛyɔŋɔ́nyu ɛyi, akʉ mmɨk afú ndǔ manyiɛp amɛn achi nyaka mbǎnkɛm. Nɛ manyiɛp kɛ yi ásɔ́rɛ́ ághókó mmɨk.
36 Nɛ nkúbhɛ́ manyiɛp kɛ Mandɛm áchɔ́ŋtí mmɨk.
37 Nɛ nkúbhɛ́ ɛyɔŋɔ́nyu kɛ Mandɛm abhʉrɛ mfay nɛ mmɨk anɛ ɛchɔŋ mɛnoŋ ngó ansɔŋ mfay nɛ mmɨk, kɛ anaŋa bo abhɛn bapú mbɔ ɛnyǔ bo Mandɛm bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́bhak, ndǔ nywɔp manyé.
38 Kɛ abhɛ́n ɛkɔŋ, bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛghɔkɔntɨk ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́mɔt! Nɛ Ɛta Mandɛm, nywɔp nɛmɔt nɛchi mbɔ nká mamiɛ́, nɛ nká mamiɛ́ achi mbɔ nywɔp nɛmɔt.
39 Mbɔk bho bákaysi bɛ Mandɛm ǎchɔ̀ŋti mpok tontó ndu bɛ́bhʉɛ́rɛ bariɛp ami. Ápú chɔŋti mpok mbɔ ɛnyu bɔ́ bákáysí. Ǎkɛp chi ntɨ nɛ bhe, ndu ápú yaŋ bɛ yɛ̌ mmu angu anɛm. Ǎyàŋ chi bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ántɨ́knsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhi.
310 Kɛ nywɔp ɛnɛn Yesu Acha ápɛ̀tnsɛm nɛ́twɔ chɔŋ mbɔ ngɛ́p. Mpok yɔ, chɔŋ nɛbu nɛ́ngwat wɔ́ɔ́ɔ́ nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ, nɛ́nɛ́msi. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛchi amfay ɛ́nsayri amɛm ngó, ɛnɛmsi. Nɛ mmɨk ansɔŋɔ nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi arɛ́.
311 Tɛ̌ndu mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm bɛbhɔŋɔ chɔŋ bɛsayri, mɛ́nɛmsi ɛnyu ɛyɔ, ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨ nɔ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ ywɛka ámbʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛni pɛ́pɛ́p, ambak mbɔ ɛnyǔ mmu Mandɛm ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛbhaka?
312 Nɛ ndǔ mǎnòŋ nɛ nɛbhakántɨ́ nywɔp ɛnɛn Mandɛm átwɔ̀, kʉ nɔ́kɔ́ ká yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ bɛ nɛ́ntwɔ́ ayak. Ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɔ, ngó ásɔŋ mmɨk nkɛm, nɛ bɛsɔŋɔ́ ngó mɛ́nkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi amfay ɛnsayri.
313 Kɛ bɛ́koŋo bariɛp Mandɛm, sɛ́nòŋ mfay nkɔ nɛ mmɨk nkɔ. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ábhákántɨ arɛ́, ǎbhak chak bɛsí Mandɛm.
314 Abhɛ́n ɛkɔŋ, tɛ̌ndu mánòŋ yɛ bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛmfakari, fyɛ́ ká bɛtaŋ ndu bɛkʉ Mandɛm angɔ bɛ bǎchi pɛ́pɛ́p, kɛbhɔ́ŋ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́, nɛ bɛ bɛsí Mandɛm kpák achi nɛ bhe.
315 Nɛ sɔt ká ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ Acha mbɔ mbi anɛ́ yi áchyɛ̀ bho bɛ mándɔ́ yi ámpɛ́mɛ́ bhɔ. Ɛchi nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ mɔ́mayɛsɛ Pɔ̌l mmu sɛ́kɔ̀ŋ ásɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka nkwɔ ntá yɛka nɛ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɛn Mandɛm achyɛ yi.
316 Asɨ́ŋ, andɛmɛ nɔkɔ amɛm bɛkáti bhi mɛnkɛm ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn. Mbɔk mɛnyɨŋ bɛchi amɛm bɛkáti ɛ́bhɛn yi asɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛbhɛn bɛ́bèmʉɛt bɛjwimɛm. Nɛ bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ, nɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ te kpirí, báyìbhiri mɛnyɨŋ yi asɨŋɨ́, mángati nɔkɔ bho chi mɛnyɨŋ bɛchak ɛbhɛn bɛpú ndɔ́ŋ amɔt nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛ́bhɛn yi ásɨ́ŋɨ́. Ndu bákʉ̀ nɔ, bábhɨ̀ŋɨ chi mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́ amʉɛt.
317 Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, tɛ̌ndu bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ambɨ ambɨ, sɔt ka mpok bɛ́ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bo abhɛn bápú bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé bɛ́kɛ́ pɔkɔ́ bhe mǎndɔp chi bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ te kpirí.
318 Kɛ dɔ́k ká ambɨ bɛgo ndǔ nɛrɨŋɨ anɛ bǎrɨ̀ŋɨ Yesu Kristo mmu achi Acha nɛ Mpɛmɛ ywɛsɛ, mǎndɔk ambɨ bɛ́go ndu bɛ́bhak ɛnyunɛ́ bɛrɨ̌ndu bhi bɛ́bhák nɛ bhe. Kɛnókó kɛ́mbak nɛ yi nɛ́nɛ, nɛ mpoknkɛm.3
1
11 Ɛkáti ɛnɛ ɛ́rɛ̀m ɛ̌ti Ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi tɛ mpok anɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́re ghoko mmɨk. Sɛ́ghók ɛ̌ti yi, sɛ́ghɔ́ yi nɛ amɨ́k, sɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ yi, nɛ sɛ́tɔk yi nɛ amɔ. Ɛyɔŋ ǎchyɛ Nɛpɛ́m.
12 Nɛpɛ́m abhésí nyaka nɛ sɛ́ghɔ yi, nɛ sɛ́rɛ̀m ɛ̌ti yi. Sɛ́ghàti bhe ɛ̌ti Nɛpɛ́m. Abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti nɛ achi nyaka nɛ Ɛta kɛ ǎbhesi ntá yɛsɛ́.
13 Sɛ́ghàti bho ɛ̌ti mmǔ anɛ sɛ́ghɔ́, nɛ sɛ́ghók mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi átɔ́ŋɔ́, bɛ́ be nkwɔ mǎmbɔŋ nɛchɛmɛ́mʉɛt nɛ bhɛsɛ. Nɛ, sayri sayri, nɛchɛmɛ́mʉɛt ɛnɛsɛ ɛnɔ nɛchi nɛ Ɛta nɛ Mɔ́ywi Yesu Kristo.
14 Nchí sɨŋ be mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ maŋák amɛsɛ anjwi pɔɔt. 
15 Mbok anɛ Mɔ́ywi áchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ bɛ sɛ́ngátí bhe achi bɛ, “Mandɛm achi Bɛdiɛrɛ, nɛ ɛjuri ɛpu nɛ yi wawak.”
16 Mbák sɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ sɛ́bhɔŋ nɛbharɛ́mʉɛt nɛ Mandɛm, kɛ sɛ́nkɔ nɔkɔ amɛm ɛjuri, nɔ sɛ́sè chi nsé, nɛ sɛpu koŋo tɛtɛp anɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́.
17 Kɛ mbák sɛ́kɔ̀ ndǔ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu yímbɔŋ áchɨ́ Bɛdiɛrɛ sɛ́bhɔŋ nɛchɛmɛ́mʉɛt nɛ batɨ. Nɛ manoŋ Mɔ́ywi Yesu anso bhɛsɛ amfɛrɛ ndǔ bɛbʉ́ mɛnkɛm.
18 Mbák sɛ́ndɛ́m bɛ sɛpu bǒ bɛbʉ́, nɔ́ sɛ́rwɔ̀ chi mmʉɛt nɛ tɛtɛp apú amɛm batɨ yɛsɛ.
19 Mbák sɛ́nsu bɛbʉ́ bhɛsɛ ntá Mandɛm, ǎfoŋori bhɛsɛ, nɛ amfɛrɛ bɛsɛ́ bɛbʉ́ antɨ, ankʉ sɛ́mbak pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí bhi. Yí apú nɔ́k bɛbhʉrɛ bariɛp ami, nɛ ndiɛrɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi chak kɛ̌ yi ákʉ̀.
110 Mbák sɛ́ndɛm bɛ sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́re kʉ bɛbʉ́ wáwák, nɔ́ sɛ́sɔ̀t Mandɛm mbɔ nsěnse, nɛ nɔ́ Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi ɛ́pú amɛm batɨ yɛsɛ.
2
21 Bɔ̌bha, ntí anɛ mɛ́sɨ̀ŋ be mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn chi bɛ mɛ́nkwák bhe bǎkɛ́ kʉ bɛbʉ́. Kɛ mbák mmu akʉ bɛbʉ́, sɛ́bhɔ̌ŋ mmu amɔt anɛ áté bɛsí Ɛtayɛsɛ ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ nɛ ǎnɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ yi amfoŋori bhɛsɛ. Mmǔ wu chi Yesu Kristo mmu achi chak bɛsí Mandɛm.
22 Yí kɛ achí akap anɛ́ ápɔ̀kɔ bɛbʉ́ bhɛsɛ. Nɛ ɛ̌ti yi, Mandɛm ǎfòŋori bɛbʉ́ bhɛsɛ, nɛ puyɛ̌ ndiɛrɛ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛsɛ, kɛ bɛbʉ́ bo mankɛm.
23 Nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ sɛ́ndɨŋɨ bɛ sɛrɔp chi bo abhɛn bárɨŋɨ Mandɛm chi nɛkʉ anɛ sɛ́kʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi áyàŋ sɛ́nkʉ́.
24 Mmu anɛ árɛ̀m bɛ, “Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ Mandɛm” kɛ yi kɛbháká kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áyàŋ bo mankʉ achí nsěnse nɛ tɛtɛp apu nɛ yi.
25 Kɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ábhʉ̀ɛrɛ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm, ɛkɔŋ Mandɛm ɛjwi yi antɨ pɔɔt. Ɛyɔ kɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ sɛ́ndɨŋɨ bɛ sɛbharɛ mmʉɛt nɛ yí.
26 Mmu anɛ árɛ̀m bɛ́ abhat mmʉɛt nɛ Mandɛm, abhɔŋ bɛbhʉɛrɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛni mbɔ ɛnyǔ Yesu ákʉ̀ nyaka. 
27 Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, ɛbhé ɛnɛ mɛ́sɨ̀ŋ ntá yɛka nɛ́nɛ ɛ́pú ɛbhé ɛkɔ. Chí nkúbhɛ́ ɛbhé ɛnɛ bǎrɨŋɨ tɛ mpok anɛ bǎbho bɛkoŋo Yesu. Ɛbhé ɛ́rɛ́ chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mǎnaŋ bǎghókó nɛ batú.
28 Yɛ̌ nɔ, nchí sɨŋ be ɛ̌ti ɛbhé ɛkɔ ɛnɛ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ kpoŋoroŋ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m Yesu nɛ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka, mbɔnyunɛ ɛjuri ɛ́fʉɛ̀t, nɛ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ ɛbhɛn tɛtɛp mɛ́náŋ bɛ́ghɔ̀.
29 Mmǔ anɛ árɛ̀m bɛ, “Nchí kɔ amɛm bɛdiɛ́rɛ́” kɛ ampap nɔkɔ ntɨ manɔ́, abhʉɛ́t amɛm ɛjuri.
210 Mmǔ anɛ ákɔ́ŋ batɨ, ǎkɔ̀ amɛm bɛdiɛ́rɛ́. Nɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ́pú bhak ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛni ɛnɛ ɛ́kway bɛkʉ yi ankwɛn ndǔ bɛbʉ́.
211 Kɛ mmǔ anɛ ápábhɛ́ mɔ́mayi, achí amɛm ɛjuri nɛ ǎkɔ̀ amɛm ɛjuri, kɛrɨŋɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ yi árɔ̀ŋ mbɔnyunɛ ɛjuri ɛnɛ yi achi amɛm ɛ́kʉ́ yi achi mbɔ nnɛ́mámɨ́k 
212 Bɔ̌bha, nchí sɨŋ ntá yɛka mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm afóŋórí bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo.
213 Bɔtá, nchí sɨŋ ntá yɛka mbɔnyunɛ bǎrɨŋɨ yi Mmu ánáŋ achi nyaka tɛ mpok bábhɨ́kɨ́re ghoko mmɨk. Bɛsak, nchí sɨŋ ntá yɛka mbɔnyunɛ mǎnu nɛ mbʉ́mbʉ, kpatɛ bǎsɔt awɔ́nɛm.
214 Bɔ̌bha, nchí sɨŋ ntá yɛka mbɔnyunɛ bǎrɔp chi bo abhɛn bárɨŋɨ Ɛta. Bɔtá, nchí sɨŋ ntá yɛka mbɔnyunɛ bǎrɨŋɨ mmu anɛ ánáŋ achi nyaka tɛ mpok mmɨk ábhɨ́kɨ́re bho. Bɛsak, nchí sɨŋ ntá yɛka mbɔnyunɛ bǎbhɔŋ bɛtaŋ nɛ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛchi amɛm batɨ ayɛka, nɛ mǎnʉ́ nɛ mbʉ́mbʉ bǎsɔt awɔ́nɛm
215 Bǎkɛ́ nyiɛ ɛkɔŋ nɛ mmɨk, nɛ yɛ̌ chí mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk. Ɛkɔŋ Ɛta ɛpu amɛm ntɨ mmu anɛ ányìɛ ɛkɔŋ nɛ mmɨk.
