216 Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo báfyɛ̀ ngoŋo arɛ́ ndǔ bɛ́chyɛ̀ bhɔ maŋák, nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn amɨ́k ayɛsɛ ákwɛ̀n arɛ ɛnkʉ sɛ́mbɔ́ŋ ɛkwak bɛbhɔŋ bhɔ, nɛ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kʉ̀ bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bhɔ báyòŋmʉɛt, bɔ́ mɛnkɛm bɛ́fù chi ndǔ mmɨk bɛbʉ́-nɛ. Bɛ́pú fu ná Ɛta.
217 Nɛ mmɨkɨ nɛ ǎfʉɛ̀rɛ fʉɛt nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhi ɛbhɛn bo máŋwaka bɛbhɔŋ. Kɛ mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áyàŋ bo mánkʉ, ǎbhak nɛpɛ́m mpoknkɛm. 
218 Bɔ̌bha, mmɨk arɔp chi kɛkwɔt mɛmay. Bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ sɛ́ghati nyaka bhe bɛ mǔmpap Kristo ǎtwɔ̀. Yɛ̌ chí nɛ́nɛ, bɛyǎ bǒmpap abhɛn Kristo mánaŋ bátwɔ. Ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ bɛsɛ sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ mpok anɛ mmɨk ámay achi kɛkwɔt.
219 Bǒmpap bhɔ báfù chi ndǔ nkwɔ ywɛsɛ. Kɛ bápú nyaka mbɔ̌ŋ bǒ-bhɛsɛ. Mbɔ báchí bǒnkwɔ ywɛsɛ tɛtɛp, mbʉ bárɔp nɛ bhɛsɛ. Kɛ bárɔ́ bhɛsɛ bɛ ɛ́mbák kpoŋoroŋ bɛ bápú nɛ bhɛsɛ.
220 Kɛ mbák chi bhe, bǎpú ɛnyu ɛyɔ, mbɔnyunɛ Mmǔ anɛ achi Nyáŋá   anɛ́nɛ́ bhe amɨk, nɛ be mankɛm bǎrɨ̀ŋɨ tɛtɛp Mandɛm.
221 Mpú sɨŋ be bɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ tɛtɛp. Nchí sɨŋ be chi ndǔ bǎrɨŋɨ tɛtɛp nɛ bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ baraká nsé apu fu ndǔ tɛtɛp Mandɛm.
222 Sayri sayri, nsěnse chi agha? Chi mmu anɛ abhɨkɨ ka bɛ Yesu chi Mpɛmɛ anɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò. Ɛnyǔ mmu wu kɛ achi mǔmpap Kristo. Ábhɨ́kɨ́ noko Ɛta nɛ Mmɔ.
223 Mmǔ anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛ Mmɔ achi Mpɛmɛ anɛ Mandɛm átó apú kway bɛbhak mmu Ɛta. Kɛ mmǔ anɛ árɛ̀m kpoŋoroŋ bɛ Yesu achi Mmɔ̌ Ɛta, abhɔŋ nɛbharɛ́mʉɛt nɛ Ɛta.
224 Dɔ̌ ká mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎghókó tɛ nɛbhǒnɛt mɛ́mbak amɛm batɨ yɛka. Mbák mǎndɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎghókó tɛ nɛbhǒnɛt mɛ́mbák amɛm batɨ ayɛka, bǎpú rɔ bɛbhak ndǔ nɛbharɛ́mʉɛt nɛ Mmɔ nɛ Ɛta.
225 Nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ Kristo yímbɔŋ afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛchyɛ bhɛsɛ chi nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti?
226 Nsɨŋ be mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ mɛ́nkʉ mǎndɨŋɨ bǒbhɔ nɔ báyàŋ bɛrwɔ bhe.
227 Kɛ Kristo achyɛ́ bhe Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ Mmu achi nɛ bhe. Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ chɛp yɛ mmu anɛ ákway bɛtɔŋ bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi tɛtɛp. Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ǎtɔ̀ŋ bhe mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi átɔ̀ŋ bhe ɛchi tɛtɛp. Nsé apu arɛ. Nchí ghati yɛ bhe bɛ, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ átɔ̀ŋ bhe, bǎkɛ́ rɔ bɛbhak ndǔ nɛbharɛ́mʉɛt nɛ Mmɔ.
228 Bɔ̌bha, bǎkɛ́ rɔ bɛbhak ndǔ nɛbharɛ́mʉɛt nɛ Mmɔ, bɛ mpok anɛ yi ápɛ̀tnsɛm fá amɨk, mǎmbɔ́ŋ maŋák bɛghɔ yi, kɛbhɔŋ bɛcháy nɛ ntíánwɔ́p bɛsí bhi mpok yi átwɔ̀.
229 Bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ yi achi chak bɛsí Mandɛm. Bǎbhɔŋ yɛ bɛrɨŋɨ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chak bɛsí Mandɛm achi mmɔ́ Mandɛm.
3
31 Ghɔ́ ká ndu Ɛtayɛsɛ áre kɔŋ bhɛsɛ. Akɔŋ bhɛsɛ́ tontó kpát ǎbhɨ́ŋɨ́ bhɛsɛ bɛ bɔ̌bhi, nɛ sɛchi bɔ̌bhi tɛtɛp. Ntí anɛ bǒ mmɨk babhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ bɛ sɛchi bɔ̌ Mandɛm chi bɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ Mandɛm.
32 Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, sɛ́chí bɔ̌ Mandɛm nɛ́nɛ, yɛ̌ nɔ, bábhɨ́kɨ́re tɔŋ bɛsɛ ɛnyu sɛ́bhàk mburɛ́ mpok Kristo ápɛ̀tnsɛm. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ chi bɛ mpok yi ábhèsi chɔŋ sɛ́mbak mbɔ yi mbɔnyunɛ sɛ́ghɔ̀ ɛnyu yi achi.
33 Nɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ábhákántɨ bɛ chɔŋ ɛ́mfakari ɛnyu ɛyɔ, ǎbhʉ̀rɛ ntɨ ɛni pɛ́pɛ́p mbɔ Kristo.
34 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ bɛbʉ́, chi mmu anɛ ápú bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé Mandɛm, nɛ bɛ́kʉ bɛbʉ́ chí bɛkwɛn bɛbhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé Mandɛm.
35 Bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ Yesu atwɔ́ nyaka fá amɨk chí bɛfɛrɛ bɛsɛ ndǔ nɛpɛmɛ́ bɛbʉ́, nɛ bɛbʉ́ bɛ́pú nɛ yí.
36 Yɛ̌ mmu anɛ ábhat mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo kɛ andɔk ambɨ bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́ apú. Mmu anɛ ábhʉɛ́t bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́ ǎtɔ̀ŋ bɛ yi abhɨkɨ re ghɔ Yesu nɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ yi wáwák.
37 Bɔ̌bha, bǎkɛ́ rɔ yɛ̌ mmu ándwɔ́ bhe. Mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chak achi chak mbɔ Yesu.
38 Mmu anɛ árɔ̀ŋ ambɨ bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́, chi mmu Satan, mbɔnyunɛ Satan abho bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́ tɛ ndǔ nɛbhǒnɛt. Ntí anɛ Mmɔ Mandɛm átwɔ́ fá amɨk chi bɛchɔŋti bɛtɨk Satan.
39 Mmǔ anɛ árɔ́bhɛ́ chi mmɔ́ Mandɛm, apú pɛrɛ kʉ bɛbʉ́ mbɔnyunɛ nɛpɛ́m Mandɛm nɛchi nɛ yi. Nɛ apú kwáy bɛrɔŋ ambɨ bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́ mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ yi abhɔŋ nɛbhě nɛkɔ.
310 Ghɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ sɛ́ndɨŋɨ bo abhɛn bachi bɔ̌ Mandɛm nɛ abhɛn bachi bɔ̌ Satan nɔ. Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ápú kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chak bɛsí Mandɛm apú mmɔ́ Mandɛm. Ɛchi ɛnyumɔ́t nɛ mmǔ anɛ abhɨkɨ kɔŋ ntɨ. 
311 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎghókó tɛ nɛbhǒnɛt chi bɛ sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛkɔŋ batɨ.
312 Sɛ́kɛ́ bhak mbɔ Ken mmu achi nyaka mmɔ̌ Satan, mbʉ́mbʉ, ɛ́kʉ awáy mɔ́mayi Ábɛl. Awáy manɔ ndaká yí? Awáy manɔ mbɔnyunɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi akʉ bɛbɛp nyaka, kɛ ɛbhɛn manɔ bɛbhak chak bɛsí Mandɛm.
313 Bɔ̌ma, ɛ́kɛ́ bhak yɛ ɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ntá yɛka mbák bǒ mmɨk bápàp bhe.
314 Sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ sɛ́fú ndǔ nɛwú sɛ́chwe ndǔ nɛpɛ́m mbɔnyunɛ sɛ́kɔŋ batɨ bǒnkwɔ. Mmǔ anɛ ábhɨkɨ kɔŋ ntɨ mǔnkwɔ abhʉɛ́t ndǔ nɛwú.
315 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ápàp ntɨ achí ngwayti bho. Nɛ bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti nɛ́pú bhak nɛ ngwayti bho.
316 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ sɛ́ndɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ ɛkɔŋ chi nɛchyɛ anɛ Yesu áchyɛ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛni ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ. Nɛ bɛsɛ nkwɔ sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛka, yɛ̌ chi nɛwú, ɛ̌ti batɨ.
317 Mbák mmu abhɔŋ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk kɛ aghɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ mɔ́mayi angwɔ́t ntɨ nɛ yi, ná ɛkɔŋ Mandɛm ɛbhak yi antɨ?
318 Bɔ̌bha, sɛ́ndɔ bɛrɛm chi nɛ ɛyɔŋɔ́nyu bɛ sɛ́kɔŋ batɨ. Sɛ́ntɔ́ŋ tɛtɛp bɛ sɛ́kɔŋ batɨ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́kʉ̀. 
319 Ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ batɨ kɛ ɛ́kwàk bhɛsɛ babhɔŋ sɛ́ndɨŋɨ bɛ sɛ́chi bɔ̌ Mandɛm mmu achi tɛtɛp. Ɛyɔ ɛ́fyɛ̀ bɛsɛ ntɨ ndǔ mpok anɛ sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm,
320 Yɛ̌ chí mpok anɛ batɨ yɛsɛ́ átàŋ bhɛsɛ bɛ sɛ́chí bǒ bɛbʉ́, sɛ́pú bhɔŋ bɛcháy bɛsí Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ nkaysi Mandɛm achá anɛ achi amɛm batɨ yɛsɛ nɛ yímbɔŋ arɨ́ŋɨ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ.
321 Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, mbák batɨ yɛsɛ ápú ji bhɛsɛ sɛ́pu bhɔŋ bɛcháy bɛsí Mandɛm mpok sɛ́nɨkmʉɛt.
322 Nɛ ǎchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ sɛ́nɨkmʉɛt bɛ yi anchyɛ bhɛsɛ mbɔnyunɛ sɛ́bhʉ̀rɛ bɛbhé bhi nɛ sɛ́kʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chyɛ̀ yi maŋák.
323 Nɛ ɛbhé ɛyi chi bɛ sɛ́nókó Yesu Kristo mmu achi Mɔ́ywi nɛ bɛ sɛ́nkɔŋ batɨ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔnyǔ yi aghati bhɛsɛ bɛ sɛnkʉ.
324 Bǒ mankɛm abhɛn bábhʉ̀rɛ bɛbhé Mandɛm chí bǒ abhɛ́n bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛbharɛ́mʉɛt nɛ yi, yí abhɔ́ŋ nɛbharɛ́mʉɛt nɛ bhɔ. Nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bhɛsɛ bɛ Mandɛm achi nɛ bhɛsɛ chí Ɛfóŋó yi mmu yi achyɛ bhɛsɛ.
4
41 Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, bǎkɛ́ noko yɛ̌ntɨkɨ Ɛfóŋó, kɛ bǎbhɔŋ bɛchak ɛnɛ́ ɛchi ansɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mmu árɛ̀m ndu bɛghɔ mbák chi Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ, barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ nsé báya fá amɨk.
42 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ mǎndɨŋɨ mbák Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm achi nɛ mmu chí bɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ árɛ̀m kpoŋoroŋ bɛ Yesu Kristo asɔt nyaka mmʉɛt nkwǎŋwaŋ atwɔ́ fá amɨk, Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm achi nɛ yi.
43 Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ápú rɛm kpóŋóróŋ bɛ Yesu atwɔ nyaka fá amɨk mbɔ nkwǎŋwaŋ, ɛfóŋó ɛnɛ ɛ́bhak nɛ yi ɛpu fu ntá Mandɛm. Ɛnyu mmu wu ǎbhɔŋ chi ɛfóŋó mǔmpap Kristo anɛ bǎghòk nyaka bɛ ǎtwɔ̀ fá amɨk, nɛ anáŋ achi fá amɨk nɛ́nɛ.
44 Kɛ bɔ̌bha, bǎchí bo Mandɛm, nɛ mǎnaŋ mǎnu nɛ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ nsé bǎsɔt awɔ́nɛm, mbɔnyunɛ mmǔ anɛ achi nɛ bhe ataŋ achá anɛ achi fá amɨk.
45 Barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ nsé chí bǒ mmɨk anɛ. Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ̌ bɔ bátɔ̀ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chi nkaysi bǒ mmɨk nɛ bǒ mmɨk bághòk bhɔ.
46 Kɛ́ sɛ́chí bo Mandɛm nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ árɨ́ŋɨ́ Mandɛm ǎghòk ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́tɔ̀ŋ. Mmu anɛ apu mmǔ Mandɛm apú ghok bhɛsɛ. Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ sɛ́rɨ̀ŋɨ mbák Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm mmu ákʉ̀ bo mándɨŋɨ tɛtɛp anɛ Mandɛm kɛ achi nɛ mmu, nɛ mbák ɛfóŋó ɛnɛ ɛ́rwɔ̀ bho kɛ ɛchi nɛ mmu.
47 Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, sɛ́ndɔ́k ambɨ bɛkɔŋ batɨ mbɔnyunɛ ɛkɔŋ ɛ́fù chi ntá Mandɛm. Nɛ mmu anɛ akɔŋ bo achí mmɔ́ Mandɛm nɛ arɨŋɨ Mandɛm.
48 Mmu anɛ abhɨkɨ kɔŋ bo, abhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm chi Mmǔ ɛkɔŋ.
49 Mandɛm atɔ̌ŋ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ́ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ bhɛsɛ ndǔ átó Njaŋa Mɔ́ywi fá amɨk bɛ sɛ́mfʉ́ɛ́t ntá yi sɛ́mbɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m.
410 Sɛ́ngɔ́ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ mbɔ́ŋ ndu ɛ́chí. Puyɛ̌ bɛ sɛkɔŋ Mandɛm, kɛ chí bɛ́ Mandɛm akɔŋ bhɛsɛ kpát ató Mɔ́ywi mbɔ akap anɛ́ ápɔ́kɔ́ bɛbʉ́ bhɛsɛ, bɛ yi amfoŋori bhɛsɛ.
411 Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, tɛ̌ndu Mandɛm akɔŋ bhɛsɛ tontó ɛnyu ɛnɛ́, sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛkɔŋ batɨ nkwɔ.
412 Yɛ̌ mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ re ghɔ Mandɛm nɛ amɨ́k. Kɛ mbák sɛ́nkɔŋ batɨ, Mandɛm ǎbhak nɛ bhɛsɛ nɛ ɛkɔŋ ɛyi ɛnjwi bhɛsɛ antɨ pɔɔt.
413 Nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ sɛ́ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ sɛ́chi nɛ Mandɛm mpoknkɛm nɛ bɛ yí achí nɛ bhɛsɛ mpoknkɛm chí Ɛfóŋó yi ɛnɛ yi achyɛ bhɛsɛ.
414 Sɛ́ghɔ̌ nɛ amɨ́k, nɛ sɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ Ɛta ato Mɔ́ywi Yesu fá amɨk mbɔ Mpɛmɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu.
415 Yɛ̌ agha anɛ árɛ̀m kpoŋoroŋ bɛ Yesu chi Mmɔ Mandɛm, Mandɛm ǎbhɔŋ nɛbharɛ́mʉɛt nɛ yi, nɛ yí ǎbhɔ́ŋ nɛbharɛ́mʉɛt nɛ Mandɛm.
416 Bɛsɛ́ babhɔŋ sɛ́rɨŋɨ yɛ nɛ sɛ́nókó bɛ Mandɛm akɔŋ bhɛsɛ tontó. Mandɛm chi Mmǔ ɛkɔŋ, nɛ mmu anɛ ákɔ̀ŋ batɨ ǎbhɔŋ nɛbharɛ́mʉɛt nɛ Mandɛm nɛ Mandɛm ǎbhatmʉɛt nɛ yí.
417 Ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ sɛ́kway bɛrɨŋɨ bɛ ɛkɔŋ Mandɛm ɛjwi bɛsɛ antɨ pɔɔt chi bɛ nywɔp Mandɛm átàŋ bo sɛpú bhɔŋ bɛcháy, mbɔnyunɛ sɛ́chí mbɔ Mɔ́ywi ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛsɛ́ fá amɨk.
418 Bɛcháy bɛ́pú ndǔ ɛkɔŋ. Ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́jwí pɔɔt ɛ́fɛ̀rɛ mmu bɛcháy antɨ. Mmu anɛ bɛcháy bɛchi yi antɨ ǎchày chí ntɛmsi. Nɛ mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛcháy chí anɛ ɛkɔŋ Mandɛm ɛbhɨ́kɨ́ jwi yi antɨ pɔɔt.
419 Sɛbhɔŋ ɛkɔŋ amɛm batɨ mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm ayambɨ akɔŋ bɛsɛ.
420 Mbák mmu árɛ̀m bɛ akɔŋ Mandɛm kɛ ampap ntɨ nkwǎ, nɔ mmǔ wu achi nsěnse, mbɔnyunɛ mbák mmu abhɨkɨ kɔŋ ntɨ nkwǎ anɛ yi ághɔ̀, ná yi ákway bɛkaŋ Mandɛm mmu yi apu ghɔ nɛ amɨ́k?
421 Nɛ ɛbhé ɛnɛ Mandɛm achyɛ bhɛsɛ ɛchi bɛ mmu anɛ akɔŋɔ Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛkɔŋ ntɨ nkwǎ nkwɔ.
5
51 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ánókó bɛ Yesu chi Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò achi mmɔ́ Mandɛm. Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ákɔ́ŋ chi ǎkɔ̀ŋ mɔ́ywi nkwɔ́.
52 Sɛ́rɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ sɛkɔŋ bɔ̌ Mandɛm tɛtɛp mbák sɛ́kɔŋ Mandɛm nɛ mbák sɛ́bhʉɛ̀rɛ bɛbhé bhi.
53 Bɛkɔŋ Mandɛm chi bɛbhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé bhi. Nɛ bɛbhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé bhi puyɛ̌ ɛtaŋtí ɛnyɨŋ,
54 mbɔnyunɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ Mandɛm áchyɛ́ nɛpɛ́m nɛkɔ ǎnù nɛ mmɨk ansɔrɛ nɔkɔ chi awɔ́nɛm. Nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ́ sɛ́nù sɛ́nsɔt awɔ́nɛm chí ndu sɛ́bhɔŋ nɛka bɛ Yesu achí Kristo.
55 Agha átàŋ ancha mmɨk? Chi ndiɛrɛ mmu anɛ ánókó bɛ Yesu chí Mmɔ Mandɛm. 
56 Nɛ́ chi Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò. Atwɔ́ fá amɨk, bájwíti yi nɛ manyiɛp. Ɛ́tárɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ manoŋ mi arɔk amɨk. Nɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ achí ntísiɛ bɛ Yesu Kristo ǎrɛ̀m chi tɛtɛp.
57 Ɛnɛ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ batísiɛ́ abhɛn bárɛ̀m bɛ́ Yesu chi Kristo báchí bárát.
58 Batísyɛ bhɔ batí árát chi Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ nɛ manyiɛp, nɛ manoŋ, nɛ bárɛ̀m chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt.
59 Mbák bakwǎŋwaŋ bárɛ̀m mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ́ bárɨ́ŋɨ́ sɛ́noko bhɔ. Sɛ́bhɔŋ yɛ́ mɛnoko ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm árɛ̀m ɛ̌ti Mɔ́ywi ɛ́ncha ɛnɛ nkwǎ árɛ̀m mbɔnyunɛ yi achi Mandɛm. Nɛ Mandɛm até ntísiɛ ɛ̌ti Mɔ́ywi.
510 Ɛ́chí yɛ bɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ anoko Mmɔ Mandɛm, ǎrɨŋɨ̀ amɛm ntɨ ɛni bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm arɛmɛ ɛ̌ti Mɔ́ywi ɛchí tɛtɛp. Bǒ abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko bárɛ̀m bɛ Mandɛm ǎsè chi nsé mbɔnyunɛ bɔ́ bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m ɛ̌ti Mɔ́ywi.
511 Nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm árɛ̀m ɛ̌ti Mɔ́ywi chi bɛ yí áchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti nɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɔ nɛ́fù chi ntá Mɔ́ywi.
512 Ɛ́chí yɛ bɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ábhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Mmɔ Mandɛm, ǎbhɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti. Nɛ mmu anɛ abhɨkɨ bhat mmʉɛt nɛ Mmɔ Mandɛm abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɔ. 
513 Nsɨŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ntá yɛka bo mǎnókó Mmɔ Mandɛm ndu bɛkʉ mándɨŋɨ bɛ mǎnaŋ bǎbhɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
514 Nɛ mpok sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt sɛ́pú makati mbɔnyunɛ sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ, ǎchyɛ bhɛsɛ yɔ mbák ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́yàŋ ɛ́kɔ ndɔ́ŋ amɔt nɛ nkaysi yi.
515 Nɛ mbák sɛrɨŋɨ bɛ sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt yi ángók bhɛsɛ, sɛ́bhɔŋ yɛ bɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ bɛ yi anáŋ áchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ yi anchyɛ bhɛsɛ.
516 Mbák mmu ywɛka ángɔ ntɨ mmǔ Mandɛm ndǔ ákʉ̀ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛn bɛpu twɔ nɛ nɛwú, ánɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm nɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm anchyɛ mmǔ wu nɛpɛ́m. Bɛbʉ́ bɛchi ɛbhɛn bɛ́twɔ̀ nɛ nɛwú, kɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ rɛm bɛ mmu ánɨkmʉɛt ɛ̌ti mmu anɛ ákʉ́ ɛnyǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɔ.
517 Bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ mɛnkɛm chi bɛbʉ́. Kɛ bɛbʉ́ bɛchi ɛbhɛn bɛpu twɔ nɛ nɛwú.
518 Sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ mmu anɛ Mandɛm áchyɛ́ yi nɛpɛ́m nɛkɔ apú pɛrɛ kɔŋ bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́ mbɔnyunɛ Mmɔ Mandɛm achi nɛ yi nɛ ákɛ̀m yi ɛnyu ɛnɛ Satan apu kway bɛkʉ yi yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
519 Sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ sɛchi bɔ̌ Mandɛm kɛ bǒ mmɨk mankɛm báchí amɔ mbʉ́mbʉ.
520 Sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ́ Mmɔ Mandɛm atwɔ anɛ́nɛ́ batɨ ayɛsɛ amɛm bɛ sɛ́ndɨ́ŋɨ́ Mandɛm mmu achi tɛtɛp. Nɛ́nɛ, sɛbharɛ mmʉɛt nɛ Mandɛm mbɔ ɛnyǔ sɛ́bhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Mɔ́ywi Yesu Kristo. Yí aywǐntí kɛ̌ áchí Mandɛm tɛtɛp nɛ yí kɛ̌ áchyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
521 Bɔ̌bha, bǎkɛ́ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ bɔ mandɛm nsé.5
1 
1 Mɛ Jɔ̌n mǔnti bakoŋo Yesu amɔt kɛ̌ nchí sɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Nchí sɨŋ ntá yɛ, wɔ máyɛsɛ anɛ Mandɛm áyábhɛ́ nɛ ntá bɔ̌bhɛ. Nkɔŋ be tɛtɛp, nɛ puyɛ̌ chi mɛ awánti kɛ̌ nkɔ́ŋ bhe. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu áchák anɛ árɨŋɨ tɛtɛp Mandɛm akɔŋ be.
2 Nkɔŋ be mbɔnyunɛ bɛsɛ́ sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ tɛtɛp anɛ ǎbhák amɛm batɨ ayɛsɛ nɛ abhak nɛ bɛsɛ tɛ ndǔ nɛŋɔkɔ́mɨk ɛnɛn nɛ́twɔ̀.
3 Mandɛm Ɛta nɛ Yesu Kristo mántɔ́ŋ bɛsɛ́ bɛrɨ̌ndu, mángɔ́ bhɛsɛ́ ntínso, nɛ mánchyɛ bhɛsɛ kpák ndu sɛ́kòŋo tɛtɛp Mandɛm nɛ ndǔ sɛ́bhɔ̀ŋ ɛkɔŋ nɛ batɨ.
4 Mbɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛyǎ maŋák ndu bɛtɛmɛri mbɔk bɔ̌bhɛ nɛ bɛghɔ bɛ bɔ́ bákòŋo tɛtɛp Mandɛm nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm Ɛta ághátí bɛsɛ sɛ́nkʉ́.
5 Máyɛsɛ, nchí nɨkmʉɛt bɛ sɛ́nkɔŋ batɨ. Ɛnɛ ɛ́pú ɛbhé ɛkɔ. Mɛ́chyɛ̀ wɔ chi nkúbhɛ́ ɛbhé ɛnɛ sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ tɛ mpok sɛbho bɛkoŋo Yesu.
6 Nɛ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ́ tɛtɛp chi bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm ághátí bhɛsɛ sɛnkʉ. Ɛbhé Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ sɛ́nkɔŋ batɨ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǎghókó tɛ nɛbhǒnɛt.
7 Nchí rɛm nɔ mbɔnyunɛ bǒ abhɛn bárwɔ̀ batɨ bachi yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak. Bábhɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛ Yesu Kristo atwɔ nyaka fá amɨk mbɔ nkwǎŋwaŋ. Ɛnyǔ mmǔ wu achi mmu amɔt ndǔ mpáy bho abhɛn bárwɔ̀ bho, nɛ achí mǔmpap Kristo.
8 Sɔt yɛka mpok bɛ́ bǎkɛ́ kʉ bɛtɨk ndɛ́ndɛm, kɛbhɔŋ nsáy ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhɔ. Sɔt ká mpok ɛnyu ɛnɛ bǎbhɔ̀ŋ nsáy yɛka nkɛm.
9 Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ápú pɛrɛ koŋo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Kristo átɔ́ŋɔ́, kɛ ǎmàka nkaysi achák arɛ́, apú bhat mmʉɛt nɛ Mandɛm. Kɛ mmu anɛ árɔ̀ŋ ambɨ bɛkoŋo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Kristo átɔ́ŋɔ́, Ɛta ǎbhák nɛ yi, Mɔ́ywi nkwɔ ǎbhak nɛ yi.
10 Ɛ́tɔŋ yɛ bɛ mbák mmu átwɔ̌ ntá yɛka anɛ átɔ̀ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛpu ndɔ́ŋ amɔt nɛ ɛbhɛn Kristo átɔ́ŋɔ́, yɛ̌ mmu ywɛka ákɛ́ syɛpti mmǔ wu amɛm ɛkɛt ɛyi. Yɛ̌ chí bɛkaka yi bǎkɛ́ kaka.
11 Nchí rɛm nɔ mbɔnyunɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ákàka ɛnyǔ mmǔ wu áchɛ̀m mmʉɛt nɛ yí ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhi. 
12 Mbɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ bɛchak bɛghati bhe, kɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ yaŋ bɛfyɛ bhɔ mɛnkɛm amɛm ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Mbɔ̌ŋ nkaysi bɛ́twɔ bɛghɔ bhe bɛ sɛ́ndɛm kɛpɨ bɛsí nɛ bɛsi, bɛ́ maŋák amɛsɛ anjwi pɔɔt.
13 Bɔ mɔ́mayɛka anɛ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ Mandɛm áyábhɛ́ bátò bhe bakak nkwɔ.
1 
1 Mɛ Jɔ̌n mǔnti bakoŋo Yesu kɛ nchí sɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Gáyɔs, nchí sɨ́ŋ ntá yɛ, wɔ mmu nkɔ́ŋɔ́ tɛtɛp.
2 Anɛ ɛkɔŋ, nchí nɨkmʉɛt bɛ ɔ́kɛ́ me, nɛ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛmbak sayri nɛ wɔ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ mbɔ mmu Mandɛm nɛchi sayri.
3 Mbɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ maŋák mpok ngókó ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mbɔk bɔ̌mayɛsɛ ndǔ nnyɛ́n Yesu bátwɔ́ fá baghati bɛsɛ. Bághátí bhɛsɛ bɛ wɔ ɔchí mmǔ tɛtɛp ndǔ mbi Mandɛm nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu, sayri sayri, ɔ́kóŋó tɛtɛp.
4 Yi ɛ́kwày bɛchyɛ mɛ maŋák ɛ́ncha bɛghok bɛ bɔ̌bha bákòŋo tɛtɛp Mandɛm? 
5 Anɛ ɛkɔŋ, ɔ́kʉ̀ bɛtɨk Mandɛm ɛrɨ́rɨ́ ndǔ ɔ́kɛ̀m bǒnkwɔ ɛrɨrɨ, sayri sayri, abhɛn bachi mankɔ.
6 Bághátí Nkwɔ Kristo abhɛn fá ɛ̌ti ɛkɔŋ ɛyɛ nɛ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɔ́kʉ́ ntá yap. Mpok anɛ bɔ bárɔ̀ bɛrɔŋ ambɨ, chyɛ bhɔ nɛkwak ɛnɛn nɛ́kwáy ndǔ bɛtɨk Mandɛm ɛbhɛn bo bákʉ̀.
7 Bákɔ̀ chi bɛkʉ bɛtɨk Kristo. Ɛ̌ti yɔ bápú sɔt yɛ̌ nɛkwak ntá bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ Mandɛm.
8 Bɛsɛ́ babhɔŋ sɛ́bhɔŋ yɛ bɛchyɛ mɛnyǔ bo bhɔ nɛkwak bɛ sɛ́mbák batɨ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk nɛ bhɔ ndu bɛghati bho tɛtɛp Mandɛm.
9 Nsɨ̌ŋ barɔ́ŋ ɛkáti ntá nkwɔ Kristo abhɛn awu, kɛ Diyotrifis mmu ákɔ́ŋ bɛbhak mǔnti, abhɨ́kɨ́ fyɛ́ ntí ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ́rɛ̀m.
10 Mpok ntwɔ́ awu chɔŋ mbʉrɛ ndak anɛ nɛ ɛnyǔ yi áchɔ̀ŋti nnyɛ́n ɛna bɛsí bǒnkwɔ. Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ ɛ́may nɔ. Yímbɔŋ apú ka bɛsyɛpti batɨ̌ bǒnkwɔ nɛ ǎkàŋ tɛ bo abhɛn báyàŋ bɛkʉ nɔ, nɛ abók bhɔ bɛ mándɔ Nkwɔ Kristo.
11 Anɛ ɛkɔŋ, ɔ́kɛ́ ŋɔkɔ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛpɨŋ. Ŋɔkɔ́ chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́rɨ́. Mmǔ anɛ ákʉ̀ bɛrɨ chi mmu Mandɛm, kɛ mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ bɛbʉ́ ábhɨ́kɨ́re ghɔ Mandɛm.
12 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ndǔ ɛká Mandɛm ǎrɛ̀m ɛrɨ́rɨ́ ɛ̌ti Dɛmɛ́triyɔs. Yɛ̌ chi nɛpɛ́m ɛni nɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ akɔŋ tɛtɛp Mandɛm nɛ achi ɛrɨ́tí mmu. Bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ́rɛ̀m ɛchi tɛtɛp. 
13 Mbɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́gháti bhe, kɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ yaŋ bɛsɨŋ bɔ mɛnkɛm amɛm ɛkáti ɛnɛ.
14-15 Nnókó bɛ nchí twɔ chɔŋ bɛghɔ bhe mandú mpok. Mpok yɔ, chɔŋ sɛ́ndɛm kɛpɨ bɛsí nɛ bɛsi. Kpák Mandɛm ámbak nɛ bhe. Mamʉrɛ bhɛ mankɛm ndǔ nkwɔ Mandɛm abhɛn fá bátò wɔ bakak. Kaká yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmʉɛrɛ wa anɛ achi ndǔ nkwɔ Mandɛm abhɛn awu.
1
1 Mɛ Júd kɛ nchí sɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Nchí mǔbɛtok Yesu Kristo nɛ nchí manɔ Jems. Nchí sɨŋ ntá yɛka bo abhɛn Mandɛm mmu achi Ɛtayɛsɛ abhɨ́ŋɨ́. Yí akɔŋ be nɛ ákʉ́ bɛ Yesu ámbák Mbabhɛri ywɛka.
2 Mandɛm ángɔ́ bhe ntínso, ánchyɛ bhe kpák nɛ ɛkɔŋ ɛyi tontó tontó. 
3 Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, ndu nchí yáŋ tontó bɛsɨŋ be ɛ̌ti nɛpɛmɛ anɛ Mandɛm ápɛ́mɛ́ bhɛsɛ mankɛm, ngɔ́ bɛ mbɔŋ bɛsɨŋ ngáti bhe bɛ mǎnkɛ́m tɛtɛp anɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ bɛ ambak mbɔ ɛnyǔ báchyɛ́ yɔ ntá bo Mandɛm ndɔŋ amɔt ndak ámáy.
4 Nchí rɛm nɔ mbɔnyunɛ mbɔk bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ Mandɛm mánɔ́nɛ bachwe ndǔ nkwɔ yɛka. Bɔ mánù bɛyibhiri Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi nɛ bhɛsɛ. Bákʉ̀ nɔ ndu bárɛ̀m bɛ Mandɛm áchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ ngǎngaŋ bɛ sɛnchwe ndǔ barak ɛpúsí. Bábyàk Yesu Kristo ɛnɛ́ yi kɛ achi Ɛta ntá yɛsɛ nɛ yi aywǐnti kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bhɛsɛ. Mǎnaŋ basɨŋ nyaka tɛntɛp bɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm antɛmsi mɛnyǔ bǒbhɔ.
5 Yɛ̌ndu bákʉ́ bǎrɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm ndɔŋ amɔt, nchí yáŋ bɛtɨk be bɛ Ɛta Mandɛm afɛ́rɛ́ nyaka bo Israɛl ámɔ́ bo Íjip kɛ bágháká nɔ́kɔ́ ambi, anaŋa abhɛn babhɨkɨ noko.
6 Bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ bɔángɛl abhɛn babhɨkɨ ka bɛbhak ndǔ bɛchɔkɔ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ bhɔ, asɔt nyaka bhɔ abhʉ́rɛ́ amɛm nɛpi ɛnɛn nɛ́giri pyɔɔ nɛ ngɛm bɛkak, nɛ ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ bábhak mpoknkɛm. Arɛ́, mánòŋ tɛ nywɔp nɛgho ɛnɛn Mandɛm átàŋ bho.
7 Bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk nkwɔ ɛtɔk Sódom nɛ ɛnɛ́ Gomóra nɛ bɛtɔk bɛ́chák ɛbhɛn bɛ́kókósí nyaka nɛ bhɔ. Bo bɛtɔk ɛbhɔ báchyɛ́ nyaka mmʉɛt ndǔ barak ɛpúsí nɛ bɛpɔ̌ baraká kɛbhʉ́rɛ́ áchák anɛ bakwǎŋwaŋ babhɨkɨ bhɔŋ bɛkʉ. Bɔ́ nkwɔ bachi ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri amɛm ngó anɛ apu nɛmɛ, nɛ ɛyɔ chí ɛrɨŋ ntá bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko Mandɛm.
8 Yɛ̌ nɔ, ɛchi ɛnyǔ yɔ nɛ bǒbhɛn nkwɔ. Bághɔ̀ kɛnɔ́ amɨ́k antifú ɛkɛn kɛ́kʉ̀ bɔ mámbyak bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ amfáy yap. Bɛkoŋo kɛnɔ́ ɛkɔ bárɛ̀m bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti bɛfóŋó ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ amfay bho, mánkʉ nɔkɔ bɛpɔ̌ barak ɛpúsí.
9 Kɛ yɛ̌ chi mpok Máikɛl mǔnti bɔángɛl ákɛ̀m nyaka ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ Satan ɛ̌ti mmu wap anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛsɔt ɛrɛnɛ Moses, abhɨ́kɨ́ sɔt bɛtaŋ ndǔ mmʉɛt yi bɛ́ ándɛm ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ ntá Satan. Arɛm nyaka chi bɛ, “Mandɛm Acha ánji wɔ!”
10 Kɛ bǒbhɛn bárɛ̀m bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bɔ bábhɨ́kɨ́ jwimɛm. Báchí mbɔ nyǎbhɨ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ kɛboŋ, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kó yɔ́ anti, ɛ́kʉ kʉ. Nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ kɛ bɛ́wày bhɔ.
11 Chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛp ntá yap ɛ́ncha! Bákòŋo chi bayarɛ́kak Ken. Bákʉ̀ nkwɔ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ndǔ bɛbhɔŋ nsáy mbɔ Bálam ákʉ̀ nyaka. Bágù mbɔnyunɛ bátàŋntí nɛ Mandɛm mbɔ ɛnyǔ Kóra akʉ nyaka, agú.
12 Mpok báchɛ̀m mɛnyiɛ nɛnyiɛ́-ɛkɔŋ nɛ batɨ, bábhak mbɔ bakwap amɛn áchɔŋti nɛnyíɛ́. Bátwɔ̀ mánchɔkɔ mɛnyiɛ nɛ mɛnyu, mánkaysi nɔkɔ chi ndiɛrɛ mmʉɛt ɛyap. Bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ntíánwɔ́p. Báchí mbɔ bɛkpɔkɔ́ nɛbhaŋ ɛnɛn mbʉ́ɛ́p ápɔ̀kɔ amfay kɛ yɛ̌ manyiɛp kɛfú arɛ ánkwɛ́n. Báchí mbɔ mɛnɔk ɛbhɛn bɛ́pú nyu kɛpɛm yɛ̌ chi ndǔ mpok anɛ mɛnɔk mɛnyu kɛpɛm. Báchí mbɔ mɛnɔk ɛbhɛn bághɛ́mɛ́ nɛ bakaŋ nɛ bɛ́gú ndak ámay.
13 Bɔ báchi mbɔ bɛtaŋtí mpɛ́rɛ́nyɛn amɛm manyu ngo ɛnɛ́ ɛ́gbògho ɛ́mbay nɔkɔ gboo, gboo. Mɛnyɨŋ ntianywɔp ɛbhɛn bɔ bákʉ̀ bɛchi mbɔ ɛfɛn ɛnɛ́ mpɛ́rɛ́nyɛn ɛ́gbogho ɛmbay nɔkɔ angɔkɔnyɛ́n. Báchí mbɔ mambě mfay anɛ ábóŋoboŋ. Mandɛm abhʉ́rɛ́ ɛbhak ntá yap, ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ ɛ́giri pyɔɔ. Arɛ́ kɛ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́bhak ngwɛnti ti.
14 Ɛ́nɔk mmu achi nyaka ndǔ mkpák bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ tándrámɔt bɛbho amʉɛt Adam anáŋ arɛm nyaka tɛmbɨ ɛ̌ti bǒbhɛn bɛ, “Acha ǎtwɔ̀ nɛ ngɛ́mtáy bɔángɛl Mandɛm.
15 Ǎtwɔ̀ bɛkpɔt manyé bo mmɨk nkɛm, antɛmsi abhɛ́n bápú kʉ mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ bo Mandɛm ɛ̌ti bɛpɛpti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bárɛ̀m ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti yi.”
16 Bǒbhɛn chi bo ɛnywíntí nɛ bákɔŋ bɛji batɨ. Bákòŋo chí bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fù bɔ antɨ. Báchí bǒ mpányu nɛ básɔt sɛ́rwɔrɛ́nyu bɛsɔt nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ntá bho. 
17 Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, kɛ mbák chi bhe, bǎkɛ ghɔkɔntɨk mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǒnto Yesu Kristo Acha ywɛsɛ bárɛ́mɛ́ tɛntɛp bɛ bɛ́bhɔŋ bɛ́fákári.
18 Bárɛ̀m nyaka ntá yɛka bɛ, “Ndǔ manywɔbhɛ́ ngwɛnti mmɨk, chɔŋ bǒ kɛyɔ́kɔ́ mámfú mánjɔkɔ nɔkɔ bhe. Ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnap, bɔ́ bákòŋo chí bɛbɛ́pti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmʉɛt ɛyap ɛ́tò bɔ mánkʉ.”
19 Bɔ́ kɛ bátwɔ̀ nɛ ákɔ́rɛ́ nɛntɨ ɛnɛka. Mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk kɛ bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnap, puyɛ̌ chi Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm.
20 Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, kɛ mbák chi bhe, bǎbhɔŋ bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ndu bɛkwak batɨ, bɛ mǎngó ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mǎnókó, ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́fú ntá mbɔŋ Mandɛm. Mpok mǎnɨkmʉɛt dɔ̌ ká Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ankwak bhe.
21 Dɔ́k ká ambɨ bɛbhʉɛrɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ Mandɛm akɔŋ bhe, mǎndɔk ambɨ mɛnoŋ bɛ́ Acha ywɛsɛ Yesu Kristo ánchyɛ́ bhe nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti ɛ̌ti ntínso ɛni.
22 Ghɔ́ ká ntínso nɛ bo abhɛn bachi ɛkak ɛ́mɔt nɛfí, ɛkak ɛ́mɔt anywɔ́p.
23 Syɛ ka abhɛ́nɛ́fú fɛrɛ́ ndǔ ngó Satan, mǎmpɛmɛ bhɔ. Ghɔ́ ká bachak ntínso, kɛ mǎnsɔ́t mpok bɛ bɔ bákɛ́ charɛ bhe nɛ bɛbʉ́ bhap. Pap ka yɛ̌ chi ndɛn ɛyap ɛnɛ́ mánɔ́ nɛ bɛpɔ̌ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn máŋwaka, mánkʉ nɔkɔ. 
24 Sɛ́nchíɛ yɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm. Yi ǎkway bɛkɛm be bɛ bǎkɛ́ kwɛ́n ansɛm. Chɔŋ yi ankʉ bǎkɛ nyɔ́p mmʉɛt, antwɔ́ nɛ bhe bɛsí bhi. Arɛ́, bǎghɔ́ kɛnókó ɛki, mǎmbak maŋák mpoknkɛm.
25 Sɛ́mbɨ́tí Mandɛm. Yi aywǐnti kɛ áchí Acha. Yí kɛ áfʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ ntá Yesu Kristo bɛ́pɛ́mɛ́ bɛsɛ. Yi kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ kɛnókó, nɛ kɛnɛ́m, nɛ bɛtaŋ, nɛ kɛfɔ kɛnkɛm, mpoknkɛm anɛ áfʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm, nɛ nɛ́nɛ, ngwɛnti ti. Amen.
1
11 Ɛkáti ɛnɛ ɛ́rɛ̀m ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛfakari mandú mpok. Mandɛm achyɛ́ nyaka Yesu Kristo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bɛ yi antɔŋ bɔ ntá bǒbɛtɔk abhi. Yesu ató yɛ ángɛl akʉ mmɔ̌bɛtok aywi Jɔ̌n arɨŋɨ bhɔ.
12 Jɔ̌n até ntísiɛ ndǔ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm, nɛ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Yesu Kristo ákʉ́ yi arɨŋɨ. Asɨ́ŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ághɔ́.
13 Ɛ́rɨ ɛcha ntá mmǔ-nɛ ápày nɛ ɛyɔŋ amfay bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛ́n-nɛ bɛ́rɛ̀m ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛfakari. Ɛ́rɨ ɛcha ntá bo abhɛn bátà batú bɛghok ndǔ bápày ɛkáti ɛnɛ nɛ mámbʉrɛ mɛnyɨŋ abhɛn básɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm ɛkáti ɛnɛ mbɔnyunɛ mpok anɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛfakari arɔp chi kɛkwɔt. 
14 Mmɛ Jɔ̌n nchí sɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ ntá bɛka bǒnkwɔ tándrámɔt abhɛn báchí atú Esia. Mandɛm mmu achi nɛ́nɛ, abhak tɛ̌ nyaka, nɛ ǎtwɔ̀ ántɔ́ŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu, anchyɛ bhe kpák. Bɛfóŋó tándrámɔt ɛbhɛn bɛchi bɛsí ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ Mandɛm mɛ́ntɔ́ŋ nkwɔ bhe bɛrɨ̌ndu, mɛ́nchyɛ be kpák.
15 Nɛ Yesu Kristo mmu achi ntísiɛ Mandɛm anɛ tɛtɛp ántɔ́ŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu, anchyɛ bhe kpák. Yi chí mmǔ mbɨ anɛ áfú ndǔ nɛwú, nɛ Mfɔ bafɔ̌ mmɨk. Akɔŋ bhɛsɛ́ nɛ afɛ́rɛ́ bhɛsɛ ndǔ bɛbʉ́ nɛ manoŋ ami.
16 Akʉ bɛsɛ sɛ́mbák bǒbhi abhɛn yi achi Mfɔ wap. Akʉ bɛ́ sɛ́mbák bachiǎkap ntá Ɛtayi Mandɛm. Kɛnɛ́m nɛ kɛfɔ chí ɛki mpoknkɛm. Amen.
17 Ghok ka, yi ǎtwɔ̀ amɛm nɛbháŋ, nɛ chɔŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu angɔ yi nɛ amɨ́k. Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ áyɛ́mɛ́ yi nɛ nɛkɔŋ ǎghɔ̀ chɔŋ yi nkwɔ. Manɛrɛ́kɛrɛ́ bho ankɛm fá amɨk bádì chɔŋ kɛbhɔ ɛ̌ti yi. Ɛ́bhɔŋ bɛfakari ɛnyu ɛyɔ. Amen.
18 Acha Mandɛm Bɛtaŋ Mɛnkɛm ǎrɛ̀m bɛ, “Mɛ kɛ Nchi kʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mbo bɛbhak nɛ Mɛ kɛ nchi kʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛntwɔ ndǔ Ngwɛnti.”   Yi achí nɛ́nɛ, achí tɛ̌ mpok mmɨk ábhɨ́kɨ́ re bho, nɛ ǎtwɔ̀ chɔ́ŋ. 
19 Mmɛ Jɔ̌n mɔmáyɛka, mɛ mmǔ amɔt ndǔ nkwɔ bakoŋo Yesu kɛ̌ nchí sɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Nchí nsoŋ amɔt nɛ be ndǔ bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn sɛ́ghɔ̀, nɛ ndu Yesu achi Mfɔ ywɛsɛ nɛ ndǔ sɛchi kpirí ndǔ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ ɛyɛsɛ. Nchí mǔkɛnɔŋ amɛm ɛtɔk nɛntɨnyɛ́n ɛnɛ́ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Pátmɔs ndu nchi ghati bo Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm nɛ nte ntísiɛ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Yesu ákʉ́ bo bárɨŋɨ.
110 Ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt nɛmɔt, ɛnɛ́ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ achi nɛ mɛ, ngók ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ ndǔ ɛ́fú mɛ ansɛm. Ɛbhák mbɔ ɛyɔŋɔ́ mmba.
111 Ɛ́re rɛm bɛ, “Sɔt ɛkáti sɨŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́ghɔ̀, ɔ́nto yɔ ntá bakwɔ́ bo Yesu tándrámɔt awu ɛtɔk Ɛ́fɛsɔs, nɛ ɛtɔk Smína, nɛ ɛtɔk Pɛ́gamɔm, nɛ ɛtɔk Tiatíra, nɛ ɛtɔk Sádis, nɛ ɛtɔk Filadɛ́lfia, nɛ ɛtɔk Laodísia.”
112 Njibhiri yɛ mmʉɛt ndu bɛ́ghɔ mmu anɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛyi ɛ́twɔ̀ ntá ya. Ngɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ pú tándrámɔt ɛbhɛn bɛ́pɔ̀kɔ bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ mkpak.
113 Nɛ nɛ́ntɨ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛrɔŋɔ bhɔ, ngɔ́ mmǔfú. Abhak mbɔ Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm. Abhɔ́ŋ *ɛ́wɛt amʉɛt ɛnɛ ɛ́ghaka yi tɛ ndǔ mɛmɨ̌-bɛkak. Agwɔ́t mgbat nkʉɛt anɛ bághókó nɛ pú ambeápak.
114 Ɛmɛnɛ́nti yi ɛbhak pɛ́pɛ̌pɛ́p mbɔ ɛtɔkɔfiɔŋ. Ntí ywi ábhák ɛnyumɔt. Amɨ́k ayi ábhák mbɔ ngó anɛ ádù.
115 Bɛkak ɛbhi bɛbhak mbɔ *brɔ́ns anɛ básɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ ɛtaŋtí ngó ndu bɛ́fɛ́rɛ mɛ́nyɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛ́nkɛm arɛ́. Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi ɛ́bhak mbɔ ɛwarɛ́ tutunyɛ́n.
116 Akɛ́m mambe tándrámɔt nɛ awɔ́nɛm aywi. Akparɛnja nsɛm ɛ́páy anɛ áchap are fú yi anyu, nɛ bɛsí bhi bɛre ghɔɔ mbɔ mmok anɛ ngósí.
117 Mpok ngɔ́ yi, nkwɛ́n bɛkak ɛbhi nkáy mbɔ ngú. Kɛ yi anyaŋa awɔ́nɛm aywi mɛ amʉɛt arɛm bɛ, “Ɔ́kɛ́ chay, Mmɛ kɛ̌ nchí Ambɨ nɛ Ansɛm.”
118 Mmɛ kɛ̌ nchí mmu anɛ achi nɛpɛ́m. Ngǔ nyaka, kɛ ghɔ́, nchí nɛpɛ́m mpoknkɛm. Nɛ mbɔ̌ŋ bɛtaŋ ndu bɛkʉ bawú mambak nɛpɛ́m, nɛ mbɔ̌ŋ ɛfɨŋɨ́ ndu mɛ́nɛ́nɛ ɛtɔkɔ́ bawú.
119 Sɨ́ŋ yɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́ghɔ́, ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́chí, nɛ ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́fákari ansɛm mpok.
120 Mbák chi ɛnyɨŋ bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ɛnɛ ɛyɨŋɨ mambe tándrámɔt anɛ ɔ́ghɔ́ ndǔ awɔ́nɛm awa nɛ mɛnyɨŋ gol tándrámɔt ɛbhɛn bɛ́pɔ̀kɔ bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́, dɨŋɨ́ bɛ́ mambe tándrámɔt chí bɔángɛl tándrámɔt abhɛn bábhàbhɛri bɛka bǒnkwɔ tándrámɔt. Nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́pɔ̀kɔ bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ tándrámɔt chí bɛká bǒnkwɔ tándrámɔt bhɔ.
2
21 Yesu aghati Jɔ̌n bɛ, “Sɨ́ŋ ɛkáti-nɛ tó ntá ángɛl anɛ ábhàbhɛri bǒnkwɔ abhɛn ɛtɔk Ɛ́fɛsɔs. Sɨ́ŋ, kʉ bɔ́ mándɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú ntá mmu anɛ ákɛ́mɛ́ mambe tándrámɔt ndǔ awɔ́nɛm aywi, nɛ ǎkɔ̀ nɛ́ntɨ́ mɛnyɨŋ pú tándrámɔt ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́pɔ̀kɔ bɛrɔŋɔ.”
22 Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛ́rɛ́m bɛ, “Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛka, ndɨ́ŋɨ́ nsɔ́ŋtí anɛ mánɛ̀p ndu bɛtɨk, nɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ ndǔ bǎté kpirí ndu ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ. Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ bǎpú chyɛ mbi ntá bǒ babʉ́abʉ. Kɛ mǎmɔ bo abhɛn bárɛ̀m bɛ bachi bǒnto ɛnɛ́ bápú, nɛ bǎghɔ bɛ bápú bǒ tɛtɛp.
23 Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ bǎtè kpirí nɛ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ nɛ bǎkà bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn bǎghɔ̀ ɛ̌ti ya kɛpɔp bɛkʉ nɔ.
24 Kɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt ɛchi nɛ bhe ɛnɛ́ mbɨ́kɨ́ kɔŋ. Ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ́ mbɨ ɛnɛ́ bǎbhɔŋɔ nyaka nɛ mɛ ɛpɛt ɛpu.
25 Tɨk yɛ ka ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ́ bǎkwɛ́nɛ́ ansɛm, mǎntɨ́k nsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka mǎmpɛt mǎnkʉ nɔkɔ bɛrɨ́tí bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn bǎkʉ̀ nyaka. Mbák ɛ́pú nɔ, chɔŋ ntwɔ ntá yɛka mfɛ́rɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛyɛka ɛnɛ ɛ́pɔ̀kɔ bɛrɔŋɔ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yɔ ɛchi.
26 Kɛ nchí kaka bhe ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt. Bǎpap mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bakoŋó Níkolas bákʉ̀ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔnyu mpábhɛ́ bhɔ.
27 “Mmǔ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ batú ángók ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm árɛ̀m ntá bɛka bo Kristo. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ánú ásɔ́rɛ́ awɔ́nɛm, nchí chyɛ yi mbi bɛ anyiɛ kɛpɛm ɛkɛ́n ɛnɔk ɛnɛ ɛ́chyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m. Yɔ́ ɛchí amɛm *nɛbhʉɛt maŋák Mandɛm.” 
28 Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛ́gháti Jɔ̌n bɛ, “Sɨ́ŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ to ntá ángɛl anɛ ábhàbhɛri bǒnkwɔ abhɛn ɛtɔk Smína. Sɨ́ŋ kʉ bɔ́ mándɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú ntá Mmǔ anɛ achi nɛbhǒnɛt nɛ ngwɛnti, yí mmú ágú nyaka kɛ apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.”
29 Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛsɔŋɔri nɛ kɛchɛp ɛkɛka. Kɛ ndǔ baraká Mandɛm bǎbhɔŋ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ. Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǒ bárɛ̀m ɛ̌ti yɛka. Bɔ́bhɔ chí bo abhɛn bárɛ̀m bɛ báchi bo Israɛl ɛnɛ bápú. Báchí chi nkwɔ Satan.
210 Bǎkɛ́ cháy bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn bɛ́twɔ̀ be ambɨ. Ghok ka, mfɔ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ ǎkʉ chɔŋ mámfyɛ mbɔk ayɛka ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ ndu mɛmɔ bhe. Nɛ chɔŋ mǎmbɔŋ ɛsɔŋɔri ndǔ manywɔp byó. Kɛ bɔ́ŋ ka nɛka tɛ ndǔ nɛwú. Nɛ chɔŋ mǎmbɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti mbɔ nta kɛnókó mbɔnyunɛ mǎnu bǎsɔt awɔ́nɛm.
211 “Mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ batú, ángók ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm árɛ̀m ntá bɛka bǒnkwɔ. Mmu anɛ ánú ásɔ́rɛ́ awɔ́nɛm, nɛwú ɛnɛn nɛjwi apay nɛ́pú tɔk yi.” 
212 Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛ́gháti Jɔ̌n bɛ, “Sɨ́ŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ tó ntá ángɛl anɛ ábhàbhɛri bǒnkwɔ abhɛn ɛtɔk Pɛ́gamɔm. Sɨ́ŋ kʉ bɔ́ mándɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fù ntá mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ akparɛnja nsɛm ɛpay anɛ ácháp.”
213 Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bǎchí arɛ. Chí nɛbhʉɛt anɛ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ Satan ɛchi! Bǎte kpirí nɛ mɛ nɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔt bɛsɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ mɛ yɛ̌ chí ndǔ mpok anɛ báwày Antipas mmu achi nyaka ntísiɛ wa anɛ ághàti nyaka bǒ tɛtɛp Mandɛm nɛ ntɨ nɛmɔt. Báwáy yi nɛntɨ ɛnɛka ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ Satan áchɔ̀kɔ.
214 Kɛ mpǎy mɛnyɨŋ bɛchi nɛ bhe ɛbhɛ́n mbɨ́kɨ́ kɔŋ. Mbɔk yɛka bákòŋo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Bálam átɔ́ŋɔ́. Bálam ǎtɔ̀ŋ nyaka Bálak ɛnyǔ yí akway bɛkʉ bo Israɛl mánkwɛ́n ndǔ bɛbʉ́, nɛ bɛ mányíɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn bayɛrɛ bachyɛ mbɔ akap ntá bɔmandɛm nsé, nɛ mánkʉ nɔkɔ barak ɛ́pusi.
215 Ɛnyumɔt kɛ ɛ́chí bɛ́ mbɔk yɛka nkwɔ bǎte kpirí ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bakoŋo Nikolas bátòŋ,   bɛkʉ bɔ mankwɛn ndǔ nkúbhɛ́ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛn.
216 Ndu ɛchi nɔ, tɨ́k ká nsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka. Mbák ɛ́pú nɔ́, chɔŋ ntwɔ ntá yɛka mandú mpok, nsɔt akparɛnja nsɛm ɛpay wu nɔ áfù mɛ anyu nɛ ǎcháp, nnu nɛ bhɔ.
217 Mmǔ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ batú ángók ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm árɛ̀m ntá bɛka bǒnkwɔ. Mmǔ anɛ ánú asɔt awɔ́nɛm, chɔŋ nchyɛ́ yi nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ mána, ɛnɛn bábhɛ́sɛ́ amfay. Nɛ chɔŋ nchyɛ́ yí ntay nkwɔ ɛnɛn nɛchi pɛ́pɛ́p, ɛnɛ́n básɨ́ŋɨ́ nnyɛ́n nɛkɔ arɛ́. Yɛ̌ mmu abhíkí rɨŋɨ nnyɛ́n nɛkɔ ɛnɔ, ɛbhɨkɨ fʉɛt chi mmu anɛ báchyɛ̀ yi nɔ.” 
218 Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛghati Jɔ̌n bɛ, “Sɨ́ŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ ntá ángɛl anɛ ábhàbhɛri bǒnkwɔ abhɛn ɛtɔk Tiatíra. Sɨ́ŋ kʉ bɔ́ mándɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn chi bɛyɔŋɔ́ Mmɔ Mandɛm mmǔ amɨ́k ayi ápè chuuu mbɔ nɛ́rɨ́-ngó, bɛkak ɛbhi mɛ́ngɔɔ nɔkɔ ŋwaŋwǎŋwaŋ mbɔ brɔ́ns anɛ básɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ ɛtaŋtí ngó báfɛ́rɛ́ mɛ́nyɨ́ŋɨ́ arɛ́.
219 “Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛka, ndɨŋɨ ɛkɔŋ ɛyɛka nɛ ɛnyǔ bǎsɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ nɛ mɛ. Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyǔ bǎkwàk batɨ nɛ ndǔ bǎté nɛ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ. Nɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛ́n bǎkʉ̀ nɛ́nɛ bɛ́chá ɛbhɛ́n mbɨ.
220 Kɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛchi nɛ bhe ɛnɛ́ mbɨ́kɨ́ kɔŋ. Bě bǎrɔ̀ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Jɛ́sɛbɛl ambak nɛntɨ ɛnɛká. Yí ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ mmʉɛt ɛyi bɛ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ nɛ ǎtɔ̀ŋ andwɔ nɔkɔ bǒ bɛtok abha bɛ mánkʉ nɔkɔ barak ɛ́pusi nɛ bɛ mányiɛ nɔkɔ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛ́n báyɛ́rɛ́ báchyɛ mbɔ akap ntá mandɛm nsé.
221 Nchyɛ́ yí mpok bɛ ántɨ́knsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhi, kɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛtɨknsɛm ndǔ barak ɛpúsí yi.
222 Ghók ká, chɔŋ ntɛmsi yí nɛ nɛme, nɛ mbák bo abhɛn bákwɛ̀n bɛrwɔp nɛ yi bábhɨ́kɨ́ tɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbɛ́ptí barak ayi, chɔŋ nkʉ bɔ́ mámbɔŋ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri.
223 Chɔŋ nsɔt nɛwú nsak bo abhɛn bákòŋo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi átɔ̀ŋ. Nɛ chɔŋ bɛká bǒnkwɔ mankɛm mándɨŋɨ bɛ́ Mmɛ kɛ̌ nchí chak nkaysi bo nɛ batɨ̌ yap, nɛ chɔŋ ńkap yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ayɛka bɛ́kóŋó ɛbhi bɛtɨk.
224 Kɛ mbák chí be nkwɔ achak amɛm ɛtɔk Tiatíra abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ te kákátí ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n Jɛ́sɛbɛl átɔ̀ŋ, be bho bábhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔk mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mbɔk bǒ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ barak Satan anɛ áré bhɛsɛ, nchí ghati bhe bɛ, mpú chyɛ be yɛ̌ ntu áchák.
225 Ndiɛrɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt kɛ nchí ghati bhe. Tě ká kpirí ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mǎnókó kpátɛ mɛ̌mpɛtnsɛm.
226:28 Mmǔ anɛ ánú ásɔ́rɛ́ awɔ́nɛm, nɛ árɔ̀ŋ ambɨ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ndɛmɛ tɛ ndu ngwɛnti, chɔŋ nchyɛ́ yi bɛtaŋ amfay bǒ bɛtɔkɔ́ mmɨk, nkubhɛ mbɔ ɛnyu Ɛtaya áchyɛ́ mɛ bɛtaŋ amfǎy yap, chɔŋ yí ankɛ́m kɛfɔ amfay yap nɛ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ɛnɛ baghoko nɛ ɛse awɔ. Anchɔkɔti bhɔ mbɔ ɛnyu bádɛ̀p ɛtě ntɔp amɨk ɛ́nchɔkɔti. Chɔŋ nchyɛ́ yi nɛmbe ɛnɛn nɛyǐnywɔp ndu bɛtɔŋ bɛ anu asɔt awɔ́nɛm.
229 Mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ batú ángók ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm ághàti bɛka bǒnkwɔ́.”
3
31 Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛghati Jɔ̌n bɛ, “Sɨ́ŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ tó ntá ángɛl anɛ ábhàbhɛri bǒnkwɔ abhɛn ɛtɔk Sádis. Sɨ́ŋ kʉ bɔ mandɨŋɨ bɛ bɛyɔŋɔ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú ntá mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛfóŋó Mandɛm tándrámɔt nɛ mambe tándrámɔt. ‘Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛka. Bǎbhɔŋ ɛrɨ́tí nnyɛ́n bɛsí bho bɛ bǎchí nɛpɛ́m, ɛnɛ́ bǎchi bawú.
32 Ŋɛmɛ́ ká mǎmfyɛ́ bɛtaŋ bɛ mandu bɛtaŋ anɛ árɔ́bhɛ́ ákɛ́ kpɨkɨ ɛ́may mǎngú. Nchí rɛm nɔ mbɔnyunɛ ngɔ́ bɛ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛka bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ jwi pɔɔt bɛsí Mandɛm mmu mɛ́tòk.
33 Tɨk yɛ ka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎghókó nɛ bǎkóŋo. Tɨ́k ká nsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka, nɛ kɔ́ŋ ká mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎghɔ́kɔ́. Mbák bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ ŋɛmɛ, chɔŋ ntwɔ́ ntá yɛka mbɔ ngɛ́p, nɛ bapu rɨŋɨ mpok anɛ mɛ́twɔ̀.
34 Kɛ mbɔk bǒ bábhʉɛt ndǔ nkwɔ yɛka awu ɛtɔk Sádis abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ nyɔp nkú ɛyap nɛ bakwap. Chɔŋ bɔ mánkɔ nɛ mɛ nɛ ndɛn pɛ́pɛ́p amʉɛt, mbɔnyunɛ bákway bo abhɛn bákɔ̀ nɛ mɛ.
35 Mmu anɛ ánú asɔt awɔ́nɛm báfyɛ yí ɛ́wɛt pɛ́pɛ́p amʉɛt, nɛ mpú fɛrɛ nnyɛ́n ɛni ndǔ ɛkáti nɛpɛ́m. Chɔŋ ndɛm bɛsí Ɛtaya nɛ bɔángɛl bɛ yi achi mmu wa.
36 Mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ batu ángók ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm ághàti bɛká bǒnkwɔ.’” 
37 Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛ́gháti Jɔ̌n bɛ, “Sɨ́ŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ tó ntá ángɛl anɛ ábhàbhɛri bǒnkwɔ abhɛn ɛtɔk Filadɛ́lfia. Sɨ́ŋ kʉ́ bɔ mándɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fù ntá mmǔ anɛ achi Nyáŋá, mmǔ tɛtɛp, yí mmu ákɛ́mɛ́ ɛfɨŋɨ́ Mfɔ Debhít. Mpok yi ánɛ́nɛ́ yɛ̌ mmu apu kway bɛtyɛp, nɛ mpok yi atyɛbhɛ, yɛ̌ mmu apú kwáy mɛ́nɛ́nɛ.”
38 Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛka. Ghók ká, nnɛ́nɛ́ mbǐnywɔp ndɔ́ fúú ntá yɛka anɛ́ yɛ̌ mmu ápú kway bɛtyɛp. Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ bǎbhɔŋ chi mandú bɛtaŋ, Yɛ̌ nɔ́, bǎkòŋo ɛyɔŋ ɛya nɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ bʉɛ mɛ.
39 Kɛ mbák chí bǒnkwɔ bakoŋo Satan abhɛn bárɛ̀m bɛ́ báchí bo Israɛl ɛnɛ́ bápú kɛ básè chi nsé, chɔŋ nkʉ bɔ́ mántwɔ mántɛp mánɛ́n bɛsí ɛbhɛká nɛ nkʉ bɔ mándɨŋɨ bɛ nkɔŋ be.
310 Mbák chi bhe, bǎbhʉ́rɛ́ ɛyɔŋ ɛya, bǎrɔ́k ambɨ bɛte kpirí ndǔ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ. Ɛ̌ti yɔ, chɔŋ mbak nɛ bhe bɛ bǎkɛ́ chwe ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ́ ɛ́twɔ̀ mɛmɔ bo abhɛn báchi fá amɨk mankɛm.
311 Mɛ́twɔ̀ mandú mpok. Tě ká kpirí ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́ fɔŋɔ nta kɛnókó yɛka anɛ́ átɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ mǎnu bǎsɔt awɔ́nɛm.
312 Mmu anɛ ánù ásɔt awɔ́nɛm, chɔŋ ntɛp yi mbɔ ɛkwap amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm Mmu mɛ̌tòk, yí kɛfú arɛ wáwák. Nɛ chɔŋ nsɨ́ŋ nnyɛ́n Mandɛm nɛ nnyɛ́n ɛtɔk Mandɛm yi amʉɛt. Ɛtɔk ɛyɔ chi Yerúsalɛm anɛ nkɔ anɛ áfù amfay ntá Mandɛm átwɔ̀ fá amɨk. Chɔŋ nsɨŋ nnyɛ́n nɛkɔ ɛna nkwɔ yi amʉɛt.
313 Mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ batú ángók ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm ághàti bɛká bǒnkwɔ.” 
314 Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛghati Jɔ̌n bɛ, “Sɨ́ŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ tó ntá ángɛl anɛ ábhàbhɛri bǒnkwɔ abhɛn ɛtɔk Laodísia. Sɨ́ŋ kʉ bɔ mandɨŋɨ bɛ bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛfǔ ntá mmu anɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ ‘Amen.’ Yi achi mmǔ tɛtɛp nɛ Ntísiɛ anɛ tɛtɛp. Mandɛm afʉɛt chi nta yi kɛ ǎghoko mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm.”
315 Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛka. Bǎchí mbɔ manyiɛp amɛn ásɔ́tí, sɔ́ŋ be kɛsɔŋ, kwɛn be kɛkwɛ́n! Ɛrɨ bɛ mǎmbák mbɔ manyiɛp bakwɛn, mbák ɛ́pú nɔ, mbɔ manyiɛp basɔŋ.
316 Tɛ̌ndu bachí mbɔ manyiɛp amɛn ásɔ́tí, kwɛn bě kɛkwɛn, sɔ́ŋ bě kɛsɔŋ, chɔŋ mpá be mfɛ́rɛ́ anyu wa.
317 Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka ǎrɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Nchí mǔnkáp, mbɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ. Mbɨ́kɨ́ chɛp yɛ̌nyɨŋ.’ Kɛ be bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛ bǎchi ndǔ ɛkwɛt. Bǎchí bo abhɛn mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛghɔ be ntínso, bachí bachɛ́bhɛ́bho, bachí manɛmamɨ́k, bachí bɛbhó bɛwɔ́.
318 Nchí niɛ yɛ bhe bɛ mǎntwɔ ntá ya mǎnkú pú anɛ básɔ́ŋɔ́ ango bafɛrɛ mɛ́nyɨ́ŋ mɛnkɛm arɛ́ bɛ́ mǎmbák bǒ bakáp tɛtɛp. Twɔ́ ká ku ndɛn pɛ́pɛ́p mǎmfyɛ́ amʉɛt bɛ́ mǎnkútí bɛbhó bɛwɔ ɛbhɛka ɛbhɛn bɛ́chyɛ bhe ntíánwɔ́p. Twɔ́ ka, mǎnku babhé mǎmfyɛ amík bɛ mǎnkwáy bɛghɔ mbaŋ tɛtɛp.
319 “Nchí nyurɛ bo abhɛn nkɔ́ŋɔ́, nchyɛ́ bhɔ ntɛmsi. Fiɛ́ yɛ ka bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chak, mantɨk nsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka.
320 Ghók ká, nchí ambǐnywɔp téé nchí dɛp. Mbák mmú aghok ɛyɔŋ ɛya ánɛ́nɛ mbǐnywɔp chɔŋ nchwe anywɔ́p, nnyiɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ yi.
321 Mmu anɛ ánù ánsɔ̀t awɔ́nɛm, chɔŋ nchyɛ́ yí bɛtaŋ bɛ anchɔkɔ nɛ mɛ ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ɛya, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ mɛmbɔŋ nnú, nsɔt awɔ́nɛm, nchɔkɔ nɛ ɛtayá ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ɛyi.
322 Mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ batú, ángók ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm ághàti bákwɔ́ bo Kristo.”
4
41 Awu áfʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, njɨŋɨ ngɔ́ mbǐnywɔp anɛ achi fúú amfay. Nɛ mpɛt ngók ɛyɔŋɔ́ mbɨ ɛnɛ nnáŋ nyaka ngoko ndǔ ɛ́ghàti mɛ mɛnyɨŋ nɛ ɛyɔŋ mbɔ ɛnɛ́ mmbá. Ngók ndǔ yɔ ɛ́rɛ̀m ntá ya bɛ, “Twɔ́ wɛn amfay, nɛ chɔ́ŋ ntɔŋ wɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn chɔŋ bɛfakari.”
42 Tɛ́mte wu, Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ atwɔ́ abhak nɛ mɛ. Ngɔ́ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ amfay. Mmǔ abhak arɛ́ chɔkɔ.
43 Mmʉɛ́t mmǔ wu are kɔt ŋwaŋwǎŋwaŋ mbɔ batay anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ jáspa nɛ kanɛ́lian.   Mbaŋátámfoŋ átée ághabhɛri ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ɛyɔ ánkɔt nɔkɔ mbɔ ntay ɛ́meral.
44 Mɛnɔk kɛfɔ ɛsǎ nsɛm mɛnwi bɛ́káp ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ɛyɔ. Bǒbatí ɛsa nsɛm anwi báchɔ́kɔ ndǔ mɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap abhak nɛ nkú pɛ́pɛ́p amʉɛt, nɛ ntǎ-kɛfɔ anti anɛ bághókó nɛ pú.
45 Mmyamyaŋ are fú ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ. Nɛbu nkwɔ́ nɛ́re rɛmti, nɛfaŋ ansay nɔkɔ. Bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ tándrámɔt bɛbhak ambɨ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ mɛ́ndu nɔkɔ mbɔ *sɛsay. Bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ bhɔ chí bɛfóŋó Mandɛm tándrámɔt.
46 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́bhák bɛsí ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ mbɔ manyu. Ɛ́ngɔ nɔkɔ mbɔ glas anɛ áŋaŋari. Mɛnyɨŋ mɛ́nwí ɛbhɛn bɛchi nɛpɛ́m bɛ́tée bɛkáp ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ, ɛnyu ɛnɛ ɛ́mɔt ɛchi ambɨ, ɛ́mɔt ansɛm, ɛchák ɛbhě awɔ́nɛm, ɛnɛ́fú ɛbhe awɔ́ghɔ. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bɛ́bhɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ amɨ́k ambɨ nɛ ansɛm.
47 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ambɨ ɛbhak mbɔ nkʉ, ɛnɛ ɛ́kòŋo ɛbhak mbɔ nnɛ́m mpɔŋ. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́jwí bɛ́rát ɛbhɔ́ŋ bɛsí mbɔ nkwǎŋwaŋ, nɛ ɛnɛ ɛjwi mɛnwi ɛbhak mbɔ ɛbhɔkɔ ɛnɛ ɛ́rè amfay.
48 Ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnwi ɛbhɛn bɛchi nɛpɛ́m, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛ́mɔt ɛ́bhɔ́ŋ bɛbhap bɛtándat. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhap ɛ́bhák nɛ amɨ́k fúúú, anɛ́ amfǎy bɛbhap, nɛ anɛ́ amɛm bɛbhap. Báre kway nɛkwáy bɛti nɛ ngósí kɛywěmʉɛt bɛ, “Nyáŋá, nyáŋá, nyáŋá chi Ɛta Mandɛm Bɛtaŋ Mɛnkɛm yi mmu achi nyaka, nɛ achi, nɛ átwɔ̀ chɔŋ!”
49 Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bɛ́bɨ̀ti nɛ bɛ́chyɛ kɛnókó nɛ bakak ntá yi mmu achi chɔkɔ ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ, yi mmu achi nɛpɛ́m mpoknkɛm,
410 bǒbati ɛsa nsɛm manwi báré kwɛn bɛsí mmu anɛ achí ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ mánchyɛ nɔkɔ yi mmu achi nɛpɛ́m mpoknkɛm kɛnókó, nɛ mángʉɛbhɛ nɔkɔ ntǎ-kɛfɔ ɛyap amɨk bɛsí ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ mánkway nɔkɔ bɛ,
411 “Acha nɛ Mandɛm mmu sɛ́tòk, wɔ kɛ ɔ́kwáy mmu anɛ bo bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɛm bɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛ bɛyǎ bɛcha mánchyɛ wɔ kɛnókó nɛ bakak ɛ̌ti bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛ, mbɔnyunɛ wɔ kɛ ɔ́ghókó mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm nɛ chí bɛ́kóŋo nkaysi yɛ kɛ ɔghoko bhɔ nɛ bɛchi.”
5
51 Ngɔ́ nkwɔ ɛkáti nɛ́nɛ́p ndǔ awɔ́nɛm mmu anɛ achɔkɔ ndu ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ. Basɨ́ŋ abhak yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak amɛm nɛ ansɛm ɛkáti. Báfyɛ́ bɛ́bhánɛ́ anyǔ ɛkáti ndǔ bɛpók tándrámɔt, baghaŋa.
52 Nɛ ngɔ́ ɛtaŋtí ángɛl Mandɛm ndu árɛ̀m nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ bɛ, “Agha ǎkway bɛfɛrɛ ɛ́bhánɛ́ ɛnɛ́, anɛnɛ ɛkáti ɛnɛ?”
53 Yɛ̌ mmu, yɛ̌ chi anɛ achi amfay nɛ Mandɛm nɛ yɛ̌ chi anɛ áchí amɨk nɛ yɛ̌ chi anɛ achi ɛtɔkɔ́ bawú kɛkwáy mɛ́nɛ́nɛ yɔ́. Yɛ̌ mmu kɛkwáy bɛ́pay ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ básɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm.
54 Ndi bɛyǎ kɛbhɔ mbɔnyunɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ yɛ̌ mmu anɛ ákwáy mɛ́nɛ́nɛ ɛkáti nɛ́nɛ́p ɛyɔ, nɛ yɛ̌ chi bɛpay basɨŋ amɛn achi arɛ́.
55 Mǔnti amɔt ndu bǒbati ɛsa nsɛm manwi aghati mɛ bɛ, “Kɛ́pɛrɛ di! Yɨŋɨ́ mmú anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Nkʉ Nnɛrɛ́kɛt anɛ bo Yúdah, Nnɛ́m ɛbhárɛ́mɔ Mfɔ Debhít. Anu asɔt awɔ́nɛm. Abhɔŋ ngǎngaŋ bɛbhakari bɛ́bhánɛ́ tándrámɔt ánɛ́nɛ ɛkáti nɛnɛp.”
56 Mpok ɛyɔ, ngɔ́ Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n téé nɛntɨ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ nɛ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnwi ɛbhɛn bɛchi nɛpɛ́m. Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n abhak ndǔ nkwɔ bǒbati. Ɛbhak mbɔ bɛ mánaŋ baway nyaka yi. Abhɔ́ŋ babhaŋ tándrámɔt nɛ amɨ́k tándrámɔt. Amɨ́k ayi tándrámɔt chí bɛfóŋó Mandɛm tándrámɔt ɛbhɛ́n bátó mbankɛm amɨk.
57 Arɔk ntá mmu anɛ áchí ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ asɔt ɛkáti nɛ́nɛ́p ɛyɔ nɔ́ ɛchi ndǔ awɔ́nɛm ayi.
58 Ásɔ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ɛkáti, mɛnyɨŋ mɛnwi nɛ bǒbati ɛsǎ nsɛm anwi, bákwɛ́n bɛsí Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap akɛ́m nɛkɨ́ŋ nɛ bɛkwɔp ɛbhɛn baghoko nɛ pú. Bɛkwɔbhɛ ɛbhɔ bɛ́jwí nɛ insɛns. Insɛns wu atee ndǔ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt bo Mandɛm.
59 Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ nɛ bǒbati bare kway nɛkwáy nɛkɔ bɛ, “Wɔ kɛ ɔ́kwáy bɛsɔt ɛkáti nɛ́nɛ́p ɔ́mbakari bɛ́bhánɛ́ mbɔnyunɛ báwǎy nyaka wɔ nɛ manoŋ amɛ amɛn árɔ́ŋɔ́ amɨk kɛ ɔ́kú bo nɛ mɔ bɛ mámbák bo Mandɛm. Ɔkʉ nɔ ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ manɛrɛ́kɛrɛ bho, nɛ bǒ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk, nɛ bǒ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛtɔk, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nkwɔ́ bho.
510 Ɔku bhɔ bɛ mándɔp chi bo abhɛn ɔ́chí mfɔ wap, nɛ bo abhɛn báchiákap ntá Mandɛm mmu bɛsɛ sɛ́tòk. Nɛ chɔŋ bɔ́ mámbak bafɔ ntá bo fá amɨk.”
511 Njɨŋɨ yɛ, ngɔ́ ndǔ ngɛ́mtáy bɔángɛl bate bakabhɛ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi nɛpɛ́m, nɛ bǒbati. Ngók bɛyɔŋ ɛbhap.
512 Ngók ndǔ bɔ bákwày nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ bɛ “Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n anɛ báwáy nyaka, akwǎy mmu anɛ bo bárɛ̀m ɛ̌ti yi bɛ, yí kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm. yi kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm yi kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak nɛnkɛm yi kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ kɛfɔ kɛnkɛm. yi kɛ bo babhɔŋɔ bɛchyɛ kɛnókó, nɛ mámbɨti yi kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛyǎ mɛnwɔp!”
513 Nɛ ngók ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi amfay, nɛ ɛbhɛn amɨk, nɛ ɛbhɛn ɛtɔkɔ́ bawú, nɛ ɛbhɛn amɛm manyu, bɔ mɛnkɛm bɛre kway bɛ, “Sɛ́mbɨ́tí mmu anɛ achi ndu ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ nɛ Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n. Sɛ́nchíɛ bɔ kɛnókó. Kɛfɔ kɛnkɛm kɛchi chi ntá yap. Bɔ kɛ babhɔŋɔ bɛtaŋ mpoknkɛm!”
514 Mɛnyɨŋ mɛnwi ɛbhɛn bɛchi nɛpɛ́m bɛrɛm bɛ, “Amen!” Nɛ bǒbati bákwɛ́n amɨk bare chyɛ kɛnókó ntá mmu anɛ achi ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ nɛ ntá Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n.
6
61 Ngɔ́ ndǔ Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n áfɛ́rɛ́ ɛtabhɛ́ bɛbhanɛ ɛ́mɔt ndǔ bɛtap tándrámɔt ɛbhɛn ɛkáti nɛ́nɛ́p. Ngók ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt ndu ɛbhɛn mɛnwi ɛ́sáy mbɔ nɛfaŋ bɛ, “Twɔ́!”
62 Ngɔ́ mpɔŋɔndɨ́k anɛ pɛ́pɛ́p nɛ mmǔ anɛ ákɔ̀ yɔ. Mmu wu abhak nɛ nkʉɛt awɔ́. Báchyɛ́ yi nta kɛfɔ. Afa arɔk ndu bɛ́pɛt mɛnu bɛsɔt awɔ́nɛm.
63 Mpok Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n áfɛ́rɛ ɛ́bhánɛ́ ɛnɛ́ ɛjwi bɛpay, ngók ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛjwi bɛpay ndu ɛbhɛn mɛnwi ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Twɔ́!”
64 Mpɔŋɔndɨ́k achák afú yɛ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ. Are pe chuuu. Báchyɛ́ mmu anɛ ǎkɔ̀ yɔ́ bɛtaŋ ndu bɛfɛrɛ kpák ámɨk bɛ bǒ mámbo bɛway batɨ. Nɛ báchyɛ́ yi ɛrɛmɛ́ akparɛnja.
65 Mpok Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n anɛnɛ ɛbhánɛ́ ɛnɛ ɛjwi bɛrat, ngók ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛjwi bɛrat ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Twɔ́!” Njɨŋɨ ngɔ́ mpɔŋɔndɨ́k pyɔ. Mmu anɛ ákɔ̀ yɔ abhak nɛ *ɛ́rúmɛ́ awɔ.
66 Ngók ɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛyɔŋ ndu ɛ́fù nɛ́ntɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi nɛpɛ́m mɛnwi. Ɛyɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛre rɛm bɛ, “Nkáp bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn nywɔp nɛmɔt ákway bɛku nkɔ́bhɛ́ nchwi ɛnwi. Nɛ nkúbhɛ́ nkáp wu ánkway bɛ́ku chi nkɔ́p ɛnyǔ nchwi anɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ taŋ ɛsiɛ byo nɛ ɛpay. Kɛ bǎkɛ́ chɔŋti bawɛt nɛ mmɛm.”
67 Mpok Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n anɛnɛ ɛbhánɛ́ ɛnɛ ɛjwi mɛnwi, ngók ndu ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛjwi mɛnwi ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Twɔ́!”
68 Ngɔ yɛ mpɔŋɔ́ndɨ́k anɛ achi bɛ̌mm nɛ nnyɛ́n mmǔ anɛ ákɔ̀ yɔ nɛ́bhak bɛ Nɛwú, nɛ Ɛtɔkɔ́ Bawú ɛnkoŋo nɔkɔ yi ansɛm. Báchyɛ Nɛwú nɛ Ɛtɔkɔ́ Bawú bɛtaŋ bɛ mánsɔt nɛnu, nɛ nsay, nɛ ɛghorǐ nɛme, nɛ nnya mběmbe ɛnɛ fá mmɨk mángwáy bo abhɛn bachi ndǔ ɛbhɔ́kɔ́mɨk ɛ́mɔt ndu bɛbhɔkɔ mmɨk mɛnkɛm mɛnwi.
69 Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n anɛnɛ ɛ́bhánɛ́ ɛnɛ́ ɛjwi bɛtay, ngɔ́ antɛn ɛ́fɛ́mɛ́ akap Mandɛm bɛfóŋó bo abhɛn baway nyaka. Báwáy bhɔ mbɔnyunɛ bághàti bho Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm nɛ ntɨ nɛmɔt.
610 Ngók ndǔ bɛfóŋó ɛbhɔ bɛ́bɨ̀k nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ bɛ, “Mandɛm Acha, wɔ mmu ɔ́chí nyáŋá, ɔbhak tɛtɛp, chɔŋ ɛ́ntat ná kɛ ɔ́ntaŋ bǒ mmɨk abhɛn báwáy bhɛsɛ, ɔ́nkɛmɛ kɛ́mbé?”
611 Báchyɛ yɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap ɛ́wɛt ɛnɛ pɛ́pɛ́p nɛ bágháti bɔ bɛ mandɔk ambɨ bɛywemʉɛt mandú kpatɛ mpǎy batɨ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk nɛ batɨ̌ bǒ nkwɔ́ abhɛn bǒ mmɨk babhɔŋɔ bɛway mbɔ bhɔ ankwáy.
612 Mpok Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n ánɛ́nɛ́ ɛtabhɛ́ sɛrwɔ ɛnɛ ɛjwi ɛtandat, njɨŋɨ, ngɔ́ ɛrɛmɛ́ nɛnyɨkɨsi mmɨk. Mmok arɔp pyɔɔ mbɔ ndɛn nɛkwɛsɛ́. Ntaŋ arɔp mbɔ manoŋ.
613 Mambe áre fú amfay ánkwɛnti nɔkɔ amɨk mbɔ kɛpɛmɛ́nɔk ɛkɛn kɛ́kwɛ̀nti amɨk mpok mbʉ́ɛ́p ataŋataŋ áfòk nɛ ɛnɛm.
614 Nɛbu nɛ́nɛ́msi mbɔ ɛkáti nɛnɛp ɛnɛ bápɛ́t báfɛ́rɛ́. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ njiɛ afa ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yɔ achi, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmɨk anɛ achi nɛntɨ nnyɛ́n afa ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yɔ achi.
615 Bafɔ̌ mmɨk nɛ manɛ́m bho, nɛ bǒbatí batɛmɛ́ nɛnu, nɛ bǒ bakáp, nɛ bɛtaŋtí bho, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achák, yɛ̌ chí abhɛn bachí basɛm, nɛ yɛ̌ chi abhɛn bapu basɛm, bábʉ́ɛ́ bábhɛ́sɛ amɛm bɔbasɛm,   kɛtárábhɛ́ ndǔ njiɛ ɛgho.
616 Báre bhɛsɛ arɛ́ mámbɨŋɨ nɔkɔ njiɛ nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́ bɛ, “Kwɛ́n ká kuti bɛsɛ bɛ́ sɛ́kɛ ghɔ bɛsí mmu anɛ achi chɔkɔ ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ nɛ bɛ ntɛmsi Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n akɛ́ bhak nɛ bhɛsɛ.
617 Ɛrɛmɛ́ nywɔp ɛnɛn Mandɛm nɛ Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n bátɔ̀ŋ bɛběntɨ ɛbhap nɛ́ghaka. Agha ákway bɛte?”
7
71 Awu áfʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, ngɔ́ bɔángɛl manwi téé ndǔ amɔ́-mmɨk anwi, mánchɛrɛ nɔkɔ babhʉ́ɛ́p anwi bɛ akɛ fok antwɔ yɛ̌ chi amɨk, nɛ yɛ̌ chi ndǔ manyu, nɛ yɛ̌ chi ndǔ mɛnɔk.
72 Ngɔ́ yɛ ángɛl achák ndǔ áfú atú anɛ mmok áfù anko nɔkɔ amfay. Akɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ básɔ̀t bɛfyɛ bɛrɨŋ amʉɛt bo Mandɛm mmu achi nɛpɛ́m. Ángɛl wu asáy abhɨŋɨ bɔángɛl manwi abhɛn Mandɛm achyɛ bɛtaŋ bɛ mánchɔŋti mmɨk nɛ bɔmanyu.
73 Aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎkɛ́ chɔŋti mmɨk, bǎkɛ́ chɔŋti bɔmanyu nɛ bǎkɛ́ chɔŋti mɛnɔk kpátɛ sɛ̌mfyɛ ɛrɨŋ Mandɛm aywɛsɛ nɛfó yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nkʉbɛtɨk aywi.”
74 Ngók yɛ ndǔ mmu ághàti mɛ mpǎy bhɔ abhɛn báfyɛ́ ɛrɨŋ Mandɛm nɛfó yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap. Bábhak nkwɔ bho bɛsa tándrámɔt nsɛm manwi abhɛn báfù ndǔ manɛrɛ́kɛt Israɛl byo nɛ apay ankɛm.
75:8 Ndǔ bɔ mankɛm, nka byo nɛ apay bafu ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt Júda, nka byo nɛ ɛpay bafu ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt Rúbɛn, nka byo nɛ ɛpay bafu ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt Gad. Nká byo nɛ ɛpay bafu ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt Asha, nka byo nɛ ɛpay bafu ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt Náftali, nka byo nɛ ɛpay ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt Manáse. Nká byo nɛ ɛpay bafu ndu nnɛrɛ́kɛt Símiɔn, nka byo nɛ ɛpay ndu nnɛrɛ́kɛt Lɛ́vi, nka byo nɛ ɛpay bafu ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt Isáka. Nká byó nɛ ɛpay bafu ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt Sɛ́bulɔn, nka byo nɛ ɛpay bafu ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt Josɛ́f, nɛ nka byo nɛ ɛpay bafu ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt Bɛnjamin. 
79 Awu áfʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, ngɔ́ ngɛ́mtay bo abhɛn yɛ̌ mmu apu kway bɛpay. Báfú ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛtɔk nɛ ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nnɛrɛ́kɛrɛ́ bho. Báfú ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nkwɔ bho, nɛ ndǔ bǒ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk. Bábhak téé bɛsí ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ Mandɛm nɛ bɛsí Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n, nɛ ndɛn pɛ́pɛ́p amʉɛt nɛ bɛwɔ̌amaŋ amɔ.
710 Báré bɨk nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ bɛ, “Mandɛm aywɛsɛ mmu achi ndu ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ nɛ Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n kɛ bápɛ́mɛ́ bhɛsɛ!”
711 Bɔangɛl mankɛm batée bakap ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ nɛ bǒbati bhɔ nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi nɛpɛ́m mɛnwi bhɔ. Bákwɛn amɨk bɛsí ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ báre chyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó,
712 mandɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Amen! Ɛrɨ bǒ mándɛm mpoknkɛm bɛ Mandɛm aywɛsɛ kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ. Achi ndɨŋɨndak nɛ abhɔ̌ŋ kɛfɔ kɛnkɛm. Sɛnchyɛ́ yi bakak, sɛnchyɛ́ yi kɛnókó, sɛ́mbɨti yi. Abhɔŋ bɛyǎ mɛnwɔp!” Amen.
713 Mǔnti amɔt arɛm yɛ ntá ya bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ bho nɛ́ nɛ bɛwɛt pɛ́pɛ́p amʉɛt? Báfú fá?”
714 Ndɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Ɛta, wɔ kɛ ɔ́rɨ́ŋɨ́.” Arɛm ntá ya bɛ, “Chí bǒ abhɛn bafǔ ndǔ ɛrɛmɛ ɛsɔŋɔri, báso nkú ɛyap ndǔ manoŋ Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n nɛ bákʉ yɔ́ ɛrɔp pɛ́pɛ́p.
715 Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ̌ bɔ́ báté bɛsí ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ Mandɛm nɛ báchyɛ̀ yi kɛnókó amɛm ɛkɛt ɛyi bɛti nɛ ngósí. Nɛ yí mmu achi ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ǎbhák chɔŋ ɛkuti ɛyap.
716 Chɔŋ nsay apú pɛrɛ nu bhɔ, manyiɛp kɛpɛrɛ kwak bhɔ, mmok kɛpɛrɛ kway bɛsɔŋ bɔ amʉɛt, nɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛchak kɛpɛrɛ kway bɛsɔŋ bɔ amʉɛt,
717 mbɔnyunɛ Mɔ́nkwɔmɛn mmu achi kɛkwɔt nɛ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ǎbhàbhɛri bhɔ. Ǎrɔŋ nɛ bhɔ ndǔ babhokó nyɛ́n anɛ manyiɛp ami áchyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m. Nɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm antɛsɛ bɔ babhɛsɛ mankɛm amɨk.”
8
81 Mpok Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n afɛ́rɛ́ ɛ́bhánɛ́ ɛnɛ ɛjwi tándrámɔt, mbaŋ akwɛn arɔp nyímí nyímí nyímí amfay ndǔ ɛbhɔ́k nɛŋɔkɔ́ nywɔp ɛmɔt.
82 Ngɔ́ yɛ bɔángɛl tándrámɔt abhɛn bachi bɛsí Mandɛm. Báchyɛ́ bhɔ mbá tándrámɔt.
83 Ángɛl achak atwɔ atee kɛkwɔt ɛ́fɛ́mɛ́ akap nɛ mɔnchan pú anɛ básɔ̀ŋ insɛns amɛm awɔ́. Báchyɛ́ bhɔ insɛns   bɛ yi anchɛm nɛ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt bo Mandɛm mankɛm, amfay ɛ́fɛ́mɛ́ akap ɛnɛ pú bɛsí ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ.
84 Mɔ́ngo anɛ áfù ndǔ insɛns awɔ́ ángɛl are kó nɛbhʉɛt Mandɛm áchí nɛ bɛyɔŋɔ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt bo Mandɛm.
85 Ángɛl wu asɔt mɔ́nchán pú wu, afyɛ́ ngo amɛm anɛ áfú ndǔ ɛ́fɛ́mɛ́ akap, amɛsɛ amɨk. Nɛbu nɛbho bɛrɛmti, nɛfaŋ ansay nɔkɔ tontó, miámiaŋ ankɔt nɔkɔ, mmɨk anyɨkɨsi nɔkɔ. 
86 Bɔangɛl abhɛn tándrámɔt bátóŋti yɛ mmʉɛt bɛfe mmbá ɛyap tándrámɔt.
87 Ángɛl anɛ́ mbɨ afe mmbá yi. Tɛ́mté wu, amaŋá nɛbu achɛm nɛ ngó nɛ manoŋ, bɛre kwɛ́nti amɨk. Ɛbhɔ́kɔ́mɨk ɛ́mɔt ndu bɛrat ɛ́sɔ́ŋɔ. Ndǔ mɛnɔk amɔt ndǔ baru arat ásɔ́ŋɔ, nɛ tákɔ nkɛm nkwɔ asɔŋɔ.
88 Ángɛl anɛ́ ajwi bapay afe ayi mmbá. Nɛ básɔt ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi mbɔ njiɛ ngo, ɛnɛ́ ɛ́dù mbɔ ngó, mámɛ́sɛ amɛm manyu. Ɛbhɔ́kɔ́ manyu ɛ́mɔt ndǔ bɛrat ɛ́yíbhíri ɛrɔp chi manoŋ manoŋ.
89 Nɛ ndu amɔt ndǔ barǔ nnya ɛnɛ ɛchi anyɛ́n arat ɛ́gú ɛnkɛm. Nɛ bɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ bachwi anɛ áchí anyɛ́n, ndu amɔt ndǔ baru arat áchɔ́ŋɔ.
810 Ángɛl anɛ ájwí bárát, afe ayi mmbá, nɛ ɛrɛmɛ́ nɛmbe nɛ́fú amfay, nɛ́ngɔɔ nɔkɔ mbɔ sɛsay. Nɛ́fú nɛ́kwɛ́n amɛm ndǔ manyɛ́n amɔt ndu árát. Nɛ́kwɛ́n nkwɔ ndǔ bɛbhak ɛbhɛn manyiɛp ǎnyày amɨk.
811 Nnyɛ́n nɛmbe ɛnɔ chi Ǎnɛn. Ndu amɔt ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ barǔ nyɛ́n arat árɔ́bhɛ́ nɛnɛnɛ́n. Nɛ bɛyǎ bo bagu ɛ̌ti manyiɛbhɛ́ mɔ mbɔnyunɛ ǎnɛ̀n nyaka tontó.
812 Ángɛl anɛ ájwí manwi afe ayi mmbá nɛ ɛbhɔ́kɔ́ mmok ɛ́mɔt ndu bɛrat, ɛrɔp chi pyɔɔ. Ɛbhɔ́kɔ́ ntaŋ ɛ́mɔt ndǔ bɛrat ɛrɔp chi pyɔɔ. Ndǔ amɔt ndǔ barǔ mambe arat árɔ́p chi pyɔɔɔ. Ɛbhɔ́kɔ́ nywɔp ɛ́mɔt ndǔ bɛrat ɛ́rɔp chi pyɔɔ. Ɛ́bhak ɛnyumɔt nɛ ɛbhɔ́kɔ́ bɛti ɛ́mɔt.
813 Njɨŋɨ yɛ ngɔ́ ndǔ ɛbhɔkɔ ɛ́rè tɛ amfǎy nɛbu, ɛ́mbɨkɨ nɔkɔ nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ bɛ, “Chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛp ɛncha! Chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛp ɛcha! Chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛp ɛncha ntá bo abhɛn bachi awu amɨk! Bɔangɛl abhɛ́n bárɔ́bhɛ́ bárát báfe ɛyap mmbá!”
9
91 Ángɛl anɛ ajwi batay afe ayi mmbá. Ngɔ́ nɛmbe ndu nɛ́fú amfay nɛ́kwɛ́nɛ́ amɨk. Báchyɛ nɛmbe ɛnɔ ɛfɨŋɨ́ mɛ́nɛ́nɛ nnyǔ nɛpi ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
92 Anɛnɛ nnyǔ nɛpi ɛnɔ. Mɔ́ngo are fú arɛ tontó mbɔ mɔ́ngo anɛ áfù ndǔ nɛpi ɛnɛn ngó ádù arɛ. Mɔ́ngo wu akútí mmok, mbǎŋ arɔbhɛ giri gíri pyɔɔ.
93 Ngɛ́mtay ɛ́fú yɛ ndu mɔ́ngo wu, ɛjwi amɨk. Báchyɛ yɔ bɛtaŋ bɛtiɛ bho mbɔ ngá-nɛghay.
94 Bágháti ngɛ́mtay ɛyɔ bɛ ɛkɛ chɔŋti tákɔ, nɛ yɛ̌ chí mɛnɔk, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́gò amɨk, nɛ bɛ ɛ́nchyɛ́ ɛsɔŋɔri chi ntá bo abhɛn ɛrɨŋ Mandɛm ɛpu bhɔ nɛfó.
95 Bárɔ́ bɛ yɔ ɛ́nyok bǒbhɔ ndǔ bataŋ atay, kɛ bɛ bákɛ́ chyɛ ngɛ́mtay bɛtaŋ bɛway yɛ̌ mmu. Ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ́ ngɛ́mtay ɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́chyɛ bo ɛbhak mbɔ bɛbe ɛbhɛn mmu ábhɔ̀ŋ mpok ngá-nɛghay ánɛm yí.
96 Mpok yɔ, chɔŋ bo mánjaŋ nɛwú, kɛ bápú ghɔ́ nɔ́. Mámbɨŋɨ nɛwú, kɛ nɛwú nɛ́mbʉɛ bhɔ.
97 Ngɛ́mtay ɛyɔ ɛbhak mbɔ mpɔŋɔ́ndɨk ɛnɛ batoŋti bɛrɔŋ ɛbhɨ̌nɛnu nɛ yɔ. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ngɛ́mtáy abhɔ́ŋ ɛnyɨŋ anti mbɔ nta kɛfɔ anɛ bághókó nɛ pú. Bɛsí ɛbhap bɛbhak mbɔ ɛbhɛn nkwǎŋwaŋ.
98 Ɛmɛnɛ́nti yap ɛ́bhák mbɔ ɛnɛ baghɔrɛ́, nɛ ámɛ́n ayap abhak mbɔ anɛ nkʉ.
99 Ngɛ́mtay ɛ́bhɔ́ŋ ɛnyɨŋ ambeápak mbɔ ndɛ́-nɛnu anɛ bághókó nɛ ɛse, ndu bɛkuti mbeápak nɛ ɛwat ɛnɛ ɛ́fù ndǔ bɛbhap ɛbhap ɛbhak mbɔ bɛrɛmti ɛbhɛn bɛ́fù ndu bɛ́kárɨ́k ɛbhɛn mpɔŋɔ́ndɨk ɛnɛ́ ɛ́rɔ̀ŋ ɛbhɨ̌nɛnu ntiɛ́t ntiɛt.
910 Baghɔ́ ayap arɛ tiɛ bho mbɔ ngá-nɛghay. Nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn yɔ ɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ bǒ mangok bɛbe ndǔ bataŋ atay bɛre fu ndǔ baghɔ yap.
911 Mfɔ wap chí ángɛl anɛ ákɛ́mɛ́ nɛpi ɛnɛ́n nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti. Nnyɛ́n ɛni ndǔ ɛyɔŋ bo Israɛl chí Abádɔn, nɛ ndǔ ɛyɔŋ Grik chi Apóliɔn, nɔ chi “Nchɔ́ŋtí mɛnyɨŋ.”
912 Ɛrɛmɛ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ́ mbɨ ɛ́fʉɛ́t. Ghɔ́ ká, bɛ́chák bɛ́páy bɛ́twɔ̀.
913 Ángɛl anɛ ájwí bátándát afe ayi mmbá. Ngók ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fú ndǔ bati ɛ́fɛ́mɛ́ akap pú bɛsí Mandɛm.
914 Ɛyɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́re rɛm ntá ángɛl anɛ ajwi bátándát mmu ákɛ́mɛ́ mbá awɔ bɛ, “Dɔ̌ bɔángɛl manwi abhɛn bágwɔ́rɛ́ awu nɛpak nyɛ́n-nɛgho ɛnɛ́n bábhɨŋɨ bɛ Yúfretis mámfú mándɔ́k!”
915 Bákáŋári yɛ bɔángɛl manwi bhɔ bɛ́ mámfá mándɔ́k mángwáy mmǔ amɔt ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ bo bati arat. Bábhʉrɛ nyaka bɔ arɛ́ mɛnoŋ nɛŋɔkɔ́ nywɔp ɛnɔ, ndǔ nkúbhɛ́ nywɔp ɛnɔ, ndǔ ntaŋ wu, nɛ ndǔ mmíɛ́ ɛnɔ.
916 Ngɔ́ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu abhɛn bákɔ̀ nɛ mpɔŋɔ́ndɨk. Mmǔfu aghati mɛ mpǎy yap. Bábhak bɔ miliɔ́n bɛsa byó (200,000,000).
917 Ndǔ kɛnɔ́ amɨ́k antifu, ngɔ́ mpɔŋɔ́ndɨk nɛ bǒ abhɛn bákɔ̀ yɔ. Báfyɛ́ ndɛ́-nɛnu ɛnɛ́ bághókó nɛ ɛsé ndu bɛkuti mbeápak ɛyap. Ndɛ́ nɛnu ɛyɔ ɛbhak chuu mbɔ ngó, ɛ́bhák mbɔ nkwɔbhɛ́ nɛbu, ɛ́bhák nkwɔ mmʉɛt sɛkɔk sɛkɔk. Batí mpɔŋɔ́ndɨk abhak mbɔ bati nkʉ. Ngó nɛ mɔ́ngo nɛ *ɛriɛbhɛ́ sɔ́lfɔ,   ɛ́ré fu mpɔŋɔ́ndɨk ɛyɔ anyu.
918 Bɛghori ɛbhɔ bɛrat, nɔ chi, ngó, nɛ mɔ́ngo, nɛ ɛriɛbhɛ́ sɔ́lfɔ, bɛ́fú anyǔ mpɔŋɔ́ndɨk bɛ́wáy mmu amɔt ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ bǒ bati arat.
919 Bɛtaŋ abhɛn mpɔŋɔ́ndɨk ɛyɔ bɛ́fù nyaka chi ndǔ manyu yap nɛ ndǔ baghɔ́ yap. Baghɔ́ yap achi nyaka mbɔ nnyɔ́. Ábhɔ́ŋ batí. Nɛ baghɔ́ yɔ kɛ yɔ ɛ́nɛ̀m nyaka bo ɛnchyɛ nɔkɔ bhɔ ɛsɔŋɔri.
920 Bakwǎŋwaŋ abhɛn bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ way, kɛtɨ́knsɛm ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bághókó nɛ amɔ. Bɔ́ kɛrɔ bɛchyɛ kɛnókó ntá bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ, nɛ ntá bɔmandɛm nsé abhɛn bɔ babhɔŋ bághókó nɛ pú, nɛ abhɛn bághókó nɛ silbha, nɛ abhɛn bághókó nɛ brɔ́ns, nɛ abhɛn bághókó nɛ batay, nɛ abhɛn bághókó nɛ mɛnɔk, nɛ bɔmandɛm nsé bhɔ bápú ghɔ mbaŋ, bápú ghok mbaŋ, nɛ bapu kɔ!
921 Bǒbhɔ kɛtɨ́knsɛm yɛ̌ chí ndǔ nɛway bho awap nɛ yɛ̌ chi ndǔ baraká njɔ ayap nɛ barak ɛ́pusi ayap, nɛ yɛ̌ chi ndǔ aghɛp awap.
10
101 Awu áfʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, ngɔ́ ɛtaŋtí ángɛl achak ndu áfú amfay ásɛ̀p amɨk. Nɛbháŋ nɛ́káp yi. Mbaŋ táfoŋ abhak amfǎy ntí ywi. Bɛsí ɛbhi mɛ́ngɔ nɔkɔ mbɔ mmok, nɛ bɛkak ɛbhi mbɔ bɛkwabhɛ́ ngó.
102 Mɔ́kati nɛ́nɛ́p anɛ mánɛ́nɛ́ abhak yi awɔ. Atee ɛkak awɔ́nɛm ɛyi ndǔ manyu, atee ɛnɛ́ awɔ́ghɔ ɛbhɨ.
103 Abɨk nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chí mbɔ ɛnɛ́ nkʉ anɛ ábɨ̀k. Ábɨ́kɨ́ nɔ́kɔ́, nɛfaŋ asáy ndɔŋ tándrámɔt.
104 Nɛfaŋ asay nɔkɔ ndɔŋ tándrámɔt, nde yaŋ bɛsɨŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ nɛfaŋ árɛ́mɛ́. Kɛ ngók ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fú amfay ndu ɛ́ghàti mɛ bɛ, “Ɔ́kɛ́ kʉ yɛ̌ mmu ándɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ nɛfaŋ ásáy ndɔŋ tándrámɔt arɛm. Kɛ́sɨŋ yɔ.”
105 Ángɛl anɛ ngɔ́ ndu atee nɛ ɛkak ɛ́mɔt ndǔ manyu, ɛkak ɛchak ɛbhɨ, asá awɔ́nɛm ywi amfay.
106 Ayɨkɨ ndǔ nnyɛ́n mmu anɛ achi nɛpɛ́m mpoknkɛm, mmu anɛ ághɔ́kɔ́ mfǎy nɛ mmɨk nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi amfay nɛ ɛnɛ ɛchi amɨk, aghoko manyu nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨn ɛnɛ ɛchi amɛm. Ayɨkɨ arɛm bɛ, “Mpok bɛpɛt bɛchɔŋti apu!
107 Kɛ mpok ángɛl anɛ ajwi bɔángɛl tándrámɔt áfè chɔŋ ayi mmbá, nkaysi Mandɛm anɛ áchí bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ǎfu kpoŋoroŋ, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi ághátí nyaka barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ bhi.”
108 Ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fú amfay, ɛnɛ́ nnáŋ ngɔ́kɔ́ ɛpɛt ɛghati yɛ mɛ bɛ, “Dɔ́k sɔt mɔ́kati nɛ́nɛ́p anɛ achi fuu awɔ ángɛl anɛ achi téé nɛ ɛkak ɛ́mɔt ndǔ manyu, ɛkak ɛchak ɛbhɨ.”
109 Ndɔk ntá ángɛl wu, ngati yi bɛ anchyɛ mɛ mɔ́kati nɛ́nɛ́p wu. Aghati mɛ bɛ́, “Sɔt yɔ́ nyíɛ́. Chɔŋ ɛ́mbak wɔ anyu mbɔ bawɛrɛ́ bɛtu, kɛ amɛm mɛnyiɛ ɛ́ndɔbhɛ nɛnɛnɛ́n!”
1010 Nsɔt yɛ mɔ́kati nɛ́nɛ́p wu awɔ ángɛl nyiɛ́. Ɛ́ré nyɨŋti mɛ anyu mbɔ bawɛrɛ́ bɛtu. Kɛ nnyiɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, ɛ́kʉ́ mɛniɛ ɛbha bɛ́rɔ́bhɛ nɛnɛnɛ́n.
1011 Bágháti yɛ mɛ bɛ, “Ɔbhɔŋ bɛ́pɛ́t bɛrɛm nkaysi Mandɛm anɛ áyɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛyǎ bho, nɛ bɛyǎ bɛtɔk, nɛ bɛyǎ bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk, nɛ bɛyǎ bafɔ.”
11
111 Awu áfʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, báchyɛ mɛ ɛnɔkɔ́ njɛnti nɛ bághati mɛ bɛ, “Dɔ́k yɛnti ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, ɔ́njɛnti ɛfɛmɛ-akap, ɔ́mpay bo abhɛn báchyɛ̀ Mandɛm kɛnókó arɛ.
112 Kɛ kɛ́yɛnti sɛnta ɛkɛrákap. Dɔ̌ nɛbhʉɛt wu, mbɔnyunɛ bárɔ yi ambak ntá bǒ abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ Mandɛm. Nɛ chɔŋ bɔ́bhɔ mánjati ɛtɔk Mandɛm   nɛ bɛtaŋ ndǔ bataŋ bɛsa bɛpay nsɛm apay.
113 Chɔŋ nchyɛ́ bɛtaŋ ntá batísiɛ bha bapay, mámbak nɛ ndɛn ákpá amʉɛt, nto bhɔ bɛ mandɔk mangati bo ntó ɛna, ndǔ manywɔp (1,260) nka amɔt nɛ bɛsay byo nɛ arat.”
114 Batísyɛ abhɛn bapay kɛ báchi téé bɛsí Mandɛm mmǔ mmɨk nkɛm achi yi awɔ. Bɔ́ báchi mɛnɔk ólif bɛpay nɛ mɛnɔk ɛbhɛn bɛ́pɔ̀kɔ bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛpay.
115 Mbák bǒmpap abhap báyàŋ bɛkʉ bhɔ ɛnyɨŋ, ngó áfù bhɔ anyu ámɛn bhɔ. Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ báway yɛ agha anɛ áyàŋ bɛkʉ bhɔ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ.
116 Bǒ abhɛn bati apay bábhɔŋ bɛtaŋ bɛkɛm manyiɛp bɛ akɛ kwɛn ndǔ manywɔp ankɛm anɛ bɔ bághàti bǒ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ bhɔ antɨ. Babhɔŋ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ manyiɛp andɔp chi manoŋ. Nɛ bábhɔŋ bɛtaŋ bɛchyɛ bǒ mmɨk mɛnyǔ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm.
117 Mánáŋ mánáŋá bɛ́gháti bǒ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áyàŋ bɔ mangati bho, nnya mbʉ́mbʉ anɛ áfu ndǔ nɛpi ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti ǎnù nɛ bhɔ ansɔt awɔ́nɛm, angway bhɔ.
118 Bɛrɛnɛ ɛbhap mɛ́mbak gʉɛpti gʉɛpti ndǔ nkɔngɔ ɛgho ɛnɛ bágó nyaka Acha wap ndǔ ɛkotákátí arɛ́. Bábhɨ̀ŋɨ yɔ ndǔ kɛ́mbʉ́ɛp bɛ, “Sódom”, mbák ɛ́pú nɔ, mambɨŋɨ bɛ, “Íjip.”
119 Chɔŋ bǒ mmɨk mankɛm, nɛ manɛrɛ́kɛt ankɛm, nɛ bǒ bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk mɛnkɛm, nɛ bǒ bɛtɔk mɛnkɛm mántwɔ mámkpɔk bɛrɛnɛ́ bawú bhɔ ndǔ manywɔp arat nɛ ɛbhɔk, kɛka mámbɛ́mɛ́ bhɔ.
1110 Chɔŋ bǒ mmɨk mámbɔŋ bɛyǎ maŋák, mánto batɨ akap nɛ mányiɛ ɛpa mbɔnyunɛ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ bhɔ batí apay báchyɛ̀ nyaka bhɔ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri.
1111 Kɛ ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ manywɔp arat nɛ ɛbhɔk Mandɛm ákʉ́ ɛ̌yu ɛyi ɛnɛ ɛ́chyɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛ́chwé bhɔ amʉɛt. Bápɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, báteté. Bɛyǎ bɛcháy bɛ́kɛm bo mankɛm abhɛn bághɔ́ bhɔ.
1112 Barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ bhɔ bati apay bághók yɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fú amfay ɛ́rɛ̀m ntá yap bɛ, “Twɔ́ ká wɛn amfay!” Báré rɔŋ amfay amɛm ɛkpɔkɔ́ nɛbhaŋ, bǒmpap abhap bate mámpɔkɔ nɔkɔ bhɔ́.
1113 Nkúbhɛ́ mpok ɛyɔ, ɛrɛmɛ́ nɛnyɨkɨsǐmɨk ɛ́kwɛ́n, nɛ ɛkɛt ɛ́mɔt ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ bɛkɛt byo amɛm nnɛ́m ɛtɔk, ɛ́báy mmʉɛt amɨk. Nká bho tándrámɔt bǎgu ndǔ nɛnyɨkɨsǐmɨk ɛnɔ. Bɛ́cháy bɛ́kɛ́m abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ gu. Báré chyɛ kɛnókó ntá Mandɛm mmu achi amfay.
1114 Ɛrɛm ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ́ ɛ́jwí bɛ́pay ɛ́fʉɛt. Ghɔ́ ká, ɛnɛ́ ɛjwi bɛrat ɛ́twɔ̀ mandú mpok. 
1115 Awu áfʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, ángɛl anɛ ájwí bati tándrámɔt afe aywi mmbá. Ngók bɛtaŋtí bɛyɔŋ amfay, mɛ́ndɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Mandɛm Acha aywɛsɛ kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ bɛkɛm mmɨk nkɛm nɛ́nɛ mbɔ Mfɔ mpoknkɛm. Yí kɛ ákɛ̀m mmɨk nɛ́nɛ nɛ Mpɛmɛ yi afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò.”
1116 Bǒbati ɛsa nsɛm manwi abhɛn báchí chɔ́kɔ́ bɛsí Mandɛm ndǔ mɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ bákwɛ́n amɨk báchyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó
1117 mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Mandɛm Bɛtaŋ Mɛnkɛm, Acha, wɔ mmu ɔ́chí ɛchɔŋ, ɔbhak nyaka, sɛ́chyɛ̀ wɔ bakak ndu ɔ́sɔ́rɛ́ bɛtaŋ ɛbhe, nɛ wɔmbɔŋ ɔnáŋá ɔ́bhó bɛkɛm mmɨk mbɔ Mfɔ.
1118 Bǒ abhɛn bábhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ wɔ bábè nyaka ntɨ nɛ wɔ. Kɛ mpok akway anɛ ɔ́tɔ̀ŋ bhɔ ɛbhɛ bɛběntɨ. Mpok akway anɛ ɔ́tàŋ bo abhɛn bagú. Mpok akway anɛ ɔ́kap bǒ bɛtok bhɛ, ɔ́nkap barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ nɛ bǒbhɛ mankɛm, ɔ́nkap bo abhɛn báchyɛ̀ wɔ kɛnókó, yɛ̌ chi ndɛ́ndɛmɛ bho, yɛ̌ chi manɛm bho, mpok akway anɛ ɔ́nàŋa nɛ bo abhɛn báwày batɨ fá amɨk.”
1119 Mánɛ́nɛ yɛ ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chí amfay. Ngɔ́ ɛkʉbhɛ́ nku amɛm. Myamyaŋ áre kɔt. Nɛbu nɛ́re rɛmti, nɛfaŋ ansay nɔkɔ. Nɛnyɨkɨsǐ mmɨk nɛgho nɛ́kwɛ́n. Amaŋá nɛbu áré kwɛnti tontó.
12
121 Awu áfʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, ngɔ́ ɛrɛmɛ́ ɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛnɛ ɛ́bhésí amfay. Ɛ́bhak chí ngɔrɛ́ anɛ afyɛ́ mmok amʉɛt mbɔ nkú. Ntaŋ ábhák antɛn bɛkak ɛbhi, nɛ nta kɛfɔ anɛ áchí yi anti abhɔ́ŋ mambe byo nɛ apay.
122 Asɛnɛ nɛ mɛniɛ, ambɨkɨ nɔkɔ ndǔ ánòŋsi nɛ bɛyǎ bɛbe.
123 Ɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛchak ɛ́bhésí amfay. Ngɔ́ ɛrɛmɛ nnya mbʉ́mbʉ anɛ ápe chuuu nɛ batí tándrámɔt, nɛ babhaŋ byo. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ntí ábhɔ́ŋ aywi mɔ́nta kɛfɔ.
124 Ngɔ́ ywi áyá ndǔ mambe amɔt ndǔ baru arat ámɛ́sɛ amɨk. Ate bɛsí ngɔrɛ́ wu nɔ ánòŋsi, ánoŋ nɔkɔ mɛnyiɛ mmɔ̌ anɛ yi ánòŋsi bɛbhe.
125 Abhé mɔ́mbakanɛm anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkɛm bǒ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛtɔk mbɔ Mfɔ nɛ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ɛyi ɛnɛ bághókó nɛ ɛse awɔ. Báfɔ́ŋɔ mɔ́wu tɛ́mté bárɔk nɛ yi ntá Mandɛm bɛsí ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ɛyi.
126 Ngɔrɛ́ abʉɛ́ arɔk amɛm baso, nɛbhʉɛt anɛ Mandɛm atoŋti ntá yi bɛ máne yi arɛ ndǔ manywɔp nka amɔt nɛ.
127 Nɛnu nɛ́kwɛ́n amfay. Máykɛl nɛ bɔángɛl abhɛn bachi antɛn yi báre nu nɛ nnya mbʉ́mbʉ nɛ bɔángɛl abhɛn bákòŋo yi.
128 Kɛ Máykɛl nɛ abhi bɔángɛl básɔt awɔ́nɛm amfǎy yap, bɔ́ kɛpɛrɛ bhɔŋ nɛbhʉɛt amfay.
129 Básɔt yɛ ɛtaŋtí nnya mbʉ́mbʉ nɛ bɔángɛl abhɛn bachi antɛn yi báfɛmɛri amɨk. Bábhɨ̀ŋɨ nnyɔ́ anɛ tɛ nyaka yɔ bɛ Mfɔ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ, nɛ nnyɛ́n ɛni nɛchak bɛ Satan, ndu yi achi mmu árwɔ̀ bǒ mmɨk.
1210 Awu áfʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, ngók ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ amfay. Ɛ́re rɛm bɛ, “Nɛ́nɛ, Mandɛm aywɛsɛ apɛ́mɛ́ bǒbhi. Chɔŋ ambak Mfɔ bǒbhi, ankɛm bɔ nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi. Nɛ́nɛ, chɔŋ Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò ambɔ́ŋ bɛtaŋ amfǎy mmɨk nkɛm, mbɔnyunɛ mánaŋ basɔt mmu anɛ ábharɛ nɔkɔ bɔ̌mayɛsɛ barak amʉɛt bɛsí Mandɛm bɛti nɛ ngósí, báfɛmɛri fá amɨk.
1211 Bɛfʉɛt ndǔ manoŋ Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n nɛ ndǔ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ baghati bho, bɔ̌mayɛsɛ mánu nɛ yi basɔt awɔ́nɛm. Báka nyaka bɛchyɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnap nkwɔ.
1212 Ndu ɛchi nɔ, mfǎy, bɔ́ŋ yɛ maŋák. Bě mankɛm abhɛn bǎchi amfay, bɔ́ŋ ká maŋák! Kɛ mbák chi mmɨk nɛ manyu, ɛyak ɛchí nɛ bhe mbɔnyunɛ Mfɔ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ asɛp atwɔ ntá yɛka nɛ bɛyǎ ɛchók mbɔnyunɛ yi arɨŋɨ bɛ mpok ayi arɔp chi kɛkwɔt!”
1213 Mpok nnya mbʉ́mbʉ ághɔ́ bɛ básɔt yi báfɛmɛri amɨk, abho bɛkoŋo ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ábhé mɔ́mbakanɛm anɛt.
1214 Kɛ báchyɛ́ ngɔrɛ́ wu bɛbhap bɛpay ɛbhɛ́n nnɛ́m ɛbhɔkɔ bɛ yi ándé, ámbʉ́ɛ́ nnya mbʉ́mbʉ andɔk amɛm baso, ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛne yi ndǔ mamiɛ́ arat nɛ ɛbhɔk ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ nnya mbʉ́mbʉ apu kway bɛkʉ yi yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
1215 Nnyɔ́ áré gboko manyiɛp anyu amɛn achi mbɔ nnyɛ́n bɛ́ nɛ́mpɔ́kɔ́ yi mbɔ ɛghori manyiɛp.
1216 Kɛ mmɨk akwak yi. Bɛghárɛ́ bɛ́fú arɛ́ mɛnyu nnyɛ́n ɛnɛn nɛ́fù anyǔ nnyɔ́.
1217 Nnya mbʉ́mbʉ ábé yɛ́ ntɨ nɛ ngɔrɛ́ wu. Arɔk mɛnu nɛ bɔ̌bhi nɛ bɛbhárɛ́ bɔ̌bhi. Bɔ̌bhi bhɔ chi bo abhɛn bábhʉ̀rɛ bɛbhé Mandɛm, nɛ báte batísiɛ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Yesu ákʉ́ bo barɨŋɨ. Nnyɔ́ áte yɛ ndǔ ɛ̌siɛ́p, angɔkɔ manyu ánoŋ nɔkɔ arɛ́.
13
131 Awu áfʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, ngɔ́ nnya mbʉ́mbʉ ndu áfù amɛm manyu. Abhɔ́ŋ bati tándrámɔt nɛ babhaŋ byo nɛ bɔ̌ntǎ-kɛfɔ byo ndu babhaŋ ayi. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ntí ywi ábhɔ́ŋ nnyɛ́n ɛnɛn nɛ́rɛ̀m ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti Mandɛm.
132 Nnya yɔ abhak mbɔ mbé. Bayarɛ́kak ayi ábhak mbɔ anɛ nnya mbʉ́mbʉ anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ bɛ́ɛ. Nnyu yi ábhák mbɔ anɛ nkʉ. Nnya mbʉ́mbʉ achyɛ nnya yɔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi nɛ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ɛyi nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́.
133 Ntí nnya yɔ ámɔt ábhɔ́ŋ ɛrɛm ɛbhé ɛfʉɛt ɛnɛ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ báchyɛ nyaka yɔ ɛfʉɛt ɛnɛ ɛkway bɛway yɔ kɛ ɛfʉɛt ɛ́rɛ ɛ́gú. Bǒ mmɨk mankɛm bábhák maknkay, babho bɛghok chi nnya yɔ.
134 Bo báré chyɛ nnya mbʉ́mbʉ kɛnókó mbɔnyunɛ yɔ́ achyɛ́ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi ntá nnya mbémbé yɔ. Báre chyɛ kɛnókó ntá nnya mbémbé mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Agha áchí mbɔ nnya mbémbé nɛ? Agha ákway mɛnu nɛ yɔ́?”
135 Báchyɛ́ yɔ mbi bɛ́panyu nɛ bɛ́rɛm ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti Mandɛm. Báchyɛ́ yɔ mbi bɛbhɔŋ bɛtaŋ amfay bo ndǔ bataŋ bɛsa bɛpay nsɛm apay.
136 Abho bɛ́rɛ́m bɛbɛptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti Mandɛm, nɛ ɛ̌ti nnyɛ́n Mandɛm nɛ ɛ̌ti nɛbhʉɛt bɛ́chɔkɔ Mandɛm nɛ ɛ̌ti bo abhɛn bachi amfay.
137 Nɛ báchyɛ yɔ mbi bɛ ánu nɛ bo Mandɛm ánsɔt awɔ́nɛm. Nɛ báchyɛ yɔ bɛtaŋ amfay yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nnɛrɛ́kɛt bho ankɛm fá amɨk, nɛ amfǎy bo Mandɛm, nɛ amfǎy bǒ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk nɛ amfǎy bǒ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛtɔk.
138 Chɔŋ bǒ mmɨk mankɛm mánchyɛ yɔ kɛnókó, nɔ chi bo abhɛn bábhɨkɨ sɨŋ manyɛ́n ayap amɛm ɛkátǐ nɛpɛ́m tɛ mpok mmɨk ábhɨ́kɨ́ re bho. Ɛkáti yɔ chi ɛnɛ́ Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n mmu báwáy nyaka.
139 Mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ batú ángók!
1310 Mmu anɛ Mandɛm árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ mánkɛ́m yi, chɔŋ mánkɛm. Mmu anɛ áwày bho nɛ akparɛnja, chɔŋ mángwáy yi nɛ akparɛnja. Ndu ɛchi nɔ, bo Mandɛm babhɔŋ bɛ́tée kpirí nɛ mándɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ ndǔ nɛka ɛnap nɛ Yesu.
1311 Awu áfʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, ngɔ́ nnya mbʉ́mbʉ achák ndǔ áfù amɨk. Abhɔ́ŋ babhaŋ apay mbɔ Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛyi ɛ́bhák mbɔ ɛnɛ nnya.
1312 Are kʉ mɛnyɨŋ nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn nnya anɛ mbɨ mɛnkɛm bɛsí bhi. Akʉ mmɨk nɛ bo abhɛn bachi arɛ mánchyɛ nnya mbɨ mmǔ ɛfʉɛt ɛyi ɛ́gú kɛnókó.
1313 Nnya anɛ ajwi ɛpay yɔ ákʉ́ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay. Áre kʉ tɛ bɛ́ ngó amfu amfay antwɔ amɨk bǒ mángɔ nɔkɔ.
1314 Afʉɛ́t ndǔ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛn báchyɛ́ yi mbi bɛ ánkʉ bɛsí nnya anɛ mbɨ arwɔ́ bǒ mmɨk. Aghati bhɔ́ bɛ́ mángókó ntíako anɛ bɔ básɔ̀t manchyɛ nɔkɔ kɛnókó ntá nnya anɛ achi nɛpɛ́m yɛ̌ndu mǎnáŋ báchyɛ́ nyaka yɔ ɛfʉɛt ɛnɛ ɛkway bɛway yɔ nɛ akparɛnja.
1315 Mandɛm achyɛ nnya anɛ ájwí ɛpay mbi, yɔ́ akʉ ɛ̌yu ɛnɛ ɛ́chyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m ɛ́chwe amʉɛt ntíako anɛ́ nnya anɛ mbɨ. Ntí-ako wu abho bɛrɛm kɛpɨ. Akʉ bɛ mángwáy bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ chyɛ yɔ kɛnókó.
1316 Nnya anɛ ájwí ɛpay akʉ nkwɔ́ bɛ mámfyɛ́ ɛrɨŋ, yɛ̌ ndǔ awɔ́nɛm, yɛ̌ ndǔ nɛfɔ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu. Yí mánkʉ nɔ ntá ndɛ́ndɛmɛ bho nɛ manɛ́m bho, nɛ ntá bǒ bakáp nɛ bachɛ́bhɛ́bho, nɛ ntá bo abhɛn bápu basɛm nɛ abhɛn bachi basɛm.
1317 Akʉ nɔ bɛ́ yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́ bhɔŋ mbi bɛku nɛ yɛ̌ chi bɛti ɛnyɨŋ kpátɛ ɛrɨ̌ŋ ɛnɛ nnya mbɨ ɛmbak yi amʉɛt. Ɛrɨŋ ɛyɔ chí nnyɛ́n nnya yɔ, mbák ɛpu nɔ, mpǎy anɛ áté ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛni.
1318 Mmǔ abhɔŋ bɛ́bhɔŋ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak. Mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ kɛboŋ ǎrɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mpǎy anɛ achi amʉɛt nnya yɔ átɔ̀ŋ. Mpǎy yɔ chi mpǎy bakwǎŋwaŋ nɛ mpǎy yɔ chi bɔhundrɛt batándat nɛ bɛsa bɛrat nsɛm bɛtandat (666).
14
141 Awu áfʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, ngɔ́ Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n téé amfǎy njiɛ Síɔn. Bǒ nka bɛsa tándrámɔt nsɛm nka ɛnwi bábhak nɛ yi (144,000). Básɨ́ŋ nnyɛ́n Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n nɛ ɛnɛ́n Ɛtayi ndǔ nɛfó yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap.
142 Ngók ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fù amfay. Ɛ́bhak mɛ batú mbo ɛwarɛ́ tutunyɛ́n nɛ mbɔ nɛfaŋ anɛ ásày nɛ mbɔ ɛyɔŋɔ bakɨŋ anɛ bɔ̌ bákwɛ̀t.
143 Bǒbhɔ nka bɛsa tándrámɔt nsɛm nka ɛnwi báre kway nɛkwáy nɛkɔ bɛsí ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ Mandɛm nɛ bɛsí mɛnyɨŋ mɛnwi ɛbhɛn bɛchi nɛpɛ́m nɛ bɛsí bǒbati. Yɛ̌ mmu kɛka bɛghɔk nɛkwáy nɔ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ fʉɛt chi bǒ nka bɛsa tándrámɔt nsɛm nka ɛnwi abhɛn Mandɛm ápɛ́mɛ́, afɛrɛ amɨk.
144 Bǒbhɔ kɛ bachi pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ babhɨkɨ nyɔ́p mmʉɛt ndǔ baraká kɛbhʉrɛ nɛ baghɔrɛ́. Bɔ́ kɛ bákòŋo Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ yi árɔ̀ŋ. Bɔ́bhɔ kɛ Mandɛm ápɛmɛ ndǔ nkwɔ bǒ mmɨk bɛ mámbak ntá yi nɛ ntá Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n.
145 Bábhɨ́kɨ́re sense wáwák mbɔnyunɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛ́kwɛ́nɛ́. 
146 Awu áfʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, ngɔ́ ángɛl achak ndu árè tɛ amfǎy nɛbu. Are twɔ́ nɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm nɛ achi tɛtɛp mpoknkɛm. Are twɔ́ nɛ yɔ ntá bǒ mmɨk, nɔ chi, bɔ̌bɛtɔk mɛnkɛm, nɛ bǒ manɛrɛ́kɛt ankɛm, nɛ bǒ bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk mɛnkɛm.
147 Ángɛl arɛm nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ bɛ, “Cháy ká Mandɛm mǎndɛm bɛ mɛnwɔp ɛbhi bɛya bɛcha mbɔnyunɛ mpok anɛ yi átàŋ bo agháká. Chiɛ́ ká yi kɛnókó! Yi kɛ ághókó mfay nɛ mmɨk, nɛ bɔmanyu, nɛ babhok anɛ́ manyiɛp ányày arɛ.”
148 Ángɛl anɛ mbɨ árɔ́ŋ nɔ́kɔ́ achak abhesi andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Ɛrɛm ɛtɔk Bábilɔn ɛ́kwɛn bǔp. Ɛ́chɔ́ŋtí bǒ bɛtɔkɔ́ mmɨk mankɛm nɛ bɛpɔ̌ barak ɛpúsí yi. Ɛ́chí mbɔ bɛ ɛ́chyɛ́ bhɔ mmɛm bataŋbataŋ mányu.”
149 Ángɛl anɛ ajwi barat árɔ́ŋ nɔ́kɔ́, achak abhesi andɛmɛ nɔkɔ nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ bɛ, “Yɛ̌ agha anɛ áchyɛ̀ kɛnókó ntá nnya mbʉ́mbʉ anɛ áfú amɛm manyu nɛ ntíako yi, nɛ anka bɛ mámfyɛ́ ɛrɨŋ ɛyi ndǔ yɛ̌ chí nɛfó ɛni nɛ yɛ̌ chí ndǔ awɔ aywi,
1410 chɔŋ yi nkwɔ anyú mmɛ́m bɛběntɨ Mandɛm amɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ ndu nkɔp anjwi tɛ́p yi kɛ chɔpti mɔ nɛ manyiɛp ndu áyaŋ mántaŋ. Nɛ chɔŋ yi wu ambɔ́ŋ nnɛ́m ɛsɔŋɔri amɛm ngó anɛ ádù nɛ *sɔ́lfɔ, bɛsí bɔángɛl Mandɛm nɛ bɛsí Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n.
1411 Mɔ́ngo anɛ áfù ndǔ ngó anɛ mmu wu achi amɛm apú may. Bo abhɛn báchyɛ̀ nnya mbʉ́mbʉ nɛ ntíako yi kɛnókó nɛ báka bɛ mámfyɛ́ ɛrɨ̌ŋ nnya yɔ bɔ amʉɛt bápú bhɔŋ chɔŋ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛyap bɛti nɛ ngósí.”
1412 Ndu ɛchi nɔ, bě bo Mandɛm, bě bho bǎbhʉ̀rɛ bɛbhé Mandɛm, bě bho bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ Yesu, tě ka kpirí nɛ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ́.
1413 Ngók yɛ́ ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fú amfay ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Sɨ́ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn amɨk: Bɛbho ɛchɔŋ, ɛrɨ ɛcha ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ágú ɛnɛ́ yi ábhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Acha nɛ ntɨ nɛmɔt.” Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ árɛ̀m bɛ, “Ɛchi tɛtɛp, chɔŋ yi ambɔŋ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhi mbɔnyunɛ nsáy bɛtɨk ɛbhi ǎkoŋo yi.” 
1414 Awu áfʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, ngɔ́ ɛkpɔkɔ́ nɛbhaŋ ɛnɛn pɛ́pɛ́p nɛ mmǔ arɛ chɔkɔ mbɔ Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm. Nta kɛfɔ anɛ bághókó nɛ pú abhak yi anti, nɛ ngak anɛ ácháp abhak yi awɔ ndu bɛkpɔt mbwɔt.
1415 Ángɛl achak áfú amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm arɛm nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ ntǎ mmǔ anɛ achi chɔkɔ ndǔ ɛkpɔkɔ́ nɛbhaŋ bɛ, “Bo bɛ́kpɔt mbwɔt anɛ anaŋ ape nɛ ngak ayɛ mbɔnyunɛ mpok bɛfɛrɛ yɔ ndu bɛtɔkɔ́ mmɨk aghaka.”
1416 Mmǔ anɛ achi chɔkɔ ndǔ ɛkpɔkɔ́ nɛbhaŋ áfoŋ yɛ ngak anɛ achi yi awɔ ndǔ bɛtɔkɔ́ mmɨk áfɛ́rɛ́ mbwɔt nkɛm.
1417 Awu áfʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, ángɛl achak afú ndǔ ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm ɛnɛ ɛchi amfay. Yi nkwɔ abhɔ́ŋ ngak anɛ ácháp ndǔ bɛkpɔt mbwɔt.
1418 Ángɛl achak afú kɛ́kwɔ́t ɛ́fɛ́mɛ́ akap. Awú abhɔ́ŋ bɛtaŋ amfǎy ngó. Arɛm ntá anɛ akɛmɛ ngak bɛkpɔt mbwɔt anɛ ácháp nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ bɛ, “Kpɔ́t kɛpɛm ɛ́nɔk ɛkɛ́n bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ grep amɨk nyokoti mbɔnyunɛ kɛ́náŋ kɛ́pe.”
1419 Ángɛl wu áfoŋ yɛ ngak ndǔ bɛtɔkɔ́ mmɨk mɛnkɛm, akpɔ́t kɛpɛmɛ́nɔk, anyokoti, ato amɛm nɛyarɛ́ grep.   Ɛyɔ̌ ɛnkɛm ɛ́tɔ́ŋ bɛ Mandɛm anaŋ aběntɨ tontó.
1420 Báyát kɛpɛm ɛkɔ amɛm nɛyarɛ́ grep antí ɛtɔk. Manoŋ afú wu arɛ. Manoŋ mɔ ajwi amɨk mbɔ mɛta amɔt nɛ ɛbhɔk, nɛ aghoŋo kpát bɛsap ɛbhi bɛghaka mbɔ bɔkilomɛta bɛsa byo (200).
15
151 Ngɔ́ ɛrɛm ɛrɨŋ nɛ ɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛchak amfay. Ngɔ́ bɔángɛl tándrámɔt, nɛ bɛghori tándrámɔt ɛbhɛn bɛchi bɛghori ɛbhɛn ngwɛnti mbɔnyunɛ bɔ kɛ bɛtɔŋ bɛběntɨ Mandɛm ɛbhɛn bɛ́twɔ̀ ndǔ ngwɛnti.
152 Ngɔ́ ɛrɛm ɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay mbɔ manyu. Ɛ́bhak mbɔ amaŋá nɛbu nɛ ɛ́nkɔt nɔkɔ ŋwaŋwǎŋwaŋ mbɔ glas anɛ ngó achi amɛm. Ngɔ́ bo abhɛn mánú nɛ nnya mbʉ́mbʉ nɛ ntíako yi nɛ mpǎy anɛ áté ndǔ nnyɛ́n nnya mbʉ́mbʉ, mánu basɔt awɔ́nɛm. Bǒbhɔ bátée angɔkɔ manyu wu nɛ bakɨ́ŋ anɛ Mandɛm áchyɛ́ bhɔ abhak bɔ amɔ́.
153 Bátée angɔkɔ manyu wu mánkway nɔkɔ nɛkwáy Moses mmɔ̌bɛtok Mandɛm nɛ ɛnɛn Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n bɛ, “Acha, Mandɛm Bɛtaŋ Mɛnkɛm, mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɔ́kʉ́ chi manɛm mɛnyɨŋ nɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay! Wɔ, Mfɔ bɛtɔk mɛnkɛm, mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɔ́kʉ̀ bɛ́bhak chi chak. Nɛ ɔchí tɛtɛp.
154 Acha, agha ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛ́chay wɔ? Agha ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛchyɛ wɔ kɛnókó? Wɔ kɛ ɔ́chí nyáŋá. Wɔ kɛ̌ bǒ bɛtɔk mɛnkɛm bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́twɔ bɛsí ɛbhɛ manchyɛ kɛnókó mbɔnyunɛ mankɛm mánaŋ bághɔ́ bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɔ́kʉ́ mɛnkɛm bɛchi chak”.
155 Mánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́kway, ngɔ́ ɛkɛt Mandɛm amɛm ɛtɛm amfay. Ɛ́bhak fúú.
156 Bɔangɛl tándrámɔt abhɛn bápɔ́kɔ́ bɛghori tándrámɔt amɔ báfú ndǔ ɛkɛrɛ́ Mandɛm ɛyɔ. Bábhák nɛ ndɛn pɛ́pɛ́p amʉɛt, nɛ *nkʉɛt ɛnɛ pú ambeápak.
157 Ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt ɛnɛ ɛchi nɛpɛ́m ndǔ ɛbhɛn mɛnwi ɛ́chyɛ bɔángɛl bhɔ tándrámɔt bɛkwɔp ɛbhɛn pú tándrámɔt. Bɛjwi nɛ bɛběntɨ Mandɛm anɛ achi nɛpɛ́m mpoknkɛm.
158 Mɔ́ngo ajwi amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́ Mandɛm ɛyɔ. Afú ndǔ kɛnɛ́m nɛ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm. Yɛ̌ mmu kɛbhɔŋ mbi bɛchwe amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́ Mandɛm. Bɛghori tándrámɔt ɛbhɛn bɔángɛl tándrámɔt bakɛmɛ amɔ bɛ́bhɔŋ nyaka bɛfʉɛt kpɨk.
16
161 Ngók yɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fú ndǔ ɛkɛrɛ́ Mandɛm ndǔ ɛ́ghàti bɔángɛl tándrámɔt bɛ, “Dɔ́k ká to bɛběntɨ Mandɛm ɛbhɛn bɛchi amɛm bɛkwɔbhɛ́ bɛběntɨ ɛbhi tándrámɔt ndǔ mmɨk nkɛm.”
162 Ángɛl anɛ mbɨ arɔk apɨkɨri ɛyǐ ɛkwɔbhɛ́ bɛběntɨ Mandɛm amɨk. Nkúbhɛ́ mpok yɔ bɛfʉɛt ɛbhɛn mɛ́nɛ̀m tontó bɛ́té amʉɛt bo abhɛn baka nyaka bɛ mamfyɛ bɔ ɛrɨŋ ɛnɛ nnya mbʉ́mbʉ amʉɛt nɛ báchyɛ́ mandɛm nsé yi kɛnókó.
163 Ángɛl anɛ ajwi bapay apɨkɨri ɛyǐ ɛkwɔp amɛm manyu. Manyu ayibhiri arɔp mbɔ manoŋ amɛn ngú, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi nɛpɛ́m amɛm manyu ɛ́gú.
164 Ángɛl anɛ ájwí bárát apɨkɨri ɛyi ɛkwɔbhɛ́ bɛběntɨ amɛm manyɛ́n agho nɛ bɔ̌manyɛ́n nɛ ndǔ bɛbhak ɛbhɛn manyiɛp ányay arɛ. Manyiɛp mankɛm arɔp chi manoŋ.
165 Ngók ndǔ ángɛl anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ amfǎy manyɛ́n árɛ̀m ntá Mandɛm bɛ, “Wɔ ɔ́chí Nyáŋá. Wɔ ɔ́chí nɛ́nɛ nɛ ɔchí nyaka! Ɔchí chak ndǔ ntɛmsi anɛ ɔ́chyɛ̀.
166 Bo bákʉ manoŋ bo Mandɛm nɛ amɛn barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm arɔŋ amɨk. Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ ɔ́chyɛ́ bhɔ́ manoŋ mányu. Ɛyɔ ɛ́kway nɛ bhɔ”.
167 Ngók yɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fù ndǔ ɛ́fɛ́mɛ́ akap Mandɛm ɛyɔ ɛ́ndɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Acha, Mandɛm Bɛtaŋ Mɛnkɛm, ɔ̌chyɛ̀ bho ntɛ́msi ɛnyu ɛnɛ ɛchi sayri nɛ chak”.
168 Ángɛl anɛ ájwí manwi apɨkɨri ɛyǐ ɛkwɔp ndǔ mmok. Báchyɛ mmok bɛtaŋ bɛsɔŋ bǒ mbɔ ngó.
169 Mmok ásɔ́ŋ bǒ mbɔ ngó, Yɛ̌ nɔ bɔ kɛtɨ́knsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap. Bɔ́ kɛka bɛchyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó ɛ̌ti kɛnɛ́m ɛki. Báre rɛm chi ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti Mandɛm mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ amfǎy bɛghori ɛbhɔ.
1610 Ángɛl anɛ ájwí batay apɨkɨri ɛyi ɛkwɔp ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ɛnɛ nnya mbʉ́mbʉ. Ɛjuri ɛ́kwɛ́n amʉɛt bo abhɛn yi achi Mfɔ wap. Bǒ bábho mɛŋa barɨ yap ndǔ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ bɔ bachi arɛ,
1611 kɛ bɔ́ kɛtɨ́knsɛm ndǔ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bákʉ̀. Mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ chi ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti Mandɛm mmu achi amfay mbɔnyunɛ bɛfʉɛt ɛbhap nɛ bɛbe bɛ́kʉ̀ nyaka bɔ bachi ndǔ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri.
1612 Ángɛl anɛ ájwí batandat apɨkɨri ɛyǐ ɛkwɔp amɛm nyɛ́n nɛgho ɛnɛn bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Yufretis. Nnyɛ́n nɛ́wɔ́ nɛnkɛm bɛ́ bafɔ abhɛn báfú atú anɛ mmok áfù mambɔŋ mbi bɛkɨŋɨ.
1613 Ngɔ́ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛrat. Bɛ́bhak mbɔ mánsáŋ. Ɛmɔt ɛfu anyǔ nnya mbʉ́mbʉ, ɛchak ɛ́fú anyǔ nnya mbémbé nɛ ɛnɛ́fú anyǔ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ nsé.
1614 Bɛfóŋó ɛbhɔ chi bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ. Bɛ́kʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay nɛ bɛ́rɔ́k ntá bafɔ̌ mmɨk mankɛm ndu bɛkʉ bɔ manchɛm nɛbhʉɛt amɔt bɛ mánu nɛ Mandɛm Bɛtaŋ Mɛnkɛm ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn yi átàŋ chɔŋ bo.
1615 Yesu Acha árɛ̀m bɛ, “Ghɔ́ ká, mɛ́twɔ̀ mbɔ ngɛ́p. Chɔŋ ɛ́ndɨ ɛncha ntá mmǔ anɛ achi pě nɛ ǎkɛ̀m ndɛn ɛyi sayri bɛ ákɛ́ kɔ ɛbhowɔ, ntíánwɔ́p ankɛm yi bɛsí bho.”
1616 Bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bhɔ bɛ́kʉ bafɔ mánchɛm ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt wu nɔ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ ndǔ ɛyɔŋ bo Israɛl bɛ Amágɛdɔn.
1617 Ángɛl anɛ ájwí tándrámɔt apɨkɨri ɛyǐ ɛkwɔp ndǔ mbʉ́ɛ́p. Ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ ɛ́fú ndǔ ɛkɛrɛ́ Mandɛm nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yi achi ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ɛyi bɛ, “Ndak ámay!”
1618 Mmyamyaŋ are kɔt. Nɛfaŋ are sáy, nɛbu nɛ́ndɛmti nɔkɔ. Nɛ ɛrɛmɛ́ nɛnyɨkɨsǐmɨk nɛ́kwɛ́n. Tɛ Mandɛm ághókó bǒ, ɛnyǔ nɛnyɨkɨsǐmɨk ɛnɔ nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ re fakari. Ɛnɔ nɛ́táŋ nɛcha.
1619 Ɛrɛm ɛtɔk ɛ́kɔ́rɛ ndǔ bɛbhɔk bɛrat. Bɛtɔk bɛgho nɛ bɛtɔk mmɨk bɛchak bɛ́kwɛ́n. Mandɛm akɛ ghɔkɔntɨk ɛrɛm ɛtɔk Bábilɔn ndǔ bɛkʉ yɔ ɛnyu mmɛ́m bɛběntɨ bhi.
1620 Bɛtɔk ɛbhɛn bɛchi nɛntɨ nnyɛ́n mɛ́nɛ́msi. Njiɛ ɛnkɛm nkwɔ ɛnɛmsi.
1621 Amaŋá nɛbu áfú amfay ánkwɛnti nɔkɔ amɨk. Áchɨ́kɨti ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nɛmɔt nɛ́bhak mbɔ bɔkilo bɛsa bɛpay nsɛm byo ndǔ mɛnwɔp ɛbhi. Áre kwɛnti bǒ amʉɛt kpát babho bɛrɛm ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti Mandɛm ɛ̌ti ɛsɔŋɔri ɛyɔ.
17
171 Ángɛl amɔt ndǔ abhɛn tándrámɔt abhɛn bakɛmɛ bɛkwɔp tándrámɔt atwɔ́ arɛm ntá ya bɛ, “Twɔ́, chɔŋ ntɔŋ wɔ ntɛ́msí anɛ Mandɛm áchyɛ chɔŋ nta nnɛ́m ngɔrɛ́-nɛkɔ, nɔ chi, ɛrɛm ɛtɔk ɛnɛ ɛchi kɛkwɔt nɛ bɛyǎ manyɛ́n agho.
172 Bafɔ̌ mmɨk bákʉ ɛpúsí nɛ yi, nɛ bǒ mmɨk mányú mmɛ́m ami kpát bákwɛn, bákʉ ɛpúsí nɛ yi.”
173 Ángɛl Mandɛm wu apɔkɔ mɛ ndǔ Ɛfóŋó arɔk amɛm baso. Arɛ́, ngɔ́ ngɔrɛ́ amɔt chɔkɔ amfay nnya mbʉ́mbʉ anɛ ápe chuuu. Nnya mbʉ́mbʉ yɔ abhɔ́ŋ bati tándrámɔt nɛ babhaŋ byo. Manyɛ́n anɛ básɨ́ŋɨ́ abhak amʉɛt nnya yɔ nɛ ábhák manyɛ́n anɛ árɛ̀m ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti Mandɛm.
174 Ngɔrɛ́ wu asɔbhɛri mmʉɛt nɛ ndɛn ɛnɛ ɛchi chuu, ɛnyǔ ndɛn ɛnɛ bafɔ báfyɛ, nɛ mɛnyɨŋ pú, nɛ mɛnyɨŋ nkáp, nɛ mɛnyɨŋ bɛfyɛ ɛmɨ ɛbhɛn bághókó nɛ bɔ̌batay bɛyǎ nkáp abhɛn bábhɨŋɨ bɛ pɛ́l.
175 Mánaŋ nyaka basɨŋ nnyɛ́n ndǔ nɛfó ɛni. Bǒ kɛrɨŋɨ ntí nnyɛ́n ɛnɔ. Nnyɛ́n ɛ́nɛrɛ nɛ́bhak bɛ, “Nnɛ́m ɛtɔk Bábilɔn chi nnɔ baghɔrɛ́-nɛkɔ nɛ bɛpɔ̌ mɛnyɨŋ ndǔ mmɨk nkɛm.”
176 Ngɔ́ bɛ́ ngɔrɛ́ wu anáŋ anyǔ nyaka manoŋ bo Mandɛm abhɛn baway ɛ̌ti bakoŋo Yesu nɛ ntɨ nɛmɔt. Manoŋ bo Mandɛm akɛ́m yi mbɔ mmɛ́m. Mpok ngɔ́ ngɔrɛ́ wu mbak maknkay.
177 Kɛ ángɛl arɛm ntá ya bɛ, “Ndaká yí ɔchí maknkay tontó? Chɔŋ ngati wɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ɛ̌ti ngɔrɛ́ nɛ nɛ nnya mbʉ́mbʉ anɛ bati tándrámɔt anɛ apɔkɔ yi nɛ babhaŋ byo.
178 Nnya mbémbé anɛ ɔ́ghɔ́ achi nyaka nɛpɛ́m, kɛ nɛ́nɛ apɛt apú, nɛ abhɔŋ bɛfu ndǔ nɛpi ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti, bɛ andɔk ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ babhɔŋɔ báway yɔ, ndak amay. Bo abhɛn babhɨkɨ sɨŋ manyɛ́n ayap tɛ nɛbhǒmɨk, bághɔ chɔŋ yɔ mámbak maknkay bɛ́ achi nyaka kɛ nɛ́nɛ apɛt apú nɛ chɔŋ ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
179 Ɛyɔ ɛ́yàŋ yɛ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ ámbɔ́ŋ kɛboŋ. Bati tándrámɔt ate ndǔ njiɛ ɛgho tándrámɔt ɛnɛ ngɔrɛ́ wu áchɔ́kɔ́ arɛ. Njiɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́te nkwɔ ndǔ bafɔ tándrámɔt.
1710 Bafɔ batay bágú. Amɔt achi nɛpɛ́m. Amɔt achi mfɔ nɛ́nɛ. Mbák chí anɛ ajwi tándrámɔt abhɨ́kɨ́ twɔ. Ánáŋ ántwɔ́ ǎbhák Mfɔ ndǔ mɔ́mbɨŋɨ́ mpok.
1711 Mbák chí nnya anɛ achi nyaka nɛpɛ́m kɛ apɛt apú, yɔ́ achi mfɔ anɛ ajwí mánɛn. Achí nyaka amɔt ndǔ abhɛn tándrámɔt. Chɔŋ mángwáy yɔ ndak amay.
1712 “Babhaŋá nya yɔ byo anɛ ɔghɔ áte ndǔ bafɔ byo abhɛn bábhɨkɨ re chyɛ bhɔ bɛtaŋ bɛkɛm kɛfɔ. Kɛ chɔŋ mánchyɛ bhɔ nɛ nnya mbʉ́mbʉ bɛtaŋ mbɔ bafɔ ndǔ nɛŋɔkɔ́ nywɔp nɛmɔt.
1713 Bafɔ bhɔ mankɛm bati byo báká ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt bɛchyɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhap nɛ kɛfɔ ɛkap ntá yi.
1714 Chɔŋ bɔ́ nɛ nnya mbʉmbʉ mánte nɛnu nɛ Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n nɛ yi ansɔt awɔ́nɛm amfay yap mbɔnyunɛ yi kɛ achi Acha Mfɔ nɛ Mfɔ bafɔ. Bakoŋo bhi chí bo abhɛn Mandɛm ábhɨ́ŋɨ́, ayap, nɛ bákòŋo yi nɛ ntɨ nɛmɔt.”
1715 Ángɛl arɛm ntá ya bɛ, “Manyɛ́n anɛ ɔ́ghɔ́ ngɔrɛ́-nɛkɔ arɛ chɔ́kɔ́ áte ndǔ ngɛ́mtáy bho, nɛ manɛrɛ́kɛrɛ bho ankɛm, nɛ bǒ bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk mɛnkɛm.
1716 Chɔŋ nnya mbʉmbʉ nɛ babhaŋ ayi byo anɛ ate ndǔ bafɔ byo mámpap ngɔrɛ́-nɛkɔ. Chɔŋ mánsɔt yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́, mankʉ yi andɔp ɛbho ɛwɔ. Chɔŋ mányiɛ nyamwʉɛ́t ɛyi nɛ mánsɔŋ yi nɛ ngó.
1717 Chɔŋ bafɔ byo bhɔ mánkʉ nɔ mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm ákʉ bɔ́ mámbɔ́ŋ nkaysi amɔt ndu bɛkʉ ɛnɛ yi áyàŋ bɔ mánkʉ. Chɔŋ mánka yɛ bɛrɔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ babhɔŋɔ mbɔ bafɔ amɔ nnya mbʉmbʉ kpatɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm atɨ̌ bɛ mɛ́mfákárí mɛ́mfakari.
1718 Ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ɔ́ghɔ́ chi nnɛ́m ɛtɔk ɛnɛ mfɔ ywi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ amfǎy bafɔ̌ bɛtɔkɔ́ mmɨk mɛnkɛm.”
18
181 Ngɔ́ ángɛl achak ndǔ áfú amfay ásɛ̀p amɨk. Abhɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ bɛtaŋ nɛ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ ɛbhi bɛre ghɔ ndǔ mmɨk nkɛm.
182 Arɛm nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ bɛ, “Ɛrɛm ɛtɔk Bábilɔn ɛ́kwɛn buúp! Ɛ́rɔp chi bɛchɔkɔ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ. Ɛ́rɔp chi bɛchɔkɔ bɛbɛ́ptí bɛfóŋó nɛ bɛpɔ̌ kɛnɛn ɛkɛn bo babhɨkɨ kɔŋ.
183 Bábilɔn akwɛn mbɔnyunɛ ákʉ́ bǒ bɛtɔk mɛnkɛm mányú mmɛ́m ɛpúsí yi. Bafɔ̌ mmɨk bákʉ̀ nyaka nkwɔ ɛpúsí nɛ yi. Bakɔ̌síɛ mankɛm fá amɨk bákwɛ̌n bǒ bakáp ɛ̌ti ɛpúsí yi.”
184 Ngók yɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛchak ɛnɛ ɛ́fú amfay ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Bǒbha, fú ká, mǎndɔ ɛtɔk Bábilɔn kɛka mǎmfyɛ mmʉɛt ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bo abhɛn bachi arɛ. Fú ká, bɛ ntɛmsi Mandɛm anɛ átwɔ̀ ntá yi akɛ bhak nɛ bhe.
185 Fú ká mbɔnyunɛ bɛbʉ́ bhap bɛghaka tɛ amfay, nɛ Mandɛm ábhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bhɔ́.
186 Kɛmɛ́ ká ntá bǒ ɛtɔk Bábilɔn yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bɔ bákʉ́ ntá bo bachak. Kɛmɛ́ ká ntá yap ndɔŋ ɛpay yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bɔ bákʉ́ bǒ bachak. Chyɛ ká bhɔ mmɛ́m amɛn bátáŋá ndɔŋ ɛpay ndǔ nkɔ́p anɛ bɔ́ báfyɛ́ mmɛ́m bataŋbataŋ amɛm báchyɛ́ bhe.
187 Kʉ ka bo Bábilɔn mámbɔ́ŋ ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ nɛdǐ kɛbhɔ. Nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bɔ bábhɔŋ nyaka maŋák, mpok bápà bɛ bachi manɛm bho nɛ, mánkʉ nɔkɔ baraká bɛbʉ́. Báchi mbɔ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ árɛ̀m nɛ mmʉɛt yi bɛ, ‘Nchí mfɔ ngɔrɛ́. Mpu kɛ́nkwɛ́sɛ́! Mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ mmu anɛ ákway bɛgu mɛ̌ndi yi wáwák!’
188 “Tɛ̌ndu Bábilɔn ápànyu ɛnyu ɛyɔ, chɔŋ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́twɔ̀ ntá yi mɛ́ntwɔ mɛnkɛm ndǔ nywɔp nɛmɔt. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ chi ɛghorǐ nɛme, nɛ nsay nɛ basɛ́mɛ́ nɛwú. Chɔŋ Mandɛm mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm antáŋ yi. Chɔŋ mánsɔŋ yi nɛ ngó.
189 “Chɔŋ bafɔ̌ mmɨk abhɛn mányíɛ́ ɛpɔ̌ nɛpɛ́m, mánkʉ nɔkɔ barak ɛ́pusi nɛ yi mándi, mámfyɛ nɛkwɛsɛ́ ɛni mpok bághɔ̀ mɔ́ngo anɛ áfù anko nɔkɔ amfǎy ndǔ yi ásɔ̀ŋɔ.
1810 Chɔŋ ɛrɛm ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ yi achi arɛ́ ɛ́nkʉ bɔ́ mámbɔ́ŋ bɛcháy bɛ ɛ́kway bɛfakari nɛ bhɔ ɛnyu ɛyɔ, mánte nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ, mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ bɛ, ‘Ɛrɛm ɛ́tɔk Bábilɔn, ɛ́bɛp ntá yɛ ɛ́cha! Ndǔ mandú mpok Mandɛm atɛ́msí wɔ́ ndak yɛ ámay!’
1811 Chɔŋ bakɔ̌siɛ́ fá amɨk mandi Bábilɔn tontó mbɔnyunɛ yɛ̌ mmu apɛt apú anɛ ákù mɛnyɨŋ ɛ́syɛ bhap.
1812 Bo ɛtɔk ɛyɔ bákù nyaka batu pú, nɛ anɛ silbha, nɛ batǔ mɛnyɨŋ bɛsɔbhɛri mmʉɛt ɛbhɛn bɛ́kɔ̀t ŋwaŋwǎŋwaŋ, nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ŋwaŋwaŋ bɛ́chák. Bákù nyaka bɛyǎ ndɛn chu ɛnɛ nkáp mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu ɛnɛ babhɨŋɨ bɛ silk nkwɔ. Bákù nyaka mɛnɔk bɛyǎ nkáp nɛ ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛrɨ́tí ɛriɛp nkwɔ. Bákù nyaka nkwɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn baghoko nɛ babhaŋá nsɔk, nɛ ɛbhɛn bághókó nɛ brɔ́ns, nɛ ɛbhɛn ɛsé nɛ ɛbhɛn bághókó nɛ ɛnyǔ ntay ɛnɛn bábhɨŋɨ bɛ mábɨl.
1813 Bǒbhɔ bákù nyaka bawɛt amɛn ɛrɨ́tí ɛriɛp mbɔ amɛn bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ sínamɔn, nɛ ínsɛns nɛ mɨ́ɨ nɛ frankinsɛns. Bákù nyaka bɛyé ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛrɨ́tí ɛriɛp nɛ bɛ́kʉ̀ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛmfʉɛt anyu. Bɔ bákù nyaka mmɛ́m nɛ bawɛt nɛ fláwa nchwi, nɛ ɛnyu nchwi anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ wit. Bákù nyaka nkwɔ mpɔŋ nɛ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n nɛ mpɔŋɔ́ndɨk nɛ bɛ́kárɨk ɛbhɛn mpɔŋɔ́ndɨk ɛ́yà. Bǒbhɔ bákù nyaka bakwǎŋwaŋ nkwɔ mbɔ basɛm.
1814 Chɔŋ bakǒsiɛ mándɛm ntá bǒbhɔ bɛ, ‘Bɛrɨ́tɨ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɔ́kɔ́ŋ nyaka bɛrɔŋ mɛnkɛm. Mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn bɛ́kʉ̀ nyaka wɔ ɔ́ndɨ́ bɛsí bho bɛ́chɔŋɔ nɛ kɛnɛ́m ɛkɛ kɛnkɛm kɛnɛ́m. Ɔpú pɛrɛ kway bɛghɔ bhɔ wáwák.
1815 Chɔŋ bɛcháy mɛ́nkɛ́m bakɔ̌siɛ abhɛn bákwɛ́nɛ́ nyaka bǒ bakáp ndu bátì mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhap ntá bo Bábilɔn. Chɔŋ bɛcháy mɛ́nkɛm bɔ ɛ̌ti ɛrɛm ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ bǒ Bábilɔn bachi arɛ́, mánte nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ mándi, nɛ basɛ́mɛ́ antɨ mandɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ,
1816 Bǒ ɛtɔk Bábilɔn, ɛ́bɛp ntá yɛka ɛcha! Bákù nyaka batu pú nɛ anɛ silbha nɛ batǔ mɛnyɨŋ bɛsɔbhɛri mmʉɛt ɛbhɛn bɛ́kɔ̀t ŋwaŋwǎŋwaŋ nɛ mɛnyɨŋ mwaŋwaŋ bɛchak. Bákù nyaka bɛyǎ ndɛn chu ɛnɛ ɛya nkáp nɛ ɛchak mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu.
1817 Ndǔ mɔ́nɛŋɔkɔ́ nywɔp amɔt kɛnɛ́m ɛkɛn kɛnkɛm kɛ́rɔŋ.’ “Bǒbati baya bachwi nɛ bǒbati bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk amɛm áchwi, nɛ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk amɛm áchwí nɛ bakɔ̌siɛ abhɛn bachi amɛm áchwí báté nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ.
